Mɛi ni ŋɔɔ o-Wiemɔ,
18 min: Nyɛfea Nyɛ Weku Nikasemɔ lɛ Daa.
Kɛ mɔ ko yɛ subaŋi komɛi ni woɔ omli la lɛ, suɔmɔ baakai bo akɛ mɔ lɛ subaŋi ji nɔ ni osumɔɔɔ, shi jeee gbɔmɔ lɛ.
1: Okɛ Ohiɛ Afɔ̃ Yehowa Nɔ Kɛ Otsui Fɛɛ (w03-GA 11/1 bf.
Ogbɛɔ odɛŋ ni ohaa nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ní hiɛ kã tɔɔ kɛ nii ní etaoɔ.”
Shi mɔdɛŋbɔɔ ní akɛaawo mli lɛ sa, kɛji akɛ nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛkɛ ŋaawoo kome pɛ atsu nii yɛ be kome mli po, koni nyɛha nyɛweku nikasemɔ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ aya hiɛ fiofio.
Kɛ́ ojɛɔ osuɔmɔ mli oboɔ obii lɛ atoi yɛ sane fɛɛ sane he lɛ, obaana akɛ ewaŋ kɛhaŋ amɛ akɛ amɛkɛ bo aaagba nɔ fɛɛ nɔ he sane, ni amɛbaabi bo ŋaawoo.
No hewɔ ni Maŋtsɛ David bi ní Yehowa kɛ ehiɛ yaafonui lɛ ato wolo “tɔ” mli lɛ, ni ekɛ hekɛnɔfɔɔ bi akɛ: “Ani amɛbɛ owolo lɛ mli?”
Wiemɔ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ yitso ji, “Nyɛhaa Tsamɔ Tsɔɔmɔ lɛ Afea Nyɛshihilɛ Gbɛ.”
Te ooofee tɛŋŋ ogbála ohemɔkɛyelii lɛ amli otsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi yɛ gbɛ ni haŋ amɛmli afu nɔ?
Naa Onyɛmimɛi lɛ Tamɔ Bɔ ni Yehowa Naa Amɛ Lɛ
20 min: “Too Wolo Tɛtrɛɛ lɛ Kɛhamɔ He Shiɛmɔ Wiemɔ He Gbɛjianɔ Oha Ohe.”
“Minyɛmimɛi, kɛ́ nyɛkɛ jaramɔ shihilɛi srɔtoi kpe lɛ, nyɛbua lɛ miishɛɛ sɔŋŋ, ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nyɛhemɔkɛyeli ní aka akwɛ yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ kɛ shifimɔ baa.” —Yak.
Ekɛɛ Korintobii lɛ akɛ: “Miwiemɔ kɛ misaneshiɛmɔ lɛ hu jɛɛɛ gbɔmɛi anilee wiemɔi ni kɔneɔ mɔ yiŋ mli, shi moŋ ejɛ mumɔ kɛ hewalɛ tsɔɔmɔ mli, beni afee ni nyɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ akadamɔ gbɔmɛi anilee nɔ, shi moŋ edamɔ Nyɔŋmɔ hewalɛ nɔ.”
Bo hu obaanyɛ okɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ anyiɛ akɛ onaanyo taakɛ Noa fee lɛ.
Yesu fã ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ, kɛji okɛ onɔkeenɔ lɛ baaŋmɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ nɔ, ni okai yɛ jɛi akɛ onyɛmi kɛo teŋ yɛ sane ko lɛ, shi onɔkeenɔ lɛ yɛ jɛi yɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ hiɛ ní oya okɛ onyɛmi lɛ ayakpata dã, koni oba ní okɛ onɔkeenɔ lɛ abaha.”
Enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ esa akɛ nyɛbo nyɛfɔlɔi atoi yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni amɛkɛɔ nyɛ ní kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mlai kpãa gbee lɛ amli.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 5:29.
Elá yɛ Yehowa he akɛ: “Kɛ́ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ ni ji owaabii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ: Mɛni ji adesa, ní ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? aloo gbɔmɔ bi, ní osaraa lɛ po?”
“Mɔ Kome Ji Nyɛnuŋtsɔ, Lɛ Ji Kristo”
Ekɛɛɛ akɛ, “kɛ oseshibii lɛ,”* tamɔ nɔ ni ekɔɔ mɛi babaoo ahe.
“Nyɔŋmɔ Ji Omaŋtsɛsɛi Kɛmiiya Naanɔ”
Kɛ ojeee mɔ ni kaneɔ Biblia lɛ daa gbi lɛ, mɛni hewɔ okɛfeee osubaŋ akɛ ooofee nakai?
16:24) Eba akɛ beni osaa ohe koni oya Kaimɔ ni baa lɛ, obaaná miishɛɛ babaoo!
17 “‘Nyɛyea Blodo Ni Ashikishaŋ-sha* Bɛ Mli Gbi Jurɔ lɛ,+ ejaakɛ nɛkɛ gbi nɛɛ nɔ nɔŋŋ majie nyɛwebii babaoo* lɛ kɛje Ejipt shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
Saji pɔtɛɛ ni onine shɛɔ nɔ lɛ baaye ebua bo koni ole kɛji obaanyɛ oná hegbɛ lɛ akɛ ooonyɛ otsu he nii.
Niiamlitaomɔ ko ni afee yɛ Church of England osɔfoi lɛ ateŋ ni Australia Canberra Times lɛ bɔ he amaniɛ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, amɛteŋ “mɛi pii heee shishijee nibii ni kɔɔ Kristofoi ahemɔkɛyeli lɛ he ní akɛtsu nii kɛjɛ blema lɛ amɛyeee, nibii tamɔ oblayoo fro ni fɔ́ lɛ nɛkɛ, Yesu naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi lɛ, kɛ mesia lɛ baa ni ji enyɔ lɛ.”
Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhiŋmɛi na naakpɛɛ nii wuji ni jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ lɛ: haomɔi nyɔŋma ni ba Mizraim nɔ lɛ, bɔ ni Israel maŋ lɛ jo foi kɛtsɔ Ŋshɔ Tsuru lɛ mli, kɛ Mizraim Farao kɛ etai lɛ ahiɛkpatamɔ.
No mli lɛ Petro miiwie Yudafoi ni heee yeee ni hi shi yɛ nakai be lɛ mli—ní ekolɛ amɛteŋ mɛi komɛi ji gbekɛbii, ni mɛi krokomɛi hu edara—ni amɛnu Yesu tsɔɔmɔi lɛ, ni amɛna enaakpɛɛ nibii ni efee lɛ loo amɛnu he, ni amɛkpɛlɛɛɛ enɔ akɛ Mesia lɛ ahe.
Kɛ́ asafoku ni yɔɔ sɔlemɔwe lɛ na naakpɛɛ nii ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ, ani amɛteŋ mɔ ko baaje he ŋwane akɛ Yesu ji Mesia ni awo ehe shi lɛ?
Beni ashɛrɛ Hebribii etɛ lɛ ashwie la kɛ flɔnɔɔ ni tsoɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ahere amɛyiwala yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ mɛi fɛɛ ni kɛ amɛhiŋmɛii na naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ —ni amraloi, lumɛi, akutseiaŋ onukpai, kɛ maŋkraloi lɛ fata he lɛ —ahe jɔ̃ amɛhe naakpa.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ naakpɛɛ nii ni Yesu fee lɛ hãa wɔnaa bɔ ni jeŋ hee lɛ mli shihilɛ baafee?
Kɛ́ Yesu miifee naakpɛɛ nɔ ko lɛ, bei pii lɛ egbalaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛbaa mɔdɛŋ ni mɔ ni eyeɔ ebuaa lɛ bɔɔ lɛ nɔ: “Ohemɔkɛyeli lɛ éhere oyiwala!”
Yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ naakpɛɛ nii ko bakɔ Elisha he yɛ egbele sɛɛ po?
Andreas ni miisɔmɔ yɛ Germany lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Mina akɛ bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ tsuɔ nii ŋmɛnɛ lɛ yɛ naakpɛɛ waa.”
Nɔ Hewɔ ni Mɛi Komɛi Ayiŋ Feɔ Amɛ Kɔshikɔshi yɛ Yesu Naakpɛɛ Nii lɛ Ahe
Efeɔ naakpɛɛ nibii wuji.
(5 Mose 4:11, 12) Ni kɛlɛ, yɛ nɛkɛ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ asɛɛ be fioo mli lɛ, hii etɛ nɛɛ kanya atuatsemɔ amɛshi Yehowa kɛ etsuji ni ehala amɛ lɛ.—4 Mose 16:1-35; Lala 106:16-18.
Adebɔɔ naa nyɛmɔ ni akɛsusuɔ nii ahe ni yɔɔ gbɔmɛi lɛ ateŋ lɛ tsɔ gbohii ahe nibii krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ, mfonirii lɛ, kɛ amagai lɛ efee lɛ nibii ni awoɔ amɛhiɛnyam; gbɔmɛi kotoɔ shi yɛ amɛhiɛ, amɛshɔɔ amɛnaa, amɛsuɔ kɛnɛrɛi ni amɛshãa tsofa-kɛ-ŋma yɛ amɛhiɛ, amɛkɛ fɔfɔi fiɔ amɛ akekere, ni amɛtaoɔ naakpɛɛ nii kɛjɛɔ hewalɛ ni mumɔi atsɛmɔ lɛ naa yɛ amɛnɔ lɛ dɛŋ. . . .
Ani ole nɔ hewɔ ni Yesu fee naakpɛɛ nibii nɛɛ fɛɛ lɛ?
Amɛtsɔ hiɛ amɛna naakpɛɛ nii fɛɛ ni efee lɛ, ni amɛ́bo enitsɔɔmɔi lɛ hu atoi.
Naakpɛɛ Nii —Namɔ Hewalɛ Naa Afee Yɛ?
9 Abaanyɛ awie bɔ ni Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ yeɔ omanye kɛ bɔ ni Yehowa webii lɛ ayi faa ní amɛshwereɔ yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ he akɛ nɔ ko ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ waa.
(Yohane 11:45; 12:17) Amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛkɛ amɛhiŋmɛi na naakpɛɛ nii lɛ, ni amɛhe amɛye ni amɛye anɔkwale ni eji lɛ he odase.
Ekɛ naakpɛɛ nii tsu nii yɛ bei ni eho lɛ amli.
Lazaro ni akɛ lɛ ba wala mli ekoŋŋ lɛ he naakpɛɛ sane lɛ ha hemɔkɛyeli ni ayɔɔ yɛ Yesu kɛ gbohiiashitee lɛ mli lɛ fa babaoo.
Dani mashi maŋ nɛɛ mli lɛ, mina shwapoi enyɔ komɛi, awo ekome gbɛi akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Naakpɛɛ Nifeemɔ kɛ ekroko lɛ akɛ, Gbohiiashitee Lɛ.
(Abɛi 29:25) Omii ashɛ nɔ ni oyɔɔ lɛ he.
Ani sɔ̃ kã Yehowa nɔ akɛ efee naakpɛɛ nibii yɛ wɔgbɛfaŋ?
(1 Korintobii 14:22-25) Shi kɛlɛ, Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ etooo eyiŋ akɛ naakpɛɛ nii atsɔ Kristofoi ajamɔ lɛ fã ni hiɔ shi daa.
Nyiɛmɔ yɛ Mumɔ Naa Koni Oná Wala kɛ Hejɔlɛ
□ Mɛni hewɔ adesa toiŋjɔlɛ he mɔdɛŋbɔɔ etee nɔ efee efolo nakai lɛ?
No hewɔ lɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔkɛ amɛ abɔ naanyo, wɔye amɛ anɔkwa, ni wɔkɛ amɛ fɛɛ ahi shi yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli.
No hewɔ ni toiŋjɔlɛ yɔɔ amɛteŋ, ni asaŋ amɛnyiɛɔ jalɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ.—Yesaia 60:17.
Bill Richardson, U.S. bɔfo kɛha Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ lɛ kɛ enine tsɔɔ nɔ titri ni tsĩɔ toiŋjɔlɛ ni aaaná yɛ Boka Teŋgbɛ lɛ gbɛ, ni efo lɛ kuku akɛ: “Abɛ hekɛnɔfɔ̃ɔ.”
Yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, jeŋ hee lɛ mli shihilɛ baafee toiŋjɔlɛ, anɔkwa jalɛ, shihilɛ ni yɔɔ kpoo, kɛ shweshweeshwe.
(Yohane 17:16) Yɛ afii ohai ekpaa D.Ŋ.B. lɛ, eha eshiwoo ni ekɛtsɔ Yeremia nɔ lɛ ba mli, ni eha emaŋ krɛdɛɛ ni ehala lɛ “anɔkwale kɛ hejɔlɛ” beni esaa ekɛ amɛ ba amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛshikpɔŋ nɔ ekoŋŋ lɛ.
(b) Mɛni kɛ́ wɔfee lɛ ebaaha toiŋjɔlɛ ahi wɔteŋ, ní Yehowa ajɔɔ wɔ?
Tooi lɛ ena jɔɔmɔi babaoo kɛtsɔ toiŋjɔlɛ kpaŋmɔ ni Yehowa kɛ amɛ efee lɛ nɔ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
12 Ni kɛlɛ, “henɔ bibioo” ko yɛ ni haaa adesai anaanyobɔɔi ni toiŋjɔlɛ yɔɔ mli aya nɔ —lilɛi lɛ.
Shi wɔsumɔɔ lɛ lolo akɛ wɔnyɛmi Kristofonyo, ni wɔbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni wɔha toiŋjɔlɛ wekukpaa ahi wɔkɛ lɛ teŋ.—Okɛto Luka 17:3 he.
Wɔtoiŋ jɔɔ wɔ “Nyɛkafea yeyeeye yɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko he, shi moŋ yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ mli lɛ, nyɛtsɔa sɔlemɔ, kɛ fai ní akɛ hiɛdɔɔ kpaa, kɛ shidaa nɔ nyɛhãa Nyɔŋmɔ alea nyɛnibimɔi lɛ; ni Nyɔŋmɔ toiŋjɔlɛ ni fe niiashishinumɔi fɛɛ lɛ baatsɔ Kristo Yesu nɔ abu nyɛtsuii kɛ nyɛjwɛŋmɔi ahe.” —Filipibii 4:6, 7.
Blema Israel Maŋtsɛ Salomo je Abɛi yitso etɛ lɛ shishi kɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ akɛ: “Mibi, ohiɛ akakpa mimla lɛ nɔ, shi ha otsui ato mikitãi lɛ! Ejaakɛ gbii asɛɛjɛkɛmɔ kɛ wala afii kɛ hejɔlɛ amɛaaŋɔfata he amɛhao.”
(b) Mɛni hewɔ wɔnyɛɛɛ wɔná toiŋjɔlɛ ni sɛɛ efooo amrɔ nɛɛ?
Awie yɛ enɔyeli be lɛ he akɛ, “no mli lɛ julɔi loo nɔmɔ bɛ China, gbɔmɛi hiɔ shi yɛ heshibaa kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli.
Biblia mli tsɔsemɔ kɛ anɔkwa toiŋjɔlɛ baa
(Luka 10:5, 6) Sha·lohmʹ, loo “hejɔlɛ,” (toiŋjɔlɛ) ji Yudafoi akusum naa ŋamɔ.
Etamɔ nɔ ni abooo jamɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi ni sɔleɔ yɛ maŋ koni toiŋjɔlɛ aba lɛ asɔlemɔi atoi po.
Feemɔ bɔ ni mɔ ko baanyɛ atsɛ́ etsui eŋmɛ emli lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ.
Toiŋjɔlɛ mlifoo ni naa wa ba beni basabasafeelɔi akuu ni hiɛ tawuu nii lɛ mɔ Yesu yɛ abɔɔ ni ekɛ ekaselɔi lɛ sɔleɔ yɛ mli lɛ mli lɛ.
• Kɛ́ wɔtɔ̃ mɔ ko nɔ lɛ, te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔha toiŋjɔlɛ ahi wɔkɛ mɔ lɛ teŋ?
Ni nɔ ni ba yɛ nakai gbi lɛ mli ji ‘lá kɛ la kɛ lasu babaoo,’ hulu haaa maŋ ni efee kusuu lɛ akpɛ yɛ jetsɛremɔ mli, ni nyɔŋtsere lɛ ha akai lá ni afɔse ashwie shi, shi jeee nyɔŋtsere kpɛmɔ yɛ gbɛkɛ ni tamɔ jwiɛtɛi ni haa mɔ toiŋ jɔɔ lɛ lɛ.”
Ato Wɔhe Gbɛjianɔ Koni Wɔsɔmɔ ‘Toiŋjɔlɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Lɛ’
Mfonirifeemɔŋ paradeiso lɛ ji toiŋjɔlɛ ni nɔ bɛ ni yɔɔ anɔkwa Kristofoi ateŋ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ
Kɛfata Yehowa hiɛ duromɔ kɛ wekukpaa ni miishɛɛ yɔɔ mli ni amɛnáa mli ŋɔɔmɔ lɛ he lɛ, amɛbaanyɛ amɛkpa Maŋtsɛ David wiemɔi ni jɛ mumɔŋ lɛ mlibaa gbɛ, akɛ: “Mɛi ni he jɔ lɛ, shikpɔŋ lɛ aaatsɔ̃ amɛnɔ̃, ni amɛmii aaashɛ amɛhe yɛ hejɔlɛ babaoo mli.”
8 Kɛ́ mɔ ni he hoɔ nu lɛ tsɛ̃ lajɔ̃ eshwie mɔ ko ni he tse he lɛ, nakai mɔ lɛ afɔ etadei ahe, ekɛ nu aju ehe, ni ehe tseee kɛyashi gbɛkɛ.
7 Agbɛnɛ, Yehowa kɛɛ Gideon akɛ: “Mikɛ hii 300 ni kɛ amɛnine to amɛnaa ni amɛshɔ nu lɛ baahere nyɛ, ni mikɛ Midian baawo nyɛdɛŋ.
Aloo ani nui ni mli ejɔ ŋanii ni hoɔ kɛjɛɔ shɔŋŋ kɛbaa lɛ gbiɔ?
Kɛ́ ebɛŋkɛ lɛ fe nine lɛ, shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nu fɛɛ baatsɔ lamɔ; kɛ́ ekɛ lɛ teŋ jɛkɛ fe nine hu lɛ, fɛɛ baawa ni ebaatsɔ ais.
Amɛle hu akɛ, eji jeee Nyɔŋmɔ kulɛ, amɛnyɛŋ amɛná kɔɔyɔɔ, nu, niyenii, kɛ nibii krokomɛi fɛɛ ni haa amɛhiɔ wala mli ni amɛnáa miishɛɛ lɛ.
Ni nu baaho yɛ Yuda fai lɛ fɛɛ amli.
Yɛ enɛ sɛɛ lɛ, etsɛŋ ni Yehowa baaha Elia atsɔse Elisha, ní abaale lɛ yɛ sɛɛ mli akɛ mɔ ni “fɔse nu shwie Elia niji anɔ lɛ.”
Beni mitu kɛwo ŋshɔ lɛ mli nɔŋŋ ni mina yoo ko ni wo atade ni haa mɔ tɛoɔ nu hiɛ, ní tɛo ŋshɔ lɛ hiɛ yɛ mimasɛi.
Akɛ gbɛjianɔi ni atsɔɔ Yesu nɔ atoɔ kɛyeɔ abuaa adesai koni amɛná wala lɛ fɛɛ baatsu nii kɛmɔ shi yɛ Kristo Afii Akpe Nɔyeli lɛ mli, ni afee enɛɛmɛi ahe mfoniri akɛ “wala nu faa krɔŋŋ ni mli tse tamɔ kristalo ashwishwɛ.”
Nu afua lɛ fite nu ni wɔnuɔ lɛ fɛɛ.
Kɛkɛ ni ekɛshi sɛɛ akɛ nui lɛ ta shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ gbii 150, ni akɛ yɛ “nyɔɔŋ ni ji kpawo lɛ nɔ gbi ni ji gbi nyɔŋma kɛ kpawo lɛ nɔ lɛ adeka lɛ yama shi yɛ Ararat gɔji lɛ anɔ.”
Kɛ amɛkɛ amɛnaji mamɔ Yordan Faa lɛ mli nu lɛ mli lɛ, nu lɛ baakpa hoo.’
Nu babaoo nyɛɛɛ suɔmɔ agbe, ni fai nyɛɛɛ enɔ aha.
24 Gideon tsu mɛi kɛtee Efraim gɔji lɛ anɔ fɛɛ, ekɛɛ: “Nyɛkpelekea shi kɛyaa ni nyɛyatutuaa Midian ni nyɛŋɔ hei ni afoɔ nui lɛ yɛ lɛ kɛyashi Bet-bara kɛ Yordan.”
Kwɛmɔ jogbaŋŋ ni okaha mɔ ko loo nɔ ko miishɔ̃ nu ni jara wa ni anaa nɛɛ kɛmiijɛ odɛŋ.—Filipibii 1:9, 10.
Be fɛɛ be lɛ, okɛ samala kɛ nu afɔ odɛ̃ dani oye nii, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu kɛ́ otee niiasɛɛ oba.
• Mɛni nibii ni jejee amɛhe, kɛ srɔtofeemɔi, yɔɔ Yesu baptisimɔ lɛ kɛ ŋmɛnɛ nu mli baptisimɔ lɛ teŋ?
Yohane nu ni bɔfo ko kɛɛ yɛ nakai ninaa lɛ nɔŋŋ mli akɛ: “Ba, ni matsɔɔo ajwamaŋ kpeteŋkpele lɛ ni ta nui babaoo lɛ anɔ lɛ kojomɔ lɛ, mɔ ni shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ maŋtsɛmɛi lɛ kɛbɔ ajwamaŋ, ni mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ tɔrɔ daa kɛ ejwamaŋbɔɔ lɛ daa lɛ.”
17 “Mɛi ni nii yɔɔ mɔbɔ lɛ kɛ ohiafoi lɛ miitao nu, shi eko bɛ.
Beni Odasefoi ni yɔɔ Equatorial Guinea lɛ kɛ ekãa yaa nɔ amɛduɔ, ni amɛshwieɔ anɔkwale dumɔwu lɛ nɔ nu lɛ, amɛyɛ nɔmimaa akɛ ‘Nyɔŋmɔ baaha eya nɔ eshwere.’

(Romabii 13:1) Shi kɛlɛ, kɛ́ hegbɛi nɛɛ fã amɛ koni amɛfee nɔ ni teɔ shi ewoɔ Nyɔŋmɔ mla lɛ, ‘amɛboɔ Nyɔŋmɔ moŋ toi fe gbɔmɛi.’—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 5:29.
Yɛ 1918 mli beni miye aaafee afii enumɔ lɛ, Awo he wolokpoi ni yitso ji Studies in the Scriptures, ni Charles T.
Nakai nɔŋŋ hu akɛ jwɛŋmɔŋ hiɛshikamɔ kpɛɔ yiŋ jogbaŋŋ yɛ nɔ ni esa akɛ afee he beni kaai teɔ shi lɛ yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ shihilɛi ni haomɔ ko bɛ mli lɛ amli.
9 Yɛ Mose gbii lɛ amli, beni Nilo Faa lɛ tsɔ la lɛ, Mizraimbii lɛ yatao nui krokomɛi amɛnu koni amɛkɛhi wala mli.
Beni Mose bi akɛ eha ena E-nunyam lɛ, Yehowa ha hetoo akɛ: “Onyɛŋ mihiɛ ona; shi mɔ ko mɔ ko enaŋ mi, ní eyi aaaná wala.”
Shi kɛ́ mɔ fɔŋ tsake, otsui nyaa.
Mɛni baaba kɛ́ be shɛ ni Yehowa kɛ kojomɔ baaba lɛ?
“Mɛɛ be mli nibii nɛɛ baaba, ni mɛni baafee beni oba lɛ kɛ nibii agbɛjianɔtoo nɛɛ naagbee lɛ he okadi?”—MATEO 24:3, New World Translation.
Kɛ́ gbekɛbii kpa shi amɛna akɛ amɛfɔlɔi lɛ haa amɛ “hɛɛ” feɔ hɛɛ ni amɛ “dabi” feɔ dabi—kɛ́ no biɔ ni amɛgbala gbekɛbii lɛ atoi po lɛ—ehaa gbekɛbii lɛ nuɔ he akɛ amɛyɛ shweshweeshwe diɛŋtsɛ, ni amɛnáa bulɛ kɛ suɔmɔ babaoo amɛhaa amɛfɔlɔi lɛ.—Mateo 5:37.
Be ni Yesu tsɔɔ ekaselɔi lɛ bɔ ni asɔleɔ ahãa lɛ, mɛɛ nibii ekɛɛ esa akɛ nomɛi ahe ahia amɛ fe nibii krokomɛi fɛɛ?
Wɔkpeee dɔŋŋ aahu kɛyashi afi 1948 afi lɛ shishijee mli, beni eha mi wolo bibioo ko ni gbɛi ji “The Prince of Peace” (Toiŋjɔlɛ Lumɔ Lɛ) lɛ.
(Kpojiemɔ 19:11-16, 19-21) Nɔ ni bɔfo Petro wie yɛ be mli ni ekpaa nibii ni naasɔomɔ ni ji ekpaa lɛ naatsemɔ feɔ he mfoniri lɛ agbɛ lɛ maa enɛ nɔ mi: “Shi ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ni yɔɔ nɛɛ, lɛ nɔŋŋ ewiemɔ akɛto amɛ aha la, ni akɛ amɛ eto kɛyaashi kojomɔ kɛ gbɔmɛi ni kwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ahiɛkpatamɔ lɛ nɔ.”
Beni Yesu je esɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ shishi lɛ, eeenyɛ efee akɛ mɛi komɛi yɔse akɛ yɛ Daniel gbalɛ lɛ naa lɛ, be ni esa akɛ Kristo lɛ apue lɛ eshɛ etã.

Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni henɔwolɔ lɛ kɛ heshibaa aaakɛɛ, “Mitɔ̃; ofainɛ kɛke mi” lɛ, ejieɔ enaa.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni amɛaawie naagba loo béi ko ni yɔɔ amɛ kɛ amɛfɔlɔi ateŋ ni miigba amɛnaa lɛ he lɛ, amɛteŋ mɛi oha mlijaa 95 kɛɛ amɛbaakɛɛ amɛfɔlɔi akɛ: “Ofainɛ, kɛke mi” kɛ “Misumɔɔ bo waa.”—Wolo ni ji For Parents Only, ni Shaunti Feldhahn kɛ Lisa Rice ŋma lɛ.
(Daniel 2:44) Ákɛ nakai ŋwɛi nɔyeli lɛ nɔ Maŋtsɛ lɛ, Yesu ‘baana ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efĩ lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ebaahere mɛi ni efĩ amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.
Ni kɛ́ bo onɔ atɔ̃, ni mɔ ni tɔ̃ onɔ lɛ jɛ etsuiŋ ekpa bo fai akɛ “Ofainɛ, okɛ mihe ake mi” lɛ, no lɛ bo hu jɛɛ heshibaa mli ni okɛke lɛ.
Toohelɔ lɛ he eshai lɛ miidɔ lɛ waa, ni ekɛ awerɛho shimɔ etsitsi.
(Romabii 12:1) Shi kɛlɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ Bi lɛ, ni naa “ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efĩ lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ” lɛ, biii babaoo yɛ wɔdɛŋ fe bɔ ni wɔɔnyɛ wɔkɛha; ni Yehowa hu efeee nakai.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ewaaa kwraa akɛ wɔbaawo shihilɛi ni mli wawai ni wɔkɛkpeɔ lɛ he ni wɔbaaje shishi wɔna wɔhe mɔbɔ.
Yohane baptisiɔ mɛi ni taoɔ amɛtsɔɔ akɛ nibii fɔji ni amɛfee lɛ edɔ amɛ waa lɛ.
Eeena ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efi lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ehere mɛi ni efi amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.
Beni Yesu na asafo babaoo lɛ, emusuŋ tsɔ̃ lɛ yɛ amɛ hewɔ.
*+ Kaana* amɛ mɔbɔ,+ ni kaasɔmɔ amɛnyɔŋmɔi lɛ,+ ejaakɛ no baatsɔ bo tsɔne.
Beni Maŋtsɛ Dario na ele nɔ hewɔ ni hii nɛɛ taoɔ ni afee mla lɛ, edɔ lɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Yehowa eto etsui shi koni ashiɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa lɛ kɛkpele jeŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ, taakɛ eha ashiɛ atsɔɔ hii 120,000 ni yɔɔ Ninive lɛ, ejaakɛ enuɔ he ehaa mɛi “ni leee amɛninejurɔ kɛ amɛbɛku” lɛ.
(2 Samuel 12:1-13) Be fɛɛ be ni matɔ̃ lɛ, misusuɔ nakai amaniɛbɔɔ lɛ he, ni no haa efeɔ mlɛo kɛhaa mi akɛ masɔle kɛkpa Yehowa fai.
Be ni mina akɛ gbo migboɔ lɛ, misɔle akɛ: “Yehowa, miikpa bo fai akɛ mikɛ hiɛdɔɔ susuuu o-Wiemɔ lɛ he.
Yona ‘mli wo la’ yɛ hulu ni shãa lɛ lɛ hewɔ.
Ewa kɛha mɛi komɛi akɛ amɛaakɛɛ akɛ, “Edɔ mi.
Agbɛnɛ edɔ Onesimo waa akɛ ejo foi.
Lalatsɛ lɛ gba akɛ Yesu ‘baana ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efĩ lɛ mɔbɔ.’
Beni Paulo kɛ Sila yɔɔ tsũ ni yɔɔ sɛɛgbɛ lɛ mli lɛ, amɛkɛ nakai be lɛ ewieee nɔ ni amɛyɔɔ yɛ shihilɛ mli lɛ he loo ni amɛaana amɛhe mɔbɔ.
Gbi fɛɛ gbi ni ebaanyiɛ hiɛ yɛ ŋmalɛi lɛ amli ni akwɛɔ daa leebi yɛ Betel lɛ, bei pii lɛ, jwɛŋmɔ kpakpa ni ehiɛ kɛ bɔ ni esumɔɔ wala ehã lɛ jeɔ kpo yɛ hiɛkpamɔ wiemɔi ni ekɛtsuɔ nii lɛ mli akɛ: “Eyɛ miishɛɛ akɛ wɔyɛ wala mli ní wɔmiisɔmɔ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛkãlɔ lɛ.”
Ni mibɔɔ mɔdɛŋ hu ni mana gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ kpakpa kɛtsɔ kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔ nɔ daa leebi, ni mifeɔ enɛ kɛtsɔɔ atrakwei lɛ ni mikwɔɔ fe ni madamɔ tsɔne ni woɔ wɔ kɛyaa nsɔɔdoi lɛ anɔ lɛ nɔ, kɛ nyiɛmɔ titri shii abɔ, bɔ ni manyɛ beni miyaa shiɛmɔ lɛ.”
10 Nyɛkɛ loo lɛ eko akatoa ní je tsɛre nɔ, shi kɛ́ eko shwɛ kɛyashi leebi lɛ, nyɛkɛ la ashãa.
21 Bei komɛi lɛ, atatu lɛ hiɔ shi kɛjɛ gbɛkɛ kɛyashi leebi pɛ, ni kɛ́ atatu lɛ wó ehe nɔ leebi lɛ, amɛfãa.
+ Feemɔ enɛ leebi fɛɛ leebi.
Etsĩɛɔ mi daa leebi;
+ 27 Amɛhiɔ hei ni amɛtsuɔ nii yɛ, yɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shĩa lɛ he, nyɔɔŋ muu fɛɛ, ejaakɛ amɛ ni amɛbuɔ he, ni amɛ ni amɛhiɛɔ enaa samfee lɛ, ni amɛ ni amɛgbeleɔ shĩa lɛ daa leebi.
Russell pue kɛha leebi jamɔ yɛ Brooklyn, New York, Betel weku lɛ hiɛ yɛ October 2, 1914 leebi lɛ, ekɛ adafitswaa ko ni hɛleɔ mɔ shi ha: “Jeŋmaji Abe lɛ eba naagbee; amɛmaŋtsɛmɛi lɛ eye amɛgbi lɛ amɛta.”
(2 Petro 3:13) Ebaafee tamɔ leebi la, beni hulu lɛ kpɛɔ, ni atatui bɛ mli lɛ.
2 Saamɔ ohe oto leebi, ejaakɛ leebi lɛ obaakwɔ kɛya Sinai Gɔŋ lɛ nɔ ni oyadamɔ mihiɛ yɛ jɛmɛ, yɛ gɔŋ lɛ yiteŋ.
No hewɔ lɛ Kunihito naa kpɛ ehe waa yɛ March 8, 1996 leebi, beni akɛɛ lɛ akɛ kojomɔ he lɛ kɛ eyiŋkpɛɛ baaha nakai leebi lɛ.
Eshɛɔ bei komɛi ni ejeɔ nitsumɔ shishi leebi maaŋkpa, ni etsuɔ nii aahu gbi muu fɛɛ, ni etsaa nɔ kɛyashiɔ nyɔɔŋ teŋ, ni ebaa shia enɔ leebi maaŋkpa ŋmɛji enumɔ.
21 Leebi fɛɛ leebi lɛ, amɛyaloɔ eko, mɔ fɛɛ mɔ loɔ bɔ ni ebaanyɛ eye.
20 Ni leebi lɛ, be ni eshɛ be ni akɛshãa leebi ŋmaa* afɔle+ lɛ, nu jɛ Edom gbɛ kɛba trukaa, ni nu lɛ yi shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ fɛɛ obɔ.
Gbalɛ lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ, Yehowa tsĩɛɔ e-Bi lɛ hiɛ “daa leebi.”
30 Amɛdamɔɔ shi daa leebi+ ni amɛdaa Yehowa shi ni amɛjieɔ eyi, ni nakai nɔŋŋ amɛfeɔ daa gbɛkɛnaashi.
Mɛi lɛ ‘kã he amɛkɛ tsuijurɔnaa nikeenii hu baa daa leebi.’
Misusuma miimɛ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ fe bɔ ni bulɔi mɛɔ jetsɛremɔ, fe bɔ ni bulɔi mɛɔ jetsɛremɔ.
2 Mose 36:3 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Ni nɔwomɔ nikeenii lɛ fɛɛ, ní Israelbii lɛ kɛba ni akɛtsu hekrɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ sɔɔmɔ lɛ he nitsumɔ lɛ, amɛhe yɛ Mose dɛŋ, ní amɛŋɔfee. Ni amɛsaa amɛkã he amɛkɛ tsuijurɔnaa nikeenii hu miiba lolo daa leebi.”
Gbalɛ lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Etsĩɛɔ mi daa leebi, etsĩɛɔ mitoi, ni mikɛnu nii tamɔ nikaselɔi.”
Ejaakɛ ebaaho daa leebi,

Daa leebi lɛ, ehãa aleɔ ekojomɔi lɛ,+
10 No hewɔ lɛ, okɛ onuŋtsɔ tsuji ni kɛ bo ba lɛ ate shi leebi maŋkpa; nyɛtea shi leebi maŋkpa kɛ́ jeŋ tse nɔŋŋ, ni nyɛyi mli.”
Beni nɔyelɔ ko tsɛ lɛ akɛ “Tsɔɔlɔ Kpakpa,” ni ekɛ wiemɔ ‘ekpakpa’ tsu nii akɛ sabala lɛ, Yesu jaje lɛ ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Mɔ kpakpa ko bɛ akɛ ja mɔ kome, lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ.”
Nihɔɔmɔ agbai kɛ nihɔɔlɔi ohai abɔ eto srɛnɛɛ yɛ gbɛjegbɛi lɛ ahe kɛ amɛjarayeli nibii: obaana shitɔ tsuji kɛ shitɔ ŋmilikitii kɛ eŋmɔmii bua shi kuikui, kɛntɛŋi ni eyimɔ obɔbɔ kɛ ameo tsuji, redio srɔtoi, akataŋwiai, samala tsei, wiigi srɔtoi, nihoomɔ tsɛŋsii, kɛ obroniwaawu aspaaterei kɛ atadei.
+ 8 Ni bɔɔ nii ejwɛ ni hiɛ kamɔ lɛ ateŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ yɛ fiji ekpaa; ni amɛfiji lɛ ahe kɛ amɛmli eyimɔ obɔbɔ kɛ hiŋmɛii sɔŋŋ.
Ekolɛ yitsei ejwɛ hiɛ akoloŋtoi kome kome ni yitsei etɛ hu hiɛ akoloŋtoi enyɔnyɔ.
Amɛyɔse akɛ ŋwɛi bɔfoi ejwɛ ni bɔfo Yohane na yɛ gbalɛ ninaa mli lɛ ‘hiɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɔɔyɔi ejwɛ lɛ mli koni kɔɔyɔɔ ko akatswa yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.’
Afii ejwɛ dani abaafɔ mi lɛ, mifɔlɔi lɛ kɛ Mormon maŋsɛɛ sɔɔlɔi kpe.
(Kpojiemɔ 4:1) Nakai “gbee ni tamɔ nugbɔshimɔ gbee” lɛ miitsɛ mɛi krokomɛi ni yɔɔ ninai sɔrɔtoi ejwɛ ni baaba lɛ mli klɛŋklɛŋ nɔ lɛ mli lɛ.
Mina bɔ ni asafo ni mihi mli klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ eshwere ni aja mli shii ejwɛ sɔŋŋ, ni atsu shiɛlɔi kɛ gbɛgbalɔi, kɛ mɛi komɛi akɛ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi kɛjɛ jɛmɛ kɛtee hei ni yɔɔ shɔŋŋ tamɔ Bolivia, Laos, kɛ Uganda.
Abaanyɛ ajara nibii titrii ejwɛ nɛɛ hu amli ni aná nibii krokomɛi.
Lalai ni yɔɔ wɔ lala wolo ni wɔyɔɔ bianɛ, ni ji, Sing Praises to Jehovah lɛ mli lɛ, kɛ lala gbee gbɛɛmɔi sɔrɔtoi ejwɛ lɛ tsuɔ nii lolo, kɛha mɛi ni sumɔɔ ni amɛkɛ lala gbee gbɛɛmɔi ejwɛ lɛ ala lɛ asɛɛnamɔ.
Be ko lɛ, Paulo kɛ Kristofoi krokomɛi ejwɛ tee sɔlemɔwe lɛ koni amɛyatsuu amɛhe yɛ kusum naa.
(Abɛi 2: 10-12) Nakai pɛpɛɛpɛ Yehowa kɛha gbekɛbii anɔkwafoi ejwɛ lɛ koni ewula amɛ kɛha nɔ ni kã amɛhiɛ lɛ.
Wɔnine shɛ anɔkwalei ni kɔɔ naakpɛɛ nibii ni Yesu fee lɛ ahe lɛ nɔ kɛtsɔ Sanekpakpai ejwɛ lɛ anɔ.
10 Yɛ Hebribii 13:7, 17 lɛ ní atsɛ yisɛɛ kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ, bɔfo Paulo tsɔɔ yiŋtoi ejwɛ ahewɔ ni esa akɛ wɔbo nɔkwɛlɔi ni yɔɔ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli lɛ atoi ni wɔba wɔhe shi wɔha amɛ.
Kɛjɛ afi 1981 kɛbaa nɛɛ, akɛ nibii srɔtoi ni anáa kɛjɛɔ lá fãi titri lɛ amli (nibii srɔtoi ni anáa kɛjɛɔ lá fãi ejwɛ titri lɛ amli) lɛ babaoo etsu nii yɛ tsofafeemɔ mli.
Samai komɛi ni aye yɛ Mizraim saŋi ko ni eye fe afii akpei ejwɛ lɛ he lɛ kɔɔ woloŋmalɔi anitsumɔ lɛ he.
Yiŋkpɛɛ ni nilee yɔɔ mli nɛ, ejaakɛ afii ejwɛ pɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Roma asraafoi lɛ ku amɛsɛɛ amɛba ekoŋŋ, ni Tatsɛ Tito nyiɛ amɛhiɛ.
Bɔfo Yohane na “ŋwɛibɔfoi ejwɛ damɔ shikpɔŋ koji ejwɛ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛhiɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɔɔyɔi ejwɛ lɛ mli” yɛ ninaa mli.
Enɛ ba mli diɛŋtsɛ yɛ nɔ ni fe afii 200 sɛɛ beni Alexander Kpeteŋkpele lɛ gbo ni aja emaŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli ejwɛ aha etatsɛmɛi ejwɛ koni amɛye nɔ lɛ.—Daniel 8:3-8, 20-25.
(b) Mɛni ji yiŋtoo ní yɔɔ bokagbɛ maŋtsɛmɛi ejwɛ lɛ atutuamɔ lɛ sɛɛ?
* Wolo nɛɛ kɛ Kristo shihilɛ kɛ etsɔɔmɔi, ni damɔ Sanekpakpai ejwɛ lɛ fɛɛ nɔ lɛ haa yɛ be ni saji lɛ ba lɛ ahe gbɛjianɔtoo pɛpɛɛpɛ naa.
Enɛ kɔɔ haomɔi ni klɛŋklɛŋ tɛtrɛmaŋtɛrɛi ejwɛ lɛ ni akpa lɛ kɔɔ he lɛ, nɔ ni hao shikpɔŋ lɛ, ŋshɔ lɛ, ŋshɔ mli bɔɔ nii, nu bui kɛ faai kɛ ŋwɛi la kpɛmɔ jɛɛhei lɛ amlijai etɛ mli ekome lɛ he.
Beni wɔfɔ́ bii ejwɛ lɛ shikome lɛ, wɔbiyei onukpai ejwɛ lɛ kɛ asafo lɛ ye amɛbua wɔ
Gbɛjianɔtoo ni damɔ Biblia lɛ nɔ lɛ tsara nɔ gbii etɛ kɛha mɛi ni tee kpokpaa wulu nɔ kpee lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo, kɛ gbii ejwɛ kɛha mɛi ni nyɛ amɛtee majimaji ateŋ kpeei krɛdɛɛi lɛ.
Samuel eye aaafee afii ejwɛ loo afii enumɔ pɛ.
Mɛi ejwɛ lɛ onukpai ji amɛ, ni amɛteŋ mɛi enyɔ hu ji daa gbɛgbalɔi, ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni Abɛi 17:6 ji anɔkwale ha, akɛ: “Hiimeji akekre ji bii abii, ni bii ahiɛnyam ji amɛtsɛmɛi.”
Sanekpakpai ejwɛ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ ehi shi yɛ yinɔsane be pɔtɛɛ ko ni atsɔɔ mli fitsofitso ni ja mli.
Nyɛkahaa amɛkwɛa bɔlɛnamɔ jeŋba sha nifeemɔi, amɛtswaa gemii ni yiwalɛ nifeemɔi yɔɔ mli, amɛkwɛɔ mumɔi atsɛmɔ nifeemɔi, ní amɛkɛ mɛi ni esaaa bɔɔ yɛ Intanɛt lɛ nɔ, akɛni nyɛbɛ dekã ni nyɛsumɔɔɔ ni amɛgbáa nyɛnaa lɛ hewɔ.

Ŋoo Ŋshɔ (Ŋshɔ Ni Egbo)
Afɔ́ Nyɛminuu Swingle yɛ November 6, 1910 yɛ Lincoln, Nebraska, shi no sɛɛ lɛ, etsɛɛɛ ni weku lɛ shi kɛtee Salt Lake City yɛ Utah.

F10 Ŋoo Ŋshɔ (Ŋshɔ ni Egbo)
+ Ni nuhiŋmɛi ni ŋoo yɔɔ mli hu nyɛŋ aba nuŋma.
He ko ni jwɛi kɛ ehe ŋmei yɔɔ, he ko ni ŋoobu yɔɔ, kɛ shikpɔŋ ni akɛfeee nɔ ko kɛmiiya naanɔ.
Amɛye maji enumɔ lɛ fɛɛ anɔ kunim, ni “[amɛbua] amɛhe naa yɛ Sidim jɔɔ ní etsɔ Ŋoo ŋshɔ agbɛnɛ lɛ mli.”
Mikɛ woji wuji kɛ woji tɛtrɛbii hɔlɔ miŋwɛi atade loo shɛt lɛ mli obɔ, kɛkɛ ni miloo ŋoo miwo kotoku mli, kɛkɛ ni mikɛje ŋoo hɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ shishi.
Biblia lɛ woɔ wɔ ŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛhaa nyɛwiemɔ he abaa nyam daa, ni ŋoo ahi mli, ni nyɛle bɔ ni sa akɛ nyɛhaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ hetoo.”—Kolosebii 4:6.
Ŋmalɛi lɛ woɔ wɔ ŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛhaa nyɛwiemɔ he abaa nyam daa, ni ŋoo ahi mli, ni nyɛle bɔ ni sa akɛ nyɛhaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ hetoo.”
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛji ŋoo naanu gbo lɛ, “sũ mli nibii falɛ ko” baanyɛ ashwɛ yɛ sɛɛ.

Bi ohe akɛ, ‘Ani mikɛ otii komɛi emamɔ mihiɛ, ekolɛ nɔ̃ ni mikɛto mitsuiŋ tɔ̃ɔ po, akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ mikɛ mihe baawo heloonaa nitsumɔ ko mli waa koni maná gbɛ́i, loo mafee nakai wɔsɛɛ?’

Ekolɛ nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛkɛ nɛkɛ shika nɛɛ atsu nii koni nyɛkɛhe wolo kome nyɛha gbekɛyoo bibioo ni ji mitipɛŋfonyo.”
Ekolɛ, enu he akɛ ehe miihia ni ena ŋaawoo kɛjɛ mɔ ko ni yɔɔ niiashikpamɔ babaoo ŋɔɔ.
Aleee nɔ ekolɛ ooona yelikɛbuamɔ kɛjɛ amɛdɛŋ . . .
Etswa efai shi waa akɛ bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ eheŋ lá kɔkɔɔkɔ, shi etsofafeelɔ lɛ wo lɛ hewalɛ koni ekpɛlɛ lá fãi titri lɛ ateŋ eko nɔ, ekolɛ wala yibii tsuji ni akɛwo rɔba kotoku mli lɛ nɛkɛ.
Mɛi pii nuɔ he yɛ kpokpaa nɛɛ nɔ akɛ ehe miihia ni amɛfee nɔ ko ni amɛkɛto nifeemɔi kɛ miishɛɛnamɔi ni ŋmɛɛ amɛ tsutsu ko lɛ najiaŋ.
Ekolɛ yoo nɛɛ ji mɔ ni taoɔ abo jamɔ hee, ni ji Kristojamɔ toi lɛ.
Ekolɛ beni maku misɛɛ be kroko lɛ, no mli lɛ shihilɛ lɛ baatsake; ekolɛ mɔ lɛ ena miishɛɛ ni ebaasumɔ ni ebo toi.”

“Nyɔŋmɔ aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ.” —Kpojiemɔ 21:4.
Yehowa gbeɔ nɔtɔmɔi yɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehewɔ.

Oheɔ shiwoo akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ baatsumɔ wɔhiɛ yaafonui; ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ; ni ŋkɔmɔyeli, bolɔmɔ kɛ nɔnaa ko hu bɛ dɔŋŋ lɛ hu oyeɔ.

Nakai naagbee wiemɔ kuku lɛ ji Hela feemɔ-wiemɔ ní shishinumɔ baanyɛ afee “atsumɔ, . . . afo mli loo akpata hiɛ” lɛ shishitsɔɔmɔ.
“Eeemi gbele kɛaatee naanɔ; ni Nuntsɔ Yehowa aaatsumɔ hiɛaŋ fɛɛ yaafonui.”

‘Ná oblahiiaŋ ŋa lɛ he miishɛɛ’

Yesu hã ana akɛ, ebaabi ni aye abua mɛi koni amɛnu nɔ ni etsɔɔ lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ.
Shi wɔle nibii saŋŋ ni baanyɛ aha wɔna hekɛnɔfɔɔ akɛ Yehowa nuɔ wɔ shishi lɛlɛŋ, ni yelikɛbuamɔ hu ni ekɛhaa wɔ lɛ ji ekpakpa fe fɛɛ ni wɔɔná. —Yesaia 48: 17, 18.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ nyɛmimɛi hii baanyɛ atsɔ amɛkɛ wumɛi ni jeee Odasefoi shi amɛyɛ anɔkwale lɛ he miishɛɛ fioo lɛ agba sane?
Kɛ manyɛ lɛ, masumɔ ni mikɛ minitii fioo ko atsɔɔ bɔ ni wolo nɛɛ baanyɛ aye abua bo koni onu Biblia mli saji ni he hiaa nɛɛ ashishi.”
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ehe miihia ni asafoŋ onukpai afee ekãa be ni amɛtsuɔ saji ni kɔɔ eshai ni yɔɔ hiɛdɔɔ ahe lɛ ahe nii loo amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa mɛi ni yɔɔ helatsamɔhe ni amɛwala eyaje oshara mli lɛ.
Ebaanyɛ eye ebua bo ni oye omanye.
Ŋamɛi lɛ ekomɛi nyɛ amɛkɛ amɛwumɛi tee, ni amɛyaye amɛbua amɛ yɛ tsumaa nitsumɔhe lɛ, ni mɛi krokomɛi hu yɛ bii ni miiya skul ni esa akɛ amɛkwɛ amɛ aloo weku lɛ nitsumɔ ni esa akɛ amɛtsu.
Kɛ́ ojie musuŋtsɔlɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishemɔ yɔɔ mli kpo ni ogba mɛi krokomɛi anɔkwalei ni jara wa ni yɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli lɛ, obaanyɛ oye obua mɛi ni yeɔ awerɛho lɛ koni amɛná miishɛjemɔ kɛ ekãawoo kɛjɛ “miishɛjemɔ fɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ,” Yehowa ŋɔɔ.—2 Korintobii 1:3.
•Te aaafee tɛŋŋ aye abua gbekɛbii koni amɛná amɛkɛ Yehowa teŋ wekukpaa ni bɛŋkɛ?
Shi gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi hu ni kɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ naagbai miikpe yɛ oshara ko loo yɛ henumɔŋ naagbai ni haa mɔ haoɔ waa hewɔ lɛ baanyɛ amɛkɛ shishitoo mlai ni yɔɔ sane nɛɛ mli lɛ atsu nii.
Wa humii ni amɛkɛ
Shi yelikɛbuamɔ ni amɛkɛhaa kɛtsɔ Ŋmalɛ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ hu yeɔ ebuaa ni atsuɔ adesa hiamɔ nii kroko hu he nii.
Nyɛhaa wɔsusua bɔ ni Yesu fee nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa kɛtsɔ ewiemɔ ni ekɛtswa mɛi krokomɛi ema shi kɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ni ekɛha amɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ he wɔkwɛa.
Nyɛminuu ko wie akɛ ekase nibii babaoo ni aaaha ejaje loo etsake esu kɛ baŋ yɛ afi pɛ mli yɛ Betel fe afii etɛ ni eye yɛ he kroko.
Yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Biblia lɛ kanemɔ kɛ ekasemɔ yeɔ ebuaa wɔ ni wɔbatsɔmɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ he sɔɔlɔi kpakpai?
No ye ebua mi ni mikɛ bulɛ ha lɛ.”
(1 Mose 1:28; 2:15) Nyɔŋmɔ ha Adam gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔ, koni eye ebua lɛ ni enyɛ etsu nɛkɛ nitsumɔ kpele nɛɛ, ni ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ amɛfɔ, ni amɛyi afa ni amɛye shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
Kɛji wɔnyiɛ esɛɛ lɛ, ebaaye ebua wɔ koni wɔná mligbɛ toiŋjɔlɛ, ní nɔ ni fata he ji hekɛnɔfɔɔ gbɛkpamɔ akɛ aaana toiŋjɔlɛ kwraa wɔsɛɛ—ni baatsɔɔ akɛ basabasafeemɔ, tawuu, kɛ awuiyeli ehiŋ shi dɔŋŋ.
(Hiob 38:1-11) Jeee adesa ŋaalɔ ko ta shi ni esusu bɔ ni esa akɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ dalɛ afee, ni asaŋ eyelikɛbuamɔ bɛ mli ni afee.
(1 Petro 3:21) Nɛkɛ nifeemɔi nɛɛ ni wɔɔha ahi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli lɛ baaye abua wɔ koni wɔkɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔ ama mɔdɛŋ ni wɔɔya nɔ wɔbɔ be fɛɛ be, koni wɔhi shi yɛ wɔ henɔjɔɔmɔ lɛ naa, ni wɔya nɔ wɔsɔmɔ Yehowa kɛ tsui ni efi shi shiŋŋ.
Mɛni Yehowa feɔ kɛyeɔ ebuaa wɔ koni wɔnyɛ wɔshiɛ?
Mɛɛ yelikɛbuamɔ Yehowa kɛha yɛ Tabera, ni yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Ni kɛlɛ, eji nɔ ni yeɔ ebuaa kɛji wɔnu bɔ ni mɛi krokomɛi kpɛ amɛyiŋ yɛ saji ni tamɔ wɔnɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ lɛ he amɛha lɛ.
Mikɛ miŋa tee nɔ aahu kɛ wɔ daa gbi weku Biblia mli nikasemɔ lɛ, ni enɛ ye ebua wɔ waa diɛŋtsɛ.

7, 8. (a) Mɛɛ odaseyeli yɔɔ ni tsɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ webii ‘eha amɛtaŋkpei lɛ ekɛlɛ’?
Nyɛminuu Swingle kɛɛ: “Eji niiashikpamɔ ni tsɔɔ heshibaa akɛ aaaba biɛ ni aná be koni akɛbo nitsɔɔmɔ toi,” ni ekɛfata he akɛ: “Nyɛshiɔ biɛ nyɛyaa be mli ni awaje nyɛ jogbaŋŋ koni nyɛkɛwo Yehowa nɔ gojoo.”
Ni nyɛsɔlea nyɛbia Nyɔŋmɔ yelikɛbuamɔ koni nyɛna nɛkɛ suɔmɔ ni nɔ kwɔ, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yibii nɛɛ eko.—Abɛi 3:5, 6; Yohane 17:3; Galatabii 5:22; Hebribii 10:24, 25.
Harmagedon ta lɛ jeee nifeemɔ ko ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛbaaye mɛi awui.
Yɛ maji komɛi anɔ lɛ, kɛ́ mɔ ko tsɛ mɔ ko ni ye lɛ onukpa lɛ gbɛi kpeŋ lɛ, etsɔɔɔ bulɛ, bɛja mɔ lɛ eha hegbɛ akɛ etsɛ lɛ nakai.
Akɛni eboteko gbalashihilɛ mli hewɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni enɛ aaaba mliŋ, akɛni mileee nuu nɛɛ?”
Kɛji akɛ amɛjɛ odehei awekukpaa mli loo jeee nakai hu lɛ, jwɛŋmɔ yɛ mli akɛ aaasusu akɛ kɛ hoo lɛ amɛjɛ wekui ni he hiaa ni yɔɔ hegbɛ lɛ amli.

Jiemɔ mplaŋ lɛ yɛ bo diɛŋtsɛ ohiŋmɛi mli klɛŋklɛŋ, kɛkɛ lɛ, obaana faŋŋ bɔ ni ooofee ojie jwɛi hwiaa ni yɔɔ onyɛmi lɛ hiŋmɛi mli lɛ.” —Luka 6:39-42.
Egbɛɔ efiji amli ni efilikiɔ kɛnyiɛɔ ebii lɛ ayiteŋ yɛ amɛtsũ lɛ mli, ni ekɛ hiŋmɛii ní miikwɛ nii jogbaŋŋ kwɛɔ akɛ eeena oshara ko he okadi ko lo.
Yɛ be mli ni wɔhaa wɔhiɛ hiɔ Paradeiso ni kã wɔhiɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛhaa wɔnáa mumɔŋ hegbɛi ni Yehowa kɛha wɔ bianɛ lɛ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ kɛmɔa shi.
▪ Feemɔ ohiɛ ŋmɔlɔŋmɔlɔ kɛkwɛ mɔ lɛ hiɛ, ni owie sane ko ni nyɛyi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ baaná he miishɛɛ

38 “Nyɛnu akɛ akɛɛ akɛ: ‘Akɛ hiŋmɛi ato hiŋmɛi najiaŋ, ni akɛ nyanyɔŋ ato nyanyɔŋ najiaŋ.’

7 Akɛni dumɔwu ni aduɔ lɛ ji “maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he wiemɔ lɛ” hewɔ lɛ, yibii ni awoɔ lɛ ji wiemɔ lɛ gbɛɛ-kɛ-shwamɔ, ehe ni awieɔ atsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi.
Feemɔ onii tamɔ mɛi ni bɔfo Paulo shiɛ etsɔɔ amɛ ni ‘amɛkpaa Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli daa amɛkwɛɔ akɛ nibii ni amɛkaseɔ lɛ yɛ mli nakai lo’ lɛ. —Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 17:11.
Biblia lɛ wieɔ hei babaoo he, tamɔ Israel, Mizraim, kɛ Hela.
Wɔ Kristofoi ajeŋba lɛ he saji ni aŋmala ashwie shi lɛ haa ayɔseɔ mɛi ni wieɔ anɔkwale lɛ yɛ faŋŋ mli.
Ni nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshĩa lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.” —5 MOSE 6:5-7.
Nakai ji bɔ ni mɛi fɔɔ kɛɛmɔ, kɛ Yehowa Odasefoi kɛ mɛi krokomɛi miigba Biblia lɛ he sane.
3 Kɛtsɔ Ojeŋba Kpakpa Nɔ: Onaanyobɔɔ su lɛ wieɔ babaoo yɛ ohe ni ebaanyɛ egbele gbɛ ni okɛye odase.
Eji anɔkwale akɛ, Biblia lɛ wieɔ ŋwɛi shitee he kɛha anɔkwa Kristofoi ni akɛ mumɔ efɔ amɛ mu lɛ.
Be ko ní eho lɛ, gbɛgbalɔi akuu ko ní amɛnyɛɔ amɛwieɔ Quechua kɛ Aymara wiemɔi lɛ fã gbɛ kɛtee Amantani kɛ Taquile ŋshɔkpɔi lɛ anɔ yɛ Titicaca Kpaakpo lɛ nɔ.
Kadimɔ nɔ ni ewie afii babaoo nɛ yɛ bɔ ni esa akɛ atsɔɔ bii egbɛ̀i lɛ ahe nii aha lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”
Yɛ be ni tsɔ hiɛ dani amɛkɛ Yehowa Odasefoi aaakpe lɛ, weku nɛɛ ji mɛi ni yɔɔ ekãa yɛ Katolik mumɔŋ sɔlemɔi akui amli, ni amɛkɛɔ akɛ amɛnaa ninaa, amɛwieɔ lilɛii srɔtoi, ni amɛtsaa helai.
Kɛ́ wɔɔya nɔ wɔshiɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔkase Ŋmalɛ lɛ jogbaŋŋ koni wɔnu emli shɛɛ sane lɛ shishi ni wɔhe wɔye.
Kɛ́ wɔwie wiemɔi ni haa mɔ nane mɔɔ shi lɛ, esaa Yehowa hiɛ
Esa akɛ ‘wɔwie anɔkwale.’
Agbɛnɛ, susumɔ nɔ ni Biblia lɛ wieɔ yɛ amɛgbele he lɛ he okwɛ.
Wɔkɛ tsei kɛ mplaŋi ni ekpɔtɔ saa agbai nɛɛ ekomɛi, kɛkɛ ni wɔkɛ wɔ lɔle ni nyɛɔ etsɔɔ gbɛi gbohii anɔ lɛ yi nɔ, wɔsɔle, ni wɔtsɔ nɔ blɛoo.
Misusuɔ akɛ tsɔne ni kã mli lɛ yɛ hewalɛ kwraa tsɔ̃ fe kar muu lɛ fɛɛ.
Be ni okɛ shĩatsɛ ni tsa nɔ lɛ bɔi wiemɔ lɛ, polisifoi atsɔne lɛ bama shi blɛoo, ni nyɛmi ni fata ohe kɛshiɛɔ lɛ tsui fã fioo.
Etipɛŋfoi wo lɛ hewalɛ ni ekpɛlɛ nɔ, koni enyɛ ená “shihilɛ kpakpa”—ená digrii, nitsumɔ, kar, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu, ni enyɛ efã gbɛ kɛyashara shi yɛ hei srɔtoi.
Mihiɛ sɔ waa diɛŋtsɛ beni ehé lɔle—nɔ ko ni sɛɛnamɔ yɔɔ he babaoo diɛŋtsɛ yɛ Australia akrowa ni etse ehe banee nɛɛ mli lɛ—eha mi bɔni afee ni matá mli kɛyatsu Kristofoi asɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ.
Ejaakɛ, tsɔne mli bɛlt ni afiɔ, yɛ be mli ni akudɔɔ tsɔne lɛ po kɛkɛ haa nyɛ ni eeenyɛ eba akɛ mɔ aaagbo yɛ tsɔne mli oshara mli lɛ baa shi kwraa.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Yesu tee yookpeemɔ shishi moŋ, shi wɔnyɛŋ wɔsusu akɛ ebaakpɛlɛ kar sɔrɔtoi ni ato sɛrɛnɛɛ kɛ bolɔmɔ ni akɛfoɔ shi yɛ maŋ lɛ nɔ; polisifoi po ebɔ tsɔne kudɔlɔi ni kpãa blɛ ni naa wa yɛ yookpeemɔ nyiɛmɔ mli lɛ nyɔmɔ.
Mihe kar ko ni yɔɔ hewalɛ, ni hi kɛha shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ yɛ wɔ akutso ni tamɔ akrowa lɛ mli, ni mitsa migbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ kɛtsɔ yelikɛbuamɔ ni mibi yoo Joyce kɛha mi lɛ nɔ.
Mitáa tsɔne ni jara wa mli, miyɛ shia fɛfɛo mli, ni miyɛ shika ni mikɛheɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni mitaoɔ.
Kulɛ amɛkɛ amɛbe fɛɛ tsuɔ nii, ni taakɛ amɛtipɛŋfoi ni boteɔ gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ feɔ lɛ, amɛhe shĩa kɛ tsɔne.

“Nibii ni Nyɛmiyoo Lane gba lɛ lɛ ye ebua lɛ ni edamɔ naagbee gbii fioo ni eshwɛ lɛ naa.”—Wɔma efã ko nɔ mi.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, nyɛmi yoo ko ní kɛtsɔ opireshɛn ko ni afee lɛ lɛ nɔ hewɔ lɛ, enyɛɛɛ enyiɛ jogbaŋŋ ni ewie jogbaŋŋ hu lɛ na akɛ ebaanyɛ ekɛ ehe awo woji tɛtrɛbii ajaa mli kɛji ewu kɛ amɛtsɔne lɛ yama gbɛ ko ni mɛi fɔɔ nɔ tsɔmɔ lɛ toi.
Kpokpaa nɔkwɛlɔ kroko wie akɛ: “Miheɔ miyeɔ akɛ, kɛ onukpai lɛ kɛ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei lɛ tsu nii yɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli, ni amɛye amɛbua amɛ koni amɛna sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ lɛ, nɔ ni baajɛ mli aba ji jwɛŋmɔŋ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ tsui ni nyɔɔ mɔ mli babaoo yɛ Yehowa sɔɔmɔ mli.”
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ŋmalɛi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ baaye abua nyɛmi yoo ko koni ena sui ni esa akɛ etao yɛ mɔ ni ekɛbaahi shi lɛ he?—Lala 119:97; 1 Timoteo 3:1-7.
Aajie yi waa akɛ nyɛmimɛi yei akaŋma wolo amɛha gboklɛfoi hii, kɛji oti lɛ ji ni amɛkɛ mumɔŋ yelikɛbuamɔ ko po aha amɛ.
8 Sane ko ni kɔɔ oblayei enyɔ komɛi ni jɛ musuŋ kome mli lɛ ahe lɛ haa wɔnaa nɔ̃ kroko hu ni saa nɔ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsu yɛ asafo lɛ mli lɛ he.
13 Ebiɔ ni nyɛmimɛi ni ahãa amɛyasɔmɔɔ yɛ nitsumɔhe niji ni yɔɔ maji krokomɛi anɔ lɛ afee tsakemɔi babaoo.
6 Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ, suɔmɔ ni nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ jie lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ bo lɛ ji nɔ ni ye ebua bo ni hã okɛ ohe badɔmɔ Yehowa kɛ esafo lɛ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ esa akɛ atsɔ akɛ bɔlɛnamɔ kɛ gbalashihilɛ he tsɔsemɔ aha gbekɛbii?
Kɛ́ Aanyɛ Minɔ ni Maná Bɔlɛ lɛ, Mɛni Mafee?
Sinii kɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nibii ni ajieɔ lɛ haa asusuɔ akɛ ehi jogbaŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ kɛha oblahii kɛ oblayei akɛ amɛaaná bɔlɛ dani amɛbote gbalashihilɛ mli.
Bei pii lɛ, mɛi ni woɔ mɛi anaa ŋmɔlɔ koni awo amɛ nyɔmɔ lɛ kɛ yakayaka wiemɔi tsuɔ nii koni amɛha mɛi aŋmɔ.
16 Sane kroko ni hao asafo ni yɔɔ Korinto lɛ lolo ji bɔlɛnamɔi.
11 Wolo tɛtrɛɛ, U.S.News & World Report lɛ jaje akɛ: “Yɛ afi 1991 mli lɛ, U.S.Amerika redio kɛ televishin nitsumɔ hei etɛ lɛ jie bɔlɛnamɔ he nibii fe 10,000 kɛjɛ gbɛkɛ ŋmɛji 7 kɛyashi 11; yɛ mfonirii lɛ fɛɛ eko ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni bɔlɛnamɔ yaa nɔ yɛ gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi ateŋ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, amɛjie bɔlɛnamɔ ni yaa nɔ yɛ gbalashihilɛ sɛɛ lɛ 14 sɔŋŋ amɛtsɔɔ.”
Alicia mami ni atsɛɔ lɛ Inez lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Misumɔɔ akɛ mikɛ mibiyoo lɛ ata shi ni wɔwie bɔlɛnamɔ he, shi ebɛ dekã kwraa.
Ani okaiɔ nɔ ni Abonsam kɛ edaimonioi lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛha wɔfee, taakɛ eyɔɔ wolo nɛɛ Yitso 10 lɛ?— Hɛɛ, amɛbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛha wɔkɛ wɔhe awo bɔlɛnamɔi amli nɔ ní Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɔ akɛ eji efɔŋ lɛ mli.
Oblayoo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Ana ni eye afii 15 ni jɛ Brazil lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, mileee bɔ ni mafee ni mikɛ mifɔlɔi awie bɔlɛnamɔ he saji ahe.”
2:8) Kɛfata he lɛ, bɔlɛnamɔ mli jeŋba sha tsɔne lɛ edu mɛi babaoo.
Kɛ́ mɔ ko kɛɛ mi akɛ eetao ni ekɛ mi aná bɔlɛ lɛ, mɛni mafee?
(1 Mose 1:28) Ŋwɛibɔfoi toigbolɔi kɛ bɔlɛnamɔ mli jeŋba shara fite adesai yɛ Noa gbii lɛ amli.
Gbekɛbii Odasefoi ji mɛi ni yɔɔ oshara mli titri, akɛni bɔlɛnamɔ mli nifeemɔ he sane yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni amɛaanya he lɛ he hewɔ.
Ekɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he nitsɔɔmɔ ni he hiaa lɛ ha mi yɛ be ni sa mli.
YƐ NIGERIA nɔtsamɔ skul ko mli lɛ, gbekɛyoo ko ni ale lɛ waa yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he jeŋba shara hewɔ lɛ sumɔɔ ni egba enanemɛi skulbii lɛ saji ni kɔɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he.
Fɔlɔi pii ahiɛ feɔ amɛ yaa kɛji skul sɔrɔtoi lɛ tsɔɔ gbekɛbii lɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he saji, shi amɛkɛ nibii ni kɔɔ jeŋba kpakpa kɛ gbɛnaa nii ahe nitsumɔ he lɛ fataaa he kɛhaaa amɛ.
Ehaa amɛnaa gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ kpakpa, amɛhiɛɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he jwɛŋmɔ kpakpa, ni ehaa amɛnaa miishɛɛ yɛ sɛɛ mli beni amɛbote gbalashihilɛ mli.
22 Be ni amɛnáa amɛhewɔ miishɛɛ lɛ, maŋ lɛŋ hii yaka gbɔmɛi komɛi babɔle shĩa lɛ he kɛkpe, ni amɛbɔi shinaa lɛ shiimɔ, ni amɛtee nɔ amɛkɛɛ nuumo lɛ, ni ji shĩatsɛ lɛ akɛ: “Jiemɔ nuu ni eba oshĩa lɛ ohã wɔ koni wɔkɛ lɛ aná bɔlɛ.”
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ekolɛ onanemɛi skulbii lɛ baaya henaabuamɔi ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ashishi, amɛkɛ tsofai fɔji baatsu nii, amɛbaanu dãa, naanyobɔɔ ni yɔɔ gbagbalii baaya nɔ yɛ hii lɛ kɛ yei lɛ ateŋ, ni amɛkɛ amɛhe baawo bɔlɛnamɔ ni tsɔɔ gbalashihilɛ hiɛ lɛ mli.
Abuɔ too hii kɛ yei falɛ pɔtɛɛ yɛ afii ni amɛye lɛ anaa ni akɛwoɔ tookwɛlɔ lɛ dɛŋ.
Mɛni ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ je kpo yɛ tsɔsemɔ yɛ jamɔ loo Kristofoi ashihilɛ mli lɛ kɛ bɔlɛnamɔ ni tsɔɔ gbalashihilɛ hiɛ lɛ ahe nikasemɔ mli ba?
Gbekɛbii nuɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he saji kɛjɛɔ amɛbibii amli tɔ̃ɔ, ja amɛkɛ mɛi ebɔɔ kwraa.
Ni sinii babaoo jieɔ bɔlɛnamɔ nifeemɔi ni yɔɔ kpetekpelee amɛtsɔɔ.
Nigeriayoo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Confident kpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ: “Mifɔlɔi buɔ bɔlɛnamɔ akɛ nɔ ko ni esaaa akɛ atsĩɔ tã yɛ faŋŋ mli kwraa; aahi yɛ kusum naa.”
Belɛ nyɛhaa wɔkɛ sɛɛyoomɔ atsua nii yɛ saji ni tamɔ hiɛtserɛjiemɔ ni wɔhalaa kɛ wɔjeŋba ni kɔɔ nuu kɛ yoo teŋ sharamɔ he nɛkɛ lɛ mli.
Anyiɛɔ yuu kɛ lala kɛ joo, ni atereɔ ŋmoŋmolo lɛ kɛyaa gɔɔ mli ni ayafuɔ yɛ mɔ ni edamɔ shi kɛha lɛ masɛi.
Kɛ́ nuu ko loo yoo ko ni ekolɛ ejie ehe fɛɛ ni eshwɛ epioto pɛ lɛ yata mɔ ko shuɔ nɔ ni ekumɔ emli oookɛɛ ekɛ lɛ miiná bɔlɛ koni awo lɛ nyɔmɔ lɛ, no ji nɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ yɛ Blɔfo mli akɛ lap dancing lɛ.
Luther kɛ ehe fɔ̃ Lyra nɔ waa, aahu akɛ, lalafoo wiemɔ ko ni ale waa lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Eji Lyra etswaaa kpãa saŋku lɛ kulɛ, Luther ejoŋ.”
Ayɛ toigbalamɔi ni mli wa waa ni akɛhaa yɛ tɔmɔi tamɔ lalai gbohii alamɔ kɛ joo he.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ, no mli lɛ aatswa lalai kpakpai, ni ajo jooi kpakpai ejaakɛ eji nɔ ko ni Yudafoi lɛ fɔɔ feemɔ.
Mikase bɔ ni atswaa saŋku hu, ni lala kɛ joo bafee hiɛtserɛjiemɔ nibii ni minyaa he.
Kulɛ hii lɛ baaha amɛ lamleŋ ni amɛbaajo kɛnyiɛ yoo lɛ kɛ ebi lɛ sɛɛ kɛya shĩa tɔ̃ɔ.
Etsɛ yoo ni jo yɛ Herode okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ lɛ shishi, ní ebi ni aha lɛ Yohane Baptisilɔ lɛ yitso lɛ akɛ Salome.
Ni bei pii lɛ, kɛ́ joo lɛ shɛ he ni mli wa waa diɛŋtsɛ lɛ, mɛi ni joɔ lɛ yaa Baal shia mli piai lɛ amli ni amɛkɛ amɛhe yawoɔ bɔlɛnamɔ mli jeŋba shara mli. —4 Mose 25: 1, 2; okɛto 2 Mose 32: 6, 17-19; Amos 2:8 he.
Nyɛmiyoo ko ni baa ebakaneɔ nii ehaa nyɛmiyoo ko ni eda yɛ afii amli ni eehe eshwila kwraa lɛ kɛ nyɛmiyoo lɛ joɔ blɛoo kɛboleɔ tsu lɛ mli ni ekɛjeɔ shishi ni ekɛgbeɔ edaa otsi saramɔ lɛ naa.
Beni saji ahe wielɔ ko wieɔ Hela wiemɔ ni atsɔɔ shishi akɛ ‘amɛshwɛ’ lɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ ekɔɔ jooi ni yaa nɔ yɛ wɔŋjalɔi agbijurɔyelii ashishi lɛ he, ni ekɛfata he akɛ: “Taakɛ ale lɛ, aje gbɛ ato jooi nɛɛ pii ahe gbɛjianɔ koni etee nyenyeŋtswibɔɔ he akɔnɔi ni naa wa fe fɛɛ lɛ ashi.”
Yɛ Mose sɛɛkuu mli lɛ, ebanina nɛkɛ atuatselɔi ni amɛbua amɛhe naa nɛɛ ni amɛmiiye nii, amɛmiinu nii, amɛmiijo, ni amɛmiikoto shi amɛmiiha shika tsinabi ko!
Nilelɔi komɛi susuɔ akɛ ekolɛ Elia tsĩ Baal jalɔi ajoo kusum nifeemɔi lɛ atã.
(Yohane 2:1-10) Ni yɛ Yesu abɛbua ni kɔɔ bi nyenyeŋtswi lɛ he lɛ mli lɛ, tsɛ lɛ ŋmɛ weku lɛ okpɔlɔ, ní lalai kɛ jooi fata he ni ekɛnyá ebi lɛ sɛɛkuu lɛ he.—Luka 15:21-25.
Anaa wiemɔ kome too ni ji ‘didãa’ ni akɛtsu nii lɛ yɛ 1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 18:26 lɛ kɛtsɔɔ Baal gbalɔi lɛ ajoo lɛ mli.
Ni taakɛ Yesu tsɔɔ lɛ, “saŋkui kɛ jooi” fata nibii ni amɛkɛjie amɛhiɛtserɛ lɛ ahe.—Luka 15:23, 25.
Shishitoo mlai nɛɛ baanyɛ akɔ nibii ni wɔfeɔ yɛ wɔshihilɛ mli tamɔ atadewoo kɛ hesaamɔ, lalai ni atswaa kɛ joi ni ajoɔ yɛ yookpeemɔ shishi, loo okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ krokomɛi ashishi lɛ ahe.
Shi nyamɔ lɛ sɛɛ etsɛɛɛ.
(2 Mose 14:31) Israel hii lɛ yafata Mose he yɛ kunimyeli lala ni amɛlá amɛha Yehowa lɛ mli, ni Miriam kɛ yei krokomɛi lɛ here nɔ kɛtsɔ fabii ni amɛsha kɛ joo ni amɛjojoi lɛ nɔ.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, atsɔɔɔ yɛ Biblia lɛ mli yookpeemɔi lɛ eko kwraa mli akɛ ajo.
Kɛji agbe mɔ ko lɛ, wɔshwɛɔ joo ko beni afu mɔ lɛ sɛɛ, ni wɔtswaa ŋoŋoi.
Shi kɛlɛ, eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ ehe ehiaaa ni wɔmɛ dani mɛi krokomɛi akɛɛ wɔ akɛ wolo, sini, shwɛmɔ, joo loo lala pɔtɛɛ ko esaaa.
Miishɛɛ sane ji akɛ, Biblia lɛ etsɔɔɔ lala pɔtɛɛ ni atswa kɛ joo pɔtɛɛ ni ajo yɛ Kana yookpeemɔ lɛ shishi.
Etsɔɔ akɛ esaaa akɛ efeɔ nɔ ni joo lalai ni teɔ akɔnɔ shi lɛ fata he.”
Kojolɔ nyɛɔ egbalaa toi yɛ joo kɛ spaa-shwɛmɔ hu he.”
Kɛ́ gbee tsakemɔ bɛ lɛ, ebaanyɛ eha asusu akɛ obɛ sane ní owieɔ he lɛ he miishɛɛ.
10 Otswa okɔɔyɔɔ lɛ, ni ŋshɔ lɛ ha amɛnɔ;+

Eŋma akɛ: “Gbalafitelɔi! nyɛleee akɛ je nɛɛ hedɔɔ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nyɛɛ ni lo?
6 Be ni mijie nyɛtsɛmɛi lɛ kɛje Ejipt+ ni nyɛbashɛ ŋshɔ lɛ naa lɛ, Ejiptbii lɛ kɛ ta shwiilii kɛ okpɔŋɔnɔtaralɔi tiu nyɛtsɛmɛi lɛ kɛtee Ŋshɔ Tsuru lɛ naa tɔ̃ɔ.
Ni osheŋ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kooloi awuiyelɔi gbeyei.

Mipapa fɔɔ kɛɛmɔ akɛ, “Ja kɔɔyɔɔ naaa atswa ashwie onɔ, kɛkɛ nɔŋŋ hela emɔ bo.”
2 Nyɛmimɛi, nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ nyɛle lɛɛlɛŋ akɛ saramɔ ni wɔbasara nyɛ lɛ efeko efolo.
(Abɛi 24:10) Kɛji akɛ Satan miifee enii tamɔ “jata ni hũuɔ” loo eejie ehe kpo tamɔ “la bɔfo” jio, mpoa ni etswa lɛ tsakeko: Ekɛɛ kɛ́ okɛ kaai kpe lɛ, obaakpa Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ.
Ná nɔmimaa akɛ, onukpai lɛ baashɛje omii ni amɛbaaye abua bo kɛyashi ohe baawa yɛ mumɔŋ ekoŋŋ. —Yesaia 32:1, 2.
25 Osheŋ sane fɔŋ ni baa trukaa lɛ gbeyei+
Shi kɛlɛ, obaanyɛ obi toibolɔi lɛ ni amɛsusu gbɛtsɔɔmɔ ni ekɛhaa ni abaanyɛ akɛtsu shihilɛ lɛ he nii lɛ he yɛ be mli ni okaneɔ ŋmalɛ lɛ.
Obaanyɛ okɛ wolo ni wieɔ nakai sane lɛ he lɛ aha lɛ.
6 Nyɛkanyiɛa nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi asɛɛ, ni nyɛsɔmɔ amɛ, ni nyɛkoto amɛ ni nyɛkɛ nyɛninenaa nitsumɔ lɛ wo mimli la; kɛjeee nakai lɛ mikɛ sane fɔŋ baaba nyɛnɔ.’
Namɔ gba bo ma lɛ?”
Yesu ma nɔ mi akɛ anɔkwa nilee he miihia beni esɔle akɛ: “Enɛ ji naanɔ wala lɛ, ákɛ amɛle bo, anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ kome lɛ, kɛ Yesu Kristo, mɔ ni otsu lɛ.”
Eyɛ mli akɛ sɛɛnamɔ yɛ he akɛ wɔɔkase shiɛmɔ wiemɔ lɛ dioo moŋ, shi mɛi babaoo ena akɛ sɛɛnamɔ yɛ he waa kɛji akɛ amɛkɛɛ lɛ waa yɛ amɛnaa beni amɛkaseɔ lɛ.
ŊWANEJEE ko bɛ he akɛ oyɛ owala kɛ owɔsɛɛ be he miishɛɛ waa.
Obaanyɛ osɔle obi Yehowa koni ewaje bo ni ofee nɔ ni ja yɛ ehiɛ.
15 Beni Yesu buɔ mɛi ni teɔ shi woɔ lɛ ni amɛdiii mumɔŋ nibii ni jara wawai lɛ asɛɛ lɛ fɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kpoo ha nyɛ, gbɛtsɔɔlɔi shwilafoi!”
Nyɛyɛ hiŋmɛii shi nyɛnaaa nii, ni nyɛyɛ toii hu shi nyɛnuuu nii lo?
Mɛni obaanyɛ ofee koni oha ekɛ nitsumɔ afee nɔ ni adafitswaa yɔɔ mli?
Ani oyɛ hekɛnɔfɔ̃ɔ ni tamɔ nakai yɛ Yehowa mli?
Kɛ ootao gbalɛ nɛɛ mlitsɔɔmɔ fitsofitso lɛ, ofainɛ kwɛmɔ tao ni yɔɔ February 15, 1994 Buu-Mɔɔ baafa 14, 15 lɛ.
Kɛ́ ootao saji babaoo ni tsɔɔ akɛ Yesu wiemɔi lɛ miiba mli ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, kwɛmɔ Mɛni Biblia lɛ Tsɔɔ Diɛŋtsɛ? wolo lɛ ni Yehowa Odasefoi fee lɛ yitso 9 lɛ.
Nakai nɔŋŋ kɛji akɛ wɔkɛ jamɔi sɔrɔtoi lɛ to he lɛ wɔbaanyɛ wɔtao amɛtsɔɔmɔi, blema saji, kusum nifeemɔi, gbɛjianɔtoi kɛ emli nibii krokomɛi lɛ amli, koni wɔkwɛ akɛ ani wɔbaana shishijee nibii pɔtɛɛ komɛi ni je amɛhe ni anaa yɛ jamɔi lɛ fɛɛ amli lo, ni kɛji nakai ni lɛ, nɔ ni nakai nibii ni anaa yɛ fɛɛ mli lɛ nyiɛɔ wɔhiɛ kɛyaa he.
Kɛ́ okwɛ gbogboi lɛ asɛɛgbɛ lɛ, onaa káwoo mɔji ní henyɛlɔi lɛ kɛba.
Heremɔ amɛ atuu, ni oha amɛle akɛ eŋɔɔ onaa waa akɛ amɛba.
Kwɛmɔ akrabatsa ni hiɛ saneyitso ni ji “Mɛni Hewɔ Biblia lɛ Kɛ Adesai Asui Wieɔ Nyɔŋmɔ He Lɛ?” mli.
Kwɛ miishɛɛ ni eji akɛ mana akɛ Alice damɔ okpɔlɔ ko sɛɛ yɛ St.
Kɛ́ ootao saji babaoo ni kɔɔ bɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛ kooloi anifeemɔi etsu nii eha yɛ mfonirifeemɔŋ lɛ he lɛ, kwɛmɔ Insight on the Scriptures, Kpo 1, baafai 268, 270-271 lɛ ni Yehowa Odasefoi fee lɛ mli.
Beni agbe kpee lɛ naa lɛ, nibii amlikwɛlɔ nukpa lɛ kɛɛ akɛ, eekpa gbɛ akɛ etsɛŋ ni ebaana Odasefoi lɛ ekoŋŋ.
Kasemɔ shiɛmɔ wiemɔ ni yɔɔ akrabatsa lɛ mli lɛ. —Kwɛmɔ March 2013 Wɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Sɔɔmɔ lɛ hu.
Kwɛmɔ ‘Nyɛhia Nyɔŋmɔ Suɔmɔ lɛ Mli’ wolo lɛ baafa 220-221 lɛ.

3 Shi bo Yehowa, ole mi jogbaŋŋ,+ onaa mi;
Yehowa baakwɛ koni abɛɛ Kristendom jamɔ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ he okadii fɛɛ kɛya, taakɛ abaafee “Babilon kpeteŋkpele lɛ,” ni ji jeŋ apasa jamɔ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ hu lɛ.—Kpojiemɔ 18:1-24.
Anania wiemɔi lɛ ma nɔ ni ekolɛ Saul enu momo kɛjɛ Yesu naa lɛ nɔ mi: “Wɔtsɛmɛi a-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ehalao eto, ní ole esuɔmɔnaa nii, ní ona jalɔ lɛ, ní onu edaaŋ gbee ko; shi obaatsɔ ehe odaseyelɔ, koni oye nii fiaa ni ona ni onu lɛ ahe odase otsɔɔ gbɔmɛi fɛɛ.
Oona nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa ni Hana fee efɔ̃ shi eha wɔ?
Onaa nakai hewalɛ lɛ eko tamɔ sarawagbamɔ.
Kɛ wɔfee nakai lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baakwɛ koni wɔná niyenii wɔye kɛ atadei ni wɔbaawo.
Eyɛ mli akɛ kuu muu lɛ fɛɛ miikwɛ nɔ kome lɛ nɔŋŋ moŋ, shi mɔ fɛɛ mɔ naa lɛ yɛ gbɛ sɔrɔto nɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ, amɛnaa kpɛɔ amɛhe kɛji amɛna akɛ wɔmiishi amɛshinaai lɛ, ni enáa amɛnɔ hewalɛ, ni bei pii lɛ amɛboɔ wɔ toi.
Kɛji wɔnyiɛ esɛɛ lɛ, ebaaye ebua wɔ koni wɔná mligbɛ toiŋjɔlɛ, ní nɔ ni fata he ji hekɛnɔfɔɔ gbɛkpamɔ akɛ aaana toiŋjɔlɛ kwraa wɔsɛɛ—ni baatsɔɔ akɛ basabasafeemɔ, tawuu, kɛ awuiyeli ehiŋ shi dɔŋŋ.
(Kwɛmɔ akrabatsai ni ji “Yehowa Hã Anyɛ Afee” kɛ “Bɔ ni ‘Mɔ Bibioo lɛ Ebatsɔ Maŋ Wulu’” lɛ hu.)
Beni Mose bi akɛ eha ena E-nunyam lɛ, Yehowa ha hetoo akɛ: “Onyɛŋ mihiɛ ona; shi mɔ ko mɔ ko enaŋ mi, ní eyi aaaná wala.”
Nyɔŋmɔ, ye obua mi koni mayɔse
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, kɛ wɔɔnyɛ wɔfee shihilɛ lɛ he mfoniri—Yesu ni kɛ wɔ yɛ kɔŋtso kome shishi lɛ—ewaaa haaa wɔ akɛ wɔɔna mɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni tere jatsũ lɛ fa ni da lɛ.
4, 5. (a) Mɛɛ mumɔ ná mɛi ni yɔɔ Efeso asafo lɛ mli lɛ anɔ hewalɛ dani amɛbatsɔmɔ Kristofoi lɛ?
“Kristofoi akpeei ni aaaya lɛ wa waa.
Akɛ Kristofoi ni shĩɔ kpe ni amɛyooɔ bɔ ni wɔbe nɛɛ he hiaa ha lɛ, wɔkotaaa wɔniji kɛkɛ ni wɔɔtara shi ni wɔmɛ kpɔmɔ.
14, 15. (a) Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ Kristofoi nyɛmɛi, ni ji fɔlɔi komekome-tsɛmɛi lɛ abi Yehowa dɛŋ yelikɛbuamɔ lɛ?
Eje eklɛŋklɛŋ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛmɔ he gbɛfaa lɛ shishi yɛ Antiokia, ni ji maŋ ni atsɛ́ Yesu kaselɔi lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ yɛ akɛ Kristofoi lɛ.
21 Yesu miiwo jalɛsaneyeli he hewalɛ yɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ, ní lɛ ji Yitso lɛ hu mli.
20 Nakai Biblia Kaselɔi lɛ yɛ Kristofoi a-Hela Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli gbalɛi ni kɔɔ “je nɛŋ naagbee” lɛ kɛ Kristo “baa” lɛ he lɛ he miishɛɛ waa yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ ni amɛpɛiɔ mli lɛ mli.
10, 11. (a) Dani Paulo aaabatsɔ Kristofonyo lɛ, no mli lɛ mɛni sɛɛ ekɛ enyɛmɔ fɛɛ tiuɔ?
(1 Yohane 2:2) No hewɔ lɛ, yɛ be mli ni Israelbii lɛ ná nɔ ko ni sɛɛ etsɛŋ ni amɛtsɔ nɔ amɛbɛŋkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛtsɔ amɛ afɔleshaai anɔ lɛ, Kristofoi yɛ nɔdaamɔ nɔ ni hi kwraa fe no, ní amɛtsɔɔ nɔ amɛyaa Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ—Yesu Kristo afɔleshaa lɛ.
Kristofoi ni yɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ hu kɛ amɛhe fɛɛ fɔ̃ɔ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ nɔ.
5 Susumɔ bɔ ni fee ni Kristofonyo ko ni wɔbaatsɛ́ lɛ Mary lɛ kɛ ehe yawo nifeemɔ ko ni shwɛ sharao ni eha ekɛ ehe awo jeŋba shara mli lɛ he okwɛ.
Paulo kai Kristofoi akɛ “ahé nyɛ kɛ jara ni wa.”
24:37-39) Klɛŋklɛŋ afii 100 lɛ mli Kristofoi ni “jeee woloŋlelɔi kɛ nilelɔi komɛi ji amɛ lɛ” tee nɔ amɛshiɛ yɛ shitee-kɛwoo ni naa wa ni amɛkɛkpe lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ.
Abaanyɛ ajie Kristofoi aŋamɔ kpo yɛ gbɛ̀i srɔtoi anɔ
(2 Korintobii 6:4) Sɔɔlɔi Kristofoi anijiaŋ ejeee wui.
4 Shi kɛlɛ, anɔkwa Kristofoi eŋmɛɛɛ gbɛ ni amɛjamɔ lɛ atsɔ mlai ahe gbɛjianɔtoo ni yɔɔ kpɛŋŋ ni shishinumɔ bɛ he.
(2 Petro 3:10-13; Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 5:41) Taakɛ mra be mli Kristofoi lɛ ji lɛ, nyɛhaa wɔyaa nɔ ‘wɔtsɔɔ ni wɔjaje Kristo’ kɛ e-Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ, be mli ni wɔmɛɔ nikeenii ni akɛbaaha wɔ yɛ Yehowa jalɛ jeŋ hee lɛ mli lɛ.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 5:42; Yakobo 5:11.
Kɛfata he lɛ, Yehowa ejɛ mlihilɛ mli eto yelikɛbuamɔ he gbɛjianɔ yɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli.
Ekolɛ mɛi ni oshiɛɔ otsɔɔ lɛ booo bo toi, loo heloonaa nitsumɔ ni otsuɔ lɛ haa etɔɔ bo aahu akɛ Kristofoi akpee ni obaaya lɛ bafeɔ naagba.
Oblayoo ko ni awie ehe yɛ The Irish Times lɛ mli akɛ “onukpa ko ni yɔɔ hegbɛ babaoo kɛ Ireland ayɛi akpeehe lɛ ateŋ ekome hiɛnyiɛlɔ,” wie yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ, akɛ: “Hemɔkɛyeli yɛ Abonsam mli lɛ tsɔɔ Kristojamɔ nɔkpɛlɛmɔ . . .
5 Nibii ni Kristofonyo ko feɔ daa gbi lɛ fataaa ejamɔ krɔŋŋ lɛ he.
Aloo eeenyɛ eba akɛ, naanyo Kristofonyo ko kɛ mlihilɛ baatsɔɔ wɔ akɛ wɔkɛ Biblia shishitoo mla ko tsuuu nii.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ bɔ ni Kristofoi pii naa bɔ ni ehe hiaa ni akɛ hiɛdɔɔ ashiɛ lɛ eha amɛfee tsakemɔi yɛ amɛshihilɛ mli?
3: Nɔ Hewɔ ni Sutsakemɔ Tsɔɔmɔ lɛ kɛ Kristofoi Atsɔɔmɔ lɛ Kpãaa Gbee Lɛ
Kɛ́ wɔtee Kristofoi akpeei srɔtoi fɛɛ ni wɔkɛ Ŋmalɛ mli ŋaawoo ni wɔnine shɛɔ nɔ lɛ tsu nii lɛ, etsɔɔ akɛ wɔmiifee toiboo.—Hebribii 10:24, 25; 13:17.
Mɛɛ su mli wɔkɛ wɔ shɛɛ sane lɛ haa yɛ, ni mɛni hewɔ?
Mɛni hewɔ ojeee shishi otaooo maŋsɛɛ wiemɔi ni afɔɔ wiemɔ yɛ nyɛshikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli lɛ?
Beni nikasemɔ lɛ yaa nɔ lɛ, susumɔ bɔ ni Biblia mli nikaselɔi baaná nɔ ni akaseɔ lɛ he sɛɛ lɛ he.
Mɛni hewɔ ekolɛ Paulo kɛɛ Korintobii lɛ akɛ “suɔmɔ toɔ etsui shi” lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ esaaa akɛ gbalashihilɛ mli bii náa bɔlɛnamɔ henumɔi amɛhãa mɛi ni jeee amɛhefatalɔi lɛ?
Mateo 10:16-22, 28-31 Mɛɛ shitee-kɛ-woo wɔbaanyɛ wɔkpa gbɛ, shi mɛni hewɔ esaaa akɛ wɔsheɔ shitee-kɛ-wolɔi gbeyei lɛ?
(1) Mɛni ji yiŋtoo titri hewɔ ni Yehowa Odasefoi kpoɔ lá ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli lɛ, ni nɛgbɛ anaa nakai shishitoo mla lɛ yɛ, yɛ Biblia lɛ mli?
Mɛni hewɔ Yesu fã ni ayatao nitsulɔi babaoo lɛ?
46 “No hewɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ nyɛtsɛɔ mi ‘Nuŋtsɔ!
Enɛ ji yiŋtoo kome hewɔ ni Armeniabii lɛ kɛ Ararat Gɔŋ lɛ gbɛi fata amɛmaŋ lɛ nɔ̃ lɛ he lɛ.
Mɛni David mia ehiɛ akɛ ebaafee? Ni mɛni hewɔ?
Mɛni hewɔ kɛ́ osusu bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ lɛ ye ebua mɛi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ he lɛ, ewoɔ bo hewalɛ lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ Mose bi Nyɔŋmɔ egbɛ́i lɛ he sane lɛ, ni mɛni hewɔ shishinumɔ yɛ mli akɛ ebi nakai lɛ?
Nɔ Hewɔ ni Gbalashihilɛi Komɛi Yeee Omanye
Kɛji nakai ni lɛ, mɛni hewɔ eba naagbee?
João kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ wɔnyɛmimɛi Portugalbii lɛ baanyɛ ahi jɛmɛ ni amɛsɔmɔ Yehowa yɛ anɔkwayeli mli lɛ, mɛni hewɔ wɔnyɛŋ wɔfee nakai nɔŋŋ yɛ jɛmɛ?”
14-16. (a) Mɛɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa Yosef fee efɔ̃ shi?
(4) Mɛni hewɔ jwɛŋmɔ yɔɔ mli ni eji sɔ ni kã mɔ nɔ akɛ ekpoo lá ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli lɛ?
Mɛni tsɔɔ akɛ Paulo miisumɔ ni ekɛ nyɛmimɛi lɛ abɔ, ni mɛni hewɔ esumɔɔ ni ekɛ mɛi ni ekɛ amɛ hiɛ hemɔkɛyeli kome lɛ abɔ lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ tooi lɛ abo tookwɛlɔi ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ atoi lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ni akɛfɔ Yesu kaselɔi lɛ mu yɛ Pentekoste lɛ sa kadimɔ lɛ?
Jeee nɔ ni wɔyaafee lɛ pɛ esa akɛ wɔsusu he, shi moŋ esa akɛ wɔsusu nɔ hewɔ ní wɔyaafee lɛ hu he.
6 Paulo ye ebua Korintobii lɛ koni amɛna nɔ hewɔ ni yelikɛbuamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ fata sɔɔmɔ ni amɛkɛhãa Yehowa lɛ kɛ jamɔ ni amɛkɛhãa lɛ lɛ he lɛ.
(b) Mɛni ji sabalai komɛi ni akɛtsɛɔ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ, ni mɛni hewɔ amɛsa lɛ?
Belɛ, mɛni hewɔ wielɔ ní sumɔɔ Yehowa ní heɔ nɔ ni ekɛɔ lɛ eyeɔ lɛ baanyɛ afee mɔ ni bɛ miishɛɛ beni ewieɔ lɛ?
Hesaa ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ ji hegbɛ kpele yɛ “wuoyaa” nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Beni atsɔɔ Hebri wiemɔ kɛha “loo” lɛ shishi kɛtee Hela wiemɔ mli lɛ, akɛ “ŋshɔŋloo kpeteŋkple,” aloo “loo wulu” tsu nii.
42 Ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛye ni amɛtɔrɔ, 43 ni amɛkɔlɔ blodo kukuji kɛntɛŋi 12 obɔbɔ, soro loi lɛ.
(Mateo 6:33) Kɛfata he lɛ, Kristofoi yeɔ “Kaisare” mlai fɛɛ ni kɔɔ gbɔbimɔ kɛ loohɛɛ he lɛ anɔ, kɛji nɔyelɔi lɛ kwɛɔ ni aye mlai nɛɛ anɔ loo amɛfeee nakai po.—Mateo 22:21; Romabii 13:1.
(Romabii 1:21-23, 25) Nakai nɔŋŋ eji yɛ sutsakemɔ he nilelɔi, ni yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ amɛkɛ woo haa shishijee nibii bibii ni asusuɔ akɛ etamɔ kɔsɔŋkɔsɔ ko ni tsakeɔ kɛyaa hiɛ —gɔgɔmii-loo-kooloi ni hiɔ nu mli kɛ shikpɔŋ gbiŋ nɔwaamɔ nibii-kooloi ni haa fufɔ —“gbɔmɛi ni tamɔ aduŋ akaa” akɛ amɛ “bɔlɔ.”
9 Ejaakɛ ŋshɔŋ loi ni amɛgbe lɛ hã lɛ kɛ mɛi ni fata ehe lɛ ahe jɔ̃ amɛhe naakpa, 10 ni nakai nɔŋŋ Yakobo kɛ Yohane, Zebedeo bihii lɛ,+ ni ji mɛi ni kɛ Simon tsuɔ nii lɛ hu ahe jɔ̃ amɛhe naakpa.
Nakai nilee lɛ mli nibii babaoo kɔɔ Yehowa nibɔɔ lɛ he: “Ni [Salomo] ewie tsei ahe, kɛjɛ tseneduru tso ni yɔɔ Lebanon lɛ nɔ aahu kɛyashi hisopo ni kwɛ̃ɔ kɛjɛɔ gbogbo mli lɛ nɔ; ni asaŋ ewie kooloi kɛ loofɔji kɛ waamɔ nii kɛ nuŋ looi ahe.”
Akɛ nibii ni anáa kɛjɛɔ looi amli etsu nii akɛ tsofa afii ohai abɔ.
Shi kadimɔ akɛ anaa ŋshɔ shishi naakpɛɛ nii krokomɛi ni anyɛɛɛ atsi hiŋmɛi lɛ naa koni ekakwɛ lɛ kɛfataa looi ni hiɛ hewolo nɔ sui sɔrɔtoi ni yɔɔ biɛ lɛ ahe, ni nɔ ni fata he ji tɛŋɛlɛoi ni hiɛ sui sɔrɔtoi ni yɔɔ fɛo waa.
Hɛɛ, wolɛi ni kɛ yaai ni mli eyi obɔ kɛ looi baa kɛjɛɔ Atlantik Ŋshɔ lɛ kɛ nui wuji srɔtoi krokomɛi ni jwere shi kɛbɔle maŋ lɛ mli lɛ hu yɛ jɛmɛ.
Mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋshɔkpɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo yaa wuo yɛ Aegean Ŋshɔ lɛ hiɛ, ni amɛkɛlɛɔ amɛhe.
Yesu kɔlɔ blodoi lɛ kɛ loi lɛ, ni esɔle, ni no sɛɛ lɛ, ekɛhã ekaselɔi lɛ, ni amɛ hu amɛkɛhã mɛi lɛ
Kɛkɛ ni gbi ko, beni Yesu nyiɛ yɛ Galilea Ŋshɔ lɛ naa lɛ, ena Petro kɛ Andrea miishá loo.
Yesu fã ekaselɔi lɛ ni amɛlɛ mɛi babaoo, eyɛ mli akɛ no mli lɛ blodoi enumɔ kɛ ŋshɔŋ loi enyɔ pɛ amɛhiɛ
10 Aloo kɛ́ ebi lɛ ŋshɔŋ loo lɛ, ebaahã lɛ onufu?
Ani Petro miisumɔ Yesu kɛ etsui fɛɛ fe wuoyaa?
Looi ni fa babaoo ni amɛhewolo nɔ sui sɔrɔtoi lɛ efee tamɔ kwaabuɛtɛ sui lɛ feɔ mɛi ni sereɔ yɛ nui ni mli tse keŋkeŋ nɛɛ amli lɛ fɛo waa diɛŋtsɛ.
ESORO maŋ lɛ mli gɔji fɛfɛji lɛ kwraa yɛ emli ŋshɔnaa ni shia sɔŋŋ yɔɔ nɔ, ŋshɔ mli tɛsaai ni tamɔ ŋshɔkpɔi, akrowai ni ayaa wuo yɛ mli lɛ, kɛ maji ni mli yɔɔ hoo ni yɔɔ ŋshɔkpɔ shikpɔji lɛ anɔ lɛ he.
Akɛ lɛlɛ nɛɛ yaa wuo, ni gbɛ agbo kã sɛɛ ní akɛ adrã yaa agbo ni tsii toɔ jɛmɛ.
Eŋɔɔ minaa akɛ minyɛ miwo aspaaterei nɛɛ ekoŋŋ, beni ekome kɛ looi ehi shi be saŋŋ sɛɛ lɛ.
Odasefoi lɛ anine shɛ ŋmɔshi nibii, ŋshɔŋ looi, kɛ yɔɔ-loo babaoo nɔ.
Etamɔ nɔ ni no mli lɛ Yesu miiwie loo ni jwere amɛmasɛi lɛ loo wuoyaa nitsumɔ lɛ he, loo ekolɛ enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ he.
Amɛyaa gbɔmɛi aŋɔɔ hu yɛ amɛnitsumɔ hei, ni amɛkɛ ɔfis nitsulɔi, mɛi ni hɔɔ nii yɛ shwapoi amli, okwaafoi, kɛ wolɛi ni kuɔ amɛsɛɛ kɛjɛɔ China Wuoyigbɛ Ŋshɔ lɛ mli wuoyaa nitsumɔ mli ni kpelekeɔ shi kɛbaa shia lɛ kpeɔ ni amɛkɛ amɛ wieɔ.
Ejaakɛ bɔ ni Yona ye shwane-shwane kɛ nyɔɔŋ-nyɔɔŋ gbii etɛ yɛ ŋshɔŋ loo kpeteŋkpele lɛ musuŋ lɛ, nakai gbɔmɔ Bi lɛ aaaye shwane-shwane kɛ nyɔɔŋ-nyɔɔŋ gbii etɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ tsui mli. . . .
Akɛ kapɛlɛ ni aná yɛ loo daaŋ lɛ wo too (24-27)
Akɛ loofɔlɔ kome lɛ fataa he kɛhaa lɛ tamɔ nɔ ni no bɛ jara ko kwraa.
+ 4 Be ni eduɔ nii lɛ, dumɔwui lɛ ekomɛi yashwie gbɛ he, ni loofɔji ba amɛbakɔlɔ amɛye.
Abaanyɛ akɛ sanebimɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ ato sanebimɔ nɛɛ he akɛ, Te looflɔ fiji enyɔ lɛ ateŋ nɔ ni he hiaa waa lɛ?
Shi Israelbii lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo bɛ kooloi kɛ loofɔji.
Loofɔji ahe nikaselɔi Sinclair kɛ Mendelsohn tsɔɔ mli yɛ wolo, Everyone’s Guide to South African Birds lɛ mli akɛ: “Enyɔ ni ŋmɛɔ wɔji lɛ kɛ ekãa buɔ amɛ tsũi kɛ amɛbii ahe waa ni amɛkɛ hiɛdɔɔ tutuaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni aaabɛŋkɛ jɛmɛ lɛ.
Nyɛjwɛŋa fɔfɔii lɛ ahe, bɔ ni amɛkwɛ̃ɔ!
2 Yɛ blema beaŋ lɛ, aduɔ loofɔji yɛ amɛlalai ni ŋɔɔ kɛ amɛhe ni yɔɔ fɛo lɛ hewɔ, ni agbɛnɛ hu ayeɔ amɛloo ni akɛ amɛ shãa afɔle hu.
Atsɛɔ lɛ yɛ Biblia lɛ mli akɛ, ‘mɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ efɔ lɛ mu,’ kɛ “okropɔŋ ko” ni miiba “kɛmiijɛ maŋsɛɛ shɔŋŋ.”
11 Miitsɛ loofɔlɔ ko ni gbɔbiɔ kɛmiijɛ hulushiteehe,*+
Nakai beaŋ lɛ, obaanyɛ obɛŋkɛ loofɔji kɛ bɔɔ nii bibii kwraa, ni amɛshihilɛhe yɔɔ koo mli diɛŋtsɛ lɛ po—hɛɛ obaakwɛ amɛ, obaakase amɛhe nii, ni obaaná amɛhe miishɛɛ.
Wɔtoii nuɔ loofɔji alalai ni ŋɔɔ lɛ.
Nɛkɛ loofɔlɔ bibioo nɛɛ yɛ henumɔŋ nilee, ni e-Feelɔ, Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛwo emli kɛha nakai feemɔ.
Akɛ nakai shika lɛ ni ebɔ he toi enyɔ baanyɛ ahe afilimatai enumɔ shi jeee ejwɛ—ni tsɔɔ ákɛ akɛ ekome lɛ woɔ mli tamɔ nɔ ni jara ko kwraa bɛ he!—Luka 12:6.
Akɛ bɔ ni etamɔ nɔ ni waaa kwraa kɛha okropɔŋ, ni ji loofɔlɔ ni he wa, ni nyɛɔ ehiɔ kɔɔyɔɔ mli ŋmɛlɛtswai abɔ lɛ akɛ eeefiliki lɛ, tsuɔ nii ni akɛfeɔ bɔ ni Yehowa haa etsuji hewalɛ lɛ he mfoniri.
Salomo tsɔɔ akɛ wɔtamɔ “loo ni adũ yɛ yaa mli, loo loofɔlɔ ni adũ yɛ tsɔne mli, . . . kɛ́ bei fɔji ba trukaa lɛ.”

Paulo kɛɛ enaanyo oblanyo fioo Timoteo yɛ wolo ni ji enyɔ ni eŋma eyaha lɛ lɛ mli akɛ: “Onyiɛ misɛɛ yɛ mitsɔɔmɔ, mijeŋba, miyiŋtoo, mihemɔkɛyeli, mitsuishitoo, misuɔmɔ, mitsuishiŋmɛɛ, miyiwalɛi, mimanehului . . . lɛ amli.”
Eŋma akɛ: “Onyiɛ misɛɛ yɛ mitsɔɔmɔ, mijeŋba, miyiŋtoo, mihemɔkɛyeli, mitsuishitoo, misuɔmɔ, mitsuishiŋmɛɛ, miyiwalɛi, mimanehului ni mina yɛ Antiokia kɛ Ikonium kɛ Listra lɛ amli, nɔ yiwalɛi abɔ ni mina ni Nuntsɔ lɛ jie mi kɛjɛ fɛɛ mli lɛ.
(1 Korintobii 4:17; 1 Timoteo 4:6, 12-16) Paulo ŋma akɛ: “Onyiɛ misɛɛ yɛ mitsɔɔmɔ, mijeŋba, miyiŋtoo, mihemɔkɛyeli, mitsuishitoo, misuɔmɔ, mitsuishiŋmɛɛ” lɛ mli.
Yɛ wolo ko ni Paulo ŋma Timoteo lɛ mli lɛ, ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Onyiɛ mitsɔɔmɔ, kɛ mishihilɛ gbɛ, kɛ miyiŋtoo, kɛ mihemɔkɛyeli, kɛ mitsuishitoo, kɛ misuɔmɔ, kɛ mishifimɔ lɛ sɛɛ kpaakpa.”
+ 10 Shi bo lɛ, onyiɛ mitsɔɔmɔ, kɛ mishihilɛ gbɛ,+ kɛ miyiŋtoo, kɛ mihemɔkɛyeli, kɛ mitsuishitoo, kɛ misuɔmɔ, kɛ mishifimɔ lɛ sɛɛ kpaakpa, 11 ni ole miyiwai kɛ mimanehului lɛ, tamɔ nɔ ni mikɛkpe yɛ Antiokia,+ yɛ Ikonium,+ yɛ Listra+ lɛ nɛkɛ.
Yesu kɛ toiboo ni afeɔ ahaa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ tsá suɔmɔ nɔ beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji mɔ ko miisumɔ mi lɛ, eeeye miwiemɔ lɛ nɔ, ni mitsɛ aaasumɔ lɛ.”
Kɛ́ mina akɛ ejeee lala kpakpa, aloo mifɔlɔi gbala mijwɛŋmɔ kɛba nɔ lɛ, yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, ebiɔ ní manyɛ mijwɛŋmɔ nɔ koni eye mitsui nɔ ejaakɛ yɛ mitsui mli lɛ, miisumɔ nakai lala lɛ.”[
Ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi lɛ, mi-Tsɛ baasumɔ lɛ, ni mi hu masumɔ lɛ ni majie mihe shi faŋŋ matsɔɔ lɛ.”
Ekɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Bɔ ni tsɛ lɛ sumɔ mi lɛ, nakai mi hu misumɔɔ nyɛ; nyɛhia shi yɛ misuɔmɔ lɛ mli.
Bɔ ni tsɛ lɛ sumɔ mi lɛ, nakai mi hu misumɔɔ nyɛ; nyɛhia shi yɛ misuɔmɔ lɛ mli.
Ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi lɛ, mi-Tsɛ baasumɔ lɛ, ni mi hu masumɔ lɛ ni majie mihe kpo faŋŋ matsɔɔ lɛ.”
Ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi lɛ, mi-Tsɛ baasumɔ lɛ, ni mi hu masumɔ lɛ ni majie mihe shi faŋŋ matsɔɔ lɛ.” —Yohane 14:21; 1 Yohane 5:3.
+ 9 Bɔ ni Tsɛ lɛ sumɔɔ mi lɛ,+ nakai mi hu misumɔɔ nyɛ; nyɛhia misuɔmɔ lɛ mli.
Ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Mɔ ni mikitai lɛ yɔɔ edɛŋ ni eyeɔ nɔ lɛ, lɛ ji mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi; ni mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi lɛ, mitsɛ aaasumɔ lɛ, ni mi hu masumɔ lɛ, ni majie mihe shi matsɔɔ lɛ.”—Yohane 14:21.
10 Kɛji nyɛye mikitãi lɛ anɔ lɛ, nyɛbaahi misuɔmɔ lɛ mli, tamɔ bɔ ni mi hu miyeɔ Tsɛ lɛ kitãi lɛ anɔ ni mihiɔ esuɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ.
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛye mikitãi lɛ anɔ lɛ, nyɛaahi misuɔmɔ lɛ mli; taakɛ bɔ ni mi hu miye mitsɛ kitãi lɛ anɔ ni mihiɔ esuɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ.”
Tsɛ ko ni yɔɔ bii enumɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ Kelvin lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Be fɛɛ be lɛ mibɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ majie suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛha mibii lɛ kpo kɛtsɔ kɛɛmɔ ni mikɛɔ amɛ akɛ misumɔɔ amɛ lɛ nɔ, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu kɛtsɔ amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ he miishɛɛ ni mináa lɛ nɔ.
Kɛji nyɛye mikitai lɛ anɔ lɛ, nyɛaahi misuɔmɔ lɛ mli; taakɛ bɔ ni mi hu miye mitsɛ kitai lɛ anɔ ni mihiɔ esuɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ.”

Sanebimɔi ni Akɛpɛiɔ Mɔ Mli
Wɔ fɛɛ wɔhe wɔye akɛ gbekɛ yoo ni gbo lɛ susuma baakpata mɔ ni gbe lɛ trukaa lɛ hiɛ yɛ gbii kpawo mli.

Dani wɔbaashi kpeei lɛ shishi lɛ, wɔkpɛlɛ yiŋkpɛɛ ko nɔ, ni efa ko kɛɔ akɛ: “Ákɛ Yehowa Odasefoi ni wɔbua wɔhe naa kutuu lɛ . . . , wɔŋmɔ wɔyiŋ kpɔ akɛ wɔbaaya nɔ ni wɔha nitsumɔ ni jɔɔmɔ yɔɔ mli nɛɛ ashwere babaoo, ni yɛ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ duromɔ naa lɛ, wɔbaafi shi yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ be kɛ kaa bei amli, ni wɔbaashiɛ Nyɔŋmɔ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa lɛ kɛ ekãa babaoo.”
Yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ hewɔ lɛ, Yesu Kristo kɛ gbele sa enaa kɛha gbɔmɔ fɛɛ gbɔmɔ. . . .
Nɔ kome ji akɛ, woloŋlelɔi ni kaseɔ wiemɔ he nii lɛ kɛɔ akɛ, wiemɔ ni ji “duromɔ eyi bo obɔ” lɛ jeee shishitsɔɔmɔ ni ja, ni akɛ shishijee Hela wiemɔ ni Luka kɛtsu nii lɛ ni ja ji “mɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ esumɔ esane.”
No hewɔ lɛ, Shulamit oblayoo lɛ miikɛɛ oblayei ni yɔɔ maŋtsɛwe lɛ koni amɛha amɛnifeemɔi afee fɛo kɛtsɔ esuɔmɔ lɛ hiɛ ni amɛtsĩɛ lɛ nɔ.
Ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Yɛ mɛi ni baanyɛ amɛkɛ amɛbe lɛ fã loo nɔ ni fa fe nakai atsu Nuŋtsɔ lɛ nitsumɔ lɛ agbɛfaŋ lɛ, wɔsusumɔ ji . . . akɛ: Nyɛya maŋtiasei wuji kɛ bibii amli, yɛ nyɛnyɛmɔ naa, ákɛ Gbɛgbalɔi loo Sanekpakpa Jajelɔi koni nyɛyatao anɔkwa Kristofoi lɛ yɛ he fɛɛ he, mɛi nɛɛ ateŋ mɛi pii hiɛ dɔɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ he, shi jeee anɔkwa nilee naa; nyɛbɔa mɔdɛŋ nyɛhaa mɛi nɛɛ alea wɔ-Tsɛ lɛ duromɔ lɛ, kɛ E-wiemɔ lɛ anunyam lɛ.”
Amrɔ nɛɛ, Grace kɛ ebe tsuɔ nii ni ekɛtao mɛi krokomɛi ni ekolɛ aha amɛná jwɛŋmɔ ni ejaaa yɛ Yehowa Odasefoi ahe lɛ.
Miyana nyɛmi nuu ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Marvin Holien, ni kɛ afii babaoo esɔmɔ akɛ nɔkwɛlɔ gbɛfalɔ, ni ekɛ wɔweku lɛ ebɔ be kpalaŋŋ lɛ, ni mibi lɛ akɛ: “Grace hiɛ fãko tsɔ, ni ebɛ niiashikpamɔ hu.
Sɛɛ mli lɛ, biyei enyɔ nɛɛ—Gladys kɛ Grace Gregory—batsɔmɔ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi.
Etee nɔ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Shihilɛ ko loo naagba loo oshara loo hiamɔ shihilɛ ko kwraa bɛ ní Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ nii lɛ nyɛŋ naa adamɔ ni etsu he nii yɛ omanyeyeli mli hu.
Mikɛ nɔ ni fe afii 75 esɔmɔ Yehowa, ni nakai nɔŋŋ eji yɛ Grace gbɛfaŋ, ni kɛjɛ beni wɔbote gbalashihilɛ mli nɛɛ, wɔkɛ nɔ ni miihe ashɛ afii 65 esɔmɔ lɛ.
Afɔ miŋa Grace afi 1930.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, be fɛɛ be ni Odasefoi lɛ baaya Grace ŋɔɔ lɛ, ejoɔ foi ni eyateeɔ ehe yɛ etsu lɛ sɛɛ kɛyashiɔ be ni amɛshiɔ amɛyaa.
Mɛi pii heɔ amɛyeɔ ákɛ akɛ jamɔ he nibii fata Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ lɛ kɛ enaakpɛɛ hewalɛi lɛ ahe.
Migbɛ́i ji no;
KWƐ hegbɛ ni eji akɛ aaaya Kristofoi ahenaabuamɔ shishi, kɛji akɛ Yehowa jalɔi ni ebua amɛhe naa lɛ shɛɛɛ mɛi nyɔŋma aloo amɛyifalɛ shɛɔ akpei abɔ, ejaakɛ Yesu wie akɛ: “He ni mɛi enyɔ loo mɛi etɛ ebua amɛhe naa yɛ, yɛ migbɛi anɔ lɛ, miyɛ amɛteŋ yɛ jɛi”!
Ni mɛi fɛɛ aaanyɛ̃ nyɛ yɛ migbɛi lɛ hewɔ; shi mɔ ni hiɛɔ mli kɛyawulaa shi lɛ, lɛ lɛ aaahere eyiwala.”—Mateo 10:16-22.
“Ni daa nɛɛ, amɛwoɔ migbɛ́i lɛ he muji gbi muu fɛɛ.
Egbɛi lɛ shishi ji “Kpɛtɛmɔ” loo “Hefatamɔ,” ni Lea tsɔɔ enɛ mli beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Enɛ lɛ agbɛnɛ miwu kɛ ehe aaakpɛtɛ mihe, ejaakɛ mikɛ lɛ efɔ bihii etɛ.”
Ni ehere nɔ ekɛɛ: “Atsɛɔ mi Lejio,* ejaakɛ wɔyi fa.”
‘Migbɛ́i ji Yehowa’ (8)
Yesu kɛɛ: “[Saulo] ji midɛŋdade ni ahala aha mi, koni ehiɛ migbɛi lɛ kɛya jeŋmaji kɛ maŋtsɛmɛi kɛ Israelbii lɛ hu ahiɛ.” —Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 9: 15.
7 Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni akɛ migbɛ́i lɛ tsɛɔ lɛ,+
Beni Emmanuel tsɔɔ lɛ yɛ Biblia lɛ mli akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi ji Yehowa lɛ, osɔfo lɛ kpiti Biblia lɛ, ni ehoso lɛ gbeyeigbeyei yɛ minyɛmi nuu lɛ hiɛ, ni ebolɔ akɛ, “Nɛkɛ wolo nɛɛ efite bo!”

“Gbekɛ Ji Mi”
Shi kwɛmɔ, mijieko su ni ja yɛ he lɛ kpo!
Beni atsĩ David tã klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, no mli lɛ eji gbekɛ nuu fioo, ni ekwɛɔ etsɛ tooi.
Nɔ̃ hewɔ ni enyɛ bihii lɛ amli wo la ji akɛ, gbi ko agbiɛnaa beaŋ lɛ, esuɔlɔ oblanyo tookwɛlɔ lɛ kɛɛ lɛ koni amɛyashara shi.
(Marko 9:25, 26) Shi be ni Yesu mɔ gbekɛ nuu lɛ nineshi lɛ, ewó ehe nɔ, ni ‘ehe wa lɛ yɛ nakai ŋmɛlɛtswaa lɛ nɔ nɔŋŋ.’
BENI Samuel ji gbekɛ nuu fioo lɛ, edamɔ shi shiŋŋ eha jalɛ shishitoo mlai, yɛ nibii fɔji ni Osɔfonukpa Eli bihii lɛ feɔ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, Yesu kɛ e-Tsɛ fɛɛ ná yijiemɔ ni gbekɛbii lɛ kɛhaa lɛ he miishɛɛ.
Otsii fioo sɛɛ lɛ, amɛbashɛ shi, ni amɛkɛ wɔ hi shi ŋmɛlɛtswai nyɔŋma kɛ miishɛɛ.
(Yesaia 10:5; Kpojiemɔ 18:2-8) Nakai “tso” lɛ baafee Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ lɛ mli jeŋmaji lɛ—ni ji gbɛjianɔtoo ko ní afee ehe mfoniri yɛ Kpojiemɔ wolo lɛ mli akɛ kooloo ní tsuɔ tamɔ muneele, ní eyɔɔ yitsei kpawo kɛ akolontoi nyɔŋma lɛ.—Kpojiemɔ 17:3, 15-17.
Yɛ afii nyɔŋma ni Karla kɛ mi fee ekome yɛ kpokpaa nɔkwɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli sɛɛ lɛ, ebabi ni afee lɛ opireshɛn.
Beni atswaa ŋmɛji nyɔŋma lɛ, asafoi babaoo eja amɛ dɛhiɛmɔ woji lɛ nɔ ni fe fã.
Etsɛɛɛ ni maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi lɛ kɛ Mennobii nyɔŋma ni feɔ wekui enyɔ lɛ tá okpɔlɔ kome he.
“Beni aaashɛ afi 2020 lɛ, no mli lɛ aakpa gbɛ akɛ helai ní jeee tsɛŋemɔ helai baagbe mɛi nyɔŋma fɛɛ mɛi nyɔŋma ateŋ mɛi kpawo yɛ kpokpai ní kpaako amɛnáa hiɛyaa lɛ anɔ, kɛ́ akɛmiito nɔ ni shɛɛɛ fã he ŋmɛnɛ lɛ.”—“The Global Burden of Disease,” Harvard University Press, 1996.
Be mli ni amɛmɛɔ bɔs lɛ, amɛkɛ aaafee minitii nyɔŋma tsuɔ nii ni amɛkɛkaneɔ Ŋmalɛ mli nikasemɔ ko ní sa ni amɛgbaa he sane, ni no sɛɛ lɛ nyɛ lɛ sɔleɔ kuku dani gbekɛbii lɛ kwɔɔ bɔs lɛ kɛyaa.[
Yehowa gba kɛtsɔ gbalɔ Zakaria nɔ akɛ: “Nakai gbii lɛ amli lɛ aaaba mli akɛ hii nyɔŋma ni jɛ jeŋmaji anɔ wiemɔi srɔtoi fɛɛ mli aaamɔ Yudanyo kome atade naamuu mli, amɛaakɛɛ: Wɔkɛ nyɛ aaatee; ejaakɛ wɔnu akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ nyɛ yɛ!”
Shi Israel akutsei nyɔŋma maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli bii lɛ ehiii nɔ̃ fɔŋ koni amɛsumɔ nɔ̃ kpakpa.
Beni naagbee mli lɛ akɛ lɛ ba koni akojo lɛ lɛ, abu lɛ fɔ ni awo lɛ tsuŋ afii nyɔŋma yɛ tsuŋwoohe ní Yehowa jálɔi krokomɛi bɛ jɛmɛ.
4 Lalatsɛ lɛ tsĩ maji nyɔŋma ní amɛtee Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ ayinɔ apam koni amɛkpãta amɛhiɛ lɛ atã.
Shiɛlɔ fɛɛ shiɛlɔ ni baaná dɔlai enumɔ eha lɛ, mikɛ dɔlai nyɔŋma baafata he ni akɛha!”
Kɛfata he lɛ, mɛi aaafee akpekpei nyɔŋma ni jeee Yehowa Odasefoi ji amɛ lɛ ba Yesu Kristo gbele lɛ Kaimɔ lɛ shishi, ni tsɔɔ akɛ amɛyɛ sanekpakpa lɛ he miishɛɛ bɔ ni sa aahu akɛ amɛba gbi jurɔ ni he hiaa nɛɛ shishi.
Nom ní aŋɔ akutsei nyɔŋma maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli bii lɛ ní akɛ gbɔi bato amɛshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ je shishi yɛ “Peka, Israel maŋtsɛ lɛ, yinɔ” mli, beni Yesaia gba gbalɛ nɛɛ sɛɛ etsɛɛɛ nɔŋŋ lɛ.
Rehabeam ye wuoyigbɛ maŋtsɛyeli ni feɔ Yuda kɛ Benyamin akutso lɛ nɔ, ni Yerobeam ye kooyigbɛ Israel akutsei nyɔŋma maŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔ.
Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhiŋmɛi na naakpɛɛ nii wuji ni jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ lɛ: haomɔi nyɔŋma ni ba Mizraim nɔ lɛ, bɔ ni Israel maŋ lɛ jo foi kɛtsɔ Ŋshɔ Tsuru lɛ mli, kɛ Mizraim Farao kɛ etai lɛ ahiɛkpatamɔ.
Sɛɛ mli lɛ, Yesu kɛ ebɔfoi nyɔŋma lɛ yi gbɛ akɛ amɛmiiya jɛmɛ.

24 “Kɛkɛ ni ekɛɛ mɛi ni damɔ emasɛi lɛ akɛ, ‘Nyɛhea mina lɛ yɛ edɛŋ ni nyɛkɛhãa mɔ ni yɔɔ minai nyɔŋma lɛ.’

Maŋtsɛmɛi Nyɔŋma Kɛha Ŋmɛlɛtswaa Kome
Ajie Petro yɛ tsuŋwoo mli aaafee afii nyɔŋma sɛɛ beni agbe Yesu yɛ Hehoo lɛ yeli beaŋ yɛ afi 33 Ŋ.B.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 12:1-5, 11-17.
“Ŋwɛi”—hulu lɛ, nyɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii lɛ—yeɔ Nyɔŋmɔ hewalɛ kɛ nilee lɛ he odase.
‘Baafa Kome Baanyɛ Agbu Duŋ Mli Tamɔ Ŋulami’
Kɛ́ odamɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ ni ookwɛ ní nakai ŋulami kpeteŋkpele lɛ miinyɔ shi kɛmiiya naagbeehe kroko lɛ, efeɔ tamɔ nɔ ni eeya “buu” mli koni eyajɔɔ ehe.
(Lala 33:6) Ni kɛ́ wɔkwɛ ŋwɛi gbɛkɛ lɛ, ŋulamii “asafo” nɛɛ fioo pɛ wɔkɛ wɔhiŋmɛii naa!
5 Ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Abram je kpo, ni ekɛɛ: “Ofainɛ, kwɛmɔ ŋwɛi ní okane ŋulamii lɛ, akɛ obaanyɛ okane lo.”
Shi, yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, ŋulamii lɛ ayi fá waa diɛŋtsɛ, tamɔ ŋshɔnaa shia.
Awie mɛnɛɛmɛi ahe yɛ Kpojiemɔ 1:16 akɛ yibɔ ni eye emuu, ni ji “ŋulamii kpawo” ni Yesu hiɛ yɛ eninejurɔ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, akɛɛ wɔ akɛ wɔyakwɛ bɔ ni lɛji enyɔ, (Arosa Star kɛ Arosa Kulm) ni Asafo lɛ toɔ he gbɛjianɔ ni ekɛloo kpeeyalɔi kɛya majimaji ateŋ kpee wuji ni abaafee yɛ Europa yɛ 1955 lɛ ashishi lɛ amli yɔɔ ha.
Sanekpakpai etɛ lɛ fɛɛ tsiɔ nɔ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsɛ lɛ akɛ ŋwɛi okadii ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ lɛ ata—hulu kɛ nyɔŋtsere ni wo duŋ kɛ ŋulamii ni miigbeegbee shi.
Kɛ amɛkɛ naagbai ni hiɛdɔɔ yɔɔ mli loo yiŋkpɛɛi ni he hiaa miikpe lɛ, amɛyaa amɛ sɔlemɔtsui amli, kɛ amɛji Buddhafoi, Taobii, Shintobii, aloo ekroko, koni amɛyabi nyɔŋmɔi lɛ anii, kɛkɛ lɛ amɛtee ŋulamiiaŋkwɛlɔ lɛ ŋɔɔ koni amɛyabi ŋulamii lɛ anii, kɛkɛ lɛ amɛtee mɔ ni gbaa lɛ ŋɔɔ koni ekane amɛdɛ ni ekwɛ amɛhiɛ, ni yɛ enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, amɛbaa shia ni amɛbabiɔ amɛ blematsɛmɛi ni egboi lɛ anii.
Afee hulu lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ, kɛ ŋulamii lɛ koni “amɛtso yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.”
Ni ŋulamii akpekpei akpei toi akpekpei akpei abɔ yɛ wɔ ŋulamii kusha ni atsɛɔ lɛ Milky Way lɛ mli.
Kɛ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ, ni ji owaobii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ, mɛni ji adesa ni ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? Aloo gbɔmɔ bi ni osaraa lɛ po?”—Lala 8:2, 4, 5.
Ni ŋwɛi ŋulamii kɛ oŋwɛ̃ kpɛŋ; hulu aaawo duŋ yɛ ekpojee mli, nyɔŋtsere hu haŋ ela lɛ akpɛ.
Ní emli aaalɛɛ kɛaateke Yudafoi anibii agbɛjianɔtoo lɛ naagbee moŋ lɛ, hulu, nyɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii ni wo duŋ lɛ ba beni hiɛkpatalɔi lɛ batutua Yerusalem lɛ.
3 Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, susumɔ nuu ko ni hi shi afii ohai babaoo ni eho nɛ, nuu ni sa kadimɔ babaoo fe sini mli gbɔmɔ ni ale lɛ waa, fe mɔ ni ehe gbɛi yɛ akaŋshii mli, aloo fe odehei aweku ko mlinyo lɛ he okwɛ.
Ŋulamii akpekpei toi akpe yɔɔ ŋulamii kushai nɛɛ ekomɛi amli.
(Hiob 38:33) Yeremia wolo lɛ ni aŋma yɛ afii 700 D.Ŋ.B. lɛ tsɛ́ Yehowa akɛ Bɔlɔ ni ‘wo nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii akpɔi’ kɛ ‘ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ akpɔi’ lɛ.
Bɔ ni ŋwɛibɔfo lɛ tsɔɔ mli eha lɛ, “ŋwɛi asafo lɛ” kɛ “ŋulamii lɛ” ni aklonto bibioo lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni etsirɛ amɛ etswia shikpɔŋ lɛ ji “mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ amaŋ lɛ.”
(Kpojiemɔ 1:12, 13, 16) Agbɛnɛ Yesu tsɔɔ enɛ mli: “Ŋulamii kpawo ni ona yɛ mininejurɔ nɔ lɛ he teemɔŋ sane lɛ, kɛ shika kanetsei kpawo lɛ: Ŋulamii kpawo lɛ ji asafoi kpawo lɛ abɔfoi, ni kanetsei kpawo ni ona lɛ ji asafoi kpawo lɛ.”—Kpojiemɔ 1:20.
Te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ akɛ, “ŋulami” ni ŋulamiiaŋkwɛlɔi lɛ na lɛ jeee ŋulami folo ko kɛkɛ lɛ?
62 Eyɛ mli akɛ nyɛyi efa babaoo tamɔ ŋwɛi ŋulamii moŋ,+ shi nyɛteŋ mɛi fioo kɛkɛ baashwɛ,+ ejaakɛ obooo Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbee toi.
“Grandmother’s Advice”: Mɛni ehiii yɛ shwelɛ ni anáa akɛ aaahe gbɛi yɛ Satan jeŋ nɛɛ mli lɛ he?
Hewalɛ ko jɛɛɛ shibɔlemɔ ŋulamii lɛ kɛ ŋulamii amli ni baanyɛ aná adesai anɔ hewalɛ tamɔ bɔ ni ŋulamiiaŋkwɛlɔi kɛɔ lɛ.
(Mateo 24:29, 30) “Ni okadii aaaba hulu kɛ nyɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii amli, . . . ni nɔ aaanyɔnyɔɔ gbɔmɛi anɔ yɛ gbeyei kɛ nibii ni baa je lɛŋ lɛ agbɛkwɛmɔ hewɔ.”—Luka 21:25, 26.
Ni nyɛsɔlea nyɛbia Nyɔŋmɔ yelikɛbuamɔ koni nyɛna nɛkɛ suɔmɔ ni nɔ kwɔ, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yibii nɛɛ eko.—Abɛi 3:5, 6; Yohane 17:3; Galatabii 5:22; Hebribii 10:24, 25.
(Luka 21:37, 38; Yohane 5:17) Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ, ekaselɔi lɛ na akɛ suɔmɔ ni mli wa ni eyɔɔ kɛha gbɔmɛi lɛ ji nɔ ni tsirɛɔ lɛ.
Tsɔɔmɔ mli akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsɔɔ akɛ “suɔmɔ onaanyo.”—Mat.
Ekomɛi, tamɔ nɔ ni wieɔ suɔmɔ, ni ji mumɔ lɛ yibii lɛ he lɛ, jɛɔ tsuiŋ henumɔ mli.
No sɛɛ lɛ, etsɔɔ anɔkwale nɛɛ mli babaoo akɛ, gbohii lɛ nyɛŋ asumɔ mɔ ko loo ni amɛnyɛ̃ lɛ, ni “nitsumɔ loo yiŋshwiemɔ loo nilee loo ŋaa ko bɛ gbohiiaje.”
Nyɔŋmɔ jieɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ esuɔmɔ ní ekɛsumɔ wɔ lɛ shi etsɔ̃ɔ, akɛ be mli ni wɔji eshafeelɔi lɛ beebe ni Kristo bagbo yɛ wɔnajiaŋ.”
3 “Misumɔɔ tsɛ lɛ.”
Mɛni hewɔ ekolɛ Paulo kɛɛ Korintobii lɛ akɛ “suɔmɔ toɔ etsui shi” lɛ?
(Marko 12:28-31) Ákɛ Kristofoi lɛ, Paulo woɔ wɔ hewalɛ koni wɔjie anɔkwa suɔmɔ kpo.
Yesu tsɔɔ akɛ eyɛ suɔmɔ kɛha wɔ taakɛ bɔ ni e-Tsɛ yɔɔ lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Mika, ní hi shi yɛ Yesaia beaŋ lɛ jaje akɛ: “Ájaje nɔ ni hi kɛ nɔ ni Yehowa biɔ yɛ odɛŋ atsɔɔo: no ji akɛ ofee nɔ ni ja gbɛ, ni osumɔ ejurɔfeemɔ, ni okɛ o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ anyiɛ yɛ heshibaa mli.”
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, hiɛsɔɔ kɛha suɔmɔ ni mli kwɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Kristo ejie lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ wɔ lɛ kanya wɔ koni wɔjɔɔ wɔwala nɔ wɔha Nyɔŋmɔ ní wɔbatsɔmɔ Kristo kaselɔi.—Yohane 3:16; 1 Yohane 4:10, 11.
16 Suɔmɔ kpo ni wɔɔjie wɔtsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ kɔɔɔ mɛi ni yɔɔ wɔkpokpai anɔ lɛ pɛ ahe.
19 Nɔ ni ji ejwɛ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔtao mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ejaakɛ suɔmɔ ji mumɔ lɛ yibii lɛ eko.
Suɔmɔ sɛɛ efooo gbi ko gbi ko.”
5 Kɛ́ Asafoŋ Sɔɔmɔ Ajinafoi Akuu lɛ mlinyo ko kɛɛ okɛ mɔ ko ni ekpa shiɛmɔyaa afee Biblia mli nikasemɔ lɛ, ekolɛ ebaaha okɛ lɛ asusu saneyitsei pɔtɛɛ komɛi ni yɔɔ ‘Nyɔŋmɔ Suɔmɔ’ wolo lɛ mli lɛ ahe.
Suɔmɔ kɛha Yehowa ji kanyamɔ kpakpa fe fɛɛ ní wɔbaanyɛ wɔná ni wɔkɛkane e-Wiemɔ lɛ.
Nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ efee lɛ tsɔɔ suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ.
4 Enɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ esa akɛ wɔsumɔsumɔɔ wɔhe yɛ gbɛnaa nii ni kã wɔnɔ lɛ kɛkɛ hewɔ.
14 Ani miyɛ bulɛ kɛ suɔmɔ kɛha jeŋba he shishitoo mlai ni yɔɔ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ?
(Yohane 13:35) Ajie suɔmɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ kpo atsɔɔ mɛi yɛ gbɛ ni sa kadimɔ waa nɔ yɛ wekui ateŋ kɛ maŋkwramɔŋ basabasafeemɔ beaŋ.
Wɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ni ja ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ eŋmɛŋ enɛ gbɛ nɛkɛ kɛyaŋ naanɔ.
Ni akɛ aŋkroaŋkroi lɛ, wɔhe yeɔ, wɔkɛ amanehulu kpeɔ, ni wɔsuɔlɔi gboiɔ.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 17:11) Amɛkpa Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli jogbaŋŋ koni amɛnu Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ, ni enɛ ye bua amɛ ni amɛtee nɔ amɛfee toiboo kɛjie suɔmɔ kpo.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, nɛkɛ ji bɔ ni ebalɛ yɛ lalatsɛ lɛ gbɛfaŋ, mɔ ni kɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ akɛ: “Misumɔɔ omla lɛ akɛ nɔ ko!
Okɛ be kukuoo ko abi shiɛlɔ ko ni etsɔɔ nɔ ni yeɔ ebuaa lɛ ni eyaa nɔ ekɛ hiɛdɔɔ tsuɔ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ yɛ hela ni naa wa ni yeɔ lɛ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ.
Mɛni abaanyɛ afee ni akɛye abua be mli ni hiamɔ ko ni yɔɔ faŋŋ eba lɛ?
Yehowa Odasefoi eye ebua mɛi akpekpei abɔ ni amɛna hiɛnɔkamɔ diɛŋtsɛ akɛ amɛaafata he.
(Hiob 36:3) Efee mlai koni eye ebua ewebii ní amɛná he sɛɛ.
Nɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni Yesu baanyɛ atsu—kɛha helatsɛmɛi, mɛi ni daimonioi haoɔ amɛ, ohiafoi, loo mɛi ni hɔmɔ yeɔ amɛ lɛ po ji—ni eye ebua amɛ ni amɛle, ni amɛkpɛlɛ, ni amɛsumɔ anɔkwale ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he lɛ nɔ.
Kɛjeee Yehowa yeɔ ebuaa wɔ kulɛ, wɔnyɛŋ wɔye kunim kɔkɔɔkɔ yɛ ta ni wɔkɛ Satan wuɔ lɛ mli
Enɛ ye ebua Gabriele ni ekwa etsutsu jeŋba gbonyo lɛ, ni esaa ekɛ Yehowa teŋ wekukpaa lɛ.
Naagbee kwraa lɛ, ye obua obii lɛ ni amɛna bɔ ni amɛaafee amɛkɛ nɔ ni amɛkaseɔ lɛ atsu nii.
8 Eyɛ mli akɛ Yesu eye emuu moŋ, shi eba ehe shi ni ehã ekaselɔi lɛ le akɛ Yehowa yelikɛbuamɔ he miihia lɛ.
Mɛi babaoo ni sɛɛ mli lɛ ehe bahiaa koni amɛku sɛɛ kɛya amɛmaŋ lɛ enyɛ amɛkɛ amɛ wiemɔ mli hesaa lɛ etsu nii kɛye kɛbua mɛi ni amɛmaŋ wiemɔ ji Spain wiemɔ lɛ.
Yesu na mɛi ni eshiɛ eha amɛ lɛ tamɔ tooi ni yelikɛbuamɔ he miihia amɛ, ni ekɛ enɛ fee nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa eha wɔ.
Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ kɛ e-Biblia, wolo, kɛ pɛnsil aba, koni nyɛye nyɛbua nyɛhe kɛtao nibii amli nyɛkwɛa akɛ amɛkɛ amɛhe kpãa gbee . . . bɔ ni sa lo.
5 Bɔfo Paulo tsɔɔ nibii komɛi ni baanyɛ aye abua wɔ koni wɔkɛ miishɛɛ asɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ.
15 Kɛ wɔɔhi shi akɛ mɛi ni susuɔ nibii kpakpai ahe lɛ, no lɛ yelikɛbuamɔ kome ji ni wɔtsi wɔhe kɛjɛ ‘naanyobɔɔ fɔŋ ni fiteɔ jeŋba kpakpa’ lɛ he.
Sɔlemɔ kɛ naanyobɔɔ kpakpa yeɔ buaa ni ayeɔ he ni feɔ shoo nɔ kunim yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
(b) Mɛni kɛ́ oblahii kɛ oblayei kai lɛ, ebaaye ebua amɛ koni amɛte shi amɛshi kaai?
Kɛ́ wɔkɛ amɛ fee ekome ni wɔjɛ heshibaa mli wɔtsu nitsumɔi ni ekolɛ amɛkɛaawo wɔdɛŋ lɛ ahe nii lɛ, ebaanyɛ eye ebua ni amɛjatsui lɛ afee huyɛɛ.
Ha asafo lɛ agba niiashikpamɔi ni woɔ mɔ hewalɛ ni amɛná yɛ shihilɛi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ amli lɛ amɛtsɔɔ: (1) mɔ ko ni yɔɔ wiemɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ ní aaaye abua lɛ koni eba Kaimɔ lɛ, (2) ní aaasɔmɔ akɛ gbɛgbalɔi awalɔ, (3) mɔ ko ni ekpa shiɛmɔyaa ní aaawo lɛ hewalɛ koni ekɛ asafo lɛ abɔi bɔɔ ekoŋŋ, (4) mɔ hee ní aaaye abua lɛ koni eje shiɛmɔyaa shishi, kɛ (5) mɛi ni ba Kaimɔ lɛ amiishɛɛ shi ní aaatee.
(Yesaia 45: 18) Nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, esa akɛ eye ebua wɔ koni wɔna nɔ̃ suɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ni eji, akɛni ehaaa wɔ wala kɛkɛ, shi moŋ ehaa wɔnáa nibii ni haa shihilɛ feɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ lɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ hu lɛ hewɔ.
Enɛ baaye abua bo ni okɛ ŋmalɛ mli saji ni ole momo lɛ ato nɔ ni okaneɔ lɛ he.
Etu ehe fɛɛ eha Yehowa sɔɔmɔ lɛ, eyɛ mli akɛ enáaa yelikɛbuamɔ tsɔ ko kɛjɛɛɛ efɔlɔi adɛŋ, ni amɛmɔɔɔ anɔkwale lɛ mli kɛyashi amɛgboi.
Shi jeee fɛɛ yeɔ ebuaa.
19 Kɛji akɛ eeeba akɛ wɔɔkpalaŋ kɛaajɛ “jalɔi atempɔŋ” lɛ nɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ baanyɛ aye abua wɔ koni wɔjaje wɔgbɛ̀i.
Akɛni nɔyeli nɛɛ baahi shi daa hewɔ lɛ, ehãa wɔnáa nɔmimaa akɛ nibii fɛɛ ni ebaafee lɛ ahe baaba sɛɛnamɔ kɛhã eshishi bii lɛ daa.
Mɛɛ nitsumɔ baahã hemɔkɛyeli ni oyɔɔ yɛ Yehowa mli kɛ wekukpaa ni yɔɔ okɛ lɛ teŋ lɛ mli aya nɔ awa?
(b) Asafo babaoo lɛ atadei yɛji lɛ feɔ mɛni he mfoniri?
* Niyenii lɛ yɛɔ tamɔ korianda* wui, ni eŋɔɔmɔ tamɔ keeki tɛtrɛbii ni akɛ wo eshwie nɔ.
6 Bɔ ni bɔfo Yohane tsɔɔ nɔ ni ena lɛ mli eha lɛ kɛɔ akɛ nɛkɛ asafo babaoo nɛɛ mlibii lɛ “wo atadei yɛji.”
Ethiopia nyɛmimɛi yei lɛ babaoo wo amɛ atadei yɛji ni aye samai awo mli fɛfɛo yɛ kusum naa, ni ha mumɔ ni akɛnáa mlifilimɔ lɛ fa kɛteke nɔ lɛlɛŋ lɛ.
Kɛ́ tsɔi ni yɔɔ he ni gbɛ̃ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ etsɔ eyɛŋ, ni hela lɛ ebote heloo lɛ mli vii lɛ, kpiti ji nɔ ni eje kpo yɛ fala lɛ mli lɛ, ni osɔfo lɛ ajaje akɛ ehe tseee.
No mli lɛ, ŋmɔ ni yɔɔ jɛi lɛ ‘egba futaa.’
30 Hɛɛ, mɛi ni amɛkpoo akɛ amɛaakpɛlɛ okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ lɛ Nɔtalɔ kunimyelɔ lɛ hewalɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ, abaanyɛ amɛnɔ ni amɛkpɛlɛ amɛtɔmɔ lɛ nɔ.
Akɛni amɛyɛ hemɔkɛyeli yɛ Kristo kpɔ̃mɔ afɔleshaa lɛ mli, ni no eha “amɛfɔ́ amɛtadei lɛ ahe, ni amɛha eyɛ futaa yɛ toobi lɛ lá lɛ mli” hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa buɔ amɛ jalɔi akɛ enanemɛi, shi jeee emumɔŋ bii, ni eha amɛná hiɛnɔkamɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ akɛ amɛbaafo “amanehulu kpeteŋkpele lɛ.”
Kɛ mɛi ni kɛ mama tsɔne feɔ mama yɛŋ lɛ ahiɛ baagboi.
Mɛi babaoo buɔ nɛkɛ nuumo ni mli filiɔ lɛ ni yɔɔ musu agbo kɛ tsɛŋ futaa tamɔ snoo nɛɛ akɛ Blonya he okadi diɛŋtsɛ.
No mli nɔŋŋ ni kpãa ni wɔkɛkaa nii lɛ tse, ni eha Awo nibii yɛji ni efɔ he fɛfɛo lɛ bawu ŋmɔtɔ.
20 Amɛnine shɛɔ “tɛ yɛŋ” ko hu nɔ.
Shi, Ellen White tsɔɔ mli akɛ, ‘abaagbe’ mɛi ni yeee kaa lɛ mli kunim lɛ ‘agbɛi kɛjɛ wala wolo lɛ mli.’
* Tɛ yɛŋ tsɔɔ akɛ aŋmɛɛ mɔ lɛ he, yɛ be mli ni tɛ diŋ tsɔɔ fɔbuu, yɛ be babaoo mli lɛ gbele.
19 Agbɛnɛ okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ ni atsi ta klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa yɛ Kpojiemɔ 6:2 lɛ ebaje kpo ni aana lɛ faŋŋ ekoŋŋ.
Wɔheɔ wɔyeɔ akɛ Biblia famɔ ni ji ‘atsi he kɛjɛ lá he’ lɛ jieɔ lá diɛŋtsɛ ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli loo efãi komɛi ni ji (plasma, red cells, white cells, kɛ platelets) lɛ kɛjɛɔ jɛmɛ.
Enɔ fɔfɔi etsuji kɛ eyɛji fɛfɛji lɛ gbáa mra yɛ January naagbee kɛmiimɔ February shishijee gbɛ.
Mɛni hewɔ amɛwo atadei yɛji lɛ?
20 Osɔfo lɛ akwɛ lɛ,+ ni kɛ́ hela lɛ ebote heloo lɛ mli vii, ni tsɔi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ etsɔ eyɛŋ lɛ, osɔfo lɛ ajaje akɛ mɔ lɛ he tseee.
Afɔɔ lɛ tsɛmɔ akɛ Lao-tzu, ni eshishi ji “Blema Nuŋtsɔ” aloo “Blemanyo,” ejaakɛ taakɛ blema saji tsɔɔ lɛ, hɔ ni enyɛ ŋɔ lɛ lɛ sɛɛ tsɛ aahu akɛ beni afɔ lɛ lɛ, no mli lɛ eyiteŋ tsɔi eje waŋ momo po.
Adu maŋkwramɔ mumɔ awo wɔ mli, ni atsɔse wɔ koni wɔnyɛ blɔfomɛi.
Nɔ ni akɛfeɔ Santa he mfoniri ŋmɛnɛ akɛ mɔ ko ni he yɔɔ miishɛɛ, kɛ etsɛŋ eyɛŋ, ni ewo atade tsuru lɛ ji nɔ ko ni nitsumɔhe ko ni yɔɔ North America lɛ fee yɛ afi 1931 koni amɛkɛtswa amɛnibii ahe adafi yɛ Blonya beiaŋ.
Eba akɛ, Yehowa baawo shiɛlɔi babaoo agbɛ kɛya ŋmɔ ni ‘egba futaa ni sa kpamɔ’ nɛɛ mli.—Mateo 9:37, 38.

“Owiemɔ lɛ ji kane kɛhã minane” (105)
BƆ NI BIBLIA LƐ TSAKE MISHIHILƐ: Be ko lɛ, mikane Abɛi 27:11 lɛ ni kɛɔ akɛ: “Mibi, feemɔ ohe nilelɔ, ní oha mitsui anyɔ mimli.”

Mɛni mafee koni mibii lɛ anii akafee mɔbɔ yɛ gbi jurɔ ko loo amɛfɔmɔ gbii ni wɔyeee lɛ hewɔ?
Jenamɔ fɛɛ lɛ no he mijwɛŋɔ.”

□ Mɛni hewɔ Kristofoi yeɔ yookpeemɔ he afi gbii juji ni amɛyeee fɔmɔ he afi gbii juji lɛ?
Ani ole nɔ ni Biblia lɛ wieɔ yɛ fɔmɔ gbii ahe?
Eeenyɛ eba akɛ, Hɔgbaa (ni ji Phœbus kɛ Mithras kɛ agbɛnɛ hu Nuntsɔ lɛ Gbi lɛ) ni maŋtsɛ Constantine kpɛlɛ nɔ lɛ . . . ha afii ohai ejwɛ lɛ mli Kristofoi lɛ susu akɛ ehi akɛ amɛaaha Nyɔŋmɔ Bi lɛ fɔmɔ gbi kɛ hulu fɔmɔ gbi lɛ akpe.
Ojogbaŋŋ, mra mli yɛ afii oha nɛɛ mli lɛ, Biblia Kaselɔi, taakɛ ale Yehowa Odasefoi yɛ no beaŋ lɛ ye fɔmɔ gbii juji.
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ mɔ ko miiye efɔmɔgbi lɛ, no tsɔɔ akɛ eeye nyɔŋmɔ ko fɔmɔgbi.
Yiŋ kɔshikɔshi-feemɔ ko kwraa bɛ he akɛ, Yesu klɛŋklɛŋ kaselɔi ni ji Yudafoi lɛ yeee efɔmɔ gbi akɛ gbijurɔ.
Mɛɛ fɔmɔ gbi yelii ahe awie yɛ Biblia lɛ mli?
