• Mɛni hewɔ naagbai baanyɛ aba Kristofoi agbalashihilɛi po amli lɛ?
Kɛfata he lɛ, amɛkɛ anɔkwayeli esɔmɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ, ni amɛkɛ naagba fɛɛ naagba ni adesai kɛkpeɔ lɛ eko ekpe diɛŋtsɛ.
Kristofonyo ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ susuuu kɛjɛɛɛ shishijee nɔŋŋ akɛ nyɛminuu ko naagbai lɛ jɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
Kɛfata he lɛ, ebaahã wɔna gbɛ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsɔ nɔ wɔfee nakai, kɛ Biblia mli shishitoo mlai komɛi ni baaye abua wɔ, koni toiŋjɔlɛ ahi wɔ kɛ mɛi krokomɛi, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu, wɔ kɛ Yehowa teŋ be fɛɛ be.
Wɔmiishwe be ni Nyɔŋmɔ baafee nibii fɛɛ ehee, ni ejie wɔnaagbai lɛ fɛɛ kɛya lɛ.
Kɛ́ wɔkɛ shika gbɛfaŋ naagbai kpe lɛ, mɛni wɔbaanyɛ wɔsɔle wɔbi, ni te Yehowa haa sɔlemɔi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ ahetoo ehaa tɛŋŋ?
17 Bei komɛi lɛ, eyɛ mli akɛ wɔsɔle yɛ naagba ko ni wɔkɛkpeɔ lɛ he aahu moŋ, shi afũ ma he ni ema.
Kpokpai komɛi tsu naagba nɛɛ he nii kɛtsɔ teji loo okpɔŋɔ ni amɛhé amɛha kpokpaa nɔkwɛlɔ lɛ koni eta lɛ nɔ.
Ekolɛ gbekɛ ko baanyɛ ekɛ naagbai babaoo aba yɛ edalɛ kɛmiishɛ ebalahiiaŋ loo ebalayeiaŋ, ni no sɛɛ lɛ ebaada ni ebatsɔ onukpa ni anyɛɔ amuɔ afɔ̃ɔ enɔ, ni abuɔ lɛ jogbaŋŋ.
Shi anɔkwa sane ji akɛ, wu kɛ ŋa ni sumɔɔ amɛhe jogbaŋŋ lɛ po kɛ naagbai komɛi kpeɔ.
Beni ejie ehe shi etsɔɔ amɛ etã lɛ, ekɛ amɛwie nɔyeli ko, Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ, ni baatsu adesai anaagbai ahe nii lɛ he sane, ni ekɛ wolo bibioo ko ni ehiɛ yɛ ehe lɛ ha amɛ.
Beni amɛkpe shikome ko lɛ, sanegbaa ko ni mli wa ni kɔɔ shihilɛ mli naagbai ahe lɛ tee nɔ yɛ amɛteŋ, ni no tee sanegbaa babaoo diɛŋtsɛ shi.
Ani Jamɔ Ji Nɔ Titri ni Kɛ Adesai Anaagbai Baa?
Kristofonyo lɛ shidaamɔ kɛ naagbai baa enɔ daa gbi; ehiii shi tamɔ bɔ ni mɛi krokomɛi fɛɛ yɔɔ lɛ . . .
Ewa mi ni mikaha mihela lɛ he mijwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ, ni mafo mɛi krokomɛi anɔ mli moŋ fe ni mahao mihe tuutuu yɛ minaagbai lɛ ahewɔ.
Kɛ́ wɔna akɛ wɔmiifee yeyeeye fe nine lɛ, ebaanyɛ efee akɛ naagba kroko hɔ sɛɛ.
19, 20. (a) Taakɛ atsɔɔ yɛ Lala 72 lɛ, mɛɛ naagba Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ baatsu he nii?
Esa akɛ wɔle nɔ hewɔ ni nakai nibii lɛ fite lɛ bɔni afee ni wɔnyɛ wɔtsĩ nakai naagba lɛ naa.
Nɔ ni tamɔ nakai lɛ, mumɔŋ paradeiso lɛ yɛ nɛkɛ jeŋ ni jeee paradeiso kwraa nɛɛ mli akɛni Yehowa Odasefoi tsuɔ mli nii, ni Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ amɛmɔdɛŋbɔi anɔ lɛ hewɔ.
Jɔɔmɔi Kɛha Mɛi ní Kuɔ Amɛsɛɛ Kɛbaa Yehowa Ŋɔɔ Lɛ
HELOO naa ninàmɔ kpakpa ji jɔɔmɔ.
Kɛji akɛ okɛ anunyam ha Yehowa lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ̀i anɔ onine baashɛ jɔɔmɔ nɔ yɛ, ni mɛni sa akɛ efee ofaishitswaa?
Kwɛ bɔ ni wiemɔi nɛɛ ji anɔkwale ha, akɛ: “Yehowa jɔɔmɔ lɛ, no feɔ mɔ niiatsɛ”!—Abɛi 10:22.
Yehowa kɛ ŋa ni yeɔ anɔkwa ni hi jogbaŋŋ ejɔɔ mi.
15:1, 2) Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli eyi obɔ kɛ oblahii kɛ oblayei babaoo ni feɔ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ ni sa jogbaŋŋ yɛ amɛhesaamɔ mli.
Akɛni akɛ anɔkwale lɛ he anɔkwa nilee ejɔɔ wɔ hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔsumɔ akɛ wɔɔfee nii yɛ nakai nilee lɛ kɛ gbeekpamɔ naa, ni wɔha wɔjwɛŋmɔ ahi nibii kpakpai anɔ.
Kɛkɛ lɛ esa akɛ Yakob akwa afee ehe Esau koni enine ashɛ jɔɔmɔ lɛ nɔ.
Ekome ni mikaiɔ ji akɛ Yehowa jɔɔ mɛi ni boɔ lɛ toi lɛ.
Nɔ ni fe fɛɛ Iɛ, nɔ ni jɛɔ Kristofoi ajeŋba kɛ nitsumɔ mli baa ji wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ Yehowa ni yɔɔ jeŋba kpakpa lɛ nɔkpɛlɛmɔ kɛ jɔɔmɔ.
19 Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ, Yehowa jɔɔ mɛi ni kɛ ekãa fĩɔ anɔkwa jamɔ sɛɛ lɛ.
Ekolɛ nakai ni ooofee lɛ baaha oná shihilɛ gbɛ ni nyɔmɔwoo yɔɔ mli ni eyi obɔ kɛ jɔɔmɔi babaoo.
Tsĩi jɔɔmɔi ni agba yɛ Yesaia wolo lɛ mli akɛ wɔbaaná wɔsɛɛ lɛ ekomɛi atã.
15 Akɛni ato Abraham seshibii lɛ ahe gbɛjianɔ akɛ maŋ yɛ Mla lɛ shishi hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa jɔɔ amɛ yɛ shiwoo ni ekɛha blematsɛ lɛ naa.
15:12) Shi ani ekpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ Yehowa ji mɔ ni ye ebua lɛ ni etsu nii lɛ, ni ákɛ, ja Nyɔŋmɔ etee nɔ ejɔɔ lɛ ní eye ebua lɛ dani ebaaye omanye?
Mikɛ afii babaoo etee nɔ esɔmɔ akɛ gbɛgbalɔ krɛdɛɛ, ni Yehowa ejɔɔ misɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ.
Kwɛ jɔɔmɔ ni eji ákɛ wɔfata nakai tooku lɛ he, ni wɔmiiná suɔmɔ kɛ ekomefeemɔ ni yɔɔ ‘nyɛmimɛi asafo muu lɛ fɛɛ’ ateŋ lɛ he sɛɛ!—1 Petro 2:17; 5:2, 3.
Yehowa kɛ emumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ baatsu nii yɛ nakai beaŋ koni eha eyiŋtoo kɛha shikpɔŋ lɛ kɛ adesai fɛɛ ni yɔɔ nɔ lɛ aba mli. Amrɔ nɛɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔ nyɛŋ akpele bɔ ni shihilɛ lɛ baaji yɛ be ni nɔ bɛ nɛɛ mli lɛ he.
Kɛji akɛ wɔfee nakai lɛ, Yehowa kɛ naanɔ wala ni miishɛɛ kɛ tsui ni nyɔɔ mɔ mli fɛɛ yɔɔ mli baajɔɔ wɔ.
Mɛɛ jɔɔmɔ emuuyeli mlihiɛlɔi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ ji kɛha asafo lɛ nɛkɛ!
21 Jɔɔmɔi babaoo jɛɔ Kaimɔ be lɛ mli baa.
Yehowa Jɔɔmɔi Amli Ŋɔɔmɔ Namɔ

(Lala 36:10; Kolosebii 2:8) Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni wɔɔtsɔmɔ nyɔji wɔha jarayeli gbɛjianɔtoo ko ni lɛ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ eedĩdãa kɛmiibɛŋkɛ hiɛkpatamɔ he lɛ, wɔbaabo ŋaa ni Yehowa woɔ wɔ akɛ wɔmii ashɛ niyenii kɛ hehaanɔ ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ he, ni wɔha wɔkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ wekukpaa lɛ afee nɔ ni he hiaa wɔ fe fɛɛ yɛ shihilɛ mli lɛ toi.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 17:25) Wɔbaanyɛ wɔda lɛ shi yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ yɛ mumɔ fɛɛ mumɔ ni wɔmuɔ, niyenii fɛɛ niyenii ni wɔyeɔ, kɛ miishɛɛ kɛ mlifilimɔ be fɛɛ be ni baa yɛ shihilɛ mli lɛ he.
Nɔ ni jɛɔ enɛ mli baa lɛ bafeɔ tamɔ la ni akɛmiihoo nii ni ebatsɔ nɔ ni shãa koo.
Shi eji niyenii, no hewɔ lɛ no ji nɔ ni wɔye nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ.
Wiemɔ ni ahaa kɛtsaraa nɔ lɛ fã ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ ma bɔ ni ehe hiaa ni wɔkase nii lɛ nɔ mi, kɛ́ wɔbaaye “niyenii kpakpa” lɛ, shi jeee nii kɛkɛ ni akaneɔ.
Nitsumɔhei ni ajɛɔ jɛmɛ ayeɔ abuaa maŋbii lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛfee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ oya—niyenii hoomɔ oya, hei ni ajieɔ shika yɛ ni afiteee be kwraa, kɛ ekrokomɛi ni tamɔ nakai—ejaakɛ amɛle akɛ kɛ́ afiteee mɛi ni amɛkɛyeɔ jara lɛ abei lɛ, ehaa amɛnáa miishɛɛ.
Yɛ 1546 October mli lɛ, nikasemɔ he lɛ ŋma Du Chastel shitee-kɛ-woo wolo akɛ Estienne Bibliai lɛ ji “niyenii kɛha mɛi ni kpooɔ wɔ Hemɔkɛyeli lɛ, ni efiɔ musubɔɔi . . . ni yaa nɔ lɛ sɛɛ,” no hewɔ lɛ eyi obɔ kɛ tɔmɔi bɔ ni yɛ no hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ “atsumɔ ni akpata fɛɛ hiɛ.”

Bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni okɛ nibii anɔmimaa atsɔɔ (1) susumɔi atsakemɔ kɛ (2) bɔ ni onuɔ nɔ ni okɛɔ lɛ he ohaa.
(5 Mose 32:4) Kɛ́ ooha saji ni afɔɔ bimɔ yɛ sui nɛɛ ahe lɛ ahetoo lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ oootsɔ ogbala jwɛŋmɔ kɛba sui lɛ anɔ?
Mina bɔ ni nyɛyeɔ nyɛbuaa nyɛhe; weku ji nyɛ lɛlɛŋ.”
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ nitsumɔhe nine lɛ baanyɛ aye abua bo, shi mɛɛ sɔ̃i esa akɛ bo diɛŋtsɛ otsu he nii?
+ 22 Yiŋtoo nɛɛ nɔŋŋ hewɔ miitsu lɛ nyɛŋɔɔ lɛ, koni nyɛle bɔ ni wɔyɔɔ, ni eshɛje nyɛtsuii amii.
Te ooofee tɛŋŋ otsɔɔ akɛ oji Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli nyo kpakpa?
Kɛ oji nyɛ ni tsuɔ nii ni nuɔ he akɛ etɔ bo beni okpa nitsumɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ otsɛɛɛ obii lɛ koni amɛfata ohe kɛhoo niyenii lɛ?
(Abɛi 16:31) Kɛ́ oji mɔ ko ni efɔ̃ nɔ yɛ afii amli lɛ, ani oyɔseɔ bɔ ni owiemɔi kɛ onifeemɔi baanyɛ aná mɛi krokomɛi anɔ hewalɛ yɛ gbɛ kpakpa nɔ lɛ?
Eji ole jogbaŋŋ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kojomɔ ni ekɛbaa lɛ baŋ yɛ afii fioo komɛi asɛɛ kulɛ, ani no baatsake bɔ ni ohiɔ shi ohaa lɛ?
Too osane lɛ he gbɛjianɔ yɛ gbɛ ni baaha bɔ ni susumɔi lɛ kɔɔ ekroko he lɛ baafee faŋŋ kɛ bɔ ni ebaaha naamuu ni obaa loo oti ni obɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni oshɛ he lɛ afee faŋŋ.
Kɛ́ tsɛ ji bo ni okɛ naagbai nɛɛ ateŋ ekome loo nɔ ni fa fe nakai miikpe lɛ, te ooofee tɛŋŋ otsu he nii?
Ehe miihia ni oye obua amɛ ni amɛna nɔ hewɔ, kɛ bɔ ni nɔ ni okɛɔ amɛ lɛ he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ diɛŋtsɛ kɛha amɛ.
Kɛ́ oobɔ mɔdɛŋ ni oya ohiɛ yɛ oshiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ, no lɛ gbalamɔ ojwɛŋmɔ kɛba bɔ ni okaneɔ ŋmalɛi ohaa lɛ nɔ babaoo.
Kɛkɛ ni ebi enyɛ akɛ, “Amrɔ nɛɛ ni ábaptisi bo lɛ, te onuɔ he tɛŋŋ?”
7 Kɛ́ oji oblanyo loo oblayoo ni miisɔmɔ Yehowa lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ hemɔkɛyeli baanyɛ aye abua bo ni ohala nitsumɔ ni sa?
Mɛni obaanyɛ ofee kɛtsɔɔ akɛ, ‘ookwɛ Nyɔŋmɔ bii lɛ akpojiemɔ lɛ gbɛ waa’?
Ná nɔmimaa akɛ ohiɛ su jieɔ bɔ ni onuɔ nii ahe ohaa lɛ diɛŋtsɛ kpo yɛ nɔ ni otsɔɔ mli lɛ mli.
Te ooofee tɛŋŋ otsɔɔ akɛ otswa ofai shi akɛ obaawu oshi mumɔi fɔji lɛ?
Kɛ́ okpɛlɛɔ otɔmɔi anɔ ni okpaa he fai lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ no baanyɛ aye abua obii lɛ?
Ekolɛ nɛkɛ ji bɔ ni onuɔ he kɛ ooshwe ni obote gbalashihilɛ mli, shi yɛ shika hewɔ lɛ onyɛɛɛ ofee nakai lɛ.
Te obaafee tɛŋŋ ole akɛ obaanyɛ okɛ ohe awo kusum ko ni afeɔ yɛ he ni nyɛyɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ?
5 Bɔ ni Akɛbaatsu Nii Aha: Obaanyɛ okɛ woji nɛɛ eko fɛɛ eko aha yɛ shĩa kɛ shĩa nitsumɔ lɛ mli be fɛɛ be ni obaana akɛ ehe miihia ni ofee nakai, obaanyɛ okɛha po kɛ́ atsɔko akɛ akɛha yɛ nyɔɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
22 Yehowa tee nɔ ekɛ Mose wie ekɛɛ: 23 “No sɛɛ lɛ, ŋɔɔ tsofai kpakpai ni jeɔ ŋma, ni ji: mire ni ewa susumɔnii 500, kɛ sinamon ni jeɔ ŋma nakai falɛ fã, ni ji, susumɔnii 250, kalamo ni jeɔ ŋma susumɔnii 250, 24 kɛ kasia susumɔnii 500 ní asusu yɛ shekel ni akɛtsuɔ nii yɛ he krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ naa,*+ kɛ oliv mu hin* kome.
Ejaakɛ ajie wain dɔkɔdɔkɔ lɛ yɛ nyɛdaaŋ.
Nu ŋma kɛ nu ni jooɔ lɛ fɛɛ nyɛŋ aho kɛjɛ nuhiŋmɛi kome lɛ nɔŋŋ mli.
Wɔha efee tamɔ daaŋjiemɔ nii yɛ niyeli sɛɛ—eŋɔɔ, shi jeee no ji niyenii lɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni wɔkɛ mɛi baawie bɔ ni esaaa loo wɔkɛ amɛ agbá ŋwane lɛ, wɔhaa wiemɔi lɛ ŋɔɔ ni amɛtsɔɔ mɔ yiŋ.
Ani osɔlemɔi lɛ tamɔ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ni jeɔ ŋma waa yɛ Yehowa hiɛ?
Hiɛsɔɔ wiemɔi kukuji, wiemɔi ni ŋɔɔ nɛɛ ta nakai onukpa lɛ ŋa lɛ tsui mli waa diɛŋtsɛ.[ 7]
Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, mɛi ni kɛ ekãa jajeɔ sanekpakpa lɛ batsɔmɔɔ “Kristo ŋmajee kpakpa . . . yɛ mɛi ni ahereɔ amɛyiwala lɛ . . . mli.”
Nakai nɔŋŋ kɛ́ ajɛ tsui mli awo ŋaa lɛ ehãa* naanyobɔɔ ŋɔɔ.
Mɛɛ wiemɔ ni ŋɔɔ ni sa hiɛ po nɛ!
Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa baaha Abraham aná miishɛɛ akɛ efɔ bi yɛ egbɔlɛ beaŋ koni yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ ebi lɛ ní ekɛ ebi nɛɛ nɔŋŋ asha afɔle eha lɛ lɛ?
(Nehemia 1:1-11) Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ esɔlemɔi lɛ kwɔ kɛtee Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ tamɔ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ni eŋma ŋɔɔ.
Nikaselɔi alilɛi ŋɔɔ naakpa!
Ni eyibii lɛ ŋɔɔ minaa.
7 Awie gbɔmɛi babaoo ni amɛhe guɔ egbo kwraa, ni ji Yuda jamɔ mli hiɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ titri he beni akɛ fãmɔ hã lɛ, akɛ: “Nyɛhiɛ atsɛ̃a, nyɛ dãatɔlɔi, ni nyɛfoa! ni nyɛwóa lele, nyɛ weinnulɔi, yɛ wein dɔkɔdɔkɔ lɛ hewɔ, ejaakɛ aha eje nyɛdaaŋ.”
Nilee wiemɔi tsɔɔ mɔ yiŋ, ni eŋɔɔ tamɔ wo; ebɛ kpookpoo, ni eteee béi shi
No sɛɛ lɛ, amɛhoɔ yɛ dadesɛŋi* amli loo amɛshãa lɛ tamɔ blodoi koklobii,+ ni eŋɔɔmɔ tamɔ keeki ni akɛ mu shã.
Kɛji mɔ ko yɛ nyɛ̃ɛ yɛ etsui mli kɛha mɔ kroko shi ekɛ wiemɔ ni ŋɔɔ loo ekɛ yiteŋmulu wiemɔi miitsimɔ nɔ lɛ, eeshishiu ehe—ehiɛ “apasa naabu.”
Nu ŋma kɛ nu ni jooɔ fɛɛ nyɛŋ ajɛ nuhiŋmɛi kome lɛ nɔŋŋ mli aba.
Ni mihe wolo bibioo lɛ yɛ bɔfo lɛ dɛŋ ni miye, ni eŋɔɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ yɛ midaaŋ tamɔ wo, ni beni miye lɛ, ejoo yɛ mimusu mli.
Ronald mami kɛ tako bala tso lɛ he, ni naagbee lɛ ewo apple ko ni ŋɔɔ waa.
Sanemligbalalɔ ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ osusuɔ akɛ ‘oweletɔɔ ŋɔɔ’ lɛ, kwɛmɔ mɛi ni kɛ afii pii etɔ owele lɛ ahiɛ.”
Ahaa nakai nui lɛ feɔ tamɔ nɔ ni ŋɔɔ—nɔ ni ŋɔɔ fe wein—ejaakɛ aju ni ehiɛ susumɔ akɛ akɛmiijo nɔ ko naa foi.
Tookwɛlɔ lɛ na oblayoo lɛ wiemɔi lɛ akɛ amɛŋɔɔ ni amɛhi tamɔ fufɔ kɛ wo ni ŋɔɔ waa.
Ha ehi ojwɛŋmɔ mli akɛ, “naajɔlɛ wiemɔi tamɔ wò-agbaku, amɛŋɔɔ susuma naa, ni amɛhaa wui náa hewalɛ.” —Abɛi 16:24.
Kɛji akɛ wɔkɛ wɔhe fɔ̃ Yehowa nɔ beni akaa wɔ lɛ, mɛɛ sɛɛnamɔi wɔnine shɛɔ nɔ?
Yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ “gɔŋ fɛɛ gɔŋ kɛ ŋshɔkpɔ fɛɛ ŋshɔkpɔ” baafamɔ kɛjɛ amɛgbɛhei yɛ nibii agbɛjianɔtoo nɛɛ naagbee ni baa lɛ mli?
20 Shi nɛgbɛ hiɛshikamɔ jɛɔ kɛbaa,
(Kolosebii 1:21-23) Wɔmli baanyɛ afili wɔ akɛ Yehowa gbala wɔ kɛtee e-Bi lɛ ŋɔɔ yɛ Yesu diɛŋtsɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ kɛ gbeekpamɔ naa: “Mɔ ko nyɛŋ aba miŋɔɔ, akɛ ja Tsɛ lɛ ni tsu mi lɛ gbala lɛ da.”
4 Esa akɛ wɔhiɛ akã shi be fɛɛ be bɔni afee ni sɔɔmɔ hegbɛi ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ní wɔnine baanyɛ ashɛ nɔ lɛ akaŋmɛɛ wɔ.
5 “Mɛɛ yoo jɛ ŋa lɛ nɔ ni ekwɔɔ kɛbaa nɛɛ,
Yehowa Yeɔ Ebuaa Wɔ ni Wɔtoɔ Wɔtsui Shi
Agbɛnɛ Yesaia wie asraafoi anibii ní akɛwuɔ ta lɛ ahe akɛ akɛ la ekpata fɛɛ hiɛ kwraa, akɛ: “Aspaatre fɛɛ aspaatre ní tawulɔi woɔ kɛshimɔɔ shi yɛ ta gidigidifeemɔ mli lɛ kɛ atade ni wuɔ shi yɛ lá mli lɛ, shã abaashã, ni eeetsɔ la niyenii.”
* Sɛɛ mli lɛ, Israelbii lɛ ahiɛ batserɛ amɛ ni amɛkɛ heshwamɔ kpa Yehowa fai koni eye bua amɛ. Amɛbɔi lɛ sɔɔmɔ ekoŋŋ ni amɛjie maŋsɛɛ nyɔŋmɔi lɛ kɛjɛ amɛteŋ.—Kojolɔi 10:6-16.
Nɔ ni fe no lɛ, kɛ́ Kristofonyo le woloŋ lɛ, ebaanyɛ ekane Biblia lɛ jogbaŋŋ ni enu shishi, ebaanyɛ esusu naagbai ahe ni emu saji anaa yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ, ni ebaanyɛ etsɔɔ mɛi Biblia mli anɔkwalei lɛ yɛ gbɛ ni mli kã shi faŋŋ ní kɔneɔ mɔ yiŋ nɔ.
(Efesobii 6:10) Beni bɔfo lɛ kɛ nakai ŋaawoo lɛ eha sɛɛ lɛ, etsɔɔ mumɔŋ yelikɛbuamɔi kɛ Kristofoi asui ni yeɔ ebuaa wɔ ni wɔye kunim lɛ amli.—Efesobii 6:11-17.
Afrikayoo ko kɛ yiŋtoo kroko hewɔ ni fɔlɔi kɛ amɛbii egbaaa bɔlɛnamɔ he sane lɛ ha: “Beni miji gbekɛ lɛ, mifɔlɔi ni ji Odasefoi lɛ kɛ mi egbaaa bɔlɛnamɔ he saji, no hewɔ lɛ ebako mijwɛŋmɔ mli pɛŋ akɛ mikɛ mibii agba enɛɛmɛi ahe saji.”
Esa akɛ nitsulɔi anɔkwɛlɔi ni shwieɔ mɛi yɛ nitsumɔ mli lɛ ale bɔ ni amɛaafee amɛkɛɛ “shɛɛ sane ni mli wa nɛɛ ni emli akã shi faŋŋ, efee kuku ni ŋaalee ahi mli, ni eha woo ni mɔ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ ahi shi pɛpɛɛpɛ,” taakɛ The Vancouver Sun lɛ bɔɔ amaniɛ lɛ.
Mɛni wɔbaafee kɛsaa wɔhe wɔto nibii ni baaba lɛ?
Ema sɛɛnamɔi babaoo ni mɛi ni sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei lɛ anine shɛɔ nɔ lɛ nɔ mi.
‘Babilon maŋtsɛ lɛ klante lɛ baaba onɔ.
Wolo tɛtrɛɛ nɛɛ kɛ ehefatalɔ Awake! lɛ kanelɔi babaoo náa nitɛŋmɔi ni akɛfeɔ Paradeiso ni baa lɛ he mfoniri lɛ ahe miishɛɛ.
Ŋmalɛi babaoo tsɔɔ akɛ kɛ́ aaahere mɔ ko yiwala lɛ, belɛ esa akɛ mɔ lɛ aná ale Yehowa, ni ehé Yesu nɔ eye, ní ená emli hemɔkɛyeli, ní ekɛ nitsumɔi ajie hemɔkɛyeli ni eyɔɔ lɛ kpo etsɔɔ.
KƐ́ OOKANE Biblia lɛ ni ona gbɛ́i ni ji Israel lɛ, mɛni baa ojwɛŋmɔ mli?
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Mi nɔŋŋ ji gbɛ lɛ kɛ anɔkwale lɛ kɛ wala lɛ; mɔ ko baaa tsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ, akɛ ja etsɔ minɔ.”
Kɛ ebalɛ kojomɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yehowa kɛ shishitoo mla ni atsɔɔ mli yɛ Galatabii 6:4 lɛ tsuɔ nii yɛ?
Mɛi krokomɛi hu kpeɔ sɛɛ kɛbaa.
12 Be fɛɛ be ni Yudafoi ni yɔɔ amɛmasɛi lɛ baaba wɔŋɔɔ lɛ, amɛkɛɔ wɔ shii abɔ* akɛ: “Amɛbaajɛ he fɛɛ he amɛkɛ wɔ abawu.”
Fiofio lɛ, mibaná hekɛnɔfɔ̃ɔ kwraa yɛ emli.”
Anania wiemɔi lɛ ma nɔ ni ekolɛ Saul enu momo kɛjɛ Yesu naa lɛ nɔ mi: “Wɔtsɛmɛi a-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ehalao eto, ní ole esuɔmɔnaa nii, ní ona jalɔ lɛ, ní onu edaaŋ gbee ko; shi obaatsɔ ehe odaseyelɔ, koni oye nii fiaa ni ona ni onu lɛ ahe odase otsɔɔ gbɔmɛi fɛɛ.
Minu he akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mihe eshai lɛ ekeŋ mi kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Ebɔ amɛ kɔkɔ akɛ je lɛ baanyɛ amɛ, ni kɛ̃lɛ eshɛje amɛmii akɛ: “Kɛ́ je lɛ nyɛɔ nyɛ lɛ, nyɛle akɛ mi tsutsu enyɛ dani enyɛɔ nyɛ lɛ.
Mifee taakɛ ekɛɛ mi lɛ, ni mitsɔ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ mile Biblia mli nikasemɔ feemɔ.
Kɛ́ amɛwa mi yi lɛ, amɛaawa nyɛ hu yi.”
Mijwɛŋmɔ kɛɔ mi akɛ enɛ ejaaa kwraa.’
Dani magba bo sane nɛɛ lɛ, ha matsɔɔ bo mɔ ni miji.
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Mi nɔŋŋ ji gbɛ lɛ kɛ anɔkwale lɛ kɛ wala lɛ; mɔ ko baaa tsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ, akɛ ja etsɔ minɔ.”
▪ “Kaana nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi yɛ Mi-sɛɛ.
Tsofa-feelɔi lɛ tsɔɔ mi nyiɛmɔ kɛ nibii ni akɛbɛje mi kɛ tsei hu ni akɛ sumui etsotsoro he.
+ Nyɛfeko mi efɔŋ ko.
Yeovil asafo lɛ mli bii ni egbɔlɔ lɛ gba mi bɔ ni minyɛ kɛ enyɛmi yoo Millie kɛ ekãa ta baisikel nɔ kɛkpa shikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli fɛɛ ni amɛkɛmiija woji ni akɛkaseɔ Biblia ni ji Studies in the Scriptures lɛ.
Hegbɛ hee ko ni baaha sɛɛnamɔ aba mishihilɛ he lɛ naa gbele eha mi.
3 Shi bo Yehowa, ole mi jogbaŋŋ,+ onaa mi;
Agbɛnɛ hu, Biblia mli nɔkwɛmɔnii babaoo ha mile anɔkwale nɛɛ: Kɛ́ misɔmɔ nyɛmimɛi lɛ kɛ Yehowa lɛ, maná anɔkwa miishɛɛ.”
23 Ehere nɔ ekɛɛ: “Mɔ ni nine kɛ minine fɛɛ kpeɔ yɛ tsɛnsi lɛ mli lɛ ji mɔ ni baajie mi ehã.
No baatsɔɔ akɛ miyeee anɔkwa.
No ye ebua mi ni mikɛ bulɛ ha lɛ.”
Bei komɛi lɛ mifeɔ mihe mfoniri ni akɛ tsɔji efee niji ahã mi ni mikɛ miifee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ.
Minyɛmi nuu ni mikɛyɔɔ lɛ kɛɛ mi akɛ amɛji mɛi komɛi ni amɛsaa amɛhe jogbaŋŋ, shi amɛbɛ nɔ ko tsɔ.
Habakuk fee bɔ ni enu he eha lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ efɔ̃ shi, ejaakɛ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ejaakɛ agbamitso lɛ gbaŋ afofro, ni yibii hu ehiŋ weintsei lɛ anɔ; mutso yibiiwoo aaafee yaka, ni abɔɔi lɛ baŋ niyenii; aaaha tooi atã yɛ tooi atsũ lɛ mli, ni anaŋ tsinai yɛ amɛtsũi lɛ amli. Shi mi lɛ, manya yɛ Yehowa mli, mimli aaafili mi yɛ miyiwalaheremɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ mli!”
Be-fɛɛ sɔɔlɔ ko kɛɛ akɛ, “Miyi ni ajieɔ lɛ woɔ mi hewalɛ koni mamia mihiɛ ni maha bɔ ni mitsuɔ misɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ he nii mihaa lɛ aya hiɛ.”
Miisumɔ koni otsɔɔ mi bɔ ni asɔmɔɔ Yehowa ahaa.”
Beni Mose bi akɛ eha ena E-nunyam lɛ, Yehowa ha hetoo akɛ: “Onyɛŋ mihiɛ ona; shi mɔ ko mɔ ko enaŋ mi, ní eyi aaaná wala.”
Nyɔŋmɔ, ye obua mi koni mayɔse
Wɔkpeee dɔŋŋ aahu kɛyashi afi 1948 afi lɛ shishijee mli, beni eha mi wolo bibioo ko ni gbɛi ji “The Prince of Peace” (Toiŋjɔlɛ Lumɔ Lɛ) lɛ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ́ osumɔɔ mɔ ko sane lɛɛlɛŋ lɛ, jeee kɛɛmɔ pɛ kɛkɛ obaakɛɛ lɛ akɛ, “Misumɔɔ osane.”
“Naanɔ suɔmɔ mikɛsumɔ bo.
(Yohane 13:34, 35) “Taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ”—hɛɛ, aafã wɔ koni wɔjie suɔmɔ ni Yesu jie lɛ kpo lɛ eko kpo.
“Nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔɔ nyɛ lɛ.
Efeee Yehowa hiɛgbele akɛ eeekɛɛ ewebii ni ehala amɛ, ni ji blema Israel lɛ akɛ: “Naanɔ suɔmɔ mikɛ sumɔo.”
Efã amɛ akɛ: “Nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ . . .
Beni ewieɔ akɛ tsɛ ní kɛ wiemɔi ni suɔmɔ yɔɔ mli haa lɛ, blema Israel Maŋtsɛ Salomo kɛɛ akɛ: “Mibi, kɛ omɔ miwiemɔi lɛ amli, ni okɛ mikitai lɛ to omasɛi, koni oba otoi shi oha nilee, ni okɛ otsui ha sanesɛɛkɔmɔ; hɛɛ, kɛ́ obolɔ otsɛ́ sɛɛyoomɔ, ní owó ogbee nɔ oha sane shishinumɔ, kɛji otao esɛɛgbɛ tamɔ jwiɛtɛi, ní otao tamɔ jwetrii ni aŋɔtee lɛ: No dani ooonu Yehowa gbeyeishemɔ shishi, ni oooná Nyɔŋmɔ he nilee.” —Abɛi 2: 1-5.
Bɔfo Paulo ŋma kɛyaha klɛŋklɛŋ afii oha lɛ mli Kristofoi lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛmimɛi ahedɔɔ hewɔ lɛ ehiaaa nyɛ akɛ aŋma nyɛ; ejaakɛ nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ etsɔɔ nyɛ akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔɔ nyɛhe; ejaakɛ nyɛfeɔ nakai hu nyɛhaa nyɛmimɛi fɛɛ.”
11 No hewɔ lɛ, Yesu wo yibiiwoo shi eha amɛ akɛ: “Naa, mikɛ mɛi komɛi ni jɛ Satan kpee he lɛ ni kɛɔ akɛ Yudafoi ji amɛ, shi ebɛ mli, shi malemɔ moŋ amɛmaleɔ lɛ miiha; naa, maha amɛba ni amɛbakoto onaji anaa, ni amɛle akɛ mi lɛ misumɔɔ bo.”
(3 Mose 19:17, 18, Ta) Kristojamɔ Shishitolɔ lɛ jaje akɛ: “Shi nyɛ mɛi ni nyɛboɔ toi nɛɛ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, Nyɛsumɔa nyɛhenyɛlɔi; nyɛfea mɛi ni he tsɛɔ nyɛ lɛ ejurɔ; . . . ni nyɛnyɔmɔwoo aaafa, ni nyɛaatsɔmɔ Ŋwɛinyo lɛ bii, shi lɛ lɛ emli hi yɛ trumui kɛ mɛi fɔji anɔ.”
Miifee Nii Fɛɛ Ehee, Na Wala Mli Ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ Shikpɔŋ Nɔ Kɛya Naanɔ!, Nɔyeli Ni Kɛ Paradeiso Baaba, kɛ The Divine Name That Will Endure Forever.
Beni Yesu jie asafo lɛ yi yɛ etsuishiŋmɛɛ he sɛɛ lɛ, ejaje akɛ: “Shi kɛlɛ mikɛo yɛ sane ko, no ji akɛ óŋmɛɛ oklɛŋklɛŋ suɔmɔ lɛ he.”
Ekɛɔ Efesobii lɛ akɛ: “Shi kɛlɛ mikɛo yɛ sane ko, no ji akɛ, oŋmɛɛ oklɛŋklɛŋ suɔmɔ lɛ he.”
Shi kɛlɛ, mikɛo yɛ sane ko, no ji akɛ oŋmɛɛ oklɛŋklɛŋ suɔmɔ lɛ he.”—Kpojiemɔ 2:1-4.
Moŋ lɛ, akɛni esumɔɔ wɔ ni eesumɔ akɛ eye ebua wɔ hewɔ lɛ, ejɛɔ mlihilɛ mli ekɛɔ wɔ akɛ: “Miji Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, mɔ ni tsɔɔo nii ni hi hao, mɔ ni tsɔɔo gbɛ ní onyiɛ nɔ lɛ.
Miifee Nii Fɛɛ Ehee,” Na Wala Mli Ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ Shikpɔŋ Nɔ Kɛya Naanɔ!, Nɔyeli Ni Kɛ Paradeiso Baaba, kɛ The Divine Name That Will Endure Forever.
Shi kɛlɛ mikɛo yɛ sane ko, no ji akɛ óŋmɛɛ oklɛŋklɛŋ suɔmɔ lɛ he.”—Kpoj.
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Mikɛo yɛ sane ko, no ji akɛ óŋmɛɛ oklɛŋklɛŋ suɔmɔ lɛ he.”
Beni lalatsɛ lɛ jwɛŋ Yehowa dalɛ lɛ he ni esusu bɔ ni adesa ji mɔ bibioo kwraa yɛ ehiɛ lɛ he lɛ, enaa kpɛ ehe yɛ bɔ ni Yehowa jɛɔ suɔmɔ mli esusuɔ wɔhe lɛ he, ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ ni ji owaabii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ: Mɛni ji adesa, ní ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? aloo gbɔmɔ bi, ní osaraa lɛ po?”
Aaafee afi 96 Ŋ.B. lɛ, Yesu kɛ ŋaawoo ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ ha amɛ: “Mikɛo yɛ sane ko, no ji akɛ oŋmɛɛ o-klɛŋklɛŋ suɔmɔ lɛ he.”
44 Shi mi lɛ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ: Nyɛyaa nɔ nyɛsumɔa nyɛhenyɛlɔi+ ni nyɛsɔlea nyɛhãa mɛi ni waa nyɛ yi lɛ,+ 45 koni nyɛtsɔmɔ nyɛ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ bii,+ ejaakɛ ehãa ehulu teɔ shi yɛ mɛi fɔji kɛ mɛi kpakpai fɛɛ anɔ, ni ehãa nugbɔ nɛɔ shwieɔ jalɔi kɛ mɛi ni ejaaa fɛɛ anɔ.
1 Yesu ni awo ehiɛ nyam lɛ kɛ klɛŋklɛŋ afii 100 lɛ mli asafo ni yɔɔ Efeso lɛ wie yɛ hiɛdɔɔ mli akɛ: “Mikɛo yɛ sane ko, no ji akɛ óŋmɛɛ oklɛŋklɛŋ suɔmɔ lɛ he.”
Shi mi lɛ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ: Nyɛsumɔa nyɛhenyɛlɔi, nyɛjɔɔa mɛi ni lomɔɔ nyɛ, nyɛfea mɛi ni nyɛɔ nyɛ lɛ ekpakpa, ni nyɛsɔlea nyɛhaa mɛi ni haoɔ nyɛ ni amɛwaa nyɛ yi lɛ; koni nyɛtsɔmɔ nyɛtsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ bii; shi ehaa ehulu teɔ shi yɛ mɛi fɔji kɛ mɛi kpakpai anɔ, ni ehaa nugbɔ nɛɔ yɛ jalɔi kɛ mɛi ni bɛ jalɛ lɛ anɔ.”
Hã Yehowa ana akɛ, onuɔ he taakɛ Maŋtsɛ David nu he lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ egbɛi, Yehowa lɛ, biɔ ní wɔsusu ehe ákɛ Tsɛ ní hi fe fɛɛ ní abaanyɛ asusu ehe.
Amɛfɔ̃ wɔ nine kɛtee amɛshĩai amli kɛhã niyeli, shi akɛni aahi ni abaana blɔfonyo kɛ mɔdiŋ ni amɛfee ekome hewɔ lɛ, ja duŋ ewo dani wɔnyɛɔ wɔyaa.
Maria hu yaa, eyɛ mli akɛ hii pɛ abiɔ ni amɛfee nakai.
Kɛ́ nakai ni lɛ, no lɛ shihilɛ yɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ je nɛŋ lɛ baanyɛ afee nɔ ni wa waa.
Ewieɔ kɛfãa ehe kɛtsɔɔ jarayeli mli adafitswaa gbɛ nɔ, yɛ wiemɔ ni mli ka shi faŋŋ mli akɛ: Miishɛɛ jɛɔ heloonaa nibii ni shika nyɛɔ eheɔ kɛ sɔɔmɔ ni ehaa mɔ naa lɛ mli baa.
(Hebribii 9:1-7) Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, ekolɛ etamɔ nɔ ni 1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 8:8 lɛ futuɔ mɔ yiŋ fioo, akɛ: “Tsei lɛ kɛlɛ, bɔ ni anaa tsei lɛ anaabui yɛ he krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yɛ sɛɛtsu lɛ hiɛ, shi anaaa yɛ kpo lɛ nɔ gbɛ.”
Beni tsei ahe nilelɔ Michael Zohary wieɔ tsei nɛɛ ni atsĩ amɛtã yɛ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ ahe lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Yɛ je lɛŋ woji ni ewieee tsei ahe fitsofitso lɛ po amli lɛ, anaaa tsei ahe saji ni fa babaoo ni kɔɔ wala shihilɛ fãi srɔtoi ahe nakai taakɛ anaa yɛ nɔ ni jeɔ kpo yɛ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ.”
No hewɔ lɛ hegbɛ ni aaaha efata Kristo he yɛ ŋwɛi Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli lɛ ŋmɛɛ lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ mikpa tawa shɛremɔ, kɛkɛ ni miyahe baagi ni mijɔɔ mihe nɔ miha Yehowa, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ Kpeteŋkpele lɛ.
7:5) Kɛ́ nakai lɛ, no lɛ Yakob sɔlemɔ lɛ baanyɛ akai bo akɛ sɔlemɔi baanyɛ aba yeyeeyefeemɔi ashi.
7 No hewɔ lɛ, hii enumɔ lɛ tsa amɛgbɛfãa lɛ nɔ ni amɛyashɛ Laish.
Lefèvre tsɔɔ mli yɛ Sanekpakpai lɛ ahiɛkpamɔ lɛ mli akɛ, etsɔɔ shishi kɛtee French mli koni “mɛi foji” ni yɔɔ sɔlemɔ lɛ mli lɛ “anu anɔkwalei ni amɛkaneɔ lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ, taakɛ eji yɛ mɛi ni kaneɔ yɛ Latin mli lɛ agbɛfaŋ lɛ.”
Kukuji lɛ asɛɛ kɛlɛɛɛ, no hewɔ lɛ, abaanyɛ asusu amɛhe yɛ shinaa lɛ naa nɔŋŋ.
Enu bɔ ni ehe hiaa ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ashiɛ lɛ yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ, no hewɔ lɛ ekɛ woji bibii ni akɛkaseɔ Biblia lɛ enyɔ wo ebaagi mli.
“Yehowa Odasefoi yɛ mla naa hegbɛ, jeee ni amɛkɛhe amɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ amɛye ni amɛja lɛ kɛkɛ,” taakɛ ewie yɛ enaagbee wiemɔ lɛ mli lɛ, “shi moŋ ni amɛgbɛ amɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ hu amɛshwã yɛ shinaai anaa, yɛ maŋbii ahenaabuamɔ hei, kɛ agbɛnɛ yɛ gbɛjegbɛi anɔ, ni amɛkɛ amɛwoji lɛ po ahã yaka kɛji amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛfee nakai.”
Yiŋtoo kroko hewɔ ni Yehowa kɛ e-Wiemɔ, ni ji Biblia lɛ hã wɔ lɛ ji, koni wɔle bɔ ni wɔbaafee wɔná miishɛɛ yɛ shihilɛ mli.
Akɛ Sɔɔmɔ Kpee ni heɔ ŋmɛlɛtswaa fã baanyiɛ Biblia mli otii anɔmimaa lɛ sɛɛ, ni abaanyɛ ato he gbɛjianɔ awo fãi etɛ ni eko fɛɛ eko heɔ minitii 10 mli, loo fãi enyɔ ni eko fɛɛ eko heɔ minitii 15 mli.
Mɛni esa akɛ fɔlɔi atsɔɔ amɛbii yɛ Yehowa he, ni te esa akɛ amɛfee nakai amɛha tɛŋŋ?
Beni wɔyashɛ England ni wɔyakamɔ shi gbɛkɛ lɛ, wɔná miishɛɛ ni wɔwie bɔ ni gbɔmɛi yɛji ehere wɔ mɛi ni ji Afrikabii lɛ hiɛmɛɛ lɛ he.
Yɛ hei ni asafoi ni wieɔ wiemɔi srɔtoi shiɛɔ yɛ shikpɔŋkuku kome lɛ nɔŋŋ mli lɛ, esa akɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ nɔkwɛlɔi lɛ kɛ amɛhe agba sane koni akutsoŋbii lɛ akanu he akɛ aasũ amɛtsui.
Yiŋkpɛɛ ni nilee yɔɔ mli nɛ, ejaakɛ afii ejwɛ pɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Roma asraafoi lɛ ku amɛsɛɛ amɛba ekoŋŋ, ni Tatsɛ Tito nyiɛ amɛhiɛ.
21 Mɛi heei ni baa Kaimɔ lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo feɔ nakai yɛ nine ni wɔteŋ mɔ ko fɔ̃ lɛ lɛ hewɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ, beni Mose kɛɛ lɛ akɛ, “mi lɛ wɔ́ lɛ mibadamɔ gɔŋkpɔ lɛ yiteŋ ni mahiɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tso lɛ yɛ midɛ” lɛ, no pɛ kɛkɛ fa ha lɛ.
14 Belɛ, te mɔ ko aaafee tɛŋŋ eha nakai mumɔ lɛ atsɔ ehee koni ekudɔ ejwɛŋmɔ yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ hu?
Agbɛnɛ hu, mɛi krokomɛi pii yɛ ni ji Biblia kaselɔi, shi amɛtamɔɔɔ Biblia Kaselɔi lɛ kwraa yɛ gbɛ ko nɔ.
Ekolɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ nibii komɛi loo béi ni baa wɔkɛ wɔweku lɛ mlibii, nanemɛi, loo wɔnanemɛi nitsulɔi ateŋ lɛ baanyɛ afata enɛɛmɛi ahe.
(Yakobo 2:23) Susumɔ he okwɛ —obaanyɛ otsɔ jeŋ muu fɛɛ Bɔlɔ lɛ naanyo!
Nanemɛi kɛkɛ wɔji.’
Shi beni eku esɛɛ kɛba shia lɛ, ekɛɛ naanyo ko akɛ wɔkwɛɛɛ shia lɛ mli shika-fitemɔ nɔ jogbaŋŋ.
Enanemɛi nɛɛ ji adesai anɔkwafoi ni ekɛ ewiemɔ lɛ tsɔɔ amɛnɔ kɛyahaa mɛi, tamɔ bɔ ni ekɛ Elia tsu nii eha lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
(Abɛi 14:20) Mɛni abɛ nɛɛ tsɔɔ wɔ?
Protestant asraafoi[9] lɛ tswia enanemɛi etɛ tu ni amɛgbe amɛ yɛ Northern Ireland.
Ye Obua Obii lɛ ni Amɛbɔ Nanemɛi Kpakpai
Ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ sumɔɔ ni ekɛ mɔ ni keɔ nii abɔ naanyo.
19 Kɛ́ okpɛ oyiŋ akɛ obaatsi ohe kɛje amale jamɔ he ni osɔmɔ Yehowa lɛ, ekolɛ onanemɛi loo owekumɛi lɛ ekomɛi nuŋ yiŋ ni okpɛ lɛ shishi ni ekolɛ amɛbaawa bo yi po.
Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ: “Kornelio miikwɛ [Petro kɛ mɛi ni fata ehe lɛ] gbɛ, ni etsɛ́ ewekumɛi kɛ enanemɛi juji kɛkpe.”
Be ko sɛɛ lɛ, miná mile akɛ mitsutsu nanemɛi lɛ kɔlɔ tui kɛyaju yɛ shikatoohe ko.
Nyɛmi yoo ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Mitswa mifai shi akɛ mabote gbalashihilɛ mli yɛ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ mli, shi mifo shii abɔ yɛ be mli ni minaa ni minanemɛi lɛ kɛ Kristofoi hii kpakpai boteɔ gbalashihilɛ mli ni mi lɛ mikã he miji oshija lɛ.”
14 Gbekɛ yoo kroko hu kpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ lɛ hu enaaa ele Yehowa akɛ Naanyo kɛ Tsɛ, ebuɔ lɛ Mumɔ ko ni etse ehe babaoo moŋ.
Etsɔɔ akɛ, weku mlibii kɛ nanemɛi ni gbele egbála amɛteŋ lɛ baafee ekome ekoŋŋ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 9:19-25) Ani kulɛ eekpa gbɛ akɛ etsutsu nanemɛi Yudafoi ni yɔɔ Yerusalem lɛ baahere lɛ hiɛmɛɛ?
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nanemɛi lɛ baasumɔ amɛhe.
Kɛ́ onanemɛi lɛ kaseɔ Yesu, ni amɛkɛ amɛbe kɛ amɛhewalɛ fɛɛ tsɔɔ mɛi Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he nii lɛ, amɛbaaye amɛbua bo ni oba ojeŋ jogbaŋŋ, ni oye Yehowa anɔkwa daa.
Wɔbuɔ Yehowa ákɛ wɔ-Naanyo ni hi fe fɛɛ ni wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔsa ehiɛ yɛ bei fɛɛ mli.
Gbi ni akɛgbeɔ naa lɛ shɛ, ni nikaselɔi lɛ na akɛ amɛfata nanemɛi kɛ wekumɛi ahe kɛmiibo ŋaawoi kpakpai kɛ wiemɔi ni woɔ mɔ hewalɛ ni amɛtsɔɔ nɔ amɛkɛ amɛhe yeɔ shɛɛ lɛ toi.
Nakai feemɔ baaha amɛkɛ woji afee amɛnanemɛi, ni nikanemɔ baatsɔ amɛsu.”
Mishwe akɛ matamɔ minanemɛi ni yɔɔ hewalɛ ni yeɔ wala lɛ.
Nakai nɔŋŋ hu kɛ́ oosumɔ ni otsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ naanyo lɛ, esa akɛ ofee nɔ ni saa ehiɛ.—Yohane 4:24.
Ebinuu lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Ni ahã mikɛ minaanyo ni misumɔɔ esane fe fɛɛ lɛ kpa bɔɔ lɛ, edɔ mi waa.”
Bo lɛ ŋɔɔ lɛ akɛ onaanyo ko bɔ bo kɔkɔ akɛ efɔŋfeelɔ ko eje gbɛ etsake nɔ ni aŋma yɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ okadi ko nɔ lɛ bɔni afee ni eha gbɛfalɔi ni hiɛ bɛ amɛhe nɔ lɛ alaaje.
ATSƆƆ mli yɛ 1992 Yearbook lɛ mli akɛ: “Gray Smith kɛ enyɛminuu onukpa Frank, ni ji gbɛgbalɔi sɔɔlɔi enyɔ ni yɔɔ ekaa, ni jɛ Cape Town [South Africa] lɛ, fa gbɛ kɛmiiya British East Africa ni amɛyakwɛ akɛ ani abaanyɛ akɛ sanekpakpa lɛ ayashɛ jɛmɛ gbɛ lo.
Nuu lɛ ha hetoo akɛ: ‘Nuu ni wa ni ekwɛ nuu ni epila lɛ ji naanyo kpakpa.’
(Mateo 23:8-10) Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, esa akɛ Kristofoi fɛɛ afee sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛlɔi.
Mɛi babaoo baanyɛ akpɛlɛ nɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ akɛ miishɛɛnamɔ damɔ nibii tamɔ gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ kpakpa, yiŋtoo ni yɔɔ shihilɛ mli, kɛ naanyobɔɔ kpakpa ni yaa nɔ yɛ mɔ kɛ mɛi krokomɛi ateŋ lɛ nɔ.
Guy Pierce ni eji Nɔyeli Kuu lɛ mli nyo lɛ ha wiemɔ ni tsa nɔ ni ji “Ha Yehowa Ekpakpafeemɔ lɛ Aná Onɔ Hewalɛ.”
Yiŋkpɛi ni mifeɔ ni mikɛtsuɔ nii daa kɛ gbɛjianɔ ni mitoɔ lɛ ji enaa tsabaa, ni étee nɔ éfee su kpakpa kɛbashi amrɔ nɛɛ.”
Kɛ́ ebaahi lɛ, esa akɛ gbekɛbii lɛ aná amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛ-Biblia, lala wolo, kɛ wolo ni akaseɔ lɛ.
Oona nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa ni Hana fee efɔ̃ shi eha wɔ?
Yɛ afi 33 Ŋ.B. Pentekoste gbi lɛ sɛɛ aaafee afii 27 lɛ, abɔ amaniɛ akɛ, “sane kpakpa lɛ anɔkwale wiemɔ lɛ” eyashɛ Yudafoi kɛ Jeŋmajiaŋbii “fɛɛ ní yɔɔ ŋwɛi shishi lɛ” aŋɔɔ. —Kol.
Ŋmɛnɛ, gbɔmɛi akpekpei abɔ miifee enɛ kɛtsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ni amɛjieɔ eyi yɛ ekpakpa ni efeɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ nɔ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ no mli lɛ abaptisi Ataa etsɛko tsɔ moŋ, shi ehiɛ dɔɔ mumɔŋ nibii ahe waa.
Susumɔ bɔ ni bɔfo Paulo ná oblanyo Timoteo nɔ hewalɛ kpakpa lɛ he okwɛ.
Nɔ ni jɛɔ mli kɛbaa lɛ sa jogbaŋŋ, ni wɔ wɔnáa he sɛɛ be fɛɛ be.
22. (a) Mɛɛ nibii krokomɛi baanyɛ aye abua gbalashihilɛ lɛ koni efee nɔ ni hi?
“Etsɔɔ Nii . . . ni Eshiɛɔ Sanekpakpa Lɛ”
Shi, nitsɔɔmɔ kpakpa shishitoo jeee nɔ ni biɔ hesaa krɛdɛɛ ko, shi moŋ nɔ ko ni he hiaa babaoo moŋ.
13 Ani oji oblanyo loo oblayoo fioo ní abaptisiko bo ní ofɔlɔi jáa Nyɔŋmɔ, ni oyaa Kristofoi akpeei, ni okɛ ohe woɔ Maŋtsɛyeli sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛmɔ mli po?
Wɔtsɔmɔ nanemɛi kpakpai!
Belɛ, namɔ hiɛ esa akɛ wɔfee gbɛi kpakpa yɛ?
Nakai nɔŋŋ Yehowa wajeɔ wɔnijiaŋ koni wɔshiɛ Maŋtsɛyeli sanekpakpa lɛ.
Kɛ́ mɔ ko fee wɔ gbɔ lɛ, te esa akɛ wɔfee wɔnii wɔhã tɛŋŋ?
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ oweku lɛ baanyɛ amɛkɛ saji nɛɛ atsu nii jogbaŋŋ?
Ewieɔ kɛfãa ehe kɛtsɔɔ jarayeli mli adafitswaa gbɛ nɔ, yɛ wiemɔ ni mli ka shi faŋŋ mli akɛ: Miishɛɛ jɛɔ heloonaa nibii ni shika nyɛɔ eheɔ kɛ sɔɔmɔ ni ehaa mɔ naa lɛ mli baa.

Bɔfo Paulo kɛɛ akɛ: “Anyɛmimɛi, nyɛkwɛa akɛ nyɛtsɛmɔ lɛ, jeee heloo gbɛfaŋ nilelɔi pii, jeee hewalɔi pii, jeee abladei pii, shi moŋ je nɛŋ kwashiai anii lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hala, koni ekɛwo nilelɔi lɛ ahiɛgbele; ni je nɛŋ gbɔjɔmɔ nii lɛ hu Nyɔŋmɔ hala, koni ekɛwo nii ni he wa lɛ ahiɛgbele; ni je nɛŋ nii ni abuuu kɛ nii ni agbe he guɔ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hala, kɛ nibii ni jeee nɔ ko nɔ ko lɛ tete, koni eha nibii ni ji nɔ ko lɛ afee yaka; beni afee ni heloo ko heloo ko akashwã yɛ ehiɛ.”—1 Korintobii 1:26-29.
6 Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ, suɔmɔ ni nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ jie lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ bo lɛ ji nɔ ni ye ebua bo ni hã okɛ ohe badɔmɔ Yehowa kɛ esafo lɛ.

14-16. (a) Mɛɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa Yosef fee efɔ̃ shi?
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni eŋma Hebribii lɛ, etsɛ́ ŋmalɛi srɔtoi ayisɛɛ kɛtsɔɔ akɛ Mla lɛ feɔ nii kpakpai ni baaba lɛ ahe okadi.—Hebribii 10:1-18.
Kɛji wɔɔna henilee kpakpa lɛ, mɛɛ nibii komɛi ni naatsii yɔɔ he esa akɛ wɔfee toiboo wɔha?

+ 4 Be ni je etsɛre nɛɛ, esa akɛ wɔtsu mɔ ni tsu mi lɛ nitsumɔi;+ je baana, ni mɔ ko mɔ ko nyɛŋ nii atsu.
Wɔkaseɔ nii babaoo ní kɔɔ Abonsam he kɛji wɔsusu wiemɔi ni Yesu wie etsɔɔ jamɔ mli tsɔɔlɔi ni yɔɔ egbii lɛ amli lɛ he lɛ: “Nyɛ lɛ nyɛtsɛ ni nyɛjɛ emli ji abonsam, ni nyɛtsɛ lɛ tsinebaa nii nyɛsumɔɔ akɛ nyɛfee.
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔsusu jogbaŋŋ akɛ, gbɛfaa ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ baanyɛ atee haomɔ kɛ yeyeeye-feemɔ shi, shi, Epafrodito (ni jeee Epafra ni jɛ Kolose lɛ) miisumɔ ni etsu nakai nitsumɔ ni wa lɛ.
Mɛɛ su mli wɔkɛ wɔ shɛɛ sane lɛ haa yɛ, ni mɛni hewɔ?
Nyɔŋmɔ jieɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ esuɔmɔ ní ekɛsumɔ wɔ lɛ shi etsɔ̃ɔ, akɛ be mli ni wɔji eshafeelɔi lɛ beebe ni Kristo bagbo yɛ wɔnajiaŋ.”
Bɔni afee ni wɔna be saŋŋ kɛha teokrase nitsumɔi lɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔyoo nibii ni fiteɔ mɔ be lɛ, koni wɔkaha nomɛi miifá.
Mɛɛ hegbɛ wɔná akɛ wɔmiifee Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii?
(5 Mose 22:8) Wɔkɛ tawa tsuuu nii, wɔkpeee betel ŋmɛ, aloo ni wɔkɛ tsofai fɔji loo tsofai ni haà jwɛŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ aaatsu nii kɛha miishɛɛnamɔ.
Ákɛ Kristofoi lɛ, “heyeli mla” lɛ akɛkojoɔ wɔ—mumɔŋ Israel ni yɔɔ kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ mli, ni emla lɛ yɔɔ amɛtsuii amli lɛ.—Yeremia 31:31-33.
Nyɛhaa wɔkasea amɛ daa.
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔná nɔmimaa akɛ ehe baaba sɛɛnamɔ kɛha wɔ yɛ wɔshihilɛ gbɛ̀i fɛɛ amli.
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔna nɔ ni ejɛ Satan shwiemɔ kɛjɛ ŋwɛi lɛ mli eba.

19 Wɔyɛ miishɛɛ waa akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ e-Wiemɔ ni ji Biblia lɛ eha wɔ, ni akɛ wɔkɛ emli shɛɛ sane ni yɔɔ hewalɛ lɛ miitsu nii kɛmiifamɔ apasa tsɔɔmɔi kɛ amɛshishi koni wɔnine ashɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ tsui kpakpa lɛ anɔ!

15 Te ooofee tɛŋŋ ona kɛji ooná nilee kɛ toiboo tsui lɛ?
Susumɔ naagbai ni fɔɔ baa ni eka shi faŋŋ akɛ okɛbaakpe lɛ he, ni osusu gbɛ̀i fioo komɛi ni obaatsɔ nɔ otsu amɛhe nii lɛ ahe.

(b) Mɛni obaanyɛ ofee kɛda Nyɔŋmɔ shi yɛ Biblia lɛ ni ekɛhã bo lɛ hewɔ?
Kɛ oyɛ shihilɛ ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ mli lɛ, okɛ nilee ahala be ni sa koni oha ofɔlɔi ale osusumɔi.

Sui enyɔ krokomɛi hu ni he hiaa ji bɔ ni okɛ obe kɛ ohewalɛ tsuɔ nii ohaa, kɛ agbɛnɛ bɔ ni obɔɔ ohe mɔdɛŋ ohaa.
Osɔfoi tsiifoi lɛ kɛ onukpai lɛ tee nɔ amɛbolɔ, no hewɔ lɛ, Pilato bi Yesu akɛ: “Ani onuuu saji babaoo ni amɛkɛyeɔ odase amɛshiɔ bo lɛ?”

Ákɛ mɛi ni bote gbalashihilɛ mli etsɛko lɛ, wɔgbele hot-dog shwapo bibioo ko yɛ he ko ni aheɔ nii waa yɛ.
7 Obalahii ni ‘amɛtsɛmɛi esaaa mɛi ni fataa gbeei ni diɔ etooi kuu lɛ asɛɛ lɛ ahe lɛ’ miiŋmɔ Hiob.
Hɛɛ, gbei po baa amɛbalɛmɔɔ efaji lɛ anɔ.
Ebaafee nɔ ni hi akɛ maná nɔ kroko ni mikɛaanyiɛ—ekolɛ gbee ni tsɔɔ shwilafo gbɛ.
Bɔni afee ni maye mabua nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ koni amɛle bɔ ni akɛ Océane hiɔ shi ahaa hewɔ lɛ, wɔha amɛbasara wɔ, ni wɔtsɔɔ amɛ bɔ ni gbee ni tsɔɔ shwilafo gbɛ lɛ tsuɔ nii ehaa, nɔ hewɔ ni eko he hiaa mi, kɛ bɔ ni esa akɛ amɛfee amɛnii amɛha kɛ́ eyɛ amɛmasɛi.

Oshishibrishii Gbee Shwuɔ
Gbalɔ lɛ tee nɔ etsɔɔ akɛ: “Kɛ́ Ahab mɔ ko gbo yɛ maŋ lɛ, gbeei aaaye lɛ . . .
Akɛni amɛle akɛ nuu lɛ baanyɛ anu nɔ ni amɛwieɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, amɛkpɛ amɛyiŋ akɛ amɛbaashiɛ amɛha gbee lɛ.
Gbi ko lɛ, yoo ko ni yeɔ ebuaa kɛkwɛɔ kuu ko ni afee kɛha shwilafoi lɛ nɔ lɛ kɛɛ mi akɛ tɛnis tswaa kuu ko ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ baasumɔ ni amɛkɛ gbee ni tsɔɔ shwilafo gbɛ aha shwilafo ko loo mɔ ko ni hiŋmɛi enaaa nii jogbaŋŋ ni yɔɔ wɔkutso lɛ mli.
Te mɛi ni yɔɔ Béziers lɛ fee amɛnii amɛha tɛŋŋ beni amɛna akɛ mikɛ gbee miiba amɛshinaa shi lɛ?

17 “Shi mi lɛ, mikɛ nu afua+ baaba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, koni mikɛkpãtã heloo fɛɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi shishi ni wala mumɔ yɔɔ amɛmli lɛ hiɛ.
Ewie akɛ enu he tamɔ nɔ ni Yehowa miikɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Misumɔɔ bo, jeee yɛ gbɛgbalɔ ni oji lɛ pɛ kɛkɛ hewɔ, shi moŋ akɛni oji mibiyoo ni ojɔɔ ohe nɔ ohã mi lɛ hu hewɔ.
Beni Yesu Kristo ni atée lɛ shi lɛ wieɔ naagba nɛɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mikɛo yɛ sane ko, no ji akɛ óŋmɛɛ oklɛŋklɛŋ suɔmɔ lɛ he.
Suɔmɔ kpele ni eyɔɔ kɛha David lɛ hewɔ lɛ, enyɛ ekɛɛ, taakɛ wɔkaneɔ yɛ 1 Samuel 23:17 lɛ akɛ: “Kaashe gbeyei, ejaakɛ mitsɛ Saul nine shɛŋ onɔ, shi bo oooye Israel nɔ maŋtsɛ, ni matsɔ osɛɛmɔ; ni mitsɛ Saul diɛŋtsɛ le nakai.”
Shi mi lɛ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ: Nyɛsumɔa nyɛhenyɛlɔi, nyɛjɔɔa mɛi ni lomɔɔ nyɛ, nyɛfea mɛi ni nyɛ̃ɔ nyɛ lɛ ekpakpa, ni nyɛsɔlea nyɛhaa mɛi ni haoɔ nyɛ ni amɛwaa nyɛ yi lɛ; koni nyɛtsɔmɔ nyɛtsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ bii.”
Ejaakɛ Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛfee nii ní miwoɔ nyɛ he kita lɛ, no lɛ mishieŋtsɛmɛi ji nyɛ,” ni ekitai lɛ ateŋ ekome ji akɛ, ‘wɔsumɔ wɔhe.’

14 Yehowa bɔ amɛ kɔkɔ yɛ faŋŋ mli akɛ: “Mi hu mato nyɛ maha klante, ni nyɛ fɛɛ nyɛaakula shi ní agbe nyɛ; ejaakɛ mitsɛ́ nyɛ ni nyɛhereee mi nɔ, miwie, ni nyɛbooo toi, shi moŋ nyɛfee nɔ ni ji efɔŋ yɛ mihiɛ, ni nyɛhala nii ní esaaa mihiɛ lɛ!”

30 “Kɛ́ wiemɔi nɛɛ fɛɛ ba onɔ, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ ni mikɛshwie ohiɛ lɛ,+ ni okai nibii nɛɛ*+ yɛ jeŋmaji fɛɛ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbɛ bo eshwã amɛmli lɛ ateŋ,+ 2 ni oku osɛɛ kɛba Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ŋɔɔ,+ ni okɛ otsui fɛɛ kɛ osusuma* fɛɛ bo egbee toi yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni mifãa bo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ anaa,+ bo kɛ obihii lɛ, 3 no lɛ, Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baahã onomii lɛ aku amɛsɛɛ kɛba,+ ni ebaana bo mɔbɔ+ ni ebaabua onaa ekoŋŋ kɛjɛ maji fɛɛ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbɛ bo eshwã amɛmli lɛ amli.
26 “Naa, ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, mikɛ jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ miishwie nyɛhiɛ:+ 27 abaajɔɔ nyɛ kɛ́ nyɛbo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi ní miwoɔ nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ toi,+ 28 ni abaalomɔ nyɛ kɛ́ nyɛbooo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi lɛ toi,+ ni nyɛgbá afã kɛje gbɛ ni mifãa nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ akɛ nyɛnyiɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni nyɛyanyiɛ nyɔŋmɔi ni nyɛleee lɛ asɛɛ.

TOOKWƐLƆI YASARA ABIFAO YESU
Ani gbohiiashitee he hiɛnɔkamɔ yɛ ha bi ni gbo yɛ enyɛ musuŋ dani afɔ lɛ lɛ?

Etsɛɛɛ kɛkɛ ni mikɛ miŋa kɛ mibii lɛ fee ekome ekoŋŋ.
Gbi ko lɛ, yoo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Awula Ukoli lɛ kɛɛ Bintu naanyo ko akɛ: “Okɛ yoo ni bii enyɔ gboi yɛ be kometoo mli, ní kã he eeshiɛ Biblia mli shɛɛ sane lɛ aba miŋɔɔ.
Be ko ni eho lɛ, jɛmɛ efɔlɔi yɔɔ, shi amrɔ nɛɛ ni Habel kwɛɔ jɛmɛ nɛɛ, efɔlɔi lɛ jio, bii lɛ jio, amɛteŋ mɔ ko nyɛɛɛ jɛmɛ amɛya.
3 Nakai nɔŋŋ hu be ni wɔji gbekɛbii lɛ, wɔ hu bɔ ni je lɛ susuɔ nii ahe ehãa lɛ ye wɔ nyɔŋ.
Abɔ Adam kɛ Hawa akɛ mɛi ni eye emuu, ni kulɛ bii ni amɛbaafɔ lɛ fɛɛ baaye emuu.
10 Yɛ be mli ni ewieɔ “nakai yoo Isabel” lɛ he lɛ, Yesu tee nɔ akɛ: “Ni ebii lɛ, gbe magbe amɛ; ni asafoi lɛ fɛɛ aaana ale akɛ mi ji mɔ ni taoɔ sabai kɛ tsuii amli, ni maha nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ bɔ ni nyɛnitsumɔi lɛ yɔɔ lɛ.”
Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii ji akɛ, esa akɛ mɛi ni naa kpɔmɔ afɔleshaa lɛ mli hemɔkɛyeli lɛ ashɛ gbɔmɔ momo lɛ amɛfɔ̃ kwraa, ni amɛna “Nyɔŋmɔ bii lɛ anunyam heyeli lɛ” mli ŋɔɔmɔ. —Romabii 6:6; 8: 19-21; Galatabii 5: 1, 24.
Beni etsɔɔ suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha amɛnyɛ lɛ kɛ hiɛsɔɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ jarawalɛ lɛ, enyɛminuu fioo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Amrɔ nɛɛ, miyɛ weku kɛ bii.
Yɛ afi 1952 mli lɛ, amɔ Ádám, ní amrɔ nɛɛ eye afii 29 ni ebote gbalashihilɛ mli ni eyɔɔ bii enyɔ lɛ, ni afolɔ enaa beni ekpoo shi kome ekoŋŋ akɛ ekɛ ehe woŋ asraafoi anitsumɔ mli lɛ.
Mɛni baaye abua bii koni amɛto amɛtsui shi?
Ni kɛji akɛ wɔyɛ bii lɛ, efaaa kɛkɛ akɛ wɔɔsɔle koni amɛfee Yehowa tsuji anɔkwafoi.
“Ekwɛɔ koni wɔkɛ gbekɛbii ni sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei abɔ naanyo.
Ojogbaŋŋ, enu he akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ ehe ekeŋ lɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ, shi eesumɔ ni ekase ehe nii hu yɛ ebii lɛ ahewɔ.
17 Kɛ́ wɔkɛ naagba ko kpe lɛ, esa akɛ wɔsusu Biblia mli shishitoo mlai ni kɔɔ naagba lɛ he lɛ ahe, ni wɔkwɛ bɔ ni wɔbaafee wɔkɛtsu nii jogbaŋŋ.
10 Kɛ naagba ko te shi, ni eda loo eji bibioo jio, kɛ́ wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ wɔnu bɔ ni Yehowa kwɛɔ sane lɛ ehaa lɛ shishi lɛ, ehe baa sɛɛnamɔ kɛhaa wɔ.
4:12) Beni wɔ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ wɔdamɔɔ shihilɛ mli naagbai anaa ni wɔbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ wɔshɛje mɛi krokomɛi amii lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná hemɔkɛyeli kɛ nɔmimaa ni lalatsɛ lɛ ná lɛ nɔŋŋ eko.
Kɛ̃lɛ, adesa nɔyelɔ ni bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ fe fɛɛ lɛ po nyɛŋ atsu naagbai fɛɛ ni yɔɔ je lɛ mli lɛ he nii.
Tsɔɔmɔ naagbai komɛi ni baanyɛ ate shi yɛ nitsumɔhe, ní otsɔɔ bɔ ni ekolɛ abaanyɛ akɛ mlihilɛ atsu he nii lɛ mli.
Kɛ wɔhiɛ mlijɔlɛ su mli lɛ, wɔyeɔ wɔhe kɛjɛɔ helai pii ni yɛ bei pii amli lɛ nɔnyɛɛ kɛbaa lɛ amli, tamɔ lá ni faa babaoo, yitsogbamɔi, kɛ kɔɔyɔɔ mumɔ ni wa mli naagbai.

• Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yehowa baatsɔ etsu jalɛsane ni ayeee yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ he nii?
Shi kɛ́ ajinatoo bɛ lɛ, ehaa yiŋtoi feɔ yaka, ni ekɛ naagbai baa weku lɛ mli.
(Hiob 26:2) Nɔkwɛlɔ ni susuɔ mɔ he lɛ ‘baawaje niji ni mli eje wui lɛ,’ ni ehaŋ naagba lɛ ada kɛteke nɔ.—Hebribii 12:12.
Eyɛ mli akɛ wɔ sanegbaa lɛ baadamɔ kui sɔrɔtoi komɛi ni yɔɔ Afrika lɛ akusumii nifeemɔi anɔ moŋ, shi naagbai ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ yɛ je lɛŋ hei krokomɛi hu.
Nikaselɔ ko ni le nii shi eji atuatselɔ lɛ wie eshi gbɛ ni tsɔɔlɔ lɛ kɛɛ atsɔɔ nɔ abuɔ akɔntaa lɛ akɛ ejaaa.

Nyɛmi nuu ko ni miiwu eshi egbɔjɔmɔ ko ni enyɛŋ eku ehiɛ eshwie nɔ lɛ niiashikpamɔ lɛ maa enɛ nɔ mi.
4 Kɛ oku osɛɛ otee koni nyɛyatsa sanegbaa ni kɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ni etamɔ nɔ ni Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ etsɛ lɛ he lɛ, nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛsusu sane he nɛkɛ:
8 Yɔsemɔ ni wɔɔyɔse akɛ nibii komɛi yɛ ni wɔnyɛŋ he nɔ ko wɔfee lɛ ji gbɛ kome ni he hiaa waa ni baanyɛ aye abua wɔ koni wɔdamɔ shihilɛ mli naagbai anaa.

Belɛ, mɛi fɛɛ ni yaa he ni amɛsusuɔ yɛ anɔkwayeli fɛɛ mli akɛ eji Petro gbonyobu lɛ he bɔni afee ni ‘amɛkɛ esɛɛyelɔ lɛ ayakpe’ lɛ kɛ naagba ko ni ji kpɛlɛmɔ ni amɛaakpɛlɛ ‘blemasaji ni anyɛɛɛ akɛ he afɔ nɔ’ lɛ nɔ, aloo ni amɛaahe Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ ni anyɛɔ akɛ he fɔɔ nɔ lɛ amɛye lɛ miikpe.
Amɛheɔ amɛyeɔ akɛ kɛ́ osɔle yɛ naagba ko he lɛ, nɔ pɛ ni sɔlemɔ lɛ feɔ ji, eyeɔ ebuaa bo ni osusuɔ naagba lɛ he jogbaŋŋ, ni bo diɛŋtsɛ otaoɔ enaa tsabaa.
Mɛi akpekpei abɔ kɔlɔɔ tsofai ni esaaa aloo amɛbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛkɛ daanumɔ aku amɛnaagbai lɛ anaa.
3 Kɛ́ wɔkpe sɛɛ minitii fioo po kɛtee kpee ko shishi lɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni wɔmiikane sane ko yɛ wolo ko mli ni wɔyaje shishi yɛ sane lɛ teŋ gbɛ—wɔnuŋ shihilɛ mli ni aŋma sane lɛ yɛ, kɛ sane lɛ hiɛkpamɔ lɛ shishi, ni enɛ haŋ wɔnu nɔ ni wɔkaneɔ lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ ní wɔnyã he.

(Kolosebii 3:20) Bulɛ ni ajieɔ kpo atsɔɔ fɔlɔi ahegbɛ lɛ saa Yehowa hiɛ ni ekɛ edɛŋ jɔɔmɔ baa.
Saamɔ ohe jogbaŋŋ, ni Yehowa baajɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni obɔɔ ni okɛ mɛi ni taoɔ anɔkwale lɛ aná yiwalaheremɔ he sane lɛ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ lɛ nɔ.

Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ lé ni wɔleee gbi lɛ loo ŋmɛlɛtswaa lɛ ji jɔɔmɔ kɛha wɔ?
Yehowa jɔɔmɔ “feɔ mɔ niiatsɛ” yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Ebɔ mɔdɛŋ lolo akɛ ebaalomɔ Israel, shi, yɛ no najiaŋ moŋ lɛ, Yehowa ha ejɔɔ Israel shii etɛ sɔŋŋ.
□ Tooi krokomɛi lɛ ni ajɔɔ amɛ kɛtsɔɔ kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ nɔ lɛ tamɔ mɛi ni atsake amɛ kɛba Yudafoi ajamɔ mli yɛ kpaŋmɔ momo lɛ shishi lɛ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Enɛ bafee jɔɔmɔ wulu diɛŋtsɛ, ejaakɛ eha miná heyeli babaoo.
(Lala 116:12) Nyɔmɔ ni wɔhiɛ Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ nibii ní ekɛjɔɔ wɔ yɛ heloonaa, gbɛtsɔɔmɔ ni ekɛhaa wɔ, kɛ nɔ ni efee bɔni afee ní wɔná naanɔ wala wɔsɛɛ lɛ da aahu akɛ, kɛ́ wɔda lɛ shi kɛtee naanɔ po lɛ, enyɛŋ nyɔmɔ nɛɛ ewo tete.
Ni yɛ be mli ni ekpɛlɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ni Yɔɔ Ŋwɛi Shɔŋŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Ni gbii lɛ asɛɛ lɛ mi, Nebukadnezar, mihole mihiŋmɛii anɔ mikwɛ ŋwɛi, ni mijwɛŋmɔ ku sɛɛ ba mimli ekoŋŋ, ni mijie mɔ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi shɔŋŋ lɛ yi, ni mikafo ni miwo mɔ ni hiɔ shi kɛyashiɔ naanɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam; ejaakɛ enɔyeli lɛ naanɔ nɔyeli ni, ni emaŋtsɛyeli lɛ yɛ kɛjɛ yinɔ kɛyaa yinɔ.
Anɔkwa saji ni jeɔ kpo yɛ afii nyɔŋmai abɔ lɛ amli lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, ágbe mɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ atsɛmɔ naa, ni Yehowa jɔɔmɔ yɛ “asafo babaoo” lɛ ni yɔɔ hiɛnɔkamɔ akɛ amɛbaaje “amanehulu kpeteŋkpele” lɛ mli lɛ anɔ.
Kɛlɛ, amɛyɛ yiŋtoo ni amɛaadamɔ nɔ amɛmli afili amɛ ejaakɛ Yehowa kɛ nɔyaa ni nɔ bɛ ejɔɔ ewebii ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ.

‘Anunyam Gbɛi Kɛha Ehe’

(Kpojiemɔ 21:4) Shi ekolɛ obaabi akɛ: ‘Mɛni hewɔ Nyɔŋmɔ tsuko enɛ he nii momo lɛ?
19 Taakɛ atsĩ tã kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ, tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ni Israel osɔfoi lɛ shã lɛ feɔ Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji anɔkwafoi lɛ asɔlemɔi ní Nyɔŋmɔ boɔ toi lɛ he mfoniri.
Be ni etsɔɔ bɔ ni hemɔkɛyeli kwalɔi lɛ fiteɔ mɛi ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ ekomɛi ahemɔkɛyeli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Enɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ faneshi ni wa lɛ ma shi shiŋŋ, ni ehiɛ nɛkɛ naasɔomɔnɔ nɛɛ akɛ, ‘Yehowa le mɛi ni ji enii lɛ,’ kɛ agbɛnɛ hu, ‘Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni boɔ tsɛɔ Yehowa gbɛ́i lɛ atsi ehe kɛje nii ni ejaaa he.’” —2 Tim.
Kɛ́ otée miishɛɛ shi yɛ osane lɛ he momo, ni owie susumɔ kome loo enyɔ he yɛ ehe saji lɛ ateŋ ekome he lɛ, no lɛ obaanyɛ okpa ŋmalɛ lɛ hiɛ kɛtsɔ enɛ kɛɛmɔ nɔ akɛ: “Kadimɔ nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ kɛɔ yɛ sane nɛɛ he.”
Shi no mli lɛ, Adam le nɔ ni ji ekpakpa kɛ efɔŋ momo, ejaakɛ abɔ lɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ subaŋ nɔ, ni eyɛ henilee.
Kɛ gbɛtsiinii ni tamɔ nɛkɛ ehe shi momo lɛ, hewalɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ baanyɛ akumɔ mli.
Susumɔ kpakpa, yiŋtoo kpakpa kɛ shihilɛ gbɛ he anɔkwa ekomefeemɔ lɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ webii ateŋ momo.
Amɛteŋ mɔ kome ete shi ewo Yehowa momo, ni ebatsɔ Satan Abonsam ejaakɛ efɔlɔ Nyɔŋmɔ naa ni elaka Adam kɛ Hawa ni amɛfee esha.
Amɛteŋ mɛi titri ji asafo babaoo lɛ, ni amɛba momo kɛjɛ “jeŋmaŋ fɛɛ jeŋmaŋ kɛ akutsei kɛ maji kɛ majianɔwiemɔi” amli ni kɛ Yohane kuu lɛ jaa Nyɔŋmɔ nyɔɔŋ kɛ shwane lɛ.
Ni Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ kpaŋ nitsumɔi kpakpai ni wɔtsu yɛ bei ni eho lɛ amli lɛ anɔ kɔkɔɔkɔ.
8:27-39) Yɛ piafonyo lɛ gbɛfaŋ lɛ, ená suɔmɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ naa niŋmaai lɛ momo, ni yɛ be mli ni enine eshɛ mumɔŋ yelikɛbuamɔ nɔ kɛjɛ Filipo ŋɔɔ sɛɛ lɛ, efee klalo akɛ ebaatsɔ kaselɔ.
Paulo kɛ Yesaia wiemɔi lɛ miito jɔɔmɔi ní Kristofoi náa mli ŋɔɔmɔ momo yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ afii oha lɛ mli, tamɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nibii ní mli kwɔlɔ lɛ ashishi ní amɛnuɔ kɛ mumɔŋ sɛɛyoomɔ ní amɛnáa kɛjɛɔ Yehowa ŋɔɔ lɛ ahe.
Ani Nyɔŋmɔ bɛ anunyam mli momo?’
Taakɛ Etiopia piafonyo lɛ ji lɛ, eji anɔkwale akɛ no mli amɛle Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli shishijee tsɔɔmɔi kɛ shishitoo mlai lɛ momo.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 2:37-41.
Kɛji be ni Nyɔŋmɔ eŋmɛ gbɛ lɛ ejie lɛ kpo momo akɛ Satan sane ejaaa lɛ, mɛni hewɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ eŋmɛ efɔŋfeemɔ gbɛ koni ekã he eya nɔ mɔ?
3:20; Luka 11:13) Shi mɛɛ hetoo obaaha, kɛ́ mɔ ko bi bo akɛ, “Kɛji Nyɔŋmɔ le ‘nii ni hiaa mi dani mibiɔ lɛ’ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ maya nɔ mabi?”
Nyɔŋmɔ webii yɛ je lɛŋ fɛɛ momo, amɛyɛ ekoŋ fɛɛ koŋ.
16 Salomo ŋma akɛ: “Yaa ni oyaye oboloo kɛ miishɛɛ, ni oyanu owein kɛ tsuijurɔ; shi onitsumɔi lɛ esa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ momo.”
Ni kɛlɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ tsɔko hiɛ momo etsɔko mɛi ni abaakpata amɛhiɛ kɛ mɛi ni baaná yiwalaheremɔ.
Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ etsɔ hiɛ eto gbɛjianɔ koni akpɔ̃ wɔ loo ahere wɔ kɛjɛ gbele mli, ni mɔ ni ji otu yɛ nakai gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ mli ji Yesu Kristo.
7 Yaa ni oyaye oniyenii kɛ miishɛɛ, ni okɛ tsuijurɔ ayanu owain,+ ejaakɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ená onitsumɔi lɛ ahe miishɛɛ momo.
10 Klɛŋklɛŋbii ni abaptisi amɛ yɛ nakai famɔ ni Yesu kɛha lɛ kɛ gbeekpamɔ naa ji Yudafoi (kɛ mɛi ni amɛtsɔmɔ Yudafoi), ni akɛ maŋ lɛ, amɛjɔɔ amɛhe nɔ momo amɛha Nyɔŋmɔ ni ajie mɔbɔnalɛ krɛdɛɛ ko kpo atsɔɔ amɛ aahu kɛbashi afi 36 Ŋ.B. lɛ.
Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, ákɛ bi ni abiɔ koni afee Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ taakɛ afeɔ momo yɛ ŋwɛi lɛ, loo nɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ, bi ni abiɔ koni afee kɛmɔ shi kwraa yɛ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ hu nɔ.
9 Yɛ bei ni eho lɛ amli lɛ, Biblia ŋmalɔi komɛi susu nɔ hewɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ ehe woko adesai asaji amli ni ekɛ jalɛsaneyeli kɛ jalɛ nifeemɔ diɛŋtsɛ aba lɛ he.
Akɛni kɛbashi amrɔ nɛɛ, ekɛ afii babaoo ena Betel sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli miishɛɛ hewɔ lɛ, enáa hiɛsɔɔ akɛ ebɔ mɔdɛŋ ekase Kristo nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ kɛjɛ egbekɛbiiashi.
Wɔda Yehowa shi ni wɔbo ŋaa ni polisi onukpa lɛ wo wɔ akɛ wɔkaya nakai nu nɔ agba lɛ he dɔŋŋ lɛ toi.
Mida Yehowa shi akɛ eye ebua mi yɛ be ni sa mli.”
Fred Rusk ni kɛ afii 11 sɔmɔ akɛ tsɔɔlɔ yɛ Gilead Skul lɛ kɛ sɔlemɔ ní ta mɛi fɛɛ ni ba lɛ atsuii amli lɛ da Yehowa shi, ni ekɛ nifeemɔ lɛ ba naagbee.
Yɛ afii nyɔŋma ni ekɛsɔmɔ yɛ Betel sɛɛ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Bei pii lɛ misɔleɔ mihaa Yehowa kɛdaa lɛ shi yɛ emlihilɛ lɛ hewɔ.
Mihiɛ sɔɔ mimami gbɔfeemɔ su lɛ waa ejaakɛ no ha wɔná miishɛɛ waa yɛ wɔshihilɛ mli ni wɔná suɔmɔ waa wɔha nyɛmimɛi lɛ.—1 Petro 4:8, 9.
(Hiob 42:2) Bɔ ni Yehowa ha Hiob nu E-gbojee lɛ shishi lɛ ye bua lɛ ni ena akɛ enyɛŋ ekɛ ehe ato Bɔlɔ lɛ he yɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko mli.
Nine shɛ tɛlifoŋ, fas, kɛ woji anɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ kɛjɛ maŋbii lɛ adɛŋ ni amɛkɛmiitsɔɔ amɛshidaa yɛ dɛhiɛmɔ wolo ni amɛnine shɛ nɔ lɛ hewɔ.
19 Agbɛnɛ hu, ekɔ blodo,+ ni eda shi, ni ekumɔ mli, ni ekɛhã amɛ ekɛɛ: “Enɛ damɔ shi kɛhã* migbɔmɔtso,+ ni akɛbaahã yɛ nyɛhewɔ lɛ.
(Hebribii 13:15) Kɛji akɛ wɔkɛ wɔnyɛmɔi kɛ nibii ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ tsu nii ni wɔkɛshã yijiemɔ afɔle wɔha Yehowa, yɛ maŋ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ loo yɛ nanemɛi Kristofoi ‘agwabɔi amli’ hu lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔjie tsuiŋ shidaa kpo kɛha Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ, wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ.
Mɔ ko ni kaneɔ nɛkɛ saji nɛɛ ateŋ mɔ ko ŋma nɛkɛ saji nɛɛ ahe sane ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ mikane shihilɛi amli ni mɛi krokomɛi tsɔmɔ lɛ he sane lɛ, amɛhaa mibaa mihe shi, ni midaa shi akɛ Kristofonyo, ni eyeɔ ebuaa mi koni mikabu mihe tutuu, ni mifee pɛsɛmkunya.”
4 Nɔ ni Tsɔɔ Wɔshidaa ni Fe Fɛɛ: Ni wɔɔjɛ wɔsusuma fɛɛ mli wɔná Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ, ni wɔwo Yehowa gbɛi lɛ hiɛ nyam, ni wɔtsɔɔ hiɛsɔɔ yɛ sɔlemɔ mli, ni wɔkɛ anɔkwayeli afã anɔkwale lɛ he lɛ fata shidaa ni fe fɛɛ ni jɛ tsuiŋ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛha wɔ Bɔlɔ lɛ, yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni efee eha wɔ hewɔ lɛ he.
Amɛyɛ Roma beni Paulo kɛɛ Kristofoi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛŋãa Priska kɛ Akwila, ní ji minanemɛi nitsulɔi yɛ Kristo Yesu mli lɛ, nyɛhaa mi, mɛi ni kɛ amɛhe wo gbele mli yɛ miyiwala hewɔ, ní jeee mi kɛkɛ midaa amɛ shi, shi moŋ jeŋmaji lɛ amli asafoi lɛ fɛɛ hu daa amɛ shi lɛ.”
Ni ewó kpulu lɛ, ni eda shi [Hela, eu·kha·ri·ste ́sas], ni eŋɔha amɛ ni ekɛɛ: Nyɛ fɛɛ nyɛnua eko! ejaakɛ enɛ ji milá ni ji kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ nɔ̃ lɛ, ní afɔse ashwie shi yɛ mɛi pii ahewɔ ha eshaifaa lɛ.”—Mateo 26:26-28.
Kɛ́ aha bo adiagbai kotoku obɔ lɛ, ani onaŋ he miishɛɛ ni obɔ mɔdɛŋ koni otao mɔ ni fee bo ejurɔ lɛ, bɔni afee ni onyɛ oda lɛ shi?
Wɔmiida Yehowa shi waa akɛ etsɔɔ “tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ” lɛ nɔ ehaa wɔ mumɔŋ niyenii babaoo yɛ bɔ ni esumɔɔ ‘nyɛmimɛi’ lɛ hewɔ.—1 Pet.
Miida Yehowa shi waa akɛ beni miji oblayoo lɛ, eha mi nyɛmi yoo ko ni hiɛ efã ni eda yɛ mumɔŋ koni etsɔse mi ni ewo mi hewalɛ ni manyɛ madamɔ naagbai fɛɛ ni mikɛkpe lɛ anaa.—Jajelɔ 4:9, 10.
(Mika 7:8) Amɛdaa Yehowa shi akɛ etsɔ e-Wiemɔ lɛ nɔ eha ‘la ete shi ehã jalɔ kɛ̃, kɛ miishɛɛ hu ehã mɛi ni ja yɛ amɛtsuiaŋ lɛ.’—Lala 97:11.
Mɛni hewɔ wɔbaada Yehowa shi akɛ ebɔ wɔ kɔkɔ ni wɔya nɔ wɔmɛ naagbee lɛ?
17, 18. (a) Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ ni wɔkɛ ‘wɔnii ni wɔyɔɔ’ lɛ atsɔɔ akɛ wɔdaa shi?
Mɛi babaoo daa Nyɔŋmɔ shi daa akɛ eduro amɛ wala.
8:12) Wɔyɛ nibii babaoo ni wɔɔda Yehowa shi yɛ he.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni Hawa aaada shi yɛ jɔɔmɔi babaoo ni Yehowa kɛha lɛ he lɛ, eje shishi eshwe nɔ ni agu eyeli lɛ. —1 Mose 3:5, 6.
Yeremia fi shi yɛ gbɛ ni ekɔ lɛ nɔ, ni no ha ená henilee kpakpa, ni nɔ̃ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, wekukpaa kpakpa hi ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ, ni esa akɛ wɔhiɛ asɔ nɔkwɛmɔnii ni tamɔ enɛ.
5 Esa akɛ wɔ mɛi ni wɔyɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ ada shi akɛ wɔbafata mɛi ni ‘ejie duŋ mli nitsumɔi eshwie’ lɛ ahe.
(Lala 11:5) Akɛni gbekɛbii yei lɛ miisumɔ ni amɛsa Yehowa hiɛ hewɔ lɛ, amɛkpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ amɛbaatɛŋ mfoniri ni amɛkɛye tɛlivishiŋ ni amɛaakwɛ lɛ najiaŋ.
Skulbii lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome tsɔɔ akɛ ena tɛlivishiŋ nitsumɔhei srɔtoi 26 atsɔji 28 sɔŋŋ mamɔ skul lɛ hiɛ.
Wɔkɛ wɔ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi lɛ mlijaa etɛ mli ekome loo mlijaa ejwɛ mli ekome tsuɔ nii koni wɔbii aná miishɛɛ.
Tɛlivishiŋ haa jwɛŋmɔŋ susumɔ nɛɛ yaa hiɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ, mɛi komɛi baasumɔ ni amɛtsi amɛhe kɛjɛ tɛlivishin, sinii, loo je lɛŋ woji ahe kwraa.
Kɛ́ Kristofoi miikwɛ tɛlivishiŋ loo amɛyɛ Intanɛt lɛ nɔ lɛ, nɔ ko ni amɛkɛaakpe trukaa lɛ baanyɛ aka amɛ ni amɛkwɛ nɔ ko ni he tseee.
Shi bi ohe akɛ, ‘Ani mibii lɛ fɔɔ mi namɔ akɛ miikwɛ tɛlivishiŋ?’
Tɛlivishiŋ, woji tɛtrɛbii, kɛ vidioi woɔ nyenyeŋtswibɔɔ—ni ji “ahoshwibɔɔ; jeŋba shara; hiɛgbejianii” he hewalɛ.
Telivishin ni wɔkwɛɔ kɛ woji, woji tɛtrɛbii kɛ adafitswaa woji ni wɔkaneɔ lɛ ji gbɛi ni wɔtsɔɔ nɔ wɔkɛ mɛi krokomɛi bɔɔ.
Beni amɛjɛ sɔlemɔ lɛ kɛbashɛ shia lɛ, gbɔmɛi nɛɛ baanyɛ agbele tɛlivishin ni amɛbo saji ni yaa nɔ lɛ toi.
Ekolɛ wɔnaa enɛ he odaseyeli gbi fɛɛ gbi yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ adafitswaa kɛ amrɔmrɔ saji ahe adafitswai amli.
Televishin nɔ sanekpakpashiɛlɔi komɛi ebua shika babaoo naa ni amɛhiɔ shi yɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔ ni yɔɔ hiɛgbele (yɛ bei komɛi amli lɛ kɛ jeŋba shara) mli.
(Hiob 32:9; Jajelɔ 4:13) Kɛ hiɛ aaasɔ mɔ ko loo aaabu lɛ yɛ eyiteŋ waŋ hewɔ lɛ, belɛ esa akɛ onukpa lɛ afee mɔ ni efee babaoo yɛ eshihilɛ mli fe egbii ni efiteɔ yɛ hejɔfeemɔ mli ni ekɛtaa shi ekwɛɔ televishin, eyakwɛɔ kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔ kɛ akaŋshii nibii, aloo ni eeejie ehiɛtserɛ kɛkɛ.
(Mateo 19:5, 6, 9) Bei pii lɛ je nɛŋ sinii kɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi haa anaa gbalashihilɛ akɛ eji be kukuoo ko kpaŋmɔ ni abaanyɛ aku mli be fɛɛ be ni asumɔɔ.
Tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi amli eyi obɔ kɛ nihɔɔmɔ he adafitswai ni miiwo bo hewalɛ koni ohe nibii ni ekolɛ amɛhe ehiaaa bo ni ekolɛ onyɛŋ ohe po lɛ.
TƐLIVISHIN nɔ shiɛlɔ ko ni ale lɛ waa gbe naanyo shiɛlɔ ko he guɔ waa akɛ éfite gbala.
Tɛlivishin nɔ adafitswaa krɛdɛɛ ko ni he gbɛi waa yɛ 1993 mli lɛ wie akɛ Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ lɛ “nyɛɛɛ atsĩ nɔ ni woɔ toiŋjɔlɛ namɔ he gbeyei fe fɛɛ—ni ji nuklea tawuu nii agbɛɛ-kɛ-shwamɔ naa.”
Agbaa wɔ ŋwɛibɔfoi ni shɛjeɔ mɛi ni he yeɔ waa diɛŋtsɛ lɛ amii, ní amɛhaa mɛi ni agbo ashi amɛ lɛ kpoo, ní amɛhaa mɛi náa nilee, ní amɛsharaa aŋkroaŋkroi kɛjɛɔ gbele mli lɛ ahe saji yɛ tɛlivishiŋ kɛ sinii anɔ, woji amli, woji tɛtrɛbii amli, kɛ woji bibii amli.
MFONIRI LƐ HE SANE: Aakɔne nyɛmi nuu ko yiŋ ni ehé TV agbo ko ni jara wa ni he ehiaaa lɛ, shi ekpɛlɛɛɛ ni ebaahé.
Bei pii lɛ, gbɔmɛi susuɔ nɔ ni amɛnu nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ yɛ redio nɔ loo nɔ ni amɛna yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ lɛ he waa.
Ŋmɛnɛ lalai, sinii, videoi, tɛlivishin nɔ nibii, video shwɛmɔi, woji, woji tɛtrɛbii, kɛ kɔmiks jieɔ daimonioi asusumɔ kpo.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni eeekase nii lɛ, televishin moŋ ekwɛɔ.
Kooloo lɛ okadi lɛ ebafee sane ko ni akaa yiŋ awieɔ he babaoo yɛ tɛlivishiŋ kɛ Internet lɛ anɔ, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu yɛ sinii, woji, kɛ woji tɛtrɛbii amli.
Tsɔɔlɔ nukpa ko ni susuɔ nii ahe waa ni yɔɔ Germany lɛ wie yɛ wolo ni eŋma kɛyaha fɔlɔi lɛ mli akɛ: “Wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔwo nyɛ ni ji fɔlɔi ni wɔsumɔɔ nyɛsane lɛ hewalɛ koni nyɛbɔ mɔdɛŋ ni nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ nyɛkɛ be ni fa babaoo atsu nii kɛtsɔse nyɛbii lɛ, ní nyɛkaŋmɛ gbɛ ni tɛlivishiŋ loo nanemɛi gbohii miitsu nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ [nyɛsɔ̃ akɛ] nyɛtsɔse nyɛbii lɛ ni amɛdara kɛbatsɔmɔ mɛi ni yɔɔ jeŋba kpakpa lɛ he nii amɛmiiha nyɛ.”
Sinii kɛ TV nɔ nifeemɔi babaoo hu fiɔ susumɔ nɛɛ sɛɛ.
Amrɔ nɛɛ, ekɛ eweku lɛ baanyɛ akɛɛ akɛ Yehowa nine efoko kuku.
Ni mɛi ni mihala lɛ baaye amɛninenaa nitsumɔ lɛ mli nii jogbaŋŋ.
14 Ekɛ enine efimɔ minɔtɔmɔi lɛ tamɔ kɔɔŋtso.
(Romabii 6: 16-23) Eyɛ mli akɛ wɔ heloo mli akɔnɔi kɛ eshafeemɔ sui lɛ amli wa, ni mpleshii ka enɛɛmɛi kɛ nibii kpakpai ni Nyɔŋmɔ biɔ yɛ wɔdɛŋ lɛ teŋ.
3 Shi amɛmɔ lɛ, amɛyi lɛ, ni amɛshwie lɛ kɛ edɛ̃ folo.
“MAFƆ midɛ yɛ bemyeli mli, ni mabɔle ofɔleshaa latɛ lɛ, Yehowa.”
Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, mɔdɛŋbɔɔ kɛ ninámɔ yɛ tsakpãa.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni shikpɔŋhosomɔ ko fite nibii yɛ Italy lɛ, adafitswaa wolo ko bɔ amaniɛ akɛ Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ “ye amɛbua mɛi, amɛye amɛbua mɛi ni naa amanehulu lɛ ekɔɔɔ he eko jamɔ mli ni mɛi lɛ yɔɔ.”
Kɛfata he lɛ, bei pii lɛ, Yesu ehiɛɛɛ wolokpoi lɛ eko.
“Leebi lɛ dũ odũmɔnii lɛ, ni gbɛkɛ hu kaajie onine yɛ he; ejaakɛ oleee emli nɔ ni baahi.”—JAJ.
(Hiob 22:5, 9) Shi Elihu ye ebua Hiob ni ewaje wekukpãa ni kã ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ lɛ, ni enɛ ji oti ni ma ŋaawolɔi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ ahiɛ.
Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, aŋkroaŋkroi komɛi yɛ ni heɔ yeɔ akɛ amɛnyɛŋ amɛbɛŋkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ—akɛ ekɛ amɛteŋ jɛkɛ tsɔ loo ebɛ deka kwraa yɛ nibii krokomɛi ahe bɔ ni ekɛaabo gbɔmɛi foji atoi.

Kpeei Kanyaa Wɔ Kɛyaa Nitsumɔi Kpakpai Ahe
Kɛfata he lɛ, wɔbɛ dekã kɛ wɔ heloo gbɛfaŋ nitsumɔ, shia nitsumɔ loo skul nikasemɔ, kɛ gbɛnaa nii krokomɛi babaoo, ní fɛɛ heɔ be lɛ ahe nitsumɔ.
Abaaná shĩai kpakpai kɛ nitsumɔi ni hi.
Yoo ko ni fɔlɔi ni tsɔse lɛ lɛ sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Wɔjeee mɛi ni nyiɛ wɔfɔlɔi asɛɛ kɛkɛ, ni wɔfataa amɛhe yɛ amɛ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Olive kɛ mi esɔmɔ aaafee afii 20 yɛ gbɛfaa nitsumɔ lɛ mli wɔkɛyasara asafoi sɔrɔtoi otsi fɛɛ otsi.
(Abɛi 3:6) Yehowa baawaje bo beni otsuɔ nii waa koni onine ashɛ mumɔŋ otii ni okɛmamɔ ohiɛ lɛ anɔ lɛ.
(Galatabii 6: 10) Shi kɛlɛ, gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ ní wɔɔnyɛ wɔtsɔ nɔ ‘wɔfee mɛi krokomɛi ejurɔ’ ji ní wɔha amɛnu amɛmumɔŋ hiamɔ nii ahe, ní wɔtsu amɛmumɔŋ hiamɔ nii nɛɛ ahe nii.
(Yesaia 61:2; Mateo 24:14) Ani okɛ ohe woɔ nitsumɔ ní he hiaa nɛɛ mli kɛmɔɔ shi?
Ni gbi po ni akɛ nitsumɔ lɛ baa naagbee lɛ, etsu nii jenamɔ fɛɛ bɔni afee ni anyɛ agbe nitsumɔ lɛ naa koni nyɛmimɛi lɛ anyɛ ajɔɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ enɔ jetsɛremɔ.
Yɛ nyɔji fioo ko sɛɛ lɛ, heloonaa nitsumɔ bafee nɔ ni anaaa, ni amɛshika fɛɛ tã.

(5 Mose 11:13-15; Abɛi 3:9, 10; 11:25) Yesu ma nɔ mi eha wɔ akɛ no feemɔ baaha wɔná miishɛɛ beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nɔ hamɔ mli yɛ [miishɛɛ, NW] fe hemɔ” lɛ.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:35.
(Jajelɔi 12:13) Shihilɛ ni atswaa amaa bulɛ ni ayɔɔ kɛha Biblia tsɔɔmɔi anɔ ji shihilɛ ni haa mɔ náa miishɛɛ, ejaakɛ Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Miishɛɛ ji mɛi ni nuɔ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ ni amɛyeɔ nɔ lɛ!”—Luka 11:28, NW.

22. (a) Yɛ miishɛɛnamɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ, okɛ Yehowa tsuji ato mɛi ni sɔmɔɔɔ lɛ lɛ ahe ni akwɛ. (b) Mɛɛ yiŋtoo krɛdɛɛ hewɔ esa akɛ wɔkpa gbɛ akɛ wɔɔna miishɛɛ lɛ?
Akɛni miishɛɛ ni anaaa lɛ egbɛ eshwa hewɔ lɛ, ekolɛ mɛi komɛi baana akɛ eyɛ mlɛo kwraa akɛ amɛaaha nɔ ni jeee no kɛ miishɛɛ baa lɛ hetoo.
Susumɔ sane ni eshishinumɔ wa nɛɛ he okwɛ: Gbɔmɛi ni fa fe oha fɛɛ mli 90 ni amɛyɔɔ jarayeli maŋ ko mli lɛ nuɔ he akɛ amɛyɛ miishɛɛ waa loo kɛ́ jeee nakai hu lɛ amɛyɛ miishɛɛ bɔ ni sa.
Kɛ́ wɔfee nakai lɛ, wɔbaaná miishɛɛ babaoo, ejaakɛ “nɔhamɔ mli yɛ jɔɔmɔ fe hemɔ.”—Bɔf. 20:35.
Michiko wie be ni ekɛhi shi akɛ oshijafo lɛ he akɛ: “Mitee nɔ mikɛɛ mihe akɛ, Yehowa ji ‘miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ,’ no hewɔ lɛ, jeee gbalamlibotemɔ nɔ wɔmiishɛɛ damɔ.”
Akɛni Yehowa diɛŋtsɛ ji miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hewɔ lɛ, sɔɔmɔ ni akɛhaa lɛ daa lɛ ji nɔ ni haa mɔ naa miishɛɛ.
Nɔ ni bɛŋkɛ bɔ ni jalɛ saneyeli he hiaa ha lɛ he ji bɔ ni gbɔmɔ taoɔ miishɛɛ lɛ, ejaakɛ Lala 106:3 (NW) jajeɔ akɛ: “Miishɛɛ ji mɛi ni yeɔ jalɛ sane, ni amɛfeɔ nii ni ja yɛ be fɛɛ mli” lɛ.
Mɛi Ni Sɔmɔɔ “Miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Lɛ” Yɛ Miishɛɛ
Yiŋkɔshikɔshi-feemɔ ko bɛ eyiŋ yɛ nɔ ni he hiaa koni eha mɔ ana miishɛɛ —miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ he: mɔ lɛ kɛ Yehowa teŋ wekukpaa kpakpa mli ŋɔɔmɔ ni eeena kɛ edeka fɛɛ ni ekaatsu nii yɛ E-sɔɔmɔ mli.
(1 Mose 1:26) Shi amɛmiishɛɛnamɔ lɛ damɔ sɔɔmɔ ni amɛaasɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ nɔ, taakɛ lalatsɛ lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, akɛ: “Miishɛɛ ji maŋ ni Yehowa ji e-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ!”
9 Yesu tsɔɔ nɔ kroko ni haa mɔ náa miishɛɛ. Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mɛi ni sumɔɔ toiŋjɔlɛ lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ, ejaakɛ aaatsɛ amɛ ‘Nyɔŋmɔ bii.’”
Yesu kɛ shishitoo mla kɛha miishɛɛnamɔ lɛ ha beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Miishɛɛ ji mɛi ni amɛhiɛ yɔɔ amɛmumɔŋ hiamɔ nii anɔ lɛ, . . . mɛi ni yeɔ ŋkɔmɔ, . . . mɛi ni he jɔ lɛ, . . . mɛi ni jalɛ he hɔmɔ kɛ kumai yeɔ amɛ lɛ, . . . mɛi ni naa mɔbɔ, . . . mɛi ni tsuii amli tse lɛ, . . . mɛi ni sumɔɔ toiŋjɔlɛ, . . . mɛi ni awaa amɛyi yɛ jalɛ hewɔ lɛ.”
Shi, Nyɔŋmɔ su kroko ni etaoɔ ni etsuji akase ji miishɛɛ, ejaakɛ lɛ ji “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ.”
BEI pii lɛ, ewa akɛ mɔ aaaná miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ daa.
Mɛni ha Yesu ná miishɛɛ, ni mɛni esa akɛ ofee koni bo hu oná miishɛɛ?
NƆ NI BIBLIA LƐ TSƆƆ: Yesu tsɔɔ nɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni kɛ miishɛɛ baa, be ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mɛi ni le akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ he miihia amɛ lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ” lɛ.
Birgit kɛɛ akɛ: “Mɔ ko baanyɛ ahi shi ní ená miishɛɛ kɛ́ ebɛ gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔ po, shi ewa akɛ aaaná miishɛɛ kɛ́ abɛ naanyo.”
YEHOWA miisumɔ ni wɔmii ashɛ wɔhe, ni no hewɔ lɛ, ekɛ nibii babaoo ni baaha wɔná miishɛɛ duroɔ wɔ.
(1 Yohane 3:17) Ajɔɔ mɔ ni naa mɛi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ amɔbɔ lɛ, ejaakɛ “nɔhamɔ mli yɛ jɔɔmɔ fe hemɔ.”—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:35.
Mɛi ni ŋma wolo tɛtrɛɛ nɛɛ baaná he miishɛɛ akɛ amɛaaha ole saji krokomɛi lolo koni eye ebua bo ni bo diɛŋtsɛ oma wɔsɛɛ shihilɛ ni miishɛɛ kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ yɔɔ mli nɔ mi oha ohe.
Taakɛ The Cambridge History of the Bible lɛ wie he lɛ, “Ŋmalɛi lɛ ha ena miishɛɛ, ni nɔ ko he yɛ oya kɛ nyamɔ yɛ nibii ni jieɔ emiishɛɛ kpo lɛ mli.”
Nyɛmimɛi, be fɛɛ be lɛ, nyɛnáa miishɛɛ, nyɛhãa ajajea nyɛ, nyɛhãa ashɛjea nyɛmii, nyɛhãa nyɛjwɛŋmɔ afea ekome, nyɛhia shi yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli.—2 Kor.
Shi nyɛmimɛi lɛ haaa enɛ atsĩ amɛnaa, amɛkai wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Jajelɔ 11:4 lɛ: “Mɔ ni saraa kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ, eduŋ nii, ni mɔ ni kwɛɔ atatui lɛ, ekpaŋ nii.”
Ehe bahia ni nyɛmimɛi lɛ atsɔɔ amɛhe ni amɛkɛwooo ta mli lɛ mli amɛha Croatiabii, Serbiabii, kɛ Muslim asraafoi sɔrɔtoi abɔ.
(Efesobii 1:22; Kpojiemɔ 1:12, 13, 20; 2:1-4) Dani enɛ aaaba lɛ, kɛ wɔnyiɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ kpakpa ni Stefana, Fortunato, kɛ Akaiko kɛfɔ shi lɛ sɛɛ, ni wɔtee nɔ wɔgbo deŋme yɛ wɔ nyɛmimɛi lɛ asɔɔmɔ mli lɛ, wɔ hu wɔbaafee mɛi ni kɛ anɔkwayeli fiɔ asafoŋ gbɛjianɔtoo sɛɛ, mɛi ni tswaa amɛ nyɛmimɛi amɛmaa shi, ni ‘kanyaa amɛ kɛyaa suɔmɔ kɛ nitsumɔi kpakpai ahe.’—Hebribii 10:24, 25.
Ni gbi po ni akɛ nitsumɔ lɛ baa naagbee lɛ, etsu nii jenamɔ fɛɛ bɔni afee ni anyɛ agbe nitsumɔ lɛ naa koni nyɛmimɛi lɛ anyɛ ajɔɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ enɔ jetsɛremɔ.
+ 2 Ni David ja hii lɛ amli etɛ, ni ekɛ kuu kome wo Yoab+ dɛŋ, ni ekɛ kuu kome hu wo Yoab nyɛmi nuu Abishai,+ Zeruia binuu+ lɛ dɛŋ, ni ekɛ kuu ni ji etɛ lɛ wo Itai,+ Gatnyo* lɛ dɛŋ.
2 Nyɛmimɛi, nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ nyɛle lɛɛlɛŋ akɛ saramɔ ni wɔbasara nyɛ lɛ efeko efolo.
April 15, 1992 Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ tswa adafi akɛ, akɛ nitsumɔ miiwo nyɛmimɛi hii ni ahala amɛ, ni titri lɛ amɛji “tooi krokomɛi” lɛ mlibii, ni tamɔ Ezra gbii lɛ amli [Nethinim] Sɔlemɔwe Sɔɔlɔi lɛ adɛŋ koni amɛye amɛbua Nɔyeli Kuu ajinafoi lɛ.—Yohane 10:16; Ezra 2:58.
Riana eye afii 22.
Minyɛɔ minaa Yesu shiwoo lɛ kpetekpelee: “Mɔ ko bɛ ni eshi shia loo nyɛmimɛi hii loo nyɛmimɛi yei loo tsɛ loo nyɛ loo ŋa loo bii loo abɔi yɛ mi kɛ sanekpakpa lɛ hewɔ, ní enaŋ shiai kɛ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ nyɛmimɛiyei kɛ nyɛmɛi.”
Beni Nyɛminuu Lagakos gbo yɛ afi 1943 lɛ, Odasefoi lɛ kɛ mumɔŋ la lɛ etee Lebanon, Syria kɛ Palestina maŋtiasei kɛ akrowai lɛ ateŋ babaoo mli.
Shi beni miye mibua kɛsaa kpee lɛ shishi lɛ, mikɛ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei babaoo bɔ.
(Mateo 25: 37-40) Beni Yesu jie ehe kpo etsɔɔ Maria Magdalena yɛ egbohiiashitee gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ, ekɛ lɛ wie emumɔŋ nyɛmimɛi nɛɛ ahe ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Yaa minyɛmimɛi lɛ aŋɔɔ ni oyakɛɛ amɛ.”
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ nyɛmimɛi hii baanyɛ atsɔ amɛkɛ wumɛi ni jeee Odasefoi shi amɛyɛ anɔkwale lɛ he miishɛɛ fioo lɛ agba sane?
Nyɛminuu Knorr hã mile akɛ nyɛmimɛi hii ni waa lɛ lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome baashi kɛya Maŋtsɛyeli Sɔɔmɔ Skul lɛ nyɔɔŋ kome, ni no sɛɛ lɛ, ebaayatsu nii yɛ Service Department lɛ.
ATSƆƆ mli yɛ 1992 Yearbook lɛ mli akɛ: “Gray Smith kɛ enyɛminuu onukpa Frank, ni ji gbɛgbalɔi sɔɔlɔi enyɔ ni yɔɔ ekaa, ni jɛ Cape Town [South Africa] lɛ, fa gbɛ kɛmiiya British East Africa ni amɛyakwɛ akɛ ani abaanyɛ akɛ sanekpakpa lɛ ayashɛ jɛmɛ gbɛ lo.
34 Mizraim nyɔŋmɔi etɛ ni afee amɛ ekome lɛ ateŋ nɔ ni ehe gbɛi fe fɛɛ ji Isis, ŋwɛi nyɛ-feemɔ he okadi lɛ; Osiris, enyɛminuu kɛ ewu; kɛ Horus, amɛbi, ni akɛ laalɔɔ damɔɔ shi kɛhaa lɛ yɛ be fɛɛ mli lɛ.
Amɛkɛ nyɛmimɛi ni ji maŋbii lɛ tsu nii jogbaŋŋ ni amɛkase nii kɛjɛ amɛŋɔɔ.
Shi ehi jogbaŋŋ akɛ, abaahã asafoŋ sɔɔlɔi lɛ atsu nitsumɔi ni akɛwo amɛdɛŋ lɛ nɔŋŋ be kplaŋŋ koni amɛle mli jogbaŋŋ ní amɛhe asa.
Agbɛnɛ hu, Biblia mli nɔkwɛmɔnii babaoo ha mile anɔkwale nɛɛ: Kɛ́ misɔmɔ nyɛmimɛi lɛ kɛ Yehowa lɛ, maná anɔkwa miishɛɛ.”
Nyɛminuu ko wie akɛ ekase nibii babaoo ni aaaha ejaje loo etsake esu kɛ baŋ yɛ afi pɛ mli yɛ Betel fe afii etɛ ni eye yɛ he kroko.
Minyɛmi nuu ni mikɛyɔɔ lɛ kɛɛ mi akɛ amɛji mɛi komɛi ni amɛsaa amɛhe jogbaŋŋ, shi amɛbɛ nɔ ko tsɔ.
Amɛkpɛlɛ nitsumɔ ni yɔɔ oshara akɛ amɛkɛ mumɔŋ niyenii baaya Biafra lɛ nɔ, ni enɛ ha nyɛmimɛi babaoo na he sɛɛ kɛyashi ta lɛ ba naagbee yɛ afi 1970.—3/1 baafa 27.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni ebaahã lɛ Buu-Mɔɔ hee ni eba lɛ kɛkɛ ni eya lɛ, ekane ŋmalɛ ko ni akɛtsu nii yɛ Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ ehã lɛ.
Ani wɔmumɔŋ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei ní yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ hu baanyɛ afee nakai nɔŋŋ?
18 No hewɔ lɛ, Mose ku esɛɛ kɛtee eshaanuu Yetro+ ŋɔɔ ni eyakɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Ofainɛ, miitao maku misɛɛ ni maya minyɛmimɛi ní yɔɔ Ejipt lɛ aŋɔɔ ní mayakwɛ akɛ amɛyɛ wala mli lolo lo.”
Wɔkaseɔ nii babaoo ní kɔɔ Abonsam he kɛji wɔsusu wiemɔi ni Yesu wie etsɔɔ jamɔ mli tsɔɔlɔi ni yɔɔ egbii lɛ amli lɛ he lɛ: “Nyɛ lɛ nyɛtsɛ ni nyɛjɛ emli ji abonsam, ni nyɛtsɛ lɛ tsinebaa nii nyɛsumɔɔ akɛ nyɛfee.
3 “Misumɔɔ tsɛ lɛ.”
Yesu tsɔɔ akɛ eyɛ suɔmɔ kɛha wɔ taakɛ bɔ ni e-Tsɛ yɔɔ lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Yesu Tsɛ lɛ toiboo haa Yesu náa miishɛɛ babaoo.
Yesu kɛɛ e-Tsɛ lɛ yɛ sɔlemɔ mli akɛ: “Owiemɔ lɛ anɔkwaleŋ.”
Wɔkɛ saji ni abua naa lɛ fɔɔ gbɛfaa Hɔɔ shwane loo Hɔgbaa, be ni Ataa eyaaa nitsumɔ lɛ.
Gbi ko baaba ni mɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ baatsɔmɔ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ nyɛmimɛi yei, ni amɛfee ekome yɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ mɛi fɛɛ a-Tsɛ lɛ jamɔ mli.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni ebaatee Lazaro shi lɛ, ‘ehole ehiŋmɛii anɔ kɛtee ŋwɛi ni ekɛɛ: Ataa, miidao shi akɛ obo mi toi.
(Hiob 29:4) Jeee akɛ Hiob miipupuu ehe beni egbaa bɔ ni ‘ejieɔ ohiafo ni bolɔɔ tsɛɔ bualɔ lɛ, ni ekɛ jalɛ eha ehe tamɔ mama, ni etsɔ tsɛ kɛha mɛi ni efi amɛ lɛ.’
Beni Yakobo tsɔɔ nikeenii nɛɛ amli lɛ, ekɛɛ: “Duromɔ nii kpakpai fɛɛ kɛ nikeenii ni hi kɛwula shi fɛɛ lɛ, ŋwɛi ejɛɔ ekpelekeɔ shi, kɛjɛɔ lai atsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ, mɔ mli ni sutsakemɔ kɛ tsɔ̃mɔ susuma ko bɛ lɛ.”
(1 Mose 50:5-8, 12-14) No hewɔ lɛ, Yosef jie mɔbɔnalɛ kpo etsɔɔ etsɛ.
WƆFƆLƆI—wɔtsɛ kɛ wɔnyɛ—baanyɛ afee hewalɛwoo, sɛɛfimɔ, kɛ ŋaawoo jɛɛhe ni sɛɛnamɔ babaoo yɔɔ he.
Akɛni Ataa bɛ shĩa ní Awo le hu akɛ etsɛŋ ni mi kɛ minyɛmi nuu fioo lɛ kɛ kaa ni kɔɔ he ni akɛwooo maŋkwramɔŋ saji amli lɛ baakpe hewɔ lɛ, nɛkɛ be nɛɛ bafee jaramɔ be kɛha Awo.
Shi miná miishɛɛ hu ejaakɛ yɛ amɛ ekãafeemɔ kɛ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ lɛ naa lɛ, gbɔmɛi babaoo ekase anɔkwale lɛ ni amɛbale wɔ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ.”—Colette, Netherlands.
Paulo jaje akɛ: “Wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔ-Nuntsɔ Yesu Kristo tsɛ lɛ shi [NW shishigbɛ niŋmaa, “wɔsɔleɔ daa”] yɛ nyɛhewɔ daa nɛɛ yɛ wɔsɔlemɔi amli.”
No kɛ nɔ ni amɛkase yɛ Petro ŋɔɔ lɛ mli hemɔkɛyeli ni amɛná lɛ ha amɛná nɔ ni amɛaadamɔ nɔ abaptisi amɛ ‘yɛ Tsɛ lɛ kɛ Bi lɛ kɛ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ gbɛi amli.’
(Yesaia 41:8; Yakobo 2:23) Egbɛi ji Abraham, ni Biblia lɛ tsɛɔ lɛ akɛ “mɛi fɛɛ ní heɔ yeɔ . . . lɛ atsɛ.”—Romabii 4:11.
(Lala 110:2) Eji Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii akɛ etao mɛi fɛɛ ni taoɔ ni amɛle mɔ ni eji diɛŋtsɛ ni amɛja lɛ “yɛ mumɔŋ kɛ anɔkwale mli” lɛ asɛɛ gbɛ, ni Mesia lɛ miitsu e-Tsɛ lɛ suɔmɔnaa nii nɛɛ he nii yɛ jeŋ fɔŋ ni etse ehe kɛjɛ Nyɔŋmɔ he nɛɛ mli.
Mɛɛ hegbɛ ni fe fɛɛ wɔkɛwoɔ wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ hiɛ nyam nɛ!
9 Akɛni Yesu ji adesa ni eye emuu tamɔ Adam hewɔ lɛ, kulɛ ebaanyɛ emu sane naa akɛ ebaanyɛ ewo shwiei ni eye emuu.
Kaimɔ akɛ, kɛ́ awo wɔ tsuŋ jio, akɛ wɔ etee he ko banee jio lɛ, no nyɛɛɛ atsi sane ni wɔ kɛ wɔ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ baagba lɛ naa loo efite ekomefeemɔ ni yɔɔ wɔ kɛ wɔnyɛmimɛi lɛ ateŋ lɛ.
Beni ekɛ Rebeka kpe lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, afɔ̃ le nine kɛba etsɛ Betuel shia lɛ mli.
Ofɔlɔi lɛ dɔɔ ohe daa.
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, abaptisi yoo lɛ kɛ enyɛ, ni yoo lɛ wu kɛ etsɛ bɔi Biblia lɛ kasemɔ.
19 Yoo ko ni yɔɔ Guyana lɛ kɛɛ gbɛgbalɔ ko ni yatswa eshinaa lɛ akɛ: “Nyɔŋmɔ diɛŋtsɛ tsu bo kɛba miŋɔɔ.”
Yoo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Eunike lɛ weku hi shi yɛ Listra, maŋtiase ko ni yɔɔ Likaonia kpokpaa ni yɔɔ Asia Bibioo lɛ wuoyi-teŋgbɛ lɛ mli.
+ 14 Ekɛ yoo okulafo, yoo ni ashwie lɛ, yoo ni abule lɛ, loo ashawo akabote gbalashihilɛ mli; shi eŋɔ oblayoo fro yɛ emaŋbii lɛ ateŋ akɛ eŋa.
(Yesaia 60:2) Esa akɛ ‘yoo’ lɛ ‘atso,’ kɛha mɛi ní ebɔle lɛ lɛ, ní kã he amɛgbugbuuɔ shi yɛ duŋ mli lolo lɛ asɛɛnamɔ.
YOO nilelɔ ko ni kɛ nuu yakagbɔmɔ ebote gbalashihilɛ mli—nakai ji Abigail kɛ Nabal shihilɛ lɛ.
Yoo ni Yesu kɛ lɛ wieɔ lɛ eba koni ebayɛ nu.
Obalayoo lɛ kɛ kɛfata he akɛ: “Shitee-kɛ-woo ni wa lolo ba kɛjɛ miweku lɛ ŋɔɔ, titri lɛ, kɛjɛ mitsɛ ŋɔɔ.
(1 Mose 3:13) Hawa, ni ji klɛŋklɛŋ yoo lɛ kɛ nakai wiemɔi fioo lɛ bɔ mɔdɛŋ koni ekɛtsɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ni etse Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ atua lɛ mli.
Kɛji mitsui emɔ yoo ko pɛŋ, ni miyawo ká yɛ minaanyo shinaa shi lɛ: no lɛ ha miŋa awiɛ aha mɔ kroko, ní mɛi krokomɛi akoto enɔ.”—Hiob 31:1, 9, 10.
Wɔkɛ oblayoo ko kpe ni ebo shiɛmɔ wiemɔ ni mikase lɛ toi.
5 Okɛ Lɛ Asusu Nii Ahe yɛ Gbɛ ni Ja Nɔ: Odasefonyo ko bi yoo ko ni heɔ eyeɔ akɛ Yesu ji Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ akɛ: ‘Kɛ ootao otsɔɔ akɛ mɛi enyɔ ji gbɔmɛi kome lɛ, mɛɛ wekukpaa obaakɛɛ akɛ ekã amɛteŋ?’
9 Shi yoo lɛ kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Bɛ ole nɔ ni Saul fee, bɔ ni ejie mumɔi atsɛlɔi kɛ klamɔfoi lɛ kɛje shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ?
Etsɛ yoo ni jo yɛ Herode okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ lɛ shishi, ní ebi ni aha lɛ Yohane Baptisilɔ lɛ yitso lɛ akɛ Salome.
1-4. (a) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yesu kɛ ŋaa tsɔɔ Samaria yoo ko nii, ni mɛni jɛ mli kɛba?
+ Kwaa ofee tamɔ yoo ko ni eye awerɛho be kplaŋŋ yɛ mɔ ko ni egbo lɛ hewɔ.
Shi kɛlɛ, yoo nɛɛ ji nua, loo biyoo nukpa yɛ weku lɛ mli.
(Luka 2:19) Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, oblayoo nɛɛ jwɛŋɔ nii anɔ jogbaŋŋ.
Hɛɛ, mɛɛ gbɛi kpakpa ofee oha ohe ákɛ Kristofonyo nuu aloo yoo oshijafonyo?
Hemɔkɛyeli tsalɔi ni yɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ sumɔɔ ni amɛtsĩ wiemɔ ni Yesu kɛ yoo ko ni lá eho lɛ aahu afii 12 sɔŋŋ, ní ba eŋɔɔ kɛha tsamɔ lɛ wie lɛ mli, akɛ: “Ohemɔkɛyeli etsao.”
(b) Te feɔ tɛŋŋ ni drako lɛ nyɛɔ ewaa “yoo lɛ ni fɔ binuu lɛ” yi lɛ?
Enɔ jetsɛremɔ lɛ, wɔbi obalayoo ko kɛji ele he ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔna kuu lɛ asraafoi anitsumɔ he yitso lɛ yɛ.
Te fɛɛ tɛŋŋ ni mi, obalayoo fioo lɛ, batsɔ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔ?
Beni mitu kɛwo ŋshɔ lɛ mli nɔŋŋ ni mina yoo ko ni wo atade ni haa mɔ tɛoɔ nu hiɛ, ní tɛo ŋshɔ lɛ hiɛ yɛ mimasɛi.
8. (a) Te tookwɛlɔ lɛ kɛ yoo lɛ fee amɛnii yɛ amɛnibii ni laaje lɛ ahe amɛha tɛŋŋ?
Satan ejie nyɛ̃ɛ kpo etsɔɔ Yehowa yoo lɛ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛi anɔ?
Okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ, ni mɔ ni ta enɔ lɛ ji ŋwɛi maŋtsɛ.
+ 6 Nɔ* ni okpɔŋɔi diji yɔɔ he lɛ eje kpo kɛmiiya kooyigbɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ;+ okpɔŋɔi yɛji lɛ eje kpo kɛmiiya ŋshɔ lɛ sɛɛgbɛ; ni okpɔŋɔi ni he yɔɔ turuntarai lɛ eje kpo kɛmiiya wuoyigbɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
White kɛɛ yɛ January 29, 1857 Review and Herald lɛ mli akɛ, Yesu eje “sanemlipɛimɔ kojomɔ” ko shishi.
Amɛfɔ amɛtadei lɛ ahe ni eyɛ futaa yɛ Toobi lɛ la lɛ mli ni enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ amɛyɛ jalɛ shidaamɔ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ kɛtsɔ hemɔkɛyeli ni amɛyɔɔ yɛ Yesu afɔleshaa lɛ mli lɛ hewɔ.
Wɔkaneɔ yɛ Kpojiemɔ 19:11 akɛ: “Ni mɔ ni ta [okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ lɛ] nɔ lɛ, atsɛɔ lɛ akɛ: Heyelilɔ kɛ Anɔkwafo; ni jalɛ naa ekojoɔ ni ewuɔ ta yɛ.”
9 Yɛ ninaa nɛɛ nɔŋŋ mli lɛ, awie Kristo he hu akɛ mɔ ko ni afĩ lɛ akekre ni ta okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ nɔ, ni eje kpo “eeye kunim, koni esaa eye kunim.”
“Mɔ ni yɔɔ toi lɛ ha ni enu nɔ ni mumɔ lɛ kɛɔ asafoi lɛ. Mɔ ni yeɔ kunim lɛ, maha lɛ mana ni aŋɔtee lɛ eko eye, ni maha lɛ tɛ yɛŋ, ni tɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ aŋma gbɛi hee ni mɔ ko leee akɛ ja mɔ ni naa lɛ.”
Enɛɛmɛi asɛɛ lɛ, Yohane na “asafo babaoo . . . ni jɛ jeŋmaŋ fɛɛ jeŋmaŋ kɛ akutsei kɛ maji kɛ majianɔ wiemɔi amli damɔ maŋtsɛsɛi lɛ hiɛ kɛ toobi lɛ hiɛ, ni amɛwo atadei yɛji, ni amɛhiɛ blɛoi yɛ amɛdɛŋ.”
Ŋmɔ ni ‘Egba Futaa ni Sa Kpamɔ’
Ekɛ yiteŋ waŋ to “ŋmɛtso” ni egba afoforo he.
Etamɔ nɔ ni tso lɛ teɔ shi kɛ afoforo tsuji fɛfɛji loo eyɛji ni egba lɛ.—Jajelɔ 12:5.
5 Asusuɔ akɛ ashwaifeemɔ buɔ mɔ he kɛjɛɔ efɔŋ mli.
Ewo atade yɛŋ.
