Gbalɔ lɛ kpa Yudafoi henɔwolɔi lɛ anɔfɔŋfeemɔ lɛ he mama, ni egba Nyɔŋmɔ kojomɔ ni baaba Babilon nɔ lɛ hu kɛtsu nitsumɔ ni akɛwo edɛŋ lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ fã lɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ webii kɛ nibii ni jara wawai ni jɛ jeŋmaji lɛ amli lɛ tsuɔ nii koni amɛkɛha anɔkwa jamɔ aya hiɛ
Ekolɛ abɔɔkwɛlɔ ko baahu ebɔɔ mli, ni ebaadũ wui, ni ebaakwra nibii ni edũ lɛ jogbaŋŋ, shi yɛ naagbee lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ naakpɛɛ hewalɛ ni ekɛbɔ nibii fɛɛ lɛ ji nɔ ni haa nii kwɛ̃ɔ.
Akɛni amɛyɛ hewalɛ waa fe wɔ hewɔ lɛ, wɔyajeɔ shihilɛ ni tamɔ David nɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ mli, ni wɔnyɛŋ wɔye omanye akɛ ja wɔkɛ wɔhe efɔ̃ Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ kɛha hewalɛwoo.
Ehe aaaba sɛɛnamɔ akɛ ooobi ohe saji ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ, ‘Ani miheɔ miyeɔ akɛ mina anɔkwale lɛ, ni akɛ Yehowa ji anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ kome pɛ lɛ?
Ejɔɔ ewala nɔ eha Nyɔŋmɔ ni abaptisi lɛ.
Ekolɛ obaasusu akɛ: ‘Ani adesa ko baanyɛ aná ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Ofe lɛ teŋ wekukpaa ni bɛŋkɛ kpaakpa?
Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ miisumɔ ni ofee nakai dani ekpe sɛɛ. —Kpojiemɔ 18:4.
4 SANEBIMƆ: Mɛni ji Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ?
Kpɔ̃mɔ ni akpɔ̃ Israelbii lɛ kɛje Ejiptbii lɛ anɔyeli dɛŋdɛŋ lɛ shishi lɛ yɛ srɔto kwraa, ejaakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni kpɔ̃ amɛ.
Kɛ́ wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ Wɔbo Yehowa toi,
Nɛkɛ ji bɔ ni suɔmɔ lɛ yɔɔ, jeee akɛ wɔ wɔsumɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, shi moŋ akɛ lɛ esumɔ wɔ ni etsu e-Bi lɛ akɛ kpatamɔ afɔle yɛ wɔhe eshai lɛ ahewɔ.” —1 Yohane 4:9, 10.
Awie Noa gbii lɛ ahe yɛ gbɛ ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ nɔ akɛ: “Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ efite yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, ni awo shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ kɛ yiwalɛ.
Yesu diɛŋtsɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɔŋmɔ sumɔ je lɛ aahu akɛ eŋɔ e-Bi koome lɛ eha, bɔni afee ni akakpata mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baana emli hemɔkɛyeli lɛ hiɛ, shi moŋ ena naanɔ wala.”
NYƆŊMƆ WIEMƆ LƐ MLI JWETRII | YESAIA 29-33
Shi moŋ, ákɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kaiɔ lɛ ni ateeɔ lɛ shi.
(2 Petro 3:9) Mɛi ni feɔ efɔŋ waa diɛŋtsɛ po baanyɛ atsake amɛtsui, ni amɛbatsɔmɔ mɛi ni feɔ toiboo, koni amɛfee tsakemɔi ni sa koni amɛná Nyɔŋmɔ nɔkpɛlɛmɔ.—Yesaia 1:18-20; 55:6, 7; Ezekiel 33:14-16; Romabii 2:4-8.
3 Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishemɔ ji henumɔ ko ni esa akɛ Kristofoi aná yɛ amɛ-Bɔlɔ lɛ he.
Yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, “[amɛkɛ amɛhe] tsɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔlɔi . . . kɛtsɔ anunyam kɛ heguɔgbee mli, kɛtsɔ he wiemɔ fɔŋ kɛ he wiemɔ kpakpa mli; tamɔ shishiulɔi [taakɛ shitee-kɛ-wolɔi kɛɔ lɛ], kɛlɛ [yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ] anɔkwafoi ji wɔ.”—2 Korintobii 6:4, 8.
Wɔji jamɔ mli hiɛtsakemɔ fã ko bianɛ, shi yɛ afii ohai 21 lɛ mli lɛ sɔlemɔ lɛ baaya nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ ko bɛ mli yɛ jamɔ mli nifeemɔ lɛ shishinumɔ naa,” taakɛ Britania univɛsiti osɔfo nukpa ko tsɔɔ mli lɛ.
Mɛɛ kɔkɔbɔɔ po enɛ ji kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji ni yɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ beni amɛbɛŋkɛɔ gboshinii kpeteŋkpele ko lɛ he nɛkɛ!
Mra be mli Kristofoi lɛ ejeee ŋwane kwraa akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ejie esuɔmɔnaa nii, eyiŋtoo, kɛ eshishitoo mlai akpo yɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli.
Ejaakɛ Yehowa miihi mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ní feɔ nɛkɛ nii nɛɛ, ni nɛkɛ nihii nii nɛɛ nɔŋŋ hewɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, shwieɔ amɛ yɛ ohiɛ nɛɛ.”
Nyɛkpɛlɛ nɔ, jeee akɛ gbɔmɛi awiemɔ, shi moŋ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ.—1 Tes.
5 Bei pii lɛ, akɛ jata feɔ ekãa he mfoniri.
Yehowa shishitoo mlai lɛ tamɔ nakai afabaŋ lɛ, ni Abonsam tamɔ nakai jata lɛ.
(Abɛi 24:10) Kɛji akɛ Satan miifee enii tamɔ “jata ni hũuɔ” loo eejie ehe kpo tamɔ “la bɔfo” jio, mpoa ni etswa lɛ tsakeko: Ekɛɛ kɛ́ okɛ kaai kpe lɛ, obaakpa Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ.
“Bɔ ni kɛ́ jata, jatanuu kɛ ekuɛ he tsɔi ni he wa miihũu yɛ kooloo ni egbɔbiɔ he,
2 Maŋtsɛ he yɛ gbeyei tamɔ jata* ni miihũu;+
Ni tsinabi kɛ jata* kɛ kooloo ni eshwi fɛɛ baafee ekome kɛhi shi;*+
Jata yɛ henaabuamɔhe lɛ!”
10 Jata hũɔ, ni jatanuu* shiɔ esɛ̃ŋ,
Bɔfo Petro kɛɔ wɔ akɛ: “Nyɛ henyɛlɔ, Abonsam lɛ, nyiɛ tamɔ jata ni hũuɔ eetao mɔ ni eeemi.”—1 Petro 5:8.
Yɛ blema lɛ, no mli lɛ jatai foɔ shi yɛ Israel ni amɛmɔmɔɔ shĩa kooloi.
(1 Korintobii 15:58) Shi kɛlɛ, ŋaawoo nɛɛ he nitsumɔ biɔ ni wɔŋmɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ yɛ shishitoo mla ni yɔɔ Jajelɔ 9:4 lɛ naa, he ni aŋma yɛ akɛ: “Gbee ni hiɛ kã lɛ ehi fe jata ni egbo” lɛ.
13 Anihaolɔ kɛɔ akɛ: “Jata yɛ agbó lɛ naa!
17 Shi Nuŋtsɔ lɛ damɔ mimasɛi ni ewo mi hewalɛ, koni atsɔ minɔ atsu shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ kɛmɔ shi kwraa, ni jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ anu;+ ni ajie mi yɛ jata lɛ daaŋ.
(Hiob 38:31-33) Yehowa gbala Hiob jwɛŋmɔ kɛtee kooloi komɛi anɔ—jata kɛ kwaakwaalabite, tɛsaaiaŋ too kɛ ŋaŋ teji, wuo kɛ duguma, agbɛnɛ okpɔŋɔ kɛ okropɔŋ.
Taakɛ Biblia woloŋlelɔ Albert Barnes tsɔɔ lɛ, Hela wiemɔ ni atsɔɔ shishi yɛ biɛ akɛ “ekpata asafo lɛ hiɛ butuu” lɛ tsɔɔ hiɛkpatamɔi ni kooloi awuiyelɔi, tamɔ jatai kɛ klaji baanyɛ amɛkɛba mɔ nɔ lɛ.
+ 19 Afee atrakpoi ekpaa yɛ maŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ hiɛ, ni akɛ nɔ ko kokloo eha maŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ yiteŋ yɛ esɛɛgbɛ, ni niji yɛ maŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ biɛ kɛ biɛ, ni jata+ damɔ niji enyɔ lɛ eko fɛɛ eko he.
Ni aye samai koklobii yɛ jatai lɛ kɛ tsinahii lɛ aŋwɛigbɛ kɛ amɛshishigbɛ.
19 Gbɔmɔ hiɛ lɛ miikwɛ tɛŋ tso lɛ yɛ afã kome, ni jata* hiɛ lɛ miikwɛ tɛŋ tso lɛ yɛ afã kroko.
Amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ yɛ hiɛi ejwɛ—tsina, jata, okropɔŋ, kɛ gbɔmɔ hiɛ.
Hɛɛ, gbɔmɛi fɔji ha ashɛ́ Daniel awo jatai abu mli.
“Klaŋ kɛ gwantɛŋ bi aaahi shi, ni kootsɛ kɛ abotia bi aaabu shi; ni tsina bi kɛ jata bi kɛ kooloo ní ewo fɔ fɛɛ aaahi he kome, ni gbekɛ bibioo aaakpala amɛ.
6 Ekolɛ Abonsam baafee enii tamɔ onufu, jata ni miihũu, loo la bɔfo po.
(2 Kronika 29:11) Nakai pɛ wɔ Henyɛlɔ, “jata ni hũɔ” lɛ baasumɔ ni wɔfee.
12 Jata lɛ tserɛ kooloi ni fa bɔ ni sa amli ehã ebii lɛ
Ani Nyɔŋmɔ ni osɔmɔɔ lɛ lɛ enyɛ ehere oyiwala kɛjɛ jatai lɛ adɛŋ?’
Kɛkɛ ni Gracely Mahlatji fa kɛba wɔshikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli, ni yɛ naagbee lɛ ekɛ Priscilla bote gbalashihilɛ mli.
Beni wɔkpa asafoŋ kpee lɛ, mibɔ Grace.
Ebatsɔ Yudafoi lɛ akadimɔnɔ kɛha nibii ni yɔɔ nyam kɛ fɛo, ni eji gbɛi ni akɛfɔɔ yei woo.”
Awie Stefano, ni ji klɛŋklɛŋ Kristofonyo la odasefonyo lɛ hu he yɛ Catholic Douay Bible lɛ mli akɛ asumɔ esane waa, loo “duromɔ eyi lɛ obɔ”—ni akɛɛɛ akɛ atee lɛ shi yɛ gbɔmɔtso mli kɛtee ŋwɛi.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 6:8.
Ni mɛni hewɔ onáa abotiai ahurumɔ kɛ kɛtsɛjiemɔ loo gwantɛŋi ni miiye nii yɛ ŋa nɔ lɛ akwɛmɔ he miishɛɛ lɛ?
“Hemɔkɛyeli ji Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ lɛ mli hekɛnɔfɔɔ ni hiɛ kã, ní ayɔɔ nɔmimaa akɛ mɔ ni heɔ eyeɔ lɛ kɛ ewala baaŋmɛ shi shii akpei abɔ.”—MARTIN LUTHER, 1522.
(Filipibii 3:14) Mihiɛ sɔɔ suɔmɔ kwɛmɔ ni minyɛmi yoo Doris kɛ Grace kɛha Awo beni egbɔ lɛ, ni enɛ ye ebua mi kɛ Etty koni wɔtsa be-fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ lɛ nɔ.
“BƆ NI ehe yɔɔ ha lɛ yɛ fɛo ni esoro efɛo lɛ kwraa.”
Naagba ko kwraa bɛ shihilɛ mli ni Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ lɛ bɛ enaa tsabaa.
Kɛjɛ Golan Heights kɛ Upper Galilee kɛkpeleke shi kɛbatsɔ Yerusalem kɛ Betlehem ni bɛŋkɛ jɛmɛ (ni anaa yɛ wolo lɛ hiɛ) lɛ kɛho kɛtee wuoyigbɛ po yɛ Negeb lɛ, nɛkɛ snoo be nɛɛ gbaa lsraelbii adaa gbi shihilɛ naa waa be fɛɛ be.
(2 Petro 2:12) Wɔhiŋmɛii naa bɔ ni shikpɔŋ lɛ shikamɔ yɔɔ fɛo jogbaŋŋ ha.
Atsɔɔ gbekɛbii bɔ ni aŋaa saralɔi yɛ bulɛ gbɛ nɔ, kɛtsɔ shikotomɔ kɛ nine ni afɔ̃ɔ afɔ̃ɔ nine kroko lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.
Ale soŋaii kɛ ofroteyei akɛ amɛji kooloi komɛi ni he yɔɔ fɛo ní nyiɛmɔ hu yɔɔ akɔnɔ.
Eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ, Salomo miiwie kooloi nɛɛ ahe fɛo, nyam, kɛ sui krokomɛi ni ekaaa ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ ahe.
Ba ni obasɔle kɛjɔɔ nɔ.”
Afɔɔ tɛŋ tsei ni yɔɔ fɛo ni mamɔ shi trɔmɔɔ namɔ yɛ Bokagbɛbii akpoi anɔ yɛ Biblia beaŋ.
Ebaabi ni ofrote yoo lɛ anyɛ akpee shihilɛi ni mli wawai anaa, ni ehe afee fɛo hu.
8 Biblia he woloŋlelɔ ko wie akɛ “mɛi komɛi yɛ Sɔlemɔ lɛ mli ni tsake tsɔɔmɔ ni kɔɔ duromɔ” loo ‘duromɔ ni wɔsaaa’ lɛ he lɛ kwraa.
Nyɛmi yoo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Grace Estep lɛ wie akɛ: “Bei komɛi lɛ, shĩatsɛ lɛ baabi bo akɛ, ‘Ni mɛni aŋma yɛ nɔ?
Yɛ be mli ni shihilɛ lɛ yaa nɔ ehiɔ lɛ, mije gbɛgbamɔ sɔɔmɔ lɛ shishi yɛ August 1, 1954 gbi lɛ nɔ, yɛ shikpɔŋkuku ni bɛŋkɛ Nagoya oketeke shidaamɔhe lɛ, he ni eheɔ minitii fioo komɛi kɛ́ anyiɛ kɛjɛ he ni mikɛ Grace kpe yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ.
Mikɛ Grace kpe afi 1947, ni wɔbote gbalashihilɛ mli July 16, 1949.
Eba akɛ ebaajɔɔ mɛi fɛɛ ní kɛtsɔ wolo nɛɛ kanemɔ nɔ lɛ, amɛbaanu Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛjianɔtoo kɛ suɔmɔ falɛ, ŋaalee, kɛ nilee mlikwɔlɛ shishi, ni amɛbaada Nyɔŋmɔ diɛŋtsɛ ní kɛtsɔ enɔ lɛ anyɛ aŋma wolo nɛɛ shi.”
Hela nilelɔ ko tsɔɔ shishi akɛ ‘yaka nikeenii ni wɔsaaa, nɔ ko ni akɛha gbɔmɔ ni jɛɛɛ enyɛmɔ mli ni esaaa hu, nɔ ko ni jɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ mlihilɛ lɛ mli ni kulɛ, nine nyɛŋ ashɛ nɔ loo ana kɛtsɔ gbɔmɔ diɛŋtsɛ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ nɔ.’
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, blema saji yɛ ni kɔɔ gbɔmɔ shigbeemɔ kɛmiijɛ ŋwɛi duromɔ mli ni jɛ mɔdɛŋ ni ebɔ koni enine ashɛ shihilɛ ni gbele bɛ mli ni ejaaa lɛ nɔ, bɔ ni ehe hiaa ni asha afɔlei ni akɛkpata aha esha, wala tso loo obalaŋtaiaŋ nu hiŋmɛi taomɔ, nyɔŋmɔi kɛ nyɔŋmɔ-fa kɛ adesa-fa ni hi gbɔmɛi ateŋ ni amɛfɔfɔɔ bii ni dara fe adesai, kɛ nu afua ko he oshara ni ba ni shwɛ sharao kulɛ ekpata adesai fɛɛ hiɛ lɛ he.
Ŋmalɛi lɛ fiii jamɔ mli susumɔ ni mɛi pii ena akɛ baptisimɔ ji duromɔ-namɔ, ni ji, jamɔ mli kusum-nifeemɔ ni kɛ hegbɛ —anunyam, krɔŋŋ-feemɔ, aloo mumɔŋ sɛɛnamɔ —haa mɔ ni abaptisi lɛ lɛ sɛɛ.
Kwɛ bɔ ni mina miishɛɛ waa nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ akɛ mikase kɛjɛ Biblia lɛ mli akɛ hɛl ko ni miitso bɛ, ni mina Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi, Yehowa, yɛ mi diɛŋtsɛ mi Romania Biblia lɛ mli!
Oblayoo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Isabella lɛ wie akɛ: “Efeɔ mi akɛ, akɛ su nɛɛ fɔɔ mɔ, ejaakɛ nakai mipapa hu yɔɔ.
Nɔ ni mishweɔ waa ji akɛ, mahi shi ni mana akɛ ajie heguɔgbee ni akɛba Yehowa gbɛi nɔ lɛ kwraa.
Yoo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Eunice ni eye aaafee afii 55 lɛ wie yɛ Biblia lɛ he akɛ, “Eeye eebua mi ni miitsɔ gbɔmɔ kpakpa, ni ehã miitsake misui gbohii lɛ.”
Enɛ jeɔ kpo yɛ ewiemɔi lɛ amli: “Ha maye niyenii ni ato aha mi lɛ . . . koni mikaye ohia ni miyaju ni mifite mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛi.”—ABƐI 30:8, 9, NW.
Ekɛfata he akɛ: “Nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni nyɛaakpa he fai yɛ migbɛi anɔ lɛ, no mafee, koni [Tsɛ, NW] lɛ hiɛ aba nyam yɛ [Bi, NW] lɛ mli.
22 “No hewɔ lɛ, kɛɛmɔ Israel shĩa lɛ akɛ, ‘Nɔ ni Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: “Nyɛ Israel shĩa, jeee nyɛ nyɛhewɔ mitsuɔ nibii ahe nii lɛ, shi migbɛ́i krɔŋkrɔŋ ni nyɛbule yɛ jeŋmaji ni nyɛtee amɛmli lɛ amli lɛ hewɔ.”’
Yesu bɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Mɛi fɛɛ aaanyɛ̃ nyɛ yɛ migbɛi lɛ hewɔ; shi mɔ ni hiɛɔ mli kɛyawulaa shi lɛ, lɛ lɛ aaahere eyiwala.”
16 Elia hi shi yɛ egbɛi, ni eshishi ji “Mi-Nyɔŋmɔ Ji Yehowa” lɛ naa.
Kaatse ehiɛ atua, ejaakɛ ekɛ nyɛtɔmɔi* lɛ ekeŋ nyɛ,+ ejaakɛ migbɛ́i kã enɔ.
21 Nɔ ni Yehowa, taiatsɛ lɛ, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛɔ yɛ Ahab, Kolaia binuu lɛ, kɛ Zedekia, Maaseia binuu lɛ, mɛi ni gbaa amalei amɛtsɔɔ nyɛ yɛ migbɛ́i mli lɛ ahe nɛ,+ ‘Naa, mikɛ amɛ miiwo Babilon maŋtsɛ Nebukadnezar* dɛŋ, ni ebaatswa amɛ nɔ yɛ nyɛhiɛ.
Kɛ́ mina akɛ ejeee lala kpakpa, aloo mifɔlɔi gbala mijwɛŋmɔ kɛba nɔ lɛ, yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, ebiɔ ní manyɛ mijwɛŋmɔ nɔ koni eye mitsui nɔ ejaakɛ yɛ mitsui mli lɛ, miisumɔ nakai lala lɛ.”[
38 Ni kɛji oye kitãi fɛɛ ni mawo bo lɛ anɔ, ni onyiɛ migbɛi lɛ anɔ, ni ofee nɔ ni sa mihiɛ kɛtsɔ mimlai kɛ mikitãi lɛ anɔ ni obaaye lɛ nɔ tamɔ bɔ ni mitsulɔ David fee lɛ,+ mi hu mikɛ bo baahi shi.
Etsɛŋ ni abaawo enɔ kɛya Nyɔŋmɔ ninejurɔ nɔ ni abaaha lɛ “gbɛi ni ta gbɛi fɛɛ gbɛi nɔ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ amli.”—Filipibii 2:9, 10.
32 “Agbɛnɛ hu, kɛ́ gbɔ ko ni jɛɛɛ omaŋ Israel teŋ jɛ maŋsɛɛ shɔŋŋ eba yɛ ogbɛ́i kpele*+ lɛ kɛ onineshiwalɛ kɛ onine ni okpã mli lɛ hewɔ, ni eba ni ekɛ ehiɛ tsɔɔ nɛkɛ shĩa nɛɛ ni esɔle lɛ,+ 33 no lɛ, jɛɛ ŋwɛi, ni ji oshihilɛhe lɛ obo toi, ni ofee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni gbɔ lɛ baabi bo lɛ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ fɛɛ ale ogbɛ́i+ lɛ ni amɛshe bo gbeyei tamɔ bɔ ni omaŋ Israel feɔ lɛ, ni amɛná amɛle akɛ ogbɛ́i kã shĩa nɛɛ ni mima lɛ nɔ.
Taakɛ Biblia wiemɔ komekome shishitsɔɔmɔ wolo ko tsɔɔ lɛ, akɛ Hela wiemɔ kɛha “gbɛi” lɛ fɔɔ nitsumɔ yɛ Biblia lɛ mli “kɛha nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni gbɛi lɛ tsɔɔ, yɛ nɔyeli hegbɛ mli, yɛ subaŋ mli, yɛ gbɛhe mli, yɛ agbojee mli, yɛ hewalɛ mli, yɛ nɔ ni nɔ̃ bɛ mli, kɛ ekrokomɛi, yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni gbɛi lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ mli.”
(2 Mose 3:15; Yeremia 32:35) Yɛ saji tamɔ Mateo 6:9 kɛ Yohane 17:6, 26 lɛ amli lɛ, Albania shishitsɔɔmɔ ni aja waa lɛ tsɔɔ Hela wiemɔ kɛha “ogbɛi lɛ” (ni ji, Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi lɛ) shishi kɛkɛ akɛ “bo,” tamɔ nɔ ni nakai ŋmalɛi lɛ etsĩii gbɛi ko tã kwraa.
16 Beni Salomo jɔɔ nakai sɔlemɔtsu ni yɔɔ nyam lɛ nɔ lɛ, ekɛ nibimɔ ni jɛ mumɔŋ nɛɛ fata he akɛ: “Ni gbɔ tete ni jɛɛɛ omaŋ Israelbii lɛ ateŋ, shi moŋ ogbɛi kpeteŋkpele lɛ . . . hewɔ ejɛ maŋsɛɛ shɔŋŋ eba lɛ, kɛ eba ni ebasɔle yɛ nɛkɛ shia nɛɛ hiɛ lɛ: no lɛ bo lɛ toi yɛ ŋwɛi ni ji oshihilɛ he lɛ, ni ofee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni gbɔ lɛ boɔ tsɛɔo yɛ hewɔ lɛ, beni afee ni shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ majimaji fɛɛ ale ogbɛi lɛ, koni amɛsheo gbeyei tamɔ omaŋ Israel, ni amɛsaa amɛna amɛle akɛ ogbɛi aŋɔwo nɛkɛ shia ni mima nɛɛ.”
Yehowa ha e-Tsulɔ lɛ ‘gbɛhe ní nɔ kwɔ gojoo, ni eduro lɛ gbɛi ní tá gbɛi fɛɛ gbɛi nɔ, koni nakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ amli.’
Nɔ ko ni baaye abua bo ji, atsɛɔ mɛi enyɔ Simon, mɛi enyɔ Yakobo, kɛ mɛi enyɔ hu Yuda.
Ákɛ akɛ mɔ ko gbɛi aaawo gbekɛ ko ní awo lɛ gbɛi ni tsɔɔ shihilɛ mli ní afɔ lɛ yɛ lɛ ji kusumii ni ja, ni be ni mɔ kɛaawo bi gbɛi lɛ ji mɔ aŋkro yiŋkpɛɛ.
Atsi gbɔmɛi tamɔ Adam, Noa, Abraham, (ni atsi egbɛi ata aaafee shii nyɔŋmai kpawo yɛ sūrah sɔrɔtoi nyɔŋmai enyɔ kɛ enumɔ mli ni sūrah 14 yitso hiɛ egbɛi), Ishmael, Lot, Yosef (ni ajɔɔ sūrah 12 nɔ aha lɛ), Mose (ni egbɛi jeɔ kpo yɛ sūrah sɔrɔtoi nyɔŋmai etɛ kɛ ejwɛ mli), Saulo, David, Salomo, Elia, Hiob, kɛ Yona (ni sūrah 10 hiɛ egbɛi lɛ) tã babaoo yɛ mli.
*+ 7 Ni maŋtsɛ shĩa onukpa fe fɛɛ lɛ hã amɛ gbɛ́i;* ewo Daniel, Belteshazar,+ ni ewo Hanania, Shadrak, ni ewo Mishael, Meshak, ni ewo Azaria, Abednego.
Kitã ni ayemforo lɛ kãa ji: “Mi [ayemforo lɛ gbɛi] miiŋɔ bo [ayemforowu lɛ gbɛi] akɛ mikpeemɔ wu, ni masumɔ bo, ni mahiɛ bo dɔdɔɔdɔ, ni mikɛ bulɛ ni mli kwɔ baaha bo, taakɛ eji yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mla ni yɔɔ Ŋmalɛ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ mli kɛha ŋamɛi ni ji Kristofoi, bei abɔ ni wɔyi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ wɔkɛaahi shi yɛ hekome yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ taakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbalashihilɛ he gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ ji lɛ.”
Kitã ni ayemforowu lɛ kãa ji: “Mi [ayemforowu lɛ gbɛi] miiŋɔ bo [ayemforo lɛ gbɛi] akɛ mikpeemɔ ŋa, ni masumɔ bo, ni mahiɛ bo dɔdɔɔdɔ, taakɛ eji yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mla ni yɔɔ Ŋmalɛ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ mli kɛha wumɛi ni ji Kristofoi, bei abɔ ni wɔyi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ wɔkɛaahi shi yɛ he kome yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ taakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbalashihilɛ he gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ ji lɛ.”
“Nyɛsusumai alɛlɔ kɛ nɔkwɛlɔ,” wɔ Bɔlɔ kpeteŋkpele, Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ baaye abua bo ni onine ashɛ nakai oti lɛ nɔ. —1 Petro 2:25.
Etsiii wɔsɛɛ shihilɛ ko tã akɛ susuma ni gbooo yɛ ŋwɛi, hɛl, Limbo, hetsuumɔ he, aloo yɛ he kroko.
Nɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ, gbi ko beni Aileen kɛ mi eta shi ni wɔsusu minifeemɔi ahe waa sɛɛ lɛ, ewo ŋaa akɛ: “Ojogbaŋŋ, kɛ naagba nɛɛ jeee gbɔmɔtsoŋ nɔ lɛ, bɛlɛ eji jwɛŋmɔŋ nɔ.”
Hetoo: Yɛ Biblia mli lɛ, susuma (Hebri, neʹphesh; Hela, psy·kheʹ) lɛ ji gbɔmɔ loo kooloo aloo wala ni gbɔmɔ loo kooloo lɛ naa mli ŋɔɔmɔ.
Abaanyɛ akɛɛ nakai nɔŋŋ yɛ hemɔkɛyelii krokomɛi ahe tamɔ, balamɔ loo fɔmɔ ekoŋŋ kɛmiiya gbɔmɔtso kroko mli, susuma ni gbooo, kɛ yiwalaheremɔ he.
(Yesaia 35:3, 4; 1 Petro 5:1, 2) Shi kɛlɛ, kadimɔ ákɛ akɛ ŋaawoo ni Paulo kɛha akɛ ‘ashɛje mɛi ni tsui fãa lɛ amii’ koni ‘ahere mɛi ni feɔ gbedee lɛ’ haaa onukpai pɛ.
Ani bei komɛi lɛ, srɔtofeemɔ yɛ bɔ ni mɛi naa wɔ amɛhaa (ni ji “susuma” lɛ) kɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ wɔtsui mli (ni ji “mumɔ”) lɛ teŋ?
Ni akɛni wɔsumɔɔ nyɛ jogbaŋŋ nɛkɛ hewɔ lɛ, wɔyɛ he tsui akɛ jeee Nyɔŋmɔ sanekpakpa lɛ kɛkɛ wɔkɛaaha nyɛ, shi wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔwala tete, ejaakɛ wɔmiisumɔ nyɛ naakpa.
Eji anɔkwale akɛ, etɔ̃ akɛ “ebu ehe jalɔ fe Nyɔŋmɔ.”
Yesu ewieee kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ adesai yɛ susuma ni gbooo.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, mɔ ni ji nilelɔ lɛ kɛ lalatsɛ ni ŋma nɛkɛ lɛ kpaa gbee, akɛ: “Yehowa mla lɛ hi kɛwula shi, ehaa susuma tsui nyɔɔ emli; Yehowa odase lɛ ma shi shiŋŋ, ehaa kwashia leɔ nii. . . .
Gbɔmɔtso kɛ susuma mligbalamɔi enyɔ ko bɛ KM lɛ mli.
7 Yesu wo ŋaa yɛ Gɔŋ nɔ Shiɛmɔ lɛ mli akɛ: “Nyɛkafea yeyeeye yɛ nyɛwala hewɔ, nɔ ni nyɛaaye kɛ nɔ ni nyɛaanu, aloo nyɛgbɔmɔtso lɛ hewɔ, nɔ ni nyɛaawo.”
Majimaji ateŋ nitsulɔi ni amɛtu amɛhe amɛha kɛ maŋ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ mli nitsulɔi ‘jɛ amɛsusuma muu lɛ fɛɛ mli’ amɛtsu tsumaa lɛ he nii tamɔ ‘Yehowa amɛtsuɔ amɛhaa.’ —Kolosebii 3:23.
Bɔ ni Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ susuma lɛ shishi ehaa lɛ yɛ mlɛo, ekɛ ehe kpãa gbee, ni akɛ adesai ajeŋ nilee kɛ amale hemɔkɛyelii lɛ eko kwraa fatako he.
Enɛ nyɛŋ afee susumai ni bɛ gbɔmɔtsei—tamɔ nɔ ni Hela wɔŋjalɔi lɛ heɔ yeɔ lɛ.
(Lala 146:3, 4) Anɔkwale sane ji akɛ, Biblia mli woji 66 lɛ ateŋ eko kwraa kɛ wiemɔi ni ji “wala ni sɛɛ efooo” loo “naanɔ wala” lɛ etooo wiemɔ ni ji “susuma” lɛ he.
Mumɔi atsɛlɔi tsɔɔ mli akɛ, kɛ́ gbɔmɔ gbo lɛ, susuma lɛ, loo “mumɔ ni aha lɛ gbɔmɔtso” lɛ, shĩɔ gbɔmɔtso lɛ kɛyaa—tamɔ abɛi ni fãa kpo kɛjɛɔ egɔgɔmitsũ mli.
Bɔni afee ni Ji Hye asɔmɔ Yehowa kɛ ‘etsui fɛɛ kɛ esusuma fɛɛ kɛ ejwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ kɛ enyɛmɔ fɛɛ’ lɛ, etao nitsumɔ ni haŋ ekɛ bei pii atsu nii.
Ni Yesu gbala amɛjwɛŋmɔ kɛba lɛ diɛŋtsɛ enɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ nɔ akɛ: “Tamɔ bɔ ni gbɔmɔ bi lɛ baaa ni asɔmɔ lɛ, shi eba sɔɔmɔ moŋ, ni eŋɔ esusuma lɛ eha yɛ mɛi pii akpɔmɔ hewɔ lɛ.”—Mat.
Nyɛwoa mipa lɛ nyɛfɔa nyɛnɔ ni nyɛkasea mi; shi mihe jɔ, ni mibaa mihe shi kɛjɛ mitsui mli; ni nyɛaana hejɔɔmɔ nyɛaaha nyɛsusumai lɛ.
No hewɔ ni mikɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: ‘Nyɛteŋ mɔ ko mɔ ko akaye la ko.’”
Yehowa Sumɔɔ Osusuma Muu Fɛɛ Sɔɔmɔ Lɛ
(1 Mose 2:17; 3:4, 5, 19) Akɛ wala susumai ni efee esha lɛ, yɛ naagbee lɛ Adam kɛ Hawa baagboi ni amɛhiŋ shi dɔŋŋ.
Akɛ nɛkɛ drama ni taoɔ susuma mli nɛɛ to bɔ ni Yakob kɛ Esau fee amɛnii amɛha yɛ mumɔŋ nibii ahe lɛ he.
Minyɛmi nuu George kɛ wɔshia kar lɛ
Nɔ ni fata enɛ he ji shia ni aaahi mli, niyenii, hehaa nii, hiɛtserɛjiemɔ—kɛfata nibii krokomɛi babaoo he, kɛ́ gbekɛbii yɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, wiemɔ ni Paulo kɛtsu nii yɛ wolo ní eŋma kɛmaje Hebribii lɛ mli lɛ baanyɛ akɔne mɛi ayiŋ ŋmɛnɛ hu, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Shĩa fɛɛ shĩa lɛ, mɔ ko kɛ̃ ma, shi mɔ ni saa nii fiaa to ji Nyɔŋmɔ.”
Ekolɛ okpa shi ni okwɛ shiai ni yɔɔ akutsei sɔrɔtoi lɛ amli lɛ.
Ni enyiɛ gbɛ ni yaa yoo lɛ shĩa lɛ nɔ
2 Solomon tsu ni ayatsɛ Israel fɛɛ kɛba, asraafoi akpei anɔkwɛlɔi lɛ kɛ asraafoi ohai anɔkwɛlɔi lɛ, kɛ kojolɔi lɛ, kɛ Israel onukpai lɛ fɛɛ, ni ji tsɛmɛi ashĩai onukpai lɛ.
Nyɛnyiɛa esɛɛ,+ 14 ni he fɛɛ he ni ebaayabote lɛ, nyɛkɛa shĩatsɛ lɛ akɛ, ‘Tsɔɔlɔ lɛ kɛɛ: “Nɛgbɛ gbɔiatsũ lɛ ni mi kɛ mikaselɔi lɛ baaye Hehoo lɛ yɛ mli lɛ yɔɔ?”’
Mɛni “Yehowa we lɛ gɔŋ lɛ” damɔ shi kɛha?
Osɔfo lɛ tsɔ ehiɛ eha mitsɛ ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Owula Economos, shwiemɔ Katina kɛjɛ oweku lɛ mli oya; ehe yɛ oshara kɛha oshiabii lɛ.”
Biblia mli abɛ ko kɛɔ akɛ: “Shia kɛ nii lɛ, tsɛmɛi agboshinii ni; shi ŋa hiɛtɛlɔ lɛ, Yehowa ŋɔɔ jɛɔ.”—Abɛi 19:14; 5 Mose 21:14.
*+ 2 Kɛjɛ nakai gbi lɛ nɔ kɛyaa lɛ, Saul hã David kɛ lɛ hi shi, ni eŋmɛɛɛ lɛ gbɛ ni eya etsɛ shĩa lɛ dɔŋŋ.
Ekane kpaŋmɔ+ wolo+ ni ana yɛ Yehowa shĩa lɛ mli wiemɔi lɛ fɛɛ yɛ amɛtoiiaŋ.
No sɛɛ lɛ, etee eshĩa* lɛ ni ebi ni abahã lɛ niyenii, ni eye.
Shi [mɛi ni baahi shi yɛ jeŋ hee ni Nyɔŋmɔ ewo shi yɛ he lɛ mli lɛ aaamamɔ] tsũi, ni amɛaahi mli, ni amɛaafee weintromi, ni amɛaaye mli yibii!
Ni maŋtsɛ we lɛ kɛ maŋbii lɛ awei lɛ, Kaldeabii lɛ kɛ la shã, ni amɛkumɔ Yerusalem gbogboi lɛ.
26 Biblia Kaselɔi lɛ ma gbɛ ni mra be mli Kristofoi lɛ tsɔɔ nɔ amɛshiɛɔ—kɛjɛɔ shia kɛyaa shia, lɛ nɔ mi babaoo yɛ 1920 kɛ 1930 afii lɛ amli.
6 Yɛ afi ni ji 480 lɛ nɔ kɛjɛ be ni Israelbii lɛ shi Ejipt shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ,+ ni ji afi ni ji ejwɛ lɛ nɔ kɛjɛ be ni Solomon batsɔ Israel nɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ mli, yɛ Ziv*+ nyɔɔŋ (ni ji nyɔɔŋ ni ji enyɔ) lɛ nɔ lɛ, Solomon bɔi Yehowa shĩa lɛ* maa.
(b) wɔnyiɛ kɛjɛ shĩa kome mli kɛmiiya ekroko mli yɛ shikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli?
Shi enɛ gbɔjɔɔ mɛi babaoo ahemɔkɛyeli, ni eka shi faŋŋ akɛ ehaaa Kristendom kui srɔtoi ni mli egbala lɛ afee ekome.
Hebri sht. ŋm., “shĩa lɛ Asa.”
Odaseyeli yɛ Shĩa kɛ Shĩa
Gbɛi ni akɛtsu nii ni akɛlɛɛ Maŋtsɛyeli jajemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ ateŋ ekome ji shia-kɛ-shia shiɛmɔ, kɛ redio nitsumɔ hei akui kɛ nitsumɔ, gramafon plɛte nɔ odaseyeli, kɛ gbɛjianɔtoo ni ji Biblia mli nikasemɔ feemɔ yɛ gbɔmɛi ashiai amli.
Kɛkɛ ni wɔhɔɔ wɔshia fɛfɛo lɛ ni wɔyahe bibioo ko yɛ Denver, yɛ Colorado.
Beni Casimir kɛ bulɛ kpoo akɛ eyeee loo lɛ, awo ehe gbeyei, ni akɛɛ lɛ akɛ eshi shia lɛ.
4 Amɛŋɔ jwiɛtɛi kapɛji 70 kɛjɛ Baal-berit shĩa*+ lɛ amɛhã lɛ, ni Abimelek kɛ shika lɛ yabɔ hii komɛi ni ebuuu nɔ ko ni tsuuu nɔ ko nɔ ko apaa koni amɛnyiɛ esɛɛ.
Mɛni jɛ ta ni bakã Maŋtsɛ Aurelian, kooyigbɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ, kɛ Maŋnyɛ Zenobia, wuoyigbɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ teŋ lɛ mli ba?
24 Amrɔ nɛɛ ni Ester kɛ Mordekai eye amɛ he nɛɛ, aso maŋnyɛ lɛ baakpa ehe naa gbamɔ?
‘Krɔŋkrɔŋbii lɛ alá etɔ’ Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ “dãa,” ni efeɔ enii tamɔ maŋnyɛ, shi bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, abaakpata ehiɛ.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ ji yoo ni yɔɔ nii babaoo kɛ mlihilɔ hu.
16 Yɛ Salomo Lalai Amli Lala wolo lɛ mli lɛ, maŋtsɛ lɛ jie oblayoo fro ko yi akɛ ehe yɛ fɛo kwraa fe maŋnyɛmɛi 60 kɛ hemɛi 80.
Beni ejajeɔ etsɔɔ akɛ lɛ ji Mizraim maŋnyɛ lɛ, efee shikai ni ashwie yɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ egbɛi amli.
Athens osɔfonukpa kɛ Osɔfoi a-Gwabɔɔ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ hiɛnyiɛlɔ, Prokopios, lɛ kɛ amɛnaabu kɛkɛ wo maŋnyɛ lɛ hewalɛ yɛ enɛ feemɔ mli.
Ojogbaŋŋ, Maŋnyɛ Izebel yiwalɔ lɛ ekã kita akɛ ebaaha agbe Elia.
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Maŋtsɛ Salomo ha Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ nii ni etaoɔ ni ebi lɛ fɛɛ, dani soro nii ni ebaha maŋtsɛ lɛ.”
12 Haman saa ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, Maŋnyɛ Ester efɔ̃ɔɔ mɔ ko mɔ ko nine ni efata maŋtsɛ lɛ he kɛba okpɔlɔ ni eŋmɛ lɛ he,+ ja mi pɛ.
Ni mɛni ji nɔ ni ye ebua Odasefoi nɛɛ ni ha amɛtee nɔ amɛye anɔkwa yɛ afii abɔ yiwaa ni naa wa lɛ shishi, ní yɛ naagbee lɛ, amɛmaŋbii lɛ kɛ maŋnyɛ lɛ kɛ bulɛ ha amɛ, ni amɛhiɛ sɔ amɛ?
Mɛi ni kɛ amɛhe woɔ nifeemɔ nɛɛ mli ji Siria Maŋtsɛ Seleucus I Nicator, Mizraim Maŋtsɛ Ptolemy Lagus, Siria Maŋtsɛ biyoo ni batsɔ Mizraim Maŋnyɛ Cleopatra I, Roma Maŋtsɛmɛi Augustus kɛ Tiberius, kɛ Palmyra Maŋnyɛ Zenobia.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Yehowa baanyɛ aha lɛ hewalɛ ni ekɛkpee Manyɛ Izebel mlifu lɛ naa.—1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 17:17-24; 18:21-40; 2 Korintobii 4:7.
18 Ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ, Persia kɛ Media lumɔ yei ni le nɔ ni maŋnyɛ lɛ fee lɛ baakɛɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ lumɛi lɛ fɛɛ, ni enɛ kɛ heguɔgbee kɛ mlifu babaoo baaba.
Mɛi ni buɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ he lɛ tsirɛ Maŋnyɛ Atalia ni ji yiwalɔ lɛ yisɛɛ kɛjɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ ni amɛyagbe lɛ, ni enɛ ha maŋbii lɛ ye amɛhe ni amɛná miishɛɛ.
Abayɔse wɔŋjamɔ nifeemɔi ni Ahab kɛ eŋa Maŋnyɛ Izebel wo he hewalɛ yɛ Israel akutsei nyɔŋma maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli akɛ eji apasa jamɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ, maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛ maŋnyɛ akekere* lɛ fi Ester yitso, ni ewó lɛ maŋnyɛ+ yɛ Vashti najiaŋ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Elia fee ekãa ni egbe Baal gbalɔi 450 moŋ, shi be ni ená ele akɛ Maŋnyɛ Yezebel miitao agbe lɛ lɛ, ejo foi.
Akɛni maŋnyɛ lɛ naa kpɛ ehe yɛ nɔ ni enu kɛ nɔ ni ena lɛ hewɔ lɛ, ekɛ heshibaa ha hetoo akɛ: “Ajɔɔ otsuji lɛ ni damɔɔ ohiɛ daa nɛɛ ni amɛboɔ onilee lɛ toi lɛ!”
49 Agbala Maŋnyɛ Yitsoŋwalɔ Ko Toi
Beni Elia jo foi kɛtee Horeb Gɔŋ lɛ nɔ yɛ Maŋnyɛ Izebel yiwaa lɛ hewɔ lɛ, enu he akɛ enitsumɔ akɛ gbalɔ lɛ eba naagbee.
Beni Nɔyelɔ Aurelian ní eyaye Zenobia, Palmyra maŋnyɛ lɛ nɔ kunim lɛ ku esɛɛ kɛtee Roma lɛ, ema sɔlemɔwe eha hulu lɛ.

‘Anunyam Gbɛi Kɛha Ehe’
Agbɛnɛ, hulu shinyɔɔ fɛfɛo ni haa wɔshihilɛ mli miishɛɛ faa daa lɛ hu?
Ejaakɛ bo ji amɛhewalɛ lɛ nyam, ni oduromɔ lɛ okɛwóɔ wɔklonto lɛ nɔ.” —Lala 89: 16- 18.
(2 Mose 15:11; 1 Korintobii 8:5, 6; Kpojiemɔ 11:17, 18) Akɛni eha eshiwoi eba mli hewɔ lɛ, ehaa wɔkaiɔ nɔ ni egbɛi fɛfɛo, Yehowa lɛ damɔ shi kɛha.
Yɛ “jeŋ” fɛfɛo “ni baaba” lɛ mli lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ webii baahi mumɔŋ paradeiso ni amɛnáa mli ŋɔɔmɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ mli yɛ shihilɛ ni hi jogbaŋŋ fe nɔ ni amɛyɔɔ mli bianɛ lɛ mli.

Sanherib shwã yɛ eyinɔsane woji lɛ amli akɛ ekɛ Hezekia to “tamɔ loofɔlɔ yɛ loofɔlɔ tsũ ko mli,” shi Ashur woji lɛ etsĩii hiɛkpatamɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ bɔfo kɛba Sanherib asraafoi lɛ anɔ lɛ tã.—2 Maŋ 18:17-36; 19:35-37.
+ 24 Kɛ́ Ahab mɔ ko gbo yɛ maŋ lɛ mli lɛ, gbei baaye lɛ; ni kɛ́ emɔ ko gbo yɛ ŋa nɔ lɛ, ŋwɛi loofɔji baaye lɛ.
Esa akɛ looflɔ lɛ kɛ efiji enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ atsu nii dani ebaanyɛ efiliki jogbaŋŋ.
Egbala amɛjwɛŋmɔ kɛtee loofɔji anɔ—Nyɔŋmɔ lɛɔ amɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ ehe feɔ oyá kɛboteɔ gbele hewalɛ lɛ mli tamɔ loofɔlɔ ni eyabote tsɔne mli!
‘Agbɛnɛ bi ŋwɛi loofɔji, ni amɛaagbao.
Loofɔji komɛi ni faa gbɛ daa afi kɛtsɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ kɛ ŋshɔ hiɛ shitoi loo kilomitai akpei abɔ, bɔ ni kwɛ̃ɛnii kɛ hulu mli la kpɛmɔ tsuɔ nii kɛfeɔ amɛ niyenii, bɔ ni wɔlɔ ni bi eba mli daa kɛtsɔɔ gbɔmɔtso kɛ ehenii sɔrɔtoi ni hiɛ wala yibii sɔrɔtoi akpekpei abɔ ni eko fɛɛ eko yɔɔ nɔ pɔtɛɛ ni etsuɔ—kɛ wɔkɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nii fioo nɛɛ aaaha lɛ—enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ ji ŋaa nitsumɔ ni nilee yɔɔ mli lɛ he odaseyeli ni nɔ bɛ.

Kristofoi Asuɔmɔ—Nikeenii ni Esa akɛ Ejara Awa Kɛha Wɔ
YƐ BE ni tsɔ Kristofoi abe lɛ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ, odasefoi babaoo kɛ ekaa ye odase akɛ Yehowa ji anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ kome lɛ.
Ani nakai nifeemɔi lɛ yɛ kɛha Kristofoi?
Etamɔ nɔ ni nilee yɛ ewiemɔ lɛ mli, no hewɔ lɛ wɔkpɛlɛ nine ni efɔ wɔ koni wɔba Kristofoi akpee lɛ nɔ.
Mɛni ha shwɛ fioo ni ekomefeemɔ ni yɔɔ Kristofoi ni hi Efeso lɛ ateŋ lɛ afite lɛ?
14 Oti titri ni ma Kristofonyo tsɔɔlɔ fɛɛ tsɔɔlɔ hiɛ ji ni eye ebua nikaselɔ lɛ ni ekɛ Yehowa abɔ naanyo.
Lɛɛlɛŋ, Yehowa baajɔɔ Kristofoi fɛɛ ni sumɔɔ akɛ amɛhiɛ amɛ emuuyeli mli daa ni amɛkpooɔ efɔŋfeemɔ lɛ, ni ebaawaje amɛ. —Lala 1: 1-3.
Ani Yakobo miikɛɛ Kristofoi hii ni he esa lɛ akɛ amɛkakpɛlɛ nitsɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kojomɔ ni tsii he gbeyeishemɔ hewɔ?
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ amɛtsɔɔ mli akɛ nɔ ni fata Kristofoi abaptisimɔ he ji numiimɔ kɛ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ni afɔseɔ ashwieɔ mɔ nɔ ni nine shɛɔ nɔ.
Nɔ titri ni kanyaa anɔkwa Kristofoi ŋmɛnɛ ji shwelɛ akɛ amɛsa Yehowa hiɛ—jeee ni amɛtsɔmɔ niiatsɛmɛi.
Beni ato Kristofoi asafo lɛ shishi lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ fee lɛ faŋŋ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ miihi yei pii kɛshihilɛ.—1 Timoteo 3:2.
Adafitswaa woji kɛ emli saji ni wie sane nɛɛ he ekpakpa lɛ ha maŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ ni no mli lɛ gbɔmɛi ni yɔɔ mli lɛ ayifalɛ miihe ashɛ gbɔmɛi ayifalɛ ni yɔɔ jeŋ muu fɛɛ lɛ mlijaa enumɔ mli ekome lɛ le akɛ Kristofoi ni jaa anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ ni ji Yehowa yɛ nakai shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ ni akɛ mɛnɛɛmɛi damɔɔ shi yɛ anɔkwayeli mli amɛhaa Biblia mli shishitoo mlai.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, aŋmala ŋaawoi ni yɔɔ Kristofoi a-Hela Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ titri koni ekudɔ mɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ ni ewaje amɛ koni amɛhiɛ emuuyeli mli daa ni amɛhi shi akɛ mɛi ni sa amɛŋwɛi tsɛmɔ lɛ.

Mɛɛ tsui ni nyɔɔ mɔ mli ekɛbahaa Kristofonyo ni ejɔɔ ehe nɔ lɛ nɛkɛ, beni ekɛ henaabuamɔ nitsumɔ ni Yehowa woɔ lɛ foi lɛ kpaa gbee lɛ!—Yes.

Nyɛkakasea kɛkɛ, bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni onine ashɛ tsuii lɛ anɔ.—7/15, baafa 18.
7 Kadimɔ nitsumɔ ni Biblia lɛ wieɔ he shii abɔ kɛkɔɔ tsui kpakpa ni hi lɛ he lɛ.
Nikanemɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ gbeleɔ wɔjwɛŋmɔi kɛ wɔtsuii amli kɛhaa Yehowa susumɔi kɛ yiŋtoi, ni enɛɛmɛi ashishi ni wɔnuɔ jogbaŋŋ lɛ haa shishinumɔ baa wɔshihilɛi amli.
Bɔfo Paulo tsɔɔ akɛ ehe miihia ni wɔsɔle beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛkahaoa yɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko he, shi moŋ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ mli lɛ nyɛkɛ sɔlemɔ kɛ faikpamɔ kɛ shidaa atsĩa nyɛtutɔmɔi lɛ atã yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ; ni Nyɔŋmɔ hejɔlɛ ni fe jwɛŋmɔi fɛɛ lɛ aaato nyɛtsuii kɛ nyɛjwɛŋmɔi lɛ yɛ Kristo Yesu mli!”
+ Ejaakɛ amɛkɛ amɛnaabu woɔ oyiteŋ mulu,* shi amɛtsui tiuɔ sɛɛnamɔ gbonyo sɛɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Yehowa le nɔ ni yɔɔ wɔtsuii amli moŋ, shi ewoɔ wɔ hewalɛ ni wɔkɛ lɛ agba sane.
+ 20 Ejaakɛ be ni ewala gbii lɛ hoɔ yaa lɛ, ejwɛŋmɔ eyaaa nɔ,* ejaakɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hãa emii ni eshɛ ehe yɛ etsui mli lɛ heɔ ejwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ.
Suɔmɔ Kɛha Yehowa ni Wɔɔdu Wɔwo Wɔbii lɛ Atsui Mli
(Abɛi 20:5) Kɛ́ ootao ní oshɛ etsui he lɛ, no lɛ mlihilɛ, sane shishinumɔ, kɛ suɔmɔ ní ooojie lɛ kpo lɛ he miihia.
(Luka 21:19) Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, nɔ ni wɔhalaa yɛ enɛ gbɛfaŋ lɛ jieɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ wɔtsui mli lɛ kpo.
“Mitsui mli efili lɛ yɛ Yehowa hewɔ;+
Nyɛ kroko hu tsɔɔ bɔ ni enu he eha beni akɛɛ lɛ akɛ ebinuu ni eye afii ekpaa lɛ egbo trukaa yɛ tsui hela ko ni ená beni ahiɛ lɛ hɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ.
10 Yɛ be mli ni ewieɔ “nakai yoo Isabel” lɛ he lɛ, Yesu tee nɔ akɛ: “Ni ebii lɛ, gbe magbe amɛ; ni asafoi lɛ fɛɛ aaana ale akɛ mi ji mɔ ni taoɔ sabai kɛ tsuii amli, ni maha nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ bɔ ni nyɛnitsumɔi lɛ yɔɔ lɛ.”
Mɛni baanyɛ aye abua wɔ ni wɔbu wɔ mfonirifeemɔ tsui lɛ he ni ekagbɔjɔ?
Beni ebɛŋkɛɔ amɛ lɛ, kɛkɛ ni etsui bɔi tswaa kɛ kpokpomɔ.
Agbɛnɛ hu, te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔná ‘tsui ni wɔkɛaale’ Yehowa lɛ?—Yer.
Ani mile akɛ kɛ́ mikɛɛ misumɔɔɔ helatsamɔ nifeemɔi ni akɛ mi diɛŋtsɛ milá baatsu nii yɛ mli lɛ ateŋ eko-eko lɛ, belɛ miitsɔɔ akɛ miihi tsɔne ni akɛjieɔ muji yɛ sabai lɛ mli loo tsɔne ni akɛyeɔ tsui lɛ najiaŋ kɛ́ aafee tsui lɛ opireshɛn lɛ?
Shi bɔni afee ni oná skul lɛ he sɛɛ jogbaŋŋ lɛ, esa akɛ oha aŋma ogbɛi yɛ mli, ní oya eko, ní okɛ ohe awo mli daa, ní okɛ ohe fɛɛ awo nifeemɔi ni akɛhaa bo lɛ mli.
Etsɔɔ mli akɛ mla lɛ mli kita wulu ji ni wɔkɛ wɔtsui, wɔsusuma, wɔjwɛŋmɔ, kɛ wɔnyɛmɔ fɛɛ asumɔ Yehowa.
Yehowa kɛɛ akɛ: “Ha nɛkɛ maŋ nɛɛ tsui akpilim, ní oha amɛtoii awa.”
Nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, amɛbaaha Yehowa tsui anya ejaakɛ eboɔ wɔsanegbaai lɛ atoi, ni enáa miishɛɛ kɛji wɔkɛ wɔlilɛi lɛ tsu nii yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ.
(Kpojiemɔ 21:4) Nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni wɔbaakai yɛ nakai beaŋ lɛ haŋ wɔnu dɔlɛ, loo piŋmɔ, ní ekolɛ ejwere wɔtsuii anɔ amrɔ nɛɛ tamɔ jatsu lɛ he.—Yesaia 65:17, 18.
Kaimɔ akɛ: “Yehowa bɛŋkɛɔ mɛi ni tsuii ekumɔ lɛ, ni ehereɔ mɛi ni mumɔ tswiaa shi kɛ dɔlɛ lɛ.”—Lala 34:19.
(Yakobo 1:14) Kɛji akɛ alaka wɔtsui lɛ, yɛ gbɛ ko nɔ lɛ, elakaa wɔ kɛ eshafeemɔ akɔnɔ, ni ehaa efeɔ tamɔ nɔ ko ni anáa he miishɛɛ ni yeee mɔ awui.
Okɛ Obii lɛ Awie Bɔlɛnamɔ He
Hɛɛ, wɔnáa nyɛ̃ɛ diɛŋtsɛ, wɔhiɔ nɔ fɔŋ feemɔi ni tamɔ bɔlɛnamɔ ni tsɔɔ gbalashihilɛ hiɛ, gbalafitemɔ, kɛ hii kɛ hii ayakayakanifeemɔi.
Bɔlɛnamɔ kɛ Gbalashihilɛ Hesusumɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ Gbeyeishemɔ Yɔɔ Mli
(2 Mose 20:14) Bɔlɛnamɔ mli ni akɛ he woɔ dani aboteɔ gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ hu ji tɔmɔ.—1 Korintobii 6:18.
Nɔ ni ejɛ akaŋ ni yei kɛ hii shĩɔ lɛ mli kɛba ji béi kɛ naagbai.
9. (a) Mɛɛ jwɛŋmɔ mɛi pii hiɛ yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he?
(1 Korintobii 7:4) Mɛi ni susuɔ gbalashihilɛ mlibotemɔ he lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi baanyɛ anu he akɛ enɛ he ehiaaa tsɔ, ejaakɛ bɔlɛnamɔ efeŋ nɔ ni he hiaa yɛ amɛ gbalashihilɛ mli.
(1 Korintobii 6:9, 10) Ani ole jamɔi ni kpɛlɛɔ bɔlɛnamɔ mli jeŋba shaji anɔ?
Shi miishɛɛ sane ji akɛ, oblahii kɛ oblayei babaoo kɛ Danielle ni eye afii 14 lɛ baakpã gbee akɛ, “Wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔfɔlɔi atsɔɔ wɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he saji—shi jeee tsɔɔlɔi krokomɛi loo TV nɔ nifeemɔi.”
Mɛi ni kwɛɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he mfonirii lɛ tsɔmɔɔ mɛi ni kɛ amɛfɔmɔ nii shwɛɔ kɛyashiɔ amɛhe baa, kɛ mɛi ni ŋmɛɔ amɛhe amɛhaa “hiɛgbejianii [loo bɔlɛnamɔ he akɔnɔi] ahe hiɛdɔɔi,” ni ebaanyɛ eha amɛnya bɔlɛnamɔ he fe nine, amɛná akɔnɔi ni bɛ hiŋmɛi nɔ, ebaanyɛ ekɛ gbalashihilɛ mli naagbai ni yɔɔ hiɛdɔɔ kɛ gbalamlitsemɔ po aba.
Satan kɛ bɔlɛnamɔ tsuɔ nii yɛ hiɛtɛɛ mli ni ekɛtsuɔ eyiŋtoo he nii yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Adafitswaa saji ni yɔɔ tɛlivishiŋ kɛ woji tɛtrɛbii amli lɛ po haa mɛi susuɔ yiwalɛ nifeemɔi ahe ni ewoɔ mɛi hewalɛ koni amɛná bɔlɛnamɔ he miishɛɛ babaoo.
Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ ni ji Biblia lɛ wieɔ bɔlɛnamɔ, kɛ fɔmɔ nii ahe yɛ faŋŋ mli.
(1 Tesalonikabii 4:4, 5) Ebaafee nɔ ni nilee yɔɔ mli akɛ obaakpoo sinii, woji, kɛ lalai ni woɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he hewalɛ.
Haffner kɛɛ akɛ, nɔ ni fɔlɔi lɛ taoɔ akɛɛ gbekɛbii lɛ nɔŋŋ ji akɛ: “Wɔmiitao ni nyɛle nyɛgbɔmɔtso lɛ kɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he nii; wɔsumɔɔɔ ni wɔkɛ nyɛ wieɔ he.”
Mami ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Sheila lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ amɛbɔi skulyaa nɔŋŋ lɛ, amɛbaanu bɔlɛnamɔ he saji, ni atsɔɔŋ amɛ nɔ ni obaasumɔ ni amɛle.”
Niiamlitaomɔ woji srɔtoi babaoo tsɔɔ akɛ krɔɔs lɛ kɛ adebɔɔ nibii ni ajáa amɛ lɛ kɛ wɔŋjamɔ kusumii ni anáa bɔlɛ yɛ mli lɛ yɛ tsakpaa.
18 Kɛ́ wɔkɛ anɔkwayeli pɛi wɔmli wɔkwɛ lɛ, ekolɛ wɔteŋ mɛi babaoo baakpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ kɛ́ wɔnu he akɛ nuu loo yoo ko miisumɔ wɔ lɛ, wɔnáa miishɛɛ waa.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, mɛi babaoo susuɔ akɛ ejeee tɔmɔ akɛ hii kɛ hii loo yei kɛ yei kɛ amɛhe baawɔ, ni akɛ ehe ehiaaa ni mɔ ko kɛ mɔ ko abote gbalashihilɛ mli dani ekɛ lɛ aná bɔlɛ.
Mɛni ji jeŋba ni sa yɛ yoo loo nuu he?’
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ekolɛ oheɔ oyeɔ waa akɛ ajwamaŋbɔɔ—mɛi ni boteko gbalashihilɛ mli ni kɛ amɛhe náa bɔlɛ lɛ—ejaaa.
Kusum nɛɛ yɛ srɔto yɛ shihilɛ ni haa akɛ tsofa woɔ nɔ ko mli ahaa yoo ko beni ehiɛ bɛ ehe nɔ, ni no sɛɛ lɛ anyɛɔ enɔ koni akɛ lɛ aná bɔlɛ be mli ni ekpɛlɛko nɔ lɛ he.
Ekolɛ amɛkɛ heguɔgbee wiemɔi yeɔ mɛi ni jɛ maŋ kroko nɔ lɛ ahe fɛo, amɛwieɔ mɛi ni esoro amɛbɔɔ su lɛ ahe yɛ gbɛ ni esaaa nɔ, loo amɛbuuu mɛi ni bɛ nɔ ko yɛ shihilɛ mli lɛ.
Etsiɔ ehe kɛjɛɔ nifeemɔi gbohii tamɔ bɔlɛnamɔ mli jeŋba shara, tsofai ni akɛtsuɔ nii yɛ gbɛ ni ejaaa nɔ, kɛ dãatɔɔ he—ni enɛ haaa egbo kpatu gbele.
Nɔ ni sa kadimɔ waa ji akɛ, jeŋmaji ní ebɔle Israel he lɛ kɛ bɔlɛnamɔ kɛ bii afɔmɔ he kusumii futuɔ jamɔ.
* Beni wɔná Intanɛt lɛ sɛɛ nɔŋŋ kɛkɛ ni esubaŋ tsake, ni mibɔi susumɔ akɛ be nɛ ekwɛɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he mfoniri yɛ kumpiuta lɛ nɔ.
Tsɔ mobail foŋ loo kɔmpiuta nɔ oha lɛ hetoo amrɔ nɔŋŋ.
Nikaselɔi lɛ kɛ kɔmpiuta tsuɔ nii, ni amɛjɔɔ amɛhe yɛ wɔɔhei ni mli tse ni yɔɔ fɛo mli.
Ani okɛ mobail foŋ, kɔmpiuta, loo Intanɛt tsuɔ nii?
Eyɛ mli akɛ ekolɛ, amɛleŋ kɔmpiutai ahe nibii pii aloo nii ni atsɔɔ yɛ skul lɛ ateŋ ekomɛi ahe nii babaoo moŋ, shi amɛle nibii pii ni kɔɔ shihilɛ kɛ bɔ ni afeɔ akpeeɔ shihilɛ mli naagbai anaa.
Taakɛ univɛsiti nikasemɔ ko tsɔɔ lɛ, bɔlɛnamɔ he yakayakanii ni ajieɔ yɛ kɔmpiuta nɔ bianɛ lɛ ji “hiɛtserɛjiemɔ nii ni mɛi biɔ ni amɛkwɛ ni fa lɛ ateŋ ekome (kɛ́ ejeee nɔ ni fa fe fɛɛ po).”
Kɛ́ wɔyɛ mɛi ateŋ ni amɛfɔɔ wɔ namɔ akɛ wɔhiɛ kɔmpiutai bibii yɛ wɔdɛŋ ni wɔmiinyɛmɔnyɛmɔɔ nɔ lɛ, amɛbaanyɛ amɛmu sane naa akɛ wɔtaooo ni wɔkɛ amɛ agba sane.
Dani kɔmpiuta be lɛ aaaba lɛ, no mli lɛ nyɛmɔ ni gbɔmɔ yɔɔ ni ekɛaapɛi Biblia ŋmalɛ lɛ mli yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ faaa.
Jairo kɛ ekɔmpiuta ni wieɔ ni ekɛ ehiŋmɛi kudɔɔ lɛ hãa saji ahetoo yɛ Kristofoi akpee shishi, ni ekɛtsuɔ nii hu kɛgbaa mɛi krokomɛi ehemɔkɛyeli lɛ he sane
Atsɔɔ tɛlivishin kɛ redio, woji amli loo kompiutai anɔ akɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni yaa nɔ ni aleɔ lɛ he nilee babaoo haa.
Kɛkɛ lɛ, obi lɛ baanyɛ ebi akɛ, “Ani osusuɔ akɛ adesa aŋsɔ ni yɔɔ hwanyaŋŋ, ni nyɛɔ ekɛ saji babaoo toɔ lɛ ba kɛkɛ?”
Enɛ biɔ wiemɔi ashishitsɔɔlɔi ni he esa atsɔsemɔ kɛ amɛ kwɛmɔ, kɛ kompiuta tsɔnei hu ni aaana ni baatsu nɛkɛ wiemɔi sɔrɔtoi nɛɛ ahe nii, kɛfata woji lɛ akalamɔ diɛŋtsɛ he.
Eji kɔmpiuta program ko ní wɔnyɛmimɛi lɛ efee, ni amɛyaa nɔ amɛkwɛɔ koni etsu nii jogbaŋŋ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, kɛ anyɛ̃ nɔ ko tamɔ kpɔ́ ko nɔ yɛ kɔmpiuta nɔ nɔŋŋ pɛ lɛ, mɔ ni kɛtsuɔ nii lɛ nine nyɛɔ eshɛɔ saji ni fa babaoo diɛŋtsɛ nɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ekolɛ mɛi babaoo ni hi shi afii 100 ni eho lɛ baasusu akɛ, nibii ni kɔmpiutai, tɛlivishiŋ, nilee ni aná yɛ ŋwɛiniiaŋ yaa he, kɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ hiɛyaai krokomɛi ni aná lɛ eha anyɛɔ afeɔ bianɛ yɛ gbɛ ni yɔɔ mlɛo nɔ lɛ, nyɛŋ aba shihilɛ mli kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Agbɛnɛ, kuu lɛ nine shɛɔ tsɔsemɔ ni mɔɔ shi nɔ yɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ kɛha Biblia shishitsɔɔmɔ kɛ kɔmpiuta nibii ahe gbɛjianɔtoo krɛdɛɛi ni ato he gbɛjianɔ lɛ kɛ nitsumɔ mli.
Kɔmpiuta lɛ nɔ nibii amli taomɔ nɔ lɛ kɛ adafitswaa ni kɔɔ Hela kɛ Hebri wiemɔi ahe lɛ haa shishitsɔɔlɔ lɛ ni ehaa anáa hegbɛ yɛ Buu Mɔɔ woji lɛ kɛ nitsumɔ mli.
Mɛi ni tsuɔ nii ni amɛleee hejɔɔmɔ lɛ kɛ nitsumɔ yeɔ shihilɛ mli nifeemɔi krokomɛi fɛɛ anajiaŋ; shi nitsulɔi ni tsuɔ nii kɛ ekãa lɛ le be ni esa akɛ amɛkpa nitsumɔ koni amɛgbala amɛjwɛŋmɔ kɛya nibii krokomɛi anɔ, tamɔ gbɛjianɔ ni amɛbaato kɛha amɛgbalashihilɛ mlibotemɔ he gbijurɔyeli lɛ nɛkɛ.
Kɛkɛ lɛ, ekɔmpiuta lɛ ewie akɛ: “Hiɛnɔkamɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛhãa ji akɛ, shikpɔŋ lɛ baatsɔ paradeiso, he ko ni hela kɛ gbele ehiŋ jɛmɛ, Kpojiemɔ 21:4.”
6 Mɛi komɛi kɛ teokrase naanyobɔɔ etsu nii ni amɛkɛhɔ̃ɔ tsofai ni tsaa mɔ loo hefɛo he nibii, hewalɛnamɔ nibii, tsɔnei ni atsɔɔ nɔ akɛ mɛi yeɔ sharamɔ he nii, tsumaa he nibii, gbɛfãa he gbɛjianɔtoi, kɔmpiuta nibii ahe gbɛjianɔtoo kɛ ekrokomɛi.
(Romabii 1:24-28; 16:17-19) Eha efee mlɛo kɛha wɔ akɛ wɔɔwo wɔtsuii kɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔi amli muji kɛtsɔ TV tsɔne ní akɛsũɔ, loo kɔmpiuta keyboard nɔ.
Ewie akɛ gbeyei ní asheɔ akɛ kɔmpiuta nyɛŋ nii atsu yɛ jeŋ fɛɛ yɛ afi 2000 lɛ mli lɛ “etsake aŋkroaŋkroi komɛi kwraa ni amɛbatsɔmɔ afii akpebii” ni sheɔ amanehului tamɔ “gbeyei ní aaamɔmɔ mɛi babaoo, nɔyelii ni bɛ hewalɛ, niyenii he basabasafeemɔi, kɔɔyɔŋ lɛji ni baashi tsũi kakadaji” ni baanyɛ aba lɛ gbeyei.[ 2]
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ́ oleee ohe be ni ona mfonirii ni teɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he akɔnɔ shi lɛ, jiemɔ ohiŋmɛi yɛ nɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ, kɛ́ kɔmpiuta nɔ ona yɛ lɛ gbee, ni kɛ́ TV nɔ ona yɛ lɛ tsakemɔ kɛya he kroko.
Mɛi komɛi ena akɛ, ehi jogbaŋŋ akɛ amɛkɛ kɔmpiuta baatsu nii loo amɛbaakwɛ tɛlivishiŋ be pɛ ni mɛi krokomɛi yɛ amɛmasɛi.
10 Kɔmpiutai ni afee ŋmɛnɛ lɛ egbele gbɛi krokomɛi kɛha naanyobɔɔ fɔŋ.
Nɔkwɛmɔ nii ni tamɔ nɛkɛ babaoo yɛ: okadi ni hɛleɔ bo shi yɛ sarawa hewalɛ he; redio nɔ adafitswaa ni kɔɔ ahum ko ni miitswa kɛ foi kɛmiiba he ni oyɔɔ lɛ he; dade ko ni obaanu egbɛɛmɔ waa he kɛjɛ otsɔne mli beni ota mli kɛnyiɛ gbɛjegbɛ ni nɔ etsi nɔ.
Mɛɛ beyinɔ po ooote shi kɛaajɛ owɔ lɛ mli?”
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, mikpɛlɛ bɔ ni mitɔ̃ kɛ bɔ ni mijie kuɛŋtimɔ kpo, kɛ bɔ ni Yehowa Wiemɔ lɛ ja yɛ bei fɛɛ mli lɛ nɔ—‘nɔ ni adũɔ lɛ, no nɔŋŋ hu abaakpa.’”—C.W.
Yakobo 1:2, 3 lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Minyɛmimɛi, kɛji nyɛgbee kaai srɔtoi pii amli lɛ, nyɛbua lɛ miishɛɛ sɔŋŋ; ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nyɛhemɔkɛyeli kaa lɛ tsɛ́ɔ tsuishiŋmɛɛ kɛbaa.”
Matsɔse* bo bɔ ni sa kɛkɛ,
Ani bo hu obaanyɛ okɛ obe fɛɛ asɔmɔ yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli koni omiishɛɛ lɛ afa babaoo?
Omami ni, ni esaaa akɛ okɛ lɛ náa bɔlɛ.
(Yakobo 4:8) Mɛni po baanyɛ aha ofee shweshweeshwe fe akɛ oooná okɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ji Tsɛ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ teŋ wekukpãa ni bɛŋkɛ kpaakpa?
Wɔkɛ bo baaya omaŋbii lɛ aŋɔɔ.’
Ebaakai bo nɔ̃ hewɔ ni esa akɛ ofee ekãa lɛ, ni ebaaha ona bɔ ni ooofee ni ohe asa kɛ nitsɔɔmɔ, ni ebaaha ona akɛ mɛi miibo shiɛmɔ ni wɔshiɛɔ lɛ toi lolo koni no awo bo hewalɛ.
*+ Bo daamɔ maŋbii lɛ anajiaŋ ni okɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ awie ohã amɛ,+ koni okɛ saji lɛ fɛɛ aba anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ.
19 Lalatsɛ lɛ lá akɛ: “Nyɛsumɔa Yehowa, nyɛ mɛi fɛɛ ni nyɛ ji emɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ!
OKƐ NƆ NI OKASE LƐ ATSU NII.
Wɔhiɛ sɔɔ otsuishitoo lɛ waa.
Yehowa wie yɛ ewebii lɛ ahe ekoŋŋ akɛ: “Nyɛ ji midasefoi,” ni ekɛfata he akɛ: “Ani misɛɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ko yɛ?

Kɛ́ afee shiɛmɔ wiemɔ ko he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, susumɔ bɔ ni obaanyɛ okɛ tsu nii, kɛ bɔ ni obaaha ekɔ shiatsɛmɛi srɔtoi ahe lɛ he.

15 “‘Kɛ́ miŋmɛɛ mimlifu lɛ fɛɛ he mishwie gbogbo lɛ kɛ mɛi ni kɛ kaaloo sha he lɛ anɔ lɛ, makɛɛ nyɛ akɛ: “Gbogbo lɛ bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni mɛi ni sha he lɛ hu bɛ dɔŋŋ.
Beni eku ekuɛ ekwɛ afii 25 ni ekɛsɔmɔ yɛ be fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mibɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ mawo mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ hewalɛ kɛtsɔ amɛ ni mikɛyaa shiɛmɔ, saramɔ ni miyasaraa amɛ, nine ni mifɔ̃ɔ amɛ kɛbaa mishĩa kɛha niyeli, kɛ okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ ni tswaa mɔ emaa shi yɛ mumɔŋ ni mitoɔ he gbɛjianɔ lɛ nɔ.
“Beni Yehowa Odasefoi batswa mishinaa lɛ, no mli lɛ miyɛ jwɛŋmɔŋ nɔnyɛɛ shishi, ni miisusu akɛ mafo miwala sɛɛ kwraa.
Miwu ní kudɔ ko kɔɔyɔŋ lɛlɛ pɛŋ lɛ bɔ mɔdɛŋ waa akɛ etsĩɛ ehiɛ.
Nɛkɛ tsɔsemɔ nɛɛ wo mihemɔkɛyeli mli hewalɛ ni eye ebua mi koni matsi mabɛŋkɛ Yehowa he kpaakpa.
No hewɔ lɛ mikpa tawa shɛremɔ, kɛkɛ ni miyahe baagi ni mijɔɔ mihe nɔ miha Yehowa, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ Kpeteŋkpele lɛ.
Mikaiɔ beni midamɔ shia ni afeɔ yara lɛ yɛ mli lɛ aaafee afii 20 ni eho nɛ lɛ, beni mikwɛɔ mitsɛ ni misumɔɔ lɛ waa lɛ, kɛ bɔ ni miná hiɛsɔɔ ni jɛ tsuiŋ kɛha kpɔmɔ afɔleshaa lɛ.
Yesu tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Mitooo miyiŋ mifeee nɔ ko, shi moŋ bɔ ni mitsɛ tsɔ̃ɔ mi lɛ, nakai mifeɔ daa.”
Bɔ ni minyɛ midamɔ miwu, mitsɛ, kɛ mibinuu lɛ gbele naa lɛ eye ebua mi ni mifeee ŋkomeŋfa, ni eha minuɔ mɛi krokomɛi ni naa nɔ̃ lɛ ashishi jogbaŋŋ.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Miji tookwɛlɔ kpakpa lɛ; mile mi diɛŋtsɛ mitoi lɛ, ni mitoi lɛ hu le mi.”
▪ “Nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ beni miba oŋɔɔ lɛ, atee sanebimɔ ko shi akɛ, Mɛni ji gbɔmɔ kɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ wɔsɛɛ be?
No mli lɛ miboteko gbalashihilɛ mli, ni nakai nɔŋŋ eji yɛ miklasbii lɛ babaoo agbɛfaŋ.
No hewɔ lɛ, beni Mose kɛɛ lɛ akɛ, “mi lɛ wɔ́ lɛ mibadamɔ gɔŋkpɔ lɛ yiteŋ ni mahiɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tso lɛ yɛ midɛ” lɛ, no pɛ kɛkɛ fa ha lɛ.
16 Oblayoo lɛ papa lɛ akɛɛ onukpai lɛ akɛ, ‘Mikɛ mibiyoo lɛ hã nuu nɛɛ akɛ eŋa, shi ehe miitsɛ̃* mibiyoo lɛ 17 ni ekɛ sane efɔ̃ enɔ akɛ: “Mina akɛ, nɔ ko bɛ obiyoo lɛ he ni tsɔɔ akɛ oblayoo fro ji lɛ.”

Nɔ ni fee mi naakpɛɛ ji, amɛ fɛɛ amɛkpa mi fai yɛ gidigidi ni amɛfee kɛshɛ miyi ni jeee misuɔmɔ naa lɛ hewɔ.
Kɛlɛ, hulu lɛ yeɔ ebuaa abɛi nɛɛ ni enyɛɔ efilikiɔ aaafee kilomitai 3,000 kɛjɛɔ Canada kɛyaa koo ko mli yɛ Mexico.
Enanemɛi tsɛɔ lɛ akɛ Hulu Kpɛmɔ.
Ni kɛlɛ lɛ ebaaye nii fɛɛ ni mikɛ deŋmegbomɔ kɛ nilee ná yɛ hulu shishi nɛɛ lɛ nɔ.

32 Yɛ nyɔŋmɔ sɛɛ gbɛ ni amɛtaoɔ lɛ mli lɛ, Shintobii, ni kɛ amɛhemɔkɛyelii edamɔ adesai kɛ blema saji anɔ lɛ, kɛ gbɔmɔ ko kɛkɛ, amɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ, mɔ ni akɛɛ eji hulu-nyɔŋmɔyoo Amaterasu Omikami seshinyo lɛ fee nyɔŋmɔ.
Ekolɛ obaasusu akɛ aye nitsulɔi ni tsu nii gbi muu fɛɛ yɛ hulu gbaŋgbaŋ nɔ lɛ sane fɔŋ.
Hulu lɛ ji ŋulami henɔ ko ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ jogbaŋŋ kɛha wɔ.
Yɛ be mli ni hulu lɛ nyɔɔ shi blɛoo yɛ je lɛŋ he fɛɛ he yɛ nakai gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi asafoi lɛ fɛɛ kɛ kui ni yɔɔ jeŋ fɛɛ lɛ baaye Kristo gbele lɛ Kaimɔ lɛ he gbi jurɔ.
Yɛ nakai maŋtsɛyeli lɛ yinɔsane “gbɛkɛ” beaŋ, beni hulu lɛ enyɔ shi yɛ Israel maŋtsɛyeli lɛ tɔkpãa lɛ nɔ, loo yɛ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ naagbee gbɛ lɛ, Ester kɛ Mordekai ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛjɛ Benyamin akutso lɛ mli lɛ wu amɛshi Yehowa henyɛlɔi lɛ jogbaŋŋ.
+ 6 Shi be ni hulu lɛ te shi lɛ eshã amɛ, ni akɛni amɛbɛ shishifã hewɔ lɛ, amɛŋala.

Kɛfata he lɛ, nyɔŋtsere lɛ dalɛ kɛ gbɛ ni kã ekɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ teŋ lɛ haa kɛ́ be shɛ ni esa akɛ ehà hulu lɛ nɔ lɛ, enyɛɔ ehàa nɔ kwraa ni ehaa jeŋ woɔ duŋ.
Ekɛ hulu lɛ teŋ jɛkɛmɔ ja pɛpɛɛpɛ bɔ ni eeena la kɛ dɔlɛ ni hi bɔ ni sa kɛjɛ mli.

26 “Naa, ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, mikɛ jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ miishwie nyɛhiɛ:+ 27 abaajɔɔ nyɛ kɛ́ nyɛbo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi ní miwoɔ nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ toi,+ 28 ni abaalomɔ nyɛ kɛ́ nyɛbooo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi lɛ toi,+ ni nyɛgbá afã kɛje gbɛ ni mifãa nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ akɛ nyɛnyiɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni nyɛyanyiɛ nyɔŋmɔi ni nyɛleee lɛ asɛɛ.
Yehowa ha egbalɔ lɛ kɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: “Naa, miŋɔ jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ mishwie nyɛhiɛ ŋmɛnɛ: jɔɔmɔ ji nyɛnɔ̃, kɛji nyɛbo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kitai ni miwoɔ nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ atoi lɛ; shi loomɔ ji nyɛnɔ̃, kɛji nyɛbooo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitai lɛ atoi, ni nyɛkpale kɛjɛ gbɛ ni miwoɔ nyɛ he kita ŋmɛnɛ nɛɛ nɔ, ni nyɛyanyiɛ nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi ni nyɛleee sá lɛ asɛɛ lɛ.” —5 Mose 11: 26-28.
30 “Kɛ́ wiemɔi nɛɛ fɛɛ ba onɔ, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ ni mikɛshwie ohiɛ lɛ,+ ni okai nibii nɛɛ*+ yɛ jeŋmaji fɛɛ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbɛ bo eshwã amɛmli lɛ ateŋ,+ 2 ni oku osɛɛ kɛba Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ŋɔɔ,+ ni okɛ otsui fɛɛ kɛ osusuma* fɛɛ bo egbee toi yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni mifãa bo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ anaa,+ bo kɛ obihii lɛ, 3 no lɛ, Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baahã onomii lɛ aku amɛsɛɛ kɛba,+ ni ebaana bo mɔbɔ+ ni ebaabua onaa ekoŋŋ kɛjɛ maji fɛɛ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbɛ bo eshwã amɛmli lɛ amli.
Beni Mose gbálaa Mla ni akɛha yɛ Sinai Gɔŋ lɛ masɛi lɛ mli lɛ, ekɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: “Naa, miiŋɔ jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ miishwie nyɛhiɛ ŋmɛnɛ: jɔɔmɔ ji nyɛnɔ̃, kɛji nyɛbo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kitãi ni miwoɔ nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ atoi lɛ; shi loomɔ ji nyɛnɔ̃, kɛji nyɛbooo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kitãi lɛ atoi, ni nyɛkpale kɛjɛ gbɛ ni miwoɔ nyɛ he kitã ŋmɛnɛ nɛɛ nɔ.”—5 Mose 11:26-28.
25 Ejɛ* otsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ŋɔɔ, ni Nyɔŋmɔ baaye abua bo; ekɛ Ofe lɛ yɔɔ, ni ebaajɔɔ bo kɛ jɔɔmɔi ni jɛ ŋwɛi, ebaajɔɔ bo kɛ jɔɔmɔi ni jɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi,+ ni ebaajɔɔ bo kɛ bii babaoo kɛ kooloi babaoo.
Beni lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ebana Yehowa jɔɔmɔi ni yɔɔ maŋ lɛ kɛ enɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Aaajɔɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, akɛ ená ohe tsui ni ekɛo ta emaŋtsɛsɛi lɛ nɔ, koni oye maŋtsɛ oha Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ; ejaakɛ o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ miisumɔ Israel.”—2 Kronika 9:8.
+ 16 Kɛ́ obo Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi ni miwoɔ bo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ toi, ni osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ,+ ni onyiɛ egbɛi lɛ anɔ, ni oye ekitãi kɛ emlai kɛ eyiŋkpɛi* lɛ anɔ lɛ, no lɛ, obaaya nɔ ohi shi,+ ni oyi baafa, ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baajɔɔ bo yɛ shikpɔŋ ni oyaa oyaŋɔ lɛ nɔ.
(2 Mose 3:8) Mose fee enɛ faŋŋ, akɛ: “Kɛji oooye kitai kɛ akpɔi kɛ mlai ni miwoɔo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ, akɛ osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni onyiɛ egbɛ̀i anɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ, no lɛ oyi aaaná wala ni oyi aaafá, ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, aaajɔɔo yɛ shikpɔŋ ni oyaa oyaŋɔ lɛ nɔ.” —5 Mose 30:16; wɔma efã ko nɔ mi.
24 “Shi kɛ́ gbɛ lɛ jekɛ tsɔ hã bo, ni onyɛɛɛ okɛ nibii nɛɛ aya he ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baahala akɛ egbɛ́i lɛ ahi,+ akɛni jɛmɛ kɛ bo teŋ jekɛ waa hewɔ lɛ (ejaakɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ejɔɔ bo), 25 no lɛ, feemɔ fɛɛ shika, ni ohiɛ shika lɛ yɛ odɛŋ kɛfã gbɛ kɛya he ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baahala lɛ.
18 Yehowa tee nɔ ekɛ mɛi ní ekwa lɛ lɛ wie akɛ: “Nyɛaashi nyɛgbɛi nyɛha mɛi ní mihala lɛ ní amɛkɛlomɔ; ni Nuntsɔ Yehowa aaagbeo, ni eeewo etsuji lɛ gbɛi kroko: koni mɔ ni jɔɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, ajɔɔ ehe yɛ anɔkwale Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ mli, ní mɔ ni kãa kita yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, akã anɔkwale Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kita; ejaakɛ hiɛ ekpa tsutsu haomɔi lɛ anɔ, ni aŋɔtee yɛ mihiɛ.”
Beni Mose tsuɔ nii akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ naawielɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe; ejaakɛ no aaaha oyi aná wala ni otsɛ yɛ jeŋ, koni ohi shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa kã otsɛmɛi Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob kita akɛ eeeŋɔha amɛ lɛ nɔ!”—5 Mose 30:19, 20.
4 Shi esaaa akɛ nyɛteŋ mɔ ko yeɔ ohia, ejaakɛ bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, Yehowa baajɔɔ bo+ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛhãa bo akɛ gboshinii lɛ nɔ, 5 shi ja obo Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbee toi kɛmɔ shi, ní oye kitãi nɛɛ fɛɛ ni miwoɔ bo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ anɔ dã.
+ 8 Yehowa baafã jɔɔmɔ ni eba onitoohei+ kɛ onitsumɔi fɛɛ anɔ, ni bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, ebaajɔɔ bo yɛ shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛhãa bo lɛ nɔ.
Nyɔŋmɔ jie ehe kpo etsɔɔ lɛ ni ekɛ famɔ ha lɛ akɛ: “Jee oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ ojaku lɛ kɛ otsɛ we lɛ kɛya shikpɔŋ ni matsɔɔo lɛ nɔ. Ni maha otsɔ jeŋmaŋ kpeteŋkpele, ni majɔɔo, ni maha ogbɛi ada, ni oootsɔ̃ jɔɔmɔ!
Kɛ́ oye obua mɛi ni amɛná Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ kɛ bɔ ni ebaatse Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛ́i lɛ he lɛ he anɔkwa nilee, oma Nyɔŋmɔ nɔyeli lɛ bembuu lɛ nɔ mi, owie naanɔ jɔɔmɔi ni adesai anɔkwafoi baaná lɛ he kɛ miishɛɛ lɛ, no tsɔɔ akɛ okɛ naabu krɔŋŋ nɛɛ miitsu nii.
Mose kɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: “Jɔɔmɔ Yehowa aaajɔɔo yɛ shikpɔŋ ní Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛhãa bo ní oŋɔ akɛ ogbɛfaŋnɔ lɛ nɔ, kɛji ooobo Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbee toi ní ojwɛŋ nɔ ní oye kita fɛɛ kita ní miwoɔo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ lɛ nɔ kɛkɛ lɛ.
Dani Israel maŋ lɛ aaabote Shiwoo Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, Mose kai amɛ sɔ̃ ni kã amɛnɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ lɛ he, ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe.”
Ni ejɔɔ lɛ ni ekɛɛ: Aaajɔɔ Abram aha ŋwɛi flooflo Nyɔŋmɔ ni ji ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ tsɛ lɛ; ni aaajie ŋwɛi flooflo Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ yi, akɛ eŋɔ ohenyɛlɔi lɛ ewo odɛŋ!
15 Ye gbi jurɔ lɛ gbii kpawo+ ohã Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, yɛ he ni Yehowa baahala lɛ, ejaakɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baajɔɔ onibaa nii fɛɛ kɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni ofeɔ lɛ nɔ,+ ni omii baashɛ ohe jogbaŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ.
Gbii kpawo sɔŋŋ oye gbi jurɔ oha Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, yɛ he ni Yehowa ehala lɛ; ejaakɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ejɔɔo yɛ onibaanii fɛɛ mli kɛ onine naa nitsumɔ fɛɛ mli; no hewɔ lɛ omii ashɛ ohe jogbaŋŋ.”—5 Mose 16:14, 15; nyɛkanea Mateo 5:3.
Akɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: “Gbii kpawo sɔŋŋ oye [asese] gbijurɔ oha Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, yɛ he ni Yehowa ehala lɛ; ejaakɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ejɔɔ bo yɛ onibaa nii fɛɛ mli kɛ onine naa nitsumɔ fɛɛ mli; no hewɔ lɛ, omii ashɛ ohe jogbaŋŋ.”
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ shiwoo nɛɛ ha Abraham (Abram) ni toɔ etsui shi lɛ akɛ: “Lɛlɛŋ, jɔɔmɔ majɔɔo ni fa hu maha oseshi afa.”
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, be fɛɛ be ni ooona nyɔŋtsere ni eekpɛ yɛ ŋwɛi gbɛkɛ lɛ, kaimɔ shi ni Nyɔŋmɔ wo David lɛ ni oda shi akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ miiye nɔ bianɛ ni ebaaye nɔ kɛya naanɔ, kɛwo Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ nyam, kɛ agbɛnɛ kɛha adesai anɔkwafoi anaanɔ jɔɔmɔi hu. —Kpojiemɔ 11:15.
Dani amɛaaya Shiwoo Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, Mose kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Miitsɛ́ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe; ejaakɛ no aaaha oyi ana wala ni otsɛ yɛ jeŋ, koni ohi shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa kã otsɛmɛi Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob kitã akɛ eeeŋɔha amɛ lɛ nɔ!”
+ 6 Ejaakɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baajɔɔ bo tamɔ bɔ ni ewo bo shi lɛ, ni okɛ onii baafa* jeŋmaji babaoo, shi bo lɛ, ehe ebahiaŋ ni oyafa nɔ ko;+ ni obaaye jeŋmaji babaoo anɔ, shi amɛ lɛ, amɛyeŋ onɔ.
Mɛni baawa wɔ ni wɔye wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔhe anɔkwa?
Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔye wɔbua Buddhabii?
3-5. (a) Te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ akɛ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ye ebua Mose ni enyɛ etsu esɔ̃i lɛ ahe nii lɛ?
Susumɔ bɔ ni wiemɔ he wolo lɛ fã fɛɛ fã tswaa nɔ ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ emaa shi, ni etsaa nɔ kɛyaa ekroko nɔ, ni eyeɔ ebuaa ni okɛtsuɔ yiŋtoo ni yɔɔ owiemɔ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ he nii lɛ he.
Yesu kɛwo enɔkwa sɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ adɛŋ akɛ amɛkɛ yelikɛbuamɔ nɛɛ aha.
Hemɔkɛyeli ni mli wa yeɔ ebuaa wɔ ni wɔyaa nɔ wɔyeɔ anɔkwa ŋmɛnɛ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Kwɛ bɔ ni wɔmli filiɔ wɔ kɛ́ wɔye wɔbua mɛi ni hiɛ tsui kpakpa lɛ ni amɛnu hiɛnɔkamɔ ni yɔɔ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ shishi ni amɛhiɛ sɔ hiɛnɔkamɔ nɛɛ!
Amɛnaa lɛ akɛ eji hegbɛ kpele akɛ amɛaaye amɛbua mɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ.
Gbɛgbalɔ krɛdɛɛ ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Dora kɛ kasɛt tsu nii ni ekɛfee nikasemɔi yɛ Mɛni Nyɔŋmɔ Taoɔ yɛ Wɔdɛŋ?
Biblia lɛ baanyɛ aye abua wɔ jogbaŋŋ.
Anaa yelikɛbuamɔ lɛ yɛ Yehowa Odasefoi awoji amli.
Kɛ́ mɔ ko fee wɔ gbɔ lɛ, te esa akɛ wɔfee wɔnii wɔhã tɛŋŋ?
Ekɛfata he akɛ: “Shi akɛ gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi lɛ, wɔbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ wɔbaaná nanemɛi heei, ni no hu ye ebua wɔ waa.”
Nɔ ni Abraham kase yɛ Yehowa he lɛ, hã ebasumɔ Yehowa waa, ni ehe enɔ eye.
(Yesaia 8:18; Hebribii 2:13) Anuɔ gbɔmɛi ní anyɛɔ amɛnɔ lɛ abolɔmɔi ahe yɛ je lɛŋ he fɛɛ he, shi yɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, adesai anɔyelii lɛ nyɛɛɛ aye abua amɛ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ekolɛ asafoŋ onukpai lɛ baanyɛ aha fɔlɔi lɛ ale gbɛjianɔ ni amralo lɛ loo nitsumɔ kuu ko eto kɛha mɛi ni tamɔ nakai ni yɔɔ he ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ, kɛ bɔ ni amɛaafee ni amɛnine ashɛ nɔ.
Yɛ je lɛŋ fɛɛ lɛ, gbɔmɛi ena akɛ Biblia lɛ he baa sɛɛnamɔ waa kɛji aato shishitoo mlai ni tamɔ nɛkɛ shishi kɛha weku lɛ, ni nomɛi bafeɔ odaseyeli ni tsɔɔ faŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ akɛ, Biblia lɛ “jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Mumɔ lɛŋ [ni] ehi ha nitsɔɔmɔ kɛ hiɛkamɔ kɛ mɔsaamɔ kɛ tsɔsemɔ ni yɔɔ jalɛ mli.”
Ani ooná nakai yelikɛbuamɔ lɛ he sɛɛ kɛmiimɔ shi?—Lala 119:129, 130; Mika 4:2.
Biblia lɛ kanemɔ daa gbi yeɔ ebuaa mi ni mikaiɔ Biblia mli famɔi kɛ shishitoo mlai ni woɔ mi hewalɛ koni mate shi mawo nɛkɛ nɔnyɛɛi nɛɛ oya.
Bɔ ni Ooofee Onu Biblia lɛ Shishi
Kɛ́ akai Kristofonyo ni kɛ afii babaoo esɔmɔ lɛ wiemɔ ko shishitsɔɔmɔ lɛ, ebaanyɛ eye ebua lɛ ni enu nɔ ni ŋmalɛ lɛ kɛɔ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ.
Kɛji akɛ wɔpɛi bɔ ni amɛtsu haomɔi ahe nii amɛha lɛ mli lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔkase nibii ni anyɛɔ atsuɔ he nii ní baaye abua wɔ koni wɔkpee kaai ni tamɔ nakai anaa ŋmɛnɛ.
Nɛkɛ tsɔsemɔ nɛɛ wo mihemɔkɛyeli mli hewalɛ ni eye ebua mi koni matsi mabɛŋkɛ Yehowa he kpaakpa.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ hemɔkɛyeli yeɔ ebuaa wɔ koni wɔdamɔ hela naa ni wɔshɛje nanemɛi heyelilɔi ni he yeɔ lɛ amii yɛ?
Tsuishitoo yeɔ ebuaa mi ni mihaaa mihela lɛ he naagbai kɛ emli haomɔi lɛ asu mitsui.
7, 8. (a) Mɛɛ odaseyeli yɔɔ ni tsɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ webii ‘eha amɛtaŋkpei lɛ ekɛlɛ’?
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, mɛi babaoo ni hiɛ tsui kpakpa lɛ enu sanekpakpa lɛ, ni amɛje shishi amɛmiikase Biblia lɛ.
Akɛni eboteko gbalashihilɛ mli hewɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni enɛ aaaba mliŋ, akɛni mileee nuu nɛɛ?”
(b) Mɛɛ shiwoo Yehowa kɛha lolo yɛ ewebii lɛ agbɛfaŋ?
Kɛ́ ‘wɔsɔleɔ daa ni wɔfɔ̃ɔɔ’ yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ, etsɔɔ akɛ wɔyɛ anɔkwa hemɔkɛyeli. —1 Tesalonikabii 5:17.
16 Agbɛnɛ Yehowa kai ewebii lɛ akɛ amɛfee esha, ni ewo amɛ hewalɛ ní amɛtsake amɛgbɛ̀i fɔji ní amɛkɔ lɛ, akɛ: “Nyɛkua nyɛsɛɛ nyɛbaa mɔ ni nyɛje ehe kɛtee sɛɛ kwraa lɛ ŋɔɔ, nyɛ Israelbii!”
Belɛ, yɛ nɔ ni ekɛɔ nɛɛ hewɔ lɛ, ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ Maria bɛ bii krokomɛi.”
Yehowa Odasefoi ena akɛ eji miishɛɛ jɛɛhe akɛ aaaye abua aŋkroaŋkroi ni boɔ wiemɔ lɛ toi lɛ, eyɛ mli akɛ amɛle akɛ mɛi fioo pɛ ni jɛ adesai aweku lɛ mli lɛ baakɔ wala gbɛ lɛ.
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ, maŋtsɛmɛi lɛ kɛ klante egbegbee amɛhe.
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔsusu jogbaŋŋ akɛ, gbɛfaa ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ baanyɛ atee haomɔ kɛ yeyeeye-feemɔ shi, shi, Epafrodito (ni jeee Epafra ni jɛ Kolose lɛ) miisumɔ ni etsu nakai nitsumɔ ni wa lɛ.
Bɔni afee ni wɔna be saŋŋ kɛha teokrase nitsumɔi lɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔyoo nibii ni fiteɔ mɔ be lɛ, koni wɔkaha nomɛi miifá.
Yɛ shihilɛi komɛi amli lɛ, enɛ ewo yibii kpakpai.
Mɛɛ hegbɛ wɔná akɛ wɔmiifee Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii?
Ákɛ Kristofoi lɛ, “heyeli mla” lɛ akɛkojoɔ wɔ—mumɔŋ Israel ni yɔɔ kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ mli, ni emla lɛ yɔɔ amɛtsuii amli lɛ.—Yeremia 31:31-33.
Oblanyo Odasefonyo ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Mile oblahii kɛ oblayei komɛi yɛ asafo lɛ mli ni kɛ mɛi ni jáaa Yehowa nyiɛɔ kɛha gbalashihilɛ.

(Mateo 24:45) Akɛni wɔmiisumɔ waa koni wɔle shɛɛ sane ni Yehowa yɔɔ kɛha adesai aweku lɛ jogbaŋŋ hewɔ lɛ, wɔɔfee jogbaŋŋ akɛ wɔɔkane Biblia lɛ “shwane kɛ nyɔɔŋ”—hɛɛ, yɛ be mli ni wɔnyɛɛɛ wɔwɔ yɛ yiŋtoo ko po hewɔ.
Hɛɛ, hiɛjoomɔ ni wɔkɛaatao hewalɛ ni wɔkɛye mɛi krokomɛi anɔ, ekolɛ ni wɔha amɛhe akpokpo yɛ wɔhewalɛ shishi lɛ baanyɛ atsɔ wɔ tsɔne. —Lala 10:18.
(Yesaia 33: 24) Hɛɛ, abaajie nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni kɛ piŋmɔ baa lɛ kɛya kwraa, agbɛnɛ hu abaajie adesai ahenyɛlɔ ni ji gbele ni ehi shi aahu lɛ kɛya.
Hɛɛ, ‘Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ ní wɔsaaa’ lɛ yɛ naakpɛɛ aahu akɛ kɛ́ wɔɔtsɔɔ mli lɛ, etekeɔ wɔnyɛmɔ.—2 Kor.
Yiŋtoo ni ha ashwie Adam kɛjɛ trom lɛ mli lɛ ji koni “ekakpã enine mli, ni etse wala tso lɛ yibii lɛ hu eko, ni eye, ni ehiɛ miikã kɛmiiya naanɔ,” hɛɛ, ni ehi shi kɛmiiya naanɔ!
Miha hetoo akɛ, “hɛɛ.”
Hɛɛ, mɛɛ gbɛi kpakpa ofee oha ohe ákɛ Kristofonyo nuu aloo yoo oshijafonyo?
Ekolɛ obaabi ohe akɛ, ‘Mɛni hewɔ kwraa afo afabaŋ nɛɛ kɛtsĩ mi gbɛ?’
Ŋmalɛi ni atsɛ yisɛɛ yɛ kukuji nɛɛ amli lɛ ta John tsuiŋ aahu akɛ ekɛɛ, “Ekolɛ esa akɛ masaa makase Biblia lɛ ekoŋŋ.”
Ekolɛ mɔ ni wieɔ yɛ wiemɔ kpoku lɛ nɔ lɛ jeee mɔ ko ni wiemɔ kanyaa mɔ, ni beni wɔbaahɛre shi lɛ, wɔjwɛŋmɔ miikpa shi—ni ekolɛ wɔmiiwɔ po!
Aloo ekolɛ obaanyɛ oye obua amɛ ni amɛsaa amɛhe.
Beni Kristofonyo ko kɛ nɔ ni miihe ashɛ afii 37 esɔmɔ Yehowa yɛ henɔjɔɔmɔ mli lɛ, eŋma akɛ: “Minu he shii abɔ yɛ mishihilɛ mli akɛ sɔɔmɔ ni mikɛhaa Yehowa lɛ yɛ jabejabe, ni ekolɛ mitsui bɛ nɔ ni mifeɔ lɛ mli.
Aloo ekolɛ oosumɔ ni okase bɔ ni atɛŋɔ mfonirii ahaa aloo otsɔ kapintɛfonyo.
Ani ofɔlɔi, nuumo ko, loo woloŋlelɔ kpanaa ko ni tsɔɔ nii yɛ univɛsiti?
Ekolɛ nɛkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nɛɛ, Yehowa, baanyɛ aye abua wɔ ni wɔna gbɛ ni kɛ mɔ yaa wala mli lɛ.”
Ekolɛ onako nɔmimaa kɛmɔko shi akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ shishitoo mlai lɛ anaa ní ooohi shi yɛ lɛ ji shihilɛ gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ.
Afeɔ nakai koni mɛi krokomɛi akabɛŋkɛ tsɔ̃ ní ekolɛ kpitiyelɔ lɛ hela lɛ tsɛŋe amɛ.
Ani ole bɔ ni amɛtamɔ ha, ekolɛ beni opɛi bɔ ni amɛji diɛŋtsɛ lɛ mli okwɛ kɛjɛ shishijee lɛ?
11 Susumɔ kooloo ko ni onyãa ekwɛmɔ he, ekolɛ afutuɔkɔ loo kpɛŋkpɛlɛ he okwɛ.
Ekolɛ olé he ni obaakwɛ koni okɛtao osanebimɔi lɛ ahetoo.
Ekolɛ osusu yɛ be ko mli akɛ, ‘Misumɔɔ nikasemɔ lɛ, shi miyaŋ ni mikɛ mɛi krokomɛi ayawie kɔkɔɔkɔ.’
Ekolɛ esusu akɛ enɛ baatsa miwuŋayeli lɛ, shi efite sane lɛ kwraa moŋ.
Ekolɛ, mɛi ni okɛkpeɔ lɛ ejieee miishɛɛ kpo yɛ Biblia lɛ he.
Kɛ ena akɛ miishɛɛ bɛ ekɛ lɛ teŋ lɛ, belɛ ekolɛ, eesusu naagba ko he waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Ekolɛ mɛi komɛi baasusu po akɛ, “Ekolɛ mafee efɔŋ wɔsɛɛ ko, ni no baaha ashwie mi kɛjɛ asafo lɛ mli.”
Aloo ekolɛ obaanyɛ okane nibii ni kɔɔ saji pɔtɛɛ komɛi ahe, loo obaanyɛ okane saji ni kɔɔ bɔ ni nibii komɛi tee nɔ ehã lɛ he.
Aloo ekolɛ afɔɔɔ nine atsɛɛɛ ebi ko loo enyɛmi ko.
Minanemɛi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome kɛɛ akɛ, ‘Ekolɛ Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ asane ja.’
Kɛ́ mɔ ko wie maŋ nɔ ni wɔjɛ lɛ loo bɔ ni atsɔse wɔ ahã lɛ he efɔŋ lɛ, te wɔfeɔ wɔnii wɔhãa tɛŋŋ?
Ekolɛ be kroko kɛ́ wɔkpe lɛ wɔbaasusu nakai sanebimɔ lɛ he.
Su ni tamɔ nɛkɛ baanyɛ aka mɛi komɛi, ‘Ekolɛ esa akɛ maba nibii ashi fioo, ni mikagba mihe naa yɛ nibii ahe tsɔ̃.’
Yɛ ojotswaa kɛ amimyeli ni egbɛ eshwã lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ—loo yɛ no hewɔ lɛ—mɛi krokomɛi náa aŋkroaŋkroi ni yeɔ anɔkwa lɛ ahe miishɛɛ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, mɛi baatsɔmɔ mɛi ni sumɔɔɔ ekpakpa, loo tamɔ bɔ ni Bibliai komɛi tsɔɔ shishi lɛ, “mɛi ni nyɛɔ ekpakpa” loo “amɛhiɔ ekpakpafeemɔ.”
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Gbɔmɔ kpakpa jieɔ nɔ̃ kpakpa kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri kpakpa lɛŋ, ni gbɔmɔ fɔŋ hu jieɔ nɔ fɔŋ kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri fɔŋ lɛ mli, ejaakɛ nɔ ni eyi tsui eteke nɔ lɛ, no enaabu wieɔ.”
45 Gbɔmɔ kpakpa jɛɔ jwetrii kpakpai ni ekɛto etsui mli lɛ amli ekɛ nibii kpakpai hãa, shi gbɔmɔ fɔŋ jɛɔ jwetrii fɔji ni ekɛto lɛ amli ekɛ nibii fɔji hãa; ejaakɛ nɔ ni eyi tsui lɛ obɔ kɛteke nɔ lɛ, no enaabu wieɔ.
Biblia lɛ tsɛ́ɔ lɛ “hejɔlɛ sanekpakpa,” “Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ sanekpakpa,” kɛ “maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa.”
+ 35 Gbɔmɔ kpakpa jieɔ nibii kpakpai kɛjɛɔ ejwetrii kpakpai ni ebua naa lɛ amli ehãa, ni gbɔmɔ fɔŋ hu jieɔ nibii fɔji kɛjɛɔ ejwetrii fɔji ni ebua naa lɛ amli ehãa.
Yesaia 52:7 wieɔ sanekpakpa he kɛha Yerusalem: “Kwɛ bɔ ni sanekpakpa jajelɔi ni shiɛɔ hejɔlɛ lɛ, sanekpakpa jajelɔi ni shiɛɔ yiwalaheremɔ lɛ naji yɔɔ fɛo yɛ gɔji lɛ anɔ, mɔ ni kɛɔ Zion akɛ: ‘O-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ yeɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ!’
No ji akɛ, kɛ́ miijaje sane kpakpa lɛ, majaje sane kpakpa lɛ ni miheee nɔ ko yɛ mɔ ko dɛŋ, koni mikɛ hegbɛ* ni miyɔɔ yɛ sane kpakpa lɛ hewɔ lɛ akatsu nii yɛ gbɛ gbonyo nɔ.
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Gbɔmɔ kpakpa jieɔ nɔ̃ kpakpa kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri kpakpa lɛŋ, ni gbɔmɔ fɔŋ hu jieɔ nɔ fɔŋ kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri fɔŋ lɛ mli, ejaakɛ nɔ ni eyi tsui eteke nɔ lɛ, no enaabu wieɔ.”
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Gbɔmɔ kpakpa jieɔ nɔ̃ kpakpa kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri kpakpa lɛŋ, . . . ejaakɛ nɔ ni eyi tsui eteke nɔ lɛ, no enaabu wieɔ.”
(Abɛi 13:15) Wolo ko ni akɛtaoɔ saji amli lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ, wiemɔ “sanesɛɛkɔmɔ kpakpa” loo saneshishinumɔ kpakpa lɛ shishinumɔ diɛŋtsɛ “tsɔɔ hiɛshikamɔ kpakpa, kojomɔ kpakpa, kɛ susumɔi ni nilee yɔɔ mli ni mɔ ko yɔɔ.”
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Gbɔmɔ kpakpa jieɔ nɔ kpakpa kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri kpakpa lɛŋ, ni gbɔmɔ fɔŋ hu jieɔ nɔ fɔŋ kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri fɔŋ lɛ mli, ejaakɛ nɔ ni eyi tsui eteke nɔ lɛ, no enaabu wieɔ.”
Bɔfo ko ní hiɛ sanekpakpa miibɛŋkɛ: “Kwɛ bɔ ni sanekpakpa jajelɔ ní shiɛɔ hejɔlɛ lɛ, sanekpakpa jajelɔ ní shiɛɔ yiwalaheremɔ lɛ naji yɔɔ fɛo yɛ gɔji lɛ anɔ, mɔ ni kɛɔ Zion akɛ: O-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ yeɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ!”
Yesu kɛ abɛbua ko tsɔɔ hewalɛ ni nɔ ni adũ yɛ tsui lɛ mli lɛ náa yɛ mɔ nɔ lɛ mli akɛ: “Gbɔmɔ kpakpa jieɔ nɔ̃ kpakpa kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri kpakpa lɛŋ, ni gbɔmɔ fɔŋ hu jieɔ nɔ fɔŋ kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri fɔŋ lɛ mli, ejaakɛ nɔ ni eyi tsui eteke nɔ lɛ, no enaabu wieɔ.”
Yesu kɛɛ etoibolɔi lɛ akɛ: “Gbɔmɔ kpakpa jieɔ nɔ̃ kpakpa kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri kpakpa lɛŋ, ni gbɔmɔ fɔŋ hu jieɔ nɔ fɔŋ kɛjɛɔ etsui mli jwetri fɔŋ lɛ mli, ejaakɛ nɔ ni eyi tsui eteke nɔ lɛ, no enaabu wieɔ.”
Wɔyɛ yiŋtoo ni wɔɔdamɔ nɔ wɔna hekɛnɔfɔɔ akɛ ekpakpa baaye efɔŋ nɔ kunim kɛ̃ ejaakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hi, ni kɛtsɔ eyelikɛbuamɔ nɔ lɛ, mɛi ni sumɔɔ ni amɛfee ekpakpa lɛ baanyɛ aye efɔŋ nɔ, taakɛ Yesu tsɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ enɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ nɔ ema nɔ mi lɛ.
Oblanyo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Jayson kaiɔ akɛ: “Yɛ miweku lɛ mli lɛ, wɔkɛ wɔhe woɔ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli daa Hɔɔ leebi.
Beni je tsɛre lɛ, etsɛ ekaselɔi lɛ, ni ehala amɛteŋ mɛi 12 ni etsɛ amɛ bɔfoi.
Ni gbi po ni akɛ nitsumɔ lɛ baa naagbee lɛ, etsu nii jenamɔ fɛɛ bɔni afee ni anyɛ agbe nitsumɔ lɛ naa koni nyɛmimɛi lɛ anyɛ ajɔɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ enɔ jetsɛremɔ.
“Beni ote shi”: Wekui babaoo anine eshɛ jɔɔmɔi anɔ yɛ Biblia mli ŋmalɛ ko ní amɛsusuɔ he daa leebi lɛ hewɔ.
Dani leebi baashɛ lɛ, amɛbɛ dɔŋŋ.
Leebi kpee lɛ ba naagbee kɛ baptisimɔ wiemɔ, ni ji nɔ ko ni sa kadimɔ yɛ Yehowa Odasefoi akpeei wuji ashishi yɛ be fɛɛ mli lɛ.
Agbɛnɛ, lɛ ebɔi mi tswaa kɛha nikasemɔ lɛ, ni bei komɛi lɛ etswaa beni miteko shi kɛjɛko saa mli, ni ekomɛi lɛ etswaa shii enyɔ yɛ gbi lɛ mli.
Mɛi komɛi ena akɛ amɛbaanyɛ amɛte shi mra fioo daa leebi, be ni amɛjwɛŋmɔ nyɛɔ emɔɔ nii waa lɛ.
No mli lɛ wɔyɛ okpɔŋɔ shwiili ko ni mamai hà esamfɛji lɛ anaa, no hewɔ lɛ bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni kɔɔyɔŋ tsakemɔ lɛ ji lɛ, wɔnyɛɔ wɔyaa sɔlemɔ Hɔgbaa leebi.
Yiŋtoo titri kome ni fe fɛɛ ji eŋa lɛ, Maŋnyɛ Izebel yitsoŋwalɔ lɛ.
Shi Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ gbɛ eshwã Ŋshɔkpɔ Tsuru Agbo lɛ nɔ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, yɛ gbi muu fɛɛ nitsumɔ ni wa kɛ niyenii babaoo ko ni ŋɔɔ yeli sɛɛ lɛ, ani onuɔ he akɛ esa akɛ okase nii, titri lɛ kɛji akɛ okpasa shi yɛ osa nɔ sɛi ko ni enɔ yɔɔ bɔdɔɔ waa mli yɛ TV hiɛ lɛ?
ANI ole gbekɛbii hii loo yei ni feɔ amɛhe shishiulɔi kɛ mɛi ni he wa?— Ani obaasumɔ ni okɛ amɛ abɔ naanyo?
Be ni nikasemɔ lɛ yaa nɔ lɛ, mina akɛ ehe miihia ni mafee tsakemɔi wuji komɛi yɛ mishihilɛ mli.
Aaron shɛ etso lɛ efɔ̃ shi yɛ Farao kɛ etsuji lɛ ahiɛ, ni tso lɛ tsɔ onufu agbo.
Anaa yɛ jamɔ mli, yɛ maŋkwramɔ mli—kɛ agbɛnɛ yɛ jarayeli nitsumɔi wuji amli.
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, gbi ni wɔkɛbaafã gbɛ lɛ bashɛ.
Shishitoo mla ni yɔɔ 1 Korintobii 15:33 lɛ ye ebua mi ni mina akɛ mɛi ni mikɛbɔɔ lɛ baanyɛ aná minɔ hewalɛ waa.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ekolɛ maŋtiase wulu lɛ baatamɔ he ko kpakpa, ní haa anáa bei kpakpai, nyɔmɔwoo ni fa, kɛ wɔɔhei kpakpai ahe yiŋsusumɔi.
Naagba wulu kroko ni Yakobo kɛ Yohane yɔɔ ji akɛ amɛsumɔɔ ni amɛná klɛŋklɛŋ gbɛhe, ni abu amɛ akɛ amɛhe hiaa fe fɛɛ.
Kɛ́ amɛmiiya kpee lɛ, ekɛ eŋa kɛ ebi abifao lɛ taa ekɔokpe agbo lɛ nɔ.
Sɛɛnamɔi wuji lakaa mɛi pii koni amɛkɛ amɛhe awo yiwalɛ nifeemɔ mli.
Ekolɛ obaana jarayelihe wulu ko ni shwapoi bibii babaoo yɔɔ mli ni abobalɔi baanyɛ aná ameo, sɛbɛi kɛ amɛhenɔi, aduawa, loo, wuɔ loo, kɛ niyenii bibii krokomɛi yɛ jɛmɛ.
Shi Israelbii lɛ fɛɛ miishe Goliat gbeyei, ejaakɛ eda waa diɛŋtsɛ.
He Pɔtɛɛ Ko—Ni Ji Maŋtiase Wulu loo Hiɛnɔkamɔi Wuji ni Baaa Mli?
Amɛbaanyɛ amɛba kɛjɛ gbɔmɛi ni eshi kɛtee maŋtiase wulu lɛ mli ni hiɛ egboi akɛ amɛbaaku sɛɛ kɛya amɛ akrowai ni amɛjɛ mli kɛba lɛ amli lɛ anaa.
Hewɔ lɛ, amrɔ nɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ ehe shi waa yɛ Ŋshɔkpɔ Tsuru Agbo lɛ nɔ fe tsutsu lɛ.—Yes.
Enɛ heɔ be kɛ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ babaoo.
Gbɔmɛi nɛɛ hi shi jeeŋmɔ yɛ Yerusalem maŋ kpeteŋkpele lɛ mli.
Nyɔŋmɔ le he ni Yona yɔɔ hu beni yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ ashɛ lɛ afɔ ŋshɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ni Yehowa nu Yona he beni ejɛ ŋshɔŋ loo agbo lɛ musuŋ ewo shi akɛ ebaaye eshiwooi lɛ anɔ lɛ.
(Efesobii 4:14) Yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, kɛtsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ ahe nilee kɛ shishinumɔ ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔfee yiŋkpɛi bibii kɛ ewuji ni nilee yɔɔ mli, ní he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ kɛha wɔ, ní baatswa wɔnanemɛi jalɔi lɛ ema shi, ni nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ ebaasa wɔ ŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ hiɛ.
Aahɔ̀ɔ atadei ni aŋmala wiemɔi ni kɔɔ afi akpe lɛ naagbee he yɛ maji ashwapoi kɛ maŋtiasei wuji ashwapoi hu amli.
(Filipibii 4:6) Kɛ́ okɛ onaanyo ni bɛŋkɛ bo kpaakpa yɛ lɛ, ani okɛ lɛ gbaa nibii wuji ni eba yɛ oshihilɛ mli lɛ pɛ ahe sane?
Kɛ́ wɔkɛ ekãa tsu nitsumɔ ni Yehowa kɛwo wɔdɛŋ lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ no baanyɛ aye abua wɔ ni wɔjwɛŋmɔ ahi sane ni kɔɔ jeŋ muu fɛɛ nɔyeli he lɛ nɔ?
7, 8. (a) Mɛɛ odaseyeli yɔɔ ni tsɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ webii ‘eha amɛtaŋkpei lɛ ekɛlɛ’?
Salomo yeee Nyɔŋmɔ anɔkwa kɛyawulaaa shi, ni tsɔɔ akɛ eyeee omanye lɛɛlɛŋ yɛ shihilɛ mli.
Eeenyɛ efee akɛ, no mli lɛ Maŋtsɛ Nebukadnezar miitao ni Daniel ana akɛ, Babilonbii lɛ anyɔŋmɔ lɛ he wa fe Yehowa, Daniel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ. —Dan.
Ni nyɛsɔlea nyɛbia Nyɔŋmɔ yelikɛbuamɔ koni nyɛna nɛkɛ suɔmɔ ni nɔ kwɔ, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yibii nɛɛ eko.—Abɛi 3:5, 6; Yohane 17:3; Galatabii 5:22; Hebribii 10:24, 25.
Harmagedon ta lɛ jeee nifeemɔ ko ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛbaaye mɛi awui.
Gbalɛ ni kɔɔ Yerusalem hiɛkpatamɔ lɛ he lɛ haa anaa yɛ faŋŋ mli akɛ Yehowa ji Nyɔŋmɔ ni ‘haa ewebii lɛ nuɔ nibii heei dani amɛpueɔ.’—Yesaia 42:9.
Mɛni Shebna sane lɛ hãa wɔleɔ yɛ bɔ Nyɔŋmɔ tsɔseɔ wɔ lɛ he?
Abonsam kɛ amanehului srɔtoi ba nuu anɔkwafo lɛ nɔ bɔni afee ni no aha ekpa Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ.
Tsɔɔmɔ mli akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsɔɔ akɛ “suɔmɔ onaanyo.”—Mat.
(Romabii 16:20) Kɛkɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baaye adesai anɔ ni ebaahã amɛhi shi yɛ miishɛɛ kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli taakɛ eto ni amɛhi shi lɛ. —Kanemɔ Kpojiemɔ 21:3-5.
NYƆŊMƆ WIEMƆ LƐ MLI JWETRII | MARKO 13-14
Ehe miihia ni ‘oná shwelɛ’ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ.
Protestant osɔfonukpa ko ŋma wolo eyaha esɔfo lɛ akɛ, ‘Nyɔŋmɔ tsu [Hitler] kɛba wɔŋɔɔ.’
Yɛ afii ohai abɔ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli lɛ, Israelbii lɛ —ní maŋtsɛmɛi babaoo fata he lɛ —kpoo Nyɔŋmɔ kɔkɔbɔi lɛ.

Ŋoo Ŋshɔ (Ŋshɔ ni Egbo)
Nyɛhaa nyɛ wiemɔ he abaa nyam daa, ni ŋoo ahi mli, ni nyɛle bɔ ni sa akɛ nyɛhaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ hetoo.” (Wɔma efã ko nɔ mi.)—Kolosebii 4:5, 6.
24 Okɛ amɛ baaba Yehowa hiɛ, ni osɔfoi lɛ kɛ ŋoo baashwã amɛnɔ,+ ni amɛkɛ amɛ baashã shãa afɔle amɛhã Yehowa.

F9 Ŋoo Ŋshɔ
(Kɛ ŋoo lɛ jara waaa lɛ, abaahe fɛɛ, ni minaŋ ŋoo ni mikɛbaatsu nii ni mikɛshiɛ dɔŋŋ!)

Mɛni hewɔ wiemɔ ni ji “esha gbɔmɔ lɛ” sa Kristendom osɔfoi lɛ?
Beni Yesu yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mɔ ko nyɛŋ aba miŋɔɔ, akɛ ja tsɛ lɛ ni tsu mi lɛ gbala lɛ dã . . .
No hewɔ lɛ, Yesaia kɛɛ akɛ: “Ha ní mɔ fɔŋ akwa egbɛ̀i lɛ, ni nɔ̃ sha feelɔ akwa ejwɛŋmɔi lɛ, ní eku esɛɛ kɛba Yehowa ŋɔɔ, ni emusuŋ aaatsɔ lɛ yɛ ehewɔ, kɛ wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ŋɔɔ, shi ekɛaafa lɛ aahu!”—Yesaia 55:7.
“NYƆŊMƆ bɔ gbɔmɔ yɛ esubaŋ lɛ nɔ, Nyɔŋmɔ subaŋ lɛ nɔ ebɔ lɛ yɛ; nuu kɛ yoo ebɔ amɛ.”
(Ezekiel 18:4) Eyɛ mli akɛ esoro enɛ kwraa yɛ nɔ ni Kristendom tsɔɔ lɛ he moŋ, shi ekɛ nɔ ni nilelɔ Salomo jɛ mumɔ tsirɛmɔ naa ewie lɛ kpãa gbee jogbaŋŋ kɛmɔɔ shi, akɛ: “Hiɛkalɔi le akɛ amɛbaagboi; shi gbohii lɛ, amɛleee nɔ ko nɔ ko, ni amɛbɛ nyɔmɔwoo ko dɔŋŋ [yɛ shihilɛ nɛɛ mli]; ejaakɛ hiɛ eje amɛkaimɔ nɔ.
Ni mɔ ni egbo lɛ te shi eta shi, ni ebɔi wiemɔ; ni eŋɔ lɛ eha enyɛ.
Yɛ adesa yinɔsane shishijee mli lɛ, wɔ klɛŋklɛŋ fɔlɔi Adam kɛ Hawa bo Satan Abonsam toi ni amɛtse atua amɛshi Nyɔŋmɔ.
Aram kɛ Israel maŋtsɛmɛi lɛ kpaŋ akɛ amɛbaakpá Maŋtsɛ Ahaz ákɛ Yuda maŋtsɛ, koni amɛwo Tabeel bi ní ejeee David seshinyo lɛ maŋtsɛ, ní amɛkudɔ Tabeel bi nɛɛ nifeemɔi.
Shi amrɔ nɛɛ, mɛi fɛɛ gboiɔ ejaakɛ klɛŋklɛŋ gbɔmɔ lɛ kpoo gbɛtsɔɔmɔ ni Bɔlɔ lɛ kɛhã lɛ lɛ. —Kanemɔ 1 Mose 1:27; 2:15-17.
Elá yɛ Yehowa he akɛ: “Kɛ́ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ ni ji owaabii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ: Mɛni ji adesa, ní ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? aloo gbɔmɔ bi, ní osaraa lɛ po?”
Kɛ akɛ hiŋmɛi to tsɔnei ni adesai fee he lɛ, mɛni wɔnaa?
Naagbee kwraa, yɛ afi 33 Ŋ.B. yɛ March naagbee gbɛ kɛmiimɔ April mli lɛ, agbɛnɛ be bashɛ ni abaaŋɔ gbɔmɔbi lɛ aha Henyɛlɔ lɛ koni etswa enanetsitsi nɔ̃.
ROBERT, obalanyo fioo ni jɛ Canada lɛ tsɔ gbɛfaa nɔ ekpa shi kɛtsɔ Europa ni eetao egbɛhe yɛ shihilɛ mli.
Yesu ji mɔ ko ni baanyɛ aha sane fɛɛ sane ni abiɔ lɛ yɛ anɔkwayeli mli lɛ hetoo, shi ehaaa Pilato hetoo.
Ni ji, hiɛshikalɔ fɛɛ hiɛshikalɔ ni boɔ mi toi lɛ, baakɛɛ mi akɛ,
Kɛ́ jeee nakai lɛ, amanehulu baajɛ mli aba, tamɔ bɔ ni kɛ́ mɔ ko ku ehiɛ eshwie hewalɛ ni gbalaa nii kɛbaa shi lɛ nɔ ni etu kɛjɛ tsũ kakadaŋŋ ko yiteŋ lɛ, ebaapila lɛ.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, gbɔmɔ pɛ baanyɛ ajie Bɔlɔ lɛ sui akpo, mɔ ni wie lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe akɛ “Yehowa, Yehowa, Nyɔŋmɔ musuŋtsɔlɔ kɛ durolɔ ni toɔ tsui, ni mɔbɔnalɛ kɛ anɔkwale fa pii.”—2 Mose 34:6.
Taakɛ atsɔɔ yɛ Mateo 16:27, 28 lɛ, beni ewieɔ ‘emaŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli ni eeeba’ lɛ he lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ: “Ejaakɛ gbɔmɔ Bi lɛ baaba yɛ e-Tsɛ anunyam lɛ mli kɛ ebɔfoi lɛ; ni no mli lɛ eeewo mɔ fɛɛ mɔ nyɔmɔ yɛ enitsumɔ naa.”
“Nɔ̃ ŋmɛlɛtswaa ni nyɛsusuuu lɛ nɔ gbɔmɔ bi lɛ baa.”—Mateo 24:44.
40 “Kɛji nuu ko yiteŋ kpa, ni etsɔ yiteŋkpataatsɛ lɛ, ehe tse.
(Kpojiemɔ 21:8, 27; 22:15) Kɛji akɛ ale wɔ akɛ wɔwieɔ anɔkwale lɛ, ehaa mɛi krokomɛi heɔ nɔ ni wɔwieɔ lɛ amɛyeɔ; amɛkɛ amɛhe fɔ̃ɔ wɔnɔ.
