Yaa Nɔ ‘Ofee Ekpakpa’
Ni nakai pɛpɛɛpɛ Yesu fee yɛ Nisan 14, afi 33 Ŋ.B.
Mɛɛ odasefoi krokomɛi wɔtaoɔ dɔŋŋ?
3, 4. (a) Yɛ sũ ni ekɛbɔ gbɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ, mɛni Nyɔŋmɔ ekpɛɛɛ eyiŋ akɛ eba?
(b) Mɛni ji sabalai komɛi ni akɛtsɛɔ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ, ni mɛni hewɔ amɛsa lɛ?
Belɛ, mɛni hewɔ wielɔ ní sumɔɔ Yehowa ní heɔ nɔ ni ekɛɔ lɛ eyeɔ lɛ baanyɛ afee mɔ ni bɛ miishɛɛ beni ewieɔ lɛ?
Mɛɛ hegbɛ ni fe fɛɛ wɔkɛwoɔ wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ hiɛ nyam nɛ!
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni ooosusu akɛ ole gbɛ ni hi jogbaŋŋ ni oootsɔ nɔ ojie mɔhesusumɔ kpo otsɔɔ ohefatalɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ obiii lɛ ni etsɔɔ bo nɔ ni kɛ́ ofee lɛ ebaanya he waa?
Kɛ́ aaka wɔ lɛ, mɛni esa akɛ wɔha ehi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli?
Wɔgbala mli wɔtsɔɔ wɔtsɔɔlɔ lɛ akɛ wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔnɔ̃ lɛ afee sɔrɔto yɛ nɔ ni nikaselɔi krokomɛi toɔ gbɛjianɔ ni amɛkɛsaa amɛhe lɛ he.
Okɛ nɔ ni Biblia lɛ gba fɔ̃ shi lɛ ato nɔ ni atswaa he adafi nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ ni atsitsii tã yɛ shishigbɛ lɛ ahe okwɛ, ni no sɛɛ lɛ omu sane naa oha ohe.
Mɛni ehe hiaa ní amɛle?
Etsɔ ŋaa gbɛ nɔ egbala nɔ ni ehenilee baaŋmɛ lɛ gbɛ ni ekɛ ehe awo mli kɛ nɔ ni ehenilee eŋmɛŋ lɛ gbɛ ni efee lɛ mli faŋŋ eha ewu.
Mɛni Yehowa taoɔ yɛ mɛi ni etsɔɔ amɛ nii lɛ adɛŋ?
Mɛni baaye abua bii koni amɛto amɛtsui shi?
Shishitoo mla kome ni bafee yelikɛbuamɔ nɔ krɛdɛɛ ji enɛ: “Nyɛkakojoa, koni akakojo nyɛ. Shi nɔ kojomɔ ni nyɛŋɔkojoɔ lɛ, aaaŋɔ kojo nyɛ.”
Mɛɛ kwashiai asane nɛ!
Kɛkɛ ni Abner yakpã nɔ ni Israel kɛ Benyamin shĩa lɛ fɛɛ ekpɛ mli akɛ amɛbaafee lɛ ewo David toiiaŋ yɛ Hebron.
4 SANEBIMƆ: Mɛni ji Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ?
6 Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ wɔɔtsɔ wɔná nɔ ni Paulo ŋma kɛyaha Tito lɛ he sɛɛ?
Shi kɛlɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔkai akɛ, kɛji ajɛko ŋwɛi akɛ shishitoo mla, loo mla hako lɛ, ebafeŋ nɔ ni sa akɛ wɔɔjɛ wɔ henilee mli wɔkojo naanyo Kristofonyo yɛ saji ni ji mɔ aŋkro nɔ̃ lɛ mli.—Romabii 14:1-4; Galatabii 6:5.
(b) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yesu tsɔ ejaje ebɔfoi lɛ ajwɛŋmɔ, ni mɛni Kristofoi ni yɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ baanyɛ akase kɛjɛ mli?
Kɛji Yiŋkɔshikɔshifeemɔi yɛ Lolo Hu?
Shi be ko be ni akpa asafoŋ kpee lɛ, nyɛmi nuu ko kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Miida bo shi waa, ejaakɛ ofee nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa ohã miweku lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, miiŋma kɛda nyɛ shi babaoo yɛ gbɛkɛ Weku Jamɔ lɛ hewɔ.
Hã nɔ ni okaneɔ lɛ ashɛ otsui he, ni osɔle oda Yehowa shi yɛ nibii kpakpai ni okaseɔ lɛ ahewɔ
18 Ani Okaiɔ Akɛ Obaakɛɛ Akɛ Miida Bo Shi?
Hã ena akɛ ohiɛ sɔɔ nibii fɛɛ ni efee ehã bo lɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ Ofe, osa woo kɛ yijiemɔ.
Be ni osɔleɔ lɛ, oda shi yɛ niyenii lɛ hewɔ, shi jeee niyeli be po nɛ!”
Kɛji obii lɛ fee nibii ni akpaa gbɛ akɛ amɛfee po lɛ, ani odaa amɛ shi?
1 “Wɔmiida nyɛ shi yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni nyɛfeɔ nyɛhaa wɔ lɛ he.
Agbɛnɛ hu, miida nyɛ shi akɛ nyɛtsɔse mi kɛ suɔmɔ, ni nyɛyaa nɔ nyɛkɛ nyɛhe shãa afɔle koni manyɛ maya nɔ masɔmɔ yɛ biɛ.”
Beni ewieɔ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ kɛ wɔsɛɛ be fɛɛ he lɛ, lalatsɛ David saa ema nɔ mi kɛha wɔ fɛɛ ekoŋŋ beni ewie yɛ shidaa sɔlemɔ mli kɛha Yehowa lɛ akɛ: “Ni mi lɛ, ohiɛ mimli yɛ mimuuyeli lɛ mli, ni okɛ mi edamɔ ohiɛ kɛmiiya naanɔ.
Akɛni nikasemɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ woɔ wɔ hewalɛ ni wɔpɛi sɔlemɔ kɛ faikpamɔi, shidaa wiemɔi, kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ yijiemɔi ni aŋmala yɛ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ amli hewɔ lɛ, ebaanyɛ eye ebua bo koni ona gbɛ̀i anɔ ni oootsɔ oha osɔlemɔi amɔ shi.
16 Agbɛnɛ, shidaa ahã Nyɔŋmɔ ejaakɛ ekɛ nyɛhe mɔdɛŋ ni wɔbɔɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ eko wo Tito+ tsui mli, 17 ejaakɛ emɔ hewalɛwoo lɛ mli lɛɛlɛŋ, shi akɛni eyɛ he miishɛɛ waa hewɔ lɛ, eeba nyɛŋɔɔ yɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ esuɔmɔ naa.
KAA ENƐ OKWƐ: Nyɛŋɔa minitii fioo daa gbɛkɛ koni ákɛ wu kɛ ŋa lɛ, nyɛkɛsusu nibii kpakpai ni ba nyɛshihilɛ mli yɛ gbi lɛ mli, ní nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛda Nyɔŋmɔ shi yɛ he lɛ ahe.
Nakai nɔŋŋ hu yɛ be mli ni amanehulu kpeteŋkpele lɛ mli ahum ni tswaa lɛ naa eba shi lɛ, obaanyɛ okwɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ kɛkpe kɛ shidaa akɛ oyɛ wala mli ni ofee klalo akɛ okɛ ohe baawo Yehowa nitsumɔ ni yɔɔ ni ji shikpɔŋ ni atsuu nɔ lɛ ni aaatsake lɛ afee lɛ anunyam paradeiso lɛ mli.
16 Ni onukpai 24+ ni tara amɛmaŋtsɛ sɛii anɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ lɛ kɛ amɛhiɛ bumɔ shi ni amɛjá Nyɔŋmɔ 17 amɛkɛɛ: “Wɔmiida bo shi, Yehowa* Nyɔŋmɔ, Ofe lɛ, mɔ ni yɔɔ amrɔ nɛɛ+ kɛ mɔ ni yɛ momo lɛ, ejaakɛ oŋɔ ohewalɛ kpeteŋkpele lɛ, ni obɔi nɔyeli akɛ maŋtsɛ.
14 Miida Nyɔŋmɔ shi akɛ mibaptisiii nyɛteŋ mɔ ko akɛ ja Krispo+ kɛ Gaio,+ 15 koni mɔ ko akakɛɛ akɛ abaptisi nyɛ yɛ migbɛ́i mli.
Ekɛ ehiŋmɛiiaŋ yaafonui kɛɛ Odasefoi lɛ akɛ: “Miida nyɛ shi yɛ mɔdɛŋ ni nyɛbɔɔ koni nyɛkase mimaŋ wiemɔ ni wa lɛ.
NYƐMIYOO Kristofonyo ko ŋma akɛ: “Miida nyɛ shi waa yɛ saji ni yeɔ ebuaa waa, ni yɔɔ Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ mli sane ni ji ‘Obaanyɛ Ona Miishɛjemɔ yɛ Haomɔ Bei Amli’* lɛ he.
Ani odaaa shi akɛ Odasefonyo ni jaje anɔkwale lɛ etsɔɔ bo lɛ kã he aahu?
30 “Kɛ́ wiemɔi nɛɛ fɛɛ ba onɔ, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ ni mikɛshwie ohiɛ lɛ,+ ni okai nibii nɛɛ*+ yɛ jeŋmaji fɛɛ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbɛ bo eshwã amɛmli lɛ ateŋ,+ 2 ni oku osɛɛ kɛba Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ŋɔɔ,+ ni okɛ otsui fɛɛ kɛ osusuma* fɛɛ bo egbee toi yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni mifãa bo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ anaa,+ bo kɛ obihii lɛ, 3 no lɛ, Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baahã onomii lɛ aku amɛsɛɛ kɛba,+ ni ebaana bo mɔbɔ+ ni ebaabua onaa ekoŋŋ kɛjɛ maji fɛɛ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbɛ bo eshwã amɛmli lɛ amli.
36 “Kɛ́ amɛfee esha amɛshi bo (ejaakɛ mɔ ko mɔ ko bɛ ni efeee esha),+ ni omli fu amɛ, ni okɛ amɛ wo henyɛlɔ ko dɛŋ, ni amɛhenyɛlɔ lɛ ŋɔ amɛ nom kɛtee shikpɔŋ ko nɔ, he ni jekɛ jio, he ni jekɛɛɛ jio,+ 37 ni amɛhiɛ tserɛ amɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni aŋɔ amɛ nom kɛtee nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛku amɛsɛɛ kɛba oŋɔɔ, ni amɛkpa bo fai ni ona amɛ mɔbɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni aŋɔ amɛ nom kɛtee nɔ lɛ nɔ amɛkɛɛ, ‘Wɔfee esha ni wɔtɔ̃; wɔfee efɔŋ,’+ 38 ni amɛku amɛsɛɛ kɛba oŋɔɔ kɛ amɛtsui fɛɛ+ kɛ amɛsusuma* fɛɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni aŋɔ amɛ nom+ kɛtee nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛtsɔ amɛhiɛ amɛhã amɛshikpɔŋ lɛ ni okɛhã amɛtsɛmɛi lɛ kɛ maŋ ni ohala+ lɛ kɛ shĩa ni mima mihã ogbɛ́i lɛ, ni amɛsɔle amɛhã bo lɛ, 39 no lɛ, jɛɛ ŋwɛi, ni ji oshihilɛhe lɛ onu amɛsɔlemɔ kɛ amɛfaikpamɔ kɛhã mɔbɔnalɛ lɛ, ni oye amɛsane ohã amɛ,+ ni okɛ esha ni omaŋbii lɛ efee amɛshi bo lɛ ake amɛ.
11 Kɛkɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ Solomon akɛ: “Akɛni enɛ ji nɔ ni oshweɔ yɛ otsui mli ni obiii ni oná nii, kɛ jwetrii, kɛ anunyam, aloo ni mɛi ni nyɛɔ bo lɛ agboi,* loo walasɛɛtsɛlɛ,* shi obi hiɛshikamɔ kɛ nilee koni okɛkojo miwebii ni miwó bo amɛnɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ hewɔ lɛ,+ 12 obaaná hiɛshikamɔ kɛ nilee; shi agbɛnɛ hu, mahã oná nii, kɛ jwetrii, kɛ anunyam bɔ ni maŋtsɛmɛi ni etsɔ ohiɛ lɛ eko kwraa náaa nakai, ni mɛi ni baaba yɛ osɛɛ lɛ ateŋ mɔ ko hu náŋ nakai.”
Paulo jaje akɛ: “Wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔ-Nuntsɔ Yesu Kristo tsɛ lɛ shi [NW shishigbɛ niŋmaa, “wɔsɔleɔ daa”] yɛ nyɛhewɔ daa nɛɛ yɛ wɔsɔlemɔi amli.”
Wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔda bo shi babaoo.”
Kɛ bo diɛŋtsɛ otao mli lɛ, onaŋ ni akɛ halo loo krɔŋkrɔŋ nii kokoroo ko ebɔle eyitso he ni akɛmiitsɔɔ bɔ ni eji, ni eta maŋtsɛsɛi nɔ akɛ “nyɛ-maŋnyɛ” ni Kristo anunyam ni kpɛɔ lɛ eyi lɛ obɔ.
Feemɔ Elia he mfoniri okwɛ; atsĩɛ lɛ kɛjɛ wɔ mli yɛ eshitoohe ni yɔɔ Yezreel yɛ nakai gbɛkɛ ni ahum miitswa, ni nugbɔ hu miinɛ waa lɛ—koni ebo hegbeyeiwoo wiemɔi ni maŋnyɛ lɛ tsulɔ lɛ hiɛ kɛba lɛ toi.
Aloo ekolɛ maŋnyɛ ni he yɔɔ fɛo waa nɛɛ jeee mɔ ni baa ehe shi diɛŋtsɛ.
Ni kɛlɛ, Biblia lɛ tsĩ nɔyelɔ kome pɛ tã —Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ.
(Yesaia 26:5) Abuŋ lɛ akɛ “oje kɛ mɔ ní ahiɛɔ lɛ dɔdɔɔdɔ dɔŋŋ,” tamɔ maŋnyɛ ní ahiɛɔ lɛ fɔfɔle lɛ.
Beni Maŋnyɛ Ester taoɔ ni ebi ewu koni efite Haman ŋaatsɔɔ fɔŋ ni eto ni ekɛbaakpata Yudafoi lɛ ahiɛ lɛ, ekɛ hiɛshikamɔ to nibii ahe gbɛjianɔ bɔni afee ni ewu ahi miishɛɛ shihilɛ mli.
Enɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Ahab we lɛ mlinyo ni agbe ji Maŋnyɛ Izebel yitsoŋwalɔ lɛ.
Maŋnyɛ Vashti booo maŋtsɛ lɛ toi (10-12)
Akɛni gbɛii “kooyigbɛ maŋtsɛ” kɛ “wuoyigbɛ maŋtsɛ” ji sablãi hewɔ lɛ, amɛbaanyɛ amɛkɔ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yeɔ nɔ lɛ he, ni maŋtsɛ, maŋnyɛ, loo maji akuu fata he.
Shi kɛlɛ, kadimɔ akɛ, maŋnyɛ lɛ nu Salomo yijiemɔ “ni ená yɛ Yehowa gbɛi lɛ hewɔ lɛ” he.
Amɔ Emlyn ni akɛ lɛ tee saneyelihe ni fe fɛɛ (Queen’s Bench Court) ni yɔɔ Dublin lɛ yɛ June 14, 1703, koni eyajie enaa.
Akɛni maŋnyɛ lɛ jwɛŋmɔ tsakeɔ oya, ni agbɛnɛ hu maŋ onukpai ni sumɔɔ ni atsa blema kpãa nɔ lɛ miiná maŋnyɛ lɛ nɔ hewalɛ babaoo hewɔ lɛ, no tsirɛ maŋsɛɛ shiɛlɔi lɛ koni amɛkɛ oyaiyeli agbe Biblia lɛ kalamɔ naa.
10 Ni yɛ gbi kpawo lɛ nɔ be ni wain lɛ ehã maŋtsɛ lɛ ená miishɛɛ* waa lɛ, ekɛɛ Mehuman kɛ Bizta kɛ Harbona+ kɛ Bigta kɛ Abagta kɛ Zeter kɛ Karkas, ni ji maŋtsɛ shĩa onukpai kpawo ni sɔmɔɔ Maŋtsɛ Ahasweros lɛ, 11 koni amɛyaŋɔ Maŋnyɛ Vashti kɛba ehiɛ, ebu maŋnyɛ akekere* lɛ kɛba, ni ekɛ ehefɛo lɛ abatsɔɔ maŋbii lɛ kɛ lumɛi lɛ, ejaakɛ ehe yɛ fɛo waa.
Ato tsatsubii ahe gbɛjianɔ awo kui kui amli, ni yɛ kui nɛɛ ateŋ babaoo amli lɛ ayɛ tsatsu henɔi srɔtoi etɛ: maŋnyɛmɛi, hii, kɛ nitsulɔi.
Namɔ po eto eyiŋ akɛ ebaaye emaŋnyɛ lɛ awui lɛ?
(1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 5:5, 9, 10, 14) Gbɔi ni ba Salomo ŋɔɔ lɛ ateŋ mɔ titri ji Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ.
16 Maŋtsɛ Asa hã enaa Maaka+ po kpa maŋnyɛyeli, ejaakɛ no mli lɛ enaa efee amaga ko ni bɛ hiŋmɛi nɔ ni akɛjáa wɔŋ tso* lɛ.
18 Bii* lɛ yabuaa tsei lɛ anaa, ni tsɛmɛi lɛ shɛreɔ la, ni ŋamɛi lɛ kpɔtɔɔ ashikishaŋ koni amɛkɛfee afɔleshaa keeki amɛhã Ŋwɛi Maŋnyɛ* lɛ,+ ni amɛfɔseɔ dãa afɔle amɛshwieɔ shi amɛhãa nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi koni amɛkɛwo mimli la.
(Salomo Lalai 3:6-11) Eha eyahi odehei ashia, shia ni yɔɔ fɛo aahu akɛ beni Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ na lɛ, “ehe jɔ̃ ehe naakpa.”—1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 10:4, 5.
Wolo ko (A History of Madagascar) tsɔɔ mli akɛ, “mɛi ayibɔ ni abaptisi lɛ gba maŋ onukpai ni sumɔɔ akɛ atsa blema kpãa nɔ lɛ anaa, ni amɛha maŋnyɛ lɛ nu shishi akɛ nuŋtsɔ lɛ niyenii ni amɛyeɔ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ amɛmiika kitã akɛ amɛbaafi Britain nɔyeli lɛ sɛɛ.”
8 Beni maŋnyɛ lɛ gba ewu, maŋtsɛ lɛ, lamɔ lɛ, ebua Hindu osɔfoi 64 ni ehe gbɛi anaa, elɛ amɛ ni ewo amɛ atadei, ni ebi ni amɛtsɔɔ lamɔ lɛ shishi.
Yɛ haomɔ ni ji ejwɛ lɛ mli lɛ, ofɔii fite shikpɔŋ lɛ, amɛbote shiai fɛɛ mli, ni amɛho yɛ atatuiaŋ ni amɛjaa no hu akɛ nyɔŋmɔ Shu loo nyɔŋmɔ-yoo Isis, ŋwɛi maŋnyɛ lɛ.
No beaŋ lɛ, Maŋnyɛ Izebel egbe Yehowa tsuji babaoo, shi nuu nɛɛ fĩ shi shiŋŋ, ni ete shi eshi Baal jamɔ.
Be ko lɛ, Maŋtsɛ Ahasweros miitao maŋnyɛ hee.
Osai nyɛɔ esɔmɔɔ akɛ “piafonyo ní kwɛɔ yei lɛ,” “maŋtsɛ piafonyo ní kwɛɔ ehemɛi lɛ,” loo sɔɔlɔ ní sɔmɔɔ maŋnyɛ lɛ.
Nyɛminuu Cantwell ŋma akɛ, “Etsɛɛɛ kwraa ni wɔye shika ni wɔna kɛjɛ wɔŋmɔ ni wɔhɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ fɛɛ —titri lɛ yɛ helatsamɔ shika fitemɔ hewɔ.
Lamai lɛ hu tsuɔ nii akɛ tsɔɔlɔi, datrɛfoi, shikpɔŋ-tsɛmɛi, kɛ maŋkwramɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi.
Beni miku sɛɛ kɛtee shia lɛ, mihe yaye waa, shi Ataa kɛ mi tee datrɛfonyo ko ŋɔɔ, etsɛɛɛ ni miná hewalɛ ekoŋŋ.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ, helatsamɔ he jeŋba he nikasemɔ baatsu gbɛfaŋnɔ ko ni he hiaa he nii, koni amɛkɛha datrɛfoi kɛ helatsɛmɛi ateŋ naanyobɔɔ aya hiɛ, koni amɛkɛ bulɛ babaoo aha nɔ ni helatsɛ lɛ sumɔɔ ni afee aha lɛ lɛ.
Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, helatsamɔ nitsulɔi akpei nyɔŋmai komɛi—ni datrɛfoi kɛ amɛhenɔi fɛɛ fata he lɛ—kɛ Yehowa Odasefoi ni yaa helatsamɔhei lɛ kpãa gbee, ni amɛkpɛlɛɔ wɔshidaamɔ akɛ wɔsumɔɔɔ ni ahã wɔ lá lɛ nɔ.
Eji Nyɔŋmɔjamɔ he nilelɔ kpanaa kɛ Biblia kasemɔi ahe nilelɔ kpele yɛ University of Wittenberg.
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, datrɛfonyo lɛ wo shi akɛ ebaafee nɔ n mitao akɛ efee lɛ.
Ekolɛ akɛni Luka ji datrɛfonyo hewɔ lɛ, eŋma nibii ni Yesu wie akɛ akɛye abua nuu ni epila lɛ he sane ní wein ní gbeɔ fala, mu ní baa piŋmɔ shi, kɛ fala nɔ fiimɔ fata he lɛ.—Luka 10:30-37.
9 Kɛ́ ohe miiye lɛ, mɛɛ datrɛfonyo osumɔɔ ni ekwɛ bo?
Datrɛfonyo ni mli jɔ ni jajeɔ wui ni ekumɔ lɛ wieɔ sɛɛnamɔi ni yɔɔ nifeemɔ gbɛ lɛ he lɛ he ekpakpa.
Bei pii lɛ, datrɛfoi jieɔ yi akɛ lá ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli lɛ haa hewalɛ ni kansa tsofai náa yɛ mɔ nɔ lɛ naa baa shi.
Beni eshɛ enɔ ni ebaana datrɛfonyo lɛ, eŋmɛ gbɛ koni yoo lɛ aya dã.
(7) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ datrɛfoi baanyɛ atsɔ ni (a) amɛkaha lá pii miiho mɔ ko, (b) amɛbaa walayibii tsuji ni yɔɔ mɔ ko mli lɛ yi, (d) amɛha gbɔmɔtso lɛ afee lá pii, kɛ (e) amɛbaa lá ni hoɔ mɔ lɛ yi?
Oya nɔŋŋ ni akɛ mi tee ni ayafee mi opireshɛn, shi datrɛfoi lɛ bɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ tsɔ akɛ miyi baaná wala.
Datrɛfoi etsɔɔ akɛ mlifu kɛ mlila ji henumɔi ni haa helai tamɔ fɛ̃fɛ̃, hewolɔ nɔ helai, musuŋtsĩi, kɛ musuŋ faji amli woɔ wu.
No hewɔ lɛ datrɛfonyo lɛ ŋma mla naa gbɛtsɔɔmɔ ni “miifã” Marie koni eya Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ kɛha hewalɛwoo kɛ naanyobɔɔ ni tswaa mɔ emaa shi.
Taakɛ bɔ ni okadii srɔtoi ni yɔɔ helatsɛ ko he lɛ hãa datrɛfonyo nyɛɔ enaa hela ni yeɔ lɛ lɛ, nibii ni atsĩtsĩi tã yɛ nakai gbalɛi lɛ amli lɛ fɛɛ hã miyɔse akɛ wɔyɛ be ni Biblia lɛ tsɛ lɛ “naagbee gbii lɛ”* mli.
Eyɛ mli akɛ datrɛfonyo lɛ miitao eya shia moŋ, shi eha mibote e-ɔfis lɛ, ni wɔwie ŋmɛlɛtswai enyɔ.
Afii fioo komɛi nɛ ni datrɛfoi yɔse oshara kroko hu (“third-hand smoke”).
(Abɛi 14:15) Yɛ je lɛŋ hei komɛi ni datrɛfoi kɛ helatsamɔhei faaa yɛ lɛ, ekolɛ shikpɔŋ tsofa ni akɛtsáa hela lɛ baafee tsofafeemɔ gbɛ pɛ ni yɔɔ.
Akpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ, ekolɛ datrɛfonyo ko baasumɔ ni aka gbɔmɔtso lɛ mli nibii komɛi ni apɛi mli akwɛ dã, tamɔ tsofai ni akɛaaka shãmɔ ni akɛpɛi mli akwɛ, gbɔmɔtso lɛ mli nibii ni efũu lɛ amlipɛimɔ kɛha helai ahe nikasemɔ, loo lá mli kwɛmɔ.
Tsɔne kuu fɛɛ kuu hiɛ tsɔne kudɔlɔi ekpaa, fitafonyo, tsɔnei akane he nitsulɔ, wiemɔ naajielɔ, nibii kɛ maŋsɛɛ majemɔ he nitsulɔ, nihoolɔ, datrɛfonyo, kuu lɛ hiɛnyiɛlɔ ni ta tsɔne bibioo ko mli, kɛ nyɛminuu ko ni hiɛ tsɔne ni awɔɔ mli.
Marina, ni eji datrɛfonyo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, misusuuu mimumɔŋ shidaamɔ he aahu kɛyashi be mli ni mibɔi nitsumɔ yɛ helatsamɔhe ni mibɔi mɛi krokomɛi apiŋmɔi ahe numɔ waa lɛ.
4 Kɛ́ ootsu nii, oyaana datrɛfonyo, loo oyaawo oketeke lɛ, ehe hiaa ni otsu he nii yɛ be pɔtɛɛ ko mli.
Ani ekolɛ omli fuɔ datrɛfoi, helatsɛmɛi akwɛlɔi, nanemɛi, aloo mɔ ni gbo lɛ po?
Ni beni yɛ naagbee lɛ akumɔ maŋtiase lɛ gbogboi lɛ, ekɛ famɔ ha akɛ akakpata sɔlemɔtsu lɛ hiɛ.
Kɛ́ otee asafoŋ onukpai lɛ aŋɔɔ lɛ, amɛkɛ bo baasɔle, ni amɛbaajɛ Biblia lɛ mli amɛye amɛbua bo, koni otsui anyɔ omli, ohenilee akabu bo fɔ tuutu, ni onyɛ odamɔ onaji anɔ ekoŋŋ yɛ Yehowa asafo lɛ mli. —Yakobo 5:14-16.
Maŋtsɛmɛi a-Wolo ni Ji Enyɔ lɛ wieɔ saji ni tee nɔ yɛ afii 340 mli lɛ ahe—kɛjɛ afi 920 D.Ŋ.B. kɛyashi afi 580 D.Ŋ.B., ni ji be ni gbalɔ Yeremia gbe wolo nɛɛ ŋmaa naa lɛ.
Akɛni amɛteŋ mɔ ko mɔ ko nyɛɛɛ awo nyɔmɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, “eŋɔke amɛyi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ.”
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ehe miihia ni asafoŋ onukpai afee ekãa be ni amɛtsuɔ saji ni kɔɔ eshai ni yɔɔ hiɛdɔɔ ahe lɛ ahe nii loo amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa mɛi ni yɔɔ helatsamɔhe ni amɛwala eyaje oshara mli lɛ.
Shi mɛni hewɔ ebaakwɛ koni mɛi nɛɛ fɛɛ agboi nakai beni ele jogbaŋŋ akɛ ebaanyɛ ebaa amɛyi lɛ?
(Romabii 15:4) Amaniɛbɔɔ ni kɔɔ Israelbii lɛ ní Yehowa kpɔ̃ amɛ kɛjɛ Mizraimbii ni wa amɛyi dɛŋdɛŋ lɛ adɛŋ lɛ he lɛ fata nibii abɔ ní aŋma ato momo yɛ wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔhe nitsɔɔmɔ ní baaha wɔná hiɛnɔkamɔ ni eshɛje wɔmii lɛ ahe.
KƐ́ OOKANE Biblia lɛ ni ona gbɛ́i ni ji Israel lɛ, mɛni baa ojwɛŋmɔ mli?
“Beni ote shi”: Wekui babaoo anine eshɛ jɔɔmɔi anɔ yɛ Biblia mli ŋmalɛ ko ní amɛsusuɔ he daa leebi lɛ hewɔ.
(2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 5:1-4) Obalanyo Daniel kɛ enanemɛi lɛ hiɛ amɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ mli beni akaa amɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mlai ni kɔɔ niyenii ahe lɛ gbɛfaŋ lɛ.
Taakɛ bɔ ni nitsulɔi ni yɔɔ Yerusalem lɛ tsake bɔ ni amɛtsuɔ nii lɛ amɛhaa lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ hu ŋmɛnɛ, kɛ́ ate shi awo Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ, amɛtsɔɔ ŋaa gbɛ nɔ amɛtsakeɔ gbɛ̀i anɔ ni amɛtsɔɔ amɛshiɛɔ lɛ.
Beni Osuɔlɔ ko Ekpa Yehowa Sɔɔmɔ
Beni Nyɔŋmɔ gbalɔ Samuel wie ehe ekpakpa lɛ, Saul kɛ heshibaa here nɔ akɛ: “Ani jeee Benyaminnyo ji mi, ni Israel akutsei lɛ amli nɔ ni ji bibioo fe fɛɛ lɛ mli mijɛ, ni miweku lɛ ji bibioo fe Benyamin akutso lɛ mli wekui lɛ fɛɛ?
Kɛ́ wɔkɛ mɛi ahe ke amɛ tswaa lɛ, wɔbaa ekomefeemɔ kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ yi, ni naanyobɔɔ hiɔ wɔ kɛ amɛ teŋ.
(Ezra 7:6) No hewɔ lɛ, Lalai awolo lɛ ji lalai komekomei beni abua naa lɛ.
Mɛni baaba beni átsu ŋwɛi kojomɔ he nii ashi Yuda lɛ, ni te esa akɛ nɔ ni ba nɛɛ he nilee ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ asa wɔhe aha tɛŋŋ?
Taakɛ akɛ kɔla eto naa lɛ, abaanyɛ akɛ ŋaawoo fɛɛ ŋaawoo ni jɛ 1 kɛyashi 17 lɛ atsu nii beni akɛ nikanemɔ nifeemɔ eha skulnyo lɛ.
• Mɛni esa akɛ wɔha ehi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli beni wɔkeɔ nii yɛ yookpeemɔ shishi loo akeɔ wɔ eko lɛ?
9:18) Ni kɛlɛ ekɛ hiɛsɔɔ kpɛlɛɔ gbɔ ni afeɔ lɛ kɛ nii ni mɛi krokomɛi keɔ lɛ lɛ anɔ kɛ amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛjie suɔmɔ kɛ hiɛsɔɔ kpo yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ.
Kɛ ebalɛ kojomɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yehowa kɛ shishitoo mla ni atsɔɔ mli yɛ Galatabii 6:4 lɛ tsuɔ nii yɛ?
Ni kɛ́ okɛ ohe wo Maŋtsɛyeli lalai lɛ alamɔ mli, kɛ́ oha saji ahetoo loo otsu nikaselɔ nifeemɔ ko he nii yɛ Teokrase Sɔɔmɔ Skul lɛ mli lɛ, ebaaha wɔ miishɛɛ lɛ ada.
(Kolosebii 1:9, 10) Ni kɛji wɔkɛ yiŋkpɛɛfeemɔ ko kpe lɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔtao Biblia shishitoo mlai lɛ fɛɛ ni kɔɔ sane lɛ he lɛ mli jogbaŋŋ.
Kɛ aatsɔɔ gbekɛbii lɛ bɔ ni atsɛɔ gbɔmɔtso lɛ hei komɛi lɛ, esaaa ni afoɔ amɛyayaiaŋ ashĩɔ tamɔ nɔ ni nomɛi atsɛmɔ yɛ hiɛgbele yɛ gbɛ ko nɔ.
36 Ni Israelbii lɛ agbɛfãi lɛ fɛɛ amli lɛ, kɛ́ atatu lɛ wó ehe nɔ yɛ sɔlemɔ buu lɛ nɔ lɛ, amɛfãa kɛyaa he kroko.
24:14) Kɛ́ gbɔmɛi eŋmɛɛɛ bo gbɛ ni owie po lɛ, jɛmɛ ni oyɔɔ lɛ kɛ odaseyeli baaha.
17 David maŋtsɛyeli lɛ ni abutu—kɛ Israel kooyigbɛ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ ni atsɔ hiɛ abutu lɛ—etsɔɔɔ akɛ Yehowa bɛ hegbɛ akɛ eyeɔ adesai anɔ loo akɛ enɔyeli lɛ nine enyɛ shi, shi moŋ etsɔɔ nɔ ni jɛɔ hewalɛ ni Satan náa yɛ mɛi anɔ kɛ adesai ahe ni amɛtseɔ kɛjɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he lɛ mli kɛbaa.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, ani wɔkɛɔ be fɛɛ be akɛ edɔ wɔ waa shi jeee nakai diɛŋtsɛ wɔtsɔɔ?
Nyɔŋmɔ tee nɔ ekɛ lɛ susu sane he akɛ: ‘Ni mi lɛ, Ninive maŋ kpeteŋkpele nɛɛ, ni gbɔmɛi fe 120,000 ni leee amɛninejurɔ kɛ amɛbɛku, kɛ kooloi babaoo hu yɔɔ mli lɛ, sane akadɔ mi, bɛ?’
Be mli ni wɔnaa bɔ ni shikpɔŋ lɛ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ nɔ lɛ ashihilɛ ehiii lɛ bianɛ lɛ, ani etsɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ klɛŋklɛŋ yiŋtoo ni eyɔɔ kɛha shikpɔŋ lɛ baŋ mli?
Asafoŋ onukpa ko ni kɛ eŋa ehi shi kɛmiishɛɛ afii 20 nɛ lɛ wie akɛ: “Bei komɛi lɛ wiemɔ ni ji, ‘Ofainɛ, mijeee gbɛ’ lɛ he hiaa kwraa fe ni aaakɛɛ akɛ, ‘Misumɔɔ bo.’”
Mitadei ni etserɛtserɛi ni lá ekpa mli fɛɛ lɛ ha mifee tamɔ mɔ ko ni nii yɔɔ mɔbɔ, shi nyɛmimɛi lɛ ná miishɛɛ akɛ amɛna mi.
Efɔɔ kaa akɛ kɛ́ atswa fɔlɔi komɛi tɛlifon, ni amɛsumɔɔɔ ni amɛkɛ mɔ lɛ awie lɛ, amɛkɛɔ amɛbi lɛ koni ekɛɛ mɔ lɛ akɛ, “Ofainɛ, mimami (loo mipapa) bɛ.”
Omli akafu, ni ohe akafee bo diɛŋtsɛ ohe mɔbɔ hu.
Eeena ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efĩ lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ehere mɛi ni efĩ amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.
Edɔ Petro waa akɛ emale yɛ gbɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ nɔ, ni eje kpo ni eyafó.
Ewa waa akɛ gbɔmɛi ni yɔɔ gbɔjɔmɔ loo amɛsumɔɔɔ akɛ anaa amɛtɔmɔi lɛ aaakɛɛ akɛ: ‘Mitɔ̃.’
Ŋwɛi Maŋtsɛ Yesu Kristo ‘baana ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efĩ lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ebaahere mɛi ni efĩ amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.’
Enu he akɛ fai ni ekpa amɛ lɛ ná ebii lɛ anɔ hewalɛ kpakpa; ewaaa kɛhaaa amɛ akɛ amɛaakpa fai kɛji amɛtɔ̃.
Yɛ be mli ni kojolɔ lɛ kɛɛ esa akɛ awo mi tsuŋ nyɔji ekpaa koni matsu nitsumɔ dɛŋdɛŋ lɛ, ekɛɛ mi akɛ edɔ lɛ akɛ aŋmɛɛɛ lɛ gbɛ koni eha tsuŋwoo lɛ sɛɛ atsɛ.
Esaaa akɛ wɔhiŋmɛi naa mɛi ni Nyɔŋmɔ kojomɔ baa amɛnɔ lɛ mɔbɔ, loo ní wɔmusuŋ atsɔ wɔ yɛ amɛ hewɔ.
13 Shi kɛlɛ, anɔkwale ní eji akɛ Yehowa tsuji ‘foɔ’ yɛ je lɛŋ shihilɛ ni efite lɛ he lɛ etsĩii amɛ miishɛɛnamɔ naa.
Ni kɛlɛ, mɛi komɛi shashaoɔ shi akɛ amɛaakɛɛ akɛ amɛshwa amɛhe, yɛ nibii ni ekolɛ eeenyɛ ejɛ mli kɛba lɛ hewɔ.
Yehowa bi Yona akɛ: “Ninive maŋ kpeteŋkpele nɛɛ, ní gbɔmɛi fe akpei-oha-kɛ-nyɔŋmai-enyɔ ni leee amɛninejurɔ kɛ amɛbɛku, . . . sane akadɔ mi, bɛ?”
Shi moŋ, etsɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ shwa ehe akɛ Saul bafee mɔ ni bɛ hemɔkɛyeli kɛ toigbolɔ.
Sane ni akɛkeɔ lɛ sa jogbaŋŋ, titri lɛ kɛji mɔ ni etɔ̃ lɛ kpɛlɛ etɔmɔ lɛ nɔ ni ekɛ anɔkwayeli jie dɔlɛ kpo yɛ he.
No hewɔ lɛ, enyɛ esɔle akɛ: “Mi-Nyɔŋmɔ, kaimɔ mi yɛ enɛ hu hewɔ, ni obaa miyi yɛ omɔbɔnalɛ falɛ lɛ naa!”
Obaanyɛ owie nɔ ko tamɔ nɛkɛ: “Edɔ mi waa akɛ onu nakai wiemɔi lɛ.
Amɛjɛ amɛsuɔmɔ mli amɛshwa amɛhe, ni amɛfee tsakemɔi ni sa.
12 Ani esa akɛ Yuda nii afee wɔ mɔbɔ?
Yɛ nɛkɛ yiŋtoi enyɔ nɛɛ—ákɛ mɛi babaoo taooo Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ sɛɛgbɛ ni ákɛ Satan yɛ ekãa waa yɛ je lɛŋ hewɔ lɛ—adesai aweku lɛ fɛɛ eyaje awerɛhoyeli shihilɛ mli.
Lɛlɛ lɛ miihoso kɛmiiya kɛmiiba yɛ ŋshɔkei wuji lɛ ahewɔ, ni nu miiba lɛlɛ lɛ mli.
Yɛ no sɛɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ha shikpɔŋ pue kɛjɛ nui lɛ amli.
Hela jeŋ nilelɔi susu akɛ jeee nugbɔnɛmɔ ni haa nu baa faai amli, shi ŋshɔŋ nu lɛ tsɔɔ shikpɔŋ shishi kɛyaa gɔji ayiteŋ, ni no tsɔɔ nu hiŋmɛii ni ŋoo bɛ mli.
(Yohane 3:5) No hewɔ lɛ, nu kɛ mumɔ ji nɔ ni akɛfɔɔ mɔ ekoŋŋ.
17 Kadimɔ akɛ gbɛshɔlɔ lɛ kɛ nu jieɔ muji ni yɔɔ sũ lɛ mli lɛ, ni ekɛ nu lɛ nɔŋŋ kpɔtɔɔ sũ lɛ dani ekɛshɔ̃ɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni etaoɔ eshɔ̃ lɛ, kɛ́ eji nibii ni amɛjwaramɔ waaa po.
Amɛbaanyɛ amɛye hemɔkɛyeli nɛɛ he odase yɛ faŋŋ mli kɛtsɔ nu ni aaamii amɛ yɛ Yesu Kristo gbɛi amli lɛ nɔ.
Nakai nui ni kuɔ lɛ baanyɛ aha amɛwala aŋmɛɛ amɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ miibɔ Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ kɔkɔ akɛ Eufrate faa lɛ mli nui lɛ baamii.
Ená ni kulɛ eyitsoŋ lɛ nu bu ni, ni ehiŋmɛii hu lɛ nu hiŋmɛii ni, koni ekafɔ̃ɔ yaafo.
Nɔ ko ni amralo nɛɛ fee ni Josephus ŋma he sane efɔ̃ shi lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, be ko lɛ eyajie shika kɛjɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ shikatoohe lɛ, ni ekɛtsa nujɔɔ koni nu atsɔ mli kɛba Yerusalem.
10 Onyɛ tamɔ wain tso+ yɛ olá lɛ mli* ni adu yɛ nui ahe.
Nui ni yɔɔ “yiteŋ” lɛ ji frɔnɔɔfeemɔ ni ebua ehe naa babaoo ni sɛŋ shikpɔŋ lɛ yiteŋ lɛ, ni no feɔ “bu wulu kwɔŋkwɔŋ” lɛ.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 2:1-4) Nakai gbi lɛ nɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ, awo mɛi krokomɛi ni yɔɔ Yerusalem lɛ hewalɛ koni amɛha abaptisi amɛ yɛ nu mli.
Jaj 11:1 —Mɛni wiemɔ ni ji, “shɛ oboloo ofɔ̃ nu hiɛ” lɛ tsɔɔ?
Yoo ni Yesu kɛ lɛ wieɔ lɛ eba koni ebayɛ nu.
Nyɛbaa wala nu lɛ he.
Tsɔnei ahe nilee, hiɛkɔɔ kɛ nilee ni abɛ lɛ fɛɛ eha aafite shikpɔŋ lɛ, nu kɛ kɔɔyɔɔ mli.
Beni eje kpo kɛjɛ nu lɛ mli lɛ, efua mi ni ekɛɛ mi akɛ, “Joseph, mitsɔ onyɛmi!”
(Hiob 42:7) No hewɔ lɛ, Hiob tsu musubɔɔ loo fɛoyeli he nii tamɔ mɔ ko ni kɛ miishɛɛ nuɔ nu.
17 Amrɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ, tsulɔ lɛ sha foi ekɛ lɛ yakpe, ni ekɛɛ: “Ofainɛ, hã mi ogbɛ́ lɛ mli nu lɛ fioo manu.”

24 Ni nuu lɛ kɛ amɛ ba Yosef shĩa lɛ, ni ehã amɛ nu kɛhã amɛnaji ahe fɔmɔ, ni ehã amɛtejii lɛ niyenii.
“Nyɔŋmɔ gbá flɔ kutruku . . . lɛ mli, ni nu tue kɛjɛ mli, ni beni enu lɛ, emumɔ kpale ba emli ni ehiɛ tserɛ lɛ.”—Kojolɔi 15:18, 19.

(1 Korintobii 15:41) Jeŋ nilee le ŋulamii ni amɛsu tamɔ wuɔfɔ taakɛ wɔ hulu lɛ ji lɛ, kɛ ŋulamii ni amɛsu tamɔ bluu, kɛ ŋulamii wuji tsuji, kɛ ŋulamii bibii yɛji, kɛ neutron ŋulamii, kɛ nɔ ni fɛlɛɔ ni jieɔ hewalɛ ni anyɛɛɛ ana naa kpo.
33 Okɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa afee pomegranet yibii* kɛbɔle atade lɛ naamuu lɛ fɛɛ kɛkpe, ni okɛ shika tsuru afee ŋmɛji ohɔlɔ pomegranet yibii lɛ ateŋ.
37 Yehowa tee nɔ ekɛɛ Mose akɛ: 38 “Okɛ Israelbii lɛ awie ní okɛɛ amɛ akɛ, amɛfee amanyai* amɛwo amɛtadei anaamui lɛ anaa yɛ amɛyinɔi fɛɛ amli, ni amɛkɛ kpãa bluu awo amanyai lɛ ayiteŋgbɛ yɛ amɛtadei lɛ anaamui lɛ anaa.
18 Akɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ klala ni alo lɛ jogbaŋŋ lo pateeshɛŋ ni akɛtsĩɔ kpo lɛ shinaa lɛ naa lɛ.
Micronesia ŋshɔkpɔi ni shwereɔ waa lɛ efee tamɔ jwetrii eŋɔlii bibii ni eshwã Pasifik ŋshɔ ni su yɔɔ bluu lɛ mli.
▪ Biblia mli amaniɛbɔɔ lɛ tsɔɔ ákɛ akɛ “kpãa bluu kɛ afaseo kɛ etsuru kɛ eyɛŋ futaa ni anyɛne” fee mama ni akɛfo kpee buu—ni ji blema Israelbii lɛ ajamɔhe—lɛ he, kɛ nɔ ni akɛfee eshinaa lɛ.
6 Akɛ klala kɛ mama* fɛfɛo kɛ mama bluu etsotsoro jɛmɛ, ni akɛ kpãi ni akɛ mama kpakpa fee kɛ kpãi ni akɛ kooloo hetsɔi ni hiɛ pɛpol kɔla fee emɔmɔ kɛfimɔ jwiɛtɛi gai ni yɔɔ marmara tɛ* akulashiŋi ahe, ni sɛi saatsei ni akɛ shika tsuru kɛ jwiɛtɛi fee mamɔ shikpɔŋ ni akɛ pɔfri tɛi* kɛ marmara tɛi* kɛ adiagbai kɛ marmara tɛi* diji eka nɔ lɛ nɔ.
37 No sɛɛ lɛ, ekɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ klala ni alo lɛ jogbaŋŋ lo pateeshɛŋ ewo sɔlemɔ buu lɛ shinaa lɛ naa,+ 38 ni efee ekulashiŋi enumɔ lɛ kɛ amɛhe kpoji lɛ hu.
24 Ojarayelihei lɛ ji he ni amɛkɛ bo ye atadei fɛfɛji, kɛ nɔhaanɔi ni akɛ mama bluu fee ni akɛ kɔlai srɔtoi elo nii ewo mli, kɛ kapɛtii ni hiɛ kɔlai srɔtoisrɔtoi, ni akɛ kpãa efimɔ fɛɛ mli kpɛŋŋ lɛ jara yɛ.
24 No sɛɛ lɛ, amɛkɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa ni alo fɛɛ kɛtsa fee pomegranet yibii* yɛ atade ní nine bɛ he lɛ naamuu lɛ naa.

Etsɛɛɛ ni wɔbɔi bɔ ni jɛmɛ kɔɔyɔŋ yɔɔ kulɔkulɔ, amɛ atatuiaŋ efee bluu, nu ni hiɛ bluu su, tsũi ni apɛnte he sui srɔtoi, kɛ baisikel babaoo lɛ ahe miishɛɛnámɔ.
OOOKƐƐ tɛi ni anyiɛɔ nɔ akɛfoɔ ŋshɔ ni hiɛ tamɔ bluu ni kpɛlɛɔ kaŋkaŋ ni ka Florida kɛ Cuba teŋ lɛ, je lɛŋ adafitswaa woji gbala jwɛŋmɔ kɛtee Bahamas nɔ yɛ 1992 mli.
17 Ni bɔ ni mina okpɔŋɔi lɛ kɛ amɛnɔtaralɔi lɛ yɛ ninaa lɛ mli nɛ: Amɛwo damai ni hiɛ la kɛ hiakinto-bluu* kɛ wuɔfɔ kɔla, ni okpɔŋɔi lɛ ayitsei tamɔ jatai ayitsei,+ ni la kɛ lasu kɛ sɔlfa fãa kɛjɛɔ amɛdaaŋ.
5 Mɛi ni le ŋaa nitsumɔ jogbaŋŋ nɛɛ kɛ shika tsuru kɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ klala kpakpa afee.
Nibii fɛɛ ni wala yɔɔ amɛmli ní yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ—muawai, jwɛi, shwuɔi, bonsoi, kɛ adesai—fɔɔ loo amɛkwɛ̃ɔ kɛtsɔ DNA ni yɔɔ amɛmli lɛ nifeemɔ nɔ.
Akɛni osɔfoi lɛ “egu” wolo tsuru lɛ hewɔ lɛ, wɔto shiɛmɔ wiemɔ ko he gbɛjianɔ koni wɔkɛ wolo bluu (“New Heavens and a New Earth”) lɛ aha.
Mɛni hewɔ atatu lɛ yɔɔ bluu lɛ?
Sikh hii ayoomɔ waaa yɛ amɛ yifiinii bluu, eyɛŋ kɛ ediŋ, ni efii ji amɛjamɔ nifeemɔ lɛ fa ni he hiaa lɛ hewɔ, ni nakai eji yɛ amɛyitsɔi ni amɛhaa etsaa kakadaji lɛ hu hewɔ.
Yɛ be mli ni gbɛkɛ duŋ lɛ kpɛɔ lɛ, ewaa waa akɛ wɔɔna nɔ ko.
Roald kɛɛ akɛ: “Trukaa lɛ, Mario ni eji gbɛgbalɔ yɛ Finnmark lɛ bi kɛji wɔbaasumɔ ni wɔfã kɛya Lakselv ni wɔyaye wɔbua asafo ko ni shiɛlɔi 23 yɔɔ mli lɛ.”
Bonso ni da waa lɛ lilɛi tsiimɔ kɛ shwuɔ kome tsiimɔ yeɔ egbɔ.

14 Agbɛnɛ hu, ekɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi ni hiɛ pɛpol kɔla kɛ kpãa tsuru kɛ mama kpakpa fee pateeshɛŋ,*+ ni eye kerubim samai ewo mli.

Yehowa jaje akɛ: “Mato nyɛ maha klante, ni nyɛ fɛɛ nyɛaakula shi ní agbe nyɛ; ejaakɛ mitsɛ́ nyɛ ni nyɛhereee mi nɔ, miwie, ni nyɛbooo toi, shi moŋ nyɛfee nɔ ni ji efɔŋ yɛ mihiɛ, ni nyɛhala nii ní esaaa mihiɛ lɛ!”
14 Yehowa bɔ amɛ kɔkɔ yɛ faŋŋ mli akɛ: “Mi hu mato nyɛ maha klante, ni nyɛ fɛɛ nyɛaakula shi ní agbe nyɛ; ejaakɛ mitsɛ́ nyɛ ni nyɛhereee mi nɔ, miwie, ni nyɛbooo toi, shi moŋ nyɛfee nɔ ni ji efɔŋ yɛ mihiɛ, ni nyɛhala nii ní esaaa mihiɛ lɛ!”
19 “Ejaakɛ nɔ ni Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: ‘Kɛ́ mikpãtã ohiɛ tamɔ maji ni mɔ ko mɔ ko bɛ amɛmli, kɛ́ mihã nui ni efee hamahama lɛ ha onɔ, ni nui ni yɔɔ hewalɛ lɛ ha onɔ lɛ,+ 20 mikɛ bo baafata mɛi ni kpelekeɔ shi kɛyaa bu* lɛ mli lɛ ahe kɛya blemabii lɛ aŋɔɔ; mahã ohi shi yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi, tamɔ blema hei ni akpãtã hiɛ lɛ, bo kɛ mɛi ni kpelekeɔ shi kɛyaa bu lɛ mli lɛ,+ koni mɔ ko akahi omli dɔŋŋ.
Miyaa kpeei daa kɛ shiɛmɔ hu yɛ daa nyɔŋ nɔ, shi minaaa mikɛ Yehowa teŋ wekukpaa ni bɛŋkɛ kpaakpa.”
30 “Kɛ́ wiemɔi nɛɛ fɛɛ ba onɔ, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ ni mikɛshwie ohiɛ lɛ,+ ni okai nibii nɛɛ*+ yɛ jeŋmaji fɛɛ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbɛ bo eshwã amɛmli lɛ ateŋ,+ 2 ni oku osɛɛ kɛba Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ŋɔɔ,+ ni okɛ otsui fɛɛ kɛ osusuma* fɛɛ bo egbee toi yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni mifãa bo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ anaa,+ bo kɛ obihii lɛ, 3 no lɛ, Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baahã onomii lɛ aku amɛsɛɛ kɛba,+ ni ebaana bo mɔbɔ+ ni ebaabua onaa ekoŋŋ kɛjɛ maji fɛɛ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbɛ bo eshwã amɛmli lɛ amli.
26 “Naa, ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, mikɛ jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ miishwie nyɛhiɛ:+ 27 abaajɔɔ nyɛ kɛ́ nyɛbo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi ní miwoɔ nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ toi,+ 28 ni abaalomɔ nyɛ kɛ́ nyɛbooo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi lɛ toi,+ ni nyɛgbá afã kɛje gbɛ ni mifãa nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ akɛ nyɛnyiɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni nyɛyanyiɛ nyɔŋmɔi ni nyɛleee lɛ asɛɛ.
11 Kɛkɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ Solomon akɛ: “Akɛni enɛ ji nɔ ni oshweɔ yɛ otsui mli ni obiii ni oná nii, kɛ jwetrii, kɛ anunyam, aloo ni mɛi ni nyɛɔ bo lɛ agboi,* loo walasɛɛtsɛlɛ,* shi obi hiɛshikamɔ kɛ nilee koni okɛkojo miwebii ni miwó bo amɛnɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ hewɔ lɛ,+ 12 obaaná hiɛshikamɔ kɛ nilee; shi agbɛnɛ hu, mahã oná nii, kɛ jwetrii, kɛ anunyam bɔ ni maŋtsɛmɛi ni etsɔ ohiɛ lɛ eko kwraa náaa nakai, ni mɛi ni baaba yɛ osɛɛ lɛ ateŋ mɔ ko hu náŋ nakai.”
Yehowa ha egbalɔ lɛ kɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: “Naa, miŋɔ jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ mishwie nyɛhiɛ ŋmɛnɛ: jɔɔmɔ ji nyɛnɔ̃, kɛji nyɛbo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kitai ni miwoɔ nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ atoi lɛ; shi loomɔ ji nyɛnɔ̃, kɛji nyɛbooo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitai lɛ atoi, ni nyɛkpale kɛjɛ gbɛ ni miwoɔ nyɛ he kita ŋmɛnɛ nɛɛ nɔ, ni nyɛyanyiɛ nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi ni nyɛleee sá lɛ asɛɛ lɛ.” —5 Mose 11: 26-28.

Beni Dito bɔi enikasemɔ lɛ mli folɔmɔ lɛ, mikɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Dito, Yehowa enyɛɛ onɔ ni ofi e-Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ sɛɛ.
Beni mibɛ jɛmɛ lɛ, eyabi Eric akɛ, ‘Ani edɔɔɔ bo akɛ fɔmɔ gbijuji ni ayeɔ kɛ miishɛɛ nɛɛ ŋmɛɛɔ bo?’

+ 19 Shi kɛ́ nyɛje misɛɛ ni nyɛyeee mimlai lɛ, kɛ mikitãi ni mikɛshwie nyɛhiɛ lɛ anɔ, ni nyɛyasɔmɔ nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi ni nyɛkoto amɛ lɛ,+ 20 no lɛ, mafã Israel kɛje mishikpɔŋ ni mikɛhã amɛ lɛ nɔ,+ ni shĩa nɛɛ ni mifee lɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ mihã migbɛ́i lɛ, majie yɛ mihiɛ mashɛ mafɔ̃, ni mahã etsɔ nyaŋemɔ nii* kɛ nɔ ko ni ayeɔ he fɛo yɛ maji fɛɛ ateŋ.
3 Hii shi akɛ gbɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ,+ ni maya nɔ mikɛ bo ahi shi ni majɔɔ bo, ejaakɛ bo kɛ oseshi lɛ mikɛ shikpɔji nɛɛ fɛɛ baahã,+ ni maye kitã ni mikã otsɛ Abraham lɛ nɔ:+ 4 ‘Mahã oseshi lɛ afa tamɔ ŋwɛi ŋulamii;+ ni mikɛ shikpɔji nɛɛ fɛɛ baahã oseshi lɛ;+ ni oseshi lɛ nɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ jeŋmaji fɛɛ baatsɔ aná jɔɔmɔ amɛhã amɛhe,’+ 5 akɛni Abraham bo migbee toi, ni etee nɔ eye mitaomɔ nii kɛ mikitãi kɛ mifamɔi kɛ mimlai lɛ anɔ lɛ hewɔ.”

14 “‘Shi kɛ́ nyɛbooo mi toi loo nyɛyeee kitãi nɛɛ fɛɛ anɔ,+ 15 ni nyɛkpoo mimlai lɛ,+ ni nyɛnyaŋe* miyiŋkpɛi* lɛ, ni nyɛyeee mikitãi lɛ fɛɛ anɔ, ni nyɛku mikpaŋmɔ lɛ mli lɛ,+ 16 no lɛ, mi hu mafee nyɛ nibii ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ: mikɛ haomɔ kɛ wɔlɔmɔ fɔŋ kɛ atridii ni naa wa baagbala nyɛtoi, ni no baahã nyɛhiŋmɛii afite, ni nyɛwala* hiɛ baakpãtã.
17 Ejaakɛ okɛɔ akɛ: “Niiatsɛ ji mi+ ni miyɛ nii ni nɔ ko nɔ ko ehiaaa mi,” shi oleee akɛ ooye awerɛho ni onii hu yɛ mɔbɔ ni ohiafo kɛ shwilafo kɛ mɔ ni hiɛ ehe folo ji bo, 18 miiwo bo ŋaa akɛ ohé shika tsuru ni atsuu he yɛ la mli yɛ miŋɔɔ koni otsɔ niiatsɛ, kɛ atadei yɛji koni owo ni ohe akakã folo ni ana ohiɛgbele lɛ,+ kɛ hiŋmɛi tsofa ni okɛkpa ohiŋmɛii anɔ+ koni ona nii.
10 “Akɛni nyɛkɛɛ akɛ, ‘Jeŋmaji enyɔ nɛɛ kɛ shikpɔji enyɔ nɛɛ baatsɔ minɔ, ni maŋɔ fɛɛ akɛ minii,’+ eyɛ mli akɛ Yehowa diɛŋtsɛ yɛ jɛmɛ moŋ hewɔ lɛ, 11 ‘gbii abɔ ni mihiɛ kã nɛɛ,’ Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa kɛɛ, ‘bɔ ni nyɛjie mlifu kpo, ni nyɛye awuŋa yɛ nyɛ ni nyɛnyɛɔ amɛ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, nakai pɛpɛɛpɛ mikɛ nyɛ baaye;+ ni kɛ́ mikojo nyɛ lɛ, mahã ale mi yɛ amɛteŋ.
+ 4 Ni ekɛɛ mi akɛ, ‘Mahã ofɔ, ni mahã oyi afa, ni mahã otsɔ majimaji asafo,+ ni mikɛ shikpɔŋ nɛɛ baahã oseshibii ní baaba yɛ osɛɛ lɛ akɛ amɛnɔ kɛmiiya naanɔ.’
13 Paulo tsɛ́ wiemɔi kɛjɛ Yesaia 49:8, ni kaneɔ akɛ: “Bɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: Be ni sa mli miboo toi yɛ, ni yiwalaheremɔ gbi nɔ hu miye mibuao yɛ: ni mibaa oyi, ni miha otsɔ̃ maŋ lɛ kpaŋmɔ, koni otee shikpɔŋ lɛ shi oma shi, ni okɛ gboshinii ni efee amaŋfɔ lɛ aha amɛ.”
+ 14 ‘Mikɛ mimumɔ lɛ baawo nyɛmli ni nyɛbaaba wala mli,+ ni mikɛ nyɛ baawo nyɛshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ; ni nyɛbaaná nyɛle akɛ mi, Yehowa, mi diɛŋtsɛ miwie, ni mifee hu,’ Yehowa kɛɛ.”
16 Eyɛ mli akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ jeee Yehowa be ní ekɛaafee naakpɛɛ nii moŋ, shi etsakeko kɛjɛ bɔ ni eji yɛ Elia gbii lɛ amli lɛ.
Agbɛnɛ mɛnɛɛmɛi miigba mɛi krokomɛi nakai naakpɛɛ nii lɛ he sane.
Wɔnine shɛ anɔkwalei ni kɔɔ naakpɛɛ nibii ni Yesu fee lɛ ahe lɛ nɔ kɛtsɔ Sanekpakpai ejwɛ lɛ anɔ.
Akɛni amɛbooo maŋtsɛ lɛ famɔ lɛ toi hewɔ lɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhe wo gbele ni yɔɔ gbeyei he oshara mli, ni atsɔ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ahere amɛyiwala; shi amɛhala akɛ amɛkɛ amɛhe aaawo gbele he oshara mli moŋ fe ni amɛaagbo Yehowa nɔ toi.—Daniel 2:49–3:29.
Nilelɔ William Barclay wie akɛ: “Quadratus miikɛɛ akɛ kɛbashi egbii amli tɔ̃ɔ lɛ, abaanyɛ akɛ mɛi ni atsu naakpɛɛ nii yɛ amɛgbɛfaŋ lɛ aba akɛ ehe odaseyeli.
Beni esɔle ebi koni ena naakpɛɛ nii ni ahaaa hetoo lɛ sɛɛ gbii fioo ko lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome, yoo onukpa ko yasara lɛ, ni eshi woji komɛi ni akɛkaseɔ Biblia lɛ eha lɛ.
(Lala 37:29; Mateo 5:5; Luka 23:43; 2 Petro 3:13; Kpojiemɔ 21:4) Agbɛnɛ hu Yesu kɛ ekaselɔi lɛ fee nɔ ni baaba mli yɛ nakai jeŋ hee lɛ mli lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ kɛtsɔ naakpɛɛ nii ni Nyɔŋmɔ ha amɛ hewalɛ ni amɛfee lɛ nɔ.—Mateo 10:1, 8; 15:30, 31; Yohane 11:25-44.
10:8) Petro ena ni Yesu efee naakpɛɛ nii ni tamɔ nakai, ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ ena beni Yesu tee Yairo biyoo lɛ shi lɛ, shi amaniɛbɔɔ ko bɛ ni tsɔɔ akɛ bɔfo ko tee gbohii ashi kɛyashi beni Petro fee nakai lɛ.
21 Kɛkɛ ni Yehowa kɛɛ Mose akɛ: “Kɛ́ oku osɛɛ otee Ejipt lɛ, kwɛmɔ ni ofee naakpɛɛ nii ní mihã bo hewalɛ akɛ ofee lɛ fɛɛ yɛ Farao hiɛ.
Yɛ nakai naakpɛɛ nɔ̃ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Bileam tee ni eyadamɔ shi eshi Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ E-webii lɛ.
▪ “Wɔle akɛ Yesu Kristo fee naakpɛɛ nibii babaoo yɛ egbii lɛ amli.
Mɛɛ naakpɛɛ nii Elisha fee yɛ Shunem?
Bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ susuɔ adesai ahe waa lɛ je kpo yɛ gbɛ ni taa mɔ mli nɔ, yɛ naakpɛɛ nii ni e-Bi, Yesu fee lɛ mli.
Wolo ni akɛpɛiɔ saji amli nɛɛ wie akɛ, Katolik Sɔlemɔ lɛ etee nɔ ehiɛ hemɔkɛyeli ni eyɔɔ yɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi amli lɛ mli, ni “ebɔɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ ekɛ adesai anilee aaatsɔɔ bɔ ni feɔ ni amɛbaa lɛ mli.”
Nɔ ni fata hela ni Yesu tsá yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ he ji daimonioi ni efamɔ.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni amɛaakpa naakpɛɛ nii gbɛ, tamɔ nibii anaa ni Nyɔŋmɔ aaatsĩ nɛkɛ lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi yooɔ akɛ amɛnaa hebuu kɛjɛɔ amɛ jeŋ muu fɛɛ Kristofoi anyɛmifeemɔ lɛ mli.
Hɛɛ, etamɔ nifeemɔ ko ni efɔɔɔ kaa kwraa akɛ Vicky he baawa lɛ kwraa kɛmɔ shi.
Mɛɛ Biblia mli shishitoo mlai baanyɛ aye abua bo koni onyɛ okpee shika he naagbai anaa?
Etsɔ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ anɔ ehã wɔna nɔ ni ebaafee ehã adesai ni baahi Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ shishi lɛ.
Marko 1:21-27 tsɔɔ bɔ ni asafoi lɛ fee amɛnii amɛha yɛ Yesu tsɔɔmɔi lɛ kɛ naakpɛɛ nii ni efee lɛ ateŋ ekome he.
Mɛni Hewɔ Naakpɛɛ Nifeemɔi Asɛɛ Efo?
Eji anɔkwale akɛ, yɛ Yesu sɔɔmɔ ni he afii etɛkɛfã lɛ mli lɛ, ekɛ ebe lɛ eko tsu nii ekɛfee naakpɛɛ nibii, ni etsa mɛi ni he yeɔ lɛ ahelai.
(2 Korintobii 5:7) Be mli ni amɛna naakpɛɛ nibii ni sa kadimɔ waa yɛ Yehowa nine naa ni hiŋmɛi enaaa lɛ sɛɛ po lɛ, Israelbii babaoo ni eshi Mizraim lɛ nu he akɛ ehe miihia koni amɛná ehe nɔ ko ni akɛ hiŋmɛi naa ni baakai amɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ nɔ ko bɛ ni aaadamɔ nɔ aje anɔkwale ni enaakpɛɛ nii lɛ ji lɛ he ŋwane.—Luka 9:43; Mateo 12:28.
Yɛ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ hewɔ lɛ, gbɔmɛi foji lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii he Yesu nɔ amɛye.
Hɔɔ leebi gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ baama bɔ ni kaselɔ-feemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ he hiaa ha lɛ nɔ mi yɛ wiemɔ ni hiɛ fãi etɛ ni tsara nɔ, ni yitso ji “Bɔfoi ni kɛ Toiŋjɔlɛ he Sanekpakpa Baa” lɛ mli.
3:15, 16; Luka 13:24) Eba akɛ wɔ fɛɛ wɔkɛ sɔlemɔ baasusu nɔ ni wɔfeɔ lɛ he ni wɔná hiɛyaa ni he hiaa lɛ, ní wɔha ahi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli akɛ Yehowa ewo shi akɛ ekɛ “anunyam kɛ woo kɛ hejɔlɛ aaaba mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni tsuɔ nikpakpai anii lɛ nɔ.”—Rom.
Afɔ “Toiŋjɔlɛ Maŋtsɛ” (6, 7)
Yesu Fɔmɔ Toiŋjɔlɛ ni Ekɛbaa
(2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 23:28-30) Hɛɛ, ejaakɛ “hejɔlɛ” mli ní afu lɛ yɛ lɛ yɛ srɔto kɛ akɛto “nɔ fɔŋ” ni baa Yuda nɔ lɛ he.
Toiŋjɔlɛ He Naatsii ko Bɛ
17 Bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni gbɔmɛi aaafee amɛnii amɛha lɛ, ehe miihia ni Yehowa tsuji aha ahi amɛjwɛŋmɔ mli akɛ, amɛji Nyɔŋmɔ toiŋjɔlɛ he bɔfoi.
Kɛ́ fɔlɔi kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ tsɔse amɛbii lɛ yɛ ‘toiŋjɔlɛ mli’ ni amɛhi shi akɛ ‘mɛi ni feɔ toiŋjɔlɛ nii lɛ,’ amɛbii lɛ náa he sɛɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Switzerland nitsumɔ he nine lɛ tsɛ Yakobo 2: 15, 16 yisɛɛ ni ekɛje emaniɛbɔɔ lɛ shishi, akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛminuu ko aloo nyɛmiyoo ko nyiɛ yayai ni enaaa edaaŋ ŋmaa lɛ, ni nyɛteŋ mɔ ko yakɛɛ amɛ akɛ: ‘Nyɛyaa yɛ hejɔlɛ mli, nyɛyawerea la, ni nyɛyayea nii nyɛtɔrɔa,’ shi ehaaa amɛ nii ni hiaa gbɔmɔtso lɛ, mɛɛ sɛɛnamɔ yɔɔ mli?”
Naanɔ Toiŋjɔlɛ: Je lɛŋ hei sɔrɔtoi enyiɛ naagbai yɔɔ jɛmɛ ni obaanyɛ otsɔɔ?
Mɛɛ sɛɛnamɔi ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ baa “Hejɔlɛ lumɔ” lɛ shishibii lɛ anɔ bianɛ kɛ wɔsɛɛ be mli hu?
21 Encyclopedia of Early Christianity lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Mra be mli sɔlemɔ lɛ bu ehe akɛ adesai aweku hee ni tsutsu yiwalɛ kuu, ni ji Yudafoi kɛ Jeŋmajiaŋbii lɛ baanyɛ ahi shi yɛ ekomefeemɔ mli yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli.”
Taakɛ woloŋlelɔ Oscar Cullmann wie he lɛ, “Plato tsɔɔ wɔ bɔ ni Socrates gbo eha yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ ni eye emuu kɛ tsuiŋ hejɔlɛ mli.
Amɛbɛ hejɔlɛ.
Beni je nɛɛ naagbee lɛ bɛŋkɛɔ lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ wɔɔtsɔ wɔkɛ Yehowa ahi shi yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli?
Mɛi ni sumɔɔ omla lɛ yɛ hejɔlɛ babaoo, ni nɔ ko nɔ ko bɛ ni woɔ amɛnajiaŋ.”
Yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔyeli shishi lɛ, Kristo sɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ miibɔ mɔdɛŋ amɛjie sui gbohii ni tamɔ kooloi anifeemɔ lɛ yɛ amɛshihilɛ mli, koni amɛkɛ amɛnyɛmimɛi Kristofoi lɛ ahi shi yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ ekomefeemɔ mli.
“Mɛi ni he jɔ lɛ, shikpɔŋ lɛ baatsɔ amɛnɔ, ni amɛmii baashɛ amɛhe waa yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ babaoo mli.” —Lala 37:11.
Yehowa—‘Toiŋjɔlɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Lɛ’
(2 Korintobii 1:3, 4) Ekɛ nɔ ni he hiaa wɔ koni wɔŋmɛ wɔtsui shi yɛ mli lɛ haa wɔ kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ babaoo.
Shi Kristofoi le akɛ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shweshweeshwe ni ebaafee tamɔ nɔ ni ekolɛ je lɛ ená lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, nɔ ko kwraa tsakeko.
Kɛ́ wɔmiisumɔ ní wɔná jɔɔmɔ ni ji naanɔ toiŋjɔlɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ lɛ, mɛni esa akɛ wɔfee?
+ Shi nyɛ mɛi ni eshwɛ lɛ, nyɛyaa nyɛtsɛ ŋɔɔ yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli.”
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ onukpai haa toiŋjɔlɛ hiɔ amɛteŋ yɛ?
Kɛ́ wɔwiemɔi tswaa mɛi emaa shi lɛ, wɔyeɔ wɔbuaa kɛbáa “hejɔlɛ kpãa” ni feɔ wɔ ekome yɛ asafo lɛ mli lɛ yi.—Nyɛkanea Efesobii 4:1-3.
Mɛni Kɛ́ Wɔfee Lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Baaná Wɔhe Miishɛɛ?
(Abɛi 3:9) Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ, Yehowa hiɛ sɔɔ amɛmɔdɛŋbɔi lɛ waa!
Ofainɛ, kanemɔ nɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛɛmɔ taakɛ atsɔɔ mli yɛ sane ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli lɛ.
Kɛ́ wɔwie wiemɔi ni haa mɔ nane mɔɔ shi lɛ, esaa Yehowa hiɛ
Kɛ mifo misɛɛ mikwɛ mishihilɛ lɛ, miyɔseɔ bɔ ni tsui nyɔɔ mɔ mli haa akɛ aaafee nibii ni sa wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ hiɛ.
Mra mli yɛ afii ohai 20 lɛ shishijee beaŋ tɔ̃ɔ lɛ, Biblia Kaselɔi akuu bibioo lɛ mli bii lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii sɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛjɛ anɔkwa suɔmɔ ní amɛyɔɔ akɛ amɛaasa ehiɛ lɛ mli, shi mɛi komɛi yɛ mli ní kɛ otii ní ejaaa emamɔ amɛhiɛ, tamɔ gbɛihemɔ he akɔnɔ ní amɛyɔɔ lɛ.
Kɛji obaasumɔ ni ole nibii babaoo aloo ni mɔ ko aba oŋɔɔ ni ekɛ bo afee shia Biblia mli nikasemɔ ni aheee nɔ ko lɛ, ofainɛ ŋmaa kɛya Watch Tower, Box 760, Accra, Ghana, aloo kɛya adrɛs ni atsɔɔ yɛ baafa 2 lɛ mli nɔ ni sa.
Ofainɛ ba mli.”
Nuŋtsɔ Yesu na he miishɛɛ, ni ewie nakai tsulɔ anɔkwafo kuu lɛ he yɛ 1919 akɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ.
Ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: ‘Ofainɛ bo lɛ kaa wɔ okwɛ gbii 10 pɛ.
Kɛ́ wɔmiitao ni wɔsa Yehowa hiɛ lɛ, no lɛ esa akɛ wɔsumɔ gbɔmɛi fɛɛ. —1 Yohane 3:11, 12.
19 “‘No sɛɛ lɛ, Israel tsu mɛi kɛtee Sihon, ni ji Amorbii lɛ amaŋtsɛ kɛ Heshbonbii lɛ amaŋtsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ, ni Israel yakɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Ofainɛ, hã wɔtsɔ oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛya wɔnɔ lɛ mli.”
Nɔ ni kɔɔ musuŋtsɔlɛ kpo ni aaajie lɛ he ji ni aaafee hiɛshikãlɔi kɛ nilelɔi, moŋ fe ni eeewa akɛ aaasa hiɛ.
Kɛ́ wɔjɛ wɔtsuiŋ wɔhã ‘kapɛji enyɔ ni shɛɛɛ nɔ ko’ po lɛ, Yehowa hiɛ sɔɔ. —Mar 12:41-44.
Shi ani mɛi ni taoɔ koni amɛsa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ lɛ amli baanyɛ afili amɛ yɛ maŋ fɛɛ maŋ tai kɛ ehiɛtsakemɔi ahe?
Yehowa kɛɛ ewebii ní egbá afã lɛ yɛ jɛmɛ akɛ jeee akɛ amɛ kponɔgbɛ jamɔ mli nifeemɔi lɛ esaaa ehiɛ kɛkɛ, shi moŋ eha ejalɛ mlifu lɛ mli wo wu hu ejaakɛ mɛi ni jáa lɛ lɛ miijá lɛ yɛ osatofeemɔ mli.
Kɛ oosumɔ ni osa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ lɛ, jamɔ ko ni okɛaabɔ lɛ he miihia—shi jeee jamɔi akuu lɛ eko fɛɛ eko kɛkɛ.
Nitsumɔhei ni ajɛɔ jɛmɛ ayeɔ abuaa maŋbii lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛfee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ oya—niyenii hoomɔ oya, hei ni ajieɔ shika yɛ ni afiteee be kwraa, kɛ ekrokomɛi ni tamɔ nakai—ejaakɛ amɛle akɛ kɛ́ afiteee mɛi ni amɛkɛyeɔ jara lɛ abei lɛ, ehaa amɛnáa miishɛɛ.
Kɛji obaasumɔ ni ole nibii babaoo aloo ní mɔko aba oŋɔɔ ni ekɛ bo afee shia Biblia mli nikasemɔ ni aheee nɔ ko lɛ, ofainɛ ŋmaa kɛya Watch Tower, Box 760, Ghana, aloo kɛya adrɛs ni atsɔɔ yɛ baafa 2 lɛ mli nɔ ni sa.
Kɛji mɔ aŋkro ni okɛ lɛ kpe lɛ bɛ oshikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli lɛ, yaabi “Please Follow Up” (S-43) wolo lɛ eko yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ, ŋmalamɔ nɔ nii, koni okɛha asafoŋ woloŋmalɔ lɛ, ni ekɛbaamaje asafo ni tsuɔ nii yɛ shikpɔŋkuku ni mɔ lɛ yɔɔ mli lɛ mli lɛ.
2 Bɔ ni Yehowa fee enii eha yɛ nɛkɛ yei nɛɛ ahe kɛ jɔɔmɔi ní ekɛba amɛnɔ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ enáa mumɔŋ sui ni mɔ ko yɔɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ fe nuu loo yoo ni mɔ lɛ ji.
Ofainɛ, obaasumɔ ni okane nakai ŋmalɛ lɛ?
31 Kɛkɛ ni ekɛɛ: “Ofainɛ kaashi wɔ, ejaakɛ bo ole he ni esa akɛ wɔbɔ nsara yɛ, yɛ ŋa lɛ nɔ, ni obaanyɛ otsɔɔ wɔ gbɛ.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, Yesu kɛ e-Tsɛ fɛɛ ná yijiemɔ ni gbekɛbii lɛ kɛhaa lɛ he miishɛɛ.
9 “Kɛ́ oyabɔ nsara owo ohenyɛlɔi lɛ, tsi ohe kɛje nɔ fɔŋ fɛɛ nɔ fɔŋ he.
Hɛɛ, ebaajɔɔ bo kɛ bii babaoo*+ kɛ oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nibaa nii kɛ oŋmaa* kɛ owain hee kɛ omu+ kɛ otsinai abii kɛ otoi abii, yɛ shikpɔŋ ni ekã otsɛmɛi lɛ kitã yɛ he akɛ ekɛbaahã bo lɛ nɔ.
Shi kwɛmɔ jogbaŋŋ yɛ enɛ he: Tsɔɔmɔ bɔ ni Ŋmalɛ mli ŋaawoo ni nyɛsusuɔ he lɛ kɔɔ ohe, shi jeee bɔ ni ekɔɔ ohefatalɔ lɛ he.
3 “Bɔ ni Yehowa ní bɔ bo, Yakob, ní eshɔ̃ bo, Israel, lɛ kɛɛ nɛ: Kaashe gbeyei, ejaakɛ mikpɔ̃o; mitsɛ́o kɛ ogbɛi; minɔ̃ jio!
Ani obaanyɛ okai nɔyelɔi hewalɔi loo jamɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi ni yɛ owala shihilɛ mli lɛ amɛwa Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ ayi lɛ agbɛi?
Otsulɔ ji mi.
3 Bɔ ni Ooofee Oná Hesɛɛ: Yɛ wolo ni Gbɛtsɔɔmɔ Kuu lɛ ŋma kɛkpa wolo lɛ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ, akɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ wo wɔ ŋaa akɛ: “Feemɔ nibii ni okaneɔ lɛ ahe mfoniri yɛ ojwɛŋmɔŋ; feemɔ onii tamɔ oyɛ jɛmɛ ni nibii lɛ ba.
Nyɛnyaa ni nyɛmli afilia nyɛ; shi nyɛ nyɔmɔwoo fa yɛ ŋwɛi.”
Matsa nyɛtuatsemɔ lɛ.”
Nyɛmagai lɛ, nyɛnyɔŋmɔ lɛ ŋulami ní nyɛfee nyɛhã nyɛhe lɛ kɛya,
Enɛ baaye abua bo koni ole nɔ ni onikaselɔ lɛ heɔ eyeɔ momo yɛ sane ko ni akɛha lɛ he.
18, 19. (a) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ oootsɔ otiu otii ni woɔ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛnyam lɛ asɛɛ?
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:28; Yakobo 5:14, 15; Yuda 22) Amɛbaaye amɛbua bo ni ona oyiŋkɔshikɔshi feemɔ lɛ jɛɛhe, ni ekolɛ eeenyɛ efee henɔwomɔ loo susumɔ ko ni ejaaa.
Dani nyɛbii lɛ baashi kɛya skul lɛ, nyɛkɛa amɛ nɔ ko ni baawo amɛ hewalɛ, nyɛkɛ amɛ afea daa gbi ŋmalɛ lɛ loo nyɛkɛ amɛ afea ekome kɛsɔlea.
Kɛ oba kpee lɛ shishi ni etɔ bo waa lɛ, sane toiboo baafee nɔ ni wa. (b) Tsɔ hiɛ ona be babaoo ni okɛ okar lɛ ayama shi ni oyata shi dani wiemɔ he gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ aje shishi.
Kwɛmɔ akɛ owiemɔ naamuu lɛ kɔɔ susumɔi ni okɛha momo lɛ ahe tɛ̃ɛ.
19 Shi jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ, shi moŋ, bo diɛŋtsɛ obinuu ni abaafɔ ahã bo lɛ,* lɛ ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ ehã migbɛ́i lɛ.’
Wiemɔi ashishitsɔɔlɔi komɛi susuɔ akɛ esa akɛ atsɔɔ kuku nɛɛ shishi akɛ, “nyɛkɛ anɔkwale afĩa nyɛhɛ tamɔ hɛfiinɔ.”
Mɔ ni kɛ bo kaseɔ Biblia lɛ baanyɛ aye abua bo ni osaa ohe yɛ sane ni obaasumɔ ni oha hetoo yɛ asafoŋ kpeei ni baanyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ shishi.
10 Yɛ be mli ni ewieɔ “nakai yoo Isabel” lɛ he lɛ, Yesu tee nɔ akɛ: “Ni ebii lɛ, gbe magbe amɛ; ni asafoi lɛ fɛɛ aaana ale akɛ mi ji mɔ ni taoɔ sabai kɛ tsuii amli, ni maha nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ bɔ ni nyɛnitsumɔi lɛ yɔɔ lɛ.”
“Nyɛ yeigbayei lɛ hu, nyɛbaa nyɛhe shi nyɛhaa nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ nyɛwumɛi lɛ, koni, kɛ mɛi komɛi booo wiemɔ lɛ toi tete lɛ, ashi wiemɔ lɛ sɛɛ ni atsɔ yei lɛ ajeŋba nɔ ni nine ashɛ amɛnɔ, ejaakɛ amɛnaa nyɛjeŋba ni hetsemɔ kɛ gbeyeishemɔ yɔɔ mli lɛ.” —1 Petro 3: 1-4.
Ejaakɛ bo okome too ji mɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ; ejaakɛ jeŋmaji fɛɛ aaaba ni amɛbaja yɛ ohiɛ, ejaakɛ ajie ojalɛ nii lɛ ashi faŋŋ”!
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni ooosusu akɛ ole gbɛ ni hi jogbaŋŋ ni oootsɔ nɔ ojie mɔhesusumɔ kpo otsɔɔ ohefatalɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ obiii lɛ ni etsɔɔ bo nɔ ni kɛ́ ofee lɛ ebaanya he waa?
Esa akɛ ogbee gbɛɛmɔ kɛ ohiɛ su lɛ ajie henumɔ ni sa kɛha osane lɛ kpo.
+ 24 No hewɔ lɛ, ni okɛ ohiɛ efɔ̃ Ejipt nɔ kɛhã shwiilii kɛ okpɔŋɔnɔtaralɔi nɛɛ, te ooofee tɛŋŋ oshwie amralo kome, ni ji minuŋtsɔ tsuji lɛ ateŋ mɔ bibioo kwraa lɛ po lɛ?
7 Buulu nyɛŋ aná anɔkwa hiɛshikamɔ;+
Agbɛnɛ lɛ, feemɔ ŋwɛibɔfoi lɛ ahe mfoniri ni amɛ hu amɛmiibolɔ amɛmiikɛɛ bo akɛ: “Kaahã Satan laka bo!”
5 Buulu lɛ, ebuuu epapa tsɔsemɔ,+
+ No hewɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ lɛ akɛ, ‘Obaalaka lɛ lɛɛlɛŋ, ni nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, obaaye omanye.
Satan baanyɛ alaka Yehowa tsuji ni yɔɔ ekãa po
Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni heɔ nɛkɛ saji nɛɛ eyeɔ lɛ . . . kwashia ji lɛ, ni ebɛ jwɛŋmɔ.”—Mishneh Torah, “Laws of Idolatry,” yitso 11; okɛto 3 Mose 19:26; 5 Mose 18:9-13 he.
9 “‘Shi kɛ́ alaka gbalɔ lɛ ni ehã mɔ lɛ hetoo lɛ, no lɛ mi, Yehowa, miji mɔ ni laka nakai gbalɔ lɛ.
Sɛɛ mli lɛ, Yehowa kɛ ebɔfoi lɛ tee ajina ni amɛtao gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni amɛaatsɔ nɔ amɛlaka Ahab koni ekɛ ehe ayawo ta ko ni abaagbe lɛ yɛ mli lɛ mli.
Taakɛ wolo ko ni akɛpɛiɔ saji amli tsɔɔ lɛ, abaanyɛ anu abɛ nɛɛ shishi yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ ákɛ etsɔɔ akɛ “ninámɔ woɔ mɛi ni kɛtsuɔ nii jogbaŋŋ lɛ ahiɛ nyam . . . [shi] yɛ kwashiai agbɛfaŋ lɛ, amɛnáaa nɔ ko kɛjɛɛɛ amɛbuulufeemɔ lɛ mli.”
Shi buulu jieɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ebuulufeemɔ kpo.
Kaaha jwɛŋmɔ ni ejaaa ni ahiɛ akɛ jwɛŋmɔ kpakpa ni abɛ yɛ mɛi ahe kɛ amɛhe wiemɔ fɔŋ tamɔ nilee pɛpɛɛpɛ lɛ miilaka bo.
(2 Korintobii 11:13-15) Shi taakɛ bɔ ni anyɛŋ akɛ kanei ni lakaa mɔ alaka amlakui ni hiɛ yɔɔ amɛhe nɔ ni amɛhe esa hu lɛ yɛ gbɛ ni waaa nɔ lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ hu mɛi ni tsɔɔ apasa tsɔɔmɔi kɛ mɛi ni woɔ jeŋ nileei ahe hewalɛ lɛ nyɛŋ alaka Kristofoi ‘ni fɔ ni amɛfɔɔ feemɔ lɛ eha amɛhenumɔ nii lɛ ele ekpakpa kɛ efɔŋ mlikpamɔ’ lɛ.—Hebribii 5:14; Kpojiemɔ 2:2.
Kɛ́ niyenii bu yɛ buulu nɔ,
lɛ baafee amalei ni daimonioi lɛ haa mɛi gbɛɔ kɛshwãa lɛ eko; shi Yehowa tsuji haŋ no alaka amɛ.
Mɔ ko ni ji kwashia lɛ he yɛ oshara ha maŋ lɛ.
Ni miji mɔ ni hãa klamɔfoi lɛ feɔ amɛnii tamɔ buului lɛ;+
Álaka mɛi pii ni aha amɛhe amɛye akɛ, kɛ amɛkɛ shika wo nitsumɔ ko mli nɔŋŋ pɛ lɛ, amɛbaanyɛ amɛna nii oya yɛ gbɛ ni waaa nɔ, ni ehe ehiaŋ ni amɛtsu he nii babaoo aloo ekolɛ amɛtsuŋ nɔ ko kwraa po.
Eyɛ mli akɛ amɛgbo Yehowa nɔ toi moŋ, shi loloolo lɛ amɛsusu akɛ amɛyɛ Yehowa gbɛfaŋ.
Yesu tee nɔ etsɛ́ woloŋmalɔi kɛ Farisifoi lɛ akɛ “kwashiai.”
+ 29 Bileam hã teji lɛ hetoo akɛ: “Ejaakɛ ofee mi buulu.
David nyɛ elaka Filistibii lɛ, ni eha amɛhe amɛye akɛ agbɛnɛ eyɛ amɛ gbɛfaŋ.
6 Ejaakɛ tamɔ bɔ ni ŋmeii fɛlɛɔ kɛ́ aashã yɛ kukwɛi shishi lɛ, nakai buulu ŋmɔlɔ ji;+ ni enɛ hu lɛ, yaka nii ni.
Mɛni hewɔ abaanyɛ akɛɛ akɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ‘tsɔ Yeremia yiŋ’ yɛ gbɛ ni sɛɛnamɔ yɔɔ he lɛ nɔ lɛ?
Shi kɛlɛ, Yehowa hã nɛkɛ amale bɔfoi nɛɛ fɛɛ batsɔmɔ kwashiai ni nijiaŋ eje wui, ni nibii baatsɔ sɛɛsɛɛ kɛha amɛ.
+ 20 Kɛkɛ ni Yehowa bi akɛ: ‘Namɔ baayalaka Ahab koni ekwɔ kɛya Ramot-gilead ni eyagbo?’
Hɛɛ, Yehowa musuŋtsɔlɛi lɛ tsɔɔ ehee daa leebi!
Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ jetsɛremɔ tsuɔ nii tamɔ pɛnte, ni ekɛhãa je lɛŋ feɔ fɛo.
Australia adafitswaa wolo ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ gbɔmɛi ayifalɛ kɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nibii ni akɛtsuɔ nii lɛ aaakã he aya hiɛ bɔ ni eyaa lɛ amrɔ nɛɛ lɛ, no lɛ beni baashɛ afi 2035 lɛ ebaabi ni wɔná Shikpɔŋ lɛ ekome hu wɔfata nɔ ni wɔyɔɔ nɔ nɛɛ he.”—Sydney Morning Herald.
Ekɛfata he akɛ: “Efeɔ mi akɛ Yehowa le nakai, ejaakɛ ehã wɔná miishɛɛ waa yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli nakai leebi lɛ, ni wɔhiɛ kpaŋ nɔ kɔkɔɔkɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ, shishitsɔɔmɔi komɛi tsɔɔ blema Hebri wiemɔ lɛ shishi akɛ “leebi ŋulami” loo “Toloo.”
Beni mitsɛ ji obalanyo lɛ, ehaa ekaneɔ Biblia lɛ daa leebi maaŋkpa etsɔɔ minii.
Ruth yɔse nɛkɛ hiamɔ nɛɛ, ejaakɛ kɛ eeekai yɛ tsutsu lɛ, eweku lɛ kaneɔ Biblia lɛ daa leebi kɛ gbɛkɛ yɛ niyeli sɛɛ.
14 Eyaa maŋtsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ gbɛkɛ, ni enɔ jetsɛremɔ lɛ ekuɔ esɛɛ kɛyaa yei ashĩa ni ji enyɔ ni Shahashgaz, maŋtsɛ lɛ piafonyo*+ ni kwɛɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ hemɛi* lɛ anɔ lɛ kwɛɔ nɔ lɛ mli.
Hɔgbaa leebi wiemɔi lɛ ekomɛi ji wiemɔi ni tsara nɔ, ni hiɛ fãi etɛ, ni yitso ji “Bɔ ni Wɔɔfee Wɔle Bɔfoi ni Ja” kɛ “Bo Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ Toi ni Oye Nɔ.”
Wɔyaa shiɛmɔ leebi, wɔyawuɔ ŋshɔ shwane, ni wɔyeɔ niyenii srɔto ko ni ŋɔɔ gbɛkɛ.”
Jim kɛ mi kase Anɔkwale wolo lɛ yitsei etɛ nakai leebi lɛ.
+ 12 Be ni Samuel te shi leebi maŋkpa ni ekɛ Saul ayakpe lɛ, akɛɛ Samuel akɛ: “Saul tee Karmel,+ ni eyama akulashiŋ ko yɛ jɛmɛ ehã ehe koni akɛkai lɛ.
‘Hewɔ lɛ mihiɛ ka enɔ.’
Mikaiɔ nakai Hɔgbaa leebi beni mi diɛŋtsɛ mibɔi shiɛmɔ klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa lɛ titri.
Hɔgbaa leebi gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ baaba baagbee kɛ drama ni kanyaa niiahesusumɔ, ni hiɛ minitii 40, ni yitso ji Nibii ni Jwere Ohiɛ ni Esa akɛ Ohala Mli.
Yɛ leebi shia kɛ shia shiɛmɔ ko ni gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi komɛi kɛ amɛhe wo mli lɛ mli lɛ, amɛna akɛ mɛi nɛɛhu bɛ shia.
10 Kristofoi babaoo nyiɛɔ nɛkɛ ŋaawoo nɛɛ sɛɛ kɛtsɔ ŋmalɛi lɛ kɛ emlitsɔɔmɔi lɛ akanemɔ kɛ Biblia lɛ kanemɔ loo ekasemɔ nɔ yɛ leebi mra mli hu.
Susumɔ bɔ ni amɛnaa kpɛ amɛhe amɛha beni amɛna akɛ nɛkɛ nyɛmimɛi hii ni asumɔɔ nɛɛ kɛ amɛŋamɛi yimɔɔ shi kɛjɛɔ bɔs srɔtoi ni ahai amli yɛ Sohaa leebi lɛ he okwɛ![ 11]
No hewɔ lɛ daa leebi lɛ, nɛkɛ ji bɔ ni amɛfeɔ.
Enɔ jetsɛremɔ leebi lɛ, wɔyashɛ wɔ nitsumɔhe lɛ yɛ Brooksville, yɛ Kentucky.
18 Mɛni hewɔ okwɛɔ lɛ daa leebi
Bei komɛi lɛ, mikaneɔ jenamɔ muu fɛɛ kɛyashiɔ leebi wɛlɛŋŋ beni hulu eje.
Kɛji akɛ egba yɛ gbɛkɛnaashi adafitswaa lɛ mli akɛ enɔ jetsɛremɔ lɛ nugbɔ baanɛ lɛ, oshashaooo shi kwraa akɛ oookɔ okataŋwia beni oshiɔ shia enɔ leebi lɛ.
14 Odase ni Ayeɔ yɛ Tsɔne ni Maŋbii Taraa Mli lɛ Amli: Gbɛgbalɔi komɛi kpɛ amɛyiŋ leebi ko akɛ amɛbaaye mɛi ni mɛ̃ɔ bɔs yɛ kɔleji ko ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ masɛi lɛ odase.
Susumɔ he okwɛ ni daa leebi kɛ́ ote shi lɛ, ehe ehiaaa ni ogbaa ohe naa yɛ shika, niiamlijiemɔ, loo nɔnyɛɛ ko kwraa he.
Ekolɛ obaakai beni okase akɛ ‘abaagbele shwilafoi ahiŋmɛi, abaagbele toimulɔi atoi, ni ŋã kpataa nɔ’ aaafee frɔ̃frɔ̃ lɛ.
Akɛni ema shishitoo tɛ agbo ko nɔ, ni akɛ akulashiŋi fɛfɛji efo he fɛɛ kɛkpe hewɔ lɛ, enyɛɔ ekɛ klɛŋklɛŋ sɔlemɔtsu ni Salomo ma lɛ yeɔ egbɔ yɛ efɛo mli.
Dɔlɛ sane ji akɛ, mihi shi akɛ mɔ ni agbako lɛ nɔ ko, ni leee nɔ ko kwraa yɛ su fɛfɛo kɛ anɔkwale ni wolo ni fe woji fɛɛ ni aŋma pɛŋ lɛ hiɛ lɛ he.”
Biblia lɛ jieɔ eyi yɛ ehe fɛo kɛ bɔ ni ehiɛ kã shi loo eyɔɔ jwɛŋmɔ lɛ hewɔ.—Nyɛkanea 1 Samuel 25:3.
5 Ani Yehowa eyanáaa Israelbii lɛ ahe miishɛɛ yɛ ogbɔjɔ shihilɛ mli ni amɛhi, niyenii ni ŋɔɔŋɔi ni amɛye, wein kpakpa ni amɛnu, kɛ lalai ni ŋɔɔ lɛ atoi ni amɛbo lɛ hewɔ?
15 “‘Shi okɛ ohiɛ fɔ̃ ohefɛo lɛ nɔ,+ ni otsɔ ashawo yɛ gbɛ́i ni ohe lɛ hewɔ.
Nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ, Cuba, ni ji ŋshɔkpɔ fɛfɛo ko ni yɔɔ Caribbean lɛ na mumɔŋ jɔɔmɔ be ko ni eko bako nakai da lɛ mli niiashikpamɔ.
11 Bɔ ni Yehowa kɛ eshai faa kwraa kɛmɔɔ shi lɛ mlitsɔɔmɔ ni mli kã shi faŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ nɛ.
Amɛju atade fɛfɛo ko ni amɛkɛto amɛha amɛhe.
Akɛni ehe yɛ fɛo, ni eetao hiɛnyam, ni ehe esa akɛ gbɛjianɔtolɔ, ni tsutsu lɛ, efɔɔ ewu ni egbo lɛ hefatamɔ yɛ tafaa nitsumɔi amli, ni enaa tse yɛ wiemɔi srɔtoi babaoo mli hewɔ lɛ, ebɔ mɔdɛŋ ni enyɛ ená bulɛ kɛ sɛɛfimɔ kɛjɛ eshishibii lɛ adɛŋ.
Be ni mikpa adesai srɔtoi ashihilɛ kɛ gbɛjianɔtoi srɔtoi ashi lɛ, miyiŋ tsɔ ni miyoo akɛ nɔ ni fe fɛɛ ni manyɛ mikɛ mishihilɛ afee ji ni mayashara shi yɛ hei kɛkpa nibii ni yɔɔ shibɔlemɔ ŋulami fɛfɛo nɛɛ nɔ lɛ ashi dani adesai afite lɛ.
Miishɛɛ ha yaafonui babaoo jie ehe kpo beni anaa mɛi babaoo ni abaptisiɔ amɛ, ni Italiabii ni fa fe 40 ni ba kpee lɛ alala fata he lɛ.
Nibii ni gbalaa mɔ jwɛŋmɔ yɛ je lɛŋ, tamɔ gbɔmɔtsoŋ hefɛo, hiɛnyam, loo heloonaa ninámɔ, jeee nibii ni Nyɔŋmɔ buɔ akɛ amɛhe hiaa.
Nyɛmimɛi yei komɛi kɛ maŋ lɛ mli hesaamɔ saa amɛhe ni amɛkɛ fɔfɔii fɛfɛji wula amɛyitsɔi yɛ Polynesiabii ahesaamɔ diɛŋtsɛ mli.
Nyɛmi nuu lɛ ji Tom Mitchell, ni nɔ ko fioo ni etswa lɛ ŋɔɔ.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ no mli lɛ, Habel fɔlɔi ni ji Adam kɛ Hawa ahe yɛ fɛo pam, ni amɛyɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ jogbaŋŋ.
Gbalɔ Yesaia kɛ wiemɔi ni ŋɔɔ tsɔɔ shɛɛ sane ni wɔshiɛɔ lɛ mli akɛ: “Kwɛ bɔ ni sanekpakpa jajelɔ ní shiɛɔ hejɔlɛ lɛ, [nɔ̃ kpakpa ko he sanekpakpa lɛ, NW] sanekpakpa jajelɔ ní shiɛɔ yiwalaheremɔ lɛ naji yɔɔ fɛo yɛ gɔji lɛ anɔ, mɔ ni kɛɔ Zion akɛ: O-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ yeɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ!”—Yesaia 52:7.
Gɔji ashikpɔŋ nɛɛ ŋshɔnine lɛ yɛ nyam kɛ fɛo fɛɛ fe bɔ ni hiɛ aaakpa nɔ.
Shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ baafee fɛo tamɔ bɔ ni no mli lɛ Eden abɔɔ lɛ yɔɔ.
(Yesaia 32:17, 18) Mɛɛ shiwoo ni yɔɔ fɛo po nɛ!
Te nikeenii nɛɛ hã Shannon nu he tɛŋŋ yɛ Yehowa he?
▪ Gbelemɔ baafa 6, ni okɛɛ akɛ: “Mɛi pii susuɔ akɛ wɔ shikpɔŋ fɛfɛo kɛ wala ni yɔɔ nɔ lɛ ba trukaa.
Socrates gbele lɛ ji gbele ni yɔɔ fɛo.
Be ni tookwɛlɔ lɛ kɛɛ oblayoo lɛ akɛ “ohe yɛ fɛo kɛyi shi” ni “kpa ko kpa ko bɛ ohe” lɛ, jeee bɔ ni ehe yɔɔ fɛo yɛ kponɔgbɛ lɛ kɛkɛ he ewieɔ, shi moŋ eewie sui kpakpai ni eyɔɔ lɛ hu he.
Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ lɛ woɔ yibii yɛ wɔmli—sui kpakpai ní jara wa, ní wɔ fɛɛ wɔbaasumɔ ni wɔná.
13 Kɛjɛ Pentekoste afi 33 Ŋ.B. kɛbaa lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ dũ “jalɛ tsei” wuji ní tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ—ni ji Kristofoi ní afɔ amɛ mu ni amɛyɔɔ ekãa—yɛ emaŋ hee, ni ji “Nyɔŋmɔ Israel lɛ” mumɔŋ shihilɛ lɛ mli.
Beni wɔyɔɔ Hopkinsville, Kentucky lɛ, nyɛmi yoo Kristofonyo ko bafua Helen waa ni ebi lɛ akɛ: “Okaiɔ mi?”
Collegiantbii ni ba lɛ ateŋ mɛi krokomɛi hai tsũi kɛjɛ akrowa lɛ mli bii lɛ aŋɔɔ ni mɛi krokomɛi hu hi Groote Huis, loo Shia Wulu, ni ji Collegiantbii lɛ ashia ni tsũi 30 yɔɔ mli lɛ mli.
14 Kadimɔ klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa akɛ onanemɛi náa gbɛfaŋnɔ kpele yɛ enɛ mli.
Ni eeenyɛ eba akɛ, wiemɔ sutsɔɔlɔi tamɔ “agbo,” “bibioo,” “emomo,” aloo “ehee” fata Ga wiemɔ ni ji “shia” lɛ he.
Kɛji ootao ni oná toiŋjɔlɛ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ, no lɛ ebiɔ ni oná sanebimɔi etɛ ni he hiaa waa nɛɛ ahetoo.
“Bɔs lɛ kwɔɔ ji nifeemɔ ni wa diɛŋtsɛ kɛha wɔ.
62 Maŋtsɛyeli Ko Ni Tamɔ Tso Agbo
11 Biblia mli saji ni ale jogbaŋŋ, ni kɔɔ gbɔfeemɔ su kpojiemɔ he lɛ ekome ji nɔ ni kɔɔ Abraham kɛ Sara he, beni amɛyashĩ buu ni amɛhi mli yɛ Mamre tsei wuji lɛ ateŋ, yɛ Hebron masɛi lɛ.
* Kɛkɛ ni eshi kɛtee maŋ wulu lɛ mli koni eyatao shika gbɛfaŋ shweshweeshwe shihilɛ.
(Hebribii 5:14) Eesumɔ ni wɔdamɔ suɔmɔ ni wɔyɔɔ kɛhã lɛ kɛ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ nɔ wɔkpɛ wɔyiŋ, kɛ́ eji yiŋkpɛɛ bibioo jio, yiŋkpɛɛ wulu jio.
(1 Korintobii 7:4) Mɛi ni susuɔ gbalashihilɛ mlibotemɔ he lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi baanyɛ anu he akɛ enɛ he ehiaaa tsɔ, ejaakɛ bɔlɛnamɔ efeŋ nɔ ni he hiaa yɛ amɛ gbalashihilɛ mli.
Naagba wulu ko ji akɛ, datrɛfoi lɛ haa wɔbii lɛ lá be mli ni fɔlɔi lɛ hako amɛ hegbɛ, ni bei pii lɛ saneyelihei haa amɛ hegbɛ ni amɛfeɔ nakai.
Amagajamɔ ehe shi yɛ Babilon, no hewɔ lɛ, ebɛ mlɛo akɛ Yudanyo anɔkwafo baasɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ jɛmɛ.
Miishɛɛ krɛdɛɛ kɛha wɔ ji “Gbɛgbamɔ Otsii” ni wɔyeɔ yɛ maŋtiasei wuji komɛi amli, be mli ni be-fɛɛ sɔɔlɔi aaashɛ nyɔŋma kɛ enyɔ buaa amɛhe naa, ni amɛkɛ nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ maŋ lɛ mli lɛ hiɔ shi, ni amɛtsuɔ nii akɛ kuu lɛ.
Kɛ wɔkɛ wɔ adeka bibioo ni wɔkɛ wɔtadei woɔ mli lɛ to he lɛ, eji nɔ ko bibioo kwraa.
Kɛ́ bulɔ lɛ bi sane ko yɛ he lɛ, nɔ ni wɔkɛɔ daa ji akɛ: “Eji wolo ko ni da ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ miisumɔ akɛ ekane.”
Nakai wiemɔi lɛ ná minɔ hewalɛ waa.

12 Yɛ afi 1953 mli lɛ, Robert, Lila, kɛ amɛbii lɛ shi maŋtiase wulu ko mli kɛtee ŋmɔ mli shia momo ko ni efite ni yɔɔ akrowa ko ni yɔɔ Pennsylvania, U.S.A. lɛ mli.
Yɛ nakai kpeei ni amɛteŋ nɔ ni da fe fɛɛ ni afee yɛ 1958 nɔ lɛ fata he lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, aná hiɛyaa babaoo yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛlɔi agbɛfaŋ.

“Minyɛmimɛi, kɛji nyɛgbee kaai srɔtoi pii amli lɛ, nyɛbua lɛ miishɛɛ sɔŋŋ; ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nyɛhemɔkɛyeli kaa lɛ tsɛɔ tsuishiŋmɛɛ kɛbaa.”—YAKOBO 1:2, 3.
Kɛ́ ena bɔ ni nibii etee lɛ ehã lɛ, ele akɛ Yehowa miiye eebua wɔ.
Kpaako miná mile akɛ oheɔ mi oyeɔ, ejaakɛ okamaaa mi obinuu, ni ji obi kome too lɛ.’
Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔle Yehowa sui lɛ jogbaŋŋ lɛ?
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, Paulo naagbee ŋaawoo ni ekɛha Korintobii lɛ sa jogbaŋŋ ŋmɛnɛ taakɛ eji afii akpei enyɔ ni eho nɛ lɛ akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ, minyɛmimɛi ni misumɔɔ, nyɛfia shi ni nyɛkagbugbãa, ni nyɛtekea nɔ yɛ Nuntsɔ lɛ nitsumɔ lɛ mli daa nɛɛ, ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nyɛmɔdɛŋbɔɔ lɛ efeee yaka yɛ Nuntsɔ lɛ mli.”—1 Korintobii 15:58.
18 Yɛ wɔbei nɛɛ amli lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi hu shiɛɔ yɛ je lɛŋ fɛɛ kɛtaoɔ mɛi ni miisumɔ ni amɛle Nyɔŋmɔ ní amɛsɔmɔ lɛ lɛ.
+ 7 Nyɛkɛ su kpakpa asɔmɔa akɛ nyɔji, tamɔ nɔ ni nyɛmiisɔmɔ Yehowa,*+ shi jeee gbɔmɛi, 8 ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ lɛ, nyɔŋ ji lɛ jio, jeee nyɔŋ ji lɛ jio, nɔ kpakpa ni efeɔ lɛ, no he najiaŋ Yehowa* baato lɛ.
Yehowa le wɔnifeemɔi, wɔsusumɔi, kɛ wiemɔi ni yɔɔ wɔlilɛi anɔ lɛ fɛɛ po dani wɔwieɔ.
Kɛ́ eji anɔkwale akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsɔɔ hiɛ ehalaa kai ni ebaaŋmɛ gbɛ ni wɔkɛkpe lɛ, belɛ no tsɔɔ akɛ, ele nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baaba wɔnɔ.
Mɛni hewɔ kɛ́ osusu bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ lɛ ye ebua mɛi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ he lɛ, ewoɔ bo hewalɛ lɛ?
Yehowa etsĩii wɔnaa koni wɔkaná miishɛɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ, shi wɔle jogbaŋŋ akɛ jeee nifeemɔi nɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ ji nibii ni yeɔ ebuaa wɔ ni wɔto mumɔŋ jwetrii yɛ ŋwɛi.
Te Yehowa nuɔ gbohii ashi ni ebaatée lɛ he ehaa tɛŋŋ, ni te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ enɛ?
Te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ shiŋ wɔ yɛ kaa be mli?
Gbɔmɛi ní yɔɔ he fɛɛ he ebaná toiŋjɔlɛ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
6 Kɛji akɛ wɔha wɔla lɛ kpɛ́ lɛ, wɔkɛ yijiemɔ bahaa wɔ-Bɔlɔ lɛ ni wɔyeɔ wɔbuaa anɔkwafoi lɛ koni amɛbale lɛ koni amɛná naanɔ wala hiɛnɔkamɔ lɛ.

2 Paulo le buufeemɔ.
1 Taakɛ ooole lɛ, Hindubii pii yɛ shikpɔji babaoo nɔ, ni maŋ nɛɛ hu fata he.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni ooosusu akɛ ole gbɛ ni hi jogbaŋŋ ni oootsɔ nɔ ojie mɔhesusumɔ kpo otsɔɔ ohefatalɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ obiii lɛ ni etsɔɔ bo nɔ ni kɛ́ ofee lɛ ebaanya he waa?
The Expositor’s Bible Commentary lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Bokagbɛ ní Bɛŋkɛ lɛ jara nɔ nihɔɔlɔi ebuuu nu kuli bibioo ni yɔɔ goga ní akɛsusuɔ nii lɛ mli, loo mulu fioo ní yɔɔ ŋsɛni mli beni aŋmɛɔ loo aloo aduawai ahaa nihelɔ lɛ akɛ ehe miihia.”
Gbɔmɛi 5,200 tee stediɔm lɛ yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛshika fitemɔ naa, ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ hiɛ goga, mamashwɛ, tako, jwɛinii, bɔlɔ, brɔshi, ninekaosu, kɛ samla ni akɛgbeɔ muawai koni akɛsha jɛmɛ.
+ 11 Ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Onukpa, obɛ nɔ ko po ni akɛyɛɔ nu, ni nubu lɛ mli kwɔ.
(1 Mose 17:1; 2 Mose 6:3) Ekolɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni Satan nibii agbɛjianɔtoo fɔŋ lɛ ehe shi jogbaŋŋ, shi yɛ Yehowa hiɛ lɛ, “jeŋmaji lɛ tamɔ nu kuli yɛ blage he, ni abuɔ amɛ tamɔ mulu kuli ní kpɛtɛ ŋsɛni he.”
Niiasɛɛyaahe ni yɔɔ mitsu lɛ mli lɛ mli lɛ ji goga ko ni agbele nɔ, ni awoɔ shi kome daa gbi.
Jeŋmaji lɛ tamɔ nu kuli yɛ goga he (15)
Gboklɛfoi atsũi ni mli eyimɔ obɔbɔ lɛ eko fɛɛ eko yɛ goga kome pɛ ni ayaa niiasɛɛ awoɔ mli.
Okɛkama nɔ ko ni baanyɛ ahoso, tamɔ nibii ni adamɔɔ nɔ kɛtsuɔ nii, loo gogai kɛ adekai anɔ.
Nu goga kome kɛ fã pɛ wɔnyɛɔ wɔnáa daa gbi.”
Nakai gbi lɛ leebi lɛ, lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ekɛ goga tee faaŋ kɛbawo bu lɛ mli obɔ ni ekɛtsɔɔ bɔ ni efee klalo kɛha baptisimɔ lɛ!
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, yɛ Yehowa ni ji “ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ feelɔ lɛ” hiɛ lɛ, jeŋmaji lɛ tamɔ nu kuli yɛ blage he.
Nɔ ni jɛ enɛ mli ba ji “nui” ni fiɔ Shinto jamɔ ni yɔɔ Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ mli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ ni agbala he shi kɛjɛ ehe—ao, yɛ be mli ni Shinto jamɔ ekpɛlɛ la babaoo ni afɔse ashwie shi yɛ Pasific tawuu he lɛ nɔ lɛ sɛɛ!
Efɔse kɛjɛ ŋwɛi eshwie shi tamɔ ofɔseɔ nu kɛjɛɔ goga mli oshwieɔ shi lɛ.
Yɛ be mli ni wɔbɛŋkɛɔ jɛmɛ lɛ, shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kadimɔ nii lɛ ekomɛi bafee mi faŋŋ—gɔŋ ko, gbɛ ŋta ko, sɔlemɔtsu ko, faa nɔ agba ko.
No hewɔ lɛ, Hiram gbe nitsumɔi fɛɛ ni etsu ehã Maŋtsɛ Solomon kɛhã anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shĩa lɛ naa:+ 12 akulashiŋi enyɔ+ lɛ kɛ akekerei ni tamɔ tsɛnsii ni mamɔ akulashiŋi enyɔ lɛ anɔ lɛ; yaa he samai+ enyɔ ni yɔɔ akekerei enyɔ ni tamɔ tsɛnsii ni mamɔ akulashiŋi lɛ anɔ lɛ ahe lɛ; 13 pomegranet aduawai+ 400 ni yɔɔ yaa he samai enyɔ lɛ ahe, ni ji pomegranet aduawai ni eko kã eko nɔ yɛ yai lɛ eko fɛɛ eko he, yɛ akekerei enyɔ ni tamɔ tsɛnsii ni mamɔ akulashiŋi lɛ anɔ lɛ ahe lɛ;+ 14 nu shwiilii nyɔŋma lɛ, kɛ okpolui nyɔŋma ni hɔlɔ nu shwiilii lɛ amli lɛ;+ 15 Ŋshɔ lɛ kɛ tsinahii 12 ni yɔɔ Ŋshɔ lɛ shishi lɛ;+ 16 kɛ lamululoomɔnii lɛ, kɛ sofii lɛ, kɛ fakai lɛ,+ kɛ amɛhe nibii krokomɛi fɛɛ ni Hiram-abiv+ kɛ akɔɔble ni atsuu he fee ehã Maŋtsɛ Solomon kɛhã Yehowa shĩa lɛ.
14 Amɛkɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ he nibii fɛɛ ni amɛkɛtsuɔ nii kɛ́ amɛmiisɔmɔ yɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ he lɛ ashwie nɔ: lajeenii lɛ kɛ fakai lɛ kɛ sofii lɛ kɛ tsɛnsii lɛ kɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ he nibii lɛ fɛɛ;+ ni amɛkɛ nu mli gbee hewolo aha nɔ, ní amɛkɛ etsei+ ni akɛwóɔ lɛ ahɔlɔ amɛgbɛhei.
3 Bei komɛi lɛ, ekolɛ wɔ hu wɔkɛ shihilɛ ni tamɔ nakai baakpe.
Bɔni afee ni anyɛ ajie akoko lɛ kɛjɛ ehe totoi lɛ amli lɛ, nitsulɔi lɛ kɛ faka loo sofi wulu ko kaa akoko loo ŋmaa ni agbee lɛ, amɛfɔ̃ɔ amɛwoɔ kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ mli, ni kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ tswaa ehe totoi ni etsiii lɛ kɛyaa, ni ŋmaa loo akoko lɛ shwieɔ shi ekoŋŋ.
Yɛ afii 1726 mli tɔŋŋ po lɛ, Daniel Defoe ye hemɔkɛyeli ni mɛi hiɛ akɛ Abonsam ji kooloo awuiyelɔ ni he yɔɔ gbeyei “ni yɔɔ ampaŋ fiji, akloŋtoi, nane ni agbala mli enyɔ, lei kakadaŋŋ, lilɛi ŋta, kɛ nibii ni tamɔ nakai” lɛ he fɛo.
+ 3 Enɛ sɛɛ lɛ, efee afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ he nibii lɛ fɛɛ, gogai lɛ kɛ sofii lɛ kɛ tsɛnsii lɛ kɛ fakai lɛ kɛ lajeenii lɛ.

+ 3 Feemɔ gogai ni akɛbaaloo emli lamulu* lɛ kɛ sofii kɛ tsɛnsii kɛ fakai kɛ lajeenii, ni okɛ akɔɔble afee ehe nibii lɛ fɛɛ.

• Faka ni jeɔ mɔ dɛŋ gbeɔ shi lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ nuu ko miiba bo saramɔ
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, 1 Samuel 13:21 lɛ kaneɔ yɛ King James Version lɛ mli akɛ: “Kɛlɛ amɛyɛ kitai ní akɛjɔɔ tsinakɔii lɛ kɛ adedai lɛ kɛ ninɛ̃mɔ dadei lɛ kɛ lemai lɛ anaa, ni akɛsáa tsina kplamɔdadei lɛ hu.”
Bo lɛ feemɔ he mfoniri ni mikɛ minane hiɛ awale loo faka mli kɛmiiye nii.
Yɛ Mizraimbii ablema saji amli lɛ, Set ji efɔŋfeemɔ nyɔŋmɔ, ni “akɛ su ni tamɔ kooloo ko ni he yɔɔ gbeyei ni yɔɔ gugɔ fɛtɛfɛtɛ ni etsɔ afã, toi kakadaji ni hiɛ koji ejwɛ, kɛ lei ni tamɔ faka ni yɔɔ keketee lɛ damɔ shi kɛha lɛ lɛ.”—Larousse Encyclopedia of Mythology.

“Amale gbalɔi pii baate shi ni amɛbaalaka mɛi pii; ni akɛni abaaya nɔ afee nibii babaoo ni mla eŋmɛɛɛ gbɛ hewɔ lɛ, mɛi pii asuɔmɔ lɛ he baajɔ.”
Ehe bahia ni bɔfo Paulo adamɔ latsaa kɛ fɛ̃i, hɔmɔ kɛ kumai, kpeshii, osharai sɔrɔtoi, kɛ yiwaa ni naa wa naa yɛ emaŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛmɔ gbɛfãai lɛ amli.
