18 Aŋkroaŋkroi ni tamɔ Laodikeabii lɛ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ bɛ klakla kɛ hewalɛwoo ni asaŋ amɛbɛ ŋanii ni kɛ hejɔɔmɔ haa mɔ.
Eŋmɛ etsui shi yɛ yiwaa ni tsara nɔ yɛ nɔyelii etɛ shishi—Fascist nɔyeli dani ta lɛ je shishi yɛ Hungary, German National Socialistbii yɛ Serbia, kɛ Komunist nɔyeli lɛ mli yɛ jeŋ hewalɛi akaŋshii lɛ mli yɛ Hungary.
Beni nyɛmi yoo ko wieɔ eblayeiaŋ be he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ okɛ ohe yawo jeŋba sha mli lɛ, sɛɛ mli lɛ ofeɔ shwɛm, ni omiishɛɛ fɛɛ tãa.
Oo kulɛ ofee ŋanii loo ofee klakla!
Kɛjɛ be mli ni akaŋshii ni ka Anaigbɛbii kɛ Bokagbɛbii ateŋ ni awie he aahu lɛ ba naagbee nɛɛ, atse nuklea tawuu nii ni be eho lɛ ayifalɛ nɔ, shi tawuu nii ni yɔɔ gbeyei kwraa fe nine ni abua naa babaoo yɛ, ni aasaa aafee ehee.
Nyɔŋmɔ wie akɛ: “Gbii abɔ fɛɛ ni shikpɔŋ lɛ yɔɔ nɛɛ, nidumɔ kɛ nikpamɔ, fɛ̃i kɛ latsaa, agbiɛnaa kɛ aharabata kɛ shwane kɛ nyɔɔŋ sɛɛ efoŋ.”
Radhakrishnan, wie yɛ yoga he akɛ “atsɔɔ bɔ ni adamɔ shi loo ata shi lɛ nɔ akudɔɔ gbɔmɔtso lɛ ni anyɛɛɛ anu dɔlɛ loo fɛi ni naa wa lɛ he. . . .
Yɛ Canada lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi enyɔ komɛi yasara nuu onukpa ko yɛ gbi ni fɛi miiye ni snoo enɛ mli.
Nɔ ni mikaiɔ lolo ji akɛ, gbi ko beni ayeɔ Blonya lɛ, no mli lɛ fɛ̃i miiye waa diɛŋtsɛ, ni ekɛ mi jɛ fuuhe lɛ wɔmiiba shia ni miishɔɔ minane shishi kɛnyiɛ emasɛi.
KENICHI, ni ji nuu ni hiɛ efã saŋŋ lɛ tee tsofahɔɔmɔhe ko koni eyahe tsofa kɛtsa tsitsi fioo ko ni ená lɛ.
Nyɔji ejwɛ sɛɛ yɛ October 1, 1940 beni fɛ̃i miiye waa lɛ, abaptisi mi yɛ kpaakpo ko ni yɔɔ Chattanooga sɛɛ lɛ mli.
Amɛsusuɔ akɛ etsɔɔ suɔmɔ su ko ni henumɔ bɛ mli, ní akaseɔ he nii kɛkɛ.
Kɔɔyɔɔ mli jɔɔ ŋanii diɛŋtsɛ, basabasa feelɔi kɛ polisifoi anaagbamɔ lɛ yɛ gbeyei fioo, ni French kasemɔ hu bafee kaa diɛŋtsɛ.
Ahaaa wɔ niyenii ni wɔye, ni akɛni February mli ni hewɔ lɛ, wɔna nɔ̃ diɛŋtsɛ yɛ fɛ̃i lɛ mli.
Kɛ́ mifeee nakai lɛ, hɔmɔ baaye wɔ gbii babaoo kɛfata fɛ̃i ni naa wa lɛ he.
Fɛi yeɔ waa yɛ fɛi be lɛ mli, ni je naa mra.
Ákɛ tookwɛlɔ lɛ, David le bɔ ni fɛ̃i yeɔ mɔ waa diɛŋtsɛ nyɔɔŋ.
Mikpɛlɛɛɛ ni mikɛ mihe woɔ mli, ejaakɛ mibaná mile akɛ afɔɔɔ Yesu yɛ December fɛ̃i be lɛ mli, ni ákɛ mra be mli Kristofoi lɛ hu yeee Blonya.—Okɛto Luka 2:8-12 he.
Akɛni jɛmɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kwɔ waa hewɔ lɛ, jɛmɛ jɔɔ waa, ni mɛi ní jɛɛɛ jɛmɛ niiaŋ lɛ kɛ hela ní shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔkwɔlɛ lɛ kɛbaa lɛ kpeɔ be fɛɛ be.
Shi agbɛnɛ, yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni wɔɔya Kooyigbɛ ni fɛ̃i yeɔ waa yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔkpee jeŋ dɔlɛ ni naa wa waa lɛ naa.
15 Kɛjɛ be mli ni akɛɛ Anaigbɛbii kɛ Bokagbɛbii ateŋ akaŋshii lɛ ba naagbee, ni jeŋ hewalɛ kome pɛ eshwɛ nɛɛ, awie toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shweshweeshwe shihilɛ he babaoo.
Kɛ jɛmɛ tamɔ Romabii agboklɛfoi atsũi krokomɛi lɛ, belɛ eji he ko ni mli ejɔ, ni ewo duŋ, kɛ emli muji, he ni kɔsɔ̃ŋkɔ̃sɔ̃i woo kɛ piŋmɔi sɔrɔtoi fɛɛ yɔɔ.
Be fɛɛ be ni mikɛ naagbai baakpe yɛ shihilɛ mli lɛ, mibɔɔ mɔdɛŋ mikaiɔ klɛŋklɛŋ suɔmɔ ni miná kɛhã Yehowa lɛ
Suzie saa eye ebua mi ni mibayɔse akɛ mɛi ni bɛ suɔmɔ ni mli wa kɛha Yehowa ni mikɛbɔɔ lɛ ji nɔ titri hewɔ ni mináaa miishɛɛ lɛ.
Ekɛfata he akɛ: “Amrɔ nɛɛ, shishitoo mla ni kɔɔ suɔmɔ kɛ bulɛ he lɛ kudɔɔ mi yɛ wekukpaa ni kã mi kɛ miŋa kɛ mibii lɛ ateŋ lɛ mli.
(Kpojiemɔ 2:4) Kulɛ esaaa akɛ amɛtɔɔ fa yɛ enɛ mli, ejaakɛ Paulo etsɔ hiɛ eŋma amɛ aaafee afii 35 ni ewie Nyɔŋmɔ “suɔmɔ babaoo ni ekɛsumɔɔ wɔ” lɛ he etsɔɔ amɛ, ni ewo amɛ hewalɛ akɛ: “Nyɛfea Nyɔŋmɔ kaselɔi, tamɔ bii ni asumɔɔ, ni nyɛnyiɛa yɛ suɔmɔ mli, taakɛ bɔ ni Kristo hu sumɔɔ wɔ lɛ.”
Yɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa fã Hoshea akɛ: “Yaa ekoŋŋ ní oyasumɔ yoo ko ní ewu sumɔɔ lɛ, shi kɛlɛ gbalafitelɔ ji lɛ, taakɛ bɔ ni Yehowa sumɔɔ Israelbii lɛ, tsɛ amɛ lɛ amɛkpale kɛtee nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi aŋɔɔ, ni amɛsumɔɔ wein yibii atatalei lɛ.”
BƆNI afee ni Yesu ama bɔ ni suɔmɔ he hiaa ha lɛ nɔ mi lɛ, ekɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
(Abɛi 16:32) Oti lɛ ji ní wɔha suɔmɔ—suɔmɔ kɛha Yehowa, suɔmɔ kɛha mɔ kroko, kɛ suɔmɔ kɛha jalɛ shishitoo mlai ahi weku lɛ kɛ asafo lɛ fɛɛ mli.
(Galatabii 5: 22, 23) Tswaa suɔmɔ kɛha Yehowa kɛ Yesu Kristo oma shi, jeee kɛtsɔ kɛɛmɔ ní oookɛɛ kɛkɛ akɛ wɔsumɔɔ amɛ lɛ nɔ, shi moŋ kɛtsɔ yiŋtoi ahewɔ ní wɔsumɔɔ amɛ lɛ kɛ gbɛ ni wɔɔtsɔ nɔ wɔjie nakai suɔmɔ lɛ kpo lɛ he sanegbaa nɔ.
4 Kristofoi sumɔɔ amɛweku mli bii—ŋamɛi sumɔɔ amɛwumɛi, wumɛi sumɔɔ amɛŋamɛi, fɔlɔi sumɔɔ amɛbii.
Nomɛi ji, (1) suɔmɔ ni wɔyɔɔ kɛhã Yehowa, (2) suɔmɔ ni wɔyɔɔ kɛhã anɔkwalei ni wɔkase yɛ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ, kɛ (3) suɔmɔ ni wɔyɔɔ kɛhã wɔnyɛmimɛi Kristofoi lɛ.
Hɛɛ, kɛ́ wɔɔye omanye diɛŋtsɛ akɛ tsɔɔlɔi lɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔná suɔmɔ ni akɛbɔ he etɛ—suɔmɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ, suɔmɔ kɛha anɔkwale lɛ, kɛ suɔmɔ kɛha gbɔmɛi.
Ona okadi ni Yesu Kristo wie akɛ no akɛbaayɔse enɔkwa kaselɔi lɛ faŋŋ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Miihã nyɛ kitã hee akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe; bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe nakai nɔŋŋ.
Jeee wɔ tsutsu wɔsumɔ lɛ; aabi wɔ koni wɔsumɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ni sumɔɔ wɔ lɛ.
Ewie esɛɛkuu lɛ he akɛ: “Nakai be lɛ mli nɔŋŋ lɛ mijwɛŋmɔ ku sɛɛ ba mimli ekoŋŋ, ni bɔni afee ni mimaŋtsɛyeli lɛ hiɛ aba nyam ekoŋŋ hewɔ lɛ, miwoo kɛ mihiɛŋtso nɔ kpɛmɔ lɛ ku sɛɛ ba miŋɔɔ ekoŋŋ, ni mijinafoi kɛ minukpai lɛ tao mi, ni aŋɔ mi ato mimaŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔ ekoŋŋ, ni aŋɔ hewalɛ ni fe tsutsu nɔ lɛ afata he aha mi.”
5 Kɛkɛ ni yɛ gbɛkɛnaashi ŋmaa afɔleshaa+ be lɛ mli lɛ, mite shi yɛ mihiɛgbele lɛ mli kɛ mitade kɛ mitade ni nine bɛ he ni egbála lɛ, ni mikula shi yɛ minakutsei anaa ni migbɛ minijiaŋ mitsɔɔ Yehowa, mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ.
19 Ni Yehowa kɛɛ Yeremia ekoŋŋ akɛ: 20 “Nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ, ‘Kɛ́ nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛku mikpaŋmɔ ni kɔɔ jetsɛremɔ he lɛ, kɛ mikpaŋmɔ ni kɔɔ jenamɔ he lɛ mli koni jetsɛremɔ kɛ jenamɔ akaba yɛ amɛbe naa dɔŋŋ lɛ,+ 21 no lɛ, abaanyɛ aku mikpaŋmɔ ni mikɛ mitsulɔ David ekpaŋ lɛ mli+ koni ekaná binuu ko ye maŋtsɛ yɛ emaŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ nɔ,+ ni nakai nɔŋŋ eji yɛ mikpaŋmɔ ni mikɛ Levi osɔfoi lɛ, misɔɔlɔi lɛ,+ ekpaŋ lɛ hu gbɛfaŋ.
Ŋɔɔ mitsui, ha esumɔ
+ 21 Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ mikitãi lɛ ni eyeɔ nɔ lɛ, lɛ ji mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi.
Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.”
Mitswa mifai shi akɛ maya nɔ mikɛ mitoi, mijwɛŋmɔ, kɛ mitsui fɛɛ akase wiemɔ lɛ bɔni afee ni mihe asa tamɔ nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ biɛ, yɛ Madagascar, ní sumɔɔ wɔ, ní toɔ amɛtsui shi amɛhaa wɔ lɛ.
Mitsɛ fee shiishɔ eha mi, ni mifɔɔ shwɛmɔ yɛ wɔbɔɔ lɛ mli.
Mi-Kwɛlɔ lɛ le nii jogbaŋŋ!
‘Kɛ misuɔmɔ ni tsakeee lɛ kɛ mimɔbɔnalɛ lɛ hu.
(Kpojiemɔ 17:16, 17; 18:21) Famɔ ni ekɛhaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ jalɛsaneyeli kɛ jalɛnifeemɔ lɛ ji akɛ: “Nyɛjea emli, mimaŋ [ni ji Babilon kpeteŋkpele lɛ, jeŋ fɛɛ apasa jamɔ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ], koni nyɛkɛ lɛ akafee ekome yɛ ehe eshai lɛ amli, ní nyɛkaná ehaomɔi lɛ eko.
Mɛi ni afɔ̃ko amɛ nine shi efeɔ amɛ akɛ amɛya lɛ baanyɛ abi amɛhe akɛ, ‘Ani yookpeemɔ nɛɛ shishi ni maya lɛ etsɔŋ suɔmɔ ni mibɛ kɛha mɛi heei ni boteɔ gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ?
Taakɛ wɔtsɔ hiɛ wɔna lɛ, Yehowa webii ni tamɔ mɛi ni bɛ hebuu nɔ ko kwraa lɛ ji mɛi ni Gog kɛ esafo lɛ fɛɛ kɛ hiɛdɔɔ tutuaa amɛ lɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Katolik Sɔlemɔ lɛ te shi amɛwo lɛ, enanemɛi naaa enitsumɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ, ni efee tamɔ nɔ ni mɛi ni kwɛ enitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ asɛɛ gbala shi, ni ehe ye yɛ be babaoo mli moŋ, shi ekɛ faishitswaa tsu oti ni ma ehiɛ lɛ he nii yɛ ewala shihilɛ mli fɛɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ naa ní wɔɔhi shi yɛ, kɛ e-Bi Yesu Kristo ni wɔɔkase lɛ ji gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ ejwɛŋ ŋmalɛi nɛɛ anɔ jogbaŋŋ beni ekome too eyɔɔ eŋwɛi pia lɛ mli ni mɔ ko gbaa enaa lɛ.
(2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 16:3) Yɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ gbonyo nɛɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Hezekia tsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ kasemɔ nɔ ‘eha egbɛ lɛ he tse’ kɛjɛ wɔŋjalɔi ahewalɛi ahe. —2 Kronika 29:2.
Be ko lɛ, ewie yɛ emaŋ ni ji Israel loo Efraim he akɛ: “Mifee Efraim tataa, mihole amɛ yɛ mikpɔkɔiaŋ . . .
Yɛ Yesu Kristo Gɔŋ nɔ Shiɛmɔ ni ehe gbɛi lɛ mli lɛ, etsɔɔ bɔ ni aaafee aná miishɛɛ ni hiɔ shi daa lɛ mli niiashikpamɔ.
15 Wɔnako Nyɔŋmɔ pɛŋ ni asaŋ wɔnuko egbee dã.
(Luka 6:12, 13) Yesu tsɔɔ ekaselɔi lɛ bɔ ni asɔleɔ.
Eji anɔkwale akɛ, nine ni Yesu fɔ̃ etoibolɔi lɛ ni amɛkpɛlɛ epã lɛ nɔ lɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ eeha amɛhe ajɔ amɛ amrɔ nɔŋŋ kɛjɛ nɔnyɛɛ shihilɛi fɛɛ ni amɛyɔɔ mli yɛ no beaŋ lɛ shishi.
Yɛ ekojomɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ naa lɛ, ehe miihia waa ni afee ehelatsɛ lɛ opireshɛn koni akɛhere yoo lɛ yiwala.
Fe nɔ ni okɛ kwashia baakpe yɛ ebuulufeemɔ mli.
29 Kɛ́ wɔhã ehi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli akɛ nakai ni wɔfeɔ lɛ jieɔ wɔ-Bɔlɔ lɛ yi ni wɔwoɔ egbɛ́i lɛ hiɛ nyam lɛ, no baatsirɛ wɔ koni wɔfee nakai.
(2 Mose 13:21, 22; 14:19) Ŋmɛnɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná hekɛnɔfɔɔ akɛ Yehowa yɛ ewebii lɛ asɛɛ ni etsɔɔ amɛ gbɛ, ebuɔ amɛhe, ni ebaakpɔ̃ amɛ.
Beni Yesu kɛ ekaselɔi lɛ shɛ shɔŋŋ lɛ, etsu amɛteŋ mɛi fioo ko kɛtee Samaria akrowa ko mli koni amɛyatao he ni amɛbaajɔɔ amɛhe yɛ.
No sɛɛ lɛ, ekɛ wolo tɛtrɛɛ lɛ eko fɛɛ eko fee bɔ ni ekɛbaatsu nii eha lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ.
(Kpojiemɔ 14:1, 3) Ele akɛ, ekɛ Paradeiso shihilɛi ni yɔɔ kpoo, ni ekɛha efɔŋ feelɔ ni gbo yɛ emasɛi lɛ baaba.
Yɛ egbele sɛɛ lɛ, Adam ku esɛɛ kɛtee shihilɛ mli ni ebɛ lɛ nɔŋŋ mli ekoŋŋ.
Wɔnu ehenɔwomɔ, kɛ eshwãa, kɛ emlifu lɛ he;+
(Abɛi 24:10) Kɛji akɛ Satan miifee enii tamɔ “jata ni hũuɔ” loo eejie ehe kpo tamɔ “la bɔfo” jio, mpoa ni etswa lɛ tsakeko: Ekɛɛ kɛ́ okɛ kaai kpe lɛ, obaakpa Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ yiŋtoo ni yɔɔ eniŋmaa lɛ asɛɛ ji ni eha Yudafoi lɛ aye amɛhe kɛjɛ hiamɔ ni ehe baahia ni amɛkane saji amlitsɔɔmɔi pii lɛ amli moŋ, shi etsɛɛɛ ni aŋmala saji babaoo ni akɛmiitsɔɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ hu eniŋmaai lɛ amli.
(Jajelɔ 9:5, 6, 10) Agbɛnɛ hu, lalatsɛ lɛ jaje akɛ gbɔmɔ “kuɔ esɛɛ kɛyaa esũ lɛ mli ekoŋŋ; nakai gbi lɛ nɔŋŋ eyiŋtoi lɛ laajeɔ.”—Lala 146:4.
Riana eye afii 22.
Asafo Woloŋ Nikasemɔ nɔkwɛlɔ lɛ kɛ gbɛi ni aŋmala lɛ ehee yɛ wolo nɔ lɛ baatsu nii koni ekwɛ akɛ atsu ekuu lɛ mlibii lɛ fɛɛ he nii lo.
+ 7 Kɛ́ ekɛ etsui fɛɛ ye mikitãi lɛ kɛ mimlai* lɛ anɔ+ tamɔ bɔ ni efeɔ amrɔ nɛɛ, mahã emaŋtsɛyeli lɛ adamɔ shi shiŋŋ kɛya naanɔ.’
Shi yɛ afii pii asɛɛ lɛ, ehe bahia ni ajie shinaa lɛ yɛ jɛmɛ ejaakɛ kɔɔyɔɔ kɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ babaoo nibaa kɛjɛɔ anaigbɛ be fɛɛ be lɛ ha shinaa lɛ kpɔtɔ.
Ataa kɛ miishɛɛ kane, ekpɛlɛ shɛɛ sane ni yɔɔ mli lɛ nɔ, ni eshiɛ emli shɛɛ sane lɛ eha mɛi ni wieɔ Kannada wiemɔ lɛ.
Mra mli nugbɔ* kɛ sɛɛkpee nugbɔ* lɛ,
Nyɔŋmɔ tee nɔ akɛ: “Namɔ gbála nujɔɔi ha nugbɔnɛmɔ, loo gbɛ eha nugbɔmɔshiimɔi asarawai lɛ, ní eha nugbɔ anɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ ní mɔ ko mɔ ko bɛ nɔ, kɛ ŋã nɔ he ni adesa ko bɛ lɛ, ní eha olɛŋlɛ kɛ shikpɔŋ folo atɔ, ní esaa eha jwɛifɔ hee hu akwɛ̃?
Kɔɔyɔɔ ni naa wa, nugbɔnɛmɔ babaoo, kɛ nu afua gbá nujɔɔ ní lɛɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni ekumɔ shiai, efite ŋmɔshi nibii, ni ekpata mɛi ahiɛ.
Kɛ́ nugbɔ nɛ ní tsũ lɛ miidu lɛ, wɔkpasaa gbogbo lɛ kɛwɔɔ koni wɔhe akafɔ.
Nugbɔnɛmɔ ni baa yɛ ebe naa pɛpɛɛpɛ kɛ kɔɔyɔŋ tsakemɔ kpakpa haa akpaa niyenii babaoo daa afi.
(NW) Abɔ amaniɛ akɛ toobi ni afɔ lɛ etsɛko ni ahoɔ lɛ yɛ enyɛ fufɔ mli lɛ ji wɔŋjalɔi anifeemɔ ni asusuɔ akɛ akɛhaa nugbɔ nɛɔ.
Nugbɔ nɛ waa beni amɛnyiɛ kɛyaa lɛ ni amɛfɔ kwraa kɛyi shi.
Atatui ni ebɔɔ yɔɔ mli enɛ eshwie hei ni efite hei babaoo.
Shɔŋŋ gbɛ he ko lɛ, okwaafonyo ko miikwɛ eŋmɔ lɛ mli, ni eeŋmɔ kɛ miishɛɛ ejaakɛ nugbɔ ewo ni eje shishi eeshwã dumɔnii ni taoɔ nu lɛ nɔ.
Beni ejie Israelbii lɛ kɛjɛ Mizraim etsɛɛɛ nɔŋŋ lɛ, ewo amɛ shi akɛ: “Naa, mibaha aboloo ajɛ ŋwɛi anɛ aha nyɛ, ni daa gbi lɛ maŋ lɛ aje kpo ayabua naa bɔ ni aaashɛ amɛnaa gbi kome.”
Jɔɔmɔi baanɛ ashwie shi tamɔ nugbɔ.
Nɛkɛ bei nɛɛ ji bei kɛha miishɛɛ kpele kɛ shidaa kɛha nugbɔnɛmɔ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ Yibaalɔ kɛ shikpɔŋ ni baa nii lɛ Feelɔ lɛ.
Eji nifeemɔ ko ni wɔŋjalɔi kɛ amɛhe woɔ mli bɔni afee ni nugbɔ anɛ.
Shi ani nɛkɛ sɔlemɔi nɛɛ eko teke nugbɔnɛmɔ atatui ni tsotsoro henaabuamɔ lɛ yiteŋ lɛ?
Beni wɔgbe shiɛmɔ lɛ naa lɛ, nugbɔ bɔi nɛmɔ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Kwɛ bɔ ni amɛtsui nyɔɔ amɛmli waa, kɛ́ nugbɔ bɔi nɛmɔ!
“Elia ji gbɔmɔ adesa tamɔ wɔ nɔŋŋ, ni esɔle sɔlemɔ ko koni nugbɔ akanɛ, ni enɛɛɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ afii etɛ kɛ nyɔji ekpaa sɔŋŋ.”
(Yakobo 5:17) Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ amanehulu nɛɛ ba ewebii lɛ anɔ, ejaakɛ amɛkpoo lɛ ni amɛyajá Kanaanbii anugbɔnɛmɔ-nyɔŋmɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ Baal lɛ.
Nɔ ko ni mɛi ni wieɔ Poland wiemɔ ni tee kpee lɛ ahiɛ kpaŋ nɔ ji beni atswa adafi akɛ aná Insight on the Scriptures wolo lɛ yɛ Poland wiemɔ mli lɛ—enɛ ha amɛná miishɛɛ waa yɛ fɛ̃i ni ye kɛ nugbɔ ni nɛ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ haa nugbɔ nɛɔ hu.
3 Beni hɔmɔ lɛ je shishi lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ gbalɔ anɔkwafo Elia kɛɛ Maŋtsɛ Ahab akɛ: “Gbii abɔ ni Yehowa, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, mɔ hiɛ ni midamɔɔ lɛ hiɛ kã nɛɛ, kɛji bɔ́ loo nugbɔ aaanɛ yɛ afii nɛɛ amli fii, ja mi miwie!”
Ni eyaa nɔ ejieɔ suɔmɔ kpo etsɔɔ adesai fɛɛ ejaakɛ “ehãa ehulu teɔ shi yɛ mɛi fɔji kɛ mɛi kpakpai fɛɛ anɔ, ni ehãa nugbɔ nɛɔ shwieɔ jalɔi kɛ mɛi ni ejaaa fɛɛ anɔ.” —Mateo 5:45.
3 Akɛni okwaafoi ji amɛ hewɔ lɛ, Israelbii lɛ kɛ amɛhe fɔ̃ɔ Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔmɔ ni amɛnáa akɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ lɛ nɔ.
Ehe bahia koni wɔsaa wɔto sɛii kɛ okpɔlɔi lɛ ekoŋŋ yɛ wɔ kpee lɛ fɛɛ shishi.
Ewoɔ mi edamɔɔ sɛi nɔ yɛ emasɛi ni mitsumɔɔ tsɛŋsii amli beni eshaa mli lɛ, ni etsɔɔ mi ŋmalɛi ni mikaseɔ miwoɔ miyitsoŋ, kɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lalai, loo sɔlemɔ lalai taakɛ wɔtsɛɔ amɛ lɛ lamɔ.
Mɛni baajɛ gbɛɛmɔ ni jɛɔ gbogboi ni atsĩmɔko he lɛ, tsuŋ shikpɔŋ ni akɛ ŋtayaai fee kɛ sɛii ni akɛ dadei fee ni akotaa lɛ mli kɛba?
Beni Eli ni eye afii 98 lɛ nu amaniɛbɔɔ nɛɛ lɛ, ekpa kɛjɛ esɛi lɛ nɔ eyagbee esɛɛgbɛ ni egbo.
Kɛ ebaanyɛ etsu he nii lɛ, belɛ, ebaanyɛ esusu saji komɛi ahe tamɔ, tsɔmɔ he ni yaa trɔmɔɔ kɛha helatsɛmɛi ashwiilii, tsu kpakpa ni ajɔɔ he yɛ mli, toiŋ tsɔnei komɛi kɛha mɛi ni nuuu nii jogbaŋŋ lɛ, kɛ agbɛnɛ he ko kɛha sɛii pɔtɛɛ komɛi.
Be fɛɛ be lɛ, niyenii lɛ fá bɔ ni gbɔ ko baaná eko eye.
Akɛni nyiɛmɔ wa kɛha mi hewɔ lɛ, Kristofonyo yoo ni kɛ wɔ sharaa shi yɛ tsũi lɛ amli lɛ kɛ mlihilɛ bi mi akɛ, “Ani obaasumɔ ni mawo sɛi maha bo koni ota nɔ yɛ be kɛ bei amli?”
Yɛ no hewɔ lɛ, shwapo nɔkwɛlɔ lɛ kɛ okadi ni tsɔɔ akɛ: “Kuu Osɛɛ Oba yɛ Minitii 20 Sɛɛ,” tsotsoro shi yɛ shinaa lɛ naa, ni egbala sɛii enyɔ, ni amɛyi enyɔ lɛ susu klɛŋklɛŋ kukuji enumɔ ni yɔɔ Nilee wolo lɛ mli lɛ he.
Kwɛmɔ nibii ni kpáa shikpɔŋhaa kuntu lɛ nɔ, sɛii ni efite, paipi he nibii ni efite, kanei ni egboi, kɛ ekrokomɛi lɛ jogbaŋŋ, ni obɔ enɛɛmɛi ahe amaniɛ amrɔ nɔŋŋ otsɔɔ nyɛmi ni tsuɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔkwɛmɔ he nii lɛ.
Yɛ bɔ ni jɛmɛ yɔɔ lɛ naa lɛ, abɛɔ ni ashaa shikpɔŋ lɛ, akpalaa mulu ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ, atsumɔɔ sɛi lɛ ahe ni atoɔ amɛ jogbaŋŋ, asaa nushwiemɔhe lɛ, atsumɔɔ samfɛji ahe kɛ ashwishwɛi lɛ ahiɛ, atsiɔ jwɛi lɛ ashwieɔ, ni asaa loo ahuɔ ehewɔŋ.
Mikɛ nitsumɔ nɔkwɛlɔ sɛi lɛ etsake shwiili, shi yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ mishihilɛ hi kwraa amrɔ nɛɛ ejaakɛ eji nɔ ni mijɔɔ nɔ miha mɛi krokomɛi asɔɔmɔ.
Kuu ko ni kojolɔi ekpaa yɔɔ mli ni Kojolɔ Mher Khachatryan ji amɛsɛinɔtalɔ lɛ kpe yɛ leebi 11:00 mli yɛ April 19, 2002.
Adin Steinsaltz tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Skul lɛ nɔkwɛlɔ ni kwɛɔ kpee lɛ nɔ lɛ taa sɛi loo saa krɛdɛɛ ko nɔ.
Mi-tsɛ ni esaa ehe fɛfɛo bɔ ni sa nakai be lɛ ta sɛi nɔ ni eekwɛ gbatsu ni tooi ni akɛ amɛ esha afɔle kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ ayitsoŋoŋoi ni ato naa lɛ eyi mli obɔ lɛ.
Ani sɛii, shikpɔŋ lɛ, kɛ gbogboi lɛ ahe tse?
• Ní aaashi sɛi ni miihoso koni eya nɔ ehoso yɛ be mli ni mɔ ko taaa nɔ lɛ tsɛɔ daimonioi koni amɛbata nɔ
Ani akɛɔ nitsulɔ lɛ kɛkɛ koni ekɛ sɛii heei ayaha loo ekɛba yɛ be pɔtɛɛ ko mli loo koni ekɛ nitsumɔ ni he hiaa adesa aha, tamɔ lagbelɔ ni gbeɔ la yɛ sɔlemɔtsu ko mli koni ekagbɛ eshwã?
Kɛji wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli aka shi lɛ, no lɛ, sɛi nɔ ni wɔɔta yɛ okpɔlɔ sɛɛ lɛ baanyɛ aye abua babaoo fe ni wɔɔkã shi yɛ saa nɔ loo wɔɔta akpasa ni hejɔlɛ yɔɔ mli lɛ mli.
Esu TV, kɛkɛ ni eho eta sɛi ni esumɔɔ waa lɛ mli.
Yoo ko kɛɛ akɛ: ‘Beni miye afii ejwɛ pɛ lɛ, minyɛ ye bua mi ni mikase ŋmalɛi miwo miyitsoŋ, ni milaa Maŋtsɛyeli lalai beni midamɔ sɛi nɔ ni mitsumɔɔ tsɛŋsii kɛ plɛtei ni mimami shaa mli lɛ amli lɛ.’
Ekɛfata he akɛ, mra be mli Kristofoi lɛ bu krɔɔs lɛ “akɛ edamɔ shi kɛha gbele kɛ nɔ fɔŋ ko diɛŋtsɛ.”
Minuɔ dãa, ni mijeɔ misɛ̃i nɔ migbeɔ shi ni nɔ̃ enyɔ minɔ, mishamɔɔ miwoɔ mishishigbɛ pioto mli, ni mikãa mishamɔ mli aahu kɛyashiɔ jetseremɔ.
Yɛ afi 1633 mli lɛ Cyril Contari, Beroia (amrɔ nɛɛ Aleppo) osɔfonukpa lɛ ni ji Lucaris henyɛlɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni Jesuitbii lɛ fiɔ esɛɛ lɛ bɔ mɔdɛŋ koni ekɛ Ottomanbii lɛ aye osɔfonukpa hegbɛyeli lɛ naa.
Amɛbolɔ ni amɛkɛ sɛii tswiatswiaa shi.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, yɛ gbi muu fɛɛ nitsumɔ ni wa kɛ niyenii babaoo ko ni ŋɔɔ yeli sɛɛ lɛ, ani onuɔ he akɛ esa akɛ okase nii, titri lɛ kɛji akɛ okpasa shi yɛ osa nɔ sɛi ko ni enɔ yɔɔ bɔdɔɔ waa mli yɛ TV hiɛ lɛ?
Ni namɔ baanyɛ ajie jwɛŋmɔ kɛjɛ shuɔi kɛ jatai lɛ anɔ?
No hewɔ lɛ, akɛ Daniel yawo jatai abu lɛ mli, ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ eji bu ni atsa loo shikpɔŋ shishi tsũ ko.
No hewɔ lɛ, amɛkɛ sane lɛ fɔ̃ shi kpoo, akɛ: “Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli onukpai lɛ kɛ lumɛi lɛ kɛ amraloi lɛ kɛ ajinafoi lɛ kɛ akutsei anukpai lɛ etee ajina, ákɛ maŋtsɛ awo kita kɛ akpɔ akɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni aaabi nyɔŋmɔ loo gbɔmɔ ko nɔ ko, ni jeee bo maŋtsɛ okome kɛkɛ, kɛyashi biɛ gbii nyɔŋmai etɛ lɛ, aaashɛ lɛ afɔ̃ jatai abu lɛ mli.”
2 Wɔ “henyɛlɔ, Abonsam,” taakɛ bɔfo Petro tsɔɔ mli lɛ, “nyiɛ tamɔ jata ni hũɔ eetao mɔ ni eeemi.”
“Mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ tsu ebɔfo ni ebaŋamɔ jatai lɛ anaabui.” —Daniel 6:22
1, 2. (a) Mɛɛ gbɛi anɔ jata tsɔɔ egbɔbiɔ?
24 Kɛkɛ ni maŋtsɛ lɛ fã, ni akɛ hii ni kɛ sane lɛ fɔ̃ enɔ lɛ* ba, ni ashɛrɛ amɛ kɛ amɛbihii kɛ amɛŋamɛi ashwie jatai abu lɛ mli.
Yɛ sane nɛɛ mli lɛ, wiemɔ ni akɛto ekroko lɛ he lɛ feɔ lɛ faŋŋ akɛ Samson kɛ eniji folo kpata jata lɛ hiɛ yɛ gbɛ ni waaa kwraa nɔ oookɛɛ jata lɛ ji too abotiabi ko kɛkɛ.
3 Emli lumɛi lɛ, jatai ni hũɔ ji amɛ.
Nɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ji akɛ, Yehowa kɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe to jata he beni etsuɔ kojomɔ he nii yɛ Israel ní yeee anɔkwa lɛ nɔ lɛ.—Yeremia 25:38; Hoshea 5:14.
14 Beni Daniel henyɛlɔi lɛ wo Maŋtsɛ Dario yiŋ ni ewo akpɔ akɛ “mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ní aaabi nyɔŋmɔ loo gbɔmɔ ko nɔ ko, ní jeee bo maŋtsɛ okome kɛkɛ, kɛyashi biɛ gbii nyɔŋmai etɛ lɛ, aaashɛ lɛ afɔ jatai abu lɛ mli” lɛ, Daniel jie hemɔkɛyeli kɛ ekãa kpo.
(Kpojiemɔ 12:12) Satan le akɛ enɔyeli lɛ kɛ eje lɛ miihe aba naagbee, no hewɔ lɛ etamɔ “jata ni hũuɔ eetao mɔ ni eeemi.”—1 Petro 5:8.
Ani ole nɔ ni ba yɛ nakai be lɛ mli?— Daniel kɛɛ: “Mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ etsu ebɔfo, ni ebaŋamɔ jatai lɛ anaabui.”
Wɔle akɛ Satan kã he enyiɛ “tamɔ jata ni hũuɔ eetao mɔ ni eeemi.”
Amɛtsɔ hemɔkɛyeli nɔ “amɛtsu jalɛ nii, amɛnine shɛ shiwoi anɔ,” ni—nɔ ni yɔɔ faŋŋ akɛ Daniel he awieɔ lɛ—“amɛtsimɔ jatai anaa.”
Kojolɔi 14:6 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Yehowa mumɔ lɛ bayi [Samson] enɔ, ni etserɛ [jata obalanyo] emli, tamɔ atserɛɔ abotiabi mli nɔŋŋ, tsɛ ehiɛɛɛ no ko no ko yɛ edɛŋ.”
Ni mɛni he wa fe jata?”
No hewɔ lɛ wɔkaneɔ “mɛi ni tsɔ hemɔkɛyeli nɔ . . . amɛtsimɔ jatai anaa, amɛgbe la hewalɛ, amɛje klantei amli . . .
Obaabu shi ni obaakpã omli tamɔ jata, ni tamɔ bɔ ni jata ji lɛ, namɔ baanyɛ awo ehiɛ la?
Shi Samson gbe jata lɛ kɛ enine folo pɛ.
3 Lalatsɛ lɛ kɛ mfonirifeemɔŋ wiemɔi ni mli kã shi tsu nii ni ekɛ Satan ŋaatsɔi lɛ to bɔ ni jata kɛ shikpãa tutuaa mɛi lɛ ahe.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, Yehowa here lɛ “kɛjɛ jata kɛ oshishibrishi lɛ dɛŋ.”
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, nɛkɛ Bi nɛɛ—emuuyeli mlihiɛlɔ ni ye je lɛ nɔ kunim lɛ; Jata ni jɛ Yuda akutso lɛ mli lɛ; David shishifa lɛ; mɔ ni kɛ ewala ha adesai lɛ; mɔ ni yɔɔ hegbɛ fe fɛɛ, ni mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ eyi lɛ obɔ, kɛ sɛɛyoomɔ ni yeɔ emuu ni jɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ lɛ—hɛɛ, mɔ nɛ ji mɔ ni sa jogbaŋŋ akɛ eheɔ wolo lɛ kɛjɛɔ Yehowa dɛŋ.
“Ni klaŋ kɛ gwantɛŋ bi aaahi shi, ni kootsɛ kɛ abotia bi aaabu shi; ni tsina bi kɛ jata bi kɛ kooloo ni ewo fɔ fɛɛ aaahi he kome, ni gbekɛ bibioo aaakpala amɛ.”
(Daniel 5:22-28) No hewɔ lɛ, beni akɛ Daniel wo jatai abu lɛ mli lɛ, etee nɔ yɛ enɔkwayeli gbɛ ni eto ema shi lɛ mli.
Yefta biyoo lɛ kɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ, gbekɛ nuu fioo ni ji Samuel fɛɛ kɛ amɛfɔlɔi ni sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei lɛ fee ekome bɔni afee ni amɛfɔlɔi lɛ anyɛ aye amɛshiwoi anɔ.
Gbekɛ nuu fioo baanyɛ akane ni eŋma amɛyibɔ.
Nyɔji nɛɛhu sɛɛ lɛ, efɔ binuu ni ji Yesu.
Nɛgbɛ kwraa gbekɛ nuu nɛɛ hɔ?
Beni wɔbote gbalashihilɛ mli afii enumɔ sɛɛ lɛ, mifɔ binuu fɛfɛo, ni wɔwo lɛ Saúl.
Odasefonyo ko ni yɔɔ bihii helatsɛmɛi etɛ ni anyɛɛɛ amɛ atsa, ni amɛteŋ mɛi enyɔ gboi nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Ebaanyɛ ewa waa akɛ asafo ko baaya nɔ asusu mɔ ni he eye yɛ be kakadaŋŋ mli lɛ he.
Kɛkɛ ni Elia kɛ gbekɛ nuu lɛ ku sɛɛ eha enyɛ lɛ, kɛ nɛkɛ wiemɔi ní hiɛ kpaŋ nɔ kɔkɔɔkɔ nɛɛ, akɛ: “Kwɛ, obi lɛ yi ená wala”!—1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 17:22-24.
6 Yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ diɛŋtsɛ be ni eto mli—beni amɛnu shiwoo lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa lɛ sɛɛ be kakadaŋŋ mli lɛ—Abraham ní eye afii 100 kɛ Sara ni eye afii 90 lɛ fɔ́ binuu Isak.
* Ehe bahia ni Noa kɛ eŋa fɛɛ abu amɛbihii lɛ ahe kɛjɛ nakai shihilɛ gbohii ni ebɔle amɛ lɛ ahe.
Jeee akɛ tsɛmɛi anɔkwɛmɔnɔ náa amɛbihii asui anɔ hewalɛ pɛ kɛkɛ, shi enáa bɔ ni amɛbiyei naa hii amɛhaa lɛ hu nɔ hewalɛ.
5 Nakai nɔŋŋ ŋmɛnɛ, kwɛ bɔ ni ehe yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ kɛji nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei ni edara yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ jie miishɛɛ ni suɔmɔ yɔɔ mli kpo amɛtsɔɔ awusãi yɛ asafo lɛ mli lɛ!
Yɛ maji komɛi anɔ lɛ, afeɔ ketiafoo he kusumii komɛi kɛ́ gbekɛ nuu ko tsɔ oblanyo.
Mikɛ oblanuu ko ni ekaseee Biblia lɛ bɔi naanyobɔɔ.
Gbalɔ lɛ tsu etsulɔ Gehazi kɛtsɔ ehiɛ, ni eyana akɛ gbekɛ lɛ egbo lɛɛlɛŋ.
Ŋmalɛi tamɔ Yesaia 11:6-9 baaba mli yɛ anunyam mli akɛ: “Klaŋ kɛ gwantɛŋbi aaahi shi, ni kootsɛ kɛ abotiabi aaabu shi; ni tsinabi kɛ jatabi kɛ kooloo ni ewo fɔ fɛɛ aaahi hekome, ni gbekɛ bibioo aaakpala amɛ.
Sɛɛ mli lɛ, amɛfɔ bihii enyɔ; haaji ji amɛ.
Etsɔɔ mli akɛ, yɛ Mla lɛ naa lɛ, abaanyɛ afo gbekɛ nuu ko ketia yɛ gbi ni ji kpaanyɔ lɛ nɔ kɛ eji Hejɔɔmɔ Gbi po.
Gbekɛbii hii komɛi feɔ amɛnii akɛ mɛi ni kpɔiaŋ esala bɔni afee ni skulbii krokomɛi asumɔ amɛsane, ni enɛ haa amɛyaa nɔ po amɛwoɔ skulbii krokomɛi ahe gbeyei.
Sɛɛ mli, beni gbekɛbii lɛ bɔi skulyaa lɛ, amɛteɔ shi mra ni amɛkɛ amɛmami kaseɔ nii daa leebi, kɛjɛɔ My Book of Bible Stories kɛ Obaanyɛ Ohi Shi Kɛya Naanɔ yɛ Paradeiso yɛ Shikpɔŋ Nɔ* woji lɛ amli.
Be ni miye afii kpawo lɛ, mikɛ mihe yadɔmɔ Boy Scouts.
11 Amɛbihii joɔ foi yɛ agbó naa tamɔ tooku,
Be ko beni eba lɛ, ebanu akɛ minyɛmimɛi hii onukpai etɛ lɛ kɛ gbekɛbii hii krokomɛi eyanɔ, ni bei komɛi lɛ amɛfeɔ basabasa.
Odasefonyo gbekɛ nuu lɛ fɔlɔi kɛ miishɛɛ kwɛ Robert akɛ mumɔŋ awusã, ni yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ, amɛkɛ lɛ kase nii.
* Kɛfata he lɛ, akɛni Herode miitao agbe Yesu hewɔ lɛ, ekpata gbekɛbii hii fɛɛ ni yɔɔ Betlehem ni “eye afii enyɔ kɛ mɛi ni yeko nakai lɛ” ahiɛ yɛ nilelɔi lɛ asaramɔ lɛ sɛɛ.
GBEKƐ nuu ko ni eye kɛjɛ afii nyɔŋma kɛ etɛ kɛyaa huru kɛjɛ ŋwɛitsu nsɔɔdoi kpaanyɔ nɔ kɛbagbee shi ni egbo.
Nibii amli ni otsɔmɔ yɛ shihilɛ mli kɛ bɔ ni ofeɔ onii ohaa lɛ yɛ srɔto yɛ mɛi krokomɛi anɔ̃ he, no hewɔ lɛ ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ yiŋtoi titrii ahewɔ ni osumɔɔ Yehowa ní oheɔ eshiwoi lɛ anɔ oyeɔ lɛ yɛ srɔto yɛ mɛi krokomɛi anɔ̃ he.
Ejaakɛ nibii fɔji fɛɛ ashishifã ji shika suɔmɔ ní mɛi komɛi di sɛɛ ni amɛdũ gbɛ kɛjɛ hemɔkɛyeli lɛ mli, ni amɛkɛ piŋmɔi babaoo egbulɔ amɛhe lɛ.”—1 Timoteo 6:9, 10.
Ni kɛlɛ, ehe miihia ni le ni ahaa aleɔ akɛ tsɔsemɔ he miihia yɛ bei komɛi amli lɛ atsu adesai ahenumɔi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ he nii, ni ákɛ, kɛ akɛha yɛ suɔmɔ mli lɛ, “ewoɔ hejɔlɛ yibii ni ji jalɛ lɛ.”
• Mɛni hewɔ abaanyɛ akɛɛ akɛ Yehowa Bi lɛ ni etsu kɛba koni ebana amanehulu ni egbo kɛha wɔ lɛ ji suɔmɔ nifeemɔ kpele fe fɛɛ ni afee dã lɛ?
Esa akɛ wu atsɔ ewiemɔ kɛ enifeemɔ nɔ ejie suɔmɔ kpo etsɔɔ eŋa tamɔ bɔ ni Kristo jie suɔmɔ kpo etsɔɔ asafo lɛ.
Yehowa hiɛ kpako suɔmɔ ni nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ Romania lɛ ejie lɛ kpo yɛ egbɛi lɛ hewɔ lɛ hu nɔ.
“Amale gbalɔi pii baate shi ni amɛbaalaka mɛi pii; ni akɛni abaaya nɔ afee nibii babaoo ni mla eŋmɛɛɛ gbɛ hewɔ lɛ, mɛi pii asuɔmɔ lɛ he baajɔ.”
Te onuɔ he tɛŋŋ yɛ suɔmɔ ni Yehowa yɔɔ kɛhã bo lɛ he?
13 Yiŋtoo kroko hewɔ ni wɔsumɔɔ Yehowa ji akɛ wɔhiɛ sɔɔ nibii ni efee eha wɔ lɛ.
Jiemɔ Anɔkwa Kristofoi Asuɔmɔ Kpo
6 Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ, suɔmɔ ni nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ jie lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ bo lɛ ji nɔ ni ye ebua bo ni hã okɛ ohe badɔmɔ Yehowa kɛ esafo lɛ.
(Yeremia 17:9) Shi kɛ́ ekɛ shihilɛ ko kpe ni eyakpɛɛɛ eyiŋ yɛ nilee mli lɛ, aso ebaaba ehe shi, koni ekpɛlɛ ŋaawoo kɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ní kɔɔ eshihilɛ lɛ he ní aaajɛ suɔmɔ mli akɛha lɛ lɛ nɔ?
(b) Mɛni hewɔ ehe hiaa ni wɔna suɔmɔ ni mli wa wɔha wɔhe lɛ?
Wɔtsɔɔ shiɛmɔ kɛ nitsɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ ni wɔkɛ wɔhe woɔ mli lɛ nɔ wɔtsɔɔ akɛ wɔyɛ suɔmɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔnanemɛi adesai yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
(b) Te suɔmɔ he hiaa kɛha anɔkwa Kristofoi lɛ tɛŋŋ?
Suɔmɔ Ji Nɔ ni Tsirɛɔ Wɔ
(Marko 10:45) Etsɔɔ mli hu akɛ: “Nɛkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ sumɔ [adesai aje] lɛ, akɛ eŋɔ e-Bi koome lɛ eha, koni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni heɔ enɔ yeɔ lɛ hiɛ akakpata, shi moŋ ena naanɔ wala.”
+ 21 Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ mikitãi lɛ ni eyeɔ nɔ lɛ, lɛ ji mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi.
“Nyɛnyɛ̃a nɔ̃ fɔŋ, ní nyɛsumɔa nɔ̃ kpakpa, ní nyɛhaa jalɛ saneyeli adamɔa shi yɛ koi shi.”
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Wɔyaaa shia kɛ shia wɔyawieee suɔmɔ he kɛkɛ.
20 Eba akɛ wolo nɛɛ ni okaseɔ lɛ baaye abua bo ni owaje suɔmɔ ni oyɔɔ kɛha Yesu kɛ Yehowa lɛ.
Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.”
Kaimɔ hu akɛ, jeee bɔ ni Kristofonyo ko tsuɔ nii babaoo ehãa lɛ akɛsusuɔ bɔ ni ejara wa hã, shi moŋ ehemɔkɛyeli kɛ bɔ ni suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ lɛ mli kwɔ hã.
Wɔyɛ miishɛɛ akɛ Yehowa eha egbó lɛ naa kã kɛha mɛi ni sumɔɔ la lɛ
Esa akɛ suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha Yehowa lɛ akudɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ emiishɛɛ-namɔ kɛ nibii ni esumɔɔ lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa, kɛ no sɛɛ lɛ, suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha enaanyo hu.
30 Yohane na ni nɛkɛ ŋulami pɔtɛɛ nɛɛ miijɛ ŋwɛi miigbe shi.
Te Yehowa webii buɔ mɛi ni jieɔ mɛi ahiɛtserɛ yɛ je lɛ mli lɛ amɛhaa tɛŋŋ, ni mɛni Odasefonyo ko wie yɛ enɛ he?
Ŋulamii bɔleɔ amɛhe, ni hewalɛ ko ni yɔɔ amɛkponɔgbɛ ni ji hewalɛ ni fe adesai anɔ̃ lɛ ji nɔ ni kudɔɔ amɛ.
Nɛkɛ kuu nɛɛ damɔ shi kɛha okadi ni ji “ŋulami kpeteŋkpele ni tsoɔ tamɔ haa” lɛ.
Yɛ afi lɛ mli bei komɛi amli lɛ, nɛkɛ ŋulamii nɛɛ ji nɔ ni jeɔ naagbee kwraa yɛ bokagbɛ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ kpeehe lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ “ŋulamii” lɛ adamɔ shi aha adesai nɔkwɛlɔi, aloo onukpai, ni yɔɔ asafoi lɛ amli lɛ, ni abuɔ amɛ akɛ Yesu bɔfoi lɛ.
Loofɔji ní fãa kɛyahiɔ he kroko lɛ kwɛɔ ŋulamii lɛ, bɔ ni shikpɔŋ lɛ hewalɛ ní gbalaa nii lɛ shikamɔ yɔɔ, loo amɛmligbɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ nɔ kroko ni amɛkɛfãa gbɛ lɛ.
Ni beni jeŋ jɔ nyɔɔŋ lɛ, ŋulamii lɛ wie amɛtsɔɔ David, ni etsirɛ lɛ koni eŋma akɛ: “Ŋwɛi gbaa Mawu anunyam lɛ, ni atatu tsɔɔ eninenaa nitsumɔ lɛ.”
Maŋtsɛ David tsɔɔ woo ni ejie lɛ kpo lɛ mli akɛ: “Kɛ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ ni ji owaabii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ: Mɛni ji adesa, ni ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? aloo gbɔmɔbi hu, ni osaraa lɛ po?”
Shi kɛ eshɛ fɛ̃i be lɛ, afua kɛ oblɔtu tsĩɔ okadii ní akwɛɔ akɛfãa gbɛ lɛ ahiɛ, amɛtsĩɔ hulu lɛ hiɛ shwane kɛ ŋulamii lɛ ahiɛ nyɔɔŋ.
Shi, “ŋulamii kpawo” lɛ hu?
(Kpojiemɔ 12: 7-12) No hewɔ lɛ, jajelɔ lɛ woɔ wɔ hewalɛ ni wɔkai wɔ-Bɔlɔ lɛ yɛ “be mli ni hulu kɛ la kɛ nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii woko duŋ, ni atatui kuɔ amɛsɛɛ amɛbaa ekoŋŋ yɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ sɛɛ lɛ.”
‘AMƐKPƐ́Ɔ TAMƆ ŊULAMII’
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, ŋulamii kɛ ŋulamii kushai ni feɔ jeŋ muu fɛɛ ni da lɛ yeɔ Yehowa adebɔɔ hewalɛ kɛ egbojee ni anyɛɛɛ shishi ana lɛ he odase.—Yesaia 40:26.
(5 Mose 18:10) Ani ebaaha ŋulami anyiɛ amɛhiɛ kɛya Herode, ni ji gbɔmɔgbelɔ kpanaku fe fɛɛ yɛ maŋ lɛŋ lɛ hiɛ, koni amɛyakɛɛ lɛ sane ko ní baaha enyɛ̃ gbekɛ lɛ?
5:20—Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ŋulamii lɛ wu kɛjɛ ŋwɛi amɛha Barak yɛ?
No sɛɛ lɛ, “ŋulami” lɛ nyiɛ ŋulamiiaŋkwɛlɔi lɛ ahiɛ kɛtee Yosef kɛ Maria ŋɔɔ.
Hulu lɛ ji ŋulami henɔ ko ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ jogbaŋŋ kɛha wɔ.
Susumɔ ŋwɛi ŋulamii lɛ ahe.
Yɛ nakai yitsei lɛ amli lɛ, Biblia lɛ wieɔ “shishijee mli” —afii akpekpe toi akpei abɔ ni eho nɛ —be ni wɔjeŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ, ni ŋulami kushai, ŋulamii, kɛ wɔshikpɔŋ lɛ fɛɛ fata he lɛ ba shihilɛ mli lɛ he.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 14: 16, 17) Kwɛmɔ ŋulamii ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi gbɛkɛ.
20 Yoel 2:10 lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ baalabii akuu babaoo feɔ tamɔ atatu ni baanyɛ ahã hulu, nyɔɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii akpɛmɔ afee kusuu.
(Lala 18:26) Eji anɔkwale akɛ, gbɔmɛi fioo ko pɛ baatsɔ amɛhe kɛjɛ Yehowa he koni amɛyajá ŋulamii loo shika tsinabi amagai, shi wɔŋjamɔi krokomɛi hu yɛ.
(Mateo 6:24, NW shishigbɛ niŋmaa) Kɛ rɔk lalafolɔi kɛ hiɛtserɛjielɔi krokomɛi ni mɛi efee amɛ nyɔŋmɔi lɛ gboi loo anuuu amɛhe dɔŋŋ lɛ, ehaa mɛi ni jaa amɛ lɛ feɔ shwɛm.
“Ŋulami” lɛ ni amɛna be ni amɛyɔɔ Boka lɛ nyiɛ amɛhiɛ kɛtee.
11:1; 12:1, 2) No hewɔ lɛ, nyɛhaa wɔsusua nifeemɔi nyɔŋma ni baaya nɔ wɔsɛɛ ni kɔɔ wɔnaanɔ wala he hiɛnɔkamɔ lɛ he lɛ ahe wɔkwɛa.
(Zakaria 8:23) Yɛ gbalɛ nɛɛ mlibaa mli yɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ lɛ, hii nyɔŋma lɛ damɔ shi kɛha asafoku babaoo ni agba amɛhe sane afɔ̃ shi yɛ Kpojiemɔ 7:9 lɛ.
• Kitãi Nyɔŋma lɛ ahe yɛ sɛɛnamɔ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Aaafee afii nyɔŋma dani akpata Yerusalem hiɛ lɛ, Yehowa tsɔ Yeremia nɔ eha nomii ni yɔɔ Babilon lɛ ná hiɛnɔkamɔ.
“Akolontoi nyɔŋma ni ona lɛ, kɛ kooloo lɛ, amɛaanyɛ ajwamaŋ lɛ, ni amɛaafee lɛ amaŋfɔ, ni amɛaaŋmɛ lɛ yayai, ni amɛaaye eheloo, ni amɛkɛ la aaashã lɛ.”
Aŋmɛŋ “akolontoi nyɔŋma,” ni ji maŋkwramɔŋ nɔyelii lɛ gbɛ ni amɛkpãtã Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ ahiɛ.
“Wɔyɛ nyɛmimɛi yei onukpai nyɔŋma yɛ wɔ asafo lɛ mli.
Kɛjɛ afi 1999 lɛ kɛbaa nɛɛ, ejurɔfeelɔi srɔtoi nyɔŋma ni keɔ nii lɛ eha shika loo amɛwo shi akɛ amɛbaaha shika ni fa fe U.S. dɔlai akpekpei toi akpei 38 koni akɛye abua mɛi ni ehia amɛ lɛ.
Gbii ejwɛ sɔŋŋ nɛ ni wɔje wɔgbɛfaa lɛ shishi, ni Biblia kasemɔ he woji ni tsiimɔ shɛɔ tɔn nyɔŋma yɛ wɔtsɔne lɛ mli.
Abaasusu nifeemɔi nyɔŋma lɛ ahe yɛ nikasemɔ nɛɛ kɛ nɔ ni baanyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli.
Awo nyɛmimɛi lɛ ekomɛi atsũŋ nɔ ni fa fe afii nyɔŋma.
Bɔfoi nyɔŋma lɛ ‘amli wo’ Yakobo kɛ Yohane “la.”
Kɛ mu fai akpei nyɔŋmai abɔ ahe miishɛɛ?
Mfonirifeemɔŋ kooloo ní tsuɔ tamɔ muneele lɛ kɛ ekolontoi nyɔŋma lɛ, “amɛaaŋmɛ [Babilon Kpeteŋkpele] lɛ yayai, ni amɛaaye eheloo, ni amɛkɛ la aaashã lɛ.”
Castro ni yɔɔ Mozambique lɛ eye afii nyɔŋma pɛ beni enyɛ gbo.
Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, ekɛ minitii nyɔŋma shiɛɔ yɛ hii ahiɛtserɛjiemɔ hei ni yɔɔ Leeds, England, dani ajeɔ asɔshwɛmɔ shishi.
Yiŋtoo nɛɛ hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi etsɔɔ gbɔmɛi akpei nyɔŋmai abɔ nikanemɔ kɛ niŋmaa, ní gbɔmɛi 23,000 (yɛ afi 1990 afii lɛ teŋgbɛ) yɛ Afrika Anaigbɛ maŋ kome too pɛ mli lɛ fata he.
Yehowa tsɔ Amos nɔ ejaje yɛ kooyigbɛ Israel akutsei nyɔŋma maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he akɛ: “Kpoo ha mɛi ni he ejɔ amɛ yɛ Zion kɛ mɛi ni buɔ amɛhe akɛ amɛyɛ shweshweeshwe yɛ Samaria gɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ!”
(Daniel 7:8) Yɛ nɔ ni fã kpo nɛɛ he lɛ, ŋwɛibɔfo lɛ kɛɛ Daniel akɛ: “Ni mɔ kroko aaate shi yɛ [maŋtsɛmɛi etɛ lɛ] asɛɛ, ni aaasoro lɛ kɛ klɛŋklɛŋbii lɛ, ni eeeba maŋtsɛmɛi etɛ shi.”
Beni nyɔŋ lɛ ba naagbee lɛ, ebu Biblia mli nikasemɔi nyɔŋma he akɔntaa.
17 Atsɔɔ Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ hiɛkpatamɔ lɛ mli jogbaŋŋ yɛ Kpojiemɔ wolo lɛ mli, akɛ: “Ni akolontoi nyɔŋma ni ona [ni ji ‘maŋtsɛmɛi’ ni yeɔ nɔ yɛ naagbee be lɛ mli] lɛ, kɛ kooloo lɛ [kooloo ni tsuɔ tamɔ muneele, ni damɔ shi kɛha Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ], amɛaanyɛ ajwamaŋ lɛ, ni amɛaafee lɛ amaŋfɔ, ni amɛaaŋmɛ lɛ yayai, ni amɛaaye eheloo, ni amɛkɛ la aaashã lɛ.”
“Ni ŋaa kɛ nilee saji fɛɛ ni maŋtsɛ lɛ bi amɛ lɛ ena yɛ mli akɛ amɛfe woloŋlelɔi kɛ okɔmfoi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ emaŋtsɛyelihei lɛ fɛɛ lɛ shii nyɔŋma.”
Yɛ nakai be lɛ mli lɛ, Israel akutsei nyɔŋma maŋtsɛyeli lɛ yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shweshweeshwe shihilɛ mli.
Afi Kome Batsɔ Afii Nyɔŋma
Mɛi ni atsu lɛ ateŋ mɛi nyɔŋma eyanáaa hemɔkɛyeli, ni amɛkɛ amaniɛbɔɔ ni jeɔ mɔ nijiaŋ wui ba, ni amɛkɛɛ akɛ, Israel nyɛŋ aye Kanaanbii lɛ anɔ kunim ejaakɛ “oblaŋi sɔŋŋ” ji amɛ, ni amɛhe wa.
EHEWOLO nɔ dĩɔ, enyanyɔji yɛ́ɔ tamɔ adiagba, ehiŋmɛii dĩɔ ni ekpɛ́lɛɔ.
“Amɛfɔ amɛtadei lɛ ahe, ni amɛha eyɛ futaa yɛ toobi lɛ lá lɛ mli,” ni tsɔɔ akɛ amɛkpɛlɛɔ Yesu afɔleshaa ni kpataa esha lɛ nɔ.
Kwɛ bɔ ni emli baafili lɛ kɛ miishɛɛ yɛ be mli ni ebɔɔ enɛ he amaniɛ lɛ, akɛ: “Nii nɛɛ asɛɛ lɛ mikwɛ, ni naa, asafo babaoo ni mɔ ko mɔ ko nyɛŋ akane ni jɛ jeŋmaŋ fɛɛ jeŋmaŋ kɛ akutsei kɛ maji kɛ majianɔwiemɔi amli damɔ maŋtsɛsɛi lɛ hiɛ kɛ Toobi lɛ hiɛ, ni amɛwo atadei yɛji, ni amɛhiɛ blɛoi yɛ amɛdɛŋ.”
(Kpojiemɔ 19:14) Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ kɔla yɛŋ tsuɔ nii kɛmaa nɔ mi ehaa wɔ akɛ eesumɔ ni eŋɔ wɔhe eshai lɛ eke wɔ: “Kɛ́ nyɛhe eshai lɛ tsuɔ tamɔ la po, amɛaayɛ tamɔ snoo; kɛ́ amɛtsuɔ tamɔ muneele lɛ, amɛaatsɔmɔ tamɔ too he tsɔi yɛŋ.”—Yesaia 1:18.
Yɛ esane lɛ mli lɛ, okpo yɛŋ ko kɛ tɔ ko ni mu yɔɔ mli ba koni ekɛbafɔ Clovis mu beni abaptisiɔ lɛ lɛ—eka shi faŋŋ akɛ ekɛmiitsɔɔ Yesu ni akɛ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ miifɔ lɛ mu lɛ.
Shi Yehowa baanyɛ ajie eshai ní tamɔ lá kɛ muneele lɛ kwraa ní eha amɛyɛ́ futaa tamɔ snoo loo too he tsɔi yɛŋ ní awoko lɛ tsofa.
37 Kɛkɛ ni Yakob kɔlɔ tsei ŋmɔji ní afolɔ, ni ji storaks kɛ almond kɛ plane tsei, ni ekpɔlɔ tsei lɛ ahe, ni no hã tsei lɛ amli eyɛji lɛ je kpo faŋŋ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, abaanyɛ aná wala yibii ni nyɛɔ ewuɔ eshiɔ hela ni yɔɔ gbɔmɔtso lɛ mli ni akɛtsaa muawai ni kɛ helai kɛ kansa baa lɛ kɛjɛ white cells lɛ mli.
Ni amɛniji ní etsɛ̃rɛ̃ lɛ ahe eyɛ futaa.
Hɔgbaa ko yɛ 1942 mli lɛ, wɔmiikase lala yɛ sɔlemɔ tsu lɛ mli pɛ kɛkɛ ni obalanyo blɔfonyo ko pue yɛ shinaa lɛ naa ni ehiɛ woji etɛ ni Buu Mɔɔ Asafo lɛ ŋmala —Creation, Vindication, kɛ Preparation.
Michael: Mida yɛ he ko ni blɔfomɛi ni ji Australiabii titri yɔɔ jɛmɛ, ni mibaná Asiabii ahe jwɛŋmɔ ni ejaaa kwraa, titri lɛ, mɛi ni jɛ China lɛ.
Mɛnɛɛmɛi hu ji Kristofoi ni ejɔɔ amɛhe nɔ ni abaptisi amɛ, ni “amɛfɔ amɛtadei lɛ ahe, ni amɛha eyɛ futaa yɛ toobi lɛ,” ni ji Yesu Kristo “la lɛ mli.”
“Mɛidiji, blɔfomɛi kɛ Bokagbɛbii ní jɛ shihilɛi srɔtoi fɛɛ mli, kɛ je lɛŋ hei srɔtoi fɛɛ efutu ni amɛfee ekome yɛ miishɛɛ mli yɛ he fɛɛ he. . . .
Agbɛnɛ hu Papuabii ni jɛ maŋ lɛ teŋ gbɛ, ni amɛkɛ mama pɛ ŋmɔɔ amɛhɛ, ni amɛhiɛɔ klantei, ni amɛsumɔɔ ni amɛnyiɛ wɔ sɛɛ tuuŋtu, ni amɛbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ amɛaata wɔhewolo yɛŋ lɛ he lɛ hu yɛ —ni nɛkɛ shihilɛi nɛɛ fɛɛ mli hilɛ lɛ efeee mlɛo kɛhaaa wɔ.
Atadei yɛji lɛ damɔ shi kɛha amɛhe ní tse yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, ejaakɛ “amɛfɔ amɛtadei lɛ ahe, ni amɛha eyɛ futaa yɛ toobi lɛ lá lɛ mli.”—Kpojiemɔ 7:9, 14.
Taakɛ Kpojiemɔ 7:14 tsɔɔ lɛ, onukpai 24 ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome kɛɛ Yohane akɛ: “Mɛnɛɛmɛi ji mɛi ni jɛ amanehulu kpeteŋkpele lɛ mli lɛ, ni amɛfɔ amɛtadei lɛ ahe, ni amɛha eyɛ futaa yɛ Toobi lɛ la lɛ mli.”
(Yakobo 4:4) Mɛi komɛi kɛ amɛhiɛ fɔ yei ni yɔɔ keketee ni hi shi yɛ afii ohai 19 lɛ mli lɛ atsɔɔmɔi anɔ, tamɔ Ellen White ni jɛ Seventh-Day Adventists jamɔ lɛ mli kɛ Mary Baker Eddy ni jɛ Christian Scientists jamɔ lɛ mli lɛ kɛ nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ nɔŋŋ lɛ yei pii ni shiɛɔ kɛjɛɔ shiɛmɔ adekai amli lɛ atsɔɔmɔi anɔ.
22 Yohane tsɔ ŋwɛi adafitswaa gbɛ lɛ nɔŋŋ nɔ ni enine shɛ saji krokomɛi ni kɔɔ asafo babaoo nɛɛ he lɛ anɔ: “Ni [onukpa lɛ] ekɛɛ mi akɛ: Mɛnɛɛmɛi ji mɛi ni jɛ amanehulu kpeteŋkpele lɛ mli lɛ, ni amɛfɔ amɛtadei lɛ ahe, ni amɛha eyɛ futaa yɛ Toobi lɛ la lɛ mli.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ní eeesɔle eha Nyɔŋmɔ kɛha gbɛ ko ni eeetsɔ nɔ eye ebua mɛi diji kɛ nɔ ni esusu akɛ eji hewolonɔ su mlijiemɔ gbɛjianɔtoo ni etamɔ nɔ ni jieɔ nyɛ̃ɛ kɛha blɔfomɛi akpo lɛ moŋ lɛ, esɔle koni ená anɔkwale lɛ, nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni eji, kɛ he fɛɛ he ni eyɔɔ.
Okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ lɛ Nɔtalɔ ji Yesu Kristo.
(Kpojiemɔ 20:11) Mɛni ji nɛkɛ “maŋtsɛsɛi yɛŋ ko ni da” nɛɛ?
Nakai atadei yɛji lɛ feɔ amɛ jalɛ shidaamɔ ni he tse yɛ Yehowa hiɛ lɛ he okadi.
Kunimyelɔ ni ta okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nyiɛmɔ lɛ miiya nɔ, ni mɔ ko nyɛɛɛ enaa atsi ni ebaa naagbee yɛ akɔntaabuu be kɛha je lɛ “ni ka mɔ fɔŋ lɛ hewalɛ mli lɛ” mli.
(Marko 11:17) Amɛjieɔ hemɔkɛyeli kpo yɛ Yesu Kristo kpɔmɔ afɔleshaa lɛ mli, ni ‘amɛfɔ́ɔ amɛtadei lɛ ahe ni amɛhaa eyɛ́ɔ futaa yɛ Toobi lɛ lá lɛ mli.’
Shi bonso wulu kɛ edaaŋ nyanyɔjii loo ogboole agbo ko ni yeɔ gbɔmɔ lɛ baanyɛ ami gbɔmɔ.
Aje emaa shishi yɛ December 1989.
Tito kɛ Jeŋmajiaŋbii krokomɛi ní aaanyɛ amɛnɔ koni afo amɛ ketia lɛ baatsɔɔ akɛ akpɛlɛɛɛ nɔ akɛ yiwalaheremɔ damɔ Yehowa duromɔ ni esaaa wɔ kɛ hemɔkɛyeli yɛ Yesu Kristo mli lɛ nɔ, shi moŋ edamɔ Mla lɛ he nitsumɔi anɔ.

” Mɛni hewɔ eji ‘Yehowa mlifu wein kpulu’ lɛ?
Yesu kɛɛ ekaselɔi anɔkwafoi lɛ akɛ: “Kpulu ni mibanu lɛ, nyɛaanu, ni baptisimɔ ni akɛaabaptisi mi lɛ, akɛaabaptisi nyɛ.”

14 Ni be ni amɛgbe nitsumɔ lɛ naa nɔŋŋ lɛ, amɛkɛ shika ni shwɛ lɛ bahã maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛ Yehoiada, ni amɛkɛfee nibii kɛhã Yehowa shĩa lɛ, nibii ni akɛsɔmɔɔ kɛ nibii ni akɛshãa afɔle, kɛ kɔɔpoi kɛ shika tsuru kɛ jwiɛtɛi nibii.

17 Mɛi Ni Sɔmɔɔ “Miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Lɛ” Yɛ Miishɛɛ
Eetao ni etsuji ana miishɛɛ hu, tamɔ bɔ ni lɛ hu eyɔɔ miishɛɛ lɛ.
Shi esaaa akɛ wɔhiɛ kpaa nɔ akɛ, Yesu Kristo, ni ji “Nɔyelɔ kome pɛ ni yɔɔ hewalɛ waa ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ lɛ,” jɛ etsuiŋ eshɛje mɛi amii ni ehã amɛná miishɛɛ.
Amɛ hu amɛyɛ miishɛɛ, ni mi kɛ miŋa hu yɛ miishɛɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.”
Ani oosumɔ ni ofee tamɔ wɔ-Tsɔɔlɔ Kpele lɛ ni oha Yehowa aná miishɛɛ?— Belɛ yaa nɔ ni okase nɔ ni Yehowa taoɔ akɛ ofee lɛ he nii, ni oha ená miishɛɛ kɛtsɔ efeemɔ nɔ!
15 Yesu tsɔɔ nibii ni haa anáa miishɛɛ lɛ ateŋ nɔ ni ji ekpaa kɛ kpawo lɛ mli akɛ: “Miishɛɛ ji mɛi ni tsuii amli tse lɛ, shi amɛaana Nyɔŋmɔ.
Kɛji wɔsumɔɔ mɔ ko lɛ, wɔtaoɔ ehilɛ-kɛhamɔ, ni wɔmii shɛɔ wɔhe kɛ́ wɔna akɛ eeye omanye ni emii eshɛ ehe lɛ.”
Yehowa ji “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ,” ni eesumɔ ni oblahii kɛ oblayei aná miishɛɛ.
Kɛ wɔkase Yehowa suɔmɔ lɛ yɛ bɔ ni wɔkɛ mɛi krokomɛi yeɔ haa lɛ mli lɛ, miishɛɛ nyiɛɔ sɛɛ, ejaakɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ hu.
Mɛni ji miishɛɛ sɔrɔtoi kpawo ni yɔɔ Kpojiemɔ lɛ mli nɔ ni ji ejwɛ lɛ, ni namɛi naa gbɛfaŋnɔ yɛ nɛkɛ miishɛɛ pɔtɛɛ nɛɛ mli?
Niŋmalɔ Jonathan Freedman wie yɛ ewolo ní gbɛi ji Happy People lɛ mli akɛ: “Kɛ́ shika fioo ko baje odɛŋ nɔŋŋ pɛ lɛ, shika falɛ ní oyɔɔ lɛ he ehiaaa babaoo dɔŋŋ yɛ miishɛɛ ní eeeha oná lɛ gbɛfaŋ.
Sɛɛ mli beni abi amɛ nɔ hewɔ ni amɛbatsɔmɔ gbɛgbalɔi loo Yehowa Odasefoi abe-fɛɛ sɔɔlɔi lɛ, amɛha hetoo akɛ, “Wɔna akɛ wɔmami kɛ miishɛɛ miisɔmɔ ákɛ gbɛgbalɔ, ni wɔ hu wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔná miishɛɛ nakai nɔŋŋ.”
Yehowa ji ‘miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ,’ ni esumɔɔ ni esɔɔlɔi aná miishɛɛ.
Be mli ni lalatsɛ lɛ tsɔɔ yiŋtoi komɛi ni kɛ miishɛɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ baa lɛ, elá akɛ: “Gbɔmɔ ni enyiɛɛɛ mɛi fɔji ajina mli, ni edamɔɔɔ eshafeelɔi agbɛ nɔ, ni etaaa hefɛoyelɔi ataramɔhe lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ.”—Lala 1:1, NW.
Nihamɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ kɛ miishɛɛ baa, ejaakɛ Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Nɔ hamɔ mli yɛ [miishɛɛ, NW] fe hemɔ.”

No hewɔ lɛ, ha wɔsusu nakai skul nikasemɔ ni obɔɔɔ mɔdɛŋ yɛ mli lɛ he, ni wɔtao gbɛ nɔ ni oootsɔ otsu naagbai ni ekolɛ okɛkpeɔ yɛ nikasemɔ nɛɛ mli lɛ ahe nii.”
Kɛ́ wɔkɛ naagbai miikpe yɛ wɔgbalashihilɛ mli lɛ, ani no tsɔɔ akɛ miishɛɛ nyɛŋ ahi mli dɔŋŋ?

Kɛ́ nakai ni lɛ, eeenyɛ efee akɛ onuɔ he akɛ nilee ni oná lɛ haa onuɔ nɔ hewɔ ni amrɔ nɛɛ je lɛ mli eyi obɔ kɛ haomɔi babaoo lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ.
Ekolɛ obaakai beni okase akɛ ‘abaagbele shwilafoi ahiŋmɛi, abaagbele toimulɔi atoi, ni ŋã kpataa nɔ’ aaafee frɔ̃frɔ̃ lɛ.
Akɛni ema shishitoo tɛ agbo ko nɔ, ni akɛ akulashiŋi fɛfɛji efo he fɛɛ kɛkpe hewɔ lɛ, enyɛɔ ekɛ klɛŋklɛŋ sɔlemɔtsu ni Salomo ma lɛ yeɔ egbɔ yɛ efɛo mli.
Dɔlɛ sane ji akɛ, mihi shi akɛ mɔ ni agbako lɛ nɔ ko, ni leee nɔ ko kwraa yɛ su fɛfɛo kɛ anɔkwale ni wolo ni fe woji fɛɛ ni aŋma pɛŋ lɛ hiɛ lɛ he.”

No mli lɛ eleee yiŋtoo ni Nyɔŋmɔ yɔɔ kɛha gbɔmɔ lɛ he nɔ ko kwraa.
Fiofio lɛ, miyiŋ tsɔ akɛ nɔ ko baŋ minɔ kɛji mijáaa blematsɛmɛi ni egboi lɛ.
Miyɔse akɛ, bɔ ni no mli lɛ misusuɔ yɛ emli saji lɛ ahe lɛ bɛ lɛ nakai kwraa, ni no ha minaa kpɛ mihe waa!”
Nɔ ko nɔ ko nyɛŋ atsĩ nakai yiŋtoo lɛ mlibaa naa kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Amɛle kɛjɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli akɛ gbohii lɛ leee nɔ ko nɔ ko, ejaakɛ Hebri Ŋmalɛi lɛ wieɔ akɛ: “Hiɛkalɔi le akɛ amɛbaagboi; shi gbohii lɛ, amɛleee nɔ ko nɔ ko, . . .
Ni jeŋmaji gboɔ deŋme efolo?
No hewɔ lɛ ekɛɛ: “Nyɛkaŋɔa nɔ ko nyɛhiɛa nyɛdɛŋ yɛ nyɛgbɛfaa lɛ mli, nyɛkahiɛa tso loo kotoku loo aboloo loo shika loo atadei enyɔ.
Nɔ ko nɔ ko bɛ ni yɔɔ Hezekia diɛŋtsɛ maŋtsɛ shĩa lɛ kɛ enɔyeli lɛ mli fɛɛ ni ekɛtsɔɔɔ amɛ.
Hofni kɛ Pinehas sɔmɔ akɛ osɔfoi ni kwɛɔ sɔlemɔwe nitsumɔi anɔ, shi hii “yakagbɔmɛi ji amɛ,” ni nɔ pɛ ni amɛyɔɔ he miishɛɛ ji amɛ akɔnɔi kɛ jeŋba shara henumɔi ahe nitsumɔ.
YOO nilelɔ ko ni kɛ nuu yakagbɔmɔ ebote gbalashihilɛ mli—nakai ji Abigail kɛ Nabal shihilɛ lɛ.
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Shi gbohii lɛ, amɛleee nɔ ko nɔ ko.”—Jajelɔ 9:5, 10.
Anɔkwa Kristofoi kɛ ashwãifeemɔ he nɔ ko bɛ nɔ ko feemɔ.
Esa akɛ wɔsumɔ wɔnanemɛi heyelilɔi ni akpɛlɛ amɛnɔ, ni yeɔ anɔkwa lɛ, ‘ni . . . wɔkafee nɔ ko yɛ niiaŋkpamɔ naa.’—1 Timoteo 5:21.
Eji nɔ ni tsirɛ mi kɛ mɛi krokomɛi akɛ wɔɔna akɛ nɔ ko nyɛɛɛ aba suɔmɔ ni miŋa yɔɔ kɛha Yehowa lɛ kɛ ekãa ni eyɔɔ kɛha esɔɔmɔ lɛ shi.
No nɔŋŋ kã mitsui nɔ.”
Agbɛnɛ hu, kaawie saji otii ni yɔɔ kuku lɛ mli lɛ fɛɛ he, ní no ha mɛi krokomɛi ná nɔ ko fioo loo amɛnáaa nɔ ko kwraa ni amɛaawie he.
Pilato po kɛɛ yɛ Yesu he akɛ: “Minako nɔ ko ni sa gbele yɛ emli; no hewɔ lɛ, mibaha ayi lɛ ni maŋmɛɛ ehe.”
Esaaa akɛ anɔkwafoi lɛ sheɔ kooloi awuiyelɔi tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ gbeyei kwraa.
Tɔmɔ bɛ he akɛ Kristofonyo ko aaakpɛlɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ nɔ kɛ́ eji mɔ ni shɛɔ taomɔ nii lɛ ahe.
Ekolɛ jeee nɔ ko ni wɔfee loo wɔkɛɛ lɛ ji nɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni eha emli efu lɛ.
Hela wiemɔ ni atsɔɔ shishi akɛ “gbekɛbii bibii” lɛ bɛ su ni tsɔɔ nuu loo yoo.
Amɛnaa maji ni miiye ohia kɛ hɔmɔ, ta mli abobalɔi ni bɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ, gbekɛbii ni anyɛɛɛ akane ni AIDS eha amɛtsɔmɔ awusãi, kɛ gbɔmɛi akpekpei abɔ ni helai krokomɛi emɔmɔ amɛ.
Vincent, ni ji tsɛ ni yɔɔ bii ejwɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Bei pii lɛ, wɔkɛ wɔbii lɛ susuɔ sɛɛnamɔi kɛ osharai ni yɔɔ nifeemɔ ko he lɛ he, koni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛna gbɛ ni ja ni esa akɛ amɛkɔ.
(b) Mɛni hewɔ Biblia mli anɔkwale ni wɔduɔ wɔwoɔ wɔbii lɛ amli lɛ ji suɔmɔ kpojiemɔ lɛ?
Kɛjɛ jeŋba mli gbɛtsɔɔmɔ nɔ kɛyashi jeŋba kpakpa ni akɛtsuɔ nii yɛ nitsumɔ mli lɛ nɔ kɛ agbɛnɛ kɛjɛ gbekɛbii atsɔsemɔ nɔ kɛyashi Nyɔŋmɔ jamɔ nɔ lɛ, Biblia lɛ ejieee nɔ ko nɔ ko kwraa ni he hiaa yɛ mli.
Kɛ amɛkɛ nilee ni afɔɔ kɛ nitsumɔ ni tsɔɔ akɛ esa akɛ gbekɛbii akase bɔ ni amɛaatsu amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛ naagbai ahe nii lɛ tsu nii lɛ, bei pii lɛ, amɛshiɔ amɛbii lɛ koni amɛfee amɛnii ní amɛkɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ko kwraa haaa.
(Abɛi 12:18) Bɔni afee ni awo gbekɛbii lɛ hewalɛ ni amɛwie faŋŋ lɛ, fɔlɔi ni le nii lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛfee mɛi ni boɔ sane toi jogbaŋŋ.
Shi akɛni fɔlɔi ni ji Kristofoi lɛ sumɔɔ amɛbii hewɔ lɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhewalɛ fɛɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ he nilee abu amɛhe.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 17:25) Biblia lɛ haa wɔnaa akɛ eji fɔlɔ ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ ni yɔɔ he miishɛɛ akɛ ekɛ nibii ni he hiaa ebii aaaha amɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ enɛ ji shihilɛ gbɛ ni atiuɔ sɛɛ waa yɛ je lɛ mli moŋ, shi ani enɛ ji nɔ ni fɔlɔi ni ji Kristofoi aaatao aha amɛbii?—Yohane 15:19; 1 Yohane 2:15-17.
Kɛ́ nyɛfee nakai lɛ, ewaŋ tsɔ kɛhãŋ nyɛ akɛ nyɛbaatsɔɔ nyɛbii lɛ anɔkwale lɛ, ejaakɛ nyɛbaanu saji ni amɛkɛ mɛi gbaa, nibii ni amɛkɛjieɔ amɛhiɛtserɛ, kɛ nibii ni amɛkaseɔ yɛ skul lɛ ashishi, ni agbɛnɛ hu ewaŋ kɛhãŋ nyɛ akɛ nyɛkɛ amɛtsɔɔlɔi lɛ baagba sane tɛ̃ɛ.
Nuu ko yɛ bii enyɔ.
(Abɛi 3:33) Yiŋtoo hewɔ ni fɔlɔi ni ji Kristofoi lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ kɛfeɔ enɛ lɛ ji akɛ amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛbii lɛ asumɔ Yehowa taakɛ amɛ hu amɛsumɔɔ lɛ lɛ.
+ 18 Bii bibii, esaaa akɛ wɔsumɔɔ mɛi yɛ wiemɔ mli loo lilɛi nɔ,+ shi moŋ yɛ nifeemɔ+ kɛ anɔkwale mli.
Bei komɛi lɛ etsɛ́ɔ amɛ kɛbaa eŋɔɔ.
Kɛji akɛ oyɛ gbekɛbii bibii loo ooto gbɛjianɔ ni ona weku lɛ, obaanyɛ okwɛ akɛ ani nɔtsamɔ skul ni sa yɛ he ni oyɔɔ lɛ lo.
7. (a) Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, mɛni esaaa akɛ fɔlɔi feɔ kɛ́ amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛha amɛbii lɛ aná jwɛŋmɔ ni ja yɛ gbalashihilɛ he lɛ?
Bii—Mɛni Baaye Abua Nyɛ ni Nyɛnyiɛ Yesu Nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ Sɛɛ?
Ani jeee suɔmɔ nɛɛ nɔŋŋ baatsirɛ amɛ ni amɛtsĩ amɛbii, ni amrɔ nɛɛ amɛkɛ kaai heei kpeɔ yɛ amɛshihilɛ mli lɛ anaa yɛ nibii komɛi ahe?
Yɛ je lɛŋ he fɛɛ he lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi tsɔɔ amɛbii lɛ ni amɛkase nii waa yɛ skul.
Fɔlɔi ni le nii lɛ yeɔ buaa amɛbii lɛ ni amɛkana susumɔ akɛ nibii kpakpai fɛɛ ni akeɔ amɛ lɛ ji nibii ni esa akɛ mɛi afee aha amɛ.
Kɛkɛ lɛ, be mli ni nyɛkɛ gbekɛbii lɛ tsuɔ nii yɛ shiɛmɔ mli lɛ, amɛnáa hegbɛ amɛkwɛɔ bɔ ni nyɛkɛ nibii ni nyɛkɛ amɛ esusu he momo lɛ tsuɔ nii nyɛhaa.
Nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ, beni wɔkutsoŋnyo ko na shika ko kã okpɔlɔ nɔ lɛ, ebi kɛji misheee gbeyei akɛ gbekɛbii lɛ baakɔlɔ shika lɛ.
“BII bibii.”
Akɛni miji kromɔ yɛ bii nyɔŋma ateŋ hewɔ lɛ, beni miye afii 13 lɛ mibɔi nitsumɔ koni mikɛye mibua kɛkwɛ weku lɛ.
Amɛ fɛɛ amɛbaana shiai kpakpai, ni amɛbaaye niyenii ni amɛdu yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ shishi.
Bɔfo Paulo ŋma akɛ: “Mɛi ni edara lɛ anɔ ji niyenii ni tsii, amɛji mɛi ni kɛ amɛjwɛŋmɔ tsuɔ nii, ni amɛtsɔse amɛjwɛŋmɔ lɛ koni ele ekpakpa kɛ efɔŋ mlikpamɔ.”
24 Shi Israel hii lɛ ahe fĩ amɛ waa yɛ nakai gbi lɛ nɔ, ejaakɛ Saul ekã mɛi lɛ kitã akɛ: “Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baaye nii* dani je baana loo dani matɔ mihenyɛlɔi lɛ anɔ owele magbe naa lɛ, alomɔ lɛ!”
No teeɔ sane hesusumɔ shi, aloo jeee nakai?
Yehowa tsɔɔ asafo lɛ nɔ ekɛ mumɔŋ niyenii babaoo haa.
Nɔ ni tamɔ nakai lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi ejɛ jeeŋmɔ amɛshiɛ akɛ, afii oha nɛɛ mli tai ni kpataa nii ahiɛ, kɛ shikpɔŋhosomɔi, tsɛŋemɔ helai, hɔmɔ, kɛ nibii krokomɛi ni baa lɛ fɛɛ kɛ odaseyeli haa akɛ “naagbee gbii lɛ” amli wɔyɔɔ lɛ—be ni baanyiɛ be ni akɛ Kristo ta sɛi nɔ akɛ Maŋtsɛ yɛ ŋwɛi yɛ afi 1914 lɛ sɛɛ.—Luka 21:10, 11; 2 Timoteo 3:1.
Kɛkɛ ni ejwɛŋ fioo, ni no sɛɛ lɛ ekɛ baagi agbo ko ha mi akɛ mikɛ niyenii pii awo mli bɔ ni manyɛ.
Hemɔ wɔ kɛ wɔshikpɔŋ lɛ kɛtsake niyenii, ni wɔbaatsɔmɔ Farao nyɔji, ni wɔshikpɔŋ lɛ hu baatsɔ enɔ.
Yɛ bɔ ni atee hiɛ yɛ tsɔji ahenilee mli lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ani hɔmɔ miiye adesai yɛ jeŋ fɛɛ?
Paulo wie Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ he akɛ: “Efɔ̃ɔɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe odaseyeli, shi moŋ efeɔ ejurɔ ni ehaa nugbɔ jɛɔ ŋwɛi nɛɔ haa nyɛ, kɛ afii ni baa nii pii hu, ekɛ ŋmãa kɛ miishɛɛ woɔ nyɛtsuiiaŋ obɔ.”—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 14:17; Lala 147:8.
Shi atade kome pɛ mɔ ko baanyɛ awo yɛ be kome mli, ni ena niyenii kɛ ninumɔ ko falɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ.
Kɛ́ tsulɔ lɛ kɛ mumɔŋ niyenii ha yɛ be ni sa mli, ni etsɔɔ bɔ ni esa akɛ ato nibii ahe gbɛjianɔ aha lɛ, te esa akɛ Kristofoi aŋkroaŋkroi afee amɛnii yɛ he amɛha tɛŋŋ?
Fɛi be ko lɛ, hela mɔ mi ni niyenii fioo pɛ wɔyɔɔ ni shika bɛ.
(Yesaia 25:6) Niyenii etaŋ, ejaakɛ “shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ aaaba abele babaoo kɛyashwie gɔji lɛ ayiteaŋ.”—Lala 72:16.
David tsu kɛtee Nabal, ni ji nuu niiatsɛ ko ni yɔɔ gwantɛŋi kɛ abotiai akuu babaoo lɛ ŋɔɔ koni eha amɛ niyenii kɛ nu.
9 Mɔ ni baa ehe shi lɛ nyaa nibii fɛɛ ni Yehowa kɛduroɔ wɔ, ni mumɔŋ niyenii hu fata he lɛ ahe.
Kadimɔ nii ni ji “nɔ ni he tse” kɛ “nɔ ni he tseee” kɛha niyenii lɛ ba shihilɛ mli beni akɛ Mose Mla lɛ ha lɛ pɛ, ni eba naagbee beni agu Mla lɛ.
Wɔmiida Yehowa shi waa akɛ etsɔɔ “tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ” lɛ nɔ ehaa wɔ mumɔŋ niyenii babaoo yɛ bɔ ni esumɔɔ ‘nyɛmimɛi’ lɛ hewɔ.—1 Pet.
2 Beni Yesu bɔfoi lɛ tee koni amɛyahe niyenii lɛ, eyajɔɔ ehe yɛ nubu ko ni yɔɔ maŋ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ he.
Shi kɛji beni wɔkaseɔ hiɛjoomɔ he nii —nɔ ni kɔɔ shika, heloonaa ninamɔ, hewalɛ kɛ gbɛhe taomɔ, niyenii, loo bɔlɛnamɔ mli miishɛɛnamɔ he lɛ sɛɛ lɛ —ona akɛ gbɔjɔmɔ ko yɛ he ko hu?
(Yesaia 26:15) Lɛlɛŋ, eyɛ miishɛɛ akɛ aaana akɛ emlibii ayifalɛ lɛ miiya hiɛ beni mɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ woɔ “shikpɔŋ” lɛ obɔ kɛ “yibii”—mumɔŋ niyenii kpakpa ni haa mɔ hewalɛ lɛ.
Mumɔŋ niyenii kɛ nu ni jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli, ni atsɔɔ egbɛjianɔtoo lɛ nɔ akɛhaa lɛ etee nɔ eha ona miishɛɛ.
Nɔ ni fata enɛ he ji shia ni aaahi mli, niyenii, hehaa nii, hiɛtserɛjiemɔ—kɛfata nibii krokomɛi babaoo he, kɛ́ gbekɛbii yɛ.
Beni mikwɛɔ niyenii kɛ nibii krokomɛi ni he hiaa kɛha Betel weku lɛ hemɔ nɔ lɛ, bɔ ni niyenii ajara wa waa lɛ hã minaa kpɛ mihe.
Niyenii ni wɔyeɔ titri ji yɛlɛ.
Sɛɛ mli lɛ, akɛ maŋbii ni tsaa ojarawatɛi, maŋbii ni eyashera shi yɛ nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ nɔ, tsɔnei ni akɛtsaa mu ni akɛfeɔ pɛtro, tsɔnei ni akɛyaa nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ nɔ, kɛ tsɔnei ni akɛnyiɛɔ nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ nɔ lɛ ahe mfonirii fee wulamɔ nibii, ni akɛ nomɛi baye tsutsu nɔ̃ lɛ anajiaŋ.”
Akɛni efee Elia, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ gbalɔ lɛ gbɔ hewɔ lɛ, yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ ahaaa emamu kɛ emu lɛ atã yɛ hɔmɔ be ni kulɛ ebaagbe lɛ kɛ ebinuu lɛ mli.
Nɔ ni fata he ji kooloi ni agbeɔ ni asaa amɛ kɛhaa afɔleshaa, kanei ni awoɔ mli mu, jɛmɛ shamɔ kɛ tsũumɔ kɛ bulɔi anitsumɔ ni amɛtsuɔ.
Sane ni yɔɔ Mateo 26:6-13 lɛ tsɔɔ wɔ he ni nifeemɔ lɛ tee nɔ yɛ—yɛ Simon kpitiyelɔ lɛ shia, yɛ Betania—shi moŋ etsɛɛɛ yoo ni bɔi mu ni jeɔ ŋma lɛ kɛ Yesu yiteŋ shwiemɔ lɛ gbɛi.
16 Osɔfo lɛ baashã enɛ, ni tsɔɔ akɛ, ebaashã ŋmaa ni awiɛ ni boko lɛ kɛ mu lɛ eko kɛ frankinsɛnsi fɛɛ ni jwere nɔ lɛ, akɛ kaimɔ afɔle,*+ afɔle ni akɛ la shãa ahãa Yehowa.
Kɛ́ tsɔnekudɔlɔ lɛ tsakeee mu lɛ yɛ be naa lɛ, etsɛŋ ni tsɔne lɛ baafite.
Eŋma akɛ: “Hã jalɔ agba mi ma kɛ mlihilɛ ni ekã mi, yiteŋ mu ji no: ni miyitso kwaaa.”—Lala 141:5.
15 Okɛ mu ashwie nɔ, ni okɛ frankinsɛnsi hu ashwie nɔ.
30 Ni Mose ŋɔ mufɔɔ mu+ lɛ eko kɛ lá ni yɔɔ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ hu eko ni ekɛshwã Aaron kɛ etadei lɛ kɛ ebihii ni fata ehe lɛ kɛ amɛtadei lɛ anɔ.
Ekolɛ enɛ miitsɔɔ mu ní akɛtsu nii kɛfɔ Hezekia mu ákɛ maŋtsɛ ni jɛ David seshi lɛ mli lɛ.
No sɛɛ lɛ, amɛsha amɛhe kɛtee shĩa koni “amɛyasaa tsofai ni jeɔ ŋma kɛ mui ni jeɔ ŋma amɛto” koni amɛkɛyakpa Yesu gbonyo lɛ yɛ Hejɔɔmɔ Gbi lɛ sɛɛ. —Luka 23:56.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, Geo wolo tɛtrɛɛ lɛ tsɛ mũ nu bui ni awo mli la yɛ nyɛsɛɛ Boka Teŋgbɛ tawuu ko mli lɛ akɛ “nibii ni ebɔle wɔhe kɛkpe lɛ fitemɔ kpeteŋkpele fe fɛɛ ni gbɔmɔ nine kɛba.”
Biblia mli saji ahe wielɔi pii susuɔ akɛ wiemɔ ní awie akɛ “nyɛfɔa tsɛ́ŋ lɛ mu” lɛ kɔɔ blema asraafoi anifeemɔ ni ji mu ní akɛtsumɔɔ tsɛ́ŋi ní akɛ kooloi awolo fee lɛ anɔ dani akɛyaa ta, koni nibii ní tswiaa nɔ lɛ ashane yɛ nɔ lɛ he.
15 Yehowa tee nɔ ekɛ Mose wie ekɛɛ: 2 “Okɛ Israelbii lɛ awie ni okɛɛ amɛ akɛ, ‘Kɛ́ nyɛná nyɛyashɛ shikpɔŋ ni mikɛhãa nyɛ koni nyɛhi nɔ lɛ nɔ,+ 3 ni nyɛkɛ tsinai loo toi lɛ eko miihã akɛ afɔle ni akɛ la shãa ahãa Yehowa lɛ—kɛ́ eji shãa afɔle+ jio, afɔle ni akɛmiitsu shiwoo krɛdɛɛ ko he nii jio, afɔle ni ajɛɔ suɔmɔ mli akɛhãa+ jio, afɔle ni ashãa yɛ nyɛgbii juji+ lɛ anɔ jio, bɔ ni afee ni eje ŋma jogbaŋŋ* ewo Yehowa lɛ+— 4 no lɛ, mɔ ni kɛ efɔle lɛ hãa lɛ, ekɛ ŋmaa* afɔle hu, ni ji ashikishaŋ kpakpa+ efa mlijai nyɔŋma mli ekome* ní akɛ mu hin* mlijai ejwɛ mli ekome efutu afata he kɛbahã Yehowa.
Shi moŋ, ejie su ni awie he yɛ Lala 141:5 lɛ kpo, akɛ: “Ha jalɔ agba mi ma kɛ mlihilɛ ni ekã mi, yiteŋ mu ji no ni miyitso kwaaa.”
+ 8 Efee nɔ ni ebaanyɛ; etsɔ hiɛ efɔse ojeŋma* eshwie migbɔmɔtso lɛ nɔ kɛhã mifuu lɛ.
22 Ni shikpɔŋ lɛ baahere ŋmaa kɛ wain hee kɛ mu lɛ nɔ;
Mɛi nɛɛ tamɔ Nyɔŋmɔjalɔ Maria, ni fɔse mu ni jeɔ ŋma eshwie Yesu nɔ lɛ.
Wiɛ tɛ, ni teji loo gbɔmɔ tsɔmɔɔ lɛ nyiɛɔ yibii lɛ anɔ ni ejwaraa amɛ, ni ejieɔ mu lɛ kɛjɛɔ mli, ni ehoɔ ni asɔoɔ awoɔ gbɛ mli. —Mateo 18:6.
18 Osɔfo lɛ kɛ mu ni eshwɛ yɛ ekɔkɔ mli lɛ akpa mɔ ni tsuɔ ehe lɛ yiteŋ, ni osɔfo lɛ akpãtã ahã lɛ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ.
17 Osɔfo lɛ kɛ mu ni eshwɛ yɛ ekɔkɔ mli lɛ eko akpa mɔ ni tsuɔ ehe lɛ ninejurɔ toi naa kɛ eninejurɔ gɔnti naa kɛ enanejurɔ gɔnti naa, yɛ sɔ̃ afɔle kooloo lɛ lá lɛ nɔ.

Tsɔɔlɔ kɛ Nikaselɔ Teŋ Wekukpaa Kpakpa
“GBƆMƐI babaoo ni amɛjeee Kristofoi lɛ po heɔ yeɔ akɛ tsɔɔlɔ kpele ni le nii ji Lɛ.
Nyɛbɔa mɔdɛŋ akɛ nyɛaale amɛtsɔɔlɔi.
Shi, etamɔ nɔ ni yɛ Ŋ.B. klɛŋklɛŋ afii oha lɛ mli lɛ, mɛi komɛi kɛ amɛhe miitsɔɔ akɛ tsɔɔlɔi, eyɛ mli akɛ amɛhe esako ni ahalako amɛ.
Upanishad (ni eshishi diɛŋtsɛ ji, “shitaramɔi yɛ tsɔɔlɔ masɛi”), ni atsɛɔ lɛ hu akɛ Vedanta ni aŋma aaafee afi 600-300 D.Ŋ.B. lɛ ji shishitoo mlai ni kɛ yiŋtoo ni yɔɔ susumɔ kɛ nifeemɔ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ mamɔɔ shi, yɛ Hindu jeŋ nilee naa.
Nyɛhaa wɔsusua amɛsɔ̃i akɛ amɛye amɛbua asafoŋbii lɛ ni amɛbu amɛhe, amɛtsɔɔ nii yɛ asafo lɛ mli kɛ esɛɛ fɛɛ, ni agbɛnɛ hu amɛkojo saji yɛ asafo lɛ mli lɛ ahe wɔkwɛa.
Fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ani wɔdaaa shi akɛ Yehowa kɛ emumɔ lɛ tsuɔ nii koni eha wɔhe asa ni esaa wɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ akɛ e-Wiemɔ lɛ he tsɔɔlɔi?
Mɛnɛɛmɛi hu bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ waa koni amɛtsɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ tsɔɔlɔi.
□ Mɛɛ Tsɔɔlɔ kɛ bi nikaselɔ wekukpaa kpakpa ko amaa nɔ mi yɛ Yesaia yitso 50?
Kaanyiɛ “Amale Tsɔɔlɔi” Asɛɛ
Encarta Encyclopedia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Yɛ Yudafoi ateŋ lɛ, onukpai pii buɔ tsɔɔlɔi akɛ amɛji gbɛtsɔɔlɔi ni kɛ mɔ yaa yiwalaheremɔ mli, ni amɛwo gbekɛbii hewalɛ koni amɛkɛ woo aha amɛtsɔɔlɔi babaoo po fe amɛfɔlɔi.”
Nuu ni kɛ afii babaoo etsɔɔ mɛi Biblia lɛ mli ni yɔɔ niiashikpamɔ babaoo lɛ kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Ehe ehiaaa ni wɔnaa atse yɛ wiemɔ lɛ mli dani wɔnyɛ wɔha wɔhiɛ afee ŋmɔlɔŋmɔlɔ kɛ miishɛɛ loo ni wɔfua wɔnyɛmimɛi lɛ atuu.
Kɛ́ gbekɛbii yɛ shĩa lɛ mli lɛ, nyɛkɛ Kasemɔ Nii Kɛjɛ Tsɔɔlɔ Kpele lɛ Ŋɔɔ lɛ ahaa.
Shiɛlɔi kɛ Tsɔɔlɔ ni Yɔɔ Ekãa
May kɛ June: Nyɛkɛ Buu-Mɔɔ kɛ Awake!
Ekɛ esane shishinumɔ ni eyɔɔ lɛ ha tsɔɔlɔi lɛ ni yɔɔ sɔlemɔwe lɛ anaa kpɛ amɛhe.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni eye afii 12 lɛ efɔlɔi yana lɛ ni eta tsɔɔlɔi lɛ ateŋ yɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ, ní “eebo amɛ toi ni eebibii amɛ nii.”
(2 Pet. 1:5; kwɛmɔ August 15, 1993 Buu-Mɔɔ, baafa 13-14, kɛha ŋaawoi krokomɛi ni kɔɔ nɔ ni nitsɔɔlɔ lɛ kɛ nikaselɔ lɛ fɛɛ baanyɛ afee koni amɛha Biblia kasemɔ lɛ aya hiɛ lɛ he.)
Nikasemɔ lɛ mli tsɔɔlɔi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome ni ji Nilelɔ Diego Gracia lɛ, toɔ nikasemɔ ni hi jogbaŋŋ ni ehe gbɛi waa ni kɔɔ jeŋbai ahe lɛ he gbɛjianɔ daa kɛha Spain datrɛfoi, ni ebatsɔ mɔ ni fiɔ hegbɛ ni wɔyɔɔ yɛ sanegbaa kɛha gbeekpamɔ lɛ mli lɛ ni kɔɔ lá ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli lɛ he sane lɛ he lɛ sɛɛ kpɛŋŋ.
Yɛ be mli ni mɔdɛŋ fɛɛ ni abɔ akɛ aaaha male akɛ Yehowa Odasefoi ji amale tsɔɔlɔi lɛ yeee omanye lɛ, mi Tsɛkwɛ kɛ gbɛ kroko tsu nii.
KASEMƆ TSƆƆLƆ KPELE LƐ
Beni bɔfo Paulo gbaa enɛ he sane efɔ̃ɔ shi lɛ, ekɛɛ: “Be ko baaba ni amɛkpɛlɛŋ tsamɔ tsɔɔmɔ lɛ dɔŋŋ, shi moŋ amɛaabua tsɔɔlɔi anaa amɛwo amɛhe yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛkɔnɔi lɛ anaa, ejaakɛ amɛtoiiaŋ miifɛ̃lɛ̃ amɛ.”—2 Timoteo 4:3.
Tsɔɔlɔ lɛ tee nɔ ekɛ wolo lɛ tsɔɔ klasbii lɛ fɛɛ, ni mɛi pii tao koni amɛná amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛnɔ.

Saji ni abaasusu he lɛ ekomɛi ji, bɔ ni asaa he koni akwɛ nikasemɔ nɔ, bɔ ni ayeɔ abuaa nikaselɔ lɛ koni esaa ehe kɛha nikasemɔ lɛ, nii abɔ ni esa akɛ akase, bɔ ni akɛ ŋmalɛi lɛ tsuɔ nii jogbaŋŋ ahaa, bɔ ni esa akɛ atsu saji ni nikaselɔ lɛ biɔ lɛ he nii aha, bɔ ni esa akɛ aje sɔlemɔ shishi aha, kɛ bɔ ni aaafee atsɔɔ nikaselɔ lɛ gbɛ kɛba gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ mli.
Te onuɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he anɔkwale lɛ ni obana lɛ he ohãa tɛŋŋ, ni mɛni obaafee kɛtsɔɔ akɛ ootao Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ tsutsu?
15 Lɛlɛŋ, yɛ shihilɛi babaoo mli lɛ, anaa bɔ ni akɛ he kpaa gbee jogbaŋŋ kɛtsɔɔ bɔ ni nyɛyi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ nyɛnyɛɔ nyɛtsakeɔ nyɛhe nyɛwoɔ shihilɛi amli lɛ nɔ, fe bɔ ni nyɛje nyɛhe nyɛha.
6 Kwɛ bɔ ni ohe yɔɔ fɛo kɛ akɔnɔ,
Susumɔ bɔ ni David nu he eha beni elá lala nɛɛ eha Yehowa lɛ he okwɛ: “Oda, ni ofeɔ naakpɛɛ nii, bo okome too ji Nyɔŋmɔ!
(Luka 11:13) Bi lɛ ni eye ebua bo koni onu nɔ ni obaakase lɛ shishi, bɔ ni ekɔɔ eyiŋtoo he ehaa, bɔ ni ebaaye ebua bo koni ole ekpakpa kɛ efɔŋ, bɔ ni esa akɛ okɛ eshishitoo mlai lɛ atsu nii yɛ oshihilɛ mli, kɛ bɔ ni nikasemɔ lɛ saa okɛ lɛ teŋ wekukpaa lɛ he ehaa.
KƐ́ OKƐ mɛi ni sumɔɔɔ osane loo amɛbɛ mɔ ni oji lɛ he miishɛɛ kpe lɛ, te ofeɔ onii ohaa tɛŋŋ?
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ́ ohefatalɔ lɛ haa omli fuɔ yɛ bɔ ni ekɛ nibii shwieɔ shi basabasa yɛ tsũ lɛ mli hewɔ lɛ, obaanyɛ ojɛ bulɛ mli okɛɛ akɛ, ‘Kɛ́ ojɛ nitsumɔ oba ni ojie otadei lɛ oshwie shikpɔŋ kɛkɛ lɛ [enɛ tsɔɔ nɔ ni naagba lɛ ji kɛ be ni ebaa], minuɔ he akɛ ohiɛ esɔɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni mibɔɔ koni makwɛ shĩa lɛ nɔ lɛ [enɛ tsɔɔ bɔ ni onuɔ he ohaa].’
Paulo tsɔɔ bɔ ni ehe hiaa ni akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ anyiɛ yɛ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ mli lɛ mli beni eŋma akɛ: “Agbɛnɛ nɔ ni eshwɛ lɛ, anyɛmimɛi, wɔmiikpa nyɛ fai ni wɔmiiwo nyɛ ŋaa yɛ Nuntsɔ Yesu mli, ákɛ bɔ ni nyɛná kɛjɛ wɔdɛŋ bɔ ni sa akɛ nyɛba nyɛjeŋ nyɛha ni nyɛsa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, kɛ bɔ ni nyɛbaa hu lɛ, ni nyɛteke nɔ fe tsutsu lɛ.”—1 Tesalonikabii 4:1.
Beni amanehulu ko eha opiŋ sɛɛ lɛ, ekolɛ amrɔ nɔŋŋ ni oyɔseɔ bɔ ni oyɔɔ wudɔɔ ha kɛ bɔ ni mɛi krokomɛi ahe hiaa bo ha.
Nɔ ni mɛi krokomɛi feɔ bianɛ lɛ baanyɛ aha ona susumɔi komɛi, bɔ ni ooonyɛ ona onikasemɔ he gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ babaoo loo bɔ ni bo kɛ oweku lɛ fɛɛ aaanyɛ ana nikasemɔ be lɛ he sɛɛ babaoo.
4 Naagbee lɛ, nyɛmimɛi, bɔ ni nyɛnine shɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni esa akɛ nyɛnyiɛ koni nyɛsa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ+ lɛ nɔ kɛjɛ wɔŋɔɔ lɛ, tamɔ bɔ ni yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ nyɛnyiɛɔ lɛ, wɔmiibi nyɛ, ni wɔmiikpa nyɛ fai yɛ Nuŋtsɔ Yesu mli akɛ, nyɛyaa nɔ nyɛfea nakai ni eteke nɔ fe tsutsu lɛ.
11 Wiemɔi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ ni aŋma ayaha Timoteo nɛɛ yeɔ ebuaa wɔ ni wɔnuɔ bɔ ni fee ni ebatsɔ sɔɔlɔ lɛ shishi: “Shi bo lɛ, hii shi yɛ nii ni okase ni oyɔɔ hewalɛ yɛ nɔ lɛ amli, ejaakɛ ole mɔ naa ni okase yɛ. Ni ogbekɛbiiashi ojɛ ole ŋmalɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ, ni aaanyɛ aha ole nii ni atsɔ Kristo Yesu nɔ hemɔkɛyeli nɔ kɛya yiwalaheremɔ mli lɛ.”
+ Nyɛhewɔ lɛ, shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ bii lɛ fɛɛ atsui efã,+ 10 ejaakɛ wɔnu bɔ ni Yehowa hã Ŋshɔ Tsuru lɛ mli nui lɛ gbi yɛ nyɛhiɛ be ni nyɛshi Ejipt lɛ,+ kɛ nɔ ni nyɛfee Amorbii lɛ amaŋtsɛmɛi enyɔ, ni ji Sihon+ kɛ Og,+ mɛi ni nyɛkpãtã amɛhiɛ yɛ Yordan lɛ sɛɛ* lɛ.
Kɛ́ onyɛ okwɛ toibolɔi lɛ ahiɛ jogbaŋŋ, ni okwɛ bɔ ni amɛhiɛ su yɔɔ, ni obi saji ni haa mɔ susuɔ nii ahe ni okpaaa hetoo gbɛ lɛ, no lɛ eeenyɛ eba akɛ obaale bɔ ni otoibolɔi lɛ nuɔ nɔ ni okɛɔ lɛ he amɛhaa.
Yesu tsɔɔ yiŋtoo lɛ yɛ sane ni ebi amɛ lɛ mli, akɛ: “Nyɛ ní nyɛhàa nyɛteŋ anunyam he, shi anunyam ní jɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ koome lɛ ŋɔɔ lɛ nyɛdiii sɛɛ, té aaafee tɛŋŋ ni nyɛaanyɛ nyɛhé nyɛyeŋ?”
(Lala 127:3-5) No hewɔ lɛ, okɛ amɛ aye nakai nɔŋŋ ákɛ mɔ ni baabu bɔ ni etsɔseɔ amɛ ehaa lɛ he akɔntaa eha Nyɔŋmɔ, ni nakai pɛpɛɛpɛ eji, ejaakɛ bo diɛŋtsɛ osɔ̃ ni.
Yesu kɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Tsɛ ni tsu mi lɛ, lɛ moŋ ewo mi kita, nɔ ni mikɛɛ kɛ nɔ ni miwie.”
Obaabu mihe koni matsɔ jeŋmaji anɔ onukpa;+
Nɔ ni fee mi naakpɛɛ ji, amɛ fɛɛ amɛkpa mi fai yɛ gidigidi ni amɛfee kɛshɛ miyi ni jeee misuɔmɔ naa lɛ hewɔ.
Nathan ekɛɛ mi akɛ manyɛ madamɔ blema nibii ni yɔɔ mijwɛŋmɔ mli lɛ nɔ mahi shi loo ni maje shihilɛ hee shishi.
Be ni mihã ele lɛ, ewo mi hewalɛ akɛ: “Hɛɛ, kɛ ohe awo be fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli.
Beni Yesu yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mɔ ko nyɛŋ aba miŋɔɔ, akɛ ja tsɛ lɛ ni tsu mi lɛ gbala lɛ dã . . .
Agbɛnɛ, lɛ ebɔi mi tswaa kɛha nikasemɔ lɛ, ni bei komɛi lɛ etswaa beni miteko shi kɛjɛko saa mli, ni ekomɛi lɛ etswaa shii enyɔ yɛ gbi lɛ mli.
Enɛ tsirɛ mi ni mijɔɔ mihe nɔ mihã Yehowa.
Yesu tsɔɔ yiŋtoo lɛ ekome mli beni ewie akɛ: “Je lɛ . . . nyɛɔ mi, ejaakɛ miyeɔ ehe odase akɛ enitsumɔi lɛ nitsumɔi fɔji ni.”
Lalatsɛ ni hi shi yɛ blema lɛ kɛɛ: “Shi mitsɛ kɛ minyɛ eshi mi moŋ, shi Yehowa hereɔ mi atuu.”
*+ Kɛ́ nɔ ko ba enɔ lɛ, gbalamɔ mitoi.
Shi David kɛɛ ehe akɛ: ‘Saul baagbe mi gbi ko yɛ bei nɛɛ amli.
Yuda kɛɛ osɔfoi lɛ akɛ: ‘Manyɛ matsɔɔ nyɛ bɔ ni nyɛaafee ni nyɛmɔ Yesu, kɛji akɛ nyɛha mi shika.
Ŋwɛibɔfo lɛ ni kɛ mi wieɔ lɛ hã mi hetoo akɛ: “Matsɔɔ bo mɛi ni amɛji.”
Ewoɔ mi edamɔɔ sɛi nɔ yɛ emasɛi ni mitsumɔɔ tsɛŋsii amli beni eshaa mli lɛ, ni etsɔɔ mi ŋmalɛi ni mikaseɔ miwoɔ miyitsoŋ, kɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lalai, loo sɔlemɔ lalai taakɛ wɔtsɛɔ amɛ lɛ lamɔ.
Kaashɛ́ mi ofɔ̃ yɛ migbɔlɛ be lɛŋ; kɛ́ mihewalɛ tã lɛ, kaakwa mi!”
Ni ji, hiɛshikalɔ fɛɛ hiɛshikalɔ ni boɔ mi toi lɛ, baakɛɛ mi akɛ,
+ 26 Kɛ́ ashwie amɛhiɛ shi yɛ misɛɛ ni amɛje lɛ hewɔ lɛ agbe naa lɛ,+ amɛbaaba amɛbahi shi yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ ni sane fɔŋ ko ninaŋ amɛ, ni mɔ ko mɔ ko woŋ amɛhe gbeyei.
Mileee nɔ ni ehiii fe fɛɛ—kɛji madamɔ nu mli gbi muu fɛɛ yɛ nɔ ni miihe ashɛ duŋ kabitii mli loo ni maŋmɛ mitsui shi yɛ piŋmɔ ni jɛɔ kanei wuji ni akpɛ́ yɛ minɔ tɛ̃ɛ jenamɔ muu lɛ fɛɛ mli.
32 Kɛkɛ ni enuŋtsɔ lɛ hã ayatsɛ lɛ kɛba ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: ‘Nyɔŋ fɔŋ, be ni okpa mi fai lɛ, mikɛ onyɔmɔ lɛ fɛɛ ke bo.
Shishijee lɛ, miwu sumɔɔɔ ni mishiɛɔ haa mɛi yɛ maŋ.
Mibo toi jogbaŋŋ oookɛɛ Yehowa kɛ mi miiwie tɛɛ.
Ekɛɛ ebɔfoi lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛji mɛi ni kɛ mi ehi shi yɛ mikaai lɛ amli; ni mi hu miito maŋtsɛyeli maha nyɛ taakɛ bɔ ni mitsɛ eto eha mi lɛ.”
Ann kɛɛ akɛ: “Oblahii kɛ oblayei babaoo ni tamɔ mi lɛ bɛ wekumɛi ni kpɛlɛɔ amɛ Kristofoi ahemɔkɛyeli lɛ nɔ.
26 Yesu hã amɛ hetoo ekɛɛ: “Lɛɛlɛŋ, lɛɛlɛŋ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, jeee okadii ni nyɛna lɛ hewɔ nyɛtaoɔ mi lɛ, shi moŋ, blodoi lɛ ni nyɛye ni nyɛtɔrɔ lɛ hewɔ ni.
Gbalɔ lɛ tee nɔ ejaje akɛ: “Ni miye, ni eŋɔɔmɔ tamɔ wo yɛ midaaŋ.”
“Naajɔlɛ wiemɔ . . . ŋɔɔ susuma naa, ni amɛhaa wui naa hewalɛ.”
Enyɛɔ ebaalɛ nakai kɛ shishinumɔ akɛ mɛi fɔji kɛ naadɔkɔbii tsĩmɔɔ awuiyeli he ŋaa ni amɛtsɔɔ yɛ mɛi ahe lɛ nɔ.
Kpóo ha mɛi ni tsɛɔ efɔŋ akɛ ekpakpa kɛ ekpakpa hu akɛ efɔŋ! mɛi ni ŋɔɔ duŋ feɔ la, ní amɛŋɔɔ la hu amɛfeɔ duŋ, mɛi ni ŋɔɔ joomɔ feɔ ŋɔɔmɔ, ní amɛŋɔɔ ŋɔɔmɔ amɛfeɔ joomɔ lɛ!”—Yesaia 5:18-20.
(Kpojiemɔ 7:9; Ezekiel 9:4) Mɛnɛɛmɛi hu kɛ ekaa jajeɔ sanekpakpa lɛ, amɛkɛ wiemɔi ni ŋɔɔ ni duromɔ yɔɔ mli tsɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛjianɔtoo ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ lɛ mli amɛhaa Kristofoi ni tamɔ gwantɛŋi lɛ.
Shi lɛ lɛ eleee akɛ mi miha lɛ abele kɛ wein kɛ mu lɛ, ni miha ejwiɛtɛi kɛ eshika ní amɛfiteɔ amɛhaa Baal lɛ fá ha lɛ lɛ!”—Hoshea 2:8-10.
Sanegbaai, kɛ lalai ni amɛlaa kɛ saŋku ni atswaa afataa lala lɛ he, kɛ naanyobɔɔ kpakpa mli ŋɔɔmɔ ni amɛnaa lɛ ha amɛna miishɛɛ kɛ hejɔɔmɔ babaoo diɛŋtsɛ.
Sɔlemɔi ni mli wa ni jɛɔ tsui mli lɛ tamɔ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ni jeɔ ŋma.
He ni amɛbɔ nsara yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ ji Mara, he ni Yehowa ha nu ní jooɔ lɛ tsɔ nuŋma yɛ lɛ.
33 Jɔɔ* mli sũ kukulii lɛ baaŋɔɔ enaa,+
10 Ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Nyɛyaa ni nyɛyayea nii kpakpai,* ni nyɛnua nii ni ŋɔɔ, ni nyɛkɛ niyenii lɛ eko amajea+ mɛi ni bɛ nɔ ko ni amɛbaaye lɛ; ejaakɛ gbi nɛɛ, gbi krɔŋkrɔŋ ni kɛhã wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ lɛ, ni nyɛkayea awerɛho ejaakɛ miishɛɛ ni Yehowa hãa anáa lɛ ji nyɛmɔɔ ni wa.”
12 Yɛ sɔlemɔi fɛɛ ni aŋmala yɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ ateŋ lɛ, nɔ ni tsɔɔ mɔ nii krɛdɛɛ ji sɔlemɔ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ ni Yesu Kristo kɛha ni tamɔ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ni eŋma ŋɔɔ lɛ.
5 No hewɔ lɛ, akɛ bii ni asumɔɔ lɛ, nyɛfea nyɛhe mɛi ni kaseɔ Nyɔŋmɔ,+ 2 ni nyɛyaa nɔ nyɛnyiɛa yɛ suɔmɔ mli,+ tamɔ bɔ ni Kristo lɛ hu sumɔ wɔ,*+ ni ekɛ ehe hã yɛ wɔhewɔ* akɛ nikeenii, kɛ afɔle, ni ji nibii ni jeɔ ŋma jogbaŋŋ ni akɛhã Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ.
Ni eŋɔɔ naakpa.
Ebaanyɛ eha mɔ ahao, ni ejwɛŋ nyɔɔŋ aaahu akɛ enaŋ wɔ kpakpa ewɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Nehemia ye ebua amɛ koni amɛná jwɛŋmɔ ni ja kɛtsɔ nɔ ni ewie nɛɛ nɔ akɛ: “Nyɛyaa ni nyɛyayea nii ni ewo fɔ, ni nyɛnua nii ni ŋɔɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ, ni nyɛkɛ eko amajea mɛi ni afeko nɔ ko atoko amɛ lɛ; ejaakɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ yɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ ha wɔ-Nuntsɔ lɛ, hewɔ lɛ nyɛwerɛ akahoa nyɛhe; ejaakɛ Yehowa he nyamɔ lɛ ji nyɛ hewalɛ.”
E-Wiemɔ lɛ kɛ nakai sɔlemɔi lɛ toɔ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma, nɔ ni kɛ́ ashã lɛ, eŋma ni ŋɔɔ lɛ kwɔɔ kɛyaa ŋwɛi lɛ he.
Ni ekɛɛ mi akɛ: Hemɔ ni oye, ni eeejoo yɛ omusuŋ, shi odaaŋ moŋ lɛ eeeŋɔɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ tamɔ wo.
Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Nitsulɔ lɛ, eye nii fioo jio, pii jio, ewɔ ŋɔɔ enaa; shi tɔ ni niiatsɛ tɔɔ lɛ haaa ewɔ.” —Jajelɔ 5:11.
12 Kɛji nɔ fɔŋ ŋɔɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ yɛ edaaŋ,
18 Nakai gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ, wain dɔkɔdɔkɔ baatsere kɛaajɛ gɔji lɛ anɔ,+
21. (a) Wolo bibioo lɛ mli sane lɛ ebafee nɔ ni ŋɔɔ asafo babaoo lɛ hu naa yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 2:1-41) Naa mlijɔlɛ ni ŋɔɔ ni aajie lɛ kpo yɛ gbɛ ni nɔ kwɔ fe fɛɛ nɔ!
Bɔ ni Ezekiel fee enii eha yɛ nitsumɔ ni akɛwo edɛŋ lɛ he lɛ ji nɔ ni ha wolokpo lɛ ŋɔɔ yɛ edaaŋ lɛ.
Kɛkɛ ni awo gbɔmɛi lɛ hewalɛ akɛ: “Nyɛyaa ni nyɛyayea nii ni ewo fɔ, ni nyɛnua nii ni ŋɔɔ dɔkɔdɔkɔ, ni nyɛkɛ eko amajea mɛi ni afeko nɔ ko atoko amɛ lɛ; ejaakɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ yɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ ha wɔ Nuntsɔ lɛ, hewɔ lɛ nyɛwerɛ akahoa nyɛhe, ejaakɛ Yehowa miishɛɛ ji nyɛ mɔ̃ɔ.”
Beni Yesu yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mɔ ko nyɛŋ aba miŋɔɔ, akɛ ja tsɛ lɛ ni tsu mi lɛ gbala lɛ dã . . .
Bɔni afee ni gbekɛbii ajo Abonsam tsɔnei lɛ anaa foi lɛ, esa akɛ amɛná amɛle Yehowa ni amɛbo lɛ toi.
Beni ekɛ Yohane wieɔ lɛ, kɛkɛ ni jamɔ mli hiɛnyiɛlɔi komɛi ba jɛmɛ.
• Te fee tɛŋŋ adesai bɔi amanehulu naa?
Biblia lɛ egba efɔ̃ shi yɛ hewalɛ ni Satan náa yɛ gbɔmɛi ni yɔɔ naagbee gbii nɛɛ amli lɛ anɔ lɛ he akɛ: “Kpóo ha mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ . . . lɛ! ejaakɛ abonsam lɛ ekpeleke shi kɛba nyɛŋɔɔ, egiri naakpa, ni ele akɛ be fioo kɛkɛ eyɔɔ.”
Mɛni lalatsɛ Asaf banu shishi?
21:9) Kuku 2 kɛyashi 4 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Ni mi, Yohane, mina maŋ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ni ji Yerusalem hee lɛ jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ yɛ ŋwɛi miikpeleke shi, ni ásaa lɛ tamɔ ayemforo ni áwula lɛ aha ewu.
Mɛni ji sɛɛnamɔ ni fe fɛɛ ni yɔɔ nikanemɔ mli?
Yesu fã ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ, kɛji okɛ onɔkeenɔ lɛ baaŋmɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ nɔ, ni okai yɛ jɛi akɛ onyɛmi kɛo teŋ yɛ sane ko lɛ, shi onɔkeenɔ lɛ yɛ jɛi yɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ hiɛ ní oya okɛ onyɛmi lɛ ayakpata dã, koni oba ní okɛ onɔkeenɔ lɛ abaha.”
Akɛni eji gbalɛ hewɔ lɛ, Yudafoi ni hi shi yɛ Ŋ.B. klɛŋklɛŋ afii oha lɛ mli lɛ miikpa Elia baa gbɛ koni ebaha eba mli.—Mateo 17:10.
Naagbee kwraa, yɛ afi 33 Ŋ.B. yɛ March naagbee gbɛ kɛmiimɔ April mli lɛ, agbɛnɛ be bashɛ ni abaaŋɔ gbɔmɔbi lɛ aha Henyɛlɔ lɛ koni etswa enanetsitsi nɔ̃.
9 Onesimo,+ minyɛmi nuu anɔkwafo ni misumɔɔ lɛ ni jɛ nyɛteŋ lɛ baafata ehe kɛba; amɛbaagba nyɛ nibii fɛɛ ni yaa nɔ yɛ biɛ lɛ.
Beni Yesu Baa yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli Anunyam Mli
Taakɛ atsɔɔ yɛ Mateo 16:27, 28 lɛ, beni ewieɔ ‘emaŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli ni eeeba’ lɛ he lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ: “Ejaakɛ gbɔmɔ Bi lɛ baaba yɛ e-Tsɛ anunyam lɛ mli kɛ ebɔfoi lɛ; ni no mli lɛ eeewo mɔ fɛɛ mɔ nyɔmɔ yɛ enitsumɔ naa.”
(Yohane 6:14, 15) Shikome ekoŋŋ lɛ, esa akɛ efee ekãa.
“Nɔ̃ ŋmɛlɛtswaa ni nyɛsusuuu lɛ nɔ gbɔmɔ bi lɛ baa.”—Mateo 24:44.
8 Sane ko ni kɔɔ oblayei enyɔ komɛi ni jɛ musuŋ kome mli lɛ ahe lɛ haa wɔnaa nɔ̃ kroko hu ni saa nɔ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsu yɛ asafo lɛ mli lɛ he.
(Jajelɔ 9:5, 10; Hebribii 11:35) Ani amɛkɛ Yesu baapue beni ebaa yɛ ŋwɛi anunyam mli lɛ?
Naagbai krɛdɛɛ tamɔ naagbai ni gbekɛbii kɛkpeɔ yɛ skul, nyiɛmɔ ni tsɔɔ gbalashihilɛ hiɛ, skul sɛɛ nifeemɔi, kɛ ekrokomɛi ni tamɔ nakai teɔ shi.
(Lala 90:10) Adesai awala tamɔ jwɛi fɔ́, etamɔ hɔɔŋ ni hoɔ, ni asaŋ etamɔ kɔɔyɔɔ.
Shi amɛbaaa ni amɛbakwɛ nibii fɛfɛji kɛkɛ.
(Yesaia 43:10-12) Kɛfata he lɛ, wɔkɛ wɔhe woɔ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli akɛni wɔbale Yehowa sui kɛ egbɛ̀i lɛ hewɔ.
Saakɛ mɛi ale egbɛi lɛ.
(Luka 9:52-56) Kɛ́ ofee nakai lɛ, obaasa Yehowa, “mɔ ni sumɔɔ akɛ ehere gbɔmɛi fɛɛ yiwala, koni amɛshɛ anɔkwale lɛ lee mli” lɛ hiɛ.—1 Timoteo 2:4.
Ní mibɛŋkɛ amɛ lɛ, mina akɛ Yehowa Odasefoi ni, ni amɛmiima Maŋtsɛyeli Asa.
Ehiɛ sɔ nɔ ni enanemɛi lɛ feɔ lɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ, ni etsɛɛɛ ni ebɔi nakai nɔŋŋ feemɔ.
Bo hu obaanyɛ okɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ anyiɛ akɛ onaanyo taakɛ Noa fee lɛ.
Akɛ nɔ hee kwraa ebafata sane ni akɛ naanyo loo mɔ ko ni ale lɛ gbaa lɛ he: bo diɛŋtsɛ ohe yijiemɔ.”
(Abɛi 13:20) Kɛɛmɔ onanemɛi lɛ ofai shi ni otswa akɛ obaakutɔ odãanumɔ lɛ mli.
Kɛ́ ekɛ enaagbee kpe lɛ, abaanyɛ etsutsu nanemɛi kɛ nitsumɔ mli hefatalɔi lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii anɔ ni amɛbaadamɔ sɛɛ fɛlɛŋŋ ni amɛbaakwɛ bɔ ni Yehowa wiemɔ baa mli lɛ ní amɛnyɛɛɛ nɔ ko amɛfee yɛ he.—Yeremia 25:31-33; Kpojiemɔ 17:15-18; 18:9-19.
4 Kɛ́ abaptisi bo lɛ, no hãa mɛi naa akɛ oosumɔ ni otsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ naanyo lɛɛlɛŋ, ni oosumɔ ni osɔmɔ lɛ.
Kɛ́ weku lɛ feɔ ekome kɛsɔleɔ, ni amɛwieɔ wiemɔi ni tsɔɔ akɛ amɛhiɛ sɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ekpakpafeemɔ lɛ, ebaaha gbekɛbii lɛ ana akɛ ehe miihia waa ni amɛkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ afee amɛ-Naanyo.”
Kɛ́ okɛ watsi ni jara wa, kar, loo shia po ke onaanyo ko lɛ, nakai naanyo lɛ baada shi ni ebaaná miishɛɛ, ni obaaná miishɛɛ ni yɔɔ nɔhamɔ mli lɛ.
Makarios kɛ woji ni efee lɛ ekomɛi maje enanemɛi ni kpɛlɛɔ nɔ lɛ.
Ni mɛni bo loo onaanyo oblanyo loo oblayoo ko baanyɛ akase yɛ sane nɛɛ mli?
Nɔ ni ba Daina nɔ lɛ hãa wɔnaa nɔ hewɔ ni esa akɛ wɔhala nanemɛi kpakpai lɛ.
4 Yesu kɛ ekaselɔi lɛ yeee akɛ mɛi ni baa shi fe lɛ, shi moŋ lɛ ekɛ amɛ ye akɛ eshieŋtsɛmɛi.
Esa akɛ wɔkɛ shishitoo mla kome too lɛ nɔŋŋ atsu nii: esaaa akɛ wɔkuɔ wɔhiɛ wɔfɔ̃ɔ saji anɔ kɛ́ wɔkɛ wɔnanemɛi miiye shi kɛ́ eshɛ mɛi ni jeee wɔnanemɛi anɔ lɛ, kɛkɛ lɛ wɔfee kpɛŋŋ.
Yolanda naanyo ko ní afɔɔ lɛ tsɛmɔ akɛ Dito ni miikase mla he nii yɛ skul lɛ hu bɔi Biblia lɛ kasemɔ ni ekɛ wɔ bɔi kpeei yaa.
Bei pii lɛ wɔnuɔ ni mɛi ni he efee shoo ni amɛmiitaoɔ mɛi amɛkɛbɔ nanemɛi lɛ miikɛɛ akɛ, “mibɛ mɔ ko ni mikɛgbaa sane,” “minyɛɛɛ mahe mɔ ko mɔ ko maye,” aloo “migbee ji minaanyo ni hi fe fɛɛ.”
Eji nɔ ni kanya nikaselɔi lɛ kɛ amɛwekumɛi kɛ nanemɛi ni yɔɔ toibolɔi lɛ ateŋ ni boɔ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi ni he esa ni yɔɔ niiashikpamɔ nɛɛ atoi beni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛtsɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ni maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ haa mɔ tsui nyɔɔ mɔ mli lɛ.
Suɔmɔ ni wɔyɔɔ kɛha lɛ lɛ mli baawa beni wɔhaa sanebimɔ nɛɛ hetoo yɛ nikasemɔ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli lɛ.
Kɛkɛ ni gbi ko yɛ afi 1959 lɛ, Nyɛminuu Schroeder tswa Gilead klas ni ji 34 lɛ adafi akɛ, enaanyo ni esumɔɔ lɛ lɛ efɔ́ haaji, nuu kome kɛ yoo kome.
Abu lɛ jalɔ kɛ jwɛŋmɔ akɛ agbɛnɛ ebaatsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ shieŋtsɛ!
1, 2. (a) Mɛni hewɔ wɔhiɛ sɔɔ nanemɛi ni yeɔ anɔkwa ni kɛ eshai faa lɛ?
Be ko beni enyɛɛɛ etsu gbɛtsɔɔmɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛha lɛ akɛ ekɛ mɛi lɛ awie lɛ he nii lɛ, eha enaanyo Baruk yatsu he nii.
(Yuda 7) Kɛfata he lɛ, hii ni jɛ maŋ lɛ mli lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi etsɛ oblayei lɛ ahe baa, ni no hewɔ lɛ ekolɛ mɛi ni baatsɔmɔ eshaahiimɛi lɛ awekumɛi, amɛnanemɛi, loo amɛnanemɛi nitsulɔi fata asafo lɛ he.
Ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ oŋmɛ shwane loo gbɛkɛ okpɔlɔ lɛ, kaatsɛ onanemɛi loo onyɛmimɛi loo owekumɛi loo okutsoŋ niiatsɛmɛi.
Shi ená nanemɛi kpakpai ni wa lɛ.
Mikpɛlɛ anɔkwale lɛ nɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ, ni wɔtsɔmɔ nanemɛi.
Yɛ be mli ni nyɛfee ekome kɛye be ko yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli sɛɛ lɛ, nyɛgbaa bɔ ni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛna Yehowa mlihilɛ lɛ he sane.
10 Ejaakɛ “mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ wala, ni eesumɔ ni eye gbii kpakpai pii lɛ, ebu elilɛi he kɛje efɔŋ he,+ kɛ enaabu hu, ni ekalaka mɛi.
Nakai nɔŋŋ hu, eyɛ mli akɛ anaaa Nuŋtsɔ Yesu moŋ, shi abaajie lɛ kpo tamɔ ‘lalilɛi yɛ be mli ni ekɛ oweletɔɔ baa mɛi ni booo ehe sanekpakpa lɛ toi lɛ anɔ lɛ.’
(Yohane 13:34, 35; Kolosebii 3:14; Hebribii 10:24, 25) Kɛfata he lɛ, amɛmiikase ŋaa nitsumɔi yɛ tsumaa, ɛlɛktrɔnik tsɔnei, woji akalamɔ, kɛ nitsumɔi krokomɛi amli bɔni afee ni amɛkɛfi “sanekpakpa” shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ sɛɛ.
Shulamit oblayoo lɛ naabu ni akɛto wò-agbaku he, kɛ elilɛi hu ni akɛɛ wò kɛ fufɔ yɛ shishi lɛ fɛɛ maa nɔ mi akɛ edaaŋ wiemɔ he tse ni eŋɔɔ.
14 Esa akɛ wɔkase Biblia lɛ kɛ asafo lɛ woji lɛ daa, ni wɔtao nibii amli fitsofitso.
Nɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni Yesu baanyɛ atsu—kɛha helatsɛmɛi, mɛi ni daimonioi haoɔ amɛ, ohiafoi, loo mɛi ni hɔmɔ yeɔ amɛ lɛ po ji—ni eye ebua amɛ ni amɛle, ni amɛkpɛlɛ, ni amɛsumɔ anɔkwale ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he lɛ nɔ.
Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔkɛ hiɛshikamɔ ahala wɔnanemɛi?
Ni kɛlɛ enyɛ eŋma Kolosebii lɛ akɛ: “Ejaakɛ kɛ mikɛ nyɛ bɛ yɛ heloo gbɛfaŋ jiŋŋ, mumɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ, mikɛ nyɛ yɛ, ni mimii shɛɔ, ni minaa nyɛ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ kɛ nyɛhé ni nyɛheɔ Kristo nɔ nyɛyeɔ lɛ shifimɔ lɛ.”
Yesu na mɛi ni eshiɛ eha amɛ lɛ tamɔ tooi ni yelikɛbuamɔ he miihia amɛ, ni ekɛ enɛ fee nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa eha wɔ.
5 Nyɛkãa He Nyɛtsua Nitsumɔ Nɛɛ: Nyɛhaa wɔtaoa gbɛ̀i anɔ ni wɔɔtsɔ ni wɔgba sanekpakpa lɛ he sane wɔtsɔɔ gbɔmɛi anɔkwafoi babaoo—yɛ amɛshiai amli, yɛ gbɛjegbɛi anɔ, yɛ tɛlifoŋ nɔ, kɛ kɛtsɔ trukaa odaseyeli nɔ.
Mɛni ji sanekpakpa lɛ?
Sɔlemɔ kɛ naanyobɔɔ kpakpa yeɔ buaa ni ayeɔ he ni feɔ shoo nɔ kunim yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Eji sanekpakpa kɛha “jeŋmaji fɛɛ.”
Kɛ́ weku lɛ feɔ ekome kɛsɔleɔ, ni amɛwieɔ wiemɔi ni tsɔɔ akɛ amɛhiɛ sɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ekpakpafeemɔ lɛ, ebaaha gbekɛbii lɛ ana akɛ ehe miihia waa ni amɛkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ afee amɛ-Naanyo.”
No hewɔ lɛ, yiŋtoo kpakpa hewɔ ni Saul báa Kenbii lɛ ayi lɛ.
Susumɔ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ nɛɛ he okwɛ: Asraafonyo nukpa ko ni tsuɔ enitsumɔ jogbaŋŋ lɛ tsu esraafonyo ni he esa fe fɛɛ lɛ kɛtee henyɛlɔi lɛ ŋsara mli koni eyatsu nitsumɔ ko ni yɔɔ oshara waa he nii.
+ 18 Kɛɛmɔ amɛ ni amɛtsu nitsumɔ kpakpa, amɛteke nɔ yɛ nitsumɔi kpakpai amli, amɛfee ejurɔ,* amɛsumɔ nihãmɔ,+ 19 koni amɛkɛbua jwetri naa shweshweeshwe amɛhã amɛhe ni efee faneshi kpakpa kɛhã wɔsɛɛ,+ koni amɛmɔ wala diɛŋtsɛ lɛ mli kpɛŋŋ.
Mɛɛ yiŋtoi kpakpai ahewɔ esa akɛ wɔya nɔ wɔsɔmɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ lɛ nɔkwɛlɔi lɛ?
Ani amɛyasusu akɛ kɛ́ amɛkpɛlɛ woo ni mɛi lɛ kɛhãa amɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ, no baahã mɛi babaoo abo sane kpakpa lɛ toi?
Eji anɔkwale akɛ, kɛ́ wɔba wɔjeŋ jogbaŋŋ lɛ, ewoɔ Yehowa hiɛ nyam, ni enɛ ji nɔ ni he hiaa fe fɛɛ.—1 Pet.
Nɔ ni he hiaa wɔ diɛŋtsɛ ji saatso kpakpa, okpɔlɔ, kɛ hiamɔ nibii fioo krokomɛi.
Kɛlɛ, ejeee wolo ko ni kanemɔ ŋɔɔ kɛkɛ, shi moŋ ehaa sanebimɔi tamɔ: Mɛni hewɔ mɛi kpakpai naa nɔ̃?
Ajinafoi lɛ kwɛɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sane kpakpa lɛ ni ashiɛɔ yɛ nitsumɔhe nine lɛ shikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli lɛ nɔ, ni amɛkwɛɔ koni ato asafoi kɛ kpokpai ashishi bɔ ni afee ni akɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ni sa ahã nyɛmimɛi lɛ.
“Nyɛnyɛ̃a nɔ̃ fɔŋ, ní nyɛsumɔa nɔ̃ kpakpa, ní nyɛhaa jalɛ saneyeli adamɔa shi yɛ koi shi.”
“NYƆŊMƆ, bɔ ni ogbɛi lɛ yɔɔ lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ oyijiemɔ lɛ yɔɔ kɛyashi shikpɔŋ lɛ naagbee hei lɛ.”
Aaafee afii 40 loo nɔ̃ ni eho nɛ, ni Ŋleshi shihemɔ maŋ nɛɛ eda kɛjɛ ŋshɔŋ lɛji adaamɔ he ni nitsumɔ ko eyaaa nɔ tsɔ yɛ jɛmɛ kɛyashɛ nɔ ni ena nii babaoo ni he hiaa hu, ni jeee yɛ Asia Wuoyi-bokagbɛ pɛ, shi moŋ yɛ jeŋ muu fɛɛ nitsumɔ mli saji amli hu.
4 Esa akɛ wɔhiɛ akã shi be fɛɛ be bɔni afee ni sɔɔmɔ hegbɛi ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ní wɔnine baanyɛ ashɛ nɔ lɛ akaŋmɛɛ wɔ.
(Lala 74:12) No mli lɛ, Yehowa maŋtsɛyeli lɛ yɛ kɛjɛ blema po ni fe nakai, no hewɔ lɛ te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni ŋwɛi lalatsɛmɛi lɛ aaala akɛ “Yehowa . . . eje shishi eeye maŋtsɛ” lɛ?
5 Koni amɛkanu ni amɛhiɛ kpa mla lɛ nɔ
(5 Mose 6:6, 7) No hewɔ lɛ, ehe miihia ni fɔlɔi afee nibii enyɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ obaanyɛ obasara onaanyo ko nakai beaŋ ni oye obua lɛ ni eye nii.”
21 No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ mɔ ko tsi ehe kwraa kɛje nibii ni hiɛ bɛ nyam lɛ ahe lɛ, ebaatsɔ dɛŋdade* ni akɛfeɔ nii ni hiɛ yɔɔ nyam, nɔ ni atsuu he, ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ kɛhã nɔtsɛ lɛ, ni asaa lɛ ahã nitsumɔ kpakpa fɛɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa.
Yesu wala jara wa aahu akɛ Yehowa baanyɛ adamɔ Yesu afɔle lɛ nɔ ehã adesai fɛɛ ni baatsɔɔ akɛ amɛheɔ Yesu nɔ amɛyeɔ lɛ ahi shi kɛya naanɔ.
Nakai nɔŋŋ kɛji akɛ wɔkɛ jamɔi sɔrɔtoi lɛ to he lɛ wɔbaanyɛ wɔtao amɛtsɔɔmɔi, blema saji, kusum nifeemɔi, gbɛjianɔtoi kɛ emli nibii krokomɛi lɛ amli, koni wɔkwɛ akɛ ani wɔbaana shishijee nibii pɔtɛɛ komɛi ni je amɛhe ni anaa yɛ jamɔi lɛ fɛɛ amli lo, ni kɛji nakai ni lɛ, nɔ ni nakai nibii ni anaa yɛ fɛɛ mli lɛ nyiɛɔ wɔhiɛ kɛyaa he.
Amɛjɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛsuɔmɔ mli amɛkɔ nakai gbɛ lɛ, no hewɔ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋmɛ gbɛ.
Eshwɛ fioo ko pɛ dani eshɛ he, shi kɛlɛ eshɛɛɛ he.
(Galatabii 5:22, 23) Eyɛ mli akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ osusuuu he nakai moŋ, shi beni be shwieɔ mli lɛ nibii baahi.
Ekolɛ, efee nakai koni ekɛha Hawa anu he akɛ ehe hiaa waa, ní eyitsoŋ afuu—oookɛɛ Hawa ji lɛ Hawa lɛ kɛ ewu naawielɔ.
Yɛ yiŋ ni aka awie nɛɛ naa lɛ, akɛni amɛlaa lamɔi ni kɔɔ amɛsuɔlɔi ni egboi lɛ ahe yɛ bei babaoo mli hewɔ lɛ, amɛsusu akɛ susuma lɛ yaa nɔ ehiɔ shi yɛ gbele sɛɛ, akɛ eshiɔ gbɔmɔtso lɛ mli ni eyahiɔ tsei, tɛsaai, faai kɛ nibii krokomɛi amli.
+ Shi bo lɛ, obaanyɛ, ejaakɛ nyɔŋmɔi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ amumɔ yɛ omli.’
Afrikayoo ko kɛ yiŋtoo kroko hewɔ ni fɔlɔi kɛ amɛbii egbaaa bɔlɛnamɔ he sane lɛ ha: “Beni miji gbekɛ lɛ, mifɔlɔi ni ji Odasefoi lɛ kɛ mi egbaaa bɔlɛnamɔ he saji, no hewɔ lɛ ebako mijwɛŋmɔ mli pɛŋ akɛ mikɛ mibii agba enɛɛmɛi ahe saji.”
No hewɔ lɛ, amɛtsĩɛ lɛ ni amɛkɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Tsɔɔlɔ, ni wɔhiɛ miihe akpãtã nɛɛ, ani jeee ohe sane ko ni lo?”
No hewɔ lɛ amlakui lɛ bi lɛ akɛ: ‘Mɛni wɔfee bo koni ahum lɛ akpa tswaa?’
Esa akɛ eshɛre la koni ehoo niyenii bibioo ko—ekolɛ no ji naagbee niyenii ni ekɛ ebinuu fioo lɛ baaye.
Esa akɛ nitsulɔi anɔkwɛlɔi ni shwieɔ mɛi yɛ nitsumɔ mli lɛ ale bɔ ni amɛaafee amɛkɛɛ “shɛɛ sane ni mli wa nɛɛ ni emli akã shi faŋŋ, efee kuku ni ŋaalee ahi mli, ni eha woo ni mɔ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ ahi shi pɛpɛɛpɛ,” taakɛ The Vancouver Sun lɛ bɔɔ amaniɛ lɛ.
Yɛ enɛ ni yɔɔ wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli hewɔ lɛ, wɔsaa wɔhe jogbaŋŋ, ni wɔsɔleɔ wɔbiɔ Yehowa jɔɔmɔ koni nɔ ni wɔɔbaakɛɛ agbɛnɛ lɛ atee miishɛɛ shi.
Emaŋtiase ji Ninive, ni ebahe gbɛi gbonyo waa yɛ niseniianii ni efeɔ nomii lɛ mli aahu akɛ abatsɛ maŋ lɛ akɛ “lashishwiemɔ maŋ.”
Yesaia etsɔɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ní amɛfee nakai yɛ be nɛɛ mli lɛ, shi ewiemɔi lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ akpɛlɛɛɛ amɛnɔ.
Taakɛ bɔ ni nitsulɔi ni yɔɔ Yerusalem lɛ tsake bɔ ni amɛtsuɔ nii lɛ amɛhaa lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ hu ŋmɛnɛ, kɛ́ ate shi awo Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ, amɛtsɔɔ ŋaa gbɛ nɔ amɛtsakeɔ gbɛ̀i anɔ ni amɛtsɔɔ amɛshiɛɔ lɛ.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni wɔɔkojo mɛi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ akɛ amɛji mɛi ni nyɛŋ abatsɔ Yehowa jálɔi kɔkɔɔkɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔná jwɛŋmɔ kpakpa yɛ amɛhe, “ejaakɛ sá lɛ wɔ hu wɔfee wɔhe kwashiai, toigbolɔi, [kɛ] gbɛdulɔi.”
6 Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ wɔɔtsɔ wɔná nɔ ni Paulo ŋma kɛyaha Tito lɛ he sɛɛ?
Wɔjeee mɛi komɛi ni yɔɔ srɔto. . . .
Kɛ́ wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ Wɔbo Yehowa toi,
Nɛkɛ ji bɔ ni suɔmɔ lɛ yɔɔ, jeee akɛ wɔ wɔsumɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, shi moŋ akɛ lɛ esumɔ wɔ ni etsu e-Bi lɛ akɛ kpatamɔ afɔle yɛ wɔhe eshai lɛ ahewɔ.” —1 Yohane 4:9, 10.
Wɔnaa hegbɛ akɛ wɔkɛ gbɔmɛi ni hiɔ shi yɛ amɛ hemɔkɛyeli naa lɛ aaafutu, yɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli.
Akɛni wɔyɔɔ Yesu Maŋtsɛyeli nɔyeli lɛ afi ni ji 83 lɛ mli hewɔ lɛ, ekolɛ mɛi komɛi baanu he akɛ wɔyɛ shishashaomɔ be mli amrɔ nɛɛ.
Esa akɛ wɔyasara asafoi ni yɔɔ Greece maŋ-te-lɛŋ kɛ kooyigbɛ lɛ ni wɔwo amɛ hewalɛ.
Te esa akɛ wɔtsu mɛi krokomɛi atɔ̃mɔi ahe nii wɔha tɛŋŋ?

Toiŋjɔlɛ ni Aaaha Efa yɛ Jwɛŋmɔ lɛ Mli

Naakpɛɛ Nifeemɔi ni Okɛ Ohiŋmɛi Ena Pɛŋ!

Adebɔɔ yɛ Naakpɛɛ
Mɛni akɛ naakpɛɛ nii ni Yesu kɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ fee lɛ tsu?
40 15 Efee E-Klɛŋklɛŋ Naakpɛɛ Nii
Yɛ hemɔkɛyeli ni yoo okulafo lɛ jie lɛ kpo hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa tsɔ Elia nɔ efee naakpɛɛ nii ko, ni ehe ba sɛɛnamɔ eha yoo okulafo lɛ be saŋŋ.
(1 Korintobii 13:8-13) Yɛ gbii nɛɛ amli lɛ, wɔnaaa naakpɛɛ nii diɛŋtsɛ yɛ faŋŋ mli.
Wɔnyɛŋ naakpɛɛ nii wɔfee, shi wɔbaanyɛ wɔba wɔhe shi, wɔjie suɔmɔ kpo, ní wɔmusuŋ atsɔ wɔ yɛ mɛi ahewɔ—ni enɛɛmɛi ji sui ní gbalaa mɛi kɛbaa anɔkwale lɛ mli.
Beni Yesu shiɛɔ yɛ Galilea lɛ, efee naakpɛɛ nibii, ekɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ he gbɛtsɔɔmɔi ha bɔfoi 12 lɛ, ekpa Farisifoi lɛ ahe mama, ni ekɛ abɛbuai ni gbala Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he nibii lɛ amli tsu nii.
Be ni Yesu feɔ naakpɛɛ nii yɛ Galilea lɛ, mɛi kɛ sane fɔ̃ enɔ akɛ daimonioi lɛ anɔyelɔ lɛ hewalɛ ekɛfeɔ nakai lɛ.
Mɛni hewɔ Yesu efeee naakpɛɛ nii ko yɛ Kaimɔ aboloo lɛ kɛ wein lɛ he lɛ?
( 2 Petro 1:16-18) Kaselɔi Yudafoi ni ji Petro, Yakobo, kɛ Yohane na naakpɛɛ nii ni ji Yesu tsakemɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ni amɛnu Nyɔŋmɔ nɔkpɛlɛmɔ gbee ni jɛ ŋwɛi lɛ.
Naakpɛɛ Nii Ba Yɛ Ŋshɔ Tsuru Lɛ Naa
Yɛ nyɔji ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ amli lɛ, hii nɛɛ bo Yesu toi, amɛna naakpɛɛ nii komɛi ni efee, bɔ ni ehiɛ dɔɔ yɛ jalɛ nii ahe, kɛ bɔ ni mɛi nyaa enitsɔɔmɔ lɛ he waa lɛ.
6 Be ni Yesu kɛ ebɔfoi lɛ yeɔ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ Gbɛkɛ Niyeli lɛ, etsɔɔɔ naakpɛɛ gbɛ ko nɔ ehãaa aboloo lɛ atsɔ eheloo, ní wein lɛ hu atsɔ elá.
No hewɔ lɛ, aakai wɔ yɛ naakpɛɛ nii ni Elia kɛ Mose fee lɛ ahe.—4 Mose 16:31-34; 1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 17:1; 2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 1:9-12.
Klɛŋklɛŋ Nii ni Yɔɔ “Naakpɛɛ”

(1 Tesalonikabii 4: 14-17) Enɛ kɛ Kristo wiemɔi ni ekɛ ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi 11 lɛ wie lɛ kpaa gbee, akɛ: “Kɛji mitee ni miyasaa gbɛhe mito nyɛ lɛ, mibaba ekoŋŋ ni mibabaŋɔ nyɛ kɛya he ni mi diɛŋtsɛ miyɔɔ lɛ, koni he ni miyɔɔ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛhi jɛi.” —Yohane 14:3.
Ni kɛji mitee ni miyasaa gbɛhe mito nyɛ lɛ, mibaba ekoŋŋ, ni mibabaŋɔ nyɛ kɛya he ni mi diɛŋtsɛ miyɔɔ lɛ, koni he ni miyɔɔ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛhi jɛi.”
Nɔ ni Paulo tsɔɔ ji akɛ, ‘Yɛ nɔ ni mitsɔ hiɛ mikɛɛ nyɛ amrɔ nɛɛ nɔŋŋ hewɔ lɛ, miikpa nyɛ fai ni nyɛfee nɔ ni makɛɛ nyɛ agbɛnɛ lɛ.’
Beni ekɛ “bɔfoi agboi” ni yɔɔ Korinto asafo lɛ mli lɛ yeɔ lɛ, ewo nyɛmimɛi lɛ hewalɛ akɛ: “Shi mi Paulo diɛŋtsɛ miikpa nyɛ fai yɛ Kristo mlijɔlɛ kɛ kpoofeemɔ lɛ hewɔ: mi, ni nyɛhiɛ lɛ miji humi yɛ nyɛteŋ, shi kɛ mibɛ nyɛŋɔɔ lɛ, mijeɔ ekãa miwoɔ nyɛ lɛ.”
Nyɛnu akɛ mikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, miiya ni maba nyɛŋɔɔ.

Amɛ fɛɛ amɛmii shɛ amɛhe babaoo diɛŋtsɛ.
Etsɛɛɛ ni abaptisi lɛ akɛ Maŋtsɛyeli jajelɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ eji woji lɛ ateŋ nɔ ni etsɛ fe fɛɛ moŋ, shi Biblia lɛ kɛ ŋaawoo ni anyɛɔ atsuɔ he nii haa kɛha ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ shihilɛ kɛ weku shihilɛ ni miishɛɛ yɔɔ mli.”

19 Yei lɛ hu kɛɛ akɛ: “Ni be ni wɔshãa afɔlei ni wɔfɔseɔ dãa afɔlei wɔshwieɔ shi wɔhãa Ŋwɛi Maŋnyɛ* lɛ, ani wɔwumɛi lɛ leee he eko dani wɔfee afɔleshaa keekii ni su tamɔ Ŋwɛi Maŋnyɛ* lɛ, ni wɔfɔse dãa afɔlei wɔshwie shi wɔhã lɛ lɛ?”
Shi gbɛtsii nii kroko ba yɛ March 1, 1835, beni Maŋnyɛ Ranavalona I gu Kristojamɔ ni efã akɛ, akɛ Kristofoi awoji fɛɛ abaha maŋ onukpai lɛ.

16 Kɛkɛ ni Memukan kɛɛ yɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛ lumɛi lɛ ahiɛ akɛ: “Jeee maŋtsɛ lɛ pɛ nɔ Maŋnyɛ Vashti etɔ̃,+ etɔ̃ lumɛi lɛ kɛ mɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ Maŋtsɛ Ahasweros kpokpai lɛ fɛɛ anɔ lɛ nɔ.
