19 Hadad hiɛ ba nyam yɛ Farao hiɛ aahu akɛ ekɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ eŋa Tapenes, ni ji maŋnyɛ* lɛ nyɛmi yoo hã Hadad gbãla.
Ashwie nakai wɔŋjamɔ ni Ahab kɛ eŋa Maŋnyɛ Yezebel wo he hewalɛ yɛ Israel akutsei nyɔŋma maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli lɛ hiɛ shi kpɔtɔɔ.
* 4 Ni oblayoo ni maŋtsɛ lɛ baaná ehe miishɛɛ fe fɛɛ lɛ baatsɔ maŋnyɛ yɛ Vashti najiaŋ.”
Be kroko lɛ, maŋsɛɛ shiɛlɔi lɛ kɛɛ maŋnyɛ lɛ akɛ, amɛyɛ nibii pii lolo ni amɛbaatsɔɔ maŋbii lɛ ní Hela kɛ Hebri wiemɔ fata he, shi ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Jeee Hela kɛ Hebri wiemɔ lɛ ji nɔ ni he hiaa mi, shi moŋ masumɔ ni male kɛji nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛtsɔɔ mimaŋbii lɛ nɔ ko ni sɛɛnamɔ yɔɔ he, tamɔ samalafeemɔ.”
Beni Israel Manyɛ Izebel, mɔ ni kɛ shɛiifeemɔ woɔ Baal jamɔ he hewalɛ lɛ nu akɛ Elia egbe Baal gbalɔi lɛ, etswa efai shi akɛ ebaagbe lɛ.
Maŋnyɛ lɛ po wie ehe akɛ Daniel, ekɛ Babilonia gbɛi ni be ko lɛ akɛha lɛ lɛ tsuuu nii.
Israelbii ni yɔɔ Mizraim lɛ ahiɛ kã nɔ akɛ “ŋwɛi maŋnyɛ” lɛ, nyɔŋmɔyoo ni ajáa lɛ yɛ hei babaoo yɛ blema Boka Teŋgbɛ lɛ —kɛ heloo gbɛfaŋ shweremɔ baaha amɛ.
Maŋnyɛ Yezebel hã kooyigbɛ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli bii lɛ kɛ amɛhe wo amale jamɔ mli waa.
Kɛ oshɛ helatsamɔhe lɛ, ekolɛ datrɛfoi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome baakɛɛ bo akɛ helatsamɔhei bibii fioo komɛi yɛ nsara lɛ mli, he ni atsuɔ naagbai bibii ahe nii yɛ; ni ahaa akɛ osharai ni eba mɔ nɔ kɛ naagbai ni mli wa he saji yaa helatsamɔhe lɛ.
Datrɛfonyo ko bɛ ni miitsu nii, ni helatsɛmɛi akwɛlɔi lɛ fɛɛ etee niyeli henaabuamɔ ko.
Datrɛfonyo ní kwɛ mi lɛ naa kpɛ ehe waa.
Kɛ egbaaa helatsɛ ko naa tete po lɛ, te ebaafee tɛŋŋ ni Kristofonyo datrɛfonyo ko ni yɔɔ hegbɛ lɛ kɛ famɔ baaha koni aha mɔ ko lá loo afite musu, yɛ be mli ni ele nɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛɔ yɛ saji nɛɛ ahe?
Amɛkɛɔ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛhe akɛ, “eji miha eyana datrɛfonyo lɛ mra kulɛ,” aloo “eji miha eyana datrɛfonyo kroko kulɛ,” aloo “eji miha ekwɛ egbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ nɔ jogbaŋŋ kulɛ, egboŋ.”
Ŋɔɔ lɛ akɛ datrɛfoi lɛ kɛɛ esa akɛ aha lɛ lá, kɛ́ jeee nakai lɛ ebaagbo.
Amrɔ nɛɛ, datrɛfoi yɛ gbɛi kɛ tsɔji krɛdɛi komɛi ni amɛkɛtsuɔ nii kɛkwɛɔ helatsɛ ko tsui beni eetswa lɛ, ni no haa amɛnaa bɔ ni tsui lɛ yɔɔ diɛŋtsɛ.
“Mitsɔ nifeemɔi srɔtoi amli —mifee shikpilikpii, miheee miyeee, minu he akɛ miyeɔ fɔ, ni mimli fu miwu kɛ datrɛfonyo lɛ akɛni eyooo shihilɛ ni hiɛdɔɔ yɔɔ mli ni gbekɛ lɛ yɔɔ mli lɛ hewɔ.”
11 Yɛ kpee ko ni afee yɛ afi ni ho lɛ mli lɛ, tsofafeemɔ mli onukpai ni jɛ Canada, Europa, Israel, kɛ United States susu nɔ ko ni ato he gbɛjianɔ koni eye ebua datrɛfoi ni amɛkwɛ helatsɛmɛi ni amɛkɛ lá tsuuu nii lɛ he.
Kɛkɛ ni datrɛfonyo ko kɛ helatsɛmɛi akwɛlɔ ko saa amɛhe koni amɛha lɛ la.
Mɛɛ be esa akɛ Kristofonyo kɛ edatrɛfonyo awie eyiŋkpɛɛ akɛ ebaatsi ehe kɛjɛ lá he lɛ he?
Bɔ ni gbɔmɛi sumɔɔ ni amɛle nɔ ni yɔɔ wɔsɛɛ be lɛ haa mɛi pii yabiɔ ashwai-afeelɔi, jamɔ he nilelɔi, ŋulamiiaŋkwɛlɔi, kɛ okɔmfoi anii.
Eyitso ŋoŋo gba, ni datrɛfoi lɛ bɛ nɔmimaa akɛ amɛbaanyɛ amɛbaa ewala yi.
Amɛteŋ mɛi ni yɔɔ nyɛmɔ lɛ shiɛɔ amɛhaa datrɛfoi, mɛi ni basaraa amɛ, kɛ mɛi krokomɛi.
Akrowa ni bɛŋkɛ amɛ fe fɛɛ, ni yɔɔ datrɛfonyo, skul, kɛ shwapo ni da saŋŋ ni anyɛɔ ayeɔ jara yɛ mli lɛ, heɔ ŋmɛlɛtswai etɛ kɛ́ akɛ tsɔne miiya jɛmɛ.
Esa akɛ datrɛfoi asusu naataamɔ saji ni tamɔ nɛkɛ he tamɔ: Ani esa akɛ akwa tsofafeemɔ mli helatsamɔ ni akɛtutuaa mɔ lɛ yɛ bei komɛi amli, koni helatsɛ lɛ anyɛ agbo kɛ bulɛ?
Beni Mary hiɛ ebi ni ji etɛ lɛ musu lɛ, datrɛfonyo lɛ wo lɛ hewalɛ koni eha afite musu lɛ.
Nɔ ni je enijiaŋ wui ji akɛ, datrɛfoi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ hu kpoo akɛ amɛaafee opireshɛn ni lá fataaa he.
Datrɛfonyo ni kwɛɔ lɛ lɛ bi lɛ be ko akɛ: “Kɛji akɛ o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛfaa mɛi ni tɔ̃ɔ lɛ, ani ekɛfaŋ bo kɛ oha akɛ la po ha bo?”
Etsɛɛɛ ni amɛbatsɔmɔ gbɔmɛi ni asheɔ amɛ gbeyei ni abuɔ amɛ waa—osɔfoi, maŋtsɛmɛi, tsofatsɛmɛi, okɔmfoi kɛ ayɛi kɛ nibilɔi.
Amɛtamɔ helatsɛ ko ni sumɔɔɔ akɛ enuɔ tsofa ni datrɛfonyo ko kɛha lɛ lɛ, akɛni ele datrɛfonyo lɛ fatɔi komɛi lɛ hewɔ.
Shi ani obaanyɛ oshwa tsofafeelɔ ko yɛ hela ni helatsɛ ko yeɔ hewɔ, kɛ́ helatsɛ lɛ kɛ datrɛfonyo lɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ tsuuu nii?
Datrɛfoi pii kɛɔ akɛ, ewa kɛhã mɛi ni sumɔɔ dãa waa lɛ akɛ amɛbaaba dãa falɛ ni amɛnuɔ lɛ shi.
Ani datrɛfonyo ko etsa nuu awuŋayelɔ ko pɛŋ?”

Mɛni Yesu fee, ni mɛni jɛ mli ba?
Yɛ egbii lɛ amli—dani akɛ tsofai ni gbeɔ muawai aaatsu nii—lɛ, no mli lɛ helatsɛmɛi akwɛmɔ bɛ tamɔ bɔ ni wɔnaa lɛ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ.
(b) Taakɛ wɔnaa yɛ Lala 106 lɛ, mɛni ba Israelbii lɛ anɔ yɛ Yehowa nɔ toi ni amɛgbo lɛ hewɔ?
Beni ekase nɔ ni ataoɔ yɛ edɛŋ sɛɛ lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Ha wɔje shishi amrɔ nɔŋŋ.”
(1) Mɛni ji yiŋtoo titri hewɔ ni Yehowa Odasefoi kpoɔ lá ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli lɛ, ni nɛgbɛ anaa nakai shishitoo mla lɛ yɛ, yɛ Biblia lɛ mli?
3 Nakai nyɔɔŋ lɛ mli nɔŋŋ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ Natan* akɛ: 4 “Yaa ni oyakɛɛ mitsulɔ David akɛ, ‘Nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: “Jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa ohã mi ni mahi mli.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ‘afɔ́ɔ’ Kristofoi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ ‘ehee kɛha hiɛnɔkamɔ ni gbooo,’ ni mɛni ji nakai hiɛnɔkamɔ lɛ?
Mɛɛ hiɛyaa kpeteŋkpele eji kɛha mi nɛkɛ!
Mɛni ji eyiŋtoo yɛ shihilɛ mli?

Refugee Community Committee (Ajinafoi ni Kwɛɔ Abobaahei Akutsei Anɔ) ni yɔɔ nsarai lɛ eko mli lɛ tsɔɔ bɔ ni amɛhiɛ esɔ amɛha yɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ amli akɛ: “Eji woo ni wɔná akɛ wɔɔdamɔ wɔwebii lɛ fɛɛ najiaŋ wɔkɛ nyɛ awie koni wɔda nyɛ shi yɛ ejurɔ ni nyɛ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ efee wɔ shii etɛ lɛ hewɔ . . .
3: Ani Okaiɔ akɛ Obaakɛɛ Miida Bo Shi?
Ani nyɛbii lɛ nuɔ ni nyɛmiikɛɛ “miikpá he fai,” “ofainɛ,” kɛ “oyiwaladɔŋŋ”?
Ani osɔleɔ be fɛɛ be dani oyeɔ nii?— Ehi akɛ wɔbaada Yehowa shi yɛ niyenii ni wɔná lɛ hewɔ dani wɔje shishi wɔye.
(Yesaia 52:7) Yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ fɔmɔ yɛ 1914 sɛɛ lɛ, onukpai 24 lɛ jaje akɛ: “Wɔmiidao shi, bo Nuŋtsɔ [Yehowa] Ofe lɛ, . . . akɛ oŋɔ ohewalɛ kpeteŋkpele lɛ ni oye maŋtsɛ.”
(1 Korintobii 16:9) Bo hu shidaa ni fa kɛteke nɔ baayi omli obɔ kɛji akɛ okɛ owala tsu nii ni okɛwo “nyɔŋmɔi amli Nyɔŋmɔ,” Yehowa, hiɛ nyam.—5 Mose 10:17; Daniel 2:47.
Shi enɔ leebi lɛ, eyɛ mli akɛ obaana bɔ ni nibii efite eha yɛ he fɛɛ he moŋ, shi efɔɔ kaa akɛ kɔɔyɔɔ mli tseɔ ni nɔ fɛɛ nɔ feɔ dioo ni ehaa mɔ he jɔɔ lɛ aahu akɛ obaanyɛ oda Yehowa shi yɛ gbi ni hi jogbaŋŋ ni ekaaa nɛɛ hewɔ.
Akaŋshilɔi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome ŋma yɛ eŋa he akɛ: “Ekolɛ nɔ ni mawie nɛɛ baawo onaa ŋmɔlɔ, shi ebaadɔ mi waa kɛ́ mihaaa ole bɔ ni minuɔ he diɛŋtsɛ yɛ ohe, ni no ji: Miidao shi akɛ oha mi kɛ bo bote gbalashihilɛ mli.”
Naagbee lɛ, kojolɔ ni bo sane lɛ toi lɛ jaje akɛ: “Eyɛ mli akɛ milomɔ tsɛŋ tsɛ lɛ [mfonirifeemɔŋ wiemɔ ko ni miikɔ osɔfonukpa lɛ he] ni folɔ nyɛnaa lɛ moŋ, shi esa akɛ mada lɛ shi akɛ eha mi hegbɛ nɛɛ koni mikɛ nyɛ akpe ni makase nyɛ tsɔɔmɔi lɛ ahe nii.”

Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, wɔnyɛɛɛ wɔtsimɔ wɔ aspaaterei ashishi ni egbulɔ bui lɛ, no hewɔ lɛ daa leebi lɛ, wɔfolɔɔ wolo ni wa ni wɔkɛwoɔ wɔ aspaaterei lɛ amli, ni gbɛkɛnaashi lɛ, wɔteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ fɔɔ etade kome pɛ ni eyɔɔ lɛ he.

Araba (Ŋoo Ŋshɔ lɛ wuoyigbɛ)
Shi kwɛ bɔ ni “ŋoo” yɔɔ wiemɔ ni aaawie kɛ gbee ni tsuishitoo, kɛ shishinumɔ yɔɔ mli lɛ “mli” akɛ, “Ofainɛ ni oŋa shinaa lɛ oha mi.”

13 “Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ ŋoo ji nyɛ,+ shi kɛ́ ŋoo lɛ mli hewalɛ lɛ tã lɛ, te eeefee tɛŋŋ ená eŋoo hewalɛ lɛ ekoŋŋ lɛ?

20 “Kɛ́ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, lɛɛ ohusu lɛ mli,+ tamɔ bɔ ni ewo bo shi lɛ,+ ni okɛɛ akɛ, ‘Miitao maye loo,’ akɛni loo miiba otsine* lɛ hewɔ lɛ, no lɛ, obaanyɛ oye be fɛɛ be ni ebaaba otsine.
Amɛ susumɔ ni kɛ ehe kpaaa gbee lɛ je kpo faŋŋ beni amɛwie amɛshi Yesu kaselɔi lɛ akɛ amɛmiikumɔ abele tsei ni amɛmiiye enɔ abele lɛ yɛ Hejɔɔmɔ Gbi nɔ lɛ; ni kɛlɛ, yɛ sɛɛ mli yɛ nakai gbi lɛ nɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ, amɛ henilee gbaaa amɛnaa beni amɛkpaŋ akɛ amɛaagbe Yesu lɛ!—Mateo 12:1, 2, 14.
+ Klɛŋklɛŋ gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛjiea ashikishaŋ-sha kɛjea nyɛshĩai lɛ amli, ejaakɛ kɛjɛ klɛŋklɛŋ gbi lɛ nɔ kɛyashi gbi ni ji kpawo lɛ nɔ lɛ, mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baaye nɔ ko ni ashikishaŋ-sha yɛ mli lɛ, nakai mɔ* lɛ, afo lɛ ashɛ afɔ̃* kɛje Israel.
Shi Romabii ahejuuhei babaoo ji tsũi wujiwuji ni gbɔlemɔ tsũi, kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔ tsũi, asɔshwɛmɔ tsũi, kɛ hei ni ayeɔ nii ni anuɔ nii yɛ lɛ yɔɔ mli.
15 Gbii nyɔŋma lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, amɛhe fee fɛo ni amɛná hewalɛ* kwraa fe oblahii* lɛ fɛɛ ni yeɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ niyenii srɔtoi lɛ.
Ekɛ aboloo ha ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi lɛ ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛhea, nyɛyea!
Nyɛkayea fɔ loo lá (17)
16 Shi nyɛkayea lá lɛ;+ nyɛtsia nyɛshwiea shikpɔŋ tamɔ nu.
7 Mɔ ni yɔɔ toi lɛ, hã enu nɔ ni mumɔ lɛ kɛɔ asafoi lɛ:+ Mɔ ni yeɔ kunim lɛ,+ mahã eye wala tso lɛ ni yɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ paradeiso lɛ mli lɛ nɔ yibii.’ +
7 No hewɔ lɛ, nyɛhia nakai shĩa lɛ mli,+ ni nyɛyea ni nyɛnua nɔ ni amɛbaahã nyɛ lɛ,+ ejaakɛ nitsulɔ lɛ, enyɔmɔwoo sa lɛ.
Shi ele akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ ni eeesa lɛ moŋ he hiaa fe niyeli.
Satan kɛ onufu tsu nii akɛ enaawielɔ ni ekɛlaka Hawa ni eku Nyɔŋmɔ mla ni guɔ tso ko yibii yeli lɛ mli.
Efee nakai, ejaakɛ kɛjɛ Nu Afua lɛ sɛɛ kɛyaa lɛ, ebaakpɛlɛ ni adesai agbe kooloi ni amɛye.
Mahã oye nii kɛjɛ otsɛ* Yakob gboshinii lɛ mli,*+
Shishitoo mla ni amɛkɛtsuɔ nii ji: “Nyɛhaa wɔyea nii ni wɔnua dãai, ejaakɛ wɔ́ lɛ, wɔbaagboi!”
Yehowa ha hetoo: “Naa, kɛ miŋa ŋwɛi naa ni nugbɔ enɛɛɛ, aloo mifa baalabii ni amɛbaye shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nii, aloo miha gbele-hela ba mimaŋbii lɛ ateŋ, ni mimaŋ ni aŋɔ migbɛi awo amɛ lɛ ba amɛhe shi, ni amɛkpa fai, ni amɛtao mihiɛ gbɛ, ni amɛkpale kɛjɛ amɛgbɛi fɔji lɛ anɔ lɛ: no lɛ mi hu majɛ ŋwɛi mabo toi, ni maŋɔ amɛhe eshai lɛ mafa amɛ, ni matsa amɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ.”—2 Kronika 6:21; 7:13, 14.
14 Nyɛkayea blodo loo ŋmaa ni ashĩ loo ŋmaa hee ko kwraa kɛyashi gbi nɛɛ baashɛ, kɛyashi be ni nyɛkɛ nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ afɔle lɛ baaba.
Yehowa kɛɛ Adam kɛ Hawa akɛ amɛbaanyɛ amɛye aduawai fɛɛ ni tsei ni yɔɔ abɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ woɔ lɛ anɔ yibii lɛ eko.
+ 11 Nuu kɛ enyɛmi gbɔmɔ ŋa feɔ nyaŋemɔ nii yɛ omli,+ nuu kroko hu kɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ebinuu ŋa náa bɔlɛ yɛ jeŋba sha mli,+ ni nuu kroko hu kɛ enyɛmi yoo, lɛ diɛŋtsɛ epapa biyoo náa bɔlɛ.
16 Oblayoo lɛ papa lɛ akɛɛ onukpai lɛ akɛ, ‘Mikɛ mibiyoo lɛ hã nuu nɛɛ akɛ eŋa, shi ehe miitsɛ̃* mibiyoo lɛ 17 ni ekɛ sane efɔ̃ enɔ akɛ: “Mina akɛ, nɔ ko bɛ obiyoo lɛ he ni tsɔɔ akɛ oblayoo fro ji lɛ.”
No hewɔ lɛ, abaanyɛ akɛ wiemɔ nɛɛ atsu nii aha Yesaia ŋa lɛ kɛ Yudayoo Maria, ni ji oblayoo fro lɛ hu.
Ezekiel ŋa lɛ gbele lɛ ji okadi (15-27)
10 Yoo kpakpa* lɛ, namɔ aaaná?
Wu lɛ kɛ eŋa lɛ kɛ ŋmɛlɛtswai etɛ foɔ tsɔne kɛyaa nitsumɔ kɛbaa shia daa gbi.
Yudayoo ni ji ŋa mɔdɛŋbɔlɔ lɛ hu na ‘eshiabii lɛ akwɛmɔ kɛ amɛyaa kɛ baa jogbaŋŋ’ mli ŋɔɔmɔ bɔ ni sa.
Mikɛ miŋa ni atsɛɔ lɛ Liz (tsutsu ko lɛ Liz Semock) lɛ tá tsũ kome mli yɛ nɔtsamɔ skul.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ biɔ ni okɛ oŋa aye tamɔ bɔ ni Yesu kɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ yeɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ.
Yɛ shikpɔji komɛi anɔ lɛ, eji nɔ ko ni wu kɛ ŋa fɔɔ feemɔ akɛ amɛaaye gbi ni amɛkɛbote gbalashihilɛ, ni ji gbɛjianɔtoo ni shishitolɔ ji Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ mli lɛ he afi gbi jurɔ.
Ekɛɛ hu akɛ: “Mináa miishɛɛ waa kɛ́ mina akɛ Biblia mli anɔkwale ko ni he hiaa waa ni mikɛ miŋa fee ekome kɛkase lɛ eta etsuiŋ waa lɛ.”
Mi kɛ miŋa yɛ 1959 mli
No hewɔ lɛ mikɛ miŋa ba gbeekpãmɔ akɛ matse bei abɔ ni mikɛtsuɔ miheloonaa nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ.”
+ Ani Filistibii ni afolɔko amɛ ketia lɛ ateŋ esa akɛ oyaŋɔ yoo yɛ akɛ ŋa?”
9 Beni bɔfo Petro maa nɔ̃ hewɔ ni ehe hiaa ni wumɛi kɛ amɛŋamɛi aye yɛ woo mli lɛ nɔ mi lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Koni akatsĩmɔ nyɛsɔlemɔi lɛ agbɛ.”
Sɛɛ mli beni akɛ weku lɛ egba sane lɛ, Rebeka jɛ suɔmɔ mli ekpɛlɛ koni ekɛ Eliezer aku sɛɛ kɛya maŋsɛɛ shɔŋŋ he ko koni eyatsɔ Abraham binuu Isak ŋa.
Kɛlɛ, esaaa akɛ abuɔ mligbalamɔ akɛ eji nɔ ko ni hiɛdɔɔ bɛ he, ejaakɛ Biblia lɛ woɔ ŋaa akɛ: “Ŋa akatse ewu gbala; . . . ni wu lɛ hu akaŋmɛɛ eŋa he.”
No hewɔ lɛ akɛ lɛ kɛ eŋa, kɛ ebihii enyɔ je Biblia kasemɔ shishi.
Nyɛmi nuu kroko hu wie akɛ, be ni eŋa gbo trukaa lɛ, “ehewojiaŋ fɛɛ wa ehe waa bɔ ni enyɛŋ mli etsɔɔ.”
Yoo lɛ ji Batsheba ni he yɔɔ fɛo naakpa lɛ, Uria ŋa lɛ.
Beni amɛkɛ okulafo ni kɛ wumɛi kpawo ehi shi lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ tsuɔ nii lɛ, Sadukifoi lɛ bi akɛ: “Belɛ gbohiiashitee lɛ mli lɛ, mɛi kpawo lɛ ateŋ namɔ ŋã eeetsɔ?”
Mɛni hewɔ nilee kɛ sanesɛɛkɔmɔ he hiaa onukpa ni yɔɔ ŋa kɛ bii lɛ?
Beni Potifar ŋa lɛ ka Yosef koni ekɛ ehe awo bɔlɛnamɔ jeŋba shara mli lɛ, ekɛ shiŋŋfeemɔ kpoo ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni mafee efɔŋ kpeteŋkpele ni tamɔ nɛkɛ nɛɛ, ni mafee esha mashi Nyɔŋmɔŋ?”
Shinichi Tohara kɛ eŋa, Masako ni Elsie kɛ amɛ tee Gilead lɛ kɛ amɛ hela mli naagbai ahe kaai pii ekpe yɛ nyɛsɛɛ afii fioo lɛ amli.
Wu kɛ ŋa ni esoro jamɔ mli ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ po agbalashihilɛ baanyɛ aye omanye yɛ mɛɛ shishinumɔ naa?
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 8:14-17; 10:34-48) Aaafee afi 50 kɛ 52 Ŋ.B. teŋgbɛ lɛ, Paulo ŋma wolo eyaha Kristofoi ni yɔɔ Galatia yɛ Asia Bibioo lɛ akɛ: “Ákɛ nɔ ni ŋmalɛ lɛ ena momo akɛ hemɔkɛyeli mli Nyɔŋmɔ aaabu jeŋmaji lɛ abem yɛ hewɔ lɛ, ejaje sanekpakpa lɛ etsɔɔ Abraham eto akɛ: ‘Omli aaajɔɔ jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ yɛ.’
Kɛ ana he miishɛɛ lɛ, shi sanebimɔ ko oha ni abaanyɛ aha hetoo be kroko kɛ oba saramɔ lɛ, tamɔ: “Ani obaasumɔ ni ole bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ baafee ni etsu eyiŋtoo akɛ ebaajɔɔ adesai ni eha shikpɔŋ lɛ atsɔ paradeiso lɛ he sane?”
Te esa akɛ ona hegbɛ kpele ni oná akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ naanyo lɛ oha tɛŋŋ?
No hewɔ lɛ, yaa nɔ okwɛ heyeli mla ni hi kɛwula shi lɛ mli, ni oya nɔ okɛ ohe ashã afɔle, ni Nyɔŋmɔ baasumɔ osane, ni ebaajɔɔ bo.
Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ yi Elisabet obɔ, ni ekɛɛ Maria akɛ: ‘Ajɔɔ bo waa yɛ yei ateŋ.’
Ni ekolɛ oná jɔɔmɔi ni Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ kɛbaaba wɔsɛɛ lɛ ni asusu he lɛ ekomɛi ahe miishɛɛ, ni ootao ole amɛhe nii babaoo.
Yɛ Pentekoste afi 33 Ŋ.B. sɛɛ nɔŋŋ lɛ, bɔfo Petro kɛɛ Yudafoi akuu ko akɛ: “Nyɛji gbalɔi lɛ kɛ kpaŋmɔ lɛ bii, kpaŋmɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔtsɛmɛi lɛ kpaŋ, beni ekɛɛ Abraham akɛ: ‘Ni oseshi mli aaajɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ wekui fɛɛ yɛ’ lɛ.
Hejɔlɛ kɛ hebuu yɛ nɔyeli lɛŋ;
Hemɔkɛyeli ni oyɔɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli lɛ mli ewa, ni Kristofoi asafo lɛ ni okɛbɔɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, oná jɔɔmɔi babaoo momo.
• Te jɔɔmɔi ni asafo babaoo lɛ náa mli ŋɔɔmɔ bianɛ, ní amɛbaaya nɔ amɛná mli ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jeŋ hee lɛ mli lɛ he hiaa bo ha tɛŋŋ?
(Abɛi 3:5, 6; Yohane 16:20) Miishɛɛ baaye amanehulu najiaŋ, beni Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ bo taakɛ ejɔɔ Hiob lɛ.
Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, susumɔ jɔɔmɔi ni onine shɛɔ nɔ daa kɛjɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ lɛ ahe.
Ani obaasumɔ ni ole jɔɔmɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ ewo shi yɛ he lɛ he saji babaoo?
Akɛ be ní maji anɔ wiemɔi srɔtoi amli bii fɛɛ baaná jɔɔmɔi babaoo lɛ mlitsɔɔmɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ha Yudafoi lɛ yɛ Hebri Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli akɛ: “Jeŋmaji pii aaatee ayakɛɛ akɛ: Nyɛbaa ni wɔyakwɔa Yehowa gɔŋ lɛ, kɛyaa Yakob Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ we lɛ, koni etsɔɔ wɔ egbɛ̀i lɛ, ní wɔnyiɛ etempɔŋi lɛ anɔ! . . .
17 Nikeenii ni nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ kɛbaaba lɛ, ekɛba yɛ bɔ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ejɔɔ lɛ ehã lɛ naa.
(1 Timoteo 4:16) Yɛ be mli ni obɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni oha oshweremɔ lɛ afee faŋŋ lɛ, bo hu obaanyɛ oná hegbɛ koni okɛ ohe awo Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi lɛ hiɛnyamwoo mli ni oná ejɔɔmɔi lɛ amli ŋɔɔmɔ.
Kwɛmɔ bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ baajɔɔ mɔdɛŋ fioo pɛ ni ooobɔ lɛ nɔ eha.
Kɛ́ okɛ obe kɛ ohewalɛ shã afɔle kɛtsu nitsumɔ nɛɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baajɔɔ bo, ni ekolɛ obaaná mɔ ko okɛ lɛ abɔi Biblia lɛ kasemɔ.
“She Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei ni oye ekitai lɛ anɔ,” ni Yehowa baajɔɔ bo babaoo ni ‘obaaye nii kpakpai amli ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ odeŋmegbomɔ lɛ mli.’—Jaj.
Akɛ gbɛjianɔtoo ni kɛ ehe kpaa gbee lɛ, amɛtsuɔ Yehowa susumɔnaa-nifeemɔ he nii, taakɛ lalatsɛ lɛ kɛɔ lɛ: “Nyɛjiea Yehowa yi, nyɛ ebɔfoi lɛ, nyɛ hewalɔi ekaalɔi ni yeɔ ewiemɔ nɔ. ni nyɛboɔ ewiemɔ lɛ gbee toi lɛ!
+ 25 Nyɛji gbalɔi lɛ kɛ kpaŋmɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ nyɛtsɛmɛi lɛ kpaŋ lɛ bii,+ be ni ekɛɛ Abraham akɛ: ‘Ni oseshi* lɛ nɔ abaatsɔ ajɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ wekui fɛɛ’ lɛ.
Beni najiaŋdamɔlɔ nɛɛ kɛ mi yeɔ shɛɛ koni eya lɛ, ekɛɛ ni akɛ: “O-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ajɔɔ bo yɛ onitsumɔ lɛ mli.”
Kɛtsɔ sanekpakpa lɛ ni obaakpɛlɛ nɔ ni okɛtsu nii lɛ nɔ lɛ, obaanyɛ oná jɔɔmɔi ni yɔɔ nyam jeee amrɔ nɛɛ kɛkɛ shi moŋ yɛ wɔsɛɛ hu beni Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ yeɔ shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ lɛ.—1 Timoteo 4:8.
Esa akɛ nitsulɔi anɔkwɛlɔi ni shwieɔ mɛi yɛ nitsumɔ mli lɛ ale bɔ ni amɛaafee amɛkɛɛ “shɛɛ sane ni mli wa nɛɛ ni emli akã shi faŋŋ, efee kuku ni ŋaalee ahi mli, ni eha woo ni mɔ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ ahi shi pɛpɛɛpɛ,” taakɛ The Vancouver Sun lɛ bɔɔ amaniɛ lɛ.
Hulu loo nyɔŋtsere diɛŋtsɛ he ehiaaa maŋ nɛɛ.
20 Mɛɛ shishinumɔ naa ‘hulu aaawo duŋ, ni nyɔŋtsere kpɛŋ, ni ŋulamii aaajɛ ŋwɛi atswia shi, ni aaahoso ŋwɛi hewalɛi lɛ’ yɛ?
Mɔ ni to niiamlitaomɔ lɛ he gbɛjianɔ lɛ wie akɛ, nifeemɔ gbɛ kpakpa ni fe fɛɛ ni anaa yɛ wekui ni yɔɔ hewalɛ lɛ ahe ji akɛ “mɔ ko eyawɔɔɔ gbɛkɛ ni emli efu mɔ kroko.” 6 Ni kɛlɛ, nɔ ni fe afii 1,900 ni eho nɛ ni Biblia lɛ wo ŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛmli afua, shi nyɛkafea esha; hulu akanyɔ shi yɛ nyɛmlila lɛ nɔ.”
(Lala 36:10) Wɔnaa Yehowa ninenaa nitsumɔi babaoo ni ebɔle wɔ, tamɔ hulu lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii.
Ani mɔ ni hãa hulu lɛ hewalɛ lɛ nyɛŋ ahã wɔ hewalɛ ni he hiaa wɔ lɛ koni wɔnyɛ wɔkpee naagbai fɛɛ ni wɔkɛkpeɔ lɛ naa?
Sane ni yɔɔ Mose Klɛŋklɛŋ Wolo lɛ mli lɛ gbalaa jwɛŋmɔ shii abɔ kɛyaa hulu lɛ kɛ bɔ ni ehe yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ kɛha shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
Mɛi ni feɔ tsofa lɛ kɛ ŋoo futuɔ nu nɛɛ ni amɛkɛmaa hulu nɔ gbii etɛ.
Sɛkɛnsi fɛɛ sɛkɛnsi lɛ, hewalɛ ni jɛɔ hulu lɛ mli lɛ naawalɛ shɛɔ nuklea okplɛmii akpekpei ohai abɔ ni efɛlɛ.
* Wala bɔɔ nii fɛɛ ni yɔɔ wɔshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ ashihilɛ damɔ atɔm hewalɛ ni jɛɔ hulu lɛ mli lɛ nɔ.
Aurelian kɛ maŋ lɛ mli bii ye yɛ ekãa naa, ni eloo nibii babaoo diɛŋtsɛ, ni nɔ ni fata he ji amaga ni yɔɔ Hulu lɛ Sɔlemɔwe lɛ mli lɛ, ni eshi kɛtee Roma.
Sane lɛ kɛɔ wɔ akɛ, “ebɔ mɔdɛŋ aahu kɛyashi hulushinyɔɔ mli koni ehere eyiwala.”
25:33) Gbalɛ kroko ni wie nɔ kome too lɛ he lɛ hu kɛɛ akɛ: “Ni mina bɔfo ko damɔ hulu mli, ni ebo kɛ gbee wulu ekɛɛ loofɔji ní filikiɔ yɛ ŋwɛi lɛ fɛɛ akɛ: Nyɛbaa ní nyɛbabuaa nyɛhe naa yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ okpɔlɔ kpeteŋkpele lɛ he, koni nyɛbaye maŋtsɛmɛi aloo kɛ asafoiatsɛmɛi aloo kɛ hewalɔi aloo kɛ okpɔŋɔi aloo kɛ mɛi ní tara amɛnɔ lɛ aloo kɛ odehei kɛ nyɔji kɛ mɛi bibii kɛ mɛi wuji fɛɛ aloo.” —Kpoj.
Aztekbii kɛ gbɔmɛi ni akɛ amɛ shaa afɔlei amɛhaa amɛ nyɔŋmɔi sɔrɔtoi lɛ yeɔ jamɔ gbijuji ni baa be fɛɛ be lɛ, titri lɛ yɛ hulu-nyɔŋmɔ Tezcatlipoca jamɔ mli.
Hebri gbalɔi sɔrɔtoi hu tsɔɔ bɔ ni hulu wo duŋ, ni nyɔŋtsere kpɛɛɛ, ni ŋulamii hu kɛ amɛkpɛmɔ haaa.
Ni nɔ ni ba yɛ nakai gbi lɛ mli ji ‘lá kɛ la kɛ lasu babaoo,’ hulu haaa maŋ ni efee kusuu lɛ akpɛ yɛ jetsɛremɔ mli, ni nyɔŋtsere lɛ ha akai lá ni afɔse ashwie shi, shi jeee nyɔŋtsere kpɛmɔ yɛ gbɛkɛ ni tamɔ jwiɛtɛi ni haa mɔ toiŋ jɔɔ lɛ lɛ.”
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, susumɔ hulu lɛ he okwɛ.
Shikpɔŋ lɛ sáa hulu hewalɛ ni hoɔ daa, ni falɛ shɛɔ okpɔŋɔi akpekpei akpekpei 240 ahewalɛ naa.
(Lala 37:8) Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, bei komɛi lɛ wɔmli baanyɛ afu yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ, shi Paulo woɔ wɔ ŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛmli afũa, shi nyɛkafea esha; hulu akanyɔ shi yɛ nyɛmlila lɛ nɔ, ni asaŋ nyɛkɛ nyɛhe akafɔ̃a shi nyɛhaa abonsam.”—Efesobii 4:26, 27.
Wolo ko ni anyɛɔ akɛ he fɔ̃ɔ nɔ, ni gbalɛ mli saji yɔɔ mli lɛ bɔɔ wɔ jeŋ muu fɛɛ hiɛkpatamɔ ko ni baa lɛ he kɔkɔ, ni ewieɔ he yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ akɛ: “Hulu aaawo duŋ, ni nyɔɔŋtsere kpɛŋ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋulamii aaatserɛ kɛaajɛ ŋwɛi atswia shi, ni ŋwɛi hewalɛi lɛ aaahoso. . . .
‘Amɛaakpɛ Tamɔ Hulu’
Hulu lɛ da waa diɛŋtsɛ, ni eteŋ hu mli kwɔ aahu akɛ eheɔ afii akpekpei abɔ dani hewalɛ ni jɛɔ hulu lɛ teŋ lɛ jeɔ kpo kɛbashɛɔ hulu lɛ hiɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, wɔkaneɔ yɛ jɛmɛ akɛ hulu, nyɔŋtsere, ŋulamii, snoo, ahum, gɔji kɛ gɔŋkpɔi lɛ fɛɛ miijie Yehowa yi.
35 Sɛɛ mli lɛ, mɛi lɛ fɛɛ bahã David miishɛjemɔ blodo* be ni je nako, shi David kã kitã akɛ: “Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mi aye ni ekɛ mi aye ekoŋŋ kɛji miye blodo loo nɔ kroko dani hulu nyɔ shi!”
“Ŋwɛi”—hulu lɛ, nyɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii lɛ—yeɔ Nyɔŋmɔ hewalɛ kɛ nilee lɛ he odase.
Wɔheɔ wɔyeɔ akɛ, hewalɛwoo wiemɔi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ baanyɛ aye abua bo koni otsu shihilɛ lɛ he nii.
Bɔni afee ni oha nakai sanebimɔ lɛ hetoo koni aye abua bo ni ona shishinumɔ ni Nuŋtsɔ lɛ Gbɛkɛnaashi Niyenii lɛ yɔɔ kɛha bo lɛ, wɔmiifɔ̃ bo nine ni okane sane ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ.
Yehowa etsĩii wɔnaa koni wɔkaná miishɛɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ, shi wɔle jogbaŋŋ akɛ jeee nifeemɔi nɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ ji nibii ni yeɔ ebuaa wɔ ni wɔto mumɔŋ jwetrii yɛ ŋwɛi.
6 Kɛji akɛ wɔha wɔla lɛ kpɛ́ lɛ, wɔkɛ yijiemɔ bahaa wɔ-Bɔlɔ lɛ ni wɔyeɔ wɔbuaa anɔkwafoi lɛ koni amɛbale lɛ koni amɛná naanɔ wala hiɛnɔkamɔ lɛ.
Etsɔ gbɛ ni mli ka shi faŋŋ ni jwɛŋmɔ yɔɔ mli nɔ etsɔɔ naagbai titrii komɛi ni gbaa wɔnaa ŋmɛnɛ ni etsɔɔ gbɛi komɛi anɔ ni ŋwɛi nitsɔɔmɔ baanyɛ atsɔ nɔ aye abua wɔ ni wɔna shihilɛ kpakpa mli ŋɔɔmɔ.
Enɛ baaye abua bo koni ole nɔ ni onikaselɔ lɛ heɔ eyeɔ momo yɛ sane ko ni akɛha lɛ he.
Eji sɔlemɔ ko ni sa kadimɔ waa, ni klɛŋklɛŋ nibimɔi etɛ ni yɔɔ mli lɛ ahe susumɔ baaye abua bo koni okase nibii ni Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ ahe nii babaoo.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:28; Yakobo 5:14, 15; Yuda 22) Amɛbaaye amɛbua bo ni ona oyiŋkɔshikɔshi feemɔ lɛ jɛɛhe, ni ekolɛ eeenyɛ efee henɔwomɔ loo susumɔ ko ni ejaaa.
Kristofoi onukpai baanyɛ afee yelikɛbuamɔ jɛɛhe diɛŋtsɛ yɛ biɛ.
Mɛɛ kaa Kristofoi babaoo kɛkpeɔ, ni mɛni baanyɛ aye abua amɛ ni amɛye nɔ kunim?
Mɔ ni kɛ bo kaseɔ Biblia lɛ baanyɛ aye abua bo ni osaa ohe yɛ sane ni obaasumɔ ni oha hetoo yɛ asafoŋ kpeei ni baanyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ shishi.
(Mateo 24:4-14, 36) Shi Yesu gbalɛ lɛ baanyɛ aye abua wɔ ni wɔfee klalo kɛha “no gbi lɛ kɛ no ŋmɛlɛtswaa lɛ.”
13:22) Akɛ gbɔi yɛ nibii agbɛjianɔtoo nɛɛ mli lɛ, kɛ́ wɔha wɔmii shɛ wɔnii ahe lɛ, no baaha tsɔne nɛɛ akadũ wɔ.
17 Kɛ́ okwɛɔ ponografi lɛ, esa akɛ obi yelikɛbuamɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ.
6 Paulo ye ebua Korintobii lɛ koni amɛna nɔ hewɔ ni yelikɛbuamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ fata sɔɔmɔ ni amɛkɛhãa Yehowa lɛ kɛ jamɔ ni amɛkɛhãa lɛ lɛ he lɛ.
Ni emumɔ lɛ yaa nɔ ewajeɔ wɔ bɔni afee ni wɔnijiaŋ akaje wui yɛ naagbee gbii nɛɛ amli.—Yes.
2:12) Yoo ko yɔse akɛ Odasefonyo ko ni ekɛtsuɔ nii lɛ mli hi ni eyeɔ ebuaa mɔ, ni ekɛ wiemɔ sha tsuuu nii loo ni ebaaŋmɔ yɛ shwɛmɔi ni esaaa he.
Mɛni baanyɛ aye abua wɔ ni wɔbu wɔ mfonirifeemɔ tsui lɛ he ni ekagbɔjɔ?
Mɛi ni ŋma wolo tɛtrɛɛ nɛɛ baaná he miishɛɛ akɛ amɛaaye amɛbua bo koni ole mɔ tuuntu ni Yesu ji lɛ.
Ŋwɛi yelikɛbuamɔ buɔ Nyɔŋmɔ anɔkwa jálɔi ahe tɛ̃ɛ kɛjɛɔ mumɔi fɔji ni tutuaa mɔ lɛ he.
Mɛni baaye abua bii koni amɛto amɛtsui shi?
Shishitoo mla kome ni bafee yelikɛbuamɔ nɔ krɛdɛɛ ji enɛ: “Nyɛkakojoa, koni akakojo nyɛ. Shi nɔ kojomɔ ni nyɛŋɔkojoɔ lɛ, aaaŋɔ kojo nyɛ.”
Nikasemɔi enyɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ naakpɛɛ nii ni Yesu fee lɛ ahe, ni amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa wɔ ni wɔle bɔ ni afeɔ mɛi ejurɔ ni ayeɔ abuaa amɛ.
Enɛ yeɔ ebuaa mi ni ehaaa masusu mikome mihe tuutu.”
Namɛi Kristo kɛtsuɔ nii kɛyeɔ ebuaa wɔ koni sui ni kɛ mligbalamɔ baa lɛ akaba wɔteŋ?
Migbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ tee hiɛ jogbaŋŋ.
Mikɛfee oti ni ma mihiɛ akɛ maha naanyobɔɔ kpakpa abakã mi kɛ Yehowa teŋ.
Ni bo lɛ okɛ mihe esha nɔsha lɛ fa mi.”
Yɛ afi 1943 lɛ, mikɛ nu mli baptisimɔ fee mihenɔjɔɔmɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ he okadi.
Akɛni Ataa bɛ shĩa ní Awo le hu akɛ etsɛŋ ni mi kɛ minyɛmi nuu fioo lɛ kɛ kaa ni kɔɔ he ni akɛwooo maŋkwramɔŋ saji amli lɛ baakpe hewɔ lɛ, nɛkɛ be nɛɛ bafee jaramɔ be kɛha Awo.
Etsɛɛɛ kɛkɛ ni mikɛ miŋa kɛ mibii lɛ fee ekome ekoŋŋ.
Efɔseɔ midɔrɔ* eshwieɔ shikpɔŋ.
19 Shi jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ, shi moŋ, bo diɛŋtsɛ obinuu ni abaafɔ ahã bo lɛ,* lɛ ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ ehã migbɛ́i lɛ.’
Etsɛɛɛ ni ena mihe miishɛɛ, ni ekãa ni ewo mi lɛ ji nɔ̃ titri ni ha mibatsɔ gbɛgbalɔ yɛ sɛɛ mli, taakɛ atsɛɔ be-fɛɛ sɔɔlɔi lɛ.
“Mitsui mli efili lɛ yɛ Yehowa hewɔ;+
Ni ahosoŋ toiŋjɔlɛ kpaŋmɔ ni mikpaŋ lɛ hu,”+ Yehowa, mɔ ni naa bo mɔbɔ lɛ kɛɛ.
Bei komɛi po lɛ, ehe bahiaa ni mamɔ mikadaa mli koni ekpa hosomɔ.
Agbala mi-skul tsɔɔlɔi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome—ni hi—kɛtsɔ gbɛjegbɛi anɔ tamɔ efɔŋ feelɔ ko.
Afii ejwɛ dani abaafɔ mi lɛ, mifɔlɔi lɛ kɛ Mormon maŋsɛɛ sɔɔlɔi kpe.
Afii ekpaa sɛɛ lɛ, Beatrice baatsɔ miŋa.
+ 24 No hewɔ lɛ, ni okɛ ohiɛ efɔ̃ Ejipt nɔ kɛhã shwiilii kɛ okpɔŋɔnɔtaralɔi nɛɛ, te ooofee tɛŋŋ oshwie amralo kome, ni ji minuŋtsɔ tsuji lɛ ateŋ mɔ bibioo kwraa lɛ po lɛ?
Ejajeɔ akɛ: “Mɔ ni taa nyɛhe lɛ eeta [mi]hiŋmɛiŋ ajaŋmalaatɛ he.”
No hewɔ lɛ, minuɔ he akɛ mi mihã wɔkutsoŋnyo lɛ hegbɛ ni eye mi awui lɛ.
Enɛ yeɔ ebuaa mi ni ehaaa masusu mikome mihe tuutu.”
Ani mile akɛ kɛ́ mikɛɛ misumɔɔɔ helatsamɔ nifeemɔi ni akɛ mi diɛŋtsɛ milá baatsu nii yɛ mli lɛ ateŋ eko-eko lɛ, belɛ miitsɔɔ akɛ miihi tsɔne ni akɛjieɔ muji yɛ sabai lɛ mli loo tsɔne ni akɛyeɔ tsui lɛ najiaŋ kɛ́ aafee tsui lɛ opireshɛn lɛ?
Akɛni miji oshija hewɔ lɛ, minyɛɔ mifeɔ tsakemɔi yɛ mibe he gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ mli be fɛɛ be, ni enɛ yeɔ ebuaa mi ni mináa be babaoo kɛkaseɔ nii.
Oblanyo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Jayson kaiɔ akɛ: “Yɛ miweku lɛ mli lɛ, wɔkɛ wɔhe woɔ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli daa Hɔɔ leebi.
Yakobo 1:2, 3 lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Minyɛmimɛi, kɛji nyɛgbee kaai srɔtoi pii amli lɛ, nyɛbua lɛ miishɛɛ sɔŋŋ; ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nyɛhemɔkɛyeli kaa lɛ tsɛ́ɔ tsuishiŋmɛɛ kɛbaa.”
Ani miishɛɛ nibii ni yɔɔ mli lɛ baanyɛ aha oshara aba migbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ nɔ loo eha maje kpa po yɛ miwala shihilɛ be ni eshwɛ lɛ fɛɛ mli?
Miweku lɛ he Sane
37 Etee nɔ efee efɔŋ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ+ tamɔ bɔ ni etsɛmɛi lɛ fee lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Ehi akɛ okɛ hiŋmɛi kome baabote wala mli fe nɔ ni oyɛ hiŋmɛii enyɔ ni abaashɛ bo afɔ̃ Gehena la* lɛ mli.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni ebaatee Lazaro shi lɛ, ‘ehole ehiŋmɛii anɔ kɛtee ŋwɛi ni ekɛɛ: Ataa, miidao shi akɛ obo mi toi.
+ 30 Ahab, Omri binuu lɛ fee efɔŋ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ fe mɛi fɛɛ ni tsɔ ehiɛ lɛ.
Yɛ nikasemɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ mli lɛ, abaasusu bɔ ni kɛ́ aha hiŋmɛi nɔ tse, atiu mumɔŋ otii asɛɛ, ni afee gbɛkɛ Weku Jamɔ daa otsi lɛ ebaaha weku muu lɛ fɛɛ he awa yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ he.
+ 8 Ni bɔɔ nii ejwɛ ni hiɛ kamɔ lɛ ateŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ yɛ fiji ekpaa; ni amɛfiji lɛ ahe kɛ amɛmli eyimɔ obɔbɔ kɛ hiŋmɛii sɔŋŋ.
Israel maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Buulu yɔɔ nɛɛ, egbɛ ja yɛ ehiɛ; shi mɔ ni ji nilelɔ lɛ, eboɔ ŋaawoo toi.”—Abɛi 12:15.
Kɔɔyɔɔ ni naa wa tswaa be fɛɛ be, ni elooɔ shia kɛshooɔ mɔ hewolo nɔ ni ekɛwoɔ mɔ hiŋmɛiaŋ hu.
Nakai nɔŋŋ dani abaakpata Sodom kɛ Gomora maji lɛ ahiɛ lɛ, Lot shaahii lɛ na lɛ akɛ “etamɔ mɔ ni yeɔ fɛo.”—1 Mose 19:14.
Klɛŋklɛŋ nɔ ni aha ni ji, “Gbalashihilɛ ni Aaaha Etsɔ Ekomefeemɔ ni Hiɔ Shi Daa” lɛ kai mɛi ni eba kpee lɛ akɛ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ lɛ gbalashihilɛ jeee gbɛjianɔtoo ni abaanyɛ ashɛ afɔ, taakɛ je lɛŋ bii pii susuɔ lɛ.
Bɔ ni amɛsusu mihe waa lɛ ha mikase nɔ ko ni he hiaa waa: Ákɛ “mɔ fɛɛ mɔ akafo enɔ mli, shi moŋ efo enaanyo nɔ mli.”—Filipibii 2:4.
Ŋamɛi aheshibaa kɛ bulɛ subaŋ ni “jara wa yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ” lɛ naa amɛwumɛi anɔ hewalɛ kpakpa.
Obaanyɛ osɔle obi Yehowa koni ewaje bo ni ofee nɔ ni ja yɛ ehiɛ.
(Yohane 3:16) Yesu Kristo ni akɛha akɛ kpɔmɔ afɔleshaa lɛ kɛ susumɔ ni ahiɛ akɛ Yehowa sumɔɔɔ wɔ ni wɔhe bɛ sɛɛnamɔ kɛha lɛ lɛ kpãaa gbee.
Nyɛyɛ hiŋmɛii shi nyɛnaaa nii, ni nyɛyɛ toii hu shi nyɛnuuu nii lo?
14 Shi gbi ni Yesu kpɔtɔ sũ ni ekɛgbele nuu lɛ hiŋmɛii lɛ,+ Hejɔɔmɔ Gbi ni.
Shi, kɛtsɔ shwɛde ni haa anaa nii wuji kɛ woji ni akɛ niŋmaa wuji eŋmala lɛ nɔ lɛ, minyɛɔ mikɛ ŋmɛlɛtswai enumɔ tsuɔ nii gbi kome ni mikɛkaseɔ nii yɛ be mli ni mikɛ hiŋmɛi kome ni eshwɛ lɛ tsuɔ nii lɛ.
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ je lɛŋ lɛ, heloo lɛ sɛɛdii nii lɛ kɛ hiŋmɛii lɛ asɛɛdii nii lɛ kɛ shihilɛ lɛ mli hewoo lɛ, ejɛɛɛ tsɛ lɛ mli, shi moŋ je lɛ mli ejɛ.”
25 Omri tee nɔ efee efɔŋ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ, ni efee efɔŋ fe mɛi fɛɛ ni tsɔ ehiɛ lɛ po.
Belɛ, namɔ hiɛ esa akɛ wɔfee gbɛi kpakpa yɛ?
+ Nyɛkanyiɛa nyɛtsuii kɛ nyɛhiŋmɛii asɛɛ, nii ni hãaa nyɛye mi anɔkwa* lɛ.
Hɛɛ, Ŋwɛi Flooflonyo lɛ baakojo nibii fɛɛ, ni nɔ ni adesa hiŋmɛii enaaa lɛ po fata he.
+ 3 No hewɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ okwɛɔ jwɛi hwiaa ni kã onyɛmi hiŋmɛi nɔ lɛ, shi onaaa mplaŋ ni kã bo diɛŋtsɛ ohiŋmɛi nɔ lɛ?
Klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa ni mikane lɛ, yaafonui ba mihiŋmɛiiaŋ.
Kɛji mɔ ko miisumɔ je lɛ, belɛ tsɛ lɛ suɔmɔ lɛ bɛ emli; ejaakɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ je lɛŋ lɛ, heloo lɛ sɛɛdii nii lɛ kɛ hiŋmɛii lɛ asɛɛdii nii lɛ kɛ shihilɛ lɛ mli hewoo lɛ, ejɛɛɛ tsɛ lɛ mli, shi moŋ je lɛ mli ejɛ.”
4 Kɛ́ okɛ mɔ ko kpe yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli ni wieɔ wiemɔ kroko shi oleee wiemɔ pɔtɛɛ ni ewieɔ lɛ, okɛ wolo lɛ sɛɛ atsɔɔ lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ.
23 Kɛjɛ be ni mitee Farao hiɛ mikɛ lɛ yawie yɛ ogbɛ́i mli nɛɛ,+ efee gbɔmɛi nɛɛ efɔŋ fe tsutsu lɛ,+ ni ojieko omaŋ lɛ hu.”
Hemɔkɛyeli nɛɛ baaha oná miishɛɛ, ni ebaaha oná ekãa kɛwie ohiɛnɔkamɔ nɛɛ he.
KƐ́ YEHOWA wie lɛ, mɛi ni yɔɔ nilee lɛ boɔ toi kɛ bulɛ ní mli kwɔ ni amɛyeɔ ewiemɔi lɛ anɔ.
Yɛ be mli ni ewie anunyam hiɛnɔkamɔ ni mɛi ni Yehowa eŋɔ amɛ akɛ emumɔŋ “bii” lɛ kɛ “Kristo nanemɛi niyelɔi” yɛ ŋwɛi Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli lɛ yɔɔ lɛ he lɛ, Paulo kɛɛ: “Bɔɔnii lɛ agbɛkwɛmɔ kɛ hehiamɔ miimɛ Nyɔŋmɔ bii lɛ akpojiemɔ lɛ.
Yoo ko ni na ninefɔɔ wolo lɛ yɛ skul lɛ shinaa lɛ naa lɛ bi mɔ ni esa akɛ ena koni egbala nifeemɔ lɛ mli etsɔɔ lɛ.
(1 Petro 4:12, New International Version) Petro miiwie yiwaa he yɛ biɛ, shi nakai nɔŋŋ ewiemɔi lɛ hu kɔɔ amanehului srɔtoi fɛɛ ni ekolɛ heyelilɔ ko baaŋmɛ etsui shi yɛ mli lɛ he jogbaŋŋ.
Ni kɛ Awo nu ni mɔ ko kɛ mi wie yɛ gbɛ ni esaaa nɔ lɛ, ewieɔ ehaa mi nɔŋŋ ni ekɛfãa mihe.
6 Abaanyɛ ayɔse Yehowa tsuji anɔkwafoi lɛ hu kɛtsɔ ekãa ni amɛkɛtsuɔ hegbɛi ni amɛnáa lɛ he nii jogbaŋŋ koni amɛkɛ mɛi ni jeee anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ jálɔi lɛ awie lɛ nɔ.
(Hiob 2:11) Beni amɛyana lɛ lɛ, amɛteŋ mɔ ko etswaaa esɛŋ kɛyashi Hiob jaje akɛ: “Ha gbi ni afɔ́ mi yɛ nɔ lɛ alaaje.”
Anɔkwale ni wɔkɛ wɔnaanyo aaawie lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ esaaa akɛ wɔmaleɔ loo wɔlakaa maŋ nɔyelɔi lɛ bɔni afee ni wɔnine ashɛ yelikɛbuamɔ nɔ.
Biblia lɛ wieɔ jiemɔ ni abaajie gbele kɛya kɛ naanɔ wala he shi ni Nyɔŋmɔ ewo lɛ he shii abɔ. —Kwɛmɔ akrabatsa ni ji “Abaaye Gbele Nɔ Kunim” lɛ.
Wɔhã mɛi ale enitsumɔi.
Ha ni ehi ojwɛŋmɔ mli akɛ sɛɛnamɔi yɛ he akɛ ooowie kɛjɛ wiemɔ he wolo mli.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ hewalɛ ni shikpɔŋ lɛ yɔɔ tsutsu lɛ baaku sɛɛ ahã lɛ ekoŋŋ, kɛkɛ lɛ, wala baanyɛ aya nɔ ahi nɔ.
Beni bɔfo Paulo kɛ enanemɛi ni yɔɔ hemɔkɛyeli lɛ mli lɛ wieɔ lɛ, ewo amɛ hewalɛ akɛ: “Nyɛshɛjea mɛi ni tsui faa lɛ amii; nyɛherea mɛi ni feɔ gbedee lɛ; nyɛtoa nyɛtsui shi nyɛhaa mɛi fɛɛ. . . .
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛji akɛ otoibolɔi lɛ wie lɛ, kaaye oyai ni otsɔ sanegbaa lɛ kɛtee oshiɛmɔ lɛ nɔ.
Yesu kɛɛ Farisifoi ni buɔ amɛhe jalɔi, shi kɛlɛ amɛjeee mɛi ni yɔɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛ shinɔi ashwiei! Te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni nyɛ mɛi ni nyɛji mɛi fɔji lɛ, ni nyɛaanyɛ ekpakpa nyɛwieŋ?
Apokalips, loo Kpojiemɔ wolo lɛ wieɔ mfoniri-feemɔŋ ajwamaŋ kpele ko ni yɔɔ teemɔŋ gbɛi ko ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ, ni ji “Babilon Kpeteŋkpele” lɛ he.
3 Sɛɛ mli lɛ Paulo ha ale bɔ ni enu he eha lɛ yɛ wolo ni eŋma eyaha Kristofoi ni hi Tesalonika lɛ mli, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Wɔna nɔ momo, ni afee wɔ niseniianii hu yɛ Filipi, tamɔ bɔ ni nyɛle lɛ, kɛlɛ wɔná ekãa yɛ wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ mli ni wɔkɛjaje Nyɔŋmɔ Sanekpakpa lɛ wɔtsɔɔ nyɛ tsɛbelɛ ate shi ashi wɔ babaoo.”
No mli, yɛ Pentekoste afi 33 Ŋ.B., ni afɔse mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ashwie shi, ni efɔ klɛŋklɛŋ Kristofoi lɛ mu, ni ewo amɛ hewalɛ koni amɛwie “Nyɔŋmɔ nibii wuji” lɛ ahe yɛ wiemɔi sɔrɔtoi babaoo mli.
ŊMALƐI lɛ kɛɔ wɔ akɛ ‘wɔwo mɛi fɛɛ,’ ni ‘wɔkawie mɔ ko he efɔŋ.’
Mifɔlɔi le bɔ ni afeɔ ataoɔ hegbɛ ni akɛ mɛi agba Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sane lɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
(ɛ) shĩatsɛ lɛ miiwie?
Yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ enɛ ji ‘Nyɔŋmɔ mla lɛ ni awieɔ ashiɔ ni akojoɔ’?
Yɛ nitsumɔ dadei krɛdɛɛi komɛi ni afee kɛ nibii bibii ahe opireshɛn feemɔ hewɔ lɛ, bɔ ni akaa koni ajaje enɛ ni anyɛ afɔ ekoŋŋ lɛ eye omanye babaoo.
French niŋmalɔ Voltaire ŋma akɛ: “Kulɛ nuu ni gbɔmɔtsoŋ tutuamɔ haa enii feɔ mɔbɔ, ni egbeɔ ehe ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, baashwe koni kulɛ ehi shi eji emɛ otsi ko kulɛ.”
15. (a) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Odasefoi babaoo ni yɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ ekase Paulo kɛ Sila nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ?

Mina bɔ ni asafo ni mihi mli klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ eshwere ni aja mli shii ejwɛ sɔŋŋ, ni atsu shiɛlɔi kɛ gbɛgbalɔi, kɛ mɛi komɛi akɛ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi kɛjɛ jɛmɛ kɛtee hei ni yɔɔ shɔŋŋ tamɔ Bolivia, Laos, kɛ Uganda.

Shi mɛi komɛi etsake amɛhe amɛwo shihilɛi nɛɛ amli, ni maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi heei lɛ hu baanyɛ amɛfee nakai nɔŋŋ.

Ewie akɛ: “Wɔmiitao gbalashihilɛ mli bii ni yɔɔ tsɔne, koni amɛfã ta krɛdɛɛ kɛja wolo nɛɛ yɛ maŋ lɛ mli fɛɛ.”
Akɛni oye anɔkwa yɛ nɔ ko bibioo kwraa mli hewɔ lɛ, ye maji nyɔŋma nɔ.”
Awuŋayeli ha Kain he tsɛ̃ Habel kɛyashɛ he ni egbe lɛ, ni no nɔŋŋ ha Yosef tsɛ bii nyɔŋma lɛ he tsɛ̃ lɛ kɛyashɛ he ni amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛgbe lɛ kwraa po.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, yɛ he ni bɛŋkɛ kpaakpa ni Gestapo lɛ baanyɛ ayɔse amɛ yɛ, yɛ December 12, 1936 lɛ, Odasefoi ni naa shɛɔ 3,500 ja yiŋkpɛɛ komekomei akpei nyɔŋmai abɔ ní akala ní kɔɔ amɛnehulu ni amɛnaa yɛ niseniianii ni afeɔ amɛ lɛ he.
Shi kɛlɛ, gbalɛ lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ “aklontoi nyɔŋma” baakwɛ̃ kɛjɛ nɔyeli nɛɛ mli, ni amɛmli ekome pɔtɛ̃ɛ ko baahe gbɛ́i waa.
Kɛ hooo kwraa lɛ amɛshiɛ sanekpakpa lɛ yɛ wiemɔi srɔtoi nyɔŋma mli, ni amɛje shĩa Biblia mli nikasemɔi babaoo hu ni yaa hiɛ lɛ ashishi.
Luk 17:11-14 —Yesu tsa kpitiyelɔi nyɔŋma (nwtsty lɛ mli sane ni kɔɔ Luk 17:12 lɛ he: “hii kpitiyelɔi nyɔŋma”; nwtsty lɛ mli sane ni kɔɔ Luk 17:14 lɛ he: “nyɛkɛ nyɛhe ayatsɔa osɔfoi lɛ”)
Mikɛ afii nyɔŋma ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ sɔmɔ aahu yɛ nakai asafo lɛ mli.
Wɔkpeɔ yɛ nyɛmi nuu ko kɛ eŋa shĩa, ni jɛmɛ kɛ he ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ teŋ jekɛmɔ feɔ kilomitai 16.
(Kpojiemɔ 17:16, 17; 18:2-5) “Akolontoi nyɔŋma” lɛ damɔ shi kɛha maŋkwramɔŋ asraafoi ahewalɛ ni yeɔ nɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ.
No sɛɛ lɛ mɛi ni kwɛ mli lɛ hala woji lɛ ateŋ nɔ ni fe fɛɛ, nyɔŋma ni ye gbɛhe ni ji enyɔ, kɛ nyɔŋma ni ye gbɛhe ni ji etɛ.
Etsɔ Amos nɔ eha enɛ fee faŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ yɛ nɔ ni fe afii 100 sɛɛ yɛ Yerobeam II, ni batsɔ Israel akutsei nyɔŋma maŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔ maŋtsɛ yɛ aaafee afi 844 D.Ŋ.B. lɛ nɔyeli be lɛ mli.
No sɛɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ha Israel mlai, ní Kitãi Nyɔŋma lɛ hu fata he, koni ekudɔ amɛ ni ebu amɛhe.
Sikhbii ji amɛjamɔ lɛ shishitolɔ, Guru Nānak kaselɔi, kɛ gurui nyɔŋma (Nānak kɛ esɛɛyelɔi nɛɛhu) ni amɛniŋmaai yɔɔ Sikh wolo krɔŋkrɔŋ, Guru Granth Sahib lɛ mli lɛ sɛɛnyiɛlɔi.
Akɛni nyɔŋma baanyɛ adamɔ shi aha shikpɔŋ nɔ emuuyeli hewɔ lɛ, “hii nyɔŋma” lɛ damɔ shi kɛha “asafo babaoo” lɛ ni akɛ amɛ ba “Nyɔŋmɔ Israel” lɛ ni amɛkɛ amɛ feɔ “kuu kome” lɛ anaanyobɔɔ mli lɛ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yosef nyɛmimɛi hii nyɔŋma lɛ jie musuŋtsɔlɛ kwraa kɛjɛ amɛtsuii amli, ni mɛni jɛ mli ba?
Nyɔŋma ji yibɔ ko ni damɔ shi kɛha shikpɔŋ nɔ emuuyeli kwraa.
Kɛkɛ ni akolonto “bibioo” ko te shi yɛ ekolontoi nyɔŋma lɛ teŋ ni “hiŋmɛii yɛ he tamɔ gbɔmɔ hiŋmɛii kɛ naabu ni wieɔ nibii wuji.” —Daniel 7: 2-8.
Luther kɛ nyɔji nyɔŋma hi Wartburg yibaamɔ hé lɛ, ni etu ehe eha niŋmaa kɛ Biblia shishitsɔɔmɔ.
Shi kɛlɛ, aŋkroaŋkroi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ ni yɔɔ Israel akutsei nyɔŋma maŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔyeli shishi lɛ ashihilɛ tee nɔ efite kwraa.
Asiria ye Samaria nɔ kunim, ni ehã Israelbii lɛ tsɔmɔ etsuji; Israel kooyigbɛ wekui nyɔŋma maŋtsɛyeli lɛ ba naagbee
Amaniɛbɔɔ lɛ tsa nɔ akɛ: “Ni Yesu here nɔ akɛ: Ani jeee mɛi nyɔŋma he tã lɛ?
Eshwɛ aaafee nyɔji nɛɛhu loo nyɔŋma ni abaagbe Yesu, ni eesusu ekaselɔi lɛ ahe.
Nyɛmi nuu ko ni je gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ shishi beni eye afii 65 lɛ nɔ otsii enyɔ sɛɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Mináko be ko ni eyi obɔ kɛ jɔɔmɔi babaoo tamɔ nɛkɛ pɛŋ tamɔ bɔ ni miná yɛ afii nyɔŋma ni eho lɛ mli lɛ ni mikɛtsu gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ.”
10 Yɛ be mli ni Mose kɛ gbii 40 yɔɔ Sinai Gɔŋ lɛ nɔ ni eheɔ Kitai Nyɔŋma lɛ, Israelbii lɛ ku amɛ anɔkwayeli kɛha Yehowa he shiwoo ni amɛtsɔ hiɛ amɛkɛha lɛ mli.
+ Be ni amɛfee ekome kɛmiiye nii yɛ Mizpa lɛ, 2 Ishmael, Netania binuu lɛ kɛ hii nyɔŋma ni fata ehe lɛ te shi ni amɛkɛ klante gbe Gedalia, Shafan binuu Ahikam binuu lɛ.
Ŋulami lɛ je kpo beni amɛshi Yerusalem lɛ.
Ŋulamii enyiɛ yɔɔ jeŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ?
Shishinumɔ yɛ enɛ he ejaakɛ ŋwɛi ni akɛ hiŋmɛii naa lɛ mli lɛɛ kɛjɛ shikpɔŋ kɛyaa shɔŋŋ yɛ he fɛɛ he, ni ŋulamii akpekpei akpei abɔ fata he.
Shi afii ohai abɔ baaho dani abaanyɛ akɛ Abraham shwiei lɛ ato “ŋwɛi ŋulamii” loo “ŋshɔ naa shia” he.
(4 Mose 24:17) Kɛjɛ David nɔ kɛbaa lɛ, nakai “ŋulamii” lɛ ye nɔ kɛjɛ Zion Gɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
* (Kpojiemɔ 1:20) “Ŋulamii” ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ kɛ mɛi krokomɛi fɛɛ ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ, hiɔ ŋwɛi shihilɛ hei yɛ mumɔŋ shishinumɔ naa kɛjɛ be mli ni akɛ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ sɔo amɛnaa akɛ okadi ni yeɔ amɛ ŋwɛi shihilɛ he lɛ he odase lɛ.
Ni kɛlɛ, Yehowa ‘tsɔɔ ŋulamii lɛ ayibɔ hu, ekɛ amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ gbɛi tsɛɔ lɛ.’
Kojolɔi 5:20 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Ajɛ ŋwɛi awu ta lɛ, ŋulamii tete jɛ amɛgbɛhei ni amɛkɛ Sisera wu!”
Ŋulamii ni bɛŋkɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ ateŋ babaoo shɛɛɛ hulu lɛ dalɛ.
Ekolɛ amɛkɛ gbɔmɔ nɛɛ mfoniri tsotsoroɔ asa nɔ ni amɛjeɔ shishi amɛwoɔ atadei taakɛ ewoɔ lɛ ni amɛsaa amɛhe hu taakɛ efeɔ lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Enɔ afi lɛ, mibɔi sini feemɔ, ni bei pii lɛ miji mɔ titri ni agbalaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛyaa enɔ waa yɛ sini lɛ mli.
Ekolɛ wɔbaabi akɛ, Te fee tɛŋŋ ni ŋulamiiaŋkwɛlɔi lɛ na akɛ tsakpaa ko yɛ “ŋulami” ni amɛna yɛ boka lɛ kɛ “Yudafoi amaŋtsɛ” ni afɔ lɛ teŋ lɛ?
“Ŋulami” lɛ baanyɛ afee ŋaatsɔɔ ko ni Nyɔŋmɔ henyɛlɔ Satan ni baafee bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni eeenyɛ koni ehao Mesia lɛ kɛmiitsu nii.
7 Kɛkɛ ni Herode tsɛ ŋulamiiaŋkwɛlɔi lɛ pɛ ni mɔ ko fataaa amɛhe, ni ebi amɛ fitsofitso koni amɛtsɔɔ lɛ be ni ŋulami lɛ pue.
10 Ebada agbo aahu akɛ eyashɛ ŋwɛii asraafoi lɛ ahe tɔ̃ɔ, ni ehã asraafoi lɛ ekomɛi kɛ ŋulamii lɛ ekomɛi gbeegbee shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni enaanaa amɛnɔ.
Biblia baafa kome pɛ ni jeɔ mli shweshweeshwe lɛ baanyɛ agbu bɔ ni duŋ nɛɛ yɔɔ kpii ha lɛ mli tamɔ ŋulami.”
Mɛni hiɛ hulu lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ, kɛ ŋulamii lɛ amli?
Eyɛ mli akɛ wɔ hulu lɛ kɛ la babaoo haa moŋ, shi eji ŋulami pɛmpɛoo ko kɛkɛ.
Bɔ ni ŋulamii lɛ ayifalɛ yɔɔ ha kɛ bɔ ni ŋwɛiniiaŋ da babaoo ha lɛ haa ŋmiŋmi mɔɔ mɔ.
24 “Shi no gbii lɛ amli, yɛ nakai amanehulu lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, hulu lɛ baawo duŋ, ni nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ kpɛŋ,+ 25 ni ŋulamii lɛ baajɛ ŋwɛi abatswiatswiaa shi, ni abaahoso hewalɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛii lɛ.
“Ŋulami” nɛɛ hiɛ samfee ko, ni ekɛ nakai samfee lɛ gbele bu kwɔŋkwɔŋ ko naa.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ ejwɛŋmɔ mli ji akɛ anyɛŋ akane Israelbii lɛ ayibɔ tamɔ “ŋwɛi ŋulamii kɛ ŋshɔ naa shia” ni anyɛŋ akane lɛ.
Yɛ efai shi ní etswa akɛ ebaaye Yuda maŋtsɛmɛi lɛ anɔ kunim ní ejie amɛ kɛjɛ gɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, Nebukadnezar miijaje eyiŋ ní eto akɛ ebaawó ehe nɔ kɛteke nakai “ŋulamii” lɛ kpo faŋŋ.

19 Beni Yehowa gbi wulu lɛ bɛŋkɛɔ lɛ, eba akɛ wɔɔya nɔ kɛ ekaa, ni wɔsɔmɔ lɛ kɛ “gbee kome”!

8 Shi wɔgbii nɛɛ amli lɛ, ekolɛ ehe ehiaŋ ni wɔya maŋsɛɛ koni wɔyagba sanekpakpa lɛ wɔtsɔɔ wiemɔi srɔtoi fɛɛ amli bii.

4 Ni Yehowa kɛɛ Mose akɛ: “Naa, mibahã niyenii* ajɛ ŋwɛi anɛ ashwie shi ahã nyɛ,+ ni daa gbi lɛ,+ maŋbii lɛ ateŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ aje kpo ni eyaloo bɔ ni baashɛ enaa nakai gbi lɛ, koni mikɛ no aka amɛ makwɛ akɛ amɛbaanyiɛ yɛ mimla lɛ naa loo amɛnyiɛŋ yɛ naa.
Enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ obaaya Yehowa ŋɔɔ yɛ sɔlemɔ mli, ni okɛɛ lɛ akɛ oosumɔ ni ofee esuɔmɔnaa nii kɛya naanɔ.

Ani ole mɔ ni awula fɛfɛo lɛ ji?
Mɛi ni tsɔɔ jɛmɛ kɛhoɔ lɛ tete ahe jɔ̃ɔ amɛhe ni amɛkɛɔ akɛ: “Aso maŋ ní atsɛɔ lɛ hefɛo ní eye emuu, shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nyamɔ nɔ̃ lɛ nɛ lo?”—Yaafo 2:3, 11, 15.
Maŋtsɛ nilelɔ lɛ woɔ ŋaa akɛ: “Kaadi ehe fɛo sɛɛ yɛ otsui mli, ni kaaha ekɛ ehiɛsɛɛ miimɔo!”
ATSƐ lɛ akɛ “hefɛo ni eye emuu” kɛ “maŋtsɛ agbo lɛ maŋ.”
Ehe yɛ fɛo pam, kɛlɛ, mile yɛ mitsui mli akɛ eji oshara akɛ mikɛ mɔ ko ni bɛ suɔmɔ kɛha Yehowa lɛ aaanyiɛ.
Ekɛ suɔmɔ kɛɛ: “Miisumɔ.”
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, be ni nyɛmi nuu ko ŋa gbo, ni ekɛ naagbai krokomɛi ni jaraa kpe lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Mikase akɛ wɔnyɛŋ wɔtsɔɔ kai ni wɔsumɔɔ, loo bei kɛ shii abɔ ni esa akɛ amɛba wɔnɔ.
Akɛni eboteko gbalashihilɛ mli hewɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni enɛ aaaba mliŋ, akɛni mileee nuu nɛɛ?”
Be ko ni eho lɛ, kɛ́ mitee lɛ, mihãaa saji ahetoo, ejaakɛ minuɔ he akɛ nɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛɛmɔ lɛ he ehiaaa.
18 No hewɔ lɛ, Mose ku esɛɛ kɛtee eshaanuu Yetro+ ŋɔɔ ni eyakɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Ofainɛ, miitao maku misɛɛ ni maya minyɛmimɛi ní yɔɔ Ejipt lɛ aŋɔɔ ní mayakwɛ akɛ amɛyɛ wala mli lolo lo.”
Kɛji akɛ naanɔ wala fataaa Yehowa nyɔmɔwoo ni ekɛhaa enɔkwa sɔɔlɔi lɛ he po lɛ, masumɔ lolo akɛ mahi shi yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jamɔ hetuu-kɛhamɔ shihilɛ naa.
3 “Misumɔɔ tsɛ lɛ.”
Nɔ ko ni ba trukaa ji akɛ, gbɛkɛ ni tsɔ̃ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ, afolɔ minaa akɛ mihewɔ gbokɛlɛfoi krokomɛi lɛ naa amanehulu lɛ, ejaakɛ mifataaa amɛhe yɛ sɔlemɔ ni amɛsɔleɔ amɛhaa Obalayoo Fro Maria lɛ mli.
Oblanyo Odasefonyo ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Mile oblahii kɛ oblayei komɛi yɛ asafo lɛ mli ni kɛ mɛi ni jáaa Yehowa nyiɛɔ kɛha gbalashihilɛ.
Awo sumɔɔ ni mikɛ mipapa ashwɛ Frɛntsibii ashwɛmɔ ko koni wɔkɛjie wɔhiɛtserɛ, eyɛ mli moŋ akɛ minyaaa nakai shwɛmɔ lɛ he.
Anɔkwa, be ni miji oblanyo lɛ, mikase nibii pii yɛ nɔhamɔ kɛ miishɛɛ ni jɛɔ mli kɛbaa lɛ he. —Mat.
Kɛkɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ: ‘Mina miwebii ni yɔɔ Mizraim lɛ amanehulu lɛ.
Miikpa gbɛ akɛ mikɛ shitee-kɛ-woo baakpe, no hewɔ lɛ misɔle mibi Nyɔŋmɔ ni eha mi nilee kɛ ekaa ni mikɛkpee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baaba lɛ naa.
“Kɛlɛ, gbi ko Hɔgbaa lɛ, minu nɔ ko ni ha mitsake misusumɔ.
Nyɛ lɛ, nyɛjɛ je nɛɛ mli; mi lɛ, mijɛɛɛ je nɛɛ mli.” —Yohane 8:21-23.
(Lala 83:19) No hewɔ lɛ, yɛ 1931 agbiɛnaa be mli be ni miye afii 14 pɛ lɛ, mikɔ mishidaamɔ yɛ Yehowa kɛ e-Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ gbɛfaŋ.
42 Etsɔ shãa afɔle ni abaashã daa yɛ nyɛyinɔi fɛɛ amli yɛ kpee buu lɛ shinaa lɛ naa yɛ Yehowa hiɛ, jɛmɛ majie mihe kpo matsɔɔ nyɛ ní mikɛ bo awie yɛ.
Kpaako miná mile akɛ oheɔ mi oyeɔ, ejaakɛ okamaaa mi obinuu, ni ji obi kome too lɛ.’
Etsɛ́ɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ní ta eŋwɛi maŋtsɛsɛi lɛ nɔ lɛ wiemɔi asɛɛ akɛ eejaje akɛ: “Naa, miifee nii fɛɛ ehee.”
No hewɔ lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ mɛi ni teɔ shi amɛwoɔ lɛ lɛ akɛ: “Lɛɛlɛŋ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, toohelɔi lɛ kɛ ashawoi lɛ miitsɔ nyɛhiɛ kɛmiiya Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli.”
Bɔ ni Yehowa, mɔ ni feeo, mɔ hu ní shɔ̃o ní eye ebuao kɛjɛ onyɛ musuŋ beebe lɛ, kɛɛ nɛ: Kaashe gbeyei, mitsulɔ Yakob, kɛ bo Yeshurun ní mihalao!”
14 Ani miyɛ bulɛ kɛ suɔmɔ kɛha jeŋba he shishitoo mlai ni yɔɔ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ?
Ni masaa ehei ni efite lɛ;
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni ebaatee Lazaro shi lɛ, ‘ehole ehiŋmɛii anɔ kɛtee ŋwɛi ni ekɛɛ: Ataa, miidao shi akɛ obo mi toi.
Shi kɛlɛ, wɔhã wɔmumɔŋ otii ni wɔkɛ mamɔ wɔhiɛ lɛ hi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli, ni be ni miye afii 25 lɛ, ahala mi akɛ asafoŋ sɔɔlɔ, ni ji asafoŋ sɛinɔtalɔ yɛ Yehowa Odasefoi asafo ko mli.
Sapolsky, ni kɛ mɔ ko ŋma amaniɛbɔɔ, “Sex in Primetime Television: 1979 Versus 1989,” lɛ wie akɛ: “Kɛ obalaŋta ko ni miida kɛ afii pii kwɛ TV nɔ nibii ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni mɛi kɛ amɛhe woɔ bɔlɛnamɔ nifeemɔi amli lɛ, nɛkɛ mfonirii akpei abɔ ni enaa loo amɛhoɔ yɛ ehiɛ afii pii lɛ baatsɔɔ lɛ akɛ bɔlɛnamɔ ŋɔɔ—ni nɔ ko kwraa jɛɛɛ mli baaa.”
Ani wɔkpooɔ akɛ wɔkɛ yakayaka gbɔmɛi aaabɔ kɛtsɔ tɛlivishiŋ, vidio, sinii, kɛ Internet nɔ nifeemɔi, loo kɛtsɔ gbɛ̀i krokomɛi anɔ?
Kɛ wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔkase nii, beni wɔyeɔ nii, wɔboɔ redio toi, loo beni wɔkwɛɔ tɛlivishin lɛ, eeenyɛ eba akɛ wɔnyɛŋ wɔha wɔjwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ ahi nɔ ni wɔbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni wɔkase lɛ nɔ.
Aŋmɛɛɛ gbɛ ni mɔ ko akwɛ tɛlivishiŋ, ebo redio toi, loo ekane wolo ko be mli ni wɔyeɔ nii lɛ.
(Yakobo 1:22-25) Ni kɛ wɔkwɛ daa gbi adafitswaa wolo mli loo tɛlivishin nɔ nibii lɛ, jalɛ sane ni ayeee, yiwalɛ, kɛ osharai jeɔ kpo amrɔ nɔŋŋ ni esaa wɔtsuii ahe kɛ awerɛho.
Tɛlivishiŋ, redio, kɛ adafitswaa woji jie nibii ni kɔɔ Blonya lɛ he amɛtsɔɔ́ —ni amɛgbaa emli nifeemɔi lɛ ahe sane daa gbi.
Ajieɔ hii ni ehe gbɛi lɛ ayi ŋmɛnɛ yɛ woji, sinii, tɛlivishiŋ, kɛ lalai amli.
Adafitswaa wolo ni ji The New York Times lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ: “Nibii ni haoɔ mɔ ní ajieɔ yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ lɛ baanyɛ aná gbekɛbii bibii kwraa lɛ po anɔ hewalɛ.”
Ŋwanejee ko kwraa bɛ he akɛ, mɔ ko ni atsɛ́ ewiemɔ yisɛɛ yɛ niiamlitaomɔ ko ni afee ni kɔɔ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ adafitswaa he yɛ United States lɛ jie henumɔi ni tamɔ mɛi akpekpei abɔ nɔ̃ lɛ kpo akɛ: ‘Kɛ́ mibo adafitswaa toi migbe naa lɛ, mihaoɔ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
9 Yɛ maji pii amli lɛ, anaa bɔlɛnamɔ he mfoniri yɛ hei ni ahɔɔ adafitswaa woji yɛ, yɛ lalai kɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi amli, ni eehe eyi Internet lɛ nɔ obɔ.
(1 Yohane 5:19, NW) Ani enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ wolo fɛɛ wolo, sini loo tɛlivishin nɔ nibii fɛɛ ni je lɛ feɔ lɛ ekpɔtɔ ni eji Satan nibii?
Hɛɛ, bii ni náa hiɛtserɛjiemɔi ni weku lɛ kɛ ehe woɔ mli lɛ ahe miishɛɛ lɛ kɛ amɛhe woŋ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi, vidioi, sinii, kɛ Internet nɔ shwɛmɔi ni jieɔ awuiyeli, jeŋba shara, kɛ tsofa fɔji kɛ nitsumɔ akpo lɛ amli.
Afii fioo ni eho nɛɛ amli lɛ, ŋwɛi bɔɔ nii ebafee sane ni afɔɔ he wiemɔ yɛ tɛlivishin nɔ, yɛ sinii amli, kɛ agbɛnɛ yɛ Broadway shwɛmɔ mli po.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ tɛlivishiŋ nyɛɔ enáa gbekɛbii ni darako anɔ hewalɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, tɛlivishiŋ lɛ ni aaagbe ji nifeemɔ ni he hiaa kɛha sanegbaa kpakpa yɛ bei babaoo mli.
Teresa sumɔɔɔ ni efiteɔ wekukpãa ni kã ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ lɛ kɛtsɔ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔ ni woɔ bɔlɛnamɔ kɛ basabasafeemɔ he hewalɛ ni ekɛ ehe aaawo mli lɛ nɔ.
Kwɛmɔ tɛlivishiŋ, loo bó redio toi.
Nɛkɛ ji bɔ ni Germanynyo woloŋmalɔ kɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ adafitswalɔ ko ní yɔɔ niiashikpamɔ lɛ wie.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛji akɛ okɛ gbii babaoo kaneɔ adafitswaa wolo lɛ loo okwɛɔ ni oboɔ gbɛkɛnaashi tɛlivishiŋ nɔ saji atoi lɛ, ani obaanyɛ ofo enɛ feemɔ mli gbi kome pɛ yɛ otsi mli?
Wekui komɛi ekpɛ mli akɛ amɛbaatse be ni amɛkɛkwɛɔ TV loo amɛkɛtaa kɔmpiuta sɛɛ lɛ nɔ.

14 Akɛni jeŋ ni woɔ bɔlɛnamɔ jeŋba shara, awuiyeli, kɛ ninamɔ hiɛ nyam mli wɔyɔɔ—ni ajieɔ enɛɛmɛi akpo faŋŋ yɛ woji, woji tɛtrɛbii, sinii, tɛlivishin nɔ nibii, kɛ lalai ni ehe gbɛi amli hewɔ lɛ—aaloo susumɔi fɔji kɛ nibii gbohii babaoo aashwie wɔnɔ daa gbi.

Nyɛhaa wɔyaa nɔ wɔjiea jeŋba shara he susumɔi kɛjɛa wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli kwraa, ni wɔkwa nifeemɔi ni esaaa ni wɔɔha eya nɔ yɛ mɛi ni esoro wɔkɛ amɛbɔɔ su loo mɛi ni wɔkɛ amɛ hiɛ bɔɔ su kome lɛ ateŋ lɛ.—Kolosebii 3:5.
Ani ekolɛ wɔɔnyɛ wɔje lalai ni woɔ bɔlɛnamɔ ni gbalashihilɛ bɛ mli lɛ hiɛ nyam lɛ alamɔ, aloo tsofai fɔji ni akɛtsuɔ nii ni akɛnaa miishɛɛ lɛ akɔlɔmɔ kɛ nibii krokomɛi babaoo hu shishi ni ekolɛ wɔleee po?
Jenny wie akɛ: “Mináaa lɛ mlɛo akɛ mahiɛ jeŋba ni he tse mli ejaakɛ kɛ́ yoo ji bo ni nuu ná ohe miishɛɛ lɛ, no haa oyitsoŋ fũɔ.”
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, fɔlɔi le akɛ henumɔ ni anáa ahaa mɔ kroko ni esoro ebɔɔ su lɛ mli nyɛɔ ewaa ni anyɛɛɛ naa atsɔɔ po.
Taakɛ Webster’s Ninth New Collegiate Dictionary lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, “polygamy” tsɔɔ “gbalashihilɛ ni hefatalɔi lɛ ateŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ baanyɛ ana hefatalɔ fe mɔ kome yɛ be kome too lɛ nɔŋŋ mli.”
Kɛ́ mɛi kɛ amɛhe ná bɔlɛ amɛgbe naa lɛ, amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ biɔ ehe akɛ, ‘Namɔ ekoŋŋ mɔ nɛɛ kɛná bɔlɛ?’
Tsɛ ko wie akɛ: “Kɛjɛ be mli ni gbekɛbii lɛ darako kwraa lɛ tɔ̃ɔ po lɛ, wɔbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ waa akɛ wɔkɛ amɛ aaawie nibii ni kɔɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he lɛ ahe yɛ faŋŋ mli.
Oblahii kɛ oblayei ni ná bɔlɛ be ni amɛboteko gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ ateŋ pii ewie akɛ, sɛɛ mli lɛ edɔ amɛ waa akɛ amɛfee nakai.
Shi yɛ nɔ ni Yosef le yɛ gbalashihilɛ gbɛjianɔtoo ni Yehowa to shishi yɛ Eden lɛ he lɛ hewɔ lɛ, ele akɛ bɔlɛ ni akɛ mɔ kroko ŋa aaana lɛ esaŋ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ.
Iniobong kɛfata he akɛ: “Minaa miishɛɛ daa gbi, kɛ miku misɛɛ misusu nɔ ni Awo efee eha mi kɛtsɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he tsɔsemɔ ni fa bɔ ni sa ni ekɛha mi lɛ nɔ lɛ.
Yɛ amɛsusumɔ naa lɛ, esaaa akɛ akojoɔ mɛi yɛ jeŋba he saji amli, titri lɛ kɛji ekɔɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he.

Oblayoo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Alicia* lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Bei komɛi lɛ, misumɔɔ akɛ male nɔ ko yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he, shi minuɔ he akɛ kɛ́ mibi mifɔlɔi lɛ, amɛbaajwɛŋ akɛ miifee nɔ ko gbonyo.”
Nifeemɔi ni ji gbalafitemɔ, hii ni kɛ hii naa bɔlɛ, kooloo ni akɛnaa bɔlɛ, kɛ nibii fɔji krokomɛi ni ajeɔ gbɛ akɛ fɔmɔ nii feɔ lɛ fɛɛ fata Biblia mli wiemɔ ni atsɔɔ shishi akɛ “ajwamaŋbɔɔ” lɛ he.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, akrabatsai ni ji “Te Mafee Tɛŋŋ Mikɛ Ataa loo Awo Agba Bɔlɛnamɔ He Saji?”
Amɛle akɛ bɔlɛnamɔ ni aaaya nɔ yɛ gbalashihilɛ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ ji hebulemɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, ni ejeee “hetsuumɔ” ko kwraa.

“Mɔ Fɛɛ Mɔ Ni Miisumɔ Akɛ Etsɔ Agbo Yɛ Nyɛteŋ Lɛ, Etsɔ Nyɛsɔɔlɔ”: (Min. 10)
Mika, ní hi shi yɛ Yesaia beaŋ lɛ jaje akɛ: “Ájaje nɔ ni hi kɛ nɔ ni Yehowa biɔ yɛ odɛŋ atsɔɔo: no ji akɛ ofee nɔ ni ja gbɛ, ni osumɔ ejurɔfeemɔ, ni okɛ o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ anyiɛ yɛ heshibaa mli.”
Ekolɛ obaabi akɛ, ‘Ani anɔkwa sane ni ji akɛ etamɔ nɔ ni Yehowa efeko nɔ ko yɛ mikaa lɛ he lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ eleee shihilɛ mli ni miyɔɔ lɛ, loo ákɛ esusuuu mihe?’
Shi kɛbashi amrɔ nɛɛ, ani obi nuu lɛ kã he esumɔɔ osane ni ebuɔ bo lolo?
Ekolɛ ehe bahia ni oyatsu weku mli gbɛnaa nii komɛi ahe nii, no hewɔ ni oshi amɛteŋ lɛ.
Kɛ oshɛ helatsamɔhe lɛ, ekolɛ datrɛfoi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome baakɛɛ bo akɛ helatsamɔhei bibii fioo komɛi yɛ nsara lɛ mli, he ni atsuɔ naagbai bibii ahe nii yɛ; ni ahaa akɛ osharai ni eba mɔ nɔ kɛ naagbai ni mli wa he saji yaa helatsamɔhe lɛ.
5 Kɛ́ Asafoŋ Sɔɔmɔ Ajinafoi Akuu lɛ mlinyo ko kɛɛ okɛ mɔ ko ni ekpa shiɛmɔyaa afee Biblia mli nikasemɔ lɛ, ekolɛ ebaaha okɛ lɛ asusu saneyitsei pɔtɛɛ komɛi ni yɔɔ ‘Nyɔŋmɔ Suɔmɔ’ wolo lɛ mli lɛ ahe.
(Mateo 7:28, 29; 9:19-33; 11:28, 29) Wɔbaanyɛ wɔna Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ nilee lɛ yɛ gbɛ ni eŋmɛ ni eha afɔ́ Yesu yɛ weku folo ko kɛkɛ mli lɛ mli.
Akɛ gbɔmɛi ni wɔjɔɔ wɔhe nɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔpɛi wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔmli ni wɔkwɛ akɛ ani wɔmiihi shi yɛ wɔ henɔjɔɔmɔ lɛ naa lo.
Kɛha mumɔŋ sɔlemɔtsu kpeteŋkpele nɛɛ he susumɔ ni yeɔ emuu lɛ, kwɛmɔ saji ni ji “Yehowa Mumɔŋ Sɔlemɔtsu Kpeteŋkpele Lɛ” ni je kpo yɛ July 1, 1996 Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ kɛ “The One True Temple at Which to Worship” ni je kpo yɛ December 1, 1972 The Watchtower lɛ mli lɛ.
(Yeremia 25:11, 12; Daniel 9:1-3) Kɛha “jeŋmaji abe lɛ” mlitsɔɔmɔ fitsofitso lɛ, kwɛmɔ Reasoning From the Scriptures, baafa 95-97 ni Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ fee lɛ mli.
Nyɛhaa wɔkwɛa bɔ ni Anglo-Amerika Jeŋ Hewalɛ lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ eeewo mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ ahe gbeyei lɛ.
Wɔnaa kɛjɛɔ kuku ni ji 6 lɛ nɔ kɛyaa akɛ, Yeremia baahe shikpɔŋ ko kɛjɛ etsɛkwɛ̃ bi ko ŋɔɔ.
Bɔni afee ni ole srɔtofeemɔ ni yɔɔ ‘hiɛjoomɔ ni akɛtsuɔ muji nii’ kɛ “muji nitsumɔ” teŋ lɛ, kwɛmɔ July 15, 2006, Buu-Mɔɔ baafa 29-31 lɛ.
Maŋtsɛ Salomo ni ji nilelɔ lɛ jaje akɛ: “Nɔ̃ kpakpa ko bɛ ha gbɔmɔ fe enɛ, akɛ eye ni enu, ni eha esusuma aye nii kpakpai amli ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ edeŋmegbomɔ lɛ mli.”
(Yakobo 1:15) Taakɛ Yesu bɔ kɔkɔ lɛ, esa akɛ ‘wɔkwɛ jogbaŋŋ’ koni ‘wɔhiɛ ahi wɔhe nɔ jogbaŋŋ yɛ hiɛjoomɔi srɔtoi fɛɛ he,’ jeee ni wɔkɛkpa mɛi krokomɛi ashi akɛ amɛji hiɛjoolɔi lo, shi moŋ koni wɔkɛpɛi wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔmli wɔkwɛ akɛ mɛni ji nɔ ni yeɔ lumɔ yɛ wɔtsuiaŋ.
(Kwɛmɔ saji ni sa kadimɔ lɛ hu.)
Nyɛhaa wɔsusua mumɔŋ shweremɔi ni wɔná nɛɛ ekomɛi ahe wɔkwɛa, ni wɔkwɛ bɔ ni amɛhe baa sɛɛnamɔ kɛhaa wɔ ákɛ aŋkroaŋkroi.
Enɛɛmɛi kɛ ŋmalɛi krokomɛi fɛɛ haa efeɔ faŋŋ akɛ gbohii lɛ nyɛɛɛ ana wɔ, amɛnuuu wɔ wiemɔ, amɛnyɛɛɛ amɛye amɛbua wɔ, ni amɛnyɛɛɛ amɛye wɔ awui hu.
Okɛ yelikɛbuamɔ he ŋaawoi ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni aaafee ni akɛ woji tɛtrɛbii heei baaha lɛ aha.—Kwɛmɔ October 1996 Wɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Sɔɔmɔ lɛ baafa 8 lɛ mli.
4 Kɛ wɔtee shia kɛ shia lɛ, bei pii lɛ, wɔnaa ni mɛi miinyiɛ kɛkɛ loo ni ekolɛ amɛmiimɛ mɔ ko.
Kɛ́ wɔkane Yehowa he sane yɛ Biblia lɛ mli daa lɛ, wɔkɛ wɔhiɛ baafɔ̃ enɔ waa (Kwɛmɔ kuku 17-18)*
16 Mɛni hu Yohane na ekoŋŋ?
Ekolɛ, yɛ Yesu gbele sɛɛ lɛ, Petro gba nakai ninaa ni kɔɔ Kristo ni yɔɔ Maŋtsɛyeli hewalɛ mli lɛ he lɛ etsɔɔ yɛ bei babaoo mli.—Mateo 17:9.
Ahaaa mɔ ko mɔ ko ana gbekɛ lɛ.
Kwɛmɔ sane ni ji “Yehowa Wiemɔ lɛ Hiɛ Kã—Mose Klɛŋklɛŋ Wolo lɛ Mli Saji Otii—I” ni je kpo yɛ January 1, 2004 Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ.
(Kwɛmɔ Neh.
Esa akɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni taoɔ ana lɛ lɛ anu dãa ni wa ni aje gbɛ asaa aha enɛ lɛ.
Kɛ́ okwɛ bɔ ni ekumɔ shi kome nɔŋŋ kɛkɛ lɛ, eyɛ dɔlɛ waa, shi mihiɛ kpaŋ bɔ ni wɔnyɛmimɛi Kristofoi lɛ shɛje wɔmii amɛhã lɛ nɔ kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Herode hu enaaa akɛ Yesu efee nɔ fɔŋ ko, no hewɔ lɛ ekɛ lɛ ku sɛɛ kɛba Pilato ŋɔɔ ekoŋŋ.
Beni okwɛɔ vidio lɛ, kwɛmɔ akɛ obaanyɛ oha sanebimɔi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ ahetoo lo.
Biblia lɛ ní Odasefoi lɛ kɛ Patrick kaseɔ lɛ ha ená adesai ateŋ béi kɛ basabasafeemɔ lɛ naa tsabaa diɛŋtsɛ.
• Abaanyɛ akɛ esha ni wɔnine shɛ nɔ lɛ ato nɔ ni baa kɛji akɛ kɔmpiuta ko mli saji ahe gbɛjianɔtoo fite kɛtsɔ gbɛtsɔɔmɔi komɛi ni akɛtee yɛ kɔmpiuta lɛ mli lɛ ní baanyɛ afite emli nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ he.—Is There a Creator Who Cares About You?, baafa 156.
Kɔmpiutai “Jie” Teemɔŋ Kadimɔ Nii lɛ “Kpo”
Ni akɛni wɔkpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ adesai ni yɔɔ shihilɛ mli ji mɛi ni fee tsɔnei sɔrɔtoi tamɔ kɔɔyɔɔŋ lɛji, televishin, kɛ kompiutai hewɔ lɛ, ani esaaa akɛ wɔkpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ Mɔ ni ha adesai aŋsɔ ni amɛnyɛ amɛkɛfee nɛkɛ nibii nɛɛ hu yɛ shihilɛ mli?
Efɔŋ ebote kɔmpiuta nitsumɔi po mli, ni ehaa gbekɛbii pii kɛ mɛi krokomɛi naa hegbɛ amɛkwɛɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he nibii
Mɛi ni tee shisharamɔ lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo tee Photo Lab, Art Department, Information Services, ní kɛ kɔmpiuta he tsɔsemɔ kɛ ehe yelikɛbuamɔ haa, Service Department ní kwɛɔ asafoi 11,242 kɛ nɔkwɛlɔi gbɛfalɔi 572 anitsumɔ nɔ, kɛ Writing Correspondence, he ni atsuɔ sanebimɔi srɔtoi 14,000 ahe nii yɛ daa afi lɛ.
Kɔmpiuta nɔ shwɛmɔi ni yiwalɛ nifeemɔi yɔɔ mli lɛ woɔ tawuu nii kɛ nitsumɔ he hewalɛ.
Bei pii lɛ kɔmpiutai baanyɛ amɛkɛ hiŋmɛitswai fioo ko pɛ afee nɔ ni ekolɛ akɛ ŋmɛlɛtswai abɔ loo otsii babaoo baatsu he nii yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ.
Shi kɛlɛ, kɔmpiutai ashwapoi komɛi bɛ mla naa hegbɛ, akɛni gbɛjianɔtoi ni akɛwo mli momo lɛ kɛ mla kpãaa gbee hewɔ, ní tsɔɔ akɛ nihelɔ lɛ kuɔ mla mli yɛ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ kɛ nitsumɔ mli.
Kɔmpiuta ni akɛtsɔɔ woji ashishi he nilelɔ kpanaa ni ji Franz Josef Och wie akɛ: “Kɔmpiuta ni wɔfeɔ lɛ kɛ akɔntaabuu gbɛ̀i tsuɔ nii kɛtaoɔ gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni ebaanyɛ etsɔɔ wiemɔ pɔtɛɛ ko shishi.”
(1 Korintobii 6:9, 10) Beni wɔyaa hiɛ yɛ Biblia mli anɔkwa nilee mli lɛ, wɔbayɔseɔ akɛ be ni wɔfiteɔ kɛkwɛɔ mɛi ni tamɔ nakai lɛ ahe sinii, wɔkwɛɔ amɛ yɛ tɛlivishiŋ, loo kɔmpiuta nɔ aloo amɛhe saji ni wɔkaneɔ yɛ woji amli lɛ hu yeɔ awui taakɛ bɔ ni amɛkɛbɔɔ feɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ.
Tɛlifon, faks tsɔnei, kɔmpiutai—namɔ baanyɛ asusu yɛ afii ni eho lɛ amli akɛ be baaba ni abaanyɛ akɛ shɛɛ saji aya je lɛŋ he fɛɛ he yɛ hiŋmɛitswaa mli?
Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, wɔkɛ kɔmpiutai kɛ Intanɛt lɛ tsuɔ nii kɛshiɛɔ wɔhãa mɛi yɛ he fɛɛ he, ekɔɔɔ he eko kɛ́ he ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ etse ehe banee po.
8 Ni te aaakɛɛ tɛŋŋ yɛ ŋmalɛi ni akɛtsu nii yɛ Buu-Mɔɔ Nikasemɔ loo Asafo Woloŋ Nikasemɔ mli ni akɛ kɔmpiuta efee ewo woji anɔ lɛ ni akɛhaa mɛi lɛ he?
5 Kɛha mɛi ni yɔɔ Watchtower Library lɛ yɛ CD-ROM nɔ yɛ amɛwiemɔ mli lɛ, ewaaa kwraa akɛ amɛnine aaashɛ saji ajɛɛhei srɔtoi anɔ yɛ amɛ kɔmpiuta nɔ.
Ani mifiteɔ be babaoo kɛtaa kɔmpiuta hiɛ fe nɔ ni mikɛkaneɔ Biblia lɛ?’
JW Library lɛ baanyɛ aye abua bo ni odaunloodi Biblia lɛ, woji, nibii ni arikɔdi kɛ vidioi owo o-mobail foŋ, tablɛt, loo kɔmpiuta nɔ ní owooo he nyɔmɔ ko.
Amrɔ nɛɛ, nɔ ni feɔ amɛ naakpɛɛ ji akɛ, jeee akɛ akɛ hiɛdɔɔ miisusu nifeemɔi nɛɛ ahe kɛkɛ, shi moŋ mɛi ni tsutsu ko lɛ amɛyeɔ amɛhe fɛo lɛ diɛŋtsɛ miigbɛ sane lɛ miishwã: kɔmpiuta feelɔi, nitsumɔ mli hiɛnyiɛlɔi kɛ maŋkwralɔi.”
Mɛi babaoo yeɔ be ni fa fe nine yɛ tɛlivishiŋ kwɛmɔ mli loo yɛ kɔmpiuta he.
Amrɔ nɛɛ akɛ Biblia lɛ miitsu nii yɛ kɔmpiuta ni akɛtsɔɔ woji ashishi lɛ hu mli.
Afi 1980 afii lɛ bafee tsakemɔ be yɛ wɔnitsumɔi lɛ amli yɛ Brooklyn, be mli ni wɔfoŋ kɛjɛ taipraita kɛ sumui ni akpɛ́ niŋmaa okadii awo nɔ ni akɛkalaa woji lɛ kɛ nitsumɔ nɔ kɛtee kɔmpiuta kɛ nikalamɔ tsɔji anɔ lɛ.
15 Adesa aŋsɔ lɛ haa kompiuta ni atee hiɛ yɛ efeemɔ mli fe fɛɛ lɛ feɔ tamɔ blema nɔ ko.
Nɛgbɛ gbɔmɛi kaseɔ awuiyeli kɛ bɔlɛnamɔ ni esaaa kɛ mumɔi kɛ sisai ahe nii babaoo kɛjɛɔ?— Ani jeee yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi kɛ sinii komɛi amli, kɛ kɔmpiuta kɛ vidio nɔ shwɛmɔi, Internet, kɛ gbekɛbii ashwɛmɔ he woji komɛi ni mfonirii yɔɔ mli lɛ?
EYƐ gbeyei waa akɛ aaaná susumɔ ko ni tsɔɔ akɛ aaatá kɔɔyɔŋ lɛlɛ ko mli kɛya yɛ be mli ni nibii ni atswa awo emli kɔmpiuta lɛ mli lɛ ejaaa.
Amrɔ nɛɛ anyɛɔ akɛ saji ni fa babaoo toɔ disk ni yɔɔ kɔmpiutai amli (hard disks) nɔ aahu akɛ ehe ebahia ni aná akɔntaabuu gbɛi heei koni akɛtsɔɔ saji falɛ ni anyɛɔ akɛtoɔ disk nɛɛ nɔ lɛ mli.
Lɛ ekɛ akɔntaabuu mli nikasemɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ calculus lɛ ba, ni enɛ yeɔ ebuaa yɛ kɔmpiuta feemɔ, gbɛ ni afãa kɛyaa ŋwɛiniiaŋ, kɛ nuklea he nikasemɔ mli.
Kɛ́ awo maŋ he ká lɛ, atsĩɔ niyenii ní jɛɔ sɛɛ kɛbaa maŋ lɛ mli lɛ fɛɛ naa.
(Mateo 24:45-47) Hɛɛ, “tsulɔ” ko ni akɛ nitsumɔ ewo edɛŋ baahi shi koni ekɛ mumɔŋ niyenii aha, “tsulɔ” ní baafee anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ fɛɛ.
8 Israelbii lɛ wie huhuuhu amɛshi Yehowa kɛ enajiaŋdamɔlɔ Mose, yɛ niyenii kɛ nu ni amɛnaaa hewɔ, oookɛɛ amɛbɛ nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi lɛ shishi ji lɛ he odaseyeli lolo.
Efeɔ nakai kɛtsɔ mumɔŋ niyenii ni ekɛhaa yɛ wiemɔi babaoo amli lɛ nɔ.
Kɛtsɔ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ, tsulɔ lɛ najiaŋdamɔlɔi jɛ anɔkwayeli mli amɛkɛ mumɔŋ niyenii babaoo ha Kristofoi anɔkwafoi.
Agbɛnɛ hu kɛ́ nyɛmimɛi komɛi anine shɛ niyenii nɔ lɛ, amɛkɛ mɛi krokomɛi jaa, no hewɔ lɛ Ferdinand bɔi hewalɛnamɔ.
BENI Yesu tsɔɔ naagbee gbii lɛ ahe okadi lɛ, ebi akɛ: “Belɛ namɔ ji tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ, mɔ ni enuŋtsɔ ŋɔ lɛ eto ewebii lɛ anɔ, koni eha amɛ amɛŋmaa yɛ be ni sa nɔ lɛ?”
Be ni naagbee gbii ni jaraa nɛɛ baa enaagbee oyayaayai lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná nɔmimaa akɛ Yehowa baaya nɔ ehã wɔ mumɔŋ ‘niyenii yɛ be ni sa mli.’
+ 8 Ekɛ amɛ fɛɛ aná niyenii falɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ,+ kɛfata nɔ ni ebaaná kɛjɛ etsɛmɛi anibii ni ehɔ̃ɔ lɛ mli lɛ he.

5:2) Kɛfata he lɛ, “tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ” lɛ haa wɔ mumɔŋ niyenii koni ebu wɔhe kɛjɛ sutsakemɔ tsɔɔmɔ, jeŋba sha tsɔne, ninámɔ kɛ gbɛihemɔ sɛɛtiumɔ, kɛ nibii gbohii krokomɛi ni baanyɛ aná wɔnɔ hewalɛ lɛ ahe.

No hewɔ lɛ, “mɛi nyɔŋma kɛ enyɔ lɛ” jaje shihilɛ lɛ kɛtsɔ “hii kpawo ni yɔɔ gbɛi kpakpa” ni amɛhala amɛ koni amɛkwɛ niyenii jaa he “nitsumɔ ni he hiaa” nɔ lɛ nɔ.

19 Eyɛ mli akɛ nɛkɛ Odasefoi abobalɔi nɛɛ yɛ shihilɛ ni mli wa waa mli moŋ, shi amɛbiɔ mumɔŋ niyenii ashi be fɛɛ be kɛtsɔɔ heloonaa nibii ahiɛ.
Bɔ ni amɛyɔɔ he miishɛɛ akɛ amɛnine aaashɛ mumɔŋ niyenii nɔ, yɛ amɛtoi ni nuuu nii jogbaŋŋ kɛ amɛhiŋmɛi ni enaaa nii jogbaŋŋ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ maa nɔ mi akɛ “jeee aboloo kɛkɛ haa gbɔmɔ yi naa wala; shi moŋ wiemɔ fɛɛ wiemɔ ni jɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ daaŋ lɛ.”
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔye niyenii krɛdɛɛ ko ni wɔjie wɔ hiɛtserɛ kɛtsɔ shwɛmɔi anɔ.

Mɛni hewɔ nakai tsakemɔ lɛ bafee ‘ŋmaa yɛ be ni sa nɔ’ lɛ?—Mat.
Mi-tsɛ jo fɛfɛo kɛ waa hu eyɛ mli akɛ aana gbɔlɛ yɛ ehe.

Asafoi ni gbeɔ amɛshikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli nitsumɔ naa kɛtsɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Sanekpakpa Nɔmba 36 lɛ ni amɛkɛhaa shiatsɛmɛi ni yɔɔ shia fɛɛ shia loo shihilɛhe fɛɛ shihilɛhe lɛ nɔ lɛ baanyɛ ni amɛkɛ Taoɔ wolo bibioo loo Nilee wolo lɛ aha.

21 Bɔfo lɛ “damɔ hulu mli,” gbɛhe ko ni adamɔɔ nɔ akɛ famɔ haa ni akɛgbalaa ŋwɛi loofɔji ajwɛŋmɔ.
Okropɔŋi ni fãa kɛyahiɔ he kroko lɛ naa kɔɔyɔŋ dɔlɛ lɛ kɛtsɔɔ loofɔji krokomɛi ni yeɔ kooloi aloo ni amɛkwɛɔ amɛ lɛ nɔ.
Taakɛ loofɔlɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ Clark’s nutcracker ni atsĩ etã kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ feɔ lɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni nuu ni yɔɔ abɛbua nɛɛ mli lɛ miisaa ehe kɛmiito kɛha nibii ni he baahia lɛ wɔsɛɛ.

11 Amɛkɛ hekpokpomɔ aaajɛ Ejipt aba tamɔ loofɔlɔ,
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ Yesu miitao koni ebɔfoi lɛ agbala amɛjwɛŋmɔ kɛya loofɔlɔ ko ni edaaa kwraa ni he bɛ sɛɛnamɔ kwraa lɛ nɔ.
Ni beni eshwãa lɛ, eko yanyɔ gbɛ toi, ni anaanaa nɔ, ni ŋwɛi loofɔji ba bakɔlɔ.
Herodotus ni ji Hela yinɔsaneŋmalɔ ni hi shi yɛ afi 400 D.Ŋ.B. lɛ wie adesãi ni Arabiabii lɛ tãa ni kɔɔ loofɔji ni he yɔɔ gbeyei ni kɛ sinamon tso hetotoi feɔ tsui yɛ gɔji ni anyɛɛɛ nɔ aya lɛ nɔ lɛ he.
10 No hewɔ lɛ, eŋɔ enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ, ni efolɔ amɛmli enyɔnyɔɔnyɔ, ni ekɛ fã fɛɛ fã ŋmɛ efã kroko lɛ ŋɛlɛ nɔ,* shi loofɔji lɛ, efolɔɔɔ amɛmli.
6 “Kɛ́ onyiɛ gbɛ nɔ ni ona loofɔlɔ tsũ ko, yɛ tso nɔ jio, shikpɔŋ jio, ni loofɔlɔ bii loo wɔji yɛ mli, ni loofɔlɔ nyɛ lɛ bu bii lɛ loo wɔji lɛ anɔ lɛ, no lɛ, kaamɔ nyɛ lɛ kɛ ebii lɛ fɛɛ.

Wiemɔ ni ji “ŋwɛi” ni akɛtsu nii yɛ 2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 2:11 tsɔɔ (Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔŋ shihilɛhe lɛ; jeŋ muu fɛɛ ni anaa lɛ; shikpɔŋ lɛ kɔɔyɔŋ gbɛ, he ni loofɔji filikiɔ yɛ ni kɔɔyɔɔ tswaa yɛ lɛ).
Ni ŋwɛi loofɔji lɛ fɛɛ efiliki kɛtee.

49 Bɔ ni afee ni atsuu shĩa lɛ he kɛjɛ ehe ni tseee* lɛ mli lɛ, eŋɔ loofɔji enyɔ kɛ tseneduru tso kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ hisopo.
Loofɔji ní fãa kɛyahiɔ he kroko lɛ kwɛɔ ŋulamii lɛ, bɔ ni shikpɔŋ lɛ hewalɛ ní gbalaa nii lɛ shikamɔ yɔɔ, loo amɛmligbɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ nɔ kroko ni amɛkɛfãa gbɛ lɛ.
(Abɛi 30:24) Lɛɛlɛŋ, tsatsubii akui toɔ amɛhe gbɛjianɔ yɛ gbɛ ní yɔɔ fɛo diɛŋtsɛ nɔ.
10 Namɔ tsɔɔ tsatsubii bɔ ni abuaa niyenii anaa atoɔ yɛ latsaa be mli koni amɛye yɛ fɛi be mli lɛ?
Kɛkɛ lɛ Yama bɔfoi lɛ egbala lɛ, beni amɛbolɔɔ kɛ bolɔmɔi ni yɔɔ gbeyei ni hiɛnɔkamɔ bɛ mli kɛtsɔɔ shikpɔŋ ni Kusa [tsei] egbɛ eshwa nɔ, kɛ ŋmei, gbɔtsuii, akontiai kɛ tɛi, ni miitso kɛ la haai yɛ hei komɛi, ni bui eyi nɔ obɔ, ni hulu dɔlɛ eha edɔ klakla ni ekpɛmɔ eha eetso lɛ nɔ.
Ato tsatsubii ahe gbɛjianɔ yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ni amɛkɛ amɛhe tsuɔ nii yɛ ekomefeemɔ mli.
Ato tsatsubii ahe gbɛjianɔ jogbaŋŋ yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ.
Kɛ wɔfee mɛi ni “yaa tsatsu ŋɔɔ” ni wɔkɛ nɔ ni wɔkaseɔ kɛjɛɔ eŋɔɔ lɛ tsuɔ nii lɛ, wɔbaana miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.

(1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 5:13) Nɛkɛ Maŋtsɛ Salomo nɛɛ nɔŋŋ ŋma akɛ: “Hejɔ̃lɔ, yaa tsatsu ŋɔɔ; jwɛŋmɔ egbɛi lɛ ahe ni ole nii!
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ atsɔ abu Salomo nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ ni kɔɔ tsatsubii ni buaa ŋmaakpamɔ niyenii anaa amɛtoɔ lɛ bem yɛ?
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, ato tsatsubii ahe gbɛjianɔ akɛ kui ni hiɔ shi yɛ hekome, ni amɛyɛ maŋnyɛ, nitsulɔi, kɛ hii.
Tsu Nii Waa Tamɔ Tsatsu
Eji anɔkwale akɛ, tsatsu maŋnyɛ lɛ yɛ jɛmɛ, shi eji maŋnyɛ yɛ shishinumɔ naa akɛ eŋmɛɔ wɔji ni eji shihemɔhe lɛ nyɛ.
Salomo wo ŋaa akɛ: “Hejɔ̃lɔ, yaa tsatsu ŋɔɔ; jwɛŋmɔ egbɛ̀i lɛ ahe ni ole nii!”
Kɛ́ ootao saji babaoo yɛ tsatsu ni tseɔ baa lɛ he lɛ, kwɛmɔ Awake!
Kpeeibaa baanyɛ afee nɔ ko hee ko kwraa kɛha weku lɛ.
Weku ni Bɛ Miishɛɛ
Ani eeenyɛ ebalɛ akɛ agbɛnɛ weku lɛ mlibii krokomɛi baanyɛ amɛkɛ yelikɛbuamɔ aha, koni no aha onyɛ osaa obote gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli ekoŋŋ?
Beni shɛɔ afi 1941 hulutsoo be mli ní mikɛ sɔlemɔ eto gbɛjianɔ nyɔji babaoo sɛɛ lɛ, no mli lɛ mi kɛ Marion kɛ shika eto, ni wɔhé gbɛfaa shwiili ni kɛlɛ ji mitai 5.5 ní wɔweku lɛ baanyɛ ahi mli.
Mikase nɔ̃ hamɔ yɛ weku nɛɛ dɛŋ.”
Yinɔsane tsɔɔ akɛ be mli ni weku gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ fiteɔ lɛ, hewalɛ ni akutsei kɛ maji lɛ yɔɔ lɛ mli gbɔjɔɔ.
Wɔgba he sane ákɛ weku.
No mli lɛ, mɛi 17 pɛ feɔ Betel weku muu lɛ fɛɛ.

Mɛɛ sanekpakpa ayaa nɔ ashiɛɔ ŋmɛnɛ?
1 Yɛ be mli ni wɔkɛ wɔnyɛmimɛi yeɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔfee nɔ ni hi ni baaha amɛnane amɔ shi.

No hewɔ lɛ shika tsakelɔi lɛ eto amɛ okpɔlɔi lɛ yɛ sɔlemɔtsu lɛ mli tuuntu, ni amɛheɔ eko fɛɛ eko ní amɛtsakeɔ lɛ he nyɔmɔwoo.
Wɔbaaná niyenii kpakpa ni ŋɔɔ babaoo wɔye.
▪ Esa ákɛ akɛ plɛtei, glasei kɛ okpɔlɔ ni sa kɛ enɔhaanɔ kpakpa aba asa lɛ nɔ ní áto amamɔ shi kɛtsɔ hiɛ.
Biblia Mli Woji Lɛ Ahe Saji
(Romabii 16:17, 18; 2 Petro 2:3) Ani jeee nɔ ni obaakpa gbɛ kɛjɛ daimonioi okpɔlɔ nɔ nɛ?
Okɛ hiɛsɔɔ aye mumɔŋ niyenii ni Yehowa okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ pɛ atoɔ yɛ lɛ, ni apasa tsɔɔlɔi loo mumɔi fɔji nyɛŋ bo alaka.
Yehowa okpɔlɔ, daimonioi akpɔlɔ (21)
Osɔfo lɛ shɛ Biblia lɛ efɔ okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ, ni ekɛɛ ehe ehiaaa ni ekɛ ŋmalɛi afi nɔ ko sɛɛ.
Sablai ni akɛtsɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ Lalai Awolo lɛ mli, taakɛ ejeɔ kpo yɛ Fivefold Psalter, afi 1513 nɔ lɛ mli
No sɛɛ lɛ tsɔɔmɔ lɛ emli saji ni ato naa lɛ, ni ogbala mli kuku otsɔɔ lɛ akɛ, kɛji mɔ ko kɛ ehe woɔ jamɔ mli loo efeee nakai po lɛ, jamɔ mli saji ni mli wa lɛ naa eshihilɛ nɔ hewalɛ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsɔ wɔjie bulɛ kpo wɔtsɔɔ Yehowa mumɔŋ okpɔlɔ lɛ?
Kɛji wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli aka shi lɛ, no lɛ, sɛi nɔ ni wɔɔta yɛ okpɔlɔ sɛɛ lɛ baanyɛ aye abua babaoo fe ni wɔɔkã shi yɛ saa nɔ loo wɔɔta akpasa ni hejɔlɛ yɔɔ mli lɛ mli.
(Yesaia 65:11) Niyenii kɛ dãa okpɔlɔ ní amɛŋmɛɔ amɛhaa “shade wɔŋ” kɛ “shɛɛ mli wɔŋ” lɛ hewɔ lɛ, nɛkɛ Yudafoi sɛɛsɛɛyalɔi nɛɛ kɛ amɛhe eyawo jeŋmaji wɔŋjalɔi lɛ awɔŋjamɔ nifeemɔi lɛ amli.

Wɔbaanyɛ wɔsusu jogbaŋŋ akɛ, gbɛfaa ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ baanyɛ atee haomɔ kɛ yeyeeye-feemɔ shi, shi, Epafrodito (ni jeee Epafra ni jɛ Kolose lɛ) miisumɔ ni etsu nakai nitsumɔ ni wa lɛ.

Eŋma kɛyaha asafo ni yɔɔ Tesalonika lɛ akɛ: “Akɛni wɔsumɔɔ nyɛ jogbaŋŋ nɛkɛ hewɔ lɛ, wɔyɛ he tsui akɛ jeee Nyɔŋmɔ sanekpakpa lɛ kɛkɛ wɔkɛaaha nyɛ, shi moŋ wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔwala tete, ejaakɛ wɔmiisumɔ nyɛ naakpa.”
Yɛ nikasemɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ mli lɛ, abaasusu bɔ ni kɛ́ aha hiŋmɛi nɔ tse, atiu mumɔŋ otii asɛɛ, ni afee gbɛkɛ Weku Jamɔ daa otsi lɛ ebaaha weku muu lɛ fɛɛ he awa yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ he.
Tsuji kɛ amɛhiɛ fɔ̃ɔ amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi anɔ kɛhã niyenii kɛ hebuu. Shi kɛfata he lɛ, amɛhãa amɛhiɛ hiɔ amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi lɛ anɔ daa, koni amɛna nɔ ni amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi lɛ miisumɔ ni amɛfee, ni amɛtsu he nii.
Perowne miisumɔ gbɛi “Yehowa” lɛ, ejaakɛ ale yɛ he fɛɛ he.

Ojogbaŋŋ, enu he akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ ehe ekeŋ lɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ, shi eesumɔ ni ekase ehe nii hu yɛ ebii lɛ ahewɔ.
Ojogbaŋŋ, aŋma nakai wolo ni gbekɛ nuu ko ŋma eha etsɛ lɛ yɛ blema Mizraim, nɔ ni fe afii 2,000 ni eho nɛ.

Bɔ ni afee ni Kristofoi lɛ ahe awa yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ, mɛni ehe bahia ni amɛfee?

Ojogbaŋŋ, taakɛ bɔ ni wɔna lɛ, béi te shi yɛ bɔfoi lɛ po ateŋ ni amɛbɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛdi amɛ pɛsɛmkunya taomɔ nii asɛɛ.

Tsu nii waa tamɔ tsatsu
Mɛɛ anɔkwa saji ni kɔɔ tsatsu he taa otsuiŋ waa?
Ato tsatsubii ahe gbɛjianɔ awo kui kui amli, ni yɛ kui nɛɛ ateŋ babaoo amli lɛ ayɛ tsatsu henɔi srɔtoi etɛ: maŋnyɛmɛi, hii, kɛ nitsulɔi.
13, 14. (a) Tsatsubii kɛ bɔɔ nii krokomɛi tsɔɔ akɛ “amɛle nii pam” yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ, ni mɛni no tsɔɔ wɔ yɛ amɛ-Bɔlɔ lɛ he?
Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔtsu nii dɛŋdɛŋ taakɛ tsatsu feɔ lɛ?
Eŋma akɛ: “Hejɔ̃lɔ, yaa tsatsu ŋɔɔ; jwɛŋmɔ egbɛi lɛ ahe ni ole nii!
Nilelɔ Maŋtsɛ Salomo wie nilee ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛduro tsatsubii lɛ he, ni edamɔ no nɔ etsɔɔ nɔ ko ni he hiaa waa.
Mɛni Hewɔ Akɛɔ akɛ “Yaa Tsatsu Ŋɔɔ” Lɛ?
Bɔ ni etɔ wɔ sɔŋŋ hewɔ lɛ, wɔnyɛɛɛ shi wɔte, shi etsɛɛɛ ni amɛkpa wɔ tsɛ̃rɛmɔ.
Salomo kɛfata he akɛ: “Jwɛŋmɔ [tsatsu] gbɛi lɛ ahe ni ole nii.
Tsatsubii akui komɛi lɛ̀ɔ kooloi bibii komɛi ní atsɛɔ amɛ aphid, ni amɛbuɔ amɛhe, ni amɛnáa amɛniyenii mli hewalɛ kɛjɛɔ amɛmli, tamɔ nɔ ni amɛji lɛ̀ɛ kooloi pɛpɛɛpɛ.
BLEMA Israel Maŋtsɛ Salomo nilelɔ lɛ kɛ ŋaawoo nɛɛ ha akɛ: “Yaa tsatsu ŋɔɔ.”
• Yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ tsatsu bɛ kojolɔ, taakɛ atsĩ tã yɛ Abɛi 6:6-8, ni kɛlɛ ekɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa haa wɔ lɛ?
Gbɔtsuii nɛɛ asu yɛ sɔrɔtoi, ejaakɛ fɛɛ damɔ shikpɔŋ sũ ni tsatsũbii lɛ kɛmamɔ gbɔtsuii lɛ nɔ, ni amɛkɛlɛmɔ shɛɔ ninetalɔi etɛ kɛmiiya kpaanyɔ.
Amɛjieɔ nui nɛɛ kɛjɛɔ tsatsubii nɛɛ amli, yɛ be mli ni tsatsubii asraafoi lɛ shwieɔ henyɛlɔi fɛɛ ni batutuaa amɛ lɛ kɛyaa lɛ.
Shi, te fee tɛŋŋ ni nɛkɛ tsatsubii nɛɛ na le yɛ latsaa be mli akɛ fɛi be miiba, kɛ nilee ni aaaha amɛle nɔ ni esa akɛ amɛfee yɛ he?
6 Anihaolɔ, yaa tsatsu ŋɔɔ;+
Nɔ ni Tsɛmɛi ni Tsɔ Nikae Hiɛ lɛ Tsɔɔ
Taakɛ tsatsu ji lɛ, ani esaaa akɛ wɔ hu wɔtsuɔ nii waa?
Ani otsuɔ nii dɛŋdɛŋ tamɔ tsatsu ni tseɔ baa lɛ?
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, susumɔ bɔ ni tsatsu le nii pam lɛ he okwɛ.—Nyɛkanea Abɛi 30:24, 25.
• tsatsu ŋɔɔ?
Yɛ tsatsubii sɔrɔtoi lɛ ekomɛi agbɛfaŋ lɛ, tsatsubii nitsulɔi lɛ buaa tsatsubii ni yagbalaa niyenii amli nui amɛwoɔ amɛmli kɛbaa lɛ anaa amɛwoɔ tsũi ni amɛmamɔ lɛ amli.
11 Gbɔmɔ ni damɔ sequoia tso wulu shishi, ni edalɛ kɛ efɛo lɛ eha enaa ekpɛ ehe lɛ, nuɔ shishi akɛ etamɔ tsatsu bibioo ko yɛ tso nɛɛ shishi.
Nyɛhãa Yehowa sɔɔmɔ afea nɔ ni he hiaa nyɛ fe fɛɛ yɛ nyɛweku lɛ mli
Oweku lɛ baanyɛ ana Yehowa sɔlemɔtsu lɛ maa yɛ Yerusalem, ana bɔ ni Babilon asraafoi lɛ kpata hiɛ, ni amɛna bɔ ni Amralo Zerubabel ku sɛɛ ema ekoŋŋ lɛ.
AFƆ mi awo weku ko ni sumɔɔ jamɔ mli yɛ December 31, afi 1921 lɛ mli.
Ewie akɛ mɛi ni nyɛɛɛ ana miishɛɛ ni weku nikasemɔ kɛbaa lɛ eko lɛ asane dɔɔ lɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
7 Nyɛmi yoo ko ŋma kɛkɔ weku jamɔ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ he akɛ: “Ehaa wɔkaseɔ saji srɔtoi babaoo.”
Kɛji akɛ oyɛ gbekɛbii bibii loo ooto gbɛjianɔ ni ona weku lɛ, obaanyɛ okwɛ akɛ ani nɔtsamɔ skul ni sa yɛ he ni oyɔɔ lɛ lo.
4, 5. (a) Mɛɛ be ni te fee tɛŋŋ ni duŋ baha adesa loo kpɔmɔ aba?
Beni adafitswaa wolo nɛɛ wieɔ niiamlitaomɔ ko ni Gbɛjianɔtoo ko ni Pɛiɔ Weku Saji Amli lɛ fee lɛ he lɛ, etsɔɔ akɛ nɔ ni eha gbalamlitsemɔ efa babaoo yɛ Spain lɛ jɛɛɛ “hewalɛ ni jamɔi nyɛɛɛ aná yɛ amɛmli bii lɛ anɔ dɔŋŋ kɛ jeŋba he mlai ni efite” lɛ pɛ kɛkɛ, shi moŋ nibii enyɔ nɛɛ hu fata he—nomɛi ji, “yei ni eyafata mɛi ni shiɔ shĩa kɛyatsuɔ nii kɛha nyɔmɔwoo lɛ ahe, kɛ hii ni yeee amɛbuaaa amɛŋamɛi yɛ shĩa nifeemɔi amli.”
Kɛ nyɛmiikane Biblia lɛ akɛ weku lɛ, feemɔ saji lɛ ahe mfoniri yɛ ojwɛŋmɔ mli, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ ni amɛtsɔɔ lɛ nɔ
Yei yɛ amɛweku he miishɛɛ babaoo fe maŋkwramɔŋ saji.
“Kɛ́ wekui kɛ ŋaawoo nɛɛ tsu nii lɛ, te osusuɔ akɛ ebaasa amɛhe eha tɛŋŋ?
Akɛni Maŋ lɛ kudɔɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ hewɔ lɛ, enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ eweku lɛ naŋ niyenii ni ajaa lɛ eko.
Enɛ he miihia ejaakɛ kɛ́ nuu ko baaná sɔɔmɔ hegbɛ lɛ, akwɛɔ bɔ ni eweku mli bii lɛ wieɔ kɛ bɔ ni amɛfeɔ amɛnii amɛhaa.
Ni nine ni ooofɔ̃ lɛ koni ebafata oweku lɛ he kɛfã gbɛ kɛya kpee loo hiɛtserɛjiemɔ ko shishi lɛ hu?
Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, ekɛ eŋa lɛ ‘baasusu saji ahe’ koni amɛkpɛ amɛyiŋ, bɔ ni amɛbaanyɛ amɛkɛ amɛshika atsu nii yɛ gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ nɔ, koni ehe aba sɛɛnamɔ kɛha weku muu lɛ fɛɛ.
Eji miishɛɛ sane akɛ mɛi ni kɛ wekui ahe nikasemɔ efee amɛnitsumɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ emu saji anaa nakai nɔŋŋ.
Abaanyɛ atsɛ mfonirii ni nitsumɔhe nɛɛ kɛtoɔ lɛ akɛ “wɔweku lɛ he mfonirii.”
Wiemɔi ni ahaa kɛtsaraa nɔ nɛɛ yitso ji, “Nyɔŋmɔ Gbeyeishemɔ Tsirɛɔ Wɔ koni Wɔbo Ŋwɛi Taomɔ Nii Atoi,” ni egbala jwɛŋmɔ kɛtee weku lɛ nɔ.
(Yohane 8:29) Yoo ni baa ehe shi ehaa ewu yitsoyeli lɛ yɛ suɔmɔ kɛ bulɛ ni eyɔɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ hewɔ lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni eha miishɛɛ ahi eweku shihilɛ lɛ mli.
Eyɛ mli akɛ ewa akɛ abaaná niyenii, shi niyenii he ehiaaa Erika tsɔ kɛha weku lɛ.
Nɔ ni jɛ mli ba ji akɛ, anɔkwale lɛ ná shishinumɔ kpele ko kɛha weku lɛ fɛɛ, ni minu he akɛ mitsui enyɔ mimli babaoo.
(b) Mɛɛ naagbai komɛi wekui kɛkpeɔ be mli ni amɛbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛyashɛ kpeei ashishi mra lɛ?
Wɔyamamɔɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asai yɛ hei srɔtoi, ni eko fɛɛ eko heɔ otsii fioo ko.
Kɛ́ nakai ni lɛ, obaanyɛ obi sane nɛɛ kɛje osanegbaa lɛ shishi akɛ: “Shika enyiɛ esa akɛ nuu ko aná koni enyɛ ehã eweku aná miishɛɛ?”
Mɛni kɛ fɔlɔ-kome wekui ni etee nɔ efa babaoo lɛ ba, ni te esaa mɛi ni yɔɔ mli lɛ ahe ehaa tɛŋŋ?
Shi amɛheloonaa nitsumɔ lɛ kɛ shĩa kwramɔ haaa amɛná be tsɔ kɛya shiɛmɔ.
Beni eku ekuɛ ekwɛ afii 25 ni ekɛsɔmɔ yɛ be fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mibɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ mawo mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ hewalɛ kɛtsɔ amɛ ni mikɛyaa shiɛmɔ, saramɔ ni miyasaraa amɛ, nine ni mifɔ̃ɔ amɛ kɛbaa mishĩa kɛha niyeli, kɛ okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ ni tswaa mɔ emaa shi yɛ mumɔŋ ni mitoɔ he gbɛjianɔ lɛ nɔ.
Shi beni ekɛ afii 16 ehi gbalashihilɛ mli sɛɛ lɛ, Michael bayoo akɛ kɛ ejɛ nitsumɔ ni eba eŋa, Adrian ŋɔɔ yɛ shia lɛ, efeɔ tamɔ nɔ ni esanegbaa gbɛi fɛɛ laajeɔ.
Wɔbote gbalashihilɛ mli yɛ jɛmɛ yɛ October afi 1932, ni wɔye wɔ yookpeemɔ sɛɛ hejɔɔmɔ lɛ yɛ shĩa ko ni gbɛgbalɔi babaoo yɔɔ mli lɛ mli, ni wɔtsu gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ yɛ nakai beaŋ nɔŋŋ!
1 Ani obaasumɔ ni oshiɛ yɛ shikpɔŋkuku ni mɛi fɔɔ gbɔi heremɔ ni amɛyɛ shia be fɛɛ be lɛ mli?
Blikãi hu kɛ jɛmɛ efee amɛshihilɛhe.

▪ Amrɔ nɛɛ ni wɔnine eshɛ Nilee Ni Kɛ Mɔ Yaa Naanɔ Wala Mli wolo lɛ nɔ lɛ, esa akɛ afee shia Biblia mli nikasemɔ kɛyashi mɛɛ be?
Akɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ Biblia mli anɔkwale lɛ he miishɛɛ lɛ je shia Biblia mli nikasemɔ shishi.
Mɛi babaoo ni sɛɛ mli lɛ ehe bahiaa koni amɛku sɛɛ kɛya amɛmaŋ lɛ enyɛ amɛkɛ amɛ wiemɔ mli hesaa lɛ etsu nii kɛye kɛbua mɛi ni amɛmaŋ wiemɔ ji Spain wiemɔ lɛ.
5 Nyɛkãa He Nyɛtsua Nitsumɔ Nɛɛ: Nyɛhaa wɔtaoa gbɛ̀i anɔ ni wɔɔtsɔ ni wɔgba sanekpakpa lɛ he sane wɔtsɔɔ gbɔmɛi anɔkwafoi babaoo—yɛ amɛshiai amli, yɛ gbɛjegbɛi anɔ, yɛ tɛlifoŋ nɔ, kɛ kɛtsɔ trukaa odaseyeli nɔ.
Misɔmɔ yɛ asafoi ni yɔɔ Sydney lɛ ateŋ ekome mli ni mifee shia Biblia mli nikasemɔi babaoo.
Ni shia fɛɛ shia ni nyɛaabote mli lɛ, jɛi nyɛhia kɛyashi nyɛaaje jɛi.”
Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔkɛ dɛhiɛmɔ wolo lɛ atsu nii yɛ mɛi ni bɛ shĩa lɛ agbɛfaŋ yɛ be kɛ beaŋ?
Kɛ́ okɛ watsi ni jara wa, kar, loo shia po ke onaanyo ko lɛ, nakai naanyo lɛ baada shi ni ebaaná miishɛɛ, ni obaaná miishɛɛ ni yɔɔ nɔhamɔ mli lɛ.
(Yoshua 22:26, 27, NW) Najiaŋdamɔlɔi lɛ ku amɛsɛɛ kɛtee shia kɛ miishɛɛ, ejaakɛ tɔmɔ ko bɛ amɛ nyɛmimɛi lɛ ahe.
Kɛji akɛ yitsoyeli kpakpa bɛ shia lɛ mli lɛ, ani amɛbaaná mumɔŋ shihilɛ ni he hiaa koni amɛje Yehowa gbi lɛ mli shweshweeshwe?
Susumɔ niyenii sɔrɔtoi, atadei, lalai, nibii ni atɛŋ, kɛ shiai ni yɔɔ je lɛŋ fɛɛ lɛ he okwɛ.
Yɛ September 1994 mli lɛ, ato woji akalamɔ nitsumɔ shishi yɛ Betel Shia ni yɔɔ Havana lɛ.
Yoo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Ekolɛ mileee bɔ ni akɛ shika toɔ moŋ, shi miwu hu leee bɔ ni nibii—tamɔ niyenii, nibii ni akɛsaa tsũ mli, kɛ weku lɛ hiamɔ nii krokomɛi—ajara ewa eha, ni miji mɔ ni hiɔ shĩa titri.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Wɔyaaa shia kɛ shia wɔyawieee suɔmɔ he kɛkɛ.
“Be ni ajie polisifoi ni tsuɔ nii yɛ teemɔŋ lɛ ní amɛmiishi Odasefonyo ko shinaa lɛ yɛ vidio lɛ mli lɛ, mibɔi gbeyei shemɔ.
Farisifoi lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, kɛ́ mɔ ko jɔɔ eshika, loo nɔ ko ni eyɔɔ lɛ nɔ ehã Nyɔŋmɔ akɛ nɔkeenɔ lɛ, eji sɔlemɔwe lɛ nii, no hewɔ lɛ, mɔ lɛ nyɛŋ ekɛfee nɔ kroko.
Atsɔse Paul, ni ji oblanyo fioo ko ni jɛ Bastia, Corsica lɛ awo Katolik jamɔ lɛ mli, ni yɛ be kɛ beaŋ lɛ, ekɛ ehe woɔ sɔlemɔ lɛ nifeemɔi lɛ amli, tamɔ keeki hɔɔmɔ koni akɛná shika aha Katolik yelikɛbuamɔ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ nɛkɛ.
Ani enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ ehiii akɛ anáa shika?— Dabi.
Ekaba kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ wɔbaahã shika kɛ heloonaa nibii ahe ahia wɔ fe naanyobɔɔ ni yɔɔ wɔ kɛ Yehowa teŋ lɛ
Yɛ no gbii lɛ amli lɛ, wein guɔyelɔi ni yeee anɔkwa lɛ shiɔ amɛwein lɛ mli koni efa ni amɛna shika babaoo.
Festus, ni kwɛ tooyeli kɛ shika akɔntaabuu nɔ yɛ Yehowa Odasefoi asafo ko mli yɛ Afrika Anaigbɛ lɛ he bafí lɛ waa yɛ shika gbɛfaŋ.
Kristofoi ateŋ mɛi fioo komɛi emale yɛ nitsumɔhe, amɛtswa ojo, loo amɛju shika kɛ nibii krokomɛi po.—1 Tim.
(2 Korintobii 8:12; 9:7) Tertullian ŋma akɛ: “Ni kɛ adeka ko ma shi ni akɛheɔ shika po lɛ, enɛ jeee shika ni aheɔ dani abote jamɔhei lɛ amli, tamɔ nɔ ni akɛɛ jamɔ ji nitsumɔ mli yelikɛfuamɔ ko.
(Jajelɔ 7:11, 12; Abɛi 2:7; 3:21) Eyɛ mli akɛ shika kɛ hebuu falɛ ko haa koni eha mɔ ni yɔɔ shika lɛ nine ashɛ nɔ ni etaoɔ lɛ nɔ moŋ, shi shika lɛ baanyɛ alaaje hu.
Yuda yeee shika ni etsɔ gbɛ gbonyo nɔ ená lɛ, ejaakɛ eyashɛrɛ shika lɛ eshwie sɔlemɔwe lɛ ni etee eyawo esɛ̃ kpãa.—Mat.
Álaka mɛi pii ni aha amɛhe amɛye akɛ, kɛ amɛkɛ shika wo nitsumɔ ko mli nɔŋŋ pɛ lɛ, amɛbaanyɛ amɛna nii oya yɛ gbɛ ni waaa nɔ, ni ehe ehiaŋ ni amɛtsu he nii babaoo aloo ekolɛ amɛtsuŋ nɔ ko kwraa po.
Beni gbekɛbii lɛ da kɛshɛ he ko ni amɛbaanyɛ amɛhiɛ shika nɔŋŋ lɛ, amɛfɔlɔi tsɔɔ amɛ ní amɛkɛ shika awo tooyeli adeka lɛ mli yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ.
Bei pii lɛ shika sɛɛ ni adiɔ lɛ tsɔɔ amɛgbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ ni amɛkɛshãa afɔle, amɛnanemɛi, kɛ amɛweku tete po.
Ani esa akɛ mikɛ mishika awo nitsumɔ nɛɛ mli?
Akɛ shika loo aŋkroaŋkro nikeenii akamaje gboklɛfoi lɛ, yɛ anɔkwale ni eji akɛ abaanyɛ abi enɛ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ.
Ani mihiɔ shi yɛ nɔ ni Biblia lɛ wieɔ yɛ shika he lɛ naa?
Midamɔ shi mikwɛ ŋmɔshi nibii lɛ, shi shika ni mihiɛ lɛ shɛɛɛ eko kwraa hemɔ.
13 Esa akɛ afo nuu fɛɛ nuu ni afɔ yɛ oshĩa lɛ, kɛ nuu fɛɛ nuu ni okɛ oshika hé lɛ ketia,+ ni esa akɛ mikpaŋmɔ ni yɔɔ nyɛheloo mli lɛ atsɔ naanɔ kpaŋmɔ.
Nibii ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ fe fɛɛ ní akpá shi ana yɛ adesai ajeŋba he lɛ ateŋ ekome ji akɛ, shika kɛ heloonaa nibii ní abuaa naa babaoo lɛ kɛ tsui ní nyɔɔ mɔ mli kɛ miishɛɛ ní fá babaoo tamɔ nakai baaa.
Yelikɛbuamɔ gbɛjianɔtoi komɛi woɔ shika babaoo amɛhaa mɛi ni tsuɔ shika taomɔ he nii lɛ, loo amɛfiteɔ shika waa yɛ adafitswaa saji ni amɛkɛtaoɔ shika lɛ he, ni no haa shika ni amɛnine shɛɔ nɔ lɛ fioo pɛ shwɛɔ kɛha yiŋtoo hewɔ ni atsuɔ shika lɛ.
9-11. (a) Mɛɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ Yesu wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Mateo 22:21 lɛ kɛhaa wɔ yɛ bɔ ni wɔkɛ shika tsuɔ nii wɔhaa lɛ he?
12, 13. (a) Mɛni wɔkaseɔ yɛ mɔbɔnalɛ he yɛ abɛbua ni kɔɔ tsulɔ ni hiɛ enuŋtsɔ nyɔmɔ babaoo lɛ he lɛ mli?
Ottoman nɔyeli lɛ feɔ klalo kɛkpaa blematsɛ, ni amɛheɔ mɔ kroko kɛnáa shika.
Biblia mli wiemɔi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ woɔ wɔ hewalɛ waa, akɛ: ‘Shikasuɔmɔ akaba nyɛshihilɛ mli, ni nyɛmii ashɛa nibii ni yɔɔ amrɔ nɛɛ he.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni Paulo aaatsɔɔ shika yibɔ ko loo oha mlijaa ko lɛ, etsɔɔ ejwɛŋmɔ kɛkɛ akɛ, “daa otsi mli klɛŋklɛŋ gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ . . . atĩa shika ko ato, yɛ bɔ ni enáa lɛ naa.”
128 52 Ekɛ Aboloo Fioo kɛ Loo Lɛ́ Mɛi Akpei Abɔ
Taakɛ 1 Mose 1:28 lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, nakai suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ hu ji nɔ̃ kpakpa: “Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ amɛ, ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: Nyɛfɔa ni nyɛyi afáa ni nyɛyia shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ, ni nyɛnaanaa nɔ, ni nyɛyea ŋshɔŋloi kɛ ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ kooloo fɛɛ kooloo ni tsiɔ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.”
Beni Yona tee nu lɛ shishi lɛ, ŋshɔŋ loo agbo ko mi lɛ.
Manu—adesai aweku lɛ blematsɛ; ŋshɔŋ loo agbo ko here eyiwala kɛjɛ nu afua ni fite nii lɛ mli
Yesu bi akɛ: “Shi [m]ɛɛ tsɛ yɔɔ nyɛteŋ ni kɛji ebi bi lɛ aboloo, ni eeeha lɛ tɛ? aloo kɛji ebi lɛ loo lɛ, ni eeeŋɔ onufu efee loo eha lɛ?
Wɔ hu esa akɛ wɔsusu wɔshikpɔŋkuku lɛ he, koni wɔya “wuo” lɛ yɛ be mli ni mɛi saŋŋ yɛ shia ni amɛbaabo wɔshɛɛ sane lɛ toi.
2 Kɛkɛ ni Yona sɔle etsɛ Yehowa, e-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛjɛ ŋshɔŋ loo lɛ musuŋ,+ 2 ni ekɛɛ:
Ni Andrea wie akɛ: ‘Gbekɛ nuu nɛɛ, ni tere wɔ niyenii lɛ hiɛ abolooi kukuji enumɔ kɛ looi enyɔ.
Yɛ Senegal lɛ, anyɛɔ anaa gbɔmɛi ni tara gbɛjegbɛi ahe amɛmiihɔɔ loo, yeli baai, aloo aduawai yɛ jaji anɔ loo amɛta onyai tso wulu ko shishi amɛmiinu ataya, ni tamɔ baa ŋmɔŋ tii.
(Luka 1:5–2:52) Ekolɛ Petro, Yakobo, loo Yohane gba Luka sane ni kɔɔ looi ni agbe yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ.
No sɛɛ lɛ, ekaselɔi lɛ kɛ aboloo lɛ kɛ loo lɛ ha gbɔmɛi lɛ fɛɛ.
WOLO LƐ HIƐ: Nyɛmimɛi komɛi miishiɛ yɛ gbɛjegbɛ ko ni ahɔ̃ɔ loo yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ he.
Yesu kɔlɔ blodoi lɛ kɛ loi lɛ, ewó ehiɛ nɔ ekwɛ ŋwɛi, ni esɔle.
(Lala 3:9) Gbalɔ Yona kɛ nakai wiemɔi lɛ nɔŋŋ tsu nii yɛ sɔlemɔ ni mli wa mli beni eyɔɔ ŋshɔŋ loo kpeteŋkpele lɛ musuŋ lɛ.—Yona 2:10.
Yona sɔle kɛjɛ ŋshɔŋ loo lɛ musuŋ (1-9)
“Nyɛfɔa ni nyɛyi afáa ni nyɛyia shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ, ni nyɛnaanaa nɔ, ni nyɛyea ŋshɔŋloi kɛ ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ kooloo fɛɛ kooloo ni tsiɔ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.”
Petro yagbala yaa lɛ ni loi agboi 153 eyi mli obɔ lɛ kɛba ŋshɔ lɛ naa!
Mumɔŋ wuoyaa nitsumɔ yɛ Senegal lɛ ji nɔ ni nyɔmɔwoo yɔɔ mli lɛɛlɛŋ.
Enɛ ji nɔ ni ba yɛ Cangas de Morrazo, akrowa ko ni ayaa wuo yɛ mli ni yɔɔ Spain kooyi-anaigbɛ lɛ.
Amɛbo toi ni amɛgbe looi 153 sɔŋŋ!
Salomo tsɔɔ akɛ wɔtamɔ “loo ni adũ yɛ yaa mli, loo loofɔlɔ ni adũ yɛ tsɔne mli, . . . kɛ́ bei fɔji ba trukaa lɛ.”
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Shi bɔ ni afee ni wɔkatɔ̃tɔ amɛnane lɛ, yaa ŋshɔ lɛ naa oyafɔ̃ kpoŋ, ni loo klɛŋklɛŋ ni baabakɔ kpoŋ lɛ, shá lɛ, ni kɛ́ ogbɛ edaaŋ lɛ, obaana jwiɛtɛi shika [stata kapɛlɛ, loo drakmai ejwɛ].
Yɛ be ko sɛɛ lɛ, miyahe wuoyaa lɛlɛ, ni jeee akɛ ebafee nɔ ni haa wɔnaa wɔdaaŋ ŋmaa kɛkɛ, shi moŋ eha wɔnyɛ wɔtsa shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ yɛ ŋshɔnaa maji lɛ amli.
Kɛkɛ ni Yesu kɛ sane lɛ to tsɛmɛi ni ji adesai lɛ ahe, ni ekɛhã oti ni etsɔɔ lɛ fee faŋŋ. Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mɛɛ tsɛ yɔɔ nyɛteŋ ni kɛ́ ebi bi lɛ nu mli loo lɛ, ebaahã lɛ onufu moŋ fe nu mli loo?

9 Yɛ Jeŋ Ta I sɛɛ lɛ, agbála gbɔmɛi fɛɛ ni kɛɔ akɛ amɛji Kristofoi lɛ amli awo kui enyɔ mli: (1) Kristendom osɔfoi lɛ kɛ amɛsɛɛnyiɛlɔi, ni fi Jeŋmaji Akpaŋmɔ lɛ (amrɔ nɛɛ Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ lɛ) sɛɛ waa, yɛ be mli ni amɛkɛ amɛhe kpɛtɛɔ anɔkwa ni amɛyeɔ amɛjakumaŋ he lolo lɛ, kɛ (2) anɔkwa Kristofoi ni hi shi yɛ nakai ta be lɛ sɛɛ, ni kɛ amɛsɛɛfimɔ fɛɛ ha Nyɔŋmɔ Mesia Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ, shi jeee je nɛŋ maji lɛ.
Aaafee egbele lɛ sɛɛ nɔ ni aaashɛ afii enyɔ lɛ, misusu afii abɔ ni jara wa ni wɔkɛfee ekome kɛhi shi lɛ he—babaoo yɛ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ mli, kɛ agbɛnɛ yɛ Yehowa Odasefoi ajeŋ fɛɛ nitsumɔhe yitso ni yɔɔ Brooklyn yɛ New York lɛ.
Gbi ko beni atswa eshinaa lɛ ní egbele lɛ, naa Odasefoi enyɔ komɛi ni efee klalo akɛ amɛaaye amɛbua lɛ koni ele anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛi ni ji Yehowa lɛ.

Akɛni Akaiko ji Latin gbɛi ni kɔɔ tsuji ahe, ni Fortunato kɔɔ nuu ni eye ehe he hewɔ lɛ, saji ahe niŋmalalɔi komɛi susuɔ akɛ ekolɛ mɛi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ jɛ shia kome lɛ nɔŋŋ mli.

Yesu Here Gbekɛbii Atuu
Mɛi ni eba nifeemɔ lɛ shishi lɛ fɛɛ baaná hegbɛ kɛye odase kpele kɛtsɔ gbɔi lɛ ni amɛaahere amɛ hiɛmɛɛ lɛ nɔ.—Rom.
Amɛbaahere mɛi akpekpei abɔ ni aaatee amɛ shi lɛ atuu.
Amaniɛbɔi kɛɔ akɛ, yɛ Asia nɛkɛ lɛ, “bei pii lɛ akɛ miishɛɛ nyaaa gbekɛbii yei afɔmɔ he.”
Wɔfã kɛtee United States, ni wɔfɔ wɔbiyoo Marlene kɛba jeŋ yɛ December.
17 Ani nibii ni ofeɔ yɛ oshihilɛ mli lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ oŋmɛɔ gbɛ ní Nyɔŋmɔ anɔkwa wiemɔ lɛ aha ohe atse?
Kɛ́ amɛku amɛsɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa hereɔ amɛ atuu.
Kaatsɛ babaoo tsɔ yɛ shinaa lɛ naa, titri lɛ, kɛji je lɛ mli ejɔ ŋanii.
