118 Nyɛhereherea Nyɛhe
Kɛji obaasumɔ ni ole nibii babaoo aloo ni mɔ ko aba oŋɔɔ ni ekɛ bo afee shia Biblia mli nikasemɔ ni aheee nɔ ko lɛ, ofainɛ ŋmaa kɛya Watch Tower, Box 760, Accra, Ghana, aloo kɛya adrɛs ni atsɔɔ yɛ baafa 2 lɛ mli nɔ ni sa.
No hewɔ lɛ, akɛni saji nɛɛ dɔɔ amɛ waa hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ atswa adafi akɛ asaa ahe mɔ lɛ kɛba asafo lɛ mli ekoŋŋ lɛ, shishinumɔ yɛ he akɛ wɔwieŋ wiemɔi ni wɔkɛaahere lɛ ekoŋŋ lɛ amrɔ nɔŋŋ, kɛyashi be mli ni wɔɔnyɛ wɔfee nakai yɛ wɔkɛ mɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ teŋ.
Maŋbii foji ni heɔ amɛyeɔ diɛŋtsɛ akɛ paapa lɛ baanyɛ aha amɛsuɔlɔi ni egboi lɛ aya ŋwɛi lɛ kpɛlɛ nyɔmɔ ni awoɔ koni asɔle aha gbohii lɛ nɔ.
Anɔkwa, be ni Yosef nyɛmimɛi lɛ ba Ejipt ni amɛsaa amɛ kɛ lɛ teŋ lɛ, Farao here amɛ hiɛmɛɛ, ni ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ amɛbaanyɛ amɛhi Ejipt ni amɛye “shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ nikpakpai lɛ.” —1 Mo.
Enɛ yeɔ ebuaa mɛi heei ni yɔɔ wiemɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ, ní ehe hiaa waa akɛ ahere amɛ hiɛmɛɛ lɛ hu.
Etee nɔ ejaje akɛ: “Kristo ehere nyɛ kɛba Nyɔŋmɔ anunyam lɛ mli.”
“Bi Nuu, Wɔmiihere Bo Atuu Kɛmiiba Shĩa!”
17 “Shi bo, gbɔmɔ bi,* nɔ ni Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: ‘Kɛɛmɔ loofɔji srɔtoi fɛɛ kɛ ŋa mli kooloi fɛɛ akɛ, “Nyɛbuaa nyɛhe naa ni nyɛbaa.
Kɛkɛ ni Noa ŋmɛɛ loofɔlɔ diŋ ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ kwaakwaalabite he kɛjɛ adeka lɛ mli.
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔnu loofɔji alalai ni ŋɔɔ lɛ.
Kɛ́ Yehowa kwɛɔ loofɔji kɛ fɔfɔii lɛ, enyiɛ nɔŋŋ ekwɛŋ wɔ?
No hewɔ lɛ, Salomo bɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Tamɔ looi ni alooɔ amɛ yɛ yaa fɔŋ mli, loo loofɔji ni adũɔ amɛ yɛ tsɔne mli lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ adũɔ gbɔmɛi abii yɛ be fɔŋ mli, kɛ́ ebanina amɛ trukaa lɛ.”—Jajelɔ 9:11, 12, NW.
Loofɔlɔ ko ni gbɔbiɔ baajɛ hulushiteehe aba (11)
(Luka 12:6, 7) Nakai beaŋ lɛ, aflimata ji loofɔji ni ahɔ̃ɔ akɛ loo lɛ ateŋ nɔ ni jara waaa fe fɛɛ, ni kɛlɛ amɛteŋ ekome folo po bɛ ni e-Bɔlɔ lɛ susuuu ehe.
15 Yesaia gbalɛ lɛ mli wiemɔi ní nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ gbalaa wɔjwɛŋmɔ kɛyaa nyɛmɔ ní Yehowa yɔɔ ní ekɛgbaa nibii ní baaba wɔsɛɛ, ní no sɛɛ lɛ ehaa ewiemɔi baa mli pɛpɛɛpɛ lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ ní sa kadimɔ waa nɔ, akɛ: “Miitsɛ́ okropɔŋ ko kɛmiijɛ boka, kɛ miyiŋtoo naa nuu lɛ kɛmiijɛ maŋsɛɛ shɔŋŋ.
Bɔ ni loofɔji ni etamɔ nɔ ni amɛhe ehiaaa lɛ jeee nibii ni daraaa tsɔ kɛha Yehowa akɛ eeebɔ amɛ lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ hu ehiɛ kpaŋ amɛnɔ akɛ ebaakwɛ amɛ.
Taakɛ bɔ ni gbalɛ lɛ jie lɛ kpo yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ, abaashi amɛgbohii lɛ ni afuuu amɛ koni kooloi kɛ loofɔji aye.
Nyɛkwɛa ŋwɛi loofɔji lɛ: amɛduuu nii, asaŋ amɛkuuu, asaŋ amɛbuaaa naa amɛwooo aboŋoi amli; shi nyɛtsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ lɛɔ amɛ kɛ̃.
Nyɛjwɛŋa fɔfɔii lɛ ahe, bɔ ni amɛkwɛ̃ɔ!
Wɔwala sɛɛ baanyɛ afo trukaa tamɔ bɔ ni yaa dũɔ loo aloo tsɔne duɔ loofɔlɔ lɛ.
Hebri wiemɔi kɛha ŋaŋ gbeei, shia ŋa nɔ kooloi krokomɛi, kɛ loofɔji ni filikiɔ gbɛkɛ batsɔmɔ nɔ ni akɛtoɔ Babilonbii kɛ Persiabii adesãi amli mumɔi fɔji kɛ kooloi ni he yɔɔ gbeyei ahe yɛ Yudafoi ajwɛŋmɔi amli.
Ni mikɛ amɛgbohii lɛ baahã ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kooloi akɛ niyenii.
Salomo bɔ amaniɛ akɛ: “Enyiɛ esɛɛ kɛtee amrɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ tamɔ tsina ni ayaagbe lɛ, aloo tamɔ sɛkɛyelɔ ni ayaabɔ lɛ apã, kɛyashi beyinɔ ni gãi tsu emlɛbo mli; tamɔ loofɔlɔ he feɔ oyá kɛyaa tsɔne mli ni eleee akɛ ewala hewɔ atsɔ̃ lɛ.”—Abɛi 7:22, 23.
Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kooloi, loofɔji, looi—bɔɔ nii krokomɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ wala ni kɛ amɛ kɛ amɛshwiei baahi shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ ahe hegbɛ kɛ gbɛnaa nii ka amɛnɔ.
Bɔ ni okropɔŋ naa nii jogbaŋŋ lɛ yɛ naakpɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ, ni ehaa loofɔlɔ lɛ jɛɔ ŋwɛi shɔŋŋ aaashɛ mitai ohai abɔ ni enaa nii bibioo kwraa yɛ shikpɔŋ, yɛ he ni ekolɛ ejɛkɛmɔ feɔ kilomitai abɔ po!
Eji anɔkwale akɛ nilee ni Yehowa kɛwo loofɔji amli lɛ yɛ naakpɛɛ.
Wɔ̀ faaa kwraa aahu akɛ loofɔlɔ bolɔmɔ haa mɔ hiɛ tsɛ̃ɔ.
Yesu ma nɔ mi eha wɔ akɛ wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ ní lɛɔ ŋwɛi loofɔji lɛ ní wulaa ŋanɔ jwɛi lɛ le nibii ni he hiaa wɔ lɛ jogbaŋŋ kɛmɔ shi.—Mat.
Abɔ Adam, no sɛɛ lɛ Hawa, ákɛ Yehowa adebɔɔ gbi ni ji ekpaa lɛ naagbee kwraa—bɔɔ nii ni nɔ kwɔ kwraa fe looi, loofɔji kɛ kooloi!
Ewie loofɔji kɛ fɔfɔii kɛ nibii krokomɛi ni anaa lɛ he koni ekɛye ebua mɛi ni amɛnu saji komɛi ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he lɛ shishi.
Ani ole nɔ ni loofɔlɔ lɛ feɔ lɛ?—
+ Klante kɛ hɔmɔ baagbe amɛ,+ ni amɛgbohii baatsɔ niyenii ahã ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kooloi.’
Eji mɔ ko kɛɛ mi yɛ nakai beiaŋ akɛ, maná hegbɛ maya maji nɛɛ babaoo anɔ kulɛ, maje he ŋwane.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ naagbee nɛɛ miiba, eyɛ mli akɛ wɔnyɛŋ wɔtsɔɔ be pɔtɛɛ moŋ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ akako Hebribii ni Paulo kɛwieɔ lɛ kɛyashi nakai ŋɛlɛ lɛ nɔ moŋ, shi ehe bahia ni amɛya amɛhiɛ kɛshɛ mumɔŋ dalɛ he, ni amɛwaje amɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ koni amɛmia amɛhiɛ yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baanyɛ aba lɛ mli.—2/15, baafa 29.
Asafoŋ onukpa ko ni yɔɔ niiashikpamɔ lɛ wie akɛ: “Mihiɔ shi gbi fɛɛ gbi tamɔ nɔ ni Yehowa gbi wulu lɛ baaba wɔ́.”—Yoel 1:15.
Ejaakɛ ekɛ hegbɛ kɛ hewalɛ boɔ ewoɔ mumɔi ni he tseee lɛ ayi, ni amɛjeɔ kpo!”
Gbɔmɛi ni yɔɔ hemɔkɛyeli lɛ kɛ hehiamɔ ekpa ebaa gbɛ kɛjɛ be mli ni adesai gbee shi kɛbote esha kɛ gbele mli lɛ.
(Yoel 1:15) Yehowa wo mɛi ni yɔɔ Zion aŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛkpalea kɛbaa miŋɔɔ kɛ nyɛtsui muu lɛ fɛɛ.”
HEI fioo pɛ baa Biblia kanelɔi ajwɛŋmɔ mli amrɔ nɔŋŋ fe Galilea Ŋshɔ lɛ.
KWƐMƆ okpo ni baa ebasɔ̃ nuu lɛ yiteŋ lɛ.
(1 Tesalonikabii 5:17; Hebribii 5:7) Yehowa woɔ mɛi fɛɛ ni baa lɛ abo lɛ ashi akɛ ehaŋ aye amɛ awui yɛ mumɔŋ.—Lala 91:1-10; Abɛi 1:33.
(Lala 78:5-8) Kɛkɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kwɛ maŋ lɛ jogbaŋŋ, ni efee klalo akɛ ebaaye ebua ewebii lɛ be fɛɛ be ni amɛaabote haomɔ mli.
Beni mɛi komɛi bɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛtsĩ gbekɛbii lɛ anaa koni amɛkaba Yesu ŋɔɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Nyɛhaa gbekɛbii lɛ abaa miŋɔɔ, ni nyɛkatsĩa amɛ gbɛ.”
Ekpakpa ko dani minyɛ mikpɛlɛ shihilɛ mli ni miyaje lɛ nɔ.
Mina nɔ ni mitaoɔ lɛ agbɛnɛ.
Akɛɔ akɛ enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jwɛŋmɔ mli loo áŋma awo wolo ko mli dani ebaa mli.
22 Kpɛmɔ fɛfɛo ni tamɔ shika tsuru jɛɔ kooyigbɛ;
Okɛ otii ni yɔɔ ‘Ba ni Obanyiɛ Misɛɛ’ wolo lɛ, baafa 87-89 lɛ mli lɛ afata he.
Kɛ okɛ ekãa kase Biblia lɛ, obaanu mɔ ni Yehowa ji lɛ shishi kɛ nɔ hewɔ ni esumɔɔ ni okɛ ohe afɔ̃ enɔ kwraa lɛ.
Ekãa ni okɛshiɛɔ kɛ miishɛɛ kpo ni ojieɔ yɛ ehe lɛ baaná enɔ hewalɛ afii babaoo.
• Mɛɛ jɔɔmɔi mɛi ni kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nyiɛɔ lɛ náa?
Maye nyɛhe fɛo, kɛ́ nɔ ni nyɛsheɔ he gbeyei lɛ ba,+
Mɛɛ kɔkɔbɔɔ he hiaa beni asusuɔ nɔ ni baa kɛjɛɔ wɔtsui mli lɛ he lɛ?
Mɛɛ be Yesu ‘baaba’?—Mat.
Yesu ‘miiba kɛ atatui Iɛ,’ koni ebatsu kojomɔ he nii akɛ mɔ ni anaaa lɛ
Enɛ bafee suɔmɔ kpele diɛŋtsɛ ni amɛyɔɔ kɛha wɔ, ejaakɛ etsɔɔ akɛ wɔbaana he ko ni wɔkɛ wɔ nibii baato kwraa, kɛ he ko ni ji shia ni wɔbaaku wɔsɛɛ kɛba jɛmɛ daa Hɔgbaa gbɛkɛ.
15 Anɔkwa, aju mi kɛjɛ Hebribii lɛ ashikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ,+ ni biɛ hu, mifeko nɔ ko ní sa akɛ awo mi tsuŋ.”
Minu he akɛ esa akɛ majie hiɛsɔɔ kpo matsɔɔ lɛ yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni efee eha mi lɛ hewɔ.
(Yoel 1:15) Yehowa wo mɛi ni yɔɔ Zion aŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛkpalea kɛbaa miŋɔɔ kɛ nyɛtsui muu lɛ fɛɛ.”
Eŋma akɛ: “Mikpa Nuntsɔ lɛ fai shii etɛ sɔŋŋ, koni eje minɔ.”
(Yohane 17:3) Susumɔ nɔ ni okaseɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli lɛ he jogbaŋŋ kɛtsɔ saji nɛɛ ni ooobi ohe lɛ nɔ: ‘Mɛni enɛ tsɔɔ mi yɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ he?
Beni mɛi komɛi bɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛtsĩ gbekɛbii lɛ anaa koni amɛkaba Yesu ŋɔɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Nyɛhaa gbekɛbii lɛ abaa miŋɔɔ, ni nyɛkatsĩa amɛ gbɛ.”
Kɛfata he lɛ, aha Mose kɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: “Yehowa, nyɛtsɛmɛi a-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ni ji Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Isak Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Yakob Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ tsu mi nyɛŋɔɔ nɛɛ.”
Ewó mitoi nɔ akɛ Odasefoi babaoo yɛ Ohaji akutso lɛ mli.
Ekpakpa ko dani minyɛ mikpɛlɛ shihilɛ mli ni miyaje lɛ nɔ.
Becky kɛɛ akɛ: “Mifɔlɔi sɔmɔɔɔ Yehowa, no hewɔ lɛ, amɛhaa shihilɛ waa ehaa mi kɛji akɛ miibɔ mɔdɛŋ ni mafee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni kɔɔ sɔɔmɔ ni mikɛaaha Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ he lɛ.
No hewɔ ni lalatsɛ lɛ kpa lɛ fai akɛ: “Ha ola kɛ onɔkwale lɛ aba, ni amɛbatsɔɔ mi gbɛ” lɛ.—Lala 43:3.
Eŋma akɛ: “Kloe webii lɛ batswa mi adafi yɛ nyɛhewɔ, minyɛmimɛi, akɛ béi yɛ nyɛteŋ.”
+ 19 Kɛkɛ ni Laban kɛɛ: “Ehi akɛ mikɛ lɛ baahã bo moŋ fe nɔ ni mikɛ lɛ baahã nuu kroko.
18 Ejaakɛ mikaŋ akɛ mawie nɔ ko akɛ ja nɔ ni Kristo tsɔ minɔ efee bɔ ni afee ni jeŋmaji lɛ abo toi lɛ; etsɔ miwiemɔ kɛ minifeemɔ, 19 okadii kɛ naakpɛɛ nii ahewalɛ,+ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ lɛ hewalɛ nɔ efee enɛ, enɛ hewɔ lɛ, mishiɛ Kristo he sane kpakpa lɛ fitsofitso kɛjɛ Yerusalem kɛbɔle shi aahu kɛyashɛ Ilirikum tɔ̃ɔ.
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ kɛ ŋaa ni asafoŋ onukpai lɛ wo mi lɛ ha mina akɛ mikɛ mɛi ni sumɔɔɔ Yehowa miibɔ naanyo.
Shi mi lɛ, mile akɛ daa oboɔ mi toi; shi asafo lɛ ni damɔ shi lɛ hewɔ mikɛɛɔ, koni amɛhe amɛye akɛ bo otsu mi.”
“Mibɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ mikɛ je lɛ aaaye egbɔ, shi akɛni mitamɔɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ lɛɛlɛŋ hewɔ lɛ, amɛkpoo mi.
Beni ehe bahia koni efee ehe sɛkɛyelɔ yɛ Gat Maŋtsɛ Akish hiɛ lɛ, efo lala ko, lala kɛ ŋɔɔmɔ ko, ní hemɔkɛyeli wiemɔi nɛɛ fata he akɛ: “Nyɛkɛ mi akãfoa Yehowa dalɛ lɛ, ni nyɛhaa wɔ fɛɛ wɔwóa egbɛi lɛ nɔ!
Ni no lɛ magba mli makɛɛ amɛ akɛ: Mileee nyɛ kwraa, nyɛjea minɔ nyɛyaa, nyɛ mɛi ni nyɛtsuɔ nibii ni ejaaa gbɛ!”—Mateo 7:22, 23.
+ 13 Kɛ́ okwɛ ogbe naa lɛ, bo hu abaafu bo tamɔ afu otsɛmɛi lɛ,*+ tamɔ bɔ ni afee onyɛmi nuu Aaron lɛ,+ 14 ejaakɛ be ni maŋbii lɛ kɛ mi béɔ yɛ Zin ŋa lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛtse famɔ ni mikɛhã akɛ afee mi krɔŋkrɔŋ yɛ amɛhiɛ yɛ nui lɛ ahewɔ lɛ hiɛ atua.
6 Shi Nyɔŋmɔ, mɔ ni shɛjeɔ mɛi ni tsui ekumɔ lɛ amii+ lɛ tsɔ wɔŋɔɔ ni Tito ba lɛ nɔ eshɛje wɔmii; 7 ni jeee kɛtsɔ wɔŋɔɔ ni eba lɛ nɔ kɛkɛ, shi moŋ kɛtsɔ miishɛjemɔ ni ená yɛ nyɛhewɔ lɛ hu nɔ, ejaakɛ ebabɔ wɔ amaniɛ akɛ, nyɛmiishwe waa ni nyɛna mi, nyɛmiiye awerɛho waa, ni nyɛmiisusu mihe waa;* ni no hewɔ lɛ, miná miishɛɛ babaoo fe tsutsu lɛ.
“Mibinuu lɛ kɛ gbekɛ ko ni onukpai lɛ ebɔ mi kɔkɔ akɛ ejeee naanyo kpakpa lɛ fɔɔ nyiɛmɔ,” taakɛ tsɛ ko wie lɛ.
Bei pii lɛ Awo shɛɔ nakai oti lɛ he, ni enɛ bafee nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa kɛha mi kɛ Lesley.
Bileam hã lɛ hetoo akɛ: ‘Ofee mi buulu.
Enɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa lɛ ye ebua mi waa be ni midaa lɛ.
Kristofoi, ni muɔ kɔɔyɔɔ ni mli tse yɛ Yehowa jamɔ krɔŋŋ gɔŋ ni awo nɔ gojoo lɛ nɔ lɛ teɔ shi amɛwoɔ nɛkɛ henumɔ nɛɛ.
Ákɛ Kristofoi lɛ, “heyeli mla” lɛ akɛkojoɔ wɔ—mumɔŋ Israel ni yɔɔ kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ mli, ni emla lɛ yɔɔ amɛtsuii amli lɛ.—Yeremia 31:31-33.
Kristofoi boteɔ “hejɔɔmɔ gbi yeli” nɛɛ mli kɛtsɔɔ toiboo ní amɛfeɔ amɛhaa Yehowa, kɛ jalɛ sɛɛ ní amɛdiɔ kɛtsɔ Yesu Kristo lá ní efɔse eshwie shi lɛ mli hemɔkɛyeli namɔ nɔ lɛ nɔ.
12 Jeee Biblia lɛ kasemɔ nɔ pɛ atsɔɔ ahiɛɔ Yehowa jalɛ shishitoo mlai ahe hiɛsɔɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ mli, shi kɛtsɔ Kristofoi akpeei ni wɔɔya daa kɛ Kristofoi asɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ ni wɔ fɛɛ wɔkɛ wɔhe aaawo mli lɛ nɔ.
(Marko 12:28-31) Ákɛ Kristofoi lɛ, Paulo woɔ wɔ hewalɛ koni wɔjie anɔkwa suɔmɔ kpo.
Be ni abaabua amale Kristofoi ni jwɛi lɛ feɔ amɛhe mfoniri lɛ anaa kɛjɛ anɔkwa Kristofoi ni ŋmaa lɛ feɔ amɛhe mfoniri lɛ ateŋ lɛ shɛko.
18. (a) Mɛni ye bua oblayoo Kristofonyo ko ni enyɛ edamɔ kaa naa beni eyaa skul lɛ?
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Paulo tsɔ ekɛ ehe shã afɔle eha enyɛmimɛi lɛ, ni mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Kristofoi asafoŋ onukpai ni yɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ baanyɛ atsɔ afee nakai nɔŋŋ?
Beni bɔfo Paulo batsɔ gboklɛfonyo yɛ Roma lɛ, ejɛ heshibaa mli ebi nanemɛi Kristofoi koni amɛsɔle amɛha lɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ye bei komɛi amli lɛ Kristofoi ni amɛjɔɔ amɛhe nɔ lɛ baasusu kɛji akɛ sɛɛnamɔ diɛŋtsɛ yɛ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛkɛ hiɛdɔɔ bɔɔ lɛ he.
(Mateo 5: 37) Esa akɛ Kristofoi ni tsɛɔ amɛhe baa lɛ ahiɛ adɔ yɛ he.
Bei pii lɛ, mɛɛ shihilɛi komɛi haa ewaa kɛhaa Kristofoi akɛ amɛaafee jalɛ nii?
(Maleaki 3:2, 3) Kɛjɛ afi 1919 kɛbaa nɛɛ, amɛwo Maŋtsɛyeli yibii babaoo, klɛŋklɛŋ ji Kristofoi krokomɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ, ni kɛjɛ afi 1935 kɛbaa nɛɛ, nanemɛi “asafo babaoo” ko ni amɛyi faa be fɛɛ be lɛ.—Kpojiemɔ 7:9; Yesaia 60:4, 8-11.
Mɛi ni boɔ nakai shɛɛ sane lɛ toi lɛ baanyɛ aná shihilɛ ni miishɛɛ yɔɔ mli amrɔ nɛɛ taakɛ eji yɛ anɔkwa Kristofoi akpekpei abɔ agbɛfaŋ lɛ.
Shi efɔlɔi kɛ mɛi krokomɛi ni yɔɔ esafo lɛ mli lɛ ye amɛbua lɛ ni enyɛ eshɛ oti ni ekɛma ehiɛ akɛ ebaatsɔ daa gbɛgbalɔ lɛ he.
11 Yɛ afii ohai 19 lɛ naagbee afii nyɔŋmai fioo lɛ amli lɛ, Kristofoi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ kɛ amɛhe wo mɛi ni sa lɛ ataomɔ mli yɛ ekãa naa.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ‘afɔ́ɔ’ Kristofoi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ ‘ehee kɛha hiɛnɔkamɔ ni gbooo,’ ni mɛni ji nakai hiɛnɔkamɔ lɛ?
Hetoo kɛha nakai sanebimɔ lɛ biɔ ni aná nilee ni kɔɔ shihilɛ ni Kristofoi ni yɔɔ nakai blema maŋtiase lɛ mli lɛ kɛkpe lɛ he.
Emli gbɔmɛi lɛ ena nɔ babaoo, yɛ be mli ni ajɔɔ amɛnɔ aha Maria Obalayoo Fro lɛ, ni amɛ klɛŋklɛŋ maŋtsɛ, Stephen, nyɛ amɛ nɔ koni amɛtsɔmɔ mɛi ni kɛ amɛnaabu kɛɔ akɛ amɛji Kristofoi yɛ afi 1001 lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ.
25 Yudafoi anɔkwafoi lɛ aheŋmɛɛmɔ kɛmiijɛ nomŋɔɔ mli, ní ba mli kɛtsɔ Babilon shigbeemɔ nɔ lɛ, fee Kristofoi ní afɔ amɛ mu lɛ ajiemɔ kɛmiijɛ mumɔŋ nomŋɔɔ mli yɛ afi 1919 lɛ he mfoniri.
(1 Korintobii 7:19; 10:25; Kolosebii 2:16, 17; Hebribii 10:1, 11-14) Ahã Yudafoi—ni bɔfoi lɛ fata he lɛ—ni batsɔmɔ Kristofoi lɛ ye amɛhe kɛjɛ gbɛnaanii ni kã amɛnɔ akɛ amɛye mlai ni esa akɛ amɛbo toi beni amɛyɔɔ Mla kpaŋmɔ lɛ shishi lɛ ahe.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 15:29) Nɔ ni fe nakai lɛ, kɛ sane lɛ bakɔ lá lɛ mli fãi srɔtoi lɛ amli fãi bibii lɛ eko fɛɛ eko ni akɛaatsu nii he lɛ, no lɛ, Kristofonyo fɛɛ Kristofonyo akwɛ jogbaŋŋ ni ekɛ sɔlemɔ asusu sane lɛ he dani ejɛ ehenilee mli ekpɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ eyiŋ eha ehe.
3 Paulo yɔse akɛ kɛ́ ekomefeemɔ baaya nɔ ahi Kristofoi lɛ ateŋ lɛ, belɛ esa akɛ amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ abɔ mɔdɛŋ afee nibii ni baaha ekomefeemɔ ahi amɛteŋ.
Yɛ Kristofoi agbɛfaŋ lɛ, henɔjɔɔmɔ kɛ baptisimɔ ji nifeemɔi ni he hiaa ni haa anáa Yehowa dɛŋ jɔɔmɔ.
Yɛ Kristofoi agbɛfaŋ lɛ, ebaanyɛ esa amɛmumɔŋ shihilɛ he, ni nɔ ni baajɛ mli aba ji jwɛŋmɔ ni ejaaa kɛ jeŋba gbonyo.
17 Yɛ be mli ni asusuɔ ŋwɛibɔfoi gbohii ni ba shikpɔŋ nɔ ni amɛfɔfɔɔ bii lɛ he sane yɛ yitso 10 lɛ he lɛ, abiɔ gbekɛ lɛ akɛ, “Mɛni ole yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he?”
Ekɛɛ efɔlɔi baaje kpo, ni gbekɛbii yei baaba jɛmɛ ni wɔbaaná hegbɛ wɔkɛ amɛ aná bɔlɛ.”
Oblayoo ko kɛɛ lɛ akɛ, kɛ́ eye ebua lɛ yɛ akɔntaabuu he kaa ko ni abaafee lɛ mli lɛ, ebaahã ekɛ lɛ aná bɔlɛ.
Kɛ mɔ kome taoɔ mɔ kroko lɛ hilɛ-kɛhamɔ ni pɛsɛmkunya bɛ mli lɛ, efɔɔɔ kaa akɛ bɔlɛnamɔ kɛ naagbai ni yɔɔ hiɛdɔɔ baa.
No hewɔ lɛ, ebɛ naakpɛɛ akɛ bɔlɛnamɔ mli yakayaka nifeemɔi fata Baal jamɔ he.
Eyɛ mli akɛ shiɛlɔi ni ji nuu kɛ yoo baanyɛ atsu nii kutuu bei komɛi moŋ, shi esaaa akɛ enɛ yaa nɔ daa, ni enɛ baahi kɛ aaya lɛ kutuu.
Ani ehe miihia ni ole nɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛɔ yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he lɛ, ni ohi shi yɛ naa?
Beni ŋwɛibɔfoi lɛ ŋɔ adesa gbɔmɔtsei ni amɛkɛ yei ná bɔlɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, amɛbii lɛ badara ni amɛbatsɔmɔ asaabui.
Ayɛ mfonirii komɛi ni teɔ bɔlɛnamɔ akɔnɔ shi ni bɛ hiŋmɛi nɔ kwraa ni kɔɔ mɛi enyɔ ni hiɛ bɔɔsu kome ni kɛ amɛhe miiná bɔlɛ, mɛi pii ni kɛ amɛhe miiná bɔlɛ, kooloi ni akɛnáa bɔlɛ, gbekɛbii ni miiná bɔlɛ, hii pii ni feɔ ekome kɛtoɔ yoo ko kabonaa, bɔlɛnamɔ mli niseniianii ni afeɔ yei, mɛi ni afimɔɔ amɛ ni akɛ amɛ náa bɔlɛ, loo niseniianii ni afeɔ mɛi kɛjieɔ hiɛtserɛ.
9 Ani tɔmɔ yɛ “foŋ nɔ bɔlɛnamɔ,” “ajwamaŋ tɛs-mɛseji,” loo “Intanɛt nɔ bɔlɛnamɔ” he?
Aloo amɛkɛ amɛfɔmɔ nii lɛ po baashwishwia onɔ̃ he.
Sane ko ni aŋma yɛ 1991 nɔ lɛ mli ji ‘Jamɔ Mli Tsɔsemɔ kɛ Bɔlɛnamɔ ni Tsɔɔ Gbalashihilɛ Hiɛ: Odaseyeli ni Jɛ Maŋ Obalaŋtai Aŋɔɔ.’
Abɔ amaniɛ akɛ Asia maŋ ko ni hiɛtserɛjielɔi pii fãa gbɛ kɛyaa jɛmɛ, yɛ “bɔlɛnamɔ hiɛtserɛjiemɔ” hewɔ lɛ, yɛ ahoshwibɔlɔi akpekpei enyɔ, ni amɛteŋ mɛi babaoo ji mɛi ni ahe amɛ loo aju amɛ kɛba jɛmɛ, beni amɛji gbekɛbii.

• Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ wɔbaanyɛ wɔya nɔ ‘wɔtsu nii’ yɛ Yesu anɔkwa nyɛmimɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ akasemɔ mli?
11, 12. (a) Namɛi Nyɔminuu Russell jie amɛ yi yɛ nibii ni etsɔɔ lɛ ahe?
Kɛkɛ ni oweletɔɔ nifeemɔ ni jɛ enyɛmimɛi hii lɛ ateŋ mɛi enyɔ ŋɔɔ lɛ ha amɛgbe hii fɛɛ ni yɔɔ maŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ mli lɛ.
3:15) Gbalamɔ ojwɛŋmɔ kɛya wiemɔ lɛ nɔ shi jeee wielɔ lɛ nɔ, ni obu shɛɛ sane lɛ akɛ ejɛ wɔ ‘Tsɔɔlɔ Kpeteŋkpele’ lɛ ŋɔɔ.
Shi ani ole nɔ hewɔ ni Yesu bi akɛ, “Namɔ ji minyɛ, ni namɛi ji minyɛmimɛi” lɛ?— Ha ni wɔtao mli wɔkwɛ.
(b) Te nyɛmimɛi ni sɔ kã amɛnɔ lɛ kɛ mɔ ko ni folɔ Yehowa Odasefoi anaa yɛ gbɛ ni ejaaa nɔ lɛ ye yɛ suɔmɔ mli amɛha tɛŋŋ?
Nyɛmi nuu ŋa okulafo ni akɛboteɔ gbalashihilɛ mli (5-10)
Kristofonyo ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ susuuu kɛjɛɛɛ shishijee nɔŋŋ akɛ nyɛminuu ko naagbai lɛ jɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
4 Beni Israelbii lɛ kɛ afii babaoo ehi Mizraim akɛ nyɔji lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa tsu Mose kɛ enyɛmi nuu Aaron kɛtee Farao ŋɔɔ koni amɛyakɛɛ lɛ ni eŋmɛɛ E-webii lɛ ahe.
Ani nɔ ko yɛ ni nyɛmi nuu ko baanyɛ afee koni no aha ená shwelɛ akɛ eeesɔmɔ asafo lɛ?
Wɔnyɛmimɛi ni nyiɛɔ asafo lɛ hiɛ lɛ bi koni Amerika Saneyelihe Wulu fe fɛɛ lɛ akwɛ bɔ ni abua sane lɛ ahã lɛ mli ekoŋŋ.
Wɔtsuii yimɔ obɔ lɛlɛŋ kɛ shidaa kɛha Yehowa beni wɔyaa nɔ ekoŋŋ kɛ wɔnitsumɔ lɛ, Nyɛminuu kɛ Nyɛmiyoo Laeste kɛ amɛnɔ̃ lɛ yɛ amɛ asafo lɛ mli, kɛ mi hu minɔ̃ yɛ gbɛfaa nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
31 Enɛ ebafee anɔkwale yɛ nyɛmimɛi lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii ni kɛ saji majeɔ kɛtsɔɔ kɔmpiuta lɛ nɔ lɛ ahe—amɛkɛ naaŋmɔlɔwoo wiemɔi aloo sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli sane ko ni yɔɔ ŋmɔlɔ; lalafoo wiemɔi ni ekolɛ edamɔ wɔhemɔkɛyeli lɛ nɔ; nɔkwɛmɔnii srɔtoi ni yɔɔ maŋshiɛmɔ wiemɔi ni aha yɛ kpeei, kɛ kpeei wuji ashishi aloo yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ; shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli niiashikpamɔi; kɛ ekrokomɛi in fata he—nibii ni anaaa tɔmɔ yɛ he tsɔ.
Nɔ ni Paulo ŋma lɛ fã ko kɛɔ akɛ: “Anyɛmimɛi, misumɔɔɔ akɛ aje nyɛhiɛ, akɛ wɔ tsɛmɛi lɛ fɛɛ hi atatu lɛ shishi, ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛfo ŋshɔ lɛ, ni abaptisi amɛ fɛɛ awo Mose mli yɛ atatu lɛ kɛ ŋshɔ lɛ mli.”

“Nyɛteŋ namɔ ni kɛji eyɛ gwantɛŋi oha, ni amɛteŋ ekome laaje lɛ, eshiŋ nyɔŋmai nɛɛhu kɛ nɛɛhu lɛ yɛ sɛɛ yɛ ŋa lɛ nɔ ni eyatao nɔ ni elaaje lɛ kɛyashi ebaana lɛ?
Be eshɛ ni esa akɛ ekpɛ eyiŋ yɛ nɔ ni ekɛ ewala baafee he.

Kɛjɛ January kɛyaa lɛ, abaafee tsakemɔi fioo komɛi bɔni afee ni eye ebua nikaselɔi lɛ ni amɛná gbɛjianɔtoi lɛ ahe sɛɛ jogbaŋŋ kɛmɔ shi.

Kɛ̃lɛ, yɛ naagbai nɛɛ kɛ ekrokomɛi ni amɛkɛkpe lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, akɛ kuu lɛ, amɛfee bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni amɛbaanyɛ yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Kɛji ákɛ akɛ tsɔsemɔ miiha wɔ loo wɔkɛmiiha lɛ, nyɛhaa wɔkaia yiŋtoo ni yɔɔ tsɔsemɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛhaa lɛ sɛɛ, ní wɔbo Biblia mli ŋaawoo ni nilee yɔɔ mli lɛ toi, akɛ: “Mɔ tsɔsemɔ mli waa, kaaŋmɛɛ he!
Mɔ ni aaahi maŋ nɛŋ lɛ, eeegbo kɛ klante kɛ hɔmɔ kɛ gbele hela naa; shi mɔ moŋ ní aaaje kpo, ní eyagbee Kaldeabii ní ebɔ nsara ewo nyɛhe lɛ adɛŋ lɛ, eyi aaaná wala, ni esusuma aaatsɔ haanɔ̃ ahã lɛ.”

(Yohane 10:11-16) Agbɛnɛ hu Salomo kɛ anɔkwa saji komɛi ni anyɛŋ aje he ŋwane ba: “Gbɔmɛi abii ahewɔ afee nakai, koni Nyɔŋmɔ aka amɛ akwɛ, ni amɛna akɛ, kɛ ka amɛ kɛkɛ lɛ, amɛtamɔ kooloi nɔŋŋ.
Ani esa akɛ mɔ ko aya ŋwɛi dani ena wɔsɛɛ be shihilɛ kpakpa diɛŋtsɛ?
Shi oshĩa lɛ ni oya nomŋɔɔ mli yɛ he kroko yɛ amɛhiɛ.
Ni kɛ jeŋ tse lɛ wɔtaa okɔɔkpe nɔ kɛkpaa shi.”
Ekolɛ obaanyɛ okɛ lɛ aya koni eyana Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ, beni afeee kpee ko, bɔni afee ni ekolɛ he ko hee ni eeeya jɛmɛ klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa lɛ he gbeyei ni eeeshe lɛ aba shi.
Ni kɛlɛ, kɛ nibii ejaaa po lɛ, wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔkɛ shishinumɔ loo jwɛŋmɔ kpakpa atsu nii, aloo jeee nakai?
Ní mɛi aye amɛhe.

+ 13 Be ni mɛi ni kpãa tɛtɛrɛmantɛrɛi lɛ kɛ mɛi ni láa lɛ efee ekome kɛmiijie Yehowa yi ni amɛmiida lɛ shi, ni tɛtɛrɛmantɛrɛi lɛ kɛ tsɛŋtsɛŋi lɛ kɛ nibii krokomɛi ni akɛtswaa lala lɛ agbɛɛmɔ lɛ tee ŋwɛi be ni amɛjieɔ Yehowa yi akɛ, “ejaakɛ ehi; ni esuɔmɔ ni tsakeee lɛ hiɔ shi kɛyaa naanɔ”+ lɛ nɔŋŋ ni atatu bayi shĩa lɛ, ni ji Yehowa shĩa lɛ obɔ.

Masha fata shidaa afɔle ni akɛhaa lɛ he, ni mɛi ni kɛ shidaa afɔle nɛɛ haa lɛ jɛɔ amɛsuɔmɔ mli amɛfeɔ nakai kɛdaa Yehowa shi yɛ nibii babaoo ni ekɛjɔɔ amɛ lɛ ahewɔ.

“Miida nyɛ shi yɛ sane, ‘Ojara Wa yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Hiɛ!’ lɛ hewɔ.
Shiatsɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: ‘Mihiɛ esɔ nɔ ni amɛfee lɛ waa.’
Hɛɛ, ni wɔ fɛɛ wɔmiida Yehowa shi yɛ tsamɔ tsɔɔmɔ ni ekɛha ni haa esoroɔ wɔ yɛ je lɛ he lɛ hewɔ.
Eda Nyɔŋmɔ shi ni “ewie yɛ ehewɔ etsɔɔ mɛi fɛɛ ni kwɛɔ Yerusalem kpɔmɔ lɛ gbɛ lɛ.”
Enɛ ŋɔɔ minaa waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Eŋma akɛ: “Miitsɔ Yesu Kristo nɔ miida mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shi yɛ nyɛ fɛɛ nyɛhewɔ, akɛ agbaa nyɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ he sane yɛ je lɛŋ fɛɛ.”
Wɔkɛ Shidaa Haa yɛ Nɔ ni Wɔyɔɔ lɛ Hewɔ
Eŋma akɛ: “Mijɛ mitsui mli fɛɛ miida bo shi waa, yɛ Maŋtiase lɛ gbɛi amli, yɛ onifeemɔ ni hi jogbaŋŋ kɛmɔ shi nɛɛ he.
Kwɛ bɔ ni wɔhiɛ sɔɔ akɛ Kristo etee nɔ efee nibii kɛbu Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ amumɔŋ hetsemɔ kɛ anɔkwa jamɔ krɔŋŋ lɛ he!
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mijɛ mitsui muu fɛɛ mli mikɛ yaafonui da Yehowa shi yɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ni ekɛha mi lɛ hewɔ; no ha mitee nɔ mifi shi.
Eŋɔɔ wɔnaa waa akɛ Yehowa klɛŋklɛŋ efee nibii ni baahã wɔnyɛ wɔbɛŋkɛ lɛ, ní wɔ kɛ lɛ abɔ gbagbalii!
Beni Rebeka kɛɛ lɛ akɛ Abraham nyɛmi nuu Nahor nabi ji lɛ lɛ, Eliezer sɔle ni ekɛda Nyɔŋmɔ shi.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni amɛaada Nyɔŋmɔ shi ákɛ eha amɛye amɛhe lɛ, amɛsusu yɛ gbɛ ni ejaaa nɔ akɛ eetsĩ amɛnaa yɛ nibii komɛi amli, ni no ha amɛshwa lɛ.
Yɛ suɔmɔ ni Yehowa yɔɔ kɛha adesai hewɔ lɛ, mɛi babaoo ni yɔɔ shɔŋŋ yɛ Ande Altiplano lɛ nɔ lɛ miifata mɛi ni woɔ enɔkwale jamɔ shia ni je agbo lɛ hiɛ nyam lɛ he.—Hagai 2:7.

(1 Korintobii 6:18) Kɛ mɛi enyɔ ko miitao ni amɛbote gbalashihilɛ mli, ni yɛ enɛ hewɔ lɛ amɛnyiɛɔ lɛ, amɛbaanyɛ amɛkɛ shishitoo mla nɛɛ atsu nii kɛtsɔ shihilɛi ni kaa mɔ ni amɛaakwa nɔ —tamɔ mɛi enyɔ lɛ pɛ ní aaahi he ko tamɔ yɛ tsu mli loo ni amɛaatara kar ko mli.
Kɛha minitsumɔ lɛ he nyɔmɔwoo lɛ, nitsumɔhe lɛ ha mi tsɔne ko ni jara wa waa, nyɔmɔwoo kpakpa, kɛ ɔfis ko ni yɔɔ fɛo waa yɛ Madrid, Spain maŋ-te lɛŋ.
Kpokpaa nɔkwɛlɔ ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Emil Zarysky lɛ kɛ etsɔne ni anyɛɔ awɔɔ mli lɛ fɔɔ wɔ saramɔ.
Asraafonyo ko ta tu ema wɔ nɔ, ni ewa wɔ kar lɛ, ni ebi akɛ wɔtsɔɔ lɛ he ni wɔyaa.
Mihu aka mi gbee, ni be ko lɛ akɛ okpɛlɛmi tserɛ mikar lɛ.
Nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ kome ji Keinosuke, ni ji nitsumɔ hei wuji ni feɔ kar yɛ Japan lɛ ekome mli nihɔɔlɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ.
Agbɛnɛ hu mikase bɔ ni akɛ mu woɔ dadei ni yɔɔ tsɔne mli lɛ ahe nii ni mitsakeɔ mu lɛ koni ekaha mifite shika.
Beni nyɛnyiɛ loo nyɛta tsɔne mli kutuu kɛyaa, nyɛyaa shwapo mli kɛha nihemɔ, loo nyɛkɛ nyɛbii nyiɛ kutuu kɛmiiya shia kɛ shia yɛ Kristofoi asɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ haa nyɛnaa hegbɛi kpakpai ni aaaha nyɛkɛ tsɔsemɔ aha nyɛbii lɛ yɛ hejɔlɛ shihilɛ mli.
Kɛji enɛɛmɛi ji tsɔji ni tswaa adafi aloo siklitɛ lɛ, yiŋtoo titri lɛ ji akɛ: ‘Hemɔ nii nɛɛ, ni omii baashɛ ohe waa.’
Amɛteŋ mɛi babaoo baanyɛ atsɔɔ bo amrɔ nɔŋŋ afii abɔ ni esa akɛ amɛye dani aŋmɛ amɛ gbɛ koni amɛfo gbɛjegbɛi amli ni mɔ ko fataaa amɛhe loo ní amɛyakãmɔ shi amɛwɔ be ni amɛsumɔɔ loo ní amɛkudɔ tsɔne.
Yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ julɔi lɛ tswa telefon ni akpaaa gbɛ amɛkɛtsɔɔ he ni amɛshi kar sɔrɔtoi enyɔ lɛ yɛ.

Abaanyɛ akɛ mɛi komɛi afata kar kuu kɛha odaseyeli lɛ he, ni ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ amɛbaana hejɔɔmɔ waa akɛ amɛnyɛ amɛtee mɛi komɛi aŋɔɔ, kɛ́ mɛi fioo po.
Oblahii lɛ tsetsee kui ni amɛshãa mɛi atsɔji.
“Mika mitoi mihã tsɔji ni hoɔ lɛ fɛɛ agbɛɛmɔ.
Shiatsɛmɛi komɛi atsui baanyɛ afã kɛ́ shiɛlɔi akuu wulu badamɔ amɛshia hiɛ.
Wɔhɔɔ wɔ afi 1935 Austin Seven kar bibioo lɛ, ni wɔwo nu hiɛ lɛlɛ ni wɔbaata mli kɛya New York lɛ he nyɔmɔ.
Kɛ́ miiya Kristofoi akpeei lɛ, akɛ mi woɔ helatsɛmɛi ashwiili mli ni atsiɔ mi kɛbɛŋkɛɔ kar lɛ, ni awóɔ mi awoɔ mli.
Aha mi nitsumɔ akɛ mikwɛ “kar ni akɛtswaa gramafon” lɛ nɔ, shi eji baisikel kɛ enaji etɛ, ni atsake lɛ fioo bɔ ni anyɛɔ akɛ gramafon kɛ kar batre maa nɔ.
(Timoteo 3:1-5) Etamɔ nɔ ni mɛi pii yɛ ni sumɔɔ heloonaa nibii waa, tamɔ shiai aloo kar, aloo amɛnáa be babaoo amɛhaa amɛnitsumɔ fe bɔ ni amɛnáa amɛhaa adesai krokomɛi ni amɛkɛaabɔ.
Shi kɛ́ tsɔne kudɔlɔ lɛ kudɔɔɔ tsɔne lɛ, ni eyaaa nɔ ekudɔɔɔ kudɔɔ lɛ, no lɛ nakai tsɔne lɛ nɔŋŋ baanyɛ afee nɔ ni gbeɔ mɔ yɛ gbɛ ni waaa nɔ.
Nyɛmi nuu ko ni nine kpɔɔ waa lɛ ke mi kar pɛmpɛoo ko; ahala mi akɛ kpokpaa wulu nɔkwɛlɔ; ni miná yoo ko he suɔmɔ.”
Beni amɛyaa tsuŋwoohe lɛ, trukaa ni amɛna mi yɛ mikar lɛ mli.
Wɔyɛ naagba ni kɔɔ tsɔne he, ejaakɛ kar srɔtoi enyɔ pɛ mɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ wiemɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ lɛ yɔɔ.
Enɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kome ji Ashur Maŋtsɛ Esar-Hadon, mɔ ni kɛ henɔwomɔ jaje akɛ: “Miji ofe, miji ofe ni yɔɔ hewalɛ, miyɛ ekãa, mida kpeteŋkpele, mije agbo.”
18 Shi be fɛɛ be lɛ, ehi akɛ mɔ ko kɛ hiɛdɔɔ atao nyɛsɛɛ gbɛ yɛ yiŋtoo kpakpa ko hewɔ, ni jeee be ni miyɔɔ nyɛŋɔɔ lɛ kɛkɛ, 19 mibii bibii,+ nyɛhewɔ lɛ, miikɔ̃mɔ ekoŋŋ kɛyashi abaashɔ̃ Kristo* yɛ nyɛmli.
Wɔkaneɔ nakai nɔŋŋ yɛ Yesu he akɛ: “Miji tookwɛlɔ kpakpa lɛ, ni mile mɛi ni ji mimɛi, ni mimɛi lɛ hu le mi, taakɛ bɔ ni tsɛ lɛ le mi, ni mi hu mile tsɛ lɛ; ni miŋɔɔ miwala miŋmɛɔ shi yɛ tooi lɛ anajiaŋ lɛ.”

11 Miji tookwɛlɔ kpakpa lɛ;+ tookwɛlɔ kpakpa lɛ kɛ ewala* fɔ̃ɔ shi ehãa gwantɛŋi lɛ.

Agbɛnɛ Yesaia wie asraafoi anibii ní akɛwuɔ ta lɛ ahe akɛ akɛ la ekpata fɛɛ hiɛ kwraa, akɛ: “Aspaatre fɛɛ aspaatre ní tawulɔi woɔ kɛshimɔɔ shi yɛ ta gidigidifeemɔ mli lɛ kɛ atade ni wuɔ shi yɛ lá mli lɛ, shã abaashã, ni eeetsɔ la niyenii.”
Anaa faŋŋ yɛ mɛi komɛi agbɛfaŋ akɛ, gbɛfaŋnɔ ni Blonya tsuɔ yɛ jamɔ mli lɛ jeee amɛhe sane ko, kɛha amɛ lɛ, nɔ ni he hiaa ji hegbɛ ni amɛnáa kɛshɛjeɔ amɛmii lɛ.”
(Luka 21:19) Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, nɔ ni wɔhalaa yɛ enɛ gbɛfaŋ lɛ jieɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ wɔtsui mli lɛ kpo.
Abaanyɛ awie Kristofoi ní afɔ amɛ mu lɛ asafo lɛ he akɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ “Zion biyoo,” akɛni “ŋwɛi Yerusalem” ji amɛnyɛ lɛ hewɔ.
Kwɛmɔ akɛ owiemɔ naamuu lɛ kɔɔ susumɔi ni okɛha momo lɛ ahe tɛ̃ɛ.
19 Shi jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ, shi moŋ, bo diɛŋtsɛ obinuu ni abaafɔ ahã bo lɛ,* lɛ ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ ehã migbɛ́i lɛ.’
(1) Shihilɛ fɛɛ lɛ piŋmɔ ni.
Amrɔ nɛɛ, eyɛ miishɛɛ akɛ eeegba mɛi krokomɛi Biblia lɛ mli shɛɛ sane lɛ.
Enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, weku kome pɛ yɔɔ lɛɛlɛŋ—adesai aweku lɛ!
Mɛni hewɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ni akɛfɔ Yesu kaselɔi lɛ mu yɛ Pentekoste lɛ sa kadimɔ lɛ?
Odaseyeli yɛ ni tsɔɔ akɛ, yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni eeefee nɔ ni atsɔɔ shishi kɛjɛ Latin loo Hela ni awieɔ yɛ Shem-Tob be lɛ mli lɛ mli lɛ, nɛkɛ Mateo ŋmalɛ nɛɛ etsɛ waa, ni aŋma yɛ Hebri mli kɛjɛ shishijee.
Nɔ ni nɔŋŋ ni he hiaa titri ji ni okɛ mɔ ko aje sanegbaa ni ŋɔɔ shishi.
(Yeremia 11:20) Hɛɛ, Yehowa kaa nɔ ni aŋɔtee yɛ wɔmligbɛ tɔ̃ɔ lɛ ekwɛɔ.
• Mɛni ji wiemɔ he ni awoɔ, ni te Yesu kɛ nɛkɛ nitsɔɔmɔ gbɛ nɛɛ tsu nii eha tɛŋŋ?
Ni kɛ́ nyɛna akɛ bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, nyɛnyɛŋ nyɛkɛ nyɛhe awo mli hu?
(Lala 110:2) Eji Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii akɛ etao mɛi fɛɛ ni taoɔ ni amɛle mɔ ni eji diɛŋtsɛ ni amɛja lɛ “yɛ mumɔŋ kɛ anɔkwale mli” lɛ asɛɛ gbɛ, ni Mesia lɛ miitsu e-Tsɛ lɛ suɔmɔnaa nii nɛɛ he nii yɛ jeŋ fɔŋ ni etse ehe kɛjɛ Nyɔŋmɔ he nɛɛ mli.
Abuɔ Biblia lɛ akɛ eji woji babaoo ni kɔɔ jamɔŋ susumɔi kɛ aŋkroaŋkroi aniiashikpamɔi ahe lɛ ateŋ ekome ko kɛkɛ, shi jeee wolo ni wieɔ anɔkwale ni anaaa anɔkwa wiemɔi yɛ mli.
5 Ani Nyɔŋmɔ Ji Mɔ ko ni Yɔɔ Lɛɛlɛŋ?
Mɛɛ gbɛjianɔi ato kɛha shwane hejɔɔmɔ lɛ, ni te enɛ he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ ha tɛŋŋ?
(Hebribii 13:15, 16) Kɛfata he lɛ, amɛjáa Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ emumɔŋ sɔlemɔtsu, ní ji “jeŋmaji fɛɛ asɔlemɔwe,” taakɛ sɔlemɔtsu ní hi Yerusalem lɛ ji lɛ mli.
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ wɔnaa akɛ Yehowa baanyɛ aye abua ewebii lɛ yɛ kaai fɛɛ ni amɛkɛkpeɔ lɛ amli.
Nɔ ni baajɛ enɛ mli kɛba ji, onukpai akuu muu lɛ fɛɛ baaná sui kpakpai ni he hiaa kɛhã Nyɔŋmɔ asafo lɛ nɔkwɛmɔ yɛ gbɛ ni sa nɔ.
Yaa Nɔ ‘Ofee Ekpakpa’
Ehe miihia ni wɔná nɔ kroko wɔfata nilee lɛ he.
Ni nakai pɛpɛɛpɛ Yesu fee yɛ Nisan 14, afi 33 Ŋ.B.
Kɛ́ wɔmiitsu heguɔgbee he nii lɛ, bei pii lɛ, mɛɛ be ji “dioofeemɔ be”?
Steinsaltz wie akɛ: “Enɛ he nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ ni afee kɛteke nɔ ji kaselɔ ko ni abɔ amaniɛ akɛ eyatee ehe yɛ etsɔɔlɔ ni ji nilelɔ kpele lɛ saatso shishi koni ena ni ekase bɔ ni ekɛ eŋa wɔɔ ehaa.
12 Esa akɛ mlihilɛ ni damɔ suɔmɔ krɔŋŋ nɔ mla lɛ akudɔ ŋa lɛ hu lilɛi.
Esa akɛ yoo ni aŋɔ lɛ nom ni Israel nuu ko baaŋɔ lɛ akɛ eŋa lɛ afo ni eye esuɔlɔi ni egboi lɛ agbele he ŋkɔmɔ nyɔŋ muu fɛɛ.
Eha Adam ŋa kome pɛ.
Nyɛmi yoo lɛ gbala ejwɛŋmɔ kɛtee Nɔ Diɛŋtsɛ ni Kɛ Weku Miishɛɛ Baa wolo lɛ hu nɔ, ni ema nɔ mi eha lɛ akɛ, ŋaawoi kpakpai komɛi yɛ mli ni baaye abua ekɛ eŋa lɛ.
Ejaakɛ mi lɛ, nuumo ji mi, ni miŋa hu egbɔ.”
30 “Nuu ko akaŋɔ epapa ŋa, koni ekashwie epapa hiɛ shi.
Ŋwanejee ko kwraa bɛ he akɛ Lot le bɔ ni Yehowa bu Sara, ni ji Lot tsɛkwɛ̃ Abraham ŋa lɛ he eha lɛ jogbaŋŋ.
Mɛi komɛi susuɔ akɛ ja aná mɛi etsu sɔ̃i nɛɛ eko fɛɛ eko he nii—wu, ŋa, binuu, biyoo, naa kɛ nii, kɛ ekrokomɛi—dani ebafeɔ weku “diɛŋtsɛ.”
Enitsumɔtsɛ ni kpaa babaoo gbɛ kɛjɛɔ edɛŋ lɛ kɛ lɛ eye bɔ ni esaaa, eweku lɛ kwɛmɔ miigbala emli waa, ni hela ko ni miiye eŋa lɛ hu ehã efee yeyeeye.
Te yoo ko baafee tɛŋŋ etsɔɔ akɛ esusuɔ ewu he?
Wu hu baanyɛ aye abua eŋa ni ele enyɛmɔi.
Beni onukpa lɛ kɛ hefatalɔi lɛ wieɔ lɛ, belɛ eŋa kɛ tsuishitoo miimɛ.
Ewie akɛ, amrɔ nɛɛ ekɛ eŋa lɛ kɛ mɛi 15 miikase nii, ni mɛi ni ekpa Yehowa sɔɔmɔ lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii ebɔi asafoŋ kpeei yaa ekoŋŋ.

+ 33 Shi Yehowa kɛɛ Mose akɛ: “Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni efee esha eshi mi lɛ, lɛ egbɛ́i magbe yɛ miwolo lɛ mli.
Nu Afua lɛ kpata mɛi fɔji lɛ ahiɛ, ni abaa mɛi ni efee klalo kɛha nakai Nyɔŋmɔ nifeemɔ lɛ pɛ ayi—Noa kɛ mɛi krokomɛi kpawo ni yɔɔ eweku lɛ mli lɛ.—1 Mose 7:19-23; 2 Petro 3:5, 6.
Beni nakai je lɛ naagbee lɛ bɛŋkɛɔ lɛ, Yehowa kɛɛ Noa ni ebote adeka lɛ mli, ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Eshwɛ biɛ gbii kpawo ni mahã nu abanɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ shwaneshwane kɛ nyɔɔŋnyɔɔŋ gbii nyɔŋmai ejwɛ, ni makpãta nii fɛɛ ni hiɛ kãmɔ ni mifee lɛ hiɛ kɛjɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.”
(2 Korintobii 4: 16-18) Wɔ hiɛnɔkamɔ ni jara wa waa lɛ damɔ Yehowa shiwoo ni kɔɔ wɔsɛɛ be ko ni ebɛŋkɛ ni emli ni “[eee]tsumɔ [wɔ] hiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋkɔmɔyeli ko kɛ bolɔmɔ ko kɛ nɔnaa ko hu bɛ dɔŋŋ” lɛ nɔ shiŋŋ.
Te anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ baafee enii yɛ mɔdɛŋ ni Satan bɔɔ koni ekpata anɔkwa jamɔ hiɛ kɛjɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ he eha tɛŋŋ?
3 Kɛkɛ ni Maria wó ojeŋma,* nardo mu krɔŋŋ, ni jara wa waa diɛŋtsɛ ni ŋmɛɔ nsɛni tɛ kome,* ni efɔse eshwie Yesu naji ahe ni ekɛ eyitsɔi tsumɔ enaji ahe.
Yehowa “aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋkɔmɔyeli ko kɛ bolɔmɔ ko kɛ nɔnaa ko hu bɛ dɔŋŋ.”
(Yesaia 25:8) Yehowa “aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋkɔmɔyeli ko kɛ bolɔmɔ ko kɛ nɔnaa ko hu bɛ dɔŋŋ.”
(2 Petro 3: 13) Etsɛŋ ni Yehowa ‘aaami gbele kɛaatee naanɔ’ ni ‘eeetsumɔ hiɛaŋ fɛɛ yaafonui.’ —Yesaia 25:8.
(Yohane 5:28, 29, NW) Beni bɔfo Yohane na “ŋwɛi hee kɛ shikpɔŋ hee” lɛ he ninaa lɛ, akɛɛ lɛ akɛ, “Nyɔŋmɔ diɛŋtsɛ . . . aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋkɔmɔyeli ko kɛ bolɔmɔ ko kɛ nɔnaa ko hu bɛ dɔŋŋ.”
9 Shĩai wuji pii ni mɛi babaoo yɔɔ mli lɛ amli feɔ dioo.
2 Ani enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ abaakpata Yuda maŋ lɛ hiɛ kɛjɛ shihilɛ mli kwraa?
Kɛfata he lɛ, adesai eshɛ he ko ni sa kadimɔ waa yɛ yinɔsane mli: Amɛbaanyɛ amɛfite shikpɔŋ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ, kɛtsɔ adesai fɛɛ ni yɔɔ nɔ lɛ ahiɛ ni amɛbaakpãtã lɛ nɔ.
Ejieɔ hela, gbele, kɛ piŋmɔi fɛɛ.
“Ebaatsumɔ amɛhiŋmɛiiaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni mɔ ko yeŋ awerɛho dɔŋŋ, ni mɔ ko woŋ yara ko hu dɔŋŋ, ni mɔ ko hu piŋŋ dɔŋŋ.
17:5, 16; 18:8) No sɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa diɛŋtsɛ baakpãta Satan je lɛ fã ni eshwɛ lɛ hiɛ yɛ Harmagedon ta, ni ji naagbee nifeemɔ ni baaya nɔ yɛ amanehulu kpeteŋkpele lɛ mli lɛ mli.—Kpoj.
21 Kɛkɛ ni Yehowa tsu ŋwɛibɔfo ko ni eyagbe tawulɔ kãkãlɔ fɛɛ tawulɔ kãkãlɔ,+ kɛ hiɛnyiɛlɔ fɛɛ hiɛnyiɛlɔ, kɛ tatsɛ fɛɛ tatsɛ ni yɔɔ Asiria maŋtsɛ lɛ nsara lɛ mli lɛ, no hewɔ lɛ, Asiria maŋtsɛ lɛ ku esɛɛ kɛtee lɛ diɛŋtsɛ eshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ hiɛgbele.
Ni Nyɔŋmɔ aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ.”—Kpojiemɔ 21:1-4.
(Romabii 5:17) Kpɔmɔnɔ lɛ kɛ nɔdaamɔnɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ aaatsɔ nɔ akpata nɛkɛ “naagbee henyɛlɔ” nɛɛ hiɛ lɛ haa.
Sɛɛ mli lɛ, ebooo fãmɔ ni akɛha lɛ akɛ ekpata maŋ ko ni ji Israel henyɛlɔ lɛ hiɛ lɛ toi.—2/15, baafa 22-23.
(Yesaia 29:13, 14) Nɔ ni Yuda tsɛɔ lɛ nilee kɛ hiɛtɛ̃ɛ ní ená lɛ hiɛ baakpata yɛ be mli ni Yehowa kudɔɔ nibii koni Babilon Jeŋ Hewalɛ lɛ ababɛɛ ehemɔkɛyeli kwalɔi ajamɔ gbɛjianɔtoo muu lɛ fɛɛ kɛya kwraa lɛ.
18 Akɛni Yehowa sumɔɔ mɛi ni sɔmɔɔ lɛ lɛ lɛɛlɛŋ hewɔ lɛ, ebaabɛɛ mɛi ni haoɔ amɛ lɛ fɛɛ kɛya kwraa.
16 No hewɔ lɛ, agbɛnɛ nyɛtsua oya ni ayakɛa David ni abɔ lɛ kɔkɔ akɛ: ‘Kaahi hei ni afoɔ faa lɛ yɛ lɛ, yɛ ŋa lɛ nɔ* yɛ nyɔɔŋ nɛɛ mli kɔkɔɔkɔ, shi moŋ bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ foo faa lɛ, kɛjeee nakai lɛ, abaabɛɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛ mɛi fɛɛ ni fata ehe lɛ ashwie.’”
Shi aŋmalaa gbɛi awoɔ wolo nɛɛ mli yɛ taomɔ nii komɛi anaa, ejaakɛ Yehowa baanyɛ ‘agbe’ mɛi agbɛi.
Ni kaatsumɔ amɛhe esha lɛ kɛje ohiɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mumɔ tsirɛ Salomo koni etĩ esusumɔ lɛ mli akɛ: “Naa, nɔ ni mina nɛ: ehi ni eyɛ fɛo, akɛ gbɔmɔ aaaye ni enu ni eye nii kpakpai amli ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ edeŋme fɛɛ ni egboɔ yɛ hulu shishi nɛɛ lɛ mli, ewala gbii abɔ fɛɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ eha lɛ lɛ; ejaakɛ no ji egbɛfaŋnɔ.”—Jajelɔ 5:17.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ kɔkɔbɔɔ ni ekɛha yɛ shishijee, ni kɔɔ tso ni agu eyeli he lɛ he, akɛ, ‘Gbi nɔ oooye eko lɛ, gbo ooogbo’ lɛ, hã gbɔmɔ lɛ ákɛ bɔɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ heloo-kɛ-mumɔ fɛɛ —ni kɛ eye eyibii lɛ eko lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ eeegbo, ákɛ bɔɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ heloo-kɛ-mumɔ fɛɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ wɔmiijɔɔ wɔhe po, tamɔ kɛ wɔyaaye nii lɛ, esa akɛ wɔsaa wɔhe akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji ni eba maŋ lɛ mli kɛha Kristofoi akpee, ni esaaa akɛ wɔwoɔ atadei tamɔ jeans, nika, loo T-Shirt ni aŋmala nibii yɛ amɛmli.
8 Shi anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɔmɔ lɛ kɛɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ oja oshĩa lɛ mli ni ohã mi fã po lɛ, mikɛ bo eyaŋ, ni miyeŋ nɔ ko* ni minuŋ nu hu yɛ biɛ.
3 Naajiemɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛhã mɛi ni kojoɔ mi lɛ nɛ: 4 Wɔyɛ hegbɛ* akɛ wɔyeɔ nii ni wɔnuɔ nii, aloo jeee nakai?
Wɔta shi yɛ sɔlemɔtsũ lɛ atrakpoi lɛ anɔ ni wɔbɔi yeli.
16 Atsĩ shihilɛ mli nibii ni haa wɔnáa miishɛɛ tamɔ niyeli kɛ ninumɔ tã yɛ Jajelɔ 3:12, 13 lɛ.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni Adam baafĩ Nyɔŋmɔ sɛɛ akɛ enɔyeli lɛ ja lɛ, ebo eŋa toi ni efata ehe kɛye tso ni agu enɔ yibii yeli lɛ.
25 Kɛkɛ ni Mose kɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛyea no ŋmɛnɛ, ejaakɛ ŋmɛnɛ ji hejɔɔmɔ gbi kɛhã Yehowa.
No sɛɛ lɛ, Satan tsɔ enɔ ni eha Adam hu ye yibii ni agu eyeli lɛ eko.
15 Nuumo lɛ kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Ba wɔtee shĩa ni oyaye nɔ ko.”
Kɛtsɔ tso yibii ni agu eyeli ni amɛye lɛ nɔ lɛ, amɛkpoo ŋwɛi ejurɔfeemɔ.
+ 17 Nii ni aŋmɛŋ bo gbɛ ni oye yɛ omaji* lɛ amli ji oŋmaa* loo owain hee loo omu mlijai nyɔŋma mli ekomekomei, loo otsinai kɛ otoi akromɔbii,+ loo afɔle fɛɛ afɔle ni owoɔ shi akɛ okɛbaahã, loo afɔlei ni ojɛɔ osuɔmɔ mli okɛhãa, loo odɛŋ onia.
Mfonirifeemɔŋ kooloo ní tsuɔ tamɔ muneele lɛ kɛ ekolontoi nyɔŋma lɛ, “amɛaaŋmɛ [Babilon Kpeteŋkpele] lɛ yayai, ni amɛaaye eheloo, ni amɛkɛ la aaashã lɛ.”
Beni Salomo wieɔ kpɛkpɛɛfeelɔ he lɛ, eŋma akɛ: “Ewala gbii fɛɛ mli lɛ duŋ mli eyeɔ nii yɛ, emli woɔ la babaoo, ni hela kɛ mlifu kpaaa lɛ.”
17 Etsɛŋ tsɔ̃ ni Yehowa baakudɔ Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ lɛ mli bii ni “eye sɛkɛ” lɛ ni amɛaatsɔ̃ amɛhiɛ amɛwo apasa jamɔ, taakɛ awie he yɛ Kpojiemɔ 17:16 lɛ: “Amɛaanyɛ ajwamaŋ lɛ, ni amɛaafee lɛ amaŋfɔ, ni amɛaaŋmɛ lɛ yayai, ni amɛaaye eheloo, ni amɛkɛ la aaashã lɛ.”
12 Yesu ka Pergamo Kristofoi lɛ hu hiɛ yɛ ‘nii ni akɛsha afɔle aha wɔji ni amɛye lɛ hewɔ.’
14 Akɛni maŋtsɛ shĩa lɛ ŋoo lɛ eko wɔyeɔ* hewɔ lɛ, ehiii akɛ wɔbaata shi ni wɔkwɛ ni nɔ ni sa maŋtsɛ lɛ aŋmɛɛ lɛ, no hewɔ ni wɔŋma wolo nɛɛ koni wɔhã maŋtsɛ lɛ ale enɛ, 15 koni ohã akwɛ otsɛmɛi lɛ ayinɔsaji awolo lɛ mli.
Yɛ je lɛŋ hei komɛi lɛ, maŋ kusumii eŋmɛɛɛ wekui agbɛ ni amɛye nii kutuu loo ni amɛwie kɛ́ amɛmiiye nii.
No hewɔ lɛ, ani mi lɛ miya mi diɛŋtsɛ mishĩa ni miyaye nii, ni minu nɔ ko, ni mikɛ miŋa awɔ lo?
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔye niyenii krɛdɛɛ ko ni wɔjie wɔ hiɛtserɛ kɛtsɔ shwɛmɔi anɔ.
Gbi gbɛkɛ dani Yesu baagbo lɛ, ekɛ akpiti aboloo kɛ kpulu ni wein yɔɔ mli ha ebɔfoi lɛ ni efã amɛ akɛ amɛye ni amɛnu.
17 Atsɔɔ Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ hiɛkpatamɔ lɛ mli jogbaŋŋ yɛ Kpojiemɔ wolo lɛ mli, akɛ: “Ni akolontoi nyɔŋma ni ona [ni ji ‘maŋtsɛmɛi’ ni yeɔ nɔ yɛ naagbee be lɛ mli] lɛ, kɛ kooloo lɛ [kooloo ni tsuɔ tamɔ muneele, ni damɔ shi kɛha Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ], amɛaanyɛ ajwamaŋ lɛ, ni amɛaafee lɛ amaŋfɔ, ni amɛaaŋmɛ lɛ yayai, ni amɛaaye eheloo, ni amɛkɛ la aaashã lɛ.”
Kɛ wɔɔkpɛ̃lɛ tsɔɔmɔi ni daimonioi asusumɔi ni yɔɔ oshara ebote mli lɛ nɔ lɛ, ebaanyɛ eha wɔye ebɔɔ ni wɔgboi taakɛ heloonaa niyenii ni muawai loo ebɔɔ ebote mli lɛ baanyɛ afee lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Te Oyeɔ Nii Jogbaŋŋ yɛ Mumɔŋ Ohaa Tɛŋŋ?
1, 2. (a) Mɛɛ susumɔ Yudafoi ni hi shi yɛ Yesu gbii lɛ amli lɛ hiɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he?
Toiboo ni Yesu fee yɛ kaa ni naa wa shishi lɛ ha “ehi kɛwula shi” koni enyɛ etsu gbɛhe hee ni Nyɔŋmɔ esaa eto lɛ akɛ Maŋtsɛ kɛ Osɔfonukpa lɛ he nii.
“Kwɛ Bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ Yɔɔ Hewalɛ Waa Diɛŋtsɛ Ha!”
Ná Kanyamɔ Koni Osɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ
Esa akɛ mɛi ni miisumɔ ni amɛna Nyɔŋmɔ dɛŋ jɔɔmɔ lɛ akpɛ amɛyiŋ, ni shishashaomɔ bɛ mli, ni ekɛ etaomɔ nii akpa gbee.
2 Kaselɔ Yuda tsɔɔ gbɛ nɔ ni oootsɔ ohi Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔ lɛ mli daa.
(b) Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, mɛni Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ le yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ he?
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:35) Be mli ni maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi heei nɛɛ yaa nɔ amɛkaseɔ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ji “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ” ni mli hi, ní haa mɛi krokomɛi anine shɛɔ anɔkwale lɛ nɔ lɛ, amɛbaaya nɔ amɛná miishɛɛ.—1 Timoteo 1:11, NW.
5 Ejaakɛ wɔmiifãmɔ susumɔi kɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni kwɔ ni teɔ shi ewoɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nilee lɛ wɔmiishwie,+ ni wɔmiiŋɔ jwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ jwɛŋmɔ nom koni wɔhã ebo Kristo lɛ toi; 6 ni wɔsaa wɔhe wɔto, koni kɛ́ nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ, nyɛbo toi kɛwula shi nɔŋŋ lɛ, wɔkɛ toigbele fɛɛ toigbele he toigbalamɔ ahã. +
Ojogbaŋŋ, enu he akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ ehe ekeŋ lɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ, shi eesumɔ ni ekase ehe nii hu yɛ ebii lɛ ahewɔ.
Beni Yehowa jie ehewalɛ lɛ kpo lɛ, gbɔmɛi lɛ bo akɛ: “Yehowa lɛ, lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ!”
Yɛ “otsi” nɛɛ mli lɛ, akpã hegbɛ ni yɔɔ akɛ aaatsɔmɔ Yesu kaselɔi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ mli aha Yudafoi ni sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei lɛ kɛ mɛi ni etsake kɛba Yuda jamɔ mli lɛ pɛ.
(Yakobo 4:8) Mɛni po baanyɛ aha ofee shweshweeshwe fe akɛ oooná okɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ji Tsɛ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ teŋ wekukpãa ni bɛŋkɛ kpaakpa?
Mɛni ye ebua David ni eyɔse nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ sumɔɔ?
Nyɔŋmɔ miisumɔ akɛ “ehere gbɔmɛi fɛɛ yiwala, koni amɛshɛ anɔkwale lɛ lee mli.”
Nyɛtiua ‘Hetsemɔ Sɛɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Gbeyeishemɔ Mli’
4 Nakai beiaŋ lɛ, Ejiptbii lɛ hu miifufuu amɛkromɔbii ni Yehowa tswia amɛ nii yɛ amɛteŋ lɛ,+ ejaakɛ Yehowa ekojo amɛnyɔŋmɔi lɛ.
*+ Bo daamɔ maŋbii lɛ anajiaŋ ni okɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ awie ohã amɛ,+ koni okɛ saji lɛ fɛɛ aba anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ.
4 Eyɛ mli akɛ Kristofoi ejieee Nyɔŋmɔ anunyam lɛ kpo kɛtsɔ anunyam nɛɛ ní aaakpɛ́lɛ yɛ amɛhiɛ nɔ moŋ, shi amɛhiɛ kpɛ́lɛɔ yɛ gbɛ ko nɔ beni amɛgbaa mɛi krokomɛi Yehowa sui kɛ eyiŋtoo ni yɔɔ nyam lɛ ahe sane lɛ.
• Mɛni ebiɔ ni wɔfee koni wɔnyɛ wɔbote Nyɔŋmɔ hejɔɔmɔ lɛ mli ŋmɛnɛ?
(Hiob 1:9-11; 2:4, 5) Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ, Satan egri naakpa yɛ enaagbee mɔdɛŋ ni ebɔɔ koni eha nɔ ni ekɛɛ lɛ afee anɔkwale, yɛ amrɔ nɛɛ ni ato Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ ama shi shiŋŋ, kɛ eshishibii kɛ najiaŋdamɔlɔi anɔkwafoi ni ebɔle jeŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɛɛ lɛ mli.
5 Shi, kɛji akɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔ yɛ mumɔŋ nibii anɔ lɛ, wɔhiɛ baahi wɔhe nɔ be fɛɛ be akɛ, eyɛ mli akɛ Yehowa jeee Nyɔŋmɔ ni taoɔ tɔmɔ moŋ, shi ele beni wɔtsuɔ susumɔi kɛ akɔnɔi ni ehiii lɛ ahe nii.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, kɛ́ okɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ tsu nii kɛye obua mɛi krokomɛi ni amɛfee tsakemɔi yɛ amɛshihilɛ mli lɛ, otsui nyɔɔ omli ni onáa miishɛɛ waa.
Shi nakai miishɛɛ lɛ ba naagbee, beni amɛgbo Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ toi lɛ.
Enɛ ji yiŋtoo ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛbɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ kɛ adesai, ni no ji nɔ ni Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ diɛŋtsɛ!
Nilelɔ George Howard, ni epɛi nɛkɛ sane nɛɛ mli babaoo lɛ susuɔ akɛ, “Shem-Tob Hebri Mateo lɛ jɛ Kristofoi abe lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ afii ohai ejwɛ lɛ mli he ko.”
Yɛ nyɛsɛɛ afii ejwɛ lɛ pɛ mli lɛ, mina akɛ Maŋtsɛyeli Asai lɛ etee hiɛ kɛjɛ ekome kɛyashɛ nɔ ni fa fe 600.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, aaafee afii ejwɛ nɛ lɛ, no mli lɛ dãatɔlɔ ko ni atsɛ́ɔ lɛ Ariel kã shi etɔ dãa.
13 Shi, gbɛi hee ni akɛha Hebribii ejwɛ lɛ fɛɛ kɔɔ apasa nyɔŋmɔi ahe kpaakpa, ni tsɔɔ akɛ nyɔŋmɔi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ eba anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shi.
Sɛɛ mli gbi ko yɛ February 1942 lɛ, Lloyd kɛ mi tee nigii—ni Odasefoi ejwɛ ni ewo shi akɛ amɛjieŋ teemɔŋ sane nɛɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔŋ mɛi krokomɛi fata he—kɛtee nitsumɔhe ni akɛ waonaa gbɛi woɔ woji ashishi yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ, ni wɔbote gbalashihilɛ mli.
Gbii ejwɛ sɔŋŋ nɛ ni wɔje wɔgbɛfaa lɛ shishi, ni Biblia kasemɔ he woji ni tsiimɔ shɛɔ tɔn nyɔŋma yɛ wɔtsɔne lɛ mli.
Beni Paulo kɛ Luka yahi eshia lɛ, no mli lɛ “eyɛ biyei oblayei ejwɛ ni gbaa.”
Ni kooloi wuji ejwɛ fã kpo kɛjɛ ŋshɔ lɛŋ, soro eko, soro eko.”
Nyɔŋmɔ “hulu” ni naa wa ni ji efɔbuu kojomɔ lɛ woŋ ohe gbeyei, ni kɛ aŋmɛɛ hiɛkpatamɔ kɔɔyɔi ejwɛ lɛ ahe lɛ, abaabaa oyi kɛjɛ Yehowa mlifu lɛ mli ‘la ni shaa nii’ lɛ mli.
22 “Kɛ́ mɔ ko ju tsina loo too ni egbe loo eyahɔ̃ɔ lɛ, ekɛ tsinai enumɔ ato tsina kome ni eju lɛ najiaŋ, ni ekɛ toi ejwɛ ato too kome ni eju lɛ najiaŋ.
19 Afee akekerei ni mamɔ akulashiŋi ni yɔɔ ablanaa lɛ hiɛ lɛ tamɔ lili fɔfɔii, ni fɔfɔii lɛ akwɔlɛ ji ninetalɔi ejwɛ.
Abuɔ naa akɛ, United States obalaŋta loo gbekɛ kɛ ŋmɛlɛtswai fe ejwɛ baabo rɔk lalai atoi, daa gbi, kɛ aja mli, yɛ enaagbee afii ekpaa ni ebaaye yɛ skul lɛ mli!
Yoo ko kɛ ebii ejwɛ fata mɛi klɛŋklɛŋ ni mikɛkase Biblia lɛ ahe.
Eyɛ mli akɛ aŋmɛɔ mi gbɛ koni maya nitsumɔ moŋ, shi Gestapobii ejwɛ ni ta tsɔne mli yɛ wɔshĩa lɛ hiɛ lɛ kwɛɔ miyaa kɛbaa fɛɛ, ni polisifonyo ko hu sharaa shi yɛ gbɛjegbɛ lɛ afã gbɛ.
Akojo mi akɛ mahi tsũŋ afii ejwɛ ni minyɛ lɛ afi kɛ fã.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: ‘Shi miina hii ejwɛ ni amɛnyiɛ la lɛ mli.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, Arrian kɛ Plutarch, mɛi enyɔ ni ŋmala Alexander Kpeteŋkpele lɛ wala shihilɛ mli saji mra fe fɛɛ lɛ ŋmala yɛ Alexander gbele ni ba yɛ 323 D.Ŋ.B. lɛ sɛɛ nɔ ni fe afii ohai ejwɛ, ni kɛlɛ, yinɔsaneŋmalɔi kpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ esa akɛ akɛ he afɔ̃ nɔ.
Amɛkpooo mishiɛmɔ wiemɔi lɛ, shi kɛ́ migbe amɛtsũi lɛ amaamɔ naa pɛ lɛ, amɛkɛ mi foɔ tako mli oya nɔŋŋ.
Yitso Ejwɛ
32 Nɔ ni enyiɛ klɛŋklɛŋ naasɔomɔi ejwɛ lɛ eko fɛɛ eko naatsemɔ sɛɛ ji famɔ ni ji: “Ba ni obakwɛ!”
Akɛ kɔsɔŋkɔsɔ fimɔ Petro ni awo lɛ tsuŋ, ni asraafoi akui srɔtoi ejwɛ to naa koni amɛbu ehe ni ekajo foi, ni asraafoi ejwɛ yɔɔ kuu fɛɛ kuu mli.
Kɛfata he lɛ, amɛkɛ lá fãi titrii ejwɛ ni ji wala yibii yɛji, wala yibii tsuji, platelets, kɛ plasma tsuuu nii yɛ helatsamɔ mli, ejaakɛ amɛbuɔ Nyɔŋmɔ mla lɛ.
+ 31 Ni ebaatsu ebɔfoi lɛ kɛ tɛtɛrɛmantɛrɛ gbɛɛmɔ ni naa wa, ni amɛbaabua ehalamɔbii lɛ anaa kɛbaajɛ kɔɔyɔi ejwɛ lɛ anɔ, kɛjɛ ŋwɛi naagbeehe kome kɛyashi naagbeehe kroko.

6 Ni kwaakwaalabitei lɛ bahãa lɛ blodo kɛ loo daa leebi kɛ blodo kɛ loo daa gbɛkɛ, ni enuɔ faa lɛ mli nu lɛ eko.
No mli lɛ mikɛ shika fioo pɛ eto ni baashɛ kɛha aspaatre kome pɛ hemɔ, ni hiɛnɔkamɔ ko hu bɛ akɛ mana shika gbɛfaŋ yelikɛbuamɔ ko kɛjɛ mifɔlɔi aŋɔɔ.

‘Hiŋmɛi Tsofa ni Okɛfɔ Ohiŋmɛii Nɔ’
Amɛfolɔ amɛnaa akɛ amɛku Hejɔɔmɔ Gbi mla lɛ mli —abuɔ abele loo ŋmãa kũu akɛ ŋmaakpamɔ, ni amɛbuɔ ekposamɔ lɛ hu akɛ abele loo ŋmãa gbɛlɛmɔ.
Wɔteŋ mɛi krokomɛi hu kɛ je lɛŋ bii yaa kɛ baa daa gbi.
‘Hemɔ Hiŋmɛi Tsofa ni Okɛfɔ Ohiŋmɛii Anɔ’
Kɛ́ akɛ dade kaplɛ ko shɔɔ tɛ ni yɔɔ trotro, kɛ ehiɛ ŋmlitsaŋmlitsa fioo lɛ nɔ lɛ, eshiɔ okadi ko yɛ shika lɛ nɔ.
Wiemɔ, “Hiob miishɛjelɔi” lɛ ebatsɔ nɔ ni akɛtoɔ gbɔmɔ ni, yɛ be mli ni esa akɛ enu he eha mɔ, yɛ haomɔ be mli lɛ, ewuleɔ efala mli moŋ lɛ he.
Esa akɛ wɔsusu sane nɛɛ he waa, ejaakɛ kɛ́ wɔkwɛɛɛ ni ahi lɛ, su nɛɛ ni ehe shi yɛ je lɛŋ lɛ baaná wɔ hu wɔnɔ hewalɛ. —Efe.

17 Moŋ lɛ, wɔbaaye wiemɔi fɛɛ ni wɔnaabui ewie lɛ anɔ, ni wɔbaashã afɔlei wɔhã Ŋwɛi Maŋnyɛ* lɛ, ni wɔbaafɔse dãa afɔlei wɔshwie shi wɔhã lɛ,+ tamɔ bɔ ni wɔ, kɛ wɔtsɛmɛi lɛ, kɛ wɔmaŋtsɛmɛi lɛ, kɛ wɔlumɛi lɛ fee yɛ Yuda maji lɛ anɔ kɛ Yerusalem gbɛjegbɛi lɛ anɔ be ni wɔtɔrɔ kɛ blodo* ni wɔná nii lɛ, be ni wɔnaaa sane fɔŋ ko kwraa lɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Biblia lɛ etsɔɔɔ mu falɛ ni maŋnyɛ lɛ kɛha Salomo moŋ, shi ekɛɔ wɔ akɛ enikeenii lɛ kã he eji nɔ ni nɔ ko bɛ ni kɛ lɛ yeɔ egbɔ. —1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 10:10.

Anɔkwa, be ni England Maŋnyɛ Elizabeth I lɛ to Trinity College lɛ shishi lɛ, jwɛŋmɔ ni ekɛfee nakai ji, ni aná osɔfoi ni baanyɛ atsɔɔ emaŋbii lɛ sane ni yɔɔ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛwiemɔ mli.

Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, be ko lɛ Maŋnyɛ Ester bi ni ewu Maŋtsɛ Ahashwerosh atsu jalɛ sane ko ni ayeee he nii.

Eji anɔkwale akɛ, blema yinɔsaji awoji ko bɛ amrɔ nɛɛ ni anaa Maŋnyɛ Ester he saji yɛ mli, kɛlɛ jeee Ester pɛ ji ablade ko ni gbɛ́i eje maŋ yinɔsaji awoji amli.

Naanɔ Maŋtsɛ lɛ baanyiɛ wɔhiɛ blɛoo aahu kɛyashi naagbee gbii nɛɛ anaagbee kwraa, ejaakɛ David maa nɔ mi ehaa wɔ akɛ: “Yehowa baa mɛi fɛɛ ni sumɔɔ lɛ lɛ ayi; shi mɛi fɔji lɛ, eeekpata amɛ fɛɛ amɛhiɛ.”—Lala 145:16, 20.
8 Maŋtsɛ Yosia bɔ mɔdɛŋ ekoŋŋ akɛ ebaajie nɔ̃ fɛɛ nɔ̃ ni kɛ wɔŋjamɔ yɔɔ tsakpaa lɛ kɛjɛ Yuda.
Jɛmɛ ni maŋtsɛ lɛ bi Ester nɔ ni etaoɔ ni efee eha lɛ.
Maŋtsɛ Salomo jie heshibaa kpo yɛ esɔlemɔ yɛ faŋŋ mli lɛ mli beni ajɔɔ Yehowa sɔlemɔtsu lɛ nɔ lɛ
Shi kɛlɛ, etsɛŋ ni eeete shi ‘edamɔ shi’ yɛ Yehowa gbɛi amli akɛ Tatsɛ kɛ-Maŋtsɛ ni anyɛɛɛ enɔ kunim aye, ni eeetɔ “owele yɛ mɛi ni leee Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mɛi ni booo wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ Yesu Kristo sanekpakpa lɛ toi lɛ anɔ.”
Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ hegbɛ akɛ eeetsɔɔ nɔyeli ni esa akɛ eye nɔ, ni ehala e-Bi Yesu, akɛ efee Maŋtsɛ.
Etsɔ David nɔ kɛba yɛ heloo naa no hewɔ lɛ hegbɛ yɛ kɛha lɛ akɛ efeɔ Yehowa Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔ Maŋtsɛ.

13 Nɛgbɛ Hamat maŋtsɛ lɛ, kɛ Arpad maŋtsɛ lɛ, kɛ Sefarvaim maji lɛ anɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ, kɛ Hena maŋtsɛ lɛ, kɛ Iva maŋtsɛ lɛ yɔɔ?’”
Afeko eko ní tamɔ nakai dã kɛjɛ Maŋtsɛ Salomo gbii lɛ amli aahu kɛbaa.—2 Kronika 30:1, 25, 26.

Wolo ni ji The Illustrated Science Encyclopedia—Amazing Planet Earth lɛ wie akɛ: “Kɛ́ oyɛ ŋwɛiniiaŋ shɔŋŋ ni okwɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ, ekpɛ́lɛɔ tamɔ jwine fɛfɛo.”

5 Ni mlifiinɔ ni alo ni yɔɔ efɔd lɛ he, ni akɛfiɔ efɔd lɛ mli koni emɔ mɔ jogbaŋŋ lɛ,+ nibii nɛɛ nɔŋŋ eko akɛfee, ni nomɛi ji, shika tsuru kɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ klala ni alo lɛ jogbaŋŋ, tamɔ bɔ ni Yehowa fã Mose lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
3 Amɛkɛ hamlɛ tswia shika tsuru tɛtrɛbii ni amɛfee fɛtɛfɛtɛ kwraa, ni amɛfolɔ lɛ tamɔ kpãi koni amɛkɛlo nii amɛwo efɔd lɛ ni akɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ klala kpakpa fee lɛ mli.
Susumɔ nɔ ni bei pii lɛ abuɔ lɛ akɛ no ji kooloo wulu fe fɛɛ ní ehi shibɔlemɔ ŋulami nɛɛ nɔ pɛŋ, ni ji bonso ní su yɔɔ bluu lɛ he okwɛ.
Amɛtade lɛ, kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi ni hiɛ pɛpol kɔla ni.

23 Mɔ ni fata ehe ji, Oholiab,+ Ahisamak binuu lɛ ni jɛ Dan weku lɛ mli lɛ, mɔ ni ji ŋaalɔ ni le bɔ ni aloɔ nii awoɔ mama mli, ni agbɛnɛ hu, enyɛɔ ekɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ klala kpakpa loɔ nii lɛ.
12 No sɛɛ lɛ, amɛŋɔ sɔɔmɔ nibii+ fɛɛ ni amɛkɛtsuɔ nii yɛ he krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ daa lɛ, ní amɛkɛwo mama bluu mli, ní amɛkɛ nu mli gbee hewolo aha he, ní amɛkɛma tso ni akɛbaawó lɛ nɔ.
+ 28 Okɛ kpãa bluu afi tsitsinɔnii lɛ gai lɛ kɛyamɔ efɔd lɛ gai lɛ, koni emɔ tsitsinɔnii lɛ ekpɛtɛ shi.
Anaa amɛ kɛ amɛtadei etsuji kɛ bluu fɛfɛji ni amɛmiitsu nii yɛ amɛ chacras aloo ŋmɔji bibii lɛ amli.
Yifiinii bluu lɛ damɔ shi kɛha jwɛŋmɔ ni lɛɛ tamɔ atatuiaŋ, ni he ko bɛ kɛha mɔ he jwɛŋmɔ fɔŋ namɔ
+ 3 Onia ni nyɛbaahe yɛ amɛdɛŋ lɛ nɛ: shika tsuru+ kɛ jwiɛtɛi+ kɛ akɔɔble+ 4 kɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ klala kpakpa kɛ abotia hetsɔi 5 kɛ gwantɛŋhii ahewoji ni awo lɛ tsofa tsuru kɛ nu mli gbei ahewoji kɛ akasia tso+ 6 kɛ mu ni akɛbaawo kanei amli+ kɛ balsam mu ni akɛbaafee mufɔɔ mu+ kɛ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma+ 7 kɛ onike tɛi kɛ tɛi krokomɛi ni akɛbaatara efɔd+ lɛ kɛ tsitsinɔnii+ lɛ amli.
Nɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni obaanyɛ ofee yɛ nakai beaŋ ji ni oha bɔ ni ole osuɔlɔ lɛ oha lɛ ahi ojwɛŋmɔ mli, ekɔɔɔ he eko nɔ hela ni yeɔ lɛ.”
Yɛ nakai be lɛ mli lɛ, gbɔmɛi ni hiŋmɛii amli bluu loo eyɛŋ, loo nɔ ni hiɛ su kroko ni yɔɔ fɛo, shi amrɔ nɛɛ amɛshwila lɛ, baanyɛ ana nii ekoŋŋ.
Ani obaakpa gbɛ akɛ kɔlai srɔtoi lɛ fɛɛ baato amɛhe yɛ he kome—bluu sɔŋŋ yɛ afã, yɛlo sɔŋŋ yɛ afã, kɛtsara nɔ nakai?

“Ŋulami kome fe ŋulami kroko anunyam,” taakɛ Paulo kɛɛ jeeŋmɔ kwraa dani jeŋ nilee kpá nɛkɛ ŋulamii nɛɛ ashi akɛ ŋulamii bluu, ŋulamii tsuji agboi, kɛ ŋulamii bibii yɛji lɛ.

Yesu tsɔ wiemɔ ni eha ni eji nitsɔɔmɔ ni nɔ bɛ nɛɛ nɔ ewie saji babaoo he, ni nɔ ni fata enɛɛmɛi ahe ji gbɛ ni atsɔɔ nɔ anáa anɔkwa miishɛɛ, bɔ ni afeɔ asaa béi, bɔ ni asɔleɔ ahaa, kɛ jwɛŋmɔ ni ja ni esa akɛ aná yɛ heloonaa nibii ahe.

Ni nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshĩa lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.” —5 MOSE 6:5-7.
Nyɔŋmɔ diɛŋtsɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”
Mose wo ŋaa akɛ: “Ni nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ aka otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ, kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ, kɛ beni oka shi, kɛ beni ote shi.”—5 Mose 6:6, 7.
Ni nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ aka otsui nɔ ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛteŋ kɛ beni oka shi kɛ beni ote shi.”—5 Mose 6:5-7; okɛto Mateo 22:37-40 he.

+ 17 Majie mihiɛ maka nyɛ, ni nyɛhenyɛlɔi baaye nyɛnɔ kunim;+ ni mɛi ni nyɛɔ nyɛ lɛ baanaanaa nyɛnɔ,+ ni nyɛbaajo foi be ni mɔ ko mɔ ko enyiɛɛɛ nyɛsɛɛ.

Mɛi ni Diɔ Toiŋjɔlɛ Sɛɛ Lɛ

Amrɔ nɛɛ mikɛ mɛi enumɔ kaseɔ Biblia lɛ, ni amɛteŋ mɛi etɛ baa kpeei.”
Yɛ afii etɛ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli lɛ, efã efɔlɔi lɛ kɛtee shia ni sa mli, ni kɛtsɔ nanemɛi Kristofoi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ ayelikɛbuamɔ nɔ lɛ, esaa shihilɛhe lɛ bɔ ni baahi aha etsɛ hiamɔ nii krɛdɛɛi lɛ.
Nɔ ni jɛ nɛkɛ ŋaa gbɛ ni “akɛheɔ” tsakelɔi lɛ mli ba ji mɛi aaafee 10,000 ni atsake kɛba Katolik jamɔ mli ekoŋŋ yɛ afii etɛ mli.
Asafo fɛɛ asafo ni kwɛɔ woji ashɛɛ nɔ lɛ nine baashɛ “Literature Inventory” woji (S-18) lɛ etɛ nɔ̃.
Wɔfã shii etɛ yɛ afi 1942 lɛ mli.
Ataa, Awo, kɛ wɔnyɛmimɛi etɛ lɛ gboi yɛ kɔɔyɔɔ ni ebɔɔ yɔɔ mli ni ji gas ni gbeɔ mɔ lɛ mli.
Afii fioo sɛɛ lɛ, hela ni gbeɔ mɔ afã lɛ eko mɔ lɛ ni egbo trukaa, ni eshi kooloi alɛɛhei wuji agboi etɛ yɛ North Dakota, ni fɛɛ dalɛ fe acre akpe, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu mitsɛkwɛ lɛ ŋmɔ ni dalɛ ji acre 640 ni yɔɔ Montana, ni tsɔ egboshinii lɛ.

10 Ni mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ baaná miishɛɛ babaoo yɛ amɛhewɔ, ni amɛmli baafili amɛ, ni amɛkɛ nikeenii baamaje amɛhe, ejaakɛ nɛkɛ gbalɔi enyɔ nɛɛ piŋ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ.

22 Amɛkɛɛ: “Kornelio,+ asraafoiatsɛ ko ni ji jalɔ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishelɔ ni Yudafoi amaŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ wieɔ ehe ekpakpa lɛ, ŋwɛibɔfo krɔŋkrɔŋ ko kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛtsɔɔmɔi hã lɛ akɛ etsu ni abatsɛ bo kɛba eshĩa ni ebo nɔ ni oyɔɔ kɛɛmɔ lɛ toi.”

Mileee Yehowa, ni Israel hu mihaaa amɛya.”

14 Luka,+ datrɛfonyo ni asumɔɔ lɛ lɛ miiŋa nyɛ, ni Dema hu miiŋa nyɛ.

• Mɛni hewɔ abaanyɛ akɛɛ akɛ Yehowa Bi lɛ ni etsu kɛba koni ebana amanehulu ni egbo kɛha wɔ lɛ ji suɔmɔ nifeemɔ kpele fe fɛɛ ni afee dã lɛ?
Ni maha klante kɛ hɔmɔ kɛ gbele hela abote amɛteŋ kɛyashi beyinɔ ni amɛaata kwraa yɛ shikpɔŋ ni miŋɔha amɛ kɛ amɛtsɛmɛi lɛ nɔ.’ ”
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ he nilee ni shwereɔ nɛɛ kaiɔ wɔ Lala 147:15, ní kɛɔ akɛ: ‘Yehowa tsuɔ ewiemɔ lɛ kɛbaa shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ; ewiemɔ lɛ shaa foi oyayaayai’ lɛ.

12 Nakai gbi lɛ nɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ, Herode kɛ Pilato, ni tsutsu ko lɛ amɛkɛ amɛhe yeee lɛ, batsɔmɔ nanemɛi.

1:7; 8:14, 17, 33) Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, abu Abraham akɛ Yehowa “Nyɔŋmɔ shieŋtsɛ” dani ashã kpɔ̃mɔ afɔle lɛ.

10, 11. (a) Mɛɛ shishitoo mlai Yeremia damɔ nɔ ehala enanemɛi?
Akɛ bo baaya Babilon ni jɛmɛ obaagbo yɛ, ni abaafu bo kɛ onanemɛi lɛ fɛɛ yɛ jɛmɛ, ejaakɛ ogba amalei otsɔɔ amɛ.’”
“Yehowa bafee mɔ ko ni bɛŋkɛ mi fe mɔ fɛɛ mɔ, ni ekã he eji minaanyo ni bɛŋkɛ mi fe mɔ fɛɛ mɔ.”
Mɛi ni agbo ashi amɛ lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi ahiɛ sɔɔ akɛ amɛaanu ni nanemɛi miiwie mɔ ni egbo lɛ subaŋi krɛdɛɛi komɛi ni ha amɛsumɔ esane lɛ ahe. —Okɛto Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 9:36-39 he.
No hewɔ lɛ, mibɔi mɛi ni kɛ hiɛdɔɔ jáa Nyɔŋmɔ, titri lɛ mɛi ni edara yɛ afii amli, lɛ kɛbɔɔ.
Enaanyo ko ni esumɔɔ esane waa ni atsɛɔ lɛ Antonio lɛ ye ebua lɛ be ni eyaje shihilɛ ko ni jaraa lɛ mli.
Mɛni wɔbaakã he wɔfee kɛya naanɔi anaanɔ?
Shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ ha minyɛ migba mɛi babaoo mihemɔkɛyeli lɛ he sane, ni miye mibua amɛteŋ mɛi komɛi ni amɛbatsɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nanemɛi.
Mɛi krokomɛi ahe tswaa shi babaoo akɛ amɛkɛ nɛkɛ saji nɛɛ aaamaje, kɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ akɛ amɛbaafee klɛŋklɛŋ mɛi ni jie saji nɛɛ akpo amɛha amɛnanemɛi.
Yehowa hewalɛwoo wiemɔi lɛ je shishi kɛ kaimɔ ní ekai amɛ akɛ Israel ji eshieŋtsɛ Abraham shwiei lɛ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ekolɛ onaanyo ko ni oheɔ lɛ oyeɔ lɛ ejie oteemɔŋ saji diɛŋtsɛ ni ogba lɛ yɛ hekɛnɔfɔɔ mli lɛ kpo.
Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa hala adesai komɛi akɛ enanemɛi lɛ?
(Lala 31:6) Ani wɔbaanyɛ wɔkpa gbɛ akɛ Yehowa baatsɔ wɔnaanyo kɛji akɛ wɔhiɔ shihilɛ srɔtoi enyɔ mli—soro bɔ ni wɔfeɔ wɔnii wɔhaa kɛji wɔyɛ Kristofoi nanemɛi ateŋ, ni wɔfeɔ nɔ kroko kɛji akɛ amɛbɛ wɔmasɛi—tamɔ hii “osatofoi” ni kɛ amɛsubaŋ diɛŋtsɛ teeɔ lɛ?
Mɔ ni kɛɛ Bebe sane nɛɛ ji amɛnaanyo ko ní susu akɛ eeshɛje emii, shi enɛ kumɔ etsui moŋ kwraa.
Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ ji Naanyo kome ko ni kɛo baahi shi daa, ni he ni oyɔɔ lɛ kɔɔɔ he.
Susumɔ nɔ ni ha minaa kpɛ mihe—kɛ miishɛɛ—afii 20 komɛi asɛɛ beni minyɛ kɛɛ mi akɛ tsɔɔlɔ nɛɛ ku esɛɛ eba koni ebasara etsutsu nanemɛi kɛ mɛi ni etsɔɔ amɛ nii lɛ koni ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ eji Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome lɛ!
Akɛ mfonirii fɛfɛji kpɛtɛ okpɔlɔi kɛ shwiilii henɔi komɛi ahe, ni ato woji ni yɔɔ wiemɔi srɔtoi amli awo nɔ, ni akɛmamɔ maŋ lɛ mli hei ni mɛi fɔɔ tsɔmɔ waa lɛ.
27 Nɔkwɛlɔi nɛɛ ji mɛi ni hãa Maŋtsɛ Solomon kɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yeɔ nii yɛ Maŋtsɛ Solomon okpɔlɔ lɛ he lɛ niyenii.
(Yesaia 2:2-4) Amɛtsuɔ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ koome lɛ nɔŋŋ tamɔ amɛnyɛmimɛi ní afɔ amɛ mu lɛ, amɛkpeeɔ kaai ní tamɔ amɛnɔ̃ lɛ anaa, amɛjieɔ anɔkwayeli kɛ emuuyeli mlihiɛmɔ koome lɛ nɔŋŋ kpo, ni amɛyeɔ nii yɛ mumɔŋ okpɔlɔ kome nɔ.
(5 Mose 1:34-36) Feemɔ nibii ni Nyɔŋmɔ taoɔ ni ofee lɛ, ni ekaba oyiŋ kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ oooyaye ‘daimonioi akpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ nii.’
(Abɛi 9:2) Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, mumɔŋ niyenii ni esa akɛ asusu he babaoo mamɔ mfonirifeemɔŋ okpɔlɔ nɛɛ nɔ.—Yesaia 55:1, 2.
Gboklɛfonyo ko ni yɔɔ Filipi lɛ ŋmɛ Paulo kɛ Sila okpɔlɔ.
Nyɛnyɛŋ Yehowa kpulu lɛ kɛ daimonioi akpulu lɛ nyɛnu shikome; nyɛnyɛŋ ‘Yehowa okpɔlɔ lɛ’ kɛ daimonioi okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ nii nyɛye shikome.”—1 Korintobii 10:20, 21, NW.
Aaafee afii ohai enyɔ ní etsɔ hiɛ lɛ, Yesaia gba efɔ̃ shi akɛ: “Amɛŋmɛ okpɔlɔ, amɛto bulɔi, amɛmiiye nii, amɛmiinu dãai.”
Fiofio lɛ, gbekɛbii lɛ bafata he, ni okpɔlɔ ni ayeɔ leebi niyenii yɛ he lɛ bafee he ni agbaa sane yɛ.
Ni mɛɛ nigbɛlɛmɔ tsɔnei akɛtsuɔ nii kɛgbɛlɛɔ nibii ni oyeɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ?
(Mateo 23:2-7; Yohane 7:49) Eyɛ mli akɛ Stefano ji mɔ ko ni le Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli jogbaŋŋ moŋ, shi ená he miishɛɛ ákɛ akɛ nitsumɔ ni ji ‘sɔɔmɔ ni eeesɔmɔ yɛ okpɔlɔi ahe’ lɛ wo edɛŋ, bɔni afee ni bɔfoi lɛ anyɛ amɛkɛ amɛhe awo “sɔlemɔ kɛ wiemɔ lɛ he sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli.”
+ 48 Solomon fee nibii lɛ fɛɛ kɛhã Yehowa shĩa lɛ: shika tsuru afɔleshaa latɛ+ lɛ; shika tsuru okpɔlɔ+ lɛ ni hiɛmaa blodo lɛ maa nɔ lɛ; 49 kanetsei+ ni akɛ shika tsuru krɔŋŋ fee lɛ, enumɔ yɛ ninejurɔgbɛ ni enumɔ hu yɛ abɛkugbɛ yɛ sɛɛtsu lɛ hiɛ; kɛ fɔfɔii+ lɛ, kɛ kanei lɛ, kɛ nibɛɛnii* lɛ, akɛ shika tsuru fee fɛɛ;+ 50 okpolui lɛ, kɛ lagbeenii lɛ,+ kɛ tsɛnsii lɛ, kɛ kɔɔpoi lɛ,+ kɛ lajeenii lɛ,+ akɛ shika tsuru krɔŋŋ fee fɛɛ; kɛ nibii ni sɛɛtsu+ lɛ ni ji He Krɔŋkrɔŋ Fe Fɛɛ lɛ shinai lɛ kɛ sɔlemɔ shĩa+ lɛ shinai lɛ tsɔmɔɔ amɛhe yɛ amɛnɔ lɛ, akɛ shika tsuru fee fɛɛ.

16. (a) Mɛni etsɛŋ ni ebaaba Satan, edaimonioi lɛ, kɛ mfoniri-feemɔŋ okpɔlɔ ni je lɛŋ jeŋmaji lɛ yeɔ nii yɛ nɔ lɛ anɔ?
Nigbɛlɛmɔ Tsɔnei ni Haa Anáa Niyenii
Mikɛ mi-Biblia kɛ woji bibii kɛ dɛhiɛmɔ woji shwieɔ okpɔlɔ ni mã misaatso lɛ masɛi lɛ nɔ kɛha mɛi ni basaraa mi lɛ.
▪ Esa akɛ akɛ plɛtei, glasei kɛ okpɔlɔ kɛ enɔhaa nɔ kpakpa aba asa lɛ nɔ ní akɛma shi yɛ he ko ni sa kɛtsɔ hiɛ.
Nɔ ni fata leebi jamɔ gbɛjianɔtoo ní Yehowa Odasefoi a-Betel weku fɛɛ weku kɛ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi akui fɛɛ kɛtsuɔ nii yɛ leebi niyenii okpɔlɔ lɛ he lɛ he ji, Biblia lɛ loo Yearbook hee ni eba lɛ kanemɔ kuku otsi otsi.
Wɔnaa Yesu Kristo kɛ ebɔfoi 12 lɛ yɛ gbɔi atsũ agbo ko ni asaa mli ni amɛtara okpɔlɔ ni ato nibii amamɔ nɔ lɛ sɛɛ.
Amɛŋmɛɛɛ saji ahe shi moŋ amɛtsɔ sane lɛ amɛfɔ̃ nakai onukpai henɔwolɔi ni kɛ hewalɛ ni husu bɛ he tsu nii lɛ anɔ.
6 Gbi gbɛkɛ ni Yesu to egbele lɛ Kaimɔ lɛ shishi lɛ, ekɛɛ ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛji mɛi ni kɛ mi ehi shi yɛ mikaai lɛ amli; ni mi hu miito maŋtsɛyeli maha nyɛ taakɛ bɔ ni mitsɛ eto eha mi lɛ, koni nyɛye nii ni nyɛnu yɛ mikpɔlɔ lɛ he yɛ mimaŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli, ni nyɛtara sɛii anɔ ni nyɛkojo Israel akutsei nyɔŋma kɛ enyɔ lɛ.”
Ewie mɛi ni yeɔ eko lɛ ni kɛ Kristo fɛɛ náa mli gbɛfaŋnɔ lɛ ahe, kɛkɛ ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛnyɛŋ [Yehowa, NW] kpulu lɛ kɛ daimonioi akpulu lɛ nyɛnu shikome; nyɛnyɛŋ [Yehowa, NW] okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ nii kɛ daimonioi anɔ̃ lɛ nɔ nii nyɛye shikome.”
Ebɔ Korintobii lɛ kɔkɔ yɛ ‘daimonioi akpɔlɔ nɔ niyeli’ he.
Atsɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ akɛ okpɔlɔ, ni awieɔ akɛ mɔ ni kɛ kooloo ni akɛbaasha afɔle lɛ baa lɛ kɛ Yehowa kɛ osɔfoi lɛ miiye nii.
Kɛ wɔkwɛ mumɔŋ niyenii babaoo ni tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ kuu lɛ kɛŋmɛɔ wɔ okpɔlɔ lɛ, wɔnaa mɔ ni Yesu kɛ lɛ tsuɔ nii ni ekɛhaa wɔ “ŋmaa yɛ be ni sa nɔ” lɛ faŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ.
Taakɛ lalatsɛ David tsɔɔ mli lɛ, “nyɛsaa nyɛnaa nyɛkwɛa, ni nyɛaana akɛ Yehowa hi; ajɔɔ gbɔmɔ ni baa lɛ abo lɛ.”—Lala 34:9.
20 min: Okɛ Wɔ Woji Tɛtrɛbii lɛ Atsu Nii Jogbaŋŋ Kɛmɔ Shi.
Kɛ́ be yɛ lɛ, gbaa niiashikpamɔ ko ni sa ni nyɛsafo lɛ ená loo hã afee ehe nɔkwɛmɔnɔ.
Suɔmɔ ni nanemɛi enyɔ ni bɛŋkɛ amɛhe kpaakpa lɛ jieɔ lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛhe lɛ?
(Romabii 14:7, 8) No hewɔ lɛ kɛ́ wɔmiito nibii ni wɔkɛ amɛhe nitsumɔ baaye klɛŋklɛŋ gbɛhe lɛ ahe gbɛjianɔ lɛ, wɔkɛ Paulo ŋaawoo lɛ tsuɔ nii. Ewo ŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛjeŋba akatamɔ jeŋbii ajeŋba, shi moŋ nyɛkɛ nyɛjwɛŋmɔ ní etsɔ ehee lɛ atsakea nyɛhe, koni nyɛyoo nii ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii kpakpai ní sa ehiɛ jogbaŋŋ ní hi kɛwula shi lɛ.”
(2 Samuel 23:1, 3, 4) Eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ Salomo ni ji David bi ní baye esɛɛ lɛ yɔse akɛ sane nɛɛ ji anɔkwale, ejaakɛ ebi Yehowa koni eha lɛ “toiboo tsui” kɛ nyɛmɔ ni ‘ekɛaayoo nɔ ni hi kɛ nɔ ni ehiii.’
▪ Okɛ Hewalɛ ni Olilɛi lɛ Yɔɔ lɛ Atsu Nii yɛ Gbɛ Kpakpa Nɔ
Yɛ be mli ni tsutsu ko lɛ, no mli lɛ esumɔɔɔ Maŋtsɛyeli shɛɛ sane lɛ, ekpakpa ni Odasefonyo lɛ fee lɛ lɛ ná enɔ hewalɛ kpakpa.
‘Nyɛhiɛ Akakpaa Ejurɔfeemɔ Nɔ’
Amɛhiɛ kpaa abɛbua nɛɛ nɔ, akɛ, “Kɛ ehi tsɔ̃ fe bɔ ni eeenyɛ efee anɔkwale lɛ, bei pii lɛ, ehiii tamɔ bɔ ni asusuɔ akɛ eji lɛ.”
1 Taakɛ bɔfo Paulo fee lɛ, wɔmiisumɔ ni ‘wɔye sanekpakpa lɛ he odase faŋŋ.’ (Bɔf.
(2 Korintobii 9:14, 15) Akɛni Paulo hiɛ sɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nikeenii lɛ hewɔ lɛ, ekɛfee enitsumɔ titri yɛ ewala shihilɛ mli ‘akɛ ebaaye Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ sanekpakpa lɛ he odase faŋŋ.’
(11) Mɛni ji helatsamɔ mli sui kpakpai ahe shishitoo mlai ni fe fɛɛ lɛ ateŋ ekome?
(2 Petro 3:10-13; Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 5:41) Taakɛ mra be mli Kristofoi lɛ ji lɛ, nyɛhaa wɔyaa nɔ ‘wɔtsɔɔ ni wɔjaje Kristo’ kɛ e-Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ, be mli ni wɔmɛɔ nikeenii ni akɛbaaha wɔ yɛ Yehowa jalɛ jeŋ hee lɛ mli lɛ.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 5:42; Yakobo 5:11.
Asafo lɛ kɛ oniai ni atsuɔ lɛ eko tsuɔ mɛi aheloonaa hiamɔ nii ahe nii, shi nɔ titri ni akɛfeɔ ji, akɛtsuɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he nibii ahe nii, ni akɛ eko yeɔ abuaa kɛgbɛɔ sane kpakpa lɛ ashwãa.
Be ko lɛ mɔ ko tsɛ́ Yesu akɛ mɔ kpakpa.
Kɛbashi afi 2013 lɛ, no mli lɛ wiemɔ shishitsɔɔlɔi ni fa fe 2,700 miitsu nii yɛ hei 190 kɛ sɛɛ koni amɛye amɛbua kɛgbɛ sane kpakpa lɛ ashwã yɛ wiemɔi 670 kɛ sɛɛ amli.
Ehaa wɔ niyenii kɛ miishɛɛ.
Mɛɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa?
+ 41 Manya amɛhe koni mafee amɛ ekpakpa,+ ni mikɛ mitsui fɛɛ kɛ misusuma* fɛɛ baadu amɛ koni amɛmɔ shi yɛ shikpɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ.’”
Eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ Yehowa náa gbɔmɔ kpakpa—mɔ ni yɔɔ jeŋba kpakpa he miishɛɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Odasefoi lɛ yɛ he miishɛɛ akɛ amɛaafee bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni amɛaanyɛ koni amɛkɛye amɛbua ni amɛha shwɛmɔhe lɛ afee he ni yɔɔ fɛo.
(Ezekiel 34:2-4; Yohane 7:47-49) Yesu kɛ amɛ baaye yɛ gbɛ ni yɔɔ srɔto nɔ, ebaafee nɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ kɛha amɛ.
Paulo kɛɛ akɛ, esa akɛ mɛi ni sumɔɔ ni ‘amɛnyiɛ bɔ ni sa Yehowa hiɛ’ ni ‘amɛhe awa lɛ aya nɔ awo yibii yɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa fɛɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa mli.’—Kolosebii 1:10, 11.
Yehowa tsuji fɛɛ ni ejɔɔ amɛhe nɔ lɛ miisumɔ ni amɛnyɛ amɛkɛɛ taakɛ bɔfo Paulo kɛɛ lɛ: “Sanekpakpa lɛ hewɔ mifeɔ enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ, beni afee ni mi hu maná emli nii lɛ eko.”—1 Kor.
Sanegbaa kɛ miishɛɛ tsa nɔ, ni ekpa mi fai, yɛ naanyobɔɔ su ni eyajieee lɛ kpo kɛjɛ shishijee, ejaakɛ ebɛ deka kwraa lɛ hewɔ.
21 No hewɔ lɛ, Gehazi wó foi kɛyi Naaman sɛɛ.
Shi miná miishɛɛ hu ejaakɛ yɛ amɛ ekãafeemɔ kɛ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ lɛ naa lɛ, gbɔmɛi babaoo ekase anɔkwale lɛ ni amɛbale wɔ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ.”—Colette, Netherlands.
18 Be ni amɛnu nibii nɛɛ, amɛwieee amɛshiii lɛ dɔŋŋ,* ni amɛwo Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ nyam amɛkɛɛ: “Belɛ, eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ehã jeŋmajiaŋbii lɛ hu hegbɛ koni amɛtsake amɛtsui ni amɛná wala.”
Kɛtsɔ nakai feemɔ nɔ lɛ, Daniel miijie Yehowa yi tamɔ gbekɛbii hii kɛ yei akpei abɔ ni ejie Yehowa yi yɛ faŋŋ mli yɛ afii ni eho lɛ mli lɛ nɔŋŋ.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, wɔnyɛŋ wɔkɛ ŋmɛlɛtswaa kome kroko afata wɔgbi lɛ he, no hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ Paulo ŋaawoo lɛ ahiɛ shishinumɔ srɔto ko.
10 Yɛ be mli ni ewieɔ “nakai yoo Isabel” lɛ he lɛ, Yesu tee nɔ akɛ: “Ni ebii lɛ, gbe magbe amɛ; ni asafoi lɛ fɛɛ aaana ale akɛ mi ji mɔ ni taoɔ sabai kɛ tsuii amli, ni maha nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ bɔ ni nyɛnitsumɔi lɛ yɔɔ lɛ.”
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Bɔ ni Noa gbii lɛ fee lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ be ni gbɔmɔ Bi lɛ eba [loo, naagbee gbii] lɛ hu baatamɔ.
Yesu diɛŋtsɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɔŋmɔ sumɔ je lɛ aahu akɛ eŋɔ e-Bi koome lɛ eha, bɔni afee ni akakpata mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baana emli hemɔkɛyeli lɛ hiɛ, shi moŋ ena naanɔ wala.”
No hewɔ lɛ, minuɔ he akɛ mi mihã wɔkutsoŋnyo lɛ hegbɛ ni eye mi awui lɛ.
Kɛ́ hetoo ji hɛɛ lɛ, jee shishi bianɛ ni oto nibii ahe gbɛjianɔ koni onyɛ oshɛ oti nɛɛ he.
Nɛkɛ hii nɛɛ sumɔɔɔ enɛ, no hewɔ lɛ amɛkɛ lɛ bɔi saji anaataomɔ yɛ anɔkwale lɛ ni etsɔɔ gbɔmɛi lɛ hewɔ.
* Taakɛ nu haa tso ni egbi feɔ frɔfrɔ lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ naajɔlɛ wiemɔ ni akɛ lilɛi ní tsaa mɔ wieɔ lɛ haa mɛi ni nuɔ lɛ atsui nyɔɔ amɛmli.
Kɛji akɛ wɔkpa lɛ fai akɛ ekaha wɔgbee shi beni akaa wɔ lɛ, ebaaye ebua wɔ koni Satan, ‘mɔ fɔŋ lɛ,’ nine akashɛ wɔnɔ.
Ani bo hu obaanyɛ okɛ obe fɛɛ asɔmɔ yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli koni omiishɛɛ lɛ afa babaoo?
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ wɔkase Yesu lɛ, wɔbaatamɔ Yehowa.
Kulɛ ebaanyɛ ni efee wɔ koni wɔfee nɔ pɛ ni etaoɔ ni wɔfee lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, beni amɛgbe Hii Shi Daa wolo lɛ naa lɛ, Edita kɛ Paca gba sane ni mli kã shi faŋŋ ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni ehe hiaa ni ekɛ hiɛdɔɔ atsu anɔkwale lɛ he nii.
10 No hewɔ lɛ, mikɔ midɛhiɛmɔtso ni ji Mlihilɛ lɛ,+ ni mifo mli, ni mikɛku mikpaŋmɔ ni mikɛ maji lɛ fɛɛ fee lɛ mli.
29 Kɛ́ wɔhã ehi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli akɛ nakai ni wɔfeɔ lɛ jieɔ wɔ-Bɔlɔ lɛ yi ni wɔwoɔ egbɛ́i lɛ hiɛ nyam lɛ, no baatsirɛ wɔ koni wɔfee nakai.
Ni gbi po ni akɛ nitsumɔ lɛ baa naagbee lɛ, etsu nii jenamɔ fɛɛ bɔni afee ni anyɛ agbe nitsumɔ lɛ naa koni nyɛmimɛi lɛ anyɛ ajɔɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ enɔ jetsɛremɔ.
Ni asafo babaoo lɛ hu feɔ nakai.
Bɔ ni enijiaŋ eje wui eha hewɔ lɛ, enyiɛ gbi kome gbɛnyiɛmɔ kɛtee ŋa lɛ nɔ, ni eka shi faŋŋ akɛ ekɛ nu loo nibii komɛi fataaa ehe kɛyaaa.
No hewɔ lɛ, beni Pilato bi Yesu sane ni kɔɔ naafolɔmɔi ni Yudafoi lɛ kɛshwie enɔ lɛ he lɛ, Yesu “efooo edaaŋ kwraa, ni amralo lɛ naa kpɛ ehe diɛŋtsɛ.”—Yesaia 53:7, Ga Biblia Hee; Mateo 27:12-14; Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 8:28, 32-35.
Esa akɛ Corporation loo Nitsumɔ lɛ mlibii lɛ atswa Woloŋmalɔ lɛ Nitsumɔ he lɛ adafi yɛ amɛ adrɛs ni ekolɛ etsake yɛ nyɛsɛɛ afi lɛ mli lɛ he koni woji ni akɛmajeɔ amɛ ni kɔɔ mɛi ni amɛbaasumɔ ni amɛye amɛnajiaŋ lɛ he lɛ ashɛ amɛdɛŋ yɛ July mli.
Ani ehaa mɛi naa jwɛŋmɔ ni ejaaa yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli shɛɛ sane ni wɔjajeɔ lɛ he?
5 Ejaakɛ wɔmiifãmɔ susumɔi kɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni kwɔ ni teɔ shi ewoɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nilee lɛ wɔmiishwie,+ ni wɔmiiŋɔ jwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ jwɛŋmɔ nom koni wɔhã ebo Kristo lɛ toi; 6 ni wɔsaa wɔhe wɔto, koni kɛ́ nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ, nyɛbo toi kɛwula shi nɔŋŋ lɛ, wɔkɛ toigbele fɛɛ toigbele he toigbalamɔ ahã. +
Kɛji akɛ wɔkpa lɛ fai akɛ ekaha wɔgbee shi beni akaa wɔ lɛ, ebaaye ebua wɔ koni Satan, ‘mɔ fɔŋ lɛ,’ nine akashɛ wɔnɔ.
Esaaa akɛ wɔmuɔ sane naa kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ nɔ ni wɔfee lɛ naa wa aahu akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛfaŋ wɔ.
Wɔkɛ bo baaya omaŋbii lɛ aŋɔɔ.’
(Kolosebii 3:13) Ani nakai tsuishitoo lɛ he miihia wɔ?
Bei pii lɛ, enɛ jeɔ kpo yɛ gbɛ pɔtɛɛ nɔ yɛ be mli ni wɔkaseɔ Samarianyo kpakpa ni Yesu wie ehe yɛ ebɛbua ni saa mɔ henumɔi ahe lɛ mli lɛ.
14 Kɛji wɔɔya nɔ wɔnyiɛ yɛ hiɛyaa mli yɛ gbɛjianɔtoo kpakpa naa lɛ, no lɛ shiɛmɔ ni wɔɔya daa hu he miihia waa.
5 Shi, kɛji akɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔ yɛ mumɔŋ nibii anɔ lɛ, wɔhiɛ baahi wɔhe nɔ be fɛɛ be akɛ, eyɛ mli akɛ Yehowa jeee Nyɔŋmɔ ni taoɔ tɔmɔ moŋ, shi ele beni wɔtsuɔ susumɔi kɛ akɔnɔi ni ehiii lɛ ahe nii.
4: Toma—Saneyitso: #Nɔ Hewɔ ni Esa akɛ Wɔsusu Nii Ahe Dani Wɔwie
24:14) Kɛ wɔhiɛ sɔ nɔ hewɔ ni esa akɛ wɔkã he wɔshiɛ lɛ, nijiaŋwujee fɛɛ loo nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baanyɛ agbala wɔjwɛŋmɔ ni bajeɔ wɔgbɛ nɔ lɛ etsiŋ wɔnaa.
Kɛ́ wɔto gbɛjianɔ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná be hu koni wɔkɛsaa wɔhe kɛha Asafo Woloŋ Nikasemɔ lɛ kɛ Buu-Mɔɔ Nikasemɔ lɛ.
9 Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, wɔ hu wɔkaseɔ Yesu ni wɔfeɔ ekãa.
Larson kɛba naagbee akɛ: “Ojogbaŋŋ, nakai ji bɔ ni fee ni wɔnine shɛ wɔ ŋwɛitsu ŋsɔɔdoi 30 lɛ nɔ.”
(Efesobii 1:22; Kpojiemɔ 1:12, 13, 20; 2:1-4) Dani enɛ aaaba lɛ, kɛ wɔnyiɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ kpakpa ni Stefana, Fortunato, kɛ Akaiko kɛfɔ shi lɛ sɛɛ, ni wɔtee nɔ wɔgbo deŋme yɛ wɔ nyɛmimɛi lɛ asɔɔmɔ mli lɛ, wɔ hu wɔbaafee mɛi ni kɛ anɔkwayeli fiɔ asafoŋ gbɛjianɔtoo sɛɛ, mɛi ni tswaa amɛ nyɛmimɛi amɛmaa shi, ni ‘kanyaa amɛ kɛyaa suɔmɔ kɛ nitsumɔi kpakpai ahe.’—Hebribii 10:24, 25.
Nakai ŋmalɛ lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Jwɛŋmɔ ni akɛmaa heloo lɛ nɔ lɛ, gbele ni, shi jwɛŋmɔ ni akɛmaa mumɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ, wala kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ ni.”
Kwɛ bɔ ni ebaafee nɔ ni nilee bɛ mli akɛ ‘wɔkɛ wɔhe aaakpasa wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔ’ aloo gbɔmɛi ni ale amɛ waa yɛ je lɛŋ yɛ be mli ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛ wɔhe afɔ̃ Yehowa nɔ kwraa moŋ!
Taakɛ wɔtsɔ hiɛ wɔna lɛ, Yehowa webii ni tamɔ mɛi ni bɛ hebuu nɔ ko kwraa lɛ ji mɛi ni Gog kɛ esafo lɛ fɛɛ kɛ hiɛdɔɔ tutuaa amɛ lɛ.
Mɛni wɔkaseɔ kɛjɛɔ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ mli?— Wɔkaseɔ akɛ Yesu yɛ hewalɛ ni ekɛ eshai faa, ni ehaa mɛi ni he yeɔ lɛ náa hewalɛ ekoŋŋ.
Kɛfata he lɛ, wɔbɛ dekã kɛ wɔ heloo gbɛfaŋ nitsumɔ, shia nitsumɔ loo skul nikasemɔ, kɛ gbɛnaa nii krokomɛi babaoo, ní fɛɛ heɔ be lɛ ahe nitsumɔ.
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ naa ní wɔɔhi shi yɛ, kɛ e-Bi Yesu Kristo ni wɔɔkase lɛ ji gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ.
15:4-9) Wɔsumɔɔɔ ni wɔtamɔ gbɔmɛi ni hiɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jamɔ hetuu-kɛhamɔ shi amɛsumɔɔɔ ni amɛtsu he nii “yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛwe” lɛ.
Yoo ko ni fɔlɔi ni tsɔse lɛ lɛ sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Wɔjeee mɛi ni nyiɛ wɔfɔlɔi asɛɛ kɛkɛ, ni wɔfataa amɛhe yɛ amɛ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
15 Wɔnako Nyɔŋmɔ pɛŋ ni asaŋ wɔnuko egbee dã.
Kulɛ ebaanyɛ ni efee wɔ koni wɔfee nɔ pɛ ni etaoɔ ni wɔfee lɛ.
Akɛ lai ni tsoɔ lɛ baafɔ gbonyobu lɛ nɔ, akɛ dãa lɛ baashwã gbonyobu lɛ nɔ, ni abaafu gbee bi lɛ hiɛkalɔ yɛ gbonyobu lɛ masɛi.
Nɔ najiaŋ ni yoo lɛ mli baafu lɛ, ejɛ nɔ ni Yesu wie lɛ mli ehã hetoo yɛ heshibaa mli akɛ: “Nuŋtsɔ, nakai ni, shi yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, gbei abii lɛ yeɔ fufuji ni jɛɔ amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi lɛ akpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ shwieɔ shi lɛ.”
(Abɛi 14:10) Ani ókwɛ bɔ ni looflɔ, gbee loo alɔnte ko kwɛɔ ehiɛ yɛ ashwishwɛ mli ni agbɛnɛ etsɔtseɔ, ehũuɔ, aloo etutuaa nɔ ni enaa lɛ dã?
Amɛnyɛɛɛ gbéi lɛ.”
Bei pii lɛ wɔnuɔ ni mɛi ni he efee shoo ni amɛmiitaoɔ mɛi amɛkɛbɔ nanemɛi lɛ miikɛɛ akɛ, “mibɛ mɔ ko ni mikɛgbaa sane,” “minyɛɛɛ mahe mɔ ko mɔ ko maye,” aloo “migbee ji minaanyo ni hi fe fɛɛ.”
(1 Korintobii 15:58) Shi kɛlɛ, ŋaawoo nɛɛ he nitsumɔ biɔ ni wɔŋmɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ yɛ shishitoo mla ni yɔɔ Jajelɔ 9:4 lɛ naa, he ni aŋma yɛ akɛ: “Gbee ni hiɛ kã lɛ ehi fe jata ni egbo” lɛ.
Roma yinɔsaneŋmalɔ Tacitus kɛɔ akɛ: “Akɛ hefɛoyeli fata gbele he; akɛ kooloi ahewoji wo Kristofoi lɛ, ni gbeei tsɛrɛ Kristofoi lɛ aloo; akala amɛ akpɛtɛ krɔɔs loo sɛŋmɔtsei ahe; akɛ mu ni baanyɛ ashã amɛ ni amɛtso kpa amɛhe, koni kɛ duŋ wo lɛ ni amɛtsɔmɔ kanei,” adesa kanei ní baaha maŋtsɛ we lɛ abɔɔi lɛ amli akpɛ.
Kɛkɛ ni Yehowa kɛɛ Gideon akɛ: “Tse mɛi fɛɛ ni kɛ amɛnine tsɔɔ nu lɛ kɛtoɔ amɛnaa ni amɛshɔɔ tamɔ gbee lɛmɔɔ nu lɛ kɛje mɛi ni baakula shi yɛ amɛnakutsei anaa amɛnu nu lɛ ahe.”
Be ko lɛ, ŋaŋ gbeei babɔle mihe kɛkpe, shi amɛkɛ mi teŋ jɛkɛ, ni minaaa amɛ yɛ duŋ lɛ mli, shi miinu amɛhe.
Shi anɔkwa abɛ lɛ eba mli yɛ amɛhe akɛ: ‘Gbee kuɔ esɛɛ kɛyaa lɛ diɛŋtsɛ eshwee he, ni kpolokoo ni aju ehe lɛ yakokoloɔ ŋmɔtɔ mli.’ ”—2 Petro 2:21, 22; Abɛi 26:11.
Wɔkɛ amɛ wieɔ nibii ni amɛnáa he miishɛɛ lɛ ahe—amɛbii, amɛgbeei, amɛshĩai kɛ amɛnitsumɔi.
Shii abɔ ni gbee lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni eje odɛŋ lɛ, babaoo hu ni ehe bahiaa ni omɔ etoii lɛ amli waa ji no, ni babaoo hu ni ehaa gbee lɛ hiɛ dɔɔ.
Kɛ́ oba shĩa nɛɛ ekoŋŋ lɛ, matsɛ́ gbee lɛ mawo bo!’
Tsi ohe kɛjɛ bɔ ni owieɔ oyayaayai lɛ ní ooowa oya nɔŋŋ bɔ ni eekai mɔ ko alɔnte ni tuɔ kɛyaa sɛɛ trukaa beni ena gbee ko lɛ he.
Gbee ni egbo?
Mihiŋmɛi enaaa nii jogbaŋŋ, ni gbee ni tsɔɔ shwilafo gbɛ ní atsɔse lɛ kɛha Europa maŋtiasei amli gbɛjegbɛi lɛ anɔ nyiɛmɔ lɛ ji nɔ ni yeɔ ebuaa mi kɛha Afrika akrowai amli gbɛjegbɛi ni shia fa yɛ nɔ lɛ anɔ nyiɛmɔ.
“MƐƐ hewɔ po ni nɛkɛ gbee gbonyo nɛɛ aaalomɔ minuntsɔ maŋtsɛ?
2 Nyɛkwɛa jogbaŋŋ yɛ gbei lɛ ahe; nyɛkwɛa jogbaŋŋ yɛ mɛi ni yeɔ awui lɛ ahe; nyɛkwɛa jogbaŋŋ yɛ mɛi ni folɔɔ heloo lɛ ahe.
Yɛ Fɛɛ Sɛɛ Lɛ, Gbee Kɛkɛ Eji.
Miŋma wolo nɔ nii kɛbi koni aha mi gbee, shi akɛɛ mi akɛ mɛi babaoo miimɛ koni aha amɛ eko.
11 Bɔ ni gbee kuɔ esɛɛ kɛyaa eshwee he lɛ,
Mɛi ni yɔɔ Lomé lɛ ateŋ mɛi fioo ko pɛ ena gbee agbo tamɔ nɛkɛ pɛŋ, ejaakɛ gbeei ni yɔɔ Togo lɛ ateŋ babaoo daraaa.
Gbee ni Hiɛ Kã aloo Jata ni Egbo?
10 Shi Yezebel lɛ, gbei baaye lɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni yɔɔ Yezreel lɛ nɔ,+ ni mɔ ko mɔ ko efuŋ lɛ.’”
Ni yɛ afi 1999 mra be mli lɛ, nihélɔi anine baanyɛ ashɛ wolo “ni kɔɔ suɔmɔ [ni] Gbekɛ Yesu kɛ egbee, Angel, jie kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛhe” kpoi abɔ nɔ.
Ejaakɛ mɔ ni aaaná mi lɛ, ená wala, ni ehiɛ aaaba nyam yɛ Yehowa hiɛ.”
Ebo mi toi ni etsu bo.”
Nɔ ni jɛ mli ba ji akɛ, fãji ni yɔɔ minakutsei ashishi lɛ gboi, ni eŋɔ mi nyɔji etɛ dani miná hewalɛ.
Lafayette Asafo lɛ mlibii ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ kɛ mlihilɛ wóɔ mi kɛ tsɔne kɛyaa kpeei daa.
Enɛ ha efee mlɛo eha mi akɛ mafã kɛya jɛi.”
Gbekɛbiiyei lɛ po kɛ mi gbaa amɛyitsoŋ saji.
Biblia lɛ kanemɔ daa gbi yeɔ ebuaa mi ni mikaiɔ Biblia mli famɔi kɛ shishitoo mlai ni woɔ mi hewalɛ koni mate shi mawo nɛkɛ nɔnyɛɛi nɛɛ oya.
No mli lɛ minuuu he mihaaa amɛ ni mileee nɔ ni yaa nɔ yɛ amɛhe lɛ tamɔ bɔ ni minuɔ he bianɛ akɛ nakai ji bɔ ni gbɔmɛi feɔ mi lɛ.”
Nɛkɛ tsɔsemɔ nɛɛ wo mihemɔkɛyeli mli hewalɛ ni eye ebua mi koni matsi mabɛŋkɛ Yehowa he kpaakpa.
Amɛle akɛ eji mɔ ko ni miijo foi shi amɛwóoo mitoi nɔ!”
Eyoo mi amrɔ nɔŋŋ, ni mináko majie mihe shi matsɔɔ lɛ po ni ebi mi akɛ: “Te nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ Egypt lɛ yaa nɔ amɛhaa tɛŋŋ?”
Tsuishitoo yeɔ ebuaa mi ni mihaaa mihela lɛ he naagbai kɛ emli haomɔi lɛ asu mitsui.
Kɛmiiba eshikpɔŋ nɔ sɔɔmɔ lɛ naagbee lɛ, eŋmɛ esɔɔmɔ lɛ ekwɛ yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ ni ekɛɛ: “Nɔ ni eshwɛ ni ka shi ha mi ji jalɛ akekre lɛ, ni Nuntsɔ ni ji jalɛ kojolɔ lɛ baaha mi yɛ nakai gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ.”—2 Timoteo 4:8.
Amɛkɛ amɛnifeemɔ tsɔɔ akɛ nanemɛi kpakpai ji amɛ, ni enɛ hãa wɔmii shɛɔ wɔhe.
Yesu tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Mitooo miyiŋ mifeee nɔ ko, shi moŋ bɔ ni mitsɛ tsɔ̃ɔ mi lɛ, nakai mifeɔ daa.”
Bɔ ni minyɛ midamɔ miwu, mitsɛ, kɛ mibinuu lɛ gbele naa lɛ eye ebua mi ni mifeee ŋkomeŋfa, ni eha minuɔ mɛi krokomɛi ni naa nɔ̃ lɛ ashishi jogbaŋŋ.
Paulo wiemɔi ni wɔnaa yɛ Romabii 8:35-39 lɛ hu kɛ faishitswaa woɔ mimli, ejaakɛ amɛtsɔɔ akɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko bɛ ni baagbala wɔ kɛjɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Kristo suɔmɔ lɛ he.
Nɔ ni kɔɔ jamɔŋ hemɔkɛyeli he lɛ ji nɔ kroko ni Yehowa Odasefoi kɛtsuɔ nii, mɛi ni nuɔ he taakɛ lalatsɛ lɛ nuɔ he lɛ akɛ: “Yehowa, tsɔɔmɔ mi ogbɛ lɛ, ni okpala mi kɛtsɔ tempɔŋ ni kã shi faŋŋ nɔ.”
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Miji tookwɛlɔ kpakpa lɛ; mile mi diɛŋtsɛ mitoi lɛ, ni mitoi lɛ hu le mi.”
11 Ni ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, miyɛ hewalɛ tamɔ gbi ni Mose tsu mi lɛ nɔŋŋ.
Mi hu miitao ni abaptisi mi, ni mitee nɔ miwie he aahu kɛyashi Awo ha Odasefonyo ko ni eda kɛ mi bagba he sane.
Mikɛɛ lɛ akɛ mafee nakai, shi ja ekpɛlɛ nɔ̃ kome nɔ eha mi dã, no ji: “Kɛji mitɔ̃ lɛ, ofainɛ ni ojaje mi.
No hewɔ lɛ, eŋmɛɛ mihe ni miya, ni atsɛɛɛ mi kɛyaaa jɛmɛ dɔŋŋ.”
‘Ani esaaa akɛ nyɛhe kpokpoɔ yɛ mihiɛ?
18 Shi akɛni Yesu le amɛyiŋtoo fɔŋ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Osatofoi, mɛni hewɔ nyɛkaa mi?
Ona okadi ni Yesu Kristo wie akɛ no akɛbaayɔse enɔkwa kaselɔi lɛ faŋŋ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Miihã nyɛ kitã hee akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe; bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe nakai nɔŋŋ.
BƆNI afee ni Yesu ama bɔ ni suɔmɔ he hiaa ha lɛ nɔ mi lɛ, ekɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
No hewɔ lɛ enyɛ ekɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ yɛ ewala be lɛ mli naagbee ŋmɛlɛtswaa lɛ mli akɛ: “Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Odasefoi ehiɛ Kristofoi ahe ni amɛkɛwooo maŋ saji amli kwraa lɛ mli yɛ faŋŋ mli, ni amɛha Yesu wiemɔi nɛɛ eba mli: “Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Ekɛɛ: “Kita hee miŋɔ-haa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.”
GBƐKƐ dani enɔjetsɛremɔ ni Yesu gbo lɛ, ekɛɛ ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi lɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Yesu kɛɛ: ‘Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.’
5 Anaa bɔ ni tsakemɔ nɛɛ he hiaa lɛ yɛ famɔ ni Yesu kɛha ekaselɔi lɛ yɛ enaagbee ŋmɛlɛtswai ni ekɛ amɛ ye lɛ mli: “Kita hee miŋɔ-haa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Yesu kɛɛ: “Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Klɛŋklɛŋ taomɔ nii ni Yesu kɛha lɛ ji enɛ: ‘Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
15 Gbi gbɛkɛ ni enɔ jetsɛremɔ lɛ abaagbe Yesu lɛ, ekɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Miihã nyɛ kitã hee akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe; bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe nakai nɔŋŋ.
“Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Yesu jaje akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.”
Ewie akɛ: “Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Yesu kɛɛ: “Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.”
Kɛkɛ ni ekɛfata he akɛ: “Miihã nyɛ kitã hee akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe; bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe nakai nɔŋŋ.
Yesu kɛɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
14 Akɛni Akwila kɛ Priska kɛ amɛhe wo gbele mli amɛha Paulo hewɔ lɛ, amɛfee amɛnii yɛ Yesu wiemɔi nɛɛ kɛ gbeekpamɔ naa: “Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.”
5 Yɛ Yesu shikpɔŋ nɔ shihilɛ lɛ naagbee gbɛkɛ lɛ mli lɛ, ekɛɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
10 Gbi gbɛkɛ ni enɔ jetsɛremɔ lɛ Yesu gbo lɛ, ekɛɛ ekaselɔi ni bɛŋkɛ lɛ kpaakpa lɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Ejaje akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Yesu kɛɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Ekɛɔ akɛ: “Maha ohaolɔi lɛ aye amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛheloo, ni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛlá aaatɔrɔ amɛ tamɔ dãa dɔkɔdɔkɔ.”
12 Lalatsɛ lɛ wie hu akɛ: “Owiemɔi lɛ ŋɔɔ yɛ midaaŋ akɛ nɔ ko!
Akɛni nu ŋma kɛ nu ni jooɔ nyɛŋ aba yɛ nu bu kome mli hewɔ lɛ, mɛi krokomɛi kpaa Yehowa webii agbɛ yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ akɛ amɛaawie wiemɔi ni hi pɛ
Eyɛ fɛo diɛŋtsɛ.
“Ŋmajee Kpakpa” Buɔ Wɔhe
Eji mu krɛdɛɛ ko ni jeɔ ŋma waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Ni nɔ ko ni ŋɔɔ jɛ hewalɔ lɛ mli.”
Enɛ sa ejaakɛ yɛ shãa afɔle gbɛfaŋ lɛ, ashãa kooloo ni agbe lɛ lɛ yɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ nɔ, ni ŋma jurɔ, loo ŋma ni ŋɔɔ kwɔɔ kɛyaa Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ yɛ ŋwɛi.
10 Mihe wolokpo bibioo lɛ yɛ ŋwɛibɔfo lɛ dɛŋ ni miye,+ ni eŋɔɔ tamɔ wo yɛ midaaŋ,+ shi be ni miye lɛ, ejoo yɛ mimusuŋ.
AFƆƆ abɛ ko buu akɛ, oweletɔɔ ŋɔɔ.
Taakɛ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ni jeɔ ŋma ni sɔlemɔwe osɔfoi lɛ shãa lɛ ji lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ maa nɔ mi ehaa wɔ akɛ: “Jalɔi asɔlemɔ lɛ, enáa he miishɛɛ.”—Abɛi 15:8.
15 Ejaakɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ lɛ, wɔji Kristo he ŋma krɔŋŋ yɛ mɛi ni aahere amɛyiwala lɛ ateŋ kɛ agbɛnɛ hu yɛ mɛi ni hiɛ miikpãtã lɛ ateŋ; 16 yɛ mɛi ni hiɛ miikpãtã lɛ agbɛfaŋ lɛ, wɔji gbele he fũ* ni jeɔ fũ kɛyaa gbele mli,+ shi yɛ mɛi ni aahere amɛyiwala lɛ agbɛfaŋ lɛ, wɔji wala he ŋma ni jeɔ ŋma kɛyaa wala mli.
“Nu ni aju lɛ, enumɔ ŋɔɔ” (17)
Shi mɔ* ni hɔmɔ miiye lɛ lɛ, nɔ ni joɔ po ŋɔɔ enaa.
Ni wain dɔkɔdɔkɔ baatsere kɛaajɛ gɔji lɛ amli,+
Kɛjɛ jɛmɛ kɛyaa lɛ, Odasefoi lɛ kɛ amɛhe fɔɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Jajelɔ lɛji lɛ anɔ ni amɛkɛ shɛɛ sane ni ŋɔɔ ni kɔɔ Yehowa Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he lɛ abaha mɛi ni yɔɔ faai lɛ atoi lɛ —Hindubii, Muslimbii, kɛ mɛi ni tsɛɔ amɛhe Kristofoi lɛ hu.
Mɛi ni kɛ joomɔ feɔ ŋɔɔmɔ, ni amɛkɛ ŋɔɔmɔ hu feɔ joomɔ lɛ!
Wɔ gugɔ hãa wɔleɔ kɛji wɔmiimu, ni wɔnu agbiɛnaa be mli fɔfɔii aŋma he lɛ.
Wo ni miitsere* lɛ, eŋɔɔ naabu naa.
Wein ni anáa yɛ wein yibii nɛɛ mli lɛ hiɛ tsuɔ, ni eŋɔɔ jogbaŋŋ.
No hewɔ lɛ miye, ni eŋɔɔ tamɔ wo yɛ midaaŋ.
MƐNI haa omii shɛɔ ohe waa kɛ́ ooshara shi yɛ abɔɔ ko mli loo kɛ́ onyiɛ fɔfɔii komɛi ni jeɔ ŋma ateŋ lɛ?
Eji anɔkwale akɛ, yɛ mitsuiŋ dɔlɛi, kɛ minaagbai lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa suɔmɔ mlihilɛ lɛ efee nɔ ni ŋɔɔ, eha shihilɛ efee nɔ ni sa hilɛ.
(Abɛi 17:17) Ekomefeemɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ni tee nɔ waa yɛ nɛkɛ jaramɔ be nɛɛ mli lɛ na hewalɛ ni mli wa waa yɛ mimumɔŋ hiɛyaa nɔ, ni ewaje mi waa kɛha jaramɔ bei ni jwere mihiɛ lolo lɛ.
Amrɔ nɛɛ, miná nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni mitaoɔ, ejaakɛ minine eshɛ nɔ ni nyɛkɛmaje Epafrodito+ kɛbahã mi lɛ nɔ, nii ni jeɔ ŋma jogbaŋŋ,+ afɔle ni Nyɔŋmɔ náa he miishɛɛ, ni sa ehiɛ jogbaŋŋ lɛ.
Nɔ ni esa akɛ wɔbi wɔhe kɛ́ wɔmiitao wɔle kɛji hiɛtserɛjiemɔ ko sa loo esaaa lɛ ji akɛ: ‘Mɛni he ekɔɔ?
(Lala 1:1, 2, NW) Agbɛnɛ hu, Sanekpakpa ni Mateo ŋma lɛ kɛɔ wɔ akɛ beni Yesu Kristo kpoo mɔdɛŋ ni Satan bɔ ni ekɛka Lɛ lɛ, E-tsɛ wiemɔi asɛɛ kɛjɛ Hebri Ŋmalɛi ni jɛ mumɔŋ lɛ mli, ni ekɛɛ: “Aŋma akɛ: ‘Jeee aboloo kɛkɛ haa gbɔmɔ yi naa wala; shi moŋ wiemɔ fɛɛ wiemɔ ni jɛɔ [Yehowa] Nyɔŋmɔ daaŋ lɛ.’
Kɛ wala hu yɛ jeŋ hee lɛŋ.
Wɔtsɔmɔ nanemɛi kpakpai!
Biblia he woloŋlelɔ ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Eyɛ mli akɛ etee koni eyatao mɔ ko moŋ, shi ani eje gbɛ eba diɛŋtsɛ koni ebatao nɛkɛ mɔ krɛdɛɛ nɛɛ?
Mɛni Yesaia gba efɔ̃ shi yɛ Mesia lɛ baa lɛ he, ni anaa faŋŋ akɛ Mateo kɛ Yesaia wiemɔi lɛ tsu nii yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
11:2-6—Kɛ́ Yohane le momo akɛ Yesu ji Mesia lɛ akɛni enu beni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ akɛ ekpɛlɛɔ Yesu nɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ ebi akɛ Yesu ji “mɔ ni baa lɛ” lo lɛ?
Ewieɔ kɛfãa ehe kɛtsɔɔ jarayeli mli adafitswaa gbɛ nɔ, yɛ wiemɔ ni mli ka shi faŋŋ mli akɛ: Miishɛɛ jɛɔ heloonaa nibii ni shika nyɛɔ eheɔ kɛ sɔɔmɔ ni ehaa mɔ naa lɛ mli baa.
3 “Nɔ ni he hiaa fe fɛɛ” lɛ hiɛ shishijee shishinumɔ ni ji nɔ ko ni baa dani nɔ fɛɛ nɔ baa aloo hiamɔ nii ni esa akɛ asusu nomɛi ahe klɛŋklɛŋ.
14 Belɛ, mɛɛ sane naamuu pɛ ni nilee yɔɔ mli, ni ji anɔkwale wɔɔnyɛ wɔshɛ he?
Nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, mibale Yehowa, ni ji Naanyo ni jara wa fe fɛɛ lɛ.
18 Yesu bɔ kɔkɔ hu akɛ: “Be baaba tete, ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni gbeɔ nyɛ lɛ aaasusu akɛ ekɛmiijá Nyɔŋmɔ.”
Ani be ko baashɛ ni nilee srɔtoi ni nine shɛɔ nɔ lɛ fɛɛ baafee nɔ ni ji anɔkwa taakɛ wɔkpaa gbɛ lɛ?
22 Amɛkɛɛ: “Kornelio,+ asraafoiatsɛ ko ni ji jalɔ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishelɔ ni Yudafoi amaŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ wieɔ ehe ekpakpa lɛ, ŋwɛibɔfo krɔŋkrɔŋ ko kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛtsɔɔmɔi hã lɛ akɛ etsu ni abatsɛ bo kɛba eshĩa ni ebo nɔ ni oyɔɔ kɛɛmɔ lɛ toi.”
Nɔ ni efeemɔ feɔ mlɛo kɛhaa mɔ ko lɛ feemɔ bɛ mɔ kroko lɛ hewalɛ mli kwraa.

No hewɔ lɛ, wɔshɛre la yɛ stof wuji enyɔ komɛi ni akɛ mu tsɛŋsi fee lɛ amli koni eha asa lɛ nɔ adɔ.
Ekolɛ akɛni Luka ji datrɛfonyo hewɔ lɛ, eŋma nibii ni Yesu wie akɛ akɛye abua nuu ni epila lɛ he sane ní wein ní gbeɔ fala, mu ní baa piŋmɔ shi, kɛ fala nɔ fiimɔ fata he lɛ.—Luka 10:30-37.
55 Shi yei lɛ ni kɛ lɛ jɛ Galilea kɛba lɛ nyiɛ sɛɛ ni amɛbakwɛ gbonyobu* lɛ ni amɛna bɔ ni akɛ egbonyo lɛ eŋmɛ shi ehã lɛ,+ 56 ni amɛku amɛsɛɛ amɛyasaa tsofai ni jeɔ ŋma kɛ ojeŋmai* amɛto.
(Amos 8:11) Enɛ haa gbalɛ ni yɔɔ Yesaia 25:6 lɛ baa mli, akɛ: “Ni Yehowa Zebaot aaaŋmɛ okpɔlɔ yɛ gɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ aha majimaji fɛɛ: fɔ nii kɛ wein kpakpa, fɔ nii kɛ wuiaŋ fɔ, wein kpakpa ni atsere nɔ.”

Amɛshiŋ ŋmaa,* wain hee loo mu, tsinabi loo toobi ko kwraa amɛhãŋ bo kɛyashi amɛbaakpãtã ohiɛ.
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ ‘gbɔmɛi lɛ fɛɛ baana fɔ-nii ni akɛŋmɛ okpɔlɔ aye.’
Ekɛ mu akafata he, ni ekɛ frankinsɛnsi hu akashwie nɔ, ejaakɛ esha afɔle ni.
Asũɔ kane ni mu yɔɔ mli, ni akɛ gbonyo adeka lɛ maa shi bɔ ni najiashigbɛ lɛ baakwɛ hiɛgbɛ shinaa lɛ naa.
Yesu Kristo diɛŋtsɛ wie nyɔmɔ ko ni abu he akɔntaa akɛ eji “mu tɔi oha” naa lɛ he.—Luka 16:5, 6.

5 “‘Kɛ́ ofɔle lɛ ji ŋmaa afɔle ni ashã yɛ kã tɛtrɛɛ nɔ lɛ,+ no lɛ, efee nɔ ni akɛ ashikishaŋ kpakpa ni ashikishaŋ-sha* bɛ mli ni akɛ mu efutu fee.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, aawo yei ni edara yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ hewalɛ koni amɛfee “mɛi ni tsɔɔ nii kpakpai.”—Tito 2:3.
Kwɛmɔ shihilɛi enyɔ ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ ekoŋŋ, ni oŋɔ lɛ akɛ yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ nɔ lɛ mli lɛ, bo ji opapa, ni yɛ nɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ mli lɛ, bo ji otsɔɔlɔ lɛ.
