Koreabii yɛ Fɔlɔi a-Gbi hu, beni gbekɛbii keɔ amɛ fɔlɔi anii, kɛ Tsɔɔlɔi a-Gbi, beni nikaselɔi woɔ amɛ tsɔɔlɔi ahiɛ nyam ni amɛkeɔ amɛ nii.

Mɛni hewɔ Yesu nyɛmɔi akɛ tsɔɔlɔ lɛ haaa ewó ehe nɔ kɔkɔɔkɔ lɛ?
Amɛbaanyɛ amɛtsɔɔ akɛ enɛ baaye abua lɛ tsɔɔlɔ lɛ ni enu nɔ hewɔ ni Yehowa Odasefoi halaa akɛ amɛkɛ amɛhe wooo nifeemɔi komɛi amli lɛ shishi.
Eŋma akɛ: “Ejaakɛ nyɛ ni kulɛ esa akɛ nyɛtsɔmɔ tsɔɔlɔi moŋ yɛ be lɛ naa lɛ, ehia akɛ atsɔɔ nyɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ mli shishijee nibii lɛ ekoŋŋ.”—Hebribii 5:12.
Eeenyɛ efee akɛ eyeko afii 13 ni aha eshi Tarso ni ji maŋ nɔ ni afɔ lɛ yɛ lɛ kɛtee Yerusalem koni Mlatsɔɔlɔ ni ehe gbɛi waa ni atsɛɔ lɛ Gamaliel lɛ atsɔɔ lɛ nii.

3 Shi kɛlɛ, te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔha wɔnitsɔɔmɔ lɛ amɔ shi jogbaŋŋ akɛ tsɔɔlɔi lɛ?
(Lala 25:9) No hewɔ lɛ, kwɛ bɔ ni eji nɔ ni he hiaa kɛha tsɔɔlɔi ŋmɛnɛ akɛ amɛnyiɛ Ezra nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ sɛɛ, klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ kɛtsɔ sɔlemɔ nɔ ni amɛaatsɔ amɛsaa amɛtsui lɛ nɔ!
Yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ, ekɛ ŋaa ye etsɔɔlɔ lɛ odase yɛ teemɔŋ.
Ákɛ Biblia mli anɔkwale lɛ tsɔɔlɔi lɛ, wɔ hu wɔfeɔ nakai pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Tsɛ lɛ ha gbekɛbii lɛ hé siklitɛ, ni amɛkɛtee amɛkɛyaha tsɔɔlɔ lɛ ni enɛ ha amɛkɛ Ŋmalɛ mli ŋaawoo lɛ tsu nii.
Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔha wɔnitsɔɔmɔ amɔ shi jogbaŋŋ akɛ tsɔɔlɔi lɛ?
Eŋma akɛ: “Be ko baaba ni amɛkpɛlɛŋ tsamɔ tsɔɔmɔ lɛ dɔŋŋ, shi moŋ amɛaabua tsɔɔlɔi anaa amɛwo amɛhe yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛkɔnɔi lɛ anaa, ejaakɛ amɛtoiiaŋ miifɛ̃lɛ̃ amɛ; ni amɛaakpala anɔkwale lɛ yɛ amɛtoii asɛɛ, ni amɛkpale amɛyabo adesãi moŋ atoi.”—2 Timoteo 4:3, 4.
Kɛ́ wɔfee nakai lɛ, wɔtsɔɔ akɛ wɔmiisumɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni wɔtsɔ Tsɔɔlɔ Kpele lɛ sɛɛnyiɛlɔi.
16 Be ko yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ afii 100 Ŋ.B. lɛ, ayana Yesu ní no mli lɛ eye afii 12 lɛ yɛ sɔlemɔtsu lɛ mli, “ni eta shi yɛ tsɔɔlɔi lɛ ateŋ eebo amɛ toi ni eebibii amɛ nii.”
Tsɔɔlɔ kpakpa feɔ toiboo bɔni afee ni ená sanesɛɛkɔmɔ
Tsɔɔlɔ lɛ kɛɛ akɛni mɛi krokomɛi lɛ fɛɛ yaa sɔlemɔ hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ lɛ hu eya.
Namɛi Yehowa babu amɛ akɛ “[e]bi,” ni mɛɛ tsɔɔlɔ nɛkɛ eji kɛha amɛ?
(Abɛi 2:1-6) Dani wɔɔtsɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ he tsɔɔlɔi ni he esa lɛ, mɔdɛŋbɔɔ kɛ hetsɔsemɔ he miihia, ni kɛlɛ, nakai mɔdɛŋbɔɔ lɛ kɛ nyɔmɔwoi baa.
Afii etɛ ni tsara nɔ lɛ fɛɛ mli lɛ, tsɔɔlɔ nɛɛ kɛ jweremɔ nii ni akɛha onukpai aklas sɔrɔtoi etɛ lɛ mli bii lɛ ha Yehowa Odasefoi abii.

6 Bɔ ni afee ni aku Satan ŋaa nɛɛ naa lɛ, June 15, 1908 Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ kala kitã ko ni shiwoo ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ yɔɔ mli lɛ: “Kɛ́ nuu ji mi lɛ, be fɛɛ be kɛ he fɛɛ he ni miyɔɔ lɛ, kɛ́ teemɔŋ tete lɛ, maba mijeŋ jogbaŋŋ yɛ mikɛ yei asharamɔ mli taakɛ mafee kɛ́ miyɛ mɛi ateŋ lɛ; kɛ́ yoo ji mi hu lɛ, maba mijeŋ yɛ nakai gbɛ nɔŋŋ nɔ.”
Gbekɛbii lɛ kɛ mi gbaa nɔ fɛɛ nɔ he saji yɛ faŋŋ mli, ní bɔlɛnamɔ he saji fata he.
Obii lɛ yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he saji ni amɛbaasumɔ ni amɛbi bo, shi amɛnyɛɛɛ amɛwo sanegbaa lɛ nɔ.
Yɛ mɛi komɛi agbɛfaŋ lɛ, “shishijee gboshinii ko ba nyɛ ni eeenyɛ eba akɛ amɛkɛ amɛhe aaawo bɔlɛnamɔ ni tsɔɔ gbalashihilɛ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ shi, shi jeee yɛ ‘bɔlɛnamɔ ni tsɔɔ gbalashihilɛ hiɛ ni obalaŋtai ni yeko afii nyɔŋmai enyɔ’ lɛ kɛ amɛhe woɔ mli lɛ asane lɛ mli.”
Kɛ́ ekɛ mɔ ko ni jeee eweku nyo yɛ tsu kome mli akɛ ehefatalɔ lɛ, esa akɛ amɛfee mɛi ni ebote gbãla mli yɛ kusum naa loo yɛ nɔ ni amralo lɛ najiaŋdamɔlɔ kwɛ nɔ lɛ naa.—Mat.
Mɛni baanyɛ aye abua, ni akɛtsĩ jeŋba he naagbai ni baanyɛ ate shi yɛ banuma weku mli bii, ni esoro amɛbɔɔ su lɛ ateŋ lɛ naa?
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ́ mɔ ko ni esoro ebɔɔ su kɛ naagbai ni haoɔ mɔ miikpe yɛ egbalashihilɛ mli lɛ, kaafee ohe mɔ pɛ ni enyɛɔ ekɛ lɛ yeɔ eyitsoŋ sane.
Mibaná susumɔ ni ejaaa yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he.
Moŋ lɛ, nɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛɔ yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he lɛ baanyɛ aye abua wɔ koni:
Troy, mɔ ni wɔwie ehe kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ, hu kɛɛ akɛ: “Mikwɛɛɛ sinii ni teɔ bɔlɛnamɔ akɔnɔ shi, ni mikɛ mɛi ni wieɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he bɔ ni esaaa lɛ hu ebɔɔɔ.
Ekɛ wɔ, ni ji oblahii oshijafoi lɛ wieɔ tamɔ tsɛ kɛ ebii wieɔ lɛ, ni bei pii lɛ ewoɔ wɔ ŋaa yɛ bɔ ni esa akɛ wɔkɛ yei aye aha lɛ he.
Esa akɛ ajie fɔlɔi Kristofoi ni damɔɔ kaa ni ji sanegbaa ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ susumɔ yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he, ni amɛkɛ amɛbii susuɔ he lɛ naa lɛ ayi.
Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baasumɔ akɛ ekɛ bo aná bɔlɛ be ni ekɛ bo boteko gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ miifo lɛ pɛ enɔ mli, shi jeee ni eesumɔ bo! —1 Korintobii 13:4, 5.
Baal jalɔi lɛ kɛ ajwamaŋi ni yɔɔ egbatsui lɛ amli lɛ kɛ amɛhe woɔ bɔlɛnamɔ jeŋba shara nifeemɔi ni yɔɔ nyaŋemɔ amli koni no aha Baal ajɔɔ amɛ ni amɛŋmɔshi nibii kɛ lɛɛ-kooloi lɛ ashwere.
Gbekɛyoo ko ni eye afii 16 lɛ kɛɛ: “Yɛ bɔ ni mifɔlɔi feɔ amɛnii amɛhaa yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ mli naagbai ahe saji ahe hewɔ lɛ, mikɛ amɛ egbaaa enɛɛmɛi ahe saji.
Kɛ enɛ ehiii feemɔ lɛ, ebaafee nɔ ni nilee yɔɔ mli akɛ okɛ shiatsɛ lɛ aaawo shiɛlɔ kroko ko ni tamɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ dɛŋ.
Be ko ni eho lɛ minyɛmiyoo onukpa lɛ bi Awo saji komɛi ni kɔɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, oblahii kɛ oblayei komɛi kɛ amɛhe woɔ bɔlɛnamɔ nifeemɔi amli tamɔ nuutso ni akɛwoɔ daŋ loo yoohe ni alɛmɔɔ, nuutso ni akɛwoɔ wamɔhe, nuutso loo yoohe ni ahaa mɔ kroko kɛshwɛɔ kɛyashiɔ he baa, ni amɛsusuɔ akɛ tɔmɔ ko bɛ nifeemɔi nɛɛ ahe ejaakɛ amɛkɛ amɛhe nako “bɔlɛ” diɛŋtsɛ.
(Hebribii 13:4) Mɛi ni nyɛɛɛ adamɔ nɔnyɛɛ ni akɛbaa amɛnɔ koni amɛkɛ amɛhe awo jeŋba shara mli lɛ naa lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo kpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ mɔ yɛ yiŋtoi babaoo hewɔ ni esaaa akɛ ekɛ ehe woɔ nifeemɔ ni tamɔ nakai mli.
Lalai ni Naa Wa Waa —Bɔlɛnamɔ, Awuiyeli, kɛ Satan Jamɔ
Shi etamɔ nɔ ni sɔrɔtofeemɔi pii, ni jeee gbɔmɔtso lɛ he nibii ahe nilee nɔ edamɔ lɛ, tamɔ nɔ ni edamɔ nɔ ni aŋkroaŋkro lɛ kaseɔ yɛ nuu loo yoo bɔɔ su he lɛ nɔ.
Yiŋ ni okpɛɔ yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he lɛ baasa owɔsɛɛ he.
Shi moŋ, eha wɔye wɔhe kɛjɛ nɛkɛ je nɛɛ kɛ egbɛ̀i ni baa nuu kɛ yoo bɔɔ su ni yɔɔ fɛo, kɛ eyiŋtoo, kɛ nitsumɔi sɔrɔtoi ni eko fɛɛ eko tsũɔ lɛ ashi lɛ ahe.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:28) Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, te wɔfeɔ wɔnii wɔhaa tɛŋŋ, kɛ onukpa ko kɛ wɔ wie wɔbii ahe, yɛ saji tamɔ naanyobɔɔ fɔŋ loo nuu kɛ yoo teŋ jeŋba ni esaaa lɛ he lɛ?
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni Canada adafitswaa wolo titri ni ji The Globe and Mail wieɔ yɛ kpoomɔ ni nɔyeli lɛ kpoo akɛ ekɛ “hii kɛ hii loo yei kɛ yei agbalashihilɛ mlibotemɔ” ní akɛaawo mla shishi lɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Yɛ afi 2000 lɛ mli lɛ, ebafee nɔ ni shishinumɔ bɛ mli kwraa akɛ akɛ nɔ ko ni mɛi enyɔ ni sumɔɔ amɛhe ni etuu amɛhe amɛha amɛhe sumɔɔ waa lɛ aaakama amɛ yɛ bɔɔ su kome ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ hewɔ.”
Kɛkɛ ni etee nɔ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ni asaŋ kɛ́ minyiɛ gbele hɔɔŋ jɔɔ lɛŋ lɛ, misheŋ efɔŋ ko gbeyei; ejaakɛ okɛ mi yɛ: otso kɛ odɛhiɛmɔtso lɛ, nomɛi shɛjeɔ mimii.”
Enɛ lɛ, jeee nɔ ko nɔ ko ni fe akɛ tsuiŋ awerɛhoyeli.”
Helatsɛmɛi akwɛlɔi lɛ sha foi kɛba tsu lɛ mli, shi amɛnyɛɛɛ he nɔ ko amɛfee.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, tɔmɔ ko kwraa bɛ Kristojamɔ he.”

Ahãaa Nɔ Ko Nɔ Ko Afite
Yehowa kɛ mɔ ko etooo mɔ kroko he, ni ejeee mɔ ni yɔɔ shɛii, aloo etaoɔ emuuyeli ni anyɛŋ ashɛ he.
11 Hiɛyaa ni eba shikpɔŋkukuji heei ni kpaako atsuɔ nii yɛ mli lɛ ahe amaniɛbɔi lɛ hu sa kadimɔ waa.
(Abɛi 29:25; Mateo 10:28) Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ gbohii lɛ leee nɔ ko nɔ ko, ejaakɛ ekɛɛ: “Hiɛkãlɔi le akɛ amɛbaagboi; shi gbohii lɛ, amɛleee nɔ ko nɔ ko . . .
Nɔ kpakpa ko kwraa jɛŋ ohefatalɔ lɛ gbɔjɔmɔi ni ooojie kpo otsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi, aloo ni ooowie he yɛ maŋ lɛ mli kɛbaŋ kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Jeee nakai nɔ ko kwraa ji nɔ ni etsɔɔ lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Romabii 8:21 baaba mli akɛ: “Bɔɔ nii lɛ [adesai] diɛŋtsɛ hu baaye amɛhe kɛjɛ fitemɔ nyɔŋyeli lɛ mli kɛya Nyɔŋmɔ bii lɛ anunyam heyeli lɛ mli.”
5 Obii lɛ baanyɛ amɛkase Yehowa he nii babaoo kɛ́ amɛnu osɔlemɔi.
19 Nakai nɔŋŋ hu wɔbii lɛ kɛ kaai babaoo kpeɔ yɛ skul.
Ená be eha gbekɛbii lɛ, ejaakɛ esumɔɔ amɛ.
Mibii lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii yɛ anɔkwale lɛ mli.
12 Ha obii lɛ ana nɔmimaa akɛ bo, akɛ fɔlɔ lɛ, bo ji mɔ ni obaakwɛ amɛ—shi jeee amɛ amɛbaakwɛ bo.
Ye obua obi lɛ ni enya shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ he (Kwɛmɔ kuku 11)
Gbɔmɛi ni fa fe akpeiakpe kome—hii, yei, kɛ gbekɛbii—ni jɛ Israel akutsei ekpaa mli, damɔ Gerizim Gɔŋ lɛ hiɛ.
(Lala 34:12) Ákɛ tsɛ lɛ, David tswa efai shi akɛ ekɛ gboshinii ni jara wa—ni ji Yehowa gbeyeishemɔ kpakpa ni ŋmɛɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ lɛ—baaha ebii lɛ.
Nyɛmi yoo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Berenice lɛ yɛ bii ejwɛ, ni abaptisi amɛ fɛɛ dani amɛye afii 14.
Shishijee lɛ, miwu sumɔɔɔ akɛ mikɛ gbekɛbii lɛ yaa asafoŋ kpeei.
No hewɔ lɛ, fɔlɔi kɛ amɛhiɛ fɔɔ amɛ wekui anɔ bei pii, titri lɛ amɛbii, koni amɛye amɛbua amɛ yɛ gbɔlɛ be mli.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, ehe miihia ni fɔlɔi ale mɛi ni amɛbii lɛ kɛbɔɔ kɛ he ni amɛkɛ amɛ bɔɔ yɛ.
(Mateo 5:37) Shi, mɛni bii ni abaatsɔse amɛ lɛ biɔ ni afee?
Akɛni adesai fɛɛ ji Adam kɛ Hawa shwiei, ni afɔ amɛ yɛ nakai fitemɔ kɛ mujiwoo shihilɛ lɛ mli hewɔ lɛ, amɛnyɛɛɛ amɛha nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kpaa gbɛ kɛjɛɔ amɛdɛŋ akɛ ebii lɛ aba mli.
Odasefoi aweku ko—Eugène Ntabana, kɛ eŋa, kɛ ebii enyɔ—hi maŋtiase lɛ, ni ji Kigali mli.
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ gbekɛbii saa amɛhe tamɔ sisai loo ayɛi ŋmɛnɛ, ni amɛtee mɛi ashĩai amli ni amɛyawo amɛhe gbeyei akɛ kɛ́ amɛhaaa amɛ nɔ ko lɛ amɛbaaye amɛ awui lɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhe miiwo Samhain kusumii amli ni amɛleee.
Hɛɛ, ehe hiaa ni gbekɛbii ana akɛ amɛ fɔlɔi jieɔ suɔmɔ ni amɛyɔɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni amɛfeɔ lɛ amli.
6 Shi wɔkpãtã amɛhiɛ,+ tamɔ bɔ ni wɔfee Maŋtsɛ Sihon ni hi Heshbon lɛ, wɔkpãtã maŋ fɛɛ maŋ hiɛ, ni hii kɛ yei kɛ gbekɛbii hu fata he.
Yɛ 1991/92 fɛ̃i be lɛ mli lɛ, akɛ niyenii ni tsiimɔ shɛɔ tɔŋ 400 kɛ hii, yei, kɛ gbekɛbii atadei babaoo maje kɛyaha mɛi ni ehia amɛ lɛ.
(Yakobo 1:17; 1 Timoteo 1:11) Ekɛ tsɔɔmɔi kpakpai haa mɛi fɛɛ ni boɔ toi lɛ, ni enáa miishɛɛ yɛ toiboo ni mɛi ni etsɔɔ amɛ nii lɛ feɔ lɛ mli, taakɛ bɔ ni fɔlɔi náa miishɛɛ kɛji amɛbii bo tsɔsemɔi ni amɛjɛɔ suɔmɔ mli amɛkɛhaa lɛ toi lɛ.—Abɛi 27:11.
Kɛfata he lɛ, Israelbii lɛ le akɛ esa akɛ amɛjeŋba afee krɔŋkrɔŋ.
Be ni tamɔ nɛkɛ he hiaa gbekɛbii ni amɛkaiɔ waa hu, ni ehaa amɛnuɔ he akɛ amɛyɛ shiŋŋ kɛ shweshweeshwe hu.
11 Nyɛle jogbaŋŋ akɛ wɔtee nɔ wɔwie wɔtsɔɔ nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ, ni wɔshɛje nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ mii, ni wɔye nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ odase,+ tamɔ bɔ ni tsɛ+ feɔ ebii lɛ, 12 koni nyɛya nɔ nyɛnyiɛ bɔ ni sa Nyɔŋmɔ,+ mɔ ni tsɛɔ nyɛ kɛbaa e-Maŋtsɛyeli+ kɛ enunyam lɛ mli lɛ.
Enɛ ha minyɛ awo ni atsɛɔ lɛ Berta lɛ kome too kwɛ bii ekpaa ní eye kɛjɛ afi kome kɛyashi afii 16 lɛ.
“Wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔjie hiɛsɔɔ ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ kpo wɔtsɔɔ yɛ jɔɔmɔ fɛɛ jɔɔmɔ ni esaaa wɔ, ni wɔnáa kɛjɛɔ Yehowa kɛ egbɛjianɔtoo lɛ dɛŋ lɛ he kɛ mumɔŋ niyenii ni ekɛha wɔ yɛ be ni sa mli hewɔ lɛ he.”
No sɛɛ lɛ, etee eshĩa* lɛ ni ebi ni abahã lɛ niyenii, ni eye.
Shi heloo gbɛfaŋ hiamɔ nii—niyenii, hehaa nɔ̃, kɛ wɔɔhe hu?
Esa akɛ amɛje shishi nyɔɔŋ ŋmɛlɛ 1:00 bɔni afee ni niyenii lɛ abe leebi 4:00 mli beni wolɛi lɛ eba.
Mɛi akpekpei abɔ krokomɛi hu kɛ daa gbi shihilɛ mli deŋmegbomɔi kpeɔ, koni amɛkɛna amɛdaaŋ ŋmaa kɛkɛ.
Nibii ní kɛ́ wɔfee lɛ etsɔɔ akɛ wɔfeɔ falefale ji, wɔdɛŋ ni wɔfɔɔ kɛ samala kɛ nu dani wɔyeɔ nii loo wɔmɔɔ niyenii mli, beni wɔtee nii asɛɛ wɔba, kɛ beni wɔju abifao he wɔtã loo beni etee nii amli ni wɔtsake ehe sɛɛ lɛ.
Aloo ewaa kɛhaa mɛi komɛi akɛ amɛaaba bɔ ni amɛyeɔ nii loo amɛnuɔ dãai amɛhaa lɛ shi.
YESU hala “tsulɔ” ko yɛ Pentekoste afi 33 Ŋ.B. koni eha ‘ewebii’ lɛ anii yɛ be ni sa mli.
Beni lsraelbii lɛ yɔɔ ŋa lɛ nɔ lɛ, amɛnine shɛ mana, ni ji naakpɛɛ niyenii ko nɔ kɛjɛ Yehowa ŋɔɔ.
Mɛi komɛi ewie akɛ, eeenyɛ efee akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ha kooloi lɛ yaje shihilɛ ko ni haŋ amɛfee nɔ ko kwraa lɛ mli, ni no haaa niyenii he ahia amɛ tsɔ.
Wɔto gbɛjianɔ kɛha mumɔŋ niyenii jaa.
(Yohane 10:16) Amɛmɔɔ kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ mli kɛ shishinumɔ akɛ amɛkɛ mlai ni kɔɔ nakai kpaŋmɔ lɛ he lɛ tsuɔ nii, ni amɛfiɔ gbɛjianɔ ni atsɔ kpaŋmɔ lɛ nɔ ato lɛ sɛɛ. Kɛfata he lɛ, amɛkɛ Kristofoi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ fɛɛ kaseɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he nii kometoo, ni asaŋ amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa amɛ yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛmɔ kɛ kaselɔfeemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Akɛni Farao biyoo lɛ eŋɔ lɛ akɛ ebi hewɔ lɛ, mɛi jie bulɛ kpele kpo amɛtsɔɔ lɛ, eye niyenii kpakpai, ewo atadei ni nɔ bɛ, ni ehi shi yɛ ogbɔjɔ shihilɛ mli.
Taakɛ bɔ ni niyenii kpakpa ko ni oyeɔ lɛ haa bo hewalɛ koni otsu nii lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ ni oookane lɛ baawo bo hewalɛ koni ohi shi yɛ eshishitoo mlai lɛ anaa.
Beni eyɔɔ tsuŋwoohe lɛ po lɛ, atsɔ gbɛ ko nɔ aha enine shɛ mumɔŋ niyenii nɔ, ni no wo lɛ hewalɛ ni eshɛje emii.
Beni ekpɔ̃ ewebii lɛ kɛjɛ Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ mli yɛ afi 1919 sɛɛ lɛ, eŋmɛ amɛ kunimyeli okpɔlɔ kpeteŋkpele, ni ji mumɔŋ niyenii babaoo diɛŋtsɛ.
20 Ejurɔfeemɔ ni ajie lɛ kpo yɛ niyenii kɛ atadei babaoo ni akɛwo tsɔnei amli kɛtee tsutsu Soviet Union loo Russia lɛ hu eha nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ ena ekãa babaoo.
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: ‘Hɔmɔ baaba.’—Marko 13:8.
Eyɛ mli akɛ ekolɛ nɔ ko fioo pɛ nitsulɔi nɛɛ yɔɔ yɛ heloo gbɛfaŋ moŋ, shi bei pii lɛ amɛyɛ hiamɔ nii ni sa kɛ tsui ni nyɔɔ mɔ mli akɛ amɛmiiye niyenii ni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛgbo he deŋme.—2 Tesalonikabii 3:11, 12.
Namɔ ji tsulɔ, loo tsulɔ nukpa nɛɛ, ni mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ etsɔɔ ehaa Nuŋtsɔ lɛ webii lɛ “amɛŋmaa yɛ be ni sa nɔ”?
Miyeee niyenii shii enyɔ yɛ otsi mli koni maná bei pii ni mikɛsusu ohe.
Agbɛnɛ hu, Yesu kɛɛ amɛ ni amɛsɔle koni Nyɔŋmɔ ahã amɛ niyenii ni amɛbaaye nakai gbi lɛ, ni ekɛ amɛhe eshai ake amɛ. Amɛbaanyɛ amɛsɔle yɛ nibii krokomɛi ni he hiaa amɛ lɛ hu ahe.
No hewɔ lɛ ekɛɛ: “Nyɛkaŋɔa nɔ ko nyɛhiɛa nyɛdɛŋ yɛ nyɛgbɛfaa lɛ mli, nyɛkahiɛa tso loo kotoku loo aboloo loo shika loo atadei enyɔ.
Amɛyeɔ “niyenii kpakpa.”

18 Kɛ fɔlɔi Kristofoi na akɛ afɔ̃ amɛbii lɛ anine kɛmiiya henaabuamɔ ko shishi lɛ, esa akɛ amɛkwɛ koni amɛle nɔ ni baaya nɔ yɛ jɛmɛ, ni yɛ bei babaoo mli lɛ ebaafee nɔ ni nilee yɔɔ mli akɛ amɛaafata amɛhe kɛya.
Wɔteŋ mɛi fioo ko ekpe akɛ kuu yɛ Újpest, yɛ Budapest kpokpaa lɛ nɔ yɛ Hungary kɛha kpee fioo ko dani wɔkɛ wɔhe awo Kristofoi asɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Moŋ lɛ, wɔkpɛɔ mli akɛ wɔbaaŋmɛɛ mlifu lɛ he, eyɛ mli akɛ ekolɛ ‘wɔyɛ sane ko wɔshi mɔ lɛ.’
Ewaa kɛhaa mɛi komɛi akɛ amɛaashiɛ yɛ shĩa kɛ shĩa ní amɛkɛ mɛi ni amɛleee agba sane.
• Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa nyiɛɔ lɛ?
Mɛi krokomɛi nɛɛ hu yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kaimɔ mli, ni no hewɔ lɛ abaatee amɛ shi, ejaakɛ Biblia lɛ woɔ shi akɛ: “Jalɔi kɛ mɛi ni ejaaa fɛɛ baate shi.” —Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 24:15.
Mɛni tsɔɔ akɛ jeee mɛi fɛɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ duroɔ amɛ emumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ baaya ŋwɛi?
(Yesaia 48:16b, 17) Esa akɛ bɔ ni Yehowa kwɛɔ amɛ lɛ he kpojiemɔ ní suɔmɔ yɔɔ mli nɛɛ ama nɔ mi kɛha Israel maŋ lɛ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ baajie amɛ kɛjɛ Babilon.
Shi jɛmɛ kɛya Yuda+ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.”

21 Kɛ́ je tsɛre lɛ, Yehowa nyiɛɔ amɛhiɛ yɛ atatu ni damɔ shi jaŋŋ mli yɛ gbɛ lɛ nɔ,+ ni kɛ́ je na lɛ, enyiɛɔ amɛhiɛ yɛ la ni damɔ shi jaŋŋ mli koni no ahã amɛ kane, bɔ ni afee ni amɛnyɛ amɛnyiɛ be ni je etsɛre kɛ be ni je ena.
No hewɔ lɛ, ehã mɛi lɛ tee shĩa, ni ekɛɛ ebɔfoi lɛ akɛ amɛfo Galilea Ŋshɔ lɛ kɛya ŋshɔ lɛ sɛɛgbɛ.
(Yohane 1:35-51) Shi sɛɛ mli lɛ, mɛi ejwɛ nɛɛ kɛ amɛhe yawo amɛwuoyaa nitsumɔ lɛ mli ekoŋŋ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ no mli lɛ afeko gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ ɔfis lɛ yɛ kpee lɛ shishi lolo moŋ, shi Nyɛminuu Sullivan kɛ Marion gbɛi wo wolo nɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ akɛ gbɛgbalɔ, ni ebi wɔ akɛ: “Nɛgbɛ ji he ni nyɛbaaya ni nyɛyatsu gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ yɛ kɛ́ agbe kpee lɛ naa lɛ?”
Kɛlɛ, wɔyaa tsɔji amaamɔhei, nitsumɔhei, shwɛmɔhei, gbɛjegbɛi ni mɛi babaoo fɔɔ nɔ tsɔmɔ, kɛ hei krokomɛi wɔyashiɛɔ wɔhaa mɛi yɛ he fɛɛ he ni wɔbaana amɛ yɛ.
Yɛ be ni sa mli lɛ Yesu kɛ nɛkɛ hegbɛ nɛɛ baatsu nii akɛ: “Ye lumɔ yɛ ohenyɛlɔi lɛ ateŋ!”—Lala 110:1, 2; Filipibii 2:8, 9; Hebribii 10:13, 14.

19 Kwɛ bɔ ni ajɔɔ Yehowa webii aha akɛ amɛmiina mumɔŋ la babaoo nɛɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ!
Yɛ Kristofoi agbɛfaŋ lɛ, henɔjɔɔmɔ kɛ baptisimɔ ji nifeemɔi ni he hiaa ni haa anáa Yehowa dɛŋ jɔɔmɔ.
Hɛɛ, ebaajɔɔ bo kɛ bii babaoo*+ kɛ oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nibaa nii kɛ oŋmaa* kɛ owain hee kɛ omu+ kɛ otsinai abii kɛ otoi abii, yɛ shikpɔŋ ni ekã otsɛmɛi lɛ kitã yɛ he akɛ ekɛbaahã bo lɛ nɔ.
12:14) Gbɛ kome ni wɔɔtsɔ nɔ wɔjɔɔ mɛi ni teɔ shi amɛwoɔ wɔ lɛ ji ni wɔsɔle wɔha amɛ.
Wɔtee nɔ wɔsɔle wɔha Yehowa, wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ wɔfee tsakemɔi, ni yɛ naagbee lɛ wɔbafee mɛi sa kɛha baptisimɔ.—Nyɛkanea Kolosebii 1:9, 10.
Shi mɛi ni kɛ mlihilɛ hereɔ Yesu kaselɔi lɛ náa jɔɔmɔi.
22 Gbalashihilɛ baanyɛ aha mɔ aná miishɛɛ ni etsui anyɔ emli beni esɛɛ tsɛɔ lɛ.
Esa akɛ mɛi ni miisumɔ ni amɛna Nyɔŋmɔ dɛŋ jɔɔmɔ lɛ akpɛ amɛyiŋ, ni shishashaomɔ bɛ mli, ni ekɛ etaomɔ nii akpa gbee.
(b) Yehowa jɔɔ Yosef yɛ enɔkwayeli lɛ hewɔ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Yɛ enɛɛmɛi sɛɛ lɛ, mɛɛ mumɔŋ jɔɔmɔi nɛkɛ anáa yɛ Betel!

11:9) Kwɛ jɔɔmɔi ni adesai anine baashɛ nɔ!
Kɛ́ mɔ ko ha abaptisi lɛ lɛ, mɛɛ jɔɔmɔi kɛ sɛɛnamɔi komɛi jɛɔ mli kɛbaa?
Biblia lɛ wieɔ ehe akɛ: “Ajɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ Yesu Kristo tsɛ lɛ, mɔ ni ji musuŋtsɔlɛi atsɛ kɛ miishɛjemɔ fɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, mɔ ni shɛjeɔ wɔmii yɛ wɔmanehului lɛ fɛɛ mli, koni wɔ hu wɔnyɛ wɔkɛ miishɛjemɔ, ni Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔshɛjeɔ wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔmii lɛ, ashɛje mɛi ni naa amanehulu fɛɛ amanehulu lɛ amii.”
Jɔɔmɔi ni ená lɛ fɛɛ haa emii shɛɔ ehe waa, ni eekpa gbi ni “maŋbii lɛ ateŋ mɔ ko ekɛŋ akɛ: Migbɔjɔ!” lɛ gbɛ.—Yes.
Amɛ nine shɛɔ nyɛmɔ ni Yehowa yɔɔ ni ekɛjɔɔ mɛi ni kɛ anɔkwayeli ŋmɛɔ amɛtsui shi lɛ nɔ.—Yak.
Okɛ Hiɛdɔɔ Atao Yehowa Jɔɔmɔ Sɛɛ Gbɛ
27 Ni amɛkɛ migbɛ́i lɛ afɔ̃ Israelbii lɛ anɔ,+ koni majɔɔ amɛ.”
Yɛ enɛ ni yɔɔ wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli hewɔ lɛ, wɔsaa wɔhe jogbaŋŋ, ni wɔsɔleɔ wɔbiɔ Yehowa jɔɔmɔ koni nɔ ni wɔɔbaakɛɛ agbɛnɛ lɛ atee miishɛɛ shi.
(3 Mose 19:32) Enɛ baa lɛ nakai yɛ mɛi ni kɛ anɔkwayeli esɔmɔ Yehowa aahu afii babaoo lɛ agbɛfaŋ titri ejaakɛ “waŋ lɛ, anunyam akekre ni, kɛ́ aná lɛ yɛ jalɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ.”
Ebiyoo lɛ he yɛ fɛo waa.
Wiemɔ lɛ Tamɔ Lala ko ni Ŋɔɔ
25 Omamɔ hei grɔŋŋi yɛ gbɛjegbɛ fɛɛ gbɛjegbɛ nɔ hei ni afɔɔ tsɔmɔ lɛ, ni okɛ ohe hã* mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni hoɔ lɛ ni ohã ohefɛo lɛ tsɔ nɔ ko ni anyaŋeɔ,+ ni ohã oshawo nifeemɔi lɛ fa pii.
Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, eŋɔɔ wɔnaa waa akɛ ama nitsumɔhe nine hee fɛfɛo ko yɛ Lilongwe, ni amamɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asai 1,000 kɛ sɛɛ yɛ Malawi!
Miishɛɛ sane ji akɛ, beni bɔfo lɛ ŋma yɛ nakai kponɔgbɛ hewulamɔ nibii lɛ ahe lɛ, ekɛ Hela wiemɔ henɔ ko ni ji koʹsmos lɛ tsu nii, ni no hu eji wiemɔ ni aná Ŋleshi wiemɔ ni ji “cosmetic,” ni eshishi ji “koni aha hewolo lɛ titri afee fɛo” lɛ yɛ mli.

Hefɛo Diɛŋtsɛ ni Yɔɔ Kɛha Nilelɔ
EJI Mazda jamɔ ni Iran gbalɔ Zoroaster shiɛ etsɔɔ lɛ sɛɛnyiɛlɔ ji bo kulɛ, obaamɛ gbi ni shikpɔŋ lɛ baaku sɛɛ efee fɛo tamɔ bɔ ni eji kɛjɛ shishijee mli lɛ.
Ani no mli lɛ Petro kɛ nɔnyɛɛ miitsĩ Kristofoi yei anaa ni amɛgu hewolo nɔ hefɛo nibii kɛ nibii krokomɛi ni haa mɔ he feɔ fɛo lɛ?
Lala ni kɛ fe fɛɛ ni yɔɔ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ tamɔ sɔlemɔ ni ŋɔɔ.
Kɛtsɔ nikasemɔi ni nɔ kwɔlɔ ni etsɔɔ amɛ lɛ anɔ, bɔni afee ni ekɛsaa amɛ kɛha nɔ ni baaba lɛ.

Misusuko he pɛŋ akɛ wɔbaaná he ko ni yɔɔ fɛo tamɔ nɛkɛ ni wɔkpe yɛ jɛmɛ kɛjie Yehowa yi.
Ebɔi yei krokomɛi akwɛmɔ, ni ewieɔ bɔ ni amɛhe yɔɔ fɛo ha.
Yɛ March 19, 1983 lɛ, wɔna tsũi heei nɛɛ anɔjɔɔmɔ ko ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ yɛ agbiɛnaa be mli hulutsoo gbi ko nɔ.
Kwɛ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shweshweeshwe shihilɛ ni wɔná yɛ Yehowa mumɔŋ sɔlemɔtsu lɛ kpoi ni yɔɔ fɛo lɛ anɔ!
Ehe yɛ fɛo waa diɛŋtsɛ, shi ehe fɛo lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishemɔ ni eyɔɔ lɛ.

Ekɛ mɛi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ wo abɔɔ fɛfɛo ko mli ni eha amɛ nibii ni he baahia amɛ lɛ fɛɛ babaoo koni amɛya nɔ amɛhi shi daa ni amɛna miishɛɛ.
18 Nakai gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ, Yehowa baajie amɛhewulamɔ nii lɛ fɛɛ: amɛnaneshi gai lɛ,
▪ Wɔ fɛɛ wɔhiɛ sɔɔ gbɛjianɔ sɔrɔtoi ni adesai Loɔ. ni amɛjwɛŋmɔ kpakpa yɛ be. koni amɛkɛtao wɔ naagbai ba- baoo lɛ anaa tsabaai lɛ.
Woji ni akɛ niji ŋmala ni aye samai awo mli kɛ esɛɛ fɛfɛo lɛ jieɔ tsuishitoo kɛ hesaai ni woloŋmalɔi ni kɛ amɛniji ŋmala lɛ kɛtsu nii lɛ kpo.
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔnu loofɔji alalai ni ŋɔɔ lɛ.
Kristendom televishin nɔ sanekpakpashiɛlɔi lɛ po kpaa amɛniji amli koni amɛnine ashɛ amɛ gbɛfaŋnɔ ni shɛɔ dɔlai akpekpei toi akpekpei abɔ lɛ anɔ!—Okɛto Yeremia 5:26-31 he.
Yɛ be mli ni abaanyɛ akɛ tɛlivishin atsu nii ni sɛɛnamɔ aba he lɛ, hewalɛ fɔŋ ni enaa yɛ adesai anɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ eha je lɛŋ bii kɛ hiɛdɔɔ ewie he.
5:15, 16) Be enyiɛ wɔfiteɔ otsi fɛɛ otsi yɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔi ahe, be enyiɛ wɔfiteɔ kɛkwɛɔ tɛlivishiŋ, be enyiɛ wɔfiteɔ yɛ Internet lɛ he, ni be enyiɛ wɔfiteɔ yɛ shwɛmɔ mli?
Beni abi saji lɛ yɛ BBC tɛlivishiŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, amaniɛbɔlɔ lɛ kɛ nifeemɔ lɛ ba naagbee kɛtsɔ kɛɛmɔ ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mikase nibii babaoo ni tsɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ni Yehowa Odasefoi bashiɔ wɔshinaa lɛ.
Wɔfiteŋ bei babaoo ni kulɛ wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛfee nɔ ko kpakpa lɛ kɛkwɛŋ tɛlivishiŋ.
Tɛlivishiŋ lɛ ji abaawa ni kwɛ lɛ yɛ shia.
Agbɛnɛ hu, susumɔ gbɛ̀i ni wɔtsɔ nɔ wɔná redio, tɛlivishiŋ, tɛlifoŋ, kɛ faks tsɔnei kɛ nitsumɔ yɛ gbɛ kpakpa nɔ lɛ he sɛɛ lɛ he okwɛ.
Tɛlivishiŋ kɛ sinii ni wɔkwɛɔ, Internet lɛ kɛ nitsumɔ, kɛ woji wuji, woji tɛtrɛbii, kɛ adafitswaa woji ni wɔkaneɔ lɛ ji gbɛ̀i ni wɔtsɔɔ nɔ wɔkɛ mɛi krokomɛi bɔɔ.
Tɛlivishin, redio, sinii, kɛ vidio nɔ nibii gbɛɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he nibii eshwãa be fɛɛ be.
Miyɛ tsũ mli nibii ni akɛ tsei fee fioo ko pɛ ni mihala akɛ misumɔŋ ni maná tɛlivishiŋ ko.
Tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nibii kɛ vidio nɔ shwɛmɔi babaoo haa etɔɔ mɔ, shi Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ kanemɔ kɛ ekasemɔ haa mɔ tsui nyɔɔ emli ni ewoɔ mɔ hewalɛ.—Lala 19:8, 9.
Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, enuuu nɔ̃ hewɔ ni mɛi komɛi kpooɔ nibii komɛi tamɔ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi komɛi ni enaa akɛ tɔmɔ ko bɛ he lɛ shishi.
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔbi wɔhe akɛ, ‘Be enyiɛ mifiteɔ kɛkaneɔ je lɛŋ woji tɛtrɛbii loo adafitswaa woji, kɛkwɛɔ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nibii, kɛboɔ lalai atoi, loo kɛtswaa kɔmpiuta nɔ shwɛmɔi?
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, nibii ni etee nɔ yɛ gbi lɛ mli lɛ ahe maŋshiɛmɔ ni ahaa yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ lɛ atoiboo kɛkɛ baanyɛ aha gbeyei amɔ wɔ!
Tɛlivishiŋ nɔ kane ni kpɛɔ, mɛi asusuma ni jeɔ yɛ samfɛlɛ naa, kanei ni asuɔ ni agbeɔ, lɔlei ni baa ni yaa lɛ agbɛɛmɔ, naji ashishi gbɛɛmɔi ni anuɔ yɛ abalanaa lɛ nɔ, samfee ni miigbele ni miiŋa shinaai lɛ, fɛɛ ji okadii ni tsɔɔ akɛ akutsoŋbii lɛ yɛ “wala mli.”
Jeŋ nilee, ni ji hii-shi-kɛha-ŋmɛnɛ lɛ hu baa trukaa yɛ jarayeli nitsumɔ he nikasemɔ kpeei ashishi, woji ni akɛyeɔ abuaa he, woji, sinii, tɛlivishin nɔ nifeemɔi, kɛ agbɛnɛ yɛ lala mli.
Tɛlivishiŋ Ani Anyɛɔ Ashiɔ Bi Ahaa lɛ ni Ehiɔ?
Ebaanyɛ efee mfoniri ni yɔɔ wolo ko loo wolo tɛtrɛɛ ko mli, sini loo tɛlivishin nɔ nɔ̃ ko, mfoniri ko ni atɛŋ yɛ tao ko nɔ ni miitswa nɔ ko he adafi, loo shihilɛ diɛŋtsɛ ko.
Wɔkwɛ jogbaŋŋ koni wɔkaŋmɛɛ amɛhe wɔha hewalɛi ni baagbɔjɔ amɛ, tamɔ televishin nɛkɛ.
Adafitswaa woji ni ale jogbaŋŋ kɛ tɛlivishiŋ nitsumɔhei bɔ yiŋkpɛɛ ni afee lɛ he amaniɛ.
Yɛ saneyeli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, atswa amaniɛbɔi babaoo ni ejaaa ni atsɔmɔ lɛ yɛ saneyeli lɛ mli lɛ he adafi yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ, ni ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, awie akɛ Nyɛminuu Margaryan ekpɛlɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ etɔmɔ nɔ.
17 Mɛi komɛi woɔ gbalafitemɔ he hewalɛ kɛtsɔɔ amɛhe ni amɛkɛhaa je lɛ susumɔ ni ekpɔtɔ yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he ni amɛjieɔ lɛ kpo yɛ woji amli, tɛlivishin nɔ, kɛ sinii amli lɛ nɔ.
BEI komɛi lɛ, tɛlivishiŋ ni mɔ sũɔ ehaa ebii ni amɛkwɛɔ lɛ haa ehe jɔɔ lɛ ni enyɛɔ etsuɔ nibii komɛi ni etsuɔ he nii lɛ ahe nii.
Ani osũ tɛlivishiŋ lɛ?
Nɔ ko kwraa bɛ ni baaha ahé adafitswaa woji waa loo eha mɛi pii akwɛ tɛlivishiŋ ákɛ ja saji ni kɔɔ gbele he, titri lɛ kɛji saji lɛ kɔɔ mɛi babaoo ni amɛnyɔnyɔi yɛ shihilɛi ni yɔɔ gbeyei mli lɛ he lɛ.
Kɛ́ mɔ ko kɛ wɔ ye jogbaŋŋ lɛ, ani wɔhe feɔ oya kɛdaa mɔ lɛ shi, ni kɛ́ ebaahi lɛ, ani wɔŋmaa wolo loo wɔfeɔ nɔ kroko kɛjieɔ hiɛsɔɔ kpo?
Afeɔ amɛhe amagai ni akɛ daa nyɔŋmɔi lɛ ashi—ni eji woo ko ni akɛfɔɔɔ hiɛkalɔi hamɔ—ni lalafoo wiemɔ ŋmalɔi gbaa ekãa ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ ahe saji.
Ni amɛlá ni amɛhereheree nɔ amɛkɛkafo Yehowa ni amɛkɛda lɛ shi, ejaakɛ ehi, ejaakɛ naanɔ emɔbɔnalɛ hiɔ shi kɛyaa yɛ Israel nɔ.”—Ezra 3:1-11.

“Amɛ Fɛɛ Amɛshɛ Shikpɔŋ Shweshweeshwe” (Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 27:27-44)
Ekolɛ ehiɛ ekpa lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ewiemɔ ni ewie etsɔɔ Daniel akɛ: “Nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ji nyɔŋmɔi a-Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ maŋtsɛmɛi anuntsɔ” lɛ nɔ.
15 Nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baa lɛ, eba momo, ni nɔ ni baaba hu eba momo;+ shi anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ taoɔ nɔ ni atiuɔ sɛɛ lɛ.
Nɛkɛ nuu anɔkwafo nɛɛ tsɔ ejeŋba nɔ ema nɔ mi akɛ esumɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ jalɛ nɔyeli moŋ fe ni eeena Satan heyeli mumɔ lɛ eko, taakɛ gbɔmɛi ni sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei, tamɔ Habel, Henok, Noa, Abraham, Isak, Yakob, kɛ Yosef efee kɛtsɔ hiɛ momo lɛ.
Kɛji kɛjɛ shishijee lɛ wɔnuuu sane ko shishi loo wɔnaaa bɔ ni ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ su lɛ yɔɔ tsakpaa po lɛ, Biblia lɛ ní wɔkase lɛ etsɔɔ wɔ Yehowa he saji ní fá fe bɔ ni sa momo, ní baanyɛ aye abua wɔ ní wɔna akɛ eji Nyɔŋmɔ ní yɔɔ suɔmɔ, ni ekwɛɛɛ mɛi ahiɛaŋ, ni eyeɔ jalɛ sane hu be fɛɛ be.
No hewɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ woɔ wɔ hewalɛ koni wɔtsɔ Biblia lɛ kasemɔ, sɔlemɔ, kɛ mɛi ni le Nyɔŋmɔ momo ní amɛsumɔɔ lɛ lɛ anɔ wɔbale lɛ.
3 Tse Nyɔŋmɔ Gbɛi lɛ He: Mɔ ko nyɛŋ eha Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi lɛ afee krɔŋkrɔŋ fe bɔ ni eji amrɔ nɛɛ.
Beni eka akɛ ebaatsɔɔ mi Nyɔŋmɔ he nii lɛ, mikɛ mlifu ni naa wa kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Mile Nyɔŋmɔ ni mijaa lɛ lɛ momo!”
5 Beni Yesu kɛ Nikodemo wie lɛ, no mli lɛ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ eba Yesu nɔ momo, ni afɔ lɛ mu kɛha ewɔsɛɛ maŋtsɛyeli yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli, ni Nyɔŋmɔ ekpɛlɛ Yesu nɔ yɛ faŋŋ mli akɛ E-Bi.
NƆ NI NYƆŊMƆ WIEMƆ LƐ TSƆƆ: Nyɔŋmɔ efee nɔ ko momo kɛye ebua adesai, ni eshɛje amɛmii yɛ gbɛ krɛdɛɛ ko ni sa waa nɔ.
Beni bɔfo Paulo fã gbɛ kɛtee Asia Bibioo lɛ kɛ Hela fɛɛ lɛ, eshiɛ etsɔɔ Jeŋmajiaŋbii babaoo ni sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei momo lɛ kɛ ‘Helabii ni jaa Nyɔŋmɔ’ lɛ fɛɛ.
5 Kɛkɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ: “Enɛ baahã amɛhe amɛye akɛ, Yehowa, amɛtsɛmɛi a-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni ji Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Isak Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Yakob Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ,+ ejie ehe kpo etsɔɔ bo.”
6 Ni Israelbii lɛ fee efɔŋ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ ekoŋŋ,+ ni amɛyasɔmɔ Baal srɔtoi+ lɛ, kɛ Ashtoret amagai lɛ, kɛ Aram* nyɔŋmɔi lɛ, kɛ Sidon nyɔŋmɔi lɛ, kɛ Moab nyɔŋmɔi lɛ,+ kɛ Amonbii lɛ anyɔŋmɔi lɛ,+ kɛ Filistibii lɛ anyɔŋmɔi lɛ.
Yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, esa akɛ amɛtsɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli anɔkwale krɔŋŋ lɛ, ni ekomɛi ji nɔ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ: Yehowa ji Ŋwɛi Flooflo Nyɔŋmɔ, ni lɛ pɛ ji mɔ ni sa ákɛ akɛ gbɛhe nɛɛ he anunyam lɛ aha lɛ (Lala 83:19); Yesu ji Nyɔŋmɔ Bi kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Mesia Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ Nɔyelɔ ni ahala (1 Korintobii 15:27, 28); Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ baatse Yehowa gbɛi lɛ he ni ebaaha eyiŋtoo kɛha shikpɔŋ lɛ kɛ adesai ni yɔɔ nɔ lɛ aba mli (Mateo 6:9, 10); esa akɛ ashiɛ sanekpakpa ni kɔɔ nɛkɛ Maŋtsɛyeli nɛɛ he lɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ fɛɛ.
Taakɛ tsɔɔmɔ nɛɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, “Tsɛ lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ, Bi lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ, ni Mumɔ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ hu ji Nyɔŋmɔ, ni kɛlɛ, jeee Nyɔŋmɔi etɛ yɔɔ, shi moŋ Nyɔŋmɔ kome.”
Taakɛ tsɔɔmɔ nɛɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, “Tsɛ lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ, Bi lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ, ni Mumɔ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ, ni kɛlɛ jeee Nyɔŋmɔi etɛ yɔɔ, shi moŋ Nyɔŋmɔ kome.”
Amɛbiɔ akɛ, te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni Tsɛ lɛ aaafee Nyɔŋmɔ, Yesu hu aaafee Nyɔŋmɔ, ni mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ hu aaafee Nyɔŋmɔ, ni kɛlɛ jeee Nyɔŋmɔi etɛ yɔɔ shi Nyɔŋmɔ kome hu?
Amɛkɛɔ akɛ “Tsɛ lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ, Bi lɛ [Yesu] ji Nyɔŋmɔ, ni Mumɔ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ, ni kɛlɛ jeee Nyɔŋmɔi etɛ yɔɔ shi moŋ Nyɔŋmɔ kome.”
11:2-6—Kɛ́ Yohane le momo akɛ Yesu ji Mesia lɛ akɛni enu beni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ akɛ ekpɛlɛɔ Yesu nɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ ebi akɛ Yesu ji “mɔ ni baa lɛ” lo lɛ?
9 Kɛ́ ojɔɔ owala nɔ oha Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ momo ni abaptisi bo akɛ Kristofonyo lɛ, no lɛ ole akɛ wekukpaa ko bɛ ni tamɔ okɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ nɔ̃ lɛ.
+ Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni heee enɔ eyeee* lɛ, akojo lɛ momo, ejaakɛ eheko Nyɔŋmɔ Bi koome lɛ gbɛ́i lɛ nɔ eyeko.
Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ beni Nyɔŋmɔ fã Noa koni ekpɛ adeka lɛ, nakai beaŋ lɛ Noa bii lɛ edara momo ni amɛbote gbalashihilɛ mli.
(Lala 144:15b) Yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ, oje shishi oona shiwoo nɛɛ mlibaa: “Nyɔŋmɔ aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ.”
Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ miibɔ Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ kɔkɔ akɛ Eufrate faa lɛ mli nui lɛ baamii.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 14:16, 17) Akɛni shikpɔŋ lɛ ji shihilɛhe ko ni yɔɔ fɛo momo hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ Yehowa ni ji “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ” lɛ fee lɛ paradeiso lɛ, kwɛ bɔ ni enɔ baafee fɛo aha!—1 Timoteo 1:11, NW.
Ni nilee yɛ mli akɛ wɔɔmu sane naa akɛ beni David ji oblanyo fioo lɛ beebe ni ebɔi Nyɔŋmɔ yi jiemɔ kɛ lalai ni taa mɔ tsuiŋ.
Mɛni mɛi komɛi efee ní no eha amɛná be babaoo kɛmiitsu shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ?
5 Dani Yesu Kristo ni atée lɛ shi lɛ baakwɔ kɛya ŋwɛi lɛ, ejie ehe kpo etsɔɔ ekaselɔi lɛ ni ekɛ nitsumɔ ko ni he hiaa wo amɛdɛŋ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ mɛi krokomɛi náa minitsumɔ lɛ he sɛɛ?’
Ekolɛ obaanyɛ otsake sane ni obiɔ kɛjeɔ shishi lɛ mli, loo okɛ ŋmalɛ kroko atsu nii yɛ sanegbaa lɛ mli.
Habakuk fee bɔ ni enu he eha lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ efɔ̃ shi, ejaakɛ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ejaakɛ agbamitso lɛ gbaŋ afofro, ni yibii hu ehiŋ weintsei lɛ anɔ; mutso yibiiwoo aaafee yaka, ni abɔɔi lɛ baŋ niyenii; aaaha tooi atã yɛ tooi atsũ lɛ mli, ni anaŋ tsinai yɛ amɛtsũi lɛ amli. Shi mi lɛ, manya yɛ Yehowa mli, mimli aaafili mi yɛ miyiwalaheremɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ mli!”
Heloonaa ninamɔ mli shweremɔ kɛ mumɔŋ shweremɔ baaa, shi mumɔŋ shweremɔ kɛ heloonaa shweremɔ baa, ni efaa kɛhaa Yehowa nitsumɔ lɛ he hiamɔ nii ahe nitsumɔ.
Be-fɛɛ sɔɔlɔ ko kɛɛ akɛ, “Miyi ni ajieɔ lɛ woɔ mi hewalɛ koni mamia mihiɛ ni maha bɔ ni mitsuɔ misɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ he nii mihaa lɛ aya hiɛ.”
Akɛni amɛle akɛ amɛgbeko amɛnitsumɔ lɛ naa kwraa hewɔ lɛ, amrɔ nɔŋŋ ni amɛkɛ amɛhe wo nitsumɔ mli, ni amɛto kpee wulu he gbɛjianɔ kɛha nakai afi lɛ yɛ September 1919.
9 Beni gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi komɛi epɛi amɛshihilɛi amli jogbaŋŋ amɛkwɛ sɛɛ lɛ, amɛna akɛ ehe ehiaaa ni amɛyi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ kɛ amɛbe fɛɛ atsu nii.
4 Biblia kasemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ efee nɔ ni mɔɔ shi jogbaŋŋ yɛ mɛi akpekpei abɔ ni ayeɔ abuaa amɛ koni amɛbatsɔmɔ Yesu Kristo anɔkwa kaselɔi lɛ mli.
(Daniel 8:3, 4, 20-22; Kpojiemɔ 13:1, 2, 7, 8) Je nɛŋ jarayelɔi kɛ adebɔɔ he nilelɔi ená nii waa, ejaakɛ amɛkɛ nɔyelɔi ní feɔ amɛnii tamɔ kooloi lɛ efee ekome ni amɛfee tawuu nibii ní kpataa nii ahiɛ waa.
Shi, etsɛɛɛ kɛkɛ ni henyɛlɔi ha akpa nitsumɔ lɛ.
Ani onáa he miishɛɛ akɛ onukpai akuu lɛ feɔ ekome kɛtsuɔ nii akɛ kuu kome?
Beni Paulo wo enanemɛi heyelilɔi ni yɔɔ Roma lɛ ŋaa koni amɛhiɛ atsɛ̃ kɛjɛ wɔ mli lɛ, ewo amɛ hewalɛ koni ‘amɛjie duŋ mli nitsumɔi lɛ amɛshwie’ ni ‘amɛwo Nuntsɔ Yesu Kristo.’
Eyɛ mli akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ miye nɔ ni fe afii 70 moŋ, shi minyɛɔ mitsuɔ nii gbi muu fɛɛ yɛ nihoomɔhe lɛ kɛ niyeli tsũ lɛ mli.
Dɛŋdade titri ni fata amɛ sanekpakpa shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ he ji Buu-Mɔɔ wolo tɛtrɛɛ lɛ.
Ekolɛ akpaa amɛ gbɛ akɛ amɛkɛ amɛhe aaawo nifeemɔi komɛi amli yɛ nitsumɔ kpamɔ sɛɛ aloo yɛ hejɔɔmɔ gbii komɛi anɔ.
Shi amɛheloonaa nitsumɔ lɛ kɛ shĩa kwramɔ haaa amɛná be tsɔ kɛya shiɛmɔ.
Mina akɛ mɛi ni teɔ shi shiɔ wɔnitsumɔ lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo nuuu wɔnitsumɔ lɛ kɛ sane ni wɔhiɛ lɛ shishi kwraa.
Tertullian wolo ni ale fe fɛɛ ji Apology, ni akpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ eji Kristojamɔ folo hefamɔi awolo ni yɔɔ hewalɛ waa lɛ ateŋ ekome.
10 Wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsu nii jogbaŋŋ kɛmɔ shi, kɛ́ wɔkɛ sɛɛyoomɔ tsu nii be mli ni wɔtsuɔ shia kɛ shia nitsumɔ lɛ.
Beni eku ekuɛ ekwɛ afii 25 ni ekɛsɔmɔ yɛ be fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mibɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ mawo mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ hewalɛ kɛtsɔ amɛ ni mikɛyaa shiɛmɔ, saramɔ ni miyasaraa amɛ, nine ni mifɔ̃ɔ amɛ kɛbaa mishĩa kɛha niyeli, kɛ okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ ni tswaa mɔ emaa shi yɛ mumɔŋ ni mitoɔ he gbɛjianɔ lɛ nɔ.
Atsĩ Maŋtsɛyeli jajelɔi “asafo” lɛ kɛ amɛ nitsumɔ ni ji “sanekpakpa” lɛ shiɛmɔ lɛ naa yɛ nɔ ni miihe ashɛ Britania Nɔyeli Maji lɛ fɛɛ mli.
12 Nyɛsɛɛ afi lɛ April mli lɛ nyɛmi yoo ko ni kɛ ehe wo shia kɛ shia shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ kɛ woji tɛtrɛbii lɛ eko ha oblanyo ko yɛ gbɛjegbɛ lɛ nɔ.
17 Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ lɛ najiaŋdamɔlɔ ni ji Nɔyeli Kuu lɛ tsɔɔ bɔ ni esa akɛ atsu Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ aha yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ fɛɛ, ni amɛtoɔ enɛ he gbɛjianɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ nyɛmimɛi hii enumɔ nyiɛ nɔ akɛ amɛmiikwɛ he ni nanegbɛ bibioo nɛɛ yaa, ni amɛja nyɛmimɛi yei lɛ kɛ gbekɛbii lɛ ni amɛtsu nii yɛ akrowa lɛ mli.
(Abɛi 22:29) Beni akɛ nyɔji enumɔ etsɔse nikaselɔi lɛ agbe naa lɛ, awaje amɛ jogbaŋŋ ni amɛyadamɔ Maŋtsɛmɛi ni fe fɛɛ, Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Kristo Yesu najiaŋ.
Shiɛlɔ fɛɛ shiɛlɔ ni baaná dɔlai enumɔ eha lɛ, mikɛ dɔlai nyɔŋma baafata he ni akɛha!”
Sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ nɔkwɛlɔ lɛ loo onukpa kroko ni he esa atsɔɔ otii titrii enumɔ komɛi ni haa mɔ ko nitsɔɔmɔ mɔ̃ɔ shi jogbaŋŋ, taakɛ atsɔɔ yɛ kuku 5-18 ni yɔɔ January 15, 2008, Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ baafa 9-12 lɛ mli lɛ, ní ewie he kuku.
13 No hewɔ lɛ, amɛbua barle* blodoi enumɔ lɛ ni mɛi lɛ ye lɛ akukuji ni shwɛ lɛ anaa amɛwo kɛntɛŋi 12 obɔbɔ.
Kuu lɛ mlibii enumɔ gboi.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 1:8) Kɛjɛ mɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ ayifalɛ ni miihe ashɛ akpei enumɔ yɛ afi 1914 lɛ nɔ lɛ, yifalɛ ni jieɔ Nyɔŋmɔ yi lɛ etee hiɛ kɛyashɛ nɔ ni fa fe akpekpei ekpaa ŋmɛnɛ, ni amɛteŋ mɛi babaoo ji “asafo babaoo” lɛ mlibii.
Kristofoi aaashɛ akpekpei enumɔ miiye odase kɛmiiha ŋwɛi maŋtsɛyeli lɛ, yɛ be mli ni amɛkɛ ŋmɛlɛtswai ni fa fe akpekpei akpe tsuɔ nii yɛ afi mli ni amɛkɛ yiwalaheremɔ shɛɛ sane lɛ yahaa mɛi krokomɛi lɛ.
Nɔ ni abaafɔ feemɔ ji akɛ, akɛ minitii enumɔ baatsu adafitswai ahe nii.
Ŋmɔ ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ ‘egba futaa’ aahu akɛ, yɛ nyɔji enumɔ pɛ sɛɛ lɛ, weku nɛɛ miifee Biblia mli nikasemɔi 30.
Mɛi enumɔ nɛɛ pɛ yɔɔ ní amɛfee klalo beni ayemforo wu lɛ bashɛ shi lɛ.
Mi kɛ minyɛmimɛi yei enumɔ lɛ náa miishɛɛ waa beni wɔji gbekɛbii.
Yɛ afii enumɔ ni eho lɛ pɛ mli lɛ, mɛi ni miihe ashɛ akpekpei 1.7 jɔɔ amɛwala nɔ amɛha Yehowa.
Nɔ ni fe afii nyɔŋmai enumɔ eho, ni nakai hiamɔ nii lɛ bako mli lolo.
Mibɔi yaafo, ejaakɛ no mli lɛ miye afii enumɔ pɛ.
Nyɛmi nuu ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Michel kɛ eŋa Marie-Agnès ni amɛjɛ France, ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛye aaafee afii 58 lɛ fã kɛtee Benin aaafee afii enumɔ ni eho nɛ.
Yehowa Odasefoi ja wolo bibioo nɛɛ ekomekomei fe akpekpei enumɔ, yɛ nyɔji fioo pɛ mli, yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ fɛɛ nɔ.
Yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ saramɔi enumɔ lɛ mli lɛ, yoo lɛ náaa dekã yɛ nibii krokomɛi ahewɔ.
Nyɛhaa wɔsusua yiŋtoi enumɔ ahewɔ ni esa akɛ wɔfee nakai lɛ ahe wɔkwɛa.
Beni eshwɛ fioo ni je baana lɛ, hii enumɔ ni kɛ tui ewula amɛhe ba wɔtsũ shwiili lɛ he ni amɛbaŋɔ mi, Awo, kɛ minyɛmi yoo lɛ nom.
Nɔ ni fe afii ohai enumɔ sɛɛ lɛ, Yuda Maŋtsɛ Yehoshafat to lumɛi lɛ kɛ Levibii lɛ ahe gbɛjianɔ yɛ tafaa ko mli koni esaa etswa Yehowa jamɔ krɔŋŋ ema shi ekoŋŋ.
16 Be ni Filistibii lɛ anɔyelɔi enumɔ lɛ na lɛ, amɛku amɛsɛɛ kɛtee Ekron nakai gbi lɛ.
21:8—Te aaafee tɛŋŋ anyɛ awie akɛ Saul biyoo Mikal ná bihii enumɔ beaŋ beni 2 Samuel 6:23 wieɔ akɛ enáaa bi aahu kɛyashi egbo hu?
Nɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ Jamɔ Mli Shishijee Otii Enumɔ, ni atsɔɔ faŋŋ yɛ 1895 mli lɛ ji “(1) bɔ ni Ŋmalɛ jɛ mumɔ mli kɛmɔ shi ni tɔmɔ ko kwraa bɛ mli; (2) nyɔŋmɔ ni Yesu Kristo ji; (3) obalayoo fro ni fɔ Kristo; (4) bɔ ni akɛ Kristo to wɔ najiaŋ akɛ kpatamɔ nɔ yɛ sɛŋmɔtso lɛ nɔ; (5) Kristo gbohiiashitee yɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ kɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ eshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ baa ni ji enyɔ yɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ lɛ.”—Studi di teologia (Nyɔŋmɔ Jamɔ Mli Nikasemɔi).
Yɛ nɔ ni shɛɛɛ afii enumɔ yɛ be mli ni Rehabeam baye maŋtsɛ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Mizraim maŋtsɛ lɛ ba koni ekɛ Yerusalem abawu ta.
Yesu wie yɛ faŋŋ mli akɛ: “Mɔ ko nyɛŋ aba miŋɔɔ, akɛ ja tsɛ lɛ ni tsu mi lɛ gbala lɛ dã.”
Yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, esa akɛ Timoteo ‘awie atsɔɔ onukpa akɛ tsɛ’ kɛ ‘yei onukpai hu akɛ nyɛmɛi.’
Yehowa, wɔ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi shɔŋŋ,
‘Sanejajemɔ akɛ, Tsɛ lɛ, kɛ Bi lɛ, kɛ Mumɔ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yeɔ egbɔ lɛ bɛ Biblia lɛ mli,’ [taakɛ Protestant Nyɔŋmɔjamɔ he nilelɔ, Karl Barth kɛɛ lɛ].”
(Yohane 1:29; 18:37) Akɛni Yesu jieɔ sui ni e-Tsɛ yɔɔ lɛ akpo jogbaŋŋ hewɔ lɛ, ená he miishɛɛ ákɛ eeefee nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ efee lɛ.
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ, ‘Tsɛ lɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ kɛ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ haa mɛi ni biɔ lɛ lɛ.’
Enɛ baaha wekukpãa gbagbalii ní haa mɔ mii shɛɔ ehe abakã wɔ kɛ wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ teŋ.
Beni Yesu sɔmɔɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, etsɔɔ mɛi nibii ni e-Tsɛ lɛ etsɔɔ lɛ lɛ, ni ejie sui ni e-Tsɛ lɛ kɛtsɔse lɛ lɛ akpo yɛ enifeemɔi amli.
Yɛ afii etɛ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli lɛ, efã efɔlɔi lɛ kɛtee shia ni sa mli, ni kɛtsɔ nanemɛi Kristofoi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ ayelikɛbuamɔ nɔ lɛ, esaa shihilɛhe lɛ bɔ ni baahi aha etsɛ hiamɔ nii krɛdɛɛi lɛ.
Yɛ naagbee gbii ni jaraa nɛɛ amli lɛ, tsɛmɛi pii ‘edɔɔɔ amɛbii ahe.’
Oblayoo nɛɛ he yɛ fɛo waa, ni be ni epapa kɛ emami gboi lɛ, Mordekai ŋɔ lɛ akɛ ebiyoo.
“Nyɛtsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ lɛɔ amɛ”
Saneyelihe fioo ni tsɔ hiɛ eye sane lɛ kɛ tsɛ lɛ kpã gbee, ni ekɛ gbekɛ lɛ kwɛmɔ wo tsɛ lɛ dɛŋ.
Egba Nyɔŋmɔ Bi lɛ naa akɛ kɛ́ abu lɛ fɔ akɛ eji musubɔlɔ lɛ, ebaanyɛ eha agbe e-Tsɛ lɛ he guɔ.
Mɛni esa akɛ mɛi fɛɛ ni leee akɛ Adam kɛ esha etsɛŋe amɛ lɛ ayɔse yɛ Tsɛ lɛ he?
Kaaja amɛ, ni kaasɔmɔ amɛ hu; ejaakɛ mi, Yehowa, O-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, miji Nyɔŋmɔ awuŋayelɔ ni woɔ tsɛmɛi atɔmɔi anyɔmɔ kɛtsɔɔ bii anɔ kɛyashiɔ yinɔbii ni ji etɛ kɛ yinɔbii ni ji ejwɛ ni nyɛɔ mi lɛ anɔ; ni minaa mɛi akpei abɔ ni sumɔɔ mi ni amɛyeɔ mikitai lɛ anɔ lɛ amɔbɔ.” —2 Mose 20: 4-6.
Esaaa akɛ wɔsusuɔ wɔyiŋ yɛ enɛ he, ejaakɛ Yesu wie faŋŋ akɛ: “Jeee mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni kɛɔ mi akɛ: Nuntsɔ, Nuntsɔ!
Ataa, Awo, kɛ wɔnyɛmimɛi etɛ lɛ gboi yɛ kɔɔyɔɔ ni ebɔɔ yɔɔ mli ni ji gas ni gbeɔ mɔ lɛ mli.
Ni amɛaafee enɛɛmɛi, ejaakɛ amɛleee tsɛ lɛ loo mi hu.”
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, Yesu kɛ e-Tsɛ fɛɛ ná yijiemɔ ni gbekɛbii lɛ kɛhaa lɛ he miishɛɛ.
Buu-Mɔɔ nɛɛ wieɔ nɔ ni Yesu kɛ e-Tsɛ lɛ ehã wɔle yɛ bɔ ni ŋwɛi yɔɔ hã lɛ he.
13 Akɛni wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ “anɔkwale fá pii” hewɔ lɛ, wɔtaoɔ koni ‘wɔkɛ wɔhe atsɔɔ akɛ esɔɔlɔi kɛtsɔ anɔkwa wiemɔ nɔ.’
Be ni Yesu muɔ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ nɛɛ naa lɛ, etsɔɔ bɔ ni tsɛ lɛ wie etsɔɔ ebinukpa lɛ ehã, ni ekɛɛ: “Mibi, bo lɛ, okɛ mi yɔɔ daa nɛɛ, ni nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni miyɔɔ lɛ onɔ ni.
Bɔni afee ni ana srɔtofeemɔ ni yɔɔ Biblia lɛ mli anɔkwa nilee ni aaaná kɛ nilee fioo ni ayɔɔ yɛ nɔ ni ekɛɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ha wɔsusu nɔ ni afɔɔ lɛ tsɛmɔ akɛ Wɔtsɛ ni Yɔɔ Ŋwɛi lɛ, loo Nuntsɔ lɛ Sɔlemɔ lɛ, ni aŋma yɛ Mateo 6:9-13 lɛ he wɔkwɛ.
Yɛ afii abɔ komɛi asɛɛ lɛ, bihii krokomɛi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome ŋɔ tsɛ lɛ kɛtee eshia ni eyakwɛ lɛ kɛyashi egbo.
+ 8 Enyɛmimɛi lɛ kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Ani obaafee ohe maŋtsɛ yɛ wɔnɔ, ní oye wɔnɔ?”
Beni Nyɛminuu Perla kɛ nikasemɔ lɛ toɔ klas lɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: ‘Nyɛnine eshɛ nitsumɔ hee nɔ, ni ji akɛ nyɛbatsɔmɔ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi, ni ehe miihia ni nyɛfee ekãa ni nyɛhe awa.’
Nyɛmimɛi lɛ ŋɔ heyeli ni amɛná nɛɛ ni amɛkɛ amɛhe wo Maŋtsɛyeli nitsumɔ lɛ mli kɛ ekãa.
Asha ŋmalɛi ni Nyɛminuu Young tsɛ yisɛɛ yɛ e-maŋshiɛmɔ lɛ mli lɛ yɛ mama ni akɛjieɔ sini nɔ
Te esa akɛ wɔbu nitsumɔi ni akɛwo wɔdɛŋ akɛ wɔshiɛ ní wɔtswa wɔnyɛmimɛi lɛ wɔma shi lɛ wɔha tɛŋŋ?
13 Ebiɔ ni nyɛmimɛi ni ahãa amɛyasɔmɔɔ yɛ nitsumɔhe niji ni yɔɔ maji krokomɛi anɔ lɛ afee tsakemɔi babaoo.
Nyɛmimɛi hii nɛɛ fata “mɛi ni nyiɛɔ hiɛ” ní esa akɛ wɔbo amɛ toi ni wɔba wɔhe shi wɔhã amɛ lɛ ahe.
Amɛteŋ mɔ kome kaiɔ akɛ yɛ be mli amɛklas tsɔsemɔ lɛ yaa nɔ lɛ, Nyɛminuu Knorr wie akɛ: “Nyɛbaakase nii pii yɛ Gilead.
Asafoŋ onukpa lɛ bi lɛ ni esusu dɔlɛ ni Yehowa baanu he beni ebii ni ji ŋwɛi bɔfoi lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi tse atua lɛ he.
Mikai kɔkɔbɔɔ ni Nyɛminuu Knorr kɛha lɛ akɛ: “Misumɔɔɔ ni mɔ ko mɔ ko ‘akpã ebɛlɛ lɛ’!”
Yehowa hiɛ kpako suɔmɔ ni nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ Romania lɛ ejie lɛ kpo yɛ egbɛi lɛ hewɔ lɛ hu nɔ.
7 Nakai gbi lɛ ji klɛŋklɛŋ be ni David fo shidaa lala ehã Yehowa koni Asaf+ kɛ enyɛmimɛi hii* lɛ alá; no nɛ:
Josef Barth, ni ji nuu ko ni yɔɔ gbɛfãa nitsumɔ lɛ mli niiashikpamɔ lɛ kɛ ŋaawoo nɛɛ ha mi: “Kɛ oosumɔ ni oye omanye yɛ onitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ no lɛ, okɛ nyɛmimɛi lɛ afee onyɛmimɛi.”
(Yoshua 22:26, 27, NW) Najiaŋdamɔlɔi lɛ ku amɛsɛɛ kɛtee shia kɛ miishɛɛ, ejaakɛ tɔmɔ ko bɛ amɛ nyɛmimɛi lɛ ahe.
Bɔfo Paulo kɛɛ akɛ: “Anyɛmimɛi, nyɛkwɛa akɛ nyɛtsɛmɔ lɛ, jeee heloo gbɛfaŋ nilelɔi pii, jeee hewalɔi pii, jeee abladei pii, shi moŋ je nɛŋ kwashiai anii lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hala, koni ekɛwo nilelɔi lɛ ahiɛgbele; ni je nɛŋ gbɔjɔmɔ nii lɛ hu Nyɔŋmɔ hala, koni ekɛwo nii ni he wa lɛ ahiɛgbele; ni je nɛŋ nii ni abuuu kɛ nii ni agbe he guɔ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hala, kɛ nibii ni jeee nɔ ko nɔ ko lɛ tete, koni eha nibii ni ji nɔ ko lɛ afee yaka; beni afee ni heloo ko heloo ko akashwã yɛ ehiɛ.”—1 Korintobii 1:26-29.
6 Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ, suɔmɔ ni nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ jie lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ bo lɛ ji nɔ ni ye ebua bo ni hã okɛ ohe badɔmɔ Yehowa kɛ esafo lɛ.
Beni ewieɔ saneyitso ni ji “Ja Oyɛ Hemɔkɛyeli, Kɛ́ Jeee Nakai lɛ, Osɛɛ Etsɛŋ” lɛ he lɛ, Nyɛminuu Noumair gbala jwɛŋmɔ kɛtee Yuda Maŋtsɛ Ahaz nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ nɔ.
Nyɛminuu ko niiashikpamɔ tsɔɔ bɔ ni nɛkɛ tsakemɔ nɛɛ etee nɔ oyayaayai eha lɛ mli pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Edombii lɛ ji Abraham seshibii ni jɛ Yakob nyɛmi nuu Esau ni afɔ́ ekɛ lɛ haaji lɛ mli.
Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, okɛ onyɛmi lɛ ayasaa, ni oku osɛɛ oba, ni okɛ onɔkeenɔ lɛ abahã.” —Mateo 5:23, 24.
Klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa ni shiɛlɔi babaoo kaneɔ wɔnyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ Ukraine lɛ anitsumɔ lɛ he sane nɛ.
Kaimɔ Yesu wiemɔi lɛ akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ, kɛji okɛ onɔkeenɔ lɛ baaŋmɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ nɔ, ni okai yɛ jɛi akɛ onyɛmi kɛo teŋ yɛ sane ko lɛ, shi onɔkeenɔ lɛ yɛ jɛi yɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ hiɛ, ni oya okɛ onyɛmi lɛ ayakpata dã, koni oba ni okɛ onɔkeenɔ lɛ abaha.”—Mateo 5:23, 24; 1 Petro 4:8.
(Kolosebii 2:5; 1 Tesalonikabii 3:7 8; 2 Petro 1:12) Nakai nɔŋŋ nyɛkahaa wɔgbalaa wɔjwɛŋmɔ kɛyaa wɔnyɛmimɛi lɛ agbɔjɔmɔi anɔ, shi moŋ amɛsui kpakpai lɛ kɛ ta ni amɛwuɔ yɛ omanyeyeli mli koni amɛkã he amɛfĩ shi shiŋŋ ni amɛkɛ woo aha Yehowa lɛ nɔ.
Yudafoi kɛ Arab Kristofoi nyɛmimɛi
Shi, nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei lɛ ekomɛi woɔ “atadei ni kɔla kɛ niji bɛ he, atadei ni akɛ mamai ni mli titii ni hiɛ yɔɔ muji ekpɛ, nikai kukuji, kɛ . . . atadei ni eba nɔ ehee ni esaaa Nyɔŋmɔ webii yɛ be mli ni amɛyɔɔ amɛ wɔɔhei loo niyeli hei lɛ.”
(Mateo 26:28, NW) Yesu kɛ wein ni yɔɔ kpulu lɛ mli lɛ miitsu nii kɛmiidamɔ shi kɛha lɛ diɛŋtsɛ elá lɛ aloo ákɛ elá lɛ he okadi.
Mɛni baaba Yerusalem nɔ kɛ́ enu Yehowa mlifu kpulu lɛ?
7 Paulo wie yɛ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ Gbɛkɛnaashi Niyenii lɛ he akɛ: “Shii abɔ ni nyɛyeɔ nɛkɛ aboloo nɛɛ ni nyɛnuɔ nɛkɛ kpulu nɛɛ hu lɛ, nyɛmiijaje Nuŋtsɔ lɛ gbele lɛ nyɛmiitsɔɔ kɛyashi beyinɔ ni eeeba.”
Nyɛnyɛŋ Nuŋtsɔ Yehowa kpulu lɛ kɛ daimonioi akpulu lɛ nyɛnu shikome; nyɛnyɛŋ ‘Nuŋtsɔ Yehowa okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ nii’ kɛ daimonioi anɔ lɛ nɔ nii nyɛye shikome.
Nifeemɔi ni akɛtsu he nii amrɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ ateŋ ekomɛi ji akɛ ahaŋ odasefonyo ashɔ Biblia lɛ naa yɛ saneyelihe kɛ agbɛnɛ hu gu ni agu kɔɔpoo kome ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ kɛaanu nu yɛ skul srɔtoi lɛ kɛ oketekei amaamɔhei lɛ.
78 Gbi ni ji 12 lɛ nɔ lɛ, Naftalibii lɛ awekunukpa Ahira,+ Enan binuu lɛ, 79 kɛ efɔle ni ji kã kome ni akɛ jwiɛtɛi fee ni tsiimɔ ji shekeli 130, kɛ tsɛnsi kome ni akɛ jwiɛtɛi fee ni tsiimɔ ji shekeli 70 yɛ shekel ni akɛtsuɔ nii yɛ he krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ naa+ lɛ bahã, ni nibii enyɔ nɛɛ fɛɛ eyimɔ obɔbɔ kɛ ashikishaŋ kpakpa ni akɛ mu efutu ní akɛbaashã ŋmaa afɔle;+ 80 kɔɔpoo kome ni akɛ shika tsuru fee ni tsiimɔ ji shekeli 10, ní tsofa-kɛ-ŋma eyi lɛ obɔ; 81 tsinanuu* kome kɛ gwantɛŋnuu kome kɛ gwantɛŋbi ni ji nuu ni náko fe afi, ní akɛbaashã shãa afɔle;+ 82 abotianuu* kome, ní akɛbaashã esha afɔle;+ 83 tsinai enyɔ kɛ gwantɛŋhii enumɔ kɛ abotiahii enumɔ kɛ gwantɛŋbii enumɔ ni ji hii ni eko fɛɛ eko ená afi, ní akɛbaashã naanyobɔɔ afɔle.
+ 39 Ni etee hiɛ fioo, ni ekɛ ehiɛ bu shi, ni esɔle ekɛɛ:+ “Mi-Tsɛ, kɛ́ aaahi lɛ, hã kɔɔpoo nɛɛ+ aho mihe aya.
7 No mli lɛ, Babilon ji shika tsuru kɔɔpoo yɛ Yehowa dɛŋ;
+ Amrɔ nɛɛ wɔtsɔmɔ minuŋtsɔ nyɔji, wɔ kɛ mɔ dɛŋ ní ana kɔɔpoo lɛ yɛ lɛ fɛɛ!”
Beni amɛboteɔ shia lɛ mli lɛ, mibi amɛ akɛ, “Ani ebaagba nyɛnaa kɛji migbe tii ni minuɔ lɛ naa dani nyɛkwɛ minibii lɛ amli?”
Yɛ amale jamɔ tsɔɔmɔi ahe.
7 Be ni aaba abamɔ Yesu ni ayagbe lɛ lɛ, esɔle ekpa e-Tsɛ lɛ fai akɛ: “Aba, Ataa, onyɛɔ nii fɛɛ ofeɔ; jiemɔ kpulu nɛɛ kɛje minɔ.
(b) Yɛ Yerusalem sɛɛ lɛ, namɔ baafee mɔ ni baanyiɛ sɛɛ ní baanu Yehowa mlifu kpulu lɛ?
26:27, 28) Wein tsuru ji nɔ ni yɔɔ kpulu ni Yesu wó lɛ mli.
Yosef fã etsuji lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome koni ekɛ niyenii awo enyɛmimɛi hii lɛ akotokui lɛ amli, ní efimɔ amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ shika efɔ̃ nɔ yɛ ekotoku lɛ mli, ní ekɛ Yosef jwiɛtɛi kpulu lɛ afɔ̃ nɔ yɛ Benyamin kotoku lɛ mli.
Wɔfee bɔ ni ekɛɛ lɛ, ni beni wɔnuɔ kɔfe lɛ mishiɛ mitsɔɔ lɛ.
(nwtsty lɛ mli sane ni kɔɔ Mat 26:39 lɛ he: “hã kɔɔpoo nɛɛ aho mihe aya”)
Yɛ afi 1947 mli lɛ, beni misɔmɔ asafo ko ni yɔɔ Mwanza akrowa lɛ mli lɛ migbe naa nɔŋŋ pɛ kɛkɛ ni mibi he ni manyɛ maya koni miyahe tii yɛ manu.
Kɛkɛ ni ekɛfata he akɛ: “Miwoɔ misafoŋbii lɛ hewalɛ ni amɛhere nyɛ kɛba amɛshiai amli ni amɛha nyɛ kɔfe nyɛnu.
Nakai nɔŋŋ ewó kpulu lɛ hu yɛ niyenii lɛ asɛɛ.”
Nɔ ni yɔɔ mli ji wolo ni akɛjieɔ shika yɛ bank, (ni shika lɛ naa shɛɔ U.S. dɔla kome) kɛ wolo fioo ko ni ekɛ enine eŋma efata he, akɛ: “Kɛha tii kɔɔpoo kome aloo pɛtrol galɔn kome.”
Enɛ ji kpulu ni “ejwamaŋbɔɔ lɛ he mlifu daa” ni no nɔ etsɔ ni ekɛha jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ tɔrɔ daa lɛ yɔɔ mli lɛ.
Amɛ fɛɛ amɛkɛ kpulu kome pɛ nuɔ nii; mɔ ko mɔ ko bɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ esaatso, loo okpɔlɔ.”
44:5—Ani Yosef kɛ kpulu tsu nii ni ekɛkala lɛɛlɛŋ?
Eye lá yi sɔ̃, ni ehiɛ shika kpulu “ni eyi obɔ kɛ ejwamaŋbɔɔ lɛ mli nihii nii kɛ muji nii lɛ yɛ edɛŋ.”
Bɔfo lɛ tsɛ́ David wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Lala 32:1, 2 lɛ yisɛɛ ni eŋma akɛ: “Ajɔɔ mɛi ni aŋɔ amɛmlatɔmɔi lɛ afa amɛ, ni atsimɔ amɛhe eshai lɛ anɔ lɛ; ajɔɔ nuu ni Nuŋtsɔ [Yehowa] ebuuu ehe esha lɛ ehaaa lɛ lɛ.”
Ni no lɛ, wɔbaaná miishɛɛ ni lalatsɛ lɛ wie he lɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ, mɔ ni jaje akɛ: “Miishɛɛ ji mɔ ni ohala ni ohãa ebɛŋkɛɔ bo lɛ.”—Lala 65:4, NW.
Shi moŋ, eji mɔ ko ni naa mɔ he miishɛɛ, Mɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ni esusuɔ wɔ miishɛɛnamɔ he.
+ 7 Anɔkwa, owebii* lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ, ni otsuji ni damɔɔ ohiɛ be fɛɛ be ni amɛboɔ onilee* lɛ toi lɛ hu yɛ miishɛɛ!
Mɛni hewɔ mɛi pii naaa anɔkwa miishɛɛ lɛ, ni anɔkwa miishɛɛ kɛ mɛni yɛ tsakpaa?
Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, akɛni nihamɔ fata he hewɔ lɛ, eji shihilɛ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ni haa mɔ tsui nyɔɔ emli—shihilɛ kpakpa—ni taakɛ Yesu kɛɛ lɛ, “Nɔ hamɔ mli yɛ jɔɔmɔ fe hemɔ.”—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:35.
Ŋaawoo nɛɛ kɛ nitsumɔ haa mɔ náa miishɛɛ, ejaakɛ ‘ajɔɔ mɛi ni hiɛ yɔɔ amɛmumɔŋ hiamɔ nii anɔ lɛ.’—Mateo 5:3.
(Mateo 5:44, 45) Amɛnáa miishɛɛ kpele fe fɛɛ kɛjɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nifeemɔ, kɛ amɛsuɔmɔ mli ní amɛjɛɔ amɛkɛ amɛhe haa koni amɛha mɛi krokomɛi ale “Nyɔŋmɔ ni ajɔɔ lɛ lɛ anunyam sanekpakpa” lɛ nɔ.—1 Timoteo 1:11.
Okɛ ohe afɔ Yehowa nɔ, ejaakɛ enɛ kɛ miishɛɛ baa, taakɛ atsɔɔ yɛ Levinyo lɛ wiemɔi lɛ amli lɛ: “Yehowa Zebaot, ajɔɔ gbɔmɔ ni ŋɔɔ ehiɛ efɔɔ onɔ lɛ!”—Lala 84:13.
(Yeremia 31:12) Kɛkɛ lɛ, obaanyɛ okɛ yelikɛbuamɔ aha mɛi krokomɛi koni amɛná shihilɛ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ, shihilɛ ni yiŋtoo yɔɔ sɛɛ, ni bo diɛŋtsɛ hu obaaná miishɛɛ babaoo.
Taakɛ nibii kpawo ni haa anáa miishɛɛ ni Yesu tsĩ tã lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, namɛi náa anɔkwa miishɛɛ ŋmɛnɛ?
Hɛɛ, anyɛŋ ana anɔkwa miishɛɛ kɛtsɔ heloonaa nibii anaabuamɔ nɔ; ni asaŋ miishɛɛ baaa yɛ heloo ni egbee shi lɛ akɔnɔ nii ni adiɔ sɛɛ lɛ hewɔ.
Yehowa ji “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ” ni eesumɔ ni etsuji aná miishɛɛ.
4 Yɛ shihilɛi ni yaa nɔ efiteɔ yɛ nibii agbɛjianɔtoo nɛɛ mli lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ haŋ mɛi ni naa miishɛɛ babaoo yɛ mumɔŋ nihamɔ mli lɛ anine anyɛ shi kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Beni ewieɔ bɔ ni aaafee aná miishɛɛ he lɛ, eŋma akɛ: “Oshijayeli baanyɛ aha mɔ aná miishɛɛ, shi ejeee nɔ ko ni tsĩɔ mɔ miishɛɛnamɔ naa.
19 Yehowa ji “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ,” ni eesumɔ ni oná miishɛɛ.
Etsɔɔ mli yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ akɛ: “Ekolɛ maha loo mihaŋ oha mlijaa 10, shi miyɛ onia ni mitsuɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ, ni miyɛ nɔmimaa akɛ Yehowa hu yɛ he miishɛɛ.”
He fɛɛ he ni nikaselɔi lɛ baaya lɛ, amɛbaanyɛ amɛhiɛ amɛ anɔkwa miishɛɛ lɛ mli kɛtsɔ amɛhiŋmɛii ni amɛaaha ená miishɛɛ lɛ nɔ.

15 Miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ji Yehowa, ni miishɛɛ sane hu ji anɔkwale lɛ —nɔ ni haa adesai hiɛnɔkamɔ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ miishɛɛ babaoo yɛ suɔmɔ hemɔ mli moŋ, shi miishɛɛ ni fe no yɛ suɔmɔ ní aaaha, loo aaajie kpo atsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ mli.
Gbɔmɛi lɛ ná miishɛɛ waa, ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔná nɔmimaa akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hu ná miishɛɛ.—2 Mose 15:1, 20, 21.
Kɛ́ ofee nakai lɛ obaaná miishɛɛ, ejaakɛ Yesu wie akɛ: “Mɛi ni hiɛ yɔɔ amɛmumɔŋ hiamɔ nii anɔ lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ.”—Mateo 5:3, NW.
Yehowa ji “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ,” ni esumɔɔ ni etsuji aná miishɛɛ.

(b) Kunimyelɔ lɛ ni ta okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nyiɛmɔ lɛ baa naagbee yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Wɔhiɛ kpaŋ be mli ni datrɛfonyo lɛ kɛɛ wɔ akɛ wɔbiyoo lɛ miina amanehulu yɛ lá mli wala yibii ni ji lymphoblast ni efa fe nine, ni ji gbekɛbiiashi kansa henɔ ko ni náa hewalɛ yɛ lá wala yibii yɛji lɛ anɔ lɛ nɔ gbi ko gbi ko.

Taakɛ anyɛɔ ajaa lá lɛ mli plasma lɛ mli awoɔ fãi krokomɛi pii amli lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ anyɛɔ ajaraa lá lɛ mli fãi krokomɛi (ni ji red cells, white cell, platelets) lɛ hu mli ni ajieɔ fãi bibiibii kɛjɛɔ mli.

30 “Ni agbɛnɛ, kɛ́ miku misɛɛ kɛtee onyɔŋ, ni ji mitsɛ ŋɔɔ, ni gbekɛ lɛ fataaa wɔhe lɛ, akɛni esumɔɔ gbekɛ lɛ tamɔ bɔ ni esumɔɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ esusuma* hewɔ lɛ, 31 no lɛ, kɛ́ ena akɛ gbekɛ lɛ bɛ nɔŋŋ pɛ lɛ, ebaagbo, ni onyɔji baahã onyɔŋ, ni ji wɔtsɛ lɛ kɛ eyiteŋ waji akpeleke shi kɛya Gbonyobu* lɛ mli kɛ awerɛho.

□ Gbekɛ nuu ko ni eye afii 12, ni amɛyɔɔ ŋshɔkpɔ ko nɔ yɛ Pasifik anaigbɛ, he ni atsĩ Yehowa Odasefoi anitsumɔ naa yɛ lɛ, na akɛ nanemɛi fɔji sɔŋŋ ji mɛi ni ebɔle ehe kɛkpe yɛ skul lɛ.
17 Bo lɛ feemɔ gbekɛ nuu fioo Yesu he mfoniri okwɛ ni eekwɛ etsɛ, nuu ni ŋɔ lɛ fee ebi nɛɛ ni miitsu nii.
Be ni akɛ gbekɛ nuu lɛ yaa Yesu ŋɔɔ lɛ, daimonio lɛ too lɛ tswa shi ni ehã ablami ni naa wa sha lɛ.
Ni yɛ afi 1999 mra be mli lɛ, nihélɔi anine baanyɛ ashɛ wolo “ni kɔɔ suɔmɔ [ni] Gbekɛ Yesu kɛ egbee, Angel, jie kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛhe” kpoi abɔ nɔ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ no mli lɛ midako moŋ, shi mikpɛ miyiŋ akɛ makase Cambodian koni manyɛ magba miskulbii lɛ Yehowa he sane.
Mikome pɛ mitee shiɛmɔ ni miyashiɛ mitsɔɔ weku ko ni bihii enumɔ yɔɔ mli.
Be ko lɛ, ekɛɛ nikaselɔ ko akɛ: “Oblanyo ni okaseɔ nii waa, be ko baashɛ ni obaana akɛ anɔkwa Kristofoi fɛɛ ni le woloŋ lɛ baakpoo . . . jamɔŋ nilelɔi ní jeɔ ŋwane lɛ atsɔɔmɔi.”
Tsɛ ko kase Yehowa beni ejajeɔ ebinuu fioo ni eye afii ejwɛ lɛ.
Akɛni gbekɛbii lɛ nya enifeemɔ lɛ he waa hewɔ lɛ, amɛbɔi eyijiemɔ.
Ebinuu fioo lɛ bɛ hewalɛ kwraa, ni esa akɛ ehi emasɛi be fɛɛ be.
Bei pii lɛ, atsɔɔ gbekɛbii hii lɛ amɛtsɛmɛi aheloonaa nitsumɔi, tamɔ okwaayeli loo ninenaa nitsumɔ loo ŋaa nitsumɔ ko.
Gbekɛbii nɛɛ ateŋ mɔ kome ni eye afii enyɔ lɛ nyɛɛɛ ekɛ mɔ agba sane, ni wiemɔi enyɔoo ko pɛ jɛɔ enaa.
Yɛ Amerika Wuoyigbɛ maŋ ko mli yɛ afii komɛi ni ho lɛ, gbekɛ nuu ko ha wiemɔ ko yɛ Teokrase Sɔɔmɔ Skul lɛ mli yɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli.
* Ani obaasumɔ ni ofee Shikpɔŋ Kpakpa lɛ he mfoniri taakɛ gbekɛ ko ni hi shi yɛ nakai beaŋ lɛ na shikpɔŋ lɛ shikãmɔ lɛ?
No hewɔ lɛ, nibii babaoo yɛ shɛɛ sane ni Gabriel kɛyaha Maria lɛ mli fe binuu ko ni eeetsɔ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ efɔ́ lɛ.
No mli lɛ eji oblanyo fioo ni kwɛɔ tooi beni Samuel fɔ lɛ mu akɛ mɔ ko ni baaye maŋtsɛ wɔsɛɛ lɛ.
Ákɛ aaahiɛ gbekɛbii hii enumɔ ni darako, wu ni heee yeee, kɛ kilomitai 30 gbɛfãa kɛmiiya Maŋtsɛyeli Asa ni bɛŋkɛ lɛ ji nitsumɔ ko ni wa.
Kɛ mɔ ko yɛ subaŋi komɛi ni woɔ omli la lɛ, suɔmɔ baakai bo akɛ mɔ lɛ subaŋi ji nɔ ni osumɔɔɔ, shi jeee gbɔmɔ lɛ.
ANI okaiɔ be mli ní onine shɛ wolo nɔ kɛjɛ osuɔlɔ ko ní yɔɔ shɔŋŋ lɛ ŋɔɔ, nɔ ni ji naagbee nɔ̃?
Yɛ be mli ní eyaa nɔ ekaseɔ nii lɛ, esuɔmɔ kɛha Yehowa lɛ da, ni ena suɔmɔ ni mli wa akɛ eeegba ehe sane etsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi.
(1 Yohane 3:16; Yohane 15:13) Esa akɛ Yesu he-kɛ-afɔleshãa suɔmɔ lɛ akanya hiɛsɔɔ nɔkpɛlɛmɔ yɛ wɔmli.
Nakai nɔŋŋ hekɛnɔfɔɔ ni wɔyɔɔ yɛ Yehowa mli lɛ daa, kɛ wɔna bɔ ni ejɛɔ suɔmɔ mli ekwɛɔ wɔ lɛ he odaseyeli yɛ wɔshihilɛ mli.

No hewɔ lɛ, ehe miihia ni Biblia mli nikaselɔi lɛ aná suɔmɔ kɛ hiɛsɔɔ amɛhã Nyɔŋmɔ. —Ro 14:7, 8.
10 Ejaakɛ “mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ wala, ni eesumɔ ni eye gbii kpakpai pii lɛ, ebu elilɛi he kɛje efɔŋ he,+ kɛ enaabu hu, ni ekalaka mɛi.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, gbɔmɔ pɛ baanyɛ ajie Bɔlɔ lɛ sui akpo, mɔ ni wie lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe akɛ “Yehowa, Yehowa, Nyɔŋmɔ musuŋtsɔlɔ kɛ durolɔ ni toɔ tsui, ni mɔbɔnalɛ kɛ anɔkwale fa pii.”—2 Mose 34:6.
2:9) Kɛ́ wɔsumɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ, wɔkɛ amɛ baaye jogbaŋŋ ekɔɔɔ he eko skul abɔ ni amɛtee, amɛhewolonɔ su, loo mɛi ni amɛji.
(Yohane 17:20, 21) Nyɔŋmɔ jɛ esuɔmɔ mli etsu e-Bi lɛ koni ekɛ ewala abafɔ shi eha mɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ kɛ adesai ni feɔ toiboo lɛ aje lɛ.
Kɛfata he lɛ, nikasemɔi nɛɛ baaye abua wɔ ni wɔkase Yehowa koni wɔjie suɔmɔ kɛ mlihilɛ kpo, wɔhiɛ akã shi, ni wɔmii ashɛ wɔhe.
2:19-22) Nanemɛi nɛɛ anaanyobɔɔ lɛ bafee gbagbalii yɛ yiŋtoo titri ko hewɔ: Amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ yɛ suɔmɔ ni mli kwɔ kɛha Yehowa.
Mose jaje yɛ Israelbii lɛ akpɔmɔ kɛmiijɛ nyɔŋyeli mli yɛ Mizraim lɛ he akɛ: “Suɔmɔ Yehowa sumɔɔ nyɛ, ni eesumɔ akɛ eye kita ni ekã nyɛtsɛmɛi lɛ nɔ hewɔ ni Yehowa kɛ nineshiwalɛ jie nyɛ [nɛɛ].”—5 Mose 7:8.
Nɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni Yesu baanyɛ atsu—kɛha helatsɛmɛi, mɛi ni daimonioi haoɔ amɛ, ohiafoi, loo mɛi ni hɔmɔ yeɔ amɛ lɛ po ji—ni eye ebua amɛ ni amɛle, ni amɛkpɛlɛ, ni amɛsumɔ anɔkwale ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he lɛ nɔ.
Esa akɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baato jalɛ sane ema shi lɛ asumɔ jalɛ, ni ehi shi yɛ jalɛ naa.
Mɛi ni náa suɔmɔ ní tamɔ nɛkɛ amɛhaa Yehowa lɛ yɛ nɔmimaa akɛ amɛbaaná edɛŋ jɔɔmɔ.—Lala 5:8; 25:4, 5; 135:13; Hoshea 12:6.
Eyɛ mli akɛ obi fufɔo lɛ nuŋ wiemɔi lɛ ashishi moŋ, shi ogbee kɛ ŋɔɔmɔ ni haa ehe jɔɔ lɛ ni suɔmɔ yɔɔ mli lɛ he baaba sɛɛnamɔ aha lɛ.
Kɛ́ henii lɛ eko fɛɛ eko miitsu nii jogbaŋŋ lɛ, ehãa gbɔmɔtso lɛ daa, be mli ni gbɔmɔtso lɛ tswaa ehe emaa shi yɛ suɔmɔ mli lɛ.” —Efe.
Nɔ ni fe nakai lɛ, amɛfai shi ni amɛtswa koni amɛya nɔ amɛhi shi akɛ jeŋ muu fɛɛ Nɔyelɔ ni Fe Fɛɛ ni ji Yehowa anɔkwa sɔɔlɔi lɛ ji nɔ ni tee hiɛ waa akɛni amɛhere lala nɔ shii abɔ akɛ “ejaakɛ naanɔ emɔbɔnalɛ hiɔ shi kɛyaa” lɛ.—Lala 118:1-4, 29.
Nɔ kome ji akɛ, suɔmɔ ji nɔ ni kanyaa gbeyeishemɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ.
(Yesaia 45: 18) Nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, esa akɛ eye ebua wɔ koni wɔna nɔ̃ suɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ni eji, akɛni ehaaa wɔ wala kɛkɛ, shi moŋ ehaa wɔnáa nibii ni haa shihilɛ feɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ lɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ hu lɛ hewɔ.
Obaanyɛ oná enɛ kɛ́ oyɛ suɔmɔ diɛŋtsɛ kɛha Yehowa, ni okɛ nɔ ni gbohiiashitee hiɛnɔkamɔ lɛ tsɔɔ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ to otsui mli.
(Lala 119:105) Nyɛhaa wɔsusua nɔkwɛmɔnii komɛi ni kɔɔ oblahii kɛ oblayei ni sumɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, ni bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛhi shi akɛ mɛi ni he wa yɛ mumɔŋ yɛ miishɛɛnamɔ sɛɛdii kɛ heloonaa nibii asɛɛtiumɔ je nɛɛ mli lɛ ahe wɔkwɛa.
(Filipibii 2:15; Kpojiemɔ 7:9; Yohane 10:16) Mɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ “aaakpɛ́ tamɔ ŋulamii” kɛmɔ shi yɛ Kristo Afii Akpe Nɔyeli lɛ mli, be mli ni amɛbaafata Kristo he koni amɛha adesai ni feɔ toiboo lɛ aná kpɔmɔnɔ lɛ he sɛɛ kɛmɔ shi yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ.
Be ko beni duŋ ewo waa ni nyɔɔŋtsere bɛ lɛ, mikɔ́ mishwɛde ni migbe efeemɔ naa lɛ, ni mikɛje kpo klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa ni mikɛkwɛ ŋulamii lɛ kɛ shibɔlemɔ ŋulamii ni bɔleɔ wɔhulu lɛ he lɛ.
Kɛ hooo kwraa lɛ ŋulamii akpekpei toi akpei 100 ji nɔ ni yɔɔ wɔ Milky Way ŋulami kusha, ni wɔ hulu lɛ kɛ ŋulamii ni bɔleɔ lɛ lɛ ji emli nyɛkɛsiɔɔ ko lɛ mli.
ŊULAMII lɛ kɛ blema Israel Maŋtsɛ David wie yɛ mfonirifeemɔŋ gbɛ nɔ, gbi gbɛkɛ ko ni jeŋ ejɔ lɛ mli, ni no tsirɛ lɛ ni eŋma akɛ: “Ŋwɛi gbaa Mawu anunyam lɛ, ni atatu tsɔɔ eninenaa nitsumɔ lɛ.”
WƆHULU lɛ ji ŋulami ni da bɔ ni sa kɛkɛ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, Kojolɔi 5:20, 21 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Ajɛ ŋwɛi awu ta lɛ, ŋulamii tete je amɛgbɛhei ni amɛkɛ Sisera wu!
Ahum lɛ naa wa aahu akɛ anyɛɛɛ ana hulu lɛ yɛ hulutsoo be mli, ni anaaa ŋulamii lɛ nyɔɔŋ hu.
Ŋwɛibɔfo lɛ kɛɛ Daniel yɛ kuku 3 lɛ akɛ: “Mɛi ni le nii lɛ aaakpɛ́ tamɔ atatu kpɛmɔ, ni mɛi ni etsɔɔ mɛi pii agbɛ kɛtee jalɛ mli lɛ aaakpɛ́ tamɔ ŋulamii kɛaatee naanɔ.”
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, mɛi komɛi buɔ jamɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi, maŋkwralɔi, kɛ mɛi ni bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ yɛ akaŋshii kɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔ mli lɛ fe nine, ni amɛkɛ woo srɔto ko hãa amɛ, oookɛɛ jamɔ kwraa amɛtaoɔ amɛjá amɛ nɛɛ.
Ani ole akɛ ŋulamii lɛ fɛɛ yɛ gbɛii?
3: Namɛi Ji Nilelɔi, loo Magi, ní Ŋulami ko Nyiɛ Amɛhiɛ Kɛtee Yesu Ŋɔɔ Lɛ?
Biblia lɛ buɔ ashwãifeemɔi srɔtoi fɛɛ kɛ Babilonbii anifeemɔ ni ji mɔdɛŋ ni abɔɔ ni nine ashɛ adafitswaa nɔ kɛtsɔ ŋulamii anɔ lɛ fɔ yɛ gbɛ ni yɔɔ faŋŋ nɔ.—5 Mose 18:10-12; Yesaia 47:13.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, nuu ko ni ale lɛ waa akɛ efeɔ sini, ni sɛɛ mli lɛ ebatsɔ amralo lɛ wie akɛ: “Mi lɛ, mibaaa mihe shi, ni mibaŋ mihe shi kɔkɔɔkɔ.”

22 “Shi no gbii lɛ amli yɛ nɛkɛ amanehulu nɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, hulu hiɛ aaawo duŋ, ni nyɔŋtsere hu kpɛŋ, ni ŋwɛi ŋulamii lɛ aaatserɛ atswia shi, ni aaahoso hewalɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ.

Kɛ wɔɔkɛɛ nɔ ko kɛje shishi lɛ, Biblia lɛ kɛɔ wɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ bɔ “kanei” lɛ —hulu, nyɔɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii —ákɛ nibii ni kadiɔ be, koni “amɛtsɔɔ okadii kɛ bei kɛ gbii kɛ afii.”
Amɛ Katolik yiwalɔi kɛ gbɔmɔgbelɔi lɛ wooo Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Kristo hiɛ nyam, ni amɛgbe anɔkwa Kristojamɔ he guɔ yɛ be mli ni amɛwaa nakai mɛi akpei nyɔŋmai abɔ ni wie shi amɛ lɛ ayi ni amɛgbeɔ amɛ lɛ.

15 Gbii nyɔŋma lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, amɛhe fee fɛo ni amɛná hewalɛ* kwraa fe oblahii* lɛ fɛɛ ni yeɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ niyenii srɔtoi lɛ.
+ Amɛhi jɛmɛ aaafee afii nyɔŋma.
Amaniɛbɔɔ ko tsɔɔ akɛ: “Yɛ afii nyɔŋma ni gbɛjianɔtoo nɛɛ etsu nii lɛ mli lɛ, gboklɛfoi ní abaptisiɔ amɛ yɛ tsuŋwoohe lɛ mli ákɛ Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi lɛ ateŋ mɔ ko bɛ ni aŋmɛɛ ehe ni eku sɛɛ kɛba tsuŋwoohe lɛ mli ekoŋŋ—kɛ akɛmiito oha mlijaa 50-60 ní yɔɔ kui krokomɛi amli ni kuɔ amɛsɛɛ amɛbaa lɛ he lɛ.”
Gbɔmɛi ayifalɛ 100 mlijaa 10 yɛ gɔji ahe.
Akɛni be ni amɛkɛbaahi Greece faaa hewɔ lɛ, amɛto gbɛjianɔ kɛha nikasemɔi etɛ yɛ otsi mli, ni amɛgbe Obaanyɛ Ohi Shi wolo lɛ kasemɔ naa yɛ otsii nyɔŋma pɛ mli.
Mi kɛ minyɛmimɛi yei enyɔ—ni wɔji bii nyɔŋma lɛ ateŋ onukpai—lɛ yajieɔ wɔhiɛtserɛ yɛ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa jajelɔi lɛ ashĩa, he ni Daphne kɛ Rose yɔɔ lɛ.
Dani aaabaptisi lɛ tete lɛ, no mli lɛ eefee shia Biblia mli nikasemɔi nyɔŋma.
Taakɛ Scotland Glasgow Herald bɔ amaniɛ lɛ, gbekɛbii ni nako afii 12 ni kaa amɛhe gbee lɛ, bɔ he toi enyɔ yɛ be ni shɛɛɛ afii nyɔŋma mli.
Tenrikyo jamɔ lɛ tsɔɔ hemɔkɛyeli ni anáa yɛ bɔlɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ akɛ Tenri O no Mikoto lɛ mli, kɛ nyɔŋmɔi bibii lɛ hu amli hemɔkɛyeli.
Kɛbashi bianɛ lɛ, abaa gbɔmɛi nyɔŋma yi yɛ ŋshɔkpɔ lɛ nɔ kɛtsɔ le ni amɛbale anɔkwale lɛ, kɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ yiŋtoi lɛ ahe nii lɛ nɔ.
Amaniɛbɔɔ ni Yoshua kɛ Kaleb kɛba lɛ yɛ srɔto yɛ nɔ ni saralɔi krokomɛi nyɔŋma lɛ kɛba lɛ he yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Kɛjɛ afi 1990 kɛbaa lɛ, Asafo lɛ efee vidioi nyɔŋma yɛ wiemɔi 41 mli, ní maa Biblia mli saneyitsei srɔtoi babaoo nɔ mi, kɛfata vidioi krokomɛi ni afee aha mɛi ni kɛ Amerika Mumuii Awiemɔ tsuɔ nii lɛ ahe.
+ 7 Okadi ni jɛ Yehowa ŋɔɔ koni okɛna akɛ nɔ ni Yehowa ewie lɛ baaba mli lɛ nɛ:+ 8 Naa, mahã hulu lɛ hɔɔŋ lɛ ni miikpeleke shi yɛ Ahaz atrakpoi* lɛ anɔ lɛ aya sɛɛ nanefaamɔi nyɔŋma.”’”
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Beni miyeɔ afii nyɔŋma yɛ Betel lɛ, mina akɛ gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi pii eshi Betel yɛ hela loo hiamɔ ni ehia akɛ amɛyakwɛ amɛfɔlɔi ni miigbɔlɔ lɛ hewɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Hiram gbe nitsumɔi fɛɛ ni etsu ehã Maŋtsɛ Solomon kɛhã anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shĩa lɛ naa:+ 12 akulashiŋi enyɔ+ lɛ kɛ akekerei ni tamɔ tsɛnsii ni mamɔ akulashiŋi enyɔ lɛ anɔ lɛ; yaa he samai+ enyɔ ni yɔɔ akekerei enyɔ ni tamɔ tsɛnsii ni mamɔ akulashiŋi lɛ anɔ lɛ ahe lɛ; 13 pomegranet aduawai+ 400 ni yɔɔ yaa he samai enyɔ lɛ ahe, ni ji pomegranet aduawai ni eko kã eko nɔ yɛ yai lɛ eko fɛɛ eko he, yɛ akekerei enyɔ ni tamɔ tsɛnsii ni mamɔ akulashiŋi lɛ anɔ lɛ ahe lɛ;+ 14 nu shwiilii nyɔŋma lɛ, kɛ okpolui nyɔŋma ni hɔlɔ nu shwiilii lɛ amli lɛ;+ 15 Ŋshɔ lɛ kɛ tsinahii 12 ni yɔɔ Ŋshɔ lɛ shishi lɛ;+ 16 kɛ lamululoomɔnii lɛ, kɛ sofii lɛ, kɛ fakai lɛ,+ kɛ amɛhe nibii krokomɛi fɛɛ ni Hiram-abiv+ kɛ akɔɔble ni atsuu he fee ehã Maŋtsɛ Solomon kɛhã Yehowa shĩa lɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ gba fɔ̃ shi akɛ: “Nakai gbii lɛ amli lɛ aaaba mli akɛ hii nyɔŋma ni jɛ jeŋmaji anɔ wiemɔi srɔtoi fɛɛ mli aaamɔ Yudanyo kome atade naamuu mli, amɛaakɛɛ: Wɔkɛ nyɛ aaatee; ejaakɛ wɔnu akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ nyɛ yɛ!”
Wɔnaanaa “jata bi” nɔ yɛ wɔ najiashi yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
No lɛ Daniel niiashikpamɔ ni ená yɛ jatai abu lɛ mli ni wɔɔkai lɛ baawo wɔ hewalɛ!—Daniel 6:17-23.
Samson gbe jata yɛ Yehowa mumɔ lɛ naa (5-9)
12:8—Gad tabilɔi lɛ ‘ahiɛ tamɔ jatai ahiɛ’ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Yehowa baabu “Zion gɔŋ” lɛ he tamɔ “jata bi hũuɔ yɛ emilɛ̃loo he” lɛ.
Nɛkɛ maŋtsɛ nɛɛ ji mɔ ni fã akɛ ajie Daniel kɛjɛ jatai abu lɛ mli lɛ.
(2 Petro 3:13) Bo lɛ feemɔ tamɔ oofee gbalɛ nɛɛ mlibaa ni da waa lɛ he mfoniri yɛ ojwɛŋmɔ mli: “Klaŋ kɛ gwantɛŋbi aaahi shi, ni kootsɛ kɛ abotiabi aaabu shi; ni tsinabi kɛ jatabi kɛ kooloo ni ewo fɔ fɛɛ aaahi hekome, ni gbekɛ bibioo aaakpala amɛ.”
Bonsoi sɔrɔtoi, kɛ nu mli gbeei hu sɔrɔtoi, ofrotei, oshishibrishii, kɛ okropɔŋi ji wɔhefatalɔi, yɛ gɔji wuji fɛfɛji, ŋshɔ niji ni etse amɛhe, kɛ ekrokomɛi ni nɔ yɔɔ shweshweeshwe, ni tseneduru tsei kooi, kɛ tsei sɔrɔtoi krokomɛi, tamɔ Douglas fir yɔɔ nɔ, fata he.
(Abɛi 21:31) Baalabii lɛ yɛ nyanyɔji tamɔ jatai anyanyɔji; okpɔŋɔnɔtaralɔi lɛ okpɔŋɔi lɛ yitsei tamɔ jatai ayitsei.
Kɛ mɔ ko booo toi lɛ, no lɛ ashɛ lɛ afɔ̃ jatai abu lɛ mli.’
17 Ni bɔ ni mina okpɔŋɔi lɛ kɛ amɛnɔtaralɔi lɛ yɛ ninaa lɛ mli nɛ: Amɛwo damai ni hiɛ la kɛ hiakinto-bluu* kɛ wuɔfɔ kɔla, ni okpɔŋɔi lɛ ayitsei tamɔ jatai ayitsei,+ ni la kɛ lasu kɛ sɔlfa fãa kɛjɛɔ amɛdaaŋ.
Samson gbe jata kɛ edɛ̃ folo.
Ajie Daniel kɛjɛ jata bu lɛ mli.
Yɛ blema bei amli lɛ, jatai kɛ kooloi krokomɛi ni yeɔ milɛloo kɛ tooku lɛ woɔ oshara mli ni amɛmɔmɔɔ tooi komekomei lɛ.
(Yesaia 31:4) Ni kɛlɛ, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni jata lɛ hiɛ woɔ la ehaa kɛji eetutua wɔ tɛ̃ɛ po lɛ, wɔnaanaa enɔ yɛ mfonirifeemɔŋ kɛtsɔ toiboo ní wɔfeɔ wɔhaa Nyɔŋmɔ moŋ fe adesai kɛ gbɛjianɔtoi ní tamɔ jata lɛ nɔ.
Atsɔɔ enɛɛmɛi yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli akɛ nomɛi ji: suɔmɔ, ní akɛ gbɔmɔ hiɛ fee he mfoniri lɛ; jalɛsaneyeli, ní akɛ jata hiɛ fee he mfoniri lɛ; kɛ nilee, ní akɛ okropɔŋ hiɛ fee he mfoniri lɛ.
Abonsam tamɔ jata ni miihũu (8)
7 Matsɔ tamɔ jata* mawo amɛ,+
Namɔ kɛ Daniel wo biɛ kɛ jatai nɛɛ fɛɛ?
Odasefoi nɛɛ kɛ miishɛɛ gba bɔ ni ‘ajie amɛ kɛjɛ jata lɛ daaŋ’ lɛ amɛtsɔɔ, yɛ kpee lɛ shishi.—2 Timoteo 4:17.
+ Nyɛhenyɛlɔ, Abonsam lɛ, nyiɛ tamɔ jata ni miihũu, ni eetao mɔ ko emi.
Ni jatabii gbɛɔ shwãa.
Shi kɛlɛ, etsɛɛɛ ni Biblia mli anɔkwale ni ekaseɔ lɛ ha efee tsakemɔi ni sa kadimɔ waa, ni eha mɛi babaoo wie akɛ etamɔ jata ko ni miitsake kɛmiitsɔ gwantɛŋ bi!
Ahaa jatai kɛ kootsɛi, loo shuɔi kɛ oshishibirishi nɔɔ yɛ shwɛmɔi krokomɛi ni ehe gbɛi lɛ mli.
* 19 Be ni hulu lɛ te shi nɔŋŋ lɛ, maŋtsɛ lɛ te shi ni ejo foi kɛtee jatai abu lɛ naa.
2 Korintobii 13: 13 (14) kɛ etɛ lɛ fɛɛ baa yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ: “Nuŋtsɔ Yesu Kristo duromɔ lɛ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔ lɛ kɛ Mumɔ Krɔŋkrɔŋ naanyobɔɔ lɛ kɛ nyɛ fɛɛ ahi shi.”
15 Kristo kɛfata he akɛ: “Kunimyelɔ lɛ, maŋɔ lɛ mafee akulashiŋ yɛ mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ sɔlemɔtsu lɛ mli, . . . ni maŋma mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛi, kɛ mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ maŋ ni ji Yerusalem hee ni jɛɔ ŋwɛi kpelekeɔ shi kɛjɛɔ mi-Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ lɛ gbɛi, kɛ mi diɛŋtsɛ migbɛi hee lɛ, yɛ enɔ.”
+ 5 No hewɔ lɛ, mito miyiŋ akɛ mama shĩa mahã Yehowa, mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛ́i lɛ, tamɔ bɔ ni Yehowa wo mitsɛ David shi akɛ: ‘Obinuu ni mahã eta omaŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ nɔ yɛ osɛɛ lɛ, lɛ ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ ehã migbɛ́i lɛ.’
23 Yesu yaa nɔ ekɛɔ akɛ: “Ni maŋma mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛi kɛ mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ maŋ ni ji Yerusalem hee ni jɛɔ ŋwɛi kpelekeɔ shi kɛjɛɔ mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ŋɔɔ lɛ gbɛi, kɛ mi diɛŋtsɛ migbɛi hee lɛ yɛ enɔ.”
Yehowa wie yɛ gbalɛ ni yɔɔ Maleaki 1:11 lɛ mli akɛ: “Kɛjɛ hulu shitee mli kɛyashi eshinyɔɔ mli lɛ migbɛi lɛ da yɛ jeŋmaji lɛ ateŋ, . . . ni akɛ nikeenii ní he tse hu baa; ejaakɛ migbɛi lɛ da yɛ jeŋmaji lɛ ateŋ.”
+ 13 Kɛ́ miŋa ŋwɛii anaa ni nugbɔ enɛɛɛ, loo mifã agãi lɛ koni amɛbafite shikpɔŋ lɛ, loo mikɛ tsɛŋemɔ hela ni gbeɔ mɔ ba miwebii lɛ ateŋ, 14 ni miwebii ni migbɛ́i kã amɛnɔ+ lɛ ba amɛhe shi+ ni amɛsɔle ni amɛtao mihiɛ dromɔ ni amɛtsi amɛhe kɛje amɛgbɛi fɔji lɛ anɔ lɛ,+ no lɛ, majɛ ŋwɛii mabo amɛ toi ni mikɛ amɛhe eshai lɛ baake amɛ ni mahã amɛshikpɔŋ lɛ aba nii.
26 “No hewɔ lɛ, nyɛ Yudabii fɛɛ ni nyɛyɔɔ Ejipt shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛboa Yehowa wiemɔ lɛ toi: ‘“Naa, mikɛ mi diɛŋtsɛ migbɛ́i kpele lɛ ekã kitã,” Yehowa kɛɛ, “akɛ Yuda nuu ko Yuda nuu ko ni kɛɔ akɛ ‘Gbii abɔ ni Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa hiɛ kã nɛɛ!’ + kɛ migbɛ́i lɛ kãŋ kitã dɔŋŋ+ yɛ Ejipt shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ fɛɛ.
12 “Ŋmaa oyahã Pergamo asafo lɛ bɔfo lɛ akɛ: Nii ni mɔ ni hiɛ klante kakadaŋŋ ni ehiɛ kɛ esɛɛ fɛɛ naa ba waa lɛ kɛɛ nɛ:+ 13 ‘Mile he ni oyɔɔ lɛ, ni ji he ni Satan maŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ yɔɔ lɛ; shi okã he ohiɛ migbɛ́i lɛ mli kpɛŋŋ,+ ni okwaaa hemɔkɛyeli ni oyɔɔ yɛ mimli+ lɛ yɛ midasefonyo anɔkwafo Antipa gbii lɛ amli po,+ mɔ ni agbe lɛ+ yɛ nyɛmasɛi, yɛ he ni Satan yɔɔ lɛ.
+ 8 Sɛɛ mli lɛ, Daniel, mɔ ni akɛ minyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛ́i ewo lɛ+ ni atsɛɔ lɛ Belteshazar+ ni nyɔŋmɔi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ amumɔ yɔɔ emli+ lɛ badamɔ mihiɛ, ni migba lɛ lamɔ lɛ akɛ:
(Wɔma efã ko nɔ mi.) Yɛ nɔ ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi ni ji Yehowa lɛ he lɛ, 2 Mose 3:15 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Enɛ ji migbɛi kɛyaa naanɔ, ni enɛ ji mikaimɔ kɛyaa yinɔi fɛɛ.”
Nɔ ni aŋma afɔ̃ shi lɛ kɛfata he akɛ: “Shi beni yi yawula shi lɛ, Daniel, mɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ Belteshazar, taakɛ bɔ ni atsɛɔ minyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛi lɛ, mɔ ni nyɔŋmɔi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ amumɔ yɔɔ emli lɛ, ba mihiɛ, ni migba lamɔ lɛ yɛ ehiɛ.”
Migbɛ́i ji no; mikɛ minunyam lɛ hãaa mɔ kroko, ni mikɛ miyijiemɔ lɛ hu hãaa amagai.”
Enɛ kɛ nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ wie lɛ kpãa gbee akɛ: “Mi ji Yehowa, migbɛi ji no, ni mikɛ minunyam lɛ haŋ mɔ kroko, ni mikɛ miyijiemɔ lɛ hu haŋ amagai!”—Yes.
“Mahã amɛle mihewalɛ kɛ minyɛmɔ yɛ nɛkɛ be nɛɛ mli, ni amɛbaaná amɛle akɛ migbɛ́i ji Yehowa.” —Yeremia 16:21
7 Mahã ale migbɛ́i krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yɛ mimaŋ Israel teŋ, ni mihãŋ abule migbɛ́i krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ dɔŋŋ; ni jeŋmaji lɛ baaná ale akɛ miji Yehowa,+ Mɔ Krɔŋkrɔŋ ni yɔɔ Israel lɛ.’
“Amɛtaoɔ ni amɛkɛ amɛlamɔi ni amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ gbaa enaanyo lɛ aha mimaŋ lɛ hiɛ akpa migbɛi lɛ anɔ, taakɛ bɔ ni amɛtsɛmɛi lɛ ahiɛ kpa migbɛi lɛ anɔ yɛ Baal hewɔ lɛ.”
+ 27 Amɛmiitao amɛtsɔ lamɔi ni amɛgbaa amɛhe lɛ nɔ amɛhã mimaŋ lɛ hiɛ akpa migbɛ́i lɛ nɔ, tamɔ bɔ ni amɛtsɛmɛi lɛ ahiɛ kpa migbɛ́i lɛ nɔ yɛ Baal hewɔ lɛ.
+ 19 Shi kɛ́ nyɛje misɛɛ ni nyɛyeee mimlai lɛ, kɛ mikitãi ni mikɛshwie nyɛhiɛ lɛ anɔ, ni nyɛyasɔmɔ nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi ni nyɛkoto amɛ lɛ,+ 20 no lɛ, mafã Israel kɛje mishikpɔŋ ni mikɛhã amɛ lɛ nɔ,+ ni shĩa nɛɛ ni mifee lɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ mihã migbɛ́i lɛ, majie yɛ mihiɛ mashɛ mafɔ̃, ni mahã etsɔ nyaŋemɔ nii* kɛ nɔ ko ni ayeɔ he fɛo yɛ maji fɛɛ ateŋ.
Nɔ ni baanyɛ afata wiemɔ kuku ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi lɛ he ji (1) nɔ hewɔ ni ehe hiaa ni wɔle Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi lɛ, (2) nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi lɛ ji, kɛ (3) bɔ ni wɔɔfee wɔwo nakai gbɛi lɛ hiɛ nyam.
(1 Yohane 3:23, 24) Ehaa wɔnáa miishɛɛ akɛ Yehowa ejɛ mlihilɛ mli eha e-Bi lɛ “gbɛi ni ta gbɛi fɛɛ gbɛi nɔ, [ja Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi lɛ pɛ] koni mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ amli, ni lilɛi fɛɛ lilɛi agba mli kpoo akɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuŋtsɔ kɛwo [Tsɛ, NW] Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam.”—Filipibii 2:9-11.
(Yoshua 5:14) Beni Samson fɔlɔi bi koni ŋwɛibɔfo ko atsɔɔ egbɛi lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mɛɛba obiɔ migbɛi ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ lɛ?”
Atsɛɔ mi [tsɛ ogbɛi].
Kɛkɛ ni Elia kɛɛ: “Ni nyɛtsɛa nyɛ-nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛi, ni mi hu matsɛ Yehowa gbɛi: ni aaaba mli akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ, mɔ ni kɛ la aaahere nɔ lɛ, lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ!”
Kɛji Yehowa diɛŋtsɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Enɛ ji migbɛi kɛyaa naanɔ; ni enɛ ji gbɛi ni mɛi aaatsɛ kɛkai mi yɛ yinɔi fɛɛ ni baaba lɛ amli” lɛ, ani mɔ ko yɛ hegbɛ akɛ eeete ewo shi nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ lɛ?
Elia kɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛtsɛa nyɛnyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛi, ni mi hu matsɛ Yehowa gbɛi: ni aba mli akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mɔ ni kɛ la aaahere nɔ lɛ, lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ!”—1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 18:23, 24.
Beni wɔyaa nɔ wɔkɛ Biblia lɛ tsuɔ nii yɛ shia-kɛ-shia nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ, wɔnaa akɛ ‘ehiɛ kã ni eyɛ hewalɛ.’—Heb.
3 Nakai nyɔɔŋ lɛ mli nɔŋŋ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ Natan* akɛ: 4 “Yaa ni oyakɛɛ mitsulɔ David akɛ, ‘Nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: “Jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa ohã mi ni mahi mli.
(Jajelɔ 2:10) Salomo mamɔ tsũi eha ehe, efee weintromi, ni efee abɔɔi kɛ tromi, kɛ nujɔɔi hu eha ehe.
+ 19 Ekɛ la shã anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shĩa lɛ,+ ni ekumɔ Yerusalem gbogboi lɛ eshwie shi,+ ni ekɛ la shã emɔji lɛ fɛɛ, ni ekpãtã nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni jara wa lɛ hiɛ.
19 Shi jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ, shi moŋ, bo diɛŋtsɛ obinuu ni abaafɔ ahã bo lɛ,* lɛ ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ ehã migbɛ́i lɛ.’
(Hebribii 13:15, 16) Kɛfata he lɛ, amɛjáa Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ emumɔŋ sɔlemɔtsu, ní ji “jeŋmaji fɛɛ asɔlemɔwe,” taakɛ sɔlemɔtsu ní hi Yerusalem lɛ ji lɛ mli.
BENI Yesu kɛ ebɔfoi lɛ bua amɛhe naa yɛ ŋwɛitsu ko nɔ yɛ Yerusalem lɛ, no mli lɛ, ele akɛ nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ ji naagbee gbɛkɛ ni ekɛ amɛ baahi shi.
Kɛkɛ ni Abner yakpã nɔ ni Israel kɛ Benyamin shĩa lɛ fɛɛ ekpɛ mli akɛ amɛbaafee lɛ ewo David toiiaŋ yɛ Hebron.
Beni ahum ko ni naa wa waa tswa lɛ, tsu ni amã yɛ tɛsaa nɔ lɛ pɛ nyɛ emã shi.
9 Ni osɔfo Yehoiada wó adeka+ ko, ni egbu enaanɔ lɛ mli fɔlɔ, ni ekɛma afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ masɛi, ni kɛ́ mɔ ko miibote Yehowa shĩa lɛ mli lɛ, eyɛ eninejurɔgbɛ.
Minyɛɔ minaa Yesu shiwoo lɛ kpetekpelee: “Mɔ ko bɛ ni eshi shia loo nyɛmimɛi hii loo nyɛmimɛi yei loo tsɛ loo nyɛ loo ŋa loo bii loo abɔi yɛ mi kɛ sanekpakpa lɛ hewɔ, ní enaŋ shiai kɛ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ nyɛmimɛiyei kɛ nyɛmɛi.”
Mima mi diɛŋtsɛ mishia.
(Hebribii 3:4, The Jerusalem Bible) Akɛni shia fɛɛ shia yɛ emalɔ, ni bɔ ni edaaa ha kɔɔɔ he eko hewɔ lɛ, belɛ jeŋ muu fɛɛ ni yɔɔ haŋtsii, kɛ wala sui sɔrɔtoi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ hu fɛɛ yɛ amɛfeelɔ.
Ebayi shia ni Yesu Kristo kaselɔi aaafee 120 ebua amɛhe naa yɛ mli lɛ obɔ.
Abɛi yitso 7 lɛ gbaa wɔ oblanyo ko ni tee shisharamɔ yɛ yoo ko ni bɛ jeŋba lɛ shĩa masɛi gbɛkɛ ko lɛ he sane.
14, 15. (a) Mɛni wɔbaanyɛ wɔfee kɛtsɔɔ akɛ ‘wɔkwaaa wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ we lɛ’?
+ 13 Kɛɛmɔ lɛ akɛ, makojo eshĩa lɛ kɛya naanɔ yɛ esha lɛ ni ele lɛ hewɔ,+ ejaakɛ ebihii lɛ miilomɔ Nyɔŋmɔ,+ shi ekãko amɛhiɛ.
Amɛkɛɛ amɛba biɛ koni amɛbakwɛ mishia lɛ mli akɛ amɛbaana woji ni Yehowa Odasefoi—gbɛjianɔtoo ko ni atsĩ amɛnaa lɛ fee lɛ eko lo.

“Susuma” kɛ “Mumɔ” —Mɛni Ji Wiemɔi Nɛɛ Ashishinumɔ Diɛŋtsɛ?
Eŋma kɛyaha asafo ni yɔɔ Tesalonika lɛ akɛ: “Akɛni wɔsumɔɔ nyɛ jogbaŋŋ nɛkɛ hewɔ lɛ, wɔyɛ he tsui akɛ jeee Nyɔŋmɔ sanekpakpa lɛ kɛkɛ wɔkɛaaha nyɛ, shi moŋ wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔwala tete, ejaakɛ wɔmiisumɔ nyɛ naakpa.”
Shi kɛlɛ, susumai fioo ko ni bo Yehowa toi lɛ fata mɛi ni ajie amɛ kɛjɛ nakai kojomɔ ni tamɔ la lɛ mli lɛ ahe.

Gbee Jata Aduŋ
Yɛ nɛkɛ jeŋ nilee nɛɛ hewɔ lɛ, esaaa akɛ Hindubii gbeɔ bɔɔ nii krokomɛi, aloo amɛyeɔ amɛ awui, ni enɛ ji yiŋtoo kome hewɔ ni amɛjaa kooloi komɛi tamɔ, tsinai, onufui, kɛ aduji lɛ.
Tsina Jata Aduŋ
• Kɛ́ adesai jɛ aduji ni baa shi fe gbɔmɛi amli kɛba lɛ, mɛni hewɔ anako aduŋ henɔ ko ni miihe atamɔ gbɔmɔ lɛ?—LALA 8:5, 6.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, yɛ Afrika hei komɛi nɛkɛ lɛ, awieɔ akɛ nɛkɛ efɔŋ tsuji nɛɛ yɛ hewalɛi komɛi ni naa wa waa, ni amɛnyɛɔ amɛtsakeɔ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛhe loo mɛi krokomɛi amɛfeɔ amɛ waamɔ kooloi, aduji, kɛ loofɔji; amɛnyɛɔ amɛfilikiɔ kɛtsɔɔ kɔɔyɔɔ mli ni amɛkɛtsuɔ amɛyiŋtoi ahe nii; amɛnyɛɔ amɛpueɔ ni amɛlaajeɔ; amɛnyɛɔ amɛtsɔɔ gbogboi amli; ni amɛnyɛɔ amɛnaa nibii ni afũ yɛ shikpɔŋ po.
Kɛ́ Yehowa kpoo amɛnaa shi lɛ, nugbɔ nyɛɔ enɛɔ eshwieɔ shi aahu akɛ ewoɔ ŋmɔtɔ.
26 Be ni ewo nugbɔnɛmɔ mla+
Beni Roma maŋ onukpa Petronius bɔ mɔdɛŋ ni ejɔɔ Yudafoi lɛ ahe lɛ, Josephus kɛɛ akɛ, ‘Nyɔŋmɔ jie ba ni eba [pa·rou·siʹa] kpo etsɔɔ Petronius,’ kɛtsɔ nugbɔ ni etsu kɛba lɛ nɔ.
+ Enuɔ nu ni nɛɔ kɛjɛɔ ŋwɛi lɛ;+ 12 eji shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kwɛɔ nɔ.
Ni namɔ shi wɔbaada kɛ́ wɔye aduawai kɛ yelibaai ni ŋɔɔ lɛ?— Esa akɛ wɔda Nyɔŋmɔ shi ejaakɛ ehulu kɛ enu haa nibii kwɛ̃ɔ.
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, Yehowa kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Eshwɛ biɛ gbii kpawo ni maha nu abanɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ shwane-shwane kɛ nyɔɔŋ-nyɔɔŋ gbii nyɔŋmai ejwɛ.”
6 Ani nugbɔ enɛ pɛŋ kɛtsɔ be nɛɛ hiɛ?
Snoo kɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ baanyɛ afolɔ wɔnitsumɔi hu amli, ni enɛ damɔ he ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ nɔ.
Taakɛ yinɔsaneŋmalɔ Fernando Bea tsɔɔ lɛ, eji “nitsumɔ ko ni biɔ ŋaa kɛ jwɛŋmɔ” yɛ buufeelɔi ni kɛ “mamai ni ekua, ni bɛ tswãa tsɔ̃, ni ahiɔ mli yɛ gbɛfaa mli, ni buɔ mɔ he kɛjɛɔ hulu dɔlɛ kɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ he, loo ni akɛtsuɔ nii akɛ nɔ ni atoɔ nibii awoɔ mli yɛ lɛlɛ mligbɛ lɛ” tsuɔ nii lɛ agbɛfaŋ.
Ni nugbɔ tue, ni faai ba, ni kɔɔyɔɔ tswa, ni amɛshimɔ tsũ lɛ, ni ewule, ni ewulemɔ lɛ da.”—Mateo 7:24-27.
Wɔbashɛ shwapo lɛ naa ekoŋŋ ní wɔhe efɔ tsɔtsɔɔtsɔ yɛ nugbɔ ni nɛ lɛ hewɔ.
5:45) Kɛ́ wɔbo Yesu ŋaawoo nɛɛ toi lɛ, wɔbatsɔmɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ “bii,” ni tsɔɔ akɛ wɔmiikase Yehowa, mɔ ni ‘haa ehulu teɔ shi yɛ mɛi fɔji kɛ mɛi kpakpai anɔ, ni ehaa nugbɔ nɛɔ yɛ jalɔi kɛ mɛi ni bɛ jalɛ lɛ anɔ’ lɛ.
Ataa kɛ yiŋkɔshikɔshi feemɔ damɔ shi gbi muu fɛɛ ni eemɛ ni eshɛ enɔ koni eŋma egbɛi akɛ asraafonyo.
Kɛkɛ ni Yehowa ŋa shinaa lɛ ni nugbɔ lɛ bɔi nɛmɔ.
Biblia lɛ wieɔ nugbɔnɛmɔ he babaoo.
Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa fee nugbɔ lɛ?
+ 7 Ejaakɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ náa Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔmɔ lɛ eko kɛ́ emiɔ nu ni nɛɔ shwieɔ nɔ kpitiokpitio lɛ, ni ebaa nii ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ kɛhãa mɛi ahewɔ ni ahuɔ nɔ lɛ.
Yehowa bibii Hiob saji yɛ ewolo lɛ yitsei 38 kɛyashi 41 lɛ mli fɛɛ, kɛ babaoo hu ni kɔɔ E-nibɔɔ he.
Eyɛ mli akɛ mɛi krokomɛi kɛ hiɛdɔɔ eyasusuuu kɔkɔbɔɔ lɛ he moŋ, shi gbi nɔ ní Lot shi Sodom lɛ, “Nyɔŋmɔ nɛ la kɛ swɔɔ kɛjɛ ŋwɛi, ni ekpata amɛ fɛɛ kwa amɛhiɛ.”—Luka 17:28, 29.
Amɛjoɔ joo kɛha nibaa nii babaoo námɔ koni akɛha Baal ate shi kɛjɛ nitsumɔ ni etsuuu yɛ hulutsoo be mli lɛ mli koni akɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ ajɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ.
Akɛni ebaa shi kɛ mitai 1,200 yɛ kilomitai 24 pɛ mli hewɔ lɛ, atsi Yuda Ŋa Kpalanaa lɛ hiɛ kɛjɛ kɔɔyɔi ni jɛ anaigbɛ ni kɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ baa lɛ ahe, ni yɛ no hewɔ lɛ, nugbɔnɛmɔ fioo ko pɛ enine shɛɔ nɔ.
Nɔ ni ejɛ nugbɔ ni fɔɔ nɛmɔ, kɛ kɔɔyɔɔ ni mli jɔɔ yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ mli kɛba ji kooi ni nugbɔ fɔɔ nɛmɔ yɛ mli ni yɔɔ fɛo, ni ehà gɔji ni amɛnɔ kwɔlɔ fe mitai 2,000 lɛ ajɔɔi lɛ anɔ fɛɛ lɛ.
Yɛ anɔkwa toiŋjɔlɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ kudɔɔ nugbɔ kɛ sarawai (27-33)
Ajie ŋmɔji lɛ he afabaŋi lɛ ni ama agba ni baabu toibolɔi lɛ ahe kɛjɛ hulu kɛ nugbɔ he.
Lamɔ lɛ gba enaa aahu akɛ, enyɛɛɛ ewɔ.
Mɛɛ beyinɔ po ooote shi kɛaajɛ owɔ lɛ mli?”
Susanne eje mli, ni eemɛ Yehowa koni átee lɛ shi.
Bei pii lɛ Biblia lɛ kɛ gbele toɔ wɔ he.
Beni Paulo wo enanemɛi heyelilɔi ni yɔɔ Roma lɛ ŋaa koni amɛhiɛ atsɛ̃ kɛjɛ wɔ mli lɛ, ewo amɛ hewalɛ koni ‘amɛjie duŋ mli nitsumɔi lɛ amɛshwie’ ni ‘amɛwo Nuntsɔ Yesu Kristo.’
2 Beni Yehowa gbi wulu lɛ bɛŋkɛɔ nɛɛ, adesai babaoo miiwɔ yɛ mumɔŋ.
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “[Yesu] kɛɛ amɛ [ekaselɔi lɛ] akɛ: ‘Wɔ shieŋtsɛ Lazaro ewɔ; shi miiya ni mayatsiɛ̃ lɛ yɛ wɔ lɛ mli.’
Be ni Henok nu he akɛ etoiŋ ejɔ lɛ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, eŋa ehiŋmɛii, ni etsɔ mli ewɔ vii.
Onukpai babaoo ni yɔɔ maŋtiase lɛ wɔɔ yɛ tsũ nɛɛ mli gbɛkɛ bɔni afee ni nine anyɛ ashɛ maŋ onukpai ni nitsumɔ mli gbɛnaa nii kã amɛnɔ lɛ anɔ daa.
Yɛ be mli ni ekolɛ ebaawa kɛha wɔ akɛ wɔɔnu gbele shishi diɛŋtsɛ lɛ, wɔnuɔ nɔ ni wɔ̀ ji shishi.
Mar 4:26-29 —Mɛni wɔkaseɔ yɛ Yesu nɔkwɛmɔnɔ ni kɔɔ nidulɔ ni yawɔɔ lɛ he lɛ mli?
Bɔfo Paulo kpɛlɛ nɔ ni jɛɔ gbohiiashitee he hiɛnɔkamɔ ni shɛjeɔ mɔ mii nɛɛ mli baa lɛ nɔ yɛ nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ amli: “Anyɛmimɛi, wɔmiisumɔ akɛ nyɛle mɛi ni ewɔ lɛ ahe sane, koni nyɛkaye ŋkɔmɔ tamɔ mɛi ni eshwɛ lɛ, mɛi ni bɛ nɔhiɛkamɔ ko lɛ.
Akɛni mibɛ wɔɔhe hewɔ lɛ, miyaa dãahɔɔmɔhe ni yɔɔ akrowa lɛ, ni mimɛɔ aahu kɛyashiɔ nɔkwɛlɔ lɛ shiɔ kɛyaa shia —bei pii lɛ maŋkɛ̃ —miŋmɛɔ saa ni mikãa nɔ, ni miteɔ shi leebi mra dani nɔtsɛ lɛ jeɔ nihɔɔmɔ shishi.
Kɛji akɛ mɔ ko ŋmɛ gbɛ ni Satan je lɛ mli nɔnyɛɛ lɛ wɔle lɛ ni ewɔ loo ekpa nitsumɔ lɛ, eka shi faŋŋ akɛ amɛbaalaaje amɛ kponɔgbɛ atadei lɛ—yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, amɛbaalaaje le ni ale amɛ akɛ Kristofoi ni he tse lɛ.
Mɛni enɛ tsɔɔ yɛ gbele he?— Hɛɛ, ákɛ etamɔ wɔ̀ ni tsii waa.
Ehiii kwraa akɛ Ortodɔks Sɔlemɔ feɔ tamɔ oblaŋ ni wɔɔ”!
3 Nɛkɛ lamɔ nɛɛ hao Nebukadnezar aahu akɛ enyɛɛɛ ewɔ.
10 Ejaakɛ Yehowa efɔse wɔ ni tsii mumɔ eshwie nyɛnɔ;+
Yɛ be mli ni anaa mi akɛ miŋmɔɔ ni migbaa sane gbi muu lɛ fɛɛ yɛ shwapo lɛ mli lɛ, namɔ aaanyɛ ale akɛ kɛ mishɛ shia gbɛkɛ nɔŋŋ pɛ lɛ, mifóɔ ni minyɛɛɛ mawɔ?”
Shi amɛwɔɔɔ yɛ gbele mli taakɛ mɛi ni etsɔ amɛhiɛ lɛ fee lɛ.
Naagbee lɛ, nitsumɔ ni haa wɔnáa nii babaoo nɛɛ hé wɔjwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ aahu akɛ wɔwɔ yɛ mumɔŋ.
Wu lɛ wie akɛ: “Wɔkpɛ wɔyiŋ akɛ be fɛɛ be ni naataamɔ ko baaba wɔteŋ lɛ, wɔbaasaa dani wɔyawɔ, ekɔɔɔ he eko bɔ ni amɛji naagbai bibii ha.”
Amɛwɔɔ lɛlɛ lɛ ablanaa lɛ nɔ, ekolɛ yɛ agba ko ni ashi lɛ tamɔ buu yɛ gbɛkɛnaashi mli ni ajieɔ daa leebi.
No sɛɛ lɛ, ahaa wɔ wonu kɛ bodobodo wɔyeɔ, ni wɔyawɔɔ beni etɔ mi bliboo.
Etsɛɛɛ nɔŋŋ ni wɔ nyɔ Sisera nɔ.
(3 Mose 19:32) Enɛ baa lɛ nakai yɛ mɛi ni kɛ anɔkwayeli esɔmɔ Yehowa aahu afii babaoo lɛ agbɛfaŋ titri ejaakɛ “waŋ lɛ, anunyam akekre ni, kɛ́ aná lɛ yɛ jalɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ.”
Ebiyoo lɛ he yɛ fɛo waa.
Wiemɔ lɛ Tamɔ Lala ko ni Ŋɔɔ
25 Omamɔ hei grɔŋŋi yɛ gbɛjegbɛ fɛɛ gbɛjegbɛ nɔ hei ni afɔɔ tsɔmɔ lɛ, ni okɛ ohe hã* mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni hoɔ lɛ ni ohã ohefɛo lɛ tsɔ nɔ ko ni anyaŋeɔ,+ ni ohã oshawo nifeemɔi lɛ fa pii.
Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, eŋɔɔ wɔnaa waa akɛ ama nitsumɔhe nine hee fɛfɛo ko yɛ Lilongwe, ni amamɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asai 1,000 kɛ sɛɛ yɛ Malawi!
Miishɛɛ sane ji akɛ, beni bɔfo lɛ ŋma yɛ nakai kponɔgbɛ hewulamɔ nibii lɛ ahe lɛ, ekɛ Hela wiemɔ henɔ ko ni ji koʹsmos lɛ tsu nii, ni no hu eji wiemɔ ni aná Ŋleshi wiemɔ ni ji “cosmetic,” ni eshishi ji “koni aha hewolo lɛ titri afee fɛo” lɛ yɛ mli.
16 Kɛ́ wɔgba wɔnyɛmimɛi Kristofoi lɛ nibii ni wɔbaasumɔ ni wɔfee yɛ jeŋ hee lɛ mli lɛ, no baaye abua wɔ fɛɛ ni wɔnyɛ wɔfee bɔ ni shihilɛ baaji yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ he mfoniri jogbaŋŋ.
Kwɛmɔ sane ni ji “Genesaret —‘Eyɛ Naakpɛɛ ni Eyɛ Fɛo’” ni je kpo yɛ January 1, 1992 Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ.
Hefɛo Diɛŋtsɛ ni Yɔɔ Kɛha Nilelɔ
EJI Mazda jamɔ ni Iran gbalɔ Zoroaster shiɛ etsɔɔ lɛ sɛɛnyiɛlɔ ji bo kulɛ, obaamɛ gbi ni shikpɔŋ lɛ baaku sɛɛ efee fɛo tamɔ bɔ ni eji kɛjɛ shishijee mli lɛ.
Ani no mli lɛ Petro kɛ nɔnyɛɛ miitsĩ Kristofoi yei anaa ni amɛgu hewolo nɔ hefɛo nibii kɛ nibii krokomɛi ni haa mɔ he feɔ fɛo lɛ?
Lala ni kɛ fe fɛɛ ni yɔɔ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ tamɔ sɔlemɔ ni ŋɔɔ.
Kɛtsɔ nikasemɔi ni nɔ kwɔlɔ ni etsɔɔ amɛ lɛ anɔ, bɔni afee ni ekɛsaa amɛ kɛha nɔ ni baaba lɛ.
GBƆMƐI aaashɛ 10,500 yɔɔ Tuvalu, ni ji maŋ fɛfɛo ko ni ŋshɔkpɔi nɛɛhu ni yɔɔ Pasifik Wuoyigbɛ lɛ feɔ maŋ lɛ mli.
Misusuko he pɛŋ akɛ wɔbaaná he ko ni yɔɔ fɛo tamɔ nɛkɛ ni wɔkpe yɛ jɛmɛ kɛjie Yehowa yi.
Ebɔi yei krokomɛi akwɛmɔ, ni ewieɔ bɔ ni amɛhe yɔɔ fɛo ha.
Yɛ March 19, 1983 lɛ, wɔna tsũi heei nɛɛ anɔjɔɔmɔ ko ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ yɛ agbiɛnaa be mli hulutsoo gbi ko nɔ.
Kwɛ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shweshweeshwe shihilɛ ni wɔná yɛ Yehowa mumɔŋ sɔlemɔtsu lɛ kpoi ni yɔɔ fɛo lɛ anɔ!
Ehe yɛ fɛo waa diɛŋtsɛ, shi ehe fɛo lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishemɔ ni eyɔɔ lɛ.
TSEI ni ale amɛ akɛ Arz Ar-rab, ni shishi ji “Nuntsɔ lɛ Tsenedurutsei” lɛ kwɛ̃ɔ yɛ Lebanon gɔji fɛfɛji lɛ anɔ.
Ekɛ mɛi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ wo abɔɔ fɛfɛo ko mli ni eha amɛ nibii ni he baahia amɛ lɛ fɛɛ babaoo koni amɛya nɔ amɛhi shi daa ni amɛna miishɛɛ.

Gbekɛ Yoo Fioo ko ní Nine Kpɔɔ
6 Kɛkɛ ni Shekem onukpai lɛ fɛɛ kɛ mɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ Bet-milo lɛ bua amɛhe naa, ni amɛwó Abimelek maŋtsɛ+ yɛ tso agbo lɛ masɛi, yɛ akulashiŋ ni yɔɔ Shekem lɛ masɛi.
Minu he akɛ migbɔmɔtso lɛ fã ko eŋmɛɛ mi.
Amɛkɛ amɛ ba Yabesh ni amɛfu amɛwui lɛ yɛ tso agbo lɛ ni yɔɔ Yabesh+ lɛ shishi, ni amɛhi ŋmaa gbii kpawo.

20 Ni anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ bɔfo lɛ kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Okɛ loo lɛ kɛ blodo ni ashikishaŋ-sha* bɛ mli lɛ ashwie tɛsaa agbo lɛ ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ nɔ, ni otsɔ wonu* lɛ oshwie.”
