18 No sɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa+ jie ehe kpo etsɔɔ lɛ yɛ Mamre tsei wuji+ lɛ ateŋ, be ni eta emama tsũ lɛ shinaa lɛ naa shwane ketekete lɛ.
Beni mɛi komɛi miitsɔmɔ niiatsɛmɛi lɛ, hiɛnyiɛlɔi ni yeee anɔkwa ni yɔɔ nitsumɔi wuji, maŋkwramɔŋ, kɛ apasa jamɔ mli lɛ kɛ amɛjeŋba shara nifeemɔ lɛ miitswa mɛi krokomɛi ojo ni amɛmiiye amɛ awui yɛ henumɔŋ hu.
Te nakai lɛji lɛ adaramɔ yɔɔ tɛŋŋ?
Mɔ ko ni bɛ niji kɛ naji gɔntii lɛ nyɛŋ ekɛ ehe awo tawuu mli.
MƆ NI EJI TSUTSU: ESHWE NI ENÁ SHIHILƐ MLI SANEBIMƆI NI HE HIAA LƐ AHETOO
13. (a) Yehowa kɛ “jalɛ tsei” jɔɔ ewebii ní ekɛ amɛ ku sɛɛ kɛba ekoŋŋ lɛ yɛ mɛɛ shishinumɔ naa?
Yɛ naagbee lɛ ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: ‘Kɛ ofee naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ, Israelbii lɛ baahe aye akɛ mi mitsuo.’
Ni yɛ bei ni eho lɛ amli lɛ, naakpɛɛ nii tsu gbɛfaŋnɔ ko yɛ hemɔkɛyeli námɔ loo etswaa kɛ shimaa mli.
Beni afɔ mi yɛ July 1918 mli sɛɛ lɛ, mifɔlɔi fã kɛyahi Cap-de-la-Madeleine, ni ji akrowa bibioo ko ni yɔɔ Quebec, yɛ Canada, ni atsɛɔ jɛmɛ He ni Afeɔ Naakpɛɛ Nii Yɛ lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, nyɛhãa wɔsusua naakpɛɛ nii ni Yesu fee lɛ ateŋ ejwɛ ahe wɔkwɛa.
ETSƐKO tsɔ ni Yesu Kristo fee naakpɛɛ nii, ni amrɔ nɛɛ aana lɛ ni eetsɔɔ nii yɛ kpeehe ko yɛ Kapernaum, yɛ Galilea Ŋshɔ lɛ masɛi.
13 Eji anɔkwale akɛ, ŋmɛnɛ lɛ afeee naakpɛɛ nibii ni tamɔ nakai.
Amɛkɛ hekɛnɔfɔ̃ɔ kpa shihilɛ mli ni amɛaaku sɛɛ amɛba ekoŋŋ yɛ wɔsɛɛ be mli yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ gbɛ kɛtsɔ naakpɛɛ nii ni ji gbohiiashitee nɔ.
Ani yiŋkɔshikɔshi-feemɔi ni kɔɔ Yesu naakpɛɛ nii lɛ kɛ eshitee lɛ he lɛ ja?
(Kpojiemɔ 12:9; 2 Korintobii 4:4; 11:3) Mɔbɔ sane ji akɛ, bɔfo Paulo bɔ kɔkɔ akɛ jamɔŋ bii pii yɛ ni “hiɛ baakpata kɛ̃” ejaakɛ Satan ni “baafee naakpɛɛ nii koni ekɛlaka mɛi” lɛ baalaka amɛ.
Shi atsɔɔɔ Yesu naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi, ni ekrokomɛi ni abɔɔɔ he amaniɛ lɛ fata he lɛ ayibɔ diɛŋtsɛ.
Shi kɛlɛ, yei etɛ komɛi ni kɛɛ amɛnine shɛ shɛɛ sane ko nɔ kɛjɛ Oblayoo Fro Maria ŋɔɔ lɛ fata mɛi ni shɛɛɛ maŋbii lɛ amlijaa etɛ mli ekome ni heɔ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi amɛyeɔ lɛ ahe.
No hewɔ lɛ kɛ Awo kɛ mi jɛ hemɔkɛyeli tsalɔ kome ŋɔɔ kɛtee mɔ kroko ŋɔɔ lɛ, wɔkɛ hiamɔ kpaa naakpɛɛ tsamɔ gbɛ.
Beni amɛshɛ Yordan naa lɛ, Elia fee naakpɛɛ nɔ ko yɛ be mli ni gbalɔi abii 50 komɛi miikwɛ kɛmiijɛ shɔŋŋ lɛ.
4:12-16) Galilea ji he ni Yesu ha e-Gɔŋ nɔ Shiɛmɔ ni haa mɔ shwieɔ eyiŋ waa lɛ yɛ, jɛmɛ ehala ebɔfoi lɛ yɛ, ni jɛmɛ efee eklɛŋklɛŋ naakpɛɛ nii lɛ yɛ, ni eeenyɛ efee akɛ jɛmɛ ji he ni yɛ eshitee lɛ sɛɛ lɛ ejie ehe kpo etsɔɔ mɛi ni fa fe 500 lɛ yɛ.
Abonsam ka lɛ koni eha tɛi atsɔmɔ aboloo, shi Yesu efeee nakai ejaakɛ ejaaa akɛ eeefee naakpɛɛ nii koni ekɛná nɔ ni lɛ diɛŋtsɛ esumɔɔ.
Yɛ naakpɛɛ tsamɔi babaoo kɛ naakpɛɛ nii krokomɛi ni efee lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, aleee Yesu akɛ Tsofatsɛ, shi moŋ akɛ Tsɔɔlɔ, Onukpa loo Nuŋtsɔ. —Mateo 8: 19; Luka 5:5; Yohane 13:13.
Mɛɛ naakpɛɛ nii Yesu fee, ni mɛɛ ninefɔɔ ekɛha Petro kɛ Andrea?
Bɔ ni wɔbɛ nɔ ni jwɛŋmɔ yɔɔ mli ni wɔɔdamɔ nɔ wɔje Yesu shihilɛ, naakpɛɛ nii, gbele, kɛ shitee lɛ he ŋwane lɛ, wɔbɛ nɔ ni wɔɔdamɔ nɔ wɔje maŋtsɛsɛi nɔ ni Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ lɛ eta akɛ Maŋtsɛ ni sa yɛ E-ninejurɔ nɔ lɛ he ŋwane.
Yehowa fee naakpɛɛ nɔ ko kɛwo lɛ nyɔmɔ.
Yehowa fee naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ eha lɛ, ni beni Gideon saa ebi koni aha bɔ́ anyɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ ní toowolo lɛ agbi lɛ, atsu enɛ hu he nii aha lɛ, ni no ha ená nɔmimaa.
13 Ŋwɛi hebuu he shiwoo lɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ sɔ̃ kã Yehowa nɔ akɛ efee naakpɛɛ nii yɛ wɔgbɛfaŋ.
17, 18. (a) Mɛni hewɔ Yesu fee naakpɛɛ nii srɔtoi?
Yinɔsaneŋmalɔ Will Durant ŋma yɛ ewolo ni ji Caesar and Christ lɛ mli akɛ: “Ákɛ gbɔmɛi foji fioo ko . . . kɛ gbɔmɔ ko ni náa mɛi anɔ hewalɛ ni abuɔ lɛ waa aaaba shihilɛ mli, mɔ ni jeŋba nɔ kwɔ kɛ mɔ ni kanyaa adesai anyɛmifeemɔ he ninaa lɛ baafee naakpɛɛ nɔ ko ni anyɛŋ ahe aye fe ekrokomɛi fɛɛ ni aŋmala yɛ Sanekpakpai lɛ amli.
Ekolɛ obaanu he akɛ yiŋtoo titri ko hewɔ mɛi shashaoɔ shi akɛ amɛaahe naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi amɛye lɛ.
Mɛni hewɔ Yesu fee naakpɛɛ nii lɛ?
Fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, kɛ́ obi lɛ shɛ eblahiiaŋ lɛ, ebafeɔ hegbɛ kpele ni oná ni ‘okɛaatsɔɔ lɛ gbɛ ni sa akɛ etsɔ nɔ.’
Ani ohaa ohiɛ hiɔ Yehowa mlihilɛ nifeemɔi lɛ anɔ?
Ofɔlɔi lɛ dɔɔ ohe daa.
Kɛkɛ ni eŋma akɛ: “Miná miishɛɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ beni minine shɛ owolo lɛ nɔ lɛ.
Ejaakɛ Yehowa miihi mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ní feɔ nɛkɛ nii nɛɛ, ni nɛkɛ nihii nii nɛɛ nɔŋŋ hewɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, shwieɔ amɛ yɛ ohiɛ nɛɛ.”
Gbekɛbii krokomɛi baanyɛ afite o-Kristofoi asui lɛ
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ toibolɔi lɛ baanyɛ aná nɔkwɛmɔnii ni ohalaa kɛha wiemɔ yɛ kuu ko hiɛ lɛ nɔ hewalɛ yɛ?
Shi bɔni afee ni oná skul lɛ he sɛɛ jogbaŋŋ lɛ, esa akɛ oha aŋma ogbɛi yɛ mli, ní oya eko, ní okɛ ohe awo mli daa, ní okɛ ohe fɛɛ awo nifeemɔi ni akɛhaa bo lɛ mli.
Nɔkwɛmɔ nii ni tamɔ nɛkɛ babaoo yɛ: okadi ni hɛleɔ bo shi yɛ sarawa hewalɛ he; redio nɔ adafitswaa ni kɔɔ ahum ko ni miitswa kɛ foi kɛmiiba he ni oyɔɔ lɛ he; dade ko ni obaanu egbɛɛmɔ waa he kɛjɛ otsɔne mli beni ota mli kɛnyiɛ gbɛjegbɛ ni nɔ etsi nɔ.
Mɛɛ beyinɔ po ooote shi kɛaajɛ owɔ lɛ mli?”
Susumɔ mɔ ni okɛyaakase nii lɛ he, ni otao sanebimɔ ko loo nɔkwɛmɔnɔ ko ni obaanyɛ okɛye obua lɛ ni eya ehiɛ.
5 Ejaakɛ wɔmiifãmɔ susumɔi kɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni kwɔ ni teɔ shi ewoɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nilee lɛ wɔmiishwie,+ ni wɔmiiŋɔ jwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ jwɛŋmɔ nom koni wɔhã ebo Kristo lɛ toi; 6 ni wɔsaa wɔhe wɔto, koni kɛ́ nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ, nyɛbo toi kɛwula shi nɔŋŋ lɛ, wɔkɛ toigbele fɛɛ toigbele he toigbalamɔ ahã. +
Yakobo 1:2, 3 lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Minyɛmimɛi, kɛji nyɛgbee kaai srɔtoi pii amli lɛ, nyɛbua lɛ miishɛɛ sɔŋŋ; ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nyɛhemɔkɛyeli kaa lɛ tsɛ́ɔ tsuishiŋmɛɛ kɛbaa.”
Ani bo hu obaanyɛ okɛ obe fɛɛ asɔmɔ yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli koni omiishɛɛ lɛ afa babaoo?
Omami ni, ni esaaa akɛ okɛ lɛ náa bɔlɛ.
Wɔkɛ bo baaya omaŋbii lɛ aŋɔɔ.’
Ebaakai bo nɔ̃ hewɔ ni esa akɛ ofee ekãa lɛ, ni ebaaha ona bɔ ni ooofee ni ohe asa kɛ nitsɔɔmɔ, ni ebaaha ona akɛ mɛi miibo shiɛmɔ ni wɔshiɛɔ lɛ toi lolo koni no awo bo hewalɛ.
No mli lɛ, oniatsulɔi lɛ tsi amɛbɛŋkɛ Petro ni amɛbi lɛ akɛ: “Ani nyɛtsɔɔlɔ lɛ haaa daa afi onia lɛ?”
Bɔ ni amɛsusu mihe waa lɛ ha mikase nɔ ko ni he hiaa waa: Ákɛ “mɔ fɛɛ mɔ akafo enɔ mli, shi moŋ efo enaanyo nɔ mli.”—Filipibii 2:4.
(2 Timoteo 3:16; Lala 119:151) Kɛ okaneɔ Biblia lɛ ni okpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ yɛ odaa gbi shihilɛ mli lɛ, no lɛ obaanyɛ ohi shi yɛ ogbalashihilɛ kitakamɔ lɛ naa.—Lala 119:105.
Ani ona akɛ tsofai kpakpai ni afee bianɛ lɛ ehã hela ko ni yɔɔ ohe lɛ naa eba shi loo ehã oná gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ kpakpa?
(Mateo 24: 14; Hebribii 10: 24, 25) Kɛ́ ohenumɔ nii lɛ amli wa waa lɛ, no lɛ ohiɛ kpaŋ mumɔŋ otii ní okɛaamamɔ ohiɛ beni okɛ ofɔlɔi toɔ gbɛjianɔ kɛhaa wɔsɛɛ lɛ nɔ kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Kɛ́ gbee tsakemɔ bɛ lɛ, ebaanyɛ eha asusu akɛ obɛ sane ní owieɔ he lɛ he miishɛɛ.
Mɛi krokomɛi hu boɔ wiemɔi nɛɛ atoi bianɛ: “Nyɛkɛ nyɛhiɛ akafɔa amimyeli nɔ, ni nyɛyitso hu akafua yɛ juu-kɛ-fɔ̃ nii ahewɔ.”
10 Otswa okɔɔyɔɔ lɛ, ni ŋshɔ lɛ ha amɛnɔ;+
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ kɛ́ onu sane kpakpa ko lɛ, omii shɛɔ ohe waa.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ofainɛ, ye ŋkunyaa kɛtsɔ mumɔi atsɛmɔ+ nɔ koni ohã mɔ ni matsɔɔ bo lɛ akwɔ kɛba.”
26 Ni obaanyɛ okɛ shika lɛ ahe nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baa otsine*—tsinai kɛ gwantɛŋi kɛ abotiai kɛ wain kɛ dãji krokomɛi ni wa, kɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni osumɔɔ;* ní oye yɛ jɛmɛ yɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ, ní omii ashɛ ohe, bo kɛ oshĩabii fɛɛ.
Kaimɔ: Ofainɛ hã atswa lala hee lɛ shi kome koni nyɛmimɛi lɛ abo toi, koni no sɛɛ lɛ amɛlá kɛnyiɛ sɛɛ.
(Abɛi 20:5) Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ŋɔɔ lɛ akɛ okɛ mɔ ko miikase yitso ni ji “Ní Aaahi Shi yɛ Gbɛ ni Saa Nyɔŋmɔ Hiɛ lɛ Nɔ” ni yɔɔ Mɛni Biblia lɛ Tsɔɔ Diɛŋtsɛ?
Kɛji obaasumɔ ni ole nibii babaoo aloo ni mɔ ko aba oŋɔɔ ni ekɛ bo afee shia Biblia mli nikasemɔ ni aheee nɔ ko lɛ, ofainɛ ŋmaa kɛya Watch Tower, Box 760, Accra, Ghana, aloo kɛya adrɛs ni atsɔɔ yɛ baafa 2 lɛ mli nɔ ni sa.
Kɛlɛ, mile akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ, Yehowa hiɛ sɔɔ sɔɔmɔ ni mikɛhaa lɛ lɛ waa fe beni mikwɛɔ mfonirii ni teɔ bɔlɛnamɔ akɔnɔ shi lɛ, ni bɔ ni lɛ ekwɛɔ nii ehaa lɛ ji nɔ ni he hiaa.”
Ni aakai wɔ fɛɛ, kɛ gbekɛbii lɛ hu akɛ ehe miihia ní wɔsɔmɔ Yehowa kɛjɛ wɔtsui mli, shi jeee ní wɔɔkwa wɔfee wɔhe Kristofoi kɛkɛ koni wɔkɛsa gbɔmɛi ahiɛ.
Hɛɛ, amitsrɔbi tso lɛ feɔ hiŋmɛi lɛ fɛo jogbaŋŋ ni ewoɔ yibii waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Ani Nyɔŋmɔ ná enɛ he miishɛɛ?
Kɛ́ mɔ ko ni yɔɔ oshikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli lɛ bi ni abaha lɛ woji tɛtrɛbii lɛ eko daa lɛ, ofainɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni otsu he nii amrɔ nɔŋŋ koni enine ashɛ eko fɛɛ eko nɔ.
Ofainɛ kwɛmɔ shi ni Nyɔŋmɔ ewo adesai yɛ sane nɛɛ he.
7 Ekɛɛ: “Minyɛmimɛi, miikpa nyɛ fai, nyɛkafea efɔŋ.
Yɛ nakai gbɛ nɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ, kaimɔ ní aaakai Yehowa lɛ biɔ nifeemɔ, ní aaafee nɔ ni saa ehiɛ.
2:5-8) Yɛ be mli ni esusuɔ mɛi krokomɛi ahe lɛ, ni eeesa lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehiɛ moŋ lɛ, eto okadi lɛ efɔ shi koni wɔnyiɛ sɛɛ.—Rom.
Akɛni wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔsa ehiɛ ni wɔhi esuɔmɔ lɛ mli hewɔ lɛ, wɔwieɔ taakɛ bɔfo Paulo wie lɛ akɛ: “Wɔmiitao akɛ wɔba wɔjeŋ fɛfɛo [loo wɔye anɔkwa] yɛ nii fɛɛ mli.”
(1 Korintobii 11:1) Ni Paulo ŋma yɛ Yesu he akɛ: “Kristo hu haaa ehe asa ehiɛ.”
“Ofainɛ, bo lɛ, feemɔ akɛ okɛyaahã omralo lɛ ni okwɛ.
Ofainɛ, hã gwantɛŋ hetsɔi lɛ pɛ agbi ni bɔ́ anyɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ fɛɛ nɔ.”
Yibiiwoo lɛ falɛ baafee sɔrɔto, shi Yehowa hiɛ sɔɔ, yɛ bei abɔ ni sɔɔmɔ ni akɛha lɛ ji nɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni wɔsusuma baanyɛ ekɛha.
Wɔbuɔ Yehowa ákɛ wɔ-Naanyo ni hi fe fɛɛ ni wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔsa ehiɛ yɛ bei fɛɛ mli.
Mɛi ni sumɔɔ ni amɛsusu nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni amɛsumɔɔ lɛ he, ni amɛfee nɔ ni amɛsumɔɔ hu—ni mla ko bɛ lɛ, taomɔ nii ko hu bɛ lɛ, naa no he miishɛɛ waa.
Mishwie miyiŋ akɛ, kɛ́ Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ hewalɛ ni ekɛbɔ jeŋ muu nɛɛ fɛɛ —ní minyaa he waa akɛ makwɛ lɛ —no lɛ bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, ebaanyɛ eha mi hewalɛ koni mikɛfee tsakemɔi bɔni afee ni masa ehiɛ.
Shi eka shi faŋŋ akɛ nɔ ni jɛ mli ba ni ji Samariabii ajamɔ lɛ esaaa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ kɛmɔɔɔ shi. —2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 17: 7-33.
Nakai nɔŋŋ hu kɛ́ oosumɔ ni otsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ naanyo lɛ, esa akɛ ofee nɔ ni saa ehiɛ.—Yohane 4:24.
Herode hu enaaa akɛ Yesu efee nɔ fɔŋ ko, no hewɔ lɛ ekɛ lɛ ku sɛɛ kɛba Pilato ŋɔɔ ekoŋŋ.
Ákɛ mɛi ni tamɔɔɔ mɛi ni heɔ susuma ni gbooo lɛ amɛyeɔ lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi efeee yara kɛ susumɔ ni ejaaa akɛ aaajaje akɛ mɔ ni egbo lɛ etee jeŋ kroko mli.
+ 19 Kɛkɛ ni Saul tsu mɛi kɛtee Yishai ŋɔɔ akɛ: “Hã obinuu David ni kwɛɔ toi lɛ aba miŋɔɔ.”
Mɛi krokomɛi ahe tswaa shi babaoo akɛ amɛkɛ nɛkɛ saji nɛɛ aaamaje, kɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ akɛ amɛbaafee klɛŋklɛŋ mɛi ni jie saji nɛɛ akpo amɛha amɛnanemɛi.
Efeɔ nakai kɛtsɔɔ gbɔmɛi ni etsɔɔ amɛ nii ni etsuɔ amɛ koni amɛyatsɔɔ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli amɛha mɛi krokomɛi lɛ nɔ.
+ 15 No hewɔ lɛ, nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɔ nɛ: ‘Gbalɔi ni gbaa yɛ migbɛ́i mli shi mitsuko amɛ, ni amɛkɛɔ akɛ klante kɛ hɔmɔ baŋ shikpɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ lɛ, klante kɛ hɔmɔ baakpãtã amɛhiɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Maŋtsɛ Yehoram baanyɛ ana be babaoo ni ekɛtsu klɛŋklɛŋ bɔfo ni ta okpɔŋɔ nɔ kɛ mɔ ni ji enyɔ, koni yɛ naagbee lɛ, Israel Maŋtsɛ Yoram kɛ Yuda Maŋtsɛ Ahazia amia ni amɛtara amɛshwiilii amli ni amɛkɛ Yehu ayakpe dani eshɛ Yezreel maŋ lɛ mli.
Omɔdɛŋbɔɔ, titri lɛ yɛ Biblia kanemɔ, hesaamɔ kɛha asafoŋ kpeei, kɛ weku nikasemɔ mli lɛ baaha amɛna faŋŋ akɛ nifeemɔi nɛɛ ahe yɛ sɛɛnamɔ waa.
Nɛkɛ nitsumɔtsɛmɛi kpanakui nɛɛ miisumɔ ni amɛtsu amɛ nitsumɔ mli onukpai, nɔkwɛlɔi, kɛ hiɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ—yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, amɛnitsulɔi lɛ fɛɛ—ni amɛbakwɛ nitsumɔ he nine lɛ.
Woloŋmalɔ ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Lori Hope ni eye kansa pɛŋ lɛ wie akɛ: “Dani okɛ nibii ni aŋmala loo sane ko ni kɔɔ kansa he lɛ aaaha mɔ ko ni miiye kansa loo eye kansa pɛŋ lɛ, ehi jogbaŋŋ akɛ ooobi lɛ kɛji ebaasumɔ ni enine ashɛ saji ni tamɔ nakai lɛ anɔ.
Yiŋtoo he miihia kɛji esa akɛ akpɛ yiŋ yɛ saji ni he hiaa waa ahe, tamɔ nɔ ko ni abaahe, Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ saamɔ aloo emaa, tooyeli krɛdɛɛ ni akɛbaamaje Asafo lɛ, aloo shika ni akɛbaatsu kpokpaa nɔkwɛlɔ lɛ kwɛmɔ he nii.
Yɛ Jajelɔ 11:1 lɛ, mɛni wiemɔ ni ji “shɛ oboloo ofɔ̃” lɛ tsɔɔ?
Suɔmɔ tsirɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ni etsu e-Bi lɛ kɛba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ koni ebagbo ehã wɔ.
Kɛ́ Yehowa tsu ebɔfoi ni baatsu nii akɛ eblafoi lɛ (mɛi ni “hii ekpaa” lɛ feɔ amɛhe mfoniri lɛ) koni amɛkpata hemɔkɛyeli kwalɔi lɛ ahiɛ lɛ, mɛi ni ‘akadi amɛhiɛnaai’ lɛ pɛ yi abaabaa.
Ani onuɔ he akɛ jarayeli he adafi fɛɛ ni atswaa daa nɛɛ, nikee nibii ahemɔ he naagba, tsei ni ayeɔ amɛhe samai, kɛ okpɔlɔŋmɛɛi ni atoɔ he gbɛjianɔ ni ayaa, woji ni akɛmajeɔ kɛŋaa mɛi lɛ mli fɛɛ lɛ—etamɔ nɔ ni ájie Yesu kɛjɛ mli kwraa?
Matsu mibinuu, mɔ ni misumɔɔ lɛ lɛ.
Mɛi komɛi wieɔ akɛ amaniɛbɔi ni yɔɔ Sanekpakpai etɛ lɛ amli ni kɔɔ tsumɔ ni Yesu tsu bɔfoi lɛ ni amɛyashiɛ lɛ he lɛ kɛ amɛhe kpãaa gbee.
13 Nitsumɔhe nine lɛ baanyɛ aha ole saji komɛi ni baaye abua bo, shi enyɛŋ eha ole saji ni kɔɔ nitsumɔi ni yɔɔ jɛi lɛ ahe loo amɛtao wɔɔhe amɛha bo.
* 17 Kɛkɛ ni ekɛɛ: “Matsu ní akɛ mitoi lɛ ateŋ abotia kome ni edako abahã bo.”
Shi, jeee mumɔŋ bɔɔ nɔ ko kɛkɛ Yehowa tsu lɛ.

22 Mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ fɛɛ, shi titri lɛ, Kaisare shĩabii+ lɛ miiŋa nyɛ.

18 Ani ole nɔkwɛmɔnii komɛi yɛ Biblia lɛ mli ni tsɔɔ mɛi komɛi ni ha “shika suɔmɔ” loo heloonaa nibii asɛɛtiumɔ fite wekukpãa ni kã amɛ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ lɛ?
3 Ani Ehaŋ Afite Be Lɛlɛŋ?: Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, mɔ ni kɛ tsɔnei ahe nilee nɛɛ tsuɔ nii lɛ nine shɛɛɛ kɔmpiuta he nilee ni tamɔ nɛkɛ nɔ ní efiteee nɔ ko babaoo tamɔ—shika kɛ be fɛɛ.
(Mateo 24:21) Yɛ nakai be lɛ mli lɛ gbɔmɛi baashɛrɛ amɛshika amɛshwie gbɛjegbɛi lɛ anɔ akɛ “nɔ ko ní anyaŋeɔ,” taakɛ Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ.
Emli onukpai lɛ, nyɔɔŋnii hewɔ amɛkojoɔ, ni emli osɔfoi lɛ, nyɔmɔwoo hewɔ amɛtsɔ̃ɔ nii, ni emli gbalɔi lɛ, shika hewɔ amɛgbaa . . .
Yeyeeyefeemɔ nɛɛ eha mɛi komɛi miitiu ninámɔ sɛɛ, kɛjwɛŋmɔ lɛ akɛ no baaha amɛná nɔ ni he hiaa amɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Dario hã ajie naatsĩi ni akɛba nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ, ni efã koni ajɛ maŋtsɛ fotro lɛ mli aha Yudafoi lɛ shika kɛha nitsumɔ nɛɛ.
Nakai nɔŋŋ hu bɔfo lɛ ekɛɛɛ akɛ shika ji nɔ̃ titri ní kɛ “nibii fɔji” baa, aloo ákɛ shika ji naagba fɛɛ naagba ní baa lɛ shishifã.
No hewɔ lɛ kɛ obuɔ ohe akɛ niiatsɛ jio, ohiafo jio, tsi ohe kɛjɛ shika suɔmɔ ni ooona lɛ he.
Shika ni mináa amrɔ nɛɛ haa minine shɛɔ hiamɔ nibii tamɔ atade ni yɔɔ hiŋmɛi nɔ nɛkɛ lɛ nɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ ekɛɛ: “Nyɛkaŋɔa nɔ ko nyɛhiɛa nyɛdɛŋ yɛ nyɛ gbɛfaa lɛ mli, nyɛkahiɛa tso loo kotoku loo aboloo loo shika loo atadei enyɔ.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, heloonaa nibii kɛ shika sɛɛtiumɔ ní husu bɛ he lɛ haa mɛi pii biɔ amɛhe akɛ, ‘Etamɔ nɔ ni wɔnáa nibii heei ní wɔheɔ lɛ eko fɛɛ eko he miishɛɛ; ni kɛlɛ mɛni hewɔ ni, yɛ enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ ahe susumɔ sɛɛ lɛ, nɛkɛ ŋɔɔmɔi nɛɛ fɛɛ ebatsɔɔɔ henumɔ ní haa mɔ tsui nyɔɔ emli waa lɛ?’
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ bɔɔ wɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Shika suɔmɔ akaba nyɛjeŋba mli, ni nyɛmii ashɛa nii ni nyɛyɔɔ lɛ he.”
Mɛi akpekpei abɔ tsuɔ nii nyɔɔŋ kɛ shwane bɔni afee ni amɛná shika babaoo bɔ ni amɛbaanyɛ.
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ yɛ Jajelɔ 7:12 lɛ akɛ: “Nilee tamɔ hɔɔŋ, tamɔ bɔ ni shika hu tamɔ hɔɔŋ lɛ; shi nɔ ni nilee kɛfe ji akɛ nilee hereɔ etsɛ yiwala.”
Amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa mi koni maná nitsumɔ, ni yɛ bei komɛi amli lɛ, amɛkɛ shika keɔ mi.
Osɔfoi komɛi yeɔ amɛ asafoku lɛ ahe nii, ni amɛkɛ lakamɔ wiemɔi heɔ shika ní amɛkɛ deŋmegbomɔ ená lɛ yɛ amɛdɛŋ—ni esoro enɛ kwraa yɛ Ŋmalɛ mli famɔ ni akɛha lɛ he, akɛ: “Yaka nyɛná, yaka nyɛŋɔhãa!”—Mateo 10:8; 1 Petro 5:2, 3.
Kwɛ bɔ ni ohiɛ baafee bo yaa aha akɛ aaaju oshika kɛ nibii ni okɛ deŋmegbomɔ ebɔ mɔdɛŋ otsu ona lɛ!
“Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, mɛi babaoo miiná shika he naagba, titri lɛ yɛ be ni nibii ajara etee hiɛ waa nɛɛ mli.
Nɛgbɛ shika ni akɛbaatsu hiamɔ nibii nɛɛ ahe nii lɛ jɛɔ kɛbaa?
Aloo amɛkɛ amɛhe fɔ̃ɔ shika lɛ nɔ babaoo moŋ?
Manyɛ makwɛ helatsɛmɛi babaoo koni maná shika pii, shi no feemɔ haŋ wɔsɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ jogbaŋŋ.
Wolo tɛtrɛɛ nɛɛ tsɔɔ bɔ ni esa akɛ aŋmɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ yɛ heloonaa nibii ahe, ni ewieɔ nibii etɛ komɛi ni jara wa waa ni anyɛŋ akɛ shika ahe lɛ hu ahe.”
Mɛi komɛi po ni etamɔ nɔ ni amɛsumɔɔ gbɔmɔ ni amɛmli hi lɛ tsakeɔ amɛnifeemɔ kɛ́ eba lɛ shika he sane, ni amɛbafeɔ mɛi ni yitseiaŋ wala ni tseee amɛhiɛ amɛhaaa mɔ.
Akɛni miji kromɔ yɛ bii nyɔŋma ateŋ hewɔ lɛ, beni miye afii 13 lɛ mibɔi nitsumɔ koni mikɛye mibua kɛkwɛ weku lɛ.
Petro ye Kristo he odase etsɔɔ Kornelio, eweku lɛ, kɛ Jeŋmajiaŋbii krokomɛi.
Alexander tabilɔi lɛ ye Persia asraafoi lɛ anɔ kunim kwraa, ni Dario jo foi, ni eshi eweku lɛ yɛ Alexander dɛŋ.
Taakɛ ekolɛ ole lɛ, nɛkɛ nifeemɔ ni tee nɔ diɛŋtsɛ yɛ shihilɛ mli nɛɛ maa nɔ mi akɛ nibii eyaaa nɔ jogbaŋŋ kɛhaaa wekui pii yɛ bii atsɔsemɔ mli.
Kɛ́ ootao Gemaria kɛ Shafan he saji babaoo lɛ, no lɛ kwɛmɔ saneyitso ni ji “Ani Ole Shafan kɛ Eweku Lɛ?”
(Efesobii 6:4) Kwɛ miishɛɛ ni Yehowa baaná beni enaa be fɛɛ be akɛ nɛkɛ weku nɛɛ miibɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛhiɛ emuuyeli mli lɛ!
Nibii ni obaanyɛ osusu he lɛ fa babaoo—miishɛɛ ni wɔnaa yɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli, wɔ gbɔjɔmɔi kɛ fãtɔɔi, wɔ nijiaŋwujeei, wɔ shika gbɛfaŋ naagbai, nɔnyɛɛi ni wɔkɛkpeɔ yɛ nitsumɔhe loo skul, wɔwekui ahilɛ-kɛhamɔ, kɛ wɔ asafo lɛ mumɔŋ shihilɛ, kɛji wɔɔtsĩ fioo komɛi pɛ tã.
Ni ekolɛ ebaabi mɔdɛŋbɔɔ kɛ gbɛjianɔtoo kpakpa koni wɔnyɛ wɔha wɔgbɛkɛ Weku Jamɔ lɛ afee nɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ, ni sɛɛnamɔ yɔɔ he, ni wɔfolɔɔɔ mli.
Yɛ hewalɛ ni Ezra wo mɛi lɛ hewɔ lɛ, wekui 1,500 ní ekolɛ mɛi aaafee 6,000 yɔɔ mli kpɛlɛ akɛ amɛbaaku amɛsɛɛ kɛya amɛjakumaŋ.
No hewɔ lɛ, fɔlɔi kɛ amɛhiɛ fɔɔ amɛ wekui anɔ bei pii, titri lɛ amɛbii, koni amɛye amɛbua amɛ yɛ gbɔlɛ be mli.

12:1) Be ni akɛtsuɔ nii yɛ teemɔŋ nikasemɔ kɛ weku Biblia nikasemɔ mli, kpeeiyaa mli, kɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ he baa sɛɛnamɔ kwraa fe be ni afiteɔ kɛtaoɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ Internet lɛ nɔ kɛ gbɛkpamɔ akɛ aaaná nɔ ko ni he baaba sɛɛnamɔ.

11 Kɛ wɔtee sɛɛ yɛ yinɔsane mli ekolɛ aaafee afii 4,000 lɛ, wɔkɛ Akadiabii ablema adesã ko ni ehe gbɛi ni atsɛɔ lɛ Gilgamesh Ekaafeemɔi lɛ kpeɔ.
Wɔbaajie Nyɔŋmɔ yi daa.
16:13) Wɔbaanyɛ wɔŋɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ akɛ gbɛtsɔɔlɔ ko ni toɔ etsui shi.
Akɛni wɔhiɔ shi tamɔ bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ sumɔɔ ni wɔhi shi —yɛ nyɔŋmɔjamɔ hetuu-kɛhamɔ naa hewɔ lɛ —ehaa je lɛ nyɛ̃ɛɔ wɔ, ni enɛ kɛ kaai baa wɔhemɔkɛyeli nɔ be fɛɛ be.
Daa Hɔgbaa lɛ, yɛ be mli ni wɔkɛ sɔlemɔ ekpa kpee lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, wɔkɛ be fioo kaseɔ lala.
Wɔtee nɔ wɔsɔle wɔha Yehowa, wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ wɔfee tsakemɔi, ni yɛ naagbee lɛ wɔbafee mɛi sa kɛha baptisimɔ.—Nyɛkanea Kolosebii 1:9, 10.
João kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ wɔnyɛmimɛi Portugalbii lɛ baanyɛ ahi jɛmɛ ni amɛsɔmɔ Yehowa yɛ anɔkwayeli mli lɛ, mɛni hewɔ wɔnyɛŋ wɔfee nakai nɔŋŋ yɛ jɛmɛ?”
Paulo jaje akɛ: “Wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔ-Nuntsɔ Yesu Kristo tsɛ lɛ shi [NW shishigbɛ niŋmaa, “wɔsɔleɔ daa”] yɛ nyɛhewɔ daa nɛɛ yɛ wɔsɔlemɔi amli.”
(Luka 21:19) Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, nɔ ni wɔhalaa yɛ enɛ gbɛfaŋ lɛ jieɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ wɔtsui mli lɛ kpo.
Mɛɛ kaai fɔlɔ kome mɔ ko kɛkpeɔ, ni te wɔbuɔ gbɔmɛi ni tamɔ lɛ wɔhaa tɛŋŋ?
4:10) Nyɛhãa wɔ diɛŋtsɛ hu wɔyaa wɔhiɛ yɛ mumɔŋ, koni wɔnyɛ wɔsɔmɔ Yehowa jogbaŋŋ.
Eji anɔkwale akɛ “wɔ fɛɛ wɔtɔɔ babaoo.”
Yɛ maji komɛi anɔ lɛ, kɛ́ mɔ ko tsɛ mɔ ko ni ye lɛ onukpa lɛ gbɛi kpeŋ lɛ, etsɔɔɔ bulɛ, bɛja mɔ lɛ eha hegbɛ akɛ etsɛ lɛ nakai.
No hewɔ lɛ wɔshĩ buu yɛ shikpɔŋ fioo ko ni eshwɛ yɛ mɔ ko ni yɔɔ wiemɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ lɛ ŋmɔ mli.
Esaaa akɛ wɔsusuɔ he dani wɔfee.
18 No hewɔ lɛ, Mose ku esɛɛ kɛtee eshaanuu Yetro+ ŋɔɔ ni eyakɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Ofainɛ, miitao maku misɛɛ ni maya minyɛmimɛi ní yɔɔ Ejipt lɛ aŋɔɔ ní mayakwɛ akɛ amɛyɛ wala mli lolo lo.”
Ni Shiwoo Shikpɔŋ lɛ hu kã amɛhiɛ kpaakpa, ni no hewɔ lɛ nɔ̃ pɛ ni ebaabi ji ní amɛbɛŋkɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ tamɔ bɔ ni meele ko bɛŋkɛɔ la ko ni tsɔɔ lɛ gbɛ akɛ eshɛ he ni eyaa lɛ he lɛ.
7 No hewɔ lɛ, Satan je Yehowa hiɛ etee, ni ehã asanei* ni waa mɔ he waa tsɛ̃rɛ̃ Hiob+ kɛjɛ enane shishi aahu kɛyashi epampam.
Nakai ji bɔ ni amaniɛbɔɔ ko ni jɛ Ireland lɛ wie yɛ shihilɛ mli ni je lɛ yɔɔ mli lɛ he.
Lamɔ lɛ gba enaa aahu akɛ, enyɛɛɛ ewɔ.
2 No hewɔ lɛ, maŋtsɛ lɛ fã koni atsɛ majikfeelɔi lɛ, kɛ okɔmfoi lɛ, kɛ ŋkunyaayelɔi lɛ, kɛ Kaldeabii* lɛ kɛba koni amɛbatsɔɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ elamɔi lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ etao wolo lɛ, ni beni ena lɛ, lɛ hu ekɛha ebinuu lɛ.
Miikpa gbɛ akɛ mikɛ shitee-kɛ-woo baakpe, no hewɔ lɛ misɔle mibi Nyɔŋmɔ ni eha mi nilee kɛ ekaa ni mikɛkpee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baaba lɛ naa.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ dabi; no hewɔ lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni ohiɛ asɔ sui kpakpai ni ohefatalɔ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ, ni oha ohiɛsɔɔ lɛ aje kpo yɛ owiemɔi amli.—Abɛi 31:28.
Nakai ni amɛfeɔ lɛ haa amɛjieɔ amɛjwɛŋmɔ kɛjɛɔ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛnaagbai lɛ anɔ, ni amɛkɛ amɛjwɛŋmɔ maa nibii ni hi titri lɛ anɔ.—Fil.
No hewɔ lɛ, wɔná miishɛɛ waa akɛ wɔná wɔle akɛ nyɛsɛɛ afi lɛ kpokpaa wulu nɔ kpee lɛ saneyitso lɛ baafee “Nyɔŋmɔ Gbalɛ Wiemɔ” lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ mɛi ni teɔ shi amɛwoɔ lɛ lɛ akɛ: “Lɛɛlɛŋ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, toohelɔi lɛ kɛ ashawoi lɛ miitsɔ nyɛhiɛ kɛmiiya Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli.”
5:9) Shi mɛni hãa esoroɔ wɔ lɛ?
Nɛkɛ mlai nɛɛ ateŋ ekome tsɔɔ bɔ ni esa akɛ ato adesa sɛbo he gbɛjianɔ aha, ní afũ jogbaŋŋ yɛ he ni kɛ ŋsara lɛ teŋ jekɛ, bɔni afee ni ekafite he ni gbɔmɛi lɛ hiɔ lɛ.
“Kɛji oba nitsumɔ mli hejɔɔmɔ lɛ, kaakpɛ oyiŋ akɛ obaagbɔjɔ ohe yɛ afi loo nɔ mli.
(Mateo 24:37-39) Nakai nɔŋŋ bɔfo Petro ŋma akɛ, taakɛ bɔ ni “nu ŋɔ no be lɛŋ je lɛ ni ehiɛ kpata lɛ,” nakai nɔŋŋ hu “kojomɔ kɛ gbɔmɛi ni kwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ahiɛkpatamɔ gbi lɛ” woɔ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ je lɛ he gbeyei.—2 Petro 3:5-7.
No hewɔ lɛ, mikɛ migbɛbimɔ wolo yaha.”
Ekɛ woji nyɔŋma woɔ taip-raita lɛ mli shikome ni ekalaa lɛ waa bɔni afee ni niŋmaa okadii lɛ fɛɛ aje kpo faŋŋ yɛ woji lɛ fɛɛ nɔ.
Yesu bɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Nakai mɔ ni bɔɔ jwetri ehaa lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe, shi ejeee niiatsɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ yɔɔ.” —Luka 12: 16-21.
Kɛji nakai ni lɛ, mɛni hewɔ eba naagbee?
Fɛɛ sɛɛ po lɛ, kɔɔyɔɔ ni wɔmuɔ lɛ babaoo yɛ lolo, ni etãaa da.
Yɛ enɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ mitee nɔ mikɛ lɛ gba Biblia mli anɔkwalei lɛ ahe sane afii 37 eyɛ mli akɛ etamɔ nɔ ni miigbo yaka deŋme.”
8 Gbɛtsii nibii krokomɛi baanyɛ atsĩ sanekpakpa lɛ jijemɔ naa.
Gbɛtsɔɔmɔi ni ekɛhã lɛ lɛ ekomɛi yɛ ni yɛ adesai ahiɛ lɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni nilee bɛ mli.
Bi ohe akɛ: ‘Ani otii ni mikɛmamɔ mihiɛ kɛ bɔ ni mihiɔ shi mihaa lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ miheɔ miyeɔ akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ ji be ni esa akɛ atsu Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa shiɛmɔ kɛ kaselɔfeemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ?
Wɔleee nɔ ko ni hi fe nibii ni wɔná yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ni asaŋ nɔ ko bɛ ni shɛɔ he bibioo po. . . .
Sanekpakpa lɛ ni Akɛbaa Navajo Shikpɔŋ Nɔ
5:20) Esa akɛ wɔkɛ hiɛdɔɔ atsu mɛɛ nitsumɔi kpakpai?
(1 Korintobii 11:23-26) Eba akɛ wɔɔya nɔ wɔtao mɛi ni he jɔ ni kpɛlɛɔ sanekpakpa lɛ nɔ lɛ.
Wiemɔ ni awieɔ yɛ be ni sa mli lɛ hi.
Ni kɛlɛ, kɛ nibii ejaaa po lɛ, wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔkɛ shishinumɔ loo jwɛŋmɔ kpakpa atsu nii, aloo jeee nakai?
Gbɛi ni Atsɔɔ nɔ Ashiɛɔ Sane Kpakpa Lɛ
16 Yɛ no sɛɛ lɛ Yohane ŋma akɛ: “Ni mina bɔfo kroko miifiliki yɛ ŋwɛi teŋ, ni ehiɛ naanɔ sanekpakpa ni eyaajaje etsɔɔ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ jeŋmaŋ fɛɛ jeŋmaŋ kɛ akutso fɛɛ akutso kɛ majianɔwiemɔi fɛɛ kɛ maŋ fɛɛ maŋ, ni ekɛ gbee wulu kɛɛ: Nyɛshea Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei ni nyɛkɛ anunyam ahaa lɛ, ejaakɛ ekojomɔ ŋmɛlɛtswaa lɛ eshɛ; ni nyɛjaa mɔ ni fee ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ kɛ ŋshɔ kɛ nu bui ni baa lɛ.”
10 Be ni ena ninaa lɛ nɔŋŋ lɛ, wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ wɔbaaya Makedonia, ejaakɛ wɔmu sane naa akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ etsɛ wɔ koni wɔyajaje sane kpakpa lɛ wɔtsɔɔ amɛ.
“Anɔkwale lɛ sanekpakpa” lɛ gbalaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛbaa mɛni nɔ?
Eji nɔ ni woɔ mɔ hewalɛ akɛ wɔɔle akɛ bɔfoi yeɔ amɛbuaa wɔ yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli
3 Hɛɛ, kɛjɛ afi 1914 kɛbaa nɛɛ, sane hee ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ebafata Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa lɛ he.
Wɔkaneɔ yɛ bɔfoi lɛ ahe akɛ “amɛfɔ̃ɔɔ nitsɔɔmɔ kɛ Yesu Kristo shiɛmɔ yɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ kɛ shiai be fɛɛ be.”
11 Weku nikasemɔ ni afeɔ daa he hiaa.
Beni eye afii 40 yɛ afi 1929 lɛ, ekɛ sanekpakpa lɛ yaha mɛi ni yɔɔ nakai ais kɛ la shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ.
KASELƆ Yakobo ŋma akɛ: “Duromɔ nii kpakpai fɛɛ kɛ nikeenii ni hi kɛwula shi fɛɛ lɛ, ŋwɛi ejɛɔ ekpelekeɔ shi, kɛjɛɔ lai atsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ.”
(3 Mose 19:17, 18, Ta) Kristojamɔ Shishitolɔ lɛ jaje akɛ: “Shi nyɛ mɛi ni nyɛboɔ toi nɛɛ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, Nyɛsumɔa nyɛhenyɛlɔi; nyɛfea mɛi ni he tsɛɔ nyɛ lɛ ejurɔ; . . . ni nyɛnyɔmɔwoo aaafa, ni nyɛaatsɔmɔ Ŋwɛinyo lɛ bii, shi lɛ lɛ emli hi yɛ trumui kɛ mɛi fɔji anɔ.”
9 Yesu tuu sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛmɔ kɛ ehe nitsɔɔmɔ ewo wɔdɛŋ.
Bɔni afee ni “Kristo, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ subaŋ lɛ, anunyam sanekpakpa lɛ la ni tsoɔ lɛ akakpɛ miiha amɛ.”—2 Korintobii 4:3, 4; 1 Yohane 5:19.
16 Nɔ ni fata ‘nitsumɔ kpakpa fɛɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa mli yibii ni aaawo’ lɛ he hu ji weku gbɛnaa nii ahe nii ni wɔɔtsu kɛ nanemɛi Kristofoi ahe ni wɔɔsusu.
4 Okɛ loo ni asaa lɛ awo mli,+ loo lɛ hei ni hi lɛ fɛɛ,
8 Shi wɔgbii nɛɛ amli lɛ, ekolɛ ehe ehiaŋ ni wɔya maŋsɛɛ koni wɔyagba sanekpakpa lɛ wɔtsɔɔ wiemɔi srɔtoi fɛɛ amli bii.
Agbɛnɛ hu, susumɔ Hoshea 4: 11 lɛ mli wiemɔi lɛ ahe okwɛ: “Wein kɛ wein hee fiteɔ mɔ jwɛŋmɔ.”
Mɛi sumɔɔ wo yɛ eŋɔɔmɔ kɛ bɔ ni etsaa helai lɛ hewɔ.
Nakai nɔŋŋ eji yɛ “kalamo,” ni ji kaanee tso ní jeɔ ŋma, ní ji tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ní akɛfutuɔ mu krɔŋkrɔŋ ní akɛfɔɔ mɔ mu lɛ mli lɛ hu gbɛfaŋ.
Ŋɔɔmɔ kɛ Joomɔ Shɛɛ Sane
Okɛ nakai anɔkwa sane lɛ ato nɔ ni Salomo yɔse nɛɛ he: “Nitsulɔ lɛ, eye nii fioo jio, pii jio, ewɔ ŋɔɔ enaa; shi tɔ ni niiatsɛ tɔɔ lɛ haaa ewɔ.”—Jajelɔ 5:10-12.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yehowa Odasefoi ejaje bɔ ni Maŋtsɛyeli shɛɛ sane lɛ ŋɔɔ tamɔ agbami lɛ amɛtsɔɔ yɛ he fɛɛ he yɛ?
Taakɛ eji yɛ gbalɔ Yesaia gbii lɛ amli lɛ, ŋmɛnɛ, gbɔmɛi yɛ ni “tsɛɔ efɔŋ akɛ ekpakpa kɛ ekpakpa hu akɛ efɔŋ! mɛi ni ŋɔɔ duŋ feɔ la, ni amɛŋɔɔ la hu amɛfeɔ duŋ, mɛi ni ŋɔɔ joomɔ feɔ ŋɔɔmɔ, ni amɛŋɔɔ ŋɔɔmɔ amɛfeɔ joomɔ lɛ!”
Etsɛ lɛ akɛ “ŋmajee kpakpa kɛ afɔle kɛ ŋɔɔmɔ ni sa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ.”
Abɛi 16:24 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Naajɔlɛ wiemɔi tamɔ wo agbaku, amɛŋɔɔ susuma naa, ni amɛhaa wui náa hewalɛ.”
21 Yɛ be ni sa mli lɛ, nɛkɛ wolo nɛɛ mli sane lɛ hu bafee nɔ ni ŋɔɔ “asafo babaoo . . . ni jɛ jeŋmaŋ fɛɛ jeŋmaŋ kɛ akutsei kɛ maji kɛ majianɔwiemɔi amli” ni ana amɛ akɛ amɛmiidɔmɔ ŋtsɔi yɛ nihiinii ni amɛnaa akɛ afeɔ yɛ Kristendom teŋ lɛ anaa.
Ŋmalɛ lɛ bɔɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Wein kɛ wein hee fiteɔ mɔ jwɛŋmɔ.”
Maŋtsɛ Salomo ni hi shi yɛ blema Israel lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Nitsulɔ lɛ, eye nii fioo jio, pii jio, ewɔ ŋɔɔ enaa; shi tɔ ni niiatsɛ tɔɔ lɛ haaa ewɔ.”
Ŋmalɛi lɛ kɛɔ wɔ yɛ gbɛ ni sa jogbaŋŋ nɔ akɛ: “Naajɔlɛ wiemɔi tamɔ wo agbaku, amɛŋɔɔ susuma naa, ni amɛhaa wui naa hewalɛ.”—Abɛi 16:24.
2:15, 16—Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ wɔji “Kristo ŋmajee kpakpa”?
12 Mɔ ni sɔmɔɔ lɛ, kɛji nii fioo eyeɔ jio, nii pii eyeɔ jio lɛ, ewɔ ŋɔɔ enaa, shi nii babaoo ni niiatsɛ yɔɔ lɛ hãaa ewɔ.
Kwɛ bɔ ni mimii shɛ mihe akɛ mikɛ minyɛmimɛi lɛ aaabɔ kɛ miishɛɛ nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ, ni kɛ makɛɛ lɛ masaa mawo mimumɔŋ nitoohe lɛ obɔ ekoŋŋ!
• Mɛɛ be wɔsɔlemɔi lɛ batsɔɔ tamɔ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ni jeɔ ŋma waa yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ?
Shi eŋɔɔ nɛkɛ anɔkwale Kristofoi nɛɛ anaa akɛ amɛaale nɛkɛ kojomɔi nɛɛ ni amɛna amɛhe akɛ Yehowa kɛ amɛ miitsu nii ekoŋŋ yɛ ejajemɔ mli.—Lala 19:10, 11.
Yohane kuu lɛ kɛ amɛhefatalɔi lɛ jajeɔ ŋɔɔmɔ kɛ joomɔ sane amɛhaa adesai fɛɛ
155 6 24 Ŋɔɔmɔ kɛ Joomɔ Shɛɛ Sane
Ni eeeye nɛkɛ wolo nɛɛ ŋɔɔ ejaakɛ ejɛɛhe lɛ jɛ ŋwɛi.
Gbalɔ Yesaia wie mɛi ni yɔɔ duŋ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ mli lɛ ahe beni eŋma akɛ: “Kpóo ha mɛi ni tsɛɔ efɔŋ akɛ ekpakpa kɛ ekpakpa hu akɛ efɔŋ! mɛi ni ŋɔɔ duŋ feɔ la, ní amɛŋɔɔ la hu amɛfeɔ duŋ, mɛi ni ŋɔɔ joomɔ feɔ ŋɔɔmɔ, ní amɛŋɔɔ ŋɔɔmɔ amɛfeɔ joomɔ lɛ!”
Nyɔŋmɔ webii ewo Maŋtsɛyeli yibii ni ŋɔɔ, tamɔ agbamii kpakpai
2: Mɛɛ Gbɛ nɔ Sɔlemɔi ni Sa Tamɔ Tsofa-kɛ-Ŋma yɛ Yehowa Hiɛ?—Lala 141:2; Kpoj.
Amɛkɛ toiŋjɔlɛ he lakamɔ wiemɔi ní ŋɔɔ wɔleee gbɔmɛi lɛ, shi moŋ amɛkɛ ekãa bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ní amɛhɛle amɛ shi akɛ be ní wɔyɔɔ mli nɛɛ ji tawu be diɛŋtsɛ. —Yesaia 56: 10- 12; Romabii 13: 11, 12; 1 Tesalonikabii 5:6.
9 Gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi pii eyɔse akɛ esaaa akɛ amɛfeɔ keketee kɛ amɛmiihala nibii ni amɛkɛbaajie amɛ hiɛtserɛ loo amɛkɛbaaná amɛhewɔŋ miishɛɛ lɛ.
13 Gbalɛi ni yɔɔ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ pii eba mli momo.
1:16) Yɛ wɔtsui ni baanyɔ wɔmli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, wɔbaana akɛ mɛi krokomɛi kɛ wiemɔi ni Paulo tsɛ́ yisɛɛ yɛ Romabii 10:15 lɛ baakpã gbee akɛ: “Kwɛ bɔ ni hejɔlɛ he sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi ni shiɛɔ nii kpakpai lɛ anaji yɔɔ fɛo ha!”—Yes.
Mɔ ni aaahi maŋ nɛŋ lɛ, eeegbo kɛ klante kɛ hɔmɔ kɛ gbele hela naa; shi mɔ moŋ ní aaaje kpo, ní eyagbee Kaldeabii ní ebɔ nsara ewo nyɛhe lɛ adɛŋ lɛ, eyi aaaná wala, ni esusuma aaatsɔ haanɔ̃ ahã lɛ.”
2 Ebɛ naakpɛɛ mɔ akɛ je nɛɛ bɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ kpakpa.
Yesu kɛɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ ni amɛsɔle koni Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ aba ejaakɛ ekɛ jalɛ kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ baaba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
4 Yɛ afi ni ji kpawo lɛ nɔ lɛ, Yehoiada tsu ayatsɛ mɛi oha nɔkwɛlɔi ni kwɛɔ maŋtsɛ hebulɔi* kɛ maŋtsɛ shĩa bulɔi*+ lɛ anɔ lɛ koni amɛba eŋɔɔ yɛ Yehowa shĩa lɛ.
2 Paulo le akɛ, Yesu afɔleshãa lɛ nɔ Nyɔŋmɔ baatsɔ ehã wɔ nibii kpakpai fɛɛ ni ewo shi akɛ ebaahã wɔ lɛ.
Jwɛŋmɔ ni tamɔ nɔ ni mɛi ni yɔɔ Sodom kɛ Gomora lɛ hiɛ lɛ miiná hiɛtserɛjiemɔ nifeemɔ ni yaa nɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ nɔ hewalɛ.
45 Gbɔi baaba abakoto mihiɛ;+
23 Agbɛnɛ, miitsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ni ebaye odase eshi mi,* akɛ mɔbɔ ni minaa nyɛ lɛ hewɔ ni mibako Korinto lolo lɛ.
Anaa faŋŋ akɛ Yesu miiwie Roma asraafoi ní baaba yɛ afi 66 Ŋ.B. kɛ amɛ aflaŋai krɛdɛɛi lɛ ahe.
Kɛ́ nugbɔ nɛ ni shikpɔŋ lɛ bɔi nibaa ekoŋŋ lɛ, akɛ yijiemɔ haa apasa nyɔŋmɔi lɛ; wɔŋjalɔi lɛ nuɔ he akɛ ama amɛ apasa hemɔkɛyelii lɛ anɔ mi.
15 Asafo babaoo lɛ ni amɛ hu aŋmaa amɛgbɛii yɛ wala wolo lɛ mli lɛ baaje amanehulu kpeteŋkpele lɛ mli hiɛkalɔi.
No hewɔ lɛ mije kpo ni mikɛo abakpe, ní mabɔ mɔdɛŋ matao ohiɛgbɛ, ni minao nɛɛ.”—Abɛi 7:13-15.
Sane lɛ kɛɔ wɔ akɛ: “Yesu kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: [Nyɛsaa] nyɛnaa nɔ ko.
Koni wɔná naanɔ wala.
+ 3 Enɛ ji naanɔ wala lɛ,+ akɛ amɛbaale bo,* anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ kome lɛ,+ kɛ Yesu Kristo, mɔ ni otsu lɛ lɛ.
Beni Yesaia 60:1 lɛ wieɔ anɔkwa jamɔ ni aaato ama shi ekoŋŋ yɛ blema kɛ agbɛnɛ hu yɛ wɔgbii nɛɛ amli lɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Tee shi ni otso, shi ola lɛ miiba, ni Yehowa anunyam lɛ miikpɛ́ yɛ onɔ!”
10 Amɛteŋ mɔ ko wekunyo* baaba ni ebahole amɛ kɛje kpo, ní eyashã amɛ ekomekomei.
Ofainɛ ba mli.”
Ani nɔ ko fɔŋ eba enɔ?
KASELƆ Yakobo ŋma akɛ: “Duromɔ nii kpakpai fɛɛ kɛ nikeenii ni hi kɛwula shi fɛɛ lɛ, ŋwɛi ejɛɔ ekpelekeɔ shi, kɛjɛɔ lai atsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ.”
Shi ani wɔbaanyɛ wɔná nɔmimaa akɛ ebaaba mli, ni mɛɛ hewalɛ nakai gbɛkpamɔ lɛ baanyɛ aná yɛ wɔnɔ bianɛ?
+ 2 Mina Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ anunyam lɛ jɛ bokãgbɛ kɛmiiba yɛ jɛmɛ,+ ni egbee tamɔ nui babaoo agbɛɛmɔ;+ ni enunyam lɛ kpɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
9 Shi Obadia kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Mɛɛ esha mifee hewɔ ni okɛ mi, otsulɔ woɔ Ahab dɛŋ koni egbe mi nɛɛ?
Yehowa ajie suɔmɔ ni tsakeee kpo atsɔɔ nyɛ,+ tamɔ bɔ ni nyɛjie kpo nyɛtsɔɔ hii ni egboi lɛ kɛ mi lɛ.
Bɔfo Paulo ha hetoo akɛ: “Minyɛɔ nii fɛɛ mifeɔ yɛ mɔ ni wajeɔ mi ni ji Kristo lɛ mli.”
Nyɛyaa nɔ nyɛfea enɛ kɛkaia mi.’”—Luka 22:19.
45 Gbɔi baaba abakoto mihiɛ;+
Jɛmɛ ni mibana lɛ ha mibasumɔ akɛ mikɛ mihe baaha ni matsu nii yɛ jɛmɛ.
Beni Awo hiɛ mi—ekromɔ bi lɛ—hɔ lɛ, esɔle akɛ kɛji gbekɛ nuu ji mi lɛ, ekolɛ matsɔ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa jajelɔ.
Mijwɛŋ bɔ ni Yesu jie suɔmɔ kpo be ni mɛi wo emli la po lɛ he, ni no ye ebua mi ni mi hu mijie suɔmɔ ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ kpo mitsɔɔ yoo nɛɛ.”
23 Agbɛnɛ, miitsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ni ebaye odase eshi mi,* akɛ mɔbɔ ni minaa nyɛ lɛ hewɔ ni mibako Korinto lolo lɛ.
Shi Ataa kɛ Awo tsiii mihiɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ yɛ saji babaoo ni mibiɔ akɛ gbekɛ lɛ hewɔ.
Agbɛnɛ hu, dani wɔbaakpɛ wɔyiŋ yɛ sane ko he lɛ, wɔbaabi wɔhe akɛ: ‘Mɛɛ Biblia mli shishitoo mlai baanyɛ aye abua mi ni makpɛ yiŋ ni ja?
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Yehowa haa mi mihiamɔ nii, ewoɔ mi hewalɛ, ni ehaa mikpɛɔ miyiŋ yɛ nilee mli.
Dani mashi koni mayafata Nyɛminuu Stead he lɛ, minyɛ kɛ mi wie yɛ teemɔŋ.
Shi beni miwɔ lɛ, ekɛ ebi ni egbo lɛ fɔ̃ mimasɛi ni ewo mibi lɛ.
Kɛ amɛwami yi lɛ, amɛaawa nyɛ hu yi.”
Ni Yehowa wajeɔ mi daa.
Nyɛbaaná nyɛle akɛ, Yehowa, taiatsɛ lɛ, ji mɔ ni tsu mi nyɛŋɔɔ.—Zak.
(Lala 1:1, 2; Hebribii 10:24, 25) Ani Yehowa shɛɛ sane lɛ bɛŋkɛ mitsui waa tamɔ “la ní tsoɔ yɛ mitsui mli, ní aŋa yi awo miwui amli,” ni tsirɛɔ mi koni mikɛ mihe awo Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛmɔ kɛ kaselɔ feemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli?
Bɔni afee ni manyɛ maya nɔ matsu nii akɛ nɔkwɛlɔ gbɛfalɔ lɛ, wɔkpɛ wɔyiŋ akɛ Nela akpa be-fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ ni eku esɛɛ kɛya shia koni eyakwɛ wɔbiyoo lɛ.
Mɛi ni mileee po baasɔmɔ mi.
3 Ekɛɛ mi akɛ: “Bo Israel, mitsulɔ ji bo,+
Eyɛ mli akɛ Lidia nu shishi akɛ etsɛ miitao koni ejie ejwɛŋmɔ kɛjɛ naagba lɛ nɔ moŋ, shi Lidia kɛɛ akɛ: “Biblia lɛ ni mikase lɛ ha mi nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni mitaoɔ kɛteke nɔ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ́ ona Yehowa adebɔɔ nibii fɛfɛji lɛ eko lɛ, obaanyɛ obi ohe akɛ, ‘Mɛni enɛ tsɔɔ mi yɛ Yehowa he?’
Enɛ ha miná miishɛɛ babaoo.
Ni ekɛɛ: Bɔ ni okɛɛ Israelbii lɛ nɛ: Mi ji tsu mi nyɛŋɔɔ nɛɛ.”
(Luka 22: 24-27) Kɛkɛ ni ekɛ nɔ ni abaanyɛ atsɛ lɛ akɛ Kristo mla lɛ koŋtɛ lɛ ha, akɛ: “Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.” —Yohane 13:34.
Ebɛ naakpɛɛ mɔ akɛ Yesu Kristo kɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
“Miihã nyɛ kitã hee akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe; bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe nakai nɔŋŋ.
34 Miihã nyɛ kitã hee akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe; bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ,+ nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe nakai nɔŋŋ.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
5 Yɛ naagbee sɔlemɔ ni Yesu kɛ ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi 11 lɛ sɔle lɛ mli lɛ, etsɔɔ akɛ le ní aaale Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ suɔmɔ ní aaaya nɔ aná lɛ yɛ tsakpaa, ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mijie ogbɛi lɛ kpo mitsɔɔ amɛ, ni masaa majie lɛ kpo matsɔɔ, koni suɔmɔ ni okɛ sumɔ mi lɛ ahi amɛmli, ni mi hu mahi amɛmli.”
Be ni Yesu muɔ esɔlemɔ lɛ naa lɛ, esaa ema e-Tsɛ lɛ gbɛ́i kɛ suɔmɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ yɔɔ kɛhã bɔfoi lɛ kɛ mɛi krokomɛi ni baakpɛlɛ “anɔkwale lɛ” nɔ sɛɛ mli lɛ nɔ mi, akɛ: “Mihã amɛle ogbɛ́i lɛ, ni masaa mafee nakai, koni suɔmɔ ni okɛsumɔ mi lɛ ahi amɛmli, ni mi hu mi kɛ amɛ afee ekome.” —Yohane 17:26.
Dani amɛaaya Shiwoo Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, Mose kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Miitsɛ́ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe; ejaakɛ no aaaha oyi ana wala ni otsɛ yɛ jeŋ, koni ohi shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa kã otsɛmɛi Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob kitã akɛ eeeŋɔha amɛ lɛ nɔ!”
19 Ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ, miitsɛ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ akɛ odasefoi miiwo nyɛ akɛ, mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ, eshwie ohiɛ;+ no hewɔ lɛ, kɔ wala koni ohi wala mli,+ bo kɛ oseshibii,+ 20 ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ,+ ní obo egbee toi, ní okpɛtɛ ehe,+ ejaakɛ lɛ ji owala, ni lɛ ebaahã owala sɛɛ atsɛ waa yɛ shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa kã kitã akɛ ekɛbaahã otsɛmɛi Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob lɛ nɔ.”
Miikpa nyɛ fai ni nyɛkɛ nyɛnɔ ni mitɔ̃ lɛ kɛ nyɛ shishi ni miyanuuu lɛ loo bɔ ni misumɔɔ nyɛ mihaa lɛ ni mihaaa nyɛle lɛ afa mi. . . .
9 No sɛɛ lɛ, Yakob sɔle ekɛɛ: “Ao, mitsɛ Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mitsɛ Isak Nyɔŋmɔ, Yehowa, bo mɔ ni okɛɛ mi akɛ, ‘Kuu osɛɛ kɛya oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ owekumɛi lɛ aŋɔɔ, ni mikɛ bo baaye jogbaŋŋ lɛ,’+ 10 suɔmɔ ni tsakeee kɛ anɔkwayeli fɛɛ ni ojie kpo otsɔɔ otsulɔ lɛ,+ emli ekome folo nɛkɛ esaaa mi, ejaakɛ midɛhiɛmɔtso lɛ pɛ mikɛfo Yordan nɛɛ, ni amrɔ nɛɛ mitsɔ kui enyɔ.
Kɛlɛ, Yakob sɔle akɛ: “Mitsɛ Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mitsɛ Isak Nyɔŋmɔ, Yehowa, mɔ ni kɛɛ mi akɛ: Kuu osɛɛ oya oshikpɔŋ nɔ kɛ owekumɛi aŋɔɔ, ni mafeeo jogbaŋŋ lɛ; omɔbɔnalɛi kɛ onɔkwayeli fɛɛ ni ojie otsɔɔ otsulɔ lɛ, ekome folo nɛkɛ esaaa mi; shi tso mihiɛ kɛfo Yordan nɛɛ, ni agbɛnɛ mitsɔ asafokui enyɔ.
Gbi ko lɛ oblayoo fioo ko ba miŋɔɔ yɛ nyanyɔŋ he datrɛfonyo lɛ nitsumɔhe lɛ ni ekɛɛ akɛ, “Oleee mi, shi mile bo, ni miisumɔ ni maha ole kɛkɛ akɛ misumɔɔ osane.”
Enɛ hewɔ gbalɔ Mose nyɛ́ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Miitsɛ́ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe.”—5 Mose 30:19, 20.
Miitsɛ́ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ, mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ni osumɔ Yehowa o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe; ejaakɛ no aaaha oyi aná wala ni otsɛ yɛ jeŋ.” —5 Mose 30: 15-20.
Ekɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Bɔ ni tsɛ lɛ sumɔ mi lɛ, nakai mi hu misumɔɔ nyɛ; nyɛhia shi yɛ misuɔmɔ lɛ mli.
Bɔ ni tsɛ lɛ sumɔ mi lɛ, nakai mi hu misumɔɔ nyɛ; nyɛhia shi yɛ misuɔmɔ lɛ mli.
+ 9 Bɔ ni Tsɛ lɛ sumɔɔ mi lɛ,+ nakai mi hu misumɔɔ nyɛ; nyɛhia misuɔmɔ lɛ mli.
Mile bo, mile eshai ni ofee, ni mile bɔ ni onuɔ he ohãa, shi fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, misumɔɔ bo.’
22 “Kɛ́ nyɛye kitã ni miwoɔ nyɛ nɛɛ nɔ jogbaŋŋ ni nyɛkɛtsu nii, ni nyɛsumɔ Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ,+ ni nyɛnyiɛ egbɛi lɛ fɛɛ anɔ, ni nyɛkpɛtɛ ehe lɛ,+ 23 Yehowa baashwie jeŋmaji nɛɛ fɛɛ kɛje nyɛhiɛ,+ ni nyɛbaashɔ̃shɔ̃ɔ jeŋmaji ni dara ni amɛmli bii lɛ hu ayi fa fe nyɛ lɛ amaji lɛ yɛ amɛdɛŋ.
4 Ejaakɛ mijɛ amanehulu kɛ awerɛho babaoo ni yɔɔ mitsui mli lɛ mli mikɛ yaafonui babaoo ŋma nyɛ, jeee koni mikɛhã nyɛwerɛ aho nyɛhe,+ shi moŋ koni nyɛle bɔ ni suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛhã nyɛ lɛ mli kwɔ hã.
Ekɛɛ enyɛmimɛi héyelilɔi ni hi Korinto lɛ akɛ: “Mitsuiŋ amanehulu kɛ fimɔ babaoo mli miŋma nyɛ yɛ, kɛtsɔ yaafonui babaoo hu mli, jeee ni nyɛwerɛ aho nyɛhe hewɔŋ, shi moŋ ni nyɛna nɔ suɔmɔ babaoo ni misumɔɔ nyɛ.”
Paulo suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha enyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ Roma lɛ tsirɛ lɛ ni eŋma akɛ: “Miishwe akɛ mana nyɛ, koni mikɛ mumɔŋ nikeenii [khaʹri·sma] ko aha nyɛ bɔni afee ni nyɛfi shi shiŋŋ; aloo, yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, koni nyɛna hewalɛwoo tsakemɔ yɛ nyɛteŋ, mɔ fɛɛ mɔ kɛtsɔ mɔ kroko lɛ hemɔkɛyeli nɔ, nyɛnɔ lɛ kɛ minɔ lɛ fɛɛ.”
▪ “Mijie ogbɛi lɛ kpo mitsɔɔ amɛ, ni masaa majie lɛ kpo matsɔɔ, koni suɔmɔ ni okɛ sumɔ mi lɛ ahi amɛmli, ni mi hu mahi amɛmli.”
15 Awoɔ Kristofoi hewalɛ akɛ: “Nyɛkaia mɛi ni nyiɛɔ hiɛ yɛ nyɛteŋ lɛ, . . . ni yɛ be mli ni nyɛsusuɔ nɔ ni jɛɔ amɛjeŋba lɛ mli baa lɛ he lɛ nyɛkasea amɛhemɔkɛyeli.”
Ekolɛ eji anɔkwale akɛ nyɛmimɛi komɛi kɛ shihilɛ wa fioo, shi kɛ okome pɛ oyɔɔ lɛ, no onaa bɔ ni ehi jogbaŋŋ akɛ aaafata nyɛmimɛi ahe kɛhi shi.
Kɛ́ eegba onaa akɛ wekumɛi kɛ amɛhe miiwo nyɛsaji amli bɔ ni esaaa lɛ, okɛ ohefatalɔ lɛ asusu he be ni nyɛteŋ mɔ ko mli fuko
Tsɔɔmɔ bɔ ni amɛnaagbai, amɛhiamɔ nii, loo sanebimɔi ni yɔɔ amɛjwɛŋmɔ mli lɛ kɔɔ saneyitso ni owieɔ lɛ he lɛ he.
36 “Kɛ́ amɛfee esha amɛshi bo (ejaakɛ mɔ ko mɔ ko bɛ ni efeee esha),+ ni omli fu amɛ, ni okɛ amɛ wo henyɛlɔ ko dɛŋ, ni amɛhenyɛlɔ lɛ ŋɔ amɛ nom kɛtee shikpɔŋ ko nɔ, he ni jekɛ jio, he ni jekɛɛɛ jio,+ 37 ni amɛhiɛ tserɛ amɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni aŋɔ amɛ nom kɛtee nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛku amɛsɛɛ kɛba oŋɔɔ, ni amɛkpa bo fai ni ona amɛ mɔbɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni aŋɔ amɛ nom kɛtee nɔ lɛ nɔ amɛkɛɛ, ‘Wɔfee esha ni wɔtɔ̃; wɔfee efɔŋ,’+ 38 ni amɛku amɛsɛɛ kɛba oŋɔɔ kɛ amɛtsui fɛɛ+ kɛ amɛsusuma* fɛɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni aŋɔ amɛ nom+ kɛtee nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛtsɔ amɛhiɛ amɛhã amɛshikpɔŋ lɛ ni okɛhã amɛtsɛmɛi lɛ kɛ maŋ ni ohala+ lɛ kɛ shĩa ni mima mihã ogbɛ́i lɛ, ni amɛsɔle amɛhã bo lɛ, 39 no lɛ, jɛɛ ŋwɛi, ni ji oshihilɛhe lɛ onu amɛsɔlemɔ kɛ amɛfaikpamɔ kɛhã mɔbɔnalɛ lɛ, ni oye amɛsane ohã amɛ,+ ni okɛ esha ni omaŋbii lɛ efee amɛshi bo lɛ ake amɛ.
1:23) Ani kɛ́ okase nii lɛ, ojwɛŋɔ nɔ ni okase lɛ nɔ ni obiɔ Yehowa ni eye ebua bo ni ole bɔ ni obaafee okɛtsu nii yɛ oshihilɛ mli?
Yɛ enɛ hewɔ lɛ, Paulo wo ŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛkaia nyɛtsɔɔlɔi, mɛi ni wie Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ tsɔɔ nyɛ lɛ; nyɛkwɛa amɛjeŋba lɛ naagbee, ni nyɛkasea amɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ.”
Wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Hebribii 13:7 lɛ kɔɔ wɔhe bianɛ kɛ hewalɛ babaoo tamɔ be mli ni Paulo ŋma amɛ lɛ, akɛ: “Nyɛkaia nyɛtsɔɔlɔi, mɛi ni wie Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ tsɔɔ nyɛ lɛ; nyɛkwɛa amɛjeŋba lɛ naagbee, ni nyɛkasea amɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ.”
14 Wɔkaneɔ bɔfo Paulo ŋaawoo ni ekɛha yɛ Hebribii 13:7 lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛkaia nyɛtsɔɔlɔi, mɛi ni wie Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ tsɔɔ nyɛ lɛ; nyɛkwɛa amɛjeŋba lɛ naagbee, ni nyɛkasea amɛ hemɔkɛyeli lɛ.”
KAA ENƐ OKWƐ: Kwɛmɔ niyenii ni oyeɔ, be ni okɛgbɔleɔ okpɔiaŋ, kɛ be abɔ ni onaa okɛwɔɔ lɛ jogbaŋŋ.
11 Kɛ́ onyiɛ shiɛmɔ nɔ ni mɔ ko fee bo nɔ ko ni esaaa lɛ, mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ oye ohe nɔ lɛ?
Kɛ akpɛlɛ nɔ lɛ, obaanyɛ otsa nɔ kɛtsɔ enɛ kɛɛmɔ nɔ: “Akɛni oyɔɔ sane nɛɛ he miishɛɛ hewɔ lɛ, ekolɛ obaanyã wolo nɛɛ ni kɛ ŋaawoo babaoo haa yɛ bɔ ni aaafee aná miishɛɛ yɛ weku kɔkrɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ he lɛ kanemɔ hu he.”
Ewie yɛ bɔ ni eweku lɛ kɛ lɛ ye ehã be ni ashwie lɛ lɛ he akɛ: “Mile akɛ, miweku lɛ enyɛɛɛ mi.
15 Agbɛnɛ hu, esumɔɔ nyɛ babaoo fe tsutsu lɛ, ejaakɛ ekaiɔ bɔ ni nyɛ fɛɛ nyɛboɔ toi lɛ,+ kɛ bɔ ni nyɛkɛ gbeyeishemɔ kɛ hekpokpomɔ here lɛ lɛ.
Kɛ okwɛ ŋwɛi ni eyi obɔ kɛ ŋulamii nyɔɔŋ beni atatu bɛ ŋwɛi lɛ, te onuɔ nɔ ni onaa lɛ he ohaa tɛŋŋ?
Te onuɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he anɔkwale ni onine eshɛ nɔ lɛ he ohaa tɛŋŋ, ni mɛni otswa ofai shi akɛ obaafee?

Ayana Abifao Lɛ

Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, be ni Farisifoi lɛ na Yesu ni etee okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ ko shishi yɛ Mateo shĩa lɛ, amɛbi kaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Mɛni hewɔ nyɛtsɔɔlɔ lɛ kɛ toohelɔi kɛ eshafeelɔi yeɔ nii lɛ?”
Tsɔɔlɔ lɛ wie Yehowa Odasefoi ahe etsɔɔ klasbii lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛkwɛa bɔ ni amɛhemɔkɛyeli tsirɛɔ amɛ koni amɛfee ekome ni eha amɛfee mɛi ni ato amɛhe gbɛjianɔ waa nakai lɛ.
Amɛjie Yehowa yi akɛ ekɛ Tsɔɔlɔ Kpele ni tamɔ nɛkɛ, ni baanyɛ atsá gbɔmɛi ahelai po eha amɛ lɛ eha amɛ.—Marko 2:1-12.
13 Yehowa efee nɔ ko ni tamɔ nɔ ni tsɔɔlɔ lɛ fee lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Tsɔɔlɔ Kpele lɛ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi Yehowa, tsu nii kɛ́ ekɛ gbɔmɛi miiwie.
Tara wiemɔ lɛ gbele gbɛ ni ekɛ tsɔɔlɔ lɛ gba sane babaoo, ni sɛɛ mli lɛ ejie vidio ni ji Jehovah’s Witnesses Stand Firm Against Nazi Assault lɛ po etsɔɔ eklasibii lɛ fɛɛ.
Gbi ko lɛ, mitsɔɔlɔ lɛ fee nɔ ko ni fee mi naakpɛɛ waa. Eshwie mihiɛ shi yɛ miskulbii lɛ ahiɛ akɛ gbeyeilɔ ji mi.
Atsɔse lɛ yɛ Gamaliel, ni ji tsɔɔlɔ ni he esa ni ale lɛ waa yɛ Farisifoi ablema saji amli lɛ anaji anaa.
Ekolɛ mɔ ko ni tsɛɔ ehe tsɔɔlɔ tɛoɔ yiŋkɔshikɔshifeemɔ yɛ mɛi amli, ejeɔ Biblia mli anɔkwale ko he ŋwane (ekolɛ naagbee bei amli ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ), no hewɔ lɛ kuu ko tseɔ ehe kɛyanyiɛɔ esɛɛ.
Nyɛmi yoo fioo ko tsɔɔlɔ kɛɛ lɛ akɛ ekɛ eklas bii krokomɛi lɛ aya Katolik sɔlemɔ.
Afii fioo sɛɛ, yɛ 1920 mli lɛ, mikɛ Dimitris, ni ji obalanyo tsɔɔlɔ ko ni yɔɔ wɔ akrowa lɛ bote gbalashihilɛ mli.
Wɔnaa Tsɔɔlɔ Kpele lɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ yɛ jɛmɛ, akɛ: “Shi enɛ ji naanɔ wala lɛ, ákɛ amɛle bo, anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ kome lɛ, kɛ Yesu Kristo, mɔ ni otsu lɛ.”
Mika akɛ mikɛ mlifu baayanina tsɔɔlɔ lɛ yɛ skul koni masopa lɛ jogbaŋŋ.
Yɛ be ko sɛɛ lɛ, nɛkɛ kui nɛɛ ekomɛi kɛ Levi osɔfoyeli kuu lɛ bashi akaŋ, ni amɛhe amɛ gbɛhe lɛ po akɛ Mla tsɔɔlɔi.
Tsɔɔlɔi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome ni ji osɔfo lɛ kɛ wɔyitsei shilɛɔ gbogbo lɛ kɛ́ wɔhaaa sane ko hetoo jogbaŋŋ.
4 Beni ewieɔ nɔ ni amale tsɔɔlɔi baafee yɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli lɛ he lɛ, Petro kɛɛ akɛ: “Mɛi [nɛɛ] kɛ hiɛkpatamɔ tsɔɔmɔi aaabahɔ mli nigii, ni Nuntsɔ [Yesu Kristo] lɛ ni kpɔ̃ amɛ lɛ po, amɛaakwa lɛ, ni amɛkɛ hiɛkpatamɔ ni he yɔɔ oya aaaba amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛnɔ.”
Afii fioo komɛi asɛɛ lɛ, mibatsɔ tsɔɔlɔ nukpa yɛ Sehlale Skul ni yɔɔ akrowa ni atsɛɔ lɛ Mamatsha lɛ mli.
Marco: “Tsɔɔlɔ ni kɛ mi kɛ miŋa kaseɔ Biblia lɛ jɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli eha wɔsanebimɔi lɛ eko fɛɛ eko hetoo.
Tsɔɔlɔ lɛ tsɛ mi kɛtee klas lɛ hiɛ ni ebi mi akɛ: “Kwɛmɔ gbekɛbii hii krokomɛi lɛ ahewɔ kɛkpe ni okwɛ ohe.”
8 Eeenyɛ efee akɛ amale tsɔɔlɔi ni Petro wie akɛ “[amɛnyiɛɔ] heloo sɛɛ yɛ hebulemɔ akɔnɔ mli” lɛ fata nɛkɛ hefɛoyelɔi ni bɛ mumɔ nɛɛ ahe.
“Ábaptisi mɛi ni yɔɔ wɔmaŋ lɛ mli lɛ ni kɛlɛ wɔbɛ tsɔɔlɔ.
Dani matsɔɔ nɔ ni kɛ nɛkɛ niseniianiifeemɔ nɛɛ ba, ní yɛ nakai beaŋ lɛ, afɔɔɔ feemɔ yɛ Greece lɛ, ha magba bo bɔ ni fee ni mibatsɔ Biblia he nitsɔɔlɔ.
Taakɛ Yesu fee lɛ, wɔ hu wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsɔmɔ tsɔɔlɔi ni he esa kɛ́ ‘wɔhiɛ hi wɔtsɔɔmɔ lɛ nɔ’ be fɛɛ be.—1 Tim.
Ni mɛi komɛi hu susuɔ akɛ esa akɛ ashi sanebimɔi ni tamɔ enɛɛmɛi lɛ aha jamɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi kɛ tsɔɔlɔi.
Tsɔɔlɔi kɛ skul nɔkwɛlɔi lɛ anaa kpɛ amɛhe waa yɛ nɔ ni amɛkase yɛ gbijurɔyeli lɛ shishijee, eyinɔsane, kɛ jamɔ nifeemɔ ni eji lɛ he.
Akɛni gbekɛbii ajwɛŋmɔ esako ni amɛkɛ amɛhe fɔɔ mɛi anɔ hewɔ lɛ, amɛji mɛi titri ni heguɔgbee baanyɛ aye amɛ awui waa.—Kolosebii 3:21.
Ejaakɛ aŋɔ bɔɔ nii lɛ awo yakayakanii ashishi, jeee amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛsuɔmɔnaa, shi moŋ yɛ mɔ ni ba amɛ shi lɛ hewɔ, yɛ nɔhiɛkamɔ mli; akɛ bɔɔ nii lɛ diɛŋtsɛ hu baaye amɛhe kɛjɛ fitemɔ nyɔŋyeli lɛ mli kɛya Nyɔŋmɔ bii lɛ anunyam heyeli lɛ mli.”
10. (a) Mɛni hewɔ Isabel kɛ ebii lɛ anine shɛ fɔbuu kojomɔ nɔ lɛ?
Amɛnáa miishɛɛ akɛ Biblia mli shishitoo mlai nɛɛ nɔŋŋ miiye kɛmiibua amɛbii ní amrɔ nɛɛ amɛji fɔlɔi ni miiye omanye lɛ.
Ani amɛnyɛ amɛye omanye yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛbii atsɔsemɔ mli?
Ele akɛ esa akɛ eha Nyɔŋmɔ awaje lɛ koni enyɛ ekpee nibii ni ekɛbaakpe wɔsɛɛ lɛ anaa kɛ ekãa, ekwɛ ebii lɛ jogbaŋŋ, ni ená bulɛ eha ehe ekoŋŋ.
14 Ni nyɛ gbekɛbii lɛ hu?
* Shi kaselɔi lɛ bɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛtsĩ gbekɛbii lɛ anaa koni amɛkaba Yesu ŋɔɔ.
Mɔ ko ni jɛ London, yɛ England ni kane wolo lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ: “Mfonirii fɛfɛji lɛ baaha fɔlɔi kɛ gbekɛbii aná he miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ akɛ lɛ kɛ eŋa, kɛ ebihii enyɔ je Biblia kasemɔ shishi.
(Romabii 1:26-32) Fɔlɔi Kristofoi nyɛŋ afɔ̃ɔ gbɛnaanii ni kã amɛnɔ akɛ amɛkudɔ lalai kɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔ ni amɛbii lɛ halaa lɛ he nitsumɔ akɛni ewa akɛ fɔlɔi aaanu wiemɔ lɛ shishi lɛ hewɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ, ákɛ gbekɛbii lɛ, wɔná gbii juji kɛ weku ekomefeemɔi yɛ jamɔ gbijurɔyelii amli yɛ afi muu lɛ fɛɛ mli lɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ.
Ani Yehowa taoɔ nɔ ni shɛɛɛ enɛ kɛjɛɔ gbekɛbii adɛŋ ŋmɛnɛ?
Susumɔ saji komɛi ni bei pii lɛ abiɔ yɛ bɔ ni aaafee aye abua gbekɛbii koni amɛnyɛ amɛnu gbele shishi lɛ he okwɛ.
Afɔ Adam kɛ Hawa bii fɛɛ yɛ be mli ni Nyɔŋmɔ eshwie amɛfɔlɔi lɛ kɛjɛ Eden abɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ sɛɛ.
Beni afii lɛ hoɔ lɛ, mɛi ni wɔkɛkase Biblia lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo ní amɛbii hu fata he lɛ batsɔmɔ Odasefoi.
Fiofio lɛ, gbekɛbii ni eshwɛ lɛ hu sɔmɔ akɛ be-fɛɛ sɔɔlɔi yɛ be ko mli, ni eha wɔná miishɛɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ akɛ fɔlɔi.
Beni gbi lɛ eba naagbee lɛ, dani gbekɛbii lɛ baawɔ lɛ, kɛ́ amɛteŋ mɔ ko nakutso naa ekpɔlɔ lɛ, akɛ mu ni baa piŋmɔ shi baato nɔ aha lɛ.
Mɛi komɛi taa naa po akɛ gbala ni fɔlɔi tseɔ mli lɛ baanyɛ ahi aha gbekɛbii, koni esaa amɛ ni amɛtsu amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛ gbalamlitsemɔ he nii gbi ko!
Mɛni mafee koni mibii lɛ anii akafee mɔbɔ yɛ gbi jurɔ ko loo amɛfɔmɔ gbii ni wɔyeee lɛ hewɔ?
Fɔlɔi baanyɛ akpɛ amɛyiŋ akɛ amɛkɛ amɛgbɛkɛ Weku Jamɔ be lɛ eko baakase wolo lɛ, loo amɛbaanyɛ amɛfee nakai kɛ́ amɛkɛ amɛbii lɛ ateŋ mɔ ko miikase nii, loo be ni amɛtsɔɔ amɛbii lɛ eko bɔ ni afeɔ aŋkro nikasemɔ ahãa.
Kɛ oyɛ bii loo Biblia mli nikaselɔi krokomɛi ni amɛji shiɛlɔi ni abaptisiko amɛ lɛ, tsɔsemɔ amɛ koni amɛkɛ amɛnitsumɔ lɛ he akɔntaabuu aha yɛ daa nyɔŋ nɔ.
Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ Uranus ji ofe, shi enyɛ ebii lɛ anɔ, ni Gaia wo ebinuu Cronos hewalɛ koni esa lɛ loo efee lɛ osai.
Kadimɔ nɔ ni ewie afii babaoo nɛ yɛ bɔ ni esa akɛ atsɔɔ bii egbɛ̀i lɛ ahe nii aha lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”
SARA miishwe ní efɔ́.
Beni Yesu ba yɛ afi 1914 lɛ, ani ena Kristofoi akuu ko ni afɔ amɛ mu ni miijɛ anɔkwayeli mli amɛkɛ niyenii miiha yɛ be ni sa mli?
Beni bɔfo lɛ kɛ edɛhiɛmɔ tso lɛ sa niyenii lɛ he, ni la bashã niyenii lɛ, Gideon yɔse akɛ Yehowa ji mɔ ni tsu bɔfo lɛ lɛɛlɛŋ.
Ebiɔ ni akɛ heloonaa nibii kɛ mumɔŋ niyenii babaoo awaje amɛ; ebiɔ ni matsu nii waa koni maná shika pii ni mikɛye mabua amɛ.
Yɛ Yesu gbii lɛ amli lɛ, ayeɔ afilimatai, shi akɛni amɛkpatãa ŋmɔshi nibii ahiɛ hewɔ lɛ, mɛi babaoo buɔ amɛ akɛ kooloi ni fiteɔ nii.
Ahaa amɛkwɛɔ niyenii ni ajaa lɛ anɔ, ni bei komɛi amli lɛ amɛkɛ kpãa yiɔ gbokɛlɛfoi krokomɛi lɛ.
4 Shi no mli lɛ nɔ ni kã Yesu tsui nɔ waa moŋ ji bɔ ni eeefee eha esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ mumɔŋ niyenii, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli anɔkwalei lɛ.
Eye nii ni etɔ, ni eshi niyenii lɛ eko koni ekɛyaha Naomi yɛ shia.—Rut 2:14.
43% Niyenii ni anyɛɛɛ ahe 47%
* Ani wɔdaaa Yehowa shi yɛ mumɔŋ niyenii ni ekɛhaa wɔ yɛ amɛbe naa pɛpɛɛpɛ lɛ he?
Nɔ ni fata enɛ he ji hemɔkɛyeli shia lɛ mli bii fɛɛ ni akɛ mumɔŋ “niyenii” ni he hiaa aaaha amɛ “yɛ be ni sa nɔ.”—Mateo 24:45, 46.
Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, ekolɛ nɔ ni baanyɛ afata niyenii lɛ ahe ji niyenii ni Mose Mla lɛ egu amɛyeli.
Amɛle hu akɛ, eji jeee Nyɔŋmɔ kulɛ, amɛnyɛŋ amɛná kɔɔyɔɔ, nu, niyenii, kɛ nibii krokomɛi fɛɛ ni haa amɛhiɔ wala mli ni amɛnáa miishɛɛ lɛ.
Shi, sane lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ji akɛ, mɛi babaoo yeɔ amɛ mumɔŋ niyenii lɛ bibiibii, ni mɛi komɛi po ŋmɛɔ gbɛ ni amɛgboiɔ kɛ hɔmɔ kwraa.
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ mumɔŋ niyenii ni wɔnine shɛɔ nɔ lɛ hɛle wɔ shi yɛ gbijurɔyelii, nifeemɔi, loo kusumii komɛi ni amale jamɔŋ nifeemɔi yɔɔ mli lɛ ahe lɛ, esa akɛ wɔfee tsakemɔi oya nɔŋŋ.
Gbɛtsɔɔmɔ ni fata nɔ ni akɛha koni wɔkɛto gbii etɛ kpokpaa nɔ kpee lɛ he gbɛjianɔ ji ní wɔto niyenii ahe gbɛjianɔ wɔha mɛi ni baaba kpee lɛ.
Agbɛnɛ hu lɛ, niyenii ni lá fata he, tamɔ ntsiŋ nɛkɛ.
Nakai be lɛ mli lɛ, mɔ fɛɛ mɔ baaná toiŋjɔlɛ, gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ kpakpa, niyenii ni fa, shiai fɛfɛji, kɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa.
Ahaaa wɔ niyenii ni wɔye, ni akɛni February mli ni hewɔ lɛ, wɔna nɔ̃ diɛŋtsɛ yɛ fɛ̃i lɛ mli.

7 Yɛ nɔ ni akwɛɔ nɔ kɛkaseɔ bɔ ni akɛ kɔmpiuta tsuɔ nii ahaa, saji ni ato naa ashwie shi, kɛ ehe saji krokomɛi ni fata he ni nyɛmimɛi jieɔ lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ ni amɛkɛhaa amɛhe, kɛ Sɔɔmɔ Kpee kɛ Teokrase Sɔɔmɔ Skul lɛ mli fãi ni atoɔ he gbɛjianɔ ni akɛhaa kɛtsɔɔ elɛktrɔnik loo gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ gbɛfaŋ lɛ: Ehi yɛ bei pii amli akɛ nyɛmimɛi lɛ aaato amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛ nifeemɔi ahe gbɛjianɔ yɛ be mli ni amɛhaa sɛɛnamɔi ni saa amɛ asafo lɛ he lɛ yɔɔ amɛjwɛŋmɔ mli.

Shiɛlɔ lɛ tsɔ emobail foŋ lɛ loo shiatsɛ lɛ kɔmpiuta nɔ egbele kɛtee Le Anɔkwale Lɛ dɛhiɛmɔ wolo lɛ loo Biblia lɛ Tsɔɔ wolo lɛ baafa ko yɛ shiatsɛ lɛ wiemɔ mli ni ekɛlɛ susu he.
“Nitsumɔhei wuji babaoo ni toɔ nibii ni akɛkakseɔ bɔ ni akɛ kɔmpiutai tsuɔ nii ahaa lɛ he gbɛjianɔ ni amɛhɔɔ lɛ kɛ hegbɛ ni amɛyɔɔ yɛ enɛɛmɛi ahe lɛ woɔ mla shishi, ni amɛkɛ ehe hegbɛ yɛ bɔ ni akɛ nibii ni tamɔ nɛkɛ aaatsu nii yɛ mla naa lɛ haa.
Yɛ nakai beaŋ nɔŋŋ lɛ, akɛ naagbai tamɔ mɛi ni ejie amɛhe efolo ahe mfoniri, hetsɛ̃ ni gbálaa mɛi ateŋ he saji, kɛ saji ni kɔɔ bɔ ni akɛ he woɔ nibii ni yɔɔ nyaŋemɔ ni ehiii mli lɛ ewo kɔmpiuta gbɛjianɔtoi lɛ amli.
Te emli nɔ ni yɔɔ nyɛmɔ babaoo lɛ, kɔmpiutai ni tsuɔ nii waa diɛŋtsɛ lɛ ateŋ nɔ ni yɔɔ hwanyaŋŋ fe fɛɛ lɛ aloo adɔdɔŋ folo?
Nakai nitsumɔhe lɛ to gbɛ ko ni atsɔɔ nɔ atsɔɔ nii ashishi ni kɛ Biblia mli wiemɔ lɛ kasemɔ yɛ kɔmpiuta nɔ lɛ he nilee yɔɔ tsakpaa.
Kɛ́ mɔ ko bi wɔ wɔtsɔɔmɔi lɛ eko he sane lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛ mobail foŋ henɔ ni wɔhiɛ loo kɔmpiuta atsu nii ni wɔhã ena hetoo lɛ yɛ jw.org lɛ nɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ.
Yɛ be mli ni tsɔnei ahe nitsumɔi kɛ saji babaoo tsɔɔ kɔmpiutai kɛ nitsumɔi anɔ kɛbaa lɛ, nɛgbɛ ji he ni abaanyɛ ana sanebimɔi ni he hiaa waa tamɔ, Mɛni ji yiŋtoo ni yɔɔ shihilɛ sɛɛ?
Kɛ́ mɔ ni eshiɛɔ ehãa lɛ yɛ he miishɛɛ lɛ, eklikiɔ ekroko hu nɔ, ni no hu wieɔ akɛ, “Ani obaasumɔ ni mikɛ bo akase Biblia lɛ?”
Esa akɛ wiemɔ shishitsɔɔlɔi lɛ akase kɔmpiuta kɛ nitsumɔ, bɔ ni atoɔ nitsumɔi ahe gbɛjianɔ ahaa, kɛ wiemɔ shishitsɔɔmɔ he ŋaai hu.
Ani nɔ ko kwraa bɛ ni abaanyɛ afee ni akɛha shihilɛ lɛ ahi fe bɔ ni eyɔɔ lɛ?
Biblia lɛ ewieee nɔ ko ni tsɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishelɔi tamɔ Noa, Abraham, Sara, Isak, Rebeka, Yosef, Mose, kɛ David baaye nɛkɛ okadi nibii nɛɛ eko yɛ be mli ni atee amɛshi kɛba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ sɛɛ.
Ebɛ jwɛŋmɔ, ni eleee nɔ ko nɔ ko.
Afii ohai babaoo dani Kristo aaaba lɛ, akɛ gbalɛ bɔ Yudafoi, ni no mli lɛ amɛji Nyɔŋmɔ maŋ ni ehala amɛ ni baashi Babilon ni amɛhi jɛmɛ akɛ nomii lɛ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Nyɛtsia nyɛhe, nyɛtsia nyɛhe! Nyɛjea kpo kɛjɛa jɛi! Nyɛkataa nɔ ko ni he tseee he! Nyɛjea kpo kɛjɛa emli! Nyɛ mɛi ni nyɛtereɔ Yehowa nibii lɛ, nyɛtsuua nyɛhe!”

No sɛɛ lɛ wɔyaa mɛi ni etee ŋmɔ mli momo lɛ aŋɔɔ, ni amɛteŋ mɛi komɛi kpaa humɔ ni amɛboɔ wɔshɛɛ sane ni jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli lɛ toi, ni enɛ haa tsinai ni gbalaa kɔi kɛhuɔ lɛ nyɛɔ amɛwoɔ amɛtsui fioo.

Shi yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ efee nibii pii ehã wɔ momo, ni ebaatsu naagbai kɛ nɔnai fɛɛ ni wɔkɛkpeɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ hu ahe nii.

Nyɔŋmɔ tsu gbalɔ ko eyakɛɛ Eli akɛ abaagbala etoi, ni abaagbe ebihii enyɔ lɛ akɛ etoigbalamɔ lɛ fã.
Taakɛ wɔna kɛtsɔ hiɛ momo lɛ, akɛ mfoniri-feemɔŋ wiemɔ tsu nii yɛ 5 Mose 6:6-9, ni akɛɛ gbɔmɛi lɛ ni ‘amɛkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔi lɛ afimɔ amɛ nineshi akɛ okadi’—ni amɛtsɔ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ kɛ nifeemɔ fɛɛ nɔ amɛtsɔɔ suɔmɔ ni amɛyɔɔ kɛha Yehowa gbɛi lɛ.
Kɛ́ osusu shiwoi ni anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ eha amɛba mli momo kɛ nɔ ni baaba mli kpaako lɛ ahe lɛ, ani onáa he miishɛɛ akɛ osɔmɔ lɛ taakɛ Yoshua fee lɛ?
Gbalɔ lɛ ena Nyɔŋmɔ hewalɛ lɛ ni miitsu nii momo.
Kɛkɛ ni akpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ, saji lɛ baadamɔ kɛji Mesia lɛ eba momo, kɛji akɛ eji Nyɔŋmɔ loo gbɔmɔ, kɛ agbɛnɛ, kɛji akɛ Yudafoi loo Kristofoi ji mɛi ni hiɛ anɔkwale mla lɛ pɛ nɔ.
17 Yɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ mlibaa mli lɛ, bulɔ kuu lɛ, ni ji “tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ” lɛ, wóɔ egbee nɔ, jeee kɛha mɛi ni yɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛjianɔtoo ní anaa lɛ mli momo lɛ pɛ kɛkɛ, shi moŋ kɛha mɛi ní bɛ mli lɛ hu.
Kɛ́ osusu nibii fɛɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ efee eha bo kɛ adesai fɛɛ lɛ ahe lɛ, eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ efee nibii pii eha wɔ momo.
Mumɔi fɔji ni yɔɔ mɛi enyɔ lɛ amli lɛ le jogbaŋŋ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ eto be jeeŋmɔ kɛha daimonioi lɛ akojomɔ.
Kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ etsɔ hiɛ ehala mɛi ni abaahere amɛyiwala lɛ eto momo lɛ, ani enɛ baŋ ekãa ni Kristofoi jieɔ lɛ kpo yɛ sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛmɔ mli lɛ shi?
Yɛ ewolo ni jɛ mumɔŋ lɛ yitsei ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ amli lɛ, no mli lɛ etsɔɔ momo akɛ Kristo ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ Osɔfonukpa kpeteŋkpele lɛ ebote ŋwɛi diɛŋtsɛ.
Mɔ ko baanyɛ abi akɛ, ‘Ani mikɛ nifeemɔ ni láshishwiemɔ, gbele, loo awuiyeli yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ loo yɛ Internet lɛ nɔ lɛ shɛjeɔ mimii?’
Nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛfee ekome kɛkwɛ nifeemɔ ko ni aajie yɛ JW Broadcasting (tv.jw.org) lɛ nɔ, koni no sɛɛ lɛ nyɛsusu he.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ekolɛ wɔteŋ mɛi babaoo sumɔɔ ni wɔjie wɔhiɛtserɛ, wɔkane woji, wɔkwɛ TV, wɔfã gbɛ wɔyashara shi, loo wɔle ilɛtrɔniki nibii hei ni afee.
ŊMƐNƐ lɛ, ojotswaa kɛ tawuu kɛ awuiyeli eyi je lɛŋ fɛɛ. Nibii ni wɔkaneɔ yɛ adafitswaa woji amli, nibii ni wɔnaa yɛ TV nɔ, kɛ nibii ni wɔnuɔ yɛ redio nɔ lɛ tsɔɔ nakai.
Esa akɛ wɔbu Biblia kanemɔ akɛ wɔ daa teokrase he gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ fa ko ni he hiaa, koni wɔkɛye tɛlivishin kwɛmɔ kɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔi fɛɛ ni adiɔ sɛɛ lɛ hiɛ.
Tɛlivishiŋ nɔ Nifeemɔ Ha Ekɛ Yijiemɔ Ha Nyɔŋmɔ
Kɛji akɛ sinii, tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nibii, loo hiɛtserɛjiemɔhei jie enɛ amɛtsɔɔ lɛ, ani wɔtaa shi wɔkwɛɔ fɛɛ ni nɔ ko shiii wɔ?
Bei pii lɛ sinii kɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nibii ni ajieɔ lɛ jieɔ bɔlɛnamɔ kpo yɛ mɛi enyɔ ni boteko gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ ateŋ.
Nyɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ amɛkwɛɔ tɛlivishiŋ yɛ be mli ni esaa kpata lɛ shi lɛ.
Ni akɛni wɔkpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ adesai ni yɔɔ shihilɛ mli ji mɛi ni fee tsɔnei sɔrɔtoi tamɔ kɔɔyɔɔŋ lɛji, televishin, kɛ kompiutai hewɔ lɛ, ani esaaa akɛ wɔkpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ Mɔ ni ha adesai aŋsɔ ni amɛnyɛ amɛkɛfee nɛkɛ nibii nɛɛ hu yɛ shihilɛ mli?
Adesã woji ni kɔɔ nuu kɛ yoo teŋ suɔmɔ he, woji tɛtrɛbii ni ale waa, tɛlivishin nɔ nibii, kɛ sinii baanyɛ atee hiɛnɔkamɔi kɛ lamɔi ni yɔɔ sɔrɔto kwraa yɛ daa gbi shihilɛ he lɛ ashi.
Tɛlivishiŋ kɛ redio nitsumɔhei wuji fɛɛ wie sane lɛ kɛ saji ni abibii mɛi lɛ he.
Yɛ BBC tɛlivishiŋ nifeemɔ lɛ eko mli lɛ, adafitswalɔ Joan Bakewell tsɔɔ mli akɛ, Goulder “nu he akɛ nɔ ko bɛ ni ebaanyɛ efee beni ena he ni gbɔmɛi lɛ ye awerɛho kɛyashɛ lɛ.”
(1 Korintobii 6:9, 10) Beni wɔyaa hiɛ yɛ Biblia mli anɔkwa nilee mli lɛ, wɔbayɔseɔ akɛ be ni wɔfiteɔ kɛkwɛɔ mɛi ni tamɔ nakai lɛ ahe sinii, wɔkwɛɔ amɛ yɛ tɛlivishiŋ, loo kɔmpiuta nɔ aloo amɛhe saji ni wɔkaneɔ yɛ woji amli lɛ hu yeɔ awui taakɛ bɔ ni amɛkɛbɔɔ feɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ.
Fɔlɔi komɛi foɔ husu amɛwoɔ be ni amɛbii lɛ kɛkwɛɔ tɛlivishiŋ lɛ he, aloo amɛtsĩɔ ekwɛmɔ naa kwraa yɛ gbɛkɛ ni akɛyaa kpee lɛ.
Tɛlivishiŋ nitsumɔhei wuji etɛ lɛ ha awuiyeli he nii ni ajieɔ atsɔɔ lɛ bɔ he toi enyɔ ni amɛha gbɔmɔgbeei ahe nii ni amɛjieɔ amɛtsɔɔ lɛ bɔ he toi etɛ.
(Efesobii 5:17) Etamɔ nɔ ni hiɛshikamɔ ni akɛkwɛɛɛ tɛlivishiŋ lɛ ji nɔ hewɔ ni Odasefoi babaoo kɛ be babaoo wooo teemɔŋ nikasemɔ kɛ Biblia kanemɔ mli lɛ.—Lala 101:3; 119:37, 47, 48.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mitse bei abɔ ni miyeɔ kɛkwɛɔ tɛlivishiŋ lɛ nɔ waa bɔni afee ni maná bei babaoo kɛsaa mihe kɛha shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ.
Mɔ ni to adafitswaa nitsumɔhe ni ji CNN lɛ shishi ni atsɛɔ lɛ Ted Turner lɛ, wie mɛi ni he esa ni jɛ maji srɔtoi anɔ ni ekɛ amɛ tsu nii lɛ ahe akɛ: “Mikase nɔ ko wulu kɛjɛ mikɛ amɛteŋ sharamɔ lɛ mli waa.
Mɛi babaoo yeɔ be ni fa fe nine yɛ tɛlivishiŋ kwɛmɔ mli loo yɛ kɔmpiuta he.
Nɛgbɛ gbɔmɛi kaseɔ awuiyeli kɛ bɔlɛnamɔ ni esaaa kɛ mumɔi kɛ sisai ahe nii babaoo kɛjɛɔ?— Ani jeee yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi kɛ sinii komɛi amli, kɛ kɔmpiuta kɛ vidio nɔ shwɛmɔi, Internet, kɛ gbekɛbii ashwɛmɔ he woji komɛi ni mfonirii yɔɔ mli lɛ?
Kwɛ bɔ ni bɔfo nɛɛ gbee ni shɛɔ shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ lɛ yaa shɔŋŋ fe televishin nɔ adafitswaa kwraa!
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔsusu woji kɛ woji tɛtrɛbii ni wɔ kɛ wɔbii kaneɔ, kɛ televishin nɔ nibii ni wɔkwɛɔ, kɛ shwɛmɔi kɛ sinii hu ni wɔkwɛɔ lɛ ahe jogbaŋŋ wɔkwɛ akɛ ani amɛsa lo.
Ekolɛ ehe baahia ní asaa gbɛjegbɛi lɛ, ni eyɛ mli akɛ amɛwɔɔhei bɛ haŋtsii moŋ, shi kwɛ bɔ ni televishin dadei ni tamɔ tsenei ni mamɔ tsui ayiteŋ lɛ fa babaoo ha!
Ekɛɛ akɛ, “nɔ ni fa fe bɔlɛnamɔ mli nifeemɔi 8 yɛ ŋmɛlɛtswaa kome mli, ní fa fe nɔ ni ba yɛ afi 1976 lɛ mli lɛ toi ejwɛ ji nɔ ni anaa” yɛ gbɛkɛnaashi ni ji be mli ni mɛi kɛkwɛɔ tɛlivishiŋ fe fɛɛ lɛ po mli.
“Miida Yehowa shi yɛ nibii kpakpai fɛɛ ni efee eha mi lɛ he.
Paulo da Nyɔŋmɔ shi; Paulo sɔlemɔ (3-11)
(Yohane 10:16; 14:6) Wɔbaanyɛ wɔya wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ daa yɛ sɔlemɔ mli koni wɔjie eyi, wɔda lɛ shi yɛ ejurɔ fɛɛ ni efee eha wɔ lɛ he, ni wɔshɛ wɔjatsui lɛ wɔfɔ enɔ, kɛ hekɛnɔfɔɔ akɛ esusuɔ wɔhe.—Filipibii 4:6, 7; 1 Petro 5:6, 7.
Ewie akɛ: “Miida nyɛ shi akɛ be fɛɛ be lɛ, nyɛlɛɔ wɔ kɛ mumɔ niyenii ni he hiaa wɔ lɛ yɛ be ni sa mli.
(Kpojiemɔ 1:18; 7:9, 14; 20:12, 13; Romabii 6:22; Yohane 5:28, 29) Kɛ eji naanɔ wala ni gbele bɛ mli yɛ ŋwɛi loo naanɔ wala yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ hu lɛ, nɛkɛ nikeenii ni ji wala lɛ ji duromɔ ni jɛ Yehowa ŋɔɔ, ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni nine shɛɔ nɔ lɛ baada shi yɛ he kɛya naanɔ!—Hebribii 2:9.
Nakai gbi lɛ, wɔbaada Yehowa shi waa diɛŋtsɛ! —Kpojiemɔ 20:1-3; 21:3, 4.
YƐ NYƆŊMƆ Wiemɔ ni ji Ŋmalɛ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, anɔkwa Kristofoi kɛ hemɔkɛyeli, hiɛnɔkamɔ, kɛ nɔkpakpa gbɛkpamɔ kwɛɔ wɔsɛɛ be gbɛ.
Awo Gilead klas ni ji 108 lɛ mli nikaselɔi lɛ hewalɛ ní amɛjwɛŋ Nyɔŋmɔ nitsumɔi lɛ kɛ emlihilɛ lɛ fɛɛ nɔ, koni amɛha amɛ sɔɔmɔ kɛ afɔleshaai lɛ afee shidaa ní amɛkɛhaa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kpojiemɔ.—Lala 50:14, 23; 116:12, 17.
Nyɛ ko ni yɔɔ bii etɛ ni atsɛɔ lɛ Linda lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ mikɛ miwu ŋma wolo ko ni wɔkɛyaada mɔ ko shi lɛ, wɔwoɔ wɔbii lɛ hewalɛ ni amɛtɛŋ mfoniri ko ni wɔkɛfata he loo amɛŋmala amɛgbɛi yɛ wolo ni wɔŋma lɛ nɔ.”
13 Anɔkwa, no hewɔ ni wɔ hu wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ shi ni wɔkpaaa lɛ,+ ejaakɛ be ni nyɛnine shɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ ni nyɛnu yɛ wɔnaa lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛmɔ mli, jeee akɛ gbɔmɛi awiemɔ, shi moŋ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ, tamɔ bɔ ni eji hu lɛɛlɛŋ lɛ, nɔ ni miitsu nii hu yɛ nyɛ ni nyɛji mɛi ni heɔ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ nɔ nyɛyeɔ lɛ amli lɛ.
+ 13 No hewɔ lɛ, wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ, wɔmiida bo shi ni wɔmiijie ogbɛ́i fɛfɛo lɛ yi.
Bei pii lɛ, mɛi ekɛɛɛ wiemɔ kuku ni ji “oyiwaladɔŋŋ” lɛ po.
Ni ewó kpulu lɛ, ni eda shi, ni eŋɔha amɛ ni ekɛɛ: Nyɛ fɛɛ nyɛnua eko! ejaakɛ enɛ ji milá ni ji kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ nɔ̃ lɛ, ní afɔse ashwie shi yɛ mɛi pii ahewɔ ha eshaifaa lɛ.”
2 Eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ Yehowa webii kɛ nɔ ni fe wiemɔi kɛkɛ jieɔ shidaa kpo amɛtsɔɔ.
14 Wɔhiɛ sɔɔ bɔ ni Kristofoi tookwɛlɔi lɛ tsɔɔ nii amɛhaa lɛ waa!
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ sanenɔjwɛŋmɔ kɛ sɔlemɔ baanyɛ aye abua wɔ ni wɔda Yehowa shi be fɛɛ be?
Nyɛmimɛi yei ni yɔɔ he ni misɔmɔɔ yɛ lɛ daa mi shi daa akɛ miba ni mibaye mabua amɛ, ni enɛ taa mitsuiŋ waa.
Yɛ bei komɛi amli lɛ, wɔbaana akɛ gbɔmɛi edaŋ wɔ shi yɛ sɔɔmɔ ni wɔkɛhaa amɛ lɛ hewɔ.
Nilelɔi ni ehe gbɛi lɛ ewie yɛ tsofafeemɔ he kpeei kɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ akɛ: “Yehowa Odasefoi amɔdɛŋbɔɔ hewɔ lɛ, amrɔ nɛɛ wɔnu shishi . . .”
Esaaa akɛ gbi kome po hoɔ ni wɔdaaa Yehowa shi yɛ suɔmɔ pii ni ejieɔ lɛ kpo etsɔɔ wɔ lɛ hewɔ.
Mida Yehowa shi akɛ eduro mi naanyo ko ni sumɔɔ mi fe lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe po.”
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Minuɔ henumɔi ni yɔɔ bɔfo Yohane wiemɔi nɛɛ asɛɛ lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ ejaakɛ midaa shi waa akɛ mibii ejwɛ ‘yɛ anɔkwale lɛ mli.’
Mɛni ba Israelbii lɛ anɔ beni amɛjieee hiɛsɔɔ kpo lɛ?
Jon: Miyɛ jogbaŋŋ, oyiwaladɔŋŋ.
Shi miyɛ miishɛɛ, ni miida Yehowa shi akɛ eha mi miishɛɛ ko ni mɔ ko mɔ ko nyɛŋ ahe kɛjɛ midɛŋ.”
(Kolosebii 2:8) Paulo sumɔɔɔ ni alaka Kolosebii ni ebatsɔ “[Nyɔŋmɔ] suɔmɔ bi lɛ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ” shishibii lɛ, ni akajie amɛ kɛjɛ amɛ mumɔŋ shihilɛ ni jɔɔmɔ yɔɔ nɔ lɛ mli.
Mɛɛ nibii akɛduro wɔ, ni mɛni esa akɛ wɔbi wɔhe?
‘Jɔɔmɔi Aaaba Eyiteŋ’
3:20) Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, amɛnuɔ he akɛ ‘ajɔɔ amɛ, ni eteke nɔ’.
Wɔná jɔɔmɔi babaoo.
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ mɛi ni yɔɔ maji nɛɛ anɔ lɛ anine shɛ Biblia lɛ eko nɔ lɛ, amɛmii shɛɔ amɛhe pam!
18 Ani Ohiɛ Sɔɔ Ojɔɔmɔi lɛ Jogbaŋŋ?
Kɛ wɔtsu nɔ ni atuu awo wɔdɛŋ akɛ wɔtsu lɛ he nii lɛ, belɛ “nɔ ni ji wɔgbɛnaa akɛ wɔtsuɔ lɛ, no pɛ wɔtsu nɛɛ”, ni Yehowa jɔɔ wɔ.
10. (a) Yesu tsɔɔ akɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ ‘sɛɛ ni aaayoo’ lɛ kɛ jɔɔmɔi kɛ gbɛnaa nii fɛɛ baa yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
24 Agbɛnɛ Abraham egbɔ, eda yɛ afii amli, ni Yehowa ejɔɔ Abraham yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ mli.
Yer 35:19 —Mɛni hewɔ ajɔɔ Rekabbii lɛ?
Akɛ esui komɛi tsuɔ nii ni akɛtoɔ “mumɔŋ gbɔmɔtso,” “mumɔŋ jɔɔmɔ,” “mumɔŋ shishinamɔ,” kɛ “mumɔŋ tsu” he. —1 Korintobii 15: 44; Efesobii 1:3; Kolosebii 1:9; 1 Petro 2:5.
4: Mɛɛ Wɔsɛɛ Be Mli Jɔɔmɔi Abaaná Mli Ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ Kpɔmɔnɔ lɛ Hewɔ?
“Esa akɛ wɔsusu jɔɔmɔi babaoo ni wɔna lɛ ahe”
(b) Mɛɛ jɔɔmɔi etsɛŋ ni gbi ko lɛ teokrase kɛbaaba abaha adesai fɛɛ?
Ekɛ ebiyoo lɛ fɛɛ jɛ amɛsuɔmɔ mli amɛkɛ nibii shã afɔle amɛhã Yehowa, ni enɛ hewɔ lɛ, ejɔɔ amɛ, ni ekɛ amɛ tsu nii yɛ esɔɔmɔ lɛ mli.
9 Yudafoi lɛ nyɛŋ atsake be ní eho lɛ mli nibii, shi kɛ́ amɛtsake amɛtsui ní amɛku amɛsɛɛ kɛba jamɔ krɔŋŋ mli ekoŋŋ lɛ, no lɛ amɛhiɛ baanyɛ akã eshaifaa kɛ wɔsɛɛ be mli jɔɔmɔi anɔ.
Nakai feemɔ baanyɛ aha aná jɔɔmɔi ni akpaaa gbɛ.
(Yakobo 2:23) Yesu Kristo hu ma nɔ mi akɛ, kɛ́ wɔmiisumɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ ajɔɔ wɔ lɛ, esa akɛ ‘wɔhe Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ wɔye.’
Kɛha Yesu kɛ agbɛnɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji fɛɛ lɛ, sɔlemɔ ni asɔleɔ kɛbiɔ jɔɔmɔ ashwieɔ niyenii anɔ lɛ ji nɔ ko ni he hiaa waa.
Lɛɛlɛŋ, Yehowa baajɔɔ Kristofoi fɛɛ ni sumɔɔ akɛ amɛhiɛ amɛ emuuyeli mli daa ni amɛkpooɔ efɔŋfeemɔ lɛ, ni ebaawaje amɛ. —Lala 1: 1-3.
Kɔɔyɔŋ lɛji ni akɛwuɔ ta kɛ asraafoi ni asɔleɔ ahaa amɛ yɛ amɛshiai lɛ ebatsɔ daa gbi nifeemɔ ko.
Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔkɛ hiɛshikamɔ ahala wɔnanemɛi?
Mɛi ni náa suɔmɔ ní tamɔ nɛkɛ amɛhaa Yehowa lɛ yɛ nɔmimaa akɛ amɛbaaná edɛŋ jɔɔmɔ.—Lala 5:8; 25:4, 5; 135:13; Hoshea 12:6.
Yehowa ha Isak nibaanii kɛ ekooloi shwere babaoo yɛ jɛmɛ.
Ejɛ ŋwɛi eshɛ Israel hefɛo lɛ efɔ̃ shikpɔŋ.
Gbi gbɛkɛ ni enɔ jetsɛremɔ lɛ abaabaptisi lɛ lɛ, epapa fee nɔ ko ni sa jogbaŋŋ.
Nɛkɛ mfonirii fɛfɛji nɛɛ eko fɛɛ eko damɔ shiwoo ni akɛha yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ, ni ji Biblia lɛ mli lɛ nɔ.
Yɛ Ester gbɛfaŋ lɛ, mɛni hefɛo baaha ená—jɔɔmɔ loo loomɔ?
Eji jamɔhe fɛfɛo ni Yehowa Odasefoi asafoi enyɔ kpeɔ yɛ mli.
Yɛ efɛo, ekpakpa ni eji, kɛ ekɛ nitsumɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ, enɔ̃ lɛ bafee nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ̃, ni etsɛɛɛ ni abɔi no kasemɔ yɛ Europa fɛɛ.
Mɔ ko ni jɛ London, yɛ England ni kane wolo lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ: “Mfonirii fɛfɛji lɛ baaha fɔlɔi kɛ gbekɛbii aná he miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
Yoo lɛ ji Batsheba ni he yɔɔ fɛo naakpa lɛ, Uria ŋa lɛ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yehowa jieɔ sui kpakpai nɛɛ akpo?
Aloo gbɔmɛi ahe nibii gbohii pɛ ahe osusuɔ, tamɔ sraalɔ ko ni hãa jwɛi fioo ko ni gbɛfãlɔi krokomɛi ni susuuu nii ahe kɛshwã lɛ fiteɔ miishɛɛ ni eyɔɔ yɛ nibii fɛfɛji ni enaa lɛ he lɛ. —Okɛto Jajelɔ 7:16 he.
Abaptisi mi akɛ Yehowa Odasefonyo, ni nyɔɔŋ kome sɛɛ lɛ mifɔ́ biyoo fɛfɛo ni ji mibi ni ji enyɔ nɔ lɛ, ni wɔwo lɛ Lucía.
Mɛi ejwɛ lɛ onukpai ji amɛ, ni amɛteŋ mɛi enyɔ hu ji daa gbɛgbalɔi, ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni Abɛi 17:6 ji anɔkwale ha, akɛ: “Hiimeji akekre ji bii abii, ni bii ahiɛnyam ji amɛtsɛmɛi.”
10 Minyɛmi yoo kɛ miyemforo, osuɔmɔ nifeemɔi lɛ yɛ fɛo waa! +
Gɔji eyi shikpɔŋ nɛɛ mli fã kpotoo nɔ, no hewɔ lɛ, nantu titri atswaa kɛyaa jɛmɛ, ni ŋshɔnaa maji fɛfɛji ní ŋshɔ hiɛ atsɔɔ kɛyaa jɛmɛ hu yɛ jɛmɛ.
Beni ehe bahia koni efee ehe sɛkɛyelɔ yɛ Gat Maŋtsɛ Akish hiɛ lɛ, efo lala ko, lala kɛ ŋɔɔmɔ ko, ní hemɔkɛyeli wiemɔi nɛɛ fata he akɛ: “Nyɛkɛ mi akãfoa Yehowa dalɛ lɛ, ni nyɛhaa wɔ fɛɛ wɔwóa egbɛi lɛ nɔ!
Etamɔ fɔfɔi babaoo ni yɔɔ fɛɔ yɛ abɔɔ ko mli.
Amɛkɛ adesai agbɔmɔtsei ba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛkɛ yei fɛfɛji baná bɔlɛ, ni amɛfɔ bii ni ji gbɔmɔ fã kɛ daimonio fã—ni ji Nefilim.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, Abɛi 19:11 kɛɛ: “Gbɔmɔ ni yɔɔ jwɛŋmɔ lɛ, emli fuuu mra, ni ehiɛ ni ekuɔ efɔɔ nɔtɔmɔ nɔ lɛ, ehiɛnyam ni.”
Wɔ mii shɛ wɔhe yɛ shikpɔŋ fɛfɛo ko he—gɔŋ agbo ko ni mashi somlomloo ni atsɛɔ lɛ El Yunque (Sɔŋmɛ Tɛ), ni etamɔ nɔ ni akɛ flonto ehà nɔ, kɛ ŋwɛi ni etse ni efee bluu yɛ esɛɛ, ní atatui yɛji yɔɔ emasɛi biɛ kɛ biɛ lɛ.
□ Mɛni ji gbɛi kpakpai ni fe fɛɛ ni wɔɔtsɔ nɔ wɔjie Yehowa yi lɛ ekome?
Yɛ Li Faa lɛ naa gbɛ lɛ, kaaloo tɛi kɛ amɛnaa piɔpiɔ ni ato naa lɛ fɛo haa mɛi ni basaraa jɛmɛ lɛ anaa kpɛɔ amɛhe.
Wɔbaaná hegbɛ ‘wɔsɔmɔ Yehowa kɛ miishɛɛ,’ ni wɔbaafee ekome kɛmamɔ shĩai fɛfɛji, ni wɔfee ŋmɔji kɛyashi naagbee kwraa lɛ, wɔbaayi shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ̃.
No hewɔ lɛ kɛji akɛ oyiŋ miifee kɔshikɔshi lɛ, kaimɔ akɛ yɛ emuu ni oyeee lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ojara baanyɛ awa tamɔ “akekere fɛfɛo” kɛ “maŋtsɛfai” yɛ Yehowa hiɛ.
Ŋmalɛ lɛ ewieee akɛ okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ lɛ sɛɛ tsɛ nakai shi moŋ ákɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛ enunyam maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli nii kɛ agbojee lɛ tsɔɔ onukpai lɛ gbii 180.
“Mile Akɛ Yoo Ní He Yɔɔ Fɛo Jio”
(1 Korintobii 13:4) Eŋma akɛ: “Suɔmɔ he tsɛ̃ɛɛ miishɛɛ ni mɛi krokomɛi naa mli ŋɔɔmɔ lɛ; enyãa amɛhilɛ-kɛhamɔ he; ni yɛ be mli ni amɛ miishɛɛ yaa hiɛ . . . lɛ, mɛi ni suɔmɔ naa amɛnɔ hewalɛ lɛ . . . baŋ lɛ shi; amɛwoŋ amɛ hiɛgbele yɛ nii ni amɛna hewɔ; amɛtsiŋ amɛhe kɛjɛŋ nakai miishɛɛnamɔ lɛ he; amɛwieŋ huhuuhu loo ni amɛaaha edɔ amɛ akɛ amɛnine shɛɛɛ duromɔ babaoo ni tamɔ nɛkɛ nɔ. . . .
(Yohane 17:3; Kpojiemɔ 21:4) No hewɔ ni Biblia lɛ baanyɛ awie akɛ: “O Yehowa Zebaot, miishɛɛ ji gbɔmɔ ni ŋɔɔ ehiɛ efɔɔ onɔ lɛ,” “miishɛɛ ji mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sheɔ Yehowa gbeyei, ni enyiɛɔ egbɛi lɛ anɔ lɛ,” “miishɛɛ ji mɛi ni he jɔ lɛ, shi amɛaaye shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.”
Nyɛminuu Lösch mu esane lɛ naa akɛ, “Nyɛyaa akɛ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ, nyɛjiea nyɛhiɛtserɛ fioo pɛ, shi nyɛkɛ nyɛjwɛŋmɔ amaa wɔmiishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ni ji Yehowa lɛ yijiemɔ kɛ agbɛnɛ hu mɛi krokomɛi babaoo ni nyɛaaha amɛná miishɛɛ lɛ nɔ.”
+ 6 Nakai nɔŋŋ David hu wie miishɛɛ ni gbɔmɔ náa kɛ́ Nyɔŋmɔ shi nitsumɔi asɛɛ ebu jalɛ ehã lɛ lɛ he akɛ: 7 “Mɛi ni akɛ amɛnifeemɔi ni mla eŋmɛɛɛ gbɛ lɛ eke amɛ, ni atsĩmɔ amɛhe eshai anɔ* lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ; 8 gbɔmɔ ni Yehowa* ebuuu ehe esha lɛ he akɔntaa lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ.”
YEHOWA, ni ji “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ” lɛ kɛ Yesu Kristo, ‘miishɛɛ nɔyelɔ kome ni yɔɔ hewalɛ lɛ’ le nɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni haa anáa miishɛɛ fe mɔ fɛɛ mɔ.
(Lala 144:15b, NW) Kɛji wɔsusu hei 110 ni wiemɔ “miishɛɛ” kɛ “miishɛɛnamɔ” lɛ jeɔ kpo yɛ, yɛ New World Translation lɛ mli lɛ mli fioo komɛi ahe lɛ, ebaaha wɔnyɛ wɔnu nɔ ni fata sɔɔmɔ ni wɔkɛhaa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ he lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ, kɛ bɔ ni sɔɔmɔ ni wɔsɔmɔɔ lɛ lɛ kɛ anɔkwa miishɛɛ baa hu.
“MƐI ni amɛhiɛ yɔɔ amɛmumɔŋ hiamɔ nii anɔ lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ, . . . mɛi ni naa mɔbɔ lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ, . . . mɛi ni sumɔɔ toiŋjɔlɛ lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ.”
Yiŋtoi ni haa anáa miishɛɛ loo mlifilimɔ nɛɛ amli ni wɔbaapɛi yɛ nikasemɔ nɛɛ kɛ nɔ ni baanyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli lɛ baaye abua wɔ koni wɔyɔse bɔ ni wɔmii baanyɛ ashɛ wɔhe aha kɛji akɛ wɔkɛ anɔkwayeli sɔmɔ Yehowa ni ji “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ” lɛ.—1 Timoteo 1:11, NW.
Yehowa Odasefoi yeee fɔmɔgbii ejaakɛ nɛkɛ gbijurɔyelii nɛɛ ashishijee jɛ wɔŋjamɔ mli, ni ewóɔ mɛi ni yeɔ amɛ fɔmɔgbii lɛ anɔ.—1 Mose 40:20-22; Marko 6:21-28.
Wolo ko ni wieɔ fɔmɔ gbii ahe (The Lore of Birthdays) lɛ kɛɛ akɛ mumɔŋ bɔɔ nɔ lɛ “kɛ nyɔŋmɔ ni akɛɛ lɛ efɔmɔ gbi nɔ afɔ nakai mɔ lɛ yɛ lɛ sharaa yɛ mumɔŋ.”
Beni Herode ye efɔmɔ gbi lɛ, efee enɛ yɛ Helabii lɛ akusum lɛ kɛ gbeekpãmɔ naa; odaseyeli ko bɛ kɛha fɔmɔ gbijurɔyeli yɛ Israel yɛ Helabii ni hi shi yɛ mra beaŋ lɛ abei lɛ mli.”
Ani eye efɔmɔ gbi?— Dabi, Biblia lɛ ekɛɛɛ nɔ ko kwraa ni tsɔɔ akɛ aŋmɛ okpɔlɔ ko yɛ Yesu fɔmɔ gbi lɛ nɔ.
Hei enyɔ pɛ ni yɔɔ Biblia lɛ mli ni wieɔ fɔmɔgbi gbijurɔyelii ahe lɛ (tsɔɔ akɛ ehi; tsɔɔ akɛ ehiii; etsɔɔɔ nɔ ko nɔ ko yɛ fɔmɔgbi gbijurɔyelii ahe).
(Luka 22:19) Fãmɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ ko kwraa bɛ Biblia lɛ mli akɛ aye Yesu fɔmɔ gbi, loo yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, aye mɔ kroko fɔmɔ gbi.
Kɛlɛ, wolo ko ni wieɔ fɔmɔgbi he (The Lore of Birthdays) lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Gbijurɔyelii krokomɛi haa mɔ náa miishɛɛ, shi fɔmɔgbi yeli haa mɔ nuɔ he akɛ lɛ eyɔɔ ni ayɔɔ.”
Kɛji akɛ fɔmɔ gbii ayeli jɛɛɛ Kristofoi anifeemɔi amli lɛ, belɛ te fee tɛŋŋ ni Kristo fɔmɔ gbi batsɔ “Kristofoi” agbijurɔ titri ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ?
Wolo ni ji The Lore of Birthdays lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Nɛkɛ mumɔŋ bɔɔ nɔ̃ nɛɛ kɛ nyɔŋmɔ ni akɛɛ lɛ efɔmɔ gbi nɔ afɔ́ nakai mɔ lɛ yɛ lɛ yɛ tsakpãa ko ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ.”
Enɛ kɛ miishɛɛ baa, taakɛ Maŋtsɛ Salomo tsɔɔ mli lɛ, akɛ: “Miishɛɛ ji mɔ ni kɛ ehiɛ fɔɔ Yehowa nɔ lɛ.” —Abɛi 16: 20, NW.
‘Miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ’ lɛ le nibii ni he hiaa wɔ ni baaha wɔ fɛɛ wɔná miishɛɛ.
Anɔkwa jamɔ hãa Yehowa webii ni yɔɔ jeŋ fɛɛ lɛ feɔ ekome ni toiŋjɔlɛ hiɔ amɛsafoi lɛ amli. —Kanemɔ Yesaia 65:13, 14.
(Mateo 24:14; 28:19, 20) Gbɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ kɛ anɔkwa miishɛɛ baaba abaha wɔ kɛ̃, ejaakɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ woɔ shi akɛ: “Mɔ ni maa eyi shi ekwɛɔ heyeli mla ni hi kɛwula shi lɛ mli, ni ekãa he, ni ejeee mɔ ni nuɔ ni ehiɛ kpaa nɔ, shi moŋ eji nɔyelɔ ni tsuɔ he nii lɛ, nakai mɔ lɛ aaajɔɔ lɛ yɛ enɔyeli lɛ mli.”—Yakobo 1:25.
2 Nɔ ni ji kpaanyɔ ni Yesu tsɔɔ akɛ ehaa anáa miishɛɛ lɛ ji akɛ: “Miishɛɛ ji mɛi ni awaa amɛyi yɛ jalɛ hewɔ lɛ, shi amɛnɔ ji ŋwɛi maŋtsɛyeli lɛ.”
Eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ Mɔ ni to nibii ni tamɔ nɛkɛ he gbɛjianɔ lɛ ji mɔ ko ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ, ni sumɔɔ ni eha mɛi krokomɛi hu ana miishɛɛ.
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ nɔhamɔ su ni eyɔɔ lɛ haa enáa miishɛɛ, ejaakɛ Yesu kɛɛ akɛ “nɔhamɔ mli yɛ jɔɔmɔ fe hemɔ.” (Bɔf.
Mɛni hewɔ wɔmii shɛɔ wɔhe akɛ wɔmiisɔmɔ “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ”?
(2 Korintobii 4:2; 7:2; Abɛi 20:23) Kaimɔ akɛ, anɔkwa ni ayeee lɛ shishijelɔ jeee mɔ ko mɔ ko fe Satan Abonsam, “malemɔ tsɛ” lɛ.—Yohane 8:44.
5 Buulu lɛ, ebuuu epapa tsɔsemɔ,+
Be ni Yosef gba etsɛ kɛ enyɛmimɛi lɛ elamɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ, ehã esane lɛ mli wo wu moŋ.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mijeɔ sanejajemɔ lɛ shishi kɛtsɔɔ enɛ kɛɛmɔ nɔ akɛ, ‘AMƐHEƆ Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ji Tsɛ Ofe lɛ amɛyeɔ . . .’
Taakɛ atsɔɔ yɛ Mateo 16:27, 28 lɛ, beni ewieɔ ‘emaŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli ni eeeba’ lɛ he lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ: “Ejaakɛ gbɔmɔ Bi lɛ baaba yɛ e-Tsɛ anunyam lɛ mli kɛ ebɔfoi lɛ; ni no mli lɛ eeewo mɔ fɛɛ mɔ nyɔmɔ yɛ enitsumɔ naa.”
Ekɛɛ ebɔfoi lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛji mɛi ni kɛ mi ehi shi yɛ mikaai lɛ amli; ni mi hu miito maŋtsɛyeli maha nyɛ taakɛ bɔ ni mitsɛ eto eha mi lɛ.”
+ 15 Nibii fɛɛ ni Tsɛ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ, minɔ ni.
(1 Tesalonikabii 4:16; 1 Petro 3:22; Kpojiemɔ 19:14-16) Etsɛ kɛ hegbɛ eha lɛ koni ekɛ “nɔyeli fɛɛ kɛ hegbɛ fɛɛ kɛ hewalɛ fɛɛ” ni teɔ shi woɔ jalɛ shishitoo mlai lɛ aba amɛnaagbee.
Kɛ́ Yesu Afii Akpe Nɔyeli lɛ ba naagbee lɛ, ebaaŋɔ nɔyeli lɛ eha e-Tsɛ ekoŋŋ.
“Ejaakɛ mɛi ni jaa lɛ nɛkɛ, tsɛ lɛ hu taoɔ.”
Woloŋlelɔ Charles Freeman haa sanebimɔ nɛɛ hetoo akɛ, ewa kɛha mɛi ni heɔ amɛyeɔ akɛ Yesu ji Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ akɛ “amɛaakpɛlɛ Yesu wiemɔi babaoo ni tsɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ji Tsɛ lɛ nɔ kwɔ fe lɛ lɛ nɔ.”
4 Mɛni hewɔ wɔpapa gbɛ́i lɛ baalaaje yɛ eweku lɛ mli akɛni ebɛ binuu ko lɛ hewɔ?
A Dictionary of the Bible, ni James Hastings fee lɛ wie akɛ: “Tertullian, Irenæus, kɛ Hippolytus kã he amɛmiikpa [Yesu Kristo] Baa ni eshɛ shi etã lɛ gbɛ lolo; shi Alexandria Tsɛmɛi lɛ kɛ susumɔ gbɛ hee ko eha wɔ. . . .
“Mifɔɔ he susumɔ kɛji akɛ mitsɛ ni eji dãatɔlɔ lɛ etee hɛl loo etee ŋwɛi.
18 Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ okwɛɔ jeŋ hee ni wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ ewo he shi lɛ gbɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Ataa sumɔɔ woji nɛɛ akanemɔ moŋ, shi nakai beaŋ lɛ ekɛ Biblia Kaselɔi taakɛ atsɛɔ Yehowa Odasefoi yɛ nakai beaŋ lɛ ebɔɔɔ gbagbalii.
Wiemɔi tamɔ “Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii,” “mi-Tsɛ suɔmɔnaa nii,” jeɔ kpo fe shii 20 sɔŋŋ.
(Lala 31:6; 2 Mose 34:6; Tito 1:2) Beni Bi lɛ wieɔ eŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Owiemɔ lɛ anɔkwaleŋ.”
Ekɛ Ŋmalɛ mli wiemɔi po fi ehemɔkɛyeli lɛ sɛɛ, ni etsɛ Yohane 14:28 ni kɛɔ akɛ ‘Tsɛ lɛ da fe Yesu,’ kɛ Yohane 17:3, he ni atsɛ Yesu yɛ akɛ mɔ ni anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ kome pɛ lɛ ‘tsu lɛ’ lɛ yisɛɛ.
Adesa wala ni yeɔ emuu pɛ baanyɛ awo kpɔmɔ nɔ̃ jara lɛ koni akɛkpɔ Adam shwiei lɛ kɛjɛ nyɔŋyeli ni amɛklɛŋklɛŋ tsɛ lɛ ehɔ̃ɔ amɛ ewo mli lɛ mli.
2 David jeee mɔ klɛŋklɛŋ ni etsɛ Ishai ŋɔ lɛ etsɔɔ Samuel koni efɔ lɛ mu; ni asaŋ ejeee mɔ ni ji enyɔ loo mɔ ni ji etɛ po.
Ni nakai pɛ ji bɔ ni Yosef nyɛmimɛi lɛ sumɔɔ ni amɛ papa asusu.
Afii komɛi ni eho lɛ amli lɛ, amɛhɔɔ amɛtsɛ bi Yosef amɛwo nyɔŋyeli mli, ni amɛmiitsɔ ŋaa koni amɛkɛɛ amɛtsɛ akɛ kooloo awuiyelɔ ko egbe lɛ.—1 Mose 37:18-35.
(Abɛi 2:6) No hewɔ ni, eyɛ mli akɛ Yesu ji Yehowa bɔɔ nii lɛ ateŋ nilelɔ fe fɛɛ moŋ, shi ekɛ ehe efɔ̃ɔɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ enilee nɔ, shi moŋ ewie nibii ní e-Tsɛ efã lɛ akɛ ewie lɛ.—Yohane 12:48-50.
Shi Ataa kɛ Awo tsiii mihiɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ yɛ saji babaoo ni mibiɔ akɛ gbekɛ lɛ hewɔ.
Eeenyɛ efee akɛ, Abraham ŋɔ ewɔfaase Lot efee ebi beni Lot tsɛ, ni ji Abraham nyɛmi nuu lɛ gbo lɛ.—1 Mose 11:27, 28; 12:5.
Nyɛminuu Jean-David ni wɔtsĩ etã kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ wie akɛ: “Nyɛmimɛi lɛ fee wɔ gbɔ diɛŋtsɛ.
10 Mɛi ni feɔ Yehowa gbɛjianɔtoo ní anaa lɛ Nɔyeli Kuu lɛ yɛ wɔgbii nɛɛ amli ji nyɛmimɛi ni akɛ mumɔ efɔ amɛ mu ni jɛ shikpɔji srɔtoi anɔ, ni amɛyɛ Yehowa Odasefoi ajeŋ fɛɛ nitsumɔhe lɛ yitso lɛ.
Ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ anɔkwa Kristofoi hu efee nakai nɔŋŋ kɛhere Yesu ŋaawoo akɛ afee ekpakpa lɛ nɔ, jeee kɛha amɛ Kristofoi nyɛmimɛi lɛ kɛkɛ, shi mɛi ni nyɛ̃ɛɔ amɛ lɛ hu.
13:17) Wɔ nyɛmimɛi ni wɔbɛŋkɛɔ amɛ lɛ haa wɔwoɔ wɔhe hewalɛ ni wɔnaa ekaa koni wɔfi shi.—Rom.
Esɔle jenamɔ lɛ fɛɛ, ni enɔ jetsɛremɔ leebi beni etsui tswaa lɛ, etee enyɛmi nuu lɛ shia.
11 Mɛi 289,678 ni abaptisi yɛ afi 2008 sɔɔmɔ afi lɛ mli yɛ jeŋ fɛɛ lɛ haa anaa faŋŋ akɛ, ehe miihia waa ni aná nyɛmimɛi hii ni baakwɛ tooku lɛ nɔ.
+ 13 Kɛ́ okwɛ ogbe naa lɛ, bo hu abaafu bo tamɔ afu otsɛmɛi lɛ,*+ tamɔ bɔ ni afee onyɛmi nuu Aaron lɛ,+ 14 ejaakɛ be ni maŋbii lɛ kɛ mi béɔ yɛ Zin ŋa lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛtse famɔ ni mikɛhã akɛ afee mi krɔŋkrɔŋ yɛ amɛhiɛ yɛ nui lɛ ahewɔ lɛ hiɛ atua.
Yesu tsɔɔ yɛ nɛkɛ abɛbua nɛɛ mli akɛ abaakojo mɛi ni Maŋtsɛ lɛ gbalaa ejwɛŋmɔ kɛbaa amɛnɔ nakai lɛ yɛ bɔ ni amɛkɛ “[e]nyɛmimɛi” lɛ ye ha lɛ naa.
Ajie naatsii ni akɛba wɔ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ beni ta lɛ ba naagbee lɛ, ni ajie wɔnyɛmimɛi lɛ kɛjɛ tsuŋwoo mli.
18 Te nyɛmimɛi lɛ fee amɛnii amɛha tɛŋŋ?
Ni wɔmiikpa gbɛ akɛ, nyɛmimɛi hii pii baaŋmɛ gbɛ ni atsɔse amɛ koni amɛkɛ nibii ni amɛbaakase lɛ aye abua Yehowa webii lɛ.
Shi, dani abaakpɛ yiŋ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ, eeefee nɔ ni nilee yɔɔ mli akɛ nyɛmi nuu lɛ aaana onukpai akuu lɛ koni esusu nɔ ni amɛaatsɔɔ akɛ afee lɛ he.
13 “Nɔ ni Yehowa, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛɛ nɛ, ‘Mikɛ nyɛtsɛmɛi lɛ kpaŋ kpaŋmɔ+ yɛ gbi nɔ ni mijie amɛ kɛje Ejipt shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, kɛje nyɔji ashĩa+ lɛ akɛ: 14 “Kɛ́ afii kpawo lɛ ba naagbee lɛ, nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ aŋmɛa enyɛmi Hebrinyo ni ahɔ̃ɔ lɛ ahã lɛ, ni esɔmɔ lɛ afii ekpaa lɛ he; ŋmɛɛmɔ ehe.”

Enɛ baaha oná jɔɔmɔ babaoo—obaaná suɔmɔ oha Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ji Biblia lɛ Ŋmalɔ lɛ.
Obaanyɛ ona enɛɛmɛi kɛ jɔɔmɔi krokomɛi amli ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ paradeiso shikpɔŋ nɔ yɛ be mli ni akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ shiwoo jeŋ hee lɛ eto ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ nibii agbɛjianɔtoo nɛɛ najiaŋ lɛ. —Luka 23: 43; 2 Petro 3: 11-13; Kpojiemɔ 21: 1-5.
6 “Agbɛnɛ, kitãi kɛ taomɔ nii kɛ yiŋkpɛi* ni Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛhã akɛ atsɔɔ nyɛ lɛ nɛ, koni nyɛye nɔ kɛ́ nyɛfo mli kɛtee shikpɔŋ ni nyɛyaaŋɔ lɛ nɔ, 2 bɔ ni afee ni oshe Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbeyei, ní oye emlai kɛ ekitãi ni miwoɔ bo lɛ fɛɛ nɔ—bo kɛ obi kɛ onabi+—owala gbii abɔ fɛɛ, koni owala sɛɛ atsɛ.
(Yakobo 2:23) Yesu Kristo hu ma nɔ mi akɛ, kɛ́ wɔmiisumɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ ajɔɔ wɔ lɛ, esa akɛ ‘wɔhe Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ wɔye.’
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, jeee akɛ amɛnine baashɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔmɔ nɔ kɛkɛ, shi moŋ, amɛbaawo mlihilɛ Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ji Yehowa lɛ hiɛ nyam yɛ asafo lɛ kɛ akutso lɛ mli.—1 Petro 2:12.
Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ ewebii lɛ ekoŋŋ, ‘ni eŋɔ kojolɔi kɛ ajinafoi eha amɛ’—hii anɔkwafoi ni woɔ Nyɔŋmɔ webii aŋaa yɛ e-Wiemɔ lɛ naa, shi jeee yɛ adesai ablema saji anaa.
+ 3 Ni Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ gbi ni ji kpawo lɛ ni efee lɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ, ejaakɛ nakai gbi lɛ nɔ Nyɔŋmɔ bɔi ehe jɔɔmɔ be ni egbe edebɔɔ nitsumɔi lɛ fɛɛ, nibii fɛɛ ní eto eyiŋ akɛ ebaafee lɛ naa lɛ.
Ehe eye akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ baaha E-shiwoo akɛ E-baatsɔ eseshi lɛ nɔ E-jɔɔ jeŋmaji fɛɛ lɛ aba mli, ni akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ baanyɛ etee Isak shi kɛjɛ gbohii ateŋ kɛ́ ehe miihia ni efee nakai koni eha nakai shiwoo lɛ aba mli.—Hebribii 11:17-19.
No ji akɛ, wɔmiitao ni wɔhã Nyɔŋmɔ tsui anyɔ emli ni ejɔɔ wɔ. Hebribii 11:6 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni bɛŋkɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, esa akɛ ehe eye akɛ eyɛ ni eji mɛi ni kɛ hiɛdɔɔ taoɔ esɛɛ gbɛ lɛ ajurolɔ.”

Yɛ enɛ ni Abraham fee lɛ hewɔ lɛ, enine shɛ jɔɔmɔi ni Nyɔŋmɔ wo lɛ shi lɛ nɔ, ni ebatsɔ mɔ ni jamɔi babaoo kpɛlɛɔ enɔ akɛ lɛ eji “mɛi fɛɛ ni heɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ amɛyeɔ lɛ atsɛ.”—Romabii 4:11, Today’s English Version.
Taakɛ 1 Mose 1:28 lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, nakai suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ hu ji nɔ̃ kpakpa: “Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ amɛ, ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: Nyɛfɔa ni nyɛyi afáa ni nyɛyia shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ, ni nyɛnaanaa nɔ, ni nyɛyea ŋshɔŋloi kɛ ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ kooloo fɛɛ kooloo ni tsiɔ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.”
No hewɔ lɛ akɛ shidaa afɔlei haaa koni akɛtao mɔ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ toiŋjɔlɛ, tamɔ akɛmiijɔɔ etsui he, shi moŋ akɛtsɔɔ shidaa kɛha mɔ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ toiŋjɔlɛ shihilɛ ni jɔɔmɔ yɔɔ mli ni mɛi ni ena enɔkpɛlɛmɔ lɛ naa mli ŋɔɔmɔ lɛ.
Ajie jamɔŋ henumɔi akpo yɛ gbɛi sɔrɔtoi anɔ beni gbɔmɛi tsɔmɔɔ amɛhe kɛyaa Nyɔŋmɔ loo amɛnyɔŋmɔi aŋɔɔ, ni amɛmiitao jɔɔmɔi kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ lɛ.
(Jajelɔ 2:24) Hɛɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji kɛ amɛhiɛ efɔ̃ɔɔ nɔ ko ni aleee bɔ ni enaa baayakpa nɔ, ni amɛtsɔɔɔ gbɛi gbohii anɔ koni amɛná shika oya, shi moŋ amɛkwɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛ kɛha miishɛɛnamɔ kɛ jɔɔmɔ.
Efee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni eeenyɛ koni ‘edamɔ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ akɛ mɔ ko ni sa,’ ni Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ lɛ.
Akɛni ekpɛlɛɛɛ nɔ akɛ aye enɔ kunim hewɔ lɛ, Satan wie akɛ Hiob sɔmɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ pɛsɛmkunya yiŋtoi pɛ ahewɔ, ejaakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ejɔɔ Hiob ni eha ena heloonaa nii babaoo diɛŋtsɛ.
+ 28 Kɛkɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ amɛ, ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Nyɛfɔa ní nyɛyi afaa, ni nyɛyia shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ+ ni nyɛkwɛa nɔ,+ ni nyɛyea loi ni yɔɔ ŋshɔ lɛ mli kɛ bɔɔ nii ni filikiɔ yɛ ŋwɛi kɛ kooloi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ wala mli* ni tsiɔ amɛhe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ anɔ.” +

6 Jɔɔmɔi Kɛha Mɛi ni Sumɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Lɛ: Yehowa susuɔ heshibalɔi ni sumɔɔ lɛ lɛ ahe waa, ni ejieɔ ‘enibii ni mli kwɔlɔ’ lɛ kpo etsɔɔ amɛ.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni Israel kɛ heloonaa nibii ni ená lɛ he yijiemɔ aaaha Yehowa lɛ, ekɛyaha nyɔŋmɔi ni yɔɔ nakai maji lɛ amli lɛ moŋ, ni etsɔ apasa nyɔŋmɔi ni eyajá nɛɛ nɔ efite gbalashihilɛ he kpaŋmɔ ni ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ fee lɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ enɛɛmɛi ha mra be mli Kristofoi lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi koni ekɛtsɔɔ akɛ ekɛ heloonaa Israel tsuuu nii dɔŋŋ shi agbɛnɛ eejɔɔ Kristofoi lɛ ni ji “Nyɔŋmɔ Israel lɛ.”
“Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ amɛ, ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: Nyɛfɔa ni nyɛyi afáa ni nyɛyia shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ.”—1 Mose 1:28.
Moŋ lɛ, etsɔɔ akɛ nɔ ni hãa nuu loo yoo ko náa anɔkwa miishɛɛ ji, anɔkwayeli ni ekɛsɔmɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, shi jeee wekukpaa ni yɔɔ ekɛ mɛi ateŋ loo nɔ ni enyɛ etsu.
Mɔbɔ sane ji akɛ, mfonirii ni teɔ bɔlɛnamɔ akɔnɔ shi lɛ ekomɛi yɛ nyaŋemɔ fe yei ni hiɛ amɛhe efoji loo nuu kɛ yoo ni miiná bɔlɛ.
Nuu kɛ yoo Bɔlɔ lɛ ji gbalashihilɛ kɛ weku lɛ Shishitolɔ, ni ele wɔ hiamɔ nii jogbaŋŋ fe bɔ ni mɔ kroko le.
Beni esɔle ebi koni ena naakpɛɛ nii ni ahaaa hetoo lɛ sɛɛ gbii fioo ko lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome, yoo onukpa ko yasara lɛ, ni eshi woji komɛi ni akɛkaseɔ Biblia lɛ eha lɛ.
Nɔ ni Hawa wie nɛɛ tsɔɔ akɛ ekolɛ, sane ni Yehowa wie yɛ abɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ yɛ ejwɛŋmɔ mli; no ji akɛ yoo ko baawo shwiei loo ebaaná “seshi” ní baakpãtã mɔ fɔŋ ni laka Adam kɛ Hawa ni eha amɛgba afã lɛ hiɛ.
Yoo ko ni daa gbi lɛ ebatsɔɔ he ko ni aama Maŋtsɛyeli Asa yɛ lɛ mu sane naa akɛ, mɛi ni maa tsũ nɛɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi ji amɛ, ni Maŋtsɛyeli Asa amɛmaa lɛ.
Hemɔ nɔ ni ekɛba ni ekɛbaato awaba lɛ yɛ edɛŋ kɛ́ edamɔ mli ehã yoo mɔkpɔŋ.
Be ko ni eho ni etsɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ bɔ klɛŋklɛŋ nuu kɛ yoo lɛ.
Taakɛ wɔbaana lɛ, eji jeŋ muu fɛɛ maŋtsɛyeli ko, jamɔ mli nɔ, ni eji Satan amale gbɛjianɔtoo ni ekɛtsuɔ nii ni ekɛwuɔ eshiɔ Nyɔŋmɔ yoo lɛ seshi lɛ.

Be ni yoo ko kɛ masha fioo ko futu ma babaoo lɛ, masha lɛ hã fɛɛ naa bawa.
Beni Yesu Kristo kɛ yoo ko ni heɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ eyeɔ ni ekɛ lɛ kpe yɛ nubu ko he lɛ gbaa sane lɛ, ema nɔ mi akɛ ehe miihia ni ale anɔkwale ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he lɛ.
Esa akɛ yoo ni aŋɔ lɛ nom ni Israel nuu ko baaŋɔ lɛ akɛ eŋa lɛ afo ni eye esuɔlɔi ni egboi lɛ agbele he ŋkɔmɔ nyɔŋ muu fɛɛ.

Yoo lɛ kadi akɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ yara lɛ shishi lɛ ateŋ babaoo shɛje nuu okulafo ni miiye awerɛho lɛ mii.
Odasefonyo ko ni miitsu maŋ odaseyeli nitsumɔ lɛ kɛ e-mail adrɛs ni eyɔɔ lɛ hã yoo ko ni ŋɔ wolo lɛ eko lɛ.
Beni wɔbote shia ko mli ni mitswa shinaa lɛ, etsɛɛɛ nɔŋŋ ni yoo ko kɛ oyaiyeli gbala mi ewo tsũ lɛ mli ni eŋa shinaa lɛ.

26 Leebi maŋkpa lɛ, yoo lɛ bagbee nuumo lɛ shinaa lɛ shi he ni enuŋtsɔ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ, ni ekã jɛmɛ aahu kɛyashi hulu je.
Yoo ko ni na ninefɔɔ wolo lɛ yɛ skul lɛ shinaa lɛ naa lɛ bi mɔ ni esa akɛ ena koni egbala nifeemɔ lɛ mli etsɔɔ lɛ.
