(b) Mɛɛ oshara kã adesai ahiɛ, shi mɛni ji nɔ ni okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ lɛ Nɔtalɔ lɛ baafee koni ekɛjie enɛ kɛya?
Ninaa ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ nɛɛ maa nɔ mi ekoŋŋ kɛhãa wɔ akɛ ‘ŋmɔji lɛ egba futaa kɛhã kpamɔ.’
Yɛ nɛkɛ gbii etɛ nɛɛ amli lɛ, abua Yehowa odasefoi fɛɛ ni abaanyɛ ana amɛ yɛ Western Ukraine, White Russia [Belarus], Bessarabia, Moldavia, Latvia, Lithuania kɛ Estonia—ni ji hii kɛ yei ni fa fe akpei kpawo . . . lɛ anaa awo shwiilii amli, ni akɛ amɛ tee oketekei ashimaamɔhei, ni akɛ amɛ wo tsɔnei ni akɛlooɔ tsinai amli yɛ jɛmɛ, ni akɛ amɛ tee he ko shɔŋŋ.”
Mi-klɛŋklɛŋ nitsumɔ ji ni miya ŋmɔ mli apaafoi mɛidiji ni yɔɔ blɔfomɛi aŋmɔji amli yɛ Vaalwater niiaŋ yɛ Transvaal lɛ aŋɔɔ.
Ŋmɛnɛ, jeee lá muu lɛ fɛɛ agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli yɛ bei babaoo mli, shi agbalaa wala yibii srɔtoi ni he hiaa titri: (1) red cells; (2) white cells; (3) platelets; (4) plasma (serum), ni ji nu gbɛfaŋ nɔ lɛ.
Ele kɛtsɔ hiɛ kwraa akɛ nyɛmiibɛŋkɛ nɛkɛ he ni faa lɛ mãa enaa shi kɛboteɔ jɔɔ mli yɛ nɛɛ, ele bɔ ni ebaagbe naa eha, ni ele bɔ ni ebaafee ni ekudɔ lɛlɛ lɛ kɛtsɔ mli.

‘Egba Futaa ni Sa Kpamɔ’
Kɛ́ tsɔi ni yɔɔ he ni hela lɛ yɔɔ lɛ etsɔ eyɛŋ, ni aana akɛ hela lɛ ebote heloo lɛ mli vii lɛ, hela lɛ kpiti ni.
Ani mɛi fɛɛ ni baafata ohe kɛtsa mi lɛ le akɛ Yehowa Odasefonyo ji mi, ni mifã akɛ akaha mi lá kwraa (lá, wala yibii tsuji, wala yibii yɛji, platelets, loo plasma ni anáa yɛ lá mli) yɛ shihilɛ fɛɛ shihilɛ mli?
Bei pii lɛ, Odasefoi ni ji blɔfomɛi ni bɛŋkɛ jɛmɛ ni ehe bahiaa ni wɔyahi amɛŋɔɔ lɛ po yɛ shɔŋŋ.
Akɛni enɛ yɔɔ wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli hewɔ lɛ, ebaafee nɔ ni ja gbɛ akɛ aaatsɛ asafo babaoo lɛ akɛ toi krokomɛi lɛ ateŋ klɛŋklɛŋ yibii—amɛji klɛŋklɛŋ bii ni ‘fɔ amɛtadei lɛ ahe ni amɛha eyɛ futaa yɛ Toobi lɛ la lɛ mli,’ kɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ akɛ amɛbaahi shi kɛya naanɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ.—Kpojiemɔ 7:9, 10, 14, 17; 20:12, 13.
Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, ana okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ futaa ko ni damɔ shi kɛha jalɛ ta ni Yesu Kristo baawuu lɛ.
“Nyɛhe eshai lɛ . . . amɛaayɛ tamɔ snoo”
Ŋmɔtsɛmɛi lɛ ekomɛi wo hewolonɔ sui amligbalamɔ ni yaa nɔ bianɛ lɛ he hewalɛ, ni amɛtswa amɛfai shi akɛ esa akɛ mɛidiji akpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ amɛbaa shi fe mɛiyɛji lɛ, ni esa akɛ amɛsɔmɔ amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi mɛiyɛji lɛ.
Hulu kpɛmɔ ni tamɔ la lɛ gbɛɔ eshwaa ŋwɛi, ni ekpɛɔ snoo yɛŋ kɛ lasu gɔŋ tɛsaa ni yɛɔ fioo lɛ nɔ.
Kɛkɛ ni ekɛ ashwishwɛ ha nuu kroko ko, ni ekɛ klala ha enɔ.
Atade yɛŋ fɛfɛo.
+ 5 Be ni amɛbote gbonyobu lɛ mli lɛ, amɛna oblanyo ko ta ninejurɔgbɛ, ni ewo atade yɛŋ kakadaŋŋ, ni amɛhe jɔ̃ amɛhe.
Kunimyelɔ lɛ, aaawo lɛ atadei yɛji, ni migbeŋ egbɛi yɛ wala wolo lɛ mli gbi ko gbi ko, ni matsi egbɛi ata yɛ mi-Tsɛ hiɛ kɛ ebɔfoi lɛ ahiɛ.”

Miji David shishifã lɛ kɛ eseshi+ lɛ kɛ leebi ŋulami ni kpɛɔ lɛ.’”
Ewie faŋŋ akɛ: “Ni okadii aaaba hulu kɛ nyɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii amli, ni jeŋmaji afimɔ lɛ aaaba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛaafee yeyeeye, yɛ ŋshɔ kɛ ŋshɔkei agbɛɛmɔ hewɔ; ni nɔ̃ aaanyɔnyɔɔ gbɔmɛi anɔ yɛ gbeyei kɛ nibii ní baa je lɛŋ lɛ agbɛkwɛmɔ hewɔ; ejaakɛ aaahoso ŋwɛi hewalɛi lɛ tete.”
Ni ŋulamii fe akpekpei toi akpei oha yɔɔ ŋulamii akuu ni wɔyɔɔ mli, ni ji Milky Way galaxy loo Hulu Ŋulamii Kushai lɛ mli.
Shi kɛlɛ, Biblia lɛ kɛɔ wɔ akɛ jeŋ muu fɛɛ Bɔlɔ lɛ tsɛɔ ŋulamii lɛ fɛɛ kɛ amɛgbɛi.
Yesu gba akɛ: “Hulu aaawo duŋ, ni nyɔŋtsere kpɛŋ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋulamii aaatserɛ kɛaajɛ ŋwɛi atswia shi.”
“Ni okadii aaaba hulu kɛ nyɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii amli, ni jeŋmaji afimɔ lɛ aaaba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛaafee yeyeeye, yɛ ŋshɔ kɛ ŋshɔkei agbɛɛmɔ hewɔ; ni nɔ̃ aaanyɔnyɔɔ gbɔmɛi anɔ yɛ gbeyei kɛ nibii ni baa je lɛŋ lɛ agbɛkwɛmɔ hewɔ; ejaakɛ aaahoso ŋwɛi hewalɛi lɛ tete.”—Luka 21:25, 26.
Nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ kɛ ŋulamii babaoo ni anyɛɛɛ akane ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi gbɛkɛ lɛ feɔ mi naakpɛɛ, ni misusuɔ bɔ ni ŋwɛiniiaŋ yaa shɔŋŋ kɛhoɔ atatu lɛ he lɛ he.

Namɛi ji “mɛi ni le nii lɛ” ŋmɛnɛ, ni amɛkpɛ́ɔ tamɔ ŋulamii yɛ mɛɛ shishinumɔ naa?

YITSO NYƆŊMA
No mli fɛɛ lɛ, jɛi shihilɛ bɛ shweshweeshwe, shi mile akɛ mɛi akpekpei nyɔŋma ni yɔɔ jɛi lɛ ateŋ mɛi fioo ko pɛ enu Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sane kpakpa lɛ.

5 Beni etsɔɔ fatɔɔi ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ ni adesai jieɔ lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛhe lɛ mli lɛ sɛɛ, taakɛ atsɛ yisɛɛ yɛ yiteŋgbɛ lɛ, Yesu kɛ wiemɔ nɛɛ fata he akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ nyɛhia kɛwulaa shi, tamɔ bɔ ni nyɛtsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ hi kɛwula shi lɛ.”

Ebaŋ mli kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ amɛaajwɛŋ akɛ, amɛaasumɔ amɛ henyɛlɔi, ni amɛtao toiŋjɔlɛ, ni amɛkɛ sane ake, aloo ni amɛtsi amɛhe kɛjɛ yiwalɛ nifeemɔ he.

14 Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ “gbekɛ ni akpoo ejeŋ afɔ̃ enɔ lɛ, ewoɔ enyɛ hiɛgbele.”
Be ni miji gbekɛ lɛ, mɛi to mi kabonaa shii abɔ.
Nyɔŋmɔ wie yɛ jɛmɛ eshi sɔlemɔtsu mli ajwamaŋ ni mɔ ko aaafee ehe (“loo, ‘gbekɛ nuu ni akɛ lɛ bɔɔ ajwamaŋ,’ ni ji gbekɛ nuu ni akɛ lɛ eto yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he jeŋba fɔŋ yiŋtoi ahewɔ,” NW shishigbɛ niŋmaa).
Yɛ wiemɔ kroko mli lɛ, yɛ be mli ni eji nɔ kome akɛ aaakane ta ko ni awuɔ lɛ he saji ni asusu mɛi abɔ ni egboi yɛ mli lɛ he lɛ, eji nɔ kroko hu kwraa akɛ aaakane gbekɛ fioo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Adnan, ni ji Bosnia gbekɛ nuu ko ni eye afii nɛɛhu, ni enyɛ gbo beni okpɛlɛm ko bakpata amɛshia lɛ hiɛ lɛ he saji.
Ni gbalɔi lɛ awiemɔi lɛ hu kɛ enɛ yeɔ egbɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ, bɔ ni aŋma akɛ: ‘Nii nɛɛ asɛɛ lɛ maku misɛɛ maba, ni masaa David buu ni ekumɔ lɛ mamã, ni etsukoi lɛ hu matswa ekoŋŋ, ni matee lɛ shi mamã shi; beni afee ni gbɔmɛi ni eshwɛ lɛ kɛ jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ hu ni atsĩ migbɛ́i atã atsɔɔ amɛ lɛ atao Nuŋtsɔ [Yehowa] sɛɛgbɛ. Nuŋtsɔ [Yehowa] ni feɔ enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ lɛ kɛɛ.’ Nyɔŋmɔ le enitsumɔi lɛ fɛɛ kɛjɛ jeŋ shishijee.”—Bɔf. 15:13-18.
+ 15 Ni enɛ kɛ Gbalɔi lɛ awiemɔi lɛ kpãa gbee, tamɔ bɔ ni aŋma lɛ, akɛ: 16 ‘Nibii nɛɛ asɛɛ lɛ maku misɛɛ maba ni mawó David mama tsũ* ni egbee shi lɛ nɔ mama shi ekoŋŋ; masaa ehei ni efite lɛ ni masaa mama shi, 17 koni mɛi ni baashwɛ lɛ kɛ jeŋmajiaŋbii lɛ fɛɛ ni akɛ migbɛ́i tsɛɔ amɛ lɛ anyɛ atao Yehowa* sɛɛ gbɛ kɛ hiɛdɔɔ, Yehowa* kɛɛ, lɛ ji mɔ ni feɔ nibii nɛɛ+ 18 ni ale kɛjɛ blema tɔ̃ɔ lɛ.’
Enɛ ja jogbaŋŋ, ejaakɛ Yehowa diɛŋtsɛ kɛɛ Mose akɛ: “Enɛ ji migbɛi kɛyaa naanɔ, ni enɛ ji mikaimɔ kɛyaa yinɔi fɛɛ.”—2 Mose 3:15.
(King James Version) Yɛ be mli ni ekpɛlɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi ni pueɔ yɛ Hebri ŋmalɛ lɛ mli yɛ biɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ, New World Translation lɛ kaneɔ akɛ: “Yehowa wiemɔ kɛha mi-Nuŋtsɔ lɛ ji akɛ: ‘Ta mininejurɔ nɔ kɛyashi be mli ni maŋɔ ohenyɛlɔi lɛ maafee maaŋoo yɛ onajiashi.’”
+ 32 No hewɔ lɛ, Lea ná musu ni efɔ binuu ni ewo lɛ gbɛ́i akɛ Ruben,*+ ni ekɛɛ: “Ejaakɛ Yehowa ena mimanehulu lɛ,+ ni agbɛnɛ miwu baasumɔ mi.”
Yesu tee nɔ akɛ: “Ni ohiɛ migbɛi lɛ amli, ni okwako mihemɔkɛyeli lɛ yɛ no gbii lɛ amli tete, beni Antipa ji midasefonyo anɔkwafo, ni agbe lɛ yɛ nyɛteŋ, heni Satan yɔɔ lɛ.”
lɛ hewɔ. Lea yɛ yiŋtoo hewɔ ni ewo ebi lɛ nakai lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ejaakɛ Yehowa ekwɛ mimanehulu lɛ; ni agbɛnɛ miwu baasumɔ mi!”
No hewɔ lɛ, esa jogbaŋŋ akɛ Biblia Kaselɔi lɛ aaakpɛlɛ gbɛi ni anaa yɛ Yesaia 43:10 lɛ nɔ: “Yehowa kɛɛ: ‘Nyɛji midasefoi, kɛ mitsulɔ ni mihala, koni nyɛle, ni nyɛhe mi nyɛye, ni nyɛna nyɛle akɛ mi nɔŋŋ ni.
Amɛ fɛɛ amɛjie henumɔi ni yɔɔ wiemɔi ni jɛ mumɔŋ nɛɛ mli lɛ kpo akɛ: “Nuŋtsɔ, mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, majie oyi kɛ mitsui fɛɛ, ni mawo ogbɛi lɛ hiɛ nyam kɛaatee naanɔ. Ejaakɛ omɔbɔnalɛ lɛ da kpele yɛ minɔ.”—Lala 86:12, 13.
Kɛ misusu be ni mikɛyɔɔ tsuŋwoo mli lɛ he lɛ, henumɔ ni minaa klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa ji miishɛɛ akɛ mihiɛ emuuyeli mli miha Yehowa kɛwo egbɛi lɛ hiɛ nyam.—Lala 124:6-8.
Shi moŋ, nɛkɛ yijiemɔ lala nɛɛ kɛ nɔ ni bɔfo Paulo ŋma lɛ kpaa gbee: “Enɛ hewɔ hu ni Nyɔŋmɔ wo [Yesu] enɔ gojoo, ni eduro lɛ gbɛi ni ta gbɛi fɛɛ nɔ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ amli, ni lilɛi fɛɛ lilɛi agba mli kpoo akɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuŋtsɔ, kɛwo Tsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam.”
Yehowa ha hetoo: “Naa, kɛ miŋa ŋwɛi naa ni nugbɔ enɛɛɛ, aloo mifa baalabii ni amɛbaye shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nii, aloo miha gbele-hela ba mimaŋbii lɛ ateŋ, ni mimaŋ ni aŋɔ migbɛi awo amɛ lɛ ba amɛhe shi, ni amɛkpa fai, ni amɛtao mihiɛ gbɛ, ni amɛkpale kɛjɛ amɛgbɛi fɔji lɛ anɔ lɛ: no lɛ mi hu majɛ ŋwɛi mabo toi, ni maŋɔ amɛhe eshai lɛ mafa amɛ, ni matsa amɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ.”—2 Kronika 6:21; 7:13, 14.
+ 4 Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ajie Yehowa, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, mɔ ni kɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ enaabu wo mitsɛ David shi, ni etsɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ enine nɔ ehã eba mli lɛ yi, mɔ ni kɛɛ akɛ, 5 ‘Kɛjɛ gbi nɔ ni mijie miwebii lɛ kɛje Ejipt shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, mihalako maŋ ko yɛ Israel wekui lɛ fɛɛ amli koni ama shĩa ahã mi yɛ jɛmɛ koni migbɛ́i lɛ akã nɔ,+ ni mihalako nuu ko akɛ etsɔ mimaŋ Israel hiɛnyiɛlɔ.
+ 15 Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ajie Yehowa, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, mɔ ni kɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ enaabu wo mitsɛ David shi, ni etsɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ enine nɔ ehã eba mli lɛ yi, mɔ ni kɛɛ akɛ, 16 ‘Kɛjɛ gbi nɔ ni mijie miwebii Israel kɛje Ejipt lɛ, mihalako maŋ ko yɛ Israel wekui lɛ fɛɛ amli koni ama shĩa ahã mi yɛ jɛmɛ koni migbɛ́i lɛ akã nɔ,+ shi mihala David koni eye mimaŋ Israel nɔ.’
8 Akɛni amɛhã amɛshinaa shi bɛŋkɛ mishinaa shi, ni amɛhã amɛshinaatso lɛ bɛŋkɛ mishinaatso lɛ, ni gbogbo pɛ ni fo mi kɛ amɛ teŋ hewɔ lɛ,+ amɛkɛ nyaŋemɔ nibii ni amɛfee lɛ wo migbɛ́i krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ he muji, no hewɔ lɛ, mikpãtã amɛhiɛ yɛ mimlifu lɛ mli.
+ 6 Shi kɛ́ nyɛ kɛ nyɛshwiei lɛ je misɛɛ ni nyɛyeee mikitãi lɛ, kɛ mimlai ni mikɛshwie nyɛhiɛ lɛ anɔ, ni nyɛyasɔmɔ nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi ni nyɛkoto amɛ lɛ,+ 7 no lɛ, mafo Israel mashɛ mafɔ̃ kɛje shikpɔŋ ni mikɛhã amɛ lɛ nɔ,+ ni shĩa ni mifee lɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ mihã migbɛ́i lɛ, majie yɛ mihiɛ mashɛ mafɔ̃,+ ni Israel baatsɔ nyaŋemɔ nii* kɛ nɔ ko ni ayeɔ he fɛo yɛ maji fɛɛ ateŋ.
18 Yehowa tee nɔ ekɛ mɛi ní ekwa lɛ lɛ wie akɛ: “Nyɛaashi nyɛgbɛi nyɛha mɛi ní mihala lɛ ní amɛkɛlomɔ; ni Nuntsɔ Yehowa aaagbeo, ni eeewo etsuji lɛ gbɛi kroko: koni mɔ ni jɔɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, ajɔɔ ehe yɛ anɔkwale Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ mli, ní mɔ ni kãa kita yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, akã anɔkwale Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kita; ejaakɛ hiɛ ekpa tsutsu haomɔi lɛ anɔ, ni aŋɔtee yɛ mihiɛ.”
14 Bo Yehowa wiemɔi ni ekɛ Koresh wie lɛ toi: “Mitsulɔ Yakob kɛ Israel ni mihala lɛ hewɔ ni mitsɛo kɛ ogbɛi, ni miwoo gbɛi, dani ole mi po.
+ He fɛɛ he lɛ, abaashã afɔlei koni eje lasu, ni akɛ afɔlei baahã migbɛ́i lɛ akɛ nikeenii krɔŋŋ; ejaakɛ migbɛ́i lɛ baaje agbo yɛ jeŋmaji lɛ ateŋ,”+ Yehowa, taiatsɛ lɛ kɛɛ.
9 Yehowa tsɔɔ yiŋtoo ni ji enyɔ hewɔ ni ekɛ Koresh ba ní ebaye Babilon nɔ kunim lɛ mli, akɛ: “Mitsulɔ Yakob kɛ Israel ní mihala lɛ hewɔ ni mitsɛ́o kɛ ogbɛi, ni miwoo gbɛi, dani ole mi po.”
Akɛ migbɛ́i kɛ mitsɛmɛi Abraham kɛ Isak gbɛ́ii atsɛ amɛ,
19 Shi jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ, shi moŋ, bo diɛŋtsɛ obinuu ni abaafɔ ahã bo lɛ,* lɛ ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ ehã migbɛ́i lɛ.’
(Hoshea 2:18, 19) Mɛi komɛi agbɛi ni ana yɛ ŋɛsukói ni ana yɛ Samaria lɛ anɔ lɛ ashishi ji “Baal ji mitsɛ,” “Baal láa,” “Baal he wa,” “Baal kaiɔ,” kɛ ekrokomɛi ni tamɔ enɛɛmɛi.
Kɛtsɔ Biblia lɛ ni Yehowa Odasefoi kɛ mikase lɛ nɔ lɛ, mibale nibii babaoo, ni ekomɛi ji Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛ́i, nɔ ni baa gbɔmɔ nɔ yɛ gbele mli, kɛ gbɛfaŋ nɔ ni Yesu tsuɔ koni Nyɔŋmɔ yiŋtoi aba mli.
◯ Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ agbɛi lɛ damɔ Yesaia 43:10 ni kɛɔ akɛ: “Yehowa kɛɛ, nyɛji midasefoi” lɛ nɔ.
Esa akɛ Biblia beaŋ tookwɛlɔ lɛ aná ekãa ni ekɛbu etooi lɛ ahe kɛjɛ klaji, oshishibrishii, kɛ jatai ahe.
(Lala 91:13) Taakɛ jata feɔ enii lɛ, bei komɛi lɛ Satan kɛ tutuamɔi ni yɔɔ kpetekpelee kɛ tɛ̃ɛ baa Yehowa webii anɔ kɛtsɔ yiwaa loo amɛnaa ni ehaa atsĩɔ yɛ mla naa lɛ nɔ.
Be ko beni David miikwɛ toi lɛ, jata agbo ko bamɔ too lɛ eko!
Ni amɛbaahũu tamɔ jatabii.”
Beni etsɔɔ nɔ ni ha eba lɛ nakai lɛ mli lɛ, ejaje akɛ: ‘Mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ tsu ebɔfo, ni ebaŋamɔ jatai lɛ anaabui.’
3 Bei pii lɛ Satan tsɔɔ awuiyeli, tsuŋwoo, loo wɔnitsumɔ lɛ guu nɔ etutua wɔ hiɛ kɛ hiɛ tamɔ jata tutua mɔ lɛ.
Ni miishɛɛ ni wɔɔna akɛ jata loo jwɛiaŋ kooloi krokomɛi ni tamɔ nakai aaahi wɔmasɛi ni wɔsheee gbeyei lɛ hu?
Jata tutuaa kooloo ni egbɔjɔ.
Ekolɛ jatai abu lɛ ji shikpɔŋ shishi gbɛ loo bu ni enaa gbɛ kã yiteŋ gbɛ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, Kojolɔi 14:6 wieɔ Samson he akɛ: “Ni Yehowa mumɔ lɛ bayi enɔ, ni etserɛ emli, tamɔ atserɛɔ abotia bi mli nɔŋŋ, tsɛ ehiɛɛɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko yɛ edɛŋ.”
Amɛshɛɛɛ bu lɛ shishi po ni jatai lɛ mɔmɔ amɛ ni amɛjwara amɛwui fɛɛ.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ Yohane yɔse nɛkɛ toobi nɛɛ oya akɛ “Jata lɛ ni jɛ Yuda akutso lɛ mli lɛ” kɛ “David shishifa” lɛ.
Gbi ko gbɛkɛ, beni amɛshĩ buui yɛ agbo naa lɛ, amɛnu ni jatai miihũu yɛ amɛmasɛi nɔŋŋ.
Yɛ sɛɛ mli, beni Mediabii kɛ Persiabii lɛ kpãta Babilon hiɛ lɛ, akɛ Daniel wo jatai abu mli, shi Nyɔŋmɔ ŋamɔ jatai lɛ anaabui ni ekɛbaa eyi hu.
No hewɔ lɛ kui enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ kɛ Jata ni jɛ Yuda akutso lɛ mli, Yesu Kristo, ni eji amɛ-Hiɛnyiɛlɔ, Tatsɛ, kɛ amɛ-Nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ nyiɛ.—Kpojiemɔ 5:5; Abɛi 28:1.
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ bɔɔ wɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Nyɛhenyɛlɔ, abonsam lɛ, nyiɛ tamɔ jata ni hũuɔ eetao mɔ ni eeemi.”—1 Pet.
Kooloo lɛ su ni fo yɛ ehiɛ lɛ ha esusu akɛ, ŋaŋ abotia kɛkɛ ni, shi sɛɛ mli beni ekwɛ enanenaa lɛ ena akɛ jata ni!
30 Jata, ni ji kooloo ni yɔɔ ekãa fe fɛɛ yɛ kooloi ateŋ lɛ,
Niŋmalɔ ko ni ŋmaa nii yɛ The Toronto Star lɛ mli yɛ Canada lɛ jie yiŋtoo kome kpo, beni eŋma akɛ: “Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ lɛ tamɔ jata ni bɛ nyanyɔŋ, ni hũuɔ kɛji ekɛ adesai abasabasafeemɔ shihilɛ kpe, shi ja emɛ ni emli bii lɛ kɛ nyanyɔji ebawo edaaŋ dani enyɛɔ nɔ ko efeɔ.”
(1 Mose 8:21) Ni gbekɛbii titri ní amɛbɛ niiashikpamɔ ko lɛ ji mɛi ni Satan ni tamɔ “jata ni hũuɔ” lɛ tutua.
Eeenyɛ efee akɛ ajie Paulo kɛjɛ jata diɛŋtsɛ daaŋ loo ajie lɛ yɛ shihilɛ ko ni yɔɔ oshara mli.
Beni Paulo kɛ kaa ni eeenyɛ efee akɛ no ha agbe lɛ yɛ ehemɔkɛyeli lɛ hewɔ lɛ kpeɔ lɛ, eŋma akɛ: “Nuŋtsɔ lɛ fi misɛɛ ni ewo mi hewalɛ, koni atsɔ minɔ ama shiɛmɔ lɛ nɔ mi, ni jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ anu; ni ajie mi yɛ jata lɛ daaŋ.”
Agbɛnɛ hu afeɔ Satan Abonsam he mfoniri yɛ Biblia lɛ mli akɛ “jata ni hũuɔ eetao mɔ ni eeemi.”
+ Egbe Ariel, Moabnyo lɛ bihii enyɔ lɛ, ni ebote nubu ko mli ni eyagbe jata yɛ snoo gbi nɔ.
Beni Yehowa tsɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ní esa akɛ adesa ashe Bɔlɔ lɛ gbeyei lɛ, be ko lɛ ekɛ Hiob wie kooloi srɔtoi tamɔ jata, ŋãŋ teji, wuo, Behemoth (loo, nu mli shwuɔ), kɛ Leviatan (eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, baa) he.
Ani susuma lɛ gboɔ?
Ao misusuma,* onaanaa hewalɔi anɔ.
Esusu Mateo 10:28 ni kɛɔ akɛ: “Nyɛshea mɔ ni nyɛɔ susuma kɛ gbɔmɔtso fɛɛ hiɛ ekpataa yɛ gehena mli lɛ gbeyei” lɛ he.
+ 20 Susuma* ni feɔ esha lɛ, nakai susuma* lɛ nɔŋŋ baagbo.
Eeekpɔ̃ amɛsusuma kɛaajɛ fifiamɔ kɛ yiwalɛ mli, ni amɛlá jara aaawa yɛ ehiɛ.”—Lala 72:12-14.
11:14) Kristendombii, ni kɛɔ akɛ amɛji Kristofoi lɛ tsɔɔ tsɔɔmɔi—tamɔ Triniti, hɛl la, kɛ susuma ni gbooo lɛ—ni eyi tɔ́ kɛ adesã kɛ amale sɔŋŋ.
Mɔ ni aaahi maŋ nɛŋ lɛ, eeegbo kɛ klante kɛ hɔmɔ kɛ gbele hela naa; shi mɔ moŋ ní aaaje kpo, ní eyagbee Kaldeabii ní ebɔ nsara ewo nyɛhe lɛ adɛŋ lɛ, eyi aaaná wala, ni esusuma aaatsɔ haanɔ̃ ahã lɛ.”
Eesumɔ ni ekɛ esusuma, loo ewala afɔ shi eha adesai eshafeelɔi.
□ Mɛni ji wiemɔi ni atsɔɔ shishi akɛ “susuma” yɛ shishijee wiemɔ mli lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ shishinumɔ?
(b) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ 1 Mose 2:7 lɛ maa nɔ mi akɛ wiemɔ “susuma” lɛ baanyɛ atsɔɔ gbɔmɔ muu lɛ fɛɛ?
Mɛi komɛi sheɔ gbeyei akɛ amɛ susuma baanyɛ aya hɛl la mli loo hetsuumɔ he ko.
Belɛ, mɛni hewɔ ni klɛŋklɛŋ afii oha lɛ mli Yudafoi pii, tamɔ Masada Hiɛdɔlɔi lɛ, na nɔmimaa waa akɛ susuma lɛ gbooo lɛ mɔ?
(Yeremia 13:17; Yona 2:7) Anyɛɔ ajuɔ susumai atoɔ, anyiɛɔ amɛsɛɛ, ni akɛ amɛ woɔ gboklɛi amli.
Nɛkɛ kuu nɛɛ wo ehe nɔ gojoo kɛteke hemɔkɛyeli kwalɔi asafo ni ba yɛ Yesu bɔfoi lɛ agbele sɛɛ be fioo mli lɛ, ni yɛ naagbee lɛ, ebabɔi wɔŋjalɔi ajeŋ nilee, tamɔ Triniti, kɛ adesa susuma ni gbooo lɛ tsɔɔmɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Biblia lɛ feɔ lɛ faŋŋ akɛ, abɔɔɔ adesai akɛ mɛi ni susuma ko ni gbooo yɔɔ amɛmli.
Yehowa ma ‘esusuma ni ekɛaaha lɛ akɛ haa nɔ̃’ lɛ pɛ nɔ mi.—Yeremia 45:4, 5.
Akɛni susumɔi ni Plato hiɛ yɛ susuma lɛ he lɛ ná Origen nɔ hewalɛ hewɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔjamɔ he nilelɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ Werner Jaeger lɛ kɛɛ akɛ, Origen “ŋɔ Plato tsɔɔmɔ akɛ adesa susuma lɛ gbooo lɛ efutu Kristofoi atsɔɔmɔ lɛ.”
Maŋtsɛ Salomo ni ji nilelɔ lɛ jaje akɛ: “Nɔ̃ kpakpa ko bɛ ha gbɔmɔ fe enɛ, akɛ eye ni enu, ni eha esusuma aye nii kpakpai amli ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ edeŋmegbomɔ lɛ mli.”
“Nɔ ni Amɛdiɔ Sɛɛ lɛ Nɔŋŋ Ŋɔɔ Amɛwala Kɛyaa”
Enɛ jeee nɔ ko ni amɛná kɛjɛ fɔmɔ mli, oookɛɛ nɔ ni akɛ susuma ni gbooo wo amɛ mli.
Mibɔi kanemɔ kɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ akɛ male miishɛɛ ni susumai ni egboi etee ŋwɛi lɛ naa mli ŋɔɔmɔ.
Ákɛ mɛi ni tamɔɔɔ mɛi ni heɔ susuma ni gbooo lɛ amɛyeɔ lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi efeee yara kɛ susumɔ ni ejaaa akɛ aaajaje akɛ mɔ ni egbo lɛ etee jeŋ kroko mli.
Mɛni ji adesa susuma lɛ?
No hewɔ lɛ, Paulo wo wɔ hewalɛ akɛ: “Nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ní nyɛfeɔ lɛ, nyɛjiea nyɛmusuŋ nyɛtsua, taakɛ Nuŋtsɔ [Yehowa] nyɛtsuɔ nyɛhaa ni jeee gbɔmɛi.”—Nyɛkanea Kolosebii 3:18-24.
Kɛ amɛbaje nɔnyɛɛ shishi lɛ, amɛjieɔ amɛhe kpo akɛ ‘mɛi ni edɔɔɔ amɛsusumai ahe’ babaoo fe bɔ ni amɛdɔɔ Yehowa he.
Odasefoi enyɔ ko kɛ gbekɛ bibioo ko miiya shia kɛ shia yɛ Caribbean ŋshɔkpɔ ko nɔ.
Misɔle miha Yehowa yɛ blema blɔfo gowa ŋmɔ ni yɔɔ shia lɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli, ni miwo shi akɛ masɔmɔ lɛ kɛya naanɔ.
Ni mahi ewe lɛ daa.
Ashã shiai kɛ Maŋtsɛyeli Asai nyɔŋmai abɔ butuu yɛ akrowai krokomɛi amli.
Ani nyɛleee akɛ esa mi akɛ mihiɔ shi yɛ nii ni ji mitsɛ nɔ̃ lɛ mli?”
Amɛyɛ jamɔ mli rɔk lala he shwɛmɔ nifeemɔ nii ni ajieɔ atsɔɔ ni mɛi kwɛɔ, amɛyɛ tsui ni aholeɔ dadei anɔ yɛ mli kɛhaa kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔ, amɛyɛ okpɔlɔi ni atswaa bɔɔlui yɛ nɔ, amɛyɛ hei ni akwɛɔ gbekɛbii bibii anɔ yɛ, kɛ agbɛnɛ tsũi ni ajieɔ sinii yɛ mli.
7 Nakai ji bɔ ni efeɔ daa afi; be fɛɛ be ni Hana baakwɔ kɛya Yehowa shĩa lɛ,+ ebienyɛ lɛ yeɔ ehe fɛo aahu akɛ efóɔ ni eyeee nii.
John Twumasi, ni wɔtsɛ ewiemɔ sɛɛ kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ, bɔ amaniɛ akɛ: “Mikɛɛ mɛi krokomɛi ni wɔkɛyɔɔ shia lɛ akɛ wɔ Asafo lɛ emaje wɔ samlai ni akɛfɔɔ nii ahe kɛ tsofai ni gbeɔ muawai—babaoo bɔ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛsaa wɔshia lɛ mli fɛɛ.
Be ko beni mi kɛ Beryl tee wɔyashiɛ yɛ shĩa agbo ko mli lɛ, gbekɛbii komɛi bɔi wɔ jɛmɔ, ni amɛbɔi wɔ tɛi hu tswiamɔ.
2 Kɛkɛ ni David fã koni akɛ gbɔi+ ni yɔɔ Israel shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ fɛɛ aba, ni ehã amɛtsu nii akɛ tɛgbalɔi koni amɛgbala tɛi ni amɛsaa he koni akɛma anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shĩa lɛ.
Aaafee nakai beaŋ nɔŋŋ ni wɔfɔlɔi ateŋ gbala, no hewɔ lɛ mi kɛ Awo ha afee tsũ shwiili aha wɔ, ni wɔfee ekome kɛbɔi gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ.
Ŋmeii kɛ kpitikpitii aaakwɛ̃ yɛ mimaŋ lɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, hɛɛ, yɛ nyamɔ maŋ lɛ mli miishɛɛnamɔ tsũi lɛ fɛɛ ayiteaŋ!”
Asraafoi lɛ fo shia nɛɛ amɛshi, ni amɛtee shiai krokomɛi ni tsara nɔ lɛ amli!
Eyɛ mli akɛ Katolikbii kɛ Protɛstantbii ni ji mɛi ni yɔɔ maŋ nɛɛ mli lɛ jeee niiatsɛmɛi moŋ, shi wɔ fɛɛ wɔhiɔ shi jogbaŋŋ.
19 Shi Uzia, ni no mli lɛ ehiɛ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma shãanɔ yɛ edɛŋ ni eeba ebashã tsofa-kɛ-ŋma lɛ mli wo la;+ ni be ni emli wo la ewo osɔfoi lɛ, kpiti+ shwie ehiɛnaa yɛ osɔfoi lɛ ahiɛ yɛ Yehowa shĩa lɛ yɛ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ masɛi.
23 Amɛsɛɛ lɛ, Benyamin kɛ Hashub saa gbogbo lɛ yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛshĩa lɛ hiɛ.
Beni wɔyɔɔ shĩa ko mli lɛ, wɔná wɔle akɛ polisifoi miiba amɛbamɔmɔ wɔ.
Ni nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshĩa lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.” —5 MOSE 6:5-7.
Asaa Yehowa jamɔhe lɛ bɔni afee ni aya nɔ ajá lɛ yɛ gbɛ ni bulɛ yɔɔ mli nɔ.
“Wɔhereɔ mɛi hiɛmɛɛ kɛbaa wɔshia be fɛɛ be, ni no hewɔ lɛ wɔshia lɛ mli yiɔ obɔ daa kɛ gbekɛbii”
4 Yɛ afi ni ji kpawo lɛ nɔ lɛ, Yehoiada tsu ayatsɛ mɛi oha nɔkwɛlɔi ni kwɛɔ maŋtsɛ hebulɔi* kɛ maŋtsɛ shĩa bulɔi*+ lɛ anɔ lɛ koni amɛba eŋɔɔ yɛ Yehowa shĩa lɛ.
11 “Aaron kɛ esha afɔle tsinanuu ni ekɛbaashã afɔle ehã ehe lɛ aba, ni ekpãtã ehã lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe kɛ eshĩa lɛ; no sɛɛ lɛ, egbe esha afɔle tsinanuu ni ekɛbaashã afɔle ehã ehe lɛ.
Kadimɔ nɔ ni ewie afii babaoo nɛ yɛ bɔ ni esa akɛ atsɔɔ bii egbɛ̀i lɛ ahe nii aha lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, bɔfo Paulo ŋma akɛ: “Nyɛŋãa Priska kɛ Akwila, ní ji minanemɛi nitsulɔi yɛ Kristo Yesu mli lɛ, nyɛhaa mi, . . . nyɛŋãa asafo ni yɔɔ amɛwe lɛ hu.”
Wɔkaneɔ yɛ bɔfoi lɛ ahe akɛ “amɛfɔ̃ɔɔ nitsɔɔmɔ kɛ Yesu Kristo shiɛmɔ yɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ kɛ shiai be fɛɛ be.”
Sɛ̃i ni nɔ yɔɔ bɔdɔɔ bɛ asa lɛ nɔ, shi wɔta tso sɛ̃ii ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ anɔ ni wɔhe jɔ wɔ.
3 Nɔ kroko ni kɔɔ nikasemɔ ni mɔɔ shi jogbaŋŋ he ji akɛ, esaaa akɛ wɔtaaa sɛi loo sɛi kakadaŋŋ ni enɔ yɔɔ bɔdɔɔ nɔ.
Shi ni osɔfo lɛ bashɛ shi pɛ kɛkɛ ni eŋmɔ, ni eta amɛdɛ, ni eyata sɛi ni tsa polisifonyo lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.
10 Ofainɛ, hã wɔfee tsũ fioo ko yɛ wɔtsũ lɛ yiteŋ+ ni wɔkɛ saatso, kɛ okpɔlɔ, kɛ sɛi, kɛ kanetso ama mli.
Kɛ́ akɛ nibii komɛi baasaa Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ loo abaato sɛi lɛ yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, esa akɛ abi ajinafoi akuu lɛ dã.
Amɛteŋ mɛi enyɔ te shi kɛjɛ amɛsɛii lɛ anɔ bɔni afee ni gbɔi lɛ anyɛ atara shi.
Toibolɔi ni fa fe 300 tara tso sɛii kɛ rɔba sɛii anɔ yɛ agba ko ni akɛ ziŋele ehà nɔ lɛ shishi.
No mli lɛ anaa he ko akɛ sɛii 12 mamɔɔ, shi bei komɛi kɛ mɛi babaoo ba fe bɔ ni akpaa gbɛ lɛ, wɔgbeleɔ shinaa ni yɔɔ tsu bibioo ni tsa nɔ lɛ naa.
Kapintɛfonyo ji mɔ ko ni kɛ tso feɔ nibii, tamɔ okpɔ̃lɔ̃i kɛ sɛii kɛ nibii.
Polisifonyo ko fai kã sɛi ko nɔ yɛ tsu lɛ fɔlɔ ko mli.
Saramɔ ni etee yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ hu ye omanye waa diɛŋtsɛ, yɛ mɔdɛŋ ni osɔfoi lɛ bɔ koni amɛfite kpee lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ, ejaakɛ amɛbolɔ ni amɛkɛ sɛii lɛ tswiatswia shi.
Okpɔlɔi, sɛii, saatsei, kukwɛii, tsɛŋsii, plɛtei, kɛ nibii krokomɛi fɛɛ ni akɛyeɔ nii lɛ hiaa feelɔ, tamɔ bɔ ni gbogboi, tsũi lɛ amli, kɛ ŋsɛndoi lɛ hu ji lɛ.
Maŋtsɛ Yesu Kristo baaha amɛhe ajɔ amɛ, “taakɛ nyɔŋmɔ nɛɔ shwieɔ ŋa ni asaa enɔ jwɛi lɛ nɔ lɛ, tamɔ nyɔŋmɔ tueɔ eshwieɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ.”
Kɛ́ ebalɛ nakai lɛ, kɔɔyɔŋ tsakeŋ ní wɔbaana srɔtofeemɔ ni yɔɔ latsaa kɛ fɛ̃i beaŋ teŋ, ni nugbɔ hu enɛŋ ekpakpa ko.
Bɔ́, loo nugbɔnɛmɔ, loo niiahefɔmɔ, loo ekɛ nitsumɔ yɛ be kpalaŋŋ mli, nyɛɛɛ eha ekwá.”
Hii kɛ yei oha kwɔ kɛtee gɔji anɔ he ni nugbɔ enɛ yɛ, ni amɛyatere tsei wuji ni amɛtsiimɔ shɛɔ tɔn 40 ni amɛkɛba.
Nugbɔ lɛ bɔi nɛmɔ aaafee gbɛkɛ ŋmɛji 11, ni enɛ aahu ŋmɛlɛtswai babaoo ni enaa baaa shi.
Shi nuklea loo tawuu nii krokomɛi yeŋ omanye yɛ nakai be lɛ mli, ejaakɛ Yehowa jajeɔ akɛ: “Ni matsɔ gbelehela kɛ lá nɔ mikɛ lɛ aaakojo, ni maha nugbɔnɛmɔ ni looɔ nibii kɛyaa kɛ nyɔŋmɔŋtɛi kɛ la kɛ swɔɔ anɛ ashwie lɛ kɛ etai lɛ kɛ majimaji babaoo ni fata ehe lɛ anɔ.
Mɛnɛɛmɛi yɛ hegbɛ akɛ amɛŋaa ŋwɛi naa, koni nu akanɛ yɛ amɛgbalɛ gbii lɛ amli; ni amɛyɛ hegbɛ hu yɛ nui lɛ anɔ, akɛ amɛhãa etsɔ̃ɔ lá, ni amɛkɛ haomɔ haoɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shii abɔ ni amɛsumɔɔ.”
Josephus ŋma nibii ni tee nɔ yɛ beni Romabii lɛ tutua Yerusalem klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa (66 Ŋ.B.) lɛ kɛ ehiɛkpatamɔ lɛ teŋ: “Yɛ gbɛkɛ lɛ ahum ko ni fiteɔ nii tswa; lasuogbele ho kɛbɔle shi, nugbɔnɛmɔ wuji tee nɔ, sarawai gbala kɛtsara nɔ, nugbɔshimɔ lɛ woɔ mɔ he gbeyei, shikpɔŋ lɛ hoso waa kɛ gbɛɛmɔ ni tsimɔɔ toi.
+ 17 Shi kɛ́ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ wekui lɛ amli mɔ ko ekwɔɔɔ kɛyaaa Yerusalem ní eyakoto Maŋtsɛ lɛ, ni ji Yehowa, taiatsɛ lɛ, no lɛ, nugbɔ enɛŋ ehãŋ amɛ.
+ 18 Ni no sɛɛ lɛ, esaa esɔle, ni nugbɔ jɛ ŋwɛi eshwie shi ni shikpɔŋ lɛ ba nii.
Yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ afii enyɔ kɛ fã lɛ mli lɛ, nugbɔ miinɛ jio, hulu miitso jio lɛ, wɔtaa okɔokpe kɛfãa gbɛ kɛkwɔlɔɔ gɔŋkpɔi, ni wɔkɛnyiɛɔ jɔɔi hu amli.
+ 34 Be ni Farao na akɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ lɛ, nyɔŋmɔŋtɛi lɛ, kɛ nugbɔshiimɔi lɛ asɛɛ efo lɛ, esaa efee esha ekoŋŋ kɛtsɔ etsui ní ekpiliŋ+ lɛ nɔ, lɛ kɛ etsuji lɛ fɛɛ.
Kɛ́ osusu nii ahe kɛtee Abijah beaŋ lɛ, obaanyɛ ofee gbi ko leebi ko ni ekolɛ eyɔse akɛ atatu ni ewo kpii lɛ miigbɛ—ni nugbɔ enɛŋ dɔŋŋ kɛyashi be ko lɛ he mfoniri yɛ ojwɛŋmɔ mli.
Enɛ haa enyɛɔ ekɛ nu falɛ ni enaa kɛjɛɔ nugbɔnɛmɔ loo snoo ni sereɔ mli lɛ fɛɛ tsuɔ nii kɛmɔɔ shi.
Ekpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ, kɛji akɛ mihu eŋmɔ ni dalɛ shɛɔ hɛkta 3/4 dani nugbɔnɛmɔ lɛ je shishi lɛ, ekɛ baisikel nɛɛ baaha mi akɛ nyɔmɔwoo.
Ani ooonyɛ oha atatui anɛ nui ashwie shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ?
5 No mli lɛ, jwɛi ko bɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni kwɛ̃ɛ nii ko hu bɔiko kwɛ̃ɛ, ejaakɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ hãko nugbɔ anɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni gbɔmɔ ko hu bɛ ni baatsu shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nii.
(Jajelɔ 1:7) Nakai eji yɛ be mli ni nugbɔnɛmɔi kɛ faai efɔ̀ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, amɛmli nui lɛ tsakeɔ kɛjɛɔ ŋshɔi lɛ amli kɛyaa atatui lɛ amli ekoŋŋ.
Bɔ ni nugbɔnɛmɔ haa wui kwɛ̃ɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ, “nakai miwiemɔ ni jɛɔ midaaŋ lɛ hu aaafee.
+ 25 Ni nugbɔ nɛ, ni nui babaoo yi shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni kɔɔyɔɔ ni naa wa tswa ni eshimɔ nakai tsũ lɛ, shi ekumɔɔɔ eshwieee shi, ejaakɛ ato shishi yɛ tɛsaa nɔ.
10 Yehowa kɛ naagbee hiɛkpatamɔ kwraa baaba Satan gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ nɔ: “Matsɔ gbele hela kɛ lá nɔ mikɛ [Gog] aaakojo, ni maha nyɔŋmɔnɛmɔ ni looɔ nibii kɛyaa kɛ nyɔŋmɔŋtɛi kɛ la kɛ swɔɔ anɛ ashwie lɛ kɛ etai lɛ [anɔ], . . .
* Feemɔ gbalɔ nɛɛ he mfoniri yɛ ojwɛŋmɔŋ okwɛ akɛ, eedɔrɔ etade kakadaŋŋ lɛ nɔ, ni efĩ yɛ ehɛ koni enyɛ efamɔ enaji jogbaŋŋ ni ehiɛ foi kɛtsɔ gbɛ ni nɔ eyi tɔ kɛ nu lɛ nɔ—ejo foi waa aahu akɛ enyɛ eyanina maŋtsɛ lɛ shwiili lɛ ni eho ehe!
9 Mɛi babaoo kuɔ amɛhiɛ amɛshwieɔ mlihilɛ ni ajieɔ lɛ kpo atsɔɔ adesai lɛ nɔ, akɛni hulu lɛ yaa nɔ etsoɔ, nugbɔ yaa nɔ enɛɔ, kɛ be ni aduawai yaa nɔ ebaa nii be fɛɛ be lɛ hewɔ.
Eeenyɛ efee akɛ amɛfã gbɛ nɛɛ yɛ Gbo beaŋ shishijee gbɛ, beni latsaa be lɛ miihe aba naagbee ni nugbɔ nyɛɔ enɛɔ fiofio lɛ.
Israel maŋ lɛ nitsumɔ titri ji okwaayeli; bɔ́ kɛ nugbɔ nɔ gbɔmɛi lɛ awala damɔ.
Gbele tamɔ wɔ̀ ni tsii waa, nɔ ni mɔ lɛ kaiii nɔ ko nɔ ko.
7, 8. (a) Mɛɛ nibii krokomɛi wɔkaseɔ yɛ Yesu nɔkwɛmɔnɔ ni kɔɔ nidulɔ ni yawɔɔ lɛ he lɛ mli?
Shi Yesu kɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ Lazaro miiwɔ ni E-baaya ni eyatsĩɛ lɛ.
Mɛni Yesu nɔkwɛmɔnɔ ni kɔɔ nidulɔ ni yawɔɔ lɛ he lɛ tsɔɔ?
12. (a) Eyɛ mli akɛ Yona yawɔ beni ahum lɛ tswaa lɛ moŋ, shi mɛni hewɔ esaaa akɛ wɔhe feɔ oya kɛwieɔ wɔshiɔ lɛ lɛ?
(Hiob 33:25) Wɔbaaná wɔ̀ kpakpa wɔwɔ̀, ni be fɛɛ be lɛ, wɔbaate shi kɛ hewalɛ ní wɔmiikwɛ gbɛ akɛ wɔbaatsa nitsumɔ ni haa mɔ mii shɛɔ ehe nɔ.
Mikɛɛ lɛ akɛ eya shia ni eyawɔ, koni ebabo maŋshiɛmɔ lɛ toi.
(Jajelɔ 9:5) Biblia lɛ wieɔ gbohii lɛ ahe ookɛɛ wɔ ni tsii enyɔ amɛnɔ, ni tsɔɔ akɛ amɛleee nɔ ko kwraa ni yaa nɔ yɛ shihilɛ mli.
Mɛi ni baafata enɔ bii nɛɛ ahe ji akpekpei abɔ ni je Harmagedon naagbee ta lɛ mli, kɛ akpekpei toi akpei abɔ ni abaatee amɛ shi kɛjɛ amɛ gbele wɔɔ yɛ gbohiiabui amli lɛ.
Eŋɔɔ nyɛmiyoo lɛ naa akɛ efataaa “oblaŋ ni wɔɔ” lɛ he dɔŋŋ. —Kpojiemɔ 18:4.
Dario hao waa yɛ Daniel hewɔ nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ aahu akɛ enyɛɛɛ ewɔ.
(Mateo 24:45) Akɛni wɔmiisumɔ waa koni wɔle shɛɛ sane ni Yehowa yɔɔ kɛha adesai aweku lɛ jogbaŋŋ hewɔ lɛ, wɔɔfee jogbaŋŋ akɛ wɔɔkane Biblia lɛ “shwane kɛ nyɔɔŋ”—hɛɛ, yɛ be mli ni wɔnyɛɛɛ wɔwɔ yɛ yiŋtoo ko po hewɔ.
(Galatabii 6:1) Hela wiemɔ ni atsɔɔ shishi akɛ ‘buɔ he’ lɛ shishinumɔ diɛŋtsɛ ji “hiɛ kã be fɛɛ be.”
Kɛtsɔ mɛi ni egboi lɛ ashi ni eeetee kɛba wala mli ekoŋŋ lɛ nɔ.
Wɔ kpakpa ni nyɛnáaa nyɛwɔ kɛ tsakemɔi ni baa yɛ bɔ ni nyɛnuɔ nii ahe nyɛhãa lɛ mli lɛ baanyɛ ekɛ naagba aba nyɛteŋ.
Bei amli ni wɔhiɛ etsɛ̃ loo wɔwɔko lɛ, wɔ henumɔi enumɔ lɛ yaa nɔ amɛkɛ saji kɛ mfonirii yaa aŋsɔ lɛ mli yɛ be fɛɛ mli, shi jeee nakai eji yɛ wɔ wɔɔ bei amli.
(Mateo 26:38) Yesu kɛ hiɛdɔɔ sɔle shii etɛ eha eŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ, ni eku esɛɛ eba shii etɛ ebanina enanemɛi lɛ ní amɛmiiwɔ.—Mateo 26:40, 43, 45.
Kɛ́ amɛhãko mɔ ko agbee shi lɛ, wɔ tseɔ yɛ amɛhiɛ.
Ye Obua Mɛi ni ‘Amɛte Shi Kɛjɛ Wɔ Mli’
Be bɛ kwraa; naagbee lɛ eshɛ,
Jɛmɛ wɔfeɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ yɛ—jɛmɛ wɔyeɔ nii yɛ, jɛmɛ wɔwɔɔ, jɛmɛ wɔjuɔ wɔhe yɛ, ni wɔyaa niiaŋ po yɛ jɛmɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, efɔɔ gbele kɛ “wɔ̀” he too, ni ewieɔ mɛi ni egboi lɛ ahe akɛ ‘amɛmiiwɔ yɛ gbohiiaje.’
Eyɛ mli akɛ David ha etɔ daa moŋ, shi Uria wɔɔɔ emasɛi.
Wolo ko ni kɔɔ lamɔi kɛ wɔ aŋsɔ lɛ he lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Jwɛŋmɔŋ nifeemɔ ni ale fe fɛɛ akɛ eyaa nɔ yɛ wɔɔ mli lɛ jeee lamɔ shi moŋ jwɛŋmɔ.
Britain Osɔfonukpa Hume tsɛ́ sɔlemɔ mli bii lɛ po akɛ “asaabui ni amɛwɔwɔi.”
(Mateo 28:19, 20) Ebaabu ewebii lɛ ahe “yɛ eniji ashishi hɔ̃ɔŋ lɛ mli.”
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ wɔnaa akɛ Yehowa baanyɛ aye abua ewebii lɛ yɛ kaai fɛɛ ni amɛkɛkpeɔ lɛ amli.
Nakai nɔŋŋ dani abaakpata Sodom kɛ Gomora maji lɛ ahiɛ lɛ, Lot shaahii lɛ na lɛ akɛ “etamɔ mɔ ni yeɔ fɛo.”—1 Mose 19:14.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ebaajie Satan kɛ edaimonioi lɛ kɛya.
Efɔlɔi kɛ lɛ tee Yerusalem koni amɛyaye Hehoo lɛ.

Yɛ gbɛ ni heɔ kilomitai 650 ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ, wɔtsɔ maŋ lɛ akrowai ni gɔji yɔɔ jɛmɛ kɛ amɛnɔ jwɛifɔ ni yɔɔ fɛo lɛ amli.

12, 13. (a) Eyɛ mli akɛ Jeŋ Hewalɛi lɛ Ateŋ Akaŋshii lɛ eba naagbee moŋ, shi jeŋmaji pii etsɔɔ akɛ amɛsumɔɔ tawuu lolo yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Kooyigbɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛ mɔ ni kɛ lɛ shiɔ akaŋ lɛ wuu maji asɛɛfimɔ tai, kɛ atũa ni atseɔ ashiɔ nɔyelii ni afiɔ sɛɛ yɛ Afrika, Asia, kɛ Latin America, yɛ Maji Ateŋ Béi ni Tawuu Bɛ Mli bei lɛ amli.
Bo lɛ susumɔ bɔ ni obaanu he oha kɛji afɔ̃ bo nine kɛtee niyeli shishi, shi mɔ ni fɔ̃ bo nine lɛ ejieee suɔmɔ kpo etsɔɔɔ bo, ni enyaŋe bo lɛ he okwɛ!
8 Beni Yesu kɛ Laodikea asafo lɛ wieɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Mile onitsumɔi lɛ akɛ obɛ ŋanii ni obɛ klakla hu.

Kɛ́ ojie hedɔɔ kpo lɛ, egbalaa otoibolɔi lɛ kɛbɛŋkɛɔ bo taakɛ la gbalaa mɔ yɛ jenamɔ fɛ̃i mli lɛ.

4 Ni kɛlɛ, yɛ enaakpɛɛ sui ni ŋmɛɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa naaa toiboo ni jɛɛɛ henumɔ loo kanyamɔ mli lɛ he miishɛɛ.
Shihilɛ mli nibii ni yɔɔ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ haa nɛkɛ yaka yiŋsusumɔi ni yɔɔ ŋmɔlɔ nɛɛ fɛɛ feɔ efolo. —Jajelɔ 9:11.
Akɛni ehaoɔ yɛ susumɔ ni esusuɔ akɛ asumɔŋ esane lɛ he hewɔ lɛ, ekolɛ ejieŋ bɔ ni enuɔ he ehaa diɛŋtsɛ lɛ kpo.
Okɛ ehe nɔkwɛmɔnɔ aha. (b) Te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ akɛ Yehowa nilee lɛ jeee nɔ ni henumɔ loo musuŋtsɔlɛ bɛ mli?
Ŋwɛi jalɛsaneyeli jeee su ko ni henumɔ bɛ mli ni yɔɔ nyanyaanya ní shwieɔ wɔ kɛyaa sɛɛ, shi moŋ eji su ni asumɔɔ waa ní gbalaa wɔ kɛbɛŋkɛɔ Yehowa.
16 No hewɔ lɛ, akɛni kulɔkulɔ oyɔɔ ni ojɔko ŋanii+ ni odɔko klakla+ hu hewɔ lɛ, mibafɛ̃ bo yɛ midaaŋ mashwie.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni Yehowa aaafee mɔ ni wieɔ kpeŋkpeŋ, ni esumɔɔɔ gbɔmɔ, loo eyi wa, taakɛ eji anɔkwale yɛ mɛi ni hiɛ nɔyeli hegbɛi lɛ ahe lɛ, emli jɔ ni eyɛ mlitsɔlɛ.
Yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ hei krokomɛi lɛ, ehaa jeŋ feɔ kulɔɔ yɛ fɛ̃i be ni naa wa waa sɛɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ eji March nyɔŋ lɛ nɔ yɛ afi 1916 mli ni fɛi miiye moŋ, shi akɛni eleee bɔ ni eeefee ena Biblia Kaselɔi lɛ hewɔ lɛ, ebi ni Ataa abaptisi lɛ yɛ faa bibioo ko ni hoɔ yɛ ŋmɔ lɛ mli lɛ mli.
Etamɔ nɔ ni amrɔ nɛɛ, fɔtei miiye wɔshia ní enyɛ edamɔ shikpɔŋhosomɔ wulu ní wɔtsɛɔ lɛ Maji Ateŋ Béi ni Tawuu Bɛ Mli lɛ naa lɛ.”
Fɛ̃i ye waa diɛŋtsɛ jenamɔ muu lɛ fɛɛ.
Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, Luka ni ji Paulo hefatalɔ gbɛfãlɔ lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ ‘amɛfee amɛ ejurɔ pii; ejaakɛ amɛshɛre la ni amɛhere amɛ fɛɛ tswɛm hiɛmɛɛ yɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ babaoo kɛ fɛ̃i lɛ hewɔ.’
Biblia ŋmalɔ ni ji Ezra lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ Chislev ji nyɔŋ ko ni ale jogbaŋŋ akɛ eji fɛ̃i kɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ be lɛɛlɛŋ.
“Kwɛ yiwalɛ kpelei ni tamɔ kooloi anifeemɔ ni henumɔ bɛ mli ni yaa nɔ,” taakɛ dɛhiɛmɔ wolo lɛ tsɔɔ mli lɛ.
Ejɛ ŋwɛi eshɛ Israel hefɛo lɛ efɔ̃ shikpɔŋ.
Gbi gbɛkɛ ni enɔ jetsɛremɔ lɛ abaabaptisi lɛ lɛ, epapa fee nɔ ko ni sa jogbaŋŋ.
Nɛkɛ mfonirii fɛfɛji nɛɛ eko fɛɛ eko damɔ shiwoo ni akɛha yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ, ni ji Biblia lɛ mli lɛ nɔ.
Yɛ Ester gbɛfaŋ lɛ, mɛni hefɛo baaha ená—jɔɔmɔ loo loomɔ?
Eji jamɔhe fɛfɛo ni Yehowa Odasefoi asafoi enyɔ kpeɔ yɛ mli.
Yɛ efɛo, ekpakpa ni eji, kɛ ekɛ nitsumɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ, enɔ̃ lɛ bafee nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ̃, ni etsɛɛɛ ni abɔi no kasemɔ yɛ Europa fɛɛ.
Mɔ ko ni jɛ London, yɛ England ni kane wolo lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ: “Mfonirii fɛfɛji lɛ baaha fɔlɔi kɛ gbekɛbii aná he miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
Yoo lɛ ji Batsheba ni he yɔɔ fɛo naakpa lɛ, Uria ŋa lɛ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yehowa jieɔ sui kpakpai nɛɛ akpo?
Aloo gbɔmɛi ahe nibii gbohii pɛ ahe osusuɔ, tamɔ sraalɔ ko ni hãa jwɛi fioo ko ni gbɛfãlɔi krokomɛi ni susuuu nii ahe kɛshwã lɛ fiteɔ miishɛɛ ni eyɔɔ yɛ nibii fɛfɛji ni enaa lɛ he lɛ. —Okɛto Jajelɔ 7:16 he.
Abaptisi mi akɛ Yehowa Odasefonyo, ni nyɔɔŋ kome sɛɛ lɛ mifɔ́ biyoo fɛfɛo ni ji mibi ni ji enyɔ nɔ lɛ, ni wɔwo lɛ Lucía.
Mɛi ejwɛ lɛ onukpai ji amɛ, ni amɛteŋ mɛi enyɔ hu ji daa gbɛgbalɔi, ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni Abɛi 17:6 ji anɔkwale ha, akɛ: “Hiimeji akekre ji bii abii, ni bii ahiɛnyam ji amɛtsɛmɛi.”
10 Minyɛmi yoo kɛ miyemforo, osuɔmɔ nifeemɔi lɛ yɛ fɛo waa! +
Gɔji eyi shikpɔŋ nɛɛ mli fã kpotoo nɔ, no hewɔ lɛ, nantu titri atswaa kɛyaa jɛmɛ, ni ŋshɔnaa maji fɛfɛji ní ŋshɔ hiɛ atsɔɔ kɛyaa jɛmɛ hu yɛ jɛmɛ.
Beni ehe bahia koni efee ehe sɛkɛyelɔ yɛ Gat Maŋtsɛ Akish hiɛ lɛ, efo lala ko, lala kɛ ŋɔɔmɔ ko, ní hemɔkɛyeli wiemɔi nɛɛ fata he akɛ: “Nyɛkɛ mi akãfoa Yehowa dalɛ lɛ, ni nyɛhaa wɔ fɛɛ wɔwóa egbɛi lɛ nɔ!
Etamɔ fɔfɔi babaoo ni yɔɔ fɛɔ yɛ abɔɔ ko mli.
Amɛkɛ adesai agbɔmɔtsei ba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛkɛ yei fɛfɛji baná bɔlɛ, ni amɛfɔ bii ni ji gbɔmɔ fã kɛ daimonio fã—ni ji Nefilim.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, Abɛi 19:11 kɛɛ: “Gbɔmɔ ni yɔɔ jwɛŋmɔ lɛ, emli fuuu mra, ni ehiɛ ni ekuɔ efɔɔ nɔtɔmɔ nɔ lɛ, ehiɛnyam ni.”
Wɔ mii shɛ wɔhe yɛ shikpɔŋ fɛfɛo ko he—gɔŋ agbo ko ni mashi somlomloo ni atsɛɔ lɛ El Yunque (Sɔŋmɛ Tɛ), ni etamɔ nɔ ni akɛ flonto ehà nɔ, kɛ ŋwɛi ni etse ni efee bluu yɛ esɛɛ, ní atatui yɛji yɔɔ emasɛi biɛ kɛ biɛ lɛ.
□ Mɛni ji gbɛi kpakpai ni fe fɛɛ ni wɔɔtsɔ nɔ wɔjie Yehowa yi lɛ ekome?
Yɛ Li Faa lɛ naa gbɛ lɛ, kaaloo tɛi kɛ amɛnaa piɔpiɔ ni ato naa lɛ fɛo haa mɛi ni basaraa jɛmɛ lɛ anaa kpɛɔ amɛhe.
Wɔbaaná hegbɛ ‘wɔsɔmɔ Yehowa kɛ miishɛɛ,’ ni wɔbaafee ekome kɛmamɔ shĩai fɛfɛji, ni wɔfee ŋmɔji kɛyashi naagbee kwraa lɛ, wɔbaayi shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ̃.
No hewɔ lɛ kɛji akɛ oyiŋ miifee kɔshikɔshi lɛ, kaimɔ akɛ yɛ emuu ni oyeee lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ojara baanyɛ awa tamɔ “akekere fɛfɛo” kɛ “maŋtsɛfai” yɛ Yehowa hiɛ.
Ŋmalɛ lɛ ewieee akɛ okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ lɛ sɛɛ tsɛ nakai shi moŋ ákɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛ enunyam maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli nii kɛ agbojee lɛ tsɔɔ onukpai lɛ gbii 180.
“Mile Akɛ Yoo Ní He Yɔɔ Fɛo Jio”
Te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ akɛ, jeee sane ni Yesu kɛɛ ashiɛ lɛ Kristendom osɔfoi lɛ shiɛɔ lɛ?
Amɛha lɛ dɛhiɛmɔ wolo ni ji Ani Obaasumɔ ni Ole Biblia lɛ Mli Saji Babaoo?
Mɛɛ aflaŋaa Yehowa kɛma shi kɛha mɛi ní shiɔ apasa jamɔ mli lɛ, ni te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ hu?
Ŋmalɛi babaoo tsɔɔ akɛ kɛ́ aaahere mɔ ko yiwala lɛ, belɛ esa akɛ mɔ lɛ aná ale Yehowa, ni ehé Yesu nɔ eye, ní ená emli hemɔkɛyeli, ní ekɛ nitsumɔi ajie hemɔkɛyeli ni eyɔɔ lɛ kpo etsɔɔ.
Paapa lɛ booo Yakobo kɔkɔbɔɔ lɛ toi: “Gbalafitelɔi! Nyɛleee akɛ je nɛɛ hedɔɔ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nyɛɛ ni lo?
Amɛle akɛ naagbai ni akɛkpeɔ lɛ “egbɛ eshwã babaoo ni emli wa waa fe bɔ ni eji afii nyɔŋma ni eho lɛ.”
3 “Mile onitsumɔi lɛ kɛ omanehulu lɛ kɛ ohia lɛ—shi kɛlɛ niiatsɛ jio—ni mile mɛi ni kɛɔ akɛ Yudafoi ji amɛ, ni amɛjeee, shi amɛji Satan kpee he moŋ lɛ amusubɔɔ lɛ.”
3 Shi bo Yehowa, ole mi jogbaŋŋ,+ onaa mi;
Anania wiemɔi lɛ ma nɔ ni ekolɛ Saul enu momo kɛjɛ Yesu naa lɛ nɔ mi: “Wɔtsɛmɛi a-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ehalao eto, ní ole esuɔmɔnaa nii, ní ona jalɔ lɛ, ní onu edaaŋ gbee ko; shi obaatsɔ ehe odaseyelɔ, koni oye nii fiaa ni ona ni onu lɛ ahe odase otsɔɔ gbɔmɛi fɛɛ.
Namɔ le bɔ ni atsuɔ naagbai ahe nii?
Nɔ ni esa akɛ wɔbi wɔhe kɛ́ wɔmiitao wɔle kɛji hiɛtserɛjiemɔ ko sa loo esaaa lɛ ji akɛ: ‘Mɛni he ekɔɔ?
Akɛni osumɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ole akɛ oofee nɔ ni sa ehiɛ hewɔ lɛ, obaanyɛ oná “henilee kpakpa.” —Hebribii 13:18; Kolosebii 3:22-24.
16 No hewɔ lɛ, kɛjɛ be nɛɛ nɔ kɛyaa nɛɛ, wɔleee mɔ ko mɔ ko yɛ heloo gbɛfaŋ.
Lɛɛlɛŋ, taakɛ Yakobo ŋma lɛ: “Nyɛleee wɔ́ sane.”—Yakobo 4:14.
Nɔ ni wɔle pɛ kɛkɛ ji enɛ: Habel kɛ nii ni eyɔɔ lɛ amli nɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ lɛ ha.
Kɛ́ gbekɛbii kpa shi amɛna akɛ amɛfɔlɔi lɛ haa amɛ “hɛɛ” feɔ hɛɛ ni amɛ “dabi” feɔ dabi—kɛ́ no biɔ ni amɛgbala gbekɛbii lɛ atoi po lɛ—ehaa gbekɛbii lɛ nuɔ he akɛ amɛyɛ shweshweeshwe diɛŋtsɛ, ni amɛnáa bulɛ kɛ suɔmɔ babaoo amɛhaa amɛfɔlɔi lɛ.—Mateo 5:37.
3-5. (a) Te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ akɛ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ye ebua Mose ni enyɛ etsu esɔ̃i lɛ ahe nii lɛ?
Ejaakɛ ele akɛ ebaabu ohe kɛjɛ osharai srɔtoi ahe.
Nyɛmi nuu ko tsɔɔ mli akɛ, “Gbɔmɛi nyɛŋ asumɔ mɔ ko ni amɛleee lɛ, no hewɔ lɛ yɛ nikasemɔ lɛ shishijee tɔ̃ɔ lɛ, mitsɔɔ amɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi yɛ Biblia lɛ mli, ni mitaoɔ hegbɛi ni mikɛma Yehowa sui lɛ anɔ mi.”
Ekolɛ, onaa baakpɛ ohe akɛ ooole akɛ nɔ ni fe afii 3,500 nɛ ni aŋma nakai sane lɛ, ni kɛlɛ ekɛ nibii titrii ni jeŋ nilelɔi heɔ yeɔ akɛ nomɛi haa anyɛɔ ahiɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ kpãa gbee.
Shi mileee nɔ ni mafee.”
Ní Aaale Nɔ Ni Ja Ní Atsu He Nii
Yesu kɛɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ yɛ afi 33 Ŋ.B. akɛ: “Kɛ nyɛna akɛ abɔ nsara awo Yerusalem he lɛ, belɛ nyɛnáa nyɛlea akɛ efitemɔ lɛ eshɛ.
Bɔfo Paulo ŋma yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ akɛ: “Wɔle akɛ bɔɔnii lɛ fɛɛ kɛ wɔ dɔmɔɔ ŋtsɔi ni amɛkɛ wɔ kɔ̃mɔɔ kɛbashi ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ.”
Te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ akɛ bɔ ni Abɛi 8:22-31 lɛ tsɔɔ nilee mli eha lɛ kɔɔ Yesu Kristo he beni ebatsɔko adesa lɛ?
Gbɔmɛi Ma Mɔɔ Agbo Ko
(Hiob 38:1-11) Jeee adesa ŋaalɔ ko ta shi ni esusu bɔ ni esa akɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ dalɛ afee, ni asaŋ eyelikɛbuamɔ bɛ mli ni afee.
Eyɛ mli akɛ ashã maŋ lɛ ekoŋŋ, tamɔ tso agbo ko ní afo afɔ̃ shi ní ashãa moŋ, shi Israel mfonirifeemɔŋ tsoku ko ni he hiaa baahi shi.
Hiɛkpamɔ: Wɔmiijie vidio ko ni sɛɛ kɛɛɛ, ni tsɔɔ he ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔná shihilɛ mli sanebimɔi ni he hiaa waa, ni hãa mɔ tsui nyɔɔ emli lɛ ahetoi yɛ wɔmiitsɔɔ mɛi fɛɛ.
3. (a) Mɛɛ tsakemɔ wulu ko ba yɛ Yesu gbele sɛɛ?
14 “No sɛɛ lɛ, osɔfo lɛ aŋɔ sɔ̃ afɔle kooloo lɛ lá lɛ eko, ni ekɛkpa mɔ ni tsuɔ ehe lɛ ninejurɔ toi naa kɛ eninejurɔ gɔnti naa kɛ enanejurɔ gɔnti naa.
Naakpɛɛ Nii Wulu
Gbalamlitsemɔ ni yaa nɔ yɛ Spain lɛ tee hiɛ kɛyashɛ 1 yɛ gbalashihilɛi 8 mli, yɛ afii ohai 20 lɛ naagbee afii nyɔŋma lɛ mli—etũ kɛjɛ 1 yɛ 100 mli, yɛ afii 25 ni ba kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli.
Nyɛminuu ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Nuu ko ni he wa, ni he ewo muji, ni hiɛ ehe basaa ni hiɛ kotoku agbo ni mli eyi obɔ kɛ adafitswaa woji kɛ woji tɛtrɛbii memeji ba wɔ Kpee Asa Wulu lɛ nɔ.
Shi Mamre ji Eshkol kɛ Aner nyɛmi; ni mɛnɛɛmɛi kɛ Abram ekpaŋ.
Ani jeee nɔtɔ̃mɔ shwiei kɛ amale seshibii ji nyɛ? nyɛ ní nyɛhiɛ dɔɔ yɛ tsei wuji ahe yɛ tso fɛɛ tso ní ebu kusuu shishi; nyɛgbeɔ gbekɛbii yɛ jɔɔi amli yɛ tɛsaai afɔji ashishi.”—Yesaia 57:4, 5.
28 Ni osɔfo lɛ kɛ mu ni yɔɔ ekɔkɔ mli lɛ eko akpa mɔ ni tsuɔ ehe lɛ ninejurɔ toi naa kɛ eninejurɔ gɔnti naa kɛ enanejurɔ gɔnti naa yɛ he ni ekɛ sɔ̃ afɔle kooloo lɛ lá lɛ kpa lɛ nɔŋŋ.
Kɛkɛ ni ejwɛŋ fioo, ni no sɛɛ lɛ ekɛ baagi agbo ko ha mi akɛ mikɛ niyenii pii awo mli bɔ ni manyɛ.
Abraham miisumɔ ni efee tsakemɔi wuji yɛ eshihilɛ mli koni enine ashɛ shiwoo lɛ nɔ
Etsɛɛɛ ni Knut kɛ Lisbeth nu he akɛ amɛfee klalo agbɛnɛ akɛ amɛbaayasɔmɔ yɛ maŋ kroko nɔ—amɛtee Uganda.
Hulu lɛ da waa diɛŋtsɛ, ni eteŋ hu mli kwɔ aahu akɛ eheɔ afii akpekpei abɔ dani hewalɛ ni jɛɔ hulu lɛ teŋ lɛ jeɔ kpo kɛbashɛɔ hulu lɛ hiɛ.
Gbi ko lɛ Filistibii lɛ ŋmɛ niyeli okpɔlɔ wulu ko ni amɛkɛbaaja amɛ nyɔŋmɔ Dagon, ni amɛyajie Samson kɛjɛ tsũ lɛ mli koni amɛye ehe fɛo.
“Jalɛ nifeemɔ tsei wuji” (3)
Amɛbaanyɛ ni amɛkɛ tsokpoti loo kakla aye bo awui.
Gbɔmɛi Tɛkɛbii, Shi Amɛyɛ Mlihilɛ Tsuii
Etsɛɛɛ ni maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi babaoo bashɛ shi, ni amɛbafee yelikɛbuamɔ nɔ kpele kɛha wɔ yɛ wɔsɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ he gbɛjianɔtoo kɛ asafoŋ kpeei anɔkwɛmɔ mli hu.
Ewie yɛ wolo ko ni eŋma eyaha Jawaharlal Nehru, yɛ May 2, 1933 lɛ mli akɛ: “Harijan kuu lɛ da tsɔ fe nɔ ni akɛ nilee kɛkɛ aaatsu he nii.
Sakina da ni eyɛ hewalɛ, yɛ be mli ni mi lɛ midaaa.
11 No mli lɛ, Heber, Kennyo lɛ, etse ehe kɛje Kenbii lɛ,+ ni ji Mose shaanuu+ Hobab seshibii lɛ ahe, ni efee emama tsũ lɛ yɛ tso agbo ko masɛi yɛ Zaananim, yɛ Kedesh.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ hu kɛ ebe kɛ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ shã afɔle wulu koni eyasara Salomo.
1 Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ ni yɔɔ akutso fɛɛ akutso mli lɛ ji he ko ni anáa mumɔŋ tsuiwoo yɛ, tamɔ kpaakpo ko ni yɔɔ shiaŋa nɔ.
Mɛɛ hegbɛ eji nɛkɛ, akɛ okɛ “mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi” lɛ aaaná Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛmɔ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ! —Mateo 24:14.
Ani Nyɔŋmɔ Boɔ Sɔlemɔi Fɛɛ Toi?
Shi bo lɛ, she anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbeyei.
Yehowa wie yɛ ewebii lɛ ahe ekoŋŋ akɛ: “Nyɛ ji midasefoi,” ni ekɛfata he akɛ: “Ani misɛɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ko yɛ?
Kɛji ohaaa mlijaa nyɔŋma mli ekome lɛ, eji Nyɔŋmɔ kitai ni ojeɔ gbɛ okuɔ mli.
Nakai ŋmalɛ lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Jwɛŋmɔ ni akɛmaa heloo lɛ nɔ lɛ, gbele ni, shi jwɛŋmɔ ni akɛmaa mumɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ, wala kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ ni.”
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ naa ní wɔɔhi shi yɛ, kɛ e-Bi Yesu Kristo ni wɔɔkase lɛ ji gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ.
(2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 16:3) Yɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ gbonyo nɛɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Hezekia tsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ kasemɔ nɔ ‘eha egbɛ lɛ he tse’ kɛjɛ wɔŋjalɔi ahewalɛi ahe. —2 Kronika 29:2.
Yoo ko ni fɔlɔi ni tsɔse lɛ lɛ sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Wɔjeee mɛi ni nyiɛ wɔfɔlɔi asɛɛ kɛkɛ, ni wɔfataa amɛhe yɛ amɛ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
15 Wɔnako Nyɔŋmɔ pɛŋ ni asaŋ wɔnuko egbee dã.
Nyɔŋmɔ jie sui nɛɛ akpo kɛtsɔ Yudafoi lɛ ni ekpɔ̃ amɛ kɛjɛ Babilon—ni ji maŋ ni ale lɛ akɛ eŋmɛɛɛ nomii ahe—lɛ nɔ.—Yes.
Anɔkwa, bɔ ni adesai piŋɔ lɛ dɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ naakpa.
Mɛni ji Nyɔŋmɔ henyɛlɔi lɛ ayiŋtoo titri lolo?
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, afii akpei enyɔ ni eho nɛ lɛ, gbɔmɛi tao ni amɛwó Yesu Kristo amɛnɔ maŋtsɛ ejaakɛ amɛna akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsu lɛ, ni ebaanyɛ efee nɔyelɔ ni nɔ bɛ kwraa.
Lɛɛlɛŋ, beni wɔjwɛŋɔ gbɛ ni Yehowa baatsɔ nɔ eha enaanɔ yiŋtoo lɛ aba mli lɛ he lɛ, wɔnaa kpɛɔ wɔhe yɛ ‘bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ nifálɛ kɛ ŋaa kɛ nilee mli kwɔ ha’ lɛ he.—Rom.
(1 Timoteo 6:17-19) Bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni wɔshika shidaamɔ ji lɛ, nyɛhaa wɔkɛ wɔhe afɔ̃a Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ lɛ nɔ ni wɔdi shihilɛ gbɛ ni baaha wɔtsɔ “niiatsɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛfaŋ” lɛ sɛɛ.
Eŋma akɛ: “Gbalafitelɔi! nyɛleee akɛ je nɛɛ hedɔɔ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nyɛɛ ni lo?
Ataa kɛ mlihilɛ tsu nii ni ekɛ Biblia mli saji kukuji lɛ bu sɔlemɔ lɛ tsɔɔmɔi ni tsɔɔ akɛ, adesa susuma lɛ gbooo, ni ákɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baapiŋ adesai asusumai lɛ kɛya naanɔ yɛ hɛl la mli lɛ fɔ́ yɛ faŋŋ mli.
18 Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ nilee krɔŋŋ ni Hiob yɔɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ he lɛ ye ebua lɛ?
Nakai ninefɔɔ lɛ tamɔ nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛha bɔfo Paulo lɛ nɔŋŋ, beni ena nuu ko yɛ ninaa mli ni miikpa lɛ fai lɛ, akɛ: “Ba Makedonia ni obaye obua wɔ.”
Ŋamɛi aheshibaa kɛ bulɛ subaŋ ni “jara wa yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ” lɛ naa amɛwumɛi anɔ hewalɛ kpakpa.
Ani mikɛ mijwɛŋmɔ yaa Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli nifeemɔi ni haa anaa mɔ, ni ajieɔ mɔ yi lɛ anɔ titri?
KƐJI asafoŋ onukpai miikwɛ akɛ Biblia kaselɔ ko baanyɛ abɔi shiɛmɔyaa lɛ, amɛbiɔ amɛhe akɛ, ‘Ani mɔ lɛ wiemɔi tsɔɔ akɛ eheɔ eyeɔ akɛ Biblia lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ ni jɛ mumɔŋ?’
“Esa Akɛ Aboɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Moŋ Toi Fe Gbɔmɛi”
Mɛɛ shishinumɔ naa, osusuɔ akɛ, obaanyɛ okɛɛ akɛ Yehowa ‘tsɔ’ enɔkwa gbalɔ lɛ ‘yiŋ’ taakɛ atsĩ tã yɛ Yeremia 20:7, 8 lɛ?—Nyɛkanea.
Ni susumɔ ni kwashiai hiɛ akɛ amɛyɛ shweshweeshwe lɛ, no nɔŋŋ baakpãtã amɛhiɛ.
10 Kristo hewɔ lɛ, kwashiai ji wɔ,+ shi nyɛ lɛ hiɛshikalɔi ji nyɛ yɛ Kristo hewɔ; wɔhe waaa, shi nyɛ lɛ, nyɛhe wa; awoɔ nyɛhiɛ nyam, shi wɔ lɛ, wɔhiɛ bɛ nyam.
(Efesobii 6:4) Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, kwashia pɛ “gbeɔ etsɛ tsɔse mɔ he guɔ.”
(1 Timoteo 5:24) Mɛi ni susuɔ akɛ ekojomɔi lɛ ji blema yinɔsane kɛkɛ, ni ákɛ efɔŋ ni amɛfeɔ lɛ kɔɔɔ ehe eko lɛ miishishiu amɛhe kɛkɛ.
Lala 14:1 kɛ 53:2 lɛ fɛɛ tsĩ “mɔ ni bɛ jwɛŋmɔ lɛ,” loo taakɛ King James Version lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ “kwashia,” lɛ ni kɛɔ yɛ etsui mli akɛ “Nyɔŋmɔ ko bɛ” lɛ tã.
Ani nyɛbaafee lɛ buulu tamɔ afeɔ gbɔmɔ adesa* buulu lɛ?
Beni nibii ni ba lɛ eyafiii egbɛkpamɔi asɛɛ lɛ, ekɛ heshibaa kɛɛ Brooklyn Betel weku lɛ akɛ ekɛ kojomɔ kpakpa eyasusuuu sane lɛ he.
(Luka 12:16-21) Biblia shishitsɔɔmɔi pii po kɛ wiemɔ ni ji “buulu” lɛ tsu nii.
Eba biɛ koni ebalaka bo koni ele oyaa kɛ obaa, ni ele nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni ofeɔ.”
Shi buulu tsui jieɔ ebuulufeemɔ lɛ kpo.
*+ 9 Kaahã omli fu oya,*+ ejaakɛ mlifu lɛ, buului atsui mli* eyɔɔ.
(b) Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa bi ŋwɛibɔfoi lɛ ŋaawoo yɛ bɔ ni aaafee alaka Ahab lɛ he lɛ?
Ekolɛ ebaalaka amɛ shikome, shi ekolɛ no baafee naagbee nɔ.
Eefee gbɔmɛi pii buuluu.—Kpojiemɔ 12:9.
Shi nɔ kome ji akɛ, amɛnyɛŋ amɛlaka Yehowa kɔkɔɔkɔ.
17 Ehi akɛ abaabo hiɛshikalɔ naajɔlɛ wiemɔi lɛ toi moŋ fe nɔ ni abaabo mɔ ni yeɔ buului anɔ lɛ bolɔmɔi toi.
(2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 17:13-15) Israelbii lɛ po bɔ mɔdɛŋ ni “amɛkɛ amɛdaa dɔkɔ enaa, ni amɛkɛ amɛlilɛi male tsɔɔ lɛ.”
Ani Abonsam kɛ edaimonioi lɛ baanyɛ ashishiu wɔ, loo amɛlaka wɔ hu?— Hɛɛ, amɛbaanyɛ kɛji akɛ wɔkwɛɛɛ wɔhe nɔ jogbaŋŋ.
Ŋwɛibɔfo ko hã alaka Ahab (21, 22)
7 Ao Yehowa, oshwɛ mi akpa, ni akpa lɛ edu mi.
Elakaa mɛi ni amɛsusuɔ akɛ eyɛ hewalɛ babaoo fe bɔ ni eyɔɔ diɛŋtsɛ.
Ni ehãa kojolɔi tsɔmɔɔ buului.
Shi buulu fɛɛ buulu kɛ ehe baawo mli.
Yehowa tsɔ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ etsɔ gbalɔ Yeremia yiŋ ni etsu nitsumɔ ni eyasusu akɛ enyɛŋ etsu lɛ.
11 Beni eshwɛ fioo ni Israel maŋ lɛ baabote Shiwoo Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, Yehowa kɛɛ Israelbii ni ji fɔlɔi lɛ akɛ: “Nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”
13 Ejaakɛ wɔŋmaaa nɔ ko nɔ ko wɔhãaa nyɛ akɛ ja nibii ni nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛkane* ni nyɛnu shishi, ni miyɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ akɛ nyɛbaaya nɔ nyɛnu nibii nɛɛ ashishi kɛmɔ shi,* 14 tamɔ bɔ ni nyɛ hu nyɛnuɔ shishi yɛ gbɛ ko nɔ akɛ wɔji nii ni nyɛkɛshwãa, tamɔ bɔ ni wɔkɛ nyɛ hu baashwã yɛ wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ Yesu gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ.
*+ 21 Kɛji he ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baahala akɛ egbɛ́i lɛ ahi lɛ+ kɛ bo teŋ jekɛ lɛ, no lɛ, gbee otsinai loo otoi ni Yehowa ehã bo lɛ eko, tamɔ bɔ ni mifã bo lɛ, ni oye yɛ omaji* lɛ amli be fɛɛ be ni ebaaba otsine.
+ 40 Ye emlai* kɛ ekitãi ni miwoɔ bo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ anɔ, bɔ ni afee ni ahi ahã bo kɛ obii ni baaba yɛ osɛɛ lɛ, koni otsɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛhãa bo lɛ nɔ.”
15 Mose Wolo ni Ji Enumɔ 6:6, 7 kɛɔ akɛ: “Nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”
Enɛ haa wɔkaiɔ Mose wiemɔi nɛɛ akɛ: “Nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshĩa lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”—5 Mose 6:6, 7.
Ni nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”
“Nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshĩa lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”—5 MOSE 6:6, 7.
Ni nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kitã ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshĩa lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”—5 Mose 6:5-7.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kwɛmɔ ohe ni ahi, koni ohiɛ akakpa Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, nɔ, ni obayeŋ ekitai kɛ emlai kɛ ekpɔi ni miwoɔo ŋmɛnɛ nɛɛ nɔ. Ni kɛ oye nii ni otɔ ni omamɔ tsui fɛfɛji ni ohi mli, ni otsinai kɛ otooi ayi efa, ni ojwiɛtɛi kɛ oshika efa, ni nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni oyɔɔ lɛ eshwere lɛ, kɛkɛ ni otsui bawó ehe nɔ ni ohiɛ kpa Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, nɔ.”—5 Mose 8:11-14.
Mose wo fɔlɔi aŋaa akɛ: “Nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔ he kitã ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.”
13 “Nɔ ni Yehowa, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛɛ nɛ, ‘Mikɛ nyɛtsɛmɛi lɛ kpaŋ kpaŋmɔ+ yɛ gbi nɔ ni mijie amɛ kɛje Ejipt shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, kɛje nyɔji ashĩa+ lɛ akɛ: 14 “Kɛ́ afii kpawo lɛ ba naagbee lɛ, nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ aŋmɛa enyɛmi Hebrinyo ni ahɔ̃ɔ lɛ ahã lɛ, ni esɔmɔ lɛ afii ekpaa lɛ he; ŋmɛɛmɔ ehe.”
+ 18 Kɛ́ mikɛɛ efɔŋfeelɔ ko akɛ, ‘Bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ obaagbo,’ ni obɔɔɔ lɛ kɔkɔ, ni owieee otsɔɔɔ efɔŋfeelɔ lɛ kɛbɔɔɔ lɛ kɔkɔ koni eje egbɛ fɔŋ lɛ nɔ ni ehi wala mli lɛ,+ ebaagbo yɛ etɔmɔ lɛ hewɔ ejaakɛ mɔ fɔŋ ji lɛ,+ shi mabi elá shi yɛ odɛŋ.
No hewɔ lɛ enyɛ ekɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ yɛ ewala be lɛ mli naagbee ŋmɛlɛtswaa lɛ mli akɛ: “Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Odasefoi ehiɛ Kristofoi ahe ni amɛkɛwooo maŋ saji amli kwraa lɛ mli yɛ faŋŋ mli, ni amɛha Yesu wiemɔi nɛɛ eba mli: “Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Ekɛɛ: “Kita hee miŋɔ-haa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.”
Bɔfo Paulo ŋma kɛyaha Kristofoi asafo ni yɔɔ Roma lɛ akɛ: “Miishwe akɛ mana nyɛ, koni mikɛ mumɔŋ duromɔkeenii lɛ eko abaha nyɛ, beni afee ni aŋɔ waje nyɛ, no ji akɛ, ashɛje mi kɛ nyɛ fɛɛ mii yɛ nyɛteŋ, yɛ hemɔkɛyeli ni yɔɔ mi kɛ nyɛ fɛɛ mli lɛŋ.”—Romabii 1:11, 12.
+ 29 No hewɔ lɛ, Yakob kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Ole bɔ ni misɔmɔ bo mihã, kɛ bɔ ni okooloi lɛ eshwere yɛ midɛŋ ehã;+ 30 fioo pɛ oyɔɔ dani miba, shi okooloi lɛ efa ni amɛshwere babaoo, ni Yehowa ejɔɔ bo kɛjɛ be ni miba nɛɛ.
GBƐKƐ dani enɔjetsɛremɔ ni Yesu gbo lɛ, ekɛɛ ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi lɛ akɛ: “Kitã hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Yesu kɛɛ: ‘Kita hee miŋɔhaa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.’
4 Ejaakɛ mijɛ amanehulu kɛ awerɛho babaoo ni yɔɔ mitsui mli lɛ mli mikɛ yaafonui babaoo ŋma nyɛ, jeee koni mikɛhã nyɛwerɛ aho nyɛhe,+ shi moŋ koni nyɛle bɔ ni suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛhã nyɛ lɛ mli kwɔ hã.
17 Makpeleke shi+ mikɛ bo abawie yɛ jɛmɛ,+ ni maŋɔ mumɔ+ ni yɔɔ onɔ lɛ eko ni mikɛbaashwie amɛnɔ, ni amɛbaaye amɛbua bo kɛtere maŋ lɛ jatsu lɛ, koni okome too okatere.
5 Anaa bɔ ni tsakemɔ nɛɛ he hiaa lɛ yɛ famɔ ni Yesu kɛha ekaselɔi lɛ yɛ enaagbee ŋmɛlɛtswai ni ekɛ amɛ ye lɛ mli: “Kita hee miŋɔ-haa nyɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe; taakɛ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nakai nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔa nyɛhe.
Shi kɛlɛ, taakɛ 5 Mose 4:2 lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, beni Mose wieɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Mla lɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛkaŋɔa nɔ ko nyɛfataa kitã ni miwoɔ nyɛ nɛɛ he, ni asaŋ nyɛkajiea nɔ ko yɛ mli, shi nyɛyea Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi ni miwoɔ nyɛ nɛɛ nɔ.”
Etsɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ni efee nakai lɛ yɛ hetoo ni ehã lɛ mli akɛ: “Lɛɛlɛŋ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ: Kɛ́ nyɛyɛ hemɔkɛyeli ni nyɛyiŋ efeee nyɛ kɔshikɔshi lɛ, jeee nɔ ni mifee agbami tso nɛɛ kɛkɛ nyɛbaafee, shi moŋ, kɛ́ nyɛkɛɛ gɔŋ nɛɛ tete akɛ, ‘Fãa oyagbee ŋshɔ lɛŋ’ lɛ, ebaaba mli.
3 Shi bo Yehowa, ole mi jogbaŋŋ,+ onaa mi;
Kɛ́ okpɛ oyiŋ akɛ obaafee nakai lɛ, no lɛ, esa akɛ otsɔ hiɛ kwraa ohã mɔ ni kwɛɔ nɔ lɛ ale dani aje asafoŋ kpeei lɛ shishi.
Ojogbaŋŋ, nyɛhaa wɔyaa nɔ wɔsusua heloo naa shwilamɔ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ he wɔkwɛa.
Nɛkɛ nɔkwɛmɔnii nɛɛ maa sane oti ni Yesu tsɔɔ lɛ nɔ mi jogbaŋŋ, ni ji akɛ ‘ya ni aaaya nɔ akã he kɛ ekãa’ lɛ ja, ni ehe miihia po yɛ Yehowa sɛɛ gbɛ taomɔ mli.—Luka 11:5-13.
Kɛ́ nakai ji sane lɛ, be lɛ nilee yɛ mli akɛ aaahe aye akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ gbɛ ni wɔɔtsɔ nɔ wɔtsu wɔmumɔŋ hiamɔ nii ahe nii lɛ hu baaha wɔ, kɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ hu ni sa jogbaŋŋ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsɔ nɔ wɔkɛkpá nibii ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ kɛ nibii ni yeɔ awui yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ amli.
No hewɔ lɛ ebɛ naakpɛɛ akɛ Kristofoi oshijafoi aaana henumɔi ni mli wa ni tamɔ nɛkɛ.
Sane kuku ni okɛ shiatsɛ lɛ baagba lɛ baanyɛ afee hewalɛwoo kɛ miishɛjemɔ wiemɔ ni enu eko etsɛ.
22 Amɛkɛɛ: “Kornelio,+ asraafoiatsɛ ko ni ji jalɔ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishelɔ ni Yudafoi amaŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ wieɔ ehe ekpakpa lɛ, ŋwɛibɔfo krɔŋkrɔŋ ko kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛtsɔɔmɔi hã lɛ akɛ etsu ni abatsɛ bo kɛba eshĩa ni ebo nɔ ni oyɔɔ kɛɛmɔ lɛ toi.”
Obaanyɛ oye obua amɛ koni amɛle akutso lɛ mli jogbaŋŋ, ni agbɛnɛ hu oha amɛsanebimɔi ahetoo ní oye obua amɛ kɛtsu amɛhiamɔ nii ahe nii.
Kɛ́ wɔmiisumɔ ni wekukpãa kpakpa akã he ahi wɔkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ lɛ, no lɛ esa akɛ wɔbo Yesu ŋaawoo lɛ toi ni wɔkɛtsu nii, ní asaŋ wɔkɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔi ni yɔɔ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ hu atsu nii.
No hewɔ lɛ, mɔ ni atsakeɔ lɛ lɛ batsɔɔ gbɔmɛi ni ji Yudafoi lɛ fa kɛ agbɛnɛ Yuda jamɔ lɛ fa.
Wɔle akɛ ehiɛ sɔɔ amɛsɔɔmɔ lɛ waa.
Kɛ́ nɔ ni obaakane lɛ ji lalafoo loo wiemɔ folo ni jeee lalafoo jio, abɛbuai loo sane ni afo atã jio lɛ, otoibolɔi lɛ baaná he sɛɛ kɛji okane lɛ jogbaŋŋ.
Bɔfo ni gbalɛ nɛɛ wieɔ ehe lɛ baahi shihilɛ mli kwraa dani Mesia Maŋtsɛ lɛ baaba.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ́ yoo ni wu jeee heyelilɔ lɛ ba ehe shi eha ewu yɛ nibii fɛɛ amli ákɛ eyitso kɛ́ nakai feemɔ eteee shi ewooo Nyɔŋmɔ mla loo shishitoo mlai lɛ, nɔ̃ kpakpa baanyɛ ajɛ mli kɛba kɛ shishinumɔ akɛ, ekɛ nakai feemɔ baanyɛ ‘ahere ewu lɛ yiwala.’
Akɛni Anne he miiye ni ehe miihia ni afee lɛ opireshɛn hewɔ lɛ, wɔku wɔ sɛɛ kɛtee Quebec.
(1 Timoteo 6:8-12) Ni yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni wɔɔfee wɔnii tamɔ nɔ ni wɔ wɔsɛɛ shihilɛ damɔ je nɛŋ shihilɛ kpakpa ni wɔɔna nɔ lɛ, wɔbaahe Yehowa Wiemɔ lɛ moŋ wɔye, beni ekɛɔ wɔ akɛ je lɛ miiho aya kɛ emli sɛɛdii nii lɛ fɛɛ, shi mɔ ni feɔ Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ hiɔ shi kɛyaa naanɔ lɛ.—1 Yohane 2:17.
(Luka 4:16; Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 15:21) Aawo gbekɛbii hewalɛ ŋmɛnɛ koni amɛnyiɛ Yesu nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ sɛɛ kɛtsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ ni amɛaakane daa, kɛ kpeei, ni ji he ni akaneɔ Biblia lɛ yɛ ni akaseɔ hu ní amɛaaya daa lɛ nɔ.
Ele akɛ yeyeeye ni aaafee yɛ shihilɛ mli hiamɔ nii ahe kɛ agbɛnɛ hu shwelɛ ni ayɔɔ kɛha heloonaa nibii kɛ miishɛjemɔ nibii lɛ baanyɛ agbala mɔ jwɛŋmɔ kɛjɛ nibii ni he hiaa waa lɛ anɔ.
18:21-35, NW) Wɔfeɔ esha wɔshiɔ Nyɔŋmɔ shii abɔ yɛ gbɛi sɔrɔtoi anɔ daa gbi—yɛ bei komɛi amli lɛ kɛtsɔ pɛsɛmkunya nifeemɔ ko nɔ, yɛ be babaoo mli lɛ kɛtsɔ nɔ ni wɔkɛɔ loo wɔsusuɔ nɔ, kɛ agbɛnɛ feemɔ ni wɔfeee nɔ ni esa akɛ wɔfee lɛ nɔ.
Satan le akɛ kɛ́ efite wɔfonirifeemɔŋ fiji lɛ ateŋ ekome lɛ, wɔnyɛŋ wɔfiliki.
Be ni Yosef gba etsɛ kɛ enyɛmimɛi lɛ elamɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ, ehã esane lɛ mli wo wu moŋ.
16 Ale Yesu jogbaŋŋ akɛ “Tsɔɔlɔ.”
Shulamit oblayoo lɛ naabu ni akɛto wò-agbaku he, kɛ elilɛi hu ni akɛɛ wò kɛ fufɔ yɛ shishi lɛ fɛɛ maa nɔ mi akɛ edaaŋ wiemɔ he tse ni eŋɔɔ.
Ekɔɔɔ he eko naagbai ni wɔkɛbaakpe lɛ, esa akɛ wɔkai ŋaa ni lalatsɛ lɛ wo yɛ ŋmɛnɛ ŋmalɛ lɛ mli lɛ. w17.03 4:6
Belɛ, mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔŋmɛ gbɛ ni Satan aha wɔnu he akɛ anyɛŋ akɛ wɔhe eshai afa wɔ?
38 Nɔ Hewɔ Ni Esa Akɛ Wɔsumɔ Yesu Sane
Wɔnyɛŋ wɔhala nibii ni wɔsumɔɔ akɛ wɔye nɔ. —Yak.
Gbalɛ ni yɔɔ 1 Mose 3:15 lɛ fata nibii ni wɔkase klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ ahe.
Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔle akɛ wɔsumɔɔ Yehowa lɛɛlɛŋ?
Mɛni wɔbaanyɛ wɔkase kɛjɛ bɔ ni Israelbii lɛ fee amɛnii yɛ bɔ ni Yehowa shɔ̃ amɛ lɛ mli?
29 Kɛ́ wɔhã ehi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli akɛ nakai ni wɔfeɔ lɛ jieɔ wɔ-Bɔlɔ lɛ yi ni wɔwoɔ egbɛ́i lɛ hiɛ nyam lɛ, no baatsirɛ wɔ koni wɔfee nakai.
(Galatabii 6: 10) Shi kɛlɛ, gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ ní wɔɔnyɛ wɔtsɔ nɔ ‘wɔfee mɛi krokomɛi ejurɔ’ ji ní wɔha amɛnu amɛmumɔŋ hiamɔ nii ahe, ní wɔtsu amɛmumɔŋ hiamɔ nii nɛɛ ahe nii.
(2 Mose 13:21, 22; 14:19) Ŋmɛnɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná hekɛnɔfɔɔ akɛ Yehowa yɛ ewebii lɛ asɛɛ ni etsɔɔ amɛ gbɛ, ebuɔ amɛhe, ni ebaakpɔ̃ amɛ.
Lɛɛlɛŋ, beni wɔjwɛŋɔ gbɛ ni Yehowa baatsɔ nɔ eha enaanɔ yiŋtoo lɛ aba mli lɛ he lɛ, wɔnaa kpɛɔ wɔhe yɛ ‘bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ nifálɛ kɛ ŋaa kɛ nilee mli kwɔ ha’ lɛ he.—Rom.
Nine ni aaanyɛ shi yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ etsɔɔɔ doo akɛ wɔbaakpoo anɔkwale lɛ kwraa.
Henɔwomɔ su baanyɛ aha wɔnu he akɛ ehe ehiaaa ni mɔ ko atsɔɔ wɔ nɔ ni esa akɛ wɔfee.
“Esa Akɛ Aboɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Moŋ Toi Fe Gbɔmɛi”
18, 19. (a) Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔkwɛ wɔhe nɔ jogbaŋŋ yɛ gbɛi nigii ni atsɔɔ nɔ ajieɔ je lɛ susumɔi lɛ ayi lɛ ahe?
6 Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔná nɔmimaa akɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔ pɔtɛɛ ko sa kɛha Kristofonyo lɛ?
Ni yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, wɔhiɛɔ baagi ko ni akɛ woji tɛtrɛbii woɔ mli daa nɛɛ,* ni kadiɔ wɔ akɛ Yehowa Odasefoi.
1:19) Mɛni obaanyɛ ofee koni oshãra ni tamɔ nɛkɛ akanina bo?
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔkadi anɔkwale ni eji akɛ Yesu miisumɔ ni etsɔɔ yoo ko nii, ni yɛ enɛ mli lɛ eji yoo ni nuu ni ekɛ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ jeee ewu.
Kɛ wɔwoɔ mɛi hewalɛ ni wɔtswaa amɛ wɔmaa shi be fɛɛ be lɛ, no lɛ, mɛi krokomɛi baawie yɛ wɔhe lɛlɛŋ akɛ: ‘Amɛha mimumɔ ewo etsui.’—1 Kor.
7 Kɛ́ wɔte shi wɔwo Satan lɛ, belɛ wɔmiite shi wɔmiiwo mɛi fɛɛ ni fiɔ esɛɛ, ní teɔ shi woɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nɔyeli lɛ hu.
Wɔbaaje shishi wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ krɛdɛɛ koni wɔje shia Biblia mli nikasemɔi ashishi yɛ March mli.
Kɛji akɛ wɔkɛ wɔhe fɔ̃ Yehowa nɔ beni akaa wɔ lɛ, mɛɛ sɛɛnamɔi wɔnine shɛɔ nɔ?
Wɔkaneɔ yɛ Abɛi 16:18 hu akɛ: “Hewoo nyiɛɔ hiɛkpatamɔ hiɛ, ni hetsɔɔmɔ mumɔ nyiɛɔ shigbeemɔ hiɛ.”
Biblia lɛ wieɔ ehe akɛ: “Ajɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ Yesu Kristo tsɛ lɛ, mɔ ni ji musuŋtsɔlɛi atsɛ kɛ miishɛjemɔ fɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, mɔ ni shɛjeɔ wɔmii yɛ wɔmanehului lɛ fɛɛ mli, koni wɔ hu wɔnyɛ wɔkɛ miishɛjemɔ, ni Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔshɛjeɔ wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔmii lɛ, ashɛje mɛi ni naa amanehulu fɛɛ amanehulu lɛ amii.”
14 Kɛ́ wɔmiiya Kristofoi akpeei loo shiɛmɔ lɛ, te wɔsaa wɔhe wɔhãa tɛŋŋ?
Be ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ebatara okpɔlɔ lɛ he lɛ, Margaret kɛ niyenii lɛ bama okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ.
24 Ekɛ kanetso+ lɛ ma kpee buu lɛ mli yɛ okpɔlɔ lɛ hiɛ, yɛ sɔlemɔ buu lɛ wuoyigbɛ.
Egbele baafa ni ato wolo lɛ mli saneyitsei lɛ anaa yɛ lɛ ni ebi gbekɛ nuu lɛ ní etsɔɔ lɛ saneyitso ni enyaa he waa.
Yesu tsɔɔ ebɔfoi lɛ nɔ hewɔ ni esa akɛ amɛba amɛhe shi hu, ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Nyɛteŋ namɔ yɔɔ nyɔŋ ni kɛ tsina kɔi miihu loo eekwɛ kooloi, ni kɛ́ nyɔŋ lɛ jɛ ŋmɔ mli eba lɛ, ebaakɛɛ lɛ akɛ, ‘Ba biɛ mramra ni obata okpɔlɔ lɛ he oye nii’?
No hewɔ lɛ, Mefiboshet ye nii yɛ David okpɔlɔ* lɛ he tamɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ bihii lɛ eko.
39 Okpɔlɔi enyɔ mamɔ agbó lɛ he ablanaa lɛ biɛ nɛɛ, ni enyɔ hu mamɔ biɛ nɛɛ, ni nomɛi anɔ agbeɔ kooloi ni akɛshãa shãa afɔlei+ lɛ, kɛ esha afɔlei+ lɛ, kɛ sɔ̃ afɔlei+ lɛ yɛ.
Yesu fɔse shikatsakelɔi lɛ ashika lɛ hu eshwie shi, ni etsirɛ okpɔlɔi lɛ etswia shi.
27 “Shi maŋtsɛmɛi enyɔ nɛɛ, amɛtsui baatsirɛ amɛ koni amɛfee efɔŋ, amɛbaata shi yɛ okpɔlɔ kome he amɛmalemalee amɛhe.
Jeanne hiɛ bɛ ehe nɔ ni eto plɛtei enyɔ emamɔ okpɔlɔ nɔ kɛha niyeli yɛ ekpata ni yɔɔ etsu bibioo ni mli efee sulii lɛ shishi.
26 “Okɛ mu nɛɛ afɔ kpee buu+ lɛ kɛ Odaseyeli adeka lɛ, 27 kɛ okpɔlɔ lɛ kɛ ehe nibii lɛ fɛɛ, kanetso lɛ kɛ ehe nibii lɛ, tsofa-kɛ-ŋma afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ, 28 shãa afɔle afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ kɛ ehe nibii lɛ fɛɛ, kɛ okpolu lɛ kɛ enɔmaanɔ lɛ mu.
Ani obɔɔ mɔdɛŋ oyeɔ nii daa yɛ Yehowa okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ?
+ 18 Ni be ni amɛtara okpɔlɔ lɛ he amɛyeɔ nii lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ: “Lɛɛlɛŋ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, nyɛ mɛi ni nyɛkɛ mi yeɔ nii lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome baajie mi ehã.”
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ hemɔkɛyeli baanyɛ aye abua koni aná hiamɔ nii yɛ?
Ani ato gbɛjianɔ koni ato okpɔlɔ lɛ ni akɛ okpɔlɔ nɔ mama ni he tse aha nɔ kɛ glasei kɛ plɛtei saŋŋ bɔ ni sa?
23 “Agbɛnɛ hu, okɛ akasia tso akpɛ okpɔlɔ,+ ekɛlɛ afee ninetalɔi enyɔ, elɛɛmɔ afee ninetalɔ kome, ni ekwɔlɛ afee ninetalɔ kome kɛ fã.
“Nyɛ mɛi ní nyɛkwa Yehowa, ní nyɛhiɛ ekpa egɔŋ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ní nyɛŋmɛɔ okpɔlɔ nyɛhaa shade wɔŋ, ní nyɛfɔseɔ wein ní afutu mli nyɛshwieɔ shi nyɛhaa shɛɛ mli wɔŋ lɛ.”—Yes.
Kɛ hetoo lɛ ji hɛɛ, ni wɔyaa nɔ wɔkaneɔ loo wɔkwɛɔ nɛkɛ nibii nɛɛ lɛ, no lɛ wɔyɛ oshara ni ji daimonioi okpɔlɔ nɔ niyeli mli.
“Nyɛnyɛŋ ‘Yehowa okpɔlɔ lɛ’ nɔ nii kɛ daimonioi okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ nii nyɛye shikome.”—1 KORINTOBII 10:21, New World Translation.
▪ Akɛ plɛtei, glasei kɛ okpɔlɔ kɛ enɔhaanɔ kpakpa aba asa lɛ nɔ ni akɛma shi yɛ he ko ni sa kɛtsɔ hiɛ.
* Yesu ‘yashwie mɛi ni hɔ̃ɔ nii kɛ mɛi ni heɔ nii yɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ, ni etsirɛ shikatsakelɔi lɛ akpɔlɔi lɛ etswiatswiaa shi.’
Eshɛrɛ shika tsakelɔi lɛ ashika lɛ eshwie ni etsirɛ okpɔlɔi lɛ etswia shi.
Nyɛbaa gbeekpamɔ akɛ nyɛwieŋ shika he yɛ bei pɔtɛi komɛi amli, tamɔ be ni nyɛfee ekome kɛmiiye nii loo be ni nyɛkɛ nyɛbii lɛ fɛɛ miijɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ nɛkɛ.
Gbelemɔ emli saji ni ato naa lɛ, ni obi akɛ: “Mɛɛ sane yɔɔ biɛ ni onyaa he waa?”
Ekɛ hegbɛ ni eyɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Bi lɛ tsu nii, ni ekɛ ekãafeemɔ “tee Nyɔŋmɔ sɔlemɔwe lɛ ni eyashwie mɛi ni hɔ̃ɔ nii kɛ mɛi ni heɔ nii yɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ, ni etsirɛ shikatsakelɔi lɛ akpɔlɔi lɛ kɛ mɛi ni hɔ̃ɔ okpoi lɛ amaaŋooi lɛ etswiatswiaa shi.”
Osɔfoi lɛ gbeɔ Yehowa okpɔlɔ lɛ he guɔ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Sɛɛ mli beni akɛ weku lɛ egba sane lɛ, Rebeka jɛ suɔmɔ mli ekpɛlɛ koni ekɛ Eliezer aku sɛɛ kɛya maŋsɛɛ shɔŋŋ he ko koni eyatsɔ Abraham binuu Isak ŋa.
(1 Mose 1:28) Yoofeemɔ he nitsumɔ kɛha Hawa ji ‘yelikɛbualɔ,’ Adam ‘hefatalɔ ni sa,’ mɔ ni baa ehe shi ehaa eyitsoyeli, ni ekɛ lɛ feɔ ekome yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ yiŋtoo ni ejaje kɛha amɛ lɛ he nitsumɔ mli.—1 Mose 2:18; 1 Korintobii 11:3.
Yɛ weku nikasemɔ lɛ mli lɛ, mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ abɔ mɔdɛŋ krɛdɛɛ ní atswa tsuii ama shi lɛ, ni mɛni enɛ biɔ?
Kɛ́ nyɛmi ko loo wɔweku lɛ mli nyo ko fee wɔ nɔ ko loo ewie nɔ ko ni edɔ wɔ waa lɛ, egbaa wɔnaa waa.
Nuu kɛ yoo Bɔlɔ lɛ ji gbalashihilɛ kɛ weku lɛ Shishitolɔ, ni ele wɔ hiamɔ nii jogbaŋŋ fe bɔ ni mɔ kroko le.
No hewɔ lɛ, ákɛ gbekɛbii lɛ, wɔná gbii juji kɛ weku ekomefeemɔi yɛ jamɔ gbijurɔyelii amli yɛ afi muu lɛ fɛɛ mli lɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ.
Aloo nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛja Biblia lɛ fã ko nyɛha weku lɛ mli bii ateŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ koni nyɛkane tamɔ bɔ ni afeɔ drama lɛ.
Onukpa ko jɛɔ suɔmɔ mli ekaiɔ nɛkɛ akɛ, “Nɔ kome ni Dada feɔ ji akɛ ebɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ekwɛɔ be fɛɛ be koni weku lɛ mlibii aya kpeei sɔrɔtoi lɛ.
Shi minaa miishɛɛ, yɛ hewalɛwoo kpele ni mináa kɛjɛɔ wɔ Betel weku ni mli bii falɛ aaashɛ mɛi 250 lɛ mli lɛ hewɔ.
Fɔlɔi baanyɛ akpɛ amɛyiŋ akɛ amɛkɛ amɛgbɛkɛ Weku Jamɔ be lɛ eko baakase wolo lɛ, loo amɛbaanyɛ amɛfee nakai kɛ́ amɛkɛ amɛbii lɛ ateŋ mɔ ko miikase nii, loo be ni amɛtsɔɔ amɛbii lɛ eko bɔ ni afeɔ aŋkro nikasemɔ ahãa.
No hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ weku yitsei lɛ ale atade ni amɛweku lɛ mli bii toɔ he gbɛjianɔ akɛ amɛaawo lɛ.
3 Nɔkwɛlɔ gbɛfãlɔ ko fata weku ko he yɛ woji tɛtrɛbii kɛhamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Mɛi ni fata gbɔi krokomɛi ni bato wɔ yɛ wɔshia lɛ ahe ji Yehowa Odasefoi anitsumɔhe yitso ni yɔɔ Brooklyn, New York, lɛ mli bii lɛ, tamɔ Hugo Riemer kɛ Charles Eicher ni ekɛ lɛ wɔɔ tsũ kome mli lɛ.
Yɛ be ni tsɔ hiɛ dani amɛkɛ Yehowa Odasefoi aaakpe lɛ, weku nɛɛ ji mɛi ni yɔɔ ekãa yɛ Katolik mumɔŋ sɔlemɔi akui amli, ni amɛkɛɔ akɛ amɛnaa ninaa, amɛwieɔ lilɛii srɔtoi, ni amɛtsaa helai.
(1 Korintobii 15:33) Weku shihilɛ baanyɛ ahi kɛ́ wɔkɛ hiɛshikamɔ bu shishitoo mla nɛɛ akɛ eji anɔkwale kɛji naanyobɔɔ fɔŋ lɛ yɛ heloo mli loo yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔ mli lɛ.
Mɛni hewɔ abaanyɛ akɛɛ akɛ gbɛ ni Kristofonyo nuu tsɔɔ nɔ ekwɛɔ eweku lɛ saa ehe ni aaasa akɛ nɔkwɛlɔ yɛ asafo lɛ mli lɛ he?
2 Taomɔ Hii: Kɛ́ weku yitso ko kpɛlɛ anɔkwale lɛ nɔ lɛ, bei pii lɛ, enáa weku mlibii krokomɛi lɛ anɔ hewalɛ ní amɛbafata ehe yɛ anɔkwa jamɔ mli.
(5 Mose 31:12; 2 Timoteo 3:15) Wekui pii kɛ hiɛdɔɔ jeɔ daa weku Biblia kasemɔ he gbɛjianɔtoo shishi, shi amɛŋmɛɔ gbɛ ni ebaa shi loo etsɛɛɛ ni amɛkpaa efeemɔ.
Sanekpakpai lɛ tsĩɔ Yesu wekumɛi krokomɛi atã, shi agbɛnɛ lɛ, nyɛhaa wɔgbalaa wɔjwɛŋmɔ kɛbaa Yesu weku kɔkrɔɔ lɛ nɔ, ni wɔkwɛ nɔ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔkase kɛjɛ amɛdɛŋ.
Eji nɔ ni kanya nikaselɔi lɛ kɛ amɛwekumɛi kɛ nanemɛi ni yɔɔ toibolɔi lɛ ateŋ ni boɔ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi ni he esa ni yɔɔ niiashikpamɔ nɛɛ atoi beni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛtsɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ni maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ haa mɔ tsui nyɔɔ mɔ mli lɛ.
Mɛɛ nitsumɔ ni he baanyɛ aba sɛɛnamɔ kɛha weku muu lɛ fɛɛ yɔɔ ni obaanyɛ otsu?— Obaanyɛ oye obua ni ato okpɔlɔ lɛ, oshá tsɛŋsii amli, oyatsi jwɛi oshwie, osaa otsũ mli, ni oloo oshwɛmɔ nibii lɛ kɛwo hei ni akɛwoɔ.
11 Weku nikasemɔ ni afeɔ daa he hiaa.
Be fɛɛ be ni nyɛmimɛi hii ni yɔɔ asafo ko mli lɛ yasaraa weku ko ni emli bii lɛ yɔɔ jamɔi srɔtoi amli lɛ, amɛbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ amɛkɛ wu ni heee yeee lɛ aaasusu saji ni amɛle akɛ ebaaná he miishɛɛ lɛ he.
Mɛi komɛi kɛɛ nibii ni kɛ enɛ baa ji kusum ni mɔ ko jɛ mli, weku mli ni ejɛ, kɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔ ni yiwalɛ nifeemɔ yɔɔ mli.
16 Nɔ ni fata ‘nitsumɔ kpakpa fɛɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa mli yibii ni aaawo’ lɛ he hu ji weku gbɛnaa nii ahe nii ni wɔɔtsu kɛ nanemɛi Kristofoi ahe ni wɔɔsusu.
Wɔshia lɛ batsɔ he ni wielɔi gbɛfalɔi babaoo batoɔ.
Wɔku Wɔ Sɛɛ
Mɛi sɔrɔtoi ŋɔ mi amɛfee amɛwekui lɛ amli mɔ ko, ni amɛha mina miishɛɛ waa.
Beni wɔyi enyɔ lɛ wɔshiɔ shwapo lɛ mli lɛ, wɔkɛ oblanyo ko ni he yɔɔ miishɛɛ waa ni eta baisikel ni ejɛ nitsumɔ eeya shia lɛ kpe.
Afeɔ kpeei nɛɛ yɛ mɛi ashĩai loo yɛ hei krokomɛi ni sa.
Gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi ni darako tsɔ ni hiɛ bii enyɔ kɛ mlihilɛ he wɔ kɛtee amɛshia ni wɔyahi jɛmɛ kɛyashi wɔná wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔshia.
Beni ekɛ Rebeka kpe lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, afɔ̃ le nine kɛba etsɛ Betuel shia lɛ mli.
3 Esa akɛ shĩa lɛ afee toiŋjɔlɛ shihilɛhe.
Lil ma woji lɛ ni ekɛtee shia nakai gbi lɛ ni eyakane amɛ jogbaŋŋ.
Hã amɛhiɛ amɛ. —Mat.
Mina bɔ ni asafo ni mihi mli klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ eshwere ni aja mli shii ejwɛ sɔŋŋ, ni atsu shiɛlɔi kɛ gbɛgbalɔi, kɛ mɛi komɛi akɛ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi kɛjɛ jɛmɛ kɛtee hei ni yɔɔ shɔŋŋ tamɔ Bolivia, Laos, kɛ Uganda.
Abaaná shĩai kpakpai kɛ nitsumɔi ni hi.
(Abɛi 5:18) Nɛkɛ tsakemɔi nɛɛ biɔ afɔleshaa, shi amɛkɛ toiŋjɔlɛ baa shia lɛ mli.
Wɔbaaje shishi wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ krɛdɛɛ koni wɔje shia Biblia mli nikasemɔi ashishi yɛ March mli.
Shi yɛ Afrika hei babaoo lɛ, mɛi ohai abɔ ni yaa yara lɛ baa shia ni mɔ ni eje mli lɛ yɔɔ lɛ ni amɛkpáa okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ ko gbɛ, ni bei pii lɛ agbeɔ kooloo kɛfeɔ kusum yɛ jɛmɛ.
Afeɔ gbekɛbii babaoo niseniianii, amamɔɔ amɛ atswɛrɛ waa, loo agbeɔ amɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ yiwalɛ nifeemɔhei fe fɛɛ lɛ ateŋ ekome mli—shia lɛ!
Beni mikɛ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ, mitee kpeei fɛɛ ni afeɔ yɛ eshĩa lɛ mli lɛ.
Amɛkɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ oosumɔ ni otsɔ Odasefonyo lɛ, belɛ shĩ shia ni oya.”
Kɛkɛ ni Greek asraafonyo nukpa lɛ kɛɛ wɔ akɛ aŋmɛɛ wɔhe, shi wɔbaanyɛ wɔya shia, ni ekɛ enitsumɔ wolo bibioo ni egbɛi yɔɔ nɔ lɛ ha wɔ koni kɛji amɔmɔ wɔ ekoŋŋ lɛ, ni wɔkɛtsu nii.
Mɔ ni okɛwie klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ bɛ shĩa, shi oyanina ewekunyo.
Gbekɛ fɛɛ gbekɛ yɛ daa gbi nitsumɔi ni ebaatsu yɛ shia.
Kɛ oná hegbɛ akɛ ooofee shia Biblia mli nikasemɔ lɛ, ekolɛ obaanyɛ okpa kaai ni baabi ni okɛ yiŋtsɔmɔ he ŋaa atsu nii lɛ gbɛ.
Beni wɔshɛɔ shia ekoŋŋ lɛ, nɔ ni miihe ashɛ ŋmɛlɛtswai 24 eho.
No hewɔ lɛ, beni miku misɛɛ miba shia afii ekpaa sɛɛ lɛ, mije shishi akɛ mabɔi Kristofoi asafoŋ kpee yaa yɛ Brugg.
Abaanyɛ akase nibii babaoo ní kɔɔ saneyitsei ahe gbɛjianɔtoo he kɛtsɔ woji ni “tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ” lɛ eto he gbɛjianɔ koni wɔkɛtsu nii yɛ shia Biblia mli nikasemɔi amli lɛ mlipɛimɔ nɔ.
No hewɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛ jwɛŋmɔ kɛɔ akɛ “shika hu tamɔ hɔɔŋ” ni ákɛ “shika feɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ” lɛ. —Jajelɔ 7: 12; 10:19.
Yehowa Odasefoi buɔ lɛ akɛ eji hegbɛ ni amɛná akɛ amɛkɛ shika kɛ nibii krokomɛi baaye abua koni anyɛ atsu shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ
Eyɛ nitsumɔi wuji enyɔ hu ní enáa shika babaoo kɛjɛɔ mli.
(Mar. 12:28-31) Nyɔŋmɔ kpaa gbɛ akɛ wɔkwa sui gbohii.
No sɛɛ etsɛɛɛ ni awo mi akɛ esɛɛ mɔ, ni akɛwo midɛŋ akɛ mikwɛ saji ni kɔɔ woji aŋmalamɔ kɛ nibii ni tamɔ nakai anɔ, miha minanemɛi asraafoi lɛ nitsumɔi, ni mikwɛ wɔshika saji anɔ.
Beni nilelɔ John Barclay wieɔ toowoo nɛɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Odaseyelii babaoo yɛ ni tsɔɔ akɛ Yudafoi ni yɔɔ Maŋsɛɛ yɛ nakai beaŋ lɛ jɛɔ anɔkwayeli mli amɛwoɔ nakai too lɛ, ni amɛteŋ niiatsɛmɛi lɛ tsuɔ onia krokomɛi amɛfataa tooyelii nɛɛ ahe.”
Biblia lɛ wiemɔi lɛ ji anɔkwale akɛ: “Nilee tamɔ teemɔ he tamɔ bɔ ni shika yi teemɔ he lɛ, shi sɛɛnamɔ ni yɔɔ nilee he nɛ: “no ji, nilee hereɔ’ mɔ nɔ̃ ni eji lɛ yiwala.”
Ebiɔ ni ana shika koni akɛma ni akɛsaa Maŋtsɛyeli Asai, Kpee Asai, nitsumɔhe niji, woji afeemɔhei, kɛ Betel shiai.
Beni Ŋleshi saneyelihe lɛ yeee eshiwoo akɛ ebaaye ebua lɛ yɛ shika gbɛfaŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ekɛ eshika kala wolo ni afee lɛ ehee lɛ.
Ebiɔ ni akɛ heloonaa nibii kɛ mumɔŋ niyenii babaoo awaje amɛ; ebiɔ ni matsu nii waa koni maná shika pii ni mikɛye mabua amɛ.
Kɛji akɛ shika lɛ fioo shwɛ yɛ nyɔŋ lɛ naagbee mli lɛ, ajaraa mli akɛhaa gbɛgbalɔi lɛ kɛha aŋkroaŋkro shika ni amɛfiteɔ lɛ nyɔmɔwoo.
Susumɔ bɔ ni obaanyɛ oná shishitoo mlai ni yɔɔ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ ahe sɛɛ yɛ bɔ ni okɛ ofɔlɔi sharaa ohaa, bɔ ni okɛ shika tsuɔ nii ohaa, kɛ beni okometoo pɛ oyɔɔ he ko lɛ he.
No hewɔ lɛ, nyɛkahea shika yɛ mɛi ni kɛ shika lɛ baa lɛ adɛŋ dɔŋŋ, ja akɛbaasaa shĩa lɛ.”
Akɛ esha afɔle shika ni shwɛɔ lɛ woɔ adeka ni ji 8 lɛ mli.
Yɛ jarayeli nitsumɔ ni aleee esɛɛ saji nɛɛ ekroko hu mli lɛ, mɔ ko ni saa shikpɔji anɔ ekɛmamɔɔ tsũi ehɔ̃ɔ lɛ fa shikai babaoo kɛjɛ mɛi krokomɛi ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ adɛŋ.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, ale wɔweku lɛ akɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shika waa moŋ fe weku ni woɔ mɛi hewalɛ ni amɛtiu mumɔŋ nibii asɛɛ.
Ani ekolɛ manyɛ mikɛ mishika loo mibe atsu nii jogbaŋŋ ni mikɛlɛɛ gbɛfaŋnɔ ni minaa yɛ anɔkwa jamɔ mli lɛ mli, kɛtsɔ jeŋ muu fɛɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ sɛɛfimɔ nɔ, aloo ni mikɛye mibua mɛi ni efi amɛ fe mi lɛ?
(Kolosebii 3:13, 14) Kɛfata he lɛ, shishitoo mlai ni yɔɔ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ kɛ nitsumɔ haa wɔjieɔ sui kpakpai akpo yɛ wɔnitsumɔ mli, ni asaŋ wɔnáa jwɛŋmɔ ni ja yɛ shika he.
Amrɔ nɛɛ shika ni amɛnáa yɛ nitsumɔ nɛɛ mli lɛ fa aahu akɛ amɛnine shɛɔ amɛdaa gbi hiamɔ nii anɔ.
Ani okɛ oshika baahe nii ni ehiii nɛɛ?
Yɛ hei komɛi lɛ, bei pii lɛ, mɛi ni yɔɔ weku lɛ sɛɛ lɛ kpaa gbɛ akɛ abaawo amɛ nyɔmɔ babaoo kɛtsɔ hiɛ dani aye gbãla nii lɛ diɛŋtsɛ naa.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, mɛi komɛi ni yɔɔ shika babaoo bɔ ni amɛbaanyɛ amɛtsu amɛhiamɔ nii ahe nii loo mɛi ni yɔɔ hegbɛ akɛ amɛaaya nitsumɔ mli hejɔɔmɔ lɛ po sumɔɔ ni amɛya nɔ amɛtsu nii.
Kristofoi ni le nii ni tsuɔ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛmumɔŋ shidaamɔ he nii lɛ, kɛ amɛnanemɛi kɛ weku nɔ̃ hu he nii lɛ, kɛ amɛhe wooo asɔshwɛmɔ mli—kɛ́ shika fioo po akɛfɔ̃ɔ nɔ.
(Mateo 10:9, 10) No mli lɛ, gbɛfalɔi fɔɔ hɛfĩinii ni akɛ shika woɔ mli, gbɛfãa kotoku ni akɛ niyenii woɔ mli hiɛmɔ kɛ́ amɛmiifã gbɛ, ni amɛkɔɔ tokota kome amɛfataa nɔ ni amɛwo lɛ he.
Amɛha mina jogbaŋŋ akɛ jeee shika kɛ ninamɔ haa mɔ náa miishɛɛ kwraa.”
Tsatsubii krokomɛi tsuɔ nii tamɔ okwaafoi, ni amɛdũɔ ni amɛkwraa “ŋmɔshi nii” ni ji mɛlɛ.
Gbi ko gbɛkɛ lɛ, duŋ wo waa aahu akɛ wɔshi wɔbuu lɛ yɛ gãgãi pii ateŋ ní wɔleee.
8 Niiamlipɛilɔi komɛi heɔ amɛyeɔ akɛ kɛ́ aaajara tsatsubii amli aha adesa fɛɛ adesa lɛ, kɛ́ hooo lɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ baaná tsatsubii 200,000 sɔŋŋ, ni tsatsubii nɛɛ fɛɛ miitsu nii dɛŋdɛŋ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ eshishi fɛɛ.
Tsatsubii tsuɔ nii waa, ni nakai esa akɛ wɔ hu wɔfee, ni wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ waa ni wɔya hiɛ yɛ nitsumɔ mli, kɛji akɛ akwɛɛɛ wɔnɔ po.—9/15, baafa 26.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, tsatsu ‘le nii pam.’
Amɛkpaa gbee ni amɛboɔ nanemɛi nitsulɔi krokromɛi atoi, amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa tsatsubii ni epila loo amɛtɔ biti lɛ kɛbaa shia.
Yɛ tsatsubii ateŋ lɛ, ayɛ maŋnyɛ, shi eji maŋnyɛ kɛ shishinumɔ kɛkɛ akɛ lɛ eŋmɛɔ wɔji lɛ, ni lɛ ji nyɛ kɛha tsatsubii akuu lɛ.
“Hejɔ̃lɔ, yaa tsatsu ŋɔɔ; jwɛŋmɔ egbɛ̀i lɛ ahe ni ole nii! . . .
Akɛ ŋaawoo haa yɛ Abɛi 6:6 akɛ: “Hejɔ̃lɔ, yaa tsatsu ŋɔɔ; jwɛŋmɔ egbɛ̀i lɛ ahe ni ole nii.”
ALE Tsɛmɛi ni tsɔ Nikae hiɛ lɛ akɛ amɛji jamɔ mli tsɔɔlɔi titrii yɛ shishijee afii ohai lɛ amli yɛ Kristo fɔmɔ sɛɛ.
Mɛni Salomo na ni fee lɛ naakpɛɛ yɛ tsatsubii sɔrɔtoi lɛ eko he?
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, yɛ henumɔ nɛɛ hewɔ lɛ tsatsubii buaa amɛniyenii anaa yɛ be ni sa mli.
Mɛni wɔbaanyɛ wɔkase kɛjɛ tsatsubii anɔɔ?
Eyɛ mli akɛ hiɛnyiɛlɔ ko bɛ ni baakudɔ amɛ loo nɔkwɛlɔ ko bɛ ni baakwɛ amɛnɔ moŋ, shi tsatsubii lɛ yaa nɔ amɛtsuɔ amɛnitsumɔ lɛ ni etɔɔɔ amɛ.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, adesai amlai kɛ mla mli nibii bibii eye amɛ sɛkɛ aahu akɛ, amɛtamɔ tsatsubii ni miifo shi yɛ nitɛŋmɔ nɔ, amɛnaaa mfoniri muu lɛ kwraa—ni ji ŋwɛi shishitoo mlai lɛ.—Mateo 23:23, 24.
6 Bɔni afee ni efee klalo eha fɛ̃ibe hewɔ lɛ, Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ, “klitso tete . . . le ebe” ni ekɛfãa kɛyaa, ni tsatsu “taoɔ eniyenii etoɔ yɛ latsaabe mli.”
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ wɔ akɛ: “Hejɔ̃lɔ, yaa tsatsu ŋɔɔ; jwɛŋmɔ egbɛ̀i lɛ ahe ni ole nii!
Yɛ be mli ni emuaa yinɔsane mli odaseyelii lɛ fɛɛ naa lɛ, Alvan Lamson kɛɛ yɛ The Church of the First Three Centuries lɛ mli akɛ: “Ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ tsɔɔmɔ ni ehe gbɛi ni ji Triniti lɛ . . . naaa sɛɛfimɔ ko kɛjɛɛɛ Justin [Martyr] wiemɔ mli: ni abaanyɛ akpã nɔ ni ayoo nɛɛ mli kɛyashɛ Tsɛmɛi ni ba dani Nikae be lɛ shɛ lɛ fɛɛ nɔ; ni ji akɛ, kɛyashi niŋmalɔi ni ji Kristofoi fɛɛ ni hi shi yɛ Kristo fɔmɔ sɛɛ afii ohai etɛ lɛ anɔ.
Mɛɛ nilee wɔbaanyɛ wɔná kɛjɛ gbɛ̀i ni tsatsu bibioo kɛtsuɔ nii lɛ he?
• Mɛni hewɔ kɛ́ wɔkwɛ tsatsubii, afutuɔkɔi, baalabii, kɛ tsũnyɛ lɛ wɔbaanyɛ wɔkase nii kɛjɛ amɛŋɔɔ lɛ?
Tsatsubii ŋmaakpalɔi lɛ ji mɛi ni nine shɛɔ Bɔlɔ lɛ jɔɔmɔi anɔ lɛ ateŋ ekomɛi.
25 Tsatsubii ahe waaa,*
Amɛfeɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ gidigidi be fɛɛ be tamɔ tsatsu ni miikpelekɛ shi kɛmiijɛ egɔŋ ni eshɔ lɛ nɔ, ni mɛi náaa be fioo po ni amɛkɛaasusu amɛhe aloo mɛi krokomɛi ahe.
Taakɛ bɔ ni tsatsu náa nitsumɔ dɛŋdɛŋ ni etsuɔ lɛ he sɛɛ lɛ, nakai Nyɔŋmɔ hu taoɔ ni ‘wɔye nii kpakpai amli ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ wɔdeŋmegbomɔ fɛɛ mli.’
Abaanyɛ akɛɛ akɛ, tsatsu henɔ ko ni yɔɔ Amerika Wuoyi ni tseɔ baa lɛ he esa waa kɛ abɔɔ feemɔ.
Beni onyiɛɔ loofɔlɔ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, belɛ eejo foi kɛmiijɛ ohe.
Abɛɛ kooloi lɛ kɛ loofɔji lɛ ashwie.
Wɔ toii nuɔ he yɛ be mli ni wɔnuɔ faa mli nui ni jɛɔ ŋwɛi eshwieɔ shi lɛ gbɛɛmɔ, loofɔji alala, kɛ wɔsuɔlɔi agbee lɛ.
(Abɛi 14:10) Ani ókwɛ bɔ ni looflɔ, gbee loo alɔnte ko kwɛɔ ehiɛ yɛ ashwishwɛ mli ni agbɛnɛ etsɔtseɔ, ehũuɔ, aloo etutuaa nɔ ni enaa lɛ dã?
16 Be ko lɛ Yesu kɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he wiemɔ lɛ to wui ni “yashwie gbɛ he, ni loofɔji ba bakɔlɔ” he.
Wɔteŋ mɛi babaoo kɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔ eyaaa loofɔji bibii ni wɔnaa lɛ fɛɛ anɔ, aahu ni kɛ́ eko gbee shi lɛ, wɔbaana.
22 Lala 148:10 kɛɔ akɛ: “Ŋãŋ kooloi kɛ shia kooloi fɛɛ, waamɔ nibii kɛ fijiatsɛmɛi.”
6 Abaashi fɛɛ ahã gɔji anɔ loofɔji ni gbɔbiɔ lɛ
NINAA 13 (19:11-21): Yesu nyiɛɔ ŋwɛi tabilɔi ahiɛ kɛtsuɔ Nyɔŋmɔ mlifu ni ekɛkojoɔ Satan gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ, etabilɔi, kɛ esɛɛfilɔi ahe nii; loofɔji yeɔ amɛloo.
Nɛkɛ loofɔji nɛɛ ajara waaa aahu akɛ, kɛ́ ohiɛ pesewai enyɔ lɛ, abaaha bo aflimatai enumɔ shi jeee ejwɛ, ni tsɔɔ ákɛ akɛ ekome gbeɔ yi ni aheee shika.
Nakai nɔŋŋ Lala 8:7-9 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “[Nyɔŋmɔ] oŋɔ nibii fɛɛ kwa oto enajiashi: Tooi kɛ tsinai fɛɛ tswɛm kɛ ŋaŋ kooloi hu, ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ ŋshɔŋloi.”
Amɛtsɛ amɛhe nilelɔi, shi amɛtsɔmɔ kwashiai, ni Nyɔŋmɔ ni fiteee lɛ anunyam lɛ, amɛtsake amɛha gbɔmɔ ni fiteɔ lɛ subaŋ henɔ ko kɛ loofɔji kɛ kooloi naji-ejwɛjwɛtsɛmɛi, kɛ waamɔ nibii anɔ.”
25:33) Gbalɛ kroko ni wie nɔ kome too lɛ he lɛ hu kɛɛ akɛ: “Ni mina bɔfo ko damɔ hulu mli, ni ebo kɛ gbee wulu ekɛɛ loofɔji ní filikiɔ yɛ ŋwɛi lɛ fɛɛ akɛ: Nyɛbaa ní nyɛbabuaa nyɛhe naa yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ okpɔlɔ kpeteŋkpele lɛ he, koni nyɛbaye maŋtsɛmɛi aloo kɛ asafoiatsɛmɛi aloo kɛ hewalɔi aloo kɛ okpɔŋɔi aloo kɛ mɛi ní tara amɛnɔ lɛ aloo kɛ odehei kɛ nyɔji kɛ mɛi bibii kɛ mɛi wuji fɛɛ aloo.” —Kpoj.
La kpɛmɔ ni haa wɔnaa nii, kɔɔyɔɔ ni wɔmuɔ, shikpɔŋ gbiŋ ni wɔyɔɔ nɔ nɛɛ, jwɛi kɛ tsei ni kwɛ̃ɔ, bɔ ni ato naa ni anaa shwane kɛ nyɔɔŋ, looi, loofɔji, kɛ kooloi —wɔ Bɔlɔ kpeteŋkpele lɛ to naa pɛpɛɛpɛ ni ebɔ enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ kɛha gbɔmɔ sɛɛnamɔ kɛ emiishɛɛnamɔ.
16 Lala 148:10 lɛ hu tsĩɔ “fijiatsɛmɛi” hu tã.
+ 4 Be ni eduɔ nii lɛ, dumɔwui lɛ ekomɛi yashwie gbɛ he, ni loofɔji ba amɛbakɔlɔ amɛye.
Loofɔji pii kɛ tɔlɛ babaoo tsuɔ nii kɛtaoɔ niyenii amɛhaa amɛbii
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, akɛ okropɔŋi, loofɔlɔ ni afɔɔ etãtsii fe fɛɛ yɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ tsuɔ nii koni akɛfee nilee, ŋwɛi hebuu, kɛ oyaiyeli he okadi.
44 Filistinyo lɛ kɛɛ David akɛ: “Bo lɛ ba miŋɔɔ, ni mikɛ oloo baahã ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ ŋa mli kooloi.”
Ekɛɛ akɛ: ‘Nyɛkwɛa ŋwɛi loofɔji lɛ jogbaŋŋ.
Beni efeɔ nakai lɛ, ekolɛ abaaha wɔkai nɔ ni baaba mɛi ní teɔ shi amɛwoɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ anɔ yɛ Harmagedon ta ní baa lɛ mli, ní abaashi amɛgbohii lɛ ashwie shi aha ŋwɛi loofɔji ní amɛbaye lɛ.—Kpojiemɔ 19:17, 18.
Loofɔlɔ lɛ eko ni yɔɔ bibioo fe enɛ ji blacksmith plover lɛ.
Dani wɔɔshi Darwin lɛ, nyɛhaa wɔshaa foi oya kɛyaa Kakadu National Park, ni ale jogbaŋŋ yɛ loofɔji sɔrɔtoi ni fa yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ hewɔ ni ka bokagbɛ, ni ejɛkɛmɔ feɔ shitoi 155 loo kilomitai 250 lɛ.
Yesu ekpa shi ena ohiafoi—ni emami po fata he lɛ—yɛ jara lɛ nɔ akɛ amɛmiihe loofɔji bibii nɛɛ eko kɛha amɛweku lɛ kwɛmɔ.
Mɛni hewɔ bei komɛi lɛ, owaa odamɔɔ shi ni oboɔ loofɔji ní láa kɛ ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ tsei anɔ lɛ atoi lɛ?
Mɛi ejwɛ lɛ onukpai ji amɛ, ni amɛteŋ mɛi enyɔ hu ji daa gbɛgbalɔi, ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni Abɛi 17:6 ji anɔkwale ha, akɛ: “Hiimeji akekre ji bii abii, ni bii ahiɛnyam ji amɛtsɛmɛi.”
Yɛ be ko sɛɛ lɛ, minyɛmimɛi hii onukpai enyɔ lɛ shi shia akɛ amɛyaatao nitsumɔ.
16 No hewɔ lɛ, baptisimɔ sanebimɔi enyɔ lɛ kaiɔ mɛi ni abaabaptisi amɛ lɛ shishinumɔ ni yɔɔ nu mli baptisimɔ sɛɛ kɛ sɔ̃i ni ekɛbafɔ̃ɔ mɔ nɔ lɛ.
Aloo ekolɛ eye tawa su ko ni eka ehe yɛ be kakadaŋŋ mli lɛ nɔ kunim, shi eŋmɛɛ ehe eha kaa ni ha eshɛre eko yɛ teemɔŋ yɛ be ko mli loo shii enyɔ ko.
Yitso Enyɔ
Nɛkɛ ensaiklopedia nɛɛ yaa nɔ ekɛɔ akɛ: “Roma paapai lɛ . . . kpã maŋ nɔyeli hewalɛ ni amɛkɛɛ sɔlemɔ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ mli kɛteke sɔlemɔ kɛ maŋ husui lɛ, ni amɛje nɔ ni amɛtsɛ lɛ akɛ klantei enyɔ he tsɔɔmɔ lɛ shishi, ni amɛwie akɛ jeee mumɔŋ hewalɛ ni ekɛaaye sɔlemɔ lɛ nɔ pɛ Kristo kɛha paapa lɛ, shi moŋ eha lɛ maŋ nɔyeli hewalɛ ni ekɛaaye je lɛŋ maŋtsɛyelii lɛ anɔ.”
Mɛni hewɔ gbalɛ wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Yesaia yitso 52 lɛ ji miishɛɛ jɛɛhe lɛ, ni mɛɛ mlibaai enyɔ amɛyɔɔ?
16 Be ni Aaron bihii enyɔ lɛ gboi akɛni amɛyabɛŋkɛ Yehowa hewɔ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ,+ Yehowa kɛ Mose wie.
Nikasemɔi enyɔ nɛɛ baagbála amaga kpeteŋkpele ni awie ehe yɛ Daniel yitso 2 lɛ kɛ kooloo ní awie ehe yɛ Kpojiemɔ yitso 13 kɛ 17 lɛ kɛ emaga lɛ mli.
WOLO LƐ HIƐ: Nyɛmimɛi enyɔ kɛ mɔ ko ni yɔɔ amɛkutso lɛ mli miikase Biblia lɛ
Yɛ be mli ni wiɛbi lɛ foɔ ehe yɛ wiɛtɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ, ŋmaa lɛ shwieɔ shi yɛ wiɛtɛ lɛ nɔ ni wiɛbi lɛ wiɛɔ lɛ.
Ni kɛfata he lɛ, nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ ama wɔɔhei ni hiɛ nsɔdoi 13, kɛ shikpɔji olɛŋlɛi 5, ni ji hei ni akɛ tsɔji mamɔɔ kɛ hei ni asaa tsɔji yɛ hu.
Stephen kɛshi sɛɛ akɛ, “Mibiyei enyɔ lɛ eyɔse enɛ, ni enɛ eye ebua amɛ ni amɛna akɛ esa akɛ amɛjie hiɛsɔɔ kpo.”
17 “Okɛ shika tsuru krɔŋŋ afee adeka lɛ naanɔ, ekɛlɛ afee ninetalɔi enyɔ kɛ fã, ni elɛɛmɔ hu afee ninetalɔ kome kɛ fã.
Klɛŋklɛŋ nikasemɔi enyɔ ni yɔɔ wolo tɛtrɛɛ nɛɛ mli lɛ wieɔ mɛi komɛi ni hiɛ amɛmiishɛɛ mli yɛ amɛpiŋmɔi lɛ fɛɛ asɛɛ lɛ he.
Kɛ́ nyɛyɛ daa gbɛgbalɔi lɛ, obaanyɛ obi amɛyi enyɔ saji. Esa akɛ mɔ kome afee mɔ ni etsɛko yɛ mli, ni mɔ kome lɛ afee mɔ ni kɛ afii babaoo esɔmɔ.
Gbɔmɛi ni bɛ dekã lɛ po heɔ miniti kome loo nɔ̃ ni amɛboɔ shɛɛ sane ní akaneɔ lɛ tɛ̃ɛ kɛjɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli lɛ toi.

Yehowa tsĩ shikpɔŋ lɛ naagbeehei enyɔ tã ni ekɛfee toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shweremɔ ní baaba lɛ he mfoniri.
Kɛ́ wɔjɛ wɔtsuiŋ wɔhã ‘kapɛji enyɔ ni shɛɛɛ nɔ ko’ po lɛ, Yehowa hiɛ sɔɔ. —Mar 12:41-44.
Shi kɛji ebooo toi lɛ, ŋɔɔ mɔ kome loo mɛi enyɔ ofata ohe, koni odasefoi enyɔ loo etɛ naa lɛ, sane fɛɛ sane ama shi.
