3: Nɔ Hewɔ ni Sutsakemɔ Tsɔɔmɔ lɛ kɛ Kristofoi Atsɔɔmɔ lɛ Kpãaa Gbee Lɛ
No hewɔ ni Maŋtsɛ David bi ní Yehowa kɛ ehiɛ yaafonui lɛ ato wolo “tɔ” mli lɛ, ni ekɛ hekɛnɔfɔɔ bi akɛ: “Ani amɛbɛ owolo lɛ mli?”
Mɛni hewɔ amanehulu kpeteŋkpele lɛ fã ni ji enyɔ lɛ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ webii woŋ oshara mli lɛ?
Mɛni Hewɔ Wala Sɛɛ Yɔɔ Kuku Nɛkɛ?
Akɛni bei pii lɛ akɛ woji ni aŋmalaa ni teemɔŋ saji yɔɔ mli lɛ woɔ baagi amli ni asɔo naa hewɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ Sanbalat kɛ “wolo ní naa kã” tsu ni akɛyaha Nehemia lɛ?
Mɛni Hewɔ Esa akɛ Wɔnyiɛ Yesu Sɛɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ gbɛhe kɛ hegbɛ ni kwɔ ni Yesu yɔɔ mli lɛ gbalaaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛjɛɛɛ jamɔ ni wɔkɛhaa Yehowa lɛ nɔ lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ atsɛɔ wɔjamɔhe lɛ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ maŋmɛɛ ogbɔjɔ shihilɛ ko he ni mikɛ mihe awo oshara mli ni mibɔ mɔdɛŋ ni milɛɛ Maŋtsɛyeli nibii lɛ amli yɛ maji ni Marx kɛ Lenin tsɔɔmɔ ehe shi fe fɛɛ yɛ mli lɛ ateŋ ekome mli lɛ?
(Yohane 21:7) Oya nɔŋŋ ni Petro kɔ etade nɔhaanɔ lɛ ewo ni efĩ mli, ejaakɛ ejie efɔ̃ shi.
27 Shi bɔ ni afee ni wɔkatɔ̃tɔ amɛnane lɛ,+ yaa ŋshɔ lɛ naa oyafɔ̃ kpoŋ, ni klɛŋklɛŋ loo ni baabakɔ kpoŋ lɛ, shá lɛ, ni kɛ́ ogbɛ edaaŋ lɛ, obaana jwiɛtɛi kapɛlɛ.
Yehowa kɛɛ Adam kɛ Hawa akɛ: “Nyɛfɔa ni nyɛyi afáa ni nyɛyia shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ, ni nyɛnaanaa nɔ, ni nyɛyea ŋshɔŋloi kɛ ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ kooloo fɛɛ kooloo ni tsiɔ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.”
‘Edu looi srɔtoi lɛ fɛɛ eko.’
16 Yaa lɛ ní damɔ shi kɛha Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ duɔ loi srɔtoi fɛɛ.
“Kɛkɛ lɛ, yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni obaahɔɔ loo lɛ kɛtsɔ teŋdamɔlɔ ko nɔ lɛ, obaanyɛ okɛ nitsumɔhe lɛ aye naa tɛ̃ɛ aloo obaanyɛ oma nitsumɔhe ni tsuɔ loo he nii bo diɛŋtsɛ.
Amɛŋmɛ amɛyai lɛ, ni amɛgbe loo babaoo aahu akɛ, amɛyai lɛ bɔi gbalamɔ!
Hela wiemɔ ni akɛtsu nii aha “sha” lɛ shishitsɔɔmɔ diɛŋtsɛ kɔɔ aduawa, ŋshɔŋ loo faaŋ loo, aloo milɛloo ni esha he.
Eyɛ mli akɛ be ni amɛna Yesu klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, amɛku amɛsɛɛ amɛyatsu amɛweku lɛ wuoyaa nitsumɔ lɛ moŋ, shi ŋwanejee ko kwraa bɛ he akɛ nɔ ni amɛna ni amɛnu lɛ ná amɛtsuii kɛ amɛjwɛŋmɔi anɔ hewalɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Tsutsu bɔ ni eji yɛ kusum naa akɛ yei atsu nii yɛ shia lɛ bɛ lɛ nakai dɔŋŋ, amrɔ nɛɛ ɔfisii amli amɛtsuɔ nii yɛ, aloo yɛ gbɛjegbɛi ahe ni amɛmiihɔɔ aduawai, amɛo kɛ amɛhenɔi, looi srɔtoi kɛ kɛntɛŋ ní alo.
Humboldt gbala ejwɛŋmɔ kɛtee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni ena lɛ nɔ—ŋshɔ lɛŋ dɔlɛ, looi ni yɔɔ ŋshɔ lɛŋ, kɛ tsei ni ena yɛ egbɛfãa lɛ mli lɛ.
Ni alomɔɔɔ kooloi lɛ, ní filikilɔi kɛ loi fata he lɛ; ni alomɔɔɔ gɔji, kpaakpoi, fai, kɛ ŋshɔi lɛ; nakai nɔŋŋ hu alomɔɔɔ atatui, oblɔtu, hulu, nyɔɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii lɛ.
Egbɔmɔtso lɛ fã ni tamɔ ŋshɔŋ loo lɛ pɛ ji he ni shwɛ.
“Wuoyaa” yɛ Polynesia Gbɛ Nɔ
Biblia lɛ etsɔɔɔ hei pɔtɛɛ ni nibii komɛi ba yɛ, yɛ Galilea Ŋshɔ lɛ masɛi, tamɔ be mli ni Yesu jie ehe kpo yɛ eshitee lɛ sɛɛ, beni Petro kɛ bɔfoi krokomɛi lɛ etee wuo lɛ (shishigbɛ).
+ Tamɔ bɔ ni yaa fɔŋ duɔ loo, ni tsɔne duɔ loofɔji lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ gbɔmɛi abii yagbeɔ sane fɔŋ* mli kɛ́ ebanina amɛ trukaa.
Ani wɔbaanyɛ wɔfee nɔ ko ni tamɔ nakai yɛ wɔmumɔŋ wuoyaa nitsumɔ lɛ mli?
Mikaiɔ nibii komɛi ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ni mikɛ minyɛkwɛmɛi abii kɛ mitsɛkwɛmɛi lɛ fee—loo shamɔ, gbɔbimɔ, tsei komɛi ni wɔfeɔ kɛshwɛɔ, kɛ nibii krokomɛi hu ni wɔgbɔɔ.
No sɛɛ etsɛɛɛ lɛ, Yesu fã Petro ni efɔ̃ yaa, ni Petro gbe looi babaoo yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ.
39 Esoro heloo fɛɛ heloo, esoro gbɔmɛi aheloo, ni esoro tsinai aheloo, ni esoro loofɔji aheloo, ni esoro nu mli loi aheloo.
9. (a) Mɛni sane ni kɔɔ wuoyaa mli niiashikpamɔ ni Petro kɛ bɔfoi krokomɛi lɛ ná lɛ tsɔɔ yɛ su kpakpa ni esa akɛ aná yɛ toiboo ni afeɔ ahaa Kristo lɛ he?
Ekɛ ŋshɔŋ loo ko daaŋ shika wo too
26 Yesu bi Petro kɛji eesumɔ e-Nuŋtsɔ lɛ ‘fe enɛɛmɛi’—ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ, Yesu kɛ enine tsɔɔ looi babaoo ni amɛgbe lɛ.
Yakobo kɛ Yohane hu jɛ Kapernaum loo he ko ni bɛŋkɛ jɛmɛ, ni amɛyaa wuo yɛ jɛmɛ niiaŋ.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ klɛŋklɛŋ adesai lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛyea ŋshɔŋloi kɛ ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ kooloo fɛɛ kooloo ni tsiɔ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.”
Yehowa tsuji ahiɛ sɔɔ hegbɛi ni amɛnaa kɛha naanyobɔɔ yɛ Kristofoi akpeei ashishi lɛ.
Yɛ afi 66 Ŋ.B. lɛ, Romabii lɛ fo Yerusalem hekawoo lɛ nɔ kpitioo, ni no ŋmɛ gbɛ ni “heloo” ni ji Kristofoi jo foi.
(1 Mose 45:4-8) Akɛ Kristofoi lɛ, esa akɛ wɔkase nɔ ko kɛjɛ enɛ mli.
Esa akɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ Kristofoi akai akɛ amɛbii lɛ ji amɛkaselɔi ni he hiaa fe fɛɛ.
Renato ha abaptisi lɛ yɛ afi 2002, ni no sɛɛ afi kome lɛ etsɔ Kristofonyo sɔɔlɔ ni kɛ ebe fɛɛ shiɛɔ ni ekɛtsɔɔ akɛ ehiɛ esɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni Yehowa efee eha lɛ lɛ.
(b) Kristofoi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ ejie Mose kɛ Elia mumɔ lɛ kpo kɛjɛ 1914 yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
The Encyclopedia of Religion lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ, mɛi ni to jamɔi ni ji Buddha jamɔ, Kristojamɔ kɛ Islam jamɔi lɛ ashishi lɛ hiɛ susumɔi srɔtoi yɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi ahe, shi wolo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Jamɔi nɛɛ ahe yinɔsaji krokomɛi tsɔɔ akɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi kɛ saji ni kɔɔ nifeemɔi nɛɛ ahe lɛ ji adesai ajamɔ mli hemɔkɛyelii lɛ amli fã titri ko.”
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, yɛ Yakobo 5:7-11 lɛ, wɔna akɛ awie Hiob he akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kɛwo Kristofoi krokomɛi hewalɛ koni amɛnyɛ amɛkpee jaramɔ shihilɛi anaa, ní eshɛje wɔmii akɛ Yehowa jɔɔ tsuishiŋmɛɛ ni tamɔ nakai lɛ nɔ.
Kɛ́ mina amɛ fɛɛ yɛ Kristofoi akpeei ashishi lɛ, minuɔ he akɛ nibii ni mikɛshã afɔle kɛba maŋ nɛɛ mli lɛ he eba sɛɛnamɔ.”
Nakai nɔŋŋ esaaa akɛ onukpai Kristofoi ni ahala amɛ lɛ shashaoɔ shi yɛ saji ni hiɛdɔɔ yɔɔ mli ni esa akɛ amɛtsu he nii lɛ ahe.
Wɔtee nɔ wɔsɔle wɔha Yehowa, wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ wɔfee tsakemɔi, ni yɛ naagbee lɛ wɔbafee mɛi sa kɛha baptisimɔ.—Nyɛkanea Kolosebii 1:9, 10.
Kɛ onukpai lɛ na akɛ etamɔ nɔ ni mɛi komɛi sumɔɔ ni amɛsaa amɛhe yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ yɛ amɛ hejɔɔmɔ be mli lɛ, no lɛ ebaafee nɔ ni sa akɛ amɛkɛ ŋaawoo ni mlihilɛ yɔɔ mli ni yɔɔ shiŋŋ hu ni tsɔɔ akɛ atade ni tamɔ nɛkɛ esaaa hiɛ lɛ aaaha dani aya kpee lɛ, titri lɛ ákɛ mɛi ni yaa Kristofoi akpee.
Kristofoi onukpai baanyɛ afee yelikɛbuamɔ jɛɛhe diɛŋtsɛ yɛ biɛ.
Shi kɛlɛ, kɛ́ ayatsuuu mɔ diɛŋtsɛ mlipɛimɔ ni haa wɔnaa “mɛi ni wɔji diɛŋtsɛ” loo ehaa wɔtaoɔ saji ahetooi ni kɛ wekukpãa ni kã wɔkɛ Yehowa loo wɔkɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ teŋ lɛ bɛ nɔ ko feemɔ lɛ he nii yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ lɛ, ebaafee nɔ ni sɛɛnamɔ bɛ he, ni enɛ baanyɛ aye mɔ awui yɛ mumɔŋ.
Abaanyɛ awie Kristofoi ní afɔ amɛ mu lɛ asafo lɛ he akɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ “Zion biyoo,” akɛni “ŋwɛi Yerusalem” ji amɛnyɛ lɛ hewɔ.
Mɛɛ kaa Kristofoi babaoo kɛkpeɔ, ni mɛni baanyɛ aye abua amɛ ni amɛye nɔ kunim?
Ehe miihia ni nuu lɛ ale nɔ ni Kristofoi aweku yitso ni eeeji lɛ tsɔɔ.
6 Kɛha Kristofonyo lɛ, asafoŋ kpeei yaa kɛ ehemɔkɛyeli ni damɔ Biblia nɔ lɛ he odase ni eeeye mɛi krokomɛi lɛ ji anɔkwa jamɔ fãi komɛi ni he hiaa, ni esaaa ni akuɔ hiɛ afɔ̃ɔ nɔ.
Wɔnanemɛi Kristofoi baanyɛ aye abua wɔ babaoo yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
13 Tsakemɔi ni Hezekia kɛ Yosia fee lɛ kɛ anɔkwa jamɔ ni atswa ama shi ekoŋŋ yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ, ní ba mli yɛ anɔkwa Kristofoi ateŋ kɛjɛ be mli ni akɛ Yesu Kristo ta maŋtsɛsɛi nɔ yɛ afi 1914 kɛbaa lɛ kpãa gbee pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Wɔnaa hegbɛ akɛ wɔkɛ gbɔmɛi ni hiɔ shi yɛ amɛ hemɔkɛyeli naa lɛ aaafutu, yɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli.
Shi kɛlɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔkai akɛ, kɛji ajɛko ŋwɛi akɛ shishitoo mla, loo mla hako lɛ, ebafeŋ nɔ ni sa akɛ wɔɔjɛ wɔ henilee mli wɔkojo naanyo Kristofonyo yɛ saji ni ji mɔ aŋkro nɔ̃ lɛ mli.—Romabii 14:1-4; Galatabii 6:5.
(b) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yesu tsɔ ejaje ebɔfoi lɛ ajwɛŋmɔ, ni mɛni Kristofoi ni yɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ baanyɛ akase kɛjɛ mli?
Kɛ́ mɔ lɛ jeee Kristofonyo lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔwie akɛ, “Kadimɔ nɔ ni Niŋmai Krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ kɛɔ wɔ.”
3 Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishemɔ ji henumɔ ko ni esa akɛ Kristofoi aná yɛ amɛ-Bɔlɔ lɛ he.
Satan miibɔ mɔdɛŋ koni etsi gbɔmɛi kɛjɛ Yehowa he kɛtsɔ awuiyeli nifeemɔi ni ekɛwoɔ amɛtsui mli lɛ nɔ, ni etsɔɔ nibii tamɔ sinii, lalai kɛ kɔmpiuta shwɛmɔi ni woɔ mɛi ni shwɛɔ lɛ hewalɛ koni amɛkɛ amɛhe awo awuiyeli nifeemɔi kɛ gbɔmɔgbee amli lɛ nɔ efeɔ enɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, bɔlɛnamɔ he mfoniri ni mɔ ko aaakwɛ yɛ Intanɛt lɛ nɔ yɛ eshĩa akɛni eeetao ele nɔ ko, loo akɛni ehiɛ bɛ ehe nɔ hewɔ lɛ pɛ kɛkɛ baanyɛ afite ehenilee kpakpa lɛ.
(1 Mose 6:2; Yuda 6) Jeee kɔmpiutai ji gbekɛbii lɛ, ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔha amɛfee nii bɔ ni wɔtaoɔ lɛ.

Afɔɔ ewiemɔ nɛɛ mli tĩi shii abɔ, ejaakɛ ekolɛ gbɔmɛi babaoo naa akɛ eji anɔkwale ní anyɛŋ aje he ŋwane.
Kɛ́ ona kpɔiaŋgbɔlelɔ ko ni eetu ajemelekutu fɛfɛo yɛ kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ onaa egbɔmɔtso lɛ tamɔ tsɔne ko ni miitsu nii jogbaŋŋ.
Kwɛ bɔ ni eyɔɔ naakpɛɛ akɛ mana akɛ eeye ehenɔjɔɔmɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ he odase yɛ faŋŋ mli kɛtsɔ ehe ni ekɛhaa kɛha nu mli baptisimɔ lɛ nɔ!
Kwɛmɔ akɛ ani obaana nɔ ko ni obaanyɛ ojie kɛjɛ mli loo ofo efeemɔ mli koni oná be kɛha Biblia kanemɔ loo ekasemɔ babaoo lo.—Efesobii 5:15, 16.
Kwɛmɔ nikasemɔi enyɔ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ, kɛha nɔ hewɔ kɛ bɔ ni abaashiɛ sanekpakpa lɛ atsɔɔ aha lɛ ahe saji amlipɛimɔ ni yaa hiɛ.—Marko 13:10.

(The Knowledge of God In Ancient Israel) Kwɛ awerɛho ni eji akɛ aaana gbɛi Yahweh, loo Yehowa, ni nɔ kwɔ, ni sa woo fe fɛɛ lɛ akɛ elaaje kɛjɛ Biblia shishitsɔɔmɔi babaoo mli, yɛ be mli ni ejeɔ kpo faŋŋ shii akpei abɔ yɛ shishijee Hebri ŋmalɛ lɛ mli lɛ!—Yesaia 43:10-12.
Mɛɛ gbalɛi baana amɛmlibaa ni yɔɔ nyam yɛ jeŋ hee lɛ mli?
Biblia lɛ baatsɔɔ wɔ.

1:16) Yɛ wɔtsui ni baanyɔ wɔmli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, wɔbaana akɛ mɛi krokomɛi kɛ wiemɔi ni Paulo tsɛ́ yisɛɛ yɛ Romabii 10:15 lɛ baakpã gbee akɛ: “Kwɛ bɔ ni hejɔlɛ he sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi ni shiɛɔ nii kpakpai lɛ anaji yɔɔ fɛo ha!”—Yes.

(Yohane 10:11-16) Agbɛnɛ hu Salomo kɛ anɔkwa saji komɛi ni anyɛŋ aje he ŋwane ba: “Gbɔmɛi abii ahewɔ afee nakai, koni Nyɔŋmɔ aka amɛ akwɛ, ni amɛna akɛ, kɛ ka amɛ kɛkɛ lɛ, amɛtamɔ kooloi nɔŋŋ.
Hã wɔkwɛ nɔ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔkase yɛ Hiob sane lɛ mli kɛ bɔ ni Yehowa bu Hiob he.
Ni kwɛmɔ agbamii lɛ kɛ akutui lɛ hu.
Kɛ́ ootao otii ni kɔɔ nitsumɔ he saji ni esa akɛ wɔsusu he lɛ ahe saji ni yɔɔ fitsofitso lɛ, kwɛmɔ April 15, 1999 Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ baafa 28-30, kɛ The Watchtower, July 15, 1982 lɛ baafa 26 lɛ.

20 Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, amrɔ nɛɛ ji be ni esa akɛ wɔteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ abo ŋaawoo ni atsɔ gbalɔ Zefania nɔ akɛha lɛ toi. Eŋma akɛ: “Dani Yehowa mlifu ni naa wa lɛ aba nyɛnɔ, dani Yehowa mlifu gbi lɛ aba nyɛnɔ!
Ni nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ni miwoɔo he kita ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ akã otsui nɔ, ni ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii, ni owie he, beni ota shi yɛ oshĩa lɛ kɛ beni onyiɛ gbɛ teŋ kɛ beni okã shi kɛ beni ote shi.” —5 MOSE 6:5-7.

BƆ NI BIBLIA LƐ TSAKE MISHIHILƐ: Be ko lɛ, mikane Abɛi 27:11 lɛ ni kɛɔ akɛ: “Mibi, feemɔ ohe nilelɔ, ní oha mitsui anyɔ mimli.”

Yehowa wie yɛ ehe akɛ: “Mina David, Ishai bi lɛ, nuu ní miyɔɔ ehe tsui, mɔ ni aaafee misuɔmɔnaa nii lɛ fɛɛ” lɛ.
Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, kɛ wɔɔtse wɔtsui wɔŋmɛ wɔmli lɛ, ebiɔ ni wɔye wɔtsui lɛ nɔ, ni wɔtsɔ eyiŋ koni ehe eye akɛ Yehowa sumɔɔ wɔ.
Akɛni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ suɔmɔ wo wɔtsui mli hewɔ lɛ, ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ, eyɛ he miishɛɛ, ni ekã etsui nɔ waa po akɛ ebaana susumɔi kpakpai ni wɔhiɛ, kɛ nɔ hewɔ ni wɔtaoɔ wɔfee nɔ ko lɛ, ní enu shishi hu. —1 Yohane 4:7-10.
Fɔsemɔ otsuiŋ tamɔ nu oshwie Yehowa hiɛ.
Maruja kɛɛ ebi yoo lɛ akɛ, “Kɛ́ woji nɛɛ eko yaje mɔ ko ni yɔɔ tsui kpakpa dɛŋ lɛ, Yehowa baaha wɔná mɔ ko ni wɔkɛ lɛ akase Biblia lɛ.”
Yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, oti ni esa akɛ ema wɔhiɛ ji ni wɔwo mɛi hewalɛ, ní wɔkɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ atsu nii kɛwaje amɛtsuii.
Kɛ́ gbekɛ ko ni baa ejeŋ jogbaŋŋ lɛ tsui tsirɛ lɛ koni ejie ehemɔkɛyeli kpo etsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ, mɛɛ yelikɛbuamɔ lolo abaanyɛ akɛhã lɛ?
Mɔ ko mɔ ko nyɛŋ aya nɔ ahiɛ Kristofoi amiishɛɛ mli kɛji ekɛ amalei, kɛ wiemɔi ni esaaa, kɛ nibii ni ejaaa gbɛ, ni etsɔɔɔ jeŋba kpakpa, ni awieee he ekpakpa hu, nii ni anyɛɔ, kɛ nii anyaŋeɔ wo etsui kɛ ejwɛŋmɔ mli obɔ.
Beni wɔpɛiɔ gbalɛ nɛɛ mli lɛ, wɔtsuiiaŋ baayi obɔ kɛ hiɛsɔɔ, ni wɔhemɔkɛyeli lɛ mli baawa.
8 Blema nilelɔ ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Mibi, kɛ omɔ miwiemɔi lɛ amli, ni okɛ mikitai lɛ to omasɛi, koni oba otoi shi oha nilee, ni okɛ otsui ha sanesɛɛkɔmɔ; hɛɛ, kɛ obolɔ otsɛ sɛɛyoomɔ, ni owó ogbee nɔ oha saneshishinumɔ, kɛji otao esɛɛgbɛ tamɔ jwiɛtɛi, ni otao tamɔ jwetrii ni aŋɔtee lɛ: No dani ooonu Yehowa gbeyeishemɔ shishi, ni oooná Nyɔŋmɔ he nilee.”—Abɛi 2:1-5.
Kɛ wɔfeɔ nakai lɛ, no lɛ “[wɔɔ]na nilee tsui” kɛtsɔ gbi fɛɛ gbi ni wɔɔtsu he nii yɛ gbɛ ni sɛɛnamɔ yɔɔ he lɛ nɔ, kɛwo wɔ Tsɔɔlɔ Kpeteŋkpele, Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ nyam.
Beni okane bɔ ni atsɔɔ nɔ ni suɔmɔ ji yɛ kuku ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ, ani otsui shwe koni mɔ ko ajie suɔmɔ ni tamɔ nakai kpo atsɔɔ bo?
6:10) Ha shi ni ewo mɛi fɛɛ ni sheɔ lɛ gbeyei lɛ ahi ojwɛŋmɔŋ akɛ: “Mishiŋo ni misaa mikwaŋo gbi ko gbi ko.”—Heb.
Kɛlɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ le enɛ, ejaakɛ ejaje akɛ: “Mi, Yehowa, mitaoɔ tsuiŋ, mikaa sabai mikwɛɔ.”
Biblia lɛ kɛ Kristofoi awoji akanemɔ kɛ enɔ jwɛŋmɔ lɛ baaha wɔná hegbɛi ni hi fe fɛɛ kɛnyɛmɔ anɔkwalei ni yɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli lɛ anɔ wɔwo wɔtsuii amli.
(Lala 1:1, 2; Hebribii 10:24, 25) Ani Yehowa shɛɛ sane lɛ bɛŋkɛ mitsui waa tamɔ “la ní tsoɔ yɛ mitsui mli, ní aŋa yi awo miwui amli,” ni tsirɛɔ mi koni mikɛ mihe awo Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛmɔ kɛ kaselɔ feemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli?
Ani oyɛ nɔmimaa diɛŋtsɛ yɛ otsui mli akɛ ‘ootao maŋtsɛyeli lɛ kɛ [Yehowa] jalɛ lɛ tsutsu’?—Mat.
24 No hewɔ lɛ, akɛni amɛmiitao amɛhi shi yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛtsuiiaŋ akɔnɔi lɛ anaa hewɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ŋmɛɛ amɛhe ehã muji nii, koni amɛfite amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛgbɔmɔtsei lɛ.
Yehowa baakpata efɔŋ feelɔi, tamɔ ojotswalɔi, gbɔmɔgbelɔi, kɛ mɛi ni diɔ bɔlɛnamɔ mli jeŋba shara sɛɛ lɛ ahiɛ.
Fɔlɔi, ani nyɛhiɛ gboɔ akɛ nyɛkɛ nyɛbii lɛ aaawie bɔlɛnamɔ he saji ahe?
Saneyitso ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ wieɔ saji nyɔŋma ni mɛi fɔɔ bimɔ yɛ nɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛɔ yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he lɛ he.
Bɔlɛnamɔ he mfonirii lɛ ha béi ba mi kɛ miŋa teŋ.
Shi afii fioo komɛi asɛɛ, be ni ebɔlɛnamɔ henumɔi amli ewa lɛ, ehe baahia ni ená hemɔkɛyeli ni mli wa akɛ, kɛ́ ebo Yehowa mlai atoi be fɛɛ be lɛ, ebaahi ehã lɛ.”
Nɛkɛ beaŋ ji be ni esa akɛ okwɛ akɛ obi lɛ le nibii babaoo ni kɔɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he, nibii ni kɔɔ tsakemɔi ni ebaana yɛ egbɔmɔtsoŋ kɛ henumɔŋ, kɛ bɔ ni esa akɛ eba ejeŋ eha lɛ he.
Amɛbaanyɛ amɛya nɔ amɛna gbalashihilɛ naanyobɔɔ ni mli wa ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ, ni abuɔ bɔlɛnamɔ yɛ mli akɛ nikeenii kpakpa ni jɛ gbalashihilɛ Shishitolɔ, Yehowa ŋɔɔ lɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ.—Abɛi 5:15-19.
Bɔlɛnamɔ ni yaa nɔ yɛ gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔ ko kɛ mɔ kroko ni jeee ehefatalɔ lɛ teŋ lɛ ji esha ni afeɔ ashiɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, ni efiteɔ wekui.

(1 Korintobii 6: 9- 11) The New York Times lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ: “Kɛha gbekɛbii ni eye afii nyɔŋma kɛ etɛ kɛyaa lɛ, bɔlɛnamɔ ebatsɔ tamɔ taomɔ nii ni baaha amɛtipɛŋfoi akpɛlɛ amɛnɔ . . .
Esa akɛ agbe mɛi ni bɔɔ ajwamaŋ lɛ (10-21)
Yesu wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Mateo 22:30 lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ aboteee gbalashihilɛ mli yɛ ŋwɛi, ni anáaa bɔlɛ hu yɛ jɛmɛ.
Kɛfata he lɛ, bɔlɛnamɔ ni yaa nɔ yɛ mɛi ni hiɛ bɔɔsu kome loo mɔ ko kɛ kooloo teŋ lɛ hu ji ajwamaŋbɔɔ.
Obaanyɛ oto hei pii ni ehe baahia ni wɔjie henɔyeli kpo yɛ lɛ anaa —niyenii ni wɔyeɔ kɛ dãa ni wɔnuɔ, nuu kɛ yoo teŋ jeŋba, kɛ be kɛ shika ni wɔfiteɔ yɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔi loo nibii ni wɔsumɔɔ lɛ ahe.
Hii kɛ yei ni jooɔ lɛ kɛ joo fee bɔlɛnamɔ he nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ yɛ kpoku lɛ nɔ.”
Biblia lɛ ŋmɛɔ nɔ kome pɛ gbɛ ni abaadamɔ nɔ atse gbala mli ní anyɛ abote gbalashihilɛ mli ekoŋŋ, ni no ji “ajwamaŋbɔɔ”—bɔlɛnamɔ yɛ gbalashihilɛ lɛ sɛɛ.—Mateo 19:9.
Nakai nɔŋŋ hu ehaa wɔnáa bɔlɛnamɔ he jwɛŋmɔ kpakpa ni baaha wɔná miishɛɛ yɛ gbalashihilɛ mli.
Yehowa le akɛ ponografi ji jwɛŋmɔ gbonyo kɛ pɛsɛmkunya susumɔ ni Satan hiɛ yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he. —1 Mose 6:2; Yuda 6, 7.
Daa nɛɛ ebɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ eka Yosef koni ekɛ lɛ aná bɔlɛ.
Satan kɛ bɔlɛnamɔ tsuɔ nii yɛ ŋaa gbɛ nɔ koni ekɛtsu eyiŋtoi ahe nii yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Ehi akɛ bo diɛŋtsɛ otsɔɔ obii lɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he saji.
Yɛ sane ni kɔɔ nuutso ni akɛwoɔ daaŋ loo yoohe ni alɛmɔɔ lɛ he lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ esoro Kristofoi yɛ je lɛŋ bii pii ahe?
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, akɛni bɔlɛnamɔ haa be shɛɔ ní mɔ he tseee hewɔ lɛ, mla eŋmɛɛɛ gbɛ ní mɔ ko kɛ bɔlɛnamɔ afee jamɔ fã yɛ Yehowa we lɛ.
James ni eye afii 20 lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Jeee wu kɛ ŋa ni miiná bɔlɛ lɛ pɛ ji nɔ ni mɛi buɔ lɛ bɔlɛnamɔ.
Yɛ haomɔi kpawo lɛ ni afɔse ashwie shi lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, mɛɛ nifeemɔ gbɛ adesai ateŋ mɛi ni fa baakɔ?
Te bɔfo lɛ tsɛ okadi kooloo ni tsuɔ tamɔ muneele lɛ tɛŋŋ, ni ejɛ kpawo lɛ mli yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Amɛkɛ amɛ ba Yabesh ni amɛfu amɛwui lɛ yɛ tso agbo lɛ ni yɔɔ Yabesh+ lɛ shishi, ni amɛhi ŋmaa gbii kpawo.
8:6-12; 9:1, 13; 11:15—Mɛɛ be ŋwɛi bɔfoi kpawo lɛ saa amɛhe koni amɛkpã amɛtɛtrɛmaŋtɛrɛi lɛ, mɛɛ be amɛkpã, ni mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ amɛtsɔ amɛkpã?
Ejo foi oya kɛtsɔ eweku lɛ hiɛ, ni ekula shi yɛ Esau hiɛ shii kpawo.
+ 14 No hewɔ lɛ, eŋɔ lɛ kɛtee Zofim ŋa lɛ nɔ, kɛtee Pisga yiteŋ,+ ni emamɔ afɔleshaa latɛi kpawo, ni eshã tsinanuu kome kɛ gwantɛŋnuu kome yɛ afɔleshaa latɛi lɛ eko fɛɛ eko nɔ.
Kɛkɛ ni ekɔlɔ blodoi kpawo lɛ, eda shi, ni ekumɔ mli, ni ekɛhã ekaselɔi lɛ koni amɛjara, ni amɛjara amɛhã mɛi lɛ.
30 Ebihii lɛ ateŋ mɔ ni baaye esɛɛ akɛ osɔfo, ni ebaaba kpee buu lɛ mli koni ebasɔmɔ yɛ he krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ baawo atadei lɛ gbii kpawo.
15 Bɔ ni ŋwɛibɔfo lɛ wiemɔi lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, abaaja “otsii nyɔŋmai kpawo” lɛ mli afee lɛ bei kpalaŋŋi etɛ: (1) “otsii kpawo,” (2) “otsii nyɔŋmai ekpaa kɛ enyɔ,” kɛ (3) otsi kome.
15 Ni mina okadi kroko yɛ ŋwɛi, eji okadi kpele, ni eyɛ naakpɛɛ, ŋwɛibɔfoi kpawo+ ni hiɛ haomɔi kpawo.
Kɛ ootao “bei kpawo” lɛ he saji ni atsɔɔ mli fitsofitso lɛ, kwɛmɔ “Let Your Kingdom Come” wolo ni Watchtower Bible and Tract Society of New York, Inc. fee lɛ, baafai 127-39, 186-9.
Ehe ni ekɛwooo maŋ saji amli akɛ Kristofonyo lɛ hewɔ lɛ, eye afii etɛ yɛ tsuŋwoo hei sɔrɔtoi kpawo mli, ni bei komɛi po lɛ, awoɔ lɛ gbokɛlɛ ni ayiɔ lɛ waa hu.
(b) Yɛ emlibaa wulu mli lɛ, mɛɛ be “bei kpawo” lɛ je shishi ni yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
+ Ni be ni ebo lɛ, nugbɔshiimɔi kpawo+ lɛ agbei wie.
Esɛɛ etsɛɛɛ ni minine shɛ nitsumɔ ko nɔ yɛ Entebbe Majimaji Ateŋ Kɔɔyɔŋ Lɛjiadaamɔhe ni yɔɔ Uganda lɛ, ni wɔhi jɛmɛ afii ejwɛ kɛ nyɔji kpawo.
Maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi kpawo pɛ ji mɛi ni shwɛ.
(Kolosebii 1:15) Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, kpoo sɔrɔtoi kpawo yɛ Mateo yitso 23, ni ejaje eshi jamɔ mli osatofoi ni hi shi yɛ egbii lɛ amli lɛ.
Awie mɛnɛɛmɛi ahe yɛ Kpojiemɔ 1:16 akɛ yibɔ ni eye emuu, ni ji “ŋulamii kpawo” ni Yesu hiɛ yɛ eninejurɔ.
Beni miku misɛɛ kɛtee Newcastle lɛ, akɛ mi tee koni miyajie minaa yɛ saneyelihe ko, ni mɛi ni fata he hu ji nyɛmimɛi krokomɛi kpawo ni kpoo akɛ amɛaatsu asraafoi anitsumɔ lɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, afɔɔ yibɔ kpawo lɛ kɛ nitsumɔ kɛha nɔ ko ni eshɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ loo eye emuu yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ.
loo Gaumata (Eye nɔ nyɔji kpawo

+ Shi ekã amɛhiɛ ni eŋmɛɛɛ amɛ gbɛ ni amɛwie,+ ejaakɛ amɛle akɛ lɛ ji Kristo lɛ.

14 Eyɛ mli akɛ mihiɛ kã nɔ akɛ etsɛŋ ni maba oŋɔɔ moŋ, shi miiŋma bo nibii nɛɛ, 15 koni kɛ́ mitsɛ lɛ, ole bɔ ni sa akɛ ofee onii ohã yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ shĩa,+ ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛkãalɔ lɛ asafo lɛ, anɔkwale lɛ akulashiŋ kɛ enɔdaamɔnɔ lɛ mli.
Beni Mose gbálaa Mla ni akɛha yɛ Sinai Gɔŋ lɛ masɛi lɛ mli lɛ, ekɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: “Naa, miiŋɔ jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ miishwie nyɛhiɛ ŋmɛnɛ: jɔɔmɔ ji nyɛnɔ̃, kɛji nyɛbo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kitãi ni miwoɔ nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ atoi lɛ; shi loomɔ ji nyɛnɔ̃, kɛji nyɛbooo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kitãi lɛ atoi, ni nyɛkpale kɛjɛ gbɛ ni miwoɔ nyɛ he kitã ŋmɛnɛ nɛɛ nɔ.”—5 Mose 11:26-28.
Yehowa ha egbalɔ lɛ kɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: “Naa, miŋɔ jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ mishwie nyɛhiɛ ŋmɛnɛ: jɔɔmɔ ji nyɛnɔ̃, kɛji nyɛbo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kitai ni miwoɔ nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ atoi lɛ; shi loomɔ ji nyɛnɔ̃, kɛji nyɛbooo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitai lɛ atoi, ni nyɛkpale kɛjɛ gbɛ ni miwoɔ nyɛ he kita ŋmɛnɛ nɛɛ nɔ, ni nyɛyanyiɛ nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi ni nyɛleee sá lɛ asɛɛ lɛ.” —5 Mose 11: 26-28.
26 “Naa, ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, mikɛ jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ miishwie nyɛhiɛ:+ 27 abaajɔɔ nyɛ kɛ́ nyɛbo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi ní miwoɔ nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ toi,+ 28 ni abaalomɔ nyɛ kɛ́ nyɛbooo Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi lɛ toi,+ ni nyɛgbá afã kɛje gbɛ ni mifãa nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ akɛ nyɛnyiɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni nyɛyanyiɛ nyɔŋmɔi ni nyɛleee lɛ asɛɛ.
shi milaaje [yɛ Sheol]; ejaakɛ gbɔmɔ ni naabu he tseee ji mi, ni maŋ ni amɛnaabui ahe tseee teŋ miyɔɔ; ejaakɛ mihiŋmɛii ena maŋtsɛ lɛ ni ji Yehowa Zebaot lɛ!”
Shi kaimɔ nɔ ni bɔfo Paulo kɛɛ yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ: “Foi ni midaa nɛɛ, midaaa lɛ butubutu; nɔmɔ ni minɔɔ nɛɛ, jeee kɔɔyɔɔ mikɛ nɔɔ; shi moŋ migbalaa mi diɛŋtsɛ migbɔmɔtso lɛ mai ni miyeɔ lɛ nyɔŋ, koni mi ni mishiɛɔ mitsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ, mi diɛŋtsɛ lɛ akashɛ mi afɔ.” —1 Korintobii 9: 26, 27.
Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ ekɛɛ akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ foi ni midaa nɛɛ, midaaa lɛ butubutu; nɔmɔ ni minɔɔ nɛɛ, jeee kɔɔyɔɔ mikɛnɔɔ; shi moŋ migbalaa mi diɛŋtsɛ migbɔmɔtso lɛ mai ni miyeɔ lɛ nyɔŋ, koni mi ni mishiɛɔ mitsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ, mi diɛŋtsɛ lɛ akashɛ mi afɔ̃.”
No hewɔ lɛ foi ni midaa nɛɛ, midaaa lɛ butubutu; nɔmɔ ni minɔɔ nɛɛ, jeee kɔɔyɔɔ mikɛnɔɔ; shi moŋ migbalaa mi diɛŋtsɛ migbɔmɔtso lɛ mai ni miyeɔ lɛ nyɔŋ, koni mi ni mishiɛɔ mitsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ, mi diɛŋtsɛ lɛ akashɛ mi afɔ.”—1 Korintobii 9:24-27.
27 Ni amɛkɛ klala kpakpa fee atadei kakadaji amɛhã Aaron kɛ ebihii lɛ,+ nilolɔ ko kɛ mamaloo tsɔne lo, 28 kɛ klala kpakpa yitsofiinɔ lɛ,+ kɛ Aaron bihii lɛ ayitsofiinii* fɛfɛji+ ni akɛ klala kpakpa fee lɛ, kɛ nikai+ ni akɛ klala ni alo lɛ jogbaŋŋ fee lɛ, 29 kɛ mliteŋfiinɔ ni akɛ klala ni alo lɛ jogbaŋŋ kɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa, ní alo fɛɛ kɛtsa fee lɛ, tamɔ bɔ ni Yehowa fã Mose lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Kɛ́ misusu be ni eho lɛ he lɛ, mináa miishɛɛ; ni kɛ misusu wɔsɛɛ be yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ shishi lɛ he lɛ, mináa miishɛɛ babaoo.
Ewie akɛ: “Miida Yehowa, ni ji jeŋ muu fɛɛ Nɔyelɔ lɛ shi akɛ, yɛ Yesu kpɔmɔ afɔle lɛ hewɔ lɛ, wekukpaa kpakpa ebakã mi kɛ lɛ teŋ, ni eŋɔɔ minaa akɛ miigba mɛi egbɛ́i ni yɔɔ nyam lɛ he sane.”
Mikɛ mihe wooo ta lɛ mli nakai beaŋ, ni mikɛ mihe woŋ tawuu mli amrɔ nɛɛ hu, ejaakɛ Kristofonyo ji mi ni mikɛ mihe wooo maŋ saji amli.”
No hewɔ lɛ, beni mibi gbɛ koni aha mana kojolɔ lɛ, mibi mihe akɛ, ‘Ani miifee nii yɛ nilee mli, aloo miitsɔ kootsɛ naa?’
Yehowa wie akɛ: “Nɔ ni mima lɛ, mi nɔŋŋ mikumɔɔ nɛɛ, ni nɔ ni mitɛo lɛ, mi nɔŋŋ mifamɔɔ nɛɛ, ni nakai ji shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ.”

Miyɛ miishɛɛ ejaakɛ yɛ da ni mida lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, mihe baanyɛ aba sɛɛnamɔ kɛha Yehowa.”

Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, wɔmiiwo nyɛmimɛi hii fɛɛ ni abaptisi amɛ lɛ hewalɛ koni amɛpɛi amɛshihilɛ mli ekoŋŋ amɛkwɛ, ni amɛbi amɛhe akɛ, ‘Kɛ́ mijeee asafoŋ sɔɔlɔ loo onukpa lɛ, mɛni hewɔ?’
Ekɛɛ Herode akɛ: “Maŋtsɛ Agripa, eŋɔɔ minaa akɛ mibajie minaa ŋmɛnɛ yɛ ohiɛ, yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni Yudafoi lɛ folɔɔ minaa yɛ he lɛ hewɔ, ejaakɛ ole Yudafoi lɛ agbɛnaa nii lɛ kɛ ŋwanejee saji lɛ fɛɛ mli pɛpɛɛpɛ.”—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 26:1-3.

“Amrɔ nɛɛ ni mibɛ skul ni awɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ mli dɔŋŋ lɛ, mina miishɛɛ akɛ minyɛɔ miyaa kpeei lɛ fɛɛ, mikɛ mihe woɔ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli, ni mikɛ weku lɛ mli bii krokomɛi lɛ naa daa gbi ŋmalɛ lɛ hesusumɔ mli ŋɔɔmɔ.
Ni kɛji miyɛ gbalɛ, ni minaa teemɔ nii fɛɛ naa, ni mile nii fɛɛ, ni kɛji miyɛ hemɔkɛyeli fɛɛ hu, bɔ ni manyɛ gɔji matsirɛ, shi mibɛ suɔmɔ lɛ, jikulɛ mijeee nɔ ko.
Be fɛɛ be ni mɔ ko baabi mi bɔ ni miyɔɔ lɛ, mihãa hetoo akɛ, “Mi nɔŋŋ nɛ, mihiɛ mli lolo!”
Ni kɛji miyɛ gbalɛ, ni minaa teemɔŋ nii fɛɛ naa, ni mile nii fɛɛ, ni kɛji miyɛ hemɔkɛyeli fɛɛ hu, bɔ ni manyɛ gɔji matsirɛ, shi mibɛ suɔmɔ lɛ, jikulɛ mijeee nɔ ko.
(1 Korintobii 15:24) Kɛ́ otee nɔ okɛ anɔkwayeli nyiɛ Kristo sɛɛ lɛ, obaaná jɔɔmɔi ni nɔ bɛ ni ojwɛŋmɔ tete nyɛŋ ashɛ he—no ji “Nyɔŋmɔ bii lɛ anunyam heyeli lɛ”!
Simeon he abifao lɛ efɔ ekpɔkɔiaŋ, jeee ni eke lɛ nii, dabi, shi moŋ ni ejɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, akɛ: “Agbɛnɛ, Nuntsɔ Maŋtsɛ, ooha otsulɔ aya yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli yɛ owiemɔ naa; ejaakɛ mihiŋmɛii ena nɔ ni obaatsɔ nɔ ohere yiwala ni ofee lɛ klalo oma gbɔmɛi fɛɛ hiɛ lɛ.” — Luka 2: 25-32, NW.
Kɛ́ okase Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii ni ofee onii yɛ ekɛ gbeekpamɔ naa lɛ, no lɛ, eba akɛ ooofata mɛi ni Yehowa ejɔɔ amɛ lɛ ahe, ni oya nɔ ‘oye nii kpakpai amli ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ odeŋmegbomɔ fɛɛ mli.’—Jajelɔ 3:13.
ANI Nyɔŋmɔ baaha oná nii kɛ́ oyeɔ lɛ anɔkwa?
+ 10 Hã lɛ nii tswaa,+ ni kaahã* lɛ nii kɛ mligbigbilimɔ, ejaakɛ enɛ hewɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baajɔɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni ofeɔ kɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni otsuɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ.
13:5) Eba akɛ, daa gbi lɛ obaakpɛ oyiŋ yɛ nilee mli koni Nyɔŋmɔ ajɔɔ bo kɛya naanɔ. —Nyɛkanea Hebribii 10:38, 39.
Ani onáŋ nitsumɔ ni akɛsaa nii ekoŋŋ nɛɛ he miishɛɛ, titri lɛ kɛ ole akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ miijɔɔ omɔdɛŋbɔi anɔ?
Bɔ pɛ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ejɔɔ bo lɛ, nakai ohã lɛ.
Moŋ ha lɛ, ni kaaha edɔo yɛ otsui mli akɛ oha lɛ; ejaakɛ nɛkɛ nii nɛɛ hewɔ lɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, aaajɔɔo yɛ onitsumɔi fɛɛ [mli].”
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa fã Israelbii ni yeɔ gbi jurɔ nɛɛ akɛ: “Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ejɔɔo yɛ onibaanii fɛɛ mli kɛ onine naa nitsumɔ fɛɛ mli; no hewɔ lɛ omii ashɛ ohe jogbaŋŋ.”
Nii pii ni mɔ ko yɔɔ loo heloonaa ogbɔjɔ shihilɛ jeee nɔ ko kwraa kɛ́ akɛto bɔ ni wɔbaanu he wɔha kɛ́ mɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ ewo lɛ Kojolɔ lɛ kɛɛ wɔ akɛ: “Nyɛbaa, nyɛ mɛi ni mitsɛ ejɔɔ nyɛ, nyɛbaŋɔa maŋtsɛyeli lɛ ni asaa ato nyɛ” lɛ he lɛ.
Nyɛmi yoo ko ni kɛ anɔkwayeli esɔmɔ Yehowa lɛ wie akɛ: “Kɛ́ ogba mɛi nibii kpakpai ni Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ baafee ehã adesai lɛ, onaa faŋŋ akɛ amɛbɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ ko kwraa, ni amɛsusuɔ akɛ amɛnaagbai lɛ baahi shi kɛya naanɔ.”
Shi ohã gbɔ kɛ gbekɛ ni bɛ tsɛ kɛ yoo okulafo,+ koni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ajɔɔ bo yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni ofeɔ lɛ mli.
Kɛ́ ekolɛ, ooye mɔ hee ko ni yɔɔ wiemɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ lɛ odase loo ooha wiemɔ yɛ asafo lɛ mli lɛ, kɛ́ oowie Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli jɔɔmɔi lɛ ahe lɛ, tsɔɔmɔ nɔ ni enɛ tsɔɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ní kɛ nakai shiwoi lɛ ha lɛ he.
Ni miisumɔ koni makɛɛ amɛ kɛjɛ mitsui mli tɔ̃ɔ akɛ, Eba akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ aaaye abua nyɛ ni ejɔɔ nyɛ.”
Abaanyɛ ana enɛ yɛ Mose wiemɔi ni ekɛ Israel maŋ lɛ wie lɛ mli: “Mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, . . . ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe.”
Nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ akutso lɛ mli bii ŋma mi ni amɛkɛɛ akɛ: “Ofainɛ, wɔmiisumɔ ni oba shia koni obaná wɔ akutso lɛ saamɔ nɔyaa mli gbɛfaŋ nɔ amrɔ nɛɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ miijɔɔ bo lɛ.”
13 Ejaakɛ be ni Nyɔŋmɔ wo Abraham shi lɛ, akɛni Nyɔŋmɔ bɛ mɔ ko ni fe lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ni eeetsɔ enɔ ekã kitã hewɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe kã kitã+ 14 ekɛɛ: “Bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, majɔɔ bo, ni mahã oshwere.”
Kɛ ofee nakai lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baajɔɔ bo hu.
Lɛlɛŋ, kɛ oye lɛ anɔkwa lɛ, yɛ naagbee lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baajɔɔ bo kɛ naanɔ wala yɛ jeŋ hee ni baa lɛ mli.
Nakai nɔŋŋ wɔnaŋ jɔɔmɔ ko kɛjɛŋ Nyɔŋmɔ dɛŋ kɛ́ wɔfã gbɛ kakadaŋŋ kɛtee he ko ni gbatsu yɔɔ, ni enɛ esaŋ ehiɛ po.

Akpɛ́kpɛ́i wiemɔi tamɔ “Zeu osɔfoi” kɛ “Zeu, hulu nyɔŋmɔ lɛ” yɛ blema nibii komɛi ni ana yɛ he ko ni bɛŋkɛ Listra lɛ anɔ.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, adesai po ni efeee toiboo amɛhaaa lɛ lɛ po náa hulu kɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ ni ejɛɔ esuɔmɔ mli ekɛhaa lɛ he sɛɛ!
Agbɛnɛ hu, hulu-nyɔŋmɔ ni halo ebɔle eyitso he yɛ mfoniri ni ana yɛ wolo, The Christians, ní Bamber Gascoigne ŋma ni ana yɛ Capitoline Museum lɛ mli lɛ mli.

(Lala 43:3; Yeremia 31:35; 2 Korintobii 4:6) Ákɛ mɔ ni tamɔɔɔ hulu ni haa esusumai tsakeɔ beni enyiɛɔ kɛyaa, ni eshɛɔ he ni etsoɔ fe fɛɛ shwane lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ hiɔ he ni kpɛɔ fe fɛɛ mli yɛ nii kpakpai ni ekɛhaa lɛ mli.
Lɛ efee hulu koni wɔná la yɛ jetsɛremɔ mli, kɛ nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii hu koni wɔná kane gbɛkɛ.
Wolo ní akɛpɛiɔ saji amli nɛɛ nɔŋŋ kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ oha ehi ojwɛŋmɔ mli akɛ hewalɛ ni kɔɔyɔɔ kɛtswaa, hewalɛ ni nu ní miiho ní atsĩ naa kɛhoɔ shwieɔ shi, hewalɛ ni faai kɛhoɔ, kɛ hewalɛ ni adebɔɔ nibii tamɔ tsei, ŋai ni atsaa yɛ sũ mli, kɛ mu kɛtsoɔ lɛ fɛɛ jɛ hulu la ní shibɔlemɔ ŋulami ní edaa kwraa [ni ji shikpɔŋ] lɛ nine shɛɔ nɔ kɛjɛɔ hulu lɛ ní ekɛ lɛ teŋ jɛkɛmɔ aaafee kilomitai akpekpei 150 lɛ ŋɔɔ lɛ, no baaye abua bo ni onu hewalɛ kpele ni hulu lɛ yɔɔ lɛ shishi.”

E-Tsɛ suɔmɔnaa nii ni ebaafee lɛ he miihia lɛ kwraa fe niyenii ni ebaaye!
Nyɛkayea nɔ ko ni nyɛkanua nɔ ko nyɔɔŋ kɛ shwane gbii etɛ.
4 Yɛ Nu Afua ni ba yɛ Noa wala beaŋ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ŋmɛ adesai agbɛ koni amɛye kooloi shi jeee kooloi alá.
7 Yesu wo ŋaa yɛ Gɔŋ nɔ Shiɛmɔ lɛ mli akɛ: “Nyɛkafea yeyeeye yɛ nyɛwala hewɔ, nɔ ni nyɛaaye kɛ nɔ ni nyɛaanu, aloo nyɛgbɔmɔtso lɛ hewɔ, nɔ ni nyɛaawo.”
Eha amɛkɛ amɛnine ta ehe, kɛkɛ ni ebi akɛ: “Bii, nyɛyɛ niyenii ko lo?”
28 “Shi nyɛji mɛi ni ekpɛtɛ mi+ yɛ mijaramɔ shihilɛi lɛ amli;+ 29 ni mikɛ nyɛ miifee kpaŋmɔ kɛhã maŋtsɛyeli, tamɔ bɔ ni mi-Tsɛ kɛ mi efee kpaŋmɔ lɛ,+ 30 koni nyɛye ni nyɛnu yɛ mikpɔlɔ lɛ he yɛ mi-Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli,+ ni nyɛtara maŋtsɛ sɛii anɔ+ nyɛkojo Israel wekui 12 lɛ.
Taakɛ atsɔɔ mli yɛ 3 Mose 17:10 lɛ, aguɔ mɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ koolooi alá yeli.
Ni amɛyeɔ tooku lɛ mli gwantɛŋhii lɛ kɛ tsinabii* ni eshwishwii lɛ;+
22 Ni akɛni mliki baabu hewɔ lɛ, ebaaye bɔta, ejaakɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baashwɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ baaye bɔta kɛ wo.
Kaimɔ akɛ beni Paulo kɛ mɛi susuɔ niyenii ní mɔ ko baasumɔ akɛ eye lɛ he lɛ, ebɔ enanemɛi Kristofoi lɛ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Nyɛkwɛa ni ahia koni nyɛ hegbɛ nɛɛ akabatsɔ̃ pampi miihã gbedelɔi lɛ.”
No hewɔ ni mikɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: ‘Nyɛteŋ mɔ ko mɔ ko akaye la ko.’”
(1 Mose 2:16, 17) Bɔni afee ni Adam kɛ Hawa aya nɔ aná Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ duromɔ koni ehe aba sɛɛnamɔ kɛha amɛ kɛ weku ní amɛbaaná wɔsɛɛ lɛ, ebaabi ni amɛkaye nakai tso pɔtɛ̃ɛ lɛ nɔ yibii lɛ eko.
Shi kɛlɛ, Daniel kɛ enanemɛi lɛ tswa amɛfai shi yɛ amɛtsui mli akɛ, amɛyeŋ niyenii ni Nyɔŋmɔ Mla ni ekɛha Israel lɛ egu eyeli lɛ eko ní amɛkɛwo amɛhe muji.
5 Nii ni ekpaa lɛ, mɔ ni hɔmɔ yeɔ lɛ lɛ yeɔ,
Jɛmɛ wɔfeɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ yɛ—jɛmɛ wɔyeɔ nii yɛ, jɛmɛ wɔwɔɔ, jɛmɛ wɔjuɔ wɔhe yɛ, ni wɔyaa niiaŋ po yɛ jɛmɛ.
Kadimɔ nɔ ni Paulo wie yɛ niyenii ni etamɔ nɔ ni akɛshã afɔle aha wɔji ní aaaye lɛ he.
(1 Petro 4:17) Ekɛ shiwoo nɛɛ ha amɛ yɛ be mli ni etoɔ egbele lɛ Kaimɔ lɛ, ni ekɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Miito maŋtsɛyeli maha nyɛ taakɛ bɔ ni mi-Tsɛ eto eha mi lɛ, koni nyɛye nii ni nyɛnu yɛ mikpɔlɔŋ lɛ he yɛ mimaŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli, ni nyɛtara sɛii anɔ ni nyɛkojo Israel akutsei nyɔŋma-kɛ-enyɔ lɛ.”—Luka 22:28-30.
26 Anɔkwa, nyɛbaaye nii nyɛbaatɔrɔ,+
“Akolontoi nyɔŋma ni ona lɛ, kɛ kooloo lɛ, amɛaanyɛ ajwamaŋ lɛ, ni amɛaafee lɛ amaŋfɔ, ni amɛaaŋmɛ lɛ yayai, ni amɛaaye eheloo, ni amɛkɛ la aaashã lɛ.”
Taakɛ bɔ ni gbalɛ lɛ jie lɛ kpo yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ, abaashi amɛgbohii lɛ ni afuuu amɛ koni kooloi kɛ loofɔji aye.
Mɛni jɛ mfonirifeemɔŋ oshishibrishi lɛ toiboo ni efee eha fãmɔ akɛ: “Tee shi, ni oye loo babaoo!” lɛ mli ba?
29 “‘Enɛ baafee okadi ahã bo:* Afi nɛɛ, nyɛbaaye nibii ni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛkwɛ̃; ni afi ni ji enyɔ lɛ, nyɛbaaye ŋmaa* ni baakwɛ̃ kɛjɛ nomɛi amli lɛ;+ shi afi ni ji etɛ lɛ, nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ nyɛbaadu nii ni nyɛbaakpa, ni nyɛbaafee wain ŋmɔji ni nyɛbaaye amɛmli yibii lɛ.
Adesa weku muu lɛ fɛɛ yɛ ehɛ mli beni enine shɛ kojomɔ nɔ akɛ: “Ohiɛ latsaa mli oooye nii yɛ, kɛyashi beyinɔ ni oooku osɛɛ kɛaatee shikpɔŋ su mli, ejaakɛ emli ajieo kɛjɛ.
32 Shi ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Miyɛ niyenii ni miyeɔ ni nyɛleee.”
Maŋtsɛ lɛ bi Daniel akɛ: “Ao Daniel, Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛkãalɔ lɛ tsulɔ, ani o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ni osɔmɔɔ lɛ be fɛɛ be lɛ enyɛ ejie bo kɛje jatai lɛ adɛŋ lo?”
(1 Petro 5:8) “Jata” nɛɛ miitao efite wɔmumɔŋ shidaamɔ lɛ, ni tsɔɔ akɛ eetao egbɔjɔ wɔkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ wekukpãa lɛ mli loo ní efite lɛ po.—Lala 7:2, 3; 2 Timoteo 3:12.
David ŋma, yɛ eshihilɛ mli be nɛɛ mli akɛ: “Misusuma yɛ jatai ateŋ . . . gbɔmɛi abii ni amɛnyanyɔji tamɔ akpɔlɔi kɛ gaimlibii.”—Lala 57:5.
(2 Samuel 17:10; Abɛi 28:1) No hewɔ lɛ, jata lɛ damɔ shi kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishemɔ su ni ji ekaafeemɔ yɛ jalɛsaneyeli mli.
Gbi ko, beni Samson nyiɛ gbɛ kɛmiiya he ni Filistibii lɛ yɔɔ lɛ, jata agbo ko wo foi kɛ bolɔmɔ ni ekɛ lɛ abakpe.
Akɛɔ akɛ mɔ fɔŋ lɛ “tamɔ jata” ní woɔ ká koni emɔ nɔ ní etaoɔ lɛ.
(Daniel 3:25) Afii komɛi asɛɛ lɛ, Daniel yaje jatai abu mli yɛ enɔkwayeli lɛ hewɔ.
Daniel ha hetoo akɛ: ‘Nyɔŋmɔ tsu ebɔfo ni ebatsĩmɔ jatai lɛ anaa, no hewɔ lɛ amɛyeee mi awui ko.’
Dabi, amɛyeee emuu, shi anyɛŋ akɛɛ akɛ amɛtamɔ jatai loo kooloi awuiyelɔi ni hiɛ yɔɔ la.
(Yeremia 20:1, 2; 38:6) Ashɛ gbalɔ Daniel hu afɔ̃ jatai abu mli.
(Lala 91:13) Bɔ ni jata tutuaa mɔ tɛ̃ɛ yɛ faŋŋ mli lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ wɔhenyɛlɔi lɛ ekomɛi jieɔ amɛshitee-kɛ-woo kpo faŋŋ kɛtsɔ mlai ní amɛtoɔ gbɛjianɔ ní awoɔ koni akɛtsĩ wɔ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ naa lɛ nɔ.
Papa shwuɔi kɛ mami shwuɔi yɛ, ni papa jatai kɛ mami jatai hu yɛ.
Anihaolɔ sheɔ jata ni yɔɔ agbó lɛ naa lɛ gbeyei (13)
Klɛŋklɛŋ nɔ̃ lɛ tamɔ jata ni yɔɔ fiji, nɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ tamɔ oshishibrishi.
Loo “jata nuu kɛ ekuɛ he tsɔi.”
28 Kɛkɛ ni eyi gbɛ ni eyana gbonyo lɛ kã gbɛ lɛ nɔ ni teji lɛ kɛ jata lɛ damɔ he.
(2 Kronika 29:11) Wɔ Henyɛlɔ, Abonsam lɛ nyiɛ “tamɔ jata ni hũuɔ,” ni eetao ni etsĩ wɔ naa.
No ji akɛ, Satan miifo shi tamɔ “jata ni hũuɔ,” eetao wɔhiɛ ekpata.
No hewɔ lɛ, jatai abu lɛ efeee mɔ ko naakpɛɛ.
(1 Petro 5:8, 9) Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, sɛɛfimɔ ni wɔmumɔŋ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei lɛ kɛhaa lɛ he miihia bɔni afee ni wɔnyɛ wɔdamɔ shi shiŋŋ be mli ni Abonsam tutuaa wɔ tamɔ jata ko ni miihũu lɛ.
‘Amɛye maŋtsɛyelii anɔ kunim, amɛtsimɔ jatai anaa, amɛgbe la hewalɛ, ni amɛje klantei amli.’
Ehere Daniel yiwala ni jatai lɛ kpeee lɛ.’
Maye amɛ yɛ jɛmɛ tamɔ jata;
Ni ebo tamɔ jata akɛ: [Yehowa, NW], jenamɔ nɛɛ fɛɛ lɛ midamɔ buuhe lɛ, ni nyɔɔŋnyɔɔŋ fɛɛ lɛ midamɔ mibuu nɔ.”
Amɛto amɛyiŋ akɛ esa akɛ ashɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baatɔ̃ nɔ lɛ awo jatai abu lɛ mli.
Kɛ́ shihilɛ lɛ mli wa lɛ, mɛɛ kaa weku yitsei baanyɛ amɛkɛkpe?
(2 Mose 24:3-8) Tsɛmɛi tee nɔ amɛsɔmɔ akɛ weku yitsei.
Kɛkɛ ni ekɛɛ yoo lɛ akɛ: “Ja okɛ kpãa ni akɛloɔ nii elo miyiteŋ tsɔi ni agbɔ lɛ kakadaji kpawo lɛ.”
24 Weku sanegbaai hu baanyɛ afee babaoo kɛtsĩ naagbai anaa.
Bɔfo Paulo ŋma akɛ: “Shi miisumɔ akɛ nyɛle akɛ nuu fɛɛ nuu yitso ji Kristo, ni yoo fɛɛ yoo hu yitso ji nuu, ni Kristo yitso ji Nyɔŋmɔ.”
Beni Yesu piŋɔ yɛ sɛŋmɔtso lɛ nɔ lɛ, mɛi jɛ lɛ, ejaakɛ Mateo bɔ amaniɛ akɛ: “Shi mɛi ni hoɔ lɛ wie musubɔɔ wiemɔ amɛshi lɛ, ni amɛhoso amɛyitsei, ni amɛkɛɛ: Bo ní okumɔɔ sɔlemɔwe lɛ ni osaa otswaa gbii etɛ lɛ, ohereee bo diɛŋtsɛ oyiwala?
Yɛ afi 33 Ŋ.B., beni Roma yeɔ nɔ lɛ, Satan kɛ nakai kooloo lɛ yitso lɛ tsu nii ni ekɛgbe Nyɔŋmɔ Bi lɛ.
(Filipibii 2:9-11) Kɛ́ wɔkɛ miishɛɛ ba wɔhe shi wɔha Kristo Yesu ni ji wɔ-Hiɛnyiɛlɔ, wɔ-Maŋtsɛ ni yeɔ nɔ, kɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ Yitso lɛ, wɔkɛ no tsɔɔ akɛ wɔbuɔ nibii ni yɔɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ tamɔ bɔ ni Yehowa buɔ amɛ lɛ.—Mateo 23:10; Kolosebii 1:18.
22 Kɛkɛ ni Samuel ŋɔ Saul kɛ esɔɔlɔ lɛ kɛba niyelihe lɛ, ni ehã amɛtara mɛi ni afɔ̃ amɛ nine kɛba lɛ ayitso yɛ okpɔlɔ lɛ he; no mli lɛ, hii aaafee 30 ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ.
Leebi beni amɛfee nibii nɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, nyɛ lɛ kɛ ebi yei lɛ baapele jara lɛ nɔ gbɛ.
(Efesobii 6:11-13; 2 Korintobii 10:4) Nɔ ni Yohane na yɛ amɛyitsei ji nɔ ko tamɔ shika akekerei.
Taakɛ awie kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ, esa akɛ ole he ni oyaa yɛ shihilɛ mli.
Shi yiteŋhaa nɔ he ehiaaa lɛ kɛji eeshiɛ yɛ shia kɛ shia, ejaakɛ gbɛnaa nii akɛ ashiɛ sanekpakpa lɛ ka Kristofoi fɛɛ anɔ.
Ená ni kulɛ eyitsoŋ lɛ nu bu ni, ni ehiŋmɛii hu lɛ nu hiŋmɛii ni, koni ekafɔ̃ɔ yaafo.
Beni Mose tsɛ Israel maŋ lɛ najiaŋdamɔlɔi lɛ fɛɛ kɛkpe lɛ, etsɛ “Israel asafoi lɛ anɔ onukpai lɛ.”
6 Enine abɛku yɛ miyitso shishi,
Lois buɔ ewu ni ji eyitso yɛ Ŋmalɛ naa lɛ waa, ni eesumɔ ni ekɛ lɛ afee ekome; shi kɛlɛ, esumɔɔɔ akɛ eŋmɛɔ Ŋmalɛ mli shishitoo mlai ni ebale lɛ ahe.
(3) Beni ohaa tao ni yitso ji ‘Yesu Shikpɔŋ nɔ Shihilɛ lɛ Mli Saji Otii’ ni aŋma yɛ saneyitso ni ji ‘Jesus Christ’ shishi yɛ Insight on the Scriptures (kɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ “All Scripture Is Inspired of God and Beneficial”) lɛ hu mli lɛ kudɔɔ bo lɛ, kanemɔ saji sɔrɔtoi ni kɔɔ nɔ koome lɛ nɔŋŋ he, ni yɔɔ Sanekpakpai lɛ fãi sɔrɔtoi lɛ amli lɛ fɛɛ ekomekome.
Ŋmalɛi ni aŋmala yɛ tao ni yɔɔ baafa 200 lɛ mli, ni hiɛ yitso akɛ “Gbalɛ” lɛ wieɔ saji ni mli kã shi faŋŋ ni kɔɔ Mesia lɛ he.
LALATSƐ David ŋma akɛ: “Minishaianii lɛ esu mi; amɛtamɔ jatsu tsiŋmoo ni tsii fe mi.
Abɛbua ko ni nilee yɔɔ mli lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Mɔdɛŋbɔlɔ jwɛŋmɔi lɛ, nifálɛ sɔŋŋ ekɛbaa; shi mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni feɔ shɛii lɛ, enɔ̃ lɛ ohia kɛkɛ ni.”
Blema lɛ, efee gbɛtsɔɔmɔi ní aŋmala ashwie shi kɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔi ní akɛha kɛtsɔ wiemɔ nɔ lɛ ekome, kɛtsɔ osɔfoi lɛ kɛ gbalɔi lɛ, kɛ agbɛnɛ, kɛtsɔ weku yitsei anɔ.
“Gbi ko, yɛ March afi 1963 mli lɛ, Paquito jɛ skul eba shia, ni ekɛɛ akɛ eyitso miigba lɛ waa.
Enɔ jetsɛremɔ Hɔgbaa, ni ji Nisan 9 lɛ, Yesu kɛ ekaselɔi lɛ shi Betania ni amɛwó amɛhiɛ amɛwo Yerusalem.
Etsɛ yoo ni jo yɛ Herode okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ lɛ shishi, ní ebi ni aha lɛ Yohane Baptisilɔ lɛ yitso lɛ akɛ Salome.
15 Kɛ wɔɔhi shi akɛ mɛi ni susuɔ nibii kpakpai ahe lɛ, no lɛ yelikɛbuamɔ kome ji ni wɔtsi wɔhe kɛjɛ ‘naanyobɔɔ fɔŋ ni fiteɔ jeŋba kpakpa’ lɛ he.
Naagbee gbii lɛ baaje shishi kɛ sane ko ni baaha sane fɔŋ afa amrɔ nɔŋŋ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ.
Shi kɛlɛ, yɛ bɔ ni shihilɛ lɛ mli wa ha lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa lɛ̀ wɔ.
15 Yɛ miyaka wala gbii nɛɛ amli lɛ,+ mina nɔ fɛɛ nɔ—kɛjɛ jalɔ ni hiɛ kpãtãa yɛ ejalɛ nifeemɔ lɛ mli+ lɛ nɔ kɛyashi mɔ fɔŋ ni hiɔ shi be kplaŋŋ yɛ efɔŋ ni efeɔ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ nɔ.
Gbi fɛɛ gbi nɔ efɔŋ lɛ fá ha lɛ.”—Mateo 6:33, 34.
“Nyɛnyɛ̃a nɔ̃ fɔŋ, ní nyɛsumɔa nɔ̃ kpakpa, ní nyɛhaa jalɛ saneyeli adamɔa shi yɛ koi shi.”
35 Be ni amɛyɔɔ amɛmaŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli ni amɛnáa ekpakpa ni ofee amɛ waa lɛ he sɛɛ, ni amɛyɔɔ shikpɔŋ agbo ni baa nii ni okɛhã amɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ, amɛsɔmɔɔɔ bo+ ni amɛtsiii amɛhe kɛjeee nibii fɔji ni amɛfeɔ lɛ hu ahe.
(2) Mɛi ni wɔkɛsharaa lɛ náa wɔnɔ hewalɛ yɛ gbɛ kpakpa loo gbɛ gbonyo nɔ; ni enɛ ji anɔkwa sane ni anyɛŋ aje he ŋwane.
5 Nɔkwɛmɔnii pii yɛ Biblia lɛ mli ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni mɛi komɛi ná mɛi krokomɛi anɔ hewalɛ gbonyo.
Naanyobɔɔ fɔŋ baanyɛ ‘atsi wɔ gbɛ ní wɔkabo anɔkwale lɛ toi’ loo wɔkɛkatsu nii.
Wɔyɛ nitsumɔ ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ ni esa akɛ wɔtsu yɛ jeŋ ni emli eyi obɔ kɛ efɔŋfeemɔ ni teɔ shi ewoɔ anɔkwa jamɔ lɛ mli.—Lala 92:8; Mateo 24:14; Kpojiemɔ 12:17.
Mɛni hewɔ nibii fɔji baa mɛi kpakpai anɔ?
Wɔɔfee nilelɔi kɛ́ wɔkase nii kɛjɛ amɛnifeemɔi gbohii lɛ amli ní wɔtsi wɔhe kɛjɛ wɔhenɔjɔɔmɔ kɛha Yehowa lɛ mli ni wɔɔku.—1 Korintobii 10:11.
Kɛkɛ ni ŋwɛibɔfo kome tsɔ bɔfo fɔŋ.
(1 Korintobii 15:33) Weku shihilɛ baanyɛ ahi kɛ́ wɔkɛ hiɛshikamɔ bu shishitoo mla nɛɛ akɛ eji anɔkwale kɛji naanyobɔɔ fɔŋ lɛ yɛ heloo mli loo yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔ mli lɛ.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Yehowa haa mi mihiamɔ nii, ewoɔ mi hewalɛ, ni ehaa mikpɛɔ miyiŋ yɛ nilee mli.
Beni Potifar ŋa lɛ ka Yosef koni ekɛ ehe awo bɔlɛnamɔ jeŋba shara mli lɛ, ekɛ shiŋŋfeemɔ kpoo ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni mafee efɔŋ kpeteŋkpele ni tamɔ nɛkɛ nɛɛ, ni mafee esha mashi Nyɔŋmɔŋ?”
Ekɛɛ akɛ, amɛjeŋba gbonyo lɛ baaha mɛi ‘awie anɔkwale gbɛ lɛ he musubɔɔ wiemɔi.’
Ehiii kwraa akɛ Ortodɔks Sɔlemɔ feɔ tamɔ oblaŋ ni wɔɔ”!
No mli lɛ sane fɔŋ ji nɔ ko ni aleee, anuko dã.
(Yesaia 29:13) Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni amɛaafee nii yɛ ekpakpafeemɔ he tɛi ni Nyɔŋmɔ efolɔ eshwie shi lɛ kɛ gbeekpamɔ naa lɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhe bɔi efɔŋ mli woo.
3 Beni Nyɔŋmɔ bi Israel Maŋtsɛ Salomo nɔ̃ jɔɔmɔ ni etaoɔ lɛ, nɔyelɔ ni edako nɛɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Ha otsulɔ toiboo tsui, ni mikɛkojo omaŋ lɛ, koni mayoo nɔ ni hi kɛ nɔ ni ehiii.”
Shi enɛ ehiii.
Mɛi babaoo susuɔ akɛ nilee yɛ mli akɛ amɛaafó amɛ pɛ amɛnɔ̃ mli, ni amɛkpoo Nyɔŋmɔ mla lɛ, shi bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, amɛbaakpa yibii gbohii.—Gal.
Gbalɛ lɛ yaa nɔ akɛ: “Aaaba mli akɛ nakai be lɛ mli lɛ mikɛ kanei aaakpa Yerusalem, ni mawo gbɔmɛi ni jwere amɛshishi atutru lɛ hiɛ lɛ anyɔmɔ, mɛi ni kɛɔ yɛ amɛtsui mli akɛ: ‘Yehowa efeŋ ekpakpa, ni esaa efeŋ efɔŋ hu!’ lɛ.
+ Kɛ́ Saul na nuu ko ni he wa loo nuu kãkãlɔ ko lɛ, ekɛ lɛ fataa esraafoi lɛ ahe.
Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ baajwara nɔyelii fɛɛ ni adesa to shishi lɛ wɔtsɔwɔtsɔ, ni ebaatsɔ nɔyeli pɛ ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
Akɛni eboteko gbalashihilɛ mli hewɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni enɛ aaaba mliŋ, akɛni mileee nuu nɛɛ?”
Abonsam kɛ amanehului srɔtoi ba nuu anɔkwafo lɛ nɔ bɔni afee ni no aha ekpa Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ.
+ 4 Be ni je etsɛre nɛɛ, esa akɛ wɔtsu mɔ ni tsu mi lɛ nitsumɔi;+ je baana, ni mɔ ko mɔ ko nyɛŋ nii atsu.
Jeŋ yinɔsane maa Biblia mli anɔkwa sane ko nɔ mi akɛ adesai nyɛŋ aye amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛhe nɔ kɛ omanyeyeli; afii akpei abɔ sɔŋŋ nɛ ni “gbɔmɔ yeɔ enaanyo gbɔmɔ nɔ ni ekɛyeɔ ehe awui!”
Ekolɛ amalelɔ baaye ehe kɛyashi be ko ni ayooo esɛɛ, shi susumɔ ewɔsɛɛ he okwɛ.
David tsɔɔ bɔ ni enuɔ he ehaa lɛ yɛ Lala 8: 4, 5 akɛ: “Kɛ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ ni ji owaobii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ: Mɛni ji adesa ni ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? aloo gbɔmɔ bi ni osaraa lɛ po?”
Beni wɔyi enyɔ lɛ wɔshiɔ shwapo lɛ mli lɛ, wɔkɛ oblanyo ko ni he yɔɔ miishɛɛ waa ni eta baisikel ni ejɛ nitsumɔ eeya shia lɛ kpe.
Agbɛnɛ, nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ nɔŋŋ, eeenyɛ efee akɛ be ni aye Hehoo niyenii lɛ atã lɛ, etsɛ David gbalɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ayisɛɛ ekɛɛ: “Mi diɛŋtsɛ mishieŋtsɛ po ni miheɔ lɛ miyeɔ, mɔ ni yeɔ midɛŋ ŋmaa lɛ, efã enane eshi mi.”
Ani hiɛshikalɔ kome folo po bɛ nyɛteŋ ni baanyɛ enyɛmimɛi ateŋ ekojo?
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, hii baabu amɛyitsoyeli lɛ he akɔntaa amɛha Kristo kɛ mɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ.
The Encyclopedia of Religion lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ, mɛi ni to jamɔi ni ji Buddha jamɔ, Kristojamɔ kɛ Islam jamɔi lɛ ashishi lɛ hiɛ susumɔi srɔtoi yɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi ahe, shi wolo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Jamɔi nɛɛ ahe yinɔsaji krokomɛi tsɔɔ akɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi kɛ saji ni kɔɔ nifeemɔi nɛɛ ahe lɛ ji adesai ajamɔ mli hemɔkɛyelii lɛ amli fã titri ko.”
Yesu bɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Nakai mɔ ni bɔɔ jwetri ehaa lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe, shi ejeee niiatsɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ yɔɔ.” —Luka 12: 16-21.
Odaakɛlɛo yashɛ jɛmɛ klɛŋklɛŋ, “ni kɛjɛ no nɔ kɛbaa nɛɛ gbɔmɔ ko ejoko gbele naa foi.”
Nuu ni atsɛɔ lɛ Hiob kɛ amanehulu ni mli wa waa kpe.
16 Nuu loo yoo, gbekɛ nuu loo gbekɛ yoo ni feɔ enii loo esaa ehe yɛ gbɛ ni teeɔ bɔlɛnamɔ shi nɔ lɛ kɛ woo haŋ anɔkwa nuufeemɔ loo yoofeemɔ, ni eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ ewooo Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ nyam.
Eji Nyɔŋmɔ le, ni etsɔ hiɛ ejaje Adam shigbeemɔ kɛmiibote esha mli momo kulɛ, ebaafee mɔ ni kɛ esha ba beni efee gbɔmɔ lɛ, ni kulɛ Yehowa baafee mɔ ni adesai fɛɛ anɔ fɔŋ feemɔ lɛ he gbɛnaanii baakã enɔ diɛŋtsɛ.
Mɛni ji wiemɔ “wɔŋɔ [efɔŋfeelɔ lɛ] wɔwo satan dɛŋ, koni eheloo lɛ hiɛ akpata, ni ahere mumɔ lɛ yiwala” lɛ shishi?
Ehe miihia ni nuu lɛ ale nɔ ni Kristofoi aweku yitso ni eeeji lɛ tsɔɔ.
3, 4. (a) Yɛ sũ ni ekɛbɔ gbɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ, mɛni Nyɔŋmɔ ekpɛɛɛ eyiŋ akɛ eba?
Nakai nɔŋŋ dani abaakpata Sodom kɛ Gomora maji lɛ ahiɛ lɛ, Lot shaahii lɛ na lɛ akɛ “etamɔ mɔ ni yeɔ fɛo.”—1 Mose 19:14.
Agbala mi-skul tsɔɔlɔi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome—ni hi—kɛtsɔ gbɛjegbɛi anɔ tamɔ efɔŋ feelɔ ko.
35 Nakai nuu lɛ ji kane ni tsoɔ ni kpɛɔ, ni nyɛshwe be kukuoo akɛ nyɛmii ashɛ nyɛhe babaoo yɛ ela lɛ mli.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Bɔ ni Noa gbii lɛ fee lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ be ni gbɔmɔ Bi lɛ eba [loo, naagbee gbii] lɛ hu baatamɔ.
Paulo wo ŋaa akɛ: ‘Nyɛhaa nyɛwiemɔ he abaa nyam daa, ni ŋoo ahi mli, ní nyɛle bɔ ni sa akɛ nyɛhaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ hetoo.’
+ Eji ŋoo kpaŋmɔ* ni kã shi daa yɛ Yehowa hiɛ kɛhã bo kɛ oshwiei ni kɛ bo yɔɔ lɛ.”
Yɛ Anaigbɛ maji lɛ amli lɛ, bei pii lɛ abuɔ apasa hemɔkɛyelii akɛ eji nɔ ko ni haa mɔ yiŋ feɔ lɛ kɔshikɔshi.
Bɔfo Paulo ŋma akɛ: “Nyɛhaa nyɛwiemɔ he abaa nyam daa, ni ŋoo ahi mli.”
• Ŋoo ni aaajɛ odɛŋ ashwie lɛ kɛ shade fɔŋ baa ja afɔ̃ ehenɔ mulumulu ashwie abɛku kɔŋ lɛ nɔ dã
“Nyɛhaa nyɛwiemɔ he abaa nyam daa, ni ŋoo ahi mli, ní nyɛle bɔ ni sa akɛ nyɛhaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ hetoo.”—Kolosebii 4:6.
“Nyɛhaa nyɛwiemɔ he abaa nyam daa, ni ŋoo ahi mli.”—KOLOSEBII 4:6.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, “ŋoo kpaŋmɔ” lɛ tsɔɔ gbeekpamɔ ko ni baahi shi daa.
4 Kɛ́ wɔkɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli, mɛi ni bɛ mli, loo wɔweku lɛ mlibii po miiwie lɛ, esa akɛ wɔkɛ bɔfo Paulo ŋaawoo nɛɛ atsu nii: “Nyɛhaa nyɛwiemɔ he abaa nyam daa, ni ŋoo ahi mli.”
F9 Ŋoo Ŋshɔ
11 Kɛkɛ ni Amazia fee ekãa ni enyiɛ esraafoi lɛ ahiɛ kɛtee Ŋoo Jɔɔ+ lɛ mli, ni eyagbe hii ni jɛ Seir lɛ ateŋ mɛi 10,000.
Shishigbɛ: Moab, aakwɛ kɛmiijɛ Ŋoo Ŋshɔ lɛ naa kɛmiiya Yuda ŋa kpataa lɛ nɔ gbɛ
Kɛ́ akɛ mlihilɛ wo ŋaa lɛ, ehaa mɔ ni awoɔ lɛ ŋaa lɛ nuɔ he akɛ ayɛ bulɛ kɛha lɛ, ni ewaaa akɛ ekɛaatsu nii.—Kolosebii 4:6.
Etsɔɔ minitii abɔ ni esa akɛ lòo aye yɛ nu mli, bɔ ni esa akɛ aka yɛ tso tɛtrɛɛ nɔ aha, ŋoo daramɔ ni esa akɛ akɛshwã nɔ, kɛ agbɛnɛ shii abɔ ni esa akɛ afɔ he yɛ nu ŋanii mli.
Ɛ10 Ŋoo Ŋshɔ (Ŋshɔ ni Egbo)
No hewɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ woɔ ŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛhaa nyɛwiemɔ he abaa nyam daa, ni ŋoo ahi mli, ni nyɛle bɔ ni sa akɛ nyɛhaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ hetoo.”
(Efesobii 5:22, 23) Wiemɔi ni yɔɔ nyam, ni ‘ŋoo yɔɔ mli lɛ,’ yeɔ ebuaa ni ehaa saji ni baanyɛ atsɔ bei lɛ anɔ gbɔɔ kwraa.—Kolosebii 4:6; Abɛi 15:1.
“Wɔteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ nine shɛɔ abele mamu falɛ aaashɛ kɔɔpoi 3, apatramɔ kɔɔpoo kome, yɔɔ gram 20, nihoomɔ fɔ niyeli awalei 2, kɛ ŋoo gram 10 nɔ.
Kɛtsɔ wɔhe ni wɔkɛaafɔ Yehowa nɔ kɛ wiemɔi ni sa ni wɔkɛaatsu nii lɛ nɔ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛ Paulo ŋaawoo lɛ atsu nii akɛ: “Nyɛhaa nyɛwiemɔ he abaa nyam daa, ni ŋoo ahi mli, ni nyɛle bɔ ni sa akɛ nyɛhaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ hetoo.”—Kolosebii 4:6.
Kɛ gbekɛbii ji wɔ jio, wɔdara jio, esa akɛ wɔha ‘wɔwiemɔ he aba nyam be fɛɛ be, ni ŋoo ahi mli, koni wɔle bɔ ni sa akɛ wɔhaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ hetoo.’—Kolosebii 4:6.
Maŋtsɛ lɛ hã Ezra ‘nibii fɛɛ ní etaoɔ’ kɛhã Yehowa shĩa lɛ —shika, jwiɛtɛi, ŋmãa, wain, mu, kɛ ŋoo, ni kɛ́ aabu fɛɛ naa ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, efeɔ Amerika dɔlai 100,000,000
Kɛ́ nyɛha ŋoo hi nyɛwiemɔ mli jogbaŋŋ,
9:36, 37) Enɛ baatsɛŋe mɛi ni wɔkɛtsuɔ nii lɛ.
+ Yiteŋ fɛɛ yiteŋ kpa, kɔɔŋ fɛɛ kɔɔŋ nɔ kpɔlɔ.
‘Hemɔ hiŋmɛi tsofa yɛ miŋɔɔ ni okɛfɔ ohiŋmɛii anɔ, koni ona nii’
Beni ekɛ enine shwishwiaa emusu nɔ lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Bei komɛi lɛ hɔmɔ yeɔ miweku lɛ, shi miisumɔ ni mikɛ nɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni miyɔɔ lɛ aha Nyɔŋmɔ, ní afɔle ni ebaabi ni mashã lɛ kɔɔɔ he eko.”
Esaaa akɛ wɔ hu wɔnáa wɔnanemɛi jálɔi ahe jwɛŋmɔ fɔŋ kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛni ekolɛ amɛfeŋ nii yɛ gbɛ ni wɔtaoɔ nɔ lɛ hewɔ, aloo akɛni amɛsubaŋ loo bɔ ni amɛji lɛ haa wɔmli fuɔ hewɔ.
Ewaaa akɛ amɛsui gbohii lɛ aaaná wɔnɔ hewalɛ, ni eha wɔmli afu.
Tsofafeemɔ ni baaha akwɛ nii jogbaŋŋ yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ yɛ ŋaawoo lɛ mli: ‘Hémɔ hiŋmɛi tsofa kɛjɛ Yesu ŋɔɔ ni okɛfɔ ohiŋmɛii anɔ, koni ona nii.’
Yesu kɛɛ: ‘Hémɔ hiŋmɛi tsofa ni okɛfɔ ohiŋmɛii nɔ koni ona nii.’
Kɛji akɛ fɔlɔi ye amɛhe anɔkwa lɛ, ewaaa kwraa akɛ amɛbii lɛ aaakase su nɛɛ.
Amɛsubaŋi lɛ baaná onɔ hewalɛ, ni taakɛ amɛji lɛ, bo hu onaŋ bulɛ kɛhaŋ ohe.
Yɛ káwoo be lɛ mli lɛ, Babilon asraafoi lɛ ayiteŋ “kpá” yɛ bɔ ni amɛtawuu faii lɛ shɔɔ amɛyiteŋ lɛ hewɔ, ni amɛkɔ̃ɔji anɔ ‘kpɔlɔ,’ yɛ nibii ní amɛkɛwo maŋ lɛ he ká, ní amɛtereɔ yɛ amɛkɔ̃ɔji anɔ lɛ hewɔ.
Beni Odasefonyo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Joseph tee fũu ko ni tamɔ nɛkɛ shishi lɛ, akɛɛ lɛ akɛ, esa akɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ fɛɛ kɛ baai komɛi afɔ amɛdɛ̃ ni amɛkɛ tsofa lɛ akpa amɛ tsitsi nɔ.
Bei komɛi lɛ, akɛ tɛ ko shɔɔ wolokpo lɛ naabui koni efee trotro, kɛkɛ lɛ akɛ kɔla ekpa naa.
Aloo amɛkɛ amɛfɔmɔ nii lɛ po baashwishwia onɔ̃ he.
Eyɛ mli eeenyɛ efee anɔkwale akɛ nii anɔ ni ajwɛŋɔ yɛ dioofeemɔ mli taakɛ afeɔ yɛ sɔlemɔ mli lɛ baanyɛ ajie nɔnyɛɛ kɛya moŋ, shi abaanyɛ awie nakai nɔŋŋ yɛ adebɔɔ naa gbɛɛmɔi komɛi ni aaabo toi loo mɔ kotosɛɛ po ni agbɔleɔ lɛ ahe.
Wɔbihii lɛ kɛ mɛi ni sumɔɔ Yehowa lɛ ebɔ kɛjɛ amɛgbekɛbiiashi, ni amrɔ nɛɛ amɛyɔse akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ ji shihilɛ gbɛ ni haa mɔ náa miishɛɛ.”
Ká ni Nebukadnezar asraafoi lɛ yawo yɛ maŋtiase ni ji Tiro lɛ he lɛ mli wa, ni amɛtsu nii dɛŋdɛŋ aahu akɛ amɛyiteŋ kpa yɛ fai ni amɛbumɔ ní shɔɔ amɛyiteŋ lɛ hewɔ, ni tsumaa he nibii ni amɛkɛmamɔ amɛkɔ̃ji anɔ kɛyamamɔ mɔ̃ji kɛ afabaŋi lɛ ha amɛkɔ̃ji anɔ kpɔlɔ.—Ezekiel 26:7-12.
Kɛkɛ lɛ, akɛ ashwãifeemɔ tsofa ko ekpa he ni afolɔ lɛ mli, ni akɛɔ wiemɔi komɛi, kɛkɛ lɛ asusuɔ akɛ mɔ lɛ eye ehe kɛjɛ julɔi atutuamɔ mli.
17 Ejaakɛ okɛɔ akɛ: “Niiatsɛ ji mi+ ni miyɛ nii ni nɔ ko nɔ ko ehiaaa mi,” shi oleee akɛ ooye awerɛho ni onii hu yɛ mɔbɔ ni ohiafo kɛ shwilafo kɛ mɔ ni hiɛ ehe folo ji bo, 18 miiwo bo ŋaa akɛ ohé shika tsuru ni atsuu he yɛ la mli yɛ miŋɔɔ koni otsɔ niiatsɛ, kɛ atadei yɛji koni owo ni ohe akakã folo ni ana ohiɛgbele lɛ,+ kɛ hiŋmɛi tsofa ni okɛkpa ohiŋmɛii anɔ+ koni ona nii.
Amɛnuɔ “tsofai” ni akɛɛ ehiɛ ŋkunyaayeli hewalɛ loo amɛkɛkpaa amɛgbɔmɔtsei ahe.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ekolɛ wɔle bɔ ni esa akɛ wɔfee wɔnii wɔha kɛ́ wɔnyaaa nyɛmi nuu ko nifeemɔ ko he.
Kwɛ mɔbɔ sane ni eeeji kɛ́ nakai subaŋi lɛ ekomɛi aaasa wɔhe!
Yɛ hekawoo be lɛ mli lɛ, asraafoi lɛ ‘ayiteŋ kpá’ yɛ amɛ dadefaii ni kpɔlɔ amɛyiteŋ lɛ hewɔ, ni amɛkɔ̃ɔji anɔ hu ‘kpɔlɔ’ yɛ nibii ni amɛkɛwo ka lɛ teremɔ hewɔ.
Bei komɛi lɛ, eshwɛɔ miniji ahe.
13 Yesu bɔ nakai Laodikeabii lɛ kɔkɔ waa akɛ: “Ohe . . . atadei yɛji, koni owo ni oyayaiaŋ hiɛgbele lɛ akakã shi, kɛ hiŋmɛi tsofa ni okɛfɔ ohiŋmɛii, koni ona nii.”
Kɛ nɛkɛ sane lɛ ji yɛ okutso lɛ mli lɛ, ani obaanyɛ otsake bei ni okɛyasaraa amɛ lɛ mli kɛya leebi beni je etsɛre saŋŋ aloo kɛyaa shwane mli po?
Beni aha wiemɔ krɛdɛɛ lɛ agbe naa Hɔgbaa leebi yɛ stediɔm ko lɛ, nyɛmimɛi babaoo nyiɛ kɛbakwɛ Betel hee lɛ.
Bei komɛi lɛ, Yesu teɔ shi ‘maŋkɛ mra, beni je tsɛreko’ bɔni afee ni esɔle.
Shi kɛlɛ, gbi ko leebi lɛ, wɔkpɛ wɔyiŋ akɛ wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔbaaya shiɛmɔ.
Enɔ jetsɛremɔ lɛ, wɔbi obalayoo ko kɛji ele he ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔna kuu lɛ asraafoi anitsumɔ he yitso lɛ yɛ.
Aaafee leebi ŋmɛji enumɔ kɛ fã, ni ji minitii fioo ko dani shikpɔŋ hosomɔ lɛ baashɛ jɛmɛ lɛ, Kunihito shi shia kɛtee enitsumɔ ni ekɛ be fã tsuɔ lɛ.
Sanegbaa lɛ tee nɔ kɛyashi enɔ jetsɛremɔ leebi maŋkpa.
Gbi fɛɛ gbi kɛ́ ote shi lɛ, onuɔ he akɛ oyɛ jogbaŋŋ, ni ofee klalo kɛha gbi lɛ mli nitsumɔi lɛ.
Leebi mra;
Akɛ wiemɔ krɛdɛɛ ni hiɛ saneyitso akɛ, “Jiemɔ Yehowa—Mɔ ni Feɔ Naakpɛɛ Nibii lɛ Yi” lɛ mu leebi gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ naa.
Amɛshiɔ Douala aaafee leebi ŋmɛji ekpaa kɛ́ hulu je nɔŋŋ, bɔni afee ni amɛfo maŋ wulu nɛɛ ni atoko nibii ahe gbɛjianɔ jogbaŋŋ yɛ mli ni tsɔji pii hu nyiɛɔ gbɛjegbɛi lɛ anɔ lɛ dani tsɔji lɛ abɔi gbɛ lɛ nɔ nyiɛmɔ.
3:10) Ha efee oti ni ma ohiɛ akɛ ooohi “Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ Nɔyelɔi” Kpokpaa Wulu nɔ Kpee lɛ shishi kɛjɛ Sohaa leebi wiemɔ lɛ shishijee tɔ̃ɔ kɛyashi Hɔgbaa shwane naagbee sɔlemɔ kɛ “Amen!”
Kɛ atswa leebi ŋmɛji 7:00 lɛ, weku lɛ buaa amɛhe naa yɛ niyeli asa lɛ nɔ kɛhaa daa gbi ŋmalɛ lɛ hesusumɔ loo leebi jamɔ, kɛjɛ Ju kɛyashi Hɔɔ.
Wɔtsuɔ shĩa fɛɛ shĩa nitsumɔ lɛ leebi, kɛkɛ lɛ, wɔyafee Biblia mli nikasemɔi. Bei komɛi lɛ, wɔnyiɛɔ shiɛmɔ nɔ aahu kɛyashi gbɛkɛ ŋmɛlɛ 11.
Nɔ ni akɛgbe leebi kpee lɛ naa ji baptisimɔ wiemɔ—ni be fɛɛ be lɛ eji nɔ titri yɛ Yehowa Odasefoi ahenaabuamɔi wuji ashishi lɛ.
Biblia lɛ haa hetoo akɛ: “Leebi lɛ du odumɔnii lɛ, ni gbɛkɛ hu kaajie onine yɛ he.”
No hewɔ lɛ, wɔjeɔ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ shishi leebi ŋmɛji ekpaa bɔni afee ni wɔnine ashɛ mɛi anɔ yɛ amɛshĩai.
Beni eji obalanyo fioo lɛ, no mli lɛ Hirohisa kɛ shika yeɔ buaa eweku lɛ kɛtsɔɔ shi ni eteɔ maŋkɛ ŋmɛji etɛ koni eyahɔɔ adafitswaa woji nɔ.
Bei pii lɛ, wɔtsuɔ nii waa kɛjɛɔ leebi kɛyashiɔ gbɛkɛ kɛfoɔ nu, ni wɔfɔɔ wɔtadei ahe yɛ nɛkɛ paipii nɛɛ anaa.
+ 2 Ni ehere nɔ ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ shɛ gbɛkɛnaashi lɛ, nyɛkɛɔ akɛ, ‘Nugbɔ enɛŋ, ejaakɛ ŋwɛi etsu,’ 3 ni leebi lɛ nyɛkɛɔ akɛ, ‘Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, jeŋ baajɔ ni nugbɔ baanɛ ejaakɛ ŋwɛi etsu, shi ehiɛ eha.’
Sohaa Leebi, Nisan 14
Leebi ko lɛ, ni anu tu tswiamɔ he yɛ maŋtiase lɛ mli.
19 Kɛkɛ ni amɛte shi leebi maŋkpa ni amɛyakoto shi yɛ Yehowa hiɛ.
Tsɛ ko, ni ji Kristofonyo onukpa ni yɔɔ bii 11 lɛ teɔ shi leebi mra ni ekɛ amɛteŋ mɛi pii kaseɔ nii dani eshiɔ kɛyaa nitsumɔ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ nɔ ni Odasefoi babaoo fɔɔ feemɔ ji amɛhe ni amɛkɛwoɔ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli yɛ shia kɛ shia yɛ Hɔgbaa leebi mli moŋ, shi hei komɛi yɛ ni amɛnaa akɛ mɛi ashiai ni amɛyaa leebi mra lɛ mɔɔɔ shi jogbaŋŋ, ejaakɛ ekolɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shia yɛ nakai beaŋ lɛ miijɔɔ amɛhe.
(Hebribii 8: 1-5) Nakai sɔlemɔtsu lɛ ji gbɛjianɔtoo ni atsɔɔ nɔ abɛŋkɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ jamɔ mli ni damɔ Yesu Kristo kpɔmɔ afɔleshaa lɛ nɔ. —Hebribii 9: 2-10, 23.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, hii baabu amɛyitsoyeli lɛ he akɔntaa amɛha Kristo kɛ mɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ.

Nɔ̃ najiaŋ ni ebaasumɔ kɛkɛ akɛ ená hiɛ yɛ ewekumɛi kɛ mɛi krokomɛi ni yɔɔ anɔkwale lɛ mli lɛ ahiɛ loo enyɛ ekɛ amɛ abɔ ekoŋŋ lɛ, eesumɔ ni etsɔ esɛɛ kwraa eha gbɛ fɔŋ ni ekɔ lɛ koni no aha efee mɔ ni sa akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ ehe eshai faa lɛ ni ekpɛlɛɔ enɔ.

Nɔ ni hi jogbaŋŋ hu lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ toiŋjɔlɛ tsɔɔ jeŋ ni hela, piŋmɔ, awerɛho, loo gbele bɛ mli.

Asusu sɔlemɔ shĩa lɛ koji ejwɛ lɛ (15-20)
Kɛ agbe kpee lɛ naa nakai gbi lɛ, abaajie Maŋtsɛyeli Sane ni teeɔ sane hesusumɔ shi, ni hiɛ baafai ejwɛ kpo.

Kooloi ejwɛ lɛ he ninaa lɛ (1-8)
Esɛɛ etsɛɛɛ ni minine shɛ nitsumɔ ko nɔ yɛ Entebbe Majimaji Ateŋ Kɔɔyɔŋ Lɛjiadaamɔhe ni yɔɔ Uganda lɛ, ni wɔhi jɛmɛ afii ejwɛ kɛ nyɔji kpawo.
13 Enɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ekɛ shika tsuru fee gai ejwɛ ewo okpɔlɔ lɛ he, ekɛ gai lɛ wo okpɔlɔ lɛ koji ejwɛ lɛ, he ni naji ejwɛ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ.
Shiɛlɔi etɛ loo ejwɛ, amɛteŋ mɔ kome lɛ, obalaŋta, asusu sane lɛ he, koni no sɛɛ lɛ amɛka efeemɔ amɛkwɛ.
Aaafee afii akpei ejwɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa kɛ mumɔ tsirɛ bɔfo Paulo ni eŋma he sane yɛ Hebribii awolo lɛ mli.
Akpã klɛŋklɛŋ tɛtɛrɛmantɛrɛi ejwɛ lɛ (7-12)
Be ni akɛɛ atoɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ shishi yɛ afi 1914 lɛ, no mli lɛ adafitswaa woji ni fe 2,000 kalaa Russell wiemɔi ni ehãa kɛ saji ni eŋmalaa lɛ yɛ wiemɔi ejwɛ amli!
Kɛ́ wɔhiɛ mlijɔlɛ su mli yɛ mlilawoo shishi po lɛ, bei pii lɛ ekanyaa mɛi ni kɛ wɔ ehiɛɛɛ susumɔ kome lɛ ni amɛsusuɔ amɛwiemɔ-kɛ-shimɔ lɛ he ekoŋŋ.
Atsɔɔɔ nɔ hewɔ, shi beni wɔyashɛ Greece lɛ, akane wolo kroko ni jɛ Nɔyeli Kuu lɛ dɛŋ lɛ atsɔɔ Nitsumɔhe Nine Ajinafoi Akuu lɛ, ní miihala mi akɛ Nitsumɔhe Nine Ajinafoi Akuu lɛ sɛinɔtalɔ yɛ nakai maŋ lɛ mli.

Wɔkɛ hiɛshikamɔ tsuɔ nii
Kɛ́ wɔmiitsu heguɔgbee he nii lɛ, bei pii lɛ, mɛɛ be ji “dioofeemɔ be”?
Kɛlɛ, kɛ́ akɛ jalɛsane ni ayeee he saji ni wɔsusu he kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ to nɔ ni akɛba Kristo Yesu nɔ lɛ he lɛ, nomɛi jeee nɔ ko kwraa.
Belɛ, mɛni hewɔ wielɔ ní sumɔɔ Yehowa ní heɔ nɔ ni ekɛɔ lɛ eyeɔ lɛ baanyɛ afee mɔ ni bɛ miishɛɛ beni ewieɔ lɛ?
Shi, kɛ afolɔ ni asha he lɛ, amɛkpɛlɛɔ yɛ amɛ koji lɛ fɛɛ nɔ.
Kɛ́ aaka wɔ lɛ, mɛni esa akɛ wɔha ehi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli?
Yɛ afi 1952 mli lɛ, amɔ Ádám, ní amrɔ nɛɛ eye afii 29 ni ebote gbalashihilɛ mli ni eyɔɔ bii enyɔ lɛ, ni afolɔ enaa beni ekpoo shi kome ekoŋŋ akɛ ekɛ ehe woŋ asraafoi anitsumɔ mli lɛ.

Shi kɛlɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔkai akɛ, kɛji ajɛko ŋwɛi akɛ shishitoo mla, loo mla hako lɛ, ebafeŋ nɔ ni sa akɛ wɔɔjɛ wɔ henilee mli wɔkojo naanyo Kristofonyo yɛ saji ni ji mɔ aŋkro nɔ̃ lɛ mli.—Romabii 14:1-4; Galatabii 6:5.

BENI nugbɔ enɛ gbii babaoo sɛɛ lɛ, mɛɛ miishɛɛ eji, akɛ ooote shi ni ona ni hulu lɛ miikpɛ yɛ ŋwɛi ni atatui bɛ jɛmɛ lɛ!
Amɛtsɔɔ kɔɔyɔŋ tsakemɔ, nugbɔnɛmɔ, atatui, kɔɔyɔɔ, kɛ srawa gbamɔ shishi akɛ etsɔɔ efɔŋ ni baaba; tsu mli sɛii loo okpɔlɔ loo tsei ni gbalaa tsɔɔ nibii ni baaba yɛ wɔsɛɛ be mli. . . .
Akɛni ekpaakpoi, ŋshɔŋ nui ni boteɔ enujɔɔi amli, egɔji somromoi, ais ni tamɔ ŋshɔkpɔ ni hoɔ blɛoo yɛ ŋshɔŋ, ŋshɔnaai, ekooi ni nugbɔ fɔɔ nɛmɔ yɛ mli ni kwɛ̃ɛ nii eyi mli obɔ lɛ ehe gbɛi yɛ jeŋ fɛɛ hewɔ lɛ, New Zealand kɛ naatselɛ wieɔ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ Bɔlɔ lɛ agbojee kɛ efɛo he.
18 Eyɛ mli akɛ eji anɔkwale akɛ, buu nyɛɛɛ atsĩ nugbɔnɛmɔ naa aloo eha kɔɔyɔɔ akpa tswaa moŋ, shi ehaa mɔ náa he ko eteeɔ kɛ́ nugbɔ miinɛ loo kɔɔyɔɔ miitswa.
5:45) Mɛni hulu kɛ nugbɔ feɔ ehãa wɔ?
Salomo beaŋ sɛɛ nɔ ni shɛɛɛ afii oha lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ gbalɔ Elia tsɔɔ akɛ ele he ni nugbɔ jɛɔ enɛɔ.
Yudanyo yinɔsaneŋmalɔ Flavius Josephus kɛɛ akɛ, yɛ be mli ni Sisera asraafoi lɛ kɛ Barak asraafoi lɛ baa abakpe lɛ, “ahum kpeteŋkpele ko tswa kɛjɛ ŋwɛi, kɛ nugbɔ kɛ nyɔŋmɔŋtɛi ni fa babaoo, ni kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ tswa nugbɔ lɛ eshwie Kanaanbii lɛ ahiɛ, ni no ha amɛhiɛ wo duŋ, aahu akɛ amɛkpɔlɔi kɛ akromiai lɛ ahe baaa sɛɛnamɔ haaa amɛ.”

9 No hewɔ hu ni kɛjɛ gbi nɔ ni wɔnu lɛ, wɔkpako sɔlemɔ kɛ nyɛ hãmɔ,+ ni wɔbiɔ koni ahã nyɛyimɔ obɔbɔ kɛ esuɔmɔnaa nii lɛ he nilee krɔŋŋ,+ yɛ hiɛshikamɔ kɛ niiashishinumɔ fɛɛ ni mumɔ lɛ hãa lɛ mli,+ 10 koni nyɛnyiɛ bɔ ni sa Yehowa,* bɔ ni afee ni nyɛsa ehiɛ kwraa, be mli ni nyɛyaa nɔ nyɛwoɔ yibii yɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa fɛɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa mli, ni Nyɔŋmɔ he nilee krɔŋŋ ni nyɛyɔɔ lɛ faa lɛ;+ 11 koni akɛ hewalɛ fɛɛ awaje nyɛ yɛ enyɛmɔ ni yɔɔ nyam lɛ naa+ koni nyɛnyɛ nyɛkɛ tsuishitoo kɛ miishɛɛ afi shi shiŋŋ, 12 be mli ni nyɛdaa Tsɛ lɛ ni hã nyɛtsɔmɔ mɛi ni sa akɛ nyɛnáa mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ agboshinii lɛ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ+ yɛ la lɛ mli lɛ shi lɛ.
Mɛni hewɔ okɔɔɔ gbi kome loo gbii enyɔ ni okadi shii abɔ ni okɛ onaabu daa mɛi ashi yɛ mli loo otsɔɔ gbɛ̀i krokomɛi ni hi anɔ ojieɔ hiɛsɔɔ kpo otsɔɔ mɛi?
4 Midaa mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shi daa nɛɛ yɛ nyɛhewɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ dromɔ ni akɛdro nyɛ yɛ Kristo Yesu mli lɛ hewɔ; 5 ejaakɛ ahã nyɛtsɔmɔ niiatsɛmɛi yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ mli, yɛ wiemɔ fɛɛ mli kɛ nilee fɛɛ mli,+ 6 tamɔ bɔ ni Kristo he odase+ lɛ emɔ shi jogbaŋŋ yɛ nyɛteŋ lɛ, 7 ni no hewɔ lɛ, nikeenii ko kwraa eshwɛɛɛ nyɛ, ni yɛ nakai beiaŋ nɔŋŋ lɛ, nyɛkɛ miishɛɛ miimɛ wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ Yesu Kristo kpojiemɔ lɛ.
Kɛji akɛ wɔkai ni wɔda gbɔmɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ ashi lɛ, no lɛ wɔbaakai ni wɔda wɔ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ shi babaoo.
Mɛni esa akɛ wɔkɛɛ yɛ wɔsɔlemɔi ni wɔsɔleɔ wɔhaa Yehowa lɛ mli?— Kɛɛmɔ mi: Kɛ́ oosɔle lɛ, mɛni okɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ?— Yehowa haa wɔ nibii kpakpai pii, ni esa jogbaŋŋ akɛ wɔda lɛ shi yɛ nomɛi ahewɔ, aloo jeee nakai?— Wɔbaanyɛ wɔda lɛ shi yɛ niyenii ni wɔyeɔ lɛ hewɔ.
Miida nyɛ shi, miida nyɛ shi waa diɛŋtsɛ!”—Bethel.
13 Anɔkwa, no hewɔ ni wɔ hu wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ shi ni wɔkpaaa lɛ,+ ejaakɛ be ni nyɛnine shɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ ni nyɛnu yɛ wɔnaa lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛmɔ mli, jeee akɛ gbɔmɛi awiemɔ, shi moŋ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ, tamɔ bɔ ni eji hu lɛɛlɛŋ lɛ, nɔ ni miitsu nii hu yɛ nyɛ ni nyɛji mɛi ni heɔ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ nɔ nyɛyeɔ lɛ amli lɛ.
Ani osusuɔ akɛ omami kɛ opapa baaná miishɛɛ kɛ́ amɛfee nɔ ko amɛha bo ni oda amɛ shi?— Hɛɛ, amɛbaaná miishɛɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Wɔ hu wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ shi ni wɔfɔ̃ɔɔ . . . , ejaakɛ beni nyɛnine shɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ ni nyɛnu yɛ wɔnaa lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛmɔ mli akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ, taakɛ bɔ ni eji hu lɛɛlɛŋ lɛ, shi jeee akɛ gbɔmɛi awiemɔ ko ni, mɔ hu ni tsuɔ hewalɛ nii yɛ nyɛ ni nyɛheɔ nyɛyeɔ lɛ amli lɛ.”
“Wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ shi ni wɔfɔɔɔ . . . , ejaakɛ beni nyɛnine shɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ ni nyɛnu yɛ wɔnaa lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛmɔ mli akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ, taakɛ bɔ ni eji hu lɛlɛŋ lɛ, shi jeee akɛ gbɔmɛi awiemɔ ko ni, mɔ hu ni tsuɔ hewalɛ nii yɛ nyɛ ni nyɛheɔ nyɛyeɔ lɛ amli lɛ.”—1 TESALONIKABII 2:13.
24 Agbɛnɛ Yesaia kɛ miishɛɛ wiemɔi tsɔɔ bɔ ni Yehowa webii amli baafili amɛ yɛ E-wiemɔ lɛ mlibaa hewɔ lɛ mli akɛ: “Nakai gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ oookɛɛ akɛ: Miidao shi, Yehowa, ejaakɛ omli fũ mi moŋ, shi omlifu lɛ ejɔ ni oshɛje mimii!”
Ani okai ni oda Yehowa shi yɛ hewalɛ kroko ni he hiaa bo ni ekɛha bo lɛ kɛ jɔɔmɔ ni ejɔɔ bo lɛ?
11 Yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ mli lɛ, ajɔɔ nyɛ koni nyɛnyɛ nyɛfee ejurɔ yɛ gbɛi srɔtoi fɛɛ anɔ, ni no hãa atsɔɔ wɔnɔ akɛ shidaa hãa Nyɔŋmɔ; 12 ejaakɛ nɛkɛ sɔɔmɔ* nɛɛ, jeee akɛ akɛhãa koni akɛtsu mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi+ lɛ ahiamɔ nii ahe nii jogbaŋŋ kɛkɛ, shi moŋ ehãa akɛ shidaa babaoo hu hãa Nyɔŋmɔ.
Beni ajie lɛ kɛjɛ helatsamɔ he lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, nyɛmi nuu lɛ tee eyada datrɛfoi lɛ ashi, shi amɛkɛɛ: “Mɛni hewɔ odaa wɔ shi?
Amrɔ nɛɛ po lɛ, kɛ́ oda mɔ ko shi yɛ ejurɔ ko ni efee lɛ hewɔ lɛ, ekolɛ ebaato he akɛ, “Yehowa ji shidaa,” kɛtsɔɔ akɛ Yehowa ji nibii kpakpai fɛɛ Jɛɛhe.
Kɛ́ aha bo adiagbai kotoku obɔ lɛ, ani onaŋ he miishɛɛ ni obɔ mɔdɛŋ koni otao mɔ ni fee bo ejurɔ lɛ, bɔni afee ni onyɛ oda lɛ shi?
Shi he fɛɛ he ni oyɔɔ kɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni ofeɔ lɛ, Kaimɔ ni okɛɛ “Oyiwaladɔŋŋ!” be fɛɛ be
3 Be fɛɛ be ni wɔsɔleɔ wɔhãa nyɛ lɛ, wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ, wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ Yesu Kristo Tsɛ lɛ shi, 4 ejaakɛ wɔnu hemɔkɛyeli ni nyɛyɔɔ yɛ Kristo Yesu mli, kɛ suɔmɔ ni nyɛyɔɔ kɛhã mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ fɛɛ 5 yɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ ni akɛto ahã nyɛ yɛ ŋwɛi lɛ hewɔ lɛ he.
Ani nyɛkaiɔ koni nyɛda Yehowa shi yɛ sɔlemɔ mli daa gbi yɛ wala kɛ egbɛjianɔ babaoo ni eto lɛ hewɔ, ‘beni nyɛkã shi kɛ beni nyɛte shi’?
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ abi bo Biblia mli sane ko ni onyɛŋ oha hetoo lɛ, obaanyɛ oha hetoo yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ be fɛɛ be akɛ: “Miidao shi akɛ otee sanebimɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ nɛɛ shi.
Yehowa heŋ nakai wekukpaa lɛ kɛjɛŋ nyɛdɛŋ kɔkɔɔkɔ kɛji nyɛyaa nɔ nyɛbuɔ lɛ akɛ nɔ ko ni nyɛkpɛlɛɔ nɔ jogbaŋŋ ni nyɛdaa shi yɛ he hu lɛ.”
13 Shi, nyɛmimɛi ni Yehowa* sumɔɔ, sɔ̃ kã wɔnɔ akɛ wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ shi be fɛɛ be yɛ nyɛhewɔ, ejaakɛ kɛjɛ shishijee lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ tsɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ ni ekɛ emumɔ lɛ fee nyɛ lɛ kɛ hemɔkɛyeli ni nyɛyɔɔ yɛ anɔkwale lɛ mli lɛ nɔ ehala nyɛ+ kɛhã yiwalaheremɔ.
Beni akɛ mumɔ tsirɛ bɔfo Paulo ni eŋma amɛ wolo lɛ, eŋma akɛ: “Midaa mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shi be fɛɛ be ni mikaiɔ nyɛ yɛ midaa faikpamɔi fɛɛ ni mikpaa mihãa nyɛ fɛɛ lɛ mli, ni mikɛ miishɛɛ kpaa fai, yɛ wa ni nyɛwa yɛ sanekpakpa lɛ gbɛfaŋ kɛjɛ klɛŋklɛŋ gbi lɛ nɔ kɛbashi be nɛ lɛ hewɔ.”
17 Shi shidaa ahã Nyɔŋmɔ akɛ tsutsu lɛ, esha nyɔji ji nyɛ, shi nyɛjɛ nyɛtsui mli nyɛbo tsɔɔmɔ henɔ nɛɛ ni akɛ nyɛ wo mli lɛ toi.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ́ oskulnyo ko kɛ zigaret ha bo ni oshɛre lɛ, obaanyɛ okɛɛ lɛ akɛ, “Dabi, mishɛreee,” ní okɛshi sɛɛ akɛ, “Misusu akɛ ohiɛ etɛ̃ fe mɔ ni shɛreɔ zigaret eei!”
Naagba wulu ko ji akɛ, datrɛfoi lɛ haa wɔbii lɛ lá be mli ni fɔlɔi lɛ hako amɛ hegbɛ, ni bei pii lɛ saneyelihei haa amɛ hegbɛ ni amɛfeɔ nakai.
Beni ebafee faŋŋ akɛ ekolɛ miyi baaná wala lɛ, datrɛfoi lɛ wo mifɔlɔi aŋaa akɛ amɛyashi mi yɛ he ni akwɛɔ gbekɛbii ni eje kpa yɛ lɛ.
Nyɔji enyɔ sɛɛ beni Joel ená aaafee nyɔji kpaanyɔ lɛ, ebafee tamɔ nɔ ni datrɛfonyo lɛ wiemɔ lɛ miiba mli ejaakɛ Joel hela lɛ mli wo wu kwraa.
Datrɛfonyo ko bɛ ni sumɔɔ ni ehelatsɛ ahao.
Nakai nɔŋŋ kɛ́ mɔ ko yana datrɛfonyo lɛ, ekolɛ ebaawa akɛ ebaakai nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni datrɛfonyo lɛ wie beni ekwɛɔ lɛ lɛ.
Danilo, Odasefonyo ko ni eji datrɛfonyo lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Datrɛfoi yɔseɔ akɛ amɛ helatsɛmɛi ni ji Odasefoi lɛ náa yelikɛbuamɔ kɛjɛɔ gbɛjianɔtoo ko ni kɛ suɔmɔ susuɔ amɛhe lɛ dɛŋ.”
MIDATRƐFONYO lɛ kɛɛ mi gbi ko yɛ nakai afi lɛ mli akɛ miyɛ multiple sclerosis (ansɔ kɛ mliteŋ wu mli hela), ni ji hela ko ni anyɛɛɛ atsa.
Paulo tsɔɔ akɛ Luka ji tsofafeelɔ, ni nibii ni Luka ŋmala lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ eji datrɛfonyo ní gbala ejwɛŋmɔ kɛtee mɛi ni helai ye amɛ lɛ anɔ, ni enu he eha amɛ.
Datrɛfonyo lɛ wiemɔi lɛ ba mli anɔkwale—kɛ́ asafoŋbii lɛ ná amɛle wɔnaagba bibioo ko po lɛ, amɛbayeɔ amɛbuaa wɔ oya nɔŋŋ.
Bei komɛi lɛ, ekolɛ ebaawa kɛha datrɛfoi kɛ helatsɛmɛi akwɛlɔi akɛ amɛkɛ bulɛ aaaha helatsɛ ko jamɔŋ hemɔkɛyelii, ni hiɛ sɔɔ amɛteŋ mɛi ni sumɔɔ akɛ amɛfee nakai lɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Beni datrɛfonyo lɛ kɛɛ yoo lɛ akɛ abifao ni efɔ nɛɛ jwɛŋmɔ naa baaba shi kwraa ni enyɛŋ enyiɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ lɛ, eha yoo lɛ tsui kumɔ kwraa.
Naagbee lɛ, Harold ŋma wolo ni haa helatsamɔhe lɛ yeɔ ehe kɛjɛɔ sɔ̃ fɛɛ sɔ̃ ni baakã amɛnɔ kɛji migbo lɛ he, ni datrɛfoi lɛ kpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ amɛbaafee opireshɛn ni he hiaa ni afee lɛ.
Eba lɛ akɛ esa akɛ wɔhɔ̃ɔ shikpɔŋ kroko hu ni wɔkɛwo kwɛmɔ ni datrɛfonyo ko ni yɔɔ Athens lɛ kwɛ mi lɛ he nyɔmɔ.
Remegio tsa nɔ akɛ: “Yɛ sanebimɔ lɛ eko fɛɛ eko sɛɛ lɛ, datrɛfoi krokomɛi lɛ holeɔ amɛniji anɔ ni amɛtsɔɔ bɔ ni amɛtsu shihilɛ ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ lɛ he nii amɛha lɛ mli.”
(Kolosebii 3:12) Kɛ datrɛfonyo ko etooo etsui shi kwraa, ni efeɔ helatsɛmɛi gidigidi lɛ, ekolɛ amɛbaaku amɛhiɛ amɛfɔ̃ ewiemɔi anɔ, ni amɛkuŋ amɛsɛɛ amɛbaŋ eŋɔɔ dɔŋŋ kɛha tsofafeemɔ ni he hiaa lɛ.
Ekolɛ ole bɔ ni afeɔ awoɔ datrɛfoi hewalɛ ni amɛkɛ gbɛi ni atsɔɔ nɔ akwɛɔ helatsɛmɛi ni akɛ lá tsuuu nii lɛ atsu nii.
Elá etã aahu akɛ datrɛfoi lɛ kɛɛ amɛfeŋ lɛ opireshɛn ni amɛbaná sane, amɛnuɔ he akɛ kɛ́ amɛfee lɛ opireshɛn lɛ ebaagbo.
Datrɛfonyo ni kwɛɔ lɛ lɛ yɔse akɛ eshwɛɛɛ taakɛ efeɔ yɛ be ni eho lɛ mli lɛ.
Be ko lɛ, aye sane ko yɛ Manchester, yɛ England, ni mɔ ni asãmã lɛ ji Henry Hudson, ni eji datrɛfonyo kɛ Biblia Kaselɔ.
Ni kɛlɛ, nakai datrɛfonyo lɛ nɔŋŋ saa ekwɛ saji ni eŋmala lɛ amli ekoŋŋ enɔ otsi, ni eŋma akɛ: “Eyɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ bɔ ni eeenyɛ ekɛtsu asraafoi anitsumɔ yɛ ta hiɛ.”
Nakai maŋ onukpa lɛ ni eji mɔ ni kwɛɔ helatsamɔhe ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ miisumɔ ni mɛi ni oshara lɛ ebanina amɛ lɛ aya Kobe helatsamɔhei lɛ moŋ fe ni eeeha datrɛfoi lɛ aha amɛ tsofai kɛ nui ni akɛtsɔɔ fãji amli ni jara wawai yɛ yelikɛbuamɔhei nɛɛ.
Te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni datrɛfonyo ko baaye abua wɔ kɛ́ wɔkɛ lɛ bɛ gbɛjianɔtoo ko?
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, ehe bahia ni polisifoi lɛ asaa akwɛ saji amli ekoŋŋ yɛ mɛi krokomɛi ni fa fe 130 ni etsɔ datrɛfonyo lɛ nine nɔ amɛgboi lɛ ahewɔ.
Datrɛfonyo nɛɛ badamɔ mipapa hiɛ tuuntu, ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ, “Gbeyeilɔ, kɛ́ nuu yɛ omli lɛ, taa mihe okwɛ!”
Wɔhiɛ kpaŋ be mli ni datrɛfonyo lɛ kɛɛ wɔ akɛ wɔbiyoo lɛ miina amanehulu yɛ lá mli wala yibii ni ji lymphoblast ni efa fe nine, ni ji gbekɛbiiashi kansa henɔ ko ni náa hewalɛ yɛ lá wala yibii yɛji lɛ anɔ lɛ nɔ gbi ko gbi ko.
Wɔkɛ wɔhe wo kpokpaa nɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli yɛ be ko mli hu, ni wɔyasaraa asafoi kɛjɛ Queen Charlotte Islands kɛyaa bokagbɛ kɛfoɔ gɔji lɛ kɛyaa Fraser Lake, kɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ, kɛyaa Prince George kɛ Mackenzie maji lɛ amli tɔɔ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Maŋtsɛ Salomo yɛ ‘maŋnyɛmɛi 60, hemɛi 80, kɛ oblayei ni aleee amɛyibɔ’ moŋ, shi lɛ po etsui mɔ oblayoo nɛɛ.
Taakɛ mishweɔ lɛ, miye maŋnyɛ nakai gbi lɛ.’
Ale lɛ akɛ gbɛjegbɛi amli gbɛjegbɛ, ni ekã shi kɛjɛ Roma kɛtee Brundisium (amrɔ nɛɛ ale lɛ akɛ Brindisi), ní lɛjiadaamɔhe yɔɔ jɛmɛ ní atsɔɔ jɛmɛ kɛyaa Bokagbɛ maji lɛ amli lɛ.
Daniel 11:25, 26 Aurelian Maŋnyɛ Zenobia
(1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 17:8-16) Yɛ nakai hɔmɔ lɛ mli nɔŋŋ, yɛ jamɔ mli yiwaa ni naa wa waa, ni Maŋnyɛ Izebel yiwalɔ lɛ kɛba amɛnɔ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa kwɛ ni egbalɔi lɛ anine shɛ aboloo kɛ nu nɔ.—1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 18:13.
13 Nɛkɛ jaramɔ be nɛɛ mli maŋnyɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ —eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ nyɛ lɛ —bote okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ asa lɛ nɔ.
Nɔ ni amɛfee nɛɛ kɛ nitsumɔi krokomɛi ni mɛi ni maŋsɛɛ shiɛlɔi lɛ etsɔse amɛ yɛ ninenaa nitsumɔi amli lɛ tsu kɛha maŋ lɛ ha maŋnyɛ lɛ tsui he jɔ be kplaŋŋ bɔ ni ha amɛnyɛ amɛkala Biblia lɛ mli woji lɛ babaoo, ni eshwɛ woji ni yɔɔ Hebri Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ fioo komɛi pɛ.
Nuu ko ni yɔɔ nɔyeli hegbɛ yɛ Etiopiabii amaŋnyɛ Kandake shishi lɛ jie su kpakpa ko kpo.
Mɛni hewɔ ni Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ wie yɛ Solomon he akɛ: “Ajɔɔ otsuji lɛ ni damɔɔ ohiɛ daa nɛɛ ni amɛboɔ onilee lɛ toi lɛ!”?
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ hu kɛ ebe kɛ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ shã afɔle wulu koni eyasara Salomo.
Beni enɛ yaa nɔ lɛ, Maŋnyɛ Septimia Zenobia, ni jɛ Roma shihemɔ maŋ ni ji Palmyra lɛ baŋɔ gbɛhe ni ji wuoyigbɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ.
Maŋnyɛ Yezebel yitsoŋ wa waa ni eesumɔ ni egbe mɛi fɛɛ ni jaa Yehowa lɛ, ni Elia hu fata mɛi nɛɛ ahe!
Yɛ tsatsubii ateŋ lɛ, ayɛ maŋnyɛ, shi eji maŋnyɛ kɛ shishinumɔ kɛkɛ akɛ lɛ eŋmɛɔ wɔji lɛ, ni lɛ ji nyɛ kɛha tsatsubii akuu lɛ.
9 Ni Sheba maŋnyɛ+ lɛ nu gbɛ́i ni Solomon ehe lɛ he, no hewɔ lɛ, eba Yerusalem koni ekɛ sanebimɔi ni mli wawai* abaka Solomon ekwɛ.
Woloŋlelɔi komɛi susuɔ akɛ maŋnyɛ lɛ ekpɛlɛɛɛ akɛ ebaa maŋtsɛ lɛ hiɛ ejaakɛ esumɔɔɔ akɛ ebaa bulɛ ni ayɔɔ kɛha lɛ lɛ shi yɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ gbɔi ni etɔrɔ dãa lɛ ahiɛ.
9 Ester kɛ Maŋnyɛ Washti kɛ sɔrɔtofeemɔ ni sa kadimɔ hã yei.
Ebatsɔ gbohii lɛ amaŋnyɛ, ni ekɛ atswere ye ebua amɛ koni amɛshɛ ŋwɛi.
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ no mli lɛ Etiopia piafonyo lɛ ni sɔmɔ yɛ Etiopiabii amaŋnyɛ Kandake we lɛ yɛ eko, ejaakɛ beni Filipo kɛ lɛ kpe yɛ gbɛ ni yaa Gaza lɛ nɔ lɛ, ena akɛ “etá eshwiili mli kɛmiiya, ni eekane gbalɔ Yesaia wolo lɛ.”
Ekolɛ maŋnyɛ ni he yɔɔ fɛo waa nɛɛ ebuuu ewu, ni nɔ ni efee lɛ bafee nɔkwɛmɔnɔ gbonyo kɛha ŋamɛi ni yɔɔ Persia Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli.—3/1, baafa 9.
(Yeremia 44: 16, 17) Yudafoi lɛ tee nɔ amɛwie hu akɛ: “Kɛjɛ beyinɔ ni wɔfɔ̃ɔ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma shãa kɛ ŋkpaiyeli kɛ ŋwɛi maŋnyɛ lɛ hamɔ nɛɛ, nɔ fɛɛ nɔ hiaa wɔ, ni wɔmiitã yɛ klante kɛ hɔmɔ naa.” —Yeremia 44:18.
7 No hewɔ lɛ, maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛ Haman+ ba Maŋnyɛ Ester okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ lɛ.
+ 3 Maŋnyɛ Ester kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Maŋtsɛ, kɛ́ mihiɛ eba nyam yɛ ohiɛ, ni esa maŋtsɛ hiɛ lɛ, no lɛ, nɔ ni mitaoɔ mabi ji, okɛ miwala* ake mi, ni nɔ ni mitaoɔ ni afee ahã mi hu ji, okɛ mimaŋbii+ lɛ hu anɔ lɛ ake amɛ.
+ Mɔ ko kɛ balsam mu babaoo tamɔ nɛkɛ baaa dɔŋŋ yɛ nɔ ni Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ kɛbahã Maŋtsɛ Solomon lɛ sɛɛ.
9] Shi enɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ maŋnyɛ lɛ kɛ Salomo shwɛ shwɛmɔi ni he bɛ sɛɛnamɔ.
(1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 10: 23, 24) Amɛhe yɛ sɛɛnamɔ ŋmɛnɛ kɛha mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni miisumɔ ni ená miishɛɛ ni eye omanye yɛ shihilɛ mli lɛ tamɔ bɔ ni awie he klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ.
Anɔkwa miishɛɛ tsɔɔ nyamɔ, mlifilimɔ po.
Mɛi babaoo ná wiemɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ, ni enɛ ha wɔmii shɛ wɔhe, ni wɔto gbɛjianɔ koni wɔku wɔsɛɛ ni wɔkɛ amɛ ayaje Biblia kasemɔ shishi.
(Yesaia 65:14) Agbɛnɛ hu, mɛi ni sɔmɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ yɛ yiŋtoo krɛdɛɛ ko kɛha miishɛɛnamɔ bianɛ—amɛyɛ emumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ni “Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔhaa mɛi ni boɔ lɛ toi [akɛ nɔyelɔ] lɛ.”
Ani osusuɔ akɛ ninámɔ baanyɛ aha ona miishɛɛ?
(Yohane 8:29) Yoo ni baa ehe shi ehaa ewu yitsoyeli lɛ yɛ suɔmɔ kɛ bulɛ ni eyɔɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ hewɔ lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni eha miishɛɛ ahi eweku shihilɛ lɛ mli.
Miyɛ miishɛɛ ejaakɛ yɛ da ni mida lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, mihe baanyɛ aba sɛɛnamɔ kɛha Yehowa.”
□ Nɛgbɛ abaana miishɛɛ ni da fe fɛɛ lɛ yɛ?
Kɛ́ nakai ni lɛ, obaanyɛ obi sane nɛɛ kɛje osanegbaa lɛ shishi akɛ: “Shika enyiɛ esa akɛ nuu ko aná koni enyɛ ehã eweku aná miishɛɛ?”
Yɛ Kristofoi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ agbɛfaŋ lɛ, nɔ ni etsɔɔ ji akɛ, Yehowa naa amɛ akɛ mɛi ni he tse, ni ebaahã amɛ gbɔmɔtsei ni gbooo koni amɛhi shi kɛya naanɔ yɛ ŋwɛi yɛ miishɛɛ babaoo mli.
Akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji lɛ, wɔyɛ miishɛɛ ejaakɛ wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔye wɔbua mɛi krokomɛi.
Ajɔɔ (miishɛɛ ji) mɛi ni fɔɔ amɛtadei lɛ ahe lɛ, koni amɛna hegbɛ yɛ wala tso lɛ nɔ, ni amɛtsɔ agboi lɛ amli kɛbote maŋ lɛ mli.
Ani enɛ fiteɔ miishɛɛ ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ?
Shi kɛ́ wɔfee nakai lɛ, wɔnáŋ miishɛɛ.
(Yesaia 40:26) Gbekɛ ni miiŋmɔ beni ekwɛɔ gbee bi ko ni nyiɛ elei sɛɛ, aloo alɔnte bi ko ni kɛ bɔɔlu ko ni akɛ kpãa elo miishwɛ—ani enɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ Yehowa, ‘miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ,’ nyɛɔ ewoɔ mɔ naa ŋmɔlɔ?
Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ní náa gbɛfaŋnɔ yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ gbohiiashitee lɛ mli lɛ yɛ miishɛɛ ni eyɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ; gbele ni ji enyɔ lɛ bɛ hewalɛ ko yɛ nɛkɛ mɛi nɛɛ anɔ, shi moŋ, amɛbaatsɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ osɔfoi kɛ Kristo lɛ osɔfoi, ni amɛkɛ lɛ baaye nɔ akɛ maŋtsɛmɛi afii akpe lɛ fɛɛ.”—Kpoj.
(Efesobii 6:4) Kwɛ miishɛɛ ni Yehowa baaná beni enaa be fɛɛ be akɛ nɛkɛ weku nɛɛ miibɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛhiɛ emuuyeli mli lɛ!
Mɛni he ekolɛ Yesu wieɔ beni ekɛɛ akɛ, “Miishɛɛ ji mɔ ni saraa ni etoɔ etadei lɛ”?
(Lala 55:23; Filipibii 4: 6, 7) Yɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ákɛ ewebii lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná henumɔ ni lalatsɛ lɛ ná lɛ eko, beni elá akɛ: “[Miishɛɛ ji] maŋ ni le tɛtrɛmaŋtrɛ gbɛɛmɔ lɛ!
Yehowa Odasefoi yɛ he miishɛɛ akɛ amɛaaye amɛbua bo koni okase Biblia lɛ bɔni afee ni oná hemɔkɛyeli ni mli wa yɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni ji Yehowa, kɛ e-Bi Yesu Kristo mli ni ohiɛ mli.
Ni bei pii lɛ, mɛi ni amɛnine shɛɔ nɔ lɛ naa akɛ jwetri ni amɛnine shɛ nɔ trukaa lɛ haaa amɛná miishɛɛ.
Kwɛ bɔ ni miyɔɔ miishɛɛ waa akɛ mifata Yehowa webii ahe, ni minaa eyelikɛbuamɔ ni sɛɛ efooo kɔkɔɔkɔ!
Na nitsumɔi ni otsuɔ nɛɛ ahe miishɛɛ, ejaakɛ enɛ feɔ babaoo ni ehaa obii lɛ amiishɛɛnamɔ fáa.
Anɔkwa jamɔ hãa Yehowa webii ni yɔɔ jeŋ fɛɛ lɛ feɔ ekome ni toiŋjɔlɛ hiɔ amɛsafoi lɛ amli. —Kanemɔ Yesaia 65:13, 14.
Mɔ kroko hu jaje akɛ: “Agbɛnɛ manyɛ magbo akɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ejaakɛ Yehowa eha miná hegbɛ mibo drama lɛ toi yɛ mi diɛŋtsɛ miwiemɔ mli.”
10 Ni Yehowa kɛɛ Mose akɛ: “Yaa Farao ŋɔɔ, ejaakɛ miŋmɛ gbɛ koni ekpiliŋ etsui, ní etsuji lɛ hu akpiliŋ amɛtsui,+ koni mafee mikadii nɛɛ yɛ ehiɛ,+ 2 agbɛnɛ hu, koni ogba obii kɛ onabii bɔ ni migbala Ejipt toi waa, kɛ okadii hu ni mifee yɛ amɛteŋ lɛ;+ ni nyɛbaaná nyɛle akɛ miji Yehowa lɛ.”
9 Philip wie akɛ: “Minu he akɛ miikpee shihilɛ lɛ naa fiofio, shi mina akɛ loloolo lɛ, eshwɛ mi nɔ ko.
Etsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Misusu akɛ nɔ ko miiŋmɛɛ mi waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Shi kɛlɛ, ekpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ: “Beni abaptisiko mi lɛ, be ko shɛ ní ewaaa kɛha mi akɛ mafolɔ kpeei amli, ni mikɛ skul nifeemɔ ni mikɛ baa shia kɛ skul nifeemɔi krokomɛi jieɔ minaa.
Mifee gbɛgbalɔ, Yehowa Odasefonyo be fɛɛ sɔɔlɔ ni minyɛɛɛ ni mikɛ mihe awo sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Shiɛlɔi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome, ni enɛ ji klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa ni ekɛ ehe woɔ gbɛjegbɛ nɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ kɛɛ: ‘Mikɛ afii abɔ ehi anɔkwale lɛ mli ni no mli lɛ miyɔseee nɔ ni jeɔ midɛŋ lɛ!’
Nakai gbi lɛ miyaaa skul, ni akɛni misusu akɛ abaabi sane ko kɛjɛ ewiemɔ lɛ mli yɛ kaa ni wɔbaafee lɛ mli lɛ hewɔ lɛ, mibi lɛ koni egbála saneyitso ni ewie he lɛ mli etsɔɔ mi.
Ekpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ: “Mihiɛ tseɔ miŋa waa lolo, shi amrɔ nɛɛ miheɔ miyeɔ waa akɛ nɔ ko ni Yehowa ŋmɛɔ gbɛ bɛ ni baanyɛ ekɛ haomɔ ni hiɔ shi daa aba wɔnɔ.”
Miyanyɛɛɛ enine mli mamɔ, ni kpãa ni akɛfi mi lɛ tse, ni mijɛ ŋwɛi mitai 6 mibatswa shi.
Ekɛfata he akɛ: “Agbɛnɛ lɛ, mina nɔ ni eŋmɛɛ mi yɛ mishihilɛ mli lɛ, no ji anɔkwa miishɛɛ ni anáa kɛ́ akɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ ye klɛŋklɛŋ gbɛhe lɛ.
Ekɛɛ: “Miyaa Kristofoi akpeei be fɛɛ be, ni mikɛ mihe woɔ teokrase nitsumɔi amli waa.
Miná weku shihilɛ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ yɛ nakai Kristofoi heshibalɔi akuu lɛ mli, ni enɛ ji nɔ ko ni mináaa yɛ be ni eho lɛ mli.
Miyɔse akɛ, bei pii lɛ amɛwoɔ nii ahe, shi fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ misumɔɔ ni male nibii amli babaoo ni misusuɔ akɛ ekolɛ miishɛɛ babaoo miiŋmɛɛ mi.
“Eyɛ mli akɛ miŋa gbo nɔ ni fe afii 18 nɛ moŋ, shi mihiɛ tseɔ lɛ ni miyeɔ egbele lɛ he ŋkɔmɔ lolo.
Midaa shi akɛ mitseee mihe kɛjɛɛɛ minyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei lɛ ahe, ni no ha amɛkɛ suɔmɔ ye bua mi.”—Hebribii 10:24, 25.
Kɛlɛ, minine eshɛ nibii ni eŋmɛɛ mi yɛ shĩa lɛ anɔ yɛ gbɛ kome loo gbɛ kroko nɔ yɛ mimaŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa jajemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Eyɛ mli akɛ mishihilɛ yɛ srɔto yɛ mɛi krokomɛi anɔ̃ he yɛ gbɛ̀i pii anɔ moŋ, shi minuuu he kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ nɔ ko ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ eŋmɛɛ mi yɛ shihilɛ mli.”
Bei komɛi lɛ, abiɔ mi akɛ, ani edɔɔ mi akɛ mifɔɔɔ lo.
Etsɛɛɛ ni mibayɔse akɛ nibii babaoo eŋmɛɛ mi.”
Mi kɛ gbɛgbalɔ ni fata mihe lɛ jara Biblia kasemɔ woji babaoo, shi akɛni mihiɛ fãko tsɔ hewɔ lɛ, mishwe shĩa waa!
Ejaje akɛ: “Miitsɛ́ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala.”
15 No hewɔ lɛ, akɛni miyɛ nɔmimaa yɛ enɛ he hewɔ lɛ, mito miyiŋ akɛ maba nyɛŋɔɔ klɛŋklɛŋ, koni nyɛná hegbɛ ni ji shii enyɔ nɔ kɛná miishɛɛ;* 16 ejaakɛ mito miyiŋ akɛ mabatsɔ nyɛŋɔɔ kɛya Makedonia, ni maku misɛɛ kɛjɛ Makedonia maba nyɛŋɔɔ ekoŋŋ, koni nyɛyajie mi gbɛ kɛya Yudea.
16 Jeee nyɛ nyɛhala mi, shi mi moŋ mihala nyɛ, ni mihole nyɛ koni nyɛya ni nyɛyawo yibii, ni akɛ, nyɛyibii lɛ aya nɔ ahi shi, koni nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni nyɛbaabi Tsɛ lɛ yɛ migbɛ́i mli lɛ, ekɛhã nyɛ.
Enɛ hewɔ gbalɔ Mose nyɛ́ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Miitsɛ́ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe.”—5 Mose 30:19, 20.
Etamɔ bɔ ni Mose kɛɛ Israel maŋ lɛ, akɛ: “Miitsɛ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala.”
Ni tsofatsɛ lɛ kɛ baa ko ni ekɛwo nu mli ni ekɛfeɔ ashwai, ni ehiɛ yɛ tsene mli lɛ shwa enɔ ni ekɛjɔɔ ehe.
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ, yɛ Nu Afua lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ Noa akɛ: “Nu afua lɛ ebapleneeŋ heloo fɛɛ dɔŋŋ, ni asaŋ nu afua ko ebakpataŋ shikpɔŋ lɛ hiɛ gbi ko gbi ko.”
Amɛbaanyɛ amɛná nu ni tsɔko lá lɛ eko hu kɛjɛ nubui ni amɛaaje yɛ Nilo Faa lɛ hewɔhewɔ lɛ amli.—2 Mose 7:24.
Aaafee weku lɛ mli bii kpawo kɛ nu mli baptisimɔ fee amɛhenɔjɔɔmɔ kɛha Yehowa lɛ he okadi yɛ nakai beaŋ.
(Ezekiel 47:1-12) Hɛɛ, ninaa mli faa lɛ kɛ nɔ ko ni tsutsu lɛ egbo baa wala mli, ni emaa nɔ mi akɛ wala nu faa lɛ feɔ gbɛjianɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ eto kɛtsɔ Yesu Kristo nɔ koni ekɛ adesa wala ni yeɔ emuu aha adesa weku ni “egbo” lɛ he mfoniri.
(1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 17:8-16) Yɛ nakai hɔmɔ lɛ mli nɔŋŋ, yɛ jamɔ mli yiwaa ni naa wa waa, ni Maŋnyɛ Izebel yiwalɔ lɛ kɛba amɛnɔ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa kwɛ ni egbalɔi lɛ anine shɛ aboloo kɛ nu nɔ.—1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 18:13.
Kɛ́ akpɔlɔ kooloi nɛɛ lɛ, nu ni aŋaa kɛjɛɔ amɛmli lɛ tsuuɔ, ni akɛni amɛmli nu lɛ nyɛɔ efutuɔ nu hewɔ lɛ, akɛtsakeɔ mamai asu.
Eeenyɛ efee akɛ, no mli lɛ, nu ni Timoteo nuɔ lɛ mli tseee, ni no ji nɔ ni yatsɛ hela lɛ kɛba lɛ.
+ 13 Kɛ́ okwɛ ogbe naa lɛ, bo hu abaafu bo tamɔ afu otsɛmɛi lɛ,*+ tamɔ bɔ ni afee onyɛmi nuu Aaron lɛ,+ 14 ejaakɛ be ni maŋbii lɛ kɛ mi béɔ yɛ Zin ŋa lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛtse famɔ ni mikɛhã akɛ afee mi krɔŋkrɔŋ yɛ amɛhiɛ yɛ nui lɛ ahewɔ lɛ hiɛ atua.
*+ 15 Kɛ́ mɔ* ko ye kooloo ko ní egbo loo kooloo ni kooloo awuiyelɔ ko etserɛ emli lɛ,+ Israelnyo ni jio, gbɔ ni jio, efɔ etadei lɛ ahe ni ekɛ nu aju ehe, ni ehe tseee kɛyashi gbɛkɛ;+ no sɛɛ lɛ, ehe baatse.
Bɔfo Petro wie hefɛoyelɔi nɛɛ ahe akɛ: “Kwa amɛkwaa amɛjieɔ amɛhiɛ yɛ enɛ nɔ akɛ ŋwɛi yɛ kɛjɛ blema beebe, ni shikpɔŋ hu jɛ nu mli, ni etsɔ nu mli ebama shi yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ naa; nomɛi nɔŋŋ nɔ etsɔ ni nu ŋɔ no be lɛŋ je lɛ ni ehiɛ kpata lɛ.
• Aŋkro ko baanyɛ atsɔ tamɔ tso ni náa nu babaoo yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Kɛkɛ ni esɔle, ni no sɛɛ lɛ ekɛ wɔ wo nu lɛ mli.
Violet ekpɛlɛɛɛ nɔ, ni nɔ ni bafee etoigbalamɔ ji akɛ ekasha nu kɛmiijɛ maŋ lɛ nu bu lɛ mli.
Yesaia 28:17 lɛ feɔ lɛ faŋŋ akɛ: “Nyɔŋmɔŋtɛ aaaloo amale abobaahe lɛ, ni nu aaaŋɔ teemɔhe lɛ kɛaatee.”
7 Nu yaa nɔ etsereɔ kɛjɛɔ enuyɛɛ nii* enyɔ lɛ amli,
20 Ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ: “Bɔɔ nii* ni hiɛ kamɔ ayi nui lɛ amli obɔbɔ, ni bɔɔ nii ni filikiɔ hu afiliki yɛ kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ mli yɛ ŋwɛi.”

Beni Eliezer kɛ tsuji krokomɛi lɛ yashɛ Haran lɛ, amɛwa yɛ nubu ko he, ejaakɛ Eliezer le akɛ etsɛŋ ni mɛi baaba amɛbayɛ nu.
3 Nyɛkɛ nyamɔ lala baayɛ nu
Enaaa nu enu, ni enaaa nii eye.
“Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ,” taakɛ Yesaia kɛɛ lɛ, “aaatsɔ tamɔ abobaahe yɛ kɔɔyɔɔ naa kɛ teemɔhe yɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ naa, tamɔ faai yɛ ŋa kpataa nɔ loo tɛsaa kpele ko ni hãa hɔɔŋ yɛ shikpɔŋ gbiŋ nɔ.”
Rebeka fee nakai, ni no sɛɛ lɛ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mayɛ eko mahã oyoomai lɛ hu kɛyashi beyinɔ ni amɛaanu amɛgbe naa.”
Taakɛ Yohane 19:33, 34 tsɔɔ lɛ, Yesu egbo momo beni “asraafoi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome kɛ akplɔ tsu eŋmawuiaŋ, ni amrɔ lɛ lá kɛ nu jɛ mli ho” lɛ.
Ni emli nui lɛ yaa nɔ eloɔ ŋshɔ mli jwɛi kɛ ŋmɔtɔ eshwieɔ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, wumɛi yeɔ amɛŋwɛi Maŋtsɛ lɛ anɔkwa kɛtsɔ Kristo sui lɛ akpo ni amɛjieɔ yɛ bɔ ni amɛkɛ amɛŋamɛi kɛ amɛbii lɛ yeɔ haa lɛ mli lɛ nɔ.
Gbalɔ lɛ wo maŋtsɛ lɛ hewalɛ akɛ ebo Yehowa gbee toi koni ahi aha lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, akɛni ŋwɛi Maŋtsɛ ni ajáa lɛ yɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ Bi koome ji Yesu hewɔ lɛ, esaaa akɛ ewoɔ too lɛ.
Te maŋtsɛ ko aaafee tɛŋŋ ní ekɛ kojomɔ ni ja ni yɔɔ faŋŋ aha yɛ be mli ni ‘ehiɛ kpaŋ mla nɔ, ní etsɔŋ nɔnalɔi fɛɛ asane hiɛ ebuŋ shi’ kɛ́ be fɛɛ be nɛɛ etɔ dãa lɛ?—Abɛi 31:4-7.
Ni ákɛ Maŋtsɛ ni ahala lɛ lɛ, nakai beaŋ lɛ Yesu yɛ nakai mɛi lɛ ateŋ.

24 No sɛɛ lɛ, Ben-hadad ni ji Siria maŋtsɛ lɛ bua esraafoi* lɛ fɛɛ anaa ni amɛkwɔ kɛtee ni amɛyawo Samaria he ka.
