14 Anaa odaseyeli ni tsɔɔ akɛ Maŋtsɛ David yiŋ tsɔ akɛ Yehowa susuɔ ehe ni enuɔ he ehaa lɛ lɛ yɛ Lala 56 ní David ŋma lɛ mli, beni ejoɔ foi yɛ Maŋtsɛ Saul ni ji gbɔmɔgbelɔ lɛ naa lɛ.
Bo diɛŋtsɛ feemɔ bɔ ni nyɛ lɛ tsui nyɔ emli waa, beni Salomo kɛ abifao lɛ ha lɛ ní ekɛɛ akɛ: “Lɛ ji enyɛ” lɛ he mfoniri okwɛ.—1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 3:16-27.
Satan Abonsam miitao ni egbe Nyɔŋmɔ Bi lɛ, ni ele akɛ Maŋtsɛ Herode ni yɔɔ Yerusalem lɛ baabɔ mɔdɛŋ koni egbe lɛ.
Ebihii lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome baaye Saul sɛɛ akɛ Israel maŋtsɛ.’
Esusu Mateo 10:28 ni kɛɔ akɛ: “Nyɛshea mɔ ni nyɛɔ susuma kɛ gbɔmɔtso fɛɛ hiɛ ekpataa yɛ gehena mli lɛ gbeyei” lɛ he.
Israel Maŋtsɛ David le jogbaŋŋ akɛ Yehowa hebuu nine lɛ yɛ enɔ, beni ekɛ jaramɔ be ni fe fɛɛ kpe po lɛ.
“Lɛ po maŋsɛɛ yei lɛ ha efee esha,” kɛtsɔ lakamɔ ni amɛlaka lɛ ní eyajá apasa nyɔŋmɔi lɛ nɔ.—Nehemia 13:26; 1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 11:1-6.
Wɔbaana yɛ Yitso 5 lɛ mli akɛ, dani afi 1935 baashɛ lɛ, asusu akɛ Kristendom sɔlemɔi lɛ mli bii kpotoo fata “asafo babaoo” ni awie amɛhe yɛ Kpojiemɔ 7:9, 10 yɛ King James Version lɛ mli lɛ ahe, ni ákɛ abaajuro amɛ akɛ kuu ni ji enyɔ nɔ ni baaya ŋwɛi, akɛni amɛhi Kristo gbɛfaŋ be ni naagbee lɛ shɛɔ lɛ hewɔ.
7 Yehoahaz asraafoi lɛ ateŋ okpɔŋɔnɔtaralɔi 50, shwiilii 10, kɛ asraafoi 10,000 ni nyiɛɔ amɛnane nɔ pɛ shwɛ, ejaakɛ Siria maŋtsɛ lɛ ekpãtã amɛteŋ mɛi babaoo ahiɛ,+ ni enaanaa amɛnɔ ni efee amɛ tamɔ ŋmaagbeemɔ beiaŋ mulu.
Akɛni amɛbooo maŋtsɛ lɛ famɔ lɛ toi hewɔ lɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhe wo gbele ni yɔɔ gbeyei he oshara mli, ni atsɔ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ahere amɛyiwala; shi amɛhala akɛ amɛkɛ amɛhe aaawo gbele he oshara mli moŋ fe ni amɛaagbo Yehowa nɔ toi.—Daniel 2:49–3:29.
18 Lalatsɛ David wie naanɔ Maŋtsɛ lɛ he kɛ nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ: “Yehowa da ni esa yijiemɔ babaoo, ni edalɛ lɛ anyɛɛɛ shishi ana!”
Mɛni Yehowa bi ni Israel maŋtsɛmɛi afee, ni mɛɛ yiŋtoi kɛha taomɔ nii nɛɛ kɔɔ Kristofoi onukpai ahe ŋmɛnɛ?
22 Beni Ashur Jeŋ Hewalɛ lɛ te shi ewo Yerusalem lɛ, Maŋtsɛ Sanherib bɔ Yehowa ahora kɛtsɔ wiemɔ ni ekɛ gbɔmɛi ni yɔɔ gbogbo lɛ nɔ lɛ wie lɛ nɔ, akɛ: “Nɛkɛ shikpɔji [ni miye amɛnɔ kunim] nɛɛ anyɔŋmɔi lɛ fɛɛ ateŋ namɛi ehere amɛshikpɔŋ yiwala kɛjɛ midɛŋ, hewɔ ni Yehowa lɛ, lɛ lɛ eeehere Yerusalem yiwala kɛaajɛ midɛŋ lɛ?”
(b) Mɛni ji yiŋtoo ní yɔɔ bokagbɛ maŋtsɛmɛi ejwɛ lɛ atutuamɔ lɛ sɛɛ?
Beni ewieɔ saneyitso ni ji “Ja Oyɛ Hemɔkɛyeli, Kɛ́ Jeee Nakai lɛ, Osɛɛ Etsɛŋ” lɛ he lɛ, Nyɛminuu Noumair gbala jwɛŋmɔ kɛtee Yuda Maŋtsɛ Ahaz nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ nɔ.
(Mateo 6:9, King James Version) Shi mɛi fioo pɛ le nakai gbɛi lɛ be saŋŋ nɛ.
Ejaakɛ Europa maŋtsɛmɛi komɛi naaa miishɛɛ kwraa yɛ paapa lɛ hewalɛ lɛ shishi.
Mɛni wɔkaseɔ yɛ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ mli?
Ŋleshi Blema Nibii Atoohe nɔkwɛlɔ ko po tsɔɔ ejwɛŋmɔ akɛ, yɛ bɔ ni “blema saji kɛ naakpɛɛ nibii lɛ fa babaoo ha hewɔ lɛ, . . . anyɛŋ ana Buddha lɛ shihilɛ he yinɔsane diɛŋtsɛ.”
(2 Mose 12:50, 51) Yɛ Ŋshɔ Tsuru lɛ naa lɛ, Yehowa fee naakpɛɛ nii kroko ni ekɛhere ewebii ni feɔ toiboo lɛ ayiwala, ni ekpata Farao kɛ esraafoi ata ni he wa lɛ ahiɛ.
Yesu baatsu naakpɛɛ nitsumɔ ekoŋŋ, yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jeŋ hee lɛ mli—shi ebaafee enɛ yɛ jeŋ fɛɛ!
Ni kɛlɛ, mɛi babaoo yɛ ni heɔ yeɔ akɛ atsɔ naakpɛɛ nii anɔ atsa amɛ lɛɛlɛŋ.
Yɛ nikasemɔ nɛɛ mli lɛ, wɔbaasusu naakpɛɛ nii etɛ komɛi ni Yesu fee lɛ ahe.
Amɛfee naakpɛɛ nii ko yɛ enɛ mli.
Nikasemɔ ni shɛjeɔ mɔ mii ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔkase kɛjɛ naakpɛɛ nibii ni Yesu fee lɛ amli ji akɛ, “emusuŋ tsɔ̃ lɛ” ni efee nibii kɛye ebua mɛi.
Afee okadii kɛ naakpɛɛ nii ashi Ejipt (8, 9)
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, Yesu tee yookpeemɔ okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ ko yɛ Kana, ni eye ebua yɛ miishɛɛ ni ana yɛ nifeemɔ lɛ shishi lɛ gbɛfaŋ, kɛtsɔ eklɛŋklɛŋ naakpɛɛ nii ni efee yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ nɔ.
Yesu tsɔ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ nɔ efee nɔkwɛmɔnɔ ko, ni ekɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ nɛɛ miitsu nii ŋmɛnɛ hu.
Mɛɛ naakpɛɛ nii Yesu Kristo fee yɛ Kana, ni te enɛ ná mɛi krokomɛi anɔ hewalɛ eha tɛŋŋ?
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, efee naakpɛɛ nii koni enine ashɛ shika ni he hiaa lɛ nɔ!
Tsɔɔlɔ Kpele lɛ fee toi eha amɛ beni amɛgbála mli akɛ Yesu Nazarenyo lɛ, tsɔɔ mɛi anii, efee naakpɛɛ nibii, ni asɛŋ lɛ lɛ.
Taakɛ wɔna kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ, yiŋtoo titri ni yɔɔ Yesu sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ jeee ni etsa helatsɛmɛi ní efee naakpɛɛ nii krokomɛi.
Esɔle dani efee naakpɛɛ nii, akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, dani etee enaanyo Lazaro shi: “Ataa, miidao shi akɛ obo mi toi lɛ.
Biblia lɛ ewieee naakpɛɛ nibii ni Yesu fee lɛ ahe akɛ eji shishiumɔ nifeemɔi loo lakamɔ nifeemɔi ni eto he gbɛjianɔ koni ekɛshɛje mɛi amii.
Kɛ wɔku wɔhiɛ wɔshwie odaseyelii krokomɛi fɛɛ nɔ, ni wɔkɛ wɔ kojomɔ lɛ damɔ odaseyeli ni jɛ sɛɛgbɛ nɛɛ nɔ lɛ, Yesu naakpɛɛ nii lɛ bafeɔ nibii ni esa akɛ wɔhe wɔye diɛŋtsɛ.—2 Timoteo 3:16.
(1 Mose 4:1) Kɛbashi ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, gbekɛ ni aŋɔɔ lɛ hɔ́ kɛ efɔmɔ lɛ haa wɔnaa kpɛɔ wɔhe, ni mɛi babaoo tsɔɔ akɛ enɛ ji nɔ ko ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
Mɛni hewɔ wɔbaanyɛ wɔná nɔmimaa akɛ naakpɛɛ nibii ni Yesu fee lɛ ji anɔkwa saji, nɔ ko ni ba mli diɛŋtsɛ lɛ?
Osɔfoi lɛ leee nɔ ni amɛbaafee, ejaakɛ amɛnyɛŋ amɛje he ŋwane akɛ amɛfee nɛkɛ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ye ebua gbalɔ lɛ ni efee naakpɛɛnii 16 sɔŋŋ —nɔ ni Elia fee lɛ toi enyɔ.
Yɛ afi 1984 lɛ, The Times ni yɔɔ London lɛ kala wolo ko ni susu sane nɛɛ he, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ejeee nɔ ni ja kwraa ákɛ akɛ jeŋ nilee he naataamɔ saji aaatsu nii ni akɛte shi awo naakpɛɛ nitsumɔi.
Kristofoi hu yɛ mli, ni amɛteŋ mɛi babaoo jeee mɛi ni ekase tsofa-feemɔ he nii, ni nakai nɔŋŋ hu amɛnyɛɛɛ amɛfee naakpɛɛ nii taakɛ mra be mli Kristofoi ni nine shɛ nakai hewalɛi anɔ kɛjɛ Kristo kɛ ebɔfoi lɛ aŋɔɔ lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi fee lɛ.
9 Yɛ no sɛɛ lɛ, akɛɛ naakpɛɛ nibii 32 ba:
Taakɛ Yehowa etsɔɔ amɛ lɛ, Aaron fee naakpɛɛ nii ko ni ye hewalɛ ni Yehowa yɔɔ yɛ Mizraim nyɔŋmɔi lɛ anɔ lɛ he odase.
Kristendom jamɔ he nikaselɔi ni bɛ hemɔkɛyeli lɛ ebɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ amɛaagbe naakpɛɛ nii ni Nyɔŋmɔ fee beni eha Ŋshɔ Tsuru lɛ mli gba koni lsraelbii lɛ anyɛ ajo foi kɛtsɔ shikpɔŋ gbiŋ nɔ lɛ he guɔ.
Nikasemɔi nɛɛ hãa wɔ hiɛnɔkamɔ akɛ etsɛŋ, Yehowa baafee naakpɛɛ nii babaoo yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ fɛɛ.
(Yohane 1:47) Yesu gbalaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛyaa hemɔkɛyeli ni mɔ ko ni efeɔ naakpɛɛ nii ehaa lɛ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ nɔ dani efeɔ.
Naa oti kroko hu ni sa akɛ wɔsusu he: Wiemɔ ni akɛtsu nii kɛha “naakpɛɛ nii” yɛ Hela wiemɔ mli, ni ji wiemɔ ni aŋma “Kpaŋmɔ Hee” lɛ yɛ mli lɛ ji dyʹna·mis—wiemɔ ko ni shishinumɔ diɛŋtsɛ ji “hewalɛ.”
Yehowa hã Yesu mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ koni ekɛfee naakpɛɛ nii ni mɛi ana nɔ ni Yesu baafee be ni eyeɔ nɔ akɛ Maŋtsɛ lɛ.
Maria na naakpɛɛ nii ni fe fɛɛ lɛ ni ji Yesu shi ni atee lɛ!
Efeee nɛkɛ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ ni ekɛjie gbɔmɛi ahiɛtserɛ.
(Filipibii 2:7) Taakɛ wɔkase yɛ wolo nɛɛ yitso ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ, Yehowa tsɔ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ejie e-Bi lɛ wala kɛbawo Maria musuŋ.
Eshitee-kɛ-wolɔi lɛ ní bɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ amɛaatao sane fɔŋ yɛ ehe be fɛɛ be lɛ po nyɛɛɛ aje anɔkwale ni eji akɛ efee naakpɛɛ nii lɛ he ŋwane.
Wɔbɛ hewalɛ ni wɔkɛbaafee naakpɛɛ nii, kɛ̃lɛ nɔ ko yɛ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔfee.
Shi bei pii lɛ, mlihilɛ nifeemɔ feɔ naakpɛɛ nii, kɛ́ wɔɔwie he nakai, ni ejieɔ jwɛŋmɔ fɔŋ ni mɛi hiɛ yɛ wɔhe lɛ kɛyaa.
Yehowa ha naakpɛɛ nibii komɛi ba ni ekɛye ebua amɛ koni amɛnine ashɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
10 Nɛkɛ jamɔi nɛɛ amli bii kɛɔ akɛ naakpɛɛ nii ji nɔ ni maa nɔ mi akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔmɔ yɛ amɛjamɔ lɛ nɔ.
79 Yesu Fee Naakpɛɛ Nii Pii
Ani osusuɔ akɛ afeɔ naakpɛɛnii lɛɛlɛŋ?
Naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ ná maŋbii lɛ anɔ hewalɛ waa, ni amɛkɛ mɛi krokomɛi ni he yeɔ lɛ ba ni atsá amɛ, ni amɛha Paulo kɛ enanemɛi lɛ nikeenii ni he hiaa amɛ lɛ.—Bɔf. 28:7-10.
He ko he ko bɛ ni wɔnaa nɔkwɛmɔnɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ yɛ enɛ mli fe yɛ Yesu Kristo mli, mɔ ni fee naakpɛɛ nii pii yɛ ‘Yehowa hewalɛ’ mli lɛ.
Amɛkɛɛ akɛ: “Wɔkɛ miishɛɛ kpɛlɛɔ fɔmɔ ni oblayoo fro lɛ fɔ lɛ, Sanekpakpai lɛ amli naakpɛɛ nitsumɔi lɛ, kɛ Kristo shitee lɛ nɔ akɛ yinɔsane mli nifeemɔi.”
No hewɔ lɛ, ekolɛ Yesu fee naakpɛɛ nii lɛ beni eshiɔ Yudafoi amaŋtiase lɛ ni ebɛŋkɛɔ Roma maŋtiase lɛ, loo efee nakpɛɛ nii lɛ beni eshiɔ Roma maŋtiase lɛ ni ebɛŋkɛɔ Yudafoi amaŋtiase lɛ.
Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, Yudafoi ajamɔ mli hiɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ kɛ amɛsɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ ekpɛlɛɛɛ naakpɛɛ nii ni Yesu feɔ ákɛ odaseyeli ni tsɔɔ akɛ eetsu Nyɔŋmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ.
Ani yiŋtoi komɛi yɛ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔdamɔ nɔ wɔkɛ wɔhe afɔ̃ saji ni aŋmala ashwie shi nɛɛ anɔ be mli ni wɔpɛiɔ anɔkwalei ni kɔɔ naakpɛɛ nibii ni akɛɛ Yesu fee lɛ ahe lɛ mli?
BENI Mose ku esɛɛ kɛtee Mizraim lɛ, egba naakpɛɛ nibii lɛ fɛɛ etsɔɔ enyɛmi nuu Aaron.
Yehowa tsɔ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ehere amɛyiwala.
Nɛkɛ mɛi nɛɛ nɔŋŋ kɛ amɛhiŋmɛii na bɔ ni Yehowa shwie Mizraim ni he wa waa—ni ji jeŋ hewalɛ ni yeɔ nɔ yɛ nakai beaŋ—lɛ hiɛaŋ shi kɛtsɔ haomɔi nyɔŋma ni kpataa nii ahiɛ kɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔ ni ba yɛ Ŋshɔ Tsuru lɛ naa ni ekɛba enɔ lɛ nɔ.
(Romabii 16:20) Kɛkɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baaye adesai anɔ ni ebaahã amɛhi shi yɛ miishɛɛ kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli taakɛ eto ni amɛhi shi lɛ. —Kanemɔ Kpojiemɔ 21:3-5.
14 No hewɔ lɛ, mɛi ni asumɔɔ, akɛni nyɛmiimɛ nibii nɛɛ hewɔ lɛ, nyɛbɔa mɔdɛŋ fɛɛ ni nyɛaanyɛ koni yɛ naagbee lɛ ena nyɛ akɛ mɛi ni muji kɛ kpa ko bɛ amɛhe, yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli.
Bɔfo Paulo tsɔɔ akɛ ehe miihia ni wɔsɔle beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛkahaoa yɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko he, shi moŋ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ mli lɛ nyɛkɛ sɔlemɔ kɛ faikpamɔ kɛ shidaa atsĩa nyɛtutɔmɔi lɛ atã yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ; ni Nyɔŋmɔ hejɔlɛ ni fe jwɛŋmɔi fɛɛ lɛ aaato nyɛtsuii kɛ nyɛjwɛŋmɔi lɛ yɛ Kristo Yesu mli!”
(Yesaia 54:13; Filipibii 4:9) Hɛɛ, mɛi ni boɔ Yehowa tsɔɔmɔi lɛ toi lɛ náa anɔkwa toiŋjɔlɛ.
Agbɛnɛ, nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ nɔŋŋ, eeenyɛ efee akɛ be ni aye Hehoo niyenii lɛ atã lɛ, etsɛ David gbalɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ayisɛɛ ekɛɛ: “Mi diɛŋtsɛ mishieŋtsɛ po ni miheɔ lɛ miyeɔ, mɔ ni yeɔ midɛŋ ŋmaa lɛ, efã enane eshi mi.”
Gbɔmɛi ní yɔɔ he fɛɛ he ebaná toiŋjɔlɛ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Yehoram kɛɛ akɛ: “Tsɛ okpɔŋɔnɔtalɔ ko ni otsu lɛ ni ekɛ amɛ ayakpe, ni ohã ebi amɛ akɛ, ‘Ani nyɛmiiba yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli?’”
Nɔ ni hi jogbaŋŋ hu lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ toiŋjɔlɛ tsɔɔ jeŋ ni hela, piŋmɔ, awerɛho, loo gbele bɛ mli.
Ni ahosoŋ toiŋjɔlɛ kpaŋmɔ ni mikpaŋ lɛ hu,”+ Yehowa, mɔ ni naa bo mɔbɔ lɛ kɛɛ.
3 Esa akɛ shĩa lɛ afee toiŋjɔlɛ shihilɛhe.
Nikasemɔ ni ji ejwɛ lɛ baatsɔɔ wɔ bɔ ni wɔɔfee wɔtiu toiŋjɔlɛ sɛɛ.
□ Mɛni hewɔ adesai agbɛjianɔtoi yeee omanye yɛ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛbɔɔ ni amɛkɛ toiŋjɔlɛ ni sɛɛ tsɛɔ aba lɛ gbɛfaŋ lɛ?
Nakai ŋmalɛ lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Jwɛŋmɔ ni akɛmaa heloo lɛ nɔ lɛ, gbele ni, shi jwɛŋmɔ ni akɛmaa mumɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ, wala kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ ni.”
Yɛ Yesu gbalɛ mli famɔ lɛ toiboo mli lɛ, ŋmɛnɛ akɛ ekãa miishiɛ jeŋ muu fɛɛ kɔkɔbɔɔ ni kɔɔ kojomɔ gbi ni baa nɛɛ he, kɛ sanekpakpa ni kɔɔ toiŋjɔlɛ ni baanyiɛ sɛɛ aba lɛ he lɛ he shɛɛ sane.
(Abɛi 5:18) Nɛkɛ tsakemɔi nɛɛ biɔ afɔleshaa, shi amɛkɛ toiŋjɔlɛ baa shia lɛ mli.
(Kpojiemɔ 14:1, 3) Ele akɛ, ekɛ Paradeiso shihilɛi ni yɔɔ kpoo, ni ekɛha efɔŋ feelɔ ni gbo yɛ emasɛi lɛ baaba.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 24:15) Nakai beaŋ lɛ, Ntabana weku lɛ, kɛ mɛi krokomɛi fɛɛ “[amii] aaashɛ amɛhe yɛ hejɔlɛ babaoo mli.”—Lala 37:11.
Yehowa Toiŋjɔlɛ He Bɔfo ni Fe Fɛɛ
Shi kɛlɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ bɔ ni osusuɔ wɔsɛɛ be he ohaa lɛ baanyɛ asa toiŋjɔlɛ ni oyɔɔ lɛ he?
Mɛi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ daraa yɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ kɛ miishɛɛ mli beni amɛ nilee ni kɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ eŋmɛ efɔŋ feemɔ gbɛ kɛ bɔ ni etsɛŋ ekɛ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ jalɛ shihilɛi baaba shikpɔŋ nɔ kɛtsɔ e-Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔ lɛ daa kɛyaa hiɛ lɛ.—1 Yohane 5:19; Yohane 17:16; Mateo 6:9, 10.
Gbɛ kome ni wɔɔtsɔ nɔ wɔtsɔɔ akɛ wɔji ‘hejɔlɛ gbɔmɛi’ ji ní wɔkɛ wɔlilɛi lɛ atsu nii jogbaŋŋ.
Yɛ be mli ni Roman Katolik, Bokagbɛ Orthodɔks, kɛ Muslim kui ni yɔɔ nakai shikpɔŋ ni naa amanehulu lɛ nɔ lɛ wuuɔ ta kɛha shikpɔŋkuku lɛ, aŋkroaŋkroi babaoo miishwe ni amɛna toiŋjɔlɛ, ni mɛi komɛi ena hu.
Kɛ́ wɔkɛ mɛi ahe ke amɛ tswaa lɛ, wɔbaa ekomefeemɔ kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ yi, ni naanyobɔɔ hiɔ wɔ kɛ amɛ teŋ.
Kɛkɛ lɛ obaanyɛ oná toiŋjɔlɛ, ni oshihilɛ baahi afii akpe—kɛ no sɛɛ!
Akɛni amɛji je nɛɛ fã hewɔ lɛ, eeenyɛ efee akɛ amɛbaafata jeŋmaji lɛ ahe kɛkɛɛ akɛ, ‘toiŋjɔlɛ yɛ.’
Naa, mikɛo ená, bo fitemɔ gɔŋ,’ Yehowa kɛɛ, ‘ni ofite shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ, ni makpã minine mli yɛ onɔ, ni makokloo kɛaajɛ tɛsaai lɛ anɔ matswa shi, ni mahã otsɔ gɔŋ ni ashã.’
9 Yehowa ku sɛɛ ekɛ nɔmimaa ha Mose kɛtsɔ shiwoi wuji enyɔ ni ekɛha lɛ nɔ, akɛ: “Mikɛo aaahi shi; ni enɛ aaatsɔ okadi ahao akɛ mi mitsuo: Kɛ́ oyajie maŋ lɛ kɛjɛ Mizraim kɛba lɛ, nyɛbajáa Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ gɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ.”
Miitsɛ́ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ, mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ni osumɔ Yehowa o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe; ejaakɛ no aaaha oyi aná wala ni otsɛ yɛ jeŋ.” —5 Mose 30: 15-20.
Ona okadi ni Yesu Kristo wie akɛ no akɛbaayɔse enɔkwa kaselɔi lɛ faŋŋ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Miihã nyɛ kitã hee akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe; bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe nakai nɔŋŋ.
12 Kɛkɛ ni ekɛɛ: “Mafata ohe,+ ni okadi ní baatsɔɔ akɛ miji mɔ ni tsu bo lɛ nɛ: Kɛ́ oyajie maŋ lɛ kɛje Ejipt lɛ, nyɛbaabasɔmɔ* anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ yɛ gɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ.”
25 “Kɛ́ oná bii kɛ nabii, ni nyɛhi shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ be kplaŋŋ, ni nyɛye sane fɔŋ ni nyɛfee amaga*+ ko ni nyɛfee efɔŋ yɛ Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, hiɛ koni nyɛkɛwo emli la lɛ,+ 26 no lɛ, ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ, miitsɛ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ akɛ odasefoi miiwo nyɛ akɛ, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, nyɛhiɛ baakpãtã oya kɛje shikpɔŋ ni nyɛfoɔ Yordan lɛ kɛyaa koni nyɛyaŋɔ lɛ nɔ.
21 Ole, no mli lɛ miishe bo gbeyei, ejaakɛ oji nuu ni sane wa; okɔɔ nɔ ni okɛfɔ̃ko shi, ni okpaa nɔ ni oduko.’
Ole, no mli lɛ miishe bo gbeyei, ejaakɛ oji nuu ni sane wa; okɔɔ nɔ ni okɛfɔ̃ko shi, ni okpaa nɔ ni oduko.’
Kɛ́ onyɛ oshɛ oti ni yɔɔ nyam nɛɛ he lɛ, obaasumɔ ni ofee lɛ daa yɛ gbɛ ni mɔɔ shi nɔ, ní ofooo mli nyɔɔŋ kome po.
13 “‘Ŋmaa afɔle fɛɛ ŋmaa afɔle ni okɛbaahã lɛ, okɛ ŋoo awo mli; hã ŋoo ni kaiɔ bo o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kpaŋmɔ lɛ ahi oŋmaa afɔle mli be fɛɛ be.
Ekolɛ ohiɛ tseɔ hefatalɔ ni osumɔɔ lɛ lolo lɛ.
16 Nɔ ni Yesu wie yɛ enɛ sɛɛ lɛ ji oti lɛ. Ebi ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nɛkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wulaa koo mli kwɛ̃ɛ nii . . . lɛ, ani ewulaŋ nyɛ babaoo, nyɛ ni nyɛhemɔkɛyeli faaa?”
Ani no baanyɛ aha okaná be oha oweku lɛ, ni etsĩ onaa hu ni okɛ ohe akawo Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ nifeemɔi ní esaaa akɛ eko ŋmɛɛɔ bo lɛ amli?
Ni ekɔɔɔ he eko he ni osɔmɔɔ yɛ lɛ, okɛ onyɛmɔ fɛɛ asɔmɔ Yehowa bɔni afee ni onyɛ oná miishɛɛ ni jɛɔ nakai fee mɔ mli kɛbaa lɛ eko.
Kɛji akɛ osɛɛ gbala shi yɛ gbɛ ni ooobi koni okaya nitsumɔ loo skul lɛ, no lɛ ekolɛ miishɛɛ nifeemɔ nɛɛ mli fã ko baaŋmɛɛ bo.
Kɛ enine shɛ wolo nɔ kɛjɛ shia ni miikɛɛ akɛ, ‘Wɔhiɛ miitse bo waa; wɔleee nɔ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔfee ni ofataaa he’ lɛ nɔ lɛ, no baafee nɔ̃ pɛ ni he hiaa lɛ koni ekɛto enibii ni eya shia.
Kɛ́ okane wolo lɛ, obaana akɛ shishijee wiemɔi komɛi ni yɔɔ ŋmalɛi ní akɛ niji ŋmala lɛ amli lɛ bɛ mli, ni etamɔ nɔ ni emli saji lɛ hu baa naagbee ni anuko nɔ ni ataoɔ atsɔɔ mli lɛ shishi.
Kɛ obɛ jɛmɛ lɛ, ná nɔmimaa akɛ —mɛi ahiɛ tseɔ bo!
Bɔni afee ni oná nɔmimaa akɛ gbɛjianɔtoo ni woɔ mɔ hewalɛ yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ eko eŋmɛŋ bo lɛ, jee shishi amrɔ nɛɛ ni okɛ nilee ato gbɛjianɔi fɛɛ ni baaha onyɛ oya gbii etɛ lɛ fɛɛ.
3 Miŋma nɔ ni miŋma lɛ koni kɛ́ miba lɛ, mɛi ni kulɛ esa akɛ maná miishɛɛ yɛ amɛhewɔ lɛ moŋ akahã miwerɛ ho mihe, ejaakɛ miyɛ nɔmimaa akɛ, nɔ ni hãa mimii shɛɔ mihe lɛ nɔŋŋ ji nɔ ni hãa nyɛ fɛɛ nyɛmii shɛɔ nyɛhe.
19 Shi ekɛɛ: “Mahã ekpakpa ni mifeɔ lɛ fɛɛ abaho yɛ ohiɛ, ni majaje Yehowa gbɛ́i lɛ yɛ ohiɛ;+ ni madro mɔ ni misumɔɔ ni madro, ni mana mɔ ni misumɔɔ ni mana lɛ mɔbɔ lɛ mɔbɔ.”
6 “No hewɔ lɛ, kɛɛmɔ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: ‘Miji Yehowa lɛ, ni majie nyɛ kɛje Ejiptbii lɛ ajatsui lɛ ashishi, ni mahere nyɛ kɛjɛ nyɔŋ ní amɛyeɔ nyɛ lɛ mli,+ ni mikɛ nine ni akpã mli* baakpɔ̃ nyɛ, ni magbala Ejiptbii lɛ atoi waa.
Yesu kɛɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ akɛ: “Kɛji mitee ni miyasaa gbɛhe mito nyɛ [yɛ ŋwɛi] lɛ, mibaba ekoŋŋ ni mibabaŋɔ nyɛ kɛya he ni mi diɛŋtsɛ miyɔɔ lɛ, koni he ni miyɔɔ lɛ nyɛ hu nyɛhi jɛi. . . .
17 Hagai ŋma ni ekɛmu egbalɛ lɛ naa akɛ: “ ‘Nakai gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ,’ Yehowa Zebaot kɛɛ, ‘maŋɔ bo, Zerubabel, . . . ni maŋɔo mafee tamɔ wolo naasɔomɔ nɔ̃; ejaakɛ bo lɛ mihalao,’ Yehowa Zebaot kɛɛ.”
2 Ejaakɛ mikɛ awuŋayeli ni jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ* lɛ miiye nyɛhe awuŋa, ejaakɛ mi diɛŋtsɛ mibi nyɛshi mihã wu kome, ni ji Kristo lɛ, koni maŋɔ nyɛ akɛ oblayoo fro ni he tse* mahã lɛ.
Yɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ he naagbai ni wɔkɛkpeɔ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, manyɛ makɛɛ akɛ wɔwala shihilɛ efee nɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ kɛ shweshweeshwe yɛ nɔ ni fa fe afii 60 ni wɔkɛhi be-fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ.
Enu miishɛɛnamɔ kɛ hebuu he ekoŋŋ.
Mlifilimɔ kɛ miishɛɛ fɛɛ ni yɔɔ lɛ sɛɛ baafo kuku kɛji akɛ gbohii lɛ ba shikpɔŋ ni nɔ eyi obɔ kɛ béi, lashishwiemɔ, mujiwoo kɛ awuiyeli—tamɔ bɔ ni shihilɛ lɛ ji ŋmɛnɛ lɛ nɔ.
Nyɛmi yoo lɛ gbala ejwɛŋmɔ kɛtee Nɔ Diɛŋtsɛ ni Kɛ Weku Miishɛɛ Baa wolo lɛ hu nɔ, ni ema nɔ mi eha lɛ akɛ, ŋaawoi kpakpai komɛi yɛ mli ni baaye abua ekɛ eŋa lɛ.
Klɛŋklɛŋ nikasemɔi enyɔ ni yɔɔ wolo tɛtrɛɛ nɛɛ mli lɛ wieɔ mɛi komɛi ni hiɛ amɛmiishɛɛ mli yɛ amɛpiŋmɔi lɛ fɛɛ asɛɛ lɛ he.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, kɛjɛ beni mitsɛ gbo lɛ, enɛ ji be klɛŋklɛŋ ni minu he waa akɛ miná miishɛɛ naakpa.”—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:35.
Klein, ni esɔmɔ yɛ Yehowa Odasefoi a-Nɔyeli Kuu lɛ mli aahu aaafee afii nyɔŋmai enyɔ sɔŋŋ lɛ kɛɛ nikaselɔi 46 lɛ akɛ: “Yesu wie akɛ miishɛɛ babaoo yɛ nihamɔ mli fe bɔ ni yɔɔ ehemɔ mli.
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ, toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shihilɛ kpakpa ni hela, ta, hɔmɔ, kɛ gbele, bɛ mli ni wɔbaaná mli ŋɔɔmɔ kɛya naanɔ lɛ, baaha wɔná miishɛɛ kɛ jɔɔmɔi ni bɛ naagbee.
Biblia lɛ ni oookase lɛ baanyɛ aha oná miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ yɛ naagbai ni okɛkpeɔ lɛ fɛɛ asɛɛ.
Nɔhamɔ mli yɛ jɔɔmɔ fe ehemɔ.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:35.
Otsii lɛ anaagbee ji miishɛɛ bei.
28 Ebii lɛ teɔ shi ni amɛkɛɔ akɛ eyɛ miishɛɛ;
Yehowa gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ feɔ Biblia kasemɔ woji yɛ wiemɔi aaafee 600 amli.
Miishɛɛ Ji Mɛi ni Shiɔ Kpe!
Shi amrɔ nɛɛ, miyɛ miishɛɛ, ni mifooo dɔŋŋ nyɔɔŋ.
3:1-5) Kwɛ miishɛɛ ni wɔyɔɔ akɛ wɔbaanyɛ wɔya Yehowa ŋɔɔ kɛha yelikɛbuamɔ!
Mɛni hewɔ kɛ́ miishɛɛ baahi gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ, ebiɔ ni aba he shi lɛ?
(1 Petro 2:20; 4:15, 16) Taakɛ Yesu wiemɔi lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, kɛ́ ana nɔ̃ yɛ jalɛ hewɔ lɛ, ehaa anáa miishɛɛ.
Ato Amɛhe Gbɛjianɔ ni Kɛlɛ Amɛyɛ Miishɛɛ
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ mɔ ko aaatsɔ aha miishɛɛ shihilɛ ahi lɛ diɛŋtsɛ eshia?
Yah jajemɔ hãa anáa miishɛɛ (12)
Esa akɛ amɛkwɛ nii kɛteke amɛ amrɔmrɔ shihilɛ nɛɛ, ni amɛha amɛhiɛ ahi miishɛɛ ni baajɛ Kristofoi agbɛ lɛ mli aba lɛ nɔ.
Eŋɔɔ wɔnaa waa akɛ wɔná sɔɔmɔ hegbɛ nɛɛ, ni eŋɔɔ wɔnaa hu akɛ wɔnyɛɔ wɔyaa shiɛmɔ daa gbi.
Shi kɛlɛ, kwɛ bɔ ni wɔná miishɛɛ be ni nakai nitsumɔ ni wa lɛ woɔ yibii lɛ!
Kwɛ bɔ ni miná miishɛ miha beni miná mile akɛ minyɛmiyoo Jean hu etee hiɛ yɛ enikasemɔ lɛ mli ni abaptisi lɛ lɛ!
Kɛ eji blɔfo atĩa, akutu, aloo nɔ kroko ni jio, obaasumɔ ni oduawa lɛ afee nɔ ni etsu, ni he yɔɔ akɔnɔ, ni ŋɔɔ hu.
William ni jɛ Orange lɛ nyɛ edamɔ France shitee-kɛ-wolɔi lɛ ahenumɔ lɛ nɔ ni ebatsɔ Netherlands nɔyelɔ.
Yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ hei komɛi lɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni tsei srɔtoi ayibaai kpɛlɛɔ kɛ sui tamɔ etsuru, akutu tsuru su, wuɔfɔ su, kɛ sui krokomɛi yɛ bei komɛi amli yɛ afi lɛ mli.
Be ko lɛ, akɛɛ mi akɛ dani manyɛ mashɛ asafo ni tsa nɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ja wɔtara okpɔŋɔi anɔ kɛfo Orange Faa lɛ.
Asha lɛ X-Ray shii abɔ, ni datrɛfonyo ni sha lɛ X-Ray lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ, nɔ ko ni dalɛ shɛɔ akutu dalɛ efuu mibi yoo lɛ mlɛbo.
Bɔ ni akutu tso kpakpa woɔ akutui kpakpai lɛ, nakai anɔkwa jamɔ feɔ gbɔmɛi kpakpai.—Mateo 7:15-20.
Mile akɛ kɛ́ miŋã akutu mli lɛ, akutu mli nu ji nɔ ni jɛɔ mli baa, no hewɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ masusu nɔ ni yɔɔ mimligbɛ, nɔ ni yɔɔ mitsui mli lɛ he lɛ?—Marko 7:20-23.
Kɛ hulu ni nyɔɔ shi lɛ kpɛ shwie Cameroon Gɔŋ lɛ afã gbɛ ni kpelekeɔ shi lɛ nɔ lɛ, ejieɔ sui sɔrɔtoi ni jeɔ kpo waa kpo—afaseo su, akutu tsuru su, wuɔfɔ, kɛ nɔ ni tsuɔ tamɔ lá.
Ato yelikɛbuamɔ kuu he gbɛjianɔ yɛ Orange maŋtiase ni bɛŋkɛ jɛmɛ lɛ mli koni ekwɛ kui ejwɛ ni kɛ amɛhe eha lɛ anitsumɔ nɔ, ni amɛjie ŋmɔtɔ lɛ ni amɛsaa shiai lɛ amli, ní amɛfɔ atadei ni ŋmɔtɔ eyi lɛ obɔ lɛ babaoo he, ni amɛtao niyenii kɛ nu amɛyaha yɛ hei ni oshara lɛ ba yɛ lɛ fɛɛ.
Mikɛ mihe yawo Protestant kui kɛ nitsumɔi srɔtoi amli, tamɔ Orange Order —ni ji gbɛjianɔtoo ko ni kɛ ehe eha kɛha Protestant jamɔ kɛ eshihilɛ gbɛ lɛ yibaamɔ lɛ.”
KƐ́ HULU lɛ je leebi maŋkpa yɛ Goma maŋ lɛŋ lɛ, ŋwɛi tsuɔ fioo ni eyɛ fɛo pam.
Yɛ afi 1993 latsaa be mli lɛ, saralɔi ni eba Orange County Fair yɛ California lɛ na “Christie” he amaga ko, ni ji “Kristo” yoo ni hiɛ ehe yayai yɛ krɔs nɔ.
Akɛ fɔmɔ gbi he nikeenii ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ ni ji wein yibii, blɔfoŋmei, kɛ akutui ni yɔɔ adekai amli ha lɛ.

12 Kɛfata he lɛ, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni datrɛfoi yeɔ anɔkwa ha lɛ, amɛnyɛŋ amɛye hela kɛ gbele nɔ kunim.
Datrɛfoi lɛ kɛ helatsɛmɛi akwɛlɔi lɛ fɛɛ anaa kpɛ amɛhe waa yɛ ehemɔkɛyeli kɛ ekãa ni eyɔɔ lɛ hewɔ.
• Ebaaha sanegbaa abakã datrɛfoi lɛ kɛ wekumɛi lɛ ateŋ
Datrɛfonyo ko tsɔɔ mli akɛ, hela ni naa wa miiye mitsui lɛ, no hewɔ lɛ esusuɔ akɛ ebaafee nɔ ni hi jogbaŋŋ moŋ akɛ maku misɛɛ kɛya United States.
Mɛi komɛi biɔ okɔmfoi kɛ tsofatsɛmɛi anii
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 24:15) Kɛkɛ ni, nɔ ni ha enaa kpɛ ehe waa diɛŋtsɛ ji akɛ, kojolɔi—ni ekolɛ saji ni ejaaa ni nibii ni akɛtswaa adafi lɛ gbɛɔ shwaa elaka amɛ lɛ—folɔ enaa akɛ lɛ egbe ewu lɛ, akɛni etsĩ opireshɛn ni datrɛfoi lɛ na akɛ ehe miihia ni akɛha lɛ lɛ naa hewɔ.
Datrɛfonyo ni oooyana lɛ koni ekwɛ bɔ ni ogbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ yɔɔ lɛ baafee nɔ ni sa feemɔ.
• Kɛ́ ebaahi lɛ, okɛ datrɛfonyo ni le tsofafeemɔi ni osumɔɔ kɛ nɔ ni ohiɔ lɛ gbɛi afata he
SANEYITSO ni ji “Opireshɛn ni ‘Lá Bɛ Mli’” lɛ mli lɛ, Maclean’s wolo tɛtrɛɛ lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ datrɛfoi ni yɔɔ Canada lɛ “miiŋɔ ŋaa gbɛ̀i heei ni yɛ afii enumɔ ni eho lɛ amli kɛbaa nɛɛ lɛ, etsake nɔ ni akɛɛ atsɛɔ lɛ opireshɛn ni lá bɛ mli lɛ efee lɛ tsofafeemɔ mli nifeemɔ gbɛ titri ko lɛ.”
Aha datrɛfonyo ko kɛ eŋa, helatsɛmɛi akwɛlɔ nitsumɔ yɛ shia lɛ mli koni amɛkwɛ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi lɛ anɔ.
(7) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ datrɛfoi baanyɛ atsɔ ni (a) amɛkaha lá pii miiho mɔ ko, (b) amɛbaa walayibii tsuji ni yɔɔ mɔ ko mli lɛ yi (d) amɛha gbɔmɔtso lɛ afee lá pii, kɛ (e) amɛbaa lá ni hoɔ mɔ lɛ yi?

Dabi, yaafonui ni Nyɔŋmɔ baatsumɔ lɛ ji yaafonui ní amanehulu, awerɛhoyeli, nijiaŋwujee, piŋmɔ, kɛ nɔnaa kɛbaa lɛ.
Kɛ okɛ inki nɛɛ ŋma nii nɔŋŋ pɛ lɛ, obaanyɛ okɛ kotsa ni efɔ atsumɔ niŋmaa lɛ kwraa.
Eyɛ mli akɛ be ni Yehowa ‘baatsumɔ hiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ’ lɛ shɛko moŋ, shi ebaaye ebua bo koni onyɛ odamɔ shihilɛ ni okɛkpe lɛ naa.—Kpojiemɔ 21:4; 1 Korintobii 10:13.
Yehowa kpɛ mli akɛ yɛ afii 120 mli lɛ, ebaakpata nakai yiwalɛ je lɛ hiɛ.—Nyɛkanea 1 Mose 6:3-5.
(Yakobo 1:27) Ja gbohiiashitee lɛ eba yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jeŋ hee lɛ mli dani abaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ kɛmɔ shi.
Bei krokomɛi amli hu lɛ, nɔyeli mli gbɛjianɔtoi ni nilee bɛ mli, kɛ hiɛjoomɔ kɛ anɔkwa ni mɛi ni yɔɔ hegbɛ ni nɔ kwɔlɔ mli lɛ yeee lɛ fɛɛ efite gbɔmɛi ashika ni amɛkɛyato lɛ, ni ényɛ mɛi anɔ ni amɛŋmɛɛ nibii ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ he.
Nyɛmimɛi ni oshãra enina amɛ lɛ baa jɛmɛ, ni amɛnine shɛɔ nibii ni amɛtaoɔ lɛ anɔ, ni miishɛɛ sɔŋŋ ni amɛnáa lɛ hãa amɛteaŋ mɛi pii ahiŋmɛiaŋ kpalaa nu.
Efo ni ekɛ yaafonui lɛ fɔ Yesu naji ahe, ni ekɛ eyitsɔi tsumɔ.
Afii ohai komɛi asɛɛ lɛ, “Agagnyo Haman” ni ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ eji Agag seshinyo lɛ ka akɛ ebaabule Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ ashishi butuu.—Ester 8:3; kwɛmɔ wolo nɛɛ Yitso 15 kɛ 16 lɛ.
Fa ni ye kunim lɛ wa Katolik jamɔ yi ni amɛgbe amɛ fɛɛ yɛ nakai shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
Mɛni hewɔ obaakɛɛ akɛ akolonto “bibioo” lɛ nyɛɛɛ akpata “mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi” lɛ ahiɛ lɛ?
Ni eeejie hiɛhaanɔ ni aŋɔha majimaji fɛɛ hiɛ lɛ, kɛ muhɔɔ ni alɛɛ mli aha jeŋmaji fɛɛ nɔ lɛ yɛ nɛkɛ gɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ.
Kɛlɛ Rut tee nɔ etsu, be pɛ ni ejɔɔ ehe ji kɛ́ ebaatsumɔ ehiɛ latsa loo eyaaye shwane nii yɛ “shĩa”—ekolɛ shĩa nɛɛ ji agba ko ni afee koni nitsulɔi lɛ ata shishi kɛjɔɔ amɛhe.
Shi nɔ ni ejaaa yɛ amɛnifeemɔi lɛ amli ji akɛ, ‘amɛhaaa amɛhiɛ ahi’ Nyɔŋmɔ yiŋtoo akɛ ebaakpata nakai beaŋ jeŋ fɔŋ lɛ hiɛ kɛtsɔ nu afua ni ekɛbaahà shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.
Kɛ́ ekɛ wɔhe eshai lɛ ke wɔ lɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni ekɔ kotsa ní ekɛtsumɔ kɛjɛ jɛmɛ kwraa.
Beni Yehowa bɔɔ haomɔ ni ji kpawo lɛ he kɔkɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ Farao akɛ kulɛ E-baanyɛ ekpata lɛ Farao lɛ kɛ ewebii lɛ ahiɛ kɛjɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ yɛ gbɛ ni waaa kwraa nɔ.
Nyɔŋmɔ gbalɔ Yesaia tsɔ hiɛ egba afii ohai abɔ ni eho lɛ amli akɛ: “[Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ] eeemi gbele kɛaatee naanɔ; ni Nuŋtsɔ Yehowa aaatsumɔ hiɛaŋ fɛɛ yaafonui.”
21 Nakai be lɛ mli lɛ, Yoshua bule Anakbii+ lɛ ashishi kɛje gɔji lɛ anɔ kɛ Hebron kɛ Debir kɛ Anab kɛ Yuda gɔji lɛ fɛɛ anɔ kɛ Israel gɔji lɛ fɛɛ anɔ.
* (1 Mose 18:23-32) Ni beni Yehowa jie eyiŋtoo kpo akɛ ebaakpata Israel maŋ lɛ hiɛ —yɛ be ko mli lɛ, yɛ wɔŋjamɔ hewɔ, yɛ be kroko hu mli lɛ, yɛ atuatsemɔ hewɔ lɛ —Mose kɛ Yehowa wie yɛ bei sɔrɔtoi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ mli tamɔ nɔ ni ekɛ adesa kroko miiwie.
Yɛ toiboo mli lɛ, “maŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ yiŋ amɛtee ni amɛyaye nii ni amɛnu nɔ ko ni amɛkɛ ekomɛi maje, ni amɛná miishɛɛ babaoo; ejaakɛ wiemɔi ni ajaje atsɔɔ amɛ lɛ amɛnu shishi.”—Nehemia 8:10-12.
Enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, kɛ ebaahi lɛ, esa akɛ ato gbɛkɛ niyeli he gbɛjianɔ oya bɔ ni sa, koni weku lɛ ana be ni fa saŋŋ kɛha niyeli, ni amɛsaa amɛhe, ni amɛshɛ kpee lɛ shishi dani aje shishi.
Ewie akɛ tso lɛ ni agu eyeli lɛ ejaaa; eji hewalɛ ni akɛmiitsu nii yɛ gbɛ ni ejaaa nɔ.
+ 33 No hewɔ lɛ, minyɛmimɛi, kɛ́ nyɛbua nyɛhe naa kɛhã niyeli nɛɛ, nyɛmɛa nyɛhe.
Awieɔ akɛ ayɛi fãa kɛshĩɔ amɛgbɔmɔtsei lɛ yɛ nyɔɔŋ teŋ ni amɛfilikiɔ kɛyaa, ni amɛkɛ ayɛi krokomɛi yakpeɔ, aloo amɛkpeɔ mɛi ni amɛnine shɛɔ amɛnɔ lɛ ni amɛgboiɔ.
Abonsam kɛ “heloo lɛ sɛɛdii nii” lɛ tsuɔ nii kɛkaa mɛi koni amɛkɛ amɛhe awo jeŋba sha mli loo amɛfee niyenii he fu loo amɛnu dãa fe nine.
(Kpojiemɔ 21:4) “Amɛaamamɔ tsũi, ni amɛaahi mli, ni amɛaafee weintromi, ni amɛaaye mli yibii!” —Yesaia 65:21.
“Amɛaanyɛ ajwamaŋ lɛ, ni amɛaafee lɛ amaŋfɔ, ni amɛaaŋmɛ lɛ yayai, ni amɛaaye eheloo, ni amɛkɛ la aaashã lɛ.”
Susumɔ enɛ he okwɛ: Dani wɔbaaye niyenii hee ko lɛ, klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ wɔbaasumɔ ni wɔle nibii ni akɛhoo.
Nyɛbayea nii.
Anɔkwa, no mli lɛ ekaselɔi lɛ ebakɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Rabi, ye nɔ ko.”
Kɛ amɛyɛ subaŋ ni ji amɛsuɔmɔ mli ni amɛaajɛ amɛbo Yehowa toi ni amɛye ewiemɔi anɔ lɛ, no lɛ amɛbaaye shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nii kpakpai lɛ.
Nɔ ni aŋma afɔ̃ shi lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Shi beni amɛyeɔ nii lɛ, Yesu kɔ aboloo, ni ejɔɔ nɔ ni ekumɔ mli, ni eŋɔha ekaselɔi lɛ, ni ekɛɛ: Nyɛhea nyɛyea!
Eye nii ni etɔ, ni eshi niyenii lɛ eko koni ekɛyaha Naomi yɛ shia.—Rut 2:14.
Ni baalabii yeɔ nɔ ni amɛshiɔ lɛ mli babaoo.
Ni kɛlɛ, bɔ ni nibii balɛ eha hewɔ lɛ, abuuu David kɛ emɛi ni fata ehe lɛ fɔ yɛ ye ni amɛye lɛ hewɔ.
Yiŋtoo ni ha ashwie Adam kɛjɛ trom lɛ mli lɛ ji koni “ekakpã enine mli, ni etse wala tso lɛ yibii lɛ hu eko, ni eye, ni ehiɛ miikã kɛmiiya naanɔ,” hɛɛ, ni ehi shi kɛmiiya naanɔ!
+ 10 Be ni nyɛkã he nyɛmiiye afi ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli nibaa nii lɛ, ehe baahia ni nyɛjie emomo lɛ koni nyɛná gbɛ kɛhã ehee lɛ.
Niyeli Be Jeee Be Kɛha Niyeli Kɛkɛ!
Akɛni atsu sane lɛ he nii agbe naa hewɔ lɛ, Hana “yiŋ etee, ni eyaye nii, ni ehiɛ efeee tɔtɔɔtɔ dɔŋŋ.”—1 Samuel 1:17, 18.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, be ni Farisifoi lɛ na Yesu ni etee okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ ko shishi yɛ Mateo shĩa lɛ, amɛbi kaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Mɛni hewɔ nyɛtsɔɔlɔ lɛ kɛ toohelɔi kɛ eshafeelɔi yeɔ nii lɛ?”
Ebi Hawa yɛ Eden akɛ: ‘Lɛɛlɛŋ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ akɛ: Nyɛkaye trom lɛ mli tsei ayibii lɛ fɛɛ eko lɛ?’
Efã Mose ni ekɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: “Kɛ nyɛyashɛ shikpɔŋ ni mikɛ nyɛ yaa nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni eba mli akɛ nyɛye shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ aboloo lɛ eko lɛ, nyɛshãa nɔwómɔ afɔle nyɛhaa Yehowa.”
Yɛ Mose sɛɛkuu mli lɛ, ebanina nɛkɛ atuatselɔi ni amɛbua amɛhe naa nɛɛ ni amɛmiiye nii, amɛmiinu nii, amɛmiijo, ni amɛmiikoto shi amɛmiiha shika tsinabi ko!
(3 Mose 19:5, 6; 22:21; 4 Mose 15:8-10) Ekɛ tsĩ ni etsĩɔ enɛɛmɛi atã lɛ miitsɔɔ akɛ eyɛ mumɔŋ shidaamɔ, ni yɛ nakai beaŋ nɔŋŋ lɛ, eeha nuu lɛ miile akɛ nibii kpakpai babaoo yɛ eshia ni amɛbaaye ní amɛnu.
Yoo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Ekolɛ mileee bɔ ni akɛ shika toɔ moŋ, shi miwu hu leee bɔ ni nibii—tamɔ niyenii, nibii ni akɛsaa tsũ mli, kɛ weku lɛ hiamɔ nii krokomɛi—ajara ewa eha, ni miji mɔ ni hiɔ shĩa titri.
Ekolɛ be ni odaa lɛ, onyɛɛɛ oná hekɛnɔfɔɔ yɛ bo diɛŋtsɛ omli.
Ekolɛ onitsumɔ je odɛŋ loo okɛ naagbai kpe yɛ skul.
Kɛ́ nɔ ko wo ohe gbeyei lɛ mɛni ofeɔ? — Ekolɛ oyaa omami kɛ opapa ŋɔɔ koni amɛwa bo.
Awie akɛ nibii amlitaolɔ ko po kɛ “miishɛɛ hekɛnɔfɔɔ wie . . . akɛ nine baashɛ ŋaa gbɛ̀i ni atsɔɔ nɔ atsuɔ wala yibii ahilɛ mli hiɛyaa he nii lɛ nɔ yɛ be ni sa mli, koni ehere [wɔ] yiwala kɛtsɔ gbɔlɛ sɛɛ ni eeefo, ekolɛ etsake lɛ sɛɛsɛɛ kwraa lɛ nɔ.”
Ni mibɔi he jwɛŋmɔ akɛ, ‘Kɛji nyɛmimɛi hii ni susuɔ mumɔŋ nibii ahe waa lɛ bɛ mihe miishɛɛ lɛ, no lɛ ekolɛ mibɛ Kristofoi asui kpakpai ni he hiaa lɛ loo ekolɛ mihe kɛkɛ ni bɛ fɛo.’”
(Aloo ewekunyo ko, ekolɛ efɔlɔ egbo, ni abaafee yara lɛ yɛ sɔlemɔtsu ko mli.)
Shi kɛlɛ, mitee nɔ misusu lolo akɛ, ‘Ekolɛ wɔbaanyɛ wɔna otii komɛi ni wɔkpaa gbee yɛ he, yɛ jamɔ mli sane nɛɛ he, aleee nɔ.’
Yɛ ojotswaa kɛ amimyeli ni egbɛ eshwã lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ—loo yɛ no hewɔ lɛ—mɛi krokomɛi náa aŋkroaŋkroi ni yeɔ anɔkwa lɛ ahe miishɛɛ
Aloo ekolɛ, oosumɔ ni owie yɛ naajɔlɛ kɛ nilee mli beni mɛi krokomɛi ní ebɔle bo lɛ amli efu waa lɛ.
Yɛ be mli ni etsɔɔ sui kpakpai ni eyɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Ekolɛ misumɔɔɔ ni makai nibii fɔji lɛ, shi minyɛɛɛ masusu nɔ ko ni ehiii ni yɔɔ ehe lɛ he.
Aloo ekolɛ amɛnaa tɔmɔ yɛ wiemɔ ní awieɔ akɛ wɔŋjalɔi amaŋ ko nɔ maŋtsɛ ji mɔ ni baakpɔ̃ Israel, yɛ maŋtsɛ ní jɛ David we lɛ moŋ najiaŋ lɛ he.
Eeenyɛ efee akɛ karate ni Kojo kase hewɔ lɛ, ekwɛɔ ehe nɔ jogbaŋŋ yɛ saji ahe, ejaakɛ ekpɛlɛɛɛ saji anɔ ja atsɔ eyiŋ ni ena odaseyeli ko kɛjɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli dã.
Ekolɛ wɔkane kɛjɛ wolo mli.
Ekolɛ ená nakai tsɛŋemɔ hela lɛ kɛtsɔ bɔlɛnamɔ mli jeŋba shara ko nɔ dani atsɛ he baa aloo yɛ no be lɛ mli.
Ekolɛ ekɛ miishɛɛ ni bɛ moŋ yɔɔ tsakpãa.”
Ekolɛ wɔnyɛ wɔha mɔ ko ná Maŋtsɛyeli shɛɛ sane lɛ he miishɛɛ kɛtsɔ hiɛkpamɔ wiemɔ ko ni mɔɔ shi ni wɔkɛtsu nii loo gbɛ ni wɔtsɔ nɔ wɔkɛ lɛ susu nii ahe lɛ nɔ.
Ekolɛ, be kroko kɛ́ miba lɛ, wɔbaasusu he.
Mɛni obaanyɛ ofee oha amɛ?— Ekolɛ obaanyɛ oye obua amɛ ni amɛkɛ amɛshwɛmɔ nii lɛ ayato kɛ́ amɛkɛshwɛ amɛgbe naa.
12 Nifeemɔ kroko ni yeɔ buaa ji ni yɛ gbi kome loo gbii enyɔ mli lɛ, ogba nɔ ni okase lɛ otsɔɔ mɔ kroko, ekolɛ skul naanyo, naanyo nitsulɔ, loo akutsoŋnyo ko.
Ekolɛ maŋnyɛ ni he yɔɔ fɛo waa nɛɛ ebuuu ewu, ni nɔ ni efee lɛ bafee nɔkwɛmɔnɔ gbonyo kɛha ŋamɛi ni yɔɔ Persia Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli.—3/1, baafa 9.
Ekolɛ benɛ Baal bɛ dekã yɛ sane ko ni he hiaa hewɔ, aloo “ekolɛ benɛ eewɔ, koni ehiɛ atsɛ̃!”
Aloo ekolɛ ehefɛo lɛ laka amɛ.
Ekolɛ mɛnɛɛmɛi ateŋ mɛi komɛi hu baagboi yɛ hemɔkɛyeli mli ni amɛnaaa nibii fɛɛ ni awo shi yɛ he lɛ amlibaa yɛ amɛwala be mli.
Bei pii lɛ, okulafo lɛ tsui kumɔɔ, ehe feɔ shoo, ni ekolɛ emli baafu loo ebaashwa ehe po.

17 Hɛɛ, eji nɔ ni woɔ mɔ hemɔkɛyeli hewalɛ akɛ aaasusu Yesaia yitso 60 lɛ mli saji otii lɛ ahe.

10 Akɛ Yerusalem wie yɛ biɛ tamɔ nɔ ni eji ŋa kɛ biianyɛ ní hiɔ buui amli, taakɛ Sara hi buui amli lɛ.
Yɛ afi 1977 lɛ, miŋa ni ji minaanyo anɔkwafo ni misumɔɔ lɛ waa lɛ tsɔ̃ esɛɛ.
Nɔ ni aŋma afɔ̃ shi yɛ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ kaneɔ akɛ: “Ni Miriam kɛ Aaron wie Mose he yɛ Kushyoo ni eyaŋɔ lɛ hewɔ; . . .

Shi kɛha mɛi ni baanyɛ afee nakai lɛ, aajie shi ni amɛaadamɔ jaŋŋ beni amɛwieɔ amɛtsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ yi bɔ ni afee ni ekafee tamɔ nɔ ni amɛbɛ mɔ bulɛ loo amɛkɛ faikpamɔ miiha.
Beni amɛyoo akɛ abaafee Gilead skul lɛ yɛ Ŋleshi wiemɔ mli lɛ, amɛteŋ mɛi fioo ko tee asafoi ni wieɔ Ŋleshi lɛ amli bɔni afee ni bɔ ni amɛwieɔ Ŋleshi Blɔfo amɛhaa lɛ aya hiɛ.
3 Ha Biblia lɛ Awie: Kɛ́ wɔtee shiɛmɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔha Biblia lɛ awie.
Sɛɛ mli lɛ, amɛyafata nyɛmimɛi lɛ ahe, ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛfee ekome kɛsɔle akɛ: “Nuŋtsɔ, kwɛmɔ amɛhe gbeyei ni amɛwoɔ lɛ, ni oha otsuji lɛ kɛ ekãa pii ajaje owiemɔ lɛ.”
Hiamɔ ni yɔɔ yɛ nɔkwɛlɔi agbɛfaŋ lɛ da aahu akɛ eyɛ mli akɛ minyɛɛɛ mawie Spanish wiemɔ lɛ moŋ, shi yɛ nyɔŋ kome mli lɛ, miikwɛ kuu bibioo ko nɔ.
No sɛɛ lɛ, hii kɛ yei Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishelɔi babua amɛhe naa ni amɛnaa kpɛ amɛhe beni amɛnu ni kaselɔi nɛɛ ‘miiwie wiemɔi srɔtoisrɔtoi’ lɛ.
Osɔfo lɛ miiwie maŋhedɔɔ ni teeɔ ta ni awuɔ shi, ní yɛ nakai be lɛ mli lɛ efiteɔ hiŋmɛigbelemɔ lɛ he.
Kɛ́ mɔ ko kpa muu nɔŋŋ lɛ, adesai baanyɛ abɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛtsiɛ̃ ehiɛ.
(Yeremia 20:9) Ebaakanya bo waa koni okɛ mɛi krokomɛi awie Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ eyiŋtoi lɛ ahe. —2 Korintobii 4:13.

“Minyɛmimɛi, kɛji nyɛgbee kaai srɔtoi pii amli lɛ, nyɛbua lɛ miishɛɛ sɔŋŋ; ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nyɛhemɔkɛyeli kaa lɛ tsɛɔ tsuishiŋmɛɛ kɛbaa.”—YAKOBO 1:2, 3.
Yɛ afi 1977 lɛ, miŋa ni ji minaanyo anɔkwafo ni misumɔɔ lɛ waa lɛ tsɔ̃ esɛɛ.
Awo sumɔɔ ni mikɛ mipapa ashwɛ Frɛntsibii ashwɛmɔ ko koni wɔkɛjie wɔhiɛtserɛ, eyɛ mli moŋ akɛ minyaaa nakai shwɛmɔ lɛ he.

“Kɛlɛ, gbi ko Hɔgbaa lɛ, minu nɔ ko ni ha mitsake misusumɔ.

Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, Paulo naagbee ŋaawoo ni ekɛha Korintobii lɛ sa jogbaŋŋ ŋmɛnɛ taakɛ eji afii akpei enyɔ ni eho nɛ lɛ akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ, minyɛmimɛi ni misumɔɔ, nyɛfia shi ni nyɛkagbugbãa, ni nyɛtekea nɔ yɛ Nuntsɔ lɛ nitsumɔ lɛ mli daa nɛɛ, ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nyɛmɔdɛŋbɔɔ lɛ efeee yaka yɛ Nuntsɔ lɛ mli.”—1 Korintobii 15:58.

Kaimɔ akɛ ekɛɛ: “Nyɛwoa mipã lɛ nyɛfɔa nyɛnɔ ni nyɛkasea mi.”
Eba, ni mikɛ lɛ gba Biblia lɛ mli saji babaoo ni woɔ mɔ hewalɛ, oya nɔŋŋ kɛkɛ ni ekpɛlɛ koni mikɛ lɛ akase Biblia lɛ daa.
Sɔɔmɔ ni Mikɛhaa Yehowa lɛ Mlilɛɛmɔ
Eyɛ mli akɛ miwu eje mli moŋ, shi eshwɛko mikome too.

No hewɔ lɛ, mikɛ migbɛbimɔ wolo yaha.”
+ 32 Ni Yehu wó ehiɛ nɔ ekwɛ samfɛlɛ lɛ naa, ni ebi akɛ: “Namɔ yɔɔ migbɛfaŋ?

Mikɛ Yehowa Odasefoi ná sharamɔ dani mikɛ mihefatalɔ lɛ gbala mli.

26 “Kɛ́ oná oyashɛ shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛhãa bo akɛ gboshinii lɛ nɔ, ni oŋɔ akɛ onɔ, ni ohi nɔ lɛ, 2 jiemɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nibaa nii* lɛ fɛɛ mli klɛŋklɛŋ yibii ni obaakpa yɛ oshikpɔŋ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛhãa bo lɛ nɔ lɛ eko, ní okɛwo kɛntɛŋ mli ní oya he ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baahala koni ehã egbɛ́i lɛ ahi jɛmɛ lɛ.
Akɛ heloonaa jɔɔmɔi baafata mumɔŋ jɔɔmɔi ni wɔyɔɔ amrɔ nɛɛ he yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ shishi.

Odasefoi miisumɔ ni amɛná Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔmɔ, ni akɛni amɛmiisumɔ amɛnanemɛi hewɔ lɛ, amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛnanemɛi lɛ ana jɔɔmɔ ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ.
Jeee toiŋjɔlɛ babaoo ní jɛ Yehowa ŋɔɔ kɛkɛ akɛbaajɔɔ Yerusalem, shi moŋ kɛ “jeŋmaji lɛ anunyam lɛ hu,” ní hoɔ kɛbaa Nyɔŋmɔ webii anɔ ní ejɔɔ amɛ hu lɛ.
(Hebribii 13:4; Lala 18:30; Jajelɔ 5:3) Kɛfata he lɛ, taakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nɛɔ jɔɔmɔi babaoo eshwieɔ onɔ yɛ mɔdɛŋ ni obɔɔ koni okɛ ohe awo shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli ni oya kpeei daa lɛ hewɔ lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ Yehowa baajɔɔ bo kɛ́ obɔ mɔdɛŋ owo ogbala lɛ hiɛ nyam lɛ.—1 Tesalonikabii 1:3; Hebribii 6:10.
(1 Korintobii 4:17) Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ Paulo nitsɔɔmɔ gbɛ̀i lɛ anɔ, tamɔ bɔ ni ebaajɔɔ wɔ tsuishiŋmɛɛ yɛ sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛmɔ mli yɛ faŋŋ kɛ shia kɛ shia, yɛ sɛɛsaramɔi amli, yɛ shia Biblia mli nikasemɔi amli, kɛ he fɛɛ he ni aaana gbɔmɛi yɛ.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 17:17.
Mɛi ni egbɔlɔ ni kɛ sɔɔmɔ krɔŋŋ haa Nyɔŋmɔ amrɔ nɛɛ baanyɛ aye Yehowa jɔɔmɔ ni yɔɔ amɛnɔ lɛ he odase, taakɛ ajɔɔ Hana yɛ gbɛ krɛdɛɛ nɔ afii ohai abɔ ni eho nɛ lɛ.
3 Ajie wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ Yesu Kristo Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ e-Tsɛ lɛ yi, ejaakɛ yɛ ekome ni wɔ kɛ Kristo efee lɛ hewɔ lɛ, ejɔɔ wɔ kɛ mumɔŋ jɔɔmɔ fɛɛ jɔɔmɔ yɛ ŋwɛiniiaŋ,+ 4 tamɔ bɔ ni ehala wɔ dani ato je lɛ shishi,* ni wɔ kɛ lɛ* afee ekome koni wɔfee krɔŋkrɔŋ ni kpa ko akahi wɔhe+ yɛ ehiɛ yɛ suɔmɔ mli lɛ.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, amɛje sɔlemɔ lɛ shishi kɛ fai ni amɛkpa amɛha Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ akɛ: ‘Ha amɛjie onunyam gbɛ́i lɛ ní kwɔ fe yijiemɔ kɛ kafomɔ fɛɛ lɛ yi.’—Neh.
Yehowa jɔɔ Yesu hu ejaakɛ efee eŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ suɔmɔnaa nii, ni E-jɔɔ obalaŋta ko ji jɛ Colombia ni nyiɛ ehenilee ni Biblia etsɔse lɛ lɛ sɛɛ ni etswa efai shi akɛ ebaafee Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ.
Kɛji wɔhiɛ jeŋba kpakpa mli lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔmɔi ahe miishɛɛ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔhiɛ hekɛnɔfɔɔ kpakpa ni kɔɔ wɔsɛɛ jɔɔmɔi ni bɛ naagbee lɛ he lɛ mli.
Yehowa Odasefoi miisumɔ ni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ amɛnine ashɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔmɔ nɔ kɛtsɔ Maŋtsɛyeli ni awo shi yɛ he lɛ nɔ, ni yɛ suɔmɔ ni amɛyɔɔ kɛha amɛ akutseiaŋbii hewɔ lɛ, amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛ hu amɛna nakai jɔɔmɔ lɛ eko.

6 “Abaajɔɔ bo kɛ́ oba shĩa, ni abaajɔɔ bo kɛ́ oje kpo.
3 Beni Nyɔŋmɔ bi Israel Maŋtsɛ Salomo nɔ̃ jɔɔmɔ ni etaoɔ lɛ, nɔyelɔ ni edako nɛɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Ha otsulɔ toiboo tsui, ni mikɛkojo omaŋ lɛ, koni mayoo nɔ ni hi kɛ nɔ ni ehiii.”
Wɔmiiwo bo hewalɛ koni okɛ gbɛjianɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ eto koni ekɛ jɔɔmɔi nɛɛ fɛɛ aba lɛ atsu nii.
Biblia mli lalatsɛ lɛ tsɔɔ wɔhenumɔi beni eŋma akɛ: “Makafoo, mi-Nyɔŋmɔ, maŋtsɛ, ni majie ogbɛi lɛ yi daa kɛaatee naanɔ!
Akɛ yijiemɔ fɛɛ baaha Bɔlɔ ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ, ni adesa fɛɛ adesa toibolɔ baati lalatsɛ lɛ wiemɔi lɛ amli kɛ gbee ni wa akɛ: “Makafoo, mi-Nyɔŋmɔ, Maŋtsɛ, ni majie ogbɛi lɛ yi daa kɛaatee naanɔ! . . .
Nibii ni enɛ biɔ ni wɔfee lɛ ekomɛi ji, ni wɔkane Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ ni wɔjwɛŋ nɔ, wɔsɔle wɔhã Yehowa, ni wɔjwɛŋ gbɛi srɔtoi ni Yehowa ejɔɔ wɔ akɛ aŋkroaŋkroi lɛ anɔ.
Kɛlɛ, obaanyɛ oná nɔmimaa akɛ kɛ́ wɔtsu nitsumɔ ni yaa nɔ yɛ mumɔŋ sɔlemɔwe lɛ he nii yɛ bɔ ni Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ taoɔ akɛ atsu he nii aha lɛ naa lɛ, no lɛ ebaaya nɔ ejɔɔ wɔ.
Ná nɔmimaa akɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baajɔɔ fɔlɔi fɛɛ ni yeɔ amɛbuaa amɛbii koni amɛkɛ mumɔŋ otii amamɔ amɛhiɛ ni amɛshɛ he lɛ waa.
Kɛ́ obɔi yɔsemɔ akɛ sɛɛnamɔi yɛ Biblia mli shishitoo mlai ní okɛtsuɔ nii yɛ oshihilɛ mli lɛ he lɛ, no lɛ hiɛsɔɔ ni oyɔɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ baaya hiɛ.
Akɛni amrɔ nɛɛ miye afii 98 hewɔ lɛ, migbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ tamɔɔɔ bɔ ni eji tsutsu lɛ, shi miyɛ he miishɛɛ akɛ minyɛɔ miyeɔ gbɔmɛi odase yɛ Yehowa shiwoi ni yɔɔ nyam kɛha wɔsɛɛ lɛ he lolo.
Etsɔɔ mli yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ akɛ: “Ekolɛ maha loo mihaŋ oha mlijaa 10, shi miyɛ onia ni mitsuɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ, ni miyɛ nɔmimaa akɛ Yehowa hu yɛ he miishɛɛ.”
Nyɛmi nuu ko ni eye afii 95 ni atsɛɔ lɛ Harold ní boteee gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Eyɛ mli akɛ kɛ́ miyɛ mɛi amasɛi loo miifee mɛi gbɔ lɛ mináa miishɛɛ moŋ, shi kɛ́ mikome pɛ miyɛ he ko po lɛ, mihe efeee shoo kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Miimɛ ni mabote gbalashihilɛ mli, ni kɛji mibote mli lɛ, ebaaŋɔɔ minaa waa akɛ makɛɛ nyɛmi nuu ni kɛ mi ebote gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ akɛ mihi shi yɛ hetsemɔ mli.”
28 Nyɛnu akɛ mikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, ‘Miishi kɛmiiya, ni maba nyɛŋɔɔ ekoŋŋ.’
Kɛ́ miiya shiɛmɔ jio, miyatsu nii yɛ he ni abaafee kpeei wuji yɛ jio, loo miyaha maŋshiɛmɔ yɛ asafoi krokomɛi amli jio lɛ, ekɛ mi nɔŋŋ, ja nɔ ko tsĩ enaa.
+ 23 ‘Bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, mafee migbɛ́i kpeteŋkpele+ lɛ ni abule yɛ jeŋmaji lɛ ateŋ, nɔ ni nyɛbule yɛ amɛteŋ lɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ; ni kɛ́ afee mi krɔŋkrɔŋ yɛ nyɛteŋ yɛ amɛhiɛ lɛ,’ Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa kɛɛ, ‘jeŋmaji lɛ baaná ale akɛ miji Yehowa.
Ni kɛji miyɛ gbalɛ, ni minaa teemɔŋ nii fɛɛ naa, ni mile nii fɛɛ, ni kɛji miyɛ hemɔkɛyeli fɛɛ hu, bɔ ni manyɛ gɔji matsirɛ, shi mibɛ suɔmɔ lɛ, jikulɛ mijeee nɔ ko.”
Ni kɛji mitee ni miyasaa gbɛhe mito nyɛ lɛ, mibaba ekoŋŋ ni mibabaŋɔ nyɛ kɛya he ni mi diɛŋtsɛ miyɔɔ lɛ, koni he ni miyɔɔ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛhi jɛi.”
Amrɔ nɛɛ, mi kɛ mɛi enumɔ kaseɔ Biblia lɛ, ni minuɔ he akɛ mifata mɛi ni tsuɔ nitsumɔ ni haa mɔ tsui nyɔɔ emli fe fɛɛ lɛ ahe.”

17 Shi kɛ́ aafɔse mi tamɔ dãa afɔle+ aashwie afɔle+ lɛ kɛ sɔɔmɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ* ni nyɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ egbala nyɛ kɛba he lɛ nɔ po lɛ, maná he miishɛɛ, ni mikɛ nyɛ fɛɛ baaná miishɛɛ waa.

3 No hewɔ lɛ, mitsu mɛi kɛtee amɛŋɔɔ akɛ: “Nitsumɔ ni mitsuɔ lɛ da, ni minyɛŋ makpeleke shi.
Miida Yehowa shi waa akɛ miyɛ wala mli ni mifata ewebii ahe, ni ákɛ, mi kɛ mɛi krokomɛi babaoo ni fata he lɛ baanyɛ aha ale egbɛi lɛ.
(2 Korintobii 12:9, 10) Yɛ niiashikpamɔ ni Paulo diɛŋtsɛ ná hewɔ lɛ, ebaanyɛ ejaje kɛ nɔmimaa akɛ: “Jeee akɛ fimɔ naa miwieɔ nɛɛ; ejaakɛ mi lɛ mikase akɛ shihilɛ fɛɛ shihilɛ ni miyɔɔ mli lɛ mimii ashɛ he.
Yoo ni werɛ eho ehe waa ji mi;* minuko wain ko loo dãa ni wa ko, shi moŋ, miifɔse mitsuiŋ* miishwie Yehowa hiɛ.
+ 30 Kɛ́ midaa shi dani miyeɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ awie mihe efɔŋ yɛ nii ni midaa shi yɛ he lɛ hewɔ?
Ŋmɛnɛ, mile akɛ miyɛ miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ, yɛ be mli ni mikɛ mihe woɔ Yehowa sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli kwraa kɛmɔɔ shi lɛ.
Eshwɛ mi kome pɛ, ni miishe gbeyei akɛ abaagbe mi.’
Miiŋɔ nibii ni miyɔɔ lɛ fã miihã ohiafoi, ni nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni mishɔ̃ yɛ mɔ ko dɛŋ lɛ, miiku miibɔ he toi ejwɛ miihã lɛ.”
11 Jeee hiamɔ ni ehia mi hewɔ miwieɔ enɛ, ejaakɛ mi lɛ, mikase akɛ mahã mimii ashɛ nii ni miyɔɔ lɛ ahe, ekɔɔɔ he eko shihilɛ mli ni miyɔɔ.
Hulu loo nyɔɔŋtsere kpɛmɔ nyɛŋ ekɛ Yehowa anunyam lɛ aye egbɔ kɔkɔɔkɔ
Hulu lɛ da kwraa fe shikpɔŋ lɛ toi 330,000
Afii komɛi ni eho lɛ, Vancouver, Canada, adafitswaa wolo The Sun lɛ jaje akɛ: “Ekolɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jamɔ ni ato he gbɛjianɔ lɛ fɛɛ agbɔjɔmɔ ji akɛ sɔlemɔ lɛ nyiɛɔ aflaŋaa lɛ sɛɛ . . .
Amrɔ nɛɛ po, Babilon jamɔ sɛɛ ni afiɔ lɛ miita yɛ hei pii, ni etsɔɔ nɔ ni baaba beni “maŋtsɛmɛi ni jɛ hulu shitee he” lɛ tutuaa lɛ lɛ.
Habakuk wiemɔi lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ nyɔɔŋ baatsɔ shwane ni shwane baakpɛ́ waa fe bɔ ni hulutsoo baanyɛ eha efee.
23 Be ni Lot yashɛ Zoar lɛ, no mli lɛ hulu eje.
Sun lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ, eheɔ eyeɔ hu akɛ “esa akɛ je lɛŋ jamɔi lɛ fɛɛ afee gbɛjianɔtoo hee ni tamɔ Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ lɛ mli bii ni abaatsɛ amɛ akɛ Jamɔi Ekomefeemɔ.”
5:25) Paulo hu ŋma nɔ ko ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ akɛ: “Nyɛmli afũa, shi nyɛkafea esha; hulu akanyɔ shi yɛ nyɛmlila lɛ nɔ, ni asaŋ nyɛkɛ nyɛhe akafɔ̃a shi nyɛhaa abonsam.”
Akɛni srawa hewalɛ bɛ jɛmɛ hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ duŋ wo nɔŋŋ pɛ lɛ, mɛi boteɔ saa mli, ni amɛteɔ shi kɛ́ hulu je.
Eeenyɛ eba akɛ, Hɔgbaa (ni ji Phœbus kɛ Mithras kɛ agbɛnɛ hu Nuntsɔ lɛ Gbi lɛ) ni maŋtsɛ Constantine kpɛlɛ nɔ lɛ . . . ha afii ohai ejwɛ lɛ mli Kristofoi lɛ susu akɛ ehi akɛ amɛaaha Nyɔŋmɔ Bi lɛ fɔmɔ gbi kɛ hulu fɔmɔ gbi lɛ akpe.
Shi wɔyɛ moto bibioo ko hewɔ lɛ, wɔnyiɛɛɛ hulu ni naa wa lɛ nɔ pii.
Mɛi ni sumɔɔ Yehowa lɛ tamɔ hulu (31)
7 Mikɛ mijwɛŋmɔ tee yaka nii kroko ni yaa nɔ yɛ hulu shishi nɛɛ nɔ: 8 Mɔ ko yɛ ni ekome too eyɔɔ ni ebɛ mɔ ko fata ehe; ebɛ binuu loo nyɛmi nuu, shi etsuɔ nii waa ni enitsumɔ lɛ baaa naagbee.
5 Mina nɔ ko yɛ hulu shishi nɛɛ ni haoɔ mɔ, tɔmɔ ko ni mɛi ni yɔɔ hegbɛ tɔ̃ɔ,+ no ji akɛ: 6 Ahãa buului hegbɛi wuji babaoo, shi ashiɔ mɛi ni sa lɛ moŋ* yɛ gbɛhei ni baa shi.
Sanekpakpai etɛ lɛ fɛɛ tsiɔ nɔ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsɛ lɛ akɛ ŋwɛi okadii ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ lɛ ata—hulu kɛ nyɔŋtsere ni wo duŋ kɛ ŋulamii ni miigbeegbee shi.
Hɛɛ, akpɛlɛ hulu nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbijurɔyeli ni fataaa Kristojamɔ nifeemɔi ahe lɛ nɔ yɛ sɔlemɔ lɛ mli.
26 Kɛji mina hulu* lɛ miitso
Afee hulu lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ, kɛ ŋulamii lɛ koni “amɛtso yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.”
Mra mli yɛ eninaa ni kɔɔ Yesu he yɛ ŋwɛi sɔlemɔtsu lɛ mli lɛ, Yohane na akɛ Yesu hiɛ “tamɔ hulu ni tsoɔ waa.”
Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mumɔ tsirɛ Salomo koni etĩ esusumɔ lɛ mli akɛ: “Naa, nɔ ni mina nɛ: ehi ni eyɛ fɛo, akɛ gbɔmɔ aaaye ni enu ni eye nii kpakpai amli ŋɔɔmɔ yɛ edeŋme fɛɛ ni egboɔ yɛ hulu shishi nɛɛ lɛ mli, ewala gbii abɔ fɛɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ eha lɛ lɛ; ejaakɛ no ji egbɛfaŋnɔ.”—Jajelɔ 5:17.
Galileo na nibii diji komɛi hu yɛ hulu lɛ nɔ, ni ekɛ no te shi eshi jeŋ nilee kɛ jamɔŋ hemɔkɛyeli kroko ni ahiɛ akɛ hulu lɛ tsakeee, ni efiteee lɛ.
Efesobii 4:26 feɔ enɛ faŋŋ: “Nyɛmli afua, shi nyɛkafea esha; hulu akanyɔ shi yɛ nyɛmlila lɛ nɔ.”
Ni ŋwɛi ŋulamii kɛ oŋwɛ̃ kpɛŋ; hulu aaawo duŋ yɛ ekpojee mli, nyɔŋtsere hu haŋ ela lɛ akpɛ.
Nyɔŋmɔ “hulu” ni naa wa ni ji efɔbuu kojomɔ lɛ woŋ ohe gbeyei, ni kɛ aŋmɛɛ hiɛkpatamɔ kɔɔyɔi ejwɛ lɛ ahe lɛ, abaabaa oyi kɛjɛ Yehowa mlifu lɛ mli ‘la ni shaa nii’ lɛ mli.
(Mateo 5:45) Ani okadi akɛ Yesu tsi hulu lɛ tã dani etsi nugbɔ tã?
(Yesaia 30:21; Mateo 24:45-47) Gilead Skul lɛ ha mɛi ni egbe nikasemɔ lɛ naa lɛ ahiɛ sɔ tsulɔ kuu nɛɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Ni nyɛsɔlea nyɛbia Nyɔŋmɔ yelikɛbuamɔ koni nyɛna nɛkɛ suɔmɔ ni nɔ kwɔ, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yibii nɛɛ eko.—Abɛi 3:5, 6; Yohane 17:3; Galatabii 5:22; Hebribii 10:24, 25.
Klɛŋklɛŋ Korintobii 15:33 kɛ nitsumɔ baanyɛ aye abua wɔ ni wɔdi jeŋba kpakpa sɛɛ ŋmɛnɛ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
(Lala 25:4) Biblia lɛ kɛ Asafo lɛ woji ni okɛaafee teemɔŋ nikasemɔ baanyɛ aye abua bo koni obale Yehowa jogbaŋŋ.
Kɛ́ wɔkɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ha mɛi krokomɛi lɛ, jeee akɛ wɔyeɔ wɔbua amɛ kɛkɛ, shi moŋ wɔ hu wɔnáa miishɛɛ falɛ ko kɛ tsui ni nyɔɔ mɔ mli ni haa wɔnyɛɔ wɔtereɔ wɔdiɛŋtsɛ wɔjatsui lɛ.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:35.
Ye obua lɛ ni ejie kooloo lɛ.
Yehowa Odasefoi ena akɛ eji miishɛɛ jɛɛhe akɛ aaaye abua aŋkroaŋkroi ni boɔ wiemɔ lɛ toi lɛ, eyɛ mli akɛ amɛle akɛ mɛi fioo pɛ ni jɛ adesai aweku lɛ mli lɛ baakɔ wala gbɛ lɛ.
Yohane 5: 22; Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 10: 42; 2 Timoteo 4:1) Shi Ŋmalɛi lɛ kɛ saji ni yeɔ buaa haa wɔ yɛ sanebimɔ ni etsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli.
(1 Tesalonikabii 5:14) Ekolɛ mɛi ni “tsui faa” lɛ naa akɛ ekãa ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ miiba shi ni ákɛ amɛnyɛŋ amɛtsu gbɛtsii nii ni amɛkɛkpeɔ lɛ ahe nii kɛji akɛ mɔ kroko yeee ebuaaa amɛ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ skul lɛ ye kɛbua amɛ ni amɛtee amɛhiɛ akɛ shiɛlɔi, tookwɛlɔi, kɛ tsɔɔlɔi?
18. (a) Mɛni ye bua oblayoo Kristofonyo ko ni enyɛ edamɔ kaa naa beni eyaa skul lɛ?
19 Nɔ ni ji ejwɛ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔtao mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ejaakɛ suɔmɔ ji mumɔ lɛ yibii lɛ eko.
Yelikɛbuamɔ ni Akɛha Koni Aye Henumɔŋ Naagbai Anɔ Kunim
Kɛ́ ena bɔ ni nibii etee lɛ ehã lɛ, ele akɛ Yehowa miiye eebua wɔ.
Bɔ ni Yehowa, mɔ ni feeo, mɔ hu ní shɔ̃o ní eye ebuao kɛjɛ onyɛ musuŋ beebe lɛ, kɛɛ nɛ: Kaashe gbeyei, mitsulɔ Yakob, kɛ bo Yeshurun ní mihalao!”
Kɛ wɔyɛ nɛkɛ nibii nɛɛ ahe mumɔŋ shishinumɔ lɛlɛŋ lɛ, enɛ baaye abua wɔ ni ‘wɔnyiɛ bɔ ni sa Yehowa hiɛ ni wɔsa ehiɛ kwraa.’—Kol.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 17:11) Amɛkpa Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli jogbaŋŋ koni amɛnu Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ, ni enɛ ye bua amɛ ni amɛtee nɔ amɛfee toiboo kɛjie suɔmɔ kpo.
Shi efɔlɔi kɛ mɛi krokomɛi ni yɔɔ esafo lɛ mli lɛ ye amɛbua lɛ ni enyɛ eshɛ oti ni ekɛma ehiɛ akɛ ebaatsɔ daa gbɛgbalɔ lɛ he.
Wiemɔi kpakpai yeɔ ebuaa ni ehaa gbalashihilɛ feɔ miishɛɛ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Kɛkɛ ni kaselɔ Yakobo kane Ŋmalɛ mli sane ko ni ye ebua mɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ koni amɛyɔse Yehowa suɔmɔnaa nii ni yɔɔ sane lɛ mli lɛ.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 15:4-17.
Hebri Ŋmalɛi lɛ gba yɛ Kristo Yesu he akɛ: “Eeejie ohiafoi ni bolɔɔ lɛ, kɛ nɔnalɔ ni bɛ bualɔ lɛ.
(3) Kanemɔ ŋmalɛi ni akpakpaa amɛ afã lɛ, ni okɛ sanebimɔi ni sa atsu nii kɛye abua shiatsɛ lɛ ni ena bɔ ni ŋmalɛi lɛ hãa sanebimɔi ni anɔmba lɛ ahetoo.
Yelikɛbuamɔ kɛhã wekui
Ehe bahia waa ni aye abua amɛ ni amɛhiɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli jeŋba he tɛi ni nɔ kwɔlɔ lɛ amli kpɛŋŋ.
Shi amrɔ nɛɛ miyɛ ŋa ni misumɔɔ lɛ waa kɛ bihii enyɔ, ni wɔfeɔ ekome akɛ weku kɛyeɔ wɔbuaa mɛi krokomɛi ni amɛkaseɔ anɔkwalei ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he, ni enɛ haa wɔnáa miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
Mɛɛ sɛɛnamɔi Mose kɛɛ eyɔɔ suɔmɔ ni anáa ahaa Yehowa lɛ he?
6 Akɛni eyɔɔ suɔmɔ diɛŋtsɛ kɛha enyɛmi Kristofonyo lɛ hewɔ lɛ, Paulo wo Timoteo hewalɛ akɛ: “Shi bo lɛ, . . . joo nibii nɛɛ anaa foi,” “Wu hemɔkɛyeli ta kpakpa lɛ.”
(Kolosebii 3:20) Akɛ fɔlɔ lɛ, eji osɔ̃ akɛ otsɔse obi lɛ ni esumɔ Yehowa ni ebatsɔ onukpa kpakpa.
20:3, 7-10) Shi, mɛi fɛɛ ni kɛ amɛtsui fɛɛ sumɔɔ Yehowa lɛ baaná hiɛnɔkamɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
(1 Mose 13:14, 15; 2 Mose 2:5-10) Mose tee nɔ efee shiwoi nɛɛ ahe mfoniri, ni no hã ebasumɔ Yehowa waa.
Ehenɔ ji mɔ ni atsĩ etã yɛ Abɛi 17:17, akɛ: “Naanyo sumɔɔ mɔ bei fɛɛ mli, ni afɔ lɛ akɛ nyɛmi ha haomɔ be” lɛ.
10 Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi aaatsɔ ni amɛjie suɔmɔ kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛhe?
Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, kɛ wɔɔtse wɔtsui wɔŋmɛ wɔmli lɛ, ebiɔ ni wɔye wɔtsui lɛ nɔ, ni wɔtsɔ eyiŋ koni ehe eye akɛ Yehowa sumɔɔ wɔ.
Akɛni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ suɔmɔ wo wɔtsui mli hewɔ lɛ, ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ, eyɛ he miishɛɛ, ni ekã etsui nɔ waa po akɛ ebaana susumɔi kpakpai ni wɔhiɛ, kɛ nɔ hewɔ ni wɔtaoɔ wɔfee nɔ ko lɛ, ní enu shishi hu. —1 Yohane 4:7-10.
1:10) Ni kɛlɛ, amrɔ nɛɛ Kristofoi komɛi baanyɛ aŋmɛɛ ‘klɛŋklɛŋ suɔmɔ’ ni amɛná amɛha Yehowa kɛ Biblia mli anɔkwale lɛ he.
Yehowa miikpa etsuji agbɛ ní amɛshe lɛ gbeyei, ni asaŋ amɛsumɔ lɛ.
Yehowa ajie suɔmɔ ni tsakeee kpo atsɔɔ nyɛ,+ tamɔ bɔ ni nyɛjie kpo nyɛtsɔɔ hii ni egboi lɛ kɛ mi lɛ.
“Nyɔŋmɔ Sumɔ Wɔ Nɛkɛ”
19 Mɛi ni shika suɔmɔ eye amɛ sɛkɛ, ni feɔ fu loo hahaaha yɛ ninumɔ kɛ niyeli he, loo ni amɛhiɛ edɔ ni mɛi anɔ hewalɛ ni amɛaana miiba amɛtsine lɛ feɔ nɛkɛ akɔnɔi loo tsinebaa nii nɛɛ amɛ nyɔŋmɔi loo amɛ amagai.
Naanɔ Maŋtsɛ lɛ baanyiɛ wɔhiɛ blɛoo aahu kɛyashi naagbee gbii nɛɛ anaagbee kwraa, ejaakɛ David maa nɔ mi ehaa wɔ akɛ: “Yehowa baa mɛi fɛɛ ni sumɔɔ lɛ lɛ ayi; shi mɛi fɔji lɛ, eeekpata amɛ fɛɛ amɛhiɛ.”—Lala 145:16, 20.
Gbɛ Nɔ ni Wɔɔtsɔ Wɔha Wɔsuɔmɔ lɛ Mli Alɛɛ Ŋmɛnɛ
10 Hɛɛ, suɔmɔ ni amɛaana amɛha Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ amɛhe, kɛ bulɛ ni amɛaajie lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛhe hu ji nibii titrii enyɔ ni he hiaa waa yɛ gbalashihilɛ ni yeɔ omanye mli.
Ani osusuŋ osuɔlɔi lɛ ahe moŋ?
Yɛ suɔmɔ ni wɔbaasumɔ amɛ yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ mli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔfee klalo akɛ wɔkɛ wɔwala baafɔ̃ shi wɔhã amɛ.
Mijwɛŋ bɔ ni Yesu jie suɔmɔ kpo be ni mɛi wo emli la po lɛ he, ni no ye ebua mi ni mi hu mijie suɔmɔ ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ kpo mitsɔɔ yoo nɛɛ.”
Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, obaakpa gbɛ akɛ suɔmɔ ní pɛsɛmkunya bɛ mli, ní eyɔɔ kɛha amɛ nɛɛ baakanya amɛ.
Mɛɛ hegbɛi baanyɛ aba aha wɔ aŋkroaŋkro ni wɔkɛlɛɛ wɔsuɔmɔ lɛ mli?
Akɛni amɛjɛɔ suɔmɔ mli amɛkɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔi ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ hãa Yehowa tsuji lɛ hewɔ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná nɔmimaa akɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔi ni amɛkɛhãa wɔ lɛ baabu wɔhe.
Gbɛkpamɔ yɛ kɛha bo akɛ okɛ osuɔlɔi ni egboi lɛ baakpe ekoŋŋ yɛ biɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ, shi yɛ shihilɛi ni esoro no kwraa yɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ amrɔ nɛɛ lɛ he!
Wɔ Suɔmɔ Kpo ni Wɔɔjie Wɔtsɔɔ Lɛ
10 Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ: Nyɛ ko ju ebinuu fioo ko he ni esaa ehe kɛha nifeemɔ ko ni he hiaa.
Ebaagbo ákɛ “oblanyo” kɛ́ akɛmiito naanɔ wala mli ŋɔɔmɔ ní eeená lɛ he lɛ.—1 Timoteo 1:19, 20; 2 Timoteo 2:16-19.
Gbekɛ nuu ko ni no mli lɛ daimonio mumɔ yɔɔ emli ni hi shi yɛ Yesu gbii lɛ amli lɛ sane lɛ haa wɔnaa bɔ ni ŋwɛibɔfoi atuatselɔi lɛ ayitseiaŋ wala ha.
KWƐMƆ Yesu yɛ biɛ ni ekɛ eniji efua gbekɛ nuu lɛ.
Kɛkɛ ni Yokebed kɛ gbekɛ lɛ ku sɛɛ kɛtee Farao biyoo lɛ ŋɔɔ, ni ewo gbekɛ nuu lɛ gbɛi akɛ Mose, ni shishi ji “ahere eyiwala kɛjɛ nu mli.”—2 Mose 2:10.
AHALA OBLANYO TOOKWƐLƆ KO AKƐ MAŊTSƐ
Otsii etɛ sɛɛ lɛ, akɛ gbekɛ nuu lɛ ba helatsamɔhe lɛ ekoŋŋ.
Kɛkɛ lɛ Sandra kɛ esaji ahetooi lɛ eye ebua ebihii lɛ.
Gbekɛbii hii kɛ yei ni ji awusãi yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ le akɛ amɛbaanyɛ amɛya eŋɔɔ yɛ sɔlemɔ mli, ni ebaaye ebua amɛ.
FEEMƆ mami ko ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ ni miisaa ebinuu fioo ko he koni eya skul lɛ he mfoniri okwɛ.
Gbi ko lɛ, Herr Schneider tswa adafi etsɔɔ klasbii lɛ fɛɛ akɛ: “Gbekɛbii hii, wɔklas lɛ baaya shisharamɔ wɔ.”
61:1, 2) Shi beni gbekɛ lɛ hu ka akɛ eeegbele wolokpo kakadaŋŋ ni aŋmalako yitsei kɛ kukuji lɛ awoko mli lɛ, eyɔse akɛ ewa ha lɛ akɛ eeena he ni Yesaia 61 lɛ yɔɔ.
Mitsɛ kɛ minyɛ kɛ amɛbii kpaanyɔ, hii enumɔ kɛ yei etɛ ji mɛi ni feɔ wɔweku lɛ.
GALATA ní no mli lɛ efata kpokpai ni Roma nɔyeli lɛ yeɔ nɔ lɛ ahe, ní amrɔ nɛɛ eyɛ Turkey lɛ ji he ni Timoteo hi.
Shirley: Hɛɛ, miyɛ bii enyɔ —nuu kome kɛ yoo kome.
Yɛ asafo ko ni wɔyasara klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa lɛ mli lɛ, gbekɛ nuu ko ni eye afii nɛɛhu lɛ yɔse akɛ mɛi komɛi ni yɔɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ lɛ miishashao shi akɛ amɛkɛ mi baawie, ni ekpɛ eyiŋ akɛ ebaafee he nɔ ko.
146 61 Yesu Tsa Gbekɛ Nuu ko ni Yɔɔ Daimonio

“Kaadi Ehe Fɛo Sɛɛ”
NƐKƐ yoo fɛfɛo nɛɛ ji Maria.
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, weku lɛ baabote Yerusalem, “ni yɔɔ fɛo kɛwula shi lɛ.”
Layard tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Kɛji wɔŋɔ gɔŋkpɔi wuji ejwɛ ni ji Nimrud [Kala], Koyunjik [Ninive], Khorsabad, kɛ Karamles, akɛ nakai shikpɔŋ lɛ koji ejwɛ lɛ, abaana akɛ ejɛkɛmɔ yɛ ekoji ejwɛ lɛ fɛɛ nɔ lɛ kɛ stadia 480 loo shitoi 60 yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ he nilee gbɛfaŋ, ni feɔ gbii etɛ gbɛnyiɛmɔ, ni gbalɔ [Yona] kɛfa gbɛ lɛ kpaa gbee pɛpɛɛpɛ.”
Mibo toi jogbaŋŋ beni minyɛmi nuu lɛ ŋa lɛ kɛɛ mi akɛ, gbekɛ yoo ko ni he yɔɔ fɛo waa ni gbɛi ji Ann “ni ená ekãa waa” akɛni enu anɔkwale lɛ he sane lɛ baaba kpeei yɛ wɔshia lɛ.
Awie Yerusalem he akɛ ‘ehe yɛ fɛo kɛwula shi.’
Amɛfee nakai ejaakɛ amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛkɛ yei ni he yɔɔ fɛo yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ abaná bɔlɛ.
Salomo tsaa nɔ akɛ: “Yoo ni he yɔɔ fɛo ni ebɛ jeŋba kpakpa [nilee] lɛ, etamɔ shika ga ni akɛwo kpolotoo gugɔŋ.”
Ebɛ naakpɛɛ mɔ akɛ mɛi komɛi ekpɛlɛ susumɔ ko ni kɛ ehe kpãaa gbee ni niŋmalɔ ko jie lɛ kpo lɛ nɔ, mɔ ni wie akɛ: “Kɛji wɔbɔɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni wɔná miishɛɛ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná miishɛɛ waa”!
Ehe “yɛ fɛo, ni ehiɛ hu yɛ fɛo” moŋ, shi kɛ̃lɛ ejie hewulamɔ ni ji “tsuiiaŋ gbɔmɔ ni aŋɔtee lɛ, yɛ mumɔ ni he jɔ ni yɔɔ kpoo lɛ nibii ni fiteee lɛ” kpo.
Shi ani oda lɛ shi pɛŋ yɛ atatuiaŋ ni feɔ bluu, kɛ tsei kɛ amɛnɔ baaŋmɔŋ, kɛ fɔfɔii fɛfɛji lɛ ahewɔ?— Lɛ efee nomɛi hu.

‘Nyɛkpaa lɛ Mu’
Nyɛmi yoo ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Mitswa mifai shi akɛ mabote gbalashihilɛ mli yɛ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ mli, shi mifo shii abɔ yɛ be mli ni minaa ni minanemɛi lɛ kɛ Kristofoi hii kpakpai boteɔ gbalashihilɛ mli ni mi lɛ mikã he miji oshija lɛ.”
Yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔyeli shishi lɛ, Kristo sɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ miibɔ mɔdɛŋ amɛjie sui gbohii ni tamɔ kooloi anifeemɔ lɛ yɛ amɛshihilɛ mli, koni amɛkɛ amɛnyɛmimɛi Kristofoi lɛ ahi shi yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ ekomefeemɔ mli.
Lɛɛlɛŋ, amɛtsɛ amɛhe akɛ “nyɛmimɛi hii” kɛ “nyɛmimɛiyei” aahu kɛjɛ klɛŋklɛŋ afi oha Ŋ.B. kɛbaa nɛɛ mli.

MƆ NI EJI TSUTSU: JOO KƐ SHWƐMƆHE BULƆ
Yɛ oshara ni jɛɔ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ jooi komɛi, lalai komɛi ni gbɛɛɔ waa, kɛ dãa ni faa babaoo lɛ hewɔ lɛ, ayemforowumɛi ni ji Kristofoi lɛ pii ekpɛ amɛyiŋ akɛ amɛkɛ nakai nifeemɔi fataŋ nibii ni abaafee yɛ amɛyookpeemɔ lɛ shishi lɛ he.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, lala kɛ joo ebote kɛ́ hoo kwraa lɛ, kusumii fɛɛ amli, eyɛ mli akɛ yɛ shikpɔji komɛi anɔ lɛ, akɛtsuɔ nii yɛ gbɛ ni he hiaa waa nɔ.
Jooi baanyɛ ekɛ tsɔnei ni dũɔ mɔ aba, ejaakɛ ána kusum naa jooi lɛ pii kɛjɛ jooi ni kɔɔ fɔmɔ nii ahe lɛ mli ni egbalaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛyaa bɔlɛnamɔ ni esaaa nɔ.
Be ni okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ lɛ yaa nɔ lɛ, Herodia biyoo fioo ni ekɛ etsutsu wu Filipo fɔ, ni atsɛɔ lɛ Salome lɛ, ba ebajo etsɔɔ gbɔi lɛ.
35 Mizraim Hathor ji suɔmɔ kɛ miishɛɛ, lalai kɛ jooi anyɔŋmɔyoo.
Bɔ ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ná ejoo lɛ he miishɛɛ babaoo hewɔ lɛ, Maŋtsɛ Herode miisumɔ ni eke lɛ nɔ ko krɛdɛɛ ko.
Joo kɛ okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ ní bei pii lɛ, eyeɔ jenamɔ muu fɛɛ.
(2 Mose 32:17, 18) Israelbii lɛ efoŋ yɛ “srɔtofeemɔ” lɛ he, agbɛnɛ amɛ lala kɛ joo lɛ diɛŋtsɛ miijie wɔŋjalɔi ajeŋ ni ebɔle amɛ lɛ nifeemɔ kpo.
Shi kɛlɛ, Emilio, nyɛminuu ko ni náa Spainbii akusum joo he miishɛɛ lɛ, yɔse akɛ oshara ko yɛ.
19 Be ni Mose bɛŋkɛ nsara lɛ ni ena tsinabi+ lɛ kɛ joi lɛ nɔŋŋ lɛ, emli wo la waa, ni eshɛrɛ tɛi tɛtrɛbii lɛ ni yɔɔ edɛŋ lɛ eshwie shi, ni ejwara amɛ yɛ gɔŋ lɛ shishi.
Beni eshɛ shia ni afeɔ yara lɛ yɛ lɛ, akɛɛ lɛ akɛ, lɛ kɛ wekumɛi ni eshwɛ lɛ baajo kɛbɔle gbonyo lɛ jenamɔ muu lɛ fɛɛ koni akɛjɔɔ mɔ ni egbo lɛ mumɔ lɛ he.
Nɔ ni nyiɛɔ enɛ sɛɛ ji lala kɛ joo kɛ tsei aniji ni akɛtsɔ nu mli ni ahosoɔ.
Mɔ ni to shishi ji Israel ben Eliezer, ni ale lɛ akɛ Ba‘al Shem Tov (“Gbɛi Kpakpa lɛ Nuŋtsɔ”), yɛ afii ohai 18 lɛ teŋgbɛ yɛ Europa Bokagbɛ, ni amɛnyiɛɔ tsɔɔmɔ ni maa lalai kɛ jooi anɔ mi sɛɛ, ni nɔ ni jɛɔ mli baa ji teemɔŋ miishɛɛ.
*+ 16 Shi be ni Yehowa Adeka lɛ bashɛ David Maŋ lɛ mli lɛ, Saul biyoo Mikal+ kwɛ shikpɔŋ kɛtsɔ samfɛlɛ lɛ mli ni ena Maŋtsɛ David ni eehuru ni eejo yɛ Yehowa hiɛ; ni enyaŋe David yɛ etsui mli.
Yesu he amaga ni atɛŋ lɛ ediŋ miije kpo yɛ rap lala, maŋ nitɛŋmɔi, kɛ jooi tete po amli.
Beni lalafolɔ ko ni jieɔ mɛi ahiɛtserɛ batsɔ Yehowa Odasefonyo lɛ, ekɛɛɛ “Lalai ni akɛjieɔ mɛi ahiɛtserɛ ni akɛjooɔ lɛ baanyɛ atee akɔnɔi ni esaaa shi . . .
No hewɔ lɛ, ja otsu nakai hiamɔ nii lɛ ahe nii, ní onyiɛ “Yehowa mla lɛ” sɛɛ dani obaanyɛ oná anɔkwa miishɛɛ mli niiashikpamɔ.
Ejaakɛ ooolɛɛ omli kɛaatee ninejurɔ kɛ abɛku.”
Nyɛjiea Yehowa yi, nyɛ enitsumɔi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ enɔyelihei lɛ fɛɛ lɛ!”—Lala 103:19-22.
Nyɛ lɛ, nyɛjɛ je nɛɛ mli; mi lɛ, mijɛɛɛ je nɛɛ mli.” —Yohane 8:21-23.
42 Etsɔ shãa afɔle ni abaashã daa yɛ nyɛyinɔi fɛɛ amli yɛ kpee buu lɛ shinaa lɛ naa yɛ Yehowa hiɛ, jɛmɛ majie mihe kpo matsɔɔ nyɛ ní mikɛ bo awie yɛ.
Kpaako miná mile akɛ oheɔ mi oyeɔ, ejaakɛ okamaaa mi obinuu, ni ji obi kome too lɛ.’
Ehi akɛ okɛ hiŋmɛi kome baabote wala mli fe nɔ ni oyɛ hiŋmɛii enyɔ ni abaashɛ bo afɔ̃ Gehena la* lɛ mli.
No hewɔ lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ mɛi ni teɔ shi amɛwoɔ lɛ lɛ akɛ: “Lɛɛlɛŋ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, toohelɔi lɛ kɛ ashawoi lɛ miitsɔ nyɛhiɛ kɛmiiya Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli.”
Bɔ ni Yehowa, mɔ ni feeo, mɔ hu ní shɔ̃o ní eye ebuao kɛjɛ onyɛ musuŋ beebe lɛ, kɛɛ nɛ: Kaashe gbeyei, mitsulɔ Yakob, kɛ bo Yeshurun ní mihalao!”
‘Kwɛmɔ Shikpɔŋ Kpakpa Lɛ’ ji dɛŋdade ko ni obaanyɛ okɛtsu nii koni okɛha Ŋmalɛi lɛ ahe shishinumɔ ni oyɔɔ lɛ aya hiɛ.
Ani ogbɔleɔ okpɔiaŋ bɔ ni sa?
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni ebaatee Lazaro shi lɛ, ‘ehole ehiŋmɛii anɔ kɛtee ŋwɛi ni ekɛɛ: Ataa, miidao shi akɛ obo mi toi.
2 Eji bo ji Osei kulɛ, te obaasumɔ ni mɛi kɛ bo aye ahã tɛŋŋ?
+ Ejaakɛ amɛkɛ amɛnaabu woɔ oyiteŋ mulu,* shi amɛtsui tiuɔ sɛɛnamɔ gbonyo sɛɛ.
17 Beni afii lɛ hoɔ kɛyaa ni odaa lɛ, obaana akɛ onyɛɛɛ ofee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni tsutsu lɛ onyɛɔ ofeɔ, loo nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni otaoɔ ofee lɛ dɔŋŋ.
Shi moŋ, sanebimɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ji, Mɛni esa akɛ ofee koni oná he sɛɛ kɛji ená emlibaa?
12 Nyɛji minyɛmimɛi; nyɛji miheloo kɛ milá.
Kɛkɛ ni ejɛ mlihilɛ mli ekɛɛ mi akɛ, “Kaashe gbeyei—oobɔ mɔdɛŋ waa, ni etsɛŋ ohe baakpɔ.”
3 Nakai nyɔɔŋ lɛ mli nɔŋŋ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ Natan* akɛ: 4 “Yaa ni oyakɛɛ mitsulɔ David akɛ, ‘Nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: “Jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa ohã mi ni mahi mli.
“Kɛji oba nitsumɔ mli hejɔɔmɔ lɛ, kaakpɛ oyiŋ akɛ obaagbɔjɔ ohe yɛ afi loo nɔ mli.
Kaimɔ akɛ ekɛɛ: “Nyɛwoa mipã lɛ nyɛfɔa nyɛnɔ ni nyɛkasea mi.”
Kɛ jeee nakai lɛ, ekolɛ obaasumɔ ni otsu nii ni obatsɔ shiɛlɔ ni abaptisiko lɛ.
David tsɔɔ bɔ ni enuɔ he ehaa lɛ yɛ Lala 8: 4, 5 akɛ: “Kɛ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ ni ji owaobii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ: Mɛni ji adesa ni ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? aloo gbɔmɔ bi ni osaraa lɛ po?”
No hewɔ lɛ nyɛkashea gbeyei; nyɛjara wa fe aflimatai babaoo.”
+ 7 Nyɛkɛ su kpakpa asɔmɔa akɛ nyɔji, tamɔ nɔ ni nyɛmiisɔmɔ Yehowa,*+ shi jeee gbɔmɛi, 8 ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ lɛ, nyɔŋ ji lɛ jio, jeee nyɔŋ ji lɛ jio, nɔ kpakpa ni efeɔ lɛ, no he najiaŋ Yehowa* baato lɛ.
Bi toibolɔi lɛ ni amɛtsɔɔ miishɛɛ ni amɛná akɛni amɛtsɔɔ mɔ ko anɔkwale lɛ ni amɛna akɛ mɔ lɛ miiya ehiɛ yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ hewɔ.
Shi kɛ́ ojwɛŋ ŋmalɛi ni atsɛ́ yisɛɛ shi aŋmalako amɛmli wiemɔi lɛ anɔ lɛ, ekolɛ obaana akɛ nilee yɛ Yehowa mlai lɛ amli.
10 Ejaakɛ “mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ wala, ni eesumɔ ni eye gbii kpakpai pii lɛ, ebu elilɛi he kɛje efɔŋ he,+ kɛ enaabu hu, ni ekalaka mɛi.
Ewaaa kwraa akɛ wɔɔna mɛi krokomɛi afatɔɔi kɛ amɛgbɔjɔmɔi ni áto naa kakadaŋŋ.
Mose bi ní ahã ena Yehowa anunyam lɛ (12-23)
Naagbee kwraa lɛ, ye obua obii lɛ ni amɛna bɔ ni amɛaafee amɛkɛ nɔ ni amɛkaseɔ lɛ atsu nii.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, wɔnyɛɔ wɔnaa nɔ hewɔ ni bɔfo Paulo kɛ kɔkɔbɔɔ ni mli wa waa ha klɛŋklɛŋ afii oha lɛ mli Kristofoi lɛ yɛ “jeŋ nilee kɛ yaka shishiumɔ . . . [kɛ] gbɔmɛi ablema saji kɛ je nɛŋ shishijee nibii ni jeee Kristo lɛ” ahe lɛ. —Kolosebii 2:8.
33 Ohiŋmɛii baana nibii ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ,
No hewɔ lɛ, kasemɔ ni okwɛ nii tamɔ Nyɔŋmɔ.
“Ola lɛ Mli Wɔnaa La Yɛ”
Yesu ma tsakpãa ni yɔɔ nibii ni wɔnaa kɛ nibii ni wɔshweɔ lɛ teŋ lɛ nɔ mi, ebɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni kwɛɔ yoo ni ehe feɔ lɛ akɔnɔ lɛ, ekɛ lɛ efite gbala momo yɛ etsui mli.”
(Yesaia 45: 18) Nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, esa akɛ eye ebua wɔ koni wɔna nɔ̃ suɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ni eji, akɛni ehaaa wɔ wala kɛkɛ, shi moŋ ehaa wɔnáa nibii ni haa shihilɛ feɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ lɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ hu lɛ hewɔ.
Minaa mɛi ni akɛ klante egbe amɛ!
Efee tamɔ nɔ ni atee Saul shi kɛtee mumɔŋ wala mli momo ni enyɛ ena Nuntsɔ ni awo ehiɛ nyam lɛ afii ohai abɔ dani mɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ agbohiiashitee lɛ baashɛ.
(1 Mose 2:16, 17) Adam kɛ Hawa miisumɔ ni amɛye amɛhe kɛjɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ shishi, ni nɔ ni jɛ mli ba ji jeŋ ni wɔnaa ni ebɔle wɔhe ŋmɛnɛ nɛɛ.
3: Mɛni Hewɔ Esa akɛ Wɔhe Nyɔŋmɔ ni Wɔnaaa Lɛ lɛ Wɔye?
Shi amɛbaaa ni amɛbakwɛ nibii fɛfɛji kɛkɛ.
Ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ nikwɛlɔ ko ni miikwɛ tookwɛlɔi yɛ Hermon Gɔŋ lɛ nɔ yɛ Boka Teŋgbɛ lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ: “Tookwɛlɔ fɛɛ tookwɛlɔ kwɛɔ etooi lɛ jogbaŋŋ koni ekɛna bɔ ni amɛyaa nɔ amɛhaa.
Okɛ hemɔkɛyeli kwalɔi akaje ŋwane (Kwɛmɔ kuku 10)
Amɛnáa miishɛɛ akɛ Biblia mli shishitoo mlai nɛɛ nɔŋŋ miiye kɛmiibua amɛbii ní amrɔ nɛɛ amɛji fɔlɔi ni miiye omanye lɛ.
Nyɛhãa wɔkwɛa gbɛi komɛi ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsɔ nɔ wɔfee nakai.
Wɔbaana yɛ Yitso 5 lɛ mli akɛ, dani afi 1935 baashɛ lɛ, asusu akɛ Kristendom sɔlemɔi lɛ mli bii kpotoo fata “asafo babaoo” ni awie amɛhe yɛ Kpojiemɔ 7:9, 10 yɛ King James Version lɛ mli lɛ ahe, ni ákɛ abaajuro amɛ akɛ kuu ni ji enyɔ nɔ ni baaya ŋwɛi, akɛni amɛhi Kristo gbɛfaŋ be ni naagbee lɛ shɛɔ lɛ hewɔ.
(Kwɛmɔ akrabatsa ni ji “Sɔlemɔi Enyɔ ni Sa Kadimɔ Waa” lɛ.)
Wɔkɛ hiɛdɔɔ taoɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he nilee ejaakɛ wɔnaa lɛ akɛ wɔ-Tsɔɔlɔ Kpele
(Mateo 6:5) Beni etsáa kpitiyelɔ ko lɛ, ekɛɛ nuu ní etsá lɛ lɛ akɛ: “Kaakwɛ ní okɛɛ mɔ ko nɔ ko.”
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ wɔkɛ wɔsɔlemɔi fɛɛ ha Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, wɔtsɔɔ akɛ wɔkpɛlɛ gbɛ ni Yesu tsɔɔ akɛ wɔtsɔ nɔ wɔsɔle lɛ nɔ: “Wɔ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi.”
No hewɔ lɛ, tswaa ofai shi akɛ obaaha ofɔlɔi atsui anyá!
“Yehowa yɔɔ nɛɛ, ehiŋmɛii kpaa shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ, ni ejieɔ ehewalɛ kpo ehaa mɛi ni amɛtsui ehi kɛwula shi yɛ egbɛfaŋ lɛ.”—2 KRONIKA 16:9.
(Yoel 1:15) Yehowa wo mɛi ni yɔɔ Zion aŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛkpalea kɛbaa miŋɔɔ kɛ nyɛtsui muu lɛ fɛɛ.”
Mitswa mifai shi akɛ maya nɔ mikɛ mitoi, mijwɛŋmɔ, kɛ mitsui fɛɛ akase wiemɔ lɛ bɔni afee ni mihe asa tamɔ nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ biɛ, yɛ Madagascar, ní sumɔɔ wɔ, ní toɔ amɛtsui shi amɛhaa wɔ lɛ.
3 Beni Nyɔŋmɔ bi Israel Maŋtsɛ Salomo nɔ̃ jɔɔmɔ ni etaoɔ lɛ, nɔyelɔ ni edako nɛɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Ha otsulɔ toiboo tsui, ni mikɛkojo omaŋ lɛ, koni mayoo nɔ ni hi kɛ nɔ ni ehiii.”
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ David yɛ nifeemɔ ko ni ebaahala emli ekome —akɛ eeeya nɔ ekwɛ yoo lɛ beni akɔnɔ teɔ shi yɛ etsui mli lɛ, aloo ni eeetsi ehe ni ekpoo kaa lɛ.
21 Taakɛ atsĩ tã kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ, Yehowa baanyɛ ele tsui mli saji.
Oblahii kɛ Oblayei Nyɛnifeemɔ Haa Nyɛfɔlɔi Atsui Nyaa
Nakai Wolo ni jɛ mumɔŋ ní wɔɔkwɛ mli daa lɛ baaye abua wɔ koni wɔbaa Kristo hejɔlɛ ni yɔɔ wɔtsuii amli lɛ yi.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 8:26-39) Nakai nɔŋŋ hu yoo ko ni atsɛ́ɔ lɛ Lidia ní agbele etsui naa “akɛ ebo nii ni Paulo wieɔ lɛ toi” lɛ ha “abaptisi” lɛ kɛ ewe lɛ amrɔ nɔŋŋ.
Kɛ́ jeee nakai lɛ, hefɛo lɛ baaha etsɔ hewolɔ, henɔwolɔ, ni ebaajie sui gbohii krokomɛi hu akpo.
Mɛɛ kɔkɔbɔɔ he hiaa beni asusuɔ nɔ ni baa kɛjɛɔ wɔtsui mli lɛ he lɛ?
Ebaasumɔ ni ekpa ni ejɔɔ ehe; shi kɛlɛ, etee nɔ ekase lolo, ni etaoɔ Ŋmalɛ mli nɔkwɛmɔ nii kɛ mfonirii ni baashɛ tsuii amli koni ewo asafoku lɛ hewalɛ.
8 Bɔfo Petro ŋma akɛ: “Nuŋtsɔ, Kristo lɛ, nyɛbua lɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ yɛ nyɛtsuii amli; ni daa nɛɛ nyɛsaa nyɛhe nyɛtoa, koni nyɛná hetoo nyɛha mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni biɔ nyɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ ní yɔɔ nyɛmli lɛ shishi lɛ, kɛ mlijɔlɛ kɛ gbeyeishemɔ.”
Yesu bi mɛi saji, ebo amɛ toi, ni egbala Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli etsɔɔ amɛ, ni no hã eshɛ amɛtsui he.
(Luka 8:12) Yesu tsɔɔ dumɔwu ni adu yɛ tɛsaa nɔ lɛ mli akɛ, no tsɔɔ mɛi ni kɛ miishɛɛ mɔɔ wiemɔ lɛ mli, shi wiemɔ lɛ náaa shishifã ni wa yɛ amɛtsuii amli lɛ.
Kɛ́ wɔjɛ wɔtsuiŋ wɔhã ‘kapɛji enyɔ ni shɛɛɛ nɔ ko’ po lɛ, Yehowa hiɛ sɔɔ. —Mar 12:41-44.
(Yakobo 1:15) Taakɛ Yesu bɔ kɔkɔ lɛ, esa akɛ ‘wɔkwɛ jogbaŋŋ’ koni ‘wɔhiɛ ahi wɔhe nɔ jogbaŋŋ yɛ hiɛjoomɔi srɔtoi fɛɛ he,’ jeee ni wɔkɛkpa mɛi krokomɛi ashi akɛ amɛji hiɛjoolɔi lo, shi moŋ koni wɔkɛpɛi wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔmli wɔkwɛ akɛ mɛni ji nɔ ni yeɔ lumɔ yɛ wɔtsuiaŋ.
Esɔle jenamɔ lɛ fɛɛ, ni enɔ jetsɛremɔ leebi beni etsui tswaa lɛ, etee enyɛmi nuu lɛ shia.
Okɛ Biblia lɛ atsu nii kɛshɛ tsui lɛ he
Gbalɛ lɛ yaa nɔ akɛ: “Aaaba mli akɛ nakai be lɛ mli lɛ mikɛ kanei aaakpa Yerusalem, ni mawo gbɔmɛi ni jwere amɛshishi atutru lɛ hiɛ lɛ anyɔmɔ, mɛi ni kɛɔ yɛ amɛtsui mli akɛ: ‘Yehowa efeŋ ekpakpa, ni esaa efeŋ efɔŋ hu!’ lɛ.
Shi onijiaŋ akaje wui.
Abɛi 16:23 kɛɔ akɛ: “Nilelɔ tsui tsɔ̃ɔ edaa nii, ni ehaa enaabu nitsɔɔmɔ lɛ fáa.”
Hewɔ, nyɛ Odasefoi, nyɛyaa nyɛhiɛ daa!
Te obaafee tɛŋŋ ni obu ogbɔmɔtso lɛ he kɛjɛ gbɔmɛi ni feɔ nibii fɔji ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ ahe?— Klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa lɛ, kaaha mɔ ko kɛ ofɔmɔ nii lɛ miishwɛ́.
Mɛni Biblia lɛ Kɛɔ Yɛ Bɔlɛnamɔ He?
Shi, akɛni bɔlɛnamɔ ni mɔ ni yeɔ fɔ lɛ kɛ mɛi krokomɛi baana lɛ baanyɛ aha mɔ ni yeee fɔ lɛ ana bɔlɛnamɔ mli hela, ni AIDS fata he hewɔ lɛ, mɛi komɛi ekpɛ amɛyiŋ akɛ amɛbaatse gbala lɛ mli yɛ bɔ ni Yesu tsɔɔ mli lɛ naa.
Etsɔɔ gbɛ ni yɔɔ nyam ni aaatsɔ nɔ akɛ fɔmɔ nii lɛ atsu nii, kɛ tsakemɔi ni baa beni mɔ ko daa lɛ mli yɛ baafai 20-3.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, gbɔmɛi lɛ ni fɔ̃ amɛ nine lɛ jaa amagai loo nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi po, ni amɛkɛ gbɔmɛi ni amɛjeee amɛŋamɛi ni amɛjeee amɛwumɛi bɔɔ ajwamaŋ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, susumɔ okɛ mɛi krokomɛi ni esoro amɛbɔɔ su ni akɛ amɛ bɔɔ lɛ he okwɛ.
(Yesaia 48:17) Kɛ́ mɔ ko hiɔ shi yɛ Biblia mli shishitoo mlai ni kɔɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he lɛ anaa lɛ:
Amɛkɛɛ akɛ ato bɔlɛnamɔ kɛha fɔmɔ pɛ, ni nɔ ko kwraa fataaa he.
Jamɔ kɛ emli bɔlɛnamɔ mli yakayaka nifeemɔi ni akɛhaa apasa nyɔŋmɔi tamɔ Baal bahé shi waa yɛ Israel.
“Mifɔlɔi kɛɔ mi akɛ mikane woji ni wieɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he ni no sɛɛ lɛ kɛji miyɛ sanebimɔ ko lɛ, mibabi amɛ.
Kɛ́ obi lɛ bi bo bɔlɛnamɔ he sane ko lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ onifeemɔ baanyɛ aha ekɛ bo awie he ekoŋŋ loo ekɛ bo akawie he dɔŋŋ?
Jeee susumɔi ni oyɔɔ yɛ suɔmɔ, bɔlɛnamɔ, naanyobɔɔ, loo bii atsɔsemɔ he lɛ pɛ kɛkɛ baatsɔɔ akɛ oshɛ gbala.
Taakɛ ŋmalɛ nɛɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, mɛi ni kɛ amɛhe woɔ bɔlɛnamɔ ni tsɔɔ gbalashihilɛ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ fiteɔ amɛjeŋba, amɛjamɔ lɛ esaaa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, ni amɛlaajeɔ bulɛ ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, Kristofoi ahe ní amɛtsiɔ kɛjɛɔ bɔlɛnamɔ mli jeŋba shara kɛ tawa kɛ nitsumɔ he lɛ buɔ amɛhe kɛjɛɔ bɔlɛnamɔ mli helai kɛ kansai komɛi ní amɛaaná lɛ ahe.—1 Korintobii 6:18; 2 Korintobii 7:1.
Okɛ amɛ aje kpo kɛbahã wɔ koni wɔkɛ amɛ aná bɔlɛ.”

Kristofoi komɛi aaanu he akɛ amɛaanyɛ amɛŋɔ juromɔ nii ni anaa kɛjɛɔ nɔmbai ni ahalaa trukaa yɛ pii ateŋ lɛ ni asɔshwɛmɔ he nifeemɔ nii bɛ mli, taakɛ bɔ ni amɛaanyɛ amɛŋɔ nibii lɛ eko yaka loo nikeenii komɛi ni guɔyeli nitsumɔ he ko loo shwapo ko kɛaatsu nii akɛ enihɔɔmɔ he adafitswaa lɛ he gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ ta lɛ.

“Nyɛhereherea Nyɛhe”
Ha amɛhiɛ amɛ̃, okɛ amɛ atsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi, ni ojie amɛyi yɛ ba ni amɛba lɛ hewɔ.
Gboklɛfoi ni abaptisi amɛ lɛ kɛ miishɛɛ here mi hiɛmɛɛ.
Heremɔ amɛ atuu, ni oha amɛle akɛ eŋɔɔ onaa waa akɛ amɛba.

Atuu ni Ahere Wɔ
La baanyɛ afee kane ni asumɔɔ yɛ duŋ mli, ni ebaanyɛ eha wɔgbɔmɔtso lɛ he afee kulɔkulɔ ni wɔniyenii adɔ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ wɔbaanyɛ wɔnyiɛ Yesu nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ sɛɛ yɛ bɔ ni ahereɔ mɛi ni egbɔjɔ ni baa wɔ kpeei ashishi lɛ atuu lɛ yɛ?
Kɛji obaasumɔ ni ole nibii babaoo aloo ni mɔ ko aba oŋɔɔ ni ekɛ bo afee shia Biblia mli nikasemɔ ni aheee nɔ ko lɛ, ofainɛ ŋmaa kɛya Watch Tower, Box 760, Accra, Ghana, aloo kɛya adrɛs ni atsɔɔ yɛ baafa 2 lɛ mli nɔ ni sa.
Mikɛɛ amɛ akɛ, “Wɔkɛ miishɛɛ baahere amɛ atuu!”

Yer 35:19 —Mɛni hewɔ ajɔɔ Rekabbii lɛ?
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: ‘Nyɛkɛ blodo lɛ kɛ loo lɛ abahãa mi.’
Kɛkɛ ni ekɔlɔ blodoi enumɔ kɛ loi enyɔ lɛ, ni ekwɛ ŋwɛi, ni esɔle,*+ ni no sɛɛ lɛ ekumɔ blodoi lɛ amli, ni ekɛhã kaselɔi lɛ, ni kaselɔi lɛ hu kɛhã mɛi lɛ.
Wɔshwa wɔhe yɛ afii babaoo ni wɔha eho dani wɔbɔ̃i nakai gbɛi sɔrɔtoi ni atsɔɔ nɔ ahoɔ nii lɛ amli ŋɔɔmɔyeli lɛ—kɛjɛ loo folo ni ahooo nɔ kɛba nɔ ni akɛ nibii sɔrɔtoi efata he ni ashĩ nɔ.
+ 11 Ni Yesu kɔlɔ blodoi lɛ, ni be ni eda shi lɛ, ejara ehã mɛi ni tara shi lɛ; nakai nɔŋŋ efee yɛ loi bibii lɛ hu he, ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ná bɔ ni etaoɔ.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Nyɛfɔa ni nyɛyi afáa ni nyɛyia shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ̃, ni nyɛnaanaa nɔ, ni nyɛyea ŋshɔŋlooi kɛ ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ kooloo fɛɛ kooloo ni tsiɔ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.” —1 Mose 1:28.
Yesu kɛfata he akɛ: ‘Ejaakɛ bɔ ni Yona ye shwaneshwane kɛ nyɔɔŋnyɔɔŋ gbii etɛ yɛ ŋshɔŋloo kpeteŋkpele lɛ musuŋ lɛ, nakai gbɔmɔ Bi lɛ aaaye shwaneshwane kɛ nyɔɔŋnyɔɔŋ gbii etɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ tsui mli.’
Amɛhã lɛ nu mli loo kuku ko ni ashã, ni ehe ni eye.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, sutsakemɔ he nilelɔ Stephen Jay Gould ŋma akɛ: “Nɔ hewɔ ni wɔyɔɔ biɛ ji akɛ looi akuu ko ni yɔɔ srɔto kwraa ni yɔɔ fine ko ni esoro lɛ kwraa lɛ nyɛ amɛtsake amɛhe amɛtsɔ kooloi ni yɔɔ naji ni hiɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ . . .
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ jaje eyiŋtoo ni kɔɔ adesa weku lɛ kɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ he lɛ yɛ gbalɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ amli: “Nyɛfɔa ni nyɛyi afaa ni nyɛyia shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ, ni nyɛnaanaa nɔ, ni nyɛyea ŋshɔŋloi kɛ ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ kooloo fɛɛ kooloo ni tsiɔ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.”—1 Mose 1:28, 31; 2:8.
15 “No hewɔ lɛ, nyɛkwɛa nyɛhe nɔ jogbaŋŋ*—ejaakɛ gbi nɔ ni Yehowa kɛ nyɛ wie yɛ Horeb kɛjɛ la lɛ teŋ lɛ, nyɛnaaa nɔ ko nɔ ko*— 16 koni nyɛkaye sane fɔŋ ní nyɛyafee nɔ ko he amaga* nyɛhã nyɛhe, nuu loo yoo henɔ ko,+ 17 shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kooloo ko henɔ ko loo loofɔlɔ ni filikiɔ yɛ ŋwɛi lɛ henɔ ko,+ 18 nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni wamɔɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ henɔ ko loo loi ni yɔɔ nui amli* lɛ henɔ ko.

No sɛɛ lɛ, fɔ̃ɔ gbekɛbii komɛi ni otsɔ hiɛ ohala amɛ lɛ nine kɛba wiemɔ kpoku lɛ nɔ, ni obi amɛ akɛ: Mɛni ji gbɛi ejwɛ ni abaanyɛ atsɔ nɔ asaa he kɛhã saji ahetoohamɔ?
Biblia woji ejwɛ lɛ—kɛjɛ 2 Mose lɛ kɛyashi 5 Mose lɛ—titri wie bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Israel ye eha yɛ Mose hiɛnyiɛmɔ shishi lɛ he sane.
Yɛ nyɔji ejwɛ sɛɛ lɛ, aba koni abaye abua Bonzali, shi no mli lɛ egbo momo.

7. (a) Mɛni mɛi ni wieɔ Biblia mli saji ahe lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi kɛɔ yɛ Daniel lamɔ mli ninaa ni kɔɔ kooloi ejwɛ lɛ kɛ Maŋtsɛ Nebukadnezar lamɔ mli amaga kpeteŋkpele lɛ ahe lɛ he?
Yɛ afi 1922 mli lɛ, amɛbɔi Kristendom naagbee ní baa lɛ jajemɔ, ni amɛtswa ŋwɛibɔfoi atɛtɛrɛmantɛrɛ kpamɔi ejwɛ ni yɔɔ Kpojiemɔ 8:7-12 lɛ kɛ kpooi etɛ ní agba afɔ̃ shi yɛ Kpojiemɔ 9:1-11:15 lɛ he adafi.
Mɛɛ wuoyaa nitsumɔ kaselɔi ejwɛ lɛ baatsu agbɛnɛ?

(2 Korintobii 2:11) Agbɛnɛ nyɛhaa wɔsusua tsɔnei ejwɛ ni he yɔɔ oshara ni “loofɔlɔdulɔ” lɛ kɛtsuɔ nii lɛ ahe wɔkwɛa.
No hewɔ lɛ, ŋmɛnɛ, Kristofoi fe akpekpei ejwɛ kɛ fa ni jɛ jeŋmaji fɛɛ mli yeee Blonya.

Aŋmɛɛɛ gbɛ ni mibinuu Wolfgang ni eye afii ejwɛ lɛ tete po awie “Ataa” he, akɛ ja “Ome Jan” (Tsɛkwɛ John) he pɛ.
MƐI pii na amanehului ni amɛye ohia ni mli wa waa hu, yɛ afii ejwɛ ni akɛwuu ta yɛ tsutsu Yugoslavia shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ mli.

+ 17 Kwashiai kɛ shwilafoi!

Kɛ́ osusu nɔ ni baa yɛ je lɛŋ hei ni agbiɛnaa be kɛ kɔɔyɔŋ dɔlɛ ni sa, gbii ni jetsɛremɔ sɛɛ kɛɔ fe jenamɔ, hulutsoo babaoo, kɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ ni sa baa lɛ he lɛ, obaaná shishinumɔ heei yɛ wiemɔ ni ji “jɔɔmɔ” lɛ he.

Ni nugbɔ bɔi nɛmɔ!
Beni Paulo kɛ mɛi ni jaaa Nyɔŋmɔ ni yɔɔ Listra maŋtiase lɛ mli lɛ wieɔ lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Blemabii lɛ ayinɔi ni eho lɛ mli lɛ [Nyɔŋmɔ] hã jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ nyiɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛgbɛ̀i lɛ anɔ, shi kɛlɛ efɔ̃ɔɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe odaseyeli, shi moŋ efeɔ ejurɔ ni ehaa nugbɔ jɛɔ ŋwɛi nɛɔ haa nyɛ, kɛ afii ni baa nii pii hu, ekɛ ŋmaa kɛ miishɛɛ woɔ nyɛtsuiiaŋ obɔ.”
Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, Luka ni ji Paulo hefatalɔ gbɛfãlɔ lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ ‘amɛfee amɛ ejurɔ pii; ejaakɛ amɛshɛre la ni amɛhere amɛ fɛɛ tswɛm hiɛmɛɛ yɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ babaoo kɛ fɛ̃i lɛ hewɔ.’
Nugbɔ nɛɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ kome nɔ,
YEHOWA ji Bɔlɔ kpele ni bɔ nugbɔ kɛ bɔ́.

Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ fɛ̃i, nugbɔnɛmɔ, ŋshɔ hiɛ hela, kɛ gbeyeishemɔ eha amɛdaaŋ egbo.
+ 4 Ejaakɛ biɛ gbii kpawo pɛ mli lɛ, mahã nugbɔ anɛ+ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ jetsɛremɔ kɛ jenamɔ gbii 40,+ ni makpãtã nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni hiɛ kã ni mifee lɛ hiɛ kɛje shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.”
Biblia lɛ gbala nu shibɔlemɔ lɛ mli beni ekɛɛ akɛ: ‘Nyɔŋmɔ gbalaa nu kulibii kɛyaa ŋwɛi, ni amɛtsɛ̃rɛ̃ɔ nunɛmɔ kɛjɛɔ efua lɛ mli, ni atatui fɔseɔ shwieɔ shi, ni eshwieɔ gbɔmɛi pii anɔ.’
Nugbɔ nɛ yɛ otsi ni tsɔ be ni akɛbaafee kpee lɛ hiɛ lɛ mli fɛɛ, ni enɛ ha shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nitsumɔ bawa waa.
