Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛkase Yesu kɛ emra be mli kaselɔi lɛ.
1. (a) Mɛni Yesu sɔle yɛ he eha ekaselɔi lɛ dani egbo?
Etsɛɛɛ ni ena mihe miishɛɛ, ni ekãa ni ewo mi lɛ ji nɔ̃ titri ni ha mibatsɔ gbɛgbalɔ yɛ sɛɛ mli, taakɛ atsɛɔ be-fɛɛ sɔɔlɔi lɛ.
Namɛi ji enanemɛi?
Be ko ni eho lɛ, jɛmɛ efɔlɔi yɔɔ, shi amrɔ nɛɛ ni Habel kwɛɔ jɛmɛ nɛɛ, efɔlɔi lɛ jio, bii lɛ jio, amɛteŋ mɔ ko nyɛɛɛ jɛmɛ amɛya.
Eshwie enyɛmi yoo lɛ hiɛ shi.
ŊWANEJEE ko bɛ he akɛ Yesu Kristo sɛɛnyiɛlɔi ni darako lɛ yɛ ejwɛŋmɔ mli beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛbaa miŋɔɔ, . . . ni maha nyɛ hejɔɔmɔ” lɛ.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ ebaanyɛ ni ekɛ Noa binuu Shem, ni ehi shi yɛ ebeaŋ afii 150 sɔŋŋ lɛ abɔ.
Gbɛgbalɔ lɛ kɛ ŋaawoo lɛ tsu nii, ni nyɔji ekpaa sɛɛ lɛ afɔ lɛ nine koni eya Gilead Skul lɛ.
Ni kɛlɛ, Yehowa ye eshiwoo lɛ anɔkwale, ni eye Mizraim hewalɛi lɛ anɔ kunim butuu.—2 Mose 14:19-31.
Ni kɛ mɔ ni nyiɛɔ gɔji anɔ lɛ shɛ he ko pɔtɛɛ lɛ, ebaanyɛ ena gbɛ kakadaŋŋ ni efo lɛ kɛ hiɛyaa ni enaa yɛ oti ni ma ehiɛ lɛ mli lɛ.
(Yesaia 9:5, 6) Blematsɛ Yakob ni gboɔ lɛ gba yɛ nɛkɛ wɔsɛɛ be mli nɔyelɔ nɛɛ he akɛ: “Maŋtsɛ tso ejeŋ Yuda dɛŋ, ni nɔyeli tso hu ejeŋ enaji ateŋ, kɛyashi beyinɔ ni mɔ nɔ̃ ni ji lɛ aaaba, ni lɛ toi majimaji lɛ aaabo.”—1 Mose 49:10.
Susumɔ nɔ ni ba beni Abraham tsu etsulɔ nukpa—ni eeenyɛ efee akɛ lɛ ji Eliezer—lɛ kɛtee Mesopotamia koni eyaŋɔ yoo ni sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei ebaha Isak lɛ he okwɛ.
(Yesaia 41:8; Yakobo 2:23) Egbɛi ji Abraham, ni Biblia lɛ tsɛɔ lɛ akɛ “mɛi fɛɛ ní heɔ yeɔ . . . lɛ atsɛ.”—Romabii 4:11.
(Lala 110:2) Eji Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii akɛ etao mɛi fɛɛ ni taoɔ ni amɛle mɔ ni eji diɛŋtsɛ ni amɛja lɛ “yɛ mumɔŋ kɛ anɔkwale mli” lɛ asɛɛ gbɛ, ni Mesia lɛ miitsu e-Tsɛ lɛ suɔmɔnaa nii nɛɛ he nii yɛ jeŋ fɔŋ ni etse ehe kɛjɛ Nyɔŋmɔ he nɛɛ mli.
32 “‘Shi kɛ́ ekɛ gwantɛŋbi miiba ekɛbashã esha afɔle lɛ, ekɛ gwantɛŋbi ni ji yoo ni kpa ko bɛ ehe aba.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikita, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.
Minuɔ he waa mihãa mɛi ni suɔlɔi egboi shi amɛbɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ ko kwraa akɛ amɛbaana amɛ ekoŋŋ lɛ.”
No hewɔ lɛ, yoo nɛɛ ba ŋa Odasefonyo lɛ ŋɔɔ ni ebi lɛ akɛ: “Ofainɛ ani obaasumɔ ni oha mi tsofa ni okɛha owu lɛ eko koni miwu asumɔ mi waa tamɔ bɔ ni owu sumɔɔ bo lɛ?”
Mifɔlɔi bana suɔmɔ ni mli wa waa amɛha nyɛmimɛi lɛ yɛ jɛmɛ hu tamɔ bɔ ni amɛsumɔɔ asafo bibioo ni yɔɔ Kampala lɛ.
16 Yesu tsɔɔ gbɛ kroko ni ekaselɔi lɛ baatsɔ nɔ akase lɛ be ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikitã, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.”
Yesu fee sane lɛ faŋŋ, beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikitã, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.
12 Paulo wo nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ Filipi asafo lɛ mli lɛ ŋaa akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ Kristo mli hewalɛwoo ko yɛ, kɛ́ suɔmɔ miishɛjemɔ ko yɛ, kɛ́ mɔhesusumɔ ko yɛ, kɛ́ suɔmɔ kɛ musuŋtsɔlɛ ko yɛ lɛ, nyɛhãa mimiishɛɛ lɛ ayia obɔ, akɛ nyɛmiijwɛŋ nɔ kome, nyɛhiɛ suɔmɔ kome, nyɛfee ekome, ni nyɛhiɛ susumɔ kome.
Ewie akɛ: “Kɛ́ misusu hegbɛ krɛdɛɛ ni miná akɛ gbɛgbalɔi awalɔ lɛ he lɛ, ehaa minaa suɔmɔ kɛ hiɛsɔɔ mihaa Yehowa, e-Bi lɛ, kɛ Egbɛjianɔtoo ni suɔmɔ yɔɔ mli lɛ.
+ 12 Enɛ ji mikitã lɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔɔ nyɛ lɛ.
Shi kɛlɛ, suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛha lala lɛ hu kã mitsui nɔ.
Jeee akɛ mi-Biblia kasemɔ lɛ ma hemɔkɛyeli ni miyɔɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mli lɛ nɔ mi kɛkɛ, shi eye ebua mi hu koni maná male lɛ ni masumɔ lɛ.
Ni kɛji miŋɔ minii fɛɛ mikuma mɛi, ni kɛji miŋɔ migbɔmɔtso miha ni ashã mi, shi mibɛ suɔmɔ lɛ, jikulɛ minaaa sɛɛ ko.” —1 Korintobii 13: 2, 3.
Ekɛ hemɔkɛyeli ni sa kadimɔ, ní tamɔ gbekɛ nɔ̃ lɛ bi yɛ heshibaa mli akɛ: “Yehowa, minuntsɔ Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ!
Lalafolɔ Johann Wolfgang von Goethe ni jɛ Germany lɛ ŋma akɛ: “Miyɛ suɔmɔ kɛ bulɛ waa kɛha [Biblia lɛ], ejaakɛ no titri ji nɔ ni haa mibaa mijeŋ jogbaŋŋ yɛ shihilɛ mli.”
13 Entellia ná hewalɛwoo babaoo kɛjɛ Lala 116, titri lɛ kuku 1-4, he ni ekane aahu shii abɔ lɛ, akɛ: “Miisumɔ Yehowa, ejaakɛ ebo migbee kɛ mifaikpamɔ lɛ toi.
Mɛni hewɔ minyɛ ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ baasumɔ ni matse migbalashihilɛ lɛ mli lɛ?
2 Yesaia abɛbua lɛ jeɔ shishi akɛ: “Ha ni malá mishieŋtsɛ lɛ he lala, misuɔlɔ lɛ lala yɛ eweintrom lɛ he.
Beni mishiɛɔ ni mikaseɔ Biblia lɛ daa gbi lɛ, suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛha Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ mli waa fe tsutsu, ni minuɔ he akɛ mitsi mibɛŋkɛ lɛ kpaakpa.
Yɛ mishia hee ni yɔɔ dioo lɛ mli lɛ, bei pii lɛ misusuɔ miwala shihilɛ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ lɛ he ni minaa kpɛɔ mihe yɛ Yehowa mlihilɛ lɛ he lolo.
No hewɔ lɛ, bi ohe akɛ, ‘Ani nuu kɛ yoo teŋ suɔmɔ kɛ anɔkwa suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛha mihefatalɔ lɛ fɛɛ ŋmɛɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ?’
Liam ha hetoo akɛ: “Afii abɔ ni miye lɛ kɔɔɔ he eko, shi moŋ suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛha Yehowa lɛ ji nɔ ni esa akɛ adamɔ nɔ.
Minuɔ he be fɛɛ be akɛ miŋa ná nii ni mitsu yɛ gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ, ejaakɛ kɛ jeee sɛɛfimɔ ni ejɛɔ suɔmɔ mli ekɛhaa mi daa lɛ kulɛ, minyɛŋ maya nɔ yɛ be-fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli.
26 Kɛkɛ ni nuu lɛ kula shi ni ekɛ ehiɛ bu shi yɛ Yehowa hiɛ 27 ni ekɛɛ: “Ajie Yehowa, minuŋtsɔ Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ yi, ejaakɛ ehãko esuɔmɔ ni tsakeee kɛ enɔkwayeli lɛ sɛɛ afo yɛ minuŋtsɔ lɛ nɔ.
+ Ao mi-Nyɔŋmɔ, kaimɔ mi yɛ enɛ hu hewɔ, ni ona mi mɔbɔ yɛ osuɔmɔ ni tsakeee ni fa babaoo lɛ hewɔ.
Esa akɛ matsake bɔ ni misusuɔ nii ahe mihaa, bɔni afee ni manyɛ majie suɔmɔ nɛɛ kpo, ni ákɛ esaaa akɛ minaa gbɔmɛi akɛ mihenyɛlɔi.”
Yehowa wo shi yɛ Mesia lɛ, ní ji “susuma ní agbeɔ ehe guɔ” kɛ mɔ ní “jeŋmaji hu hiɔ ehiɛ” lɛ he akɛ: “Maŋtsɛmɛi aaana ni amɛaate shi, lumɛi hu aaana, ni amɛaakoto shi amɛjá yɛ Yehowa ni ji anɔkwafo kɛ Israel Mɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ní ehalao lɛ hewɔ.”—Yesaia 49:7.
4 Suɔmɔ yɛ hewalɛ waa, ni eji hegbɛ ni wɔná akɛ wɔjɛ wɔsusuma muu fɛɛ mli wɔha suɔmɔ ni wɔyɔɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ miije kpo faŋŋ yɛ wɔshiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Gbi ko lɛ Yesu bi akɛ: “Mɛni gbɔmɔ aaaŋɔha ni ekɛkpɔ̃ esusuma?”
“Mina ni aakumɔ hemɔkɛyelii ni misumɔɔ waa lɛ aashwie shi yɛ gbii ni nyiɛ sɛɛ ba lɛ amli: Triniti, hɛl-la, susuma ni gbooo—eka shi faŋŋ akɛ fɛɛ jeee Biblia mli tsɔɔmɔi.”
Eeekpɔ̃ amɛsusuma kɛaajɛ fĩfĩamɔ kɛ yiwalɛ mli, ni amɛlá jara aaawa yɛ ehiɛ.”
Beni bɔfo Paulo kɛ enanemɛi ni yɔɔ hemɔkɛyeli lɛ mli lɛ wieɔ lɛ, ewo amɛ hewalɛ akɛ: “Nyɛshɛjea mɛi ni tsui faa lɛ amii; nyɛherea mɛi ni feɔ gbedee lɛ; nyɛtoa nyɛtsui shi nyɛhaa mɛi fɛɛ. . . .
Ekolɛ oyɛ nanemɛi kɛ wekumɛi ni heɔ apasa tsɔɔmɔi tamɔ hɛl la, Nyɔŋmɔi etɛ ni efee ekome, susuma ni gbooo, kɛ apasa tsɔɔmɔi krokomɛi ni tamɔ enɛɛmɛi lɛ amɛyeɔ.
“Koni ekaje nyɛtsine ni nyɛsusumai lɛ anijiaŋ miije wui.”—Heb.
Amɛ fɛɛ amɛyɛ mumɔ kome too lɛ nɔŋŋ
(Jajelɔ 9:5) Yesu tsɔɔ akɛ abaatee gbohii ashi—kɛ́ adesai yɛ susuma ni gbooo lɛ, no lɛ ehe ebahiaŋ ni atee gbohii ashi.
‘Amɛkɛ amɛtsui fɛɛ hé ewiemɔ lɛ amɛye’ ni “abaptisi amɛ, ni nakai gbi lɛ nɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ aŋɔ susumai aaafee akpei etɛ afata amɛhe.”
Helanyo niŋmalɔ Plutarch wie akɛ eji he ni susumai ni he tse lɛ yaa naagbee kwraa yɛ gbele sɛɛ.
22 Eyɛ mli akɛ Lazaro egbo gbii ejwɛ moŋ, shi wɔkadiɔ akɛ Yesu ewieee nɔ ko yɛ Lazaro susuma he akɛ eyɛ ŋwɛi, hɛl, aloo hetsuumɔ he!
Yɛ ewolo ni ji The Pursuit of the Millennium lɛ mli lɛ, Tsɔɔlɔ nukpa Norman Cohn ŋma akɛ: “Afii ohai etɛ lɛ bafee afi ni aka klɛŋklɛŋ akɛ aaakpoo afii akpe hemɔkɛyeli lɛ, beni Origen, ni ekolɛ ehé gbɛi fe fɛɛ yɛ blema Sɔlemɔ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jamɔ he nilelɔi lɛ fɛɛ ateŋ lɛ, bɔi wiemɔ akɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ jeee nifeemɔ ni baaba mli diɛŋtsɛ yɛ be ko mli, shi moŋ ebaaba yɛ heyelilɔi lɛ asusumai amli pɛ.”[
Yehowa miisumɔ ni wɔhe atse, wɔjɛ wɔsusuma muu fɛɛ mli wɔtsu nii, ni wɔyiŋ akafee wɔ kɔshikɔshi taakɛ Kristofoi pii ni yɔɔ Tiatira lɛ ji lɛ.
Amɛheɔ amɛyeɔ akɛ nifeemɔi nɛɛ haa efeɔ mlɛo kɛhaa mɔ ni egbo lɛ mumɔ, loo susuma, ákɛ eeeshi shia lɛ mli.
Amaniɛbɔɔ tsɔɔ akɛ Farisifoi lɛ heɔ amɛyeɔ akɛ kɛ́ gbɔmɔ gbo lɛ esusuma lɛ gbooo, ni akɛ jalɔi asusumai baaba ababla ekoŋŋ.
Ekɔɔɔ he eko bɔ ni wɔshihilɛ ji lɛ, Yehowa biɔ ni wɔkɛ wɔsusuma kɛ wɔtsui muu fɛɛ asɔmɔ lɛ.
Kɛ́ mɔ ko kpa muu nɔŋŋ lɛ, adesai baanyɛ abɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛtsiɛ̃ ehiɛ.
“Nyɛteŋ Mɔ ko Yiwala Tɔ̃ŋ”
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, yɛ Afrika kɛ Asia hei komɛi kɛ agbɛnɛ kɛtsɔ Pasifik kpokpai ni ji Polynesia, Melanesia, kɛ Micronesia nɔ fɛɛ lɛ, mɛi babaoo heɔ amɛyeɔ akɛ mumɔ lɛ—shi jeee susuma lɛ—gbooo.
Nyɛwoa mipã lɛ nyɛfɔa nyɛnɔ, ni nyɛkasea mi; shi mihe jɔ, ni mibaa mihe shi kɛjɛ mitsui mli, ni nyɛaana hejɔɔmɔ nyɛaaha nyɛsusumai lɛ.
Etsɔɔɔ jamɔ mli amalei ni ji susuma ni gbooo kɛ naanɔ piŋmɔ yɛ hɛl.
(Luka 22:62) Ni Paulo wo nanemɛi heyelilɔi ni yɔɔ Tesalonika lɛ hewalɛ koni ‘amɛshɛje mɛi ni tsui faa lɛ amii.’
Tsɔɔmɔ srɔtofeemɔ ni kã Islam tsɔɔmɔ yɛ susuma lɛ he (baafa 297-300) kɛ Biblia lɛ sane mlitsɔɔmɔ lɛ teŋ.
+ 4 Emamɔ afɔleshaa latɛi hu yɛ Yehowa shĩa lɛ,+ shĩa ni Yehowa ewie yɛ he akɛ: “Yerusalem migbɛ́i baahi kɛya naanɔ” lɛ.
8 Nakai gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ, Yehowa baatsɔ hebuu nɔ yɛ Yerusalem he kɛkpe;+ nakai gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ, mɔ ni baatɛ agbee shi* yɛ amɛteŋ lɛ baatsɔ tamɔ David, ni David shĩa lɛ baatsɔ tamɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, tamɔ Yehowa bɔfo ni nyiɛ amɛhiɛ.
1:8—Mɛni hewɔ Naomi kɛɛ eshaayei lɛ akɛ ‘amɛteaŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ aku esɛɛ kɛya enyɛ we’ yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni amɛaaku amɛsɛɛ kɛya amɛtsɛmɛi awe lɛ?
Kɛ́ asafoi srɔtoi tsuɔ nii yɛ shikpɔŋkuku kome mli ni amɛwieɔ wiemɔi srɔtoi lɛ, okɛ woji ni yɔɔ wiemɔ ni osafo lɛ kɛtsuɔ nii lɛ mli lɛ pɛ atsu nii yɛ shĩa fɛɛ shĩa shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Wɔyaa shiɛmɔ yɛ shia kɛ shia, wɔfeɔ sɛɛsramɔi, ni wɔjeɔ Biblia mli nikasemɔi ashishi.
Eŋma akɛ: “Kloe webii lɛ batswa mi adafi yɛ nyɛhewɔ, minyɛmimɛi, akɛ béi yɛ nyɛteŋ.”
Bɔ ni ŋshɔkpɔ shikpɔji lɛ naabunaabui lɛ bɛ trɔmɔɔ, ni tsũi bibii yɛji mamɔ nɔ ni ekpɛlɛɔ yɛ hulu lɛ nɔ lɛ, ha lalafolɔ ko kɛto “tɛsaa okpɔŋɔ ni ekuɛ he tsɔi ete shi ni egbɛ basaa” lɛ he.
Mɛi komɛi susu akɛ esa akɛ wɔshiɛ yɛ faŋŋ mli ni wɔya shia kɛ shia yɛ be mli ni mɛi komɛi nu he akɛ esa akɛ wɔtsu nii yɛ teemɔŋ waa, ni wɔtsɔ gbɛ̀i krokomɛi anɔ kɛya gbɔmɛi lɛ aŋɔɔ.
Esɔle jenamɔ lɛ fɛɛ, ni enɔ jetsɛremɔ leebi beni etsui tswaa lɛ, etee enyɛmi nuu lɛ shia.
+ 3 Nyɛkɛ Israel asafo muu lɛ fɛɛ awiea akɛ, ‘Nyɔɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ gbi ni ji nyɔŋma lɛ, amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ aŋɔ too kome+ kɛhã etsɛ shĩa lɛ, shĩa fɛɛ shĩa aŋɔ too kome ahã ehe.
4 Kɛ wɔtee shia kɛ shia lɛ, bei pii lɛ, wɔnaa ni mɛi miinyiɛ kɛkɛ loo ni ekolɛ amɛmiimɛ mɔ ko.
13 “Nɔ ni Yehowa, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛɛ nɛ, ‘Mikɛ nyɛtsɛmɛi lɛ kpaŋ kpaŋmɔ+ yɛ gbi nɔ ni mijie amɛ kɛje Ejipt shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, kɛje nyɔji ashĩa+ lɛ akɛ: 14 “Kɛ́ afii kpawo lɛ ba naagbee lɛ, nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ aŋmɛa enyɛmi Hebrinyo ni ahɔ̃ɔ lɛ ahã lɛ, ni esɔmɔ lɛ afii ekpaa lɛ he; ŋmɛɛmɔ ehe.”
Gbɛjegbɛi lɛ bɛ gbɛi ni shiai lɛ bɛ yibɔ okadi ko ni aaaŋma afɔ shi, no hewɔ lɛ jwɛŋmɔ ni kaiɔ nii jogbaŋŋ he miihia beni afeɔ sɛɛsaramɔ.
16 “Enɛɛmɛi ji mlai* ni Yehowa kɛhã Mose ní kɔɔ nuu kɛ eŋa, kɛ tsɛ kɛ ebi oblayoo ni kɛ lɛ yɔɔ shĩa lɛ he lɛ.”
Beni wɔbote shia ko mli ni mitswa shinaa lɛ, etsɛɛɛ nɔŋŋ ni yoo ko kɛ oyaiyeli gbala mi ewo tsũ lɛ mli ni eŋa shinaa lɛ.
7 No hewɔ lɛ, ebi Farao tsuji-nukpai ní awo amɛ kɛ lɛ fɛɛ tsuŋ yɛ enuŋtsɔ lɛ shĩa lɛ akɛ: “Mɛni hewɔ nyɛhiɛ efee mɔbɔmɔbɔ ŋmɛnɛ nɛkɛ?”
“Akɛni eshwɛɔ mikome pɛ yɛ shia hewɔ lɛ, minuɔ he akɛ ashi mi,” taakɛ wu ko kɛɛ lɛ.
Shiɛlɔi komɛi náaa mɛi amɛkɛgba sane kɛ́ amɛmiitsu shĩa fɛɛ shĩa shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ, ejaakɛ amɛyaninaaa mɛi pii yɛ shĩa.
26 Leebi maŋkpa lɛ, yoo lɛ bagbee nuumo lɛ shinaa lɛ shi he ni enuŋtsɔ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ, ni ekã jɛmɛ aahu kɛyashi hulu je.
26 No hewɔ lɛ, Danbii lɛ yi gbɛ amɛtee; ni akɛni Mika na akɛ amɛhe wa fe lɛ hewɔ lɛ, etsɔ ehe ni eku esɛɛ kɛtee eshĩa lɛ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, be ko be ni wɔmiishiɛ yɛ shĩ fɛɛ shĩa lɛ, miwo foi kɛyi mɔ ko ni baju mikar lɛ mli redio lɛ sɛɛ.
21 Yuda binuu Shela+ bihii ji Er, lɛ ji Leka tsɛ, kɛ Laada, lɛ ji Maresha tsɛ, kɛ mama fɛfɛo he nitsulɔi awekui ni jɛ Ashbea shĩa lɛ, 22 kɛ Yokim, kɛ Kozeba hii lɛ, kɛ Yoash, kɛ Saraf, mɛi ni kɛ Moab yei bote gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ, kɛ Yushabi-lehem.

Mose Wolo ni Ji Enyɔ 3:15 kɛɔ akɛ: “Yehowa . . . ji migbɛi kɛyaa naanɔ, ni enɛ ji mikaimɔ kɛyaa yinɔi fɛɛ.”
No hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa diɛŋtsɛ wie yɛ kuku 15 lɛ akɛ: “Enɛ ji migbɛ́i kɛyaa naanɔ, ni enɛ ji mikaimɔ kɛyaa yinɔi fɛɛ.”
41 “Agbɛnɛ hu, kɛ́ gbɔ ko ni jɛɛɛ omaŋ Israel teŋ jɛ maŋsɛɛ shɔŋŋ ba yɛ ogbɛ́i* lɛ hewɔ+ 42 (ejaakɛ amɛbaanu ogbɛ́i kpele+ lɛ he kɛ onineshiwalɛ kɛ onine ni okpã mli lɛ he), ni eba ni ekɛ ehiɛ tsɔɔ shĩa nɛɛ ni esɔle lɛ, 43 no lɛ, jɛɛ ŋwɛii, ni ji oshihilɛhe+ lɛ obo toi, ni ofee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni gbɔ lɛ baabi bo lɛ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ fɛɛ ale ogbɛ́i lɛ ni amɛshe bo gbeyei+ tamɔ bɔ ni omaŋ Israel feɔ lɛ, ni amɛná amɛle akɛ ogbɛ́i kã shĩa nɛɛ ni mima lɛ nɔ.
(Yesaia 9:6, New World Translation) Bɔfo Paulo kɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ to E-sɔɔmɔ hegbɛi ni nɔ kwɔlɔ lɛ ahe beni eŋma akɛ: “Nyɔŋmɔ wo [Yesu] enɔ gojoo, ni eduro lɛ gbɛi ni ta gbɛi fɛɛ gbɛi nɔ, koni . . . nakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ amli.”—Filipibii 2:9, 10.
Nakai yiŋkpɛɛ lɛ fã ko kaneɔ akɛ: “Wɔji Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji ni ekɛ nitsumɔ ewo wɔdɛŋ koni wɔtsu yɛ egbɛi amli, koni wɔbo famɔ ni ekɛha wɔ akɛ wɔjaje shɛɛ sane ni Yesu Kristo bashiɛ lɛ wɔtsɔɔ mɛi lɛ toi, ni wɔha amɛle akɛ Yehowa ji anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ Ofe lɛ; no hewɔ lɛ, wɔkɛ miishɛɛ miikpɛlɛ gbɛi ni Nuŋtsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛfɔ̃ wɔnɔ lɛ nɔ, ni wɔmiisumɔ koni ale wɔ ákɛ Yehowa Odasefoi, ni akɛ nakai gbɛi lɛ atsɛ́ wɔ.”
Mɛnɛɛmɛi kwɛ gbɛ kɛha ŋwɛi kojomɔ ni akɛbaate shi ashi mɛi fɔji lɛ, ni yɛ faŋŋ mli lɛ, amɛji mɛi ni akɛ amɛ wie wiemɔi nɛɛ, akɛ: “Nyɛkwɛa mi gbɛ, Yehowa kɛɛ, kɛyashi gbi nɔ ní mate shi akɛ odasefonyo! ejaakɛ miyiŋtoo ji akɛ mabua jeŋmaji lɛ anaa, ni makpee maŋtsɛyelii lɛ kɛaakpe, koni mafɔse mimlila kɛ mimlifu ni naa wa lɛ fɛɛ mashwie amɛnɔ; ejaakɛ miwuŋayeli la lɛ aaashã shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ.”—Zefania 3:8.
19 Ni Yehowa kɛɛ Yeremia ekoŋŋ akɛ: 20 “Nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ, ‘Kɛ́ nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛku mikpaŋmɔ ni kɔɔ jetsɛremɔ he lɛ, kɛ mikpaŋmɔ ni kɔɔ jenamɔ he lɛ mli koni jetsɛremɔ kɛ jenamɔ akaba yɛ amɛbe naa dɔŋŋ lɛ,+ 21 no lɛ, abaanyɛ aku mikpaŋmɔ ni mikɛ mitsulɔ David ekpaŋ lɛ mli+ koni ekaná binuu ko ye maŋtsɛ yɛ emaŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ nɔ,+ ni nakai nɔŋŋ eji yɛ mikpaŋmɔ ni mikɛ Levi osɔfoi lɛ, misɔɔlɔi lɛ,+ ekpaŋ lɛ hu gbɛfaŋ.
Klɛŋklɛŋ afii oha lɛ mli Kristofoi lɛ baptisi yɛ Yesu gbɛi amli, amɛtsa helai yɛ egbɛi amli, amɛtsɔɔ nii yɛ egbɛi amli, amɛtsɛ́ egbɛi lɛ, amɛna nɔ̃ yɛ egbɛi lɛ hewɔ, ni amɛwó egbɛi lɛ nɔ gojoo.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 2:38; 3:16; 5:28; 9:14, 16; 19:17.
Enɛ hewɔ hu ni Nyɔŋmɔ wó enɔ gojoo, ni eduro lɛ gbɛi ní tá gbɛi fɛɛ gbɛi nɔ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ amli, ní lilɛi fɛɛ lilɛi agbá mli kpoo ákɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuŋtsɔ kɛwo tsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam.”—Filip.
Yesu “gbɛi” lɛ ekwɔɔɔ fe lɛ diɛŋtsɛ egbɛi lɛ, shi ekwɔ fe bɔɔ nɔ̃ fɛɛ bɔɔ nɔ̃ kroko nɔ̃.
Enɛ hewɔ hu ni Nyɔŋmɔ wó enɔ gojoo, ni eduro lɛ gbɛ́i ní tá gbɛ́i fɛɛ gbɛ́i nɔ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛ́i lɛ amli, ní lilɛi fɛɛ lilɛi agbá mli kpoo ákɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuŋtsɔ kɛwo tsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam.”
6 Beni bɔfo Paulo tsɔɔ bɔni akɛ esa akɛ wɔná bulɛ ni mli kwɔ wɔha Kristo Yesu ni ji wɔ-Maŋtsɛ kɛ wɔ-Osɔfonukpa lɛ, eŋma akɛ: ‘Nyɔŋmɔ wó e-Bi lɛ nɔ gojoo, ni eduro lɛ gbɛi ní tá gbɛi fɛɛ gbɛi nɔ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ amli, ní lilɛi fɛɛ lilɛi agbá mli kpoo ákɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuŋtsɔ kɛwo tsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam.’
Yɛ anɔkwa ni Yesu ye hewɔ lɛ, “Nyɔŋmɔ wo enɔ gojoo, ni eduro lɛ gbɛi ni ta gbɛi fɛɛ gbɛi nɔ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ amli, ni lilɛi fɛɛ lilɛi agba mli kpoo akɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuntsɔ kɛwo Tsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam.”—Filipibii 2:7-11.
Paulo kɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɔŋmɔ wó [Yesu nɔ] gojoo, ni eduro lɛ gbɛ́i ní tá gbɛ́i fɛɛ gbɛ́i nɔ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛ́i lɛ amli, ní lilɛi fɛɛ lilɛi agbá mli kpoo ákɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuŋtsɔ kɛwo tsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam.”
Paulo kɛfataa he akɛ: “Enɛ hewɔ hu ni Nyɔŋmɔ wo enɔ gojoo, ni eduro lɛ gbɛi ni ta gbɛi fɛɛ gbɛi nɔ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ amli, ni lilɛi fɛɛ lilɛi agba mli kpoo akɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuŋtsɔ kɛwo Tsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam.”
Enɛ nɔŋŋ hewɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ wó enɔ ni ehã lɛ gbɛhe ni nɔ kwɔ, ni ejɛ mlihilɛ mli ehã lɛ gbɛ́i ni ta gbɛ́i krokomɛi fɛɛ nɔ, koni yɛ Yesu gbɛ́i mli lɛ, mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi ní lilɛi fɛɛ lilɛi ajaje atsɔɔ akɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuŋtsɔ, kɛwo Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ji Tsɛ lɛ hiɛ nyam.”—Fil.
Yesu “gbɛi” kɔɔ egbɛhe kɛ hegbɛ ni nɔ kwɔ lɛ he yɛ biɛ, nakai hu ji bɔ ni wɔnuɔ “gbɛi ni ta gbɛi-fɛɛ-gbɛi nɔ” ni atsi ta yɛ Filipibii 2:9 lɛ shishi wɔhaa.
Bɔfo Paulo tsɔɔ hewalɛ kpele ni gbɛhe mli ni Yesu yɔɔ lɛ naa yɛ sɔlemɔ nɔ lɛ mli akɛ: “Enɛ hewɔ hu ni Nyɔŋmɔ wo enɔ gojoo, ni eduro lɛ gbɛi ni ta gbɛi fɛɛ gbɛi nɔ, koni mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ anakutso fɛɛ nakutso akula shi yɛ Yesu gbɛi amli, ni lilɛi fɛɛ lilɛi agba mli kpoo akɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuntsɔ kɛwo Tsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam.” — Filipibii 2: 9-11.
(1 Samuel 17: 34-36) Ekaafeemɔ ni ekaaa nɛ, yɛ be mli ni kɛ mɔ ko susu he lɛ enaa akɛ jata nyɛɔ egbeɔ kooloo ni da fe lɛ lɛ.
(b) Mɛni ba beni maŋtsɛ lɛ ku esɛɛ kɛtee jatai abu lɛ naa enɔ jetsɛremɔ leebi lɛ?
6 No hewɔ ni koo mli jata tutuaa amɛ lɛ,
Edamɔ shi diŋŋ ni etsiii ehe kɛyashi beni jata lɛ tee.
19 Ebaafee tamɔ nuu ko ni joɔ jata naa foi, ní ekɛ oshishibrishi yakpeɔ,
Mɛi ni mɔ nyɛminuu ko amɛwo tsuŋ lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome ni hiɛ maŋkwramɔŋ susumɔi lɛ kɛɛ nyɛminuu lɛ akɛ: “Ebaahi akɛ aaaŋmɛɛ jatai ni yɔɔ kooloi akwɛmɔ he lɛ moŋ ahe, fe ni aaaŋmɛɛ nyɛhe ni aha nyɛye nyɛhe ekoŋŋ!”
Naa Daniel kome pɛ kɛ jatai komɛi ni hɔmɔ miiye amɛ.
Taakɛ bɔ ni jata damɔ shi kɛha ekaafeemɔ lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ hu ekaafeemɔ babaoo he ebahia koni amɛta sane ni mli wa waa nɛɛ ni amɛmi, ni amɛkɛha yɛ woji amli, ni amɛja kɛbɔle jeŋ fɛɛ.
+ 18 Afee atrakpoi ekpaa yɛ maŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ hiɛ, ni akɛ shika tsuru efee najiashi sɛi akpɛtɛ maŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ he, ni niji yɛ maŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ biɛ kɛ biɛ, ni jata+ damɔ niji enyɔ lɛ eko fɛɛ eko he.
10 Amɛbaanyiɛ Yehowa sɛɛ, ni ebaahũu tamɔ jata;+
Yehowa here Shadrak, Meshak, kɛ Abednego kɛjɛ la flɔnɔɔ lɛ mli, ni ehãaa jatai lɛ akpe Daniel.
4 Hiɛnɔkamɔ yɛ kɛhã mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ wala mli, ejaakɛ gbee ni hiɛ kã lɛ, ehi fe jata ni egbo.
16 Lalatsɛ lɛ tee nɔ akɛ: “Onyiɛ jata kɛ shikpãa po nɔ; ooonaanaa jata bi kɛ jeŋ nɔ yɛ onajiashi.”
Eyɛ mli akɛ amɛfɔ̃ lai amɛwo he ni amɛnuɔ kooloi lɛ ahe yɛ lɛ moŋ, shi jatai lɛ eyaaa aahu kɛyashi jetsɛremɔ tɔ̃ɔ.
38 Eshi eshihilɛhe lɛ efɔ̃ shi tamɔ jatanuu kɛ ekuɛ he tsɔi,+
Biblia lɛ wieɔ akɛ Satan tamɔ jata ni miihũu, ni miitao mɛi babaoo emi.
38 Amɛ fɛɛ amɛbaabolɔ tamɔ jatai.
Kɛkɛ ni eha akɛ hii gbohii ni bɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛgbe Daniel lɛ ha jatai lɛ.
Akɛ jata tsuɔ nii yɛ Biblia mli akɛ ekaafeemɔ he okadi, titri lɛ yɛ jalɛsaneyeli kɛ jalɛ nifeemɔ sɛɛdii mli.
David gba Saul nɔ ni efee jata lɛ kɛ oshishibrishi lɛ, ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ ekashe gbeyei.
Yesaia 35:9 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Jata ko jata ko ehiŋ jɛi, ni kooloo awuiyelɔ ko enyiɛŋ [Gbɛ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ] nɔ.”
19 Kaimɔ akɛ bulɔ lɛ tee nɔ “ebo tamɔ jata akɛ: [Yehowa, NW], jenamɔ nɛɛ fɛɛ lɛ midamɔ buuhe lɛ, ni nyɔɔŋnyɔɔŋ fɛɛ lɛ midamɔ mibuu nɔ.”
Kɛji Tiber faa lɛ nui lɛ yimɔ kɛtee shɔŋŋ kɛyashɛ maŋ lɛ gbogboi lɛ ahe, kɛji Nilo ejeee ŋa eshwieee ŋmɔji lɛ anɔ, kɛji nugbɔ enɛɛɛ, loo kɛji shikpɔŋhosomɔ, hɔmɔ, loo haomɔ ko ba lɛ, amrɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ anuɔ bolɔmɔ akɛ: ‘Nyɛfɔa Kristofoi lɛ nyɛhaa jata lɛ!’”
Ejwaraa miwui lɛ fɛɛ tamɔ jata jwaraa wui lɛ;
Shi taakɛ Portraits in the Wild wolo lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, bei komɛi lɛ, jata “kɛ shihilɛ ni yɔɔ lɛ tsuɔ nii kɛkɛ—akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, tamɔ be mli ni eyanina ŋaŋ-okpɔŋɔ bi ni ewɔ nɛkɛ.”
Eyɛ mli akɛ ekolɛ mɛi ni kɛ amɛhe eha kɛha asafo lɛ tsumaa nitsumɔ lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi haŋ wiemɔi ni kanyaa mɔ waa yɛ wiemɔ kpokui anɔ moŋ, shi kɛ́ eba Maŋtsɛyeli Asai amaamɔ lɛ, ogboi ji amɛ.
Te fee tɛŋŋ ni hulu, nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii, kɛ agbɛnɛ nibii pii ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ ba?
Atsɛɔ ŋulamii lɛ fɛɛ kɛ amɛgbɛ́ii (26)
30 Bɔ ni ato hulu, nyɔŋtsere, ŋulamii kɛ shibɔlemɔ ŋulamii krokomɛi lɛ ahe gbɛjianɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ aha lɛ haa gbɔmɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ anaa kpɛɔ amɛhe.
24 Akɛ maŋtsɛmɛi ní jɛ David maŋtsɛmɛi aweku lɛ mli lɛ toɔ ŋulamii ahe yɛ Biblia lɛ mli.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ anyɛŋ ale ŋulamii lɛ ayifalɛ, amɛkanemɔ wa tamɔ bɔ ni “ŋshɔnaa shia” kanemɔ wa lɛ.
Amrɔ nɛɛ aheɔ ayeɔ akɛ ŋulami kushai ni fa fe akpekpe toi akpei oha ni yɔɔ ŋwɛiniiaŋ, ni ŋulamii akpekpe toi akpei abɔ ni feɔ ŋulami kushai lɛ ekomɛi.
Minii woɔ mi ni ehiɛɔ mi yɛ edɛŋ gbɛkɛ ni etsɔɔ mi ŋulamii lɛ agbɛi.
Yɛ fɛ̃ibe gbɛkɛnaashi beni jeŋ tse lɛ, ŋwɛi kpɛlɛɔ kɛ ŋulamii, ni nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ kpɛlɛɔ waa akɛ ekpɛɔ akrowatsui ni akɛ jwɛi eha yiteŋ lɛ amli ehaa amɛ.
Gbi ko gbɛkɛ lɛ, eha Abraham je kpo kɛba agbó lɛ naa ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Kwɛmɔ ŋwɛi ko, ni okane ŋulamii, akɛ ooonyɛ amɛ okane lo? . . .
Kɛ́ egbaaa Yesu naa akɛ ebaawɔ agbonaa kɛ́ ehe bahia ni efee nakai lɛ, belɛ wɔ hu esaaa akɛ egbaa wɔnaa akɛ wɔbaafee nakai yɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ hewɔ.”
No sɛɛ lɛ, beni miná mile akɛ yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, “ŋulamii” lɛ ekomɛi ji ŋulami kushai ni tamɔ wɔ-Milky Way ni ŋulamii akpekpei toi akpei abɔ yɔɔ eko fɛɛ eko mli lɛ, minaa kpɛ mihe aahu po fe tsutsu lɛ.
Nibii ni Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ ebɔ, tamɔ gbɛkɛ ni jeŋ etse ni ŋwɛi ni eyi tɔ kɛ ŋulamii lɛ akwɛmɔ baanyɛ aha mɔ tsuiŋ ayi obɔ kɛ shidaa kɛha Bɔlɔ lɛ.
Mɛni hewɔ ni nyɛmɔ ni fa ni ŋulamii lɛ ekome yɔɔ lɛ he hiaa wɔ waa nakai lɛ?
(1 Yohane 5:19; Kpojiemɔ 11:8) Ekɛ mɛi ni jieɔ mɛi ahiɛtserɛ, lalatsɛmɛi, kɛ mɛi ni ehe gbɛi yɛ akaŋshii mli efee amagai ni ejáa, kɛ agbɛnɛ amɛ jooi, amɛ lalai, amɛ fɛoyelii kɛ ŋɔɔmɔyeli hu.
(Yesaia 34:4) Wiemɔ ni ji “ŋwɛi asafo lɛ fɛɛ” lɛ etsɔɔɔ ŋulamii diɛŋtsɛ kɛ shibɔlemɔ ŋulamii ní wɔnaa lɛ.
Ejeɔ kpo yɛ ŋwɛi he ni ŋulamii ni tsuɔ nii tamɔ flɔnɔɔi wuji fɔseɔ amɛla kɛ dɔlɛ amɛshwieɔ lɛ.
Te ŋulamii kɛ shibɔlemɔ ŋulamii lɛ ayifalɛ lɛ, ni te ato amɛhe gbɛjianɔ ahã tɛŋŋ?
Agbɛnɛ hu, adebɔɔ mli mlai ni kudɔɔ jeŋ ni anaa nɛɛ he shishinumɔ ha efee nɔ ni he ehiaaa dɔŋŋ akɛ aaakɛɛ akɛ naakpɛɛ nibii ni kɛbashi nakai beaŋ lɛ anuuu shishi, tamɔ nugbɔshimɔ kɛ sarawa-gbalamɔ, aloo ŋulamii kɛ ŋulamii lei-atsɛmɛi komɛi apuemɔ lɛ jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ dɛŋ aloo eji Nyɔŋmɔ Nifeemɔ.
Ŋwɛibɔfoi ni ji “leebi ŋulamii” lɛ kɛ miishɛɛ bɔ oshe beni ato shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ, ni ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ ŋwɛibɔfoi akpekpei abɔ lɛ kɛ miishɛɛ ‘tsuɔ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ he nii.’
Ejaakɛ fɛɛ damɔ susumɔ ni ana akɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ yɛ jeŋ muu fɛɛ teŋ tuuŋtu, ni ŋulamii lɛ kɛ shibɔlemɔ ŋulamii lɛ bɔleɔ he lɛ nɔ.
Bɔfo Paulo ŋma akɛ “ŋulami kome fe ŋulami kroko anunyam.”
20 Akɛni wɔnaaa hulu loo ŋulamii gbii saŋŋ, ni kɔɔyɔɔ ni tswaa kɛkpeɔ wɔ lɛ hu naa wa waa* hewɔ lɛ, wɔhiɛnɔkamɔ akɛ abaahere wɔyiwala lɛ fɛɛ bɔi tãa.
11 Akɛni David ehiɛɛɛ shwɛde hewɔ lɛ, ŋulamii akpei fioo pɛ enyɛ ekɛ ehiŋmɛi na.
Biblia lɛ tsɛɔ lɛ “mɔ ni fee hulu ní ekpɛ́ shwane, ní ewo nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii akpɔi ní amɛkpɛ́ nyɔɔŋ” lɛ.

Yesu tsĩ enɛɛmɛi ateŋ ekome tã beni ekɛ aboloo akpiti kɛ wein to egbele ni baa lɛ he Kaimɔ lɛ shishi, ni ekɛɛ yɛ kpulu ni wein yɔɔ mli lɛ he akɛ: “Nɛkɛ kpulu nɛɛ ji kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ yɛ milá ni aŋɔ-shwie shi aha nyɛ lɛ mli” lɛ.
Ni ewo kpulu lɛ, ni eda shi, ni eŋɔha amɛ ni ekɛɛ: Nyɛ fɛɛ nyɛnua eko! ejaakɛ enɛ ji milá ni ji kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ nɔ lɛ, ni afɔse ashwie shi yɛ mɛi pii ahewɔ ha eshaifaa lɛ.”

Saji ni amɛwie yɛ faŋŋ mli lɛ ateŋ ekome ji akɛ gbohiiashitee lɛ eba momo, ni yɛ faŋŋ mli lɛ eji mumɔŋ nɔ̃ loo okadifeemɔŋ nɔ̃, ni yɛ no hewɔ lɛ gbohiiashitee ko baŋ dɔŋŋ wɔsɛɛ ko yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ shishi.—2 Timoteo 2:16-18.
(Yohane 20: 17) Eyɛ mli akɛ atee Yesu shi momo akɛ mumɔ ni he wa moŋ, shi Yehowa ka he eji e-Nyɔŋmɔ.
Yɛ nakai afi lɛ mli lɛ, no mli lɛ, Israelbii lɛ ena Nyɔŋmɔ hewalɛ lɛ he odaseyeli ni mli wa waa momo.
Kɛ Yudafoi ni batsɔmɔ Kristofoi yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ le Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi momo lɛ, mɛɛ shishinumɔ naa Yesu jie lɛ kpo etsɔɔ amɛ, loo eha amɛle?
(Mateo 28:19, 20) Paulo kpa mɛi ni abaptisi amɛ momo lɛ fai koni ‘amɛkɛ amɛgbɔmɔtsei aha akɛ afɔlei ni hiɛ kamɔ, ni yɔɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ, ni saa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, sɔɔmɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ kɛ amɛjwɛŋmɔŋ nyɛmɔ.’
Ni kɛlɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ yiwalaheremɔi ní sa kadimɔ waa lɛ kɛ mumɔŋ anunyam ebaha mɛi ní afɔ amɛ mu lɛ momo.
No mli lɛ, ejɔɔ ehe nɔ momo eha Nyɔŋmɔ ejaakɛ eji Israelnyo, ni Israel maŋ lɛ ji maŋ ni ejɔɔ ehe nɔ eha Nyɔŋmɔ.
3 Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli ni aŋɔha Yesu Kristo lɛ ebɔi nitsumɔ momo kɛjɛ 1914 Ŋ.B.
AABIBII Ireland maŋsɔɔlɔ ko saji yɛ TV lɛ nɔ, ni datrɛfonyo ko ta etsu mli eekwɛ.
NƐKƐ wiemɔi ni tɛlivishiŋ nɔ wielɔ, Tom Brokaw wie nɛɛ baanyɛ akɔ maji babaoo he.
Nibii ni haa mɛi fiteɔ amɛbe ŋmɛnɛ lɛ ekomɛi ji tɛlivishiŋ kwɛmɔ, vidio nɔ shwɛmɔi kɛ Intanɛt lɛ ní akɛjieɔ hiɛtserɛ.
Tɛlivishiŋ ni aaakwɛ babaoo loo Internet lɛ mli ni aaatao babaoo, je lɛŋ saji ni he ehiaaa akanemɔ, aloo hiɛtserɛjiemɔ kɛ shwɛmɔ ni aaatiuɔ sɛɛ tuutu lɛ baanyɛ aha etɔ wɔ.
5:8) Kɛ́ oŋmɛ gbɛ ni nyɛkɛ TV kwɛmɔ loo nɔ̃ kroko ni he ehiaaa tsɔ̃ ye gbɛkɛ Weku Jamɔ ni he hiaa waa nɛɛ najiaŋ lɛ, no tsɔɔ akɛ Satan nine eshɛ nyɛ nɔ.—Efe.
Tɛlivishiŋ kwɛmɔ efee nɔ ni fiteɔ mɔ be fe fɛɛ yɛ hei pii afii babaoo nɛ.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, yɛ kɔɔyɔŋ tsɔne ni akɛ kpãai emɔmɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, afi 1990 afii lɛ teŋgbɛ pɛ mli abaná tɛlivishiŋ ni akɛtswaa adafi.
Ani afiteɔ be babaoo daa gbi kɛhaa tɛlivishin nɔ nifeemɔi akwɛmɔ?
“Awo, okɛ tɛlivishiŋ lɛ ama shi.
Je lɛŋ hiɛtserɛjiemɔi, tamɔ sinii kɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi ni jeŋba shara yɔɔ mli kɛ lalai ni naa wa lɛ ji kpoŋ naa loo ni tsuɔ nii waa.
Mɔ ko naa akɛ enaanyo yɛ tɛlivishiŋ ni ehiɛ lɛɛmɔ ji sɛntimitai 80, ni eyaa ni eyaheɔ nɔ ni ehiɛ lɛɛmɔ ji sɛntimitai 90, eyɛ mli akɛ enɔ̃ ni ehiɛ lɛɛmɔ ji sɛntimitai 70 lɛ tsuɔ nii jogbaŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ.
(Lala 101:2) Be mli ni ota shi yɛ oshia lɛ, ekolɛ obaasu tɛlivishiŋ lɛ ni obɔi sini kwɛmɔ.
6 Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, afɔ nine atsɛ obalaŋtai kɛba tɛlivishin nɔ nifeemɔ ko ni gbɔmɛi ni ale amɛ jogbaŋŋ baa mli lɛ mli koni amɛtsɔɔ amɛjwɛŋmɔ yɛ nɔ ni akɛɛ atsɛɔ lɛ eshai kpawo ni gbeɔ mɔ lɛ he.
Bei pii lɛ, yɛ be fioo ni fɔlɔi kɛ bii lɛ fɛɛ hiɔ shĩa lɛ mli lɛ, kɔmpiuta, TV, kɛ ilɛtrɔnik nibii krokomɛi haaa amɛnyɛ amɛgba sane.
Ní mɔ ko aaaŋmɛ gbɛ ni tɛlivishiŋ loo nanemɛi gbohii atsɔse ebi eha lɛ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ eha je lɛ mumɔ lɛ miiná hewalɛ yɛ gbekɛ lɛ tsɔsemɔ nɔ.
Yɛ United States lɛ, aaafee gbɔmɛi akpekpei 20 kwɛɔ nii ni ajieɔ yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ atsɔɔ kɛtsaraa nɔ lɛ daa otsi, ní tsɔɔ ŋwɛibɔfoi ni kɛ amɛhe woɔ adesai ashihilɛi amli lɛ.
Yɛ jarayelihei wuji ni yɔɔ Seoul lɛ, shwapo ko ni hɔɔ atadei ni awoɔ yɛ shishi pɛ lɛ tswa adafi yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ ni obaana ni yɛ amɛsamfɛji anaa lɛ akɛ nibii nɛɛ pɛ etsotsoro Blonya tsei anɔ ni akɛwula lɛ.
Nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ, niiamlipɛilɔi ena tsakpaa ko yɛ yiwalɛ nibii ni jeɔ kpo faŋŋ yɛ televishin nɔ lɛ kɛ awui ni obalaŋtai yeɔ lɛ teŋ.
Kɛ nyɛfo mli kɛha tɛlivishin nɔ nifeemɔ ko loo akaŋshii he nɔ ko ni nyɛsumɔɔ waa lɛ, eka shi faŋŋ akɛ nyɛbii lɛ ebuŋ nikasemɔ lɛ akɛ ehe miihia waa.
“Ŋmɛnɛ, kɛ́ aja mli lɛ, gbekɛ kɛ ŋmɛlɛtswaai kpawo kwɛɔ tɛlivishiŋ daa gbi.
Te Kristofonyo aaafee tɛŋŋ ‘akwɛ ehe nɔ jogbaŋŋ’ yɛ tɛlivishin nɔ nibii, vidioi, kɛ sinii ahe?
Ajie enɛ kpo fɛfɛo yɛ maŋ lɛ tɛlivishin, redio kɛ adafitswaa woji amli.
Gbɔmɛi eshɔ̃ɔɔ su nii loo amɛfeee tɛlivishiŋ kɛ kɔmpiutai efolo kɛkɛ ní yiŋtoo ko bɛ sɛɛ.
Bɔni afee ni mɛi fɛɛ ni nyɛɛɛ ashi amɛshiai lɛ aná he sɛɛ lɛ, abɔ amaniɛ akɛ U.S. osɔfo ko ni ale lɛ waa lɛ ewo shi akɛ, ebaatswa Yesu sɛɛkuu lɛ he adafi yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ —yɛ faŋŋ mli!
Mɛi pii kwɛɔ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nibii ní tsɔɔ bɔ ni nikwɛlɔi yasaraa mɛi ní ehe gbɛi waa ní yɔɔ shiai wuji fɛfɛji amli lɛ ni amɛkɛjieɔ amɛhiɛtserɛ.
Shi Kristofoi ni yɔɔ Pella lɛ jɛ amɛtsuiŋ amɛda Nyɔŋmɔ shi akɛ ehere amɛyiwala.
Wɔmiida nyɛ shi jogbaŋŋ.”
Nyɛhaa wɔdaa Yehowa shi daa.
Sɛɛ mli lɛ, abaptisi lɛ, ni edaa Yehowa shi akɛ ebaa ewala yi.

(3 Mose 23:33-43) Nɔ ni kɛ enɛ kpaa gbee lɛ, asafo babaoo lɛ, ni ji naabuamɔ kpeteŋkpele lɛ fa lɛ, kɛ shidaa haa yɛ maŋtsɛsɛi lɛ hiɛ “ni amɛhiɛ blɛoi yɛ amɛdɛŋ.”—Kpojiemɔ 7:9.

Shidaa Sɔlemɔ
Miida Yehowa shi waa yɛ emusuŋtsɔlɛ kɛ eshai ni eŋɔfaa lɛ hewɔ.”—Lala 103:9-13; 130:3, 4; Galatabii 6:7, 8.
Mɛi nyɔŋma lɛ ateŋ lɛ, mɔ kome nɛɛ pɛ bada Yesu shi.
+ 41 Mɛi ni fata amɛhe yɛ jɛmɛ hu ji Heman kɛ Yedutun,+ kɛ hii ni aje gbɛ atsɛ* lɛ ateŋ mɛi ni eshwɛ lɛ, koni amɛda Yehowa shi,+ ejaakɛ “esuɔmɔ ni tsakeee lɛ hiɔ shi kɛyaa naanɔ”;+ 42 ni Heman+ kɛ Yedutun fata amɛhe yɛ jɛmɛ koni amɛkpã tɛtɛrɛmantɛrɛi lɛ, ni amɛtswa tsɛŋtsɛŋi lɛ, kɛ nibii ni akɛjieɔ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ yi lɛ,* ni Yedutun bihii+ lɛ ji mɛi ni buɔ agbó lɛ naa.
Ani ejeee anɔkwale akɛ esa akɛ wɔda lɛ shi gbi fɛɛ gbi yɛ wala ni ekɛduroɔ wɔ lɛ hewɔ?
Be ko lɛ eda Nyɔŋmɔ shi yɛ mɔ ni atsɔ enɔ ni ekɛbaha lɛ lɛ hewɔ.
(Yohane 16:13; Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 1:8; 2 Korintobii 4:7-10; Galatabii 5:22, 23) Ani esaaa akɛ wɔdaa shi yɛ nɛkɛ duromɔ nikeenii ni jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ nɛɛ hewɔ?
Eŋma kɛyaha asafo ni yɔɔ Roma lɛ akɛ: “Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ miitsɔ Yesu Kristo nɔ miida mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shi yɛ nyɛ fɛɛ nyɛhewɔ, akɛ agbaa nyɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ he sane yɛ je lɛŋ fɛɛ.”
Paulo ŋa Priska kɛ Akwila, ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Jeee mi kɛkɛ midaa amɛ shi, shi moŋ jeŋmaji lɛ amli asafoi lɛ fɛɛ hu daa amɛ shi.”
Eda Nyɔŋmɔ shi yɛ Kolosebii lɛ ahemɔkɛyeli lɛ hewɔ (3-8)
Wɔmiiŋɔ hegbɛ nɛɛ ni wɔkɛda mɛi fɛɛ ni náa nɛkɛ nihamɔ ni jɛ mlihilɛ mli nɛɛ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ lɛ shi.—2 Korintobii 9:11.
Biblia lɛ woɔ wɔ hewalɛ ni ‘wɔle shidaa,’ ni wɔjie hiɛsɔɔ kpo yɛ nɔ ko ni mɔ ko aaafee aha wɔ lɛ he.
3 Be fɛɛ be ni wɔsɔleɔ wɔhãa nyɛ lɛ, wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ, wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ Yesu Kristo Tsɛ lɛ shi, 4 ejaakɛ wɔnu hemɔkɛyeli ni nyɛyɔɔ yɛ Kristo Yesu mli, kɛ suɔmɔ ni nyɛyɔɔ kɛhã mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ fɛɛ 5 yɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ ni akɛto ahã nyɛ yɛ ŋwɛi lɛ hewɔ lɛ he.
Esa akɛ wɔsɔle ni wɔkɛ shidaa mumɔ akpɛlɛ ŋwɛi tsɔsemɔ nɔ.
Miida nyɛ shi yɛ shikpɔŋ he mfoniri wolo fɛfɛo nɛɛ hewɔ.”
Eŋɔɔ wɔnaa waa akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ yeɔ ebuaa wɔ yɛ shihilɛi ni tamɔ nakai amli, ni eyaa nɔ ekɛ mumɔŋ nibii kpakpai duroɔ wɔ be fɛɛ be!
Shi moŋ amɛbaasusu enɛ he akɛ eji hegbɛ ni jɔɔmɔ yɔɔ mli.—1 Mose 33:5; Lala 127:3.

Mɛɛ jɔɔmɔi Cameron ná?

7 Eŋɔɔ wɔnaa akɛ wɔyɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli.

3 Beni Nyɔŋmɔ bi Israel Maŋtsɛ Salomo nɔ̃ jɔɔmɔ ni etaoɔ lɛ, nɔyelɔ ni edako nɛɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Ha otsulɔ toiboo tsui, ni mikɛkojo omaŋ lɛ, koni mayoo nɔ ni hi kɛ nɔ ni ehiii.”
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, jeee akɛ amɛnine baashɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔmɔ nɔ kɛkɛ, shi moŋ, amɛbaawo mlihilɛ Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ji Yehowa lɛ hiɛ nyam yɛ asafo lɛ kɛ akutso lɛ mli.—1 Petro 2:12.

12 Kwɛ jɔɔmɔ ni nyɛmimɛi yei ni baa amɛhe shi lɛ ji yɛ asafo lɛ mli kɛji amɛkɛ ekomefeemɔ fĩ amɛwumɛi kɛ onukpai lɛ hu asɛɛ!
• Mɛɛ jɔɔmɔi mɛi ni kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nyiɛɔ lɛ náa?
(Kpojiemɔ 21:3, 4) Yesu gbele lɛ baanyɛ aha wɔnine ashɛ wɔsɛɛ be mli jɔɔmɔi ní eko ji shihilɛ mli ni wɔbaahi kɛya naanɔ yɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ ni yeɔ emuu mli lɛ nɔ.
Ni kɛlɛ, mɛɛ jɔɔmɔi Elisabet kɛ Zakaria na mli ŋɔɔmɔ nɛkɛ!
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ, toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shihilɛ kpakpa ni hela, ta, hɔmɔ, kɛ gbele, bɛ mli ni wɔbaaná mli ŋɔɔmɔ kɛya naanɔ lɛ, baaha wɔná miishɛɛ kɛ jɔɔmɔi ni bɛ naagbee.
Nakai ni amɛfeɔ lɛ haa amɛjieɔ amɛjwɛŋmɔ kɛjɛɔ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛnaagbai lɛ anɔ, ni amɛkɛ amɛjwɛŋmɔ maa nibii ni hi titri lɛ anɔ.—Fil.
Yelikɛbuamɔ ni Akɛha Koni Aye Henumɔŋ Naagbai Anɔ Kunim
(1 Timoteo 6: 9, 10) Shi kɛji akɛ wɔkɛ hela, shika, loo naagbai krokomɛi ni naa wa waa kpe hu?
Kɛ́ abi bo akɛ, ‘Ani mɛi enyɔ ni esoro amɛsubaŋ kwraa lɛ baanyɛ ahi shi yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli’ lɛ, te obaahã hetoo ohã tɛŋŋ?
Etsɔ gbɛ ni mli ka shi faŋŋ ni jwɛŋmɔ yɔɔ mli nɔ etsɔɔ naagbai titrii komɛi ni gbaa wɔnaa ŋmɛnɛ ni etsɔɔ gbɛi komɛi anɔ ni ŋwɛi nitsɔɔmɔ baanyɛ atsɔ nɔ aye abua wɔ ni wɔna shihilɛ kpakpa mli ŋɔɔmɔ.
Nyɛ kroko hu tsɔɔ bɔ ni enu he eha beni akɛɛ lɛ akɛ ebinuu ni eye afii ekpaa lɛ egbo trukaa yɛ tsui hela ko ni ená beni ahiɛ lɛ hɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ.
Ani amɛkɛ nɔnyɛɛ, nijiaŋwujee, nɔnaa, loo naagbai miikpe yɛ mlihilɛ ni gbɔmɛi ni ebɔle amɛ lɛ ejieee lɛ kpo lɛ hewɔ?
Eyɛ mli akɛ Katolik Sɔlemɔ lɛ te shi amɛwo lɛ, enanemɛi naaa enitsumɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ, ni efee tamɔ nɔ ni mɛi ni kwɛ enitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ asɛɛ gbala shi, ni ehe ye yɛ be babaoo mli moŋ, shi ekɛ faishitswaa tsu oti ni ma ehiɛ lɛ he nii yɛ ewala shihilɛ mli fɛɛ.
Bó amɛ toi beni amɛtsɔɔ bɔ ni eshishitoo mlai lɛ eye ebua amɛ ní eyeɔ ebuaa koni amɛdamɔ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ shihilɛ mli naagbai anaa lɛ.
Yɛ maji krokomɛi amli lɛ naagba kroko baanyɛ ate shi.
(Yeremia 10:23) Yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, nɔ ni ejɛ he ni atsé kɛjɛ Nyɔŋmɔ he lɛ mli kɛba ji naagbai ni yɔɔ gbeyei, ni ohia fata he.—Jajelɔ 8:9.
Ekolɛ naagbai ni eko nyiɛ eko sɛɛ lɛ miigbá onaa, shi etamɔ nɔ ni onanemɛi heyelilɔi lɛ amli miifili amɛ yɛ shihilɛ mli, nɔ ko gbaaa amɛnaa, ni amɛyɛ miishɛɛ.
Nɔ ni fe no lɛ, kɛ́ Kristofonyo le woloŋ lɛ, ebaanyɛ ekane Biblia lɛ jogbaŋŋ ni enu shishi, ebaanyɛ esusu naagbai ahe ni emu saji anaa yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ, ni ebaanyɛ etsɔɔ mɛi Biblia mli anɔkwalei lɛ yɛ gbɛ ni mli kã shi faŋŋ ní kɔneɔ mɔ yiŋ nɔ.
▪ “Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ kwɔ kwraa fe bɔ ni eeená dekã kɛsusu minaagbai lɛ ahe.”
Amɛle akɛ naagbai ni akɛkpeɔ lɛ “egbɛ eshwã babaoo ni emli wa waa fe bɔ ni eji afii nyɔŋma ni eho lɛ.”
Aka akɛ “abaafã” kpiti “akɛ maŋ hewalɛnamɔ he naagba” lɛ shishi yɛ afi 2000 lɛ mli.
Shi gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi hu ni kɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ naagbai miikpe yɛ oshara ko loo yɛ henumɔŋ naagbai ni haa mɔ haoɔ waa hewɔ lɛ baanyɛ amɛkɛ shishitoo mlai ni yɔɔ sane nɛɛ mli lɛ atsu nii.
Namɔ le bɔ ni atsuɔ naagbai ahe nii?
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Kristofonyo ko damɔ henumɔŋ naagbai anaa?
Enuɔ amɛ naagbai lɛ ashishi jogbaŋŋ, ni ebaanyɛ ekɛ ŋaawoo ni tamɔ nɔ ni lɛ diɛŋtsɛ etsɔ mli lɛ aha.
(b) Mɛɛ naagba kroko Petro wie he ni wɔbaasusu he yɛ enɛ sɛɛ?
13 Yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ jeŋ ta lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, je nɛŋ nɔyelɔi lɛ to Jeŋmaji Akpaŋmɔ lɛ koni amɛkɛbɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛna je lɛ shweshweeshwe shihilɛ he tsabaa, shi amɛnine nyɛ shi.
Ekãa ni tamɔ nɛkɛ yeɔ buaa mumɔŋ gbɔmɛi ni ji asafoŋ onukpai lɛ ni ‘amɛjajeɔ amɛnyɛmimɛi lɛ’ dani ebaa lɛ akɛ naagba ni amɛkɛkpe lɛ mli aaawo wu.
Te onuɔ naagba nɛɛ he ohaa tɛŋŋ?
17. (a) Mɛni hewɔ aŋkroaŋkroi ashitee lɛ efeŋ naagba ko kɛhaŋ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Yesu Kristo lɛ?
Mɛɛ gbɛi sɔrɔtoi anɔ onaa akɛ Kristo mla lɛ miitsu nii yɛ nyɛ asafo lɛ mli?
(b) Yehowa adebɔɔ nibii lɛ mli enyiɛ wɔnyɛɔ wɔnaa?
Tsɛmɛi ni ji Kristofoi lɛ tsɔɔ amɛbii lɛ anɔkwale lɛ, ni amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa amɛ koni wekukpaa kpakpa ahi amɛ kɛ amɛ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ teŋ, ni enɛ ni amɛfeɔ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ amɛmiikase Yehowa (Kwɛmɔ kuku 8-10)
Kɛ́ mɛi hei ni eba asafoŋ kpeei lɛ na akɛ Kristofoi asuɔmɔ yɛ wɔteŋ, ni ajie lɛ kpo atsɔɔ amɛ lɛ, ekolɛ no baatsirɛ amɛ ni amɛjie Nyɔŋmɔ yi, ní amɛbafata wɔhe kɛjá lɛ. —Yoh 13:35.
4:10, 11) Kɛ́ asafoŋ onukpai lɛ tsutsu ŋɔ enɛ feemɔ amɛfɔ amɛnɔ lɛ, amɛbaaye amɛbua mɛi krokomɛi ni yɔɔ asafo lɛ mli lɛ ni amɛbaana akɛ mɛi ni egbɔlɔ lɛ akwɛmɔ ji nɔ ko ni esaaa akɛ wɔkuɔ wɔhiɛ wɔfɔɔ nɔ kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Amɛnaa maji ni miiye ohia kɛ hɔmɔ, ta mli abobalɔi ni bɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ, gbekɛbii ni anyɛɛɛ akane ni AIDS eha amɛtsɔmɔ awusãi, kɛ gbɔmɛi akpekpei abɔ ni helai krokomɛi emɔmɔ amɛ.
Vincent, ni ji tsɛ ni yɔɔ bii ejwɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Bei pii lɛ, wɔkɛ wɔbii lɛ susuɔ sɛɛnamɔi kɛ osharai ni yɔɔ nifeemɔ ko he lɛ he, koni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛna gbɛ ni ja ni esa akɛ amɛkɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ ekɛɛ: “Mitoi kɛkɛ mikɛnu ohe, shi agbɛnɛ mihiŋmɛi enao.” —Hiob 42:5.
Enɛ ehã mina akɛ, miyɛ nɔ ko ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ ni manyɛ mikɛsɔmɔ Yehowa.”
26 No hewɔ lɛ, Danbii lɛ yi gbɛ amɛtee; ni akɛni Mika na akɛ amɛhe wa fe lɛ hewɔ lɛ, etsɔ ehe ni eku esɛɛ kɛtee eshĩa lɛ.
(Abɛi 4:18) Eji anɔkwale akɛ, bianɛ lɛ wɔnaa Nyɔŋmɔ yiŋtoo lɛ he nibii komɛi “tuutuu.”
18 ‘Nyɛyɛ hiŋmɛii, shi ani nyɛnaaa nii; nyɛyɛ toii, shi ani nyɛnuuu nii?’
Shi mibale bɔ ni maha lɛ hetoo yɛ naajɔlɛ naa, ni maye mabua lɛ ni ena akɛ Biblia lɛ miiná minɔ hewalɛ kpakpa.
(Luka 9:11) Kadimɔ akɛ Yesu musuŋ tsɔ̃ lɛ yɛ gbɔmɛi lɛ ahe dani ena nɔ ni amɛbaafee yɛ nɔ ni ebaatsɔɔ amɛ lɛ he.
Ekolɛ mɛi krokomɛi hu anijiaŋ baaje wui kɛ́ amɛna akɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛjamɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ baaa amɛjeŋ jogbaŋŋ.
4:4) Ja mɔ ko yɛ hemɔkɛyeli ni enuɔ mumɔŋ nibii ashishi dani ebaanyɛ enu nɔ ni yaa nɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli lɛ shishi.
Kɛ ootao enɛ he sane lɛ, no lɛ kwɛmɔ wolo ni ji Insight on the Scriptures, Kpo 2 ní Yehowa Odasefoi fee lɛ baafa 693-694 lɛ mli.
Yehowa wo shi yɛ Mesia lɛ, ní ji “susuma ní agbeɔ ehe guɔ” kɛ mɔ ní “jeŋmaji hu hiɔ ehiɛ” lɛ he akɛ: “Maŋtsɛmɛi aaana ni amɛaate shi, lumɛi hu aaana, ni amɛaakoto shi amɛjá yɛ Yehowa ni ji anɔkwafo kɛ Israel Mɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ní ehalao lɛ hewɔ.”—Yesaia 49:7.
Beni wɔyashɛ jɛmɛ yɛ December 1983 mli lɛ, no mli lɛ asafo lɛ edaaa, shi wɔmiina akɛ mɛi heei babaoo ni yɔɔ wiemɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ miiba.
Oweku lɛ baanyɛ ana Yehowa sɔlemɔtsu lɛ maa yɛ Yerusalem, ana bɔ ni Babilon asraafoi lɛ kpata hiɛ, ni amɛna bɔ ni Amralo Zerubabel ku sɛɛ ema ekoŋŋ lɛ.
No sɛɛ lɛ, wɔnaa okpɔŋɔ tsuru ko ni damɔ shi kɛha majimaji ateŋ ta.
Wolo ni atsĩ tã kɛtsɔ hiɛ ni ji Managing Your Mind lɛ kɛfata he akɛ: “Babaoo ni mɔ ko jwɛŋɔ nibii gbohii ni ekolɛ ebaaba lɛ he lɛ, babaoo ni nakai nibii lɛ baa mli ji no, ni babaoo ni ewaa akɛ eeele gbɛ nɔ ni ebaatsɔ koni etsu amɛhe nii.”
Kwɛmɔ akɛ obaana nɔ hewɔ ni Yehowa ji Kpɔ̃lɔ Kpeteŋkpele lɛ lo, kɛ gbɛ nɔ ni oootsɔ otsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi bɔ ni etsɛŋ ni Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ baakpɔ̃ adesai.
Wɔbaana bɔ ni Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ hiɛnɔkamɔ nɛɛ mli ehaa yɛ sane ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli.
Kɛ́ ootao gbɛi krokomɛi anɔ ni obaanyɛ otsɔ ni ohã omiishɛɛ afa fe bɔ ni eyɔɔ amrɔ nɛɛ, kwɛmɔ akrabatsa ni yitso ji “Nibii Krokomɛi Ni Baanyɛ Ahã Wɔná Miishɛɛ Babaoo” lɛ.
Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, Kristofoi gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi pii fɔko.
Mɛni hewɔ nilee kɛ sanesɛɛkɔmɔ he hiaa onukpa ni yɔɔ ŋa kɛ bii lɛ?
No hewɔ lɛ, yɛ gbi kome pɛ mli lɛ, abakɛɛ Hiob akɛ aju ekooloi lɛ ekomɛi ni ekrokomɛi hu egboi, agbe etsuji lɛ, ni ebii nyɔŋma lɛ hu egboi.
Du Suɔmɔ Kɛha Nikanemɔ kɛ Nikasemɔ Owo Obii lɛ Amli
Agbɛnɛ hu, amɛbaanyɛ amɛha amɛbii lɛ akpɛ yiŋ komɛi amɛha amɛhe, ni kɛ́ amɛyiŋkpɛɛ lɛ ye omanye lɛ, amɛjie amɛyi.
Eyɛ bii nyɔŋma kɛ wu, Rafael ni tɔɔ dãa.
Akɛni amɛtsiii amɛhe kɛjɛɛɛ jeŋmaji lɛ ahe hewɔ lɛ, shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ ‘eyi obɔ’ kɛ “maŋsɛɛ bii”—ni ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ, amɛji maŋsɛɛ bii ni kɛ nifeemɔi ni Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishemɔ bɛ mli bawo Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ ateŋ.
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Anɔkwa sane ni hãa anaa Nyɔŋmɔ bii lɛ kɛ Abonsam bii lɛ nɛ: Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni efeee jalɛ nii lɛ, ejɛɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mli, nakai nɔŋŋ ji mɔ ni sumɔɔɔ enyɛmi hu.”
Fɔlɔi woɔ amɛbii aŋaa.
Beni mɛi komɛi bɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛtsĩ gbekɛbii lɛ anaa koni amɛkaba Yesu ŋɔɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Nyɛhaa gbekɛbii lɛ abaa miŋɔɔ, ni nyɛkatsĩa amɛ gbɛ.”
(1 Tesalonikabii 1:1; 2: 11, 12) Bɔ ni akɛ nɛkɛ ŋaawoo nɛɛ ha yɛ mlijɔlɛ kɛ suɔmɔ mli hewɔ lɛ eha Paulo nyɛ eŋma akɛ: “Wɔmli jɔ yɛ nyɛteŋ, taakɛ bɔ ni biianyɛ hiɛɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ebii dɔdɔɔdɔ lɛ.
MƐƐ fɔlɔi yɔɔ ni amɛkɛ hiɛdɔɔ susuuu amɛbii lɛ awɔsɛɛ be he?
10 Ŋmalɛi lɛ kɛɔ hu akɛ: “Esaaa akɛ bii tiaa nii toɔ amɛ fɔlɔi, shi moŋ fɔlɔi ni tiaa nii toɔ amɛbii.”
13 Gbekɛbii komɛi ni nyɛko amɛkane nii lɛ kaseɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lalai ni abaala yɛ kpeei ashishi daa otsi lɛ amɛwoɔ amɛyitsoŋ.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, enɛ ji be ni sa jogbaŋŋ kɛha gbekɛbii kɛ mɛi heei akɛ amɛaabi onukpai lɛ kɛji amɛhe esa akɛ amɛaaje shishi amɛná gbɛfaŋnɔ yɛ maŋ odaseyeli nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Nikasemɔ ko ni afee yɛ gbekɛbii ni eye afii ejwɛ lɛ ahe lɛ jie lɛ kpo akɛ mɛi ni amɛkase henɔyeli falɛ ko kɛ nitsumɔ lɛ “daa ni bei pii lɛ amɛfeɔ gbekɛbii ni baa amɛjeŋ jogbaŋŋ, mɛi ni ale waa, mɛi ni kpɛlɛɔ nitsumɔi heei anɔ, mɛi ni yɔɔ hekɛnɔfɔɔ, kɛ gbekɛbii ni eye afii 13 kɛyaa ni anyɛɔ akɛ he fɔɔ amɛnɔ.”
28 Ebii lɛ teɔ shi ni amɛkɛɔ akɛ eyɛ miishɛɛ;
Biblia lɛ kɛ shishitoo mlai babaoo ni jara wa ni kɔɔ naagbai ni gbekɛbii kɛkpeɔ lɛ he lɛ haa.
8 Tsɛmɛi sumɔɔ amɛbii, ni amɛsumɔɔɔ ni mɛi lakaa amɛ.
Ni eeetsɔ ehiɛ yɛ Elia mumɔ kɛ hewalɛ mli, ni eyadɔrɔ tsɛmɛi atsuii kɛba bii ahe, kɛ toigbolɔi hu kɛba jalɔi anilee mli, ni esaa maŋ ni efee klalo eto Nuŋtsɔ [Yehowa].”—Luka 1:14-17.
Kɛ́ obii lɛ kase omaŋ wiemɔ lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ amɛbaaná he sɛɛ?
Tsɛmɛi ni ji Kristofoi lɛ tsɔɔ amɛbii lɛ anɔkwale lɛ, ni amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa amɛ koni wekukpaa kpakpa ahi amɛ kɛ amɛ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ teŋ, ni enɛ ni amɛfeɔ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ amɛmiikase Yehowa (Kwɛmɔ kuku 8-10)
Yɛ hei komɛi lɛ, akɛ gbekɛbii ni leee woloŋ lɛ yawoɔ mɔ ko shishi kɛha nitsumɔ kasemɔ yɛ ŋtayaatswaa, wuoyaa, nikpɛɛ, loo nitsumɔi krokomɛi amli.
Minuɔ he akɛ Yehowa kɛ nyɛmimɛi hii ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ babaoo, ni ye amɛbua mibii lɛ duro mi.
(Lala 9:10) Adesai ni ji fɔlɔi nyɛŋ amɛkɛ hebuu aha amɛbii be fɛɛ be.
10 Yosef kɛ hiɛmɛɛ here enyɛmimɛi lɛ beni esɔmɔɔ akɛ niyenii anɔkwɛlɔ nukpa yɛ Mizraim ni hɔmɔ eba jɛmɛ lɛ.
Gbɔmɛi akpekpei abɔ krokomɛi yɛ jeŋ fɛɛ ni miina nɔ̃ yɛ hɔmɔ kɛ helai ahewɔ.
Kɛ́ niyenii bu yɛ buulu nɔ,
• Namɛi eji amɛsɔ̃ akɛ amɛjie Biblia mli anɔkwalei lɛ ahe shishinumɔ heei ni anáa lɛ akpo?
Kɛji nakai lɛ, belɛ ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ ohiɛ sɔ mumɔŋ niyenii kpakpa ni akɛha yɛ nɛkɛ henaabuamɔi kɛha anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ, Yehowa, lɛ jamɔ lɛ shishi.
Mile akɛ nɔ ni he hiaa nyɛmimɛi hii ni yɔɔ tsuŋ lɛ titri ji mumɔŋ niyenii.
4 Wɔnine shɛɔ mumɔŋ niyenii babaoo nɔ kɛtsɔɔ tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ lɛ nɔ.
Kaimɔ akɛ beni Paulo kɛ mɛi susuɔ niyenii ní mɔ ko baasumɔ akɛ eye lɛ he lɛ, ebɔ enanemɛi Kristofoi lɛ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Nyɛkwɛa ni ahia koni nyɛ hegbɛ nɛɛ akabatsɔ̃ pampi miihã gbedelɔi lɛ.”
Shi amrɔ nɛɛ haomɔi yɛ akɛ ekolɛ jeŋ nilee kɛ wɔniyenii lɛ miiwo oshara mli.
Shi kɛlɛ, Daniel kɛ enanemɛi lɛ tswa amɛfai shi yɛ amɛtsui mli akɛ, amɛyeŋ niyenii ni Nyɔŋmɔ Mla ni ekɛha Israel lɛ egu eyeli lɛ eko ní amɛkɛwo amɛhe muji.
(Luka 12:6, 7) Nakai beaŋ lɛ, aflimata ji loofɔji ni ahɔ̃ɔ akɛ loo lɛ ateŋ nɔ ni jara waaa fe fɛɛ, ni kɛlɛ amɛteŋ ekome folo po bɛ ni e-Bɔlɔ lɛ susuuu ehe.
(Mateo 10:9, 10) No mli lɛ, gbɛfalɔi fɔɔ hɛfĩinii ni akɛ shika woɔ mli, gbɛfãa kotoku ni akɛ niyenii woɔ mli hiɛmɔ kɛ́ amɛmiifã gbɛ, ni amɛkɔɔ tokota kome amɛfataa nɔ ni amɛwo lɛ he.
Taakɛ onaa yɛ mfoniri ni jɛ Germany ni fata he lɛ mli lɛ, ofrotei wɔɔɔ vii ni asaŋ amɛkɛ niyenii etooo, shi amɛtaoɔ niyenii, amɛkɔmɔɔ tsei bibii aniji ahe kɛ baai ni etsɛ̃ kpaako ni amɛyeɔ.
Ani obaanyɛ oyaha amɛ niyenii loo oyaye jara obaha amɛ?
Eji jeee Yehowa mlihilɛ lɛ ni ekɛto shikpɔŋ nɛɛ shishi kɛ enɔ nu ni bɔleɔ shi be fɛɛ be kɛ “afii ni baa nii pii” ni wɔná niyenii babaoo kulɛ, niyenii ko ehiŋ shi.
Yehowa kɛɔ mɛnɛɛmɛi akɛ: “Nyɛkɛ mlijaai nyɔŋma mli ekomekome lɛ fɛɛ abaa fiase lɛ, koni . . . nyɛkɛkaa mi nyɛkwɛa, . . . akɛ migbeleŋ ŋwɛi samfɛji lɛ mihaŋ nyɛ, ni mifɔseŋ jɔɔmɔ mihaŋ nyɛ ní ateke nɔ lo?”—Maleaki 3:10.
Kadimɔ nɔ ni Paulo wie yɛ niyenii ni etamɔ nɔ ni akɛshã afɔle aha wɔji ní aaaye lɛ he.
Nyɔŋmɔ nikeenii lɛ ekomɛi ji niyenii, dãa, kɛ wɔdeŋmegbomɔ lɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔ ni wɔɔye
20 Tso ni ole akɛ ayeee eyibii lɛ, no kɛkɛ hiɛ obaanyɛ okpãtã.
Akɛ vhuswa, ni ji maŋbii lɛ aniyenii titri ni anáa kɛjɛɔ abele mli lɛ yeɔ wuɔloo nɛɛ.
Amɛji “nilelɔ” akɛni amɛyoo akɛ be ni sa eshɛ, kɛ gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni abaatsɔ nɔ akɛ niyenii lɛ aha.
17 Kɛji mikome too miye miniyenii
32 Shi ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Miyɛ niyenii ni miyeɔ ni nyɛleee.”
10 Be ni ato Kristofoi asafo lɛ shishi sɛɛ etsɛɛɛ lɛ, bɔfoi lɛ hala “hii kpawo ni yɔɔ gbɛi kpakpa ni Mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ kɛ nilee eyi amɛ obɔ” koni amɛkwɛ Kristofoi yei okulafoi ni ehia amɛ lɛ aniyenii yɛ “daa kwɛmɔ lɛ” mli lɛ nɔ.
Mumɔŋ niyenii nɛɛ hu tsɔseɔ wɔ ni eyeɔ ebuaa wɔ koni wɔnyɛ wɔtsu shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ waa, ni enɛ ji nitsumɔ ni he hiaa fe fɛɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
Shikpɔŋ sũ akɛshɔ̃ lɛ ni ekuŋ esɛɛ kɛyaŋ he ko fe sũ kɛkɛ mli.
Yɛ Bɔfoi ni ji Tsɛmɛi lɛ atɛŋ lɛ, aleee nɔ ko kwraa ni yaa shɔŋŋ po ni bɛŋkɛɔ jwɛŋmɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ loo susumɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ he.”
Susumɔ he okwɛ: Kɛ anɔkwale ni lɛ, no lɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko kwraa bɛ ni obaanyɛ ofee, ekɔɔɔ bɔ ni ooobɔ mɔdɛŋ waa oha lɛ he eko, ni baanyɛ atsake Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛjianɔtoo ni yɔɔ kpɛŋŋ, ni ekpɛ mli etsɛ waa yɛ bo kɛ owɔsɛɛ be he lɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, mikã mihe kitã akɛ, mikɛ mɔ ko ni wieɔ Esan wiemɔ lɛ efeŋ nɔ ko kwraa, ni ákɛ mikɛ mɔ ko ni jɛ Edo State lɛ hu boteŋ gbalashihilɛ mli kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Shi kɛlɛ, beni akwɛ nibii amli yɛ wɔshia lɛ, anáaa nɔ ko nɔ ko.
Nakai nɔŋŋ hu yɛ ewolo, The Triune God lɛ mli lɛ, Jesuit osɔfo Edmund Fortman kpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ: “Kpaŋmɔ Momo lɛ . . . ekɛɛɛ wɔ nɔ ko ni mli ka shi faŋŋ aloo kɛmiitsɔ nɔ ko nɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔi Etɛ ni ji Tsɛ, Bi kɛ Mumɔ Krɔŋkrɔŋ yɛ. . . .
Lɛlɛŋ, nɔ ko kwraa bɛ ni baaha wɔtsui anyɔ wɔ mli nɛkɛ, tamɔ Biblia mli anɔkwale lɛ ni wɔɔtsɔɔ mɔ ko, ni wɔɔna hu ni nakai mɔ lɛ kɛ ehe ewo Yehowa jamɔ mli.
Nuu ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Adilson ni miiye AIDS hela lɛ, kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ ohe miiye lɛ, osumɔɔɔ ni ajie bo yɛ nɔ̃ fɛɛ nɔ̃ mli, oookɛɛ sɛɛnamɔ ko kwraa bɛ ohe loo onyɛŋ ofee nɔ ko kwraa.
4 Bɔfo Paulo wo Kristofoi aŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛkaŋmɛa mligbalamɔi loo yaka anunyam taomɔ gbɛ, shi moŋ nyɛkɛ heshibaa jwɛŋmɔ abubua nyɛnanemɛi fe nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ nyɛhe.”
Hiob kɛɛ ebɛ nɔ ko dɔŋŋ ni ebaawie (3-5)
11 Suɔmɔ ni mli wa waa ni wɔyɔɔ kɛhaa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ baakanya wɔ koni wɔjie bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔjamɔ hetuu-kɛhamɔ ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ mli wa ha lɛ kpo bɔ ni kɛ Paulo ŋaawoo nɛɛ kpãa gbee akɛ: “Bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni okɛ ohe adamɔ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, akɛ mɔ ko ni sa, nitsulɔ ni hiɛ gbooo, ni jaa anɔkwale wiemɔ lɛ mli pɛpɛɛpɛ.”
Nibii ni eshwɛ lɛ ahe ehiaaa”
Kɛ eshashao shi loo eku ehiɛ eshwie enibaa nii anɔ lɛ, nɔ ko fioo ko pɛ ebaakpa loo enaŋ nɔ ko kwraa.
21 Nɔ ko nɔ ko eshwɛŋ hãŋ lɛ ni ebaami;
Nakai hiɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ kɛɔ akɛ amɛmiisɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, shi yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, amɛteŋ mɛi babaoo wóɔ je nɛŋ nyɔŋmɔi lɛ anɔ—maŋhedɔɔ, asraafoi anitsumɔ, ninamɔ, kɛ aŋkroaŋkroi ní ehe gbɛi—kɛfata wɔŋjalɔi atsɔɔmɔi ní amɛtsɔɔ lɛ he.
Ejaakɛ nɔ ko kwraa bɛ je nɛŋ ni abaanyɛ akɛto he.
Paulo ŋma akɛ: “Bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni okɛ ohe adamɔ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, akɛ mɔ ko ni sa, nitsulɔ ni hiɛ gbooo, ni jaa anɔkwale wiemɔ lɛ mli pɛpɛɛpɛ.”—2 Tim.
Yɛ afii ni eho lɛ amli fɛɛ lɛ, mihaaa nɔ ko atsĩ mi-Kristofoi akpeeiyaa naa, ja shihilɛ ko eba ni minyɛɛɛ he nɔ ko mafee.
Ní abaakpoo nɔ ko tamɔ helai bibii, ni afeee nɔ ko yɛ yiŋkɔshikɔshifeemɔ ni kɛ yeyeeyefeemɔ baa daa gbi lɛ he lɛ baanyɛ ekɛ oshara aba.
Wolo ní akɛpɛiɔ saji amli nɛɛ nɔŋŋ kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ oha ehi ojwɛŋmɔ mli akɛ hewalɛ ni kɔɔyɔɔ kɛtswaa, hewalɛ ni nu ní miiho ní atsĩ naa kɛhoɔ shwieɔ shi, hewalɛ ni faai kɛhoɔ, kɛ hewalɛ ni adebɔɔ nibii tamɔ tsei, ŋai ni atsaa yɛ sũ mli, kɛ mu kɛtsoɔ lɛ fɛɛ jɛ hulu la ní shibɔlemɔ ŋulami ní edaa kwraa [ni ji shikpɔŋ] lɛ nine shɛɔ nɔ kɛjɛɔ hulu lɛ ní ekɛ lɛ teŋ jɛkɛmɔ aaafee kilomitai akpekpei 150 lɛ ŋɔɔ lɛ, no baaye abua bo ni onu hewalɛ kpele ni hulu lɛ yɔɔ lɛ shishi.”
Nyɔŋmɔ miikpa babaoo gbɛ kɛjɛ etsuji adɛŋ aahu akɛ, nɔ ko nɔ ko bɛ ni amɛbaafee ni baasa ehiɛ.
Amɛgboŋ deŋme yakatswaa, ni amɛfɔŋ amɛhaŋ oshara; ejaakɛ mɛi ní Yehowa ejɔɔ amɛ lɛ aseshibii ji amɛ, ni amɛshwiei kɛ amɛ aaahi shi.”—Yesaia 65:21-23.
Shi Eli bihii yakagbɔmɛi ni ji Hofni kɛ Pinehas baaa amɛjeŋ jogbaŋŋ, ni “amɛbuuu Yehowa.”
“Bɔ ni Yehowa, mɔ ni bɔ ŋwɛi lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ, mɔ ni shɔ̃ shikpɔŋ lɛ ni efee ni ekɛma shi, ni ebɔɔɔ lɛ efolo, shi eshɔ̃ lɛ ni ahi nɔ lɛ, kɛɛ nɛ: Mi ji Yehowa, ni mɔ ko bɛ sɛɛ dɔŋŋ!”
Satan nyaa he waa akɛ eeena akɛ hetsɛ̃ kɛ oweletɔɔ eha mɛi amli egbala.
“Heloo lɛ wala yɛ lá lɛ mli.” —3 Mose 17:11
Kɛ́ wɔtee hiɛ akɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi ni he esa, ni haa amɛnitsumɔ mɔɔ shi jogbaŋŋ lɛ, no hu haa enaa miishɛɛ.
Abonsam kɛ amanehului srɔtoi ba nuu anɔkwafo lɛ nɔ bɔni afee ni no aha ekpa Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ.
16 Agbɛnɛ Yehowa kai ewebii lɛ akɛ amɛfee esha, ni ewo amɛ hewalɛ ní amɛtsake amɛgbɛ̀i fɔji ní amɛkɔ lɛ, akɛ: “Nyɛkua nyɛsɛɛ nyɛbaa mɔ ni nyɛje ehe kɛtee sɛɛ kwraa lɛ ŋɔɔ, nyɛ Israelbii!”
Kristofoi, ni muɔ kɔɔyɔɔ ni mli tse yɛ Yehowa jamɔ krɔŋŋ gɔŋ ni awo nɔ gojoo lɛ nɔ lɛ teɔ shi amɛwoɔ nɛkɛ henumɔ nɛɛ.
Ye obua lɛ ni ejie kooloo lɛ.
Kɛ́ mɔ ko kɛ inki nɛɛ ŋma nii nɔŋŋ pɛ lɛ, ebaanyɛ ekɛ kotsa ní efɔ atsumɔ niŋmaa lɛ fɛɛ kwraa.
Awo nikaselɔi lɛ hewalɛ koni amɛtsu nɔ ni Lala 117 lɛ kɛɔ lɛ he nii kɛtsɔ hewalɛ ni amɛaawo mɛi krokomɛi koni ‘amɛjie Yehowa yi’ lɛ nɔ.
Te ebaafee tɛŋŋ ewie mla naa gbalashihilɛ he sane nɛɛ he?
Ni Shiwoo Shikpɔŋ lɛ hu kã amɛhiɛ kpaakpa, ni no hewɔ lɛ nɔ̃ pɛ ni ebaabi ji ní amɛbɛŋkɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ tamɔ bɔ ni meele ko bɛŋkɛɔ la ko ni tsɔɔ lɛ gbɛ akɛ eshɛ he ni eyaa lɛ he lɛ.
Bɔlɔ lɛ ŋmɛ Mose gbɛ koni eyatee ehe yɛ Sinai Gɔŋ lɛ nɔ he ko beni ‘E-hoɔ lɛ.’
(Romabii 16:20) Kɛkɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baaye adesai anɔ ni ebaahã amɛhi shi yɛ miishɛɛ kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli taakɛ eto ni amɛhi shi lɛ. —Kanemɔ Kpojiemɔ 21:3-5.
7 No hewɔ lɛ, Satan je Yehowa hiɛ etee, ni ehã asanei* ni waa mɔ he waa tsɛ̃rɛ̃ Hiob+ kɛjɛ enane shishi aahu kɛyashi epampam.
Yehowa Odasefoi ena akɛ eji miishɛɛ jɛɛhe akɛ aaaye abua aŋkroaŋkroi ni boɔ wiemɔ lɛ toi lɛ, eyɛ mli akɛ amɛle akɛ mɛi fioo pɛ ni jɛ adesai aweku lɛ mli lɛ baakɔ wala gbɛ lɛ.
Yohane 5: 22; Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 10: 42; 2 Timoteo 4:1) Shi Ŋmalɛi lɛ kɛ saji ni yeɔ buaa haa wɔ yɛ sanebimɔ ni etsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli.
Yɛ afii ohai abɔ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli lɛ, Israelbii lɛ —ní maŋtsɛmɛi babaoo fata he lɛ —kpoo Nyɔŋmɔ kɔkɔbɔi lɛ.
Ekomɛi, tamɔ nɔ ni wieɔ suɔmɔ, ni ji mumɔ lɛ yibii lɛ he lɛ, jɛɔ tsuiŋ henumɔ mli.
Kɛ́ tso nɛɛ miikpɔtɔ lɛ, ama henɔ ko kɛ mu ni jeɔ ŋma jɛɔ mli.
+ 4 Be ni je etsɛre nɛɛ, esa akɛ wɔtsu mɔ ni tsu mi lɛ nitsumɔi;+ je baana, ni mɔ ko mɔ ko nyɛŋ nii atsu.
(1 Tesalonikabii 5:14) Ekolɛ mɛi ni “tsui faa” lɛ naa akɛ ekãa ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ miiba shi ni ákɛ amɛnyɛŋ amɛtsu gbɛtsii nii ni amɛkɛkpeɔ lɛ ahe nii kɛji akɛ mɔ kroko yeee ebuaaa amɛ.
Ajie titri ashwie shi ni atsumɔ amɛnɔ wiemɔi lɛ.
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ, maŋtsɛmɛi lɛ kɛ klante egbegbee amɛhe.
No sɛɛ lɛ, etsɔɔ anɔkwale nɛɛ mli babaoo akɛ, gbohii lɛ nyɛŋ asumɔ mɔ ko loo ni amɛnyɛ̃ lɛ, ni “nitsumɔ loo yiŋshwiemɔ loo nilee loo ŋaa ko bɛ gbohiiaje.”
(1 Timoteo 2:9) Ebɛ naakpɛɛ mɔ akɛ, yɛ Kpojiemɔ wolo lɛ mli lɛ, akɛ “klala ni he tse ni kpɛɔ nyɛramnyɛram” damɔɔ shi kɛhaa mɛi ni Nyɔŋmɔ buɔ amɛ akɛ amɛyɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ ajalɛ nifeemɔi lɛ.
Wɔkaseɔ nii babaoo ní kɔɔ Abonsam he kɛji wɔsusu wiemɔi ni Yesu wie etsɔɔ jamɔ mli tsɔɔlɔi ni yɔɔ egbii lɛ amli lɛ he lɛ: “Nyɛ lɛ nyɛtsɛ ni nyɛjɛ emli ji abonsam, ni nyɛtsɛ lɛ tsinebaa nii nyɛsumɔɔ akɛ nyɛfee.
Nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ asafoi kɛ kui nɛɛ amli lɛ jɛ hei srɔtoi kɛ shihilɛi srɔtoi amli, shi wɔ fɛɛ wɔfee ekome kɛmiisɔmɔ Yehowa.
“Be ni miná afii 12 pɛ lɛ, mifɔlɔi fã kɛtee maŋ kroko nɔ ni amɛshi mi koni makwɛ minyɛmimɛi yei bibii enyɔ lɛ.
Nyɛmiyoo Stigers gbe eshikpɔŋ nɔ sɔɔmɔ lɛ naa yɛ April 20, 2007, beni eshwɛ nyɔji etɛ pɛ ni ebaaná afii 100.
Nyɛmimɛi yei komɛi kɛ maŋ lɛ mli hesaamɔ saa amɛhe ni amɛkɛ fɔfɔii fɛfɛji wula amɛyitsɔi yɛ Polynesiabii ahesaamɔ diɛŋtsɛ mli.
(1 Korintobii 7:39) Onukpai lɛ daa shi akɛ amɛyɛ nyɛmimɛi yei ni boteko gbalashihilɛ mli yɛ amɛ asafoi amli; bei pii lɛ amɛyasaraa ni amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa mɛi ni he yeɔ kɛ mɛi ni edara yɛ afii amli lɛ.
Beni nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei lɛ ahe basa kɛ mumuii awiemɔ lɛ, amɛnyɛ amɛye mumuii babaoo odase, ni no ji klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa ni amɛteŋ mɛi babaoo “nuɔ” Biblia mli anɔkwalei lɛ yɛ amɛwiemɔ mli.
Akɛ nifeemɔ nɛɛ baaha nyɛmi yoo.
Ani hegbɛi ni oyɔɔ akɛ oye obua omumɔŋ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei lɛ jara wa kɛha bo?
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi ni yɔɔ South Africa ni bɛŋkɛ Lesotho lɛ kɛ yelikɛbuamɔ nibii ni tsiimɔ shɛɔ tɔn enyɔ yaha nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei Kristofoi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ.
Nyɛmiyoo Padgett wala shihilɛ he sane je kpo yɛ October 1, 1995 Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ, bf. 19-24.
Eŋɔɔ wɔnaa akɛ wɔfata nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ ahe kɛmiisɔmɔ.
Spania flu lɛ gbe minyɛmimɛi yei enyɔ.
Ashwie minyɛmimɛi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome kɛtee Istanbul kɛ minyɛmiyoo ko hu kɛtee Russia.
Yɛ maŋ ni bɛŋkɛ jɛmɛ lɛ mli lɛ, nyɛmimɛi yei gbɛgbalɔi etɛ kɛ gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi ni jɛ California lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ, mɛi ni ebi ni akɛ amɛ afee Biblia mli nikasemɔi lɛ ayi fa aahu akɛ amɛnyɛɛɛ ni amɛkɛ amɛ fɛɛ afee nikasemɔ.
Yoo ko ni kɛ shihilɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ miikpe lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Beni mina akɛ miwu ená dekã eha yoo kroko ko yɛ asafo lɛ mli ni egbalaa ejwɛŋmɔ kɛyaa enɔ babaoo lɛ, eye mi awui.
Nyɛmiyoo gbɛgbalɔ lɛ kɛ Blɔfo Biblia ni ehiɛ lɛ ye ebua lɛ ni enu Biblia mli anɔkwalei ni je kpo yɛ wiemɔi lɛ amli lɛ shishi.
Ebi he ni Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ yɔɔ ni efɔ̃ nyɛmi yoo lɛ nine koni ebasara lɛ kɛ eŋa.
Nyɛmi yoo ko ni yɔɔ Asia ni miiye henumɔŋ haomɔ hela ko lɛ ná miishɛɛ waa beni ekane nyɛmi nuu ko ni tsutsu lɛ eji maŋsɛɛ sɔɔlɔ ni ye nakai hela lɛ eko, shi fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ etee nɔ esɔmɔ Yehowa kɛ miishɛɛ lɛ he sane lɛ.
“Wɔyɛ nyɛmimɛi yei onukpai nyɔŋma yɛ wɔ asafo lɛ mli.
No hewɔ lɛ, ná he miishɛɛ akɛ obaaye obua onyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei lɛ.
Yɛ maŋ ko mli lɛ polisifoi lɛ kɛ amɛtsɔne yama nyɛmi yoo ko ni aasaa eshia lɛ masɛi.
Kwɛ bɔ ni wɔmii shɛ wɔhe wɔhã be ni amɛjɛ suɔmɔ kɛ mlihilɛ mli amɛkɛ wɔtɔmɔ lɛ ke wɔ lɛ!
Nuu ko ni mli ewo la lɛ tsa nyɛmi yoo ko shi kɛshi shĩa ko mli, ni eshi ekotosɛɛ ŋtia waa ni nyɛmi yoo lɛ gbee shi ni eyitso tswa shi.
Beni miku misɛɛ kɛtee Thessalonica yɛ April afi 1945 lɛ, migbekɛbiiashi nanemɛi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome ni mikɛ lɛ hi awusãi ashiai srɔtoi amli lɛ nyɛmi yoo ko basara mi.
Beni klasbii lɛ sharaa shi yɛ maŋ lɛ mli lɛ, nyɛmi yoo ko ni eda yɛ afii amli ha ebinuu lɛ Buu-Mɔɔ wolo tɛtrɛɛ lɛ eko, ni ekɛɛ lɛ ni ekɛyaha emami.
“Tsofa-kɛ-ŋma [loo balsam mu]” lɛ kɔɔ mui ni jeɔ ŋma loo mu ni anáa yɛ tsei kɛ jwɛi komɛi amli lɛ he.

29 “Nɔ ni ofee kɛfee amɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ koni amɛsɔmɔ akɛ osɔfoi amɛhã mi nɛ: Ŋɔɔ tsinanuu* kome, gwantɛŋhii enyɔ ni kpa ko bɛ amɛhe,+ 2 blodo ni ashikishaŋ-sha* bɛ mli, blodoi ni ashikishaŋ-sha bɛ mli ni abɔlɔ lɛ tamɔ gai ni akɛ mu efutu, kɛ akpɔɔnɔi* ni ashikishaŋ-sha bɛ mli ni akɛ mu ekpa he.

Yɛ esane lɛ mli lɛ, okpo yɛŋ ko kɛ tɔ ko ni mu yɔɔ mli ba koni ekɛbafɔ Clovis mu beni abaptisiɔ lɛ lɛ—eka shi faŋŋ akɛ ekɛmiitsɔɔ Yesu ni akɛ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ miifɔ lɛ mu lɛ.
Kanei ni amɛsũɔ lɛ jeee nɔ ni akɛ sarawa hewalɛ sũɔ, shi moŋ nɔ ni akɛmu woɔ mli lɛ eko; yɛ tsɔnei anajiaŋ lɛ amɛtaa okpɔŋɔ kɛ shwiili mli; yɛ paipi nu najiaŋ lɛ amɛyɛ nubu kɛ tsɔne ni kɔɔyɔɔ ji nɔ ni haa etsuɔ nii; yɛ redio najiaŋ lɛ amɛkɛ amɛnaabu láa.

Sɔɔlɔ wɔ ŋɔɔ enaa (12)
Bɔfo Paulo ha hetoo akɛ: “Nyɛnyiɛa yɛ suɔmɔ mli, taakɛ bɔ ni Kristo hu sumɔ wɔ ni eŋɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe eha yɛ wɔ hewɔ akɛ nikee nii kɛ afɔle ni akɛha Nyɔŋmɔ ni jeɔ ŋma krɔŋŋ lɛ.”
Ekɛɛ mi akɛ: “Hemɔ ni oye,+ ni ebaajoo yɛ omusuŋ, shi ebaaŋɔɔ tamɔ wo yɛ odaaŋ.”
Kpojiemɔ wolo lɛ kɛ “krɔŋkrɔŋbii lɛ asɔlemɔi lɛ” toɔ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma he, kɛ shishinumɔ akɛ sɔlemɔi ni sa lɛ kwɔɔ kɛyaa Yehowa ŋɔɔ tamɔ nɔ ko ni jeɔ ŋma waa.
Mishi enɔ jetsɛremɔ ní mijwɛŋmɔŋ eyi tɔ kɛ niiashikpamɔi ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ pam, ni mitsui hu yi obɔ kɛ nanemɛi heei ni miná lɛ ahe suɔmɔ.

Bɔfo Paulo kɛ ŋaawoo ni mli wa waa ha lɛ, taakɛ wɔleɔ yɛ sane ní aŋma yɛ Galatabii 2:14 lɛ mli lɛ, akɛ: “Beni mina akɛ amɛnyiɛɛɛ trɔmɔɔ yɛ sanekpakpa lɛ anɔkwale lɛ naa lɛ, mikɛɛ Petro yɛ amɛ fɛɛ amɛhiɛ akɛ: ‘Kɛ bo ni oji Yudanyo lɛ ofeɔ onii tamɔ jeŋmajiaŋnyo ni jeee tamɔ Yudanyo lɛ, mɛɛba onyɛɔ jeŋmajiaŋbii lɛ anɔ akɛ amɛfee amɛnii tamɔ Yudafoi?’”
44 Kɛ́ nyɛwoɔ gbɔmɛi ahiɛ nyam ni nyɛtaoɔ hiɛnyam kɛjɛɔ amɛdɛŋ, shi hiɛnyam ni jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kome pɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ lɛ, nyɛtaooo lɛ, te nyɛbaafee tɛŋŋ nyɛhe nyɛye lɛ?
17 Agbɛnɛ, kɛ́ atsɛɔ bo Yudanyo,+ ni okɛ ohe fɔ̃ɔ mla nɔ ni oshwãa ofɔ̃ɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ, 18 ni ole esuɔmɔnaa nii, ni onáa nibii ni hi jogbaŋŋ lɛ ahe miishɛɛ ejaakɛ atsɔɔ* bo nii kɛjɛ Mla lɛ mli,+ 19 ni oná nɔmimaa akɛ oji shwilafoi agbɛtsɔɔlɔ, la kɛhã mɛi ni yɔɔ duŋ mli, 20 kwashiai atsɔselɔ, gbekɛbii bibii atsɔɔlɔ, ni oyɛ nilee kɛ anɔkwale ni yɔɔ Mla lɛ mli lɛ he mfoniri lɛ— 21 shi bo mɔ ni otsɔɔ mɔ kroko nii lɛ, ani otsɔɔɔ bo diɛŋtsɛ ohe nii?
Kɛji akɛ oji fɔlɔ lɛ, ole afɔleshaai babaoo, kɛ nihamɔ babaoo ni ebiɔ dani alɛ gbekɛ.
Be fɛɛ be ni okɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ haa gbɛfalɔ ko ni elaaje, ni otsɔɔ hefatalɔ nitsulɔ ko bɔ ni atsuɔ nɔ ko pɔtɛɛ ko, loo otsɔɔ gbekɛ ko bɔ ni ebaafee ni ela espaaterei lɛ, ootsɔɔ nii.
(Romabii 1:20) Kɛfata he lɛ, kɛ́ okane Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ, obaanyɛ onu nɔ hewɔ ni wɔyɔɔ shihilɛ mli, nɔ hewɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋmɛɔ nɔnaa gbɛ, gbɛ nɔ ni ebaatsɔ efo nɔnaa sɛɛ, kɛ ekolɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ fe fɛɛ lɛ, bɔ ni ooofee otsu gbɛfaŋnɔ ni hiaa he nii yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ yiŋtoi ahe nitsumɔ mli lɛ shishi.
Ebaakai bo nɔ̃ hewɔ ni esa akɛ ofee ekãa lɛ, ni ebaaha ona bɔ ni ooofee ni ohe asa kɛ nitsɔɔmɔ, ni ebaaha ona akɛ mɛi miibo shiɛmɔ ni wɔshiɛɔ lɛ toi lolo koni no awo bo hewalɛ.
Ekɔɔɔ he eko afii abɔ ni oye lɛ, nibii babaoo yɛ ní kulɛ obaasumɔ ni okase amɛhe nii, shi onaa akɛ owala sɛɛkɛlɛ ni yɔɔ kuku lɛ eŋmɛŋ bo gbɛ ni onyɛ ofee nakai.
Nyɛ gbekɛbii, mɛɛ ŋaa kpakpai nyɛkaseɔ amrɔ nɛɛ ní baaye abua nyɛ ni nyɛnyɛ nyɛsɔmɔ nyɛ-Bɔlɔ lɛ, ní yɛ nakai beaŋ nɔŋŋ lɛ wɔsɛɛ lɛ nyɛnyɛ nyɛtsu nyɛsɔ̃i ahe nii?
Kɛ́ oye obua mɛi ni amɛná Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ kɛ bɔ ni ebaatse Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛ́i lɛ he lɛ he anɔkwa nilee, oma Nyɔŋmɔ nɔyeli lɛ bembuu lɛ nɔ mi, owie naanɔ jɔɔmɔi ni adesai anɔkwafoi baaná lɛ he kɛ miishɛɛ lɛ, no tsɔɔ akɛ okɛ naabu krɔŋŋ nɛɛ miitsu nii.
(Luka 22:24-27; Yohane 13:3-8) Kɛji akɛ fɔlɔ ji bo lɛ, ani oona gbɛ nɔ ni obaanyɛ otsɔ okɛ Yesu nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ atsu nii yɛ gbɛ ni otsɔɔ nɔ ojajeɔ obii lɛ mli?
Afee nikasemɔ woji nɛɛ koni amɛye amɛbua bo ni ojwɛŋ nibii ni oheɔ oyeɔ lɛ kɛ nɔ hewɔ ni oheɔ oyeɔ lɛ anɔ, ni agbɛnɛ hu, onyɛ ogbala mli otsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi.
Nakai nɔŋŋ, esaaa akɛ ohaa gbɛ ni atsɔ nɔ awie atsɔɔ bo lɛ ha okpoo akɛ ooobo mɛi ni ekolɛ Yehowa kɛ Yesu miitsɔ amɛnɔ amɛha ole nɔ ko ni obaanyɛ okɛye obua ohe loo okɛbaa okɛ Yehowa teŋ wekukpãa lɛ yi lɛ atoi.
No hewɔ lɛ, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni odako kwraa ha lɛ, ojeee mɔ ni odako ni onyɛŋ Yehowa osɔmɔ.
(Ezekiel 3:7, 8) Onyɛŋ otsɔ̃ gbɔmɛi ni eŋamɔ amɛjwɛŋmɔi anaa lɛ ayiŋ kɔkɔɔkɔ, ekɔɔɔ he eko bɔ ni otswa ofai shi oha lɛ.
Kɛ́ sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛlɔ ji bo lɛ, no lɛ ooná gbɛfaŋnɔ—ekɔɔɔ he eko bɔ ni eyɔɔ bibioo eha—yɛ nakai nitsumɔ kpele ni atsuɔ lɛ mli.
Kɛ okane enɛɛmɛi lɛ, ŋɔɔ be ni osusu nɔ ni sui nɛɛ ji diɛŋtsɛ kɛ bɔ ni amɛhe hiaa kɛha bo lɛ ahe.
Aawo bo hewalɛ ni okpɛlɛ ninefɔɔ lɛ nɔ bianɛ ekɔɔɔ he eko afii abɔ ni oye.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, esaaa akɛ ohesaamɔ lɛ kɔɔ nɔ ni oyaa ni oyakɛɛ lɛ pɛ he, shi moŋ gbɛ nɔ ni obaatsɔ ni okɛɛ lɛ hu.
Kɛji akɛ oji sanekpakpa lɛ jajelɔ lɛ, belɛ ole bɔ ni ewa ha akɛ ooowie otsɔɔ gbɔmɛi ni nɔ ko jeee amɛhe sane ko ni ámɛfee shikpilikpii lɛ.
Te ooofee tɛŋŋ oye obua obii lɛ koni amɛna akɛ Yehowa mlai lɛ hi, bɔni afee ni amɛha mlai nɛɛ akudɔ amɛ kɛ́ obɛ amɛmasɛi po?
Kɛ́ oji gbɛgbalɔ jio, kpaako omiaa ohiɛ ni obatsɔ eko jio lɛ, susumɔ sanebimɔi nɛɛ ahe: Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ baanyɛ awaje naanyobɔɔ ni kã okɛ Yehowa teŋ lɛ?
28:20) No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ oosusu he akɛ obaafã kɛya he kroko lɛ, sɔlemɔ kɛbi Yehowa gbɛtsɔɔmɔ.—Luka 14:28-30; Yak. 1:5; kwɛmɔ akrabatsa ni ji “Bɔ ni Ooofee Ole Hei ni Hiamɔ Yɔɔ lɛ Ahe Saji” lɛ.
Kɛ́ wɔhiɛ mlijɔlɛ su mli yɛ mlilawoo shishi po lɛ, bei pii lɛ ekanyaa mɛi ni kɛ wɔ ehiɛɛɛ susumɔ kome lɛ ni amɛsusuɔ amɛwiemɔ-kɛ-shimɔ lɛ he ekoŋŋ.
Atsɔɔ shiɛmɔ wiemɔ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛtsu nii yɛ wɔshikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli lɛ yɛ baafa 4 lɛ.
Atsɔɔɔ nɔ hewɔ, shi beni wɔyashɛ Greece lɛ, akane wolo kroko ni jɛ Nɔyeli Kuu lɛ dɛŋ lɛ atsɔɔ Nitsumɔhe Nine Ajinafoi Akuu lɛ, ní miihala mi akɛ Nitsumɔhe Nine Ajinafoi Akuu lɛ sɛinɔtalɔ yɛ nakai maŋ lɛ mli.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, wɔnyɛŋ wɔkɛ ŋmɛlɛtswaa kome kroko afata wɔgbi lɛ he, no hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ Paulo ŋaawoo lɛ ahiɛ shishinumɔ srɔto ko.
3 Nakai nɔŋŋ hu be ni wɔji gbekɛbii lɛ, wɔ hu bɔ ni je lɛ susuɔ nii ahe ehãa lɛ ye wɔ nyɔŋ.
Jeee nɔ ni wɔyaafee lɛ pɛ esa akɛ wɔsusu he, shi moŋ esa akɛ wɔsusu nɔ hewɔ ní wɔyaafee lɛ hu he.
Kɛji wɔɔna henilee kpakpa lɛ, mɛɛ nibii komɛi ni naatsii yɔɔ he esa akɛ wɔfee toiboo wɔha?
Mɛni wɔbaanyɛ wɔtswa wɔfai shi akɛ wɔbaafee yɛ hei ni atsi amɛ tã yɛ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ ahe?
Ni emumɔ lɛ yaa nɔ ewajeɔ wɔ bɔni afee ni wɔnijiaŋ akaje wui yɛ naagbee gbii nɛɛ amli.—Yes.
(Kpojiemɔ 21:8, 27; 22:15) Kɛji akɛ ale wɔ akɛ wɔwieɔ anɔkwale lɛ, ehaa mɛi krokomɛi heɔ nɔ ni wɔwieɔ lɛ amɛyeɔ; amɛkɛ amɛhe fɔ̃ɔ wɔnɔ.
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ wɔnaa akɛ Yehowa baanyɛ aye abua ewebii lɛ yɛ kaai fɛɛ ni amɛkɛkpeɔ lɛ amli.
Gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi ni darako tsɔ ni hiɛ bii enyɔ kɛ mlihilɛ he wɔ kɛtee amɛshia ni wɔyahi jɛmɛ kɛyashi wɔná wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔshia.
Mɛɛ odasefoi krokomɛi wɔtaoɔ dɔŋŋ?
□ Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔkwɛ Yehowa gbɛ kɛha sɛɛyoomɔ be fɛɛ be lɛ?
Wɔyɛ redio nitsumɔ he yɛ biɛ ni miihia redio nitsulɔ.”
Eyɛ mli akɛ ahaa mitai 5 jɛkɛmɔ kamɔɔ wɔteŋ ni aŋmɛɛɛ gbɛ ni wɔkɛ wɔhe awie moŋ, shi wɔtsɔɔ gbɛ̀i krokomɛi anɔ wɔleɔ gbi lɛ ŋmalɛ lɛ.
Esa akɛ wɔkɛ Yehowa agba he sane hu yɛ sɔlemɔ mli, kɛ hekɛnɔfɔɔ akɛ ebaabo wɔ toi.
Kɛ́ aaka wɔ lɛ, mɛni esa akɛ wɔha ehi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli?
Akɛni amɛyɛ hewalɛ waa fe wɔ hewɔ lɛ, wɔyajeɔ shihilɛ ni tamɔ David nɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ mli, ni wɔnyɛŋ wɔye omanye akɛ ja wɔkɛ wɔhe efɔ̃ Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ kɛha hewalɛwoo.
(Galatabii 6:10) Belɛ, nyɛhaa klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, wɔsusua bɔ ni wɔɔfee wɔjie mɔbɔnalɛ babaoo kpo wɔtsɔɔ mɛi ni ji hemɔkɛyeli lɛ webii lɛ he.
Wɔgbala mli wɔtsɔɔ wɔtsɔɔlɔ lɛ akɛ wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔnɔ̃ lɛ afee sɔrɔto yɛ nɔ ni nikaselɔi krokomɛi toɔ gbɛjianɔ ni amɛkɛsaa amɛhe lɛ he.
Kaimɔ akɛ, kɛ́ awo wɔ tsuŋ jio, akɛ wɔ etee he ko banee jio lɛ, no nyɛɛɛ atsi sane ni wɔ kɛ wɔ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ baagba lɛ naa loo efite ekomefeemɔ ni yɔɔ wɔ kɛ wɔnyɛmimɛi lɛ ateŋ lɛ.
Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔnine ashɛ nakai feemɔ nɔ?
Ni kɛji akɛ wɔyɛ bii lɛ, efaaa kɛkɛ akɛ wɔɔsɔle koni amɛfee Yehowa tsuji anɔkwafoi.
No sɛɛ lɛ, Yesu tsɔɔ wɔ akɛ wɔsɔle yɛ niyenii ni he hiaa wɔ kɛha gbi lɛ he.
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, enanemɛi lɛ nyɛ amɛtsɔ̃ eyiŋ koni eye nii.
(1 Mose 12:2, 3; 17:19) Ani “Nyɔŋmɔ shieŋtsɛ” lɛ baaye omanye yɛ kaa ni wa nɛɛ mli?
Taakɛ bɔfo Yohane kɛ enaanyo Gaio ji lɛ, amɛmɔ anɔkwale lɛ mli kpɛŋŋ, ni amɛnyiɛ mli.
Kɛ́ ogbele fã ni ji “Become Jehovah’s Friend” (Okɛ Yehowa Abɔ Naanyo) lɛ, mɛni obaana?
Gbi ko lɛ, yoo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Awula Ukoli lɛ kɛɛ Bintu naanyo ko akɛ: “Okɛ yoo ni bii enyɔ gboi yɛ be kometoo mli, ní kã he eeshiɛ Biblia mli shɛɛ sane lɛ aba miŋɔɔ.
Namɛi ji enanemɛi?
Mina akɛ mɔ baanyɛ ekɛ Yehowa abɔ naanyo kpaakpa.”
Abɛbua nɛɛ tsɔɔ hu akɛ eyɛ mli akɛ eji nɔ ni shɛjeɔ mɔ mii akɛ aaabɛŋkɛ naanyo ko ni nuɔ nii ahe ehaa mɔ kɛha henumɔŋ yelikɛbuamɔ moŋ, shi miishɛjemɔ ni adesai kɛhaa lɛ faaa.
Yɛ sɛɛ mli beni wɔweku lɛ mli naanyo ko ha mi “Kpaŋmɔ Hee” ko ni aŋma yɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ shishitsɔɔmɔ mli po lɛ, minaaa be kwraa ni mikɛaakane.
11 Nɔ ni fata wɔmumɔŋ hiɛyaa lɛ he ji, ni wɔtsi wɔbɛŋkɛ Yehowa, ni ji wɔ-Naanyo kɛ wɔ-Tsɛ lɛ.
(2 Samuel 18:33) Yesu ni ji gbɔmɔ ni eye emuu lɛ po fó yɛ enaanyo Lazaro gbele lɛ hewɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ obaanyɛ obasara onaanyo ko nakai beaŋ ni oye obua lɛ ni eye nii.”
(Hebribii 11:6) Nɔ ko ni sa kadimɔ waa ji akɛ, “Abraham he Nyɔŋmɔ eye” dani “atsɛ lɛ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ shieŋtsɛ.”
Beni Kwaku kɛ enanemɛi lɛ miigba sane ni amɛnáaa hiɛ lɛ, obaana Akoshia ní ewu pɛ ele yɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ ateŋ lɛ kometoo ta shi.
Wɔtsɔmɔ nanemɛi kpakpai!
Nɔ ni fata nikeenii nɛɛ he ji hegbɛ ni wɔná akɛ aaabu wɔ jalɔi akɛ Yehowa nanemɛi.—Yakobo 2:23; Kpojiemɔ 7:14.
Ekɛfata he akɛ: “Shi akɛ gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi lɛ, wɔbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ wɔbaaná nanemɛi heei, ni no hu ye ebua wɔ waa.”
Etée mɛi etɛ shi yɛ eshikpɔŋ nɔ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli—yoo okulafo ko ni yɔɔ Nain lɛ binuu, kpeehe ko nɔkwɛlɔ biyoo lɛ, kɛ enaanyo Lazaro ni bɛŋkɛ lɛ kpaakpa lɛ.
Nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, mibale Yehowa, ni ji Naanyo ni jara wa fe fɛɛ lɛ.
Wɔbaakase nibii babaoo ni kɔɔ nɛkɛ hii nɛɛ ahe yɛ sɛɛ mli, ejaakɛ mɛi etɛ lɛ fɛɛ ji Yesu nanemɛi ni bɛŋkɛ lɛ kpaakpa.
Kɛ́ wɔkɛ wɔnanemɛi ni yeee emuu lɛ yeɔ yɛ suɔmɔ mli yɛ gbɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ nɔ lɛ, enyiɛ nɔŋŋ esaaa ni wɔheɔ wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ, mɔ ni jwɛŋmɔ kɛ egbɛi kwɔ fe wɔnɔ lɛ wɔyeɔ!
Amɛkɛ amɛnifeemɔ tsɔɔ akɛ nanemɛi kpakpai ji amɛ, ni enɛ hãa wɔmii shɛɔ wɔhe.
Suɔmɔ ni nanemɛi enyɔ ni bɛŋkɛ amɛhe kpaakpa lɛ jieɔ lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛhe lɛ?
Jieɔ suɔmɔ tamɔ nɛkɛ kpo.
Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “[Yesu] kɛɛ amɛ [ekaselɔi lɛ] akɛ: ‘Wɔ shieŋtsɛ Lazaro ewɔ; shi miiya ni mayatsiɛ̃ lɛ yɛ wɔ lɛ mli.’
(1 Timoteo 2:4) Mɛi ni kulɛ afii babaoo nɛ ni amɛnáaa hegbɛ ni amɛkɛaabo sanekpakpa lɛ toi lɛ miibo toi bianɛ!
35 Be ni amɛyɔɔ amɛmaŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli ni amɛnáa ekpakpa ni ofee amɛ waa lɛ he sɛɛ, ni amɛyɔɔ shikpɔŋ agbo ni baa nii ni okɛhã amɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ, amɛsɔmɔɔɔ bo+ ni amɛtsiii amɛhe kɛjeee nibii fɔji ni amɛfeɔ lɛ hu ahe.
Kɛfata he lɛ, Yehowa ni ji Jeŋ Muu Fɛɛ Maŋtsɛ lɛ baatsɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔ efee shikpɔŋ lɛ paradeiso, ni adesai ni ji jalɔi lɛ baahi nɔ kɛya naanɔ.
(2) Mɛi ni wɔkɛsharaa lɛ náa wɔnɔ hewalɛ yɛ gbɛ kpakpa loo gbɛ gbonyo nɔ; ni enɛ ji anɔkwa sane ni anyɛŋ aje he ŋwane.
(Mateo 28: 19, 20) Egba akɛ: “Aaashiɛ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa nɛɛ atsɔɔ je nɛŋ fɛɛ, ní akɛye jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ odase; ni no dani naagbee lɛ aaaba.”
Sane kpakpa lɛ ni mikɛyahãa mɛi krokomɛi lɛ hãa mimii shɛɔ mihe
“KAIMƆ amɛ ni amɛba amɛhe shi amɛhã onukpai kɛ nɔyelɔi lɛ, amɛbo amɛ toi, amɛsaa amɛhe amɛhã nitsumɔ kpakpa fɛɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa.”
(Ezekiel 3:17-21) January 1, 1984 The Watchtower lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: ‘Nɛkɛ bulɔ nɛɛ kwɛɔ bɔ ni nibii yaa nɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ ni haa Biblia gbalɛ baa mli lɛ, ni ebɔɔ amanehulu kpeteŋkpele ko ni eko bako ni tamɔ nakai da kɛjɛ jeŋ shishijee lɛ he kɔkɔ, ni etswaa nɔ ko kpakpa ko he adafi.’—Mateo 24:21; Yesaia 52:7.
10:24, 25) Obaanyɛ oye obua amɛ hu ni amɛyɔse akɛ sanekpakpa lɛ ni amɛshiɛɛɛ lɛ eha amɛnáaa miishɛɛ.
Ashiɛko “maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa nɛɛ” yɛ gbɛ ni da waa tamɔ nɛkɛ nɔ pɛŋ.
Eŋɔɔ amɛnaa waa diɛŋtsɛ akɛ amɛhe etse, shi etamɔ nɔ ni nɔ̃ pɛ ní amɛtao ji ni osɔfo lɛ atsɛ amɛ akɛ mɛi ni he tse.”
Anɔkwa, kpoo hã mi kɛ́ mijajeee sane kpakpa lɛ!
1:16) Yɛ wɔtsui ni baanyɔ wɔmli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, wɔbaana akɛ mɛi krokomɛi kɛ wiemɔi ni Paulo tsɛ́ yisɛɛ yɛ Romabii 10:15 lɛ baakpã gbee akɛ: “Kwɛ bɔ ni hejɔlɛ he sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi ni shiɛɔ nii kpakpai lɛ anaji yɔɔ fɛo ha!”—Yes.
(Lala 119:66, 69, 71, NW) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ebaanyɛ efee nɔ ni hi ha Yehowa tsulɔ ko akɛ ekɛ amanehulu aaakpe?
Yehowa kaiɔ amɛ nitsumɔi kpakpai lɛ ni efɔse Maŋtsɛyeli jɔɔmɔi eshwieɔ amɛnɔ.
Yudafoi lɛ yɛ yiŋtoo kpakpa ni haa amɛbuɔ anɔkwale yɛ nakai gbɛ nɔ.
“[Nyɔŋmɔ] lɛ ekɛ nii kpakpai woɔ odaaŋ obɔ̃, ni ehaa oblahiiaŋ tsɔɔ ehee tamɔ okropɔŋ.”—Lala 103:5.
Mɛi komɛi taa naa po akɛ gbala ni fɔlɔi tseɔ mli lɛ baanyɛ ahi aha gbekɛbii, koni esaa amɛ ni amɛtsu amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛ gbalamlitsemɔ he nii gbi ko!

9 Okpɔlɔ kɛ hiɛmaa aboloo lɛ kaiɔ asafo babaoo lɛ akɛ, kɛ amɛaaya nɔ amɛhe awa daa yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ, no lɛ esa akɛ amɛye mumɔŋ niyenii ni jɛ Biblia lɛ kɛ “tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ” lɛ woji amli lɛ be fɛɛ be.
Etsɔ shika tsakelɔi lɛ ashika lɛ eshwie shi ni etsirɛ amɛkpɔlɔi lɛ etswiatswiaa shi.
Amɛyɛ jamɔ mli rɔk lala he shwɛmɔ nifeemɔ nii ni ajieɔ atsɔɔ ni mɛi kwɛɔ, amɛyɛ tsui ni aholeɔ dadei anɔ yɛ mli kɛhaa kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔ, amɛyɛ okpɔlɔi ni atswaa bɔɔlui yɛ nɔ, amɛyɛ hei ni akwɛɔ gbekɛbii bibii anɔ yɛ, kɛ agbɛnɛ tsũi ni ajieɔ sinii yɛ mli.
Aha mɔ fɛɛ mɔ nitsumɔ ni ebaatsu kɛsaa niyeli okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ ní esha tsɛŋsii lɛ mli, ní tsɔɔ akɛ no mli lɛ amɛtsɔ hiɛ amɛyashá nu, ni amɛhoo mli momo.

Kɛji akɛ shihilɛ lɛ ha ebafee nɔ ni sa akɛ shiɛlɔ kroko kɛ binuu loo biyoo ko ni abaptisiko lɛ ni yɔɔ Kristofoi aweku ko mli, ni kɛ asafo lɛ bɔɔ lɛ afee Biblia mli nikasemɔ lɛ, no lɛ esa ákɛ akɛ onukpai asɛinɔtalɔ lɛ loo sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ nɔkwɛlɔ lɛ asusu he.
10 Gbɛ kroko ni hi ní fɔlɔi baanyɛ atsɔ nɔ amɛha amɛbii lɛ abo Yehowa toi ji ni amɛkɛ amɛ afɔ weku Biblia mli nikasemɔ feemɔ.

16 Mɛɛ be abaanyɛ afee weku nikasemɔ?
Ŋamɛi lɛ ekomɛi nyɛ amɛkɛ amɛwumɛi tee, ni amɛyaye amɛbua amɛ yɛ tsumaa nitsumɔhe lɛ, ni mɛi krokomɛi hu yɛ bii ni miiya skul ni esa akɛ amɛkwɛ amɛ aloo weku lɛ nitsumɔ ni esa akɛ amɛtsu.
“Beni ote shi”: Wekui babaoo anine eshɛ jɔɔmɔi anɔ yɛ Biblia mli ŋmalɛ ko ní amɛsusuɔ he daa leebi lɛ hewɔ.
Tsɛ ko wie akɛ: “Nɔ titri ni he hiaa ji ni nɔkwɛlɔ lɛ awo miishɛɛ shihilɛ, shi kɛlɛ bulɛ yɔɔ mli he hewalɛ beni afeɔ weku nikasemɔ lɛ—yɛ ŋaa gbɛ nɔ, shi jeee kɛ shwɛmɔ.
Beni Nyɔŋmɔ gbalɔ Samuel wie ehe ekpakpa lɛ, Saul kɛ heshibaa here nɔ akɛ: “Ani jeee Benyaminnyo ji mi, ni Israel akutsei lɛ amli nɔ ni ji bibioo fe fɛɛ lɛ mli mijɛ, ni miweku lɛ ji bibioo fe Benyamin akutso lɛ mli wekui lɛ fɛɛ?
Kɛfata he lɛ, taakɛ Yesu gba efɔ̃ shi lɛ, anɔkwale ni etsɔɔ lɛ kɛ mligbalamɔi eba wekui pii amli.—Mateo 10:34-37; Luka 12:51-53.
Misae je mli yɛ nyɔŋ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli, ní wekumɛi ni sumɔɔ lɛ, kɛ helatsamɔhe mli nitsulɔi ni jɛ helatsamɔhe kroko, he ni anu ehemɔkɛyelii ni jɛ anɔkwayeli mli shishi yɛ, ni ajie bulɛ kpo yɛ he lɛ ebɔle ehe kɛkpe.
Esaaa akɛ wɔkɛ amɛ náa nɔ ko feemɔ kɛ́ amɛji wɔweku mli bii po.
Mɔ ni to niiamlitaomɔ lɛ he gbɛjianɔ lɛ wie akɛ, nifeemɔ gbɛ kpakpa ni fe fɛɛ ni anaa yɛ wekui ni yɔɔ hewalɛ lɛ ahe ji akɛ “mɔ ko eyawɔɔɔ gbɛkɛ ni emli efu mɔ kroko.” 6 Ni kɛlɛ, nɔ ni fe afii 1,900 ni eho nɛ ni Biblia lɛ wo ŋaa akɛ: “Nyɛmli afua, shi nyɛkafea esha; hulu akanyɔ shi yɛ nyɛmlila lɛ nɔ.”
Mikɛ miŋa tee nɔ aahu kɛ wɔ daa gbi weku Biblia mli nikasemɔ lɛ, ni enɛ ye ebua wɔ waa diɛŋtsɛ.

Akɛni enɛ yɔɔ wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli hewɔ lɛ, wɔfeɔ weku nikasemɔ daa otsi, titri lɛ daa Ju gbɛkɛ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ oweku lɛ baanyɛ amɛkɛ saji nɛɛ atsu nii jogbaŋŋ?
Yɛ je lɛŋ fɛɛ lɛ, gbɔmɛi ena akɛ Biblia lɛ he baa sɛɛnamɔ waa kɛji aato shishitoo mlai ni tamɔ nɛkɛ shishi kɛha weku lɛ, ni nomɛi bafeɔ odaseyeli ni tsɔɔ faŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ akɛ, Biblia lɛ “jɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Mumɔ lɛŋ [ni] ehi ha nitsɔɔmɔ kɛ hiɛkamɔ kɛ mɔsaamɔ kɛ tsɔsemɔ ni yɔɔ jalɛ mli.”
Tsakemɔ Mli ní Esa Oweku lɛ Hiamɔ Nii Ahe
Gbi ko beni Ella etee eheɔ nii yɛ shwapo ko mli lɛ, enu ni wekui komɛi ni efã kɛba jɛmɛ miigba sane yɛ Russia wiemɔ mli.
Akɛni eka shi faŋŋ akɛ Yesu Kristo ŋaawoo ákɛ nuu niiatsɛ ko ahɔɔ ehe nibii ni ekɛha ohiafoi lɛ tsirɛ Vaudès hewɔ lɛ, eto shika namɔ he gbɛjianɔ eha eweku lɛ, kɛkɛ ni eŋmɛɛ eninamɔ lɛ he koni eshiɛ Sanekpakpa lɛ.
Ákɛ weku lɛ, wɔna nyɛ hewalɛwoo kɛ ŋaawoo lɛ fɛɛ he sɛɛ babaoo.
Ani amrɔ nɛɛ onitsumɔ eba shi loo oweku sɔ̃i anɔ egbɔ kɛ́ okɛto be mli ni okpa gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ he lɛ?
Kɛ dãatɔlɔ yɛ nyɛ weku lɛ mli lɛ, no lɛ nyɛyɛ haomɔ mli.
Nakai klas lɛ mli nikaselɔi lɛ ekomɛi ejɛ amɛsuɔmɔ mli momo amɛshi weku, nanemɛi, kɛ amɛmaŋ bɔni afee ni amɛyasɔmɔ yɛ he ni hiamɔ lɛ da yɛ.
Beni eba shia sɛɛ etsɛɛɛ lɛ, Ataa hɔ̃ɔ ekamɛra ni shaa mfoniri ewoɔ glase plɛte nɔ lɛ kɛ Awo shika nineshi nii lɛ koni ena shika ni wɔkɛya kpee wulu ko.
4] Yɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, nɔ ni ba yɛ amɛshia beni Yesu yato amɛ gbɔ lɛ kɛ nikasemɔ ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ babaoo haa, jeee kɛha amɛ pɛ shi moŋ kɛha wɔ hu.

7 No sɛɛ lɛ, ekɛshwã mɔ ni tsuɔ ehe kɛjɛɔ kpiti ni eye lɛ mli lɛ nɔ shii kpawo, ni ejaje akɛ ehe tse, ni eŋmɛɛ loofɔlɔ ni hiɛ kã lɛ he yɛ ŋa lɛ nɔ.

Elɛɔ ŋwɛi loofɔji.
Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ ebatsɔ “daimonioi ashihilɛ he” kɛ ‘mumɔi fɔji fɛɛ atsu kɛ loofɔlɔ fɛɛ loofɔlɔ ni he tseee hu tsu’ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Akɛ loofɔlɔ kome lɛ fataa he kɛhaa lɛ tamɔ nɔ ni no bɛ jara ko kwraa.
Kɛ́ Nyɔŋmɔ hãa loofɔji niyenii ni ewulaa fɔfɔi lɛ, ani ehaŋ adesai ni kɛ ejamɔ yeɔ klɛŋklɛŋ gbɛhe yɛ amɛshihilɛ mli lɛ amɛhiamɔ nii?
Nɔ ni tsɔɔ amɛ heloonaa ohia shihilɛ lɛ ji akɛ, Maria kɛ loofɔji bibii enyɔ baha.
17] Babaoo ni ekaseɔ loofɔlɔ lɛ he nii lɛ, babaoo ni enáa miishɛɛ ji no.
Yɛ afii nyɔŋma mli lɛ ehe bahia koni atsake nakai faa ni lɛɛ ni bua shi kɛyaa shɔŋŋ lɛ kɛjɛ he ko ni tamɔ loofɔji ashihilɛhe ni bɛ ni efee abobaahe kɛha nuŋ loofɔji henɔi srɔtoi babaoo, ni nuŋ loofɔji ni naa shɛɔ 10,000 kɛ ŋshɔnaa loofɔji ni naa shɛɔ 12,000 ni hiɔ shi yɛ fɛibe mli lɛ fata he.”
Nyɔŋmɔ baakwɛ amɛ taakɛ efeɔ ehaa “ŋwɛi loofɔji lɛ.”

Yɛ loofɔji fɛɛ ni mɛi ni hi shi yɛ blema beaŋ lɛ yɔse jogbaŋŋ lɛ ateŋ lɛ, ekolɛ okropɔŋ ji nɔ ni anaa ehe miishɛɛ fe fɛɛ, yɛ ehewalɛ kɛ agbojee ni ekɛfilikiɔ lɛ hewɔ.
Onaa ni loofɔlɔ ko ebayi shikpɔŋ yɛ he ko ni bɛŋkɛ bo.
Esa akɛ loofɔji ni feɔ amɛtsu yɛ shikpɔŋ, tamɔ shĩa wuɔ nɛkɛ lɛ, ahiɛ ahi amɛhe nɔ waa yɛ oshara he.
Akɛni efɔɔ kaa akɛ amɛmamɔɔ amɛtsũi yɛ tɛsaai gɔgɔmeei loo tsei kakadaji anɔ hewɔ lɛ, loofɔji abifabii lɛ nuɔ kɔɔyɔŋ tsakemɔi lɛ ahe.

La kpɛmɔ ni haa wɔnaa nii, kɔɔyɔɔ ni wɔmuɔ, shikpɔŋ gbiŋ ni wɔyɔɔ nɔ nɛɛ, jwɛi kɛ tsei ni kwɛ̃ɔ, bɔ ni ato naa ni anaa shwane kɛ nyɔɔŋ, looi, loofɔji, kɛ kooloi —wɔ Bɔlɔ kpeteŋkpele lɛ to naa pɛpɛɛpɛ ni ebɔ enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ kɛha gbɔmɔ sɛɛnamɔ kɛ emiishɛɛnamɔ.

Gbɔmɛi ahe “wuoyaa” ni yeɔ omanye yɛ Fiji

Aha amɛ hewalɛ hu ní amɛkɛaatsu Nyɔŋmɔ famɔ ni ekɛha amɛ, ní ajaje yɛ 1 Mose 1:28 lɛ he nii, akɛ: “Nyɛfɔa ni nyɛyi afáa ni nyɛyia shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ, ni nyɛnaanaa nɔ, ni nyɛyea ŋshɔŋ looi kɛ ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ kooloo fɛɛ kooloo ni tsiɔ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.”
Ekɛɛ klɛŋklɛŋ mɛi enyɔ lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛfɔa ni nyɛyi afaa ni nyɛyia shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ̃, ni nyɛnaanaa nɔ, ni nyɛyea ŋshɔŋ looi kɛ ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ kooloo fɛɛ kooloo ni tsiɔ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.”
Odase ní Yesu ye beni eyɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ mli babaoo tamɔ nɛkɛ —beni enyiɛ ŋshɔ naa, beni etá shi yɛ gɔŋ ko masɛi, beni eyeɔ nii yɛ mɔ ko shia, beni etee yookpeemɔ ko shishi, aloo beni efãa gbɛ yɛ wuoyaa lɛlɛ bibioo ko mli yɛ Galilea Ŋshɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ.
