+ 2 Nyɛhe gbeyei kɛ nyɛhe ŋmiŋmi baaya nɔ amɔ bɔɔ nɔ fɛɛ bɔɔ nɔ ni hiɛ kã ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ bɔɔ nɔ fɛɛ bɔɔ nɔ ni filikiɔ yɛ ŋwɛi, nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni tsiɔ ehe yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ loi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ ŋshɔ lɛ mli lɛ.
Nui ni hiɛ tamɔ bluu kɛ eŋɔli, ŋshɔ mli tɛsaai ni tamɔ ŋshɔkpɔi, akokooshi tsei ni kpaa kɛyaa kɛbaa, gɔji kɛ amɛnɔ jwɛifɔ, ŋshɔŋ looi, aduawai kɛ fɔfɔii ni yɔɔ fɛo.
Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kooloi, loofɔji, looi—bɔɔ nii krokomɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ wala ni kɛ amɛ kɛ amɛshwiei baahi shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ ahe hegbɛ kɛ gbɛnaa nii ka amɛnɔ.
Abɔ Adam, no sɛɛ lɛ Hawa, ákɛ Yehowa adebɔɔ gbi ni ji ekpaa lɛ naagbee kwraa—bɔɔ nii ni nɔ kwɔ kwraa fe looi, loofɔji kɛ kooloi!
Mɛni hewɔ esoro Yesu fɔmɔ kɛ egbekɛbiiashi he saji ni yɔɔ Mateo lɛ yɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ Luka lɛ he?
Mɛi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ daraa yɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ kɛ miishɛɛ mli beni amɛ nilee ni kɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ eŋmɛ efɔŋ feemɔ gbɛ kɛ bɔ ni etsɛŋ ekɛ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ jalɛ shihilɛi baaba shikpɔŋ nɔ kɛtsɔ e-Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔ lɛ daa kɛyaa hiɛ lɛ.—1 Yohane 5:19; Yohane 17:16; Mateo 6:9, 10.
Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa kɛɔ akɛ ejwɛŋmɔi kɛ egbɛ̀i lɛ anɔ kwɔlɔ kwraa fe adesai anɔ̃ lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ ni Yehowa kɛ Maŋtsɛ Manase yiwalɔ lɛ he ke lɛ lɛ?
Afrikayoo ko kɛ yiŋtoo kroko hewɔ ni fɔlɔi kɛ amɛbii egbaaa bɔlɛnamɔ he sane lɛ ha: “Beni miji gbekɛ lɛ, mifɔlɔi ni ji Odasefoi lɛ kɛ mi egbaaa bɔlɛnamɔ he saji, no hewɔ lɛ ebako mijwɛŋmɔ mli pɛŋ akɛ mikɛ mibii agba enɛɛmɛi ahe saji.”
12. (a) Mɛni hewɔ jeee mɔ ko wiemɔi pɛ ni baatsɔɔ akɛ esɔleɔ jogbaŋŋ lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ Yesu mra be mli kaselɔi lɛ nyɛ “amɛkɛ ekãa jaje Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ”?
Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa kɛ wiemɔi ni wa tamɔ nɛkɛ tsu nii?
Mɛni hewɔ okaneee Mateo yitso 5 kɛyashi 7 lɛ jogbaŋŋ ekoŋŋ ni osɔle yɛ he?
Kwɛmɔ akrabatsa ni hiɛ saneyitso ni ji “Mɛni Hewɔ Biblia lɛ Kɛ Adesai Asui Wieɔ Nyɔŋmɔ He Lɛ?” mli.
15, 16. (a) Mɛni hewɔ esaaa ni wɔsusuɔ akɛ Harmagedon yɛ shɔŋŋ fe bɔ ni ekolɛ wɔhe wɔye tsutsu ko lɛ?
Ekolɛ wɔnuŋ nɔ hewɔ ni Yehowa ŋmɛɔ gbɛ koni kaa pɔtɛɛ ko aba wɔnɔ lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ kɛmɔ shi.
Yesaia etsɔɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ní amɛfee nakai yɛ be nɛɛ mli lɛ, shi ewiemɔi lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ akpɛlɛɛɛ amɛnɔ.
7 Agbɛnɛ, kɛ́ mla ni kɛ gbele baa ni akpɛ́ yɛ tɛi+ anɔ yɛ niŋmaa okadii amli lɛ ba yɛ anunyam ni tamɔ nɛkɛ mli aahu akɛ Israelbii lɛ nyɛɛɛ Mose hiɛ akwɛ yɛ ehiɛ anunyam,+ ni ji anunyam ni sɛɛ baafo lɛ hewɔ lɛ, 8 ani mumɔ+ lɛ sɔɔmɔ lɛ hiɛ baŋ nyam babaoo fe no?
Eyɛ mli akɛ shishijee mli lɛ, Yona sumɔɔɔ ni eyagba yɛ Ninive moŋ, shi mɛni hewɔ abaanyɛ atsɛ Yona akɛ gbalɔ anɔkwafo ni yɔɔ ekãa lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ adesai baanyɛ akase Yehowa sui lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔhiɛ adɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ?
Bei komɛi lɛ, mikɛ yaafo biɔ Nyɔŋmɔ akɛ: “Mɛni hewɔ ni mimami gbo?
Mɛni hewɔ Hiob wie etsutsu shihilɛ lɛ he lɛ?
Akɛ Yesu Kristo ji Yehowa sɛɛyelɔ nɔyelɔ lɛ ŋɔɔ wɔnaa titri yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Mɛni hewɔ adesai ena amanehulu be kplaŋŋ?
Mɛni hewɔ ewa akɛ mɔ ko aaaha ehemɔkɛyeli mli awa ŋmɛnɛ lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔhe be kɛjwɛŋ nɔkwɛmɔnii kpakpai ni Yehowa gbalɔi lɛ fee lɛ anɔ lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ mɛi ni sumɔɔ anɔkwale lɛ ke yuu kɛtee Yesu ŋɔɔ lɛ?
10 Yɛ Hebribii 13:7, 17 lɛ ní atsɛ yisɛɛ kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ, bɔfo Paulo tsɔɔ yiŋtoi ejwɛ ahewɔ ni esa akɛ wɔbo nɔkwɛlɔi ni yɔɔ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli lɛ atoi ni wɔba wɔhe shi wɔha amɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, yoo nɛɛ ba ŋa Odasefonyo lɛ ŋɔɔ ni ebi lɛ akɛ: “Ofainɛ ani obaasumɔ ni oha mi tsofa ni okɛha owu lɛ eko koni miwu asumɔ mi waa tamɔ bɔ ni owu sumɔɔ bo lɛ?”
Yesu Kristo bi etoibolɔi lɛ yɛ e-Gɔŋ nɔ Shiɛmɔ lɛ mli akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ mɛi ni sumɔɔ nyɛ lɛ, mɛɛ nyɔmɔwoo nyɛyɔɔ?”
Yesu tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ mɛi ni sumɔɔ nyɛ lɛ, mɛɛ nyɔmɔwoo nyɛyɔɔ?
Yesu bi akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ mɛi ni sumɔɔ nyɛ lɛ, mɛɛ nyɔmɔwoo nyɛyɔɔ?
Ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi lɛ, mi-Tsɛ baasumɔ lɛ, ni mi hu masumɔ lɛ ni majie mihe shi faŋŋ matsɔɔ lɛ.”
Mɔ ko nyɛŋ asumɔ Yehowa diɛŋtsɛ ni esumɔɔɔ enyɛmi, ejaakɛ bɔfo Yohane wie akɛ: “Kɛji mɔ ko kɛɛ akɛ: Miisumɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, ni enyɛɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ enyɛmi lɛ, amalelɔ ji lɛ.
Ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi lɛ, mi-Tsɛ baasumɔ lɛ, ni mi hu masumɔ lɛ ni majie mihe kpo faŋŋ matsɔɔ lɛ.”
Ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi lɛ, mi-Tsɛ baasumɔ lɛ, ni mi hu masumɔ lɛ ni majie mihe shi faŋŋ matsɔɔ lɛ.” —Yohane 14:21; 1 Yohane 5:3.
Ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Mɔ ni mikitai lɛ yɔɔ edɛŋ ni eyeɔ nɔ lɛ, lɛ ji mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi; ni mɔ ni sumɔɔ mi lɛ, mitsɛ aaasumɔ lɛ, ni mi hu masumɔ lɛ, ni majie mihe shi matsɔɔ lɛ.”—Yohane 14:21.
Shi miyɛ nibii babaoo ni madamɔ nɔ mada shi—miishɛɛ ni minaa yɛ sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli, Kristofoi nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei babaoo lɛ asuɔmɔ kɛ hedɔɔ, Yehowa gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ suɔmɔ kwɛmɔ, anɔkwalei ni ŋɔɔ ni jɛ Biblia lɛ mli, hiɛnɔkamɔ ni yɔɔ akɛ abaana suɔlɔi beni atee amɛ shi, kɛ afii 42 gbalashihilɛ kɛ Yehowa tsulɔ anɔkwafo lɛ he kaimɔi.
11 Kɛkɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ Solomon akɛ: “Akɛni enɛ ji nɔ ni oshweɔ yɛ otsui mli ni obiii ni oná nii, kɛ jwetrii, kɛ anunyam, aloo ni mɛi ni nyɛɔ bo lɛ agboi,* loo walasɛɛtsɛlɛ,* shi obi hiɛshikamɔ kɛ nilee koni okɛkojo miwebii ni miwó bo amɛnɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ hewɔ lɛ,+ 12 obaaná hiɛshikamɔ kɛ nilee; shi agbɛnɛ hu, mahã oná nii, kɛ jwetrii, kɛ anunyam bɔ ni maŋtsɛmɛi ni etsɔ ohiɛ lɛ eko kwraa náaa nakai, ni mɛi ni baaba yɛ osɛɛ lɛ ateŋ mɔ ko hu náŋ nakai.”
Akɛ yijiemɔ fɛɛ baaha Bɔlɔ ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ, ni adesa fɛɛ adesa toibolɔ baati lalatsɛ lɛ wiemɔi lɛ amli kɛ gbee ni wa akɛ: “Makafoo, mi-Nyɔŋmɔ, Maŋtsɛ, ni majie ogbɛi lɛ yi daa kɛaatee naanɔ! . . .
Shi amrɔ nɛɛ minuɔ he akɛ mibɛŋkɛ Yehowa ni miida lɛ shi waa akɛ etsu mɛi ni yɔɔ nɔnyɛɛ shishi lɛ ahiamɔ nii ahe nii kɛtsɔ saji ni tsɔɔ suɔmɔ nɛɛ anɔ, ni miitao makɛɛ nyɛ nakai.”
Amrɔ nɛɛ, kɛ́ misusu be ni eho lɛ he ni mijwɛŋ jɔɔmɔi fɛɛ ni Yehowa kɛduro mi lɛ anɔ lɛ, etsirɛɔ mi koni majaje taakɛ lalatsɛ lɛ jaje lɛ nɔŋŋ akɛ: “Jiemɔ Yehowa yi, . . . lɛ ekɛ onishaianii fɛɛ faa, lɛ etsáa ohelai fiaa kwa; lɛ ehereɔ oyiwala kɛjɛɔ bu mli; lɛ ekɛ mlihilɛ kɛ musuŋtsɔlɛ fiɔo akekre.”—Lala 103:1-4.
Yesu wie akɛ: “Eji Nyɔŋmɔ ji nyɛ-Tsɛ kulɛ, nyɛbaasumɔ mi, ejaakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ mijɛ kɛba ni miyɔɔ biɛ lɛ.
+ 14 Ni ani ojieŋ suɔmɔ ni tsakeee ni tamɔ Yehowa nɔ lɛ kpo otsɔŋ mi be ni mihiɛ kã kɛ be ni migbo po?
Mibi lɛ akɛ, “Ani okaiɔ akɛ misumɔɔ waa akɛ makwɛ ɛnsaiklopedia ni akɛwoɔ kotoku mli ni ohiɛɔ kɛbaa lɛ mli?”
▪ “Beni mibasara bo nyɛsɛɛ ko lɛ, mishi wolo ko ni yitso ji ‘Ani Gbɔmɛi Fɛɛ Baasumɔ Amɛhe Gbi Ko?’ lɛ miha bo.
42 Yesu kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Eji Nyɔŋmɔ ji nyɛ-Tsɛ kulɛ, nyɛbaasumɔ mi,+ ejaakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ mijɛ kɛba ni miyɔɔ biɛ lɛ.
+ Mijieŋ misuɔmɔ ni tsakeee lɛ yɛ enɔ+ tamɔ bɔ ni mijie yɛ mɔ ni tsɔ ohiɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ.
Ole nɔ ko, no mli lɛ, misumɔɔ matimatis, ni ekã mitsui nɔ akɛ matsɔɔ matimatis.
+ 15 Ajieŋ misuɔmɔ ni tsakeee lɛ yɛ enɔ tamɔ bɔ ni mijie yɛ Saul,+ mɔ ni mijie lɛ yɛ ohiɛ lɛ nɔ lɛ.
Enɛ hewɔ nɔŋŋ mije mra mijo foi kɛmiiya Tarshish; ejaakɛ mile akɛ bo lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ durolɔ kɛ musuŋtsɔlɔ jio, ni omli fũuu mra, ni omɔbɔnalɛ fá, ni oshwaa ohe yɛ efɔŋ hewɔ!”
Amɛ fɛɛ amɛjie henumɔi ni yɔɔ wiemɔi ni jɛ mumɔŋ nɛɛ mli lɛ kpo akɛ: “Nuŋtsɔ, mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, majie oyi kɛ mitsui fɛɛ, ni mawo ogbɛi lɛ hiɛ nyam kɛaatee naanɔ. Ejaakɛ omɔbɔnalɛ lɛ da kpele yɛ minɔ.”—Lala 86:12, 13.
Enɛ hewɔ nɔŋŋ mije mra mijo foi kɛmiiya Tarshish; ejaakɛ mile akɛ bo lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ durolɔ kɛ musuŋtsɔlɔ jio, ni omli fuuu mra, ni omɔbɔnalɛ fa, ni oshwaa ohe yɛ efɔŋ hewɔ!
1-3. (a) Mɛni baanyɛ aha Kristofoi komɛi ayaje mumɔŋ oshara mli?
20 Anɔkwa Kristojamɔ je shishi kɛjɛ Yesu Kristo nɔ.
Shi Yehowa baawo tsuishiŋmɛɛ sɔrɔtoi fɛɛ he nyɔmɔ, taakɛ Kristofonyo kaselɔ Yakobo ŋma beni ewieɔ Hiob he lɛ, akɛ: “Miishɛɛ ji mɛi ni ŋmɛɔ amɛtsui shi lɛ.” —Yakobo 5: 11, NW.
11:28) Hemɔkɛyeli ni hii ni ji Kristofoi yɔɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mli, kɛ suɔmɔ ni amɛyɔɔ kɛha asafo lɛ tsirɛɔ amɛ ni amɛtaoɔ nitsumɔ kpakpa nɛɛ, ni amɛbuuu nitsumɔ nɛɛ akɛ nitsumɔ ni baaha amɛkɛ nɔ ko ni kulɛ esaaa akɛ amɛkɛshãa afɔle lɛ ashã afɔle loo ebaaha etɔ amɛ waa.
Nɔ ni fe no lɛ, kɛ́ Kristofonyo le woloŋ lɛ, ebaanyɛ ekane Biblia lɛ jogbaŋŋ ni enu shishi, ebaanyɛ esusu naagbai ahe ni emu saji anaa yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ, ni ebaanyɛ etsɔɔ mɛi Biblia mli anɔkwalei lɛ yɛ gbɛ ni mli kã shi faŋŋ ní kɔneɔ mɔ yiŋ nɔ.
(Efesobii 6:10) Beni bɔfo lɛ kɛ nakai ŋaawoo lɛ eha sɛɛ lɛ, etsɔɔ mumɔŋ yelikɛbuamɔi kɛ Kristofoi asui ni yeɔ ebuaa wɔ ni wɔye kunim lɛ amli.—Efesobii 6:11-17.
• Mɛɛ gbɛfaŋnɔ ni he hiaa sanegbaai tsuɔ yɛ weku kɔkrɔɔ lɛ kɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli?
Yɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ obalaŋtai lɛ asubaŋ gbohii kɛ nifitemɔ gbɛi—zigaret shɛremɔ, tsofai fɔji kɛ nitsumɔ kɛ daatɔɔ, bɔlɛnamɔ mli jeŋba shara, kɛ je lɛŋ nibii krokomɛi asɛɛdii, tamɔ kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔ he akaŋshii keketee, kɛ lalai kɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔi gbohii lɛ hewɔ lɛ—enɛ ji ŋaawoo ni sa yɛ ebe naa pɛpɛɛpɛ kɛha obalaŋtai Kristofoi ni sumɔɔ ni amɛnyiɛ shihilɛ gbɛ kpakpa ni haa mɔ tsui nyɔɔ emli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, atsɛɔ lɛ akɛ “wɔ-Hehoo toobi ni ji Kristo lɛ,” ejaakɛ lɛ ji Toobi ni akɛ lɛ sha afɔle aha Kristofoi lɛ.
Amɛna Kristojamɔ ni miitsu nii hu.
(Romabii 7: 4, 6; Efesobii 2: 15; Hebribii 8: 6, 13) Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Yesu tsɔɔ akɛ Kristofoi ataomɔ nii ni kɔɔ gbalashihilɛ he ni afɔɔ feemɔ lɛ yɛ srɔto kwraa yɛ Mla lɛ nɔ̃ he.
11 Nibii ni wɔkaseɔ yɛ asafoŋ kpeei, kpeei bibii, kɛ kpeei wuji ashishi lɛ, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu nibii ni wɔkaseɔ kɛ́ wɔtee skul srɔtoi ni asafo lɛ eto he gbɛjianɔ lɛ woɔ wɔ hewalɛ waa.
Mɛɛ gbɛjianɔtoo yɔɔ kɛha Kristofoi akɛ amɛtsɔ nɔ amɛbɛŋkɛ Yehowa?
Be ko lɛ, Paulo kɛ Kristofoi krokomɛi ejwɛ tee sɔlemɔwe lɛ koni amɛyatsuu amɛhe yɛ kusum naa.
Te Kristofonyo oshijafonyo aaafee tɛŋŋ ajwɛŋ “Nuntsɔ lɛ nibii” anɔ jogbaŋŋ?
13 Ŋmɛnɛ, ehe miihia ni anɔkwa Kristofoi hu akwa kusumii ni ehe gbɛi ni akpɛlɛɔ nɔ, ní damɔ apasa jamɔŋ susumɔi ni teɔ shi woɔ Kristofoi ashishitoo mlai anɔ lɛ.
(Mateo 23:8-10) Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, esa akɛ Kristofoi fɛɛ afee sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛlɔi.
Biblia lɛ wieɔ Kristofoi “awusãi kɛ okulafoi” ni kɛ amanehului kpeɔ lɛ ahe.
Te fee tɛŋŋ ni klɛŋklɛŋ Kristofoi lɛ kɛ codex lɛ batsu nii?
Wɔkaseɔ klɛŋklɛŋ afii 100 lɛ mli Kristofoi lɛ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
(1 Petro 2:17) Okɛ anɔkwayeli aya Kristofoi akpeei fɛɛ, ejaakɛ jɛmɛ ji he ni obaaná hewalɛwoo ni he hiaa bo koni onyɛ oŋmɛ otsui shi lɛ yɛ.
Kɛ́ Kristofonyo ni boteko gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ tsu nii lɛ, ebaanyɛ eje gbalashihilɛ shishi yɛ gbɛ kpakpa nɔ.
10 Yɛ Hebribii 13:7, 17 lɛ ní atsɛ yisɛɛ kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ, bɔfo Paulo tsɔɔ yiŋtoi ejwɛ ahewɔ ni esa akɛ wɔbo nɔkwɛlɔi ni yɔɔ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli lɛ atoi ni wɔba wɔhe shi wɔha amɛ.
3 Yesu Kasemɔ Ŋmɛnɛ: Wɔbaanyɛ wɔkase Yesu nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ kɛtsɔ mɔdɛŋ ni wɔɔbɔ akɛ wɔɔha wɔshihilɛ afee nɔ ni yɔɔ mlɛo ni damɔ Kristofoi asɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, mlihilɛ su kɛ su ni haa akpɛlɛɔ mɛi krokomɛi asusumɔi anɔ lɛ kpo ni wɔɔjie wɔtsɔɔ Kristofoi ni amɛhenilee mli waaa lɛ—loo wɔsuɔmɔ mli ni wɔɔjɛ wɔkpoo wɔnihalamɔi komɛi, ni wɔmaŋ hegbɛi ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ anɔ mi lɛ—tsɔɔ ‘jwɛŋmɔ ni tamɔ Kristo Yesu nɔ̃ lɛ ni wɔyɔɔ.’—Romabii 15:1-5.
(Lala 32:5; 103:3) Akɛni eyɛ bɔ ni Yehowa sumɔɔ ni ekpã mɔbɔnalɛ mli eha mɛi ni shwaa amɛhe lɛ mli hemɔkɛyeli kɛmɔ shi hewɔ lɛ, David kɛɛ akɛ: “Bo, [Yehowa, NW], ohi ni oŋɔfaa mra.”—Lala 86:5.
Agbɛnɛ kɛji jwɛi ni ŋmɛnɛ lɛ eyɛ ŋa nɔ ni wɔ́ ni aŋɔwo flɔnɔɔ mli lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wulaa nɛkɛ lɛ, ani ewulaŋ nyɛ aahu fe amɛ? nyɛ ni nyɛhemɔkɛyeli faaa!’
1 Taakɛ ooole lɛ, Hindubii pii yɛ shikpɔji babaoo nɔ, ni maŋ nɛɛ hu fata he.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni ooosusu akɛ ole gbɛ ni hi jogbaŋŋ ni oootsɔ nɔ ojie mɔhesusumɔ kpo otsɔɔ ohefatalɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ obiii lɛ ni etsɔɔ bo nɔ ni kɛ́ ofee lɛ ebaanya he waa?
35 Nakai nuu lɛ ji kane ni tsoɔ ni kpɛɔ, ni nyɛshwe be kukuoo akɛ nyɛmii ashɛ nyɛhe babaoo yɛ ela lɛ mli.
Mɛi ni ŋma wolo tɛtrɛɛ nɛɛ baaná he miishɛɛ akɛ amɛaaye amɛbua bo koni ole mɔ tuuntu ni Yesu ji lɛ.
+ 24 No hewɔ lɛ, ni okɛ ohiɛ efɔ̃ Ejipt nɔ kɛhã shwiilii kɛ okpɔŋɔnɔtaralɔi nɛɛ, te ooofee tɛŋŋ oshwie amralo kome, ni ji minuŋtsɔ tsuji lɛ ateŋ mɔ bibioo kwraa lɛ po lɛ?
Ekolɛ obaasusu akɛ: ‘Ani adesa ko baanyɛ aná ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Ofe lɛ teŋ wekukpaa ni bɛŋkɛ kpaakpa?
Shishitoo mla kome ni bafee yelikɛbuamɔ nɔ krɛdɛɛ ji enɛ: “Nyɛkakojoa, koni akakojo nyɛ. Shi nɔ kojomɔ ni nyɛŋɔkojoɔ lɛ, aaaŋɔ kojo nyɛ.”
Ejajeɔ akɛ: “Mɔ ni taa nyɛhe lɛ eeta [mi]hiŋmɛiŋ ajaŋmalaatɛ he.”
Shi kɛlɛ, bei komɛi lɛ ekolɛ ehe baahia ni asafo lɛ aye abua bo.
Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ miisumɔ ni ofee nakai dani ekpe sɛɛ. —Kpojiemɔ 18:4.

Ani ohaa ohiɛ hiɔ Yehowa mlihilɛ nifeemɔi lɛ anɔ?
Ani obaanyɛ okɛ ohe ashã afɔle?

(Ezekiel 2:7) Beni amɛyaa nɔ amɛtsuɔ nɛkɛ yiwalaheremɔ nitsumɔ nɛɛ, Yesu shiwoo nɛɛ hãa amɛnaa nɔmimaa akɛ: “Naa, mi lɛ mikɛ nyɛ yɛ daa kɛyashi jeŋ naagbee lɛ.”—Mateo 28:20.

Bɔfo Yohane wo hewalɛ akɛ: “Suɔmɔ mɛi, nyɛkahea mumɔ fɛɛ mumɔ nyɛyea; shi moŋ nyɛkaa mumɔi lɛ nyɛkwɛa akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mli amɛjɛ lo.”
Yɛ mɛi ni kwɛ lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo gbɛfaŋ lɛ, no bafee klɛŋklɛŋ sini ni amɛkwɛ ni wiemɔ kɛ gbɛɛmɔ yɔɔ mli, ni enɛ ha amɛnaa kpɛ amɛhe waa.
2. (a) Mɛni Yohane na ni enu hu, ni kerubim lɛ puemɔ tsɔɔ mɛni?
Wɔteŋ mɛi babaoo kɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔ eyaaa loofɔji bibii ni wɔnaa lɛ fɛɛ anɔ, aahu ni kɛ́ eko gbee shi lɛ, wɔbaana.

Naa Onyɛmimɛi lɛ Tamɔ Bɔ ni Yehowa Naa Amɛ Lɛ
Amɛkɛɔ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛhe akɛ, “eji miha eyana datrɛfonyo lɛ mra kulɛ,” aloo “eji miha eyana datrɛfonyo kroko kulɛ,” aloo “eji miha ekwɛ egbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ nɔ jogbaŋŋ kulɛ, egboŋ.”
Elá yɛ Yehowa he akɛ: “Kɛ́ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ ni ji owaabii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ: Mɛni ji adesa, ní ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? aloo gbɔmɔ bi, ní osaraa lɛ po?”
Nyɛhaa wɔkwɛa bɔ ni fee ni eba lɛ nakai.
Dani kɔɔyɔŋ lɛlɛ lɛ baafã lɛ, no mli lɛ etswa kɔɔyɔŋ lɛlɛ lɛ gbɛfaa he gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ ewo kɔmpiuta ni yɔɔ mli lɛ nɔ jogbaŋŋ momo, shi eleee akɛ nibii ni atsɔɔ akɛ etswa ewo kɔmpiuta lɛ nɔ ní baatsɔɔ lɛ gbɛ lɛ ejaaa.
Abaanyɛ akɛ kɔmpiuta atao nii amli, atsɔ nɔ akɛ mɛi ashara, ni yɛ nakai beaŋ nɔŋŋ lɛ akɛjie hiɛtserɛ.
Tamɔ bɔ ni kɔɔyɔŋ lɛji ni yɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ kɛ amɛhe fɔ̃ɔ kɔmpiutai anɔ koni etsɔɔ amɛ gbɛ kɛtsɔ atatui lɛ amli lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ akɛ henilee eha adesai koni etsɔɔ amɛ gbɛ yɛ amɛshihilɛ mli.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ́ amɛmiishwɛ shwɛmɔi ni yɔɔ kɔmpiuta nɔ lɛ ateŋ eko lɛ, mibiɔ amɛ bɔ ni ashwɛɔ lɛ ahaa.
Woji hu yɛ kɛha Biblia kasemɔ yɛ wiemɔi 153 mli, woji bibii yɛ wiemɔi 284 mli, kasɛt yɛ wiemɔi 61 mli, vidio kasɛt yɛ wiemɔi 41 mli, kɛ kɔmpiuta gbɛjianɔtoo po kɛha Biblia mli saji amlitaomɔ yɛ wiemɔi 9 mli! —Mateo 24: 45-47.[ 1]
Kɔmpiutai kɛ kɔmpiuta nɔ program srɔtoi tamɔ MEPS lɛ yeɔ ebuaa wɔ ni wɔtsɔɔ nibii ashishi.
Beni mibɔi sɔɔmɔ akɛ kpokpaa nɔkwɛlɔ lɛ, no mli lɛ tsɔji, tɛlivishiŋ, kɛ taipraita fioo komɛi pɛ yɔɔ nakai kpokpaa lɛ nɔ, shi redio bibii kɛ kɔmpiuta bɛ.
Wolo tɛtrɛɛ ni ji The Economist lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Kɔmpiuta nɔ shwɛmɔi ebatsɔ nɔ titri ni akɛtsɔseɔ Amerika asraafoi lɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, abaanyɛ aha elɛtrik stof adɔ, aha kɔmpiuta kɛ saji atsu nii, ni aha tɛlivishiŋ afee mfonirii kɛ gbɛɛmɔ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ anyɛɔ akɛ kɔmpiutai kɛ ilɛtrɔnik tsɔji krokomɛi tsuɔ nii yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ moŋ, shi amɛbaanyɛ amɛtsɔ tsɔne ni duɔ mɔ kɛji wɔkwɛɛɛ bɔ ni wɔkɛ wɔbe tsuɔ nii lɛ jogbaŋŋ.—1 Kor.
Ani mináa be mihaa mibii lɛ, loo mikpaa gbɛ koni shwɛmɔ nibii, TV, loo kɔmpiuta afite amɛbe?
Kɔmpiuta nɔ saji lɛ ateŋ babaoo (ni shwɛmɔ nɔ̃ fata he lɛ) ji nɔ ni gbɛŋmɛɛ wolo yɔɔ he, ní kɛ naatsĩi komɛi baa nɔtsɛ lɛ loo mɔ ni kɛtsuɔ nii lɛ nɔ yɛ saji lɛ ni ekɛaawo kɔmpiuta ko nɔ lɛ mli.
Asafo lɛ nitsumɔhe lɛ fã ko (MEPS Programming) fee kɔmpiuta program ko (Bible Translation System).
Grzegorz ni le bɔ ni atoɔ kɔmpiuta nɔ nifeemɔi ahe gbɛjianɔ lɛ fee tsakemɔi komɛi yɛ eshihilɛ mli.
Ato gbɛ ko ni atsɔɔ nɔ atsɔɔ nii ashishi ni kɛ Biblia mli wiemɔ lɛ kasemɔ yɛ kɔmpiuta nɔ lɛ he nilee yɔɔ tsakpaa nɔ.
Nikasemɔhei ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ ateŋ babaoo haa anáa tsɔsemɔ yɛ nikasemɔ ni yeee be kakadaŋŋ ni kɔɔ ɔfis nitsumɔi, lɔlei asaamɔ, kɔmpiuta saamɔ, paipi saamɔ, yitsɔi feemɔ, kɛ ninenaa nitsumɔi krokomɛi babaoo ahe lɛ mli.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, jeee woji loo kɔmpiuta gbɛjianɔtoi ní akɛwo mla shishi, nibii ni mla kudɔɔ ni akɛtsuɔ nii ní akɛ ekomɛi aaaha mɛi yaka lɛ he Yesu wieɔ lɛ.
Ŋmɛnɛ, kɔɔyɔŋ tsakemɔ he nilelɔi kɛ tsɔji ni yɔɔ ŋwanyaŋŋ tamɔ ŋulamii bibii ni gbɔmɛi efee ni bɔleɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, rada loo Tsɔne ni kɛ Kɔɔyɔŋ Hewalɛ tsuɔ nii ni haa akɛ mɔ ko yeɔ sharamɔ, kɛ kɔmpiutai wuji tsuɔ nii ni amɛkɛ naa kɔɔyɔɔ shikamɔ yɛ be kakadaŋŋ mli.

Yɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ obalaŋtai lɛ asubaŋ gbohii kɛ nifitemɔ gbɛi—zigaret shɛremɔ, tsofai fɔji kɛ nitsumɔ kɛ daatɔɔ, bɔlɛnamɔ mli jeŋba shara, kɛ je lɛŋ nibii krokomɛi asɛɛdii, tamɔ kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔ he akaŋshii keketee, kɛ lalai kɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔi gbohii lɛ hewɔ lɛ—enɛ ji ŋaawoo ni sa yɛ ebe naa pɛpɛɛpɛ kɛha obalaŋtai Kristofoi ni sumɔɔ ni amɛnyiɛ shihilɛ gbɛ kpakpa ni haa mɔ tsui nyɔɔ emli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ.
Shi, eyɛ dɔlɛ akɛ abaakɛɛ akɛ onukpai komɛi sumɔɔ ni amɛkɛ gbekɛbii aná bɔlɛ.
Esa akɛ onukpai lɛ abu asafoku lɛ he kɛjɛ bɔlɛnamɔ je nɛɛ jeŋba kpɔtɔmɔ lɛ he.
Joo sanegbaa ni sɛɛnamɔ bɛ he, kɛ be ni afiteɔ yakatswaa, kɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he miishɛɛ ni anaa yɛ gbɛ fɔŋ nɔ, kɛ shi ni ataa ni afeee nɔ ko, ni ehaa shihilɛ jeɔ mɔ tsine, kɛ wiemɔ ni ooowie oshi ofɔlɔi akɛ amɛnuuu bo shishi lɛ fɛɛ naa foi.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, yei komɛi yɛ ni kɛ hii pii ná bɔlɛ.
Abɔ amaniɛ yɛ kpee ko ni afee ni kɔɔ AIDS kɛ obalaŋtai ahe lɛ shishi akɛ: “Obalaŋtai kɛ AIDS he oshara wulu kpeɔ ejaakɛ amɛsumɔɔ ni amɛka bɔlɛnamɔ kɛ tsofai fɔji kɛ nitsumɔ amɛkwɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhe woɔ oshara mli ni amɛhiɔ shi ni amɛsusuuu wɔsɛɛ shihilɛ lɛ he, agbɛnɛ akɛni amɛsusuɔ akɛ amɛnyɛŋ amɛgboi ni amɛbuuu hegbɛi ni yeɔ nɔ lɛ hu hewɔ.”—New York Daily News, Sunday, March 7, 1993.
19 Susumɔ enɛ he okwɛ: Kɛ́ Yosef feɔ yoo lɛ he mfoniri yɛ ejwɛŋmɔ mli loo efɔɔ bɔlɛnamɔ he mfoniri feemɔ yɛ ejwɛŋmɔ mli lɛ, ani kulɛ ebaanyɛ eye anɔkwa?
Abaanyɛ atsɛ bɔlɛnamɔ nifeemɔi krokomɛi ni aŋkroaŋkroi ni boteko gbalashihilɛ mli kɛ amɛhe náa, tamɔ fɔmɔ nii ní akɛwoɔ daaŋ kɛ wamɔhe, kɛ mɔ kroko fɔmɔ nii ni akɛshwɛɔ kɛteɔ ebɔlɛnamɔ henumɔi ashi lɛ hu akɛ por·neiʹa.
(1 Mose 2:18, 23, 24; Mateo 19:4, 5) Kɛlɛ, jwɛŋmɔi ni ahiɛ yɛ nuu kɛ yoo he lɛ etsɔ̃mɔ ni átsake hiɛ.
4 Sanebimɔi Nyɔŋma ni Kɔɔ Bɔlɛnamɔ He lɛ Ahetoo
KAA ENƐ OKWƐ: Tsɔsemɔ obi lɛ koni ele bɔ ni eeefee enii eha kɛ́ mɔ ko ka akɛ ekɛ efɔmɔnii lɛ aaashwɛ.
Nigeria gbekɛyoo ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Miskul nanemɛi lɛ ka koni amɛkɔne miyiŋ akɛ bɔlɛnamɔ ji nɔ ko ni esa akɛ adesai fɛɛ ni hiɛ kã shi lɛ kɛ amɛhe awo mli.
Shi kɛlɛ, Yesu tsɔɔ akɛ nɔ̃ kome pɛ nɔ abaanyɛ adamɔ atse gbãla. Ekɛɛ akɛ: ‘Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni jeee ajwamaŋbɔɔ [hefatalɔ sɛɛ ni ajeɔ akɛ mɔ kroko náa bɔlɛ] hewɔ jɛ ni eeeshwie eŋa ni eyawɛ yoo kroko lɛ, efite gbãla.’—Mateo 19:9.
Eji anɔkwale akɛ, ebaanyɛ efee hiɛgbele akɛ fɔlɔi kɛ amɛbii aaawie bɔlɛnamɔ he hiɛ kɛ hiɛ.
Bei komɛi lɛ, amralofoi lɛ kɛ oblahii kɛ oblayei bibii ni kɛ amɛhe woɔ sexting mli lɛ yaa kɔɔtu.
Oblahii kɛ oblayei ni kɛ mɛi ná bɔlɛ be ni amɛboteko gbalashihilɛ mli lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo ewie akɛ, amɛshwa amɛhe waa akɛ amɛfee nakai.
15 Beni gbekɛbii daraa lɛ, esa akɛ amɛná bɔlɛnamɔ kɛ gbalashihilɛ he tsɔsemɔ ní sa afii abɔ ni amɛye lɛ.
Okɛ wolo ni ji Questions Young People Ask—Answers That Work, Kpo 2, ni Yehowa Odasefoi fee lɛ mli yitsei ni ji 1-5, 28, 29, kɛ 33 lɛ atsɔɔ obii ni eshɛ amɛblahiiaŋ loo amɛblayeiaŋ lɛ bɔlɛnamɔ he nii.
“Beni miná ekãa ni mibi mifɔlɔi bɔlɛnamɔ he sane ko lɛ, amɛha hetoo oookɛɛ nɔ ni miyafee nɔ ko gbonyo, amɛbi akɛ, ‘Mɛni hewɔ obiɔ enɛ he sane?
Jalɛ sane ni ayeee ni tamɔ nɛkɛ hiɔ shi akɛni yɛ gbɔmɛi ahewolo nɔ su, he ni amɛjɛ, wiemɔ, bɔɔ su, loo jamɔ hewɔ lɛ, hegbɛ fioo ko pɛ amɛyɔɔ ni amɛkɛaaha amɛshihilɛ ahi aloo po ni no aaaha amɛhi shi.
Kɛtsɔ nakai gbɛ nɔ lɛ, kɛ amɛnu ni gbekɛbii krokomɛi miiwie bɔlɛnamɔ he lɛ, efeee nɔ hee ni amɛaatao amɛle.
Nyɔŋmɔ to bɔlɛnamɔ he gbɛjianɔ kɛha bii afɔmɔ kɛ agbɛnɛ hu kɛha gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi lɛ amiishɛɛnamɔ.
Nɔ ni fata enɛɛmɛi ahe ji nibii ni wooo Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ nyam tamɔ amale, juu, musubɔɔ, bɔlɛnamɔ he wiemɔ shara, hiɛgbeji anitsumɔ, fɛoyeli ni esaaa kɛ dãatɔɔ.
Ni amɛaahiɛ hetsemɔ mli yɛ jeŋ ni eye bɔlɛnamɔ he sɛkɛ nɛɛ mli lɛ, mɛi pii diɔ nyenyeŋtswibɔɔ shihilɛ ni kɛ mɔ yaa gbele mli yɛ bei pii amli lɛ sɛɛ.
Ni tsɔɔ akɛ nikasemɔi nɛɛ baaye abua wɔ ni wɔsaa wɔtsuii kɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔi wɔto Kaimɔ lɛ ní abaafee yɛ April 9, 2009 lɛ beni hulu enyɔ shi lɛ.

Mɛni haa anaa nɔ ni yɔɔ wɔtsui mli?
Mɔ mli mɔmɔ, hiɛ ŋmɔlɔŋmɔlɔ feemɔ, mɔ fuamɔ, kɛ yijiemɔ wiemɔi ji nifeemɔi ni abuɔ amɛ akɛ amɛjeee nɔ ko tsɔ, shi amɛnáa yei anɔ hewalɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.

‘Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ha bɔ ni ekpɛ mli momo yɛ etsui mli, ni ejɛɛɛ ŋkɔmɔyeli aloo fimɔ mli, ejaakɛ tsuijurɔnaa halɔ Nyɔŋmɔ sumɔɔ.’

Kɛfata he lɛ, aha Mose kɛɛ Israelbii lɛ akɛ: “Yehowa, nyɛtsɛmɛi a-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ni ji Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Isak Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Yakob Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ tsu mi nyɛŋɔɔ nɛɛ.”
Kristojamɔ lɛ “fãi etɛ lɛ, ni Roma Katolik, Eastern Orthodoxy, kɛ Jamɔi ni tse amɛhe kɛjɛ Katolik jamɔ lɛ he lɛ heɔ Nyɔŋmɔi etɛ ni efee Ekome lɛ amɛyeɔ: Tsɛ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ni, Bi lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ni, ni Mumɔ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ hu Nyɔŋmɔ ni.

Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, Paulo naagbee ŋaawoo ni ekɛha Korintobii lɛ sa jogbaŋŋ ŋmɛnɛ taakɛ eji afii akpei enyɔ ni eho nɛ lɛ akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ, minyɛmimɛi ni misumɔɔ, nyɛfia shi ni nyɛkagbugbãa, ni nyɛtekea nɔ yɛ Nuntsɔ lɛ nitsumɔ lɛ mli daa nɛɛ, ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nyɛmɔdɛŋbɔɔ lɛ efeee yaka yɛ Nuntsɔ lɛ mli.”—1 Korintobii 15:58.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Yehowa le nɔ ni yɔɔ wɔtsuii amli moŋ, shi ewoɔ wɔ hewalɛ ni wɔkɛ lɛ agba sane.
Shi moŋ, sanebimɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ji, Mɛni esa akɛ ofee koni oná he sɛɛ kɛji ená emlibaa?
Nilee bɛ su ni tamɔ nɛkɛ mli ejaakɛ “Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ekuɔ hewolɔi anaa, shi heshibalɔi eduroɔ.”
Naa Wɔjamɔhe Lɛ!
Namɔ Hɔ Yiwalɛ Nifeemɔi Asɛɛ?
(1) Mɛni ji yiŋtoo titri hewɔ ni Yehowa Odasefoi kpoɔ lá ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli lɛ, ni nɛgbɛ anaa nakai shishitoo mla lɛ yɛ, yɛ Biblia lɛ mli?
Ŋmɛnɛ, Palmyra ni ji Zenobia maŋtsɛyeli lɛ maŋtiase lɛ, jeee nɔ ko nɔ ko akɛ ja akrowa.
3 Nakai nyɔɔŋ lɛ mli nɔŋŋ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ Natan* akɛ: 4 “Yaa ni oyakɛɛ mitsulɔ David akɛ, ‘Nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: “Jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa ohã mi ni mahi mli.
Wɔ hu wɔyɛ saji ni agba lɛ he miishɛɛ ejaakɛ emaa jɔɔmɔi ni jɛɔ toiboo ni afeɔ ahaa anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ nɔ ni jɛɔ enɔ toigbele mli kɛbaa lɛ nɔ mi.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ‘afɔ́ɔ’ Kristofoi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ ‘ehee kɛha hiɛnɔkamɔ ni gbooo,’ ni mɛni ji nakai hiɛnɔkamɔ lɛ?
Gbalɔ lɛ miiwie mumɔŋ ŋwɛi, he ni Yehowa kɛ emumɔŋ bɔɔ nii ní anaaa amɛ lɛ hiɔ lɛ he.
David tsɔɔ bɔ ni enuɔ he ehaa lɛ yɛ Lala 8: 4, 5 akɛ: “Kɛ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ ni ji owaobii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ: Mɛni ji adesa ni ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? aloo gbɔmɔ bi ni osaraa lɛ po?”
+ 6 Ni enɛ ji suɔmɔ lɛ, akɛ wɔya nɔ wɔnyiɛ yɛ ekitãi lɛ anaa.
YEHOWA ji la Jɛɛhe.
Kaimɔ akɛ wɔnyɛmimɛi ahe ni wɔɔfata yɛ lala kɛ sɔlemɔ mli yɛ asafoŋ kpeei ashishi lɛ ji wɔjamɔ lɛ fã.
+ 7 Nyɛkɛ su kpakpa asɔmɔa akɛ nyɔji, tamɔ nɔ ni nyɛmiisɔmɔ Yehowa,*+ shi jeee gbɔmɛi, 8 ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ lɛ, nyɔŋ ji lɛ jio, jeee nyɔŋ ji lɛ jio, nɔ kpakpa ni efeɔ lɛ, no he najiaŋ Yehowa* baato lɛ.
Enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ gbalaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛyaa anɔkwa sane kome nɔ: Yehowa yɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ, ni ekuuu ehiɛ efɔ̃ɔɔ loo ekpɛlɛɛɛ esha loo fitemɔ fɛɛ fitemɔ nɔ.
3 Akɛni Yehowa yɔɔ hewalɛ kɛ nyɛmɔ hewɔ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná nɔmimaa akɛ hulu lɛ baaya nɔ aha wɔ la kɛ dɔlɛ ni wɔwala damɔ nɔ lɛ.
Nibii fufuji babaoo ni efee mulumulu ni buaa amɛhe naa lɛ fãmɔɔ kpo kɛboteɔ kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ mli, ni ehàa hulu lɛ hiɛ yɛ shibɔlemɔ ŋulami muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ.
Mɛni ji hulu lɛ he saji komɛi ni sa kadimɔ?
(2 Mose 34:29, 30) Kaimɔ hu akɛ, beni Yesu tsake yɛ ebɔfoi etɛ lɛ ahiɛ nɔ ni miihe ashɛ afii 2,000 ni eho nɛ lɛ, “esu tsake yɛ amɛhiɛ, ni ehiɛ kpɛ tamɔ hulu, ni etade lɛ yɛ tamɔ la.”
Bei komɛi lɛ, mikaneɔ jenamɔ muu fɛɛ kɛyashiɔ leebi wɛlɛŋŋ beni hulu eje.
Ekolɛ, Zenobia hu já nyɔŋmɔ ko ni fata hulu nyɔŋmɔ lɛ he.
13 No hewɔ lɛ, hulu lɛ wa edamɔ shi ni nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ hu tsiii ehe kɛyashi maŋ lɛ tɔ owele yɛ amɛhenyɛlɔi lɛ anɔ.
12 Be ni eshwɛ fioo ni hulu baanyɔ shi lɛ, wɔ nyɔ Abram nɔ vii, ni duŋ kpii ni yɔɔ gbeyei ba enɔ.
Yɛ be mli ni wɔtiɔ nɛkɛ adesãi nɛɛ amli lɛ, wɔbaayoo bɔ ni nibɔɔ, Nu Afua lɛ, apasa nyɔŋmɔi kɛ gbɔmɛi ni abuɔ amɛ nyɔŋmɔi, susuma ni gbooo lɛ, kɛ hulu jamɔ teɔ shi be fɛɛ be tamɔ blema adesãi amli kpãai ni atsara.
(Romabii 1:20) Yesu ‘miiba kɛ atatui’ ni tsɔɔ akɛ ebaafee mɔ ni hiŋmɛi diɛŋtsɛ nɛɛ nyɛŋ lɛ ana taakɛ bɔ ni kɛ hulu yaje atatui asɛɛ lɛ anyɛɛɛ ana lɛ.
* Kwɛ hewalɛ kpele ní hulu lɛ yɔɔ, ejaakɛ onyɛɔ onuɔ edɔlɛ lɛ he kɛjɛɔ he ní eyɔɔ yɛ shɔŋŋ nɛɛ!
Ebuɔ hewolo lɛ he yɛ hulu lɛ nɔ, ni ehaa Israelbii lɛ náa samala ni amɛkɛfɔɔ nii ahe.
Yɛ blema Inka jamɔ mli lɛ, akɛ gbekɛbii kɛ kooloi shaa afɔle ahaa hulu-nyɔŋmɔ Inti kɛ Viracocha, bɔlɔ lɛ.
Wiemɔ ni ji “yɛ hulu shishi” lɛ shishi ji “yɛ shikpɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ” loo “yɛ je nɛɛ mli.”
(Kpojiemɔ 8:12) Nyɔŋmɔ mlifu tɔ ni ji ejwɛ lɛ tsɔɔ agbɛnɛ akɛ je lɛ “hulu” lɛ baadɔ babaoo ni anyɛŋ naa adamɔ.
Shi kɛ eshɛ fɛ̃i be lɛ, afua kɛ oblɔtu tsĩɔ okadii ní akwɛɔ akɛfãa gbɛ lɛ ahiɛ, amɛtsĩɔ hulu lɛ hiɛ shwane kɛ ŋulamii lɛ ahiɛ nyɔɔŋ.
(Kpojiemɔ 12: 7-12) No hewɔ lɛ, jajelɔ lɛ woɔ wɔ hewalɛ ni wɔkai wɔ-Bɔlɔ lɛ yɛ “be mli ni hulu kɛ la kɛ nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii woko duŋ, ni atatui kuɔ amɛsɛɛ amɛbaa ekoŋŋ yɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ sɛɛ lɛ.”
29 Esɛŋ Ai maŋtsɛ lɛ yɛ tso jaŋŋ nɔ kɛyashi gbɛkɛnaashi, ni be ni hulu lɛ miihe anyɔ shi lɛ, Yoshua fã ní ajie egbonyo lɛ kɛje tso jaŋŋ lɛ nɔ.
*+ 11 Shi be ni mijwɛŋ nitsumɔi fɛɛ ni mikɛ mi diɛŋtsɛ miniji etsu kɛ nitsumɔi fɛɛ ni migbo deŋme kɛtsu lɛ anɔ lɛ,+ mina akɛ fɛɛ lɛ yaka nii ni, kɔɔyɔɔ sɛɛtiumɔ ni;+ nɔ ko kwraa bɛ hulu shishi nɛɛ ni sɛɛnamɔ yɔɔ he.
Yɛ anɔkwale ni enɛ ji lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, mɛi komɛi wieɔ amɛshiɔ akɛ, kɛji Blonya ná eshishifa kɛjɛ wɔŋjamɔ, ní ji hulu jamɔ mli po lɛ, Kristendom ekpɛlɛ nɔ momo.
Wɔkaneɔ yɛ Kpojiemɔ 16:12 lɛ akɛ abaasaa gbɛ aha “maŋtsɛmɛi ní jɛ hulushiteehe lɛ.”
Beni wɔyi gbɛ ni yaa Niurka shĩa lɛ nɔ lɛ, wɔna lɛ ni eta shi yɛ ablanaa lɛ nɔ yɛ hulu lɛ nɔ, ni ewo eyitso nɔ kɛmiikwɛ ŋwɛi kɛ ehiɛ ŋmɔlɔŋmɔlɔ.
Kɛ́ shwilafo ko yaje he ko ni hɔŋ yɔɔ lɛ, enuɔ he akɛ eyɛ he ko ni ejɔ ni hulu bɛ jɛmɛ, shi jeee akɛ eyɛ he ko ni hulu bɛ jɛmɛ ni ewo duŋ.
Yɛ nɔ ni kɔɔ Sin sɔlemɔtsu ni yɔɔ Haran lɛ he lɛ, Nabonido ni jɛ Babilon (afii ohai ekpaa D.Ŋ.B.) lɛ ŋma akɛ: “Mikɛ shika kɛ jwiɛtɛi ha egbogboi ahe, ni miha amɛkpɛlɛ tamɔ hulu.”
Yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, lɛ moŋ ekɛ nibii ni he hiaa adesai lɛ haa amɛ—“wala kɛ mumɔ kɛ nii fɛɛ,” ni hulu, nugbɔnɛmɔ, kɛ sũ ni baa nii fata he.
20 Agbɛnɛ, nɔ ni kɔɔ nibii ni miŋmaa nyɛ nɛɛ ahe lɛ, miima nɔ mi miihã nyɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ akɛ mimaleee.
Minaa ekpɛ mihe waa yɛ nɛkɛ henumɔi heei ni mina yɛ nɛkɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ ni miye ehe fɛo aahu afii babaoo nɛɛ he, yɛ jeŋnyo ni miji lɛ hewɔ.
Paulo kɛɛ: “Ni kɛji miyɛ gbalɛ, ni minaa teemɔŋ nii fɛɛ naa, ni mile nii fɛɛ, ni kɛji miyɛ hemɔkɛyeli fɛɛ hu, bɔ ni manyɛ gɔji matsirɛ, shi mibɛ suɔmɔ lɛ, jikulɛ mijeee nɔ ko.
(1 Tesalonikabii 4:14-17) Enɛ kɛ Yesu wiemɔi ni ejaje etsɔɔ ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi 11 lɛ kpãa gbee, akɛ: “Kɛji mitee ni miyasaa gbɛhe mito nyɛ lɛ, mibaba ekoŋŋ ni mibabaŋɔ nyɛ kɛya he ni mi diɛŋtsɛ miyɔɔ lɛ, koni he ni miyɔɔ lɛ nyɛ hu nyɛhi jɛi.”—Yohane 14:3.
(1 Tesalonikabii 4:14-17) Enɛ kɛ Kristo wiemɔi ni ekɛ ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi 11 lɛ wie lɛ kpãa gbee, akɛ: “Kɛji mitee ni miyasaa gbɛhe mito nyɛ lɛ, mibaba ekoŋŋ ni mibabaŋɔ nyɛ kɛya he ni mi diɛŋtsɛ miyɔɔ lɛ, koni he ni miyɔɔ lɛ nyɛ hu nyɛhi jɛi.”—Yohane 14:3.
9 Ejaakɛ miji bibioo kwraa yɛ bɔfoi lɛ ateŋ, ni misaaa mɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ bɔfo po, ejaakɛ miwa Nyɔŋmɔ asafo lɛ yi.
Ejaje akɛ: “Naa, miiŋɔ minii fã miike ohiafoi, ni kɛji mikɛ yaka naafolɔmɔ eshɔ̃ mɔ ko nɔ ko yɛ edɛŋ lɛ, miiku miibɔ he toi ejwɛ miiha lɛ.”—Luka 19:8.
Adolfo jaje akɛ: “Amrɔ nɛɛ ni abaptisi mi lɛ, manyɛ makɛɛ kɛ yiŋtsɔmɔ diɛŋtsɛ akɛ Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome ji mi!”
(1 Tesalonikabii 4: 14-17) Enɛ kɛ Kristo wiemɔi ni ekɛ ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi 11 lɛ wie lɛ kpaa gbee, akɛ: “Kɛji mitee ni miyasaa gbɛhe mito nyɛ lɛ, mibaba ekoŋŋ ni mibabaŋɔ nyɛ kɛya he ni mi diɛŋtsɛ miyɔɔ lɛ, koni he ni miyɔɔ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛhi jɛi.” —Yohane 14:3.
2 “Maŋtsɛ Agripa, yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni Yudafoi lɛ kɛshwieɔ minɔ lɛ he lɛ,+ eŋɔɔ minaa akɛ bo ohiɛ majie minaa yɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ, 3 titri lɛ akɛni ole Yudafoi lɛ akusumii kɛ naataamɔi ni yaa nɔ yɛ amɛteŋ lɛ jogbaŋŋ lɛ hewɔ.
Ni kɛji mitee ni miyasaa gbɛhe mito nyɛ lɛ, mibaba ekoŋŋ, ni mibabaŋɔ nyɛ kɛya he ni mi diɛŋtsɛ miyɔɔ lɛ, koni he ni miyɔɔ lɛ, nyɛ hu nyɛhi jɛi.”
10 Ni lɛ hu ekɛɛ: “Naa, mikɛ nyɛ miikpaŋ kpaŋmɔ ko: Mafee naakpɛɛ nii ní afeko* eko dã yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ fɛɛ loo yɛ jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ ateŋ,+ ni maji fɛɛ ni nyɛyɔɔ amɛteŋ lɛ baana Yehowa nitsumɔ lɛ, ejaakɛ nɔ ni mafee mahã nyɛ lɛ yɛ naakpɛɛ.
Shi milaaje; ejaakɛ gbɔmɔ ni naabu he tseee ji mi, ni maŋ ní amɛnaabui ahe tseee teŋ miyɔɔ; ejaakɛ mihiŋmɛii ena maŋtsɛ lɛ ni ji Yehowa Zebaot lɛ!”
Beni ekɛ “bɔfoi agboi” ni yɔɔ Korinto asafo lɛ mli lɛ yeɔ lɛ, ewo nyɛmimɛi lɛ hewalɛ akɛ: “Shi mi Paulo diɛŋtsɛ miikpa nyɛ fai yɛ Kristo mlijɔlɛ kɛ kpoofeemɔ lɛ hewɔ: mi, ni nyɛhiɛ lɛ miji humi yɛ nyɛteŋ, shi kɛ mibɛ nyɛŋɔɔ lɛ, mijeɔ ekãa miwoɔ nyɛ lɛ.”
Shi mi lɛ, miikɛɛ akɛ: “Miitã loo, miitã loo!
9 Miiwie anɔkwale yɛ Kristo mli; mimaleee, ejaakɛ mihenilee yeɔ mi odase yɛ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ mli, 2 akɛ miyeɔ awerɛho babaoo ni minuɔ dɔlɛ ni sɛɛ efooo he yɛ mitsui mli.
Nyɛnu akɛ mikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, miiya ni maba nyɛŋɔɔ.
Midaa shi waa diɛŋtsɛ yɛ hewalɛwoo ni minine shɛ nɔ ákɛ tsɛ ni edako koni mikɛ mumɔŋ otii aye klɛŋklɛŋ gbɛhe, ni mitee nɔ mitsu he nii lɛ hewɔ, ni miida miŋa Marion ni misumɔɔ lɛ lɛ shi, kɛ gbekɛbii yei lɛ yɛ sɛɛfĩmɔ ni amɛkɛha yɛ afii ni eho lɛ amli lɛ hewɔ.
Nɔ ni mikɛɔ nyɛ nɛɛ lɛ ji shiɛmɔ ni fe fɛɛ ni mikɛha pɛŋ, ni jeee akɛ miiwie kɛ minaabu kɛkɛ; miiwie kɛmiijɛ mitsui fɛɛ mli.”
10 Paulo wie maŋ sɔɔmɔ kroko hu he beni eŋma akɛ: “Kɛji afɔse milá ashwie nyɛ hemɔkɛyeli afɔle kɛ jamɔ [maŋ sɔɔmɔ, NW] lɛ nɔ tete lɛ, miyɛ he tsuijurɔ ni mikɛ nyɛ fɛɛ aaaná tsuijurɔ.”
+ 11 Mi lɛ, nu mikɛbaptisiɔ nyɛ yɛ nyɛtsuitsakemɔ lɛ hewɔ,+ shi mɔ ni baa yɛ misɛɛ lɛ he wa fe mi, etokotai po lɛ, misaaa mɔ ni jieɔ.
Karen: Agbɛnɛ hu, ha wɔsusu Yesu wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Yohane 14:28 lɛ he wɔkwɛ: “Nyɛnu akɛ mikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ: Miiya ni miiba nyɛŋɔɔ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ miye afii 50 amrɔ nɛɛ moŋ, shi kɛlɛ mihiɛ sɔɔ minanemɛi awiemɔ akɛ, miitsu nitsumɔ kpakpa akɛ onukpa lɛ jogbaŋŋ. . . .
Abaanyɛ atsɔɔ wiemɔ “eje mitsine” lɛ shishi hu akɛ “etĩ mi” loo “mitɔ.”
19 Agbɛnɛ, ofainɛ, otsulɔ hiɛ eba nyam yɛ ohiɛ, ni oojie mlihilɛ kpele* kpo ootsɔɔ mi kɛtsɔ miyi* ní obaa lɛ nɔ,+ shi minyɛŋ majo foi kɛya gɔji lɛ anɔ, ejaakɛ miishe gbeyei akɛ ekolɛ oshãra ko baayashãra mi, ni magbo.
19 Ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ, miitsɛ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ akɛ odasefoi miiwo nyɛ akɛ, mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ, eshwie ohiɛ;+ no hewɔ lɛ, kɔ wala koni ohi wala mli,+ bo kɛ oseshibii,+ 20 ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ,+ ní obo egbee toi, ní okpɛtɛ ehe,+ ejaakɛ lɛ ji owala, ni lɛ ebaahã owala sɛɛ atsɛ waa yɛ shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa kã kitã akɛ ekɛbaahã otsɛmɛi Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob lɛ nɔ.”
+ 10 Ni okɛ odɛŋ nikeenii ni ojɛ osuɔmɔ mli okɛba yɛ bɔ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ejɔɔ bo ehã lɛ naa+ lɛ aye Otsii Agbi Jurɔ lɛ ohã Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ.
+ 7 Nyɛ kɛ nyɛshĩabii lɛ aye nii lɛ yɛ jɛmɛ yɛ Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ,+ ni nyɛmii ashɛa nyɛhe yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni nyɛtsu lɛ amli,+ ejaakɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ejɔɔ bo.
+ Shi moŋ, Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, tsake loomɔ lɛ ni etsɔ lɛ jɔɔmɔ ehã bo,+ ejaakɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, sumɔɔ bo.
Beni bɔfo Paulo etsɔɔ nɔ ni efee koni Nyɔŋmɔ ajɔɔ lɛ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, eŋma akɛ: “Kɛ́ nɔ ko yɛ ní nyɛjwɛŋɔ lɛ ekroko lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ aaajie no hu kpo atsɔɔ nyɛ.
“Mɛi komɛi kɛɔ akɛ kɛ́ oyeɔ Nyɔŋmɔ anɔkwa lɛ, ebaaha oná nii babaoo, shi kɛ́ ooye ohia lɛ no tsɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ekpɛlɛɛɛ onɔ.
Enɛ hewɔ gbalɔ Mose nyɛ́ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Miitsɛ́ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe.”—5 Mose 30:19, 20.
Miitsɛ́ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ, mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ni osumɔ Yehowa o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe; ejaakɛ no aaaha oyi aná wala ni otsɛ yɛ jeŋ.” —5 Mose 30: 15-20.
Beni Mose woɔ Israelbii lɛ hewalɛ koni amɛkɛ heloonaa oniatsumɔ aha akɛ gbɛ ni amɛtsɔɔ nɔ amɛdaa Yehowa shi kɛha amɛ jɔɔmɔi lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ aha bɔ ni eeenyɛ, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ejɔɔo eha lɛ.”
Akɛni Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yɔɔ enɔ hewɔ lɛ, Elisabet bo kɛ gbee walɛ akɛ: “Ajɔɔo yɛ yei ateŋ, ni ajɔɔ omusuŋ bi lɛ!
3 Nyɔŋmɔ Ofe lɛ baajɔɔ bo, ni ebaahã ofɔ ní oshwere babaoo, ni bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, obaatsɔ majimaji asafo.
Mose, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ gbalɔ lɛ jie bɔ ni eji lɛ kpo etsɔɔ: “Miitsɛ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ní amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala.”—5 Mose 30:19.
18 Kɛ́ oŋmɛɛ ehe ni eshi bo etee lɛ, kaana no akɛ nɔ ko ni wa, ejaakɛ sɔɔmɔ ni esɔmɔ bo afii ekpaa lɛ tamɔ apaafonyo nitsumɔ ni akɛbɔ he toi enyɔ, ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, jɔɔ bo yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni atsu lɛ mli.
Wiemɔi ni Mose kɛ blema Israelbii lɛ wie lɛ hu tsuɔ nii nakai nɔŋŋ, akɛ: “Mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi ana wala, ni osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe.”

Oblayoo ni Jeŋba He Tse
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, yɛ Nigeria, he ni yoo ni eda bɔ ni sa lɛ fɔɔ bii ekpaa yɛ lɛ, eji nɔ ni afɔɔ feemɔ yɛ yookpeemɔi ashishi akɛ aaanu ni mɛi ni sumɔɔ amɛ sane lɛ miikɛɛ mɛi ni ebote gbalashihilɛ mli ehee lɛ akɛ: “Yɛ nyɔji nɛɛhu ni baa nɛɛ mli lɛ, wɔmiikpa gbɛ akɛ wɔaanu ni abifao miifo yɛ nyɛshia lɛ mli.”
Adafitswaa wolo ni atsɛɔ lɛ The European lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Nuklea ebɔɔ he nibii ni akwɛɔ daa, ni afã ni akwɛ mli beni beryllium ebɔɔ gbe yoo ko ni jɛ jɛmɛ niiaŋ, aaafee nyɔji enyɔ ni eho nɛ lɛ, jie lɛ kpo akɛ nuklea ebɔɔ yɛ hiɛtserɛjiemɔ he nɛɛ waa, ni efa fe bɔ ni yɔɔ hei krokomɛi ni bɛŋkɛ amɛ lɛ mli lɛ toi 100.”
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, yɛ niŋmaa he akaŋshii ko ni Time wolo tɛtrɛɛ lɛ fee nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ lɛ mli lɛ, oblayoo ko ni atsɔɔ akɛ eji Katoliknyo ni bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ lɛ ŋma akɛ: “Ekɔɔɔ he eko bɔ ni wɔbuɔ shishitoo mlai ni yɔɔ Katolik jamɔ mli wɔhaa lɛ, wɔyaa nɔ wɔkpɛtɛɔ nɔ ni haa wɔfeɔ ekome yɛ Katolik hemɔkɛyeli lɛ mli lɛ he, ni no ji: wɔhe ni wɔtuɔ kɛhaa Nuŋtsɔ lɛ Niyenii lɛ yeli lɛ.”
19 Yehowa bɔ yoo lɛ akɛ nuu lɛ yelikɛbualɔ.
Yehowa fã klɛŋklɛŋ nuu kɛ yoo lɛ koni amɛkɛ amɛbɔlɛnamɔ mli hewalɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛha amɛ lɛ atsu nii yɛ bulɛ mli yɛ gbalashihilɛ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ mli ni ‘amɛyi shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ obɔ.’
2 Nyɔŋmɔ jie nɔ ni ekɛfee Adam ŋmawu lɛ eko ni ekɛshɔ̃ hefatalɔ kɛ yelikɛbualɔ—yoo, eha nuu lɛ.

Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, abaanyɛ ana he ni hemɔkɛyeli ni ayɔɔ yɛ susuma ni gbooo mli lɛ jɛ akɛ nɔ ni jɛ blema Ashur kɛ Babilon adesãi amli kɛtsɔ Mizraim, Hela, kɛ Roma blema saji anɔ kɛba Kristendom, he ni ebatsɔ eshishitoo hemɔkɛyeli yɛ e-Nyɔŋmɔ jamɔ he nikasemɔ mli lɛ.
Shi amɛ lɛ, amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛlá antɛo amɛwoɔ, amɛmiiwo amɛsusumai hu ká.

No hewɔ lɛ susuma muu fɛɛ mli ni ajɛɔ asɔmɔɔ lɛ tsɔɔ wɔhe ni wɔkɛhaa, wɔjwɛŋmɔŋ nyɛmɔi fɛɛ ni wɔkɛtsuɔ nii, kɛ wɔ hewalɛi ni wɔkɛtsuɔ nii kɛyashɛɔ he ni wɔɔnyɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ mli.
Yesu Kristo tsɔɔ akɛ, kɛ́ aawie kitãi lɛ ahe lɛ, amɛmli ewulu ni ji enyɔ ji wɔnanemɛi adesai ni wɔɔsumɔ amɛ, ni ákɛ klɛŋklɛŋ nɔ̃ lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ ni wɔɔsɔmɔ lɛ kɛ wɔsusuma fɛɛ.
Shi kɛlɛ ewo amɛ hewalɛ akɛ: “Nyɛkashea mɛi ni gbeɔ gbɔmɔtso lɛ ni amɛnyɛɛɛ susuma lɛ amɛgbe lɛ agbeyei; shi moŋ nyɛshea mɔ ni nyɛɔ susuma kɛ gbɔmɔtso fɛɛ hiɛ ekpataa yɛ gehena mli lɛ gbeyei.”—Mateo 10:1, 16-22, 28.

Nuu ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Ian ni bote gbãla mli afii nyɔŋma ni eho nɛ lɛ wie akɛ: “Kɛ́ mitsĩ mitsutsu hefatalɔ ni gbo lɛ tã lɛ, miŋa Kaitlyn enaaa lɛ akɛ eji nihiinii.
Kɛ́ wumɛi kɛ ŋamɛi fee ekome kɛsɔmɔ Yehowa lɛ, wekukpaa ni yɔɔ amɛteŋ lɛ, kɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ amɛ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ lɛ mli baawa, ni amɛgbãla lɛ baasɔ (Kwɛmɔ kuku 5, 6)
Kpojiemɔ 21:4: ‘Nyɔŋmɔ baatsumɔ amɛhiŋmɛiiaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni mɔ ko yeŋ awerɛho dɔŋŋ, ni mɔ ko woŋ yara ko hu dɔŋŋ, ni mɔ ko hu piŋŋ dɔŋŋ.
No lɛ nyɛhaa wɔyaa nɔ wɔfea esha, ejaakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ [duromɔ ni wɔsaaa] lɛ baanyɛ atsumɔ esha fɛɛ esha.
(Mateo 25:40, 45) Nakai “jeŋmaji” lɛ baabɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛkpata nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni ŋwɛi Yerusalem Hee lɛ etsu ni ekɛfee shikpɔŋ lɛ paradeiso lɛ hiɛ.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni Saul baabo Yehowa fãmɔ akɛ ekpata Amalekbii ni yitseiaŋ wala lɛ kɛ amɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ hiɛ lɛ toi lɛ, emɔ amɛmaŋtsɛ lɛ, ni ebaa amɛkooloi ni hi fe fɛɛ lɛ ayi.
Kooloi awuiyelɔi buleee Yudafoi lɛ akooloi ni amɛlɛɔ lɛ ashishi.
Ni nɔ ni fata enɛ he ji akɛ, abaajie dɔlɛ ni gbele kɛbaa lɛ fɛɛ kɛya, ejaakɛ nakai gbalɛ lɛ tsa nɔ akɛ: “Nuŋtsɔ Yehowa aaatsumɔ hiɛaŋ fɛɛ yaafonui.”
“Ebaami gbele kɛbaaya naanɔ, ni Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa baatsumɔ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ hiɛ yaafonui.”
Shi wɔle akɛ wɔ dɔlɛ lɛ baahi shi be kukuoo kɛkɛ, ejaakɛ Yehowa ewo shi akɛ ebaatsumɔ wɔ awerɛho yaafonui lɛ.”—Kpojiemɔ 21:3, 4.
Kɛkɛ ni Yehowa kɛ famɔ ha Mose koni eŋma ekpɔ lɛ ewo wolo ko mli, ní ‘ekpã ewo Yoshua toiiaŋ,’ nɔ ni kɛɔ akɛ: “Shi mibagbe Amalek kaimɔ kwraa kɛjɛ ŋwɛi shishi.”
Kɛ ekɛ wɔhe eshai lɛ fa wɔ lɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni ekɛ kotsa etsumɔ kɛjɛ jɛmɛ kwraa.
Shi amɛyɛ hemɔkɛyeli akɛ, yɛ jeŋ hee lɛ mli lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ “aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋkɔmɔyeli ko kɛ bolɔmɔ ko kɛ nɔnaa ko hu bɛ dɔŋŋ.”—Kpojiemɔ 21:4.
5 No hewɔ lɛ anaa kɛjɛɔ nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɔ yɛ biɛ lɛ mli akɛ gbii kpakpai yɛ ni baaba, akɛ akpataŋ Yuda maŋ lɛ hiɛ kwraa kɛmɔŋ shi.
Yɛ sane ni eŋma lɛ mli lɛ etsɛ Kpojiemɔ 21:4 lɛ yisɛɛ, jɛmɛ kɛɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ “aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋkɔmɔyeli ko kɛ bolɔmɔ ko kɛ nɔnaa ko hu bɛ dɔŋŋ; ejaakɛ tsutsu nii lɛ eho etee.”

20 “‘Kɛ́ gbalɔ ko ye etsuinaa sane ni ewie wiemɔ ko yɛ migbɛ́i mli ní mifãko lɛ akɛ ewie, aloo ewie yɛ nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi agbɛ́ii amli lɛ, agbe nakai gbalɔ lɛ.
Kunimyelɔ lɛ, aaawo lɛ atadei yɛji, ni migbeŋ egbɛi yɛ wala wolo lɛ mli gbi ko gbi ko, ni matsi egbɛi ata yɛ mi-Tsɛ hiɛ kɛ ebɔfoi lɛ ahiɛ.”
Atsɛ́ maŋ hee lɛ, ni ji “Nyɔŋmɔ Israel,” ni Yudafoi kɛ mɛi ni jeee Yudafoi fata he lɛ akɛ ‘maŋ ko ni Nyɔŋmɔ ehala eha egbɛ́i lɛ,’ ni Yehowa tsɛ amɛ akɛ mɛi ni akɛ egbɛ́i lɛ ewo amɛ.—Gal. 6:16; nyɛkanea Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 15:14-17; Mat.

No sɛɛ lɛ, okɛ onine atsɔɔ he ni aŋma “migbɛi” ni akɛ niŋmaa ni mli ti eŋma lɛ, ni otsɛ ogbɛi.
18 Biɛ ji he ni gbalɔ Yesaia wie wiemɔi ní wɔtsɛ yisɛɛ kɛjɛ shishijee lɛ yɛ, akɛ: “Bɔ ni mɔ ni kwɔ ní awó enɔ, ní eyɔɔ daa, ní gbɛi ji Mɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ kɛɛ nɛ: Ŋwɛi shɔŋŋ kɛ he krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ mihiɔ; asaŋ mikɛ mɔ ni tswiaa shi kɛ dɔlɛ ní ebaa ehe shi yɛ emumɔ mli lɛ hiɔ shi, koni maha heshibalɔi amumɔ aná wala hee, ní mɛi ni tswiaa shi kɛ dɔlɛ lɛ atsui aná wala hee!”
Nɔ ni fiɔ enɛ sɛɛ ji Hebri gbɛii ni akɛtsu nii yɛ ninai krokomɛi amli lɛ; akɛ Hebri gbɛi “Abaddon” (ni eshishi ji “Hiɛkpatamɔ”) ha Yesu, ni etsuɔ kojomɔ he nii yɛ he ni “atsɛɔ jɛi yɛ Hebri wiemɔ mli akɛ Har-Magedon lɛ.”—Kpojiemɔ 9:11; 16:16.

(Daniel 9:25; Yohane 12:41) Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, ejeee nɔ ko ní ba trukaa, ákɛ Yesu kɛ Yesaia gbɛi fɛɛ jieɔ susumɔ kome kpo, ejaakɛ Yesu gbɛi lɛ shishi ji “Yehowa Ji Yiwalaheremɔ.”
Ni kɛji akɛ Yesu baa shi fe Yehowa lɛ, te efeɔ tɛŋŋ ni Yesu gbɛi lɛ ta gbɛi-fɛɛ-gbɛi nɔ lɛ?
(1 Korintobii 10:1-4) Yehowa gbɛi lɛ “yɛ emli” kɛ shishinumɔ akɛ, Yesu ji mɔ titri ni fiɔ e-Tsɛ lɛ gbɛi lɛ sɛɛ ni etseɔ he.
Agbɛnɛ hu, mɛɛ sɛɛnamɔ yɔɔ Yesu sɔlemɔ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ fã ni kɛɔ akɛ, “wɔ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi, ha ogbɛi lɛ he atse” lɛ he, kɛji ákɛ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi lɛ po tsuuu nii lɛ?—Mateo 6:9; Yohane 5:43; 17:6.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ nɔ hewɔ ni esa akɛ ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi atsu nii lɛ shishinumɔ wa kɛha lɛ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔbi akɛ, ‘Ani ogbɛi he hiaa kɛha bo? . . .
Mɛni ji Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi?— Hɛɛ, no ji Yehowa, ni esa akɛ wɔsumɔ nakai gbɛi lɛ.
(1 Timoteo 6:15) Awo enɔ “gojoo,” ni aha lɛ “gbɛi ni ta gbɛi fɛɛ gbɛi nɔ” bɔni afee ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ akpɛlɛ nɔ “akɛ Yesu Kristo ji Nuŋtsɔ kɛwo Tsɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ nyam.”
Ahã ekpe jwɛi tamɔ tsinahii kpeɔ jwɛi lɛ, ni ŋwɛi bɔ́ fɔ egbɔmɔtso kɛyashi ená ele akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Ni Nɔ Kwɔ Fe Fɛɛ lɛ ji Nɔyelɔ yɛ adesai amaŋtsɛyeli mli, ni ekɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni esumɔɔ lɛ taa nɔ.
Yinɔsane ko kɛɔ akɛ: “Yuda kɛ Israel yi fa babaoo, tamɔ ŋshɔ naa shia kɛ fálɛ, amɛyeyeeɔ nii, amɛnunuuɔ dãai, ni amɛmli filiɔ amɛ.
Amɛyeɔ nii, amɛdaraa, ni amɛshwɛɔ tamɔ gbekɛbii.
Ataa kɛɔ daa nɛɛ akɛ esa akɛ weku lɛ aye nii kutuu, titri lɛ leebi niyeli, ni wɔkɛsusu daa gbi Ŋmalɛ lɛ he.

Shi kɛ́ okome too oyeɔ nii hu?
Nibii ní kɛ́ wɔfee lɛ etsɔɔ akɛ wɔfeɔ falefale ji, wɔdɛŋ ni wɔfɔɔ kɛ samala kɛ nu dani wɔyeɔ nii loo wɔmɔɔ niyenii mli, beni wɔtee nii asɛɛ wɔba, kɛ beni wɔju abifao he wɔtã loo beni etee nii amli ni wɔtsake ehe sɛɛ lɛ.

Beni Casimir kɛ bulɛ kpoo akɛ eyeee loo lɛ, awo ehe gbeyei, ni akɛɛ lɛ akɛ eshi shia lɛ.

YESU KƐ EBƆFOI LƐ YE ENAAGBEE HEHOO
Eŋmɛɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ yɛ niyeli kɛ ninumɔ mli, shi akɛɛ fufeelɔ kɛ weinnulɔ ji lɛ.
14:21—Mɛni hewɔ Israelbii lɛ baanyɛ amɛkɛ kooloo ni egbo ni afɔseko elá ashwieko shi ni amɛyeee lɛ ake gbɔ ni kɛ amɛ yɔɔ lɛ loo amɛhɔ̃ɔ amɛha maŋsɛɛ nyo lɛ?
33 No hewɔ lɛ, kaselɔi lɛ kɛɛkɛɛ amɛhe akɛ: “Ani aleenɔ, mɔ ko ebahã lɛ nɔ ko eye?”
Eyɛ mli akɛ ekolɛ nɔ ko fioo pɛ nitsulɔi nɛɛ yɔɔ yɛ heloo gbɛfaŋ moŋ, shi bei pii lɛ amɛyɛ hiamɔ nii ni sa kɛ tsui ni nyɔɔ mɔ mli akɛ amɛmiiye niyenii ni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛgbo he deŋme.—2 Tesalonikabii 3:11, 12.
Ekolɛ, manyɛ mikɛ sane nɛɛ ato he aha bo: Ŋɔɔ lɛ akɛ oyɛ shĩa ko ni okɛhai.
Ekolɛ amrɔ nɛɛ obɛ shika taakɛ tsuutsu ko lɛ oyɔɔ lɛ.
Ekolɛ enu fɔyeli he, ni “eeshwe” ni ena amɛ ni ema anɔkwa ni eyeɔ lɛ nɔ mi eha amɛ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔye wɔbua mɛi kɛ amɛshĩa nitsumɔ loo wɔya maŋ lɛ mli wɔyatsu nibii ahe nii wɔhã amɛ. —Mat.
Ekolɛ eje shishi kɛ shwɛmɔ loo hiɛtserɛjiemɔ ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛnyaa he.
Ekolɛ onuɔ he akɛ ona nakai jamɔ, loo asafo lɛ momo.

10 Ni yɛ osɔfoi lɛ ateŋ lɛ, Yedaia, kɛ Yehoiarib, kɛ Yakin,+ 11 kɛ Azaria, mɔ ni papa ji Hilkia, ni lɛ hu epapa ji Meshulam, ni lɛ hu epapa ji Zadok, ni lɛ hu epapa ji Meraiot, ni lɛ hu epapa ji Ahitub, mɔ ni ji anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shĩa* lɛ hiɛnyiɛlɔ lɛ, 12 kɛ Adaia, mɔ ni papa ji Yeroham, ni lɛ hu epapa ji Pashur, ni lɛ hu epapa ji Malkia lɛ, kɛ Maasai, mɔ ni papa ji Adiel, ni lɛ hu epapa ji Yahzera, ni lɛ hu epapa ji Meshulam ni lɛ hu epapa ji Meshilemit, ni lɛ hu epapa ji Imer lɛ, 13 kɛ amɛnyɛmimɛi hii lɛ, ni ji tsɛmɛi ashĩai onukpai lɛ, hii kãkãlɔi 1,760, ni sa kɛhã sɔɔmɔ yɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shĩa lɛ.
Ebaafee nɔ ni nilee yɔɔ mli akɛ okɛ gbɛtsɔɔlɔ ni tamɔ nakai aaanyiɛ fe nɔ ni okome too ooofã gbɛ yɛ nakai gbɛ lɛ nɔ.
Miikpa gbɛ akɛ mikɛ shitee-kɛ-woo baakpe, no hewɔ lɛ misɔle mibi Nyɔŋmɔ ni eha mi nilee kɛ ekaa ni mikɛkpee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baaba lɛ naa.
19 Wɔyɛ miishɛɛ waa akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ e-Wiemɔ ni ji Biblia lɛ eha wɔ, ni akɛ wɔkɛ emli shɛɛ sane ni yɔɔ hewalɛ lɛ miitsu nii kɛmiifamɔ apasa tsɔɔmɔi kɛ amɛshishi koni wɔnine ashɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ tsui kpakpa lɛ anɔ!
No hewɔ lɛ, wɔná miishɛɛ waa akɛ wɔná wɔle akɛ nyɛsɛɛ afi lɛ kpokpaa wulu nɔ kpee lɛ saneyitso lɛ baafee “Nyɔŋmɔ Gbalɛ Wiemɔ” lɛ.
5 Kɛ́ Asafoŋ Sɔɔmɔ Ajinafoi Akuu lɛ mlinyo ko kɛɛ okɛ mɔ ko ni ekpa shiɛmɔyaa afee Biblia mli nikasemɔ lɛ, ekolɛ ebaaha okɛ lɛ asusu saneyitsei pɔtɛɛ komɛi ni yɔɔ ‘Nyɔŋmɔ Suɔmɔ’ wolo lɛ mli lɛ ahe.
15 Kɛji akɛ wɔjɔɔ wɔhe nɔ wɔha Nyɔŋmɔ kɛtsɔ Kristo nɔ lɛ, wɔtsɔɔ wɔfai shi ni wɔtswa akɛ wɔkɛ wɔwala baatsu nii yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nifeemɔ mli taakɛ atsɔɔ yɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ.
Nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ efee lɛ tsɔɔ suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ.
Piŋmɔ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Ko ni Yɔɔ Diɛŋtsɛ
Gbi ko baaba ni mɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ baatsɔmɔ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ nyɛmimɛi yei, ni amɛfee ekome yɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ mɛi fɛɛ a-Tsɛ lɛ jamɔ mli.
Etsɛ́ɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ní ta eŋwɛi maŋtsɛsɛi lɛ nɔ lɛ wiemɔi asɛɛ akɛ eejaje akɛ: “Naa, miifee nii fɛɛ ehee.”
No hewɔ lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ mɛi ni teɔ shi amɛwoɔ lɛ lɛ akɛ: “Lɛɛlɛŋ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, toohelɔi lɛ kɛ ashawoi lɛ miitsɔ nyɛhiɛ kɛmiiya Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli.”
Bɔfo Paulo tsɔɔ akɛ ehe miihia ni wɔsɔle beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛkahaoa yɛ nɔ ko nɔ ko he, shi moŋ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ mli lɛ nyɛkɛ sɔlemɔ kɛ faikpamɔ kɛ shidaa atsĩa nyɛtutɔmɔi lɛ atã yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ; ni Nyɔŋmɔ hejɔlɛ ni fe jwɛŋmɔi fɛɛ lɛ aaato nyɛtsuii kɛ nyɛjwɛŋmɔi lɛ yɛ Kristo Yesu mli!”
Belɛ, te eeefee tɛŋŋ efɔ́ Nyɔŋmɔ Bi ni yeɔ emuu?
Wɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ni ja ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ eŋmɛŋ enɛ gbɛ nɛkɛ kɛyaŋ naanɔ.
28 Taakɛ wɔyɔse lɛ, yɛ Jeŋ Ta II naagbee nyɔji lɛ amli lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi ku sɛɛ amɛma amɛfaishitswaa akɛ amɛbaawó Nyɔŋmɔ nɔyeli lɛ nɔ gojoo kɛtsɔ sɔɔmɔ ni amɛkɛaaha lɛ akɛ teokrase gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ nɔ mi.
Kɛ́ wɔfee nakai lɛ, no lɛ wɔ hu wɔbaanyɛ wɔjaje taakɛ lalatsɛ ni ŋma akɛ: “Shi lɛɛlɛŋ, Nyɔŋmɔ ebo mi toi, efee toi eha misɔlemɔ gbee lɛ” jaje lɛ.—Lala 10:17; 66:19.
18 Yɛ wɔbei nɛɛ amli lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi hu shiɛɔ yɛ je lɛŋ fɛɛ kɛtaoɔ mɛi ni miisumɔ ni amɛle Nyɔŋmɔ ní amɛsɔmɔ lɛ lɛ.
Nilee bɛ su ni tamɔ nɛkɛ mli ejaakɛ “Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ekuɔ hewolɔi anaa, shi heshibalɔi eduroɔ.”
Ekɛɛ akɛ kɛjɛ egbekɛbiiashi lɛ, “yiŋkɔshikɔshifeemɔ kɛ nibii ni baa ni eleee [ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he lɛ] baa yɛ be kɛ bei amli, ni enáaa hemɔkɛyeli yɛ nibii pii amli.”
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 17:11) Amɛkpa Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli jogbaŋŋ koni amɛnu Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ, ni enɛ ye bua amɛ ni amɛtee nɔ amɛfee toiboo kɛjie suɔmɔ kpo.
Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ ajalɛ lɛ kpɛ́ɔ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
3 Nakai nyɔɔŋ lɛ mli nɔŋŋ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ Natan* akɛ: 4 “Yaa ni oyakɛɛ mitsulɔ David akɛ, ‘Nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: “Jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa ohã mi ni mahi mli.
Wɔ hu wɔyɛ saji ni agba lɛ he miishɛɛ ejaakɛ emaa jɔɔmɔi ni jɛɔ toiboo ni afeɔ ahaa anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ nɔ ni jɛɔ enɔ toigbele mli kɛbaa lɛ nɔ mi.
BƆFO Paulo ji Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ jajelɔ ni yɔɔ ekaa.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, nɛkɛ ji bɔ ni ebalɛ yɛ lalatsɛ lɛ gbɛfaŋ, mɔ ni kɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ akɛ: “Misumɔɔ omla lɛ akɛ nɔ ko!
Be mli ni wɔfeɔ enɛ lɛ, wɔtaooo hiɛnyam wɔhaaa wɔhe, shi moŋ wɔsumɔɔ akɛ “atsɔ Yesu Kristo nɔ awo Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ nyam yɛ nii fɛɛ mli.”
Kɛha Jesuit sɔrɔtoi lɛ, aŋmaaa woji “krɔŋkrɔŋi,” tamɔ Zoroastrian Avesta loo Confucian Four Books lɛ “ni Mumɔ Krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ kanyamɔ pɔtɛɛ ko fataaa he, ni yɛ no hewɔ lɛ, ‘ŋwɛi kpojiemɔ’ fioo ko yɛ mli.”
(Yohane 1:35-51) Shi sɛɛ mli lɛ, mɛi ejwɛ nɛɛ kɛ amɛhe yawo amɛwuoyaa nitsumɔ lɛ mli ekoŋŋ.
Beni ená ele akɛ miku misɛɛ lɛ, ejie yi akɛ ahala mi akɛ kpokpaa nɔkwɛlɔ yɛ ŋshɔkpɔ lɛ fɛɛ nɔ, ni eji hegbɛ ni mitsu he nii afii ejwɛ.
6 Sanekpakpa shiɛlɔ Filipo yɛ biyei oblayei ejwɛ ni kɛ hiɛdɔɔ shiɛ tamɔ amɛtsɛ. (Bɔf.
Yesu kɛ ekaselɔi ejwɛ lɛ náaa deka kwraa yɛ Kapernaum gbi muu lɛ fɛɛ.
Ehe bahia ni mɛi ejwɛ kɛ lɛ aŋmɛ saatso bibioo ko nɔ koni amɛtere lɛ.
• Mɛɛ gbɛ̀i ejwɛ baanyɛ aye abua gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi koni amɛtsu naagbai ahe nii?
Kɛ́ Maria jɛ he ni eyɔɔ yɛ Nazaret yɛ Yerusalem kooyi lɛ kɛmiiya he ni Elizabet yɔɔ lɛ, ebaahe gbii etɛ loo gbii ejwɛ.
BƆFOI EJWƐ BI NI AHÃ AMƐ OKADI
Nakai gbi lɛ, ehé amɛ ŋmɛlɛtswai ejwɛ dani amɛnyɛ amɛgbe Nilee Ni Kɛ Mɔ Yaa Naanɔ Wala Mli* wolo lɛ yitso 1 lɛ mli nikasemɔ naa.
Mikaiɔ nɔ ni kojolɔ lɛ kɛɛ mi yɛ saneyeli gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ lolo, akɛ: “Yurii, yiŋ ni akpɛ afii ejwɛ ni ho lɛ akɛ awo bo tsuŋ lɛ damɔɔɔ mla nɔ.
Shi kɛlɛ, ekɛ ebii bibii ejwɛ lɛ nyiɛɔ kilomitai 16 be fɛɛ be, ni no sɛɛ lɛ amɛtáa bɔs mli kɛyaa kilomitai 30 kɛfataa he dani amɛshɛɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa ní bɛŋkɛ amɛ fe fɛɛ lɛ nɔ.
Ehiɛ fãi titrii ejwɛ: sɔlemɔtsu lɛ, osɔfoyeli lɛ, lumɛi lɛ, kɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ.
12 Susumɔ ŋmalɛ ni yɔɔ Kpojiemɔ 7:1, 3 ni kɛɔ akɛ atsĩ hiɛkpatamɔ “kɔɔyɔi ejwɛ” lɛ anaa “kɛyashi beyinɔ ni wɔkɛ naasɔomɔ nɔ̃ aaakadi wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ tsuji lɛ ahiɛŋtsei anɔ dã” lɛ he.
Kojolɔi 11:40 kɛɔ akɛ: “Daa afi lɛ, Israel obalayei lɛ yaa amɛyakafoɔ Yefta, Gileadnyo lɛ biyoo lɛ, gbii ejwɛ yɛ afi mli.”
Ebaaha mi gbii ejwɛ loo enumɔ ni mikɛyasusu he jogbaŋŋ.
Amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ yɛ hiɛi ejwɛ—tsina, jata, okropɔŋ, kɛ gbɔmɔ hiɛ.
Shiɛlɔi etɛ loo ejwɛ agba yiŋtoo ni yɔɔ sɛɛsaramɔi ni afeɔ lɛ sɛɛ kɛ bɔ ni ehe hiaa ha lɛ he sane.
Sung-sik, ni ji tsɛ ko ni yɔɔ bii ejwɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Mikɛ miŋa kpɛ wɔyiŋ akɛ wɔhaŋ wiemɔ sha ko ajɛ wɔnaa.
Mɛɛ saji ejwɛ wɔbaabi be ni wɔsusuɔ Yesu nɔkwɛmɔnii lɛ ateŋ kpawo he lɛ?
Ani afii ohai 14 lɛ mli Yudanyo tsofafeelɔ Shem-Tob ben Isaac Ibn Shaprut ji mɔ ni kwɛ Tetragrammaton (Hebri niŋmaa okadii ejwɛ ni feɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi) lɛ ni anaa yɛ Mateo ŋmalɛ lɛ ni aŋma yɛ Hebri wiemɔ mli lɛ nɔ eŋma?
Yɛ Kristendom sɔlemɔi lɛ amli po lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ jamɔ he nikaselɔi kɛ osɔfoi yɛ ni kɛɔ akɛ wɔleee Yesu jogbaŋŋ ni amɛhaa eshihilɛ mli anɔkwa saji ejwɛ (Sanekpakpai lɛ) ni yɔɔ bianɛ lɛ ni anaa yɛ Biblia mli lɛ feɔ mɛi ayiŋ kɔshikɔshi.
89 3 16 Okpɔŋɔnɔtaralɔi Ejwɛ ni Miiho!
Wɔkɛ bɔs bibii enyɔ tee, ni wɔyi 22 wɔtee, ni shwɛ sharao ni wɔsafo muu lɛ fɛɛ aya.
Maria ni atsĩ etã kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ na akɛ sɛɛnamɔ yɛ he waa akɛ ekɛ ehe aaawo shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli kɛ ekãa, ni amrɔ nɛɛ eeeye kɛmiibua mɛi ejwɛ koni amɛkase Biblia lɛ.
Ye Obua Mɛi ni ‘Amɛte Shi Kɛjɛ Wɔ Mli’
Dani Henok aaawɔ yɛ gbele mli lɛ, ekolɛ ena ninaa ko, ekolɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ Paradeiso ni etsɛŋ ní ehiɛ baatsɛ kɛba mli gbi ko lɛ.
Etsɔɔ akɛ, nuu ko du dumɔwu kpakpa, shi “be ni mɛi ewɔ lɛ,” henyɛlɔ ko ba ni ebadu jwɛii kɛfutu ŋmaa lɛ.
Kɛ wɔɔfee enɛ he nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ: Akɛni Kristofonyo yoo ko wu yeee lɛ anɔkwa hewɔ lɛ, ehaomɔ lɛ bafa waa kɛyashɛ he ni enyɛɛɛ ewɔ.
Mɛi ni pɛiɔ lamɔi ahe saji amli lɛ ena akɛ wɔɔ ji nifeemɔ gbɛ ni yaa nɔ fiofio, ni awɔɔ vii yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ ŋmɛlɛtswai fioo lɛ amli, shi sɛɛ mli lɛ, ebaaa lɛ vii nakai dɔŋŋ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Yesu naanyo Lazaro ni esumɔ esane lɛ egbo moŋ, shi ekɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Wɔshieŋtsɛ Lazaro ewɔ̀; shi miiya ni mayatsĩɛ lɛ yɛ wɔ̀ lɛ mli.”
Kɛji abaawɔ yɛ gbɛfaa lɛ mli lɛ, jeee niyenii pɛ gbɛgbalɔi lɛ hoɔ amɛyeɔ yɛ lɛlɛ lɛ mli kɛkɛ, shi amɛwɔɔ mli hu.
23 Kɛ́ wɔbaanyɛ wɔye wɔbua mɛi ni amɛhiɛ atsɛ̃ yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ, ebiɔ ŋaa kɛ hiɛmiamɔ.
4 Kaahã ohiŋmɛii miiná wɔ eewɔ,
Feemɔ Elia he mfoniri okwɛ; atsĩɛ lɛ kɛjɛ wɔ mli yɛ eshitoohe ni yɔɔ Yezreel yɛ nakai gbɛkɛ ni ahum miitswa, ni nugbɔ hu miinɛ waa lɛ—koni ebo hegbeyeiwoo wiemɔi ni maŋnyɛ lɛ tsulɔ lɛ hiɛ kɛba lɛ toi.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kadimɔ akɛ Maria diɛŋtsɛ kwɛ ebi abifao lɛ, eŋɔ mama ebala ehe jogbaŋŋ, no sɛɛ lɛ eŋɔ lɛ eŋmɛ kooloi aniyenii anɔ lɛ mli blɛoo koni ewɔ, ni efee enɛɛmɛi fɛɛ kɛkwɛ koni fɛ̃i akaye lɛ ni efee shweshweeshwe.
Minyɛɛɛ mawɔ nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ yɛ hegbɛ ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ ni miná mli ŋɔɔmɔ lɛ he susumɔ hewɔ.
2 Yɛ Nebukadnezar nɔyeli afi ni ji enyɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ela lamɔi, ni ehao*+ aahu akɛ enyɛɛɛ ewɔ.
21 No hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ hã gbɔmɔ lɛ wɔ vii, ni be ni ewɔ lɛ, ejie eŋmawutsei lɛ ekome, ni no sɛɛ lɛ, etsĩ he ni ejie ŋmawutso lɛ kɛjɛ lɛ.
Ebaaya nɔ ekai nikasemɔ ni dɔɔ mɔ waa ni ekase kɛjɛ enɛ mli lɛ: Adesa ni ewɔ nyɛŋ abu enibii ahe.
Minyɛɛɛ mawɔ gbii etɛ sɔŋŋ.
Beni Yesu kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Gbekɛ lɛ gboko, shi wɔ ewɔɔ” lɛ, amɛŋmɔ lɛ.
Gbekɛ ko ni yeko afii nyɔŋmai enyɔ, ni efɔlɔi jeee Odasefoi lɛ, kɛfee esu akɛ ekɛ minitii enumɔ kɛmiishɛ nyɔŋma baakane nii daa gbɛkɛ dani eyawɔ.
Shi amrɔ nɛɛ, amɛyɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kaimɔ mli tamɔ nɔ ni amɛmiiwɔ kɛyashi gbi nɔ ni ‘mɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ gbohii akaimɔ bui lɛ amli lɛ baaje kpo.’
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ Lazaro ni egbo lɛ miiwɔ, eleee nɔ ko nɔ ko.
Nakai be lɛ bafee bei ni miwɔɔɔ jogbaŋŋ fe fɛɛ yɛ mishihilɛ mli lɛ ateŋ ekome!”
3 Ŋmɛnɛ, yɛ be mli ni Yehowa Odasefoi kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɔkɔbɔɔ lɛ haa lɛ, esa akɛ amɛfee klalo be fɛɛ be ni amɛkɛ naagbee wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Yesu gbalɛ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ mli lɛ atsu nii: “No hewɔ lɛ nyɛsaraa; ejaakɛ nyɛleee beyinɔ ni shiatsɛ lɛ baa: ekolɛ gbɛkɛ, loo nyɔɔŋ teŋ, loo wuɔgbɛɛmɔ, loo leebi; koni ekaba trukaa ebanina nyɛ akɛ nyɛmiiwɔ.
2 “Nebukadnezar maŋtsɛyeli afi ni ji enyɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ,” gbalɔ Daniel ŋma akɛ, “Nebukadnezar la lamɔi komɛi, ni etsui bɔ̃i yeli yɛ emli, ni ewɔ tserɛ yɛ ehiɛ.”
Kɛ̃lɛ, Yesu kɛ hewalɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛhã lɛ lɛ baatsu nii koni ekɛhã ana akɛ, abaanyɛ atee mɛi ni egboi lɛ ashi kɛba wala mli tamɔ bɔ pɛ ni abaanyɛ atsĩɛ mɛi ni ewɔ vii kɛjɛ wɔ mli lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa ha Adam wɔ vii, kɛkɛ ni ejie eŋmawu wu kome.
Eeena ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efi lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ehere mɛi ni efi amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.
Eyɛ mli akɛ afii ni miye lɛ shɛɛɛ mɔ ni esa akɛ eyaa dãahɔɔmɔhe moŋ, shi nihɔɔlɔ lɛ na mi mɔbɔ ni ehɔɔ biɛr lɛ eha mi.
Agba akɛ Mesia lɛ aaana “ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efĩ lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ.”
“Miinu he waa miiha nyɛmimɛi lɛ [ní ahum lɛ nina amɛ lɛ].
No hewɔ lɛ, wu ni baa ehe shi lɛ kpɛlɛɔ etɔmɔi anɔ, eyɛ mli akɛ ekolɛ wiemɔi tamɔ, “Edɔ mi waa; bɔ ni okɛɛ lɛ ja,” kɛɛmɔ baawa kɛha lɛ.
+ 13 Kaana* lɛ mɔbɔ, jiemɔ mɔ ni efeko nɔ ko lɛ lá lɛ he sɔ̃ lɛ kɛje Israel,+ koni ahi ahã bo.
Ni kɛ aakpata amɛhiɛ lɛ minaŋ amɛ mɔbɔ.’
Kɛfata he lɛ “eeena ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni ef ĩ lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ehere mɛi ni efĩ amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.”
Yɛ miishɛɛ mli lɛ, Yehowa “baafite mɛi ni fiteɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ”; ekɛ fɔbuu kojomɔ baaba adesai henɔwolɔi ni leee Nyɔŋmɔ ni shihilɛi ni yɔɔ mɔbɔ ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ jɛ amɛ lɛ anɔ.
11 Ni mi lɛ, ani esaaa akɛ Ninive maŋ kpeteŋkpele lɛ+ kɛ emli gbɔmɛi ni fa fe 120,000 ni leee nɔ ni ja kɛ nɔ ni ejaaa* lɛ, kɛ amɛkooloi babaoo lɛ asane dɔɔ mi?”
Ani onuɔ he ohaa mɛi ni naa nɔ̃ lɛ?
Akɛni David tsake etsui hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa ha ehi wala mli.
Esa akɛ wɔshwa wɔhe waa yɛ esha ni wɔfee lɛ he, ni wɔba wɔhe shi ni wɔbi Yehowa ni ekɛ wɔhe esha lɛ ake wɔ.
Edɔɔ mi be fɛɛ be akɛ gbekɛbii krokomɛi yɛ ni amɛnáaa hegbɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ!
Migbekɛbiiashi lɛ, mihiɛ edɔɔɔ yɛ anɔkwale lɛ mli; mibu lɛ nɔ ko fɛlɛfɛlɛ, ni enɛ dɔɔ mi waa.
Wɔhiɛ wɔnanemɛi heyelilɔi lɛ suɔmɔ he nyɔmɔ, ni kɛ wɔkɛɛ edɔ wɔ waa akɛ wɔtɔ̃ lɛ, belɛ wɔwo nakai nyɔmɔ lɛ eko.—Romabii 13:8.
Taakɛ lalafolɔ lɛ kaiɔ lɛ, yoo lɛ kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Edɔ mi waa akɛ mispɛl nakai wiemɔ lɛ.
David le enɔtɔmɔi lɛ jogbaŋŋ, ni edɔ lɛ waa akɛ eha ekɔnɔ fɔŋ lɛ ye enɔ.
Yɛ yiwalɛ nibii ni amɛfee lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa kɛɛ Yona akɛ: “Ani esaaa akɛ Ninive maŋ kpeteŋkpele lɛ kɛ emli gbɔmɛi ni fa fe 120,000 ni leee nɔ ni ja kɛ nɔ ni ejaaa lɛ, kɛ amɛkooloi babaoo lɛ asane dɔɔ mi?”
Eshai ni efee lɛ miidɔ lɛ waa, no hewɔ lɛ Yesu kɛ ehe eshai lɛ ke lɛ.
17 “‘“Shi amɛnii fee mi* mɔbɔ, ni mikpãtãaa amɛhiɛ; mikpãtãaa amɛhiɛ yɛ ŋa lɛ nɔ.
Michelle: Edɔ mi waa akɛ nɔ ko tamɔ nɛkɛ ba.
Kɛ wɔŋmɛ gbɛ ni henumɔi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ ye wɔnɔ lɛ, wɔbaashwa wɔhe yɛ sɛɛ mli.
Amɛja Yehowa ekoŋŋ ni amɛkɛtsɔɔ akɛ amɛshwa amɛhe.
Esaaa akɛ wɔnii feɔ wɔhe mɔbɔ.
(Abɛi 24:10) Kɛji akɛ Satan miifee enii tamɔ “jata ni hũuɔ” loo eejie ehe kpo tamɔ “la bɔfo” jio, mpoa ni etswa lɛ tsakeko: Ekɛɛ kɛ́ okɛ kaai kpe lɛ, obaakpa Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔmɔ.
Beni kooloo ni hiɛ akoloŋtoi bibii enyɔ lɛ ha ato Jeŋmaji Akpaŋmɔ lɛ yɛ Jeŋ Ta I sɛɛ lɛ, ejamɔ mli hemɛi babaoo lɛ tao amrɔ nɔŋŋ akɛ amɛaatsuu nifeemɔ nɛɛ he yɛ jamɔ mli.
7 Kɛ́ wɔte shi wɔwo Satan lɛ, belɛ wɔmiite shi wɔmiiwo mɛi fɛɛ ni fiɔ esɛɛ, ní teɔ shi woɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nɔyeli lɛ hu.
Kɛ́ kaa ko ni wɔkɛkpeɔ lɛ tamɔ nɔ ni mli wa lɛ, kaa ni mli wa ni Abraham kɛkpe beni akɛɛ ekɛ ebi Isak ashã afɔle lɛ baawo wɔ hewalɛ koni wɔkaŋmɛɛ hemɔkɛyeli he akaŋshii lɛ he.
Kɛji akɛ wɔkɛ wɔhe fɔ̃ Yehowa nɔ beni akaa wɔ lɛ, mɛɛ sɛɛnamɔi wɔnine shɛɔ nɔ?
Yesu ma nɔ mi akɛ anɔkwa nilee he miihia beni esɔle akɛ: “Enɛ ji naanɔ wala lɛ, ákɛ amɛle bo, anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ kome lɛ, kɛ Yesu Kristo, mɔ ni otsu lɛ.”
14 Kɛ́ wɔmiiya Kristofoi akpeei loo shiɛmɔ lɛ, te wɔsaa wɔhe wɔhãa tɛŋŋ?
Jɔɔmɔi ni ená lɛ fɛɛ haa emii shɛɔ ehe waa, ni eekpa gbi ni “maŋbii lɛ ateŋ mɔ ko ekɛŋ akɛ: Migbɔjɔ!” lɛ gbɛ.—Yes.
Nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, amɛbaaha Yehowa tsui anya ejaakɛ eboɔ wɔsanegbaai lɛ atoi, ni enáa miishɛɛ kɛji wɔkɛ wɔlilɛi lɛ tsu nii yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ.
Be ni Yesu jie ehe kpo etsɔɔ kaselɔi lɛ ekomɛi lɛ, no mli lɛ Toma bɛ jɛmɛ.
(Abɛi 29:4, New International Version) Jalɛsaneyeli—titri lɛ kɛ́ akɛtsu nii kɛjɛ ŋwɛi kɛbayi shi lɛ—ekɛ shidaamɔ kpakpa baa, yɛ be mli ni juu-kɛ-fɔ̃ haa maŋ yeɔ ohia.
Nɛkɛ hii ni bɛ jeŋba nɛɛ nuuu fɔyeli bibioo ko kwraa he beni amɛjie jwiɛtɛi kukuji 30 kɛjɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ shikatoohe lɛ mli ni amɛkɛha Yuda koni etsɔɔ Yesu sɛɛgbɛ lɛ.
Gbɛi srɔtoi nɛɛ eye ebua nitsumɔ lɛ waa, titri lɛ be ni nitsulɔi lɛ ayi faaa lɛ.
Kɛ́ wɔtsɔ hiɛ wɔsusu nibii komɛi ni baanyɛ ahã wɔkɛ wɔhe awo maŋkwramɔŋ saji amli lɛ ahe lɛ, etsɔɔ akɛ ‘wɔhiɛ tɛ̃.’
Shi beni miye mibua kɛsaa kpee lɛ shishi lɛ, mikɛ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei babaoo bɔ.
Mɛɛ be esa akɛ wɔye odase ní awie he lɛ?
Esa akɛ wɔha ehi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli be fɛɛ be akɛ bɔ ni wɔkɛ mɛi ni ekolɛ amɛtɔ̃ wɔnɔ lɛ yeɔ haa kɛ subaŋ ni wɔjieɔ lɛ kpo beni wɔtɔ̃ lɛ baanyɛ asa bɔ ni Yehowa kɛwɔ yeɔ ehaa lɛ he.

Afrikayoo ko kɛ yiŋtoo kroko hewɔ ni fɔlɔi kɛ amɛbii egbaaa bɔlɛnamɔ he sane lɛ ha: “Beni miji gbekɛ lɛ, mifɔlɔi ni ji Odasefoi lɛ kɛ mi egbaaa bɔlɛnamɔ he saji, no hewɔ lɛ ebako mijwɛŋmɔ mli pɛŋ akɛ mikɛ mibii agba enɛɛmɛi ahe saji.”
Kɛ́ akwɛ mli agbe naa lɛ, esa akɛ atswa asafo lɛ adafi beni akaneɔ shika he akɔntaabuu ni baanyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ.
Beni Yosef kɛ Maria yɔse akɛ amɛbinuu lɛ elaaje lɛ mɛni amɛfee, ni beni amɛna lɛ lɛ mɛni Maria kɛɛ?
(Abɛi 21:5, Ga Biblia hee) Kɛ́ wɔhe be kɛsusu saji ahe jogbaŋŋ dani wɔkpɛ wɔyiŋ lɛ, ewaaa akɛ wɔbaakpɛ yiŋ ni ja.
Biblia he nilelɔ ko wie akɛ: “Maŋtsɛ-jamɔ biii nɔ ko srɔto kɛjɛɛɛ jeŋmaji ni jáa amagai lɛ adɛŋ; no hewɔ lɛ, Babilonianyo ni abiɔ ni ekɛ woo ni ekɛhaa nyɔŋmɔ ko lɛ ahã kunimyelɔ lɛ —Dario Medianyo lɛ —kpɛlɛɔ nibimɔ lɛ nɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ.
(Mateo 25: 37-40) Beni Yesu jie ehe kpo etsɔɔ Maria Magdalena yɛ egbohiiashitee gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ, ekɛ lɛ wie emumɔŋ nyɛmimɛi nɛɛ ahe ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Yaa minyɛmimɛi lɛ aŋɔɔ ni oyakɛɛ amɛ.”
16 Mɛɛ be abaanyɛ afee weku nikasemɔ?
Mɛi ni kɛ daimonioi lɛ sharaa lɛ kɛ amɛ sharaa tɛ̃ɛ loo amɛtsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi tamɔ mumɔi atsɛlɔi anɔ amɛfeɔ nakai.
Etsɛɛɛ ni su ni etsɛ kɛ enaa kɛ agbɛnɛ datrɛfoi ni kwɛɔ lɛ lɛ hiɛ lɛ tsake.
Ha Efee Faŋŋ akɛ Osumɔɔɔ Lá: Amaniɛbɔi tsɔɔ akɛ, nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei komɛi mɛɔ aahu kɛyashi beni ekpeɔ sɛɛ tsɔ̃ dani amɛkɛɔ datrɛfoi ni tsáa amɛ hela lɛ akɛ amɛsumɔɔɔ lá.
Datrɛfoi lɛ kpaaa gbɛ akɛ maná wala.
Datrɛfonyo lɛ fee oya, ni efee lɛ opireshɛn bibioo, ni ejie Babette kɛjɛ helatsamɔ he lɛ enɔ jetsɛremɔ.
Yɛ ŋmɛlɛtswai fioo pɛ mli lɛ, nine shɛ helatsamɔhe kɛ datrɛfonyo ko nɔ yɛ Homburg/Saar, Germany.
Nakai datrɛfonyo lɛ he esa waa, enyɛɔ ekwɛɔ helatsɛ ko hiɛ ni etsɔɔ nɔ ni feɔ lɛ.
Tsofafeemɔ hei, datrɛfoi, kɛ nyanyɔji ahe nitsulɔi ahe ehiaŋ dɔŋŋ.
Etsuɔ nii yɛ helatsamɔhe ko, ni etswa efai shi akɛ ebaaye mɛi ni ekɛtsuɔ nii lɛ ateŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ odase.
(5) Kɛji lá ho mɔ ko babaoo lɛ, mɛɛ nibii titrii enyɔ ni he hiaa waa datrɛfoi feɔ?
(Yesaia 33:24; Kpojiemɔ 21:4) Bo lɛ susumɔ enɛ he—datrɛfoi, tsofai, helatsamɔhei loo jwɛŋmɔŋ hela he tsamɔhei bɛ, kɛ yarafeemɔi ni bɛ lɛ he okwɛ.
Akɛni Congo nyɛmi yoo ko miisumɔ ni lɛ hu efee nɔ̃ ko hewɔ lɛ, eshĩ toogbɛi 40 eha mɛi ni mɛɔ ni amɛna datrɛfonyo lɛ.
Kɛji akɛ otee datrɛfonyo ko ŋɔɔ kɛha ŋaawoo lɛ, ani oboŋ lɛ toi jogbaŋŋ bɔni afee ni oná nɔmimaa akɛ onu nɔ ni ekɛɔ bo loo tsofa ni eŋmalaa ehaa bo lɛ fɛɛ shishi?
* Misusu hu akɛ akɛni abuɔ datrɛfoi ni amɛnyɔmɔwoo fa hewɔ lɛ kɛ́ mibatsɔ datrɛfonyo lɛ maná miishɛɛ.
Mɛi pii biɔ shaman, okɔmfoi, loo tsofatsɛmɛi ni tamɔ nakai lɛ anii lolo.
* Amrɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ akɛ faks maje kɛtee helatsamɔhei srɔtoi ni yɔɔ Europa fɛɛ lɛ amli kɛha helatsamɔhe kɛ datrɛfonyo ni miisumɔ ni ekɛ tsofai atsu nii shi jeee lá ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli lɛ.
Kɛ́ wɔmiitao ni atsa wɔ ni wɔhe atã kwraa lɛ, belɛ esa akɛ wɔfee nɔ ni datrɛfonyo lɛ kɛɔ wɔ akɛ wɔfee lɛ.
Nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei kɛ amɛhe shã afɔle diɛŋtsɛ bɔni afee ni amɛye amɛbua wɔ yɛ gbɛ ni amɛbaanyɛ nɔ, ni datrɛfoi lɛ jɛ mlihilɛ mli amɛye amɛbua wɔ.
Datrɛfoi nyɛŋ afee naakpɛɛ nii.
Yɛ nyɔŋ kome sɛɛ beni mi datrɛfonyo lɛ ha mile hela ni yeɔ mi lɛ, mɔ ni kwɛɔ minɔ yɛ nitsumɔhe lɛ tsɛ mi kɛtee ɔfis he ni eyɔɔ lɛ ni eha mile akɛ nitsumɔ lɛ miitao gbɔmɛi ni “amɛgbɔmɔtso yɔɔ fɛo.”
Eye ebua mi hu ni minu yiŋkpɛi babaoo ni mli wa ni ebiɔ ni datrɛfoi afee lɛ ashishi.
Yɛ January 1995 lɛ, ekpɛ eyiŋ akɛ kɛ akɛ tsofafeemɔ ko ni datrɛfonyo lɛ ejie yi lɛ kpãaa gbee lɛ, helatsɛ lɛ yɛ hegbɛ akɛ ekpoɔ ni ehalaa datrɛfonyo kroko.
Taakɛ bɔ ni datrɛfonyo ko ni he esa tsɔɔ gbɛ̀i srɔtoi anɔ koni ekɛle nɔ ni gbáa helatsɛ ko tsui naa lɛ, Yesu kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ tsu nii ni ‘ekɛgbala’ “tsuiiaŋ susumɔi kɛ jwɛŋmɔi” ni yɔɔ teemɔŋ lolo lɛ po ni ejie amɛ kpo.—Abɛi 20:5; Hebribii 4:12.
Datrɛfonyo lɛ ha wɔle akɛ nɔ ni efuu mibi yoo lɛ kansa ni, ni ákɛ eji nɔ ko ni baada oyayaayai.
Kɛ́ amɛteŋ mɔ ko he miiye waa lɛ, obaanyɛ otsɔ datrɛfonyo ni he esa koni otsa lɛ.
Maŋnyɛ ko Ná Biblia lɛ He Miishɛɛ
Salomo nilee kɛ emaŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli shweremɔ lɛ ná Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ nɔ hewalɛ aahu akɛ, “ehe jɔ̃ ehe naakpa.”
(1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 10:1) Atsĩii nɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni maŋnyɛ lɛ nu lɛ tã.
Kɛkɛ ni ebashɛ be kɛha nikasemɔ lɛ naagbee, ni yɛ gbii fioo komɛi asɛɛ lɛ, naa wɔ yɛ New York City ní wɔmiimɛ wɔmeele lɛ, no ji Queen Elizabeth ni baawo wɔ kɛku sɛɛ kɛya Europa lɛ.

10 Ni Sheba maŋnyɛ lɛ nu gbɛ́i ni Solomon ehe yɛ Yehowa gbɛ́i lɛ hewɔ lɛ he,+ no hewɔ lɛ, eba koni ekɛ sanebimɔi ni mli wawai* abaka lɛ akwɛ.
No mli lɛ, Maŋtsɛ Ahab binuu Yoram ji mɔ ni yeɔ Israel nɔ, ni Izebel kã he eeye maŋnyɛ.
29 Wolo ni gbalɔ Yeremia kɛmaje kɛjɛ Yerusalem kɛyahã onukpai ni eshwɛ ni yɔɔ mɛi ni aŋɔ amɛ nom lɛ ateŋ lɛ, osɔfoi lɛ, kɛ gbalɔi lɛ, kɛ maŋbii lɛ fɛɛ, mɛi ni Nebukadnezar ŋɔ amɛ nom kɛjɛ Yerusalem kɛtee Babilon lɛ mli wiemɔi nɛ; 2 ekɛmaje be ni Maŋtsɛ Yekonia,+ kɛ maŋnyɛ lɛ,+ kɛ maŋtsɛ shĩa onukpai lɛ, kɛ Yuda kɛ Yerusalem lumɛi lɛ, kɛ ŋaalɔi lɛ, kɛ sɔ̃lɔi* lɛ eje Yerusalem etee lɛ sɛɛ.

Eji beni wɔgbee shi klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, wɔkpɛ wɔyiŋ akɛ wɔkaŋ nyiɛmɔ lɛ dɔŋŋ kulɛ, mɛni baaba?
Mɛni baaba apasa jamɔ kɛ mɛi ni kɛ amɛhe woɔ mli lɛ anɔ?
Kɛlɛ, yɛ Yeremia 16:15 lɛ naa lɛ, nakai wiemɔ lɛ baanyɛ akɔ Israelbii ni etsake amɛtsui ni aaatao amɛ lɛ ahe.
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, mikpɛlɛ bɔ ni mitɔ̃ kɛ bɔ ni mijie kuɛŋtimɔ kpo, kɛ bɔ ni Yehowa Wiemɔ lɛ ja yɛ bei fɛɛ mli lɛ nɔ—‘nɔ ni adũɔ lɛ, no nɔŋŋ hu abaakpa.’”—C.W.
Shiɛmɔ He Amaniɛbɔɔ wolo lɛ ni asafo lɛ efee lɛ tsɔɔ wɔ nibii ni esa akɛ wɔbɔ he amaniɛ.
Mɛni Yehowa Biɔ Kɛjɛɔ Wɔdɛŋ Ŋmɛnɛ?
Mɛni baanyɛ aha amɛshihilɛ ahi fe bɔ ni eyɔɔ lɛ?
Kɛfata he lɛ, nikasemɔi nɛɛ baaye abua wɔ ni wɔkase Yehowa koni wɔjie suɔmɔ kɛ mlihilɛ kpo, wɔhiɛ akã shi, ni wɔmii ashɛ wɔhe.
“Mɛi ni Hiɛ Yɔɔ Amɛmumɔŋ Hiamɔ Nii Anɔ lɛ Yɛ Miishɛɛ”
Kɛ amɛnu ni eetsɛ wiemɔ ko kɛmiitsara nɔ, kɛfata eŋmɔlɔ lɛ he, ekolɛ “Mama” loo “Dada” lɛ, ehaa amɛtsuii yimɔɔ obɔ kɛ miishɛɛ.
ANI omiishɛɛnamɔ damɔ he ni oyɔɔ lɛ nɔ titri?
“Nɔhamɔ mli yɛ jɔɔmɔ fe hemɔ.” —Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:35.
Kɛ́ okɛ watsi ni jara wa, kar, loo shia po ke onaanyo ko lɛ, nakai naanyo lɛ baada shi ni ebaaná miishɛɛ, ni obaaná miishɛɛ ni yɔɔ nɔhamɔ mli lɛ.
Kɛ́ mɔ ko kɛ gbijurɔyeli ko he ŋamɔ ŋa bo loo eke bo nii lɛ, mɛni obaanyɛ ofee?
Mɛɛ miishɛɛ heyeli enɛ kɛbaaha adesai ni shweɔ toiŋjɔlɛ, kɛ jalɛ nɔyeli lɛ nɛkɛ! —Lala 37: 9-11; 83: 18, 19.
Moŋ lɛ, etsɔɔ akɛ nɔ ni hãa nuu loo yoo ko náa anɔkwa miishɛɛ ji, anɔkwayeli ni ekɛsɔmɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, shi jeee wekukpaa ni yɔɔ ekɛ mɛi ateŋ loo nɔ ni enyɛ etsu.
Anɔkwa jamɔ ní mɔ kɛ ehe woɔ mli lɛ kɛ miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ baa
Sane kpakpa lɛ ni mikɛyahãa mɛi krokomɛi lɛ hãa mimii shɛɔ mihe
Wɔyɛ miishɛɛ akɛ Yehowa eha egbó lɛ naa kã kɛha mɛi ni sumɔɔ la lɛ
Esa akɛ suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha Yehowa lɛ akudɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ emiishɛɛ-namɔ kɛ nibii ni esumɔɔ lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa, kɛ no sɛɛ lɛ, suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha enaanyo hu.
Fiofio lɛ, gbekɛbii ni eshwɛ lɛ hu sɔmɔ akɛ be-fɛɛ sɔɔlɔi yɛ be ko mli, ni eha wɔná miishɛɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ akɛ fɔlɔi.
Shi minaa miishɛɛ, yɛ hewalɛwoo kpele ni mináa kɛjɛɔ wɔ Betel weku ni mli bii falɛ aaashɛ mɛi 250 lɛ mli lɛ hewɔ.
Ani esa akɛ mɔ ko aya ŋwɛi dani ena wɔsɛɛ be shihilɛ kpakpa diɛŋtsɛ?
(Luka 10:23) Etsɔɔ mli akɛ, nibii ni haa anáa anɔkwa miishɛɛ ji ni aaale Yehowa kɛ enaanɔ yiŋtoi lɛ, kɛ Biblia mli gbalɛi hu ni aaana akɛ eeba mli lɛ.
Yehowa Odasefoi ni yɔɔ okutso lɛ mli lɛ baaná he miishɛɛ akɛ amɛaaye amɛbua bo ni ole Nyɔŋmɔ he nii babaoo.
“Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ susu akɛ miji be-fɛɛ sɔɔlɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ waa, ní nɔ ko kwraa gbaaa minaa.
No hu kɛɔ akɛ enyɛɔ ekɛ miishɛɛ baa.
Nuŋtsɔ Yesu na he miishɛɛ, ni ewie nakai tsulɔ anɔkwafo kuu lɛ he yɛ 1919 akɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ.
Jwɛŋmɔ he nilelɔi ejɛ jeeŋmɔ amɛjie jeŋ nilee ni maa mɔ aŋkro lɛ hiamɔ nii kɛ suɔmɔnaa nii anɔ mi akɛ nɔ ni kɛ miishɛɛ baa lɛ yi.
Amɛjáa miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ.
15 min: Tĩi Wolo ni Akɛbaatsu Nii yɛ March Mli lɛ Mli—Nɔ Diɛŋtsɛ ni Kɛ Weku Miishɛɛ Baa.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 17:25) Wɔbaanyɛ wɔda lɛ shi yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ yɛ mumɔ fɛɛ mumɔ ni wɔmuɔ, niyenii fɛɛ niyenii ni wɔyeɔ, kɛ miishɛɛ kɛ mlifilimɔ be fɛɛ be ni baa yɛ shihilɛ mli lɛ he.
Yehowa kɛɛ Mesia lɛ akɛ: “Be ní sa mli miboo toi yɛ, ni yiwalaheremɔ gbi nɔ hu miye mibuao yɛ: ni mibaa oyi, ni miha otsɔ maŋ lɛ kpaŋmɔ.”
+ 4 Kɛɛmɔ amɛ akɛ: “Nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ, ‘Kɛ́ nyɛbooo mi toi ni nyɛbaanyiɛ mimla* ni mikɛfɔ̃ nyɛhiɛ lɛ sɛɛ, 5 ni nyɛbaabo mitsuji gbalɔi lɛ ni mitsuɔ amɛ kɛbaa nyɛŋɔɔ daa kɛ daa* lɛ atoi, mɛi ni nyɛbooo amɛtoi lɛ,+ 6 no lɛ, mi hu mafee shĩa nɛɛ tamɔ bɔ ni mifee Shilo+ lɛ, ni mahã maŋ nɛɛ atsɔ nii ni akɛlomɔɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ ateŋ.’”’”
5 Shi kɛ́ miyatsɔ Makedonia lɛ, maba nyɛŋɔɔ, ejaakɛ mayatsɔ Makedonia;+ 6 ni ekolɛ mikɛ nyɛ baahi shi, loo maye fɛ̃i be lɛ po yɛ nyɛŋɔɔ, koni no sɛɛ lɛ, he ni maya lɛ, nyɛyajie mi gbɛ.
+ 2 Eyɛ mli akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ mibɛ nyɛŋɔɔ moŋ, shi etamɔ nɔ ni miyɛ nyɛŋɔɔ nɔ ni ji shii enyɔ nɔ, ni miitsɔ hiɛ miibɔ mɛi ni be ko ni eho lɛ amɛfee esha, kɛ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ fɛɛ kɔkɔ akɛ, kɛ́ miná miba ekoŋŋ lɛ, mikɛ amɛhe ekeŋ amɛ, 3 ejaakɛ nyɛmiitao odaseyeli ni tsɔɔ akɛ, Kristo, mɔ ni gbɔjɔɔɔ yɛ nyɛgbɛfaŋ, shi moŋ ehe wa yɛ nyɛteŋ lɛ, miitsɔ minɔ eewie lɛɛlɛŋ.
+ 6 Shi kɛ́ nyɛ kɛ nyɛshwiei lɛ je misɛɛ ni nyɛyeee mikitãi lɛ, kɛ mimlai ni mikɛshwie nyɛhiɛ lɛ anɔ, ni nyɛyasɔmɔ nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi ni nyɛkoto amɛ lɛ,+ 7 no lɛ, mafo Israel mashɛ mafɔ̃ kɛje shikpɔŋ ni mikɛhã amɛ lɛ nɔ,+ ni shĩa ni mifee lɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ mihã migbɛ́i lɛ, majie yɛ mihiɛ mashɛ mafɔ̃,+ ni Israel baatsɔ nyaŋemɔ nii* kɛ nɔ ko ni ayeɔ he fɛo yɛ maji fɛɛ ateŋ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ mihiɛ tseɔ lɛ waa moŋ, shi le ni mile akɛ Yehowa hiɛ kpaŋ enɔ lɛ shɛjeɔ mimii, ni mile akɛ ebaakai lɛ efata mɛi akpekpei abɔ krokomɛi lɛ ahe yɛ gbohiiashitee lɛ mli.—Yohane 5:28, 29.
Akɛni mɔ ko mɔ ko bɛ nɔ ni mikpɛ miyiŋ akɛ mikɛ miwala baafee lɛ he miishɛɛ, ni agbɛnɛ akɛni hiŋtihiŋti hu yɛ mi kɛ Awula Fairclough teŋ hewɔ lɛ, mikpɛ miyiŋ akɛ mikɛɛɛ lɛ.
Ricardo tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Mimii shɛ mihe akɛ epiŋmɔ lɛ eba naagbee, shi mihiɛ tse lɛ aahu akɛ miná ni kulɛ mi hu mije mli.
Mina akɛ Sir Srivastava ji mɔ ko ni sumɔɔ mɔ sane waa, ni beni wɔgbaa sane lɛ, mitsi tã kɛfo mli kuku kɛkɛ akɛ aha mɛi badamɔ wɔsɛɛ dani ajie Awula Hoffman kɛ mi fɛɛ kɛjɛ tsuŋwoo mli.
Zdzisław, ni ji nuu ni yɛ adebɔɔ naa lɛ ejwɛŋɔ nii anɔ lɛ kpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ: “Mileee mifɔlɔi ejaakɛ amɛkpoo mi beni miji gbekɛ bibioo, ni minu he waa diɛŋtsɛ akɛ asumɔɔɔ mi kwraa.
36 “Kɛ́ amɛfee esha amɛshi bo (ejaakɛ mɔ ko mɔ ko bɛ ni efeee esha),+ ni omli fu amɛ, ni okɛ amɛ wo henyɛlɔ ko dɛŋ, ni amɛhenyɛlɔ lɛ ŋɔ amɛ nom kɛtee shikpɔŋ ko nɔ, he ni jekɛ jio, he ni jekɛɛɛ jio,+ 37 ni amɛhiɛ tserɛ amɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni aŋɔ amɛ nom kɛtee nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛku amɛsɛɛ kɛba oŋɔɔ, ni amɛkpa bo fai ni ona amɛ mɔbɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni aŋɔ amɛ nom kɛtee nɔ lɛ nɔ amɛkɛɛ, ‘Wɔfee esha ni wɔtɔ̃; wɔfee efɔŋ,’+ 38 ni amɛku amɛsɛɛ kɛba oŋɔɔ kɛ amɛtsui fɛɛ+ kɛ amɛsusuma* fɛɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ ni aŋɔ amɛ nom+ kɛtee nɔ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛtsɔ amɛhiɛ amɛhã amɛshikpɔŋ lɛ ni okɛhã amɛtsɛmɛi lɛ kɛ maŋ ni ohala+ lɛ kɛ shĩa ni mima mihã ogbɛ́i lɛ, ni amɛsɔle amɛhã bo lɛ, 39 no lɛ, jɛɛ ŋwɛi, ni ji oshihilɛhe lɛ onu amɛsɔlemɔ kɛ amɛfaikpamɔ kɛhã mɔbɔnalɛ lɛ, ni oye amɛsane ohã amɛ,+ ni okɛ esha ni omaŋbii lɛ efee amɛshi bo lɛ ake amɛ.
+ 41 Ŋma ni jeɔ ŋma jogbaŋŋ* lɛ hewɔ lɛ, maná nyɛhe miishɛɛ kɛ́ mijie nyɛ kɛje majimaji lɛ amli ni mibua nyɛnaa kɛjɛ shikpɔji ni agbɛ nyɛ ashwã nɔ lɛ anɔ lɛ;+ ni abaafee mi krɔŋkrɔŋ yɛ nyɛteŋ yɛ jeŋmaji lɛ ahiɛ.’
+ 6 Mahã fãji kɛ loo aba nyɛhe, ni mikɛ hewolo baaha nyɛhe, ni mikɛ mumɔ ni amuɔ baawo nyɛmli, ni nyɛbaaba wala mli; ni nyɛbaaná nyɛle akɛ miji Yehowa.”’”
Kɛji akɛ okã he, ni ohaaa onijiaŋ aje wui lɛ, ebaanyɛ eha oná niiashikpamɔi ni ŋɔɔ yɛ anɔkwale ni ogbaa mɛi krokomɛi lɛ mli, niiashikpamɔi ni ekolɛ onyɛŋ oná.
Yesu ‘sumɔ lɛ,’ ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Eshwɛo nɔ kome: yaa ni oyahɔɔ nii fɛɛ ni oyɔɔ, ni oŋɔha ohiafoi, ni ooona jwetri yɛ ŋwɛi; . . . ni oba obanyiɛ misɛɛ.”—Marko 10:17-21.
21 Yesu kwɛ lɛ, ni etsui mɔ lɛ, ni ekɛɛ, “Eshwɛ bo nɔ kome: Yaahɔ̃ɔ nii ni oyɔɔ lɛ ni okɛhã ohiafoi, ni obaaná jwetri yɛ ŋwɛi; ni oba obatsɔ misɛɛnyiɛlɔ.”
Kɛ́ ona akɛ ebaasumɔ ni ebo nɔ ni obaakɛɛ lɛ toi lɛ, wiemɔ nɔ ni onyaa he waa yɛ hefatalɔ ni egbo lɛ he loo nɔ ni eha oshwe lɛ waa lɛ he.
Yesu kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Eshwɛo nɔ̃ kome: yaa ni oyahɔ̀ɔ nii fɛɛ ni oyɔɔ, ni oŋɔha ohiafoi, ni oooná jwetri yɛ ŋwɛi; ni owo sɛŋmɔtso lɛ ni oba obanyiɛ misɛɛ.”
4] Ani bei komɛi lɛ onuɔ he akɛ nibii komɛi miiŋmɛɛ bo akɛni osɔmɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hewɔ?
“Wiemɔ* enɛɛmɛi otsɔɔ Yuda hii lɛ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ Yerusalem lɛ 3 ni okɛɛ amɛ akɛ, ‘Nɔ ni Yehowa, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛɛ nɛ: “Loomɔ kã mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni booo kpaŋmɔ nɛɛ mli wiemɔi lɛ atoi lɛ nɔ,+ 4 wiemɔi ni mikɛwo nyɛtsɛmɛi lɛ kitã yɛ gbi nɔ ni mijie amɛ kɛje Ejipt shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ,+ kɛje dade seremɔ flɔnɔɔ lɛ mli akɛ,+ ‘Nyɛboa migbee toi, ni nyɛfea nibii fɛɛ ni mifã nyɛ lɛ; ni nyɛbaatsɔ mimaŋ ni matsɔ nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ,+ 5 koni maye kitã ni mikã nyɛtsɛmɛi lɛ akɛ mahã amɛ shikpɔŋ ni mliki kɛ wo hoɔ yɛ nɔ+ tamɔ eji ŋmɛnɛ lɛ nɔ.’”’”
11 Beni Israelbii lɛ yɔɔ Mizraim lolo lɛ, Yehowa tsu Mose kɛtee Farao ŋɔɔ ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Yaa Farao ŋɔɔ, shi miwaje etsui kɛ etsuji lɛ atsui, bɔni afee ni mafee mikadii nɛɛ fɛɛ matsɔɔ amɛ, koni ogba nibii ni mifee yɛ Mizraim, kɛ mikadii hu ni mifee yɛ amɛteŋ lɛ, owo obii kɛ obii abii atoiaŋ, koni nyɛna nyɛle akɛ mi ji Yehowa lɛ.”
+ 18 Shi yɛ Yuda maŋtsɛ lɛ ni tsu nyɛ koni nyɛbabi Yehowa nii lɛ gbɛfaŋ lɛ, nɔ ni nyɛkɛa lɛ nɛ, “Nɔ ni Yehowa, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛɛ nɛ: ‘Wiemɔi ni onu lɛ ahewɔ lɛ, 19 otsake otsui* ni oba ohe shi+ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ yɛ nɔ ni miwie mishi maŋ nɛɛ kɛ emli bii lɛ—akɛ loomɔ baaba amɛnɔ ni mɛi anaa baakpɛ amɛhe yɛ amɛhewɔ lɛ he—ni ogbala otadei+ lɛ ni ofó yɛ mihiɛ, no hewɔ lɛ, mi hu minu oyaafo lɛ, Yehowa kɛɛ.
Dani amɛaaya Shiwoo Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, Mose kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Miitsɛ́ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ ŋmɛnɛ ni amɛbaye nyɛhe odase akɛ mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe; ejaakɛ no aaaha oyi ana wala ni otsɛ yɛ jeŋ, koni ohi shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa kã otsɛmɛi Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob kitã akɛ eeeŋɔha amɛ lɛ nɔ!”
7 Paulo tsɔɔ saneyitso ni esanegbaa lɛ kɔɔ he, yɛ 1 Korintobii yitso 15, klɛŋklɛŋ kukuji enyɔ lɛ mli akɛ: “Anyɛmimɛi, miiha nyɛle akɛ sanekpakpa lɛ ni mijaje mitsɔɔ nyɛ, ní nyɛmɔ mli hu, ní nyɛhiɛ mli hu lɛ, no nɔŋŋ akɛaahere nyɛyiwala, . . . kɛ́ jeee nakai lɛ nyɛhe nyɛye yakatswaa.”
13 Beni ekpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ ebaabu ehe akɔntaa eha Yehowa lɛ, David kɛɛ: “Bo okometoo mifee esha mishi, ni mifee efɔŋ yɛ ohiɛ, koni oye bem yɛ owiemɔ lɛ mli, ni ohe atse yɛ okojomɔ lɛ mli.”

3 Enɔ afi lɛ, Nebukadnezar —ní agbɛnɛ awo lɛ Babilon nɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ —gbala ejwɛŋmɔ kɛtee etawuu he tafãai lɛ anɔ ekoŋŋ yɛ Siria kɛ Palestina.
19 Shi ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, nyɛkwa nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ,+ mɔ ni here nyɛ kɛje nyɛmanehului kɛ nyɛhaomɔi fɛɛ amli lɛ, ni nyɛmiikɛɛ akɛ: “Dabi, wó maŋtsɛ ohã wɔ koni eye wɔnɔ.”
Biblia kanemɔ: 1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 1-2
26 Shika tsuru gugɔŋ gai ni ebi lɛ tsiimɔ fee shika tsuru shekeli* 1,700, soro jwinei ni afee lɛ tamɔ nyɔɔŋtsere, kɛ toiiaŋnii, kɛ atadei ni hiɛ pɛpol kɔla ni Midian maŋtsɛmɛi lɛ wo, kɛ afukpɔŋɔi lɛ akuɛnii lɛ.
Elia yɛ ekãa kɛha anɔkwale jamɔ, ni esɔmɔ Yehowa yɛ nyɛɛ kɛ shitee-kɛ-woo kpele ni Baal, ni ji Kaananbii lɛ anyɔŋmɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ jalɔi lɛ kɛba enɔ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ.—1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 18:17-40.
YINƆSANEŊMALƆI kpaaa gbee yɛ afi nɔ ni Persia Maŋtsɛ Artashasta nɔyeli lɛ je shishi lɛ he.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Maŋtsɛ Salomo yɛ ‘maŋnyɛmɛi 60, hemɛi 80, kɛ oblayei ni aleee amɛyibɔ’ moŋ, shi lɛ po etsui mɔ oblayoo nɛɛ.
(Zefania 2:3) Ebaaba enaagbee kwraa yɛ “Nyɔŋmɔ Ofe lɛ gbi wulu lɛ nɔ ta lɛ . . . ni atsɛɔ jɛi yɛ Hebri wiemɔ mli akɛ Harmagedon lɛ” mli, nɔ̃ mli ni abaakpata “maŋtsɛmɛi ni yɔɔ jeŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ lɛ” ahiɛ lɛ.
2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 5:1-15 Akɛni nuu ko ní hi shi yɛ Biblia bei amli lɛ ná heshibaa su hewɔ lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ená Yehowa hewalɛ ní ekɛsaa nibii ekoŋŋ lɛ he sɛɛ yɛ?
(Daniel 2:44) Jeee mɛnɛɛmɛi pɛ ji maŋtsɛmɛi ni amaga lɛ waobii lɛ feɔ amɛhe mfoniri lɛ, shi mɛi ni dade, akɔɔble, jwiɛtɛi, kɛ shika fãi lɛ fee amɛhe mfoniri lɛ hu.
Maŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ baaye nɔ akɛ maŋtsɛmɛi, ni maŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ baasɔmɔ akɛ osɔfoi.—Galatabii 6:16; Kpojiemɔ 20:4, 6.
6 Be ni sane lɛ yashɛ Ninive maŋtsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ lɛ, ete shi kɛjɛ emaŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ nɔ ni ejie emaŋtsɛ atade lɛ yɛ ehe efɔ̃ shi, ni ebu kpekpe, ni eho eta lamulu mli.
(Hebribii 9:1-7) Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, ekolɛ etamɔ nɔ ni 1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 8:8 lɛ futuɔ mɔ yiŋ fioo, akɛ: “Tsei lɛ kɛlɛ, bɔ ni anaa tsei lɛ anaabui yɛ he krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yɛ sɛɛtsu lɛ hiɛ, shi anaaa yɛ kpo lɛ nɔ gbɛ.”
Yɛ Maŋtsɛ Saul gbii lɛ amli lɛ, akutsei ni yɔɔ Yordan bokagbɛ lɛ ye Hagribii lɛ anɔ kunim, eyɛ mli moŋ akɛ Hagribii lɛ ayi fa fe amɛ toi enyɔ.
28 Kɛkɛ ni David bua Israel lumɛi lɛ fɛɛ anaa kɛtee Yerusalem: Israel wekui lɛ anɔ lumɛi lɛ, kɛ kui ni sɔmɔɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ anɔ onukpai lɛ,+ kɛ asraafoi akpei anɔkwɛlɔi lɛ kɛ asraafoi ohai anɔkwɛlɔi lɛ,+ kɛ onukpai ni kwɛɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ nibii kɛ ekooloi+ kɛ ebii+ lɛ hu anibii kɛ amɛkooloi fɛɛ anɔ lɛ, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu maŋtsɛ shĩa onukpai lɛ kɛ nuu kãkãlɔ fɛɛ nuu kãkãlɔ.
(2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 2:14) Yehowa ha hetoo kɛtsɔ tsɔɔmɔ ni etsɔɔ akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ emumɔ lɛ yɛ Elisha nɔ lɛ nɔ.
Te fee tɛŋŋ ni mɔ ni ayɔseɔ lɛ akɛ kooyigbɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ tsake yɛ jeŋ ta ni ji enyɔ lɛ sɛɛ?
29:23) No hewɔ ni Yesu tsɛ́ Yerusalem akɛ “maŋtsɛ agbo lɛ maŋ” lɛ.—Mat.
5 Wɔbaanyɛ wɔna bɔ ni Yehowa buɔ mɛi ni ebuuu nɔyeli hegbɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛha lɛ kɛjɛ Maŋtsɛ David he yinɔsane lɛ mli.
(Yesaia 66:8; Galatabii 6:16) Mɛnɛɛmɛi baa amɛhe shi amɛhaa Yesu Kristo, ŋwɛi Maŋtsɛ ní Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ, mɔ ni ji “naanɔi amaŋtsɛ” lɛ kɛ lɛ eta maŋtsɛsɛi lɛ nɔ lɛ.
“Yehowa hɔɔ amɛ eha Yabin, Kanaan maŋtsɛ lɛ, ní yeɔ maŋtsɛ yɛ Hazor lɛ. Ni etatsɛ ji Sisera . . .
Maŋtsɛ David tee nɔ etsɛ Yehowa “daa jenamɔ!”
(Lala 68: 18, NW) Beni Israelbii lɛ ehi Shiwoo Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ yɛ afii komɛi asɛɛ lɛ, Yehowa “kwɔ” Zion Gɔŋ lɛ yɛ mfonirifeemɔ mli ni efee Yerusalem Israel maŋtsɛyeli ní David yeɔ nɔ akɛ emaŋtsɛ lɛ emaŋtiase.
Israel onukpai lɛ tee nɔ amɛkɛɛ Samuel akɛ: “Agbɛnɛ wo maŋtsɛ oha wɔ, koni ekojo wɔ tamɔ jeŋmajimaji lɛ fɛɛ.”
Kɛ nanegbɛ po yɛ nui ni efee hamahama amli lɛ,+
Yehowa ji “wala nu bu.”
9 Ejaakɛ Dimon nui lɛ amli eyi kɛ lá,
Shi kwɛ bɔ ni gbɛjianɔ ni Bɔlɔ lɛ eto ní nu ní nɛɔ shwieɔ shi lɛ kuɔ sɛɛ eyaa ŋwɛi ni esaa enɛɔ ekoŋŋ lɛ he hiaa adesai ha!
Yesu tee nɔ ni etsɔɔ lɛ anɔkwale ko ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ ni kɔɔ ‘nu ni baatsɔ nu hiŋmɛi ni baaha enine ashɛ naanɔ wala nɔ’ lɛ he.
“Wala nu faa” lɛ damɔ shi kɛha mɛni, ni mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Ezekiel ninaa ni kɔɔ nɛkɛ faa nɛɛ he lɛ yeɔ ebuaa wɔ ni wɔleɔ enɛ?
22 Nu ni kɛ loomɔ baa nɛɛ abote omlinii lɛ amli ní ehã omusu afuu, ní ehã oshuɔ* akpɔtɔ.”
(b) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ atsɔ atsĩ “nui” ni fiɔ Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ sɛɛ lɛ naa kɛjɛ ehe yɛ Japan, ni mɛni jɛ mli ba?
Akɛ mɛi ni abaabaptisi amɛ lɛ woɔ nu mli kwraa, koni akɛtsɔɔ mɛi fɛɛ akɛ amɛjɔɔ amɛhe nɔ amɛha Yehowa.
Eji sane ko ni hiɛdɔɔ yɔɔ he waa hu kɛ́ mɔ ko—je gbɛ loo ekɛ nii ahe ni esusuuu—fite nu ni wɔnuɔ lɛ.
17 Ni Yehowa kɛɛ mi ekoŋŋ akɛ: 18 “Gbɔmɔ bi,* okɛ hekpokpomɔ aye oniyenii* lɛ, ni onu onu lɛ kɛ gbeyeishemɔ kɛ tsuiyeli.
Gbɛ kome ni atsɔɔ nɔ agbɛɔ nɛkɛ anɔkwale lɛ he nui nɛɛ ashwãa ji kɛtsɔ tɛlifoŋ nɔ.
Lalatsɛ lɛ ŋma akɛ, mɔ ni mii shɛɔ Yehowa mla lɛ he, ni ekaneɔ “shwane kɛ nyɔɔŋ” lɛ, baafee tamɔ “tso ni atɛo yɛ faai atoi, ni woɔ eyibii yɛ ebe lɛ mli, ni eyibaai kpɔŋ; ni nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni efeɔ lɛ shwereɔ.”—Lala 1:2, 3.
11 Anɔkwa jamɔ biɔ babaoo fe numiimɔ ni wɔkɛaafee wɔhenɔjɔɔmɔ lɛ he okadi, asafoŋ kpeei ni wɔɔya, kɛ wɔhe ni wɔkɛaawo maŋshiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
20 Shi Hezekia shihilɛ mli saji krokomɛi fɛɛ, nibii wuji ni efee kɛ kpaakpo+ lɛ kɛ gɔɔta lɛ ni efee kɛ bɔ ni ekɛ nu ba maŋ lɛ mli+ lɛ, aŋmala yɛ Yuda maŋtsɛmɛi ayinɔsaji awolo lɛ mli.
Nɔ ni yɔɔ tɔ ni ji etɛ nɛɛ mli ni afɔseɔ ashwieɔ shi lɛ ji jajemɔ ni ajajeɔ akɛ je lɛ “faai kɛ nu bui” lɛ etsɔ la, ni ekɛ mumɔŋ gbele baa mɛi fɛɛ ni nuɔ lɛ anɔ.
Nibii ní kɛ́ wɔfee lɛ etsɔɔ akɛ wɔfeɔ falefale ji, wɔdɛŋ ni wɔfɔɔ kɛ samala kɛ nu dani wɔyeɔ nii loo wɔmɔɔ niyenii mli, beni wɔtee nii asɛɛ wɔba, kɛ beni wɔju abifao he wɔtã loo beni etee nii amli ni wɔtsake ehe sɛɛ lɛ.
Ewó tso lɛ nɔ, ni ekɛtswa Nilo Faa lɛ mli nu lɛ yɛ Farao kɛ etsuji lɛ ahiɛ, ni faa lɛ mli nu lɛ fɛɛ tsɔ lá.
Egbogboi ní nɔ kwɔlɔ waa lɛ miikwɛ nujɔɔi wuji ní Eufrate Faa lɛ, ní feɔ maŋ lɛ hefamɔ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ fã lɛ mli nui lɛ eyimɔ amɛ obɔ̃bɔ̃ lɛ anɔ.

5:28) Nɔ ni ewie kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ gbalaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛyaa bɔ ni ‘Kristo hu sumɔ asafo lɛ ní eŋɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe eha yɛ ehewɔ, koni ekɛ nu hejuu lɛ atsuu ehe yɛ wiemɔ lɛ mli’ lɛ nɔ.
Akɛ tɛ bluu kɛ eyɛŋ tswa wiemɔ kpoku nɛɛ, ni aye samai fɛfɛji awo he, ni ayɛ tsũi enyɔ yɛ kpoku lɛ he kɛ amɛmli sɛii ni akɛ tɛ fee, ni asaa shikpɔŋ lɛ fɛfɛo, ni amɛɔ yɛ tsũi nɛɛ amli.
Wɔ mii shɛ wɔhe yɛ shikpɔŋ fɛfɛo ko he—gɔŋ agbo ko ni mashi somlomloo ni atsɛɔ lɛ El Yunque (Sɔŋmɛ Tɛ), ni etamɔ nɔ ni akɛ flonto ehà nɔ, kɛ ŋwɛi ni etse ni efee bluu yɛ esɛɛ, ní atatui yɛji yɔɔ emasɛi biɛ kɛ biɛ lɛ.
Trukaa yɛ afi 1953 lɛ, awó mi kpokpaa nɔkwɛlɔ kɛha Alsace-Lorraine kpokpaa lɛ, ni eji kpokpaa ko ni Germanbii lɛ ŋɔ shii enyɔ sɔŋŋ yɛ afi 1871 kɛmiimɔ afi 1945.
7 No hewɔ lɛ, hã mi ŋaalɔ ko ni le bɔ ni akɛ shika tsuru kɛ jwiɛtɛi kɛ akɔɔble+ kɛ dade kɛ kooloo hetsɔi ni hiɛ pɛpol kɔla kɛ kpãa tsuru kɛ kpãa bluu tsuɔ nii, ni ele bɔ ni ayeɔ sãmai hu.
Nui ni hiɛ tamɔ bluu kɛ eŋɔli, ŋshɔ mli tɛsaai ni tamɔ ŋshɔkpɔi, akokooshi tsei ni kpaa kɛyaa kɛbaa, gɔji kɛ amɛnɔ jwɛifɔ, ŋshɔŋ looi, aduawai kɛ fɔfɔii ni yɔɔ fɛo.
Jeee kɔɔyɔŋ tsakemɔ fɛfɛo ni emli ŋɔɔ ni hulu tsoɔ yɛ mli hu ni hɔ atatu bluu shishi lɛ kɛkɛ gbii etɛ kpee lɛ tee nɔ yɛ, shi moŋ yɛ mumɔŋ shishinumɔ mli, yɛ be mli ni “Ŋwɛi Nitsɔɔmɔ” tsuɔ nii kɛmɔɔ shi lɛ.

39 Amɛkɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa lɛ+ lo atadei kpakpai ni abaawo kɛsɔmɔ yɛ he krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ.
Kɛ́ nuu kɛ yoo hi shi afii babaoo lɛ, wu lɛ leɔ bɔ ni efeɔ eshɛjeɔ eŋa lɛ mii, ni ewoɔ lɛ hewalɛ kɛ́ ekɛ naagba kpe loo ehao.
Bei komɛi lɛ, kɛ́ anyiɛ Galilea Ŋshɔ lɛ hiɛ lɛ, anyɛɔ anaa Hermon Gɔŋ ni snoo eha yiteŋ ni yɔɔ Shiwoo Shikpɔŋ lɛ kooyigbɛ kwraa lɛ.
