31 “Okɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ klala ni alo lɛ jogbaŋŋ afee pateeshɛŋ.
7 “Agbɛnɛ hu, amɛkɛ mama bluu aha okpɔlɔ ni akɛ hiɛmaa blodo lɛ maa nɔ lɛ nɔ,+ ni amɛkɛ kãi lɛ kɛ kɔɔpoi lɛ kɛ tsɛnsii lɛ kɛ dãa afɔle kɔɔpoi wuji lɛ amamɔ nɔ;+ blodo ni yɔɔ okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ daa+ lɛ akã he ahi nɔ.
35 Ekɛ nitsumɔ he ŋaalee ewo amɛmli obɔbɔ,+ koni amɛkɛtsu ŋaa nitsumɔi fɛɛ, amɛkɛlo nii amɛwo mamai amli, ni amɛkɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ klala kpakpa alo nii, ni amɛkɛ mamaloo tsɔne hu alo nii.
2 Ekɛ shika tsuru kɛ kpãa bluu kɛ kooloo hetsɔi afaseo* kɛ kpãa ni tsuɔ waa kɛ klala ni alo lɛ jogbaŋŋ fee efɔd+ lɛ.
21 Naagbee lɛ, amɛkɛ kpãa bluu fi tsitsinɔnii lɛ gai lɛ kɛyamɔ efɔd lɛ gai lɛ, koni emɔ tsitsinɔnii lɛ ekpɛtɛ efɔd lɛ nɔ, yɛ mlifiinɔ ni alo lɛ yiteŋgbɛ, tamɔ bɔ ni Yehowa fã Mose lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Kɛ́ abu naa yɛ kwashiai amli lɛ, bonso tsiimɔ ji tɔn 120—ni etamɔ shwuɔi 30 tsiimɔ!
Te bonso ní su yɔɔ bluu lɛ da ha tɛŋŋ, ni kɛ wɔsusu Yehowa bɔɔ nii ni ji kooloi lɛ ahe lɛ, te esa akɛ no aha wɔmu sane naa wɔha tɛŋŋ?
DENMARKBII abɛbua ko kɛɔ akɛ: “Atatuiaŋ ni shwilafo enaaa lɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ ŋwɛi efeko bluu.”
22 Ni ekɛ kpãa bluu sɔŋŋ fee efɔd lɛ shishi atade ní nine bɛ he lɛ, nilolɔ ko kɛ mamaloo tsɔne lo.
No mli lɛ, mifɔlɔi lɛ egboi, no hewɔ lɛ, wɔshi Sydney kɛyahi kpokpaa ko ni enɔ yɔɔ fɛo waa ni atsɛɔ jɛmɛ akɛ Blue Mountains lɛ nɔ bɔni afee ni wɔbɛŋkɛ wɔnanemɛi.
11 Ni amɛkɛ mama bluu aha shika tsuru afɔleshaa latɛ+ lɛ he, amɛkɛ nu mli gbee hewolo aha nɔ, ní amɛkɛ etsei+ ni akɛwoɔ lɛ ahɔlɔ amɛgbɛhei.
Ni kɛlɛ, mɛi ni bɛ nitsumɔ loo nyɔmɔwoo bibioo ko pɛ amɛnaa lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii ejuuu, yɛ be mli ni klakefoi loo owulai kɛ mɛi ni feɔ guɔyeli nibii lɛ juɔ yɛ nitsumɔ mli oookɛɛ nibii ni amɛjuɔ lɛ fata amɛ nyɔŋgbele nyɔmɔwoo he.
Tso tsũi kɛ amɛhe ediŋ kɛ asara su ní akɛ bluu ebã naa yɛ maŋ lɛŋ he fɛɛ he.
21 Toiŋjɔlɛ ko bɛ kɛhã mɛi fɔji lɛ,” mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛɛ.
“No hewɔ lɛ, kɛji okɛ onɔkeenɔ lɛ baaŋmɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ nɔ, ni okai yɛ jɛi akɛ onyɛmi kɛo teŋ yɛ sane ko lɛ, shi onɔkeenɔ lɛ yɛ jɛi yɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ hiɛ, ni oya okɛ onyɛmi lɛ ayakpata dã, koni oba ni okɛ onɔkeenɔ lɛ abaha.”—Mateo 5:23, 24.
16 “Nii hu ni nyɛkase ni nyɛmɔ mli ni nyɛnu ni nyɛna yɛ mihe lɛ, nomɛi nɔŋŋ nyɛfea, ni hejɔlɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ nyɛ aaahi shi.”
Mɛni jɛɔ toiŋjɔlɛ ni akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ naa kɛtsɔɔ Yesu Kristo nɔ lɛ mli baa?
Mɛi ni náa hekɛnɔfɔɔ kwraa yɛ Yehowa mli lɛ náa ehebuu ni amɛnáa “hejɔlɛ” ní hiɔ shi daa mli ŋɔɔmɔ.—Abɛi 3:5, 6; Filipibii 4:6, 7.
(Lala 72:6-8) Toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shweremɔ ní anako ehenɔ dã hi enɔyeli lɛ mli.
Yɛ June 1939 mli lɛ, wɔtee wɔyabo maŋshiɛmɔ ni ji “Nɔyeli kɛ Toiŋjɔlɛ” ni Joseph F.
Shi mɛi ni he jɔ lɛ, shikpɔŋ lɛ aaatsɔ amɛnɔ, ni amɛmii aaashɛ amɛhe yɛ hejɔlɛ babaoo mli.”
(1 Mose 1:28; Kpojiemɔ 4:11) Mɛni hewɔ ni adesai anɔyelii nyɛko amɛkɛ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shweshweeshwe shihilɛ ni sɛɛ tsɛɔ aba lɛ?
Amrɔ nɛɛ mikɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔŋ klante ni ji Biblia lɛ tsuɔ nii koni mikɛ anɔkwa toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ jalɛsaneyeli he shɛɛ sane aha mɛi—Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa lɛ.”
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ bɔ ni Yosef kɛ enyɛmimɛi lɛ ye ha lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ esumɔɔ toiŋjɔlɛ?
Mɛi babaoo ahiɛ sɔ Augustus jogbaŋŋ, titri lɛ mɛi ni hi Bokagbɛ shikpɔji ní awieɔ Hela wiemɔ yɛ mli lɛ anɔ lɛ, ejaakɛ eha shweremɔ kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ ba yɛ ta ko ni akɛ be kakadaŋŋ wu lɛ sɛɛ.
Wiemɔ nɛɛ ha mɛi ni yɔɔ hei srɔtoi babaoo lɛ jie UN lɛ yi ni amɛhiɛ sɔ lɛ, ni akɛ Nobel Toiŋjɔlɛ Juromɔnɔ kɛha afi 2001 lɛ hu ha lɛ.
Ekɛ eshiabii kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ hei krokomɛi lɛ ateŋ bɛ jogbaŋŋ ejaakɛ “ewoɔ ehe nɔ fe nine ni no haaa enyɛ esaa ekɛ mɛi krokomɛi ateŋ” ní etao toiŋjɔlɛ sɛɛ.
“Kɛ nine shɛ anɔkwa nilee nɔ lɛ, kɛkɛ lɛ suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ ebafee anɔkwale nɔ; kɛ suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ ji anɔkwale lɛ, kɛkɛ lɛ ato tsui lɛ ama gbɛ ni ja nɔ . . . ; kɛ ato tsui lɛ ama gbɛ ni ja nɔ lɛ, kɛkɛ lɛ akanya mɔ shihilɛ; kɛ akanya mɔ shihilɛ lɛ, kɛkɛ lɛ ato weku shihilɛ he gbɛjianɔ; kɛ ato weku shihilɛ he gbɛjianɔ lɛ, kɛkɛ lɛ gbɛjianɔtoo kpakpa eba maŋ shihilɛ he; kɛ ato maŋ shihilɛ he gbɛjianɔ kpakpa lɛ, kɛkɛ lɛ toiŋjɔlɛ eba je nɛɛ mli.
Mlijɔlɛ kɛ Tsuishitoo Haa Toiŋjɔlɛ Hiɔ Asafo lɛ Mli
Shi kɛlɛ, yɛ Paradeiso ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛbaaba ekoŋŋ lɛ mli lɛ, ewo adesai ashi akɛ “amɛmii aaashɛ amɛhe yɛ hejɔlɛ babaoo mli.”
Mináaa nakai bei lɛ mlɛo kwraa, shi no feemɔ ha mihe jɔ mi, ni mihenilee ebuuu mi fɔ dɔŋŋ.” —Yakobo 5:16.
Beni eyɔɔ gboklɛfoi atsuŋ yɛ efɔŋ ni efee ni kɔɔ IRA nifeemɔ he lɛ mli lɛ, esɔle eha Nyɔŋmɔ ní eye ebua lɛ ní ena gbɛ diɛŋtsɛ ni kɛ mɔ yaa naanɔ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ jalɛ sane mli.
Mra be mli Kristofoi hi shi akɛ maŋbii ni sumɔɔ toiŋjɔlɛ, amɛyeɔ anɔkwa, ni amɛwoɔ too
Maŋbii ni tsuɔ jalɛ nii lɛ haa toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ ekomefeemɔ hiɔ shi ni amɛwoɔ mɛi krokomɛi ni yɔɔ akutso lɛ mli lɛ hewalɛ.
Mɔ ni yɔɔ shɔŋŋ lɛ kɛ mɔ ni bɛŋkɛ lɛ baaná toiŋjɔlɛ daa,”+ Yehowa kɛɛ,
Shi moŋ, ŋwɛibɔfoi lɛ jie Yehowa yi akɛ: “Anunyam aha Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ ŋwɛi flooflo, ni hejɔlɛ aba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni ana gbɔmɛi ahe tsuijurɔ.” — Luka 2: 8-14.
• Te oná nɔ ni Yehowa fee koni toiŋjɔlɛ ahi ekɛ adesai ateŋ lɛ he sɛɛ oha tɛŋŋ?
Kɛfata he lɛ, mɛi ni tee “Nyɔŋmɔ Toiŋjɔlɛ He Bɔfoi” a-Kpokpaa Wulu nɔ Kpeei 13 ni afee yɛ Malawi lɛ tee hiɛ fe 117,000.
“ANYƐMI!
Beni The Watchtower, ni ji September 15, 1981, baafa 25 lɛ wieɔ enɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ŋamɔ kuku ni ji ‘Hɛloo’ ni oookɛɛ mɔ ko kɛkɛ lɛ baanyɛ afee shishijee nii ni kɛ mɔ yaa sanegbaa mli, ni ebaanyɛ etsɔ naanyobɔɔ po.
Amɛ fɛɛ amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛfala wɔ, ni amɛhere wɔ awaawaa atuu diɛŋtsɛ.
Be ni eshaa ehe ni eyata shi lɛ, nyɛmi nuu ko tsɔ ehe ekwɛ lɛ, eŋmɔ fioo, ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Te oyɔɔ tɛŋŋ?
Okɛ dɛhiɛmɔ wolo lɛ ahã shiatsɛ lɛ koni enyɛ ena saneyitso lɛ, koni no sɛɛ lɛ okɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Hɛloo.
Kɛ́ ootao mumuii lɛ, obaanyɛ okɛɛ akɛ: “Hɛloo.
Aŋma yɛ September 15, 1981, The Watchtower lɛ baafa 25 lɛ mli akɛ: “Wiemɔ folo tamɔ ‘te oyɔɔ tɛŋŋ’ kɛkɛ ni oookɛɛ mɔ ko lɛ baanyɛ afee klɛŋklɛŋ nifeemɔ ni baaha okɛ lɛ agba sane, ni ebaanyɛ eha okɛ mɔ lɛ abɔ naanyo po.
Oya nɔŋŋ ni misɔle miha Yehowa ni mikɛɛ nuu lɛ akɛ: ‘Hɛloo, mikaiɔ sane ni wɔgba ŋmɛnɛ ji gbii etɛ lɛ, ni mikaiɔ ogbee lɛ hu.
Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, shiɛlɔi lɛ kaseɔ wiemɔ lɛ bɔ ni sa, koni amɛkɛ shiɛmɔ wiemɔi ni yɔɔ mlɛo ni tamɔ nɛkɛ aha akɛ: “Hɛloo.
Eye kɛbua mi hu ni mina akɛ kɛ́ mikpa shiɛmɔ lɛ esa akɛ mayabi nyɛmimɛi ni yɔɔ nakai shikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli lɛ ashi, kɛ́ be fioo ko kɛkɛ po maye yɛ amɛŋɔɔ dani mashi jɛmɛ.
Mɛi komɛi ekɛɛ akɛ: “Hɛloo.
8 Yɛ shihilɛ ni dekã bɛ mli nɛɛ mli lɛ, mɛi kɛ amɛhe kpeɔ ní mɔ ko ŋaaa enaanyo loo ni eeebi lɛ akɛ “te oyɔɔ tɛŋŋ?”
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛɛ akɛ: “Hɛloo.
(Luka 10:4) Hela wiemɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni akɛtsu nii kɛha ‘ŋamɔ’ lɛ shishinumɔ yaa shɔŋŋ fe ŋamɔ folo ko kɛkɛ.
4 Kɛ́ Ooye Odase yɛ Gbɛjegbɛi Ahe: Obaanyɛ okɛɛ akɛ: “Hɛloo.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, afɔɔ shia ni wieɔ Gujarati wiemɔ lɛ ŋamɔ akɛ Kemcho, ni eshishi kɛkɛ ji “Hɛloo.”
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛɛ nɔ ko tamɔ nɛkɛ: “Hɛloo.
The Encyclopedia of Religion lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ, mɛi ni to jamɔi ni ji Buddha jamɔ, Kristojamɔ kɛ Islam jamɔi lɛ ashishi lɛ hiɛ susumɔi srɔtoi yɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi ahe, shi wolo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Jamɔi nɛɛ ahe yinɔsaji krokomɛi tsɔɔ akɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi kɛ saji ni kɔɔ nifeemɔi nɛɛ ahe lɛ ji adesai ajamɔ mli hemɔkɛyelii lɛ amli fã titri ko.”
Amrɔ nɛɛ po lɛ, abaanyɛ awie bɔ ni Biblia lɛ ni wɔnine shɛ nɔ yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ haa mɛi tsakeɔ amɛsubaŋi gbohii lɛ ahe akɛ eji naakpɛɛ nii.
Nyɔŋmɔ hewalɛ ji nɔ ni tsu naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ, taakɛ eji yɛ naakpɛɛ nibii fɛɛ ni Elisha fee lɛ gbɛfaŋ beni eyɔɔ wala mli lolo lɛ.
Nilelɔ ko ni le gbɔlɛ he nii jogbaŋŋ lɛ ŋma akɛ: “Beni adebɔɔ etsu naakpɛɛ nii ni kɛ wɔ jɛɔ hɔŋɔɔ mli kɛyaa fɔmɔ mli, kɛtsaa nɔ kɛyaa dalɛ yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ gbɛfaŋ kɛ onukpa tsɔmɔ mli lɛ he nii egbe naa lɛ, ehala akɛ etoŋ nɔ ko ni tamɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ mlɛo ni baatsĩ gbɔlɛ naa koni ekɛhiɛ nakai naakpɛɛ nii lɛ amli kɛya naanɔ lɛ he gbɛjianɔ.”
Taakɛ The American Peoples Encyclopedia lɛ wieɔ he lɛ, kɛji naakpɛɛ nii ni fe fɛɛ—Yesu shitee lɛ—ba mli lɛ, belɛ naakpɛɛ nii krokomɛi fɛɛ ni abɔ he amaniɛ yɛ Sanekpakpai lɛ amli lɛ hu “baanyɛ aba.”
Biblia lɛ feɔ lɛ faŋŋ yɛ amaniɛbɔi ni ekɛhaa lɛ amli akɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi—naakpɛɛ tsamɔi, gbohiiashitee srɔtoi, kɛ ekrokomɛi—tee nɔ yɛ bei ni eho lɛ amli, ni kɛlɛ, ekɛ sanemlitsɔɔmɔ ni yɔɔ faŋŋ hu haa akɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi ni tamɔ enɛɛmɛi lɛ asɛɛ efo.
Kɛ́ wɔɔwie he yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ shishinumɔ ni “naakpɛɛ nii” hiɛ, ni ji nifeemɔi ni “abaanyɛ akɛɛ akɛ ejɛ hewalɛ ni nɔ kwɔ fe adesai anɔ̃ ŋɔɔ” lɛ naa po lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛɛ akɛ wɔteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ena naakpɛɛ nii komɛi dã.
Weku ko mlinyo kɛ miishɛɛ wie yɛ eweku lɛ naa akɛ: “Wɔbaada shi daa yɛ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ he, eji naakpɛɛ nii ni Yehowa fee.
Beni nakai wolo ni akɛpɛiɔ saji amli lɛ ewie nifeemɔi srɔtoi ni akɛɛ amɛyɛ naakpɛɛ lɛ ahe egbe naa lɛ, emu sane naa akɛ: “Eyɛ mli akɛ ekolɛ ebaawa kɛha mɔ ko akɛ ebaahe naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi nɛɛ ahe saji fɛɛ ni jamɔ he niŋmalɔi eŋmala eshwie shi lɛ eye moŋ, shi ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ amɛji saji ni akɛ jwɛŋmɔ kpakpa ŋmala koni akɛwo Buddha ni nyɛɔ ekɛ hewalɛ ni akɛfeɔ naakpɛɛ nii haa esɛɛnyiɛlɔi ni yɔɔ ekãa waa lɛ hiɛ nyam.”
Nilelɔ Arthur Pierson wieɔ Kristo naakpɛɛ nii lɛ ahe yɛ ewolo ni atsɛɔ lɛ “Many Infallible Proofs:” The Evidences of Christianity lɛ mli akɛ: “Mɛi ni etsá amɛ lɛ ayifalɛ, kɛ bɔ ni etsaa mɛi lɛ trukaa ni etsaa amɛ jogbaŋŋ kɛmɔɔ shi, kɛ bɔ ni ka ni eka akɛ eeetee gbohii ashi lɛ ekome folo po efeee efolo lɛ, haa anaa sɔrɔto-feemɔ ni da waa yɛ nɛkɛ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ kɛ naakpɛɛ nii krokomɛi ni mɛi kaa akɛ amɛaafee yɛ yinɔ nɛɛ mli aloo yɛ yinɔ kroko mli lɛ teŋ.”
Beni wolo ni ji The Miracles and the Resurrection lɛ wieɔ Sanekpakpa ŋmalalɔi lɛ anɔkwayeli lɛ he lɛ, etsɔɔ akɛ: “Ebaafee nɔ ni ejaaa kwraa akɛ aaawie ashi sanekpakpa ŋmalalɔi lɛ akɛ amɛji mɛi komɛi ni kɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi babaoo tsimɔ yinɔsane mli anɔkwalei anɔ yɛ gbɛ ni esaaa nɔ bɔni afee ni amɛkɛha Nyɔŋmɔjamɔ he susumɔi aya hiɛ. . . .
Elisha fee naakpɛɛ nibii srɔtoi babaoo yɛ esɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ ní ekɛ aaafee afii 60 ni nyiɛ sɛɛ kɛba lɛ tsu lɛ mli.—Kwɛmɔ akrabatsa ni ji “Naakpɛɛ Nibii ni Elisha Fee” lɛ.
16. (a) ‘Tsinebaa ni sɛɛ foɔ’ lɛ tsɔɔ mɛni?
Jeeŋmɔ beebe ajɛ akɛ aduawai ni tamɔ taamii nɛɛ tsu nii koni akɛtee akɔnɔ shi.
Yesaia kɛ “Israel we lɛ” to weintrom ko ni bɔi “kooŋ wein yibii” loo wein kpɔtɔi woo fiofio lɛ he.
Kɛ ena tsei ayibii, ŋmɛi, kɛ wui bɔ ni sa lɛ, opoloŋ weku lɛ baanyɛ adara agboi ni amɛbaana be ni amɛkɛlɛɛ amɛ shia lɛ mli.
Tso lɛ nɔ yiɔ obɔ kɛ fɔfɔii ni etsuuu tsɔ̃ yɛ May mli, kɛsaa ehe kɛhaa mu yibii lɛ woo.
Kuku 5: “Tsinebaa sɛɛ aaafo”
‘Tsinebaa ni sɛɛ foɔ’ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ kɛji akɛ nuumo tsinebaa nii ba shi lɛ, nɛkɛ aduawa nɛɛ po nyɛɛɛ atee ekɔnɔ shi kɛha niyenii.
(Yesaia 27:2) Shi, yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ní eeewo yibii ní ayeɔ lɛ, ewo “kooŋ wein yibii,” loo kɛ́ aaawie he tɛ̃ɛ lɛ, “nibii ni jeɔ fũ” loo “yibii ní esha (ekpɔtɔ).”
16 Mɔ ni egbɔ lɛ tsinebaa nii naa baa shi, kɛji akɛ niyenii ni ma ehiɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ tamɔ taami lɛ po.
Kɛ́ wɔji yɛ kooloo lɛ mli lɛ, anaa kooloo lɛ tamɔ yɔɔyi, ni edalɛ tamɔ yɔɔ, ni ekpɛtɛɔ oak tso lɛ bai kɛ eniji fɔbii lɛ ahe.
Klɛŋklɛŋ kwɛɛ nii ni anaa yɛ shikpɔji nɛɛ anɔ lɛ ekomɛi ji jwɛi bibiibii, shi yɛ lasu gɔji amli nui shikpɔji memeji lɛ anɔ lɛ, obaana tsei ayibii tamɔ yɔɔi henɔi ni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛkwɛ kɛ tsei pɛmpɛbii ni kwɛɔ bibiibii yɛ jɛmɛ.
Nikasemɔi enyɔ nɛɛ kɔɔ naakpɛɛ nii ni Yesu fee lɛ ahe, ni amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa wɔ ni wɔle bɔ ni afeɔ mɛi ejurɔ ni ayeɔ abuaa amɛ.
Mɛni wɔkaseɔ kɛjɛɔ naakpɛɛ nii nɛɛ mli?— Wɔkaseɔ akɛ Yesu yɛ hewalɛ ni ekɛ eshai faa, ni ehaa mɛi ni he yeɔ lɛ náa hewalɛ ekoŋŋ.
He ni amɛbashɛ lɛ kɛ Yerusalem jɛkɛmɔ aaafee gbii enyɔ loo gbii etɛ gbɛnyiɛmɔ kɛkɛ!

(Abɛi 17:27) Beni Yesu woɔ ebɔfoi lɛ agbɛ koni amɛyashiɛ lɛ, ewo amɛ ŋaa akɛ: “Kɛ́ nyɛmiibote shia lɛ, nyɛŋaa [mɛi ni yɔɔ shia] lɛ [“nyɛbaa hejɔlɛ nyɛhaa shia lɛ,”The New English Bible]. Ni kɛji shia lɛ sa lɛ, nyɛhaa nyɛhejɔlɛ lɛ abaa enɔ; shi kɛji esaaa lɛ, no lɛ nyɛhejɔlɛ lɛ akpale aba nyɛŋɔɔ ekoŋŋ.”
Ekɛfata he akɛ: “Gbɔmɔ bi lɛ aaatsu ebɔfoi lɛ, ni amɛaabua nanetɔtɔmɔ nii fɛɛ kɛ mɛi ni tsuɔ mlakwamɔ nii lɛ anaa kɛaajɛ emaŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli.”
Ni ekɛ amɛ baahã nyɛ amrɔ nɔŋŋ.”
16 Vicky kɛɛ akɛ: “Amrɔ nɛɛ, mimami miitao ni mi hu mikɛ mibiyoo lɛ amaje lɛ ni etsɔse lɛ taakɛ ekɛ mi hã emami lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ tɔmɔ henumɔi bɔi Yakob naa gbamɔ, tamɔ akɛ, ‘Mɛni hewɔ mitsu Yosef kome too kɛtee?
Namɔ Yehowa wo shi akɛ ebaatsu lɛ kɛba ni ebakwɛ etooku lɛ?
9 Nakai gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ, matsu mɛi yɛ meelei amli kɛya Etiopia ni heɔ ehe eyeɔ waa lɛ ŋɔɔ, ni Etiopia he baakpokpo; amɛbaakpokpo yɛ gbi ni miiba Ejipt nɔ lɛ nɔ, ejaakɛ bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, ebaaba.’
+ 31 Ni ebaatsu ebɔfoi lɛ kɛ tɛtɛrɛmantɛrɛ gbɛɛmɔ ni naa wa, ni amɛbaabua ehalamɔbii lɛ anaa kɛbaajɛ kɔɔyɔi ejwɛ lɛ anɔ, kɛjɛ ŋwɛi naagbeehe kome kɛyashi naagbeehe kroko.
Bei komɛi lɛ, fɔlɔi woɔ amɛbihii askul shi amɛshiɔ amɛbiyei lɛ.
Habakuk fee bɔ ni enu he eha lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ efɔ̃ shi, ejaakɛ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ejaakɛ agbamitso lɛ gbaŋ afofro, ni yibii hu ehiŋ weintsei lɛ anɔ; mutso yibiiwoo aaafee yaka, ni abɔɔi lɛ baŋ niyenii; aaaha tooi atã yɛ tooi atsũ lɛ mli, ni anaŋ tsinai yɛ amɛtsũi lɛ amli. Shi mi lɛ, manya yɛ Yehowa mli, mimli aaafili mi yɛ miyiwalaheremɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ mli!”
16 No hewɔ lɛ, kɛjɛ be nɛɛ nɔ kɛyaa nɛɛ, wɔleee mɔ ko mɔ ko yɛ heloo gbɛfaŋ.
Ni kɛlɛ, Hela wiemɔ kɛha “yooma,” shi jeee nɔ ni damɔ shi kɛha “kpãa” lɛ jeɔ kpo yɛ Mateo 19:24 lɛ mli yɛ Hela ŋmalɛ ni akɛ niji ŋmala ni yɔɔ ni etsɛ fe fɛɛ lɛ mli yɛ Mateo Sanekpakpa (Sinaitic, Vatican No. 1209, kɛ Alexandrine) lɛ amli.
Akɛni Debora, Barak, kɛ Yael kɛ amɛhe fɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ yɛ ekãa naa hewɔ lɛ, “shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ jɔ” ha Israel “afii nyɔŋmai ejwɛ.” —Kojolɔi 4: 1-22; 5:31.
Beni Mose bi akɛ eha ena E-nunyam lɛ, Yehowa ha hetoo akɛ: “Onyɛŋ mihiɛ ona; shi mɔ ko mɔ ko enaŋ mi, ní eyi aaaná wala.”
Kɛ́ gbekɛbii kpa shi amɛna akɛ amɛfɔlɔi lɛ haa amɛ “hɛɛ” feɔ hɛɛ ni amɛ “dabi” feɔ dabi—kɛ́ no biɔ ni amɛgbala gbekɛbii lɛ atoi po lɛ—ehaa gbekɛbii lɛ nuɔ he akɛ amɛyɛ shweshweeshwe diɛŋtsɛ, ni amɛnáa bulɛ kɛ suɔmɔ babaoo amɛhaa amɛfɔlɔi lɛ.—Mateo 5:37.
Wɔkpeee dɔŋŋ aahu kɛyashi afi 1948 afi lɛ shishijee mli, beni eha mi wolo bibioo ko ni gbɛi ji “The Prince of Peace” (Toiŋjɔlɛ Lumɔ Lɛ) lɛ.

Shi majimaji ateŋ mpleshii, kɛ hewolonɔ sui ateŋ nyɛɛ, kɛ awuŋayeli fɔŋ ko kwraa bɛ mɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ kɛ tooi krokomɛi lɛ ateŋ.
5 Nɔ ni fe afii 20 ho ní Yosef kɛ etsɛ ni eda, ni ji blematsɛ Yakob náaa sharamɔ ko kwraa.
[Kadimɔ: Hei ni atsɔɔɔ he ni sanebimɔi lɛ jɛ yɛ sanebimɔi lɛ anaagbee lɛ yɛ kɛha mɔ diɛŋtsɛ nii amli taomɔ koni etao hetooi lɛ.—Kwɛmɔ Sɔɔmɔ Skul, bf.
Kɛfata he lɛ, eyaaa jɛmɛ akɛ eyaakwɛ nɔ ni yaa nɔ yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ kɛkɛ.
Nɛkɛ nyɛmimɛi yei enyɔ nɛɛ ye bua ni akɛto Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛlɔi akuu ko he gbɛjianɔ yɛ maŋ ko ni asafo bɛ mli lɛ mli.
15 “‘Kɛ́ miŋmɛɛ mimlifu lɛ fɛɛ he mishwie gbogbo lɛ kɛ mɛi ni kɛ kaaloo sha he lɛ anɔ lɛ, makɛɛ nyɛ akɛ: “Gbogbo lɛ bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni mɛi ni sha he lɛ hu bɛ dɔŋŋ.
Shi kɛlɛ, ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ ni jɛ tsuiŋ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ nyɛŋ ajie ohia kɛya, ekɔɔɔ he eko bɔ ni niiashikpamɔi nɛɛ baanyɛ ata mɔ tsuiŋ aha.
Israel shwɛɛnɔ lɛ efeŋ nishaianii, ni amɛmaleŋ dɔŋŋ, ni asaŋ anaŋ shishiumɔ lilɛi yɛ amɛdaaŋ; ejaakɛ amɛaaye nii ni amɛaabumɔ shi, ni mɔ ko mɔ ko woŋ amɛhe gbeyei.”
Eba akɛ wɔɔkase nii kɛjɛ yinɔsane mli ni ana wɔ akɛ ‘wɔjeee je lɛ fã.’
Gbekɛbii gboiii yɛ nakai shiai lɛ amli.

Sɔlemɔtsui ni kamɔ efoji kɛ sɔlemɔyalɔi ni amɛnɔ miigbɔ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ gbɔmɛi akpekpei abɔ ebuuu jamɔ dɔŋŋ akɛ ehe miihia kɛha miishɛɛ namɔ. —Okɛto 1 Mose 2: 7, 17; Ezekiel 18: 4, 20 he.

12:11) Enɛ haaa nitsumɔi ni amɛtsuɔ lɛ awo yibii babaoo, ni nakai nɔŋŋ ehaaa amɛná miishɛɛ babaoo ni kulɛ esa akɛ amɛná yɛ be mli ni amɛyeɔ amɛbuaa mɛi krokomɛi lɛ.
(Mateo 7:13, 14; 1 Timoteo 4:16) Kɛ ehe bahia ni wɔfee yiŋkpɛi lɛ, belɛ, bɔ ni wɔshweɔ koni wɔfee ekpakpa lɛ baanyɛ aha wɔbi wɔhe akɛ: ‘Te yiŋkpɛɛ nɛɛ baasa Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ ni mikɛ mihe woɔ mli lɛ he eha tɛŋŋ?
Ojogbaŋŋ, kaahe ohe oye tsɔ!
Ojogbaŋŋ, ani kulɛ Yehowa Odasefoi baanyɛ atsu Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛmɔ he nii yɛ jeŋ ni nyɛ̃ɛɔ wɔ nɛɛ fɛɛ mli ni Yehowa ŋwɛi tai lɛ asɛɛfimɔ bɛ mli?
(Tito 1:5) Petro kɛ ekãa shiɛ yɛ Babilon, ni beni eŋma eklɛŋklɛŋ wolo lɛ yɛ aaafee afi 62 kɛmiimɔ afi 64 Ŋ.B. lɛ mli, no mli lɛ Kristofoi anitsumɔ lɛ ehe shi yɛ Ponto, Galata, Kapadokia, Asia kɛ Bitinia.
Nuŋtsɔ lɛ kɛɛ esɔɔlɔi anɔkwafoi lɛ yɛ Yesu abɛbua ni kɔɔ talentai lɛ ahe lɛ mli akɛ: “Ahekoo, tsulɔ kpakpa kɛ anɔkwafo!”
Ekɛfata he akɛ: “Ehi akɛ oyeee loo ni onuuu wein loo nɔ ko ní aaato onyɛmi pampi loo aaaha enane atɔ̃tɔ aloo enijiaŋ aaaje wui yɛ mli.”
(Lala 1:2; 40:9) No hewɔ lɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔha bɔ ni wɔjwɛŋmɔ nyɛɔ emɔɔ nii ehaa lɛ aya hiɛ bɔni afee ni wɔná he sɛɛ jogbaŋŋ beni wɔkaseɔ nii lɛ.
Shiɛlɔi kɛ gbɛgbalɔi fɛɛ kɛ amɛhe wo mli jogbaŋŋ, taakɛ ejeɔ kpo faŋŋ yɛ shiɛlɔi ayifalɛ hee ni fe fɛɛ ni ji 58,780 ni ana yɛ nakai nyɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ mli lɛ.
AKƐNI nibii babaoo woɔ wɔhilɛ-kɛhamɔ he gbeyei ŋmɛnɛ hewɔ lɛ, shishinumɔ yɛ mli akɛ wɔɔtao mɔ ko loo nɔ ko ni baaha wɔ shweshweeshwe shihilɛ.
Wɔkɛ onufu tsobi ni akɛ mama fee ni kɛlɛ ji mitai 1.5 bala blɔ tso ko he ni wɔkɛfee akɔɔble onufu ni atsĩ tã yɛ 4 Mose 21:4-9 lɛ.
Wiemɔ nɛɛ tsɔɔ bɔ ni wɔhiɛ sɔɔ wɔ onukpai kɛ asafoŋ sɔɔlɔi lɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
8. (a) Mɛni esa akɛ wɔsusu he jogbaŋŋ?
Taakɛ wolo ko ni akɛpɛiɔ saji amli tsɔɔ lɛ, abaanyɛ anu abɛ nɛɛ shishi yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ ákɛ etsɔɔ akɛ “ninámɔ woɔ mɛi ni kɛtsuɔ nii jogbaŋŋ lɛ ahiɛ nyam . . . [shi] yɛ kwashiai agbɛfaŋ lɛ, amɛnáaa nɔ ko kɛjɛɛɛ amɛbuulufeemɔ lɛ mli.”
16 Yɛ shidaa afɔle lɛ mli lɛ, too lɛ fɔ lɛ fɛɛ—ni hà emlinii lɛ ahe, sabai lɛ ahe, fɔ ni tsotsoro mlɛbo lɛ he lɛ, kɛ fɔ ni yɔɔ hɛ lɛ he lɛ, kɛ agbɛnɛ lei muu lɛ fɛɛ ni fɔ hà he lɛ—akɛhaa Yehowa kɛtsɔ shã ni ashãa lɛ nɔ, ahaa ejeɔ lasu yɛ afɔleshaa latɛ lɛ nɔ.
(1 Korintobii 9:26; 1 Timoteo 4:7; 2 Timoteo 2:5; 1 Petro 5:10) Yɛ blema akaŋshilɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ, ehe miihia ni ená tsɔselɔ kpakpa, ní eye ehe nɔ, ní ekɛ enyɛmɔi atsu nii jogbaŋŋ.
Nɛkɛ saji nɛɛ maa Biblia mli ŋmalɛi ni yeɔ buaa lɛ anɔ mi, tamɔ Filipibii 4:8 lɛ, ni kɛɔ akɛ: “Nii abɔ ni ji anɔkwa, nii ni sa woo, nii ni ja, nii ni he tse, nii ni adɔɔ he, nii ni yɔɔ gbɛi kpakpa lɛ fɛɛ, kɛ jeŋba kpakpa ko yɛ, kɛ yijiemɔ ko hu yɛ lɛ, enɛɛmɛi anɔ nyɛjwɛŋa!”
Ani mi kɛ omami kɛ onyɛmimɛi hii lɛ baaba abakula shi ni wɔkɛ wɔhiɛ abumɔ shi yɛ ohiɛ?”
6:11) Wɔbaanyɛ wɔkase nɔ ko ni he hiaa waa kɛjɛ bɔ ni Isak kromɔ bi Esau bu egboshinii lɛ eha lɛ mli.
Wolo tɛtrɛɛ nɛɛ tsɔɔ wɔ nɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he kɛ jɔɔmɔi komɛi ni nɔ bɛ ni ekɛbaaba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.”
Ashurbii lɛ ŋmala amɛyinɔsaji amɛwo sũ taoi anɔ, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu yɛ kpuji kɛ tɔkpoi ahe, ni sɛɛ mli lɛ Babilonbii lɛ hu fee nakai nɔŋŋ.

8:4; 9:7, 12) Shwelɛ ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ baanyɛ atsirɛ wɔ ni wɔfee ejurɔ.

19 Nɔ ni ji ejwɛ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔtao mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ejaakɛ suɔmɔ ji mumɔ lɛ yibii lɛ eko.
No hewɔ lɛ, wɔná miishɛɛ waa akɛ wɔná wɔle akɛ nyɛsɛɛ afi lɛ kpokpaa wulu nɔ kpee lɛ saneyitso lɛ baafee “Nyɔŋmɔ Gbalɛ Wiemɔ” lɛ.
15 Kɛji akɛ wɔjɔɔ wɔhe nɔ wɔha Nyɔŋmɔ kɛtsɔ Kristo nɔ lɛ, wɔtsɔɔ wɔfai shi ni wɔtswa akɛ wɔkɛ wɔwala baatsu nii yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nifeemɔ mli taakɛ atsɔɔ yɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ.
(b) Mɛni wɔkaseɔ kɛjɛɔ Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 4:18-20 kɛ Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 5:29 lɛ mli?
Suɔmɔ kɛha Yehowa ji kanyamɔ kpakpa fe fɛɛ ní wɔbaanyɛ wɔná ni wɔkɛkane e-Wiemɔ lɛ.
Wɔbua lai saŋŋ naa ni wɔkɛshɛre la, ni wɔhoo wɔniyenii ni eshwɛ lɛ, kɛkɛ ni wɔyi gbɛ.
Wɔkɛ wɔhe wo kpokpaa nɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli yɛ be ko mli hu, ni wɔyasaraa asafoi kɛjɛ Queen Charlotte Islands kɛyaa bokagbɛ kɛfoɔ gɔji lɛ kɛyaa Fraser Lake, kɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ, kɛyaa Prince George kɛ Mackenzie maji lɛ amli tɔɔ.
Wɔjáaa Abonsam.
Wɔkɛ saji ni abua naa lɛ fɔɔ gbɛfaa Hɔɔ shwane loo Hɔgbaa, be ni Ataa eyaaa nitsumɔ lɛ.
Mateo 10:16-22, 28-31 Mɛɛ shitee-kɛ-woo wɔbaanyɛ wɔkpa gbɛ, shi mɛni hewɔ esaaa akɛ wɔsheɔ shitee-kɛ-wolɔi gbeyei lɛ?
Beni wɔyaa nɔ wɔkɛ Biblia lɛ tsuɔ nii yɛ shia-kɛ-shia nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ, wɔnaa akɛ ‘ehiɛ kã ni eyɛ hewalɛ.’—Heb.
Jeee nibalɔi ji wɔ, ni wɔsaramɔ lɛ yeŋ nɔ ni fe minitii etɛ.”
4 Enɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ esa akɛ wɔsumɔsumɔɔ wɔhe yɛ gbɛnaa nii ni kã wɔnɔ lɛ kɛkɛ hewɔ.
Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔle Yehowa sui lɛ jogbaŋŋ lɛ?
Ani wɔbaanyɛ wɔhi shi afii pii ni fa nakai, ekolɛ kɛya naanɔ po?
Kɛ wɔyɛ nɛkɛ nibii nɛɛ ahe mumɔŋ shishinumɔ lɛlɛŋ lɛ, enɛ baaye abua wɔ ni ‘wɔnyiɛ bɔ ni sa Yehowa hiɛ ni wɔsa ehiɛ kwraa.’—Kol.
Yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ wɔ Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ kɛ odaseyeli kroko haa akɛ naagbee be lɛ mli wɔyɔɔ lɛ?
28 Taakɛ wɔyɔse lɛ, yɛ Jeŋ Ta II naagbee nyɔji lɛ amli lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi ku sɛɛ amɛma amɛfaishitswaa akɛ amɛbaawó Nyɔŋmɔ nɔyeli lɛ nɔ gojoo kɛtsɔ sɔɔmɔ ni amɛkɛaaha lɛ akɛ teokrase gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ nɔ mi.
Ehe bahia koni wɔsaa wɔto sɛii kɛ okpɔlɔi lɛ ekoŋŋ yɛ wɔ kpee lɛ fɛɛ shishi.
Kɛ́ wɔfee nakai lɛ, no lɛ wɔ hu wɔbaanyɛ wɔjaje taakɛ lalatsɛ ni ŋma akɛ: “Shi lɛɛlɛŋ, Nyɔŋmɔ ebo mi toi, efee toi eha misɔlemɔ gbee lɛ” jaje lɛ.—Lala 10:17; 66:19.
Yɛ egbii lɛ amli—dani akɛ tsofai ni gbeɔ muawai aaatsu nii—lɛ, no mli lɛ helatsɛmɛi akwɛmɔ bɛ tamɔ bɔ ni wɔnaa lɛ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ.
Ni akɛ aŋkroaŋkroi lɛ, wɔhe yeɔ, wɔkɛ amanehulu kpeɔ, ni wɔsuɔlɔi gboiɔ.
Shi kɛlɛ, wɔhã wɔmumɔŋ otii ni wɔkɛ mamɔ wɔhiɛ lɛ hi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli, ni be ni miye afii 25 lɛ, ahala mi akɛ asafoŋ sɔɔlɔ, ni ji asafoŋ sɛinɔtalɔ yɛ Yehowa Odasefoi asafo ko mli.
Biblia mli wolo ni ji Abɛi yitso 14 kuku 1 kɛyashi 11 lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, kɛ́ wɔkɛ nilee wie ni wɔfee nii yɛ nilee mli lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔshwere ni wɔhi shi shweshweeshwe amrɔ nɛɛ po.
Kɛ́ wɔye ekitai lɛ anɔ lɛ, ebaaha wɔtsui anyɔ wɔmli ni wɔná miishɛɛ, ni nɔ ko bɛ jeŋ fɔŋ nɛɛ mli ni baaha wɔná enɛ.
Amɛbaanyɛ ni amɛkɛ tsokpoti loo kakla aye bo awui.
Ni eŋɔ la lɛ kɛ kakla lɛ ehiɛ edɛ̃, ni amɛyi enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ amɛnyiɛ kɛtee.
Susumɔ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ nɛɛ he okwɛ: Kakla ni naa ba he yɛ sɛɛnamɔ kɛha nihoolɔ ko ni he esa waa.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ: Ekolɛ nuu ko baafee kakla koni akɛfo loo.
Be ni wɔgbele shinaa lɛ, naa shĩatsɛ lɛ ni ehiɛ kakla agbo ko kɛdamɔ he ni wɔbaatsɔ kɛkpeleke shi lɛ.
Beni esaa etee kpeei lɛ ekoŋŋ lɛ, ewu kɔ kakla ekɛnyiɛ esɛɛ ni eshã woji ni eŋmalaa kpee lɛ mli saji yɛ mli lɛ kɛ Biblia kasemɔ woji lɛ.
Ekɛ kakla wo ehe gbeyei po akɛ ebaagbe lɛ.
(1 Mose 22:2) Ni kɛlɛ, akɛni eheɔ Yehowa eyeɔ kwraa hewɔ lɛ, Abraham to gbɛjianɔ koni eye sane nɛɛ nɔ, ni ekɔ ekakla lɛ koni egbe Isak.

Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni ebaatee Lazaro shi lɛ, ‘ehole ehiŋmɛii anɔ kɛtee ŋwɛi ni ekɛɛ: Ataa, miidao shi akɛ obo mi toi.
Osɔfo ni yɔɔ Reformed (Calvin) Sɔlemɔ ni wɔyaa lɛ mli lɛ po bi mi koni maye enajiaŋ ni matsɔɔ miskulbii lɛ anii be mli ni ebɛ.
3 Nakai nyɔɔŋ lɛ mli nɔŋŋ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ Natan* akɛ: 4 “Yaa ni oyakɛɛ mitsulɔ David akɛ, ‘Nɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: “Jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa ohã mi ni mahi mli.
Kaimɔ akɛ ekɛɛ: “Nyɛwoa mipã lɛ nyɛfɔa nyɛnɔ ni nyɛkasea mi.”
Mɛɛ hiɛyaa kpeteŋkpele eji kɛha mi nɛkɛ!
Shi kɛlɛ, yɛ shwane niyeli be lɛ eko mli lɛ, Nyɛminuu Joseph Rutherford ni kwɛɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ yɛ nakai beaŋ lɛ bi koni ekɛ mi awie.
Mɛi sɔrɔtoi ŋɔ mi amɛfee amɛwekui lɛ amli mɔ ko, ni amɛha mina miishɛɛ waa.
Ewa waa kɛha mi akɛ mana bɔ ni hetoo ni ekɛha lɛ kɛ Nuntsɔ lɛ sɔlemɔ, ní mikase yɛ skul lɛ kpãa gbee haa.
46 “No hewɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ nyɛtsɛɔ mi ‘Nuŋtsɔ!
Shi akɛni sɔlemɔ lɛ nyɛɛɛ aha sanebimɔi ni égba minaa kɛjɛ migbekɛbiiashi tɔɔ lɛ ahetoo hewɔ lɛ, suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛha Komunistbii atsɔɔmɔ ákɛ Nyɔŋmɔ bɛ lɛ bada.
11 Ni amɛkɛɛ mi akɛ: “Esa akɛ ogba gbalɛ ni kɔɔ gbɔmɛi kɛ jeŋmaji kɛ wiemɔi kɛ maŋtsɛmɛi pii ahe ekoŋŋ.”
Agbɛnɛ, nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ nɔŋŋ, eeenyɛ efee akɛ be ni aye Hehoo niyenii lɛ atã lɛ, etsɛ David gbalɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ayisɛɛ ekɛɛ: “Mi diɛŋtsɛ mishieŋtsɛ po ni miheɔ lɛ miyeɔ, mɔ ni yeɔ midɛŋ ŋmaa lɛ, efã enane eshi mi.”
+ 29 Mile lɛ,+ ejaakɛ najiaŋdamɔlɔ ni jɛ eŋɔɔ ji mi, ni nakai mɔ lɛ tsu mi.”
Etsɛɛɛ ni ena mihe miishɛɛ, ni ekãa ni ewo mi lɛ ji nɔ̃ titri ni ha mibatsɔ gbɛgbalɔ yɛ sɛɛ mli, taakɛ atsɛɔ be-fɛɛ sɔɔlɔi lɛ.
Atsɔɔɔ nɔ hewɔ, shi beni wɔyashɛ Greece lɛ, akane wolo kroko ni jɛ Nɔyeli Kuu lɛ dɛŋ lɛ atsɔɔ Nitsumɔhe Nine Ajinafoi Akuu lɛ, ní miihala mi akɛ Nitsumɔhe Nine Ajinafoi Akuu lɛ sɛinɔtalɔ yɛ nakai maŋ lɛ mli.
ŊWANEJEE ko bɛ he akɛ Yesu Kristo sɛɛnyiɛlɔi ni darako lɛ yɛ ejwɛŋmɔ mli beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛbaa miŋɔɔ, . . . ni maha nyɛ hejɔɔmɔ” lɛ.
Denielle kɛɛ akɛ: “Le ni mile akɛ Yehowa bɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ, ni ebɔ wɔ kɛ nyɛmɔ ni baaha wɔná edebɔɔ nii lɛ ahe miishɛɛ lɛ haa mileɔ akɛ eesumɔ ni wɔná miishɛɛ.”
(Abɛi 14:10) Ani ókwɛ bɔ ni looflɔ, gbee loo alɔnte ko kwɛɔ ehiɛ yɛ ashwishwɛ mli ni agbɛnɛ etsɔtseɔ, ehũuɔ, aloo etutuaa nɔ ni enaa lɛ dã?
Yɛ Anaigbɛ lɛ, ashwishwɛ ni aaajwa, alɔnte diŋ ni aaana, atswere shishi ni aaanyiɛ, kɛ agbɛnɛ he ni oyɔɔ yɛ Jufɔ loo Sohaa gbi ni ji 13 lɛ fɛɛ ji nibii ni gbɔmɛi buɔ akɛ okadi fɔŋ.
ŊWANEJEE ko kwraa bɛ he akɛ ona alɔnte ni edɔ emli kɛkã shi kɛmiibo miau—shihilɛ ko ni tsɔɔ faŋŋ akɛ etsui enyɔ emli—lɛ pɛŋ.
Tsi ohe kɛjɛ bɔ ni owieɔ oyayaayai lɛ ní ooowa oya nɔŋŋ bɔ ni eekai mɔ ko alɔnte ni tuɔ kɛyaa sɛɛ trukaa beni ena gbee ko lɛ he.
Nɛkɛ aŋkroaŋkroi nɛɛ susuɔ akɛ amɛtsake amɛtsɔmɔ klaŋ, gbée loo alɔnte; yɛ bei komɛi amli hu lɛ amɛtsɔmɔ tsina, taakɛ eji yɛ Nebukadnezar gbɛfaŋ lɛ.”
Yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ, minine shɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ nɔ akɛ mifã kɛya Engadine jɔɔ lɛ mli, he ni mikɛ polisifoi lɛ kwakwe-kɛ-alɔnte shwɛmɔ lɛ tsa nɔ yɛ lɛ.
Efee gbeei kɛ alɔntei kɛ okpɔŋɔi; kooloi wuji kɛ kooloi bibii.
Gbeei baanyɛ ahi shi afii 10 kɛyashi afii 15 loo nɔ̃, taakɛ ekolɛ eji yɛ alɔntei agbɛfaŋ yɛ amɛhenɔ naa lɛ.
Bei komɛi amli lɛ, anaa gbɔmɛi ni yeɔ omanye ni anáa amɛhe miishɛɛ ni akɛ amɛ tsuɔ nii yɛ jarayeli he adafitswai kɛ sinii amli lɛ akɛ amɛmiifee shia falefale, amɛmiibɛɛ shia mli, amɛmiihala jwɛi, aloo amɛmiibɛɛ amɛ alɔŋtei kɛ gbeei ni amɛkɛ amɛ shwɛɔ lɛ ashishi.
Kaa Alɔŋte
Yɛ Anaigbɛ maji lɛ amli lɛ, mɛi pii yabiɔ ŋulamiiaŋkwɛlɔi nɔ ni baaba, amɛsheɔ Sohaa ni yagbeɔ gbi ni ji 13 yɛ nyɔŋ ko nɔ lɛ gbeyei, ni amɛtaooo alɔnte diji.
Nɔ ni fata “kooloi ahe mfonirii” nɛɛ ahe ji okpɔŋɔi, okropɔŋi, laalɔɔi, alɔŋtei, kootsɛi, adowai wuji, ofrote, loofɔlɔ mfonirii, kɛ jata mfonirii (adesã mli bɔɔ nii ni yɔɔ fiji loo gbɔmɔtso ni fiji bɛ he, ni efã kome ji kooloo kɛ ekroko lɛ yitso).
Ashwishwɛi ni ejwara, alɔntei diji, kɛ yibɔ okadii komɛi ji nɔdaamɔ nɔ kɛha apasa hemɔkɛyelii komɛi.
Hiroko ni kase Blɔfo wiemɔ lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ, be ko ni eho lɛ, nɔ ni kɛ́ fee lɛ ekɛɔ yɛ eyitsoŋ ji akɛ: ‘Gbeei kɛ alɔntei ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli lɛ po nuɔ Blɔfo fe mi.’
• Alɔnte diŋ ni bajeɔ mɔ ko gbɛ nɔ lɛ tsɔɔ shade fɔŋ
Miwaŋ gbee loo alɔnte po yi.”
Ewaaa akɛ abaanyɛ anu bɔ ni gbɛɛmɔ ko ni jeee anɔkwale lɛ baanyɛ alaka lɛ lɛ shishi—kɔɔyɔɔ ko ni tswaa waa shikome yɛ tsei amli loo alɔnte ko ni kɛ ehe eshi nɔ ko kɛtswa shi lɛ.—Luka 12:39, 40.
Ákɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ Yitso lɛ, Yesu kɛ ‘gbɔmɛi ha akɛ nikeenii.’
Amrɔ nɛɛ, mɛi ni feɔ Yehowa Odasefoi a-Nɔyeli Kuu lɛ ji Kristofoi nyɔŋma ni afɔ amɛ mu, ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛkɛ afii nyɔŋmai abɔ ená niiashikpamɔ akɛ Kristofoi.
Asafoŋ onukpai lɛ to gbɛjianɔ koni gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi nɛɛ abo asafoŋ kpee shishi nifeemɔi lɛ atoi kɛtsɔ tɛlifoŋ nɔ.
11 Ama su kpakpa ni esa akɛ Kristofoi nɔkwɛlɔi aná lɛ nɔ mi yɛ afii 1800 lɛ naagbee gbɛ, beni ahalaa hii koni amɛbatsɔmɔ gbɛfalɔi ni damɔɔ asafo lɛ najiaŋ koni amɛyatsu Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ ahiamɔ nii ahe nii lɛ.
Paulo wo Kristofoi yei ŋaa akɛ “amɛkɛ atade ni sa kɛ hiɛ ni gboɔ nɔ̃ kɛ jwɛŋmɔ ni sa awula amɛhe”—ni shishitoo mla nɛɛ kɔɔ hii hu ahe.
3 Yɛ Shiɛmɔ Nitsumɔ lɛ Mli: Ani ogbaa Biblia mli nikaselɔ ko wɔjeŋ muu fɛɛ Kristofoi anyɛmimɛi akuu lɛ he sane?
Enɛ efeee Kristofoi anaakpɛɛ ejaakɛ “jeŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ kã mɔ fɔŋ lɛ [Satan] mli.”
Bɔfo Paulo ŋma eyaha enanemɛi Kristofoi lɛ akɛ: “Beni nyɛnine shɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ ni nyɛnu yɛ wɔnaa lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛmɔ mli akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ, taakɛ bɔ ni eji hu lɛɛlɛŋ lɛ, shi jeee akɛ gbɔmɛi awiemɔ ko ni.”
Te esa akɛ wɔbu Kristofoi asafo lɛ wɔha tɛŋŋ, ni mɛni hewɔ?
Eye ebua ni ato asafoi ni feɔ Kristofoi babaoo ni amɛjeee Yudafoi yɛ Korinto, Filipi, Tesalonika, kɛ maji ni yɔɔ Galata lɛ.
Beni agbe Kristofoi a-Hela Ŋmalɛi lɛ anaa lɛ sɛɛ be fioo ko lɛ, Bitinia amralo, ni ji Pliny Bibioo lɛ bɔ amaniɛ akɛ aakpa wɔŋjalɔi asɔlemɔtsũi lɛ amli yaa kwraa, ni ákɛ kooloi ni akɛbashãa afɔle lɛ aniyenii ni ahɔ̃ɔ lɛ nɔ egbɔ kwraa.
Amɛkpooɔ ákɛ amɛaakpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ Yehowa tsɔɔ tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ kuu ni ji Kristofoi ní afɔ amɛ mu lɛ nɔ etsɔɔ ewebii anii.
13:7, 17) Enɛ haa ekomefeemɔ hiɔ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli.
Jiemɔ Anɔkwa Kristofoi Asuɔmɔ Kpo
Ekolɛ Kristofonyo ko nitsumɔtsɛ baake lɛ nɔ ko loo ekɛ shika ko baafata enyɔmɔwoo lɛ he yɛ Blonya beaŋ.
Mɛni Yehowa bi ni Israel maŋtsɛmɛi afee, ni mɛɛ yiŋtoi kɛha taomɔ nii nɛɛ kɔɔ Kristofoi onukpai ahe ŋmɛnɛ?
Taakɛ agba afɔ̃ shi yɛ Kpojiemɔ wolo lɛ mli lɛ, beni amɛhi shi akɛ mɛi ni tsuuu nɔ ko lɛ sɛɛ fioo lɛ, Kristofoi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ ba wala mli ni amɛbɔi nitsumɔ ekoŋŋ.
Ani amɛbaaŋmɛɛ Jeŋmajiaŋbii ahe jwɛŋmɔ fɔŋ ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ he, ní amɛkpɛlɛ Jeŋmajiaŋbii ni abaptisi amɛ etsɛko lɛ anɔ akɛ amɛnyɛmimɛi Kristofoi?
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ wɔɔtsɔ wɔwo nanemɛi Kristofoi krokomɛi ni naa amanehulu lɛ hewalɛ?
5 Kristofoi asafo lɛ mlibii ateŋ mɛi babaoo hiɛ sɔɔ mɛi ni ye amɛbua amɛ ni amɛnu Biblia lɛ shishi lɛ waa.
Ni asaŋ eŋmɛŋ mɛi ni kɛɔ akɛ Kristofoi ji amɛ ni kɛ jamɔ haa kɛtsɔɔ jamɔ he nibii anɔ lɛ ahe.
(b) Te suɔmɔ he hiaa kɛha anɔkwa Kristofoi lɛ tɛŋŋ?
Kɛ́ wɔbaaya nɔ wɔnyiɛ yɛ emuuyeli mli lɛ, esa akɛ wɔjie sui ni tamɔ nakai kpo, titri lɛ kɛ́ wɔmiisɔmɔ akɛ onukpai yɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, tɔmɔ ko kwraa bɛ Kristojamɔ he.”
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ “amaŋfɔ nihii nii lɛ” tsɔ ebɔi nitsumɔ yɛ afi 66 Ŋ.B., ni te Kristofoi lɛ fee amɛnii yɛ enɛ he amɛha tɛŋŋ?
16 Yesu tsɔɔ gbɛ kroko ni ekaselɔi lɛ baatsɔ nɔ akase lɛ be ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikitã, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.”
Yesu fee sane lɛ faŋŋ, beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikitã, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛye mikitãi lɛ anɔ lɛ, nyɛaahi misuɔmɔ lɛ mli; taakɛ bɔ ni mi hu miye mitsɛ kitãi lɛ anɔ ni mihiɔ esuɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ.”—Yohane 15:10.
+ 12 Enɛ ji mikitã lɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔɔ nyɛ lɛ.
+ 16 Kɛ́ obo Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kitãi ni miwoɔ bo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ toi, ni osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ,+ ni onyiɛ egbɛi lɛ anɔ, ni oye ekitãi kɛ emlai kɛ eyiŋkpɛi* lɛ anɔ lɛ, no lɛ, obaaya nɔ ohi shi,+ ni oyi baafa, ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, baajɔɔ bo yɛ shikpɔŋ ni oyaa oyaŋɔ lɛ nɔ.
(2 Mose 3:8) Mose fee enɛ faŋŋ, akɛ: “Kɛji oooye kitai kɛ akpɔi kɛ mlai ni miwoɔo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ, akɛ osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni onyiɛ egbɛ̀i anɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ, no lɛ oyi aaaná wala ni oyi aaafá, ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, aaajɔɔo yɛ shikpɔŋ ni oyaa oyaŋɔ lɛ nɔ.” —5 Mose 30:16; wɔma efã ko nɔ mi.
Beni Mose tsuɔ nii akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ naawielɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe; ejaakɛ no aaaha oyi aná wala ni otsɛ yɛ jeŋ, koni ohi shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa kã otsɛmɛi Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob kita akɛ eeeŋɔha amɛ lɛ nɔ!”—5 Mose 30:19, 20.
Ni mito he miha lɛ akɛ: “Bo toi, minyɛ ni misumɔɔ, ole jogbaŋŋ taakɛ mi hu mile lɛ akɛ misumɔɔ bo waa ni mibuɔ bo hu.
14 Hã eba akɛ oblayoo ní makɛɛ lɛ akɛ, ‘Ofainɛ, okɛ onugbɛ́ lɛ aba shi koni manu nu lɛ eko,’ ní ebaakɛɛ mi akɛ, ‘Nuu eko, ni mahã ofukpɔŋɔi lɛ hu nu’ lɛ, mɔ nɛɛ afee mɔ ni ohala ohã otsulɔ Isak; ni tsɔ enɛ nɔ ohã male akɛ ojie osuɔmɔ ni tsakeee kpo otsɔɔ minuŋtsɔ lɛ.”
4 Be fɛɛ be ni mitsĩɔ otã yɛ misɔlemɔi amli lɛ, midaa mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shi,+ 5 akɛni minuɔ ohemɔkɛyeli lɛ kɛ suɔmɔ ni oyɔɔ kɛhã Nuŋtsɔ Yesu* kɛ agbɛnɛ hu kɛhã mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ fɛɛ* lɛ he daa lɛ hewɔ.
Naa, midamɔ nubu nɛɛ he, ni maŋ lɛŋ bii abiyei lɛ miije kpo miiba nuyɛɛ: ni ha aba mli akɛ oblayoo mɔ ni makɛɛ lɛ akɛ: Miikpao fai, too ogbɛ́ lɛ kɛba shi, ní manu nu lɛ eko, ní eeekɛɛ akɛ: Nuu, ni maha oyomai lɛ hu eko amɛnu lɛ, ha lɛ nɔŋŋ etsɔ mɔ ni ojie oha otsulɔ Isak, ni no maŋɔle akɛ omli ehi yɛ minuntsɔ nɔ.”—1 Mose 24:12-14.
No hewɔ lɛ ekpa Yehowa fai akɛ: “Obalayoo mɔ ni makɛɛ lɛ akɛ: ‘Miikpao fai, too ogbɛ lɛ kɛba shi, ni manu nu lɛ eko,’ ni eeekɛɛ akɛ: ‘Nuu, ni mahã oyoomai lɛ hu eko amɛnu’ lɛ, ha lɛ nɔŋŋ etsɔ mɔ ni ojie oha otsulɔ Isak, ni no maŋɔle akɛ omli ehi yɛ minuntsɔ nɔ.”—1 Mose 24:14.
8 Enɛ nɔŋŋ hewɔ lɛ, eyɛ mli akɛ manyɛ mawie kɛ nɔmimaa babaoo yɛ Kristo mli ni mikɛfã bo koni ofee nɔ ni sa moŋ, 9 shi mikɛ suɔmɔ moŋ miikpa bo fai, mi Paulo, kwɛmɔ bɔ ni miyɔɔ nɛɛ, nuu onukpa, hɛɛ, amrɔ nɛɛ hu po lɛ, awo mi tsuŋ yɛ Kristo Yesu hewɔ.
24 Ataa, miitao ni mɛi ni okɛhã mi lɛ hu kɛ mi ahi he ni miyɔɔ lɛ,+ koni amɛna minunyam ni okɛhã mi lɛ, ejaakɛ osumɔɔ mi dani ato je lɛ shishi.
Beni ekɛ asafoi ni yɔɔ Efeso, Pergamo, kɛ Tiatira wieɔ lɛ ekɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ tsu nii: “Mile onitsumɔi lɛ kɛ odeŋmegbɔmɔ lɛ kɛ otsuishiŋmɛɛ lɛ, kɛ bɔ ni okpɛlɛɛɛ mɛi fɔji lɛ”; “ohiɛ migbɛi lɛ amli, ni okwako mihemɔkɛyeli lɛ”; kɛ “mile onitsumɔi lɛ kɛ osuɔmɔ lɛ kɛ osɔɔmɔ lɛ kɛ ohemɔkɛyeli lɛ kɛ otsuishiŋmɛɛ lɛ, ni mile onitsumɔi lɛ akɛ sɛɛkpee nii lɛ fe tsutsu nii lɛ tete.”
Ataa, mɛi ni oŋɔha mi lɛ, miisumɔ akɛ he ni miyɔɔ lɛ amɛhu amɛkɛ mi abahi jɛi, koni amɛna minunyam ni oŋɔha mi lɛ, ejaakɛ oosumɔ mi dani ato je lɛ shishi.”—Yohane 17:5, 24.
7 David kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Kaashe gbeyei, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, majie suɔmɔ ni tsakeee+ kpo matsɔɔ bo yɛ opapa Yonatan hewɔ, ni mikɛ onii Saul shikpɔji lɛ fɛɛ baahã bo, ni obaaye nii* yɛ mikpɔlɔ lɛ he daa.”
13 “Ni kɛ́ nyɛbaabo kitãi ni miwoɔ nyɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ toi jogbaŋŋ, ní nyɛsumɔ Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ní nyɛsɔmɔ lɛ kɛ nyɛtsui fɛɛ kɛ nyɛsusuma* fɛɛ lɛ,+ 14 no lɛ, mi hu mahã nugbɔ anɛ yɛ nyɛshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ yɛ ebe ni ato lɛ mli, mra mli nugbɔ* kɛ sɛɛkpee nugbɔ,* ni obaabua oŋmaa* kɛ owain hee kɛ omu naa.
Misumɔɔɔ ni minyiɛɔ ohiɛ . . . Ejaakɛ ole nɔ ko, misumɔɔ bo waa.”
15 Enɛ hewɔ ni mi hu, kɛjɛ be ni minu hemɔkɛyeli ni nyɛyɔɔ yɛ Nuŋtsɔ Yesu mli, kɛ suɔmɔ kpo ni nyɛjieɔ nyɛtsɔɔ mɛi krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ fɛɛ lɛ he lɛ, 16 mikpaaa shidaa yɛ nyɛhewɔ lɛ.
(Lala 34:9; Filipibii 4:8, 9) Obaanyɛ oná nɔmimaa akɛ, babaoo ní ofeɔ nakai lɛ, babaoo ni suɔmɔ ni oyɔɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ mli waa, ní onáa suɔmɔ babaoo ohaa nɔ ni esumɔɔ, ní onyɛ̃ɔ nɔ ni enyɛ̃ɔ lɛ waa ji no.
Yesu tsɔɔ yɛ faŋŋ mli akɛ esaaa akɛ wɔsumɔɔ mɛi ni kɛ wɔ yɔɔ hemɔkɛyeli kome mli lɛ pɛ, ejaakɛ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ mɛi ni sumɔɔ nyɛ lɛ [pɛ lɛ], mɛɛ nyɔmɔwoo nyɛyɔɔ?
6 Yesu ma bɔ ni ehe hiaa ni ekaselɔi lɛ ‘aya nɔ amɛsumɔ amɛhenyɛlɔi’ lɛ nɔ mi akɛ: “Shi kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ mɛi ni sumɔɔ nyɛ lɛ, mɛɛ nyɔmɔwoo nyɛyɔɔ?
27 “Shi miikɛɛ nyɛ mɛi ni nyɛboɔ toi nɛɛ akɛ: Nyɛyaa nɔ nyɛsumɔa nyɛhenyɛlɔi, nyɛfea mɛi ni nyɛɔ nyɛ lɛ ekpakpa,+ 28 nyɛjɔa mɛi ni lomɔɔ nyɛ lɛ, nyɛsɔlea nyɛhãa mɛi ni jɛɔ nyɛ lɛ.
Wiemɔi ni Mose kɛ blema Israelbii lɛ wie lɛ hu tsuɔ nii nakai nɔŋŋ, akɛ: “Mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi ana wala, ni osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe.”
Amɛŋɔɔ susuma lɛ naa,* ni amɛtsaa wui lɛ hu.
11:7, 8—Mɛni ji wiemɔ: “Asaŋ la ŋɔɔ, ni kɛ́ hiŋmɛi miina hulu lɛ, eŋɔɔ enaa” lɛ shishi?
(2 Mose 30:34-38) Eŋmajee lɛ bafee nɔ ni ŋɔɔ diɛŋtsɛ.
Beni Israel maŋtsɛ lɛ yaa nɔ ewieɔ sɛɛnamɔ ni sa ni jɛɔ wiemɔ ni awieɔ yɛ nilee mli lɛ mli kɛbaa lɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Naajɔlɛ wiemɔi tamɔ wo agbaku, amɛŋɔɔ susuma naa, ni amɛhaa wui náa hewalɛ.”
Kɛ kalamo* ni nyɛkɛjɛɔ shikpɔŋ ni yɔɔ shɔŋŋ nɔ kɛbaa lɛ he kɛhã mi?
Hɛl la haai lɛ fɛɛ gboi; . . . helai fɛɛ sɛɛ fo kɛjɛ gbɔmɛi ateŋ; . . . saŋkutswaa nibii fɛɛ bɔi gbɛɛmɔ ni jeee akɛ gbɔmɛi miitswa; . . . ŋshɔ agbo lɛ mli nui lɛ tsɔ nu ŋma; . . . jeŋ akpei nyɔŋma lɛ fɛɛ batsɔ fɔfɔii agbo kome ni yɔɔ fɛo fe fɛɛ.”
Yoel wie amɛ shweremɔ lɛ he fɛfɛo akɛ: “Aaaba mli akɛ nakai gbi lɛ nɔ lɛ gɔji lɛ amli aaatsere wein dɔkɔdɔkɔ, ni gɔŋkpɔi lɛ amli aaaho fufɔ, ni Yuda jɔɔi lɛ fɛɛ amli aaaho nu.”
(Kpojiemɔ 5:8) No hewɔ lɛ, tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ni ashãa ni eŋma lɛ ŋɔɔ lɛ feɔ sɔlemɔi ni akpɛlɛɔ nɔ ni Yehowa tsuji kɛhaa shwane kɛ nyɔɔŋ fɛɛ lɛ he mfoniri.—1 Tesalonikabii 3:10; Hebribii 5:7.
“Naajɔlɛ wiemɔi tamɔ wo agbaku, amɛŋɔɔ susuma naa, ni amɛhaa wui náa hewalɛ.”
9:17—Mɛni ji “nu ni aju” lɛ, ni mɛni hewɔ akɛɔ akɛ “eŋɔɔ” lɛ?
Eŋma akɛ, Ŋmalɛi ni atsɔɔ shishi kɛtee wiemɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni gbɔmɛi wieɔ lɛ mli lɛ tamɔ “shɛɛ sane ko ni ŋɔɔ waa ni akɛha kɛjɛ ŋwɛi.”
* Wiemɔi ni ekɛlakaa mɛi ni enine shɛɔ amɛnɔ lɛ ŋɔɔ tamɔ wò ni eshãmɔɔ fe mu.
(Romabii 1:28-32) Etamɔ bɔ pɛ ni gbalɔ Yesaia jaje lɛ: “Kpóo ha mɛi ni tsɛɔ efɔŋ akɛ ekpakpa kɛ ekpakpa hu akɛ efɔŋ! mɛi ni ŋɔɔ duŋ feɔ la, ní amɛŋɔɔ la hu amɛfeɔ duŋ, mɛi ni ŋɔɔ joomɔ feɔ ŋɔɔmɔ, ní amɛŋɔɔ ŋɔɔmɔ amɛfeɔ joomɔ lɛ!
Hebri sht. ŋm., “Ni naabu ni ŋɔɔ lɛ.”
Tookwɛlɔ ni awie ehe yɛ Salomo Lalai lɛ amli lɛ ná ŋma ni Shulamit gbekɛ yoo lɛ atade lɛ jeɔ waa lɛ he miishɛɛ.
Enɛ ni yɔɔ Samson jwɛŋmɔ mli lɛ hewɔ ni ebu Filisti hii 30 ni ji enanemɛi ni ba eyookpeemɔ lɛ shishi lɛ abɛ ko, akɛ: “Niyenii jɛ nɔ̃ yelɔ lɛ mli, ni ŋɔɔmɔ jɛ hewalɔ lɛ mli.”
5 Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, etamɔ bɔ pɛ ni nakai Buu-Mɔɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ wie yɛ baafa 31 lɛ, akɛ: ‘Anɔkwa sane lɛ ji akɛ, kɛji akɛ Kristofonyo ko ŋmɛɛ ehe eha esha ni ehe bahia ni ashwie lɛ lɛ, nibii babaoo ŋmɛɛɔ lɛ: eshidaamɔ kpakpa yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ; naanyobɔɔ kpakpa mli ŋɔɔmɔ ni ekɛ enyɛmimɛi, kɛ ewekumɛi Kristofoi náa lɛ.’
17 “Nu ni aju lɛ, enumɔ ŋɔɔ,
Biblia lɛ maa nɔ mi ehaa wɔ akɛ: ‘Naajɔlɛ wiemɔi ŋɔɔ susuma naa, ni amɛhaa wui náa hewalɛ.’
Maŋ niyenii ni amɛkɛtsuɔ enɛ he nii lɛ ekomɛi ji turrón (sikletɛi ni akɛ ŋmeitso yibii kɛ wo fee), marzipan, aduawai gbiji, too loo ni ashã, kɛ ŋshɔŋloi.
(b) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsɔ ni wɔha wɔsɔlemɔi lɛ atamɔ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ni jeɔ ŋma waa yɛ Yehowa hiɛ?
Be ni eshɛ tso lɛ efɔ̃ nu lɛ mli lɛ, nu lɛ baŋɔɔ.
“Nu ni Aju lɛ, Eŋɔɔ”
Wolokpo lɛ ŋɔɔ yɛ Ezekiel daŋ, ejaakɛ ená jwɛŋmɔ ni ja yɛ enitsumɔ lɛ he
5 Kɛ́ Yehowa webii lɛ kpe kutuu kɛha ejamɔ kɛ e-Wiemɔ lɛ kasemɔ, ní amɛkɛ amɛnanemɛi Kristofoi lɛ bɔ kɛ miishɛɛ lɛ, ejɔɔ amɛ.
Nyɛminuu Swingle kɛɛ: “Eji niiashikpamɔ ni tsɔɔ heshibaa akɛ aaaba biɛ ni aná be koni akɛbo nitsɔɔmɔ toi,” ni ekɛfata he akɛ: “Nyɛshiɔ biɛ nyɛyaa be mli ni awaje nyɛ jogbaŋŋ koni nyɛkɛwo Yehowa nɔ gojoo.”
Sanekpakpa ŋmalalɔi lɛ le akɛ Yesu ehi shi yɛ ŋwɛi pɛŋ dani eba shikpɔŋ nɔ.
* Miŋmɛlɛtswaa lɛ shɛko.”
+ 4 Be ni je etsɛre nɛɛ, esa akɛ wɔtsu mɔ ni tsu mi lɛ nitsumɔi;+ je baana, ni mɔ ko mɔ ko nyɛŋ nii atsu.
Mɛi ni batsɔmɔ heyelilɔi lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo jɛ shɔŋŋshɔŋŋ, ni amɛbɛ niyenii bɔ ni baaha amɛsɛɛ atsɛ yɛ Yerusalem.
Ajie Be Ni Mesia Lɛ Baa Lɛ Kpo
Telefon lɛ nɔ pɛ shiatsɛ lɛ wieɔ yɛ, ejeee kpo ni ekɛ Hatsumi abawie.
Be ni abaabua amale Kristofoi ni jwɛi lɛ feɔ amɛhe mfoniri lɛ anaa kɛjɛ anɔkwa Kristofoi ni ŋmaa lɛ feɔ amɛhe mfoniri lɛ ateŋ lɛ shɛko.
(Yesaia 54:13; Filipibii 4:9) Hɛɛ, mɛi ni boɔ Yehowa tsɔɔmɔi lɛ toi lɛ náa anɔkwa toiŋjɔlɛ.
(1 Mose 3:15) Akɛni Abraham nɔ Seshi lɛ baatsɔ kɛba hewɔ lɛ, eka shi faŋŋ akɛ Satan kɛ nyɛɛ baaba enɔ titri.
Eŋma akɛ: “Mɔ ni jɛ ŋwɛi ba lɛ, efe mɛi fɛɛ” kɛ “Mɔ ni jɛ ŋwɛi ba lɛ, efe mɛi fɛɛ, ni nɔ ni ena ni enu lɛ, no he odase eyeɔ.”
Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔle Yehowa sui lɛ jogbaŋŋ lɛ?
Be ni Yezebel nu akɛ eeba lɛ, ewo ehiŋmɛii asɛɛ, esaa eyitsɔi, ni eyata samfɛlɛ lɛ naa yɛ ŋwɛitsu lɛ nɔ emɛ lɛ.
Yɛ egbii lɛ amli—dani akɛ tsofai ni gbeɔ muawai aaatsu nii—lɛ, no mli lɛ helatsɛmɛi akwɛmɔ bɛ tamɔ bɔ ni wɔnaa lɛ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ.
Wɔ hu wɔyɛ saji ni agba lɛ he miishɛɛ ejaakɛ emaa jɔɔmɔi ni jɛɔ toiboo ni afeɔ ahaa anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ nɔ ni jɛɔ enɔ toigbele mli kɛbaa lɛ nɔ mi.
(Kolosebii 1:26) Beni atuatsemɔ ba Eden lɛ, Yehowa kɛ nibii kpakpai ahe shiwoo ha, ni egba akɛ ‘yoo lɛ seshi lɛ baatswa onufu lɛ yitso nɔ̃.’
7 Ani jeŋ nilelɔi emu sane naa akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ko bɛ akɛni anɔkwalei kɛ odaseyelii tsɔɔ akɛ nakai sane lɛ ji lɛ hewɔ?
Eba, ni mikɛ lɛ gba Biblia lɛ mli saji babaoo ni woɔ mɔ hewalɛ, oya nɔŋŋ kɛkɛ ni ekpɛlɛ koni mikɛ lɛ akase Biblia lɛ daa.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 15:29) Nɔ ni fe nakai lɛ, kɛ sane lɛ bakɔ lá lɛ mli fãi srɔtoi lɛ amli fãi bibii lɛ eko fɛɛ eko ni akɛaatsu nii he lɛ, no lɛ, Kristofonyo fɛɛ Kristofonyo akwɛ jogbaŋŋ ni ekɛ sɔlemɔ asusu sane lɛ he dani ejɛ ehenilee mli ekpɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ eyiŋ eha ehe.
Beni Yakobo tsɔɔ nikeenii nɛɛ amli lɛ, ekɛɛ: “Duromɔ nii kpakpai fɛɛ kɛ nikeenii ni hi kɛwula shi fɛɛ lɛ, ŋwɛi ejɛɔ ekpelekeɔ shi, kɛjɛɔ lai atsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ, mɔ mli ni sutsakemɔ kɛ tsɔ̃mɔ susuma ko bɛ lɛ.”
Kɛ weku lɛ mli bii fɛɛ baa weku nikasemɔ yɛ be naa lɛ, ehaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ naa be ni afiteee he sɛɛ.
Gbɔmɛi ní yɔɔ he fɛɛ he ebaná toiŋjɔlɛ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Yehoram kɛɛ akɛ: “Tsɛ okpɔŋɔnɔtalɔ ko ni otsu lɛ ni ekɛ amɛ ayakpe, ni ohã ebi amɛ akɛ, ‘Ani nyɛmiiba yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli?’”
Kɛ́ mina amɛ fɛɛ yɛ Kristofoi akpeei ashishi lɛ, minuɔ he akɛ nibii ni mikɛshã afɔle kɛba maŋ nɛɛ mli lɛ he eba sɛɛnamɔ.”
No hewɔ lɛ, beni Yesu tsuɔ esɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ, jeee mɛi ni kɛ hemɔkɛyeli bo lɛ toi lɛ amii pɛ kɛkɛ eshɛje, shi moŋ eto shishitoo nɔ ko hu ni baawo mɛi ni baahi shi yɛ afii akpei abɔ ni baaba lɛ mli lɛ hewalɛ.
Te esa akɛ wɔnu Yesu wiemɔi nɛɛ shishi wɔhã tɛŋŋ: “Bo ji Petro, ni tɛsaa nɛɛ nɔ matswa misɔlemɔ lɛ mama”?
Mɛni ole yɛ tsofafeemɔ kɛ nitsumɔ ni lá bɛ mli lɛ he?
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ dɛŋdadei ni Yehowa asafo lɛ eduro wɔ lɛ baanyɛ aye abua wɔ?
Mɛni ole yɛ tsofafeemɔi srɔtoi ni akɛ lá tsuuu nii yɛ mli, ni obaanyɛ ohala eko lɛ he?
Ni amɛmiikane sane ni okaneɔ lɛ nɔŋŋ—“Bɔ ni Wɔɔfee Wɔhi Shi Kɛya Naanɔ.”
21 Kadimɔ akɛ atsɔɔ fɔlɔi bɔ ni amɛaafee ni amɛtsɔɔ amɛbii lɛ “nɛkɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ,” loo kitai lɛ, ákɛ: “Ojwɛŋ nɔ otsɔɔ obii” lɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ ni nyɛ lɛ nyɛyɔɔ gbɛfaa nitsumɔ lɛ mli ni wɔ lɛ wɔma he kome lɛ?”
Amɛkɛɛ akɛ: “Anyɛmi, kwɛmɔ Yudafoi akpei abɔ ni ehé eye nɛɛ; ni amɛ fɛɛ, mla lɛ he hiɛdɔlɔi ji amɛ.
20 Be ni amɛnu enɛ lɛ, amɛwo Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ nyam, shi amɛkɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Anyɛmi, ona akɛ mɛi akpei abɔ ehe Nuŋtsɔ lɛ nɔ amɛye yɛ Yudafoi lɛ ateŋ, ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛji mɛi ni hiɛ dɔɔ Mla lɛ he hu.
Bɔni afee ni onyɛ otsu enɛ hu nii lɛ, kadimɔ saji otii titrii ni yɔɔ sane ni oyaakane lɛ mli lɛ jogbaŋŋ koni oyɔse bɔ ni atsɔɔ enɛɛmɛi amli ahaa lɛ.
Ni kɛlɛ, be fɛɛ be lɛ ofɔlɔi lɛ le akɛ oyɛ hegbɛ ni ohalaa nɔ ni osumɔɔ, ni akɛ amɛnyɛŋ amɛle bɔ ni obaahi shi oha wɔsɛɛ.
Shi nibii komɛi hu yɛ ni esa akɛ asusu he —eji nibii ni kɛ́ oná ole bɔ ni enáa obi lɛ nɔ hewalɛ ehaa lɛ, ehe nitsumɔ waaa tsɔ.
Namɛi fata “jalɔi” ni abaatée amɛ shi lɛ ahe, ni gbohiiashitee he hiɛnɔkamɔ lɛ baanyɛ aná onɔ hewalɛ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, kwɛ bɔ ni ajɔɔ wɔ akɛ wɔyɛ nyɛmifeemɔ ni nyiɛɔ Paulo ŋaawoo nɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ ateŋ, akɛ: “Nyɛkaŋmɛa mligbalamɔi loo yaka anunyam taomɔ gbɛ, shi moŋ nyɛkɛ heshibaa jwɛŋmɔ abubua nyɛnanemɛi fe nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ nyɛhe.”—Filipibii 2:3.
6 Oblahii kɛ oblayei, wɔyɛ he miishɛɛ waa akɛ nyɛmiitso tamɔ kanei yɛ je nɛɛ mli!
No hewɔ lɛ, te esa akɛ wɔnu wiemɔi nɛɛ shishi wɔhã tɛŋŋ: “Bo ji Petro, ni tɛsaa nɛɛ nɔ matswa misɔlemɔ lɛ mama”?
Nɔ ni Yehowa, taiatsɛ lɛ, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛɛ nɛ: “Kɛ́ nyɛtswa nyɛfai shi akɛ nyɛbaaya Ejipt, ni nyɛtee nyɛyahi* jɛmɛ lɛ, 16 no lɛ, klante kome too lɛ nɔŋŋ ni nyɛsheɔ lɛ gbeyei lɛ baabanina nyɛ yɛ jɛmɛ yɛ Ejipt shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni hɔmɔ kome too lɛ nɔŋŋ ni nyɛsheɔ lɛ gbeyei lɛ baanyiɛ nyɛsɛɛ kɛya Ejipt, ni jɛmɛ nyɛbaagboi yɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛji akɛ onu he akɛ mɔ ko kɛ bo eye yɛ gbɛ ni ejaaa nɔ lɛ, ani oyɛ nɔmimaa akɛ onu saji lɛ ashishi bɔ ni eji diɛŋtsɛ, aloo onuuu shishi?
Yesu kɛɛ Farisifoi ni buɔ amɛhe jalɔi, shi kɛlɛ amɛjeee mɛi ni yɔɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛ shinɔi ashwiei! Te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni nyɛ mɛi ni nyɛji mɛi fɔji lɛ, ni nyɛaanyɛ ekpakpa nyɛwieŋ?
Tsɔ hiɛ ni osusu mɛi ni obaanyɛ okɛkpe lɛ ahe, ni osusu bɔ ni obaafee okɛ amɛ aje sanegbaa ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ shishi lɛ he.
(Lala 119:112) Te ooofee tɛŋŋ okanya mɔ ko ní okɛkaseɔ Biblia lɛ tsui?
Ebi klas ni egbe nikasemɔ naa lɛ akɛ: “Te nyɛbaabu nyɛhe nyɛha tɛŋŋ yɛ be mli ni nyɛyaa nyɛ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ?
5 Amɛkɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Yɛ Betlehem+ ni yɔɔ Yudea lɛ, ejaakɛ bɔ ni atsɔ gbalɔ lɛ nɔ aŋma nɛ: 6 ‘Ni bo Betlehem ni yɔɔ Yuda shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, jeee bo ji maŋ ni he ehiaaa kwraa yɛ Yuda amralofoi lɛ ateŋ, ejaakɛ omli amralo ko baajɛ aba, mɔ ni baakwɛ mimaŋ Israel nɔ tamɔ tookwɛlɔ lɛ.’”
+ 10 Ni okɛ odɛŋ nikeenii ni ojɛ osuɔmɔ mli okɛba yɛ bɔ ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ejɔɔ bo ehã lɛ naa+ lɛ aye Otsii Agbi Jurɔ lɛ ohã Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ.
Susumɔ bɔ ni obaanyɛ oná shishitoo mlai ni yɔɔ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ ahe sɛɛ yɛ bɔ ni okɛ ofɔlɔi sharaa ohaa, bɔ ni okɛ shika tsuɔ nii ohaa, kɛ beni okometoo pɛ oyɔɔ he ko lɛ he.
“Eetswa esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ ojo dɔlai akpekpei abɔ, ni ekɛ shika lɛ eko miihe shiai, kar srɔtoi, ekɛfãa gbɛ kɛyaa hejɔɔmɔ, ni eko po hé gbee tsu ni tsɔne ni haa tsu mli jɔɔ yɔɔ mli.”—People’s Daily Graphic, October 7, 1989.
Oya nɔŋŋ ni misɔle miha Yehowa ni mikɛɛ nuu lɛ akɛ: ‘Hɛloo, mikaiɔ sane ni wɔgba ŋmɛnɛ ji gbii etɛ lɛ, ni mikaiɔ ogbee lɛ hu.
Mina hewalɛ saŋŋ yɛ opireshɛn lɛ sɛɛ kɛyashi gbee wulu ko hu batsi mi egbee shi.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ale gbeei akɛ amɛkɛ toiboo ni sa kɛ hedɔɔ haa amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi.
Gbii enyɔ sɛɛ lɛ, mimami tswa mi tɛlifoŋ koni eha male akɛ skul ni atsɔseɔ gbeei ni tsɔɔ shwilafoi agbɛ yɛ lɛ miimɛ̃ mi.
Shi kɛlɛ, etee nɔ ejie faishitswaa ni ma shi shiŋŋ kpo be fɛɛ be akɛ ebaahiɛ emuuyeli mli eha Yehowa ni ekwaŋ Lɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Jamɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi komɛi etswa amɛshishi bii lɛ ojo ni amɛkɛná shika pii, ni amɛkɛ shika ni amɛnáa lɛ eko ehe shĩai kɛ tsɔji ni jara wala—ni amɛteŋ mɔ ko po kɛ shika lɛ eko hé gbee tsu ni ɛɛkɔndishɛŋ yɔɔ mli.
Yoo lɛ to he eha lɛ akɛ: “Shi bɛ shifɔji abii lɛ hu yeɔ fufuji ni shwieɔ amɛnuntsɔmɛi akpɔlɔi lɛ ashishi lɛ eko!”
4:7-9) Be ko be ni wɔmiishiɛ yɛ akrowa ko mli lɛ, mɛi ŋmɛɛ amɛgbei wuji ahe amɛwo wɔ.

6 “Nyɛkɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ nii akahãa gbei, ni nyɛkashɛrɛa nyɛdiagbai nyɛshwiea kpolotoi ahiɛ,+ kɛjeee nakai lɛ, amɛbaanaanaa nɔ yɛ amɛnajiashi ni amɛbaatsɔmɔ amɛhe amɛbatserɛ nyɛmli.
3 “‘Ni mahã amanehului srɔtoi ejwɛ* aba amɛnɔ,’+ Yehowa kɛɛ, ‘klante ni baagbe amɛ, gbei ni baagbala amɛ kɛya, kɛ ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kooloi ni baaye amɛ ni amɛkpãtã amɛhiɛ.
Gbee Jata Aduŋ
Akɛ fɔbitɛ shɔ̃ gbee ni akɛma esãi lɛ nɔ.
Nɔ ni mina lɛ tamɔ wolo momo ko mli mfoniri: Nuu onukpa ko ta maŋoo nɔ, gbee ko ewɔ yɛ tso ko shishi, kɛ tsinai enyɔ ni akɛ tso ewo amɛkuɛ ni afi amɛ akpɛtɛ shwiili ko ni akɛ tsei efee etai lɛ he.
Young wie amale gbalɔi nɛɛ ahe akɛ: “Jeee hiɛnyiɛlɔi ji amɛ, shi kɛ́ amɛnyiɛ hiɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ asɛɛ kɛmiiya he ni amɛyaa lɛ, amɛwoɔ amɛyiteŋ mulu ni amɛkɛ amɛhe fũfũaa amɛ, tamɔ gbee ní kɛ miishɛɛ miitswa elei.”—Okɛto 2 Timoteo 4:3 he.
26 Ehã lɛ hetoo akɛ: “Ejaaa akɛ akɔɔ bii lɛ ablodo lɛ ni ashɛɔ afɔ̃ɔ gbeebii lɛ ahiɛ.”
Abaashɛ Maŋnyɛ Izebel yiwalɔ lɛ afɔ̃ aha gbeei, ni enáŋ fũu kpakpa.—2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 9:1-10.
Nɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ji akɛ, aná Blɔfo wiemɔ ni atsɔɔ shishi akɛ “fɛoyeli” lɛ kɛjɛ Hela feemɔ wiemɔ mli, ni eshishinumɔ diɛŋtsɛ ji “ní aaashɛte loo tamɔ gbeei.”[
Okɛ sɛɛyoomɔ atsu nii kɛ́ gbee ko miibolɔ eewo oyi lɛ.
+ 13 Hazael kɛɛ akɛ: “Te aaafee tɛŋŋ otsulɔ baafee nɔ ko tamɔ nɛkɛ, ejaakɛ gbee kɛkɛ ji mi?”
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ mɛi krokomɛi abéi ni akɛ he woɔ mli lɛ tamɔ mɔ ni mɔɔ gbee ni miiho toii amli yɛ?
(Yohane 7:1-10) Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛkaŋɔa nɔ ni ji krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ nyɛhaa shifɔ̃ji.”
Mɔ ni kɛ gwantɛŋ shãa afɔle lɛ, etamɔ mɔ ni kuɔ gbee kuɛ nɔŋŋ.
Nii ni ba trukaa ni amɛkpaaa gbɛ nɛɛ ha amɛlaaje amɛbiyoo koome pɛ ni amɛyɔɔ lɛ kɛ abifao ni baafee amɛ klɛŋklɛŋ nabi lɛ.
Beni wɔbote gbalashihilɛ mli afii enumɔ sɛɛ lɛ, mifɔ binuu fɛfɛo, ni wɔwo lɛ Saúl.
6 Yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ diɛŋtsɛ be ni eto mli—beni amɛnu shiwoo lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa lɛ sɛɛ be kakadaŋŋ mli lɛ—Abraham ní eye afii 100 kɛ Sara ni eye afii 90 lɛ fɔ́ binuu Isak.
Abifao gbele ni baa trukaa lɛ ji oshara ni kumɔɔ mɔ kwraa.
(Yesaia 2:4) Eyɛ mli akɛ enɛ kɛ wɔ gbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ ba naagbee moŋ, shi mɔ̃ ni amɔ̃ John lɛ bafee tamɔ nɔ ni ajɛ ŋwɛi afee, ejaakɛ no mli lɛ eshwɛ fioo ni mafɔ, ni ebaanyɛ eye ebua wɔ.
Etamɔ nɔ ni nakai ŋmɔlɔ lɛ miitsɔɔ hedɔɔ yɛ gbɛ ni ekaaa nɔ, abifao ko suɔmɔ nɔheremɔ yɛ efɔlɔi asuɔmɔ ni amɛjie lɛ kpo lɛ he.
Mɛɛ be nɛ ni mikɛ mihefatalɔ lɛ wie wɔhe sane moŋ fe nɔ ni mikɛ lɛ aaawie wɔbi lɛ pɛ he?
Gbɔmɛi nyɛŋ abɔ loofɔlɔ bi, fɔfɔi, loo nɔ kroko ni yɔɔ wala mli.

Mligbalamɔ ni fata he ni jɛ Biblia lɛ mli akɛ wala yɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ ejaakɛ ‘Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ wala nubu yɔɔ’ lɛ tsɔ yoo lɛ yiŋ ni eha ebifao lɛ hi shi.
Gay tsɔɔ mli akɛ, mɛi ni teeɔ hetsɛ̃ shi yɛ Britania kɛ France lɛ ka amɛyiŋ amɛtã saji ni kɔɔ German asraafoi ni miimɔmɔ yei ekaa naa ni miigbe gbekɛbii bibii ahe.
Vicky ji abifao gbekɛ yoo fɛfɛo ko—ni yɔɔ gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ, ehe yɛ fɛo, ni ehe yɛ miishɛɛ.
Aŋsɔ lɛ fã nɛɛ ji nɔ ni haa wekukpãa ni yɔɔ gbagbalii bakãa nyɛmɛi kɛ amɛbii ateŋ lɛ.”
Enyɛ gbo beni eji abifao, ni akɛni etsɛ taooo lɛ hewɔ lɛ, eyashi lɛ yɛ enaa ŋɔɔ.

2 Yɛ nɔ ni shɛɔ gbii 270 mli lɛ, klɛŋklɛŋ wala yibii ni abɔ yɛ nyɛ lɛ musuŋ kɛtsɔ bɔlɛnamɔ ni tee nɔ yɛ ekɛ abifao lɛ tsɛ lɛ teŋ lɛ daa ni etsɔɔ abifao ni wala yibii akpekpei toi akpekpei abɔ yɔɔ emli.
(2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 11:1) Ahazia binuu abifao ni ji Yehoash pɛ yi abaa, ni beni aŋɔ lɛ atee afii ekpaa sɛɛ lɛ, awo lɛ Yuda nɔ maŋtsɛ.
Beni ŋwɛibɔfoi lɛ ŋɔ adesa gbɔmɔtsei ni amɛkɛ yei ná bɔlɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, amɛbii lɛ badara ni amɛbatsɔmɔ asaabui.
Shi, redio ni amɔmɔ wiemɔi awo nɔ (ni abaanyɛ atswa aha gbɔmɛi babaoo) lɛ tsii saŋŋ, no hewɔ lɛ, wɔkɛwoɔ abifabii atso shwilii ko mli ni wɔtsiɔ.
Ni yɛ amɛsɛɛ shɔŋŋ lɛ, anaa susumai kɛ abifabii babaoo ni hiɛ fiji ni amɛmiifiliki kɛmiibɔle shi.

16 Be ko lɛ, yoo ko ni yɔɔ maŋsɛɛ lɛ kɛ ewu kpɛ amɛyiŋ akɛ, amɛkɛ amɛbinuu ni amɛfɔ lɛ baayahã nuu lɛ fɔlɔi yɛ maŋ nɔ he ni amɛjɛ lɛ.
Te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni aaafee fufɔo ko ni ebe shɛɛɛ kwraa ni afɔ lɛ lɛ tsofa ni la bɛ mli?

53 Mligbálamɔ baaba amɛteŋ, tsɛ baate shi awo binuu ni binuu baate shi awo tsɛ, nyɛ baate shi awo biyoo ni biyoo baate shi awo nyɛ, shaayoo baate shi awo ebi ŋa, ni ŋa baate shi awo eshaayoo.”

*+ 40 Okɛ ashikishaŋ kpakpa efa susumɔnɔ* mlijai nyɔŋma mli ekome ni akɛ oliv mu hin* mlijai ejwɛ mli ekome efutu, kɛ wain hin mlijai ejwɛ mli ekome ní akɛbaahã akɛ dãa afɔle lɛ afata klɛŋklɛŋ gwantɛŋnuu* lɛ he.

31 “Okɛ Israelbii lɛ awie akɛ, ‘Enɛ baaya nɔ afee mufɔɔ mu krɔŋkrɔŋ kɛhã mi yɛ nyɛyinɔi fɛɛ amli.
Mɛi ni ji kwashiai lɛ hole amɛkanei lɛ, shi amɛŋɔɔɔ mu amɛfataaa he. Shi nilelɔi lɛ ŋɔ mu wo amɛtɔi amli amɛfata amɛkanei lɛ ahe.”
Abaanyɛ akɛ mu ato shika tsuru ni esere he —abuɔ lɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ ni akɛtsuɔ nii yɛ gbɛi babaoo nɔ.

9 “‘Shi Hejɔɔmɔ Gbi+ lɛ nɔ lɛ, afɔle ni akɛbaaba lɛ afee gwantɛŋbii enyɔ ni ji hii ni kpa ko bɛ amɛhe ní eko fɛɛ eko eye afi, kɛ ashikishaŋ kpakpa efa mlijai nyɔŋma mli enyɔ ni akɛ mu efutu kɛhã ŋmaa afɔle, kɛ ehe dãa afɔle.

Shi tsɔɔlɔi ni tsɔɔ jamɔ he saji lɛ etsake Biblia tsɔɔmɔi lɛ ahiɛ kwraa; enɛ eha mɛi babaoo ená susumɔ akɛ amɛnyɛŋ amɛnu Biblia lɛ shishi. —Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:29, 30.
Tsɔɔlɔ lɛ kpɛlɛ nɔ.
“Kasemɔ Tsɔɔlɔ Kpele Lɛ” ji nakai shwane lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ wiemɔ.
Gbi ni Ji Etɛ—Nyɛfea Tsɔɔlɔi yɛ Be lɛ Hewɔ
+ 12 Toohelɔi po ba koni abaptisi amɛ,+ ni amɛbi lɛ akɛ: “Tsɔɔlɔ, mɛni esa akɛ wɔfee?”
Kaimɔ bɔ ni Tsɔɔlɔi kpeteŋkpelei lɛ kɛ henumɔi nɛɛ etsu nii eha lɛ, ni obɔ mɔdɛŋ ni okase amɛ yɛ mɔdɛŋ ni obɔɔ koni onine ashɛ mɛi krokomɛi anɔ lɛ mli.
Etsɛɛɛ kwraa ni tsɔɔlɔ kroko ni miiho lɛ yɔse miishɛɛ ni aná yɛ klastsu lɛ mli lɛ ni ebi nɔ ni yaa nɔ.
Ezra fee nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa efɔ̃ shi eha wɔ ákɛ mɔ ko ni kɛ hiɛdɔɔ kaseɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ, ni ehe esa hu kɛ mɛi krokomɛi anitsɔɔmɔ.
(1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 3:7-14; Mateo 12:42) Esa akɛ Yesu nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ akanya tsɔɔlɔi kɛ ŋaawolɔi ní yɔɔ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli lɛ ní amɛha amɛgbɛtsɔɔmɔi lɛ adamɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ nɔ be fɛɛ be.—Abɛi 21:30.
Nyɛnyiɛa esɛɛ,+ 14 ni he fɛɛ he ni ebaayabote lɛ, nyɛkɛa shĩatsɛ lɛ akɛ, ‘Tsɔɔlɔ lɛ kɛɛ: “Nɛgbɛ gbɔiatsũ lɛ ni mi kɛ mikaselɔi lɛ baaye Hehoo lɛ yɛ mli lɛ yɔɔ?”’
Kpee lɛ shishi sɛinɔtalɔ lɛ kɛ miishɛɛ here mɛi ni eba kpee lɛ atuu kɛ wiemɔ ni ji “Nyɛhaa Atsɔɔa Nyɛ Nii, Nyɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ Tsɔɔlɔi.”
Shi ani eji anɔkwale akɛ niiashikpamɔi ji gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni atsɔɔ nɔ akaseɔ nii, taakɛ afɔɔ kɛɛmɔ lɛ?
3 Ha Atsɔse Bo: Wɔ-Tsɔɔlɔ ni Fe Fɛɛ, ni ji Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ tsɔseɔ wɔ kɛtsɔ nikasemɔ he gbɛjianɔtoo ni damɔ Biblia lɛ nɔ ni ekɛhaa wɔ daa lɛ nɔ, bɔni afee ni wɔhe asa akɛ tsɔɔlɔi.
Kɛ́ tsɔɔlɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ ma niiamlitsɔɔmɔ ni akɛha klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ nɔ mi lɛ, ebaaha yiŋkɔshikɔshifeemɔ ni skulbii lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo yɔɔ lɛ sɛɛ afo.
Miwo hewalɛ koni ebi yelikɛbuamɔ yɛ skul, shi Jenny kɛɛ etsɔɔlɔ lɛ yitsoŋ wa, no hewɔ lɛ enyɛŋ ebi.
Mifɔlɔi, ni ji Atkinson kɛ Pattie Padgett, ji Hɔgbaa-skul tsɔɔlɔi kɛ Primitive Methodist Sɔlemɔ, ni Ataa tswaa saŋku ehaa amɛ lɛ lalɔi akuu lɛ mli bii.
Skul he ŋaawolɔi, tsɔɔlɔi, kɛ klasbii baabɔ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛkɔne amɛyiŋ ni amɛhala je lɛŋ heloonaa nibii asɛɛdii.
Eha hetoo akɛ jeŋmaji babaoo kɛ amɛhe baawuu tai, hɔmɔ, tsɛŋemɔ helai, shikpɔŋhosomɔi, mlakwamɔ ní baafa babaoo, amale jamɔ mli tsɔɔlɔi ní baalaka mɛi babaoo, nyɛ̃ɛ kɛ yiwaa ní akɛaaba enɔkwa sɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ anɔ, ni suɔmɔ ní ayɔɔ kɛha jalɛ nifeemɔ lɛ he baajɔ kwraa yɛ mɛi pii agbɛfaŋ.
Afi 1970 lɛ, afee woji ni ji Tsɔɔlɔ Kple lɛ Toiboo, Your Youth—Getting the Best out of It, kɛ Mi-Wolo ni Gbaa Biblia Mli Saji.
Shi mɔ ni wie sane ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ ji Biblia mli tsɔɔlɔ ko ni he esa kɛ maŋshiɛmɔ hamɔ, ní eji nɔkwɛlɔ gbɛfalɔ.
Tsɔɔlɔi ni nuɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ lɛ yɔseɔ akɛ anɔkwa jamɔ jeee anɔkwalei komɛi ni aaakase awo yitsoŋ ni ahi shi yɛ mlai komɛi anaa kɛkɛ.
Wɔkaneɔ akɛ: “Lɛ nɔŋŋ eha mɛi komɛi tsɔmɔ bɔfoi, ni mɛi komɛi gbalɔi, mɛi komɛi hu sanekpakpa jajelɔi, ni mɛi komɛi hu nɔkwɛlɔi kɛ tsɔɔlɔi, koni aŋɔsaa hetselɔi lɛ aha sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ . . .
Ni kɛlɛ, afite nɛkɛ mlai nɛɛ, ni bɔ ni tsɔ̃ɔlɔ fɛɛ tsɔ̃ɔlɔ kɛtsuɔ nii ehaa lɛ yɛ sɔrɔto kwraa.
16 Yɛ kusumii komɛi amli lɛ, fɔlɔi, mɛi ni edara yɛ afii amli, kɛ tsɔɔlɔi jɛɛɛ amɛtsui mli amɛjieee oblahii kɛ oblayei ayi, ejaakɛ amɛsusuɔ akɛ ekolɛ yijiemɔ ni tamɔ nakai baaha amɛmii ashɛ nɔ ni amɛfeɔ lɛ he loo ni amɛwó amɛhe nɔ.
7. (a) Akɛ gbekɛbii toɔ mɛni he yɛ Biblia lɛ mli?
Sane lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Ni maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛɛ Ashpenaz, epiafoi lɛ anukpa lɛ, akɛ ejie gbekɛbii hii komɛi yɛ Israelbii ni ji maŋtsɛ seshibii kɛ abladei lɛ ateŋ, gbekɛbii ni kpa ko bɛ amɛhe, ni amɛhe yɔɔ fɛo ni amɛaanyɛ ŋaa-fɛɛ-ŋaa amɛkase, ni amɛle nii, ni amɛyɔɔ jwɛŋmɔ, ni amɛaanyɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ mɔ̃ɔ lɛŋ amɛdamɔ.” —Daniel 1: 3, 4.
34 Yesu kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Je nɛɛ* mli bii lɛ boteɔ gbalashihilɛ mli ni akɛ amɛ hãa gbãla, 35 shi mɛi ni abu amɛ akɛ amɛji mɛi ni sa akɛ amɛnine shɛɔ nakai je lɛ* kɛ shitee kɛmiijɛ gbohii ateŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ boteŋ gbalashihilɛ mli, ni akɛ amɛ hãŋ gbãla hu.
Tsɔsemɔ ni suɔmɔ yɔɔ mli he hiaa gbekɛbii koni amɛjie sui ni esaaa lɛ kɛje amɛmli.
Mɛni ji nɔ ni akɛɛ fɔlɔi ni ji Israel lɛ ni amɛfee koni amɛtsɔse amɛbii lɛ, ni mɛni no tsɔɔ?
5 Dani kpee be lɛ aaashɛ lɛ, fɔlɔi komɛi ena akɛ eji nɔ ni yeɔ ebuaa waa akɛ amɛkɛ amɛbii lɛ atĩ subaŋi ni akpaa gbɛ kɛjɛɔ amɛdɛŋ lɛ mli.
Minyɛɔ minaa Yesu shiwoo lɛ kpetekpelee: “Mɔ ko bɛ ni eshi shia loo nyɛmimɛi hii loo nyɛmimɛi yei loo tsɛ loo nyɛ loo ŋa loo bii loo abɔi yɛ mi kɛ sanekpakpa lɛ hewɔ, ní enaŋ shiai kɛ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ nyɛmimɛiyei kɛ nyɛmɛi.”
Mɛni gbekɛbii baanyɛ akase kɛjɛ amɛfɔlɔi asɔlemɔi atoi ni amɛboɔ lɛ mli?
Gbekɛbii krokomɛi lɛ kɛɛ: “Jeee Ɔrtodɔks Kristofonyo ni.”
Afeɔ gbekɛbii babaoo niseniianii, amamɔɔ amɛ atswɛrɛ waa, loo agbeɔ amɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ yiwalɛ nifeemɔhei fe fɛɛ lɛ ateŋ ekome mli—shia lɛ!
10 Gbɛ kroko ni hi ní fɔlɔi baanyɛ atsɔ nɔ amɛha amɛbii lɛ abo Yehowa toi ji ni amɛkɛ amɛ afɔ weku Biblia mli nikasemɔ feemɔ.
Afrikayoo ko kɛ yiŋtoo kroko hewɔ ni fɔlɔi kɛ amɛbii egbaaa bɔlɛnamɔ he sane lɛ ha: “Beni miji gbekɛ lɛ, mifɔlɔi ni ji Odasefoi lɛ kɛ mi egbaaa bɔlɛnamɔ he saji, no hewɔ lɛ ebako mijwɛŋmɔ mli pɛŋ akɛ mikɛ mibii agba enɛɛmɛi ahe saji.”
Ŋamɛi lɛ ekomɛi nyɛ amɛkɛ amɛwumɛi tee, ni amɛyaye amɛbua amɛ yɛ tsumaa nitsumɔhe lɛ, ni mɛi krokomɛi hu yɛ bii ni miiya skul ni esa akɛ amɛkwɛ amɛ aloo weku lɛ nitsumɔ ni esa akɛ amɛtsu.
Mɛi ni ebaanyɛ eba amɛnɔ fe fɛɛ ji ohiafoi kɛ mɛi ni efi amɛ lɛ, titri lɛ, yei, gbekɛbii, mɛi ni egbɔlɔ kɛ abobalɔi.”
Shi, eyɛ dɔlɛ akɛ abaakɛɛ akɛ onukpai komɛi sumɔɔ ni amɛkɛ gbekɛbii aná bɔlɛ.
41 Gbekɛbii Ni Haa Nyɔŋmɔ Náa Miishɛɛ
Kɛ́ ebaahi lɛ, esa akɛ gbekɛbii lɛ aná amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛ-Biblia, lala wolo, kɛ wolo ni akaseɔ lɛ.
Kɛ aatsɔɔ gbekɛbii lɛ bɔ ni atsɛɔ gbɔmɔtso lɛ hei komɛi lɛ, esaaa ni afoɔ amɛyayaiaŋ ashĩɔ tamɔ nɔ ni nomɛi atsɛmɔ yɛ hiɛgbele yɛ gbɛ ko nɔ.
Nii ni Obaatsu ni Okɛhere Obii lɛ Ayiwala
Kɛ́ amɛyɛ bii lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ buɔ amɛbii lɛ fɛɛ akɛ amɛyɛ “krɔŋŋ,” ni tsɔɔ akɛ, ebuɔ amɛhe.
11, 12. (a) Mɛɛ tsuishiŋmɛɛ he kaa Yehowa Odasefoi kɛ amɛbii kɛkpe yɛ 1930 afii lɛ kɛ 1940 afii lɛ shishijee mli?
5 No sɛɛ lɛ, Yakob shi Beer-sheba, ni Israel bihii lɛ ŋɔ amɛtsɛ Yakob kɛ amɛbii lɛ kɛ amɛŋamɛi lɛ amɛtara shwiilii ní Farao kɛtsu ní akɛbawó lɛ lɛ amli.
+ 4 Shi kɛ́ yoo okulafo ko yɛ bii loo nabii lɛ, amɛkase Nyɔŋmɔjamɔ yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛshĩa klɛŋklɛŋ,+ ni amɛto amɛfɔlɔi kɛ amɛniimɛi kɛ amɛnaamɛi anajiaŋ kɛ nɔ ni sa amɛ,+ ejaakɛ enɛ sa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ.
Taakɛ fɔlɔ ko ni ebii bibii lɛ abolɔmɔ kɛ amɛfitirifitirifeemɔ efeee lɛ ahuntoo dɔŋŋ lɛ feɔ lɛ, Kojo haaa ni aduŋ lɛ nifeemɔ lɛ agbala ejwɛŋmɔ, ni ekɛ ejwɛŋmɔ ma nikasemɔ lɛ nɔ.
Kɛ́ gbekɛbii kpa shi amɛna akɛ amɛfɔlɔi lɛ haa amɛ “hɛɛ” feɔ hɛɛ ni amɛ “dabi” feɔ dabi—kɛ́ no biɔ ni amɛgbala gbekɛbii lɛ atoi po lɛ—ehaa gbekɛbii lɛ nuɔ he akɛ amɛyɛ shweshweeshwe diɛŋtsɛ, ni amɛnáa bulɛ kɛ suɔmɔ babaoo amɛhaa amɛfɔlɔi lɛ.—Mateo 5:37.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, hiɛsɔɔ kɛha suɔmɔ ni mli kwɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Kristo ejie lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ wɔ lɛ kanya wɔ koni wɔjɔɔ wɔwala nɔ wɔha Nyɔŋmɔ ní wɔbatsɔmɔ Kristo kaselɔi.—Yohane 3:16; 1 Yohane 4:10, 11.
(Yesaia 56:6, 7) Beni afii akpe lɛ baaba naagbee lɛ, no mli lɛ akɛ anɔkwafoi lɛ fɛɛ eba adesa emuuyeli mli kɛtsɔ Yesu Kristo kɛ enanemɛi osɔfoi 144,000 lɛ asɔɔmɔ lɛ nɔ.
Nɔ ni haa amɛkɛɔ enɛ titri lɛ ji Odasefoi lɛ ashidaamɔ ni damɔ Biblia lɛ nɔ, yɛ nibii tamɔ lá ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli, he ní akɛwooo maŋ saji amli, tawa shɛremɔ, kɛ jeŋbai gbohii lɛ hewɔ.
Saji pii yɛ Ŋmalɛ lɛ mli ni hãa wɔnaa akɛ Yehowa yeɔ ebuaa etsuji yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ.
5. (a) Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔle nɔ ni ebiɔ dani mɔ ko atsɔ “asafo babaoo” ni baana yibaamɔ lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome lɛ?
Ekolɛ obaabi akɛ, ‘Ani anɔkwa sane ni ji akɛ etamɔ nɔ ni Yehowa efeko nɔ ko yɛ mikaa lɛ he lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ eleee shihilɛ mli ni miyɔɔ lɛ, loo ákɛ esusuuu mihe?’
Shi kɛbashi amrɔ nɛɛ, ani obi nuu lɛ kã he esumɔɔ osane ni ebuɔ bo lolo?
Kadimɔ bɔ ni aha nakai sanebimɔi lɛ ahetoo aha yɛ Kpojiemɔ wolo lɛ mli.
19 Wɔyɛ miishɛɛ waa akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ e-Wiemɔ ni ji Biblia lɛ eha wɔ, ni akɛ wɔkɛ emli shɛɛ sane ni yɔɔ hewalɛ lɛ miitsu nii kɛmiifamɔ apasa tsɔɔmɔi kɛ amɛshishi koni wɔnine ashɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ tsui kpakpa lɛ anɔ!
6:2) Yɛ nakai beaŋ lɛ, akɛɛ Maŋtsɛ hee nɛɛ akɛ: “Ye lumɔ yɛ ohenyɛlɔi lɛ ateŋ!”
Shi yɛ nɛkɛ be nɛɛ mli lɛ, bɔfo lɛ ni jɛ ŋwɛi ni je agbo, ni enunyam ha shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ kpɛ lɛ maa nɔ ni etsɔɔ lɛ nɔ mi!
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ dabi; no hewɔ lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni ohiɛ asɔ sui kpakpai ni ohefatalɔ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ, ni oha ohiɛsɔɔ lɛ aje kpo yɛ owiemɔi amli.—Abɛi 31:28.
Ekolɛ ehe bahia ni oyatsu weku mli gbɛnaa nii komɛi ahe nii, no hewɔ ni oshi amɛteŋ lɛ.
Bɔ ni wiemɔ lɛ gbɛɛɔ kɛjɛɔ sɛŋ ni afolɔɔ nɔ kpitiokpitio, emli gbeeŋ gbɛɛmɔi okadii babaoo ni yɔɔ mli ni eko nyiɛ eko sɛɛ (aaafee enumɔ sɔŋŋ yɛ wiemɔ kome mli lɛ), kɛ daaŋ gbɛɛmɔi okadii fioo pɛ ni yɔɔ mli lɛ ha maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi lɛ anijiaŋ je wui.
Tɛsaa Lɛ.
Be ni abaabua amale Kristofoi ni jwɛi lɛ feɔ amɛhe mfoniri lɛ anaa kɛjɛ anɔkwa Kristofoi ni ŋmaa lɛ feɔ amɛhe mfoniri lɛ ateŋ lɛ shɛko.
Nakai ni amɛfeɔ lɛ haa amɛjieɔ amɛjwɛŋmɔ kɛjɛɔ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛnaagbai lɛ anɔ, ni amɛkɛ amɛjwɛŋmɔ maa nibii ni hi titri lɛ anɔ.—Fil.
(Kpojiemɔ 20:12, 13) Bɔfo Yohane ŋma ninaa kroko ni ajie atsɔɔ lɛ ni baaba mli yɛ Kristo Yesu Afii Akpe Nɔyeli lɛ mli lɛ he sane efɔ̃ shi yɛ Kpojiemɔ yitso 21 lɛ mli.
19 Nɔ ni ji ejwɛ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔtao mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ejaakɛ suɔmɔ ji mumɔ lɛ yibii lɛ eko.
*+ 11 Kɛkɛ ni ekwɔ kɛba ekoŋŋ ni ebaje niyeli lɛ shishi* ni eye nii.
Mlibaa ni Yɔɔ Gbeyei Kã Amɛhiɛ Nɔŋŋ
No hewɔ lɛ, wɔná miishɛɛ waa akɛ wɔná wɔle akɛ nyɛsɛɛ afi lɛ kpokpaa wulu nɔ kpee lɛ saneyitso lɛ baafee “Nyɔŋmɔ Gbalɛ Wiemɔ” lɛ.
Okpɔŋɔ Nɔtalɔ ni ta okpɔŋɔ yɛŋ lɛ nɔ ni yeɔ kunim yɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ nɔ lɛ baajie amɛ kɛya kwraa yɛ naagbee.
15 Kpɔmɔ nɔ lɛ ji hiɛnɔkamɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni adesai yɔɔ, shi jeee susumɔ folo ko ni ana akɛ susuma lɛ hiɔ shi yɛ gbele sɛɛ.
Nyɛkakasea kɛkɛ, bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni onine ashɛ tsuii lɛ anɔ.—7/15, baafa 18.
Nibii ni shikpɔŋhosomɔ lɛ fite lɛ ha nu, gas kɛ srawa hewalɛ ahe basɛ̃.
Kɛ́ wɔyɛ pɛtro yɛ wɔtsɔne lɛ mli lɛ, wɔyaa nɔ wɔshiɛɔ ni wɔkɛ wɔhiɛ fɔ̃ɔ Yehowa nɔ kwraa.”
(Gal 5:22) Yɛ Yehowa yelikɛbuamɔ naa lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔye wɔgbeyeishemɔi anɔ, ni wɔkɛ ekãa baashiɛ.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, kɛ wɔmiiya shikpɔŋ kuku ko mli lɛ, mikɛ pɛtrol hɔɔmɔ hei anɔtsɛmɛi lɛ ekomɛi wieɔ ni migbalaa mli mikɛtsɔɔ amɛ akɛ wɔkɛ tsɔnei etɛ tsuɔ nii daa gbi yɛ wɔ-Kristofoi anitsumɔ lɛ hewɔ.
KƆƆYƆƆ ni ebɔɔ yɔɔ mli, ni akɛtutua mɛi yɛ Tokyo, Japan, shikpɔŋ shishi nyiɛmɔ hé yɛ March 1995 mli lɛ gbe gbɔmɛi 12, ni ewo akpei abɔ krokomɛi ahela, ni eye ebua ni akɛjie teemɔŋ sane ko kpo.
Akɛ tawuu nibii ni yɔɔ gbeyei waa, tamɔ kɔɔyɔŋ lɛlɛ, tawuu tsɔji, tawuu lɛlɛ ni nyiɛɔ nu shishi, kɛ ebɔɔ ni atswaa awoɔ kɔɔyɔŋ tsu nii yɛ Jeŋ Ta I lɛ mli.
Kɔɔyɔɔ loo nɛkɛ tsofa ni gbeɔ mɔ oya nɛɛ kɛtee shiai amli kɛyashwie wekui ni ewɔ anɔ.
Shi bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni egbeɔ mɔ eha lɛ, nakai kɔɔyɔɔ ni je kpo lɛ gbe mɛi fioo pɛ kɛ akɛto mɛi ni “kɔɔyɔɔ” ni gbɔmɛi ni yɔɔ je lɛŋ fɛɛ muɔ daa gbi, ni egbeɔ amɛ yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ he lɛ.
Bei pii lɛ, ekɛ eshika ni eshwɛ lɛ fɛɛ yaheɔ pɛtrol ewoɔ ekar lɛ mli kɛyaa shiɛmɔ.
Gbi lɛ eko gbɛkɛ lɛ, mibolɔ miwo bulɔi lɛ akɛ, “kɛ́ migbe tsɔne lɛ, la lɛ naa baaba shi, ni ebaawa kɛha mi akɛ mafa tsɔne lɛ.”
Jamɔ kuu ko ni atsɛɔ amɛ Aum Shinrikyo (Anɔkwale ni Nɔ Kwɔ Fe Fɛɛ) lɛ efee tawuu nii atoohe, ni ji sarin kɔɔyɔɔ ni ebɔɔ yɔɔ mli lɛ yɛ teemɔŋ, ni amɛkɛbaatsu nii ni amɛkɛdi otii ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ, ni amɛkɛmamɔ amɛhiɛ lɛ asɛɛ.
Mikaiɔ akɛ be ko lɛ, wɔtee wɔyaahe pɛtrol yɛ pɛtrol steshɛŋ ko.
Kaa akɛ okɛ nibii sɔrɔtoi tamɔ nakai aaawo tsɔne ko mutoo nɔ mli ni okwɛ akɛ nɛgbɛ ebaanyɛ eyashɛ!
Gbɛi yɛ ni abaanyɛ atsɔ nɔ ayoo kɔɔyɔɔ nɛɛ, ni anyɛ abu he kɛjɛ he.
Mi-skul gbɛhamɔ beaŋ lɛ, ehaa mikɛ enitsulɔi ni tsuɔ srawa hewalɛ he nii lɛ tsuɔ nii, ni wɔtsakeɔ blema tsũi wuji ni kɛ gas tsuɔ nii lɛ ni wɔhaa amɛ srawa hewalɛ.
Mɛɛ amanehulu, kɔɔyɔɔ ko ni ebɔɔ yɔɔ mli kɛba yɛ Bhopal, yɛ India, shi mɛɛ “kɔɔyɔɔ” ko ni gbeɔ mɔ fe no amuɔ yɛ je lɛŋ he fɛɛ he?
4 Kɛji nɛkɛ sui nɛɛ yɛ weku ko mli lɛ, shia lɛ ebafeee tamɔ pɛtrol hɔɔmɔ he dɔŋŋ, he ni awaa ni aheɔ pɛtrol yɛ kɛkɛ.
Akɛ klɛŋklɛŋ bii lɛ yawo kɔɔyɔɔ ni ebɔɔ yɔɔ mli ni ji gas ni gbeɔ mɔ mli.
Shiɛlɔi komɛi po yashiɛɔ gbɛkɛ yɛ hei ni afoɔ pɛtro, niyelihei, kɛ nitsumɔhei krokomɛi ni atsuɔ nii gbi muu fɛɛ lɛ amli.
Mɛi komɛi ena akɛ hei ni tsɔnei mamɔɔ, tsɔnei wuji amaamɔhei, hei ni ahɔ̃ɔ pɛtrol yɛ, kɛ shwapoi amli ji ‘wuoyaahei’ ni woɔ yibii babaoo.
Shi nyɛmimɛi lɛ kɛ ŋaalee fee tsɔne ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ gas feelɔ lɛ eko —ni eji dade tsɛŋsi kokloo ni tsiimɔ shɛɔ tɔŋ fã, ni akɛmaa kar lɛ sɛɛ.
15 Kɛ mɔ ko na akɛ kɔɔyɔɔ ni ebɔɔ yɔɔ mli efite he ni eyɔɔ lɛ, mɛni ebaafee?
Samarianyo naanyo kpakpa lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ kaiɔ wɔ akɛ, Yehowa kwɛɛɛ hiɛiaŋ, ni eesumɔ ni ‘wɔfee mɛi fɛɛ ekpakpa’ —niiatsɛmɛi kɛ ohiafoi, mɛi ni esoro amɛhewolonɔ su loo maŋ nɔ ni amɛjɛ loo jamɔ mli ni amɛyɔɔ. —Gal 6:10; Bɔf 10:34.
Shi taakɛ eji lɛ, he ni shibɔlemɔ ŋulamii lɛ yɔɔ yɛ ŋulami kusha lɛ mli lɛ sa jogbaŋŋ, ni no haa eyeɔ ehe kɛjɛɔ haomɔi nɛɛ ahe. Kɛfata he lɛ, no haaa shibɔlemɔ ŋulamii lɛ ayatsɔ atatuiaŋ he ko ni dɔɔ fe nine loo ŋulamii ni fɛlɛɔ ateŋ, ni eyeɔ ehe kɛjɛɔ osharai krokomɛi hu ahe.
Agbɛnɛ hu, nakai feemɔ haa yibii lɛ tsuɔ oya, ni ehaa amɛdaraa agboiagboi ni amɛŋɔɔ waa.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni ebaatee Lazaro shi lɛ, ‘ehole ehiŋmɛii anɔ kɛtee ŋwɛi ni ekɛɛ: Ataa, miidao shi akɛ obo mi toi.
Paulo jaje akɛ: “Wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔ-Nuntsɔ Yesu Kristo tsɛ lɛ shi [NW shishigbɛ niŋmaa, “wɔsɔleɔ daa”] yɛ nyɛhewɔ daa nɛɛ yɛ wɔsɔlemɔi amli.”
Midaa Yehowa shi gbi fɛɛ gbi yɛ be fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ ni wɔkɛ wɔhe ewo mli lɛ hewɔ.”
Yɛ July 1992 lɛ nitsɔɔlɔ ko ni tsɔɔ kwasafo tsɔsemɔ he nii lɛ ŋma nɔ ko ekɛtsɔɔ “bulɛ ni fe fɛɛ kɛ miishɛɛ shidaa ni fe fɛɛ” ni ejie lɛ kpo yɛ woji lɛ ni ekwɛɔ mli ekɛsaa ehe dani eyatsɔɔ nii lɛ ahe lɛ hewɔ.
Ani wɔdaaa Yehowa shi akɛ eha aŋmala ewiemɔi lɛ, moŋ fe ni akɛ he aaafɔ̃ naabu folo ni akɛaajaje atsɔɔ kɛtsara nɔ lɛ nɔ?—Okɛto 2 Mose 34:27, 28 he.
Wɔda lɛ shi jogbaŋŋ ni wɔshi wɔtee, ni wɔshi woji babaoo wɔha lɛ.
Wɔdaa Yehowa shi akɛ wɔnyɛ wɔwo wɔhe hewalɛ ni wɔtee nɔ wɔsɔmɔ lɛ.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Midaa Yehowa shi akɛ wɔkase anɔkwale lɛ.”
Daa gbi lɛ, esa akɛ wɔda Yehowa shi yɛ nikeenii ni jara wa nɛɛ hewɔ.
(Kolosebii 3:15) Shidaa wiemɔi yɛ lalai awolo lɛ babaoo mli, ni tsɔɔ akɛ shidaa ni jɛ tsuiŋ lɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔjamɔ su kpakpa.
7 Nakai gbi lɛ ji klɛŋklɛŋ be ni David fo shidaa lala ehã Yehowa koni Asaf+ kɛ enyɛmimɛi hii* lɛ alá; no nɛ:
4 Wɔ shidaa lɛ mli bawaa jogbaŋŋ, kɛ wɔkwɛ nɔ ni yaa nɔ kɛbɔleɔ wɔ lɛ.
David shidaa lala (7-36)
Bei pii lɛ, kɛ mishɛ mi-hotɛl tsũ lɛ mli lɛ, mikulaa shi ni midaa Yehowa shi akɛ ebu mihe.
* (Mika 6:8; Luka 9:48) Yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, amɛwo Yehowa hiɛ nyam ni amɛda lɛ shi yɛ wala ni jara wa ni ekɛduro amɛ lɛ hewɔ.
Yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, gbɛi Yuda lɛ tsɔɔ shidaa ni ekɛhaa Nyɔŋmɔ.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 17:25) Wɔbaanyɛ wɔda lɛ shi yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ yɛ mumɔ fɛɛ mumɔ ni wɔmuɔ, niyenii fɛɛ niyenii ni wɔyeɔ, kɛ miishɛɛ kɛ mlifilimɔ be fɛɛ be ni baa yɛ shihilɛ mli lɛ he.
Eŋɔɔ minaa akɛ, kɛtsɔ Biblia lɛ nɔ lɛ minyɛ mifee tsakemɔi babaoo.
Yɛ gbohiiashitee he hiɛnɔkamɔ ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, ekolɛ wɔsheŋ gbele gbeyei. —Hebribii 2:15.
(Lala 62:9) Gbaa oŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ onaagbai, omiishɛɛ, oshidaai, kɛ oyijiemɔ.
Wɔmiisumɔ ni wɔda bo shi babaoo.”
“Midaa Yehowa shi waa akɛ lɛ ji mi-Nyɔŋmɔ.” —Sheryl
Miida nyɛ shi babaoo yɛ nitsumɔ kpakpa ni nyɛtsuɔ lɛ hewɔ.—Pamela, eye afii kpawo
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ amɛkɛ woo loo shidaa ko kwraa haaa lɛ.
Klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ hewɔ “wɔhiɛ kamɔ ni wɔtsiɔ wɔhe ni wɔyɔɔ” lɛ.
Miishɛɛ sane ji akɛ, Henok kɛ wiemɔ ni tsɔɔ nɔ ko ni etee nɔ momo tsu nii, ejaakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kojomɔi lɛ ba mli kɛ̃ tamɔ nɔ ni amɛba mli momo.
(1 Yohane 5:14, 15) Yelikɛbuamɔ ni fata he lɛ jɛ naanyobɔɔ ni yɔɔ gbagbalii ni ekɛ mɛi ni ji Yehowa Odasefoi momo, ni miibɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ amɛaafee Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ bɔ lɛ mli kɛba.
Anɔkwa Sane: Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ, ekomefeemɔ, kɛ shweshweeshwe shihilɛ baaba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ fɛɛ, taakɛ efee yɛ ŋwɛi momo lɛ.
Augustine tsɔɔ mli akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli ní baaye nɔ Afii Akpe lɛ jeee nɔ ko ni baaba wɔsɛɛ, shi moŋ eje shishi beni ato Kristojamɔ lɛ shishi.
Amɛtsɔɔ momo akɛ amɛsheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei; amɛyɛ bulɛ ni sa jogbaŋŋ kɛha Bɔlɔ lɛ, ni amɛsumɔɔɔ ni amɛfeɔ nɔ ko ni esaaa ehiɛ.
Mose kɛ Israelbii lɛ le Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛ́i lɛ momo.
Nyɔŋmɔ ekɛɛ amɛ momo akɛ gbɛ ni tamɔ nakai kɛ gbele baaba amɛnɔ.
Kristofoi le akɛ ato Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ ama shi momo yɛ ŋwɛi, ni ákɛ ebaajie adesai anɔyelii fɛɛ kɛya, ni ebaama shi kɛaatee naanɔ.—Daniel 2:44.
16 Yɛ Biblia Kaselɔi lɛ amra beaŋ tɔ̃ɔ lɛ, asafoŋ onukpai lɛ nu shishi akɛ eji amɛsɔ̃ akɛ amɛye amɛbua nanemɛi Kristofoi lɛ koni amɛya nɔ amɛsɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ.
Kɛfata he lɛ, amɛyɔse akɛ “jeŋmaji abei” lɛ eba naagbee momo, ni etsɔɔ akɛ be eshɛ ní Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli nɔyeli lɛ kɛ jɔɔmɔi baaba abaha adesai aweku lɛ.
David naaa hegbɛ akɛ etsu nitsumɔ ni akɛwo Levibii lɛ adɛŋ lɛ eko, shi no mli lɛ afɔ lɛ mu momo akɛ etsu nitsumɔ kroko, no ji akɛ ebaaye Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ anɔ maŋtsɛ.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Eha bɔfonukpa Mikael—Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛ hee ni ewo lɛ, ni ji Kristo Yesu lɛ eye Satan nɔ kunim butuu momo.
(1 Mose 22:1) Beni aŋma wiemɔi nɛɛ, no mli lɛ aka hemɔkɛyeli ni Abraham yɔɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mli lɛ akwɛ momo.
Ábua hii kɛ yei akpekpei abɔ ní sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei lɛ anaa momo, ni mɛi krokomɛi babaoo diɛŋtsɛ miifata amɛhe.
Nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ efee kɛha ewebii ni ehala amɛ lɛ momo lɛ haa wɔnaa nɔ ni wɔɔdamɔ nɔ wɔná hekɛnɔfɔɔ.
3 Shi kɛlɛ, mɛi ni miisɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ momo lɛ, ni amɛhiɛ “Tsɔɔmɔ Lɛ” mli lɛ ni aaaye abua amɛ lɛ hu?
(1 Maŋtsɛmɛi 18:24-40) No hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔkpɛlɛ Yehowa nɔ ŋmɛnɛ akɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni wɔkpɛ wɔyiŋ jogbaŋŋ akɛ wɔɔye nii yɛ ekpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ, kɛji wɔfeko nakai momo.
(Mateo 3:13-17) Mɛi fɛɛ ni kɔɔ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɛɛ efee babaoo yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ nɔyeli mli momo.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Constantine ewo akpɔ akɛ Kristojamɔ fata jamɔi ni akpɛlɛɔ amɛnɔ yɛ Roma nɔyeli lɛ shishi lɛ ahe moŋ, shi mɛi nyaa Hulu nyɔŋmɔ lɛ adesã lɛ he lolo, titri lɛ yɛ asraafoi lɛ ateŋ.
Wekukpãa ni yɔɔ gbagbalii yɛ amɛ kɛ Yehowa teŋ momo akɛ ebii, ejaakɛ amɛyɛ hemɔkɛyeli yɛ Kristo mli ni amɛkɛ amɛtsui fɛɛ jáa “suɔmɔ kɛ hejɔlɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ.”
No hewɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ ehe loo efɔ̃ɔ nitsumɔ yɛ “gbi ni ji kpawo lɛ” nɔ, ni ekɛ ehe wooo shikpɔŋ nɔ nibɔɔ nitsumɔ ko mli dɔŋŋ bɔni afee ni eha nɔ ni ebɔ momo lɛ aya hiɛ yɛ esuɔmɔnaa nii anaa.
(Ezekiel 14: 14, 20; 28:3) Nɔ ni awieɔ he nɛɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, yɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ewala be mli po, yɛ afii ohai ekpaa D.Ŋ.B. lɛ, no mli lɛ ale Daniel jogbaŋŋ akɛ nuu jalɔ kɛ nilelɔ, mɔ ni sa akɛ atsĩɔ etã afataa Noa kɛ Hiob ni sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei lɛ ahe.
(2 Timoteo 3:16, 17) Nɔkwɛmɔnii babaoo yɛ Biblia lɛ mli ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ fãi ni agbe eŋmalamɔ naa yɛ blema beaŋ lɛ ye ebua etsuji ni hi shi yɛ nakai beaŋ lɛ.
Wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ ni he yɔɔ naakpɛɛ lɛ suɔmɔ mlihilɛ lɛ etsirɛ mitsui momo.—Lala 63:4.
(1 Petro 1:15, 16) Eyɛ mli akɛ áhala Yesaia akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ naawielɔ momo moŋ, shi yɔsemɔ ní eyɔse eshafeemɔ shihilɛ ní eyɔɔ mli lɛ ha enaa kpɛ ehe waa, ni enaabu he tseee bɔ ni no aaaha efee mɔ ni sa akɛ anunyam Maŋtsɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ naawielɔ.
Mumɔŋ nibii anɔ titri ni wɔɔjwɛŋ lɛ baaha wɔnine ashɛ jɔɔmɔi babaoo nɔ.
Onukpai ni anyɛɔ abɛŋkɛɔ amɛ lɛ ji jɔɔmɔ
Agbɛnɛ hu, ajɔɔ wɔ akɛ wɔyɛ wala mli yɛ “naagbee be lɛ” ni agba afɔ̃ shi yɛ Daniel 12:4 lɛ mli.
Ŋmalɛi lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ “amanehulu lɛ sɛɛ etsɛɛɛ ni emli waaa” kɛ akɛto naanɔ jɔɔmɔi ni akɛma mɛi ni sumɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ahiɛ lɛ he lɛ.
Mɛi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ kaseɔ akɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii ni afeɔ lɛ kɛ jɔɔmɔi ni jara wa kwraa fe nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni je lɛ kɛhaa lɛ baaba.
Yehowa ejɔɔ ekãa ni etsuji kɛtsuɔ nii lɛ nɔ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
1-3. (a) Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa sumɔ Solomon lɛ? Ni mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yehowa jɔɔ lɛ?
“Jɔɔmɔ babaoo hu jwere nyɛhiɛ ni nyɛbaana.”
Esa jogbaŋŋ ákɛ akɛ gbekɛbii aaato bɔ́ he, ejaakɛ bɔ́ kɛ nifalɛ kɛ jɔɔmɔ yɛ tsakpaa.
No hewɔ ni toiŋjɔlɛ yɔɔ amɛteŋ, ni asaŋ amɛnyiɛɔ jalɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ.—Yesaia 60:17.
(b) Kɛ́ wɔyɛ yiŋtoi kpakpai ahewɔ ni esa akɛ wɔkɛ mɛi atɔmɔi afa amɛ ni wɔfee nakai lɛ, mɛɛ sɛɛnamɔi jɛɔ mli baa?
Shi yɛ naagbee lɛ omli filiɔ bo kɛ nyamɔ ejaakɛ kɛji ekpɛlɛɛɛ anɔkwale lɛ nɔ po lɛ, Yehowa jɔɔ bo yɛ mɔdɛŋ ni obɔ lɛ hewɔ.”
Mɛɛ jɔɔmɔ po nitsumɔ aaaji yɛ nakai beaŋ nɛkɛ!
Kooloi akwɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ fee miishɛɛ kɛ haomɔ fɛɛ.
Nakai nɔŋŋ abaajɔɔ wɔ kɛji akɛ wɔyɔse ni wɔfee toiboo wɔha gbalɔ ni nɔ kwɔ fe Mose, ni ji Yesu, kɛ agbɛnɛ “tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ lɛ” ni ehala lɛ lɛ.—Mateo 24:45, 46; Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 3:22.
Onɛɔ ojɔɔmɔ oshwieɔ nɔ.
Mɛni hewɔ onukpai ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ ji jɔɔmɔ lɛ, ni te tooi lɛ hereɔ suɔmɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ nɔ amɛhaa tɛŋŋ?
Tooi lɛ ena jɔɔmɔi babaoo kɛtsɔ toiŋjɔlɛ kpaŋmɔ ni Yehowa kɛ amɛ efee lɛ nɔ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Yehowa jɔɔ mi waa diɛŋtsɛ akɛni mifooo asafoŋ kpeei amli yɛ minitsumɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ.
4 Suɔmɔ yɛ hewalɛ waa, ni eji hegbɛ ni wɔná akɛ wɔjɛ wɔsusuma muu fɛɛ mli wɔha suɔmɔ ni wɔyɔɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ miije kpo faŋŋ yɛ wɔshiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Nyɔŋmɔ jɔɔ Yesu kɛtee “naanɔ”?
“Jalɔi Agbɛ” ni Kɛ Jɔɔmɔi Baa Lɛ
Kɛ́ wɔhiɛ jwɛŋmɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ, no lɛ wɔnaŋ wɔkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ wekukpaa ni yɔɔ gbagbalii, ni wɔnine shɛŋ naanɔ jɔɔmɔi ni Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ kɛbaaba lɛ anɔ.
Susumɔ bɔ ni amɛbaanu he amɛha beni amɛna akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ miijɔɔ amɛmɔdɛŋbɔi lɛ anɔ, ní eeha shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ dumɔnii lɛ miikwɛ̃ fɛfɛo tamɔ “Eden trom” ní woɔ yibii lɛ he okwɛ!—Ezekiel 36:34-36.
14, 15. (a) Mɛɛ jɔɔmɔi Yehowa diɛŋtsɛ kɛhaa mɛi ni bɛŋkɛ lɛ lɛ?
Mɛi nɛɛ naa naagbai ni kumɔɔ mɔ tsui ní ohia, hela, kɛ awuiyeli kɛbaa mɛi anɔ lɛ.
(Mateo 24:45) Tsɔ gbɛ fɛɛ gbɛ nɔ okɛ nɔjwɛŋmɔ loo kwɛmɔ krɛdɛɛ ni he hiaa obi lɛ aha lɛ koni okɛna naagba lɛ naa tsabaa.
(b) Mɛni esa akɛ wɔhã ehi wɔjwɛŋmɔ mli yɛ adesai anaagbai ahe?
10:31-33) Mɛi komɛi kɛ ŋaawoo nɛɛ tsuuu nii, ni naagbai kãa he eyaa nɔ yɛ henaabuamɔi ni afeɔ ni mɛi fa yɛ mli babaoo tsɔ fe bɔ ni aaanyɛ akwɛ nɔ jogbaŋŋ lɛ hewɔ.
Shi moŋ, nɔ ni ataoɔ ji ni wɔtao gbɛtsɔɔmɔ kɛjɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli kɛji akɛ wɔmiitao ni wɔna shihilɛ mli naagbai anaa koni wɔfee nii yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛ nɔ be fɛɛ be.
Hɛɛ, wɔkɛ naagbai kpeɔ, no hewɔ lɛ mi paradeiso lɛ yeko emuu.
Obaana akɛ ekolɛ amɛmiihao yɛ naagba ko ni gbaa amɛnaa lɛ hewɔ—nitsumɔ ni eje mɔ dɛŋ, tsũ nyɔmɔwoo, hela, wekunyo ko gbele, awuiyeli mli oshara, jalɛ sane ni maŋ onukpa ko yeee, gbalamlitsemɔ, gbekɛbii atsɔsemɔ, kɛ ekrokomɛi ni fata he.
Mɛɛ naagbai ekɛkpeɔ?
(1 Korintobii 2:11, 12) Esa akɛ wɔsɔle wɔbi Nyɔŋmɔ dɛŋ yelikɛbuamɔ kɛji akɛ wɔmiiná naagba yɛ sane ko shishinumɔ he.
Ekolɛ amɛmiisusu naagba ko ni yɔɔ shia loo shihilɛ mli yeyeeyefeemɔ kroko he.
Hiɛjoomɔ baanyɛ afee naagba yɛ bɔlɛnamɔ mli miishɛɛnamɔ he yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Akɛni wɔha wɔshihilɛ fee mlɛo ni wɔkɛ wɔhiɛ ma shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ hewɔ lɛ, wɔkɛ naagbai ni fɔlɔi kɛkpeɔ ŋmɛnɛ yɛ amɛbii ni amɛtsɔseɔ koni amɛsɔmɔ Yehowa lɛ mli lɛ pii ekpeee.
Ŋɔɔ lɛ akɛ, wɔbi Yehowa dɛŋ yelikɛbuamɔ, shi naagba lɛ yɛ lolo.
Esa akɛ wɔná hekɛnɔfɔ̃ɔ kwraa akɛ, nɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ biɔ ni wɔfee lɛ ji nɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ kɛha wɔ.
Esa akɛ gbalashihilɛ mli bii ni sumɔɔ Yehowa, ni amɛsumɔɔ amɛhe hu lɛ, atswa amɛfai shi akɛ amɛbaatsu amɛnaagbai ahe nii, ejaakɛ “suɔmɔ sɛɛ efooo gbi ko gbi ko.” —1 Korintobii 13:8; Mateo 19:5, 6; Hebribii 13:4.
Ellis kɛɛ: “Shi wɔyɔse akɛ shihilɛ mli ni wɔtsɛ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ ji naagba ni sɛɛ etsɛŋ.
Mimligbɛ ji he ni naagba lɛ jɛ, shi jeee kponɔgbɛ.’
Mligbalamɔ loo bienyɛyeli ko bɛ amɛteŋ; shi moŋ, anaa faŋŋ akɛ mɛi enyɔ lɛ miifee ekome koni amɛsaa naagba ni eba Korinto lɛ, kɛ hekɛnɔfɔɔ ni mɔnɛ yɔɔ yɛ mɔnɛ mli.

(Lala 104:5) Kɛ́ Bɔlɔ ko ni bɔ wɔshikpɔŋ fɛfɛo kɛ jeŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ lɛ, belɛ nilee yɛ mli akɛ wɔɔhe wɔye akɛ ebaanyɛ ekwɛ nibii nɛɛ anɔ koni amɛkafite.
Ekolɛ bɔ ni Mizraim yɔɔ fɛo ha—etɛ tsũi kɛ amɛyiteŋ somoromoo, esɔlemɔtsui kakadaji, emaŋbii ashihilɛhei ni mli dara kɛ amɛhe abɔɔi, yeli tsei, kɛ kpaakpoi bibii ní ebɔle amɛhe kɛkpe lɛ emɔmɔ gbɔmɛi ní yɔɔ “nɛkɛ ŋshɔ nɛɛ naa” lɛ atsui waa.
Bɔni afee ni wɔle bɔ ni nakai eji lɛ, nyɛhaa wɔsusua yitso fɛfɛo, ni ji Yesaia 35 lɛ he, ni wɔkadi efa fɛɛ fa ni yɔɔ sane lɛ mli lɛ.
Sanebimɔ ko yɛ ni esa akɛ osusu he: Ani Bɔlɔ ko ni le nii ni eyɔɔ yiŋtoo kɛha shikpɔŋ kɛ adesai ni yɔɔ nɔ lɛ ji mɔ ni bɔ wɔ shibɔlemɔ ŋulami fɛfɛo lɛ?
Tamɔ bɔ nɔŋŋ ni nɔ ko ni atɛŋ fɛfɛo ko kɛ yijiemɔ haa nitɛŋlɔ ni fee lɛ.
Yehowa hiŋmɛi naa nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ mɔ ko he, ekwɛɔ nii kɛtekeɔ bɔ ni mɔ ko ji yɛ kponɔgbɛ, ni enaa nɔ ni yɔɔ mɔ lɛ tsui mli.
Kɛ shɛ gbɛkɛ ni mihɔ ŋshɔnaa tɛ gɔji lɛ ateŋ ni miikwɛ hulu la kpɛmɔ lɛ liamɔi fɛfɛji lɛ, ehaa misusuɔ wala shihilɛ he waa.
Susumɔ shibɔlemɔ ŋulami, ni ajie gbɔmɛi kɛ gbɛjianɔtoi ni kɛbashi bianɛ lɛ amɛtswa amɛfai shi akɛ amɛbaafite shikpɔŋ lɛ kɛ bɔ ni eyɔɔ fɛo kɛjɛ blema lɛ, kɛfata haomɔi babaoo ni anyɛŋ akane ni amɛkɛba enɔ bii anɔ lɛ he lɛ fɛɛ kɛjɛ nɔ kɛtee lɛ he okwɛ.—2 Petro 3:13; Kpojiemɔ 11:18.
Yesu weku lɛ yɛ he ko ni kɛ Yerusalem ni ji he ni Yehowa sɔlemɔtsu fɛfɛo lɛ yɔɔ lɛ jɛkɛmɔ feɔ aaafee gbii etɛ gbɛfaa.
Ekolɛ ebaanyɛ efee akɛ Maŋtsɛ bi Hezekia—ji mɔ ni lá lala ni kɛ fe fɛɛ—ni ji sɔlemɔ ni ŋɔɔ ni akɛfee lala lɛ akɛ: “Yehowa, mikaiɔ oblema kojomɔi lɛ, ni mikɛ-shɛjeɔ mimii.”
akɛni nyɛtamɔ gbohii asãŋi ni asha he ni amɛhewɔ efee fɛo moŋ, shi amɛmligbɛ lɛ eyimɔ obɔbɔ kɛ gbohii awui kɛ muji srɔtoi fɛɛ.
Amɛhãa wɔnaa akɛ, anunyam, fɛo, agbojee, kɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ ebole Yehowa kɛkpe.
Eyɛ fɛo akɛ aaana nyɛmimɛi akɛ amɛmiihi shi yɛ ekomefeemɔ mli, ni miishɛɛ yaafonui miishwie shi yɛ suɔmɔ ni amɛyɔɔ kɛha amɛhe kɛ amɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kpeteŋkpele, Yehowa lɛ hewɔ.”

Wɔbaanyɛ ‘wɔna’ esui ni nɔ bɛ lɛ yɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔi kɛ wɔtsuii amli, ni no baaha wɔda yɛ suɔmɔ ni wɔyɔɔ kɛha lɛ lɛ mli.
Beni wɔbote gbalashihilɛ mli afii enumɔ sɛɛ lɛ, mifɔ binuu fɛfɛo, ni wɔwo lɛ Saúl.

Ani nakai kpulu lɛ diɛŋtsɛ batsɔ “kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ”?
Mɛni ji wiemɔ “shii abɔ ni nyɛyeɔ nɛkɛ aboloo nɛɛ ni nyɛnuɔ nɛkɛ kpulu nɛɛ” lɛ shishi?—1 Kor.
Biblia saji ahe wielɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ Christopher Wordsworth kɛɛ akɛ: “Bei komɛi lɛ akɛ nu woɔ kpulu lɛ mli ni atsɔɔ bɔ ni hulu lɛ kpɛ́ɔ eshwieɔ nu ni yɔɔ kpulu lɛ mli lɛ hiɛ lɛ nɔ akɛ hetoo lɛ haa.”
Bo mɔ ni onu Yehowa mlifu kɔɔpoo ni yɔɔ edɛŋ lɛ mli nii lɛ.
Shi kɔɔpoo lɛ baabaje bo hu odɛŋ,+ ni obaanu ni obaatɔ ni obaajie ohe folo.
Jeee akɛ tsɔne ko ni mɔɔ nibii kɛkpɛtɛɔ loo amã ko yɛ enane shishi.
Ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni hãa nyɛ nu kpulu kome ni nyɛnu akɛni Kristo nii ji nyɛ hewɔ lɛ, lɛɛlɛŋ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, ejuromɔnɔ eŋmɛŋ lɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ.” —Marko 9:39-41.
□ Mɛɛ oweletɔɔ kpulu ko akɛhaa jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ ni amɛnu?
Yɛ nakai 1914 naagbee nyɔŋ lɛ mli lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ mɛi ni afɔ amɛ mu ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ kase ŋmalɛ oti ni ahala kɛha afi ni baa lɛ jogbaŋŋ, akɛ: “ ‘Ani nyɛaanyɛ kpulu ni mibanu lɛ nyɛnu?’—Mateo 20:20-23.”
No hewɔ lɛ nyɛ lɛ tswa efai shi akɛ ebaahi shia be fɛɛ be ni ebi lɛ baajɛ skul kɛba shia daa shwane, ni efeɔ tii ni ekɛ ebiyoo lɛ taraa shi amɛnuɔ be mli ni amɛgbaa sane lɛ.
No sɛɛ hiŋmɛitswaa fioo ko lɛ, ekɛ enaagbee sɔlemɔ ni kɔɔ sane nɛɛ he lɛ fɔ Yehowa hiɛ: “Ataa, kɛji oosumɔ lɛ, jiemɔ kpulu nɛɛ kɛjɛ minɔ!

“Mikɔɔpoo lɛ eyi obɔ” (5)

17 Ni ehe kɔɔpoo lɛ, ni eda shi ni ekɛɛ: “Nyɛhea enɛ ni nyɛkɛhãa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ nyɛteŋ lɛ, 18 ejaakɛ miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ, kɛjɛ amrɔ nɛɛ kɛyaa lɛ, minuŋ wain ko dɔŋŋ kɛyashi Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ baaba.”
Wein ni yɔɔ kpulu lɛ mli lɛ tsu nii hu akɛ kaimɔ nɔ̃ ni tsɔɔ akɛ Yesu lá ni efɔse eshwie shi lɛ baafee nɔdaamɔ nɔ kɛha “eshaifaa,” koni egbele gbɛ kɛha mɛi ni nuɔ ni amɛyeɔ lɛ koni atsɛ amɛ kɛya ŋwɛi shihilɛ mli akɛ Kristo hefatalɔi gboshiniyelɔi.

Beni akwɛɔ sane lɛ mli lɛ, skul nikaselɔi enumɔ lɛ ateŋ mɛi enyɔ shɛɛɛ taomɔ nii ni akɛnaa kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔ kasemɔ he yijiemɔ wolo lɛ he ekoŋŋ, ni mɛi etɛ ni eshwɛ lɛ shɛ he sharao kɛkɛ, ni atsi amɛ kɛtee sɛ̃i ni tsa nɔ lɛ nɔ.
Tsɔɔmɔ nibii enumɔ ni ekolɛ ehe baahia ni wɔkɛshã afɔle koni wɔnine ashɛ anɔkwale lɛ nɔ.
Ni afã lɛ akɛ ekɔ tu lɛ, ekpɛlɛɛɛ, no hewɔ lɛ beni shɛɔ July 1916 lɛ, no mli lɛ ekɛ asraafoi akojomɔ he ni kojo lɛ shii enumɔ lɛ mli klɛŋklɛŋ nɔ lɛ ekpe, ni amɛbu lɛ fɔ ni awo lɛ tsuŋ gbii 90.
Abaptisi Namangolwa Biblia mli nikaselɔi lɛ ateŋ mɛi enumɔ, ni amɛteŋ mɔ kome miisɔmɔ akɛ asafoŋ onukpa, enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ Yehowa ejɔɔ lɛ waa.
Beni egbalaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛyaa bɔfo Paulo wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Kolosebii 1:9, 10 nɔ lɛ, Nyɛminuu Molohan kai mɛi ni egbe nikasemɔ naa lɛ akɛ nyɔji enumɔ ni amɛbaye yɛ Gilead lɛ eye ebua amɛ ni amɛshwere “yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ he nilee mli.”
No mli lɛ eefee Biblia mli nikasemɔi enumɔ momo yɛ ekutso lɛ mli, shi ena miishɛɛ akɛ eeena sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ babaoo.

Beni be shɛ ni ebalɛ akɛ mɛi ni baheɔ lɛ ba koni amɛkwɛ bɔ ni akokooshi gbiŋ lɛ yɔɔ lɛ, amɛna akɛ mɔ kroko baagi ebafutu ebaagii enumɔ lɛ mli.

No mli lɛ miye nyɔji nɛɛhu, ni eshwɛ fioo ni David baaye afii enumɔ.

(b) Mɛni hewɔ ‘yoo’ lɛ ekã shi aahu yɛ duŋ mli lɛ?
Yoo kroko hu kɛ gbekɛ yoo ko ni atsɔse lɛ yɛ sɔlemɔtsu ko mli he ni etsɛ ji osɔfo yɛ lɛ miikase Biblia lɛ.

6 Mɛni Yehowa eto eyiŋ yɛ he kɛha Zion, ni ji eŋwɛi ‘yoo’ lɛ, ní blema Yerusalem feɔ ehe mfoniri lɛ?
Yoo nɛɛ ji Samarianyo, ni ekpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ Yesu ji gbalɔ.
Akɛ famɔ ha Yehowa “yoo” lɛ koni ete shi
Odasefonyo ko ni yɔɔ Chile lɛ tsi ebɛŋkɛ yoo ko ni miije kpo kɛmiijɛ he ko ni akwɔɔ oketekei lɛ.
Yoo lɛ ŋma mɛi ni fee wolo lɛ akɛ: “Mikane nyɛwolo lɛ, ni kɛjɛ no sɛɛ lɛ mikaneɔ eko fɛɛ eko ni baa lɛ, ni enɛ eye ebua mi ni mibaa mijeŋ jogbaŋŋ.
‘Yoo nilelɔ’ diɛŋtsɛ ní tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ kɛ ewu lɛ feɔ ekome waa ni amɛkɛtswaa weku lɛ amɛmaa shi.
