Nɔ ni Ejɛ Shiɛmɔ Nitsumɔ lɛ Mli Kɛba —‘Ŋmɔji lɛ Egba Futaa Kɛhã Kpamɔ’
Akɛ tɛ bluu kɛ eyɛŋ tswa wiemɔ kpoku nɛɛ, ni aye samai fɛfɛji awo he, ni ayɛ tsũi enyɔ yɛ kpoku lɛ he kɛ amɛmli sɛii ni akɛ tɛ fee, ni asaa shikpɔŋ lɛ fɛfɛo, ni amɛɔ yɛ tsũi nɛɛ amli.
“Tɛ yɛŋ” ni Yesu kɛhaa Kristofoi ni afɔ amɛ mu ni yeɔ kunim lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ ebuɔ amɛ akɛ sane fɔŋ ko bɛ amɛhe, amɛyɛ krɔŋŋ, ni amɛhe tse.
“Amɛfɔ́ amɛtadei lɛ ahe, ni amɛha eyɛ futaa yɛ toobi lɛ lá lɛ mli.”
Bɔ ni ŋshɔkpɔ shikpɔji lɛ naabunaabui lɛ bɛ trɔmɔɔ, ni tsũi bibii yɛji mamɔ nɔ ni ekpɛlɛɔ yɛ hulu lɛ nɔ lɛ, ha lalafolɔ ko kɛto “tɛsaa okpɔŋɔ ni ekuɛ he tsɔi ete shi ni egbɛ basaa” lɛ he.
3. (a) Mɛni ekolɛ no hã Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: ‘Ŋmɔji lɛ egba futaa kɛhã kpamɔ’ lɛ?
Wɔ mii shɛ wɔhe yɛ shikpɔŋ fɛfɛo ko he—gɔŋ agbo ko ni mashi somlomloo ni atsɛɔ lɛ El Yunque (Sɔŋmɛ Tɛ), ni etamɔ nɔ ni akɛ flonto ehà nɔ, kɛ ŋwɛi ni etse ni efee bluu yɛ esɛɛ, ní atatui yɛji yɔɔ emasɛi biɛ kɛ biɛ lɛ.

Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, kulɛ misumɔɔɔ ni miboɔ amɛ toi ejaakɛ miheee mɛi yɛji miyeee.
Ajuɔ gbonyo lɛ he, ni awoɔ lɛ atade yɛŋ, ni akɛ lɛ fɔɔ saatso nɔ.
Anaa [tsei ni gbene kɛlɛ kakadaji] komekomei ni edara lɛ fɛɛ ni yɔɔ Gɔji Yɛji lɛ anɔ lɛ mitai 3,000 yɛ ŋa ni nɔ egbi, ni tɛi yɔɔ nɔ lɛ nɔ.”

(Yuda 4, NW) Ekolɛ, taakɛ blema Jamɔ He Jeŋ Nilelɔi komɛi ji lɛ, amɛsusu akɛ kɛ́ mɔ ko fee esha babaoo lɛ, ehaa mɔ lɛ náa Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ ni esaaa lɛ babaoo—no hewɔ lɛ, yɛ nakai feemɔ mli lɛ, sɛɛnamɔ yɛ he waa akɛ aaafee esha babaoo!
Ekolɛ otso lɛ kwɔlɛ aaafee ninetalɔi 20, shi eka shi faŋŋ akɛ ekwɔɔɔ tamɔ tseneduru tso, ni efɛo hu tamɔɔɔ tɛŋ nɔ.
Nɔ ni ji enyɔ lɛ, etsɔɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ (sola gratia) pɛ nɔ atsɔɔ akɛ eshai keɔ shi jeee kɛtsɔ osɔfoi loo paapai lɛ ahewalɛ nɔ.
Nɔyelii kalaa jamɔŋ sabalai yɛ woji anɔ tamɔ “IN GOD WE TRUST,” (Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ Wɔkɛ Wɔhe Fɔɔ) yɛ amɛshika ni akɛ woji efee nɔ, ni amɛkɛɔ akɛ ŋwɛi kpɛlɛɔ amɛnɔyelɔi lɛ anɔ yɛ amɛjwiɛtɛi shikai anɔ, ni akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, amɛkɛɔ akɛ, “Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ naa” ahala mɛnɛɛmɛi yɛ.
Henry Chadwick wie ehe yɛ The Early Church lɛ mli akɛ: “Konstantino ni tamɔ etsɛ lɛ ja Hulu ni Anyɛɛɛ Enɔ Kunim Aye Lɛ; . . . esaaa akɛ atsɔɔ etsakemɔ lɛ shishi akɛ mligbɛ duromɔ he niiashikpamɔ ko . . .
Sane lɛ he hia lɛ aahu akɛ, ehaaa maŋtsɛwe lɛ asa lɛ nɔ fɛo, samai ni aye yɛ akulashiŋi lɛ ahe kɛ sɛndoi hu ni aye lɛ samai ni akɛ tsenedrutsei ni ashɛ kɛjɛ Lebanon fee lɛ, agbala ejwɛŋmɔ kwraa.
8 Bɔfo Petro kɛ Satan to “jata ni miihũu” he.
Taakɛ bɔ ni jata hũumɔ haa ŋmiŋmi mɔɔ mɔ lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ Amos enu he akɛ esa akɛ eshiɛ beni Yehowa kɛɛ akɛ: “Yaa ní oyagba otsɔɔ mimaŋ Israel” lɛ.
8 Kɛkɛ ni ebo tamɔ jata ekɛɛ:
(b) jata hiɛ?
Ani jata* shiɔ esɛ̃ŋ kɛjɛɔ eshihilɛhe kɛ́ emɔko nɔ ko?
Biblia lɛ kɛ Satan tutuamɔi lɛ toɔ bɔ ni jata kɛ shikpãa tutuaa mɔ lɛ he.—Nyɛkanea Lala 91:13.
Bei komɛi lɛ, wɔfãa gbɛ koni wɔyakwɛ jwɛiaŋ kooloi ni hiɛ yɔɔ la yɛ jwɛiaŋ kooloi ashihilɛhei ní jatai kɛ kooloi krokomɛi ni hiɛ yɔɔ la nyiɛɔ jɛmɛ ni mɔ ko gbaaa amɛnaa lɛ.
Oshishibrishii kɛ Jata: Safari-Zoo ni yɔɔ Ramat-Gan, Tel Aviv
Mɛni hewɔ David sheee jata lɛ, oshishibrishii lɛ, kɛ oblaŋ lɛ gbeyei lɛ?
Paulo ŋma po akɛ ajie lɛ “yɛ jata lɛ daaŋ.” —2 Timoteo 4:16, 17.
Kooloi komɛi ni yɔɔ kooi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ amli ji shwuɔ, wuo, kɛ jata.
8 Be ko sɛɛ be ni eku esɛɛ koni eyaŋɔ yoo lɛ kɛba eshĩa lɛ,+ egba kɛtee koni eyakwɛ jata lɛ gbonyo lɛ, ni ena wobii pii ni eto wo yɛ jata lɛ gbonyo lɛ mli.
15 Kɛji akɛ jata ko ni bɛŋkɛ kooloi krokomɛi hũu yɛ Afrika ŋa kpalanaa lɛ nɔ lɛ, adowai kɛ oyaiyeli joɔ foi waa kɛyashiɔ be mli ni amɛaashi he ni oshara lɛ yɔɔ lɛ kwraa.
Shi beni okwɛɔ nɔ ni yaa nɔ yɛ afabaŋ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ona akɛ jata ko ni he yɔɔ gbeyei waa miidɛkɛ shi koni emɔ kooloo ko!
Mɛɛ Yehowa shɛɛ sane ni shwɛɛnii lɛ jajeɔ lɛ hewɔ ni amɛtamɔ jata yɛ majimaji lɛ ateŋ lɛ?
Yɛ be kroko hu mli lɛ ehere etooi lɛ ekome yiwala kɛjɛ jata ko dɛŋ.
Eshi ebuu lɛ efɔ shi tamɔ jata, ni amɛshikpɔŋ lɛ etsɔ amaŋfɔ yɛ yiwalɛ klante lɛ hiɛ, kɛ emlifu ni naa wa lɛ hewɔ.”
Ni amɛnyanyɔji tamɔ jatai anɔ,+ 9 ni amɛwo damai tamɔ dade damai.
Bulɔ lɛ ‘bo tamɔ jata’
Belɛ, eja gbɛ jogbaŋŋ akɛ jata, ni feɔ jalɛsaneyeli ní ekãafeemɔ yɔɔ mli he okadi lɛ, kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ emaŋtsɛsɛi lɛ yɛ tsakpaa.
Ani ona jata nuu agbo ko hiɛ-kɛ-hiɛ pɛŋ?

15 Jata hii* hũɔ amɛwoɔ lɛ;+
Kɛji Nilo ejeee ŋa ni eshwie ŋmɔji lɛ anɔ, kɛji kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ mli tsakeee, kɛji shikpɔŋhosomɔ, hɔmɔ, haomɔ ko ba lɛ—Amrɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ anuɔ bolɔmɔ akɛ: ‘Nyɛfɔa Kristofoi lɛ nyɛhaa jata lɛ!’”
21 Hɛɛ, jeŋmaji lɛ kɛ kooloo ni tsuɔ tamɔ muneele lɛ, Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ lɛ, baatsu nii ni amɛkɛkpata Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ hiɛ.
Hɛɛ, Sara kɛɛ ewu ejwɛŋmɔ, ni ekɛ sane lɛ lɔgɔɔɔ shi.
Hɛɛ, ehe miihia ni (Kolosebii lɛ kɛ wɔ hu) wɔná nɔmimaa ni ma shi shiŋŋ yɛ Kristo nitsumɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ yiŋtoo mli kɛ wɔshihilɛ mli lɛ he.
(Yoshua 2:9, 10; 4:23, 24) Hɛɛ, awo egbɛi lɛ nɔ kɛteke Mizraim apasa nyɔŋmɔi ni bɛ hewalɛ ko, ni nyɛɛɛ ajie amɛ jalɔi lɛ anɔ̃.
Kɛfata he lɛ, “eba ehe shi ni ebo toi kɛtee gbele mli, kɛtee sɛŋmɔtso nɔ gbele mli tete.”
(Lala 111:1) Hɛɛ, lalai ni wɔláa kɛjieɔ Yehowa yi lɛ ji yiŋtoo kpakpa kome hewɔ ni esa akɛ wɔyashɛ kpeei ashishi mra ni wɔmɛ hu kɛyashi beni abaakpa.
Hɛɛ, dani wɔɔnyɛ wɔsusu anɔkwalei ni ale jogbaŋŋ lɛ he, ni wɔmu sane naa yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ lɛ, saneshishinumɔ he miihia wɔ.—Daniel 9:22, 23.
Ni aha lɛ klala ni he tse ni kpɛɔ nyɛramnyɛram koni ewo. Ejaakɛ klala lɛ ji krɔŋkrɔŋbii lɛ ajalɛ nii lɛ.”
Belɛ, esa akɛ nyɛmimɛi asuɔmɔ krɔŋŋ atsirɛ wɔ ni wɔdɔ wɔnyɛmimɛi Kristofoi hii kɛ yei lɛ fɛɛ ahe ní amɛsane akã wɔtsui nɔ.
Hɛɛ, wɔkase nɔ ko ni he hiaa waa—bɔ ni akɛ he fɔ̃ɔ Yehowa, “mɔ ni wajeɔ” wɔ lɛ nɔ.
(Yeremia 15:16) Hɛɛ, Yeremia ná miishɛɛ yɛ anɔkwale ni eji akɛ aŋɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛi lɛ awo lɛ he, ni Ewiemɔi lɛ ajara wa kɛha gbalɔ lɛ.
19 Hɛɛ, kɛ́ ojɛ osuɔmɔ mli obo Nyɔŋmɔ toi lɛ, obaatsɔ mɔ ni feɔ jalɛ nii.
Hɛɛ, minu wiemɔi nɛɛ shii abɔ akɛ,
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:35) Hɛɛ, ‘Yehowa he nyamɔ lɛ ji wɔhewalɛ.’
5 Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, akɛni Yesu le shihilɛ mli ni yoo lɛ yɔɔ—akɛ eji yoo okulafo ohiafo—hewɔ lɛ, ena bɔ ni yoo lɛ nikeenii lɛ jara wa ha, ni ehiɛ sɔ nikeenii lɛ waa.
Hɛɛ, oyookpeemɔ gbi lɛ ji gbi krɛdɛɛ.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 2:19-21; Romabii 10:13) Hɛɛ, mɛi ni tsɛɔ Yehowa gbɛi lɛ baaje mli.
(Lala 55:23) Hɛɛ, ‘mɛi ni hiɛ kã Yehowa nɔ lɛ baaná hewalɛ hee.’—Yesaia 40:31.
Hɛɛ, shi yɛ shihilɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ mli lɛ, Kristofonyo lɛ yeee ehe akɛ eeeyatao mɔ kroko, kɛ shishinumɔ akɛ ekɛ lɛ baabote gbalashihilɛ mli.
Hɛɛ, wɔwala be yɛ kuku kwraa, tamɔ jwɛi ní ŋãlãa yɛ gbi kome pɛ mli.
(Yakobo 4:7, 8) Hɛɛ, “nyɛfea ekaa ni nyɛwajea nyɛtsui, nyɛ mɛi fɛɛ ni nyɛmɛɔ Yehowa lɛ.”—Lala 31:24, NW.
Hɛɛ, nakai ni.
Hɛɛ, “nyɛbaa nyɛhe shi yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nine ni wa lɛ shishi, koni ewo nyɛnɔ yɛ be ni sa mli.”—1 Petro 5:6.
(Lala 55:17, 23; Luka 11:5-13; 2 Korintobii 4:7) Hɛɛ, Yehowa boɔ “sɔlemɔ fɛɛ sɔlemɔ kɛ faikpamɔ fɛɛ faikpamɔ ní mɔ ko loo [e]maŋ fɛɛ aaakpa” lɛ toi.
Hɛɛ, adesai baanyɛ ajie musuŋtsɔlɛ kɛ mlihilɛ kpo, moŋ fe nɔ ni amɛyi aaawa yɛ mɛi anɔ.
43 “Shi kɛ́ be ni ajie tɛi lɛ ni aŋmala shĩa lɛ gbogboi lɛ ahe, ní asaa akɛ sũ kroko ekpa* he sɛɛ lɛ hela lɛ ku sɛɛ eba ekoŋŋ lɛ, 44 no lɛ, osɔfo lɛ aya shĩa lɛ mli ni eyakwɛ.
Esa akɛ yɛ be kɛ beaŋ lɛ akai shiɛlɔi koni amɛnyɛ amɛsaa amɛhe, ní amɛbɔ mɔdɛŋ waa koni amɛje Biblia mli nikasemɔi ashishi yɛ shĩa kɛ shĩa, kɛ agbɛnɛ beni amɛsaraa mɛi ni jie miishɛɛ kpo yɛ sane lɛ he be ko ni eho lɛ.
45 Kɛkɛ ni ebote sɔlemɔ shĩa lɛ ni ebɔi mɛi ni hɔ̃ɔ nii lɛ shwiemɔ,+ 46 ni ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Aŋma akɛ, ‘Abaatsɛ mishĩa lɛ sɔlemɔ shĩa,’+ shi nyɛ lɛ, nyɛkɛfee julɔi atɛkplo.”
1 Paulo, mɔ ni awo lɛ tsuŋ+ yɛ Kristo Yesu hewɔ, kɛ wɔnyɛmi Timoteo,+ kɛ wolo nɛɛ miimaje Filemon, wɔnaanyo nitsulɔ ni wɔsumɔɔ lɛ lɛ, 2 kɛ Apia, wɔnyɛmi yoo lɛ, kɛ Arkipo,+ wɔnaanyo asraafonyo lɛ, kɛ asafo ni yɔɔ oshĩa lɛ mli lɛ:+
Yesaia jaje akɛ: “Matsĩ Yehowa mlihilɛ lɛ kɛ Yehowa yijiemɔ lɛ tã matsɔɔ, yɛ nibii fɛɛ ní Yehowa efee eha wɔ lɛ kɛ ejurɔ pii ní efee Israel we lɛ yɛ emusuŋtsɔlɛ kɛ emlihilɛ ní fá lɛ naa lɛ hewɔ.
Wɔɔhe tsũi kpakpai: “Amɛaamamɔ tsũi, ni amɛaahi mli.” —Yesaia 65:21.
+ 44 Kɛkɛ lɛ ekɛɔ akɛ, ‘Maku misɛɛ maya mishĩa ni mifã yɛ mli lɛ mli,’ ni kɛ́ ebashɛ lɛ, enaa akɛ shĩa lɛ kã shi efolo ni abɛɛ mli, ni asaa mli.
* Shi akɛni Yeush kɛ Beria fɔɔɔ bihii pii hewɔ lɛ, abu amɛ akɛ tsɛmɛi ashĩa kome mli bii, ni ahã amɛ nitsumɔ kome.
+ Kɛ́ mɛi tsɛ shĩatsɛ lɛ Beelzebul*+ lɛ, enyiɛ nɔŋŋ ni amɛtsɛŋ eshĩabii lɛ nakai?
Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Ejaakɛ shĩa fɛɛ shĩa lɛ, mɔ ko kɛ̃ ma, shi mɔ ni saa nii fiaa to ji Nyɔŋmɔ.”
Shi nyɛnáa nyɛlea akɛ, kɛ́ shiatsɛ ko le nɔ̃ ŋmɛlɛtswaa nɔ ni julɔ baa lɛ, kulɛ eeesara ni eŋmɛŋ gbɛ ni agbu ewe lɛ awoŋ.
Nyɔŋmɔ yiŋtoo ji ni Yesu ashiɛ aha Yudafoi lɛ titri, “Israel we tooi ni elaaje lɛ.”
Be ko lɛ, Yesu yɛ shĩa ko mli ni mɛi komɛi kɛ nuu ko ni nyɛɛɛ anyiɛ lɛ ba jɛmɛ.
Ohiɛ Adɔ Yehowa We Lɛ He!
Kɛ́ wu kɛ ŋa miito nɔ ko he gbɛjianɔ loo amɛmiikpɛ amɛyiŋ yɛ nɔ ko he—kɛ́ eji wɔɔhe, nitsumɔ, bii afɔmɔ, hiɛtserɛjiemɔ, hejɔɔmɔi, loo jamɔŋ nifeemɔi lɛ—esa akɛ amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ asusu hefatalɔ kroko lɛ henumɔi kɛ esusumɔi lɛ ahe.—Abɛi 11:14; 15:22.
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ gbekɛbii saa amɛhe tamɔ sisai loo ayɛi ŋmɛnɛ, ni amɛtee mɛi ashĩai amli ni amɛyawo amɛhe gbeyei akɛ kɛ́ amɛhaaa amɛ nɔ ko lɛ amɛbaaye amɛ awui lɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhe miiwo Samhain kusumii amli ni amɛleee.
Shi David hã awó kɛtee Obed-edom,+ Gatnyo* lɛ shĩa lɛ.
Ewaa kɛhaa mɛi komɛi akɛ amɛaashiɛ yɛ shĩa kɛ shĩa ní amɛkɛ mɛi ni amɛleee agba sane.
Lydia kɛ eshia ha, ni Paulo kɛ mɛi krokomɛi bahi mli.
14 Anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ Adeka lɛ hi Obed-edom shĩabii lɛ aŋɔɔ yɛ eshĩa lɛ nyɔji etɛ, ni Yehowa tee nɔ ejɔɔ Obed-edom shĩabii lɛ kɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni eyɔɔ.
14 Hiram,+ Tiro maŋtsɛ lɛ, tsu mɛi kɛtee David ŋɔɔ, ni ehã akɛ tseneduru tsei, kɛ tɛ gbogbotswalɔi, kɛ kapintafoi hu tee ni amɛyama maŋtsɛ shĩa amɛhã David.
17:20, 21) Aafee nakai bianɛ yɛ be mli ni amɛkɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔi ni amɛnine shɛɔ nɔ yɛ Yehowa “we” lɛ tsuɔ nii lɛ.
Aaafee afii 2,700 ni eho nɛ, ni akɛ mumɔ tsirɛ Hebri gbalɔ Yesaia koni egba akɛ, “naagbee gbii lɛ amli lɛ, Yehowa we lɛ gɔŋ lɛ aaama shi yɛ gɔji lɛ ayiteaŋ . . .
Amɛmamɔ tsũi amɛha “mɛi [hii] ni kɛ amɛhe eha ajwamaŋbɔɔ lɛ” yɛ “Yehowa we lɛ,” ni amɛha amɛbii ‘tsɔ la mli kɛha Molek.’—2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 23:4-10.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, Woloŋlelɔ Kpanaa Gamble wie akɛ, gbi ko beni Augustine nu gbekɛ ko gbee yɛ akutso lɛ mli miikɛɛ akɛ: “Kɔ ni okane, kɔ ni okane” lɛ, eŋɔ lɛ akɛ famɔ ni jɛ ŋwɛi akɛ ekɔ Biblia lɛ ni ekane klɛŋklɛŋ ŋmalɛ ni ehiŋmɛi baagba nɔ lɛ.
Henry Grew, George Stetson, kɛ George Storrs pɛi susuma ni gbooo tsɔɔmɔ lɛ mli, ni amɛkpa he mama akɛ eji amale tsɔɔmɔ
Taakɛ nɔkwɛmɔnii ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, tipɛŋfoi anɔnyɛɛ kpakpa baanyɛ aye abua wɔ koni wɔsɔmɔ Yehowa kɛ susuma muu fɛɛ.
4 Nɔ ni Tsɔɔ Wɔshidaa ni Fe Fɛɛ: Ni wɔɔjɛ wɔsusuma fɛɛ mli wɔná Maŋtsɛyeli shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ, ni wɔwo Yehowa gbɛi lɛ hiɛ nyam, ni wɔtsɔɔ hiɛsɔɔ yɛ sɔlemɔ mli, ni wɔkɛ anɔkwayeli afã anɔkwale lɛ he lɛ fata shidaa ni fe fɛɛ ni jɛ tsuiŋ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛha wɔ Bɔlɔ lɛ, yɛ nibii fɛɛ ni efee eha wɔ hewɔ lɛ he.
Biblia ko (NET Bible) tsɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ shiwoo nɛɛ shishi akɛ: “Maha mɛi ni egbɔjɔ lɛ anine ashɛ amɛhiamɔ nii fɛɛ anɔ ni mashɛje susumai ni etɔ biti lɛ amii kwraa.”—Yer.
Emu sane naa akɛ: “Susuma ni gbooo lɛ . . . ji wɔŋjalɔi ajeŋ nilee ni abiii he sane.”
Ni nyɛhaa wɔjiea mɛi ayi kɛ wɔsusuma fɛɛ—wɔjie Yehowa yi daa yɛ wɔjamɔ mli, ni wɔjie mɛi krokomɛi ayi yɛ anɔkwale mli yɛ gbɛ ni ni tsɔɔ kafomɔ kɛ hiɛsɔɔ ni sa, ni wɔkai akɛ, “wiemɔ ni awie yɛ be ni sa mli lɛ ehi pam!”—Abɛi 15:23.
Bɔfo Paulo wie kɛkɔ enɛ he akɛ: “Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ hiɛ kã ni eyɛ hewalɛ ni enaa ba fe klante fɛɛ klante kɛ enaa nta, ni egbuɔ kɛboteɔ mli aahu kɛyashiɔ egbalaa susuma kɛ mumɔ mli, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu talɔi kɛ wuiaŋfɔ lɛ mli, ni enyɛɔ ekɔɔ tsui lɛ mli susumɔi kɛ yiŋtoi asɛɛ.”
(Efesobii 5:25-27) Bɔni afee ni amɛnine ashɛ “Nyɔŋmɔ tsɛmɔ ni jɛ ŋwɛi . . . lɛ he jweremɔ nɔ lɛ” nɔ hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ Kristofonyo fɛɛ Kristofonyo ni afɔ lɛ mu lɛ ajie esu kɛ baŋ momo lɛ kɛ enifeemɔi lɛ eshwie, ni ewo Kristofoi agbɔmɔtso hee lɛ, ni etsu jalɛ nii ‘kɛjɛ esusuma muu fɛɛ mli akɛ Yehowa etsuɔ ehaa.’—Filipibii 3:8, 13, 14; Kolosebii 3:9, 10, 23.
Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ susuma lɛ gboɔ, shi Kristendom jamɔi babaoo tsɔɔ akɛ adesa yɛ susuma ni gbooo, ni ákɛ susuma lɛ yaa nɔ ehiɔ shi yɛ adesa gbele sɛɛ, ni etsɔɔ mumɔŋ gbɔmɔ.
Yibiiwoo lɛ falɛ baafee sɔrɔto, shi Yehowa hiɛ sɔɔ, yɛ bei abɔ ni sɔɔmɔ ni akɛha lɛ ji nɔ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni wɔsusuma baanyɛ ekɛha.
Amɛbale Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ ni ‘amɛsumɔɔ lɛ kɛ amɛtsui muu fɛɛ kɛ amɛsusuma muu fɛɛ kɛ amɛjwɛŋmɔ muu lɛ fɛɛ.’
Eeekpɔ̃ amɛsusuma kɛaajɛ fifiamɔ kɛ yiwalɛ mli, ni amɛlá jara aaawa yɛ ehiɛ.”
Wɔkɛ wɔtsui kɛ wɔsusuma fɛɛ wo wɔnitsumɔ hee nɛɛ mli, ni yɛ be fioo sɛɛ lɛ, wɔnyɛ wɔbɔi shiɛmɔ kɛ nitsɔɔmɔ yɛ Portuguebii awiemɔ mli.
(Mateo 16: 22, 23) Ni wɔɔfee wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔsusuma ejurɔ lɛ eŋmɛɛɛ anyagbafeemɔ kɛ akɔnɔ sɛɛdii su namɔ gbɛ.
Yɛ je lɛŋ he fɛɛ he kɛ jamɔ kɛ kusumii pii amli lɛ, gbɔmɛi heɔ yeɔ akɛ adesa yɛ susuma ni gbooo yɛ emli, mumɔ ko ni hiɛ kã, ni yaa nɔ ehiɔ shi yɛ gbɔmɔtso lɛ gbele sɛɛ.
Amɛyɛ Roma beni Paulo kɛɛ Kristofoi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ akɛ: “Nyɛŋãa Priska kɛ Akwila, ní ji minanemɛi nitsulɔi yɛ Kristo Yesu mli lɛ, nyɛhaa mi, mɛi ni kɛ amɛhe wo gbele mli yɛ miyiwala hewɔ, ní jeee mi kɛkɛ midaa amɛ shi, shi moŋ jeŋmaji lɛ amli asafoi lɛ fɛɛ hu daa amɛ shi lɛ.”
Blema Hela jeŋ nilelɔi Socrates kɛ Plato he ye akɛ susuma ko ni yɔɔ gbɔmɔ mli lɛ hiɔ shi yɛ gbele sɛɛ ni egbooo kɔkɔɔkɔ.
4 Nibii ni Tsɔɔ Suɔmɔ ni Wɔyɔɔ Kɛha Yehowa: Wɔle akɛ Yehowa ni aaasumɔ lɛ kɛ tsui muu fɛɛ, kɛ susuma muu fɛɛ, kɛ jwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ lɛ, yaa shɔŋŋ kwraa fe henumɔ kɛkɛ ni aaaná aha Nyɔŋmɔ.
Loo “susuma.”
Kɛ ŋkɔmɔyeli fa babaoo yɛ mimli lɛ, omiishɛjemɔi lɛ haa misusuma mii shɛɔ ehe.”—Lala 94:18, 19; kwɛmɔ Lala 63:7-9 hu.
No hewɔ ni wiemɔ ni ji, “susuma ni gbooo” lɛ bɛ Biblia lɛ mli he ko he ko lɛ.
□ Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ esa akɛ wɔhã bɔ ni Yehowa buɔ susuma muu fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ ehãa lɛ aná bɔ ni wɔsusuɔ mɛi ahe wɔhãa lɛ nɔ hewalɛ yɛ?
Mɛni abaanyɛ akɛɛ yɛ bɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛ wiemɔ “susuma” tsuɔ nii ehaa lɛ he?
4 Ni Yehowa baaye shi ni ewo yɛ mihe lɛ nɔ akɛ: ‘Kɛ́ obihii lɛ ahiɛ hi amɛhe nɔ jogbaŋŋ ni amɛye mi anɔkwa ni amɛkɛ amɛtsui fɛɛ kɛ amɛsusuma* fɛɛ nyiɛ yɛ mihiɛ lɛ,+ no lɛ ebaŋ kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ be ko baashɛ ni anáŋ oseshinyo ko ni baata* Israel maŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ nɔ.’
Minaa kpɛ mihe waa akɛ male akɛ adesa susuma lɛ gboɔ, ni mɛi babaoo ji mɛi ni eyaŋ ŋwɛi kɛ amɛgboi, ni agbɛnɛ hu, naanɔ piŋmɔ ko bɛ hɛl kɛha mɛi fɔji lɛ.
8 Nyɔmɔwoo ko bɛ gbɔlɛ be mli “gbii fɔji” lɛ amli—ekolɛ haomɔ babaoo moŋ —kɛha mɛi ni susuuu amɛ-Bɔlɔ Kpeteŋkpele lɛ he, ní amɛbɛ enunyam yiŋtoi lɛ ahe shishinumɔ ko kwraa lɛ.
Gbalɔ lɛ miiwie mumɔŋ ŋwɛi, he ni Yehowa kɛ emumɔŋ bɔɔ nii ní anaaa amɛ lɛ hiɔ lɛ he.
Mɛni ji eyiŋtoo yɛ shihilɛ mli?
+ 6 Ni enɛ ji suɔmɔ lɛ, akɛ wɔya nɔ wɔnyiɛ yɛ ekitãi lɛ anaa.
Shi eyɔse yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ akɛ, atsɔ hiɛ ato bɔ ni ebaada eha yɛ enyɛ musuŋ lɛ he gbɛjianɔ afɔ̃ shi momo.
Ekolɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ susu nɔ ni ebaafee lɛ he.
Eshuɔji batsɔmɔ Vaisya, ni akɛ enaji fee Sudra.”—The Bible of the World.
(Mateo 10:41) Nyɔŋmɔ Bi lɛ hu jie yoo okulafo nɛɛ yi beni etsĩ etã akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ yɛ emaŋbii, ni ji Nazaretbii ni ejieee hemɔkɛyeli kpo lɛ ahiɛ lɛ.—Luka 4:24-26.
Ewa waa kɛha mi akɛ mana bɔ ni hetoo ni ekɛha lɛ kɛ Nuntsɔ lɛ sɔlemɔ, ní mikase yɛ skul lɛ kpãa gbee haa.
Wɔkai Yesu kɔkɔbɔɔ ni ekɛha ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ ‘amɛya nɔ amɛwo yibii pii’ lɛ.
+ 20 Ejaakɛ be ni ewala gbii lɛ hoɔ yaa lɛ, ejwɛŋmɔ eyaaa nɔ,* ejaakɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hãa emii ni eshɛ ehe yɛ etsui mli lɛ heɔ ejwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ.
Tsuji kɛ amɛhiɛ fɔ̃ɔ amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi anɔ kɛhã niyenii kɛ hebuu. Shi kɛfata he lɛ, amɛhãa amɛhiɛ hiɔ amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi lɛ anɔ daa, koni amɛna nɔ ni amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi lɛ miisumɔ ni amɛfee, ni amɛtsu he nii.
Esa akɛ eyɔse akɛ, ja ekpɛlɛ yibii gbohii ni gbɛ fɔŋ ni ekɔ lɛ ewo lɛ fɛɛ anɔ dani fai ni ekpaa Yehowa kɛha eshaifaa lɛ baafee nɔ̃ ni sa.

Nyɔŋ efeee enuŋtsɔ.
1:5) Eeenyɛ efee akɛ Paulo ná ele weku nɛɛ beni etee nakai kpokpaa lɛ nɔ klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa yɛ afii komɛi ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ.
Taakɛ bɔfo Yohane kɛ enaanyo Gaio ji lɛ, amɛmɔ anɔkwale lɛ mli kpɛŋŋ, ni amɛnyiɛ mli.
(1 Yohane 4:20) Yɛ yitsei ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ amli lɛ, wɔbaapɛi bɔ ni Yesu jie suɔmɔ kpo etsɔɔ mɛi lɛ mli.
Agbɛnɛ, nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ nɔŋŋ, eeenyɛ efee akɛ be ni aye Hehoo niyenii lɛ atã lɛ, etsɛ David gbalɛ wiemɔi nɛɛ ayisɛɛ ekɛɛ: “Mi diɛŋtsɛ mishieŋtsɛ po ni miheɔ lɛ miyeɔ, mɔ ni yeɔ midɛŋ ŋmaa lɛ, efã enane eshi mi.”
Te Yehowa nuɔ gbohii ashi ni ebaatée lɛ he ehaa tɛŋŋ, ni te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ enɛ?
Renato ha abaptisi lɛ yɛ afi 2002, ni no sɛɛ afi kome lɛ etsɔ Kristofonyo sɔɔlɔ ni kɛ ebe fɛɛ shiɛɔ ni ekɛtsɔɔ akɛ ehiɛ esɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni Yehowa efee eha lɛ lɛ.
Mɛni hewɔ Mose bi Nyɔŋmɔ egbɛ́i lɛ he sane lɛ, ni mɛni hewɔ shishinumɔ yɛ mli akɛ ebi nakai lɛ?
Nɛkɛ nitsumɔ nɛɛ, ni Kristo jɛɔ eŋwɛi maŋtsɛsɛi lɛ nɔ ekudɔɔ lɛ miiya nɔ kɛbashi bianɛ, ni enɛ saa bo diɛŋtsɛ ohe.
25 Esusu akɛ enyɛmimɛi lɛ baakɔ sɛɛ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ miitsɔ enine nɔ eehere amɛyiwala, shi amɛkɔɔɔ sɛɛ.
Ani hiɛshikalɔ kome folo po bɛ nyɛteŋ ni baanyɛ enyɛmimɛi ateŋ ekojo?
MƆBƆNALƐ: ‘Eeena ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efĩ lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ehere mɛi ni efĩ amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.
Moŋ lɛ, etsɔɔ akɛ emusuŋ tsɔɔ lɛ yɛ mɛi ni feɔ eshai ni yɔɔ hiɛdɔɔ, shi amɛtsɔɔ akɛ amɛshwa amɛhe, ni amɛbaa Kristo lɛ ŋɔɔ koni amɛhe ajɔ amɛ lɛ ahe, ni enuɔ amɛ shishi hu.
Ŋto tso lɛ he sɛɛ ni ená lɛ hewɔ ni edɔ lɛ akɛ tso lɛ gbo lɛ.
Yɛ be mli ni wɔkpáaa fai akɛ wɔtɔ̃ yɛ wɔshiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, eka shi faŋŋ akɛ wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsɔɔ bɔ ni edɔ wɔ akɛ wɔba yɛ be ni esaaa mli.
Shi ani Yesu efee nɔ ko fɔŋ ko dã, ni no hewɔ lɛ esa akɛ edɔ lɛ waa?
Wɔnanemɛi maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi lɛ yɔse akɛ nibii ni ekɛɛmɔ wa waa yɛ wiemɔ fɛɛ wiemɔ mli lɛ ateŋ ekome ji “edɔ mi,” titri lɛ beni mɔ ko kpaa fai yɛ nɔ ko ni ewie loo efee ni eleee hewɔ lɛ.
ANI nuu ni hela emɔ lɛ nɛɛ nii miifee bo mɔbɔ?
Enɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, esa akɛ oshwa ohe waa yɛ nibii fɔji fɛɛ ni ofee lɛ ahe.
Nuumo wɔɔɔ jogbaŋŋ yɛ esaa nɔ.
Yesu bi akɛ “Simon, wɔ owɔɔ lɛ?”
Je ena waa, ekolɛ nyɔɔŋteŋ po eho, ni “amɛhiŋmɛii etsii” kɛ wɔɔ.
6 Nakai nyɔɔŋ lɛ mli lɛ, maŋtsɛ lɛ nyɛɛɛ awɔ.
(Yohane 11:11-13) Wɔkpaaa gbɛ akɛ mɔ ko ni ewɔ lɛ baaye abua wɔ, aloo jeee nakai?
‘Makã shi mawɔ yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli’ (8)
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ŋɔɔ lɛ akɛ Kristofoi pii wɔɔ shĩa kome mli.
Kɛ́ wɔná wɔɔ kpakpa ko wɔwɔ lɛ, wɔmii shɛɔ wɔhe waa, shi namɔ baasumɔ ni kɛ́ eyakã shi lɛ ekate shi dɔŋŋ?
Kɛ wɔshɛ jɛmɛ, wɔwɔɔ yɛ Nyɛmiyoo DeCambra, ni ji yoo ni fɔɔ mɔ ni tsuɔ nii yɛ jɛmɛ fɛɛ lɛ shia ni wɔhe jɔɔ wɔ jogbaŋŋ.
Yesu kome too tee eyasɔle shii etɛ, ni shii etɛ lɛ fɛɛ lɛ ekuɔ esɛɛ ebanaa Petro kɛ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ ni amɛmiiwɔ!
Yiŋtoo kroko hu ji akɛ, ekolɛ amɛwɔɔɔ mra, no hewɔ lɛ amɛwɔ shɛɛɛ amɛnaa.
12 Be ni eshwɛ fioo ni hulu baanyɔ shi lɛ, wɔ nyɔ Abram nɔ vii, ni duŋ kpii ni yɔɔ gbeyei ba enɔ.
Kristendom jamɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ ateŋ mɛi komɛi po wie amɛwebii lɛ ahe akɛ ‘amɛmiiwɔ waa.’
Akɛni mináa be pii mikɛwɔɔ hewɔ lɛ, miyɛ miishɛɛ!
Obaanyɛ okɛ mɛi akpekpei abɔ ni yɔɔ amrɔ nɛɛ lɛ abɔ naanyo, kɛ mɛi hu ni bei ni eho lɛ amɛmiiwɔ yɛ gbele mli ni miimɛ koni atee amɛ shi lɛ hu abɔ yɛ be mli ni “gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ.”
Sɛɛ mli be ni Yosef miisusu saji nɛɛ ahe lolo lɛ, etsɔ mli ewɔ.
29, 30. (a) Mɛni Yesu kɔkɔbɔɔ akɛ mɛi ni anaa akɛ amɛmiiwɔ lɛ ahiɛ baagboi ejaakɛ abaajie amɛ “atadei” lɛ yɛ amɛhe lɛ tsɔɔ?
Gbii enyɔ sɛɛ lɛ, ekɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Wɔshieŋtsɛ Lazaro ewɔ; shi miiya ni mayatsĩɛ lɛ yɛ wɔ lɛ mli.”
▪ “Mɛni ebaabi koni wɔnyɛ wɔwɔ gbɛkɛ, ni wɔsheee gbeyei akɛ abaaju wɔ nibii loo ni aaaye wɔ awui?”
Yɛ afii kpawo ni mikɛsɔmɔ yɛ biɛ lɛ mli lɛ, be fɛɛ be lɛ, mináa nɔ ko miyeɔ ni miyɛ he ko ni miwɔɔ.”
Wɔ̀ ni awɔɔɔ yɛ tɔŋtɔŋ buu mli yɛ hei ni atridii ehe shi waa yɛ lɛ hu kɛ oshara baa.
Paulo shɛje Tesalonikabii lɛ amii akɛ: “Wɔmiisumɔ akɛ nyɛle mɛi ni ewɔ lɛ ahe sane, koni nyɛkaye ŋkɔmɔ tamɔ mɛi ni eshwɛ lɛ, mɛi ni bɛ nɔhiɛkamɔ ko lɛ.”
Kaselɔi lɛ yasusu akɛ Yesu miitsɔɔ akɛ Lazaro bɛ hewalɛ, ni no hewɔ lɛ eewɔ kɛmiijɔɔ ehe koni ená hewalɛ.
Yɛ be ko sɛɛ lɛ ebanina amɛ ni amɛmiiwɔ.
Kadimɔ akɛ Yesu kɛ Lazaro kɛ Yairo biyoo lɛ agbele lɛ to wɔ ni awɔɔ he.
Nugbɔ ní nɛɔ yɛ agbiɛnaa beaŋ ní no haa weintsei lɛ woɔ jogbaŋŋ lɛ enɛŋ, ni ŋmei kɛ jwɛi sɔŋŋ aaakwɛ̃ yɛ weintrom lɛ mli.—Yesaia 5:5, 6.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, adesai po ni efeee toiboo amɛhaaa lɛ lɛ po náa hulu kɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ ni ejɛɔ esuɔmɔ mli ekɛhaa lɛ he sɛɛ!
Ebaaba wɔŋɔɔ tamɔ nugbɔ ni miinɛ,
+ 17 Kɛjeee nakai lɛ, Yehowa mli baawo la ewo nyɛ, ni ebaaŋa ŋwɛi naa ni nugbɔ enɛŋ,+ ni shikpɔŋ lɛ baŋ enii, ni nyɛhiɛ baakpãtã oya kɛje shikpɔŋ kpakpa ni Yehowa kɛhãa nyɛ lɛ nɔ.
Ehãa sarawai gbálaa yɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ mli,*
Jeŋ nilelɔi buɔ akɔntaa akɛ kɛ́ jeee Jupiter hewɔ kulɛ, nibii wuji ní hiɛɔ foi kɛnyiɛɔ ŋwɛiniiaŋ nɛɛ baagbee shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ babaoo fe bɔ ni amɛbagbeɔ shi bianɛ lɛ toi 10,000.
Ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ hulu kɛ nugbɔ ni nɛɔ kɛ nibii krokomɛi fɛɛ ni he hiaa koni eha niyenii aba haa, aloo jeee nakai efeɔ?— No hewɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ji mɔ ni esa akɛ wɔda lɛ shi kɛ́ wɔhe wa.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 14:16, 17.
Ani ŋwɛi lɛ diɛŋtsɛ po baanyɛ ahã nugbɔ anɛ?
Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, mɛi kɛ amɛhe ha kɛfamɔ atomoi lɛ yɛ nugbɔ lɛ nɔ.
Yɛ nɛkɛ oshara be nɛɛ mli ni Yehowa kɛɛ Elia akɛ: “Yaa ni okɛ ohe ayatsɔɔ Ahab, ni maha nugbɔ abanɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ!”
Te feɔ tɛŋŋ ni gbalɔ lɛ kɛɔ nɔ ko tamɔ nakai beni anako nugbɔnɛmɔ atatu ko kwraa lɛ?
Ni ŋwanejee ko hu bɛ he akɛ wɔdaa Yehowa shi yɛ eninenaa nitsumɔ ni ji nugbɔ kɛ bɔ́ ní haa kwɛ̃ɛnii ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ daraa lɛ hewɔ.
Shi nugbɔnɛmɔ yeɔ buaa ni fɔfɔii kwɛ̃ɔ.
Yehowa ha hetoo: “Naa, kɛ miŋa ŋwɛi naa ni nugbɔ enɛɛɛ, aloo mifa baalabii ni amɛbaye shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ nii, aloo miha gbele-hela ba mimaŋbii lɛ ateŋ, ni mimaŋ ni aŋɔ migbɛi awo amɛ lɛ ba amɛhe shi, ni amɛkpa fai, ni amɛtao mihiɛ gbɛ, ni amɛkpale kɛjɛ amɛgbɛi fɔji lɛ anɔ lɛ: no lɛ mi hu majɛ ŋwɛi mabo toi, ni maŋɔ amɛhe eshai lɛ mafa amɛ, ni matsa amɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ.”—2 Kronika 6:21; 7:13, 14.
13 Yɛ September afi 2009 lɛ, nugbɔ wulu ko ni nɛ yɛ Manila yɛ Philippines lɛ ha nu afua ba Manila hei babaoo.
Bɔ́ loo nugbɔnɛmɔ, loo niiahefɔmɔ, loo ekɛ nitsumɔ yɛ be kpalaŋŋ mli, nyɛɛɛ eha ekwá.”
Ekolɛ wɔjeee okwaafoi, shi nugbɔnɛmɔ kɛ snoo baanyɛ asa wɔhe.
Beni atswaa ŋmɛji kpaanyɔ yɛ nugbɔ ni nɛɔ waa lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Odasefoi 507 ni yɔɔ Grenoble ni ji Alpine maŋtiase lɛ mli lɛ kpa gbɛjegbɛi lɛ anɔ fɛɛ ni amɛkɛ dɛhiɛmɔ woji lɛ hã loo amɛkɛ dɛhiɛmɔ woji lɛ wo woji amajemɔ adekai amli.
Shi Elia ye ebua Israelbii lɛ ni amɛtsake amɛtsui, ni no hewɔ lɛ esɔle koni nugbɔ anɛ.
Kɛlɛ, beni nugbɔ bɔi nɛmɔ lɛ, tso nɛɛ ni “egbo” lɛ ku sɛɛ etsɛ̃, ni tso hee ko jɛ eshishifãi lɛ mli tamɔ nɔ ni eji “tso hee.”
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Ehaa ehulu teɔ shi yɛ mɛi fɔji kɛ mɛi kpakpai anɔ, ni ehaa nugbɔ nɛɔ yɛ jalɔi kɛ mɛi ni bɛ jalɛ lɛ anɔ.”—Mateo 5:45.
Akɛni nugbɔ lɛ nɛ waa hewɔ lɛ, eha Kishon faa lɛ yi, ni ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ efɔ Baal gbalɔi ni akpata amɛhiɛ lɛ alá lɛ kɛtee.
Ejaakɛ ebaahã mra mli nugbɔ* anɛ bɔ ni sa ahã nyɛ,
Dabi, ejaakɛ Paulo kɛɛ: “[Nyɔŋmɔ] efɔ̃ɔɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe odaseyeli, shi moŋ efeɔ ejurɔ, ni ehaa nugbɔ jɛɔ ŋwɛi nɛɔ haa nyɛ, kɛ afii ni baa nii pii hu, ekɛ ŋmãa kɛ miishɛɛ woɔ nyɛtsuiiaŋ obɔ.”
(1 Mose 1:1; Nehemia 9:6; Hebribii 3:4; Kpojiemɔ 4:11) Enɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ lɛ etsɔɔ he fɛɛ he ni kɔɔyɔɔ atswa kɛya aloo lɛ ehaa nugbɔ nɛɔ.
Mijwɛŋ bɔ ni Yesu jie suɔmɔ kpo be ni mɛi wo emli la po lɛ he, ni no ye ebua mi ni mi hu mijie suɔmɔ ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ kpo mitsɔɔ yoo nɛɛ.”
Kaaja amɛ, ni kaasɔmɔ amɛ hu; ejaakɛ mi, Yehowa, O-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, miji Nyɔŋmɔ awuŋayelɔ ni woɔ tsɛmɛi atɔmɔi anyɔmɔ kɛtsɔɔ bii anɔ kɛyashiɔ yinɔbii ni ji etɛ kɛ yinɔbii ni ji ejwɛ ni nyɛɔ mi lɛ anɔ; ni minaa mɛi akpei abɔ ni sumɔɔ mi ni amɛyeɔ mikitai lɛ anɔ lɛ amɔbɔ.” —2 Mose 20: 4-6.
Esa akɛ amɛkase bɔ ni amɛaajie nɛkɛ suɔmɔ nɛɛ kpo, ejaakɛ etee nɔ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.”
9 Kaakoto amɛ, ni kaahã alaka bo ni osɔmɔ amɛ hu,+ ejaakɛ mi, Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, miji Nyɔŋmɔ ni biɔ ni ajá mikome too pɛ,+ ni mikɛ tsɛmɛi ni nyɛɔ mi lɛ atɔmɔi lɛ ahe toigbalamɔ baa bii anɔ, kɛ yinɔ ni ji etɛ kɛ yinɔ ni ji ejwɛ lɛ nɔ,+ 10 shi mijieɔ suɔmɔ ni tsakeee kpo mitsɔɔ mɛi ni sumɔɔ mi ni amɛyeɔ mikitãi lɛ anɔ lɛ aseshibii aahu kɛyashiɔ amɛseshibii lɛ ayinɔ ni ji akpe lɛ nɔ.
“Enɛ ji mikita, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.”
2 No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ Kristo mli hewalɛwoo ko yɛ, kɛ́ suɔmɔ miishɛjemɔ ko yɛ, kɛ́ mɔhesusumɔ ko* yɛ, kɛ́ suɔmɔ kɛ musuŋtsɔlɛ ko yɛ lɛ, 2 nyɛhãa mimiishɛɛ lɛ ayia obɔ, akɛ nyɛmiijwɛŋ nɔ kome, nyɛhiɛ suɔmɔ kome, nyɛfee ekome,* ni nyɛhiɛ susumɔ kome.
9 Yesu tsɔɔ ekaselɔi lɛ bɔ ni kasemɔ ní amɛaakase esuɔmɔ kɛ heshibaa lɛ he hiaa ha, beni ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.”
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikitã lɛ, akɛ nyɛsumɔsumɔa nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ pɛ ni misumɔɔ nyɛ lɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikitã, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.”
Tsui kpakpa ni eyɔɔ lɛ tsirɛɔ lɛ ni ejieɔ suɔmɔ ni Yesu wie he lɛ kpo akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.”—Yohane 13:35.
(Yuda 20, 21) Beni wɔyaa nɔ wɔnáa wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ sui ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ, ni mɔbɔnalɛ ni fa ni ejieɔ lɛ kpo etsɔɔ mɛi ni sumɔɔ lɛ lɛ fata he lɛ he sɛɛ lɛ, eba akɛ wɔɔha be fɛɛ be lɛ wɔhenumɔi afee tamɔ nɔ ni David jie lɛ kpo yɛ enaagbee wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Lala 145 lɛ mli lɛ akɛ: “Minaabu aaagba Yehowa yijiemɔ, ni heloo fɛɛ aaajie egbɛi krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yi daa kɛaatee naanɔ!”
Yehowa Odasefoi amajimaji ateŋ nyɛmifeemɔ ni suɔmɔ yɔɔ mli lɛ ji odaseyeli ni tsɔɔ akɛ jeŋ hee ko ni tamɔ nakai baanyɛ aba, ejaakɛ Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.”—Yohane 13:35.
Kɛ́ miná shika suɔmɔ lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ ebaanyɛ eha mɔdɛŋ ni mibɔɔ akɛ maye anɔkwa lɛ aba shi?—Lala 37:21; 1 Timoteo 6:9, 10.
(Yohane 13:1) Yɛ be mli ni Yesu wieɔ etsɔɔ hii 11 ni baafee nɔyeli kuu lɛ fa yɛ Kristofoi asafo lɛ mli lɛ, ekɛɛ: “Enɛ ji mikita, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.”
Jeee mɛi atɔmɔi taomɔ ji nɔ ni kadiɔ Yesu sɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ, shi moŋ nyɛmimɛi asuɔmɔ, ejaakɛ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.”
Yesu wie akɛ nɛkɛ suɔmɔ nɛɛ baakadi enɔkwa sɛɛnyiɛlɔi, ni ekɛɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe [kɛ a·gaʹpe] lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.”
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔná nɔmimaa akɛ Yehowa baajɔɔ wɔ waa kɛ́ wɔkɛ e-Bi Yesu Kristo wiemɔi lɛ tsu nii akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikitã, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.”—Yohane 15:12.
No sɛɛ lɛ, ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: ‘Enɛ ji mikitã, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.
Sɛɛ mli be fioo ko, yɛ nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ nɔŋŋ lɛ, Yesu ha saji amli fee faŋŋ, akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikitã, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.
Yesu diɛŋtsɛ fee lɛ faŋŋ beni ewie akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikitã, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.
Nyɛmimɛi asuɔmɔ ji nifeemɔ ko ni kadiɔ lɛ, taakɛ Yesu wie lɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.”
13:13) Kristofonyo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Sandra, ní ebote gbalashihilɛ mli afii 50 nɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Nɔ ni minyaa he fe fɛɛ yɛ miwu lɛ he ji Biblia mli gbɛtsɔɔmɔ kɛ emli ŋaawoo ni ekɛhaa mi lɛ, kɛ suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha Yehowa ní da fe suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha mi lɛ.”
2 Yesu tsɔɔ bɔ ni suɔmɔ he hiaa ha lɛ mli beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.”
(Yohane 14:31; Efesobii 5:2) Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ akɛ: “Enɛ ji mikita, akɛ nyɛsumɔ nyɛhe tamɔ bɔ ni misumɔ nyɛ lɛ.”—Yohane 15:12, 13.
Taakɛ Yesu wie kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ, suɔmɔ nɛɛ baahã ana mɛi ni amɛji, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛsumɔɔ nyɛhe lɛ, no mɛi fɛɛ kɛbaale akɛ mikaselɔi ji nyɛ.” —Yohane 13:35.
Daa Ju lɛ, mikɛ okpɔŋɔ nɔtamɔ nɔ̃ lɛ fɔ̃ɔ okpɔŋɔ loo teji lɛ nɔ, mifimɔɔ minibii lɛ ni mitoɔ mishwieɔ okpɔŋɔ loo teji lɛ nɔ, ni no sɛɛ lɛ mikɛ aaafee ŋmɛlɛtswai 12 taa kɛyaa asafo ni tsa nɔ lɛ mli.
Wɔfeɔ wɔweku Biblia mli nikasemɔ lɛ daa Ju gbɛkɛ beni wɔye nii wɔgbe naa, ni wɔkɛ gbekɛbii lɛ ateŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ kaseɔ Biblia lɛ akɛ aŋkroaŋkro.
Nitsumɔ ni ahã mi yɛ shĩa lɛ mli ji, niiahefɔmɔ kɛ lai lɛmɔ.
Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baasumɔ ni ebakwɛ wɔnitsumɔhe niji lɛ ateŋ eko mli kɛjɛ Ju kɛyashi Sohaa lɛ baanyɛ aba.
Ju ji jarawoo gbi yɛ Charity.
Agbɛnɛ hu, kɛjɛ Hɔɔ, March 22 lɛ nɔ aahu kɛyashi Kaimɔ gbi lɛ ni gbeɔ Ju, April 14 lɛ nɔ lɛ, wɔbaafã ta ko ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ ni wɔkɛfɔ̃ mɛi anine kɛba Kaimɔ lɛ shishi.
Yɛ afi 2014 mli lɛ, Kaimɔ lɛ baagbee Ju, April 14, beni hulu enyɔ shi.
7 Beni Yesu shɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ Ju, Nisan 10 lɛ, etsu nɔ ni ena yɛ shwane ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ he nii.
Yɛ Ju, April 2, 2007 lɛ, shikpɔŋhosomɔ ni naawalɛ ji 8.1 lɛ hoso Solomon Islands, ni ji ŋshɔkpɔi srɔtoi ni yɔɔ Australia kooyi-bokagbɛ lɛ.
Kɛjɛ Ju kɛyashi Hɔɔ lɛ, akɛ ŋmalɛ lɛ mlikwɛmɔ jeɔ gbi lɛ shishi yɛ Betel.
Ajɔɔ woji akalamɔhe hee lɛ kɛ tsũi etɛ ni awɔɔ mli lɛ anɔ yɛ Wallkill yɛ Ju May 16, afi 2005.
Ehoɔ niyenii babaoo kɛtsɔɔ hiɛ daa Ju, koni enyɛ ejɔɔ ehe ni enyɛ ekɛ eweku lɛ aye nii, fe ni eeefee mɔ ni bɛ deka yɛ kpatashi.
Ju Leebi 2
Carey Barber, ni no beaŋ lɛ esɔmɔɔ yɛ nitsumɔhe yitso ni yɔɔ Brooklyn, New York, lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Ju gbɛkɛ yɛ February 16, 1942 lɛ, abi ni hii fɛɛ ni yɔɔ Brooklyn Betel weku lɛ mli lɛ kɛ amɛhe awo nɔ ni sɛɛ mli lɛ abaatsɛ lɛ akɛ Teokrase Sɔɔmɔ Skul lɛ mli.”
▪ Esa akɛ asafoi ato gbɛjianɔ ni sa koni amɛye afi nɛɛ Kaimɔ lɛ Ju, April 2, beni hulu enyɔ shi sɛɛ.
Wɔkpeɔ daa Ju leebi ni wɔkɛsusuɔ wɔnitsumɔ kɛha otsi ni kã wɔhiɛ lɛ he, ni wɔjaraa nitsumɔi amli kɛha wɔshia lɛ kwramɔ.
Bei pii lɛ, be ni wɔbaashɛ shĩa lɛ, je ena ni etɔ wɔ bliboo.
Afi nɛɛ, Nisan 14 jeɔ shishi yɛ Ju, April 2, beni hulu enyɔ shi sɛɛ.
Wɔbɔi nitsumɔ ekoŋŋ Ju.
Kwɛ bɔ ni eji hewalɛwoo akɛ maná daa gbi ŋmalɛ lɛ leebi, kɛ Buu-Mɔɔ Nikasemɔ ni afeɔ daa Ju gbɛkɛ lɛ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ!
Jeŋ muu fɛɛ Betel weku lɛ mli bii ni amɛyi fa fe 12,000 lɛ le akɛ amɛfeɔ amɛweku nikasemɔ lɛ Ju gbɛkɛ.
1:6) Ju kɛ Jufɔ, ni ji Nisan 10 kɛ 11 lɛ, Yesu kɛ ehe wo emaŋ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli waa, ni ekɛha nakai enaagbee gbii lɛ fee nɔ ni ekɛtsu nii waa yɛ eshikpɔŋ nɔ shihilɛ mli lɛ ekomɛi.
Kɛfata he lɛ, wɔnyiɛɔ gbɛjianɔ ni wɔto kɛha Buu-Mɔɔ wolo tɛtrɛɛ lɛ kasemɔ kɛ Biblia lɛ kanemɔ daa Ju gbɛkɛ lɛ sɛɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.

(2 Korintobii 11:14, 15) Satan haa nɔ̃ fɔŋ feɔ tamɔ nɔ̃ kpakpa, ni elakaa mɛi ni amɛheɔ amalei amɛyeɔ.
+ 9 Shi be fɛɛ be ni mawie akɛ matswa jeŋmaŋ ko loo maŋtsɛyeli ko mama shi, ni madu, 10 ni efee efɔŋ yɛ mihiɛ ni ebooo migbee toi lɛ, no lɛ, mi hu matsake mijwɛŋmɔ* yɛ ekpakpa ni mito miyiŋ akɛ mafee mahã lɛ lɛ he.’

Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa na Zedekia akɛ ‘agbami gbonyo’ lɛ?
Mɛni tsirɛ lɛ koni etsi ehe kɛjɛ efɔŋ he amrɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ?
□ Mɛni hewɔ Nyɔŋmɔ eŋmɛ shihilɛ gbohii agbɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ?
Eyɛ mli akɛ wɔná tsuiŋ esha susumɔ kɛjɛ fɔmɔ mli moŋ, shi mɛni hewɔ wɔbaanyɛ wɔjie ekpakpafeemɔ ko kpo lɛ?
Ewie kɛfata he akɛ: “Mɛi ni sumɔɔ ni amɛle nɔ fɛɛ nɔ yɛ woji ni aŋmalaa ni akɛmajeɔ kɛtsɔɔ kɔmpiuta nɔ lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii ekɔ su fɔŋ diɛŋtsɛ ni ji hiɛtserɛjiemɔ he saji fɛɛ ni amɛnine shɛɔ nɔ lɛ ni amɛkɛmajeɔ—naaŋmɔlɔwoo wiemɔi, adesãi, woji ni akɛha koni mɛi krokomɛi hu nine ashɛ nɔ, kɛ ekrokomɛi babaoo—amɛkɛmajeɔ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni edrɛs yɔɔ amɛ kɔmpiuta nɔ lɛ.”
Satan tsɔɔ hiɛtserɛjiemɔ nifeemɔi kɛ gbɛ̀i krokomɛi anɔ elakaa mɛi koni amɛhé amɛye akɛ ekpakpa ji efɔŋ, ni efɔŋ moŋ ji ekpakpa.
Shi mɔ ni tiuɔ efɔŋ sɛɛ lɛ, no nɔŋŋ baaba enɔ kɛ̃.
Ebaabu ohe kɛjɛ nibii tamɔ “gbɛ fɔŋ,” kɛjɛ mɛi ni jeɔ jalɛ gbɛi anɔ, kɛ mɛi ni amɛgbɛ̀i bɛ tɔrɔmɔɔ lɛ ahe.
José kɛɛ akɛ: “Beni mishi wɔshĩa lɛ mli lɛ, mibɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ mafee mihe gbekɛ kpakpa, shi mikɛ nanemɛi fɔji yabɔ.
Osheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei jogbaŋŋ, ni ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ obaasumɔ ni otsi ohe kɛjɛ efɔŋ he.
+ 18 Nyɛyakwɛa bɔ ni shikpɔŋ lɛ ji hã,+ ní nyɛkwɛ kɛji mɛi ni yɔɔ nɔ lɛ ahe wa loo amɛhe waaa, amɛyi faaa loo amɛyi fa, 19 nyɛkwɛa kɛji shikpɔŋ lɛ hi loo ehiii, kɛji maji ni amɛyɔɔ mli lɛ jwere shi kɛkɛ loo atswa gbogboi awo amɛhe.

(Bɔfoi 15:28, 29; 1 Korintobii 6:9, 10) Kɛ́ wɔtsi wɔhe kɛje hiɛtserɛjiemɔi ni tamɔ nakai lɛ ahe lɛ, wɔhãa Yehowa naa akɛ wɔnyɛɔ efɔŋ. —Lala 34:14; Romabii 12:9.
Akɛni Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ* ji Mɔ ni Bɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni eji ofe hewɔ lɛ, ekolɛ, mɛi pii baashwa lɛ yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baa je lɛ mli, ni nibii fɔji fata he lɛ he.
Ani ole nii ni ehiii ni Adam kɛ Hawa fee lɛ?
Eyafee nibii gbohii pii, ni eyagbee amane mli.

20 min: Mɛni Hewɔ Esa akɛ Abɔ Nɔ ni Ehiii He Amaniɛ?
No hewɔ lɛ, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni ji lɛ, nyɛhaa wɔtsia wɔhe kɛjɛa naanyobɔɔ fɔŋ he ni wɔjie Yehowa yi yɛ gwabɔi amli.
Kaimɔ akɛ, no mli lɛ ŋwɛibɔfo fɔŋ ni ji Satan miifee efɔŋ.
Mɛi ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi ji mumɔŋ gbɔmɛi ni anaaa amɛ, ni ji Satan kɛ ebɔfoi ni feɔ efɔŋ lɛ.
Etamɔ nɔ ni ookɛɛ mɔ ko ni fɛi kɛ hɔmɔ miiye lɛ akɛ, ‘Yaawere la, ni oyaye nii otɔ’ ni no sɛɛ lɛ ofeee nɔ ko kɛyeee obuaaa lɛ.
21 Kɛ́ wɔjwɛŋ bɔ ni Yehowa kɛ jalɛsaneyeli tsuɔ nii ehaa lɛ he lɛ, esaaa akɛ wɔsusuɔ ehe akɛ eji kojolɔ ní yɔɔ kpɛŋŋ, ní bɛ henumɔ, ní susuɔ fɔbuu kojomɔ ní eeejaje eshwie efɔŋfeelɔi anɔ lɛ pɛ he.
Moŋ lɛ, hɔmɔ ye lɛ, kumai ye lɛ, fɛ̃i ye lɛ, ni enyiɛ yayaiaŋ hu.
Eyasusu akɛ mɛi naŋ ehe jwɛŋmɔ ni ejaaa yɛ jɛmɛ; yɛ esusumɔ naa lɛ, su nɛɛ yeɔ mɔ awui kwraa fe fɛ̃i ni yeɔ waa yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ.
16 Ani miishɛɛ ní Yehowa yɔɔ akɛ eeefã egbɛi lɛ he lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ ebɛ henumɔ, ni esusuɔ ekome pɛ ehe?
Yudafoi anyɔŋ ni ji Chislev (ni kɛ November kɛ December yeɔ egbɔ lɛ) ji nyɔŋ ko ni fɛ̃i yeɔ ni nugbɔ nɛɔ waa.
Ekolɛ tsitsi baamɔ bo, aloo omusu baakɔ̃ bo.
Ni fɛ̃i hu jɛɔ kooyigbɛ kɔɔyɔi lɛ amli kɛbaa.
Ekɛɔ amɛ, yɛ faŋŋ mli akɛ: “Mile onitsumɔi lɛ akɛ obɛ ŋanii ni obɛ klakla hu.
Kɛ afii komɛi ba ni fɛ̃i lɛ naa waaa tsɔ po yɛ mli lɛ, fɛ̃i yeɔ mɔ waa yɛ jɛmɛ yɛ fɛ̃i be lɛ mli. —Mika 5:1; Luka 2:15.
Ekɛɛ ‘hɔmɔ kɛ kumai kɛ fɛ̃i ye lɛ, ni enyiɛ yayaiaŋ.’
Shi yɛ no najiaŋ lɛ, eye egbii lɛ kɛhɔ̃ɔ aiswɔta yɛ hulu lɛ nɔ.
Nyɛkahaa wɔŋmɛa jeŋ ni anuuu nii ahe ahaaa mɔ yɛ mli, ni suɔmɔ bɛ mli nɛɛ gbɛ koni ekatsĩ suɔmɔ ni wɔɔjie lɛ kpo wɔtsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ naa.
Beni mikome too mitá jɛmɛ, ni miha kuŋtu hatahata ko lɛ, mikai bɔ ni miŋa ni edako tsɔ lɛ tu ehiɛ gbii enyɔ ni eho nɛ lɛ beni mɛi ni tamɔ asraafoi lɛ bamɔ mi kɛjɛ mishia, ni mishi lɛ kɛ wɔbii bibii enyɔ ni bɛ hewalɛ lɛ.
(1 Mose 4:8) No hewɔ lɛ Kain batsɔ gbɔmɔgbelɔ ni nuuu nii ahe ehaaa mɔ.
Akɛni wɔwɔɔ mama buui amli hewɔ lɛ, hulutsoo be mli jeŋ dɔlɛ lɛ naa waa fe nine, ni fɛ̃i bei amli hu lɛ, fɛ̃i yeɔ wɔ waa fe nine.
Enáa he miishɛɛ akɛ eeeye mɔ kroko awui yɛ gbɛ ni henumɔ bɛ mli ni nɔ ko kɔɔɔ ehe nɔ ko lɛ nɔ, ni enáa miishɛɛ yɛ mɔ kroko lɛ miishɛɛ ni ebɛ kɛ hiɛshishwiemɔ lɛ he.
Yɛ nakai be mli lɛ fɛ̃i miiye, ni titri lɛ, yɛ maji ni yɔɔ hei ni nɔ kwɔlɔ kɛ gɔji anɔ ni bɛŋkɛ Betlehem lɛ amli.

22 Wɔkase nibii ejwɛ kɛjɛ Hoshea yitso 6 kɛyashi yitso 9 lɛ mli ní baanyɛ aye abua wɔ ni wɔkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ anyiɛ, ni nomɛi ji: (1) Mɔ nifeemɔ nɔ atsɔɔ anaa akɛ etsake etsui diɛŋtsɛ; (2) afɔleshãai kɛkɛ esaaa Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ; (3) kɛ́ Yehowa jálɔi kwa lɛ lɛ, edɔɔ lɛ; kɛ (4) bɔni afee ni ahi aha wɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔfee nibii ni hi.

Kɛ́ wɔná suɔmɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ ni wɔjie lɛ kpo yɛ wɔsɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ, jeee miishɛɛ ni jɛɔ nɔhamɔ mli lɛ pɛ kɛkɛ wɔbaaná, shi moŋ wɔtsui hu baanyɔ wɔmli akɛ wɔmiikase Yesu ni wɔmiisa Yehowa hiɛ.

No hewɔ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ lɛ akɛ, ‘Obaalaka lɛ lɛɛlɛŋ, ni nɔ ni fe fɛɛ lɛ, obaaye omanye.
Ekolɛ amɛsusu akɛ Yesu kɛ nuu nɛɛ efee ekome koni amɛlaka mɛi lɛ.
14 Shi buulu lɛ, eyaa nɔ ewieɔ.
13 No sɛɛ lɛ, Delila kɛɛ Samson akɛ: “Kɛbashi amrɔ nɛɛ, ofee mi buulu ni olaka mi.
Kwashiai kɛ shwilafoi!
Wolo ko ní akɛpɛiɔ saji amli lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ, “kwashia sumɔɔ koni ehã mɛi ana akɛ ele nii, ni enɛ hãa efɔseɔ nɔ ni esusuɔ akɛ nilee yɛ mli lɛ eshwieɔ shi, shi saji ní jɛɔ enaa lɛ yafeɔ kwashiai asane.”
10 Ogbɔjɔ shihilɛ esaaa kwashia;
16 Buulu jieɔ emlifu kpo oya,*+
Shi mlila ni buulu woɔ mɔ lɛ, etsii fe nibii enyɔ nɛɛ fɛɛ.
Shi mɔ ko ni nɔ kwɔ fe amɛ laka Hawa.
Kwashia pɛ—ekolɛ mɔnɛ—baanyɛ ahe lɛ aye.”
22 Kɛ́ okɛ ŋmetso mli bi shi buulu yɛ ŋmetso mli
Hiɛnɔkamɔ yɛ kɛhã buulu fe lɛ.
Yehowa bi bɔfoi lɛ ateŋ mɔ ni baasumɔ ni eyalaka Israel maŋtsɛ Ahab ni yitsoŋ wa lɛ, ni eyanyɔ yɛ ta mli.
3 Henɔwomɔ tso yɛ buulu daaŋ,
(b) Mɛni wɔbaanyɛ wɔfee kɛtsɔɔ akɛ wɔhãko Satan alaka wɔ?
Ekpa nyɛmimɛi lɛ fai yɛ bɔ ni efee enii ehã lɛ hewɔ, ni ewie akɛ: “Mifee buulu waa, akɛ midamɔ mɛi enyɔ ni eba miŋɔɔ ni amɛbashiɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ amɛhã mi lɛ ahiɛ miwie nibii ni tamɔ nakai.”
Shii etɛ sɔŋŋ nɛ ni ofee mi buulu ni otsɔko mi nɔ ni hãa onáa hewalɛ kpele lɛ.”
Shi kɛlɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ kwashiai tsɔɔ amɛjieɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ amɛmli lɛ kpo?
(1 Korintobii 1: 20) Akɛni ebɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishemɔ hewɔ lɛ, mɔ ni yɔɔ jeŋ nilee lɛ muɔ saji anaa yɛ gbɛ ni ejaaa nɔ kɛjɛɔ anɔkwalei ni ale mli, ni ehaa efeɔ ‘kwashia.’
Kaaha alakao ni oha omumɔŋ niyeli miifee nɔ ni ehiii.
18 Mɔ ko akalaka lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehe: Kɛ́ nyɛteŋ mɔ ko susuɔ akɛ ehiɛ kã shi yɛ je nɛɛ* mli lɛ, etsɔ kwashia, koni etsɔ hiɛshikalɔ.
Bileam kɛɛ akɛ: ‘Oha mitsɔ tamɔ buuluu.
No hewɔ lɛ, kɛ́ mɔ ko tsɛ́ enaanyo akɛ “sɛkɛyelɔ” lɛ, belɛ eetsɔɔ akɛ esa akɛ akɛ toigbalamɔ ni akɛbaa mɔ ko ni tseɔ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ atũa lɛ nɔ aba enaanyo lɛ nɔ, ni tsɔɔ akɛ akpata ehiɛ kwraa.
Ekɛ nii babaoo ni ená yɛ eshihilɛ be fɛɛ mli lɛ tsu nii ni ekɛbua nibii ni yɔɔ fɛo kɛ nibii ni abuɔ akɛ ehi fe fɛɛ lɛ anaa.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 5:32) Mumɔ nɛɛ haa wɔwoɔ yibii kpakpai—sui kpakpai ni baanyɛ aha wɔya nɔ wɔfee toiboo lɛ.—Galatabii 5:22, 23.
Abaaje shishi atsake shikpɔŋ lɛ afee lɛ shia fɛfɛo, ni toiŋjɔlɛ, kɛ miishɛɛ yɔɔ mli kɛha adesai.
Jeee kɛɛmɔ ni aaakɛɛ kɛkɛ akɛ ajáa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ji nɔ ni nɔ atsɔ ayɔse anɔkwa Kristofoi lɛ, shi moŋ kɛtsɔ hemɔkɛyeli ni jieɔ sui kpakpai ni Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ woɔ lɛ akpo lɛ nɔ.
Kɛji wɔkwɛ nitɛŋmɔ ko ni yɔɔ fɛo loo wɔná nɔ ko ni agbɔ lɛ fɛfɛo ko he miishɛɛ lɛ, wɔyiŋ efeee wɔ kɔshikɔshi akɛ nitɛŋlɔ aloo nitɛŋlɔ ko ni gbɔɔ nii yɛ shihilɛ mli.
(Yuda 6) Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, amɛshi gbɛhe ni akɛwo amɛdɛŋ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋwɛi gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ mli lɛ ejaakɛ amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛkɛ yei fɛfɛji abahi shi yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
Yɛ saji ni ŋɔɔ ni awie yɛ Salomo Lalai lɛ amli lɛ fɛɛ mli lɛ, Shulamit oblayoo lɛ hi shi yɛ jeŋba hetsemɔ mli, ni no hewɔ lɛ ená bulɛ kɛjɛ mɛi ni bɔle ehe lɛ aŋɔɔ.
Nyɛminuu Breaux mã nɔ mi eha skulbii lɛ akɛ mɛi ni feɔ Yehowa suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ ahe yɛ fɛo yɛ Yehowa hiɛ ekɔɔɔ he eko bɔ ni amɛji yɛ kponɔgbɛ.
Miida nyɛ shi yɛ shikpɔŋ he mfoniri wolo fɛfɛo nɛɛ hewɔ.”
Abonsam duɔ mɛi komɛi, ejaakɛ amɛŋmɛɔ béi gbɛ ni efiteɔ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ ekomefeemɔ ni yɔɔ wɔteŋ lɛ kɛ shweremɔ ni Yehowa eha anɔkwa jamɔ miishwere yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ.—Lala 133:1-3.
(Romabii 5:9) Efeɔ enɛ ejaakɛ amɛhe yɛ fɛo yɛ ehiɛ.
Bɔ ni ŋoŋoi nɛɛ yɔɔ fɛo ni amɛyɔɔ srɔtoisrɔtoi lɛ sa ehiɛ waa, ni oona kɛ onaaa lɛ ebashi ekɔ eko eekwɛ.
Eŋɔɔ wɔnaa waa akɛ wɔɔle akɛ wɔ onukpai ni yɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii feɔ nii yɛ nɛkɛ mfoniri fɛfɛo ni haa mɔ naa hejɔɔmɔ nɛɛ kɛ gbeekpamɔ naa.
Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, kɛ́ wɔjie wɔwiemɔi akpo kɛ henumɔ ni sa lɛ, no lɛ wɔwiemɔ lɛ baanyɛ aŋɔɔ ni emli baatsii bɔ ni ebaanyɛ esa mɛi ni boɔ wɔ toi lɛ atsuii ahe.
“Bei komɛi kɛ́ mina yoo ko ni he yɔɔ fɛo lɛ, mikɛ lɛ toɔ fɔfɔi fɛfɛo ko ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ baasumɔ akɛ ená yɛ eshĩa lɛ he.
No ji nɔ ni ha efee yoo ni he yɔɔ fɛo diɛŋtsɛ lɛ.—Abɛi 31:30; Hebribii 11:11.
Nɛkɛ skul naagbee he gbɛjianɔtoo ni ji klɛŋklɛŋ nɔ ni akɛje shishi yɛ Buu Mɔɔ Asafo lɛ Nikasemɔhe ni yɔɔ Patterson, New York lɛ bafee nifeemɔ be ko ni ŋɔɔ waa kɛ emli nibii fɛfɛji.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ jetsɛremɔ tsuɔ nii tamɔ pɛnte, ni ekɛhãa je lɛŋ feɔ fɛo.
Nakai afi lɛ ji be ni miye afii 91, ni awo wɔ hewalɛ koni wɔfã kɛyahi maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi lɛ ashĩa ni yɔɔ Rome lɛ mli, ni eji shĩa fɛfɛo ko ni yɔɔ he ko ni kɛ́ wɔɔkɛɛ lɛ toiŋjɔlɛ yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ.
+ 13 No hewɔ lɛ, wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ, wɔmiida bo shi ni wɔmiijie ogbɛ́i fɛfɛo lɛ yi.

Nɔ ni akɛha fɛfɛo ni tsɔɔ saji amli fɛfɛo, ni yɔɔ wiemɔi 35 mli lɛ tsɔɔ bɔ ni Yehowa jeŋ muu fɛɛ webii agbɛjianɔtoo lɛ hãa Yesu famɔ akɛ ajaje sanekpakpa lɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ lɛ baa mli ehaa.

“Kɛ́ onyiɛ koo ko mli, ni oyati tso tsũ fɛfɛo ko ni mashi nɔ lɛ, ani obaakɛɛ akɛ: ‘Tsũ nɛɛ yɛ fɛo waa!
Efee gbeei kɛ alɔntei kɛ okpɔŋɔi; kooloi wuji kɛ kooloi bibii.
Eji kpee wulu diɛŋtsɛ, ni mɛi ni ba lɛ ayi fa kwraa fe Odasefoi ni yɔɔ maŋ lɛ mli lɛ.
Teemɔŋ sane wulu ko bɛ he.”
Ebaatsɔ onufu agbo.”
14 Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Rabshake, ní jáa apasa nyɔŋmɔi lɛ, nuuu shishi akɛ srɔto kpele yɛ Samaria hemɔkɛyeli kwalɔ lɛ kɛ Yerusalem ní yɔɔ Hezekia shishi lɛ teŋ.
Maŋtsɛyeli Ko Ni Tamɔ Tso Agbo
Beni Yona tee nu lɛ shishi lɛ, ŋshɔŋ loo agbo ko mi lɛ.
Skul sɔrɔtoi ni Yehowa Odasefoi kɛtsuɔ nii lɛ eye ebua babaoo.
Akɛ niyenii ni falɛ shɛɔ tɔŋ 188 maje kɛjɛ Rome yɛ tsɔnei kui wuji enyɔ mli kɛtsɔ Austria, Czechoslovakia, kɛ Poland kɛtee tsutsu Soviet Union.
Etee “yookpeemɔ he okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ” kɛ “okpɔlɔ wulu ko” ni aŋmɛ lɛ lɛ shishi.
Shi enɛ baanyɛ ekɛ haomɔi wuji aba.
Bɔni afee ni anyɛ ajie akoko lɛ kɛjɛ ehe totoi lɛ amli lɛ, nitsulɔi lɛ kɛ faka loo sofi wulu ko kaa akoko loo ŋmaa ni agbee lɛ, amɛfɔ̃ɔ amɛwoɔ kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ mli, ni kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ tswaa ehe totoi ni etsiii lɛ kɛyaa, ni ŋmaa loo akoko lɛ shwieɔ shi ekoŋŋ.
Wɔɔhei ní aaatao aha gbɔi babaoo ni baaba lɛ bafee nitsumɔ wulu.
Shi Saul bua tai babaoo anaa, ni eye Amonbii lɛ anɔ kunim.
Shi sanebimɔ ni he hiaa lɛ ji akɛ, Mɛni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɔ yɛ enɛ he?
Taakɛ The Independent adafitswaa wolo lɛ wie he lɛ, anɔkwa ni ayeee yɛ jeŋba mli lɛ saa “nɔ fɛɛ nɔ he, kɛjɛ nuu kɛ yoo teŋ suɔmɔ saji kɛ nibii ni nɔyelii feɔ ni amɛkɛshishiuɔ amɛ shishibii, aahu kɛyashi nitsumɔ mli shika ni akpaa hiɛ ahaa mɛi, yɛ nibii wuji ni ahãa amɛshɛɔ lɛ ahewɔ lɛ anɔ.”
Akrowai amli oblahii kɛ oblayei bibii lɛ ba maŋtiase wulu lɛ mli koni amɛbatao shweshweeshwe shihilɛ bɔni afee ni amɛkɛkwɛ amɛwekui lɛ loo koni amɛye omanye yɛ shika gbɛfaŋ.
Shi, sɔrɔtofeemɔ ni kã henaabuamɔ ni hiɛshikamɔ yɔɔ mli yɛ wɔ shia mli kɛ nifeemɔi ni aha eteke nɔ ni jieɔ je lɛŋ mumɔ lɛ kpo yɛ tsũ ko ni ahai mli lɛ teŋ lɛ da.
Mɛi ni yɔɔ je lɛŋ fɛɛ lɛ miisusu shihilɛ mli sanebimɔi ni he hiaa waa lɛ ahe.
Gbohii awui komɛi ni ayana yɛ blema Siria ni datrɛfoi pɛi mli kɛkwɛ nɔ ni kɛ wuiaŋ hela ni amɛye lɛ ba lɛ mli lɛ ha amɛmu sane naa akɛ bɔ ni akɛ wiɛbi lɛ wiɛɔ nii yɛ wiɛtɛ lɛ nɔ ahaa lɛ ye oblayei pii awui—eha amɛnakutso wui kpakpaa afã, eye amɛkotosɛɛ wu lɛ awui, ni eha amɛnane gɔntii fũufui.

Ani ole mɔ ko ni miisumɔ ni ekpá tawa shɛremɔ?

+ Mileee Yehowa ko kwraa, ni agbɛnɛ hu, mihãŋ Israel aya.”
Wɔbaanyɛ wɔjɛ Biblia lɛ mli wɔtsɔɔ amɛ nibii ni wɔle yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ gbɛ́i, eyiŋtoo kɛha adesai, kɛ sui ni eyɔɔ lɛ ahe nii.
Biblia lɛ egba efɔ̃ shi yɛ hewalɛ ni Satan náa yɛ gbɔmɛi ni yɔɔ naagbee gbii nɛɛ amli lɛ anɔ lɛ he akɛ: “Kpóo ha mɛi ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ . . . lɛ! ejaakɛ abonsam lɛ ekpeleke shi kɛba nyɛŋɔɔ, egiri naakpa, ni ele akɛ be fioo kɛkɛ eyɔɔ.”
Mɛni amɛle momo?
(Yona 4:1-8) Kulɛ esa akɛ yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ lɛ Yona aye awerɛho ni eye yɛ tso lɛ gbele hewɔ lɛ eha gbɔmɛi 120,000 ni yɔɔ Ninive ni “leee amɛninejurɔ kɛ amɛbɛku” lɛ moŋ.—Yona 4:11.

2 No hewɔ lɛ, maŋtsɛ lɛ fã koni atsɛ majikfeelɔi lɛ, kɛ okɔmfoi lɛ, kɛ ŋkunyaayelɔi lɛ, kɛ Kaldeabii* lɛ kɛba koni amɛbatsɔɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ elamɔi lɛ.

6 Yesu wie akɛ: “Kɛ́ mɔ ko sumɔɔ mi lɛ, ebaaye miwiemɔ lɛ nɔ, ni mi-Tsɛ baasumɔ lɛ.”
“Kɛji nyɛye mikitai lɛ anɔ lɛ, nyɛaahi misuɔmɔ lɛ mli; taakɛ bɔ ni mi hu miye mitsɛ kitai lɛ anɔ ni mihiɔ esuɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ”
Kɛji nyɛye mikitãi lɛ anɔ lɛ, nyɛaahi misuɔmɔ lɛ mli; taakɛ bɔ ni mi hu miye mitsɛ kitãi lɛ anɔ ni mihiɔ esuɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ.”
Yesu to he hã lɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ mɔ ko sumɔɔ mi lɛ, ebaaye miwiemɔ lɛ nɔ, ni mi-Tsɛ baasumɔ lɛ . . .
23 Yesu hã lɛ hetoo akɛ: “Kɛ́ mɔ ko sumɔɔ mi lɛ, ebaaye miwiemɔ lɛ nɔ,+ ni mi-Tsɛ baasumɔ lɛ, ni wɔbaaba eŋɔɔ ni ekɛ wɔ baahi shi.
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji nyɛye mikitãi lɛ anɔ lɛ, nyɛaahi misuɔmɔ lɛ mli; taakɛ bɔ ni mi hu miye mitsɛ kitãi lɛ anɔ ni mihiɔ esuɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ.”—Yohane 15:10.
25 Tamɔ bɔ pɛ ni ekɛɛ hu yɛ Hosea wolo lɛ mli lɛ, akɛ: “Matsɛ mɛi ni jeee mimaŋ+ lɛ akɛ ‘mimaŋ,’ kɛ yoo ni asumɔɔɔ lɛ lɛ akɛ, ‘misuɔlɔ’;+ 26 ni he ni akɛɛ amɛ yɛ akɛ, ‘Jeee mimaŋ ji nyɛ lɛ,’ jɛmɛ nɔŋŋ abaatsɛ amɛ yɛ akɛ ‘Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛkãalɔ lɛ bii.’”
Bɔ ni afee ni wɔna kɛji wɔjieɔ suɔmɔ kpo wɔtsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔbi wɔhe akɛ: ‘Ani mifeɔ bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni manyɛ koni maye mabua miweku lɛ mli bii, misafoŋbii, kɛ mɛi ni mikɛkpeɔ yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ?
Amrɔ nɛɛ, gbɔlɛ mli naagbai haa shihilɛ feɔ nɔ ni wa, shi mimumɔŋ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei—mimumɔŋ weku ni da—ni misumɔɔ, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu minyɛmi nukpa biyoo lɛ efee yelikɛbuamɔ jɛɛhe diɛŋtsɛ kɛha mi.
(Abɛi 16:32) Kelvin wie akɛ, “Kɛ́ ehe bahia ni majaje mibii lɛ yɛ saji komɛi ni yɔɔ hiɛdɔɔ ahe lɛ, be fɛɛ be lɛ mibɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni maha amɛle faŋŋ akɛ suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛha amɛ lɛ hewɔ mijajeɔ amɛ lɛ.”
4 No hewɔ lɛ, minyɛmimɛi ni misumɔɔ ni mishweɔ hu, mimiishɛɛ kɛ mikekere,+ nyɛdamɔa shi shiŋŋ+ yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ yɛ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ mli, nyɛ mɛi ni misumɔɔ.
14 Ao mi-Nyɔŋmɔ, kaimɔ mi+ yɛ enɛ hewɔ, ni kaatsumɔ suɔmɔ ni tsakeee ni mijie lɛ kpo yɛ mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shĩa lɛ kɛ emli sɔɔmɔ* lɛ hewɔ lɛ.
Ewie akɛ: “Misɔle, mikase Biblia lɛ, ni mijwɛŋ nibii ni mikase lɛ anɔ. Enɛ hã mihiɛ basɔ Nyɔŋmɔ sui lɛ waa, ni suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛhã Yehowa lɛ mli bawa fe shwelɛ ni miyɔɔ akɛ makwɛ ponografi lɛ.”
Beni ewieɔ akɛ tsɛ ní kɛ wiemɔi ni suɔmɔ yɔɔ mli haa lɛ, blema Israel Maŋtsɛ Salomo kɛɛ akɛ: “Mibi, kɛ omɔ miwiemɔi lɛ amli, ni okɛ mikitai lɛ to omasɛi, koni oba otoi shi oha nilee, ni okɛ otsui ha sanesɛɛkɔmɔ; hɛɛ, kɛ́ obolɔ otsɛ́ sɛɛyoomɔ, ní owó ogbee nɔ oha sane shishinumɔ, kɛji otao esɛɛgbɛ tamɔ jwiɛtɛi, ní otao tamɔ jwetrii ni aŋɔtee lɛ: No dani ooonu Yehowa gbeyeishemɔ shishi, ni oooná Nyɔŋmɔ he nilee.” —Abɛi 2: 1-5.
Shi misumɔɔ mibii lɛ waa, ni mibayɔse akɛ kɛ́ mikɛ Biblia mli ŋaawoo tsu nii yɛ bɔ ni mikɛ miweku lɛ yeɔ haa lɛ mli lɛ, enáa mibii lɛ anɔ hewalɛ kpakpa.
Mishi enɔ jetsɛremɔ ní mijwɛŋmɔŋ eyi tɔ kɛ niiashikpamɔi ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ pam, ni mitsui hu yi obɔ kɛ nanemɛi heei ni miná lɛ ahe suɔmɔ.
3:8, 9) Eyɛ mli akɛ amɛfataaa mɛi ni akɛfee kpaŋmɔ lɛ ahe moŋ, shi ‘amɛmɔɔ’ kpaŋmɔ nɛɛ “mli” kɛtsɔ kpaŋmɔ lɛ he mlai lɛ anɔ ni amɛyeɔ lɛ nɔ, taakɛ gbalɔ Yesaia gba efɔ shi akɛ: ‘Gbɔi ní kɛ amɛhe bakpɛtɛɔ Yehowa he ní amɛsɔmɔɔ lɛ ní amɛsumɔɔ Yehowa gbɛi lɛ, ní amɛtsɔmɔɔ etsuji lɛ: mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ní yeɔ hejɔɔmɔ gbi lɛ ní ebuleee lɛ, ní emɔɔ mikpaŋmɔ lɛ mli lɛ, amɛ hu mikɛ amɛaaba migɔŋ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni maha amɛnyã yɛ misɔlemɔwe lɛ.’
9 No sɛɛ lɛ, Yakob sɔle ekɛɛ: “Ao, mitsɛ Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mitsɛ Isak Nyɔŋmɔ, Yehowa, bo mɔ ni okɛɛ mi akɛ, ‘Kuu osɛɛ kɛya oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ owekumɛi lɛ aŋɔɔ, ni mikɛ bo baaye jogbaŋŋ lɛ,’+ 10 suɔmɔ ni tsakeee kɛ anɔkwayeli fɛɛ ni ojie kpo otsɔɔ otsulɔ lɛ,+ emli ekome folo nɛkɛ esaaa mi, ejaakɛ midɛhiɛmɔtso lɛ pɛ mikɛfo Yordan nɛɛ, ni amrɔ nɛɛ mitsɔ kui enyɔ.
Kɛ mawie yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, mitsui kã mi nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ—no ji nɔ ni misumɔɔ fe fɛɛ.
Shi akpɔi ni kɔɔ bɔ ni esa ákɛ akɛ nyɔji aye aha lɛ ejieee nii amli, ni mɔbɔnalɛ yɛ mli aahu akɛ ato gbɛjianɔ yɛ Mose Mla lɛ mli akɛ: “Shi kɛji tsulɔ lɛ gba mli kɛɛ akɛ: Miisumɔ minuŋtsɔ lɛ kɛ miŋa kɛ mibii lɛ, misumɔɔɔ akɛ miyayeɔ mihe lɛ, no lɛ enuŋtsɔ lɛ kɛ lɛ aba Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, ni asaŋ ekɛ lɛ aba shinaa loo shinaatso he, ni enuŋtsɔ lɛ kɛ fitii agbu etoi; ni esɔmɔ lɛ kɛya naanɔ.”—2 Mose 21:2-6; 3 Mose 25:42, 43; 5 Mose 15:12-18.
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, beni ekpãa eninefɔɔ ni suɔmɔ yɔɔ mli lɛ mli ehaa wɔ akɛ wɔbo eŋaawoo toi lɛ, wɔ ŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ kɛ kɔkɔbɔɔi ni sa fataa he ehaa wɔ akɛ: “Mibi, ohiɛ akakpa mimla lɛ nɔ, shi ha otsui ato mikitai lɛ!
Amrɔ nɛɛ, ninumɔ kɛ sane kaimɔ ji naagba kɛha mi, ni eha shihilɛ ewa kɛha mi, shi mimumɔŋ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei lɛ —mimumɔŋ weku agbo lɛ —kɛ agbɛnɛ hu mibiyei enyɔ lɛ awekui lɛ hu yeɔ amɛbuaa mi waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Etsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Hiɛsɔɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛha anɔkwale lɛ mli bakwɔ yɛ miwala shihilɛ beaŋ, ni suɔmɔ ni miyɔɔ kɛha Yehowa lɛ bada.”
Kɛlɛ, Yakob sɔle akɛ: “Mitsɛ Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mitsɛ Isak Nyɔŋmɔ, Yehowa, mɔ ni kɛɛ mi akɛ: Kuu osɛɛ oya oshikpɔŋ nɔ kɛ owekumɛi aŋɔɔ, ni mafeeo jogbaŋŋ lɛ; omɔbɔnalɛi kɛ onɔkwayeli fɛɛ ni ojie otsɔɔ otsulɔ lɛ, ekome folo nɛkɛ esaaa mi; shi tso mihiɛ kɛfo Yordan nɛɛ, ni agbɛnɛ mitsɔ asafokui enyɔ.
+ 5 Shi kɛ́ nyɔŋ lɛ kɛɛ doo akɛ, ‘Miisumɔ minuŋtsɔ lɛ, kɛ miŋa, kɛ mibii lɛ; misumɔɔɔ ni maye mihe’ lɛ,+ 6 no lɛ, enuŋtsɔ lɛ kɛ lɛ aba anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ.
Kɛshɛ Ju lɛ, bei pii lɛ, wɔyashiɛɔ yɛ maŋ lɛ mli hei ni Odasefonyo ko bɛ lɛ, ni wɔfɔ̃ɔ mɛi nine ní amɛbabo maŋshiɛmɔ ni ato akɛ abaaha nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ toi.
Ha asafo lɛ ale woji ajaa krɛdɛɛ ni ato he gbɛjianɔ kɛha Maŋtsɛyeli Sanekpakpa No. 36 lɛ jaa ni baaje shishi Ju, October 16 lɛ, ní baatsá nɔ aahu kɛyashi Sohaa, November 17.
“ ‘Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, wɔfee obalayoo nɛɛ opreshɛn [ekɛ enine tsɔɔ ehelatsɛmɛi lɛ eko] ni wɔkɛ la tsuuu nii, ni Ju lɛ, abaajie lɛ ni eya shia.
Shi beni shɛɔ Ju, Febuary 1, 1943 lɛ, no mli wɔfee klalo kɛha enɔjɔɔmɔ.”
▪ Abaaye afi 2014 Kaimɔ lɛ Ju, April 14.
Yɛ kɔɔyɔŋ lɛlɛ lɛ he gbɛjianɔtoo hewɔ lɛ, abaafee kpee lɛ Hɔgbaa kɛ Ju.
Enɔ Ju lɛ, Saphira tee nitsumɔhe lɛ koni mɔ ni eyaaye enajiaŋ lɛ atsɔɔ lɛ nitsumɔ lɛ.
Ju leebi mra lɛ, mishi koni miyakwɔ bɔɔs kɛya shĩa.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, Mary tee nɔ efó daa Ju gbɛkɛ.
Beni eshɛ jɛmɛ yɛ Ju gbɛkɛ ko lɛ, ewo e-Buu-Mɔɔ wolo tɛtrɛɛ lɛ nɔ ni ekɛɛ: “Masumɔ ni mɔ ko atsɔɔ nibii ni yɔɔ wolo tɛtrɛɛ nɛɛ mli lɛ mli babaoo aha mi.
No mli lɛ, amɛfeɔ ekome Ju, ekome Shɔ, ekome Sohaa, kɛ enyɔ hu Hɔgbaa.
Yesu yɛ sɔlemɔwe lɛ lolo yɛ Ju, ni ji Nisan 10 lɛ nɔ, eewie gbe ni abaagbe lɛ lɛ he.
Aje nɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ amrɔ nɛɛ akɛ Buu-Mɔɔ Gilead Biblia Skul lɛ shishi yɛ Ju, February 1, 1943.
Leebi—Ju Kɛyashi Hɔɔ
Aha efuu kɛ eyara-feemɔ he wiemɔ yɛ Brooklyn Betel Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ, yɛ December 28, 1992.
Wekui pii toɔ gbɛjianɔ ni amɛfeɔ amɛweku nikasemɔ lɛ Ju gbɛkɛ, yɛ Betel wekui ni yɔɔ je lɛŋ fɛɛ lɛ akasemɔ mli.
Paul tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Wɔbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ wɔfeɔ wɔ weku Biblia mli nikasemɔ lɛ daa Ju gbɛkɛ yɛ be ni wɔto lɛ naa,” ni ekpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ, “jeee daa gbi eyeɔ omanye.”
Bei pii lɛ Ju ji gbi ko ni maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi kɛjɔ́ɔ amɛhe loo amɛkɛtsuɔ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛ nibii ahe nii.
Eugene kpɛlɛ, shi he ni ena nitsumɔ yɛ pɛ ji ŋmɔ ko mli yɛ Pomeroon faa lɛ masɛi otsi kome, kɛjɛ Ju kɛyashi Hɔɔ shwane.
Agbɛnɛ hu, wɔtswaa wɔ mlalelɔi lɛ adafi, ni amɛyaa maŋ mlalelɔ ni folɔɔ mɛi anaa yɛ kojomɔ he lɛ ŋɔɔ Ju koni amɛyafã mɛi ni akɛ amɛ ewo tsuŋwoohei lɛ ahe.
Harold ni amrɔ nɛɛ eye afii 83 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Kɛjɛ Ju kɛyashi Sohaa lɛ gbɔmɛi fioo ko pɛ yɔɔ shia.
Daa Ju lɛ, nɛkɛ gbɛgbalɔ krɛdɛɛ nɛɛ fãa gbɛ kilomitai 65 koni ekɛ mumui wolɛɛnyo lɛ ayafee Biblia mli nikasemɔ.
MRUDULABEN, India yoo ko ni eye afii 78, ni yɔɔ nii waa lɛ kɛɛ akɛ, “mihiɔ ŋmaa daa Ju kɛjɛ be mli ni miye kɛjɛ afii nyɔŋma kɛ etɛ kɛbaa.”
Agbɛnɛ Ju, ni ji Nisan 10 leebi maŋkpa mli lɛ, amɛwó Yerusalem gbɛ amɛtere ekoŋŋ.
Nitsumɔhe nine nɔkwɛlɔ lɛ kɛ hegbɛ ha João koni ebaná weku nikasemɔ lɛ mli gbɛfaŋnɔ daa Ju gbɛkɛ, no hewɔ lɛ wɔnyɛɔ wɔfɔɔ sanegbaa waa.
Ekolɛ enɛ baabi ni otsɛ datrɛfonyo, oye obua mɔ lɛ kɛya helatsamɔhe, loo ni ofee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni ooonyɛ koni oha lɛ niyenii kɛ wɔɔhe.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ani datrɛfonyo ni oyanaaa lɛ amrɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ oto oyiŋ ni osuɔlɔ lɛ he aye ni egbo?
Datrɛfonyo ko ni jɛ Norway ni mli jɔ, kɛ helatsɛmɛi akwɛlɔ ko ni jɛ Czechoslovakia ye ebua mi, ni ekolɛ amɛmlihilɛ lɛ here miyiwala.
Monna tee nɔ egba esane lɛ akɛ: “Datrɛfonyo lɛ heee mi eyeee aahu kɛyashi be mli ni efee nɔ ni ekpe sɛɛ tsɔ.
Datrɛfoi lɛ fee amɛjwɛŋmɔ akɛ amɛkɛ la woŋ emli.
Eji Hiob tee okɔmfo ko ŋɔɔ kulɛ, no ehiii kwraa!
Eyɛ mli akɛ wɔkpɛlɛŋ tsamɔ ni wɔŋtsɛ ko aaatsa wɔ lɛ nɔ moŋ, shi ani wɔkɛ kpãa baafi bi ŋmɔŋ ni wɔfɔ́ lɛ lɛ nineshi akɛni ekolɛ no aaabu gbekɛ lɛ he kɛjɛ efɔŋ he lɛ hewɔ?
Te mafee tɛŋŋ magbála nɔ hewɔ ni masumɔ loo misumɔŋ ni akɛ nibii ni anáa kɛjɛɔ nibii titrii ejwɛ ni feɔ lá lɛ amli lɛ ateŋ ekome loo nɔ ni fe nakai atsu nii ahã mi lɛ mli matsɔɔ datrɛfonyo ko lɛ?
(Efesobii 4:28; Kolosebii 3:23) Akɔntaabuu tsɔɔ akɛ, yɛ Europa maŋ ko mli lɛ, nitsulɔi ní kɛ woji yatsɔɔ amɛ nitsumɔtsɛmɛi akɛ amɛdatrɛfoi kɛɛ aha amɛjɔɔ amɛhe fioo yɛ shia yɛ amɛhe ni yeɔ hewɔ lɛ amlijaa etɛ mli ekome tsɔɔ gbɛ fɔŋ nɔ amɛnine shɛɔ woji nɛɛ anɔ.
Agbɛnɛ hu, datrɛfoi ekpa shi amɛna helai hei 30, ni anyɛɛɛ atsa helai nɛɛ ekomɛi.
Nɔ kome ji akɛ, enɛ tsɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ni amɛkpoɔ la ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli, ni datrɛfoi komɛi tsɛɔ lɛ yiwalaheremɔ nii lɛ.
Ekolɛ, edatrɛfonyo lɛ baatsɔɔ be ni ebaafɔ; kɛlɛ, kɛ́ eshashao shi hu jiŋŋ, yoo lɛ yaa nɔ enáa nɔmimaa akɛ kɛ́ ŋwɛi kpa ebu shi tete lɛ, ebaafɔ.
Yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ eyakase nii yɛ Wittenberg Nikasemɔhe Wulu lɛ, ni eje woloŋ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔjamɔ he nilelɔ kpanaa.
Adafitswaa wolo lɛ tsɔɔ yɛ faŋŋ mli hu akɛ: “Datrɛfoi ni [gbala lá amɛwo emli] lɛ haaa lɛ hegbɛ ni ehala tsofafeemɔ mli nɔ ni esumɔɔ.”
Datrɛfoi lɛ fee bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni amɛaanyɛ ákɛ adesai koni amɛkɛku enɛ naa, shi fɛɛ lɛ yakatswaa.
Saneyitsei ni akɛha lɛ ekomɛi kaneɔ akɛ: “Saneyelihe: Helatsɛmɛi Baanyɛ Akpoo Tsofafeemɔ”; “Kojomɔhe Wulu: Lá ni Agbalaa Awoɔ Mɔ Mli Ji Hegbɛ ni Mɔ Ko Yɔɔ lɛ Fitemɔ”; “Datrɛfonyo ni Nyɛ Mɔ Ko Nɔ Eha Lɛ Lá lɛ Eye Fɔ yɛ Saneyelihe”; kɛ “Awo Yehowa Odasefonyo Nyɔmɔ yɛ Lá ni Agbala Awo Emli lɛ Hewɔ.”
Nicoletta tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Datrɛfoi lɛ susu Brunella gbɔmɔtsoŋ, henumɔŋ, kɛ mumɔŋ hiamɔ nii ahe.
(Kolosebii 4:11) Amɛkɛ lɛ yaa datrɛfonyo lɛ ŋɔɔ, amɛyasaraa lɛ yɛ eshia, ni amɛwoɔ lɛ hewalɛ yɛ henumɔŋ yɛ opireshɛn ejwɛ ni afee lɛ lɛ mli.
Gbi ko lɛ emli bawo wu aahu akɛ minu he akɛ esa akɛ mayana datrɛfonyo.
14 Ni kɛ́ datrɛfonyo ko kɛɛ wɔ akɛ, kɛ́ wɔkpɛlɛɛɛ ni ahã wɔ lá lɛ, wɔbaagboi hu?
Datrɛfonyo ko ni kulɛ esumɔɔɔ ni enaa wɔ kwraa lɛ po he bajɔ agbɛnɛ, aahu po akɛ ebi Awo bɔ ni eyɔɔ.
Datrɛfonyo lɛ nyɛɛɛ ana nɔ ni feɔ lɛ, ni no hewɔ lɛ enyɛɛɛ eye ebua lɛ.
Datrɛfonyo ko ni eji woloŋmalɔ hu lɛ ŋma akɛ ekolɛ nɔ ni Josephus kɛ Luka tsɔɔ akɛ efee Agripa lɛ jɛ titiŋtrɔ̃ ni tsĩ emusuŋnii lɛ anaa lɛ hewɔ, ni enɛ nyɛɔ egbeɔ mɔ.
Hospital Information Services (Nitsumɔhe ni Kwɛɔ Helatsamɔ He Saji Anɔ) ni Yehowa Odasefoi to shishi lɛ, miiye miibua datrɛfoi babaoo koni amɛnu saji nɛɛ ashishi babaoo.
Datrɛfoi ejwɛ ni yɔse fɔmɔ mli hela nɛɛ agbɛ́i ji nɔ ni akɛwo LMBB (Laurence-Moon-Bardet-Biedl syndrome) hela lɛ.
23 Moŋ lɛ, owó ohe nɔ oshi ŋwɛi Nuŋtsɔ lɛ,+ ni ohã ayahole eshĩa lɛ kɔɔpoi lɛ ahã bo.
Gbi ko beni atswa eshinaa lɛ ní egbele lɛ, naa Odasefoi enyɔ komɛi ni efee klalo akɛ amɛaaye amɛbua lɛ koni ele anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛi ni ji Yehowa lɛ.
6 Agbɛnɛ, etsɛ ebinuu Solomon ni efã lɛ koni ema shĩa ehã Yehowa, Israel Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ.
Ni Shĩa lɛ gɔŋ* lɛ baatsɔ tamɔ hei grɔŋŋi yɛ koo mli.
(b) wɔjɛ shĩa ko mli kɛmiiya shĩa kroko mli?
Beni Yakob ná le nɔ ni ebihii lɛ eyafee lɛ, ekã amɛhiɛ akɛ: ‘Nyɛwo mi amane mli, ni nyɛha mihe eje fu ewo shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ bii lɛ, ni amɛaabua amɛhenaa amɛbatua mi ni amɛaagbe mi; ni aaakpata mihiɛ, mi kɛ miwe lɛ.’
Shiai miikumɔ, tsei miifamɔ, tɛlifon kpaa miigbeegbee shikpɔŋ.
Be ni amɛye nii amɛgbe naa lɛ, amɛshi kɛtee Samuel shĩa lɛ.

21 Be ni Rehoboam bashɛ Yerusalem lɛ, amrɔ nɔŋŋ ni ebua Yuda shĩa lɛ fɛɛ kɛ Benyamin weku lɛ naa koni amɛkɛ Israel ayawu koni amɛshɔ̃ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ amɛhã Solomon binuu Rehoboam ekoŋŋ. + Ebua tawulɔi 180,000 ni atsɔse amɛ lɛ* anaa.
Ani ofataa oŋa he yɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli, ni okɛ lɛ naa gbɛfaŋnɔ yɛ shia-kɛ-shia saramɔi kɛ Biblia mli nikasemɔi afeemɔ mli?
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Minu he akɛ Yehowa eha wɔweku lɛ nitsumɔ, shi no mli lɛ, miisusu wɔshĩa ni wɔsaa lɛ ehee, kɛ nibii ni wɔkɛwo mli afii 25 ni eho nɛ lɛ ahe.”
Aloo ekolɛ gbekɛ nuu ko kɛɛ etsɛ akɛ: “Dabi, mitswako bɔɔl yɛ shia lɛ mli.”
Anɔkwa, nɔ ni efee lɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ eekɛɛ bo akɛ obaahi nakai wolo bibioo ni ekɛha bo lɛ nɔ; moŋ lɛ nɔ ni etsɔɔ ji akɛ, wolo lɛ yɛ mla naa sɛɛfimɔ aahu akɛ, yɛ shishinumɔ ko naa lɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni wolo lɛ ji shĩa lɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
Kɛkɛ ni ekɛ ehewalɛ fɛɛ tsi akulashiŋi lɛ, ni shĩa lɛ kumɔ eshwie nɔyelɔi lɛ kɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ fɛɛ anɔ.

Eyɛ mli akɛ shiai ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ jeee shiai haŋtsii moŋ, shi amaa lɛ bɔ ni amɛbaanyɛ amɛkpee lasuogbele ni tswaa yɛ jɛmɛ shikpɔji lɛ anɔ lɛ naa.

3 Kɛ́ wɔkpe sɛɛ minitii fioo po kɛtee kpee ko shishi lɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni wɔmiikane sane ko yɛ wolo ko mli ni wɔyaje shishi yɛ sane lɛ teŋ gbɛ—wɔnuŋ shihilɛ mli ni aŋma sane lɛ yɛ, kɛ sane lɛ hiɛkpamɔ lɛ shishi, ni enɛ haŋ wɔnu nɔ ni wɔkaneɔ lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ ní wɔnyã he.
Yesu ‘ŋɔ esusuma lɛ eha yɛ mɛi pii akpɔmɔ hewɔ’ kɛtsɔ egbele lɛ nɔ akɛ adesa ni eye emuu.

5:9) Nɔkwɛmɔnii nɛɛ anɔ ni wɔɔjwɛŋ lɛ baanyɛ aye abua wɔ koni wɔnijiaŋ akaje wui.
(1 Mose 2:7) Ahãaa gbɔmɔ susuma; ebatsɔ susuma, gbɔmɔ ni hiɛ kã.
Yɛ Plato gbɛfaŋ lɛ, je lɛ yɛ “Susumai” enyɔ, ekome feɔ ekpakpa ni ekroko lɛ feɔ esha.
(2 Korintobii 8:12) Eji anɔkwale akɛ, Yehowa miikpa wɔ gbɛ akɛ wɔbaasɔmɔ lɛ kɛ wɔsusuma muu fɛɛ, ni wɔfee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni wɔɔnyɛ yɛ bɔ ni wɔshihilɛ baaŋmɛ wɔ gbɛ lɛ naa.
Biblia lɛ kɛ nɔmimaa jajeɔ akɛ: “Susuma ni feɔ esha lɛ—lɛ nɔŋŋ eeegbo.”
Nyɛwoa mipã lɛ nyɛfɔa nyɛnɔ, ni nyɛkasea mi; shi mihe jɔ, ni mibaa mihe shi kɛjɛ mitsui mli; ni nyɛaana hejɔɔmɔ nyɛaaha nyɛsusumai lɛ.
Nɛkɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ ni yɔɔ gbeyei nɛɛ feɔ bɔ ni susuma ni gbooo tsɔɔmɔ lɛ baanyɛ atsake bɔ ni adesai buɔ gbele amɛhaa lɛ yɛ gbɛ ni mli wa nɔ lɛ he mfoniri.
‘susuma ni gbooo yɛ wɔŋjamɔ mli’: 265
Nɔ ni tamɔɔɔ nakai lɛ, gbɔmɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ji susuma lɛ, ni susuma lɛ ji gbɔmɔ lɛ.”
Ewo akpɔ yɛ paapa lɛ wolo ko ni eŋma ni ji Benedictus Deus (1336) lɛ mli akɛ “mɛi ni egboi lɛ asusumai boteɔ jɔɔmɔ shihilɛ mli [ŋwɛi], atsuuɔ amɛhe [hetsuumɔ he] aloo abuɔ amɛ fɔ [hɛl] nɔŋŋ yɛ gbele sɛɛ, ni amɛsaa amɛkɛ amɛgbɔmɔtsei ni atee amɛ shi lɛ feɔ ekome ekoŋŋ yɛ jeŋ naagbee lɛ mli.”
(1 Tesalonikabii 2:7, 8) Yɛ enɛ kɛ gbeekpamɔ naa lɛ, ekɛɛ: “Nyɛshɛjea mɛi ni tsui fãa lɛ amii; nyɛherea mɛi ni feɔ gbedee lɛ; nyɛtoa nyɛtsui shi nyɛhaa mɛi fɛɛ.”

Mɛni Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ beni ekɛɔ akɛ Rahel ‘susuma heɔ emli aje’ lɛ?
Nɔ titri ji akɛ, wɔtsɔɔ nɔ wɔjieɔ wɔsuɔmɔ kpo wɔtsɔɔ lɛ kɛtsɔɔ wɔtsui muu fɛɛ, susuma fɛɛ, jwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ, kɛ hewalɛ fɛɛ nɔ.—Marko 12:29, 30.
Akɛni anyɛŋ atee mɔ ko ni gbooo shi hewɔ lɛ, nɛkɛ hii ni sheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei nɛɛ heee amɛyeee akɛ susuma lɛ yaa nɔ ehiɔ shi yɛ gbele sɛɛ.

19 Kwɛ bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ kɛ hewalɛ “[gbuɔ] kɛboteɔ mli kɛyashi beyinɔ ni egbalaa susuma kɛ mumɔ lɛ kɛ talɔi kɛ wuiaŋfɔi lɛ amli” ehãa!
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ obaatsɔ oye obua nakai mɔ lɛ ni enu nɔ ni susuma lɛ ji lɛ shishi?
Jwɛŋmɔ ni ahiɛ yɛ ŋwɛi, hɛl, susuma, Wiemɔ lɛ (Logos), kɛ nilee he lɛ fɛɛ baná shishinumɔi heei.
Taakɛ Josephus ni hi shi yɛ nakai beaŋ lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, oti ko ni he hiaa waa ji susuma ni gbooo lɛ mli hemɔkɛyeli lɛ.
Beni Paulo wieɔ enitsumɔ yɛ mɛi ni amɛjeee Yudafoi ni eye ebua amɛ koni amɛná anɔkwale lɛ he nilee lɛ he lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nɔ ni mikɛto mihiɛ titri ji akɛ, he ni atsĩko Kristo gbɛi atã yɛ lɛ, jɛi majaje sanekpakpa lɛ yɛ, . . . shi moŋ taakɛ bɔ ni aŋma lɛ akɛ: ‘Mɛi ni ajajeko ehe sane ko atsɔko amɛ lɛ, amɛaana, ni mɛi ni nuko lɛ, amɛaanu shishi.’”

39 Ani obaanyɛ ogbɔbi kooloo ohã jata
No hewɔ lɛ, efã ni ashɛ Daniel afɔ̃ jatai abu lɛ mli.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni emli aaawo la awo Daniel ni eha akɛ lɛ awo jatai abu lɛ mli amrɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ, Dario ye gbi muu fɛɛ ni eebɔ mɔdɛŋ koni ehere eyiwala.
+ Jatai eshwie amɛ.
Kɛlɛ, too nyɛ ni esa jogbaŋŋ lɛ tete nyɛŋ adamɔ jata hiɛ.
Ema nɔ mi eha amɛ akɛ Yehowa miisumɔ ewebii ní ekɛfee kpaŋmɔ lɛ lolo, ni ekɛɛ: “Bɔ ni Yehowa kɛɛ mi nɛ: Bɔ ni jata hũuɔ, loo jata bi hũuɔ yɛ emilɛ̃loo he, ni kɛ́ atsɛ́ kooloi kwɛlɔi asafoi awo ehe, ní esheee amɛgbee gbeyei ni ebuuu amɛbolɔmɔ lɛ: nakai Yehowa Zebaot aaakpeleke shi abawu yɛ Zion gɔŋ lɛ kɛ egɔŋkpɔ lɛ nɔ.”
Be mli ni Dario ehi ŋmãa nyɔɔŋ lɛŋ fɛɛ ni ewɔɔɔ lɛ, ehe fee oya kɛtee jatai abu lɛ naa.
17 Lalatsɛ lɛ wie bɔ ni abaanaanaa “jata bi kɛ jeŋ” nɔ yɛ najiashi lɛ he.
NUGBƆNƐMƆ loo snoo loo nyɔŋmɔŋtɛi loo klaji loo jatai loo henyɛlɔi akpokpaa nɔ nyɛɛɛ agbe amɛfaishitswaa mumɔ lɛ.
Ni tamɔ jata ji lɛ, namɔ baanyɛ awo ehiɛ la?
He ni jata lɛ nyiɛɔ ebii lɛ ahiɛ kɛjeɔ kpo yɛ,
No hewɔ lɛ ashɛ Daniel afɔ̃ jatai abu lɛ mli.
Ebuɔ shi yɛ jatai* ni he wala ateŋ ni elɛɔ ebii lɛ.
7 Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli onukpai lɛ, kɛ hiɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ, kɛ kpokpaa nɔkwɛlɔi* lɛ, kɛ maŋtsɛ ŋaawolɔi lɛ, kɛ amralofoi lɛ fɛɛ ekpe ni amɛkpɛ mli akɛ amɛkɛ famɔ ko baahã yɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ gbɛ́i mli ni agu nifeemɔ ko, no ji akɛ, kɛyashi gbii 30 lɛ, mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sɔleɔ ebiɔ nyɔŋmɔ ko loo gbɔmɔ ko nɔ ko yɛ bo, maŋtsɛ, osɛɛ lɛ, ashɛ lɛ afɔ̃ jatai abu lɛ mli.
Shi jatai ni he wala* po anyanyɔji kumɔɔ.
Ŋmalɛi tamɔ Yesaia 11:6-9 baaba mli yɛ anunyam mli akɛ: “Klaŋ kɛ gwantɛŋbi aaahi shi, ni kootsɛ kɛ abotiabi aaabu shi; ni tsinabi kɛ jatabi kɛ kooloo ni ewo fɔ fɛɛ aaahi hekome, ni gbekɛ bibioo aaakpala amɛ.
+ Egbonyo lɛ kã gbɛ lɛ nɔ, ni teji lɛ damɔ he; jata lɛ hu damɔ gbonyo lɛ he.
(1 Samuel 17:34, 35) Shi, Satan Abonsam “nyiɛɔ tamɔ jata ni huuɔ eetao mɔ ni eeemi.”
Etamɔ jata yoo yɛ jatai ateŋ.
Mla ni Maŋtsɛ Dario wo lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ: “Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni aaabi nyɔŋmɔ loo gbɔmɔ ko nɔ ko, ni jeee [maŋtsɛ lɛ] kɛkɛ, kɛyashi biɛ gbii nyɔŋmai etɛ lɛ, aaashɛ lɛ afɔ jatai abu lɛ mli.”—Daniel 6:8-10.
22 Mi-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ tsu ebɔfo ni ebaŋamɔ jatai lɛ anaabui,+ ni amɛyeko mi awui ko,+ ejaakɛ yɛ ehiɛ lɛ, anaaa efɔŋ ko yɛ mihe; ni bo maŋtsɛ hu, mifeko bo efɔŋ ko.”
+ 6 Ni enɛ ji suɔmɔ lɛ, akɛ wɔya nɔ wɔnyiɛ yɛ ekitãi lɛ anaa.
Shi amrɔ nɛɛ miyɛ ŋa ni misumɔɔ lɛ waa kɛ bihii enyɔ, ni wɔfeɔ ekome akɛ weku kɛyeɔ wɔbuaa mɛi krokomɛi ni amɛkaseɔ anɔkwalei ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he, ni enɛ haa wɔnáa miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
(1 Mose 50:5-8, 12-14) No hewɔ lɛ, Yosef jie mɔbɔnalɛ kpo etsɔɔ etsɛ.
Kɛfata mɔ he susumɔ kɛ suɔmɔ ni amɛjieɔ lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛnaanyo gbɔmɔ lɛ he lɛ, nɛkɛ tsutsu mɛi ni jeɔ gbɛ amɛfiteɔ nibii nɛɛ ekase bɔ ni ‘anyɛɔ efɔŋ.’
(1 Yohane 4:20) Yɛ yitsei ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ amli lɛ, wɔbaapɛi bɔ ni Yesu jie suɔmɔ kpo etsɔɔ mɛi lɛ mli.
Suɔmɔ Kɛha Yehowa ni Wɔɔdu Wɔwo Wɔbii lɛ Atsui Mli
Shi miná miishɛɛ hu ejaakɛ yɛ amɛ ekãafeemɔ kɛ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ lɛ naa lɛ, gbɔmɛi babaoo ekase anɔkwale lɛ ni amɛbale wɔ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ.”—Colette, Netherlands.
(Abɛi 20:5) Kɛ́ ootao ní oshɛ etsui he lɛ, no lɛ mlihilɛ, sane shishinumɔ, kɛ suɔmɔ ní ooojie lɛ kpo lɛ he miihia.
(Yohane 3:35; Kolosebii 1:15) Yehowa wie fe shikome akɛ esumɔɔ e-Bi lɛ ni ekpɛlɛɔ enɔ.
Nɔ ni Suɔmɔ Tsuɔ
Mɛɛ odaseyeli Adam kɛ Hawa ná ní tsɔɔ akɛ Yehowa sumɔɔ amɛsane, ni kɛlɛ te amɛhere nɔ amɛha tɛŋŋ?
11 Ŋmɛnɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi jieɔ amɛ nyɛmimɛi asuɔmɔ lɛ kpo kɛtsɔ wiemɔi ni yɔɔ Yesaia 2:4 lɛ ni amɛhaa ebaa mli lɛ nɔ akɛ: “Amɛkɛ amɛklantei aaasɔ̃ kɔii ni amɛkɛ amɛkpɔlɔi hu aaasɔ̃ adedai.
Belɛ, mɛni hewɔ wielɔ ní sumɔɔ Yehowa ní heɔ nɔ ni ekɛɔ lɛ eyeɔ lɛ baanyɛ afee mɔ ni bɛ miishɛɛ beni ewieɔ lɛ?
Beni etsɔɔ suɔmɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha amɛnyɛ lɛ kɛ hiɛsɔɔ ni eyɔɔ kɛha maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ jarawalɛ lɛ, enyɛminuu fioo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Amrɔ nɛɛ, miyɛ weku kɛ bii.
Kaimɔ akɛ, kɛ́ awo wɔ tsuŋ jio, akɛ wɔ etee he ko banee jio lɛ, no nyɛɛɛ atsi sane ni wɔ kɛ wɔ-Tsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ baagba lɛ naa loo efite ekomefeemɔ ni yɔɔ wɔ kɛ wɔnyɛmimɛi lɛ ateŋ lɛ.
Nɛkɛ ji bɔ ni suɔmɔ lɛ yɔɔ, jeee akɛ wɔ wɔsumɔ Nyɔŋmɔ, shi moŋ akɛ lɛ esumɔ wɔ ni etsu e-Bi lɛ akɛ kpatamɔ afɔle yɛ wɔhe eshai lɛ ahewɔ.” —1 Yohane 4:9, 10.
Yesu diɛŋtsɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɔŋmɔ sumɔ je lɛ aahu akɛ eŋɔ e-Bi koome lɛ eha, bɔni afee ni akakpata mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baana emli hemɔkɛyeli lɛ hiɛ, shi moŋ ena naanɔ wala.”
(Kwɛmɔ akrabatsa ni ji “Nifeemɔ ni Tsɔɔ ákɛ Ayɛ Suɔmɔ,” ni yɔɔ baafa 6-7 lɛ.)
Bo lɛ susumɔ he okwɛ, namɔ tuuntu ji mɔ ni Yehowa sumɔɔɔ esane?
(3 Mose 19:18) Shi, Yesu kɛɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ akɛ amɛjie he-kɛ-afɔleshãa suɔmɔ ni baashɛ he ni mɔ kɛ ewala baaha yɛ enaanyo Kristofonyo hewɔ lɛ kpo.
Ejaakɛ nibii fɔ̃ji fɛɛ ashishifã ji shika suɔmɔ ní mɛi komɛi di sɛɛ . . . ni amɛkɛ piŋmɔi babaoo egbulɔ amɛhe lɛ.”
(1 Korintobii 13:7) Kristofonyo ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ efee klalo lɛɛlɛŋ akɛ ebaahe mɛi ni ejie amɛhe kpo akɛ mɛi ni anyɛɔ akɛ he fɔ̃ɔ amɛnɔ yɛ be ni eho lɛ aye.
2 Kaselɔ Yuda tsɔɔ gbɛ nɔ ni oootsɔ ohi Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔ lɛ mli daa.
Etsɔɔ mli akɛ mla lɛ mli kita wulu ji ni wɔkɛ wɔtsui, wɔsusuma, wɔjwɛŋmɔ, kɛ wɔnyɛmɔ fɛɛ asumɔ Yehowa.
19 Wekukpaa ni ka David kɛ Maŋtsɛ Saul kɛ ebi Yonatan teŋ lɛ ji nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ ko ni sa kadimɔ waa ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni suɔmɔ kɛ heshibaa yɔɔ tsakpaa kɛ bɔ ni henɔwomɔ kɛ pɛsɛmkunya hu yɔɔ tsakpaa nakai nɔŋŋ ha.
Ekɛ woji nyɔŋma woɔ taip-raita lɛ mli shikome ni ekalaa lɛ waa bɔni afee ni niŋmaa okadii lɛ fɛɛ aje kpo faŋŋ yɛ woji lɛ fɛɛ nɔ.
Mɛi aaafee nyɔŋma baanyɛ awie wiemɔi ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ yɛ minitii enumɔ ni ashi koni toibolɔi kɛ amɛhe awo sanegbaa lɛ mli lɛ mli.
(Yohane 16:11) Akoloŋtoi nyɔŋma lɛ feɔ hewalɛ ni yeɔ emuu ni ekɛtsu nii yɛ je nɛɛ mli lɛ he okadi ni sa.
Amɛkɛfata he akɛ: “Amrɔ nɛɛ po, mɛi enumɔ mli mɔ kome miiye ohia futafuta ni niyenii ni fa bɛ ni ebaaye, ni mɛi nyɔŋma mli mɔ kome kɛ piŋmɔ ni hiɛdɔɔ yɔɔ mli kpeɔ yɛ niyenii kpakpa ni enaaa eye hewɔ.”
(Daniel 2:44) Jeee mɛnɛɛmɛi pɛ ji maŋtsɛmɛi ni amaga lɛ waobii lɛ feɔ amɛhe mfoniri lɛ, shi mɛi ni dade, akɔɔble, jwiɛtɛi, kɛ shika fãi lɛ fee amɛhe mfoniri lɛ hu.
Kitai Nyɔŋma lɛ mli nɔ ni ji etɛ lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Kaahiɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, gbɛi amli yakayaka, ejaakɛ Yehowa ebuŋ mɔ ni hiɛɔ egbɛi amli yakayaka lɛ bem.”
Nɔkwɛmɔnii: oblayei froi, talɛntai, gwantɛŋi kɛ abotiai
Amrɔ nɛɛ, mɛi ni feɔ Yehowa Odasefoi a-Nɔyeli Kuu lɛ ji Kristofoi nyɔŋma ni afɔ amɛ mu, ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛkɛ afii nyɔŋmai abɔ ená niiashikpamɔ akɛ Kristofoi.
6 Yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ afii nyɔŋma ni Asa kɛye nɔ lɛ amli lɛ, Yehowa jɔɔ Yuda maŋtsɛyeli lɛ ni ehã amɛná toiŋjɔlɛ.
18. (a) Namɛi hiɔ shi yɛ taomɔ nii nyɔŋma kɛha anɔkwa jamɔ lɛ anaa, ni yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, yɛ afii nyɔŋma ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli lɛ, wɔkɛ maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi ni jɛ Australia, Austria, Germany, Philippines, Sweden, kɛ United States tsu nii, yɛ shikpɔŋ fɛfɛo ni gɔji, kooi, kɛ kpaakpoi yɔɔ nɔ lɛ mli yɛ Sumatra kooyigbɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, yɛ gbi kome pɛ mli lɛ, abakɛɛ Hiob akɛ aju ekooloi lɛ ekomɛi ni ekrokomɛi hu egboi, agbe etsuji lɛ, ni ebii nyɔŋma lɛ hu egboi.
Eyɛ bii nyɔŋma kɛ wu, Rafael ni tɔɔ dãa.
“Shibɔlemɔ ŋulami lɛ hosoɔ kɛ hewalɛ ni shɛɔ shikpɔŋhosomɔi akpei nyɔŋma hewalɛ.
Kitãi Nyɔŋma lɛ ahe yɛ sɛɛnamɔ babaoo yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?
Etsɛko tsɔ̃ ni Mose tĩ nɔ ni afɔɔ lɛ tsɛmɔ akɛ Kitai Nyɔŋma, ní kitai ni awo akɛ akagbe gbɔmɔ, akabɔ ajwamaŋ, akaju, akaye amale odase, ni hiɛ akakɔ̃ mɔ ko nɔ ko nɔ lɛ fata he lɛ mli eha amɛ.
Akɛni miji kromɔ yɛ bii nyɔŋma ateŋ hewɔ lɛ, beni miye afii 13 lɛ mibɔi nitsumɔ koni mikɛye mibua kɛkwɛ weku lɛ.
Onukpa ko ni yɔɔ France ni efee gbɛgbalɔ fe afii nyɔŋma ha hetoo akɛ: “Gbɛgbamɔ ji gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni atsɔ̃ɔ nɔ abɛŋkɛɔ Yehowa he kpaakpa.”
Yɛ afii nyɔŋma ni ekɛsɔmɔ yɛ Betel sɛɛ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Bei pii lɛ misɔleɔ mihaa Yehowa kɛdaa lɛ shi yɛ emlihilɛ lɛ hewɔ.
18 Ni hemɔ nɛkɛ tsiisi* nyɔŋma nɛɛ hu ni okɛyahã asraafoi akpetsɛ lɛ; agbɛnɛ hu, ni okwɛ bɔ ni onyɛmimɛi hii lɛ yɔɔ, ni okɛ nɔ ko ajɛ amɛŋɔɔ kɛba.”
4 Sanebimɔi Nyɔŋma ni Kɔɔ Bɔlɛnamɔ He lɛ Ahetoo
1 Beni Yesu tsá kpitiyelɔi nyɔŋma lɛ, mɔ kome pɛ ku esɛɛ ebada lɛ shi.
Haneul, ni eye afii nyɔŋma lɛ kɛɛ akɛ, “Minanemɛi skulbii lɛ sumɔɔ ni agba sane, shi jeee ni agbála nibii amli aha amɛ.”
Yɛ sɛɛ mli, beni asraafoi lɛ jɛ amɛkɛ Filistibii lɛ tawuu lɛ mli amɛba lɛ, yei lɛ la akɛ: ‘Saul egbe akpekpei, shi David egbe akpei nyɔŋma-nyɔŋmai.’
24 Agbɛnɛ mihala osɔfoi lɛ ateŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ 12, amɛji, Sherebia kɛ Hashabia,+ kɛ amɛnyɛmimɛi lɛ ateŋ mɛi nyɔŋma.
David tsɔɔ bɔ ni enuɔ he ehaa lɛ yɛ Lala 8: 4, 5 akɛ: “Kɛ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ ni ji owaobii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ: Mɛni ji adesa ni ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? aloo gbɔmɔ bi ni osaraa lɛ po?”
Nyɛmagai lɛ, nyɛnyɔŋmɔ lɛ ŋulami ní nyɛfee nyɛhã nyɛhe lɛ kɛya,
(Kpojiemɔ 1:16, 17a) Yesu diɛŋtsɛ tsɔɔ ŋulamii kpawo lɛ shishi yɛ sɛɛ mli.
20 Mɛɛ shishinumɔ naa ‘hulu aaawo duŋ, ni nyɔŋtsere kpɛŋ, ni ŋulamii aaajɛ ŋwɛi atswia shi, ni aaahoso ŋwɛi hewalɛi lɛ’ yɛ?
(Lala 36:10) Wɔnaa Yehowa ninenaa nitsumɔi babaoo ni ebɔle wɔ, tamɔ hulu lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii.
Elá yɛ Yehowa he akɛ: “Kɛ́ mikwɛ oŋwɛi lɛ ni ji owaabii anaa nitsumɔi lɛ, nyɔɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii ni osaa oto lɛ: Mɛni ji adesa, ní ojwɛŋɔ enɔ? aloo gbɔmɔ bi, ní osaraa lɛ po?”
Yehowa tsɔɔ akɛ ŋulamii lɛ fa waa diɛŋtsɛ, ejaakɛ ekɛ amɛ to “ŋshɔ naa shia” he.—1 Mose 22:17.
6 Nyɔŋmɔ Hewalɛ Lɛ Jeɔ Kpo Faŋŋ Yɛ Ŋulamii Amli
David yoo akɛ ŋulamii lɛ kɛ shibɔlemɔ ŋulami lɛ ni kpɛlɛɔ kɛtsɔɔ “atatu” lɛ loo kɔɔyɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ kɛ odaseyeli ni anyɛŋ aje he ŋwane haa akɛ anunyam Nyɔŋmɔ ko yɛ shihilɛ mli.
(Mateo 2:2) Shi ŋulami lɛ enyiɛɛɛ amɛhiɛ kɛyaaa Betlehem.
Toronto Star ŋmalɔ ko kɛɛ akɛ: “Kwɛmɔ jogbaŋŋ yɛ mumɔŋ jamɔi gbohii lɛ ahe . . .
Ŋulamii ahe nilelɔi buɔ akɔntaa akɛ ŋulamii ní yɔɔ wɔ Milky Way ŋulamii kusha lɛ pɛ mli lɛ fá fe akpekpei toi akpei 100.
8 Kɛ́ wɔkai akɛ Biblia lɛ feɔ Yesu he mfoniri akɛ “ehiɛ ŋulamii kpawo yɛ eninejurɔ” nɔ lɛ, ebaaye ebua wɔ koni wɔkwa nakai su lɛ.
2 “Ŋmaa oyahã Efeso+ asafo lɛ bɔfo+ lɛ akɛ: Nii ni mɔ ni hiɛ ŋulamii kpawo lɛ yɛ eninejurɔ, ni enyiɛɔ shika tsuru kanetsei kpawo lɛ ateŋ lɛ kɛɛ nɛ:+ 2 ‘Mile onifeemɔi lɛ, kɛ nitsumɔ ni otsuɔ waa lɛ kɛ oshifimɔ lɛ, ni akɛ, oŋmɛɛɛ mɛi fɔji agbɛ, ni oka mɛi ni kɛɔ akɛ bɔfoi ji amɛ,+ shi amɛjeee lɛ okwɛ, ni ona akɛ amalelɔi ji amɛ.
(Kpojiemɔ 1:20; 2:1) Bei komɛi lɛ ŋulamii damɔɔ shi kɛhaa mumɔŋ bɔɔ nii ni ji ŋwɛibɔfoi, shi Kristo kɛ gbɔmɔ tsuŋ nii koni eŋmala shɛɛ saji eshwie shi eha mumɔŋ bɔɔ nii.
Yɛ gbɛ kroko hu nɔ lɛ, ŋulamii ahe nilelɔi kɛ adebɔɔ he nilelɔi miikase wɔ ŋulamii ni bɔleɔ hulu lɛ, ŋulamii lɛ, kɛ ŋulamii kushai ni kɛ wɔteŋ jɛkɛ waa po lɛ ahe nii babaoo.
Hebri gbalɔi sɔrɔtoi hu tsɔɔ bɔ ni hulu wo duŋ, ni nyɔŋtsere kpɛɛɛ, ni ŋulamii hu kɛ amɛkpɛmɔ haaa.
The Toronto Star amaniɛbɔɔ lɛ tsɔɔ shishi akɛ “ní oooyɔse akɛ atɔ̃ onɔ, ní oooŋmɛɛ mlifu fɛɛ ni ejɛ mli kɛba lɛ he, ní yɛ naagbee lɛ okɛ mɔ ni tɔ̃ onɔ lɛ aye kɛ mlihilɛ kɛ suɔmɔ po.”
Hii lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: ‘Wɔna gbekɛ lɛ ŋulami lɛ klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa beni wɔyɔɔ Boka lɛ, ni wɔba koni wɔbaja lɛ.’
Wɔnaa ŋulami kushai, ŋulamii, kɛ shikpɔji ni bɔleɔ wɔhulu lɛ, ni eko fɛɛ eko nyiɛ eŋɛlɛ nɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
Wolo ko ni anyɛɔ akɛ he fɔ̃ɔ nɔ, ni gbalɛ mli saji yɔɔ mli lɛ bɔɔ wɔ jeŋ muu fɛɛ hiɛkpatamɔ ko ni baa lɛ he kɔkɔ, ni ewieɔ he yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ akɛ: “Hulu aaawo duŋ, ni nyɔɔŋtsere kpɛŋ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋulamii aaatserɛ kɛaajɛ ŋwɛi atswia shi, ni ŋwɛi hewalɛi lɛ aaahoso. . . .
Hii ni atsɛɔ amɛ ŋulamiiaŋkwɛlɔi nyiɛ ŋulami lɛ sɛɛ kilomitai ohai abɔ kɛtee Yerusalem.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, wɔkaneɔ yɛ jɛmɛ akɛ hulu, nyɔŋtsere, ŋulamii, snoo, ahum, gɔji kɛ gɔŋkpɔi lɛ fɛɛ miijie Yehowa yi.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, ejáaa mɛi ni ehe gbɛi waa yɛ kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔ mli loo ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ amagai krokomɛi.
Jeŋ shikpalɔi heɔ amɛyeɔ akɛ, ŋulamii aaafee akpekpe toi akpei 400 ni yɔɔ ŋulami kusha ni wɔshikpɔŋ lɛ yɔɔ mli, ni atsɛɔ lɛ Milky Way lɛ pɛ mli.
Awie yɛ ehe akɛ: “Yehowa báa gbɔi ayi, efiɔ awusã kɛ okulafo sɛɛ.”
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ekolɛ wɔbaasusu bɔ ni tsɛ ko ní yɔɔ suɔmɔ lɛ baajie naa eha kɛji ebi nuu bibioo ko bi lɛ akɛ, “Dada, te fee tɛŋŋ ní afɔ́ mi?” lɛ he.
Gbekɛbii lɛ yɛ srɔto.
Be ko lɛ ekɛɛ osɔfo ko ni teɔ shi woɔ lɛ lɛ akɛ: ‘Kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ha mihi wala mli afii pii lɛ, maha gbekɛ nuu ni huɔ shikpɔŋ ale Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli saji babaoo fe bɔ ni ole.’
(Yakobo 1:27) Okɛ enɛ akashwɛ kwraa—kɛ́ afee gbekɛbii ni bɛ shihilɛ mli niiashikpamɔ niseniianii lɛ, ehaa awusãi a-Tsɛ lɛ mli fuɔ yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ.
Yuda le akɛ ehiii akɛ ajuɔ ejaakɛ atsɔɔ lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Mla lɛ kɛjɛ be mli ni eji gbekɛ bibioo.
Aloo ekolɛ gbekɛ nuu ko kɛɛ etsɛ akɛ: “Dabi, mitswako bɔɔl yɛ shia lɛ mli.”
Ani obaanyɛ otsĩ kooloi krokomɛi ni yɔɔ mfoniri nɛɛ mli ni Biblia lɛ wieɔ amɛhe lɛ agbɛi atã?— Kwɛmɔ gbekɛ nuu fioo ni kɛ onufu lɛ shwɛɔ lɛ!
Shi te ebalɛ tɛŋŋ ni gbekɛbuu ni atsɔse lɛ yɛ ŋa shikpɔŋ tɛtrɛɛ nɔ lɛ baje Pasifik Ŋshɔ lɛ naa?
Kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋmɛ mi gbɛ ni mihi wala mli afii pii lɛ, maha gbekɛ ni kɛ tsinakɔi huɔ ale Ŋmalɛi lɛ babaoo fe bɔ ni ole.’

Kwɛmɔ wielɔ lɛ hiɛ
Mishi minitsumɔ lɛ—ni ji gbɛtsiinii kɛha mimumɔŋ nɔyaa lɛ—ni amrɔ nɛɛ, minuɔ he akɛ mishihilɛ eye omanye yɛ Yehowa hiɛ, ni no ji nɔ̃ titri ni he hiaa.”—Luka 14:33.
Ani daimonio ko baanyɛ agbele shwilafoi ahiŋmɛii?”
Wɔbuɔ gbɛi kpakpa ni wɔɔfee yɛ Yehowa hiɛ lɛ akɛ ehe miihia kwraa fe ninámɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ, ehe miihia ni wɔna, loo wɔyoo nii ni esaaa Yehowa hiɛ.
Eŋma akɛ: “Ni hiɛkalɔi ejwɛ ni hiŋmɛii eyimɔ amɛhiɛ kɛ amɛsɛɛ obɔ yɛ maŋtsɛsɛi lɛ teŋ kɛ ehewɔ.”—Kpojiemɔ 4:6b.
Ehiŋmɛi kome pɛ naa nii; kansa fee ekome beni eji abifao lɛ, ni efite nakai hiŋmɛi lɛ.
(1 Korintobii 8:1) No hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔná heshibaa su ni Mose jie lɛ kpo beni ekɛɛ Yehowa akɛ: “Tsɔɔmɔ mi ogbɛ lɛ ko, beni afee ni maleo, koni mihiɛ aba nyam yɛ ohiɛ” lɛ eko.
Dani Yoshua aaagbo lɛ, ekɛ hewalɛwoo wiemɔi ni kanyaa mɔ kpa maŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ fai akɛ: ‘Shi kɛji esaaa nyɛhiɛ akɛ nyɛaasɔmɔ Yehowa lɛ, no lɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ nyɛkɔa mɔ ni nyɛaasɔmɔ, kɛji nyɔŋmɔi lɛ ni yɔɔ faa lɛ sɛɛ ni nyɛtsɛmɛi lɛ sɔmɔ lɛ jio, loo Amorbii ni nyɛyɔɔ amɛshikpɔŋ nɔ nɛɛ anyɔŋmɔi lɛ jio.’
Yoo ko ni agbe ebiyoo na akɛ eji hewalɛwoo beni gbekɛ yoo kroko hu ni egbo lɛ nyɛ kɛɛ lɛ bɔ ni eye ehe kɛjɛ awerɛho lɛ mli yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ.

Atsɔɔ Mɔ ni “Yoo” lɛ Ji
Kɛ́ Kelim-ninu fɔɔɔ lɛ, Kelim-ninu baaŋɔ yoo [tsulɔyoo] kɛjɛ Lullu shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛbaha Shennima ni etsɔ eŋa.”
Ebɛ naakpɛɛ mɔ akɛ mɛi bu lɛ akɛ “yoo kpakpa.”
Yoo nɛɛ naanyo ko hu kpɛ eyiŋ akɛ ebaakase Biblia lɛ yɛ shitee-kɛ-woo ni ewu kɛba enɔ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ.
Yoo ko wie saramɔ ni Odasefonyo ko basara lɛ lɛ he akɛ: “Nɔ ni mikaiɔ yɛ ehiɛ ŋmɔlɔŋmɔlɔ su lɛ he ji toiŋjɔlɛ ni eyɔɔ.
2:2) Ŋa ni bɛ yitsoŋ lɛ shashaooo shi akɛ eeegbe ewu he guɔ, shi yoo nilelɔ feɔ nibii ni baaha ebii kɛ mɛi krokomɛi aná bulɛ ni mli kwɔ amɛha ewu.
3 Susumɔ nɔ ni ba Hawa ni ji klɛŋklɛŋ yoo lɛ nɔ lɛ he okwɛ.
Yɛ maji komɛi anɔ lɛ, yoo ni sumɔɔɔ ni atseɔ gbala lɛ baanyɛ ekɛ enine awo woji ashishi, woji ni maa nibii anɔ mi jogbaŋŋ kɛhaa bii lɛ ni ebaanyɛ eŋɔ eha ehe, kɛ shika ni akɛbaaye abua amɛ yɛ nakai beaŋ nɔŋŋ; shi no etsɔɔɔ akɛ nakai woji lɛ ni ekɛ enine woɔ shishi lɛ miitsɔɔ akɛ eekpoo nuu lɛ.

14 Kɛ nibii kpakpai ni hulu lɛ hãa ebaa,
Lala 74:16 wieɔ Yehowa he akɛ: “Bo . . . osaa ŋulami kɛ hulu oto.”
(Romabii 1:20) Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, susumɔ hulu lɛ he okwɛ.
Wɔle akɛ hulu baaje daa leebi, ni latsaa be baanyiɛ fɛ̃i be sɛɛ. —1 Mose 8: 22; Yesaia 40:26.
Kɛ wɔɔkɛɛ nɔ ko kɛje shishi lɛ, Biblia lɛ kɛɔ wɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ bɔ “kanei” lɛ —hulu, nyɔɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii —ákɛ nibii ni kadiɔ be, koni “amɛtsɔɔ okadii kɛ bei kɛ gbii kɛ afii.”
TAAKƐ nakai susuma ni hulu lɛ kɛba lɛ yɔɔ lɛ, adesai anifeemɔi kɛ mlai miitsake waa be fɛɛ be.
Hɛɛ, anyɛŋ akɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ ato kɛnɛrɛ ní miitso yɛ duŋ mli lɛ he, shi moŋ abaanyɛ akɛ ato leebi hulu la ní kpɛɔ, ni haa mɔ náa toiŋjɔlɛ, miishɛɛ, yiŋtoo, kɛ ekãafeemɔ yɛ shihilɛ mli lɛ he.
“Jalɛ hulu lɛ baakpɛ” (2)
Kɛ́ hulu la kpɛ́ eshwie akulashiŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, ehaa akulashiŋ lɛ susuma shwieɔ atrakwei lɛ anɔ.
(Yesaia 4:6) Bei pii lɛ, amaa buu, loo asese yɛ weintrom loo ŋmɔ mli koni eha hɔ̃ɔŋ ni he hiaa kɛjɛ hulu ni tsoɔ waa yɛ hulutsoo be mli lɛ nɔ, kɛ hebuu hu kɛjɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ beaŋ fɛ̃i kɛ ahum ni tswaa lɛ amli.—Okɛto Yona 4:5 he.
Ena, loo epɛi “nitsumɔi fɛɛ ni atsuɔ yɛ hulu shishi lɛ” mli, “ni naa, fɛɛ lɛ yakayakanii kɛ kɔɔyɔɔ hakumɔ ni!”
Ewie faŋŋ akɛ: “Ni okadii aaaba hulu kɛ nyɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii amli, ni jeŋmaji afimɔ lɛ aaaba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛaafee yeyeeye, yɛ ŋshɔ kɛ ŋshɔkei agbɛɛmɔ hewɔ; ni nɔ̃ aaanyɔnyɔɔ gbɔmɛi anɔ yɛ gbeyei kɛ nibii ní baa je lɛŋ lɛ agbɛkwɛmɔ hewɔ; ejaakɛ aaahoso ŋwɛi hewalɛi lɛ tete.”
+ 15 Wo lɛ nyɔmɔ nakai gbi lɛ nɔŋŋ dani hulu anyɔ shi,+ ejaakɛ efĩ lɛ ni enyɔmɔwoo lɛ nɔ ewala* damɔ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, okɛ otii komɛi mamɔɔ ohiɛ akɛ, kɛ́ je tsɛre lɛ obaatsu amɛhe nii kɛ gbɛkpamɔ akɛ hulu lɛ baate shi ni obaahi wala mli.
Kɛ́ oná nu lɛ eko lɛ, esa akɛ obaa yi jogbaŋŋ kɛjɛ hulu lɛ he.
Biblia saji ahe wielɔ ni atsɛɔ lɛ Christopher Wordsworth kɛɛ akɛ: “Bei komɛi lɛ akɛ nu woɔ kpulu lɛ mli ni atsɔɔ bɔ ni hulu lɛ kpɛ́ɔ eshwieɔ nu ni yɔɔ kpulu lɛ mli lɛ hiɛ lɛ nɔ akɛ hetoo lɛ haa.”
Shi kɛ hulu ni shãa mɔ waa lɛ ba pɛ kɛkɛ lɛ jwɛi lɛ fɛɛ egbi.
Yesu gba akɛ: “Hulu aaawo duŋ, ni nyɔŋtsere kpɛŋ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋulamii aaatserɛ kɛaajɛ ŋwɛi atswia shi.”
hɔ̃ɔŋ yɛ hulutsoo beiaŋ
“Ni okadii aaaba hulu kɛ nyɔŋtsere kɛ ŋulamii amli, ni jeŋmaji afimɔ lɛ aaaba shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛaafee yeyeeye, yɛ ŋshɔ kɛ ŋshɔkei agbɛɛmɔ hewɔ; ni nɔ̃ aaanyɔnyɔɔ gbɔmɛi anɔ yɛ gbeyei kɛ nibii ni baa je lɛŋ lɛ agbɛkwɛmɔ hewɔ; ejaakɛ aaahoso ŋwɛi hewalɛi lɛ tete.”—Luka 21:25, 26.
Ahum kɛ emli mulu eshimɔ lɛ, hulu ni naa wa eshã lɛ, emli tsũi ni efee koikoi lɛ miiye ŋkɔmɔ, jɛmɛ efee dioo tamɔ gɔɔ mli, ni ja patui kɛ amɛhenɔi ni nyiɛɔ gbɛkɛ lɛ ebolɔ dani anuɔ gbɛɛmɔ ko he.
9 Yesu kɛ gbalɛ ni kɔɔ ‘hulu ni baawo duŋ, nyɔŋtsere ni kpɛŋ, kɛ ŋulamii ni gbeɔ shi’ lɛ ahe lɛ ha ebɔfoi ejwɛ.
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, mɛi ní bɛ mumɔŋ la lɛ nyɛɛɛ ahi wala mli, tamɔ bɔ ni eji yɛ mɛi ní naaa la kɛjɛɛɛ hulu lɛ mli lɛ agbɛfaŋ lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
“Kɛji hulu ejeee lɛ jeŋ nyɛŋ atse”
(Ezekiel 39:11, 17-20) Yohane wiemɔi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ kɛ nakai gbalɛ ni etsɔ hiɛ lɛ baa jwɛŋmɔ mli yɛ faŋŋ mli akɛ: “Ni mina bɔfo ko damɔ hulu mli, ni ebo kɛ gbee wulu ekɛɛ loofɔji ni filikiɔ yɛ ŋwɛi lɛ fɛɛ akɛ: Nyɛbaa ni nyɛbabuaa nyɛhe naa yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ okpɔlɔ kpeteŋkpele lɛ he, koni nyɛbaye maŋtsɛmɛi aloo kɛ asafoiatsɛmɛi aloo kɛ hewalɔi aloo kɛ okpɔŋɔi aloo kɛ mɛi ni tara amɛnɔ lɛ aloo kɛ odehei kɛ nyɔji kɛ mɛi bibii kɛ mɛi wuji fɛɛ aloo.”—Kpojiemɔ 19:17, 18.
