5 Beni etsɔɔ fatɔɔi ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ ni adesai jieɔ lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛhe lɛ mli lɛ sɛɛ, taakɛ atsɛ yisɛɛ yɛ yiteŋgbɛ lɛ, Yesu kɛ wiemɔ nɛɛ fata he akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ nyɛhia kɛwulaa shi, tamɔ bɔ ni nyɛtsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ hi kɛwula shi lɛ.”
Gbɛ ni Mikɛ Mitsɛ Fa Kɛha Shiɛmɔ
Kɛ́ wɔkɛ wɔnanemɛi ni yeee emuu lɛ yeɔ yɛ suɔmɔ mli yɛ gbɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ nɔ lɛ, enyiɛ nɔŋŋ esaaa ni wɔheɔ wɔŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ, mɔ ni jwɛŋmɔ kɛ egbɛi kwɔ fe wɔnɔ lɛ wɔyeɔ!
+ 11 Nuu kɛ enyɛmi gbɔmɔ ŋa feɔ nyaŋemɔ nii yɛ omli,+ nuu kroko hu kɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ebinuu ŋa náa bɔlɛ yɛ jeŋba sha mli,+ ni nuu kroko hu kɛ enyɛmi yoo, lɛ diɛŋtsɛ epapa biyoo náa bɔlɛ.
Israelnyo kojolɔ ko ni yɔɔ ekãa lɛ tsɛ́ ehe akɛ mɔ bibioo fe fɛɛ yɛ etsɛ we lɛ.
Yesu tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Mitooo miyiŋ mifeee nɔ ko, shi moŋ bɔ ni mitsɛ tsɔ̃ɔ mi lɛ, nakai mifeɔ daa.”
Bɔ ni minyɛ midamɔ miwu, mitsɛ, kɛ mibinuu lɛ gbele naa lɛ eye ebua mi ni mifeee ŋkomeŋfa, ni eha minuɔ mɛi krokomɛi ni naa nɔ̃ lɛ ashishi jogbaŋŋ.
16 Oblayoo lɛ papa lɛ akɛɛ onukpai lɛ akɛ, ‘Mikɛ mibiyoo lɛ hã nuu nɛɛ akɛ eŋa, shi ehe miitsɛ̃* mibiyoo lɛ 17 ni ekɛ sane efɔ̃ enɔ akɛ: “Mina akɛ, nɔ ko bɛ obiyoo lɛ he ni tsɔɔ akɛ oblayoo fro ji lɛ.”
Atsɛɔ mitsɛ Bill Muscat, ni eji mɔ ko ni fiɔ Komunist nɔyeli sɛɛ, shi naakpɛɛ sane ji akɛ eheɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ eyeɔ.
Yesu kɛɛ ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ: “Tsɛ ni tsu mi lɛ, lɛ moŋ ewo mi kita, nɔ ni mikɛɛ kɛ nɔ ni miwie.”
Yehowa kɛbaake lɛ, ejaakɛ epapa ekpɛlɛɛɛ nɔ.
(Yohane 13:1) Ena akɛ amɛyɛ tsui ni mli tse kɛ susuma muu hetuu-kɛhamɔ kɛha e-Tsɛ lɛ.
Beni Yesu yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mɔ ko nyɛŋ aba miŋɔɔ, akɛ ja tsɛ lɛ ni tsu mi lɛ gbala lɛ dã . . .
Kɛji mɔ ko miisumɔ je lɛ, belɛ tsɛ lɛ suɔmɔ lɛ bɛ emli; ejaakɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ je lɛŋ lɛ, heloo lɛ sɛɛdii nii lɛ kɛ hiŋmɛii lɛ asɛɛdii nii lɛ kɛ shihilɛ lɛ mli hewoo lɛ, ejɛɛɛ tsɛ lɛ mli, shi moŋ je lɛ mli ejɛ.”
Lalatsɛ ni hi shi yɛ blema lɛ kɛɛ: “Shi mitsɛ kɛ minyɛ eshi mi moŋ, shi Yehowa hereɔ mi atuu.”
Hã wɔ gbɛfaŋnɔ ko yɛ wɔpapa nyɛmimɛi lɛ ateŋ.”
Ani nyɛleee akɛ esa mi akɛ mihiɔ shi yɛ nii ni ji mitsɛ nɔ̃ lɛ mli?”
Afɔ Murzynowski yɛ akrowa ko, shi beni ehiɛ fã fioo lɛ, etsɛ ha etee Königsberg koni eyakase Hela kɛ Hebri wiemɔi.
Bihii 11 ni Yakob fɔ amɛ beni ekɛ Rahel papa Laban yɔɔ lɛ nɛ.
6 Beni Yesu Kristo yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, ekase e-Tsɛ lɛ jogbaŋŋ kɛmɔ shi yɛ mɔbɔnalɛ kpojiemɔ mli.
2:22) Kulɛ Yesu baanyɛ awo shwiei ni eye emuu.
+ 39 Shi Nuŋtsɔ lɛ kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Agbɛnɛ, nyɛ Farisifoi, nyɛshaa kɔɔpoo kɛ kã he, shi nyɛmligbɛ lɛ, nyɛyimɔ obɔbɔ kɛ amimyeli kɛ efɔŋfeemɔ.
Ni maŋ kpeteŋkpele lɛ mli gbala etɛ, ni jeŋmaji lɛ amaji lɛ wule, ni akai Babilon Kpeteŋkpele lɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, koni aŋɔ emlifu ni naa wa lɛ kpulu lɛ mli daa lɛ aha lɛ.
Amɛkɛ shika kpuji kɛ jwiɛtɛi kpuji kɛ tsɛŋsii krokomɛi ni amɛloo kɛjɛ Yehowa sɔlemɔtsu lɛ mli yɛ Yerusalem lɛ miiye nii.
Jɔɔmɔ kpulu lɛ ni wɔjɔɔ lɛ, ani jeee Kristo la lɛ naanyobɔɔ lɛ ni?
Fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Yesu kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Anɔkwa, nyɛbaanu kpulu lɛ moŋ, shi mininejurɔ kɛ mibɛku nɔ taramɔ lɛ, jeee minɔŋ ni mikɛbaahã, shi moŋ mɛi ni mi-Tsɛ esaa eto amɛ lɛ anɔ ni.” —Mateo 20:23.
19 Beni Yesu to Kaimɔ lɛ shishi lɛ, etsɛ́ ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi lɛ koni amɛnu kɛjɛ kpulu kome lɛ nɔŋŋ mli.
Ekɛɛ Kristofoi ni afɔ amɛ mu lɛ akɛ: ‘Shi shii abɔ ni nyɛyeɔ nɛkɛ aboloo nɛɛ ni nyɛnuɔ nɛkɛ kpulu nɛɛ hu lɛ, nyɛmiijaje Nuŋtsɔ lɛ gbele lɛ nyɛmiitsɔɔ kɛyashi beyinɔ ni eeeba.’
“Ni bɔfo kroko ni ji etɛ nyiɛ amɛsɛɛ, ni ekɛ gbee wulu kɛɛ: Kɛ mɔ ko ja kooloo lɛ kɛ emaga lɛ, ni ehe ekadi lɛ yɛ ehiɛŋtso nɔ loo enine nɔ lɛ, lɛ hu eeenu Nyɔŋmɔ mlifu daa ni afutu lɛ krɔŋŋ awo emlifu kpulu lɛ mli lɛ eko.”
7 “Agbɛnɛ hu, amɛkɛ mama bluu aha okpɔlɔ ni akɛ hiɛmaa blodo lɛ maa nɔ lɛ nɔ,+ ni amɛkɛ kãi lɛ kɛ kɔɔpoi lɛ kɛ tsɛnsii lɛ kɛ dãa afɔle kɔɔpoi wuji lɛ amamɔ nɔ;+ blodo ni yɔɔ okpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ daa+ lɛ akã he ahi nɔ.
Taakɛ mifɔɔ feemɔ lɛ, no mli lɛ miito nula kɛfee tii, ni mifee klalo akɛ majɔɔ mihe ŋmɛlɛtswaa fã.
Farisifonyo shwilafo, ha kpulu lɛ kɛ kã lɛ mli tsutsu aje, dani esɛɛ hu aje!”—Mateo 23:25, 26.
Shishijee lɛ mishashao shi fioo, ni mikɛɛ akɛ: ‘Ejeee nɔ ko ni minyãa he.’
9 Beni Yesu to Kaimɔ lɛ shishi lɛ, ewie kpulu ni wein yɔɔ mli lɛ he, ni ekɛɛ ebɔfoi anɔkwafoi lɛ akɛ: “Minuŋ weintso yibii lɛ eko dɔŋŋ kɛyashi gbi nɔ ni manu lɛ ehee yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ mli.”
Nyɔŋmɔ kɔɔpoo ni mlifu wain yɔɔ mli (15)
Sane ni aŋma ni tswa he adafi lɛ bɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Shi namɔ le, akɛ ekolɛ kaa krɛdɛɛ ko baaba, amanehulu loo hiɛgbelewoo kpulu, kɛha Toobi lɛ sɛɛnyiɛlɔi anɔkwafoi lɛ yɛ afi 1915 mli!”
(1 Korintobii 11:25) Wein tsurɔ ni yɔɔ kpulu lɛ mli lɛ damɔ shi kɛha Yesu lá lɛ.
Akɛni “kpulu” lɛ damɔ shi kɛha kpaŋmɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, mɛi ni akɛfee kpaŋmɔ hee lɛ pɛ yeɔ okadi nibii lɛ eko.
+ 18 Agbɛnɛ hu, amɛloo lamululoomɔnii lɛ, kɛ sofii lɛ, kɛ lagbeenii lɛ, kɛ tsɛnsii+ lɛ, kɛ kɔɔpoi+ lɛ, kɛ nibii krokomɛi ni akɛ akɔɔble fee ni akɛtsu nii yɛ sɔlemɔ shĩa lɛ fɛɛ kɛtee.
+ 23 Ni ewó kɔɔpoo, ni eda shi, ni ekɛhã amɛ, ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛnu kɔɔpoo lɛ naa.
2 “Naa, mahã Yerusalem atsɔ kɔɔpoo* ni baahã majimaji fɛɛ ni bɔle lɛ lɛ adidãa; ni abaawo Yuda kɛ Yerusalem hu he ka.
Esɔle akɛ: “Kɛji oosumɔ lɛ, jiemɔ kpulu nɛɛ kɛje minɔ!”
(Romabii 5:8; Tito 2:14; 1 Yohane 4:9, 10) No hewɔ lɛ, Paulo bɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “No hewɔ lɛ, mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yeɔ nɛkɛ aboloo nɛɛ ni enuɔ Nuntsɔ lɛ kpulu lɛ bɔ ni esaaa lɛ, etɔ̃ Nuntsɔ lɛ gbɔmɔtso lɛ kɛ ela lɛ nɔ.”—1 Korintobii 11:27.
48 Gbi ni ji kpawo lɛ nɔ lɛ, Efraimbii lɛ awekunukpa Elishama,+ Amihud binuu lɛ, 49 kɛ efɔle ni ji kã kome ni akɛ jwiɛtɛi fee ni tsiimɔ ji shekeli 130, kɛ tsɛnsi kome ni akɛ jwiɛtɛi fee ni tsiimɔ ji shekeli 70 yɛ shekel ni akɛtsuɔ nii yɛ he krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ naa+ lɛ bahã, ni nibii enyɔ nɛɛ fɛɛ eyimɔ obɔbɔ kɛ ashikishaŋ kpakpa ni akɛ mu efutu ní akɛbaashã ŋmaa afɔle;+ 50 kɔɔpoo kome ni akɛ shika tsuru fee ni tsiimɔ ji shekeli 10, ní tsofa-kɛ-ŋma eyi lɛ obɔ; 51 tsinanuu* kome kɛ gwantɛŋnuu kome kɛ gwantɛŋbi ni ji nuu ni náko fe afi, ní akɛbaashã shãa afɔle;+ 52 abotianuu* kome, ní akɛbaashã esha afɔle;+ 53 tsinai enyɔ kɛ gwantɛŋhii enumɔ kɛ abotiahii enumɔ kɛ gwantɛŋbii enumɔ ni ji hii ni eko fɛɛ eko ená afi, ní akɛbaashã naanyobɔɔ afɔle.
Ejeee anɔkwale akɛ Yosef kɛ kpulu lɛ tsu nii yɛ klamɔ mli tamɔ bɔ ni ejeee anɔkwale hu akɛ Benyamin ju kpulu lɛ.
54 Gbi ni ji kpaanyɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ, Manasebii lɛ awekunukpa Gamaliel,+ Pedazur binuu lɛ, 55 kɛ efɔle ni ji kã kome ni akɛ jwiɛtɛi fee ni tsiimɔ ji shekeli 130, kɛ tsɛnsi kome ni akɛ jwiɛtɛi fee ni tsiimɔ ji shekeli 70 yɛ shekel ni akɛtsuɔ nii yɛ he krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ naa+ lɛ bahã, ni nibii enyɔ nɛɛ fɛɛ eyimɔ obɔbɔ kɛ ashikishaŋ kpakpa ni akɛ mu efutu ní akɛbaashã ŋmaa afɔle;+ 56 kɔɔpoo kome ni akɛ shika tsuru fee ni tsiimɔ ji shekeli 10, ní tsofa-kɛ-ŋma eyi lɛ obɔ; 57 tsinanuu* kome kɛ gwantɛŋnuu kome kɛ gwantɛŋbi ni ji nuu ni náko fe afi, ní akɛbaashã shãa afɔle;+ 58 abotianuu* kome, ní akɛbaashã esha afɔle;+ 59 tsinai enyɔ kɛ gwantɛŋhii enumɔ kɛ abotiahii enumɔ kɛ gwantɛŋbii enumɔ ni ji hii ni eko fɛɛ eko ená afi, ní akɛbaashã naanyobɔɔ afɔle.
(Mateo 14:6-10) The International Standard Bible Encyclopedia (afi 1979 nɔ̃) lɛ kɛ nɛkɛ nilee nɛɛ haa: “Helabii ni hi shi kɛtsɔ Yudafoi ni wieɔ Hela wiemɔ lɛ hiɛ lɛ ye nyɔŋmɔi kɛ gbɔmɛi ni ale waa lɛ afɔmɔ gbii.
Tsɔɔmɔ tsakpãa ni kã fɔmɔ he gbijurɔyelii kɛ apasa hemɔkɛyeli teŋ lɛ mli.
Kɛ helatsɛ lɛ yɛ helatsamɔ he loo he ni akwɛɔ mɛi ni edara yɛ lɛ, no lɛ mɛi ni kwɛɔ jɛmɛ nɔ lɛ anamɔ he miihia koni mɛi ni tsuɔ nii yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ, ale nɔ amɛbaafee yɛ nibii tamɔ fɔmɔ gbijurɔyeli, Blonya, je lɛŋ gbijuji krokomɛi ayeli he.
Klɛŋklɛŋ lɛ, Biblia lɛ ewieee yɛ he ko he ko akɛ Yesu loo Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji anɔkwafoi lɛ ateŋ mɔ ko ye efɔmɔ gbi.
3: Mɛni Hewɔ Kristofoi Yeee Fɔmɔ Gbii Juji?
Fɔmɔ gbi he gbijurɔyelii pɛ ni atsĩ tã yɛ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ kɔɔ nɔyelɔi enyɔ komɛi ni jáaa Yehowa lɛ ahe.
Shi, odaseyeli ko kwraa bɛ ni tsɔɔ akɛ gbi ko shɛ ni etsɔɔ ekaselɔi lɛ gbi ni afɔ lɛ lɛ po; ni nɔ ko kwraa hu bɛ ni tsɔɔ akɛ esɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ ye efɔmɔ gbi.
Ani eji mɔ ko ni fãa ohiafoi ahe lɛ fɔmɔ gbi, atuatselɔ ni wo Roma Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he gbeyei aahu akɛ agbe lɛ aloo ekolɛ eji ŋaalɔ ko ni ma aŋkro nilee kɛ mligbɛ ŋaalee ko ni nɔ kwɔ nɔ mi?
Beni enilee yɛ Ŋmalɛ mli anɔkwale lɛ he lɛ yaa hiɛ lɛ, belɛ babaoo ni eshishinumɔ yɛ fɔmɔgbi he gbijurɔyelii kɛ je lɛŋ gbijuji kɛ bɔ ni Yehowa kwɛɔ enɛɛmɛi ehaa lɛ yaa hiɛ ji no.
Shi, ofainɛ kadimɔ akɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhe wooo fɔmɔ gbi yeli he okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ kɛ hoofeemɔ mli, ni asaŋ amɛkeee amɛhe nii hu.
5 Biblia lɛ etsĩii tã akɛ aye Yesu fɔmɔ he gbi jurɔ.
Shi kɛlɛ, fɔmɔ gbii ahe gbijurɔyelii ahe jwɛŋmɔ lɛ fɛɛ je shishi kɛjɛ gbɔmɛi ni jaaa anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ anɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Ŋmalɛi lɛ tsɔɔ yɛ faŋŋ mli akɛ fɔmɔ gbi gbijurɔyelii, ni ji anɔkwa sane ni anɔkwa Kristofoi ekuuu amɛhiɛ amɛfɔɔɔ nɔ lɛ ejaaa.
Fɔmɔ gbijurɔyeli kroko ni atsĩ tã yɛ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ ji Herode nɔ lɛ, no mli ni afo Yohane Baptisilɔ lɛ yitso lɛ.
Gardner Wilkinson, ni ji Mizraim he nikaselɔ lɛ wiemɔi ayisɛɛ ni eŋma akɛ: “Mizraimnyo fɛɛ Mizriamnyo buɔ gbi lɛ babaoo, ni efeɔ enɛ kɛyashiɔ efɔmɔ gbi be lɛ nɔ; ni ekolɛ taakɛ eji yɛ Persia lɛ, mɔ aŋkro fɛɛ mɔ aŋkro kɛ miishɛɛ babaoo yeɔ efɔmɔ gbi, ni ekɛ miishɛɛ fɛɛ nii yɔɔ akutsoŋ lɛ hereɔ enanemɛi lɛ, ni titri lɛ, kɛ niyenii ŋɔɔmɔŋɔɔmɔi.”
1:4—Ani Hiob bii lɛ ye amɛfɔmɔ gbii?
Te mra be mli Kristofoi lɛ bu fɔmɔ gbii ayeli amɛha tɛŋŋ, ni mɛni hewɔ?
Yɛ shihilɛ kroko mli lɛ, abi koni nyɛmi yoo ko atsɔɔ nɔ hewɔ ni Yehowa Odasefoi yeee Blonya kɛ fɔmɔgbii lɛ mli eha mɔ ko ni yɔɔ wiemɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ lɛ wu ni teɔ shi woɔ lɛ lɛ.
Ani enɛɛmɛi ateŋ ekome ji Tsɔɔlɔ Kpele lɛ fɔmɔ gbi ni aaaye lo?— Dabi.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, Yesu klɛŋklɛŋ sɛɛnyiɛlɔi lɛ yeee efɔmɔ gbi he gbi jurɔ.
Beni emii nu ni egbo lɛ, no mli eshwɛ otsii enyɔ ni ebaaye afii ejwɛ.
▫ Mɛni hewɔ klɛŋklɛŋ Kristofoi lɛ yeee Yesu fɔmɔgbi lɛ?
No hewɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ ayeɔ yookpeemɔ he afi gbii juji ni ayeee fɔmɔ he afi gbii juji lɛ?
Agbe Gbɔmɔ yɛ Fɔmɔ Gbiyeli Okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ ko Shishi
8 Gbijurɔyeli kroko ni mɛi babaoo yeɔ ji fɔmɔgbiyeli.
“Mishi mple kɛjɛ January 1940 aahu kɛbashi May 1945 koni miyi ana wala yɛ gbokɛlɛfoi aŋsarai sɔrɔtoi enumɔ mli: Sachsenhausen, Neuengamme, Auschwitz, Buna kɛ Buchenwald.
Ekɛ hekpokpomɔ bɔi nyiɛmɔ—ni shwuɔi enumɔ ni akɛ sũ nii fee ni ato naa lɛ mli nɔ ni ji etɛ lɛ jɛ nitoo ŋmoŋmolo lɛ nɔ ebagbee shi.
15 Anɔkwa ni ayeɔ asafo lɛ hu biɔ ni wɔya otsi kpeei sɔrɔtoi enumɔ lɛ fɛɛ bɔ ni wɔshihilɛi kɛ nyɛmɔ baaŋmɛ gbɛ.
Abɔ amaniɛ akɛ “ahɔɔ akpei enumɔ yɛ nyɔji enyɔ mli, akpei ohai enyɔ yɛ afii nyɔŋma kɛ enyɔ mli.”
Ni kɛlɛ, taakɛ guɔyelɔ gbɛfalɔ ni yɔɔ Yesu abɛbua ni kɔɔ adiagba ko he lɛ mli lɛ ji lɛ, mina nɔ ko ni jara wa aahu akɛ miŋmɛɛ miŋamɛi lɛ ateŋ mɛi enumɔ, mihemɛi lɛ, sɔlemɔ lɛ, naanyobɔɔ kuu lɛ, kɛ gbɛi ni miná yɛ je lɛŋ lɛ he ni mikɛtsake no.—Mateo 13:45, 46.
Beni miye afii enumɔ yɛ South Africa, he ni mitee ni miyatao shika tsuru yɛ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, naa mi ni miiku misɛɛ kɛmiiya shia kɛ nɔ ko ni jara wa kwraa fe no.
Nyɔji enumɔ lɛ tsɔɔ nɛkɛ filikilɔi nɛɛ awala sɛɛ tsɛlɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
Afii enumɔ sɛɛ lɛ, John A.
Aaafee afii enumɔ yɛ be mli ni Paulo eŋma ewolo lɛ eyaha Hebribii lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Cestius Gallus, Roma asraafoi lɛ bawo Yerusalem he ka.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, kɛ hoo lɛ, Samuel eye afii etɛ beni atse lɛ fufɔ lɛ, ni Isak eye aaafee afii enumɔ.
Nyɔji enumɔ pɛ nɛ ni wɔye Helen be-fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ he gbi jurɔ ni ji afii 60 lɛ.
Mɛi komɛi ahiɛ fee amɛ yaa akɛ mifataaa mɛi ni abaptisi lɛ ahe, ejaakɛ amɛle akɛ mibɔi shiɛmɔ beni miye afii enumɔ, ni miyɛ ekãa yɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
14:24, 25) Enɛ hewɔ lɛ, obaanyɛ oje shishi oha amɛle bɔ ni wɔfeɔ kpeei lɛ wɔhaa lɛ kɛtsɔ daa otsi kpeei enumɔ lɛ ní ooogbála mli otsɔɔ amɛ ekomekomei lɛ nɔ.
Amɛjie mitadei, ni amɛteŋ mɛi enumɔ yi mi aaafee ŋmɛlɛtswaa kome, ni amɛkɛ asraafoi aspaaterei ni amɛwo lɛ naanaa miyitso nɔ.
Lothar Hörnig kɛɛ kojomɔ he lɛ akɛ eye afii enumɔ kɛ fã yɛ he ko banee yɛ tsuŋwoo he lɛ, ni ajieee lɛ yɛ Brandenburg tsuŋwoo he lɛ aahu kɛbashi 1959.
Abaanyɛ akɛ assarion, ni ji kaplɛ kome ni shɛɛɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ Ghana pesewai enumɔ lɛ ahé aflimatai enyɔ.
8 Nyɛteŋ mɛi enumɔ baatiu mɛi 100, ni nyɛteŋ mɛi 100 baatiu mɛi 10,000, ni nyɛhenyɛlɔi lɛ baanyɔnyɔi yɛ klante naa yɛ nyɛhiɛ.
Mikome pɛ mitee shiɛmɔ ni miyashiɛ mitsɔɔ weku ko ni bihii enumɔ yɔɔ mli.
Makɛɛ akɛ, gbɔmɛi ni abuɔ amɛ fɔ́, ni yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ amɛyeɔ bem lɛ . . . manyɛ makɛɛ akɛ amɛshɛɔ oha mlijaa enumɔ kɛmiishɛ 10.”
Kulɛ abaawo lɛ tsũŋ afii enumɔ. . . .
Okɛ minitii enumɔ ati saji otii ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ, ni je kpo yɛ January afi 2005 Wɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Sɔɔmɔ lɛ baafa 8 lɛ ni hiɛ saneyitso akɛ “Bɔ ni Akɛ Shiɛmɔ Wiemɔi ni Akɛhaa lɛ Tsuɔ Nii” lɛ mli lɛ mli kɛkpa wiemɔ lɛ hiɛ: (1) Bei pii lɛ shiɛmɔ wiemɔi lɛ baanyɛ amɔ shi jogbaŋŋ kɛ́ wɔkɛwo wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔwiemɔi amli.
Beni mikɛ wolo tɛtrɛbii srɔtoi enumɔ ha lɛ lɛ, ekwɛ fɛɛ ekomekome ni ekɛɛ akɛ: ‘Makɔlɔ fɛɛ.’
Wɔkaneɔ yɛ Yohane 6:10-13 lɛ akɛ, Yesu lɛ̀ asafo ni fa fe akpei enumɔ yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ.
Minitii 45?
Onukpa ko ni yɔɔ maŋ lɛ mli he ni gidigidi lɛ je shishi yɛ lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Yɛ nɔ ni miihe ashɛ gbii enumɔ sɛɛ beni ta lɛ eje shishi lɛ, wɔje shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ shishi yɛ maŋ lɛ mli kɛ esɛɛ fɛɛ.
Gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi nɛɛ na hu akɛ gbii komɛi ni amɛhala yɛ otsi lɛ mli akɛ amɛkɛkwɛŋ tɛlivishiŋ gbɛkɛ lɛ haa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ weku lɛ mli lɛ náa hegbɛ kɛkaneɔ nii.
Gbii enyɔ sɛɛ lɛ, tɛlivishin nɔ adafitswaa ko wie saji ni aŋmala yɛ kansa ni feɔ fufɔ nɛɛ he.
(1 Korintobii 15:33) Weku shihilɛ baanyɛ ahi kɛ́ wɔkɛ hiɛshikamɔ bu shishitoo mla nɛɛ akɛ eji anɔkwale kɛji naanyobɔɔ fɔŋ lɛ yɛ heloo mli loo yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔ mli lɛ.
(Efesobii 5:3, 4) Ni awuiyeli ni anaa yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ loo vidio shwɛmɔi amli lɛ hu?
Tɛlivishiŋ kɛ redio nyɛɔ etsɔɔ mɔ nii.
Yɛ November 1998 lɛ, ajie nibii ni yaa nɔ yɛ Betel, ni ji Yehowa Odasefoi lɛ anitsumɔhe nine ni yɔɔ Louviers yɛ France lɛ yɛ France maŋ lɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ.
11 Bɔni afee ni wɔkpoo bɔlɛnamɔ jeŋba shara lɛ, esa akɛ wɔbi wɔhe akɛ, ‘Ani miŋmɛɔ mihiŋmɛi gbɛ ni ehaa mináa shwelɛ akɛ makane jeŋba shara he nibii yɛ woji amli, loo makwɛ yɛ tɛlivishiŋ loo Intanɛt lɛ nɔ?’
Amɛkɛ televishin nɔ nibii ni kɔɔ jarayeli, sinii, kɛ video nɔ nibii hu tsɔɔ nii.
Ajieɔ gbekɛbii ni hɔmɔ miiye amɛ, ní amɛhiŋmɛii enyɔ kɛbote mli, kɛ abobalɔi ni ejo foi kɛshi amɛshihilɛhei lɛ yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ ni wɔnaa be fɛɛ be.
9 Jeŋba sha, yiwalɛ nifeemɔ, kɛ daimonioi asaji eyi sinii, wɛbsaitii, nibii ni ajieɔ yɛ TV nɔ, vidio gemisii, kɛ lalai pii amli obɔ.
Kɛ́ oosusu akɛ okɛ saji ni jɛ adafitswaa woji amli, tɛlivishiŋ nɔ, redio mli, loo Internet nɔ baatsu nii lɛ, no lɛ kwɛmɔ jogbaŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ.
Mɛi komɛi kɛ amɛhe yawoɔ nitsumɔi komɛi ni nilee bɛ mli aloo nitsumɔi ni jeee ekpakpa mli, tamɔ ojarawatɛi ni bɛ diɛŋtsɛ hemɔ mli, aloo amɛkɛ shika yawoɔ tɛlivishin nɔ nifeemɔi ni asumɔɔ waa mli, shi etsɛɛɛ kɛkɛ lɛ akpa feemɔ, aloo amɛfiɔ tsũmaa nitsumɔ ko ni shika tã kwraa sɛɛ.
11 Tɛlivishin nɔ nibii, vidioi, kɛ sinii pii hãa efɔŋfeemɔ shwereɔ.
Atsɔɔ tɛlivishin kɛ redio, woji amli loo kompiutai anɔ akɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni yaa nɔ ni aleɔ lɛ he nilee babaoo haa.
Ŋmɛnɛ, ekɛ sinii kɛ tɛlivishin nɔ nibii ni jieɔ yiwalɛ kɛ jeŋba shara etsɔɔ lɛ tsuɔ nii.
5:13) Ani mikpaa Internet lɛ nɔ kɛkɛ ni yiŋtoo ko bɛ he loo migbeleɔ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi kɛjɛ he kome kɛyaa he kroko kɛkɛ beni mikwɛɔ lɛ?
Amerikabii eha amɛ heloo gbɛfaŋ ninamɔ ebɔ he toi enyɔ, tamɔ kar kɛ tɛlivishiŋ sɔrɔtoi yɛ nyɛsɛɛ afii 30 lɛ amli.
(Lala 94:20) Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, te esa akɛ wɔnu he wɔha tɛŋŋ kɛji ákɛ Yehowa Odasefoi ahe saji ni adafitswaa wolo, redio, loo tɛlivishiŋ lɛ kɛha lɛ ji nɔ ni atsɔmɔ lɛ loo eji amalei diɛŋtsɛ lɛ?
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ekolɛ mɛi babaoo ni hi shi afii 100 ni eho lɛ baasusu akɛ, nibii ni kɔmpiutai, tɛlivishiŋ, nilee ni aná yɛ ŋwɛiniiaŋ yaa he, kɛ ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ beaŋ hiɛyaai krokomɛi ni aná lɛ eha anyɛɔ afeɔ bianɛ yɛ gbɛ ni yɔɔ mlɛo nɔ lɛ, nyɛŋ aba shihilɛ mli kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Te ebaasusu yɛ Kristofonyo ko ni fiteɔ ŋmɛlɛtswai babaoo yɛ vidio nɔ shwɛmɔi loo tɛlivishiŋ kwɛmɔ mli, shi ebɛ teemɔŋ nikasemɔ sui kpakpai lɛ he eha tɛŋŋ?—2 Korintobii 6:14b; Efesobii 5:3-5, 15, 16.
Shi ni aaaye be ni fa tsɔ daa otsi yɛ nibii tamɔ televishin, sinii, videoi, kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔi, je lɛŋ woji akanemɔ, loo shwɛmɔi ahe lɛ baanyɛ aŋmɛ gbɛ ni kutumpɔo tsui ajie ehe kpo ni egbala wɔ kɛjɛ Yehowa he.
KƐJI akɛ okwɛ tɛlivishin nɔ nibii fioo lɛ, belɛ ojeee gbɔ kɛha hetsɛ̃.
Akɛ gbalashihilɛ mli béi feɔ naaŋmɔlɔwoo wiemɔi kɛ adesãi babaoo yɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ nifeemɔi amli, shi kɛ́ enɛ miiya nɔ yɛ shihilɛ mli diɛŋtsɛ lɛ ejeee shwɛmɔ sane kwraa.
(5 Mose 6:7) Fɔlɔi, nyɛkadia akɛ, wiemɔ kɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kpakpa ni mɔ feɔ ji gbɛ ni hi fe fɛɛ ni atsɔɔ nɔ atsɔɔ gbekɛbii “gbɛ ni sa” akɛ amɛtsɔ nɔ, ni tɛlivishiŋ nyɛŋ enɛ he nii atsu.—Abɛi 22:6.
Obɔɔ naanyo kɛji akɛ okwɛ tɛlivishiŋ nɔ gbɛjianɔtoo ko, obo lala toi, okane wolo ko, otee sini, loo okɛ Internet lɛ fãi komɛi tsu nii.
16 Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, ato nakai “ŋwɛi hee” ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ ŋwɛi nɔyeli ni Kristo yeɔ nɔ lɛ shishi momo.
Gbalɛi ni Nyɔŋmɔ tsɔ Yeremia nɔ egba lɛ ateŋ kpotoo eba mli momo.
Ni kɛ́ ele momo akɛ Yehowa hi kwraa fe enyɔŋmɔ lɛ, aso jeee hegbɛ ni ená akɛ ebaafee nɔ ko kɛtsɔɔ akɛ eyɛ Yehowa gbɛfaŋ nɛ?
(Yeremia 25:5, 6) Kɛji akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ etsɔ hiɛ momo eto aŋkro fɛɛ aŋkro wɔsɛɛ shihilɛ he gbɛjianɔ lɛ, no lɛ faikpamɔ nɛɛ ebafeŋ nɔ ni nilee yɔɔ mli.
Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ Daniel nu he akɛ ekɛ e-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ teŋ yɛ kpaakpa, ni ákɛ Yehowa kpɛlɛɔ anɔkwayeli mli ni ejɛɔ esɔmɔɔ lɛ lɛ nɔ.
(Kpojiemɔ 11:15) Beni Yesu yɔɔ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, ejie lɛ kpo etsɔɔ akɛ enine eshɛ hegbɛ ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ nɔ momo kɛjɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ—hegbɛ ni ha enyɛ ekudɔ adebɔɔ naa hewalɛi lɛ ní ha enyɛ etsá helai srɔtoi fɛɛ, ní ha enyɛ etee gbohii ashi po.
(1 Petro 5:1-4) Shi taakɛ wɔna kɛtsɔ hiɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ eduro yei hegbɛi komɛi ni yɔɔ nyam.
Shi kɛ́ wɔkɛ saji jiejie wɔnaa, ni wɔbɔi mɛi ahe wiemɔ nyanyaanya lɛ, belɛ eeenyɛ efee akɛ wɔtsui ebɔi fitemɔ.
Taakɛ wɔna lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ekpɛ mli momo akɛ abaawu ta ní akɛbaafo efɔŋfeemɔ sɛɛ ní akɛtɔ mɛi ni awaa amɛ yi lɛ ahe owele lɛ wɔsɛɛ, ni e-Bi Yesu Kristo ji mɔ ni baawu nakai ta lɛ.
(Luka 21:28) Ni mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji ni egboi momo lɛ aaatsɔ ana kpɔmɔ?
Nibii ni Nyɔŋmɔ eto eyiŋ akɛ ebaafee ni ewie he yɛ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ ená wɔnɔ hewalɛ momo, ni ebaaya nɔ ená wɔnɔ hewalɛ.
9 Mɛi akpekpei abɔ eba mfonirifeemɔŋ sɔlemɔwe lɛ momo koni amɛbaja Nyɔŋmɔ “yɛ mumɔ kɛ anɔkwale mli,” ni daa afi lɛ, mɛi akpekpei ohai abɔ ni ji “jeŋmaji lɛ fɛɛ anii ni jara wa lɛ” kéɔ yuu kɛbaa.
Ani Nyɔŋmɔ Eto Wɔ Wɔsɛɛ Be Efɔ Shi Momo?
Beni maji ni Romabii lɛ yeɔ nɔ lɛ faa lɛ, Romabii lɛ kpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ maji nɛɛ awɔji lɛ nɔŋŋ ji Romabii lɛ awɔji lɛ, ni ákɛ amɛhiɛ su kroko kɛkɛ.
Yehowa eje shishi momo eeto shishitoo nɔ kɛha maŋ ko ni efee ekome yɛ wɔbe nɛɛ mli, ni edamɔɔɔ hiɛjoomɔ kɛ pɛsɛmkunya ni ebu yɛ jeŋ ni wɔyɔɔ mli ŋmɛnɛ lɛ nɔ, shi moŋ edamɔ suɔmɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ naanyo gbɔmɔ nɔ.
Saji enyɔ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ yɛ wolo tɛtrɛɛ nɛɛ mli lɛ baatsɔɔ bɔ ni gbɔmɛi akpekpei abɔ miina miishɛjemɔ momo kɛtsɔ wekukpaa ni bɛŋkɛ kpaakpa ni amɛkɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ, Yehowa, kɛ e-Bi, Yesu Kristo ni esumɔɔ lɛ lɛ hu naa lɛ nɔ.
Ehe ehiaaa ni wɔle gbi kɛ ŋmɛlɛtswaa nɔ ni gbɛjianɔtoo nɛɛ hiɛkpatamɔ lɛ baaje shishi; akɛ kooloi ayibaamɔ woko wɔdɛŋ, ni adesai ni kpaa gbɛ akɛ amɛyi baana wala lɛ miibote mfonirifeemɔŋ adeka, ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ webii amumɔŋ paradeiso lɛ mli momo.
No hewɔ lɛ, jamɔ mli sɛɛnyiɛlɔi babaoo heɔ yeɔ akɛ dani aaafɔ mɔ ko po lɛ, no mli lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ eto gbɛjianɔ ele momo kɛji ato mɔ lɛ he gbɛjianɔ kɛha naanɔ miishɛɛ yɛ Paradeiso loo ni ebaaná naanɔ hiɛkpatamɔ.
Mɛi babaoo leee akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ eto nɔyeli ni baanyɛ efee je lɛ ekome lɛ shishi momo.
Kɛfata he lɛ, esa akɛ ana yɛ enifeemɔ mli akɛ etswa efai shi akɛ ebaahi shi yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ taomɔnii anaa.
(Yoshua 23:14; Yesaia 55:11) Bɔ ni anyɛɔ akɛ he fɔɔ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ shiwooi anɔ aahu ahaa hewɔ lɛ, yɛ bei komɛi amli lɛ ewieɔ wɔsɛɛ be mli nibii ni baaba lɛ ahe diɛŋtsɛ tamɔ nɔ ni amɛba mli momo po.
3:13-15) Yesu baptisimɔ lɛ nyɛŋ afee tsuitsakemɔ yɛ esha ko hewɔ he okadi; ni asaŋ ehe ehiaaa ni ejɔɔ ehe nɔ eha Nyɔŋmɔ, ejaakɛ eji nakai maŋ ni amɛjɔɔ amɛhe nɔ momo amɛha Yehowa lɛ mli nyo.
5 Bɔfo Petro eyoo Yesu momo akɛ “Kristo lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛkalɔ lɛ Bi lɛ.”
Áto Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli ni Mesia ni ji Kristo Yesu yeɔ nɔ lɛ shishi momo.
Yesu ye Nyɔŋmɔ anɔkwa kɛtee gbele mli.
2 Bɔ ni Yehowa fee enii eha yɛ nɛkɛ yei nɛɛ ahe kɛ jɔɔmɔi ní ekɛba amɛnɔ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ enáa mumɔŋ sui ni mɔ ko yɔɔ lɛ he miishɛɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ fe nuu loo yoo ni mɔ lɛ ji.
18, 19. (a) Mɛni Rose kɛ Christopher wie ni hãa wɔnaa akɛ, eji hegbɛ kpele akɛ abaabaptisi wɔ, ni akɛ, kɛ́ wɔfee nakai lɛ, Yehowa baajɔɔ wɔ?
5 Yehowa wo Abraham shi akɛ: “Oseshi lɛ mli aaajɛ ajɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ jeŋmaji fɛɛ.”
Yehowa jɔɔ ewebii lɛ.
Hana kɛ hiɛdɔɔ sɔle, ni ewo shi akɛ, kɛ akɛ binuu ko jɔɔ lɛ lɛ, ‘ekɛ lɛ baaha Yehowa ewala gbii abɔ fɛɛ.’
50 Kɛkɛ ni enyiɛ amɛhiɛ kɛje kpo kɛtee Betania tɔ̃ɔ ni ehole eniji anɔ ni ejɔɔ amɛ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yehowa jɔɔ etsuji ni hi shi yɛ blema lɛ?
Te gbɛjianɔ ni ato akɛ ashwie efɔŋfeelɔi ni tsakeee amɛtsui lɛ eye ebua Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ ehã tɛŋŋ?
16 Beni osusu nɔ ni gbɛgbalɔi kɛɔ yɛ gbɛgbamɔ sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli jɔɔmɔi ahe lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ekolɛ oosusu gbɛgbamɔ mli ni obaanyɛ okɛ ohe awo lɛ he.
Ehi akɛ wɔɔsɔle koni Yehowa ‘aha wɔniji anaa nitsumɔi lɛ ashwere’ ni ejɔɔ wɔshiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔ.
Mlai yeɔ amɛbuaa wɔ ni wɔnáa hegbɛi ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ ahe sɛɛ.
Mɛɛ jɔɔmɔi mɛi ni kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nyiɛɔ lɛ náa?
Yehowa baakwɛ koni adesai toibolɔi atsɔ Yesu Kristo nɔ aná jɔɔmɔ.
Mina bɔ ni Yehowa sɔɔmɔ lɛ eshwere waa yɛ Philippines, ni enɛ ji jɔɔmɔ.
4: Esaaa akɛ Abuɔ Ninámɔ akɛ Eji Nyɔŋmɔ Jɔɔmɔ He Okadi (rs bf. 399 kk.
14 Anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ Adeka lɛ hi Obed-edom shĩabii lɛ aŋɔɔ yɛ eshĩa lɛ nyɔji etɛ, ni Yehowa tee nɔ ejɔɔ Obed-edom shĩabii lɛ kɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni eyɔɔ.
25 Kɛkɛ ni ekɛɛ: “Mibinuu, hã mi jwɛiaŋ loo lɛ eko maye, koni no sɛɛ lɛ majɔɔ* bo.”
Kɛfata Yehowa hiɛ duromɔ kɛ wekukpaa ni miishɛɛ yɔɔ mli ni amɛnáa mli ŋɔɔmɔ lɛ he lɛ, amɛbaanyɛ amɛkpa Maŋtsɛ David wiemɔi ni jɛ mumɔŋ lɛ mlibaa gbɛ, akɛ: “Mɛi ni he jɔ lɛ, shikpɔŋ lɛ aaatsɔ̃ amɛnɔ̃, ni amɛmii aaashɛ amɛhe yɛ hejɔlɛ babaoo mli.”
Kɛ́ wɔná hemɔkɛyeli yɛ Yehowa mli ni wɔjɛ heshibaa mli wɔnyiɛ e-Bi lɛ sɛɛ fe nɔ ni wɔɔtiu ŋkomeŋfa nibii asɛɛ lɛ, wɔtsui nyɔɔ wɔ mli ni wɔnáa hejɔɔmɔ babaoo daa gbi.—Mat.
Mɛɛ jɔɔmɔ shihilɛ Nyɔŋmɔ webii náa mli ŋɔɔmɔ ŋmɛnɛ?
Wiemɔ miishɛɛ kɛ jɔɔmɔi ni anáa yɛ gbɛgbalɔi awamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ he.
Mɛni ehe bahia ni Israelbii lɛ afee koni Yehowa aya nɔ ajɔɔ amɛ?
Mɛɛ jɔɔmɔi babaoo ásaa ato aha Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ kɛji amɛku sɛɛ amɛbɔi Hejɔɔmɔ Gbi lɛ yeli ekoŋŋ lɛ?
Wɔmiiwo bo hewalɛ koni okɛ gbɛjianɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ eto koni ekɛ jɔɔmɔi nɛɛ fɛɛ aba lɛ atsu nii.
Kɛ́ fɔlɔi kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ tsɔse amɛbii lɛ yɛ ‘toiŋjɔlɛ mli’ ni amɛhi shi akɛ ‘mɛi ni feɔ toiŋjɔlɛ nii lɛ,’ amɛbii lɛ náa he sɛɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Yɛ naagbee mli lɛ, wɔbɔ mɔdɛŋ wɔkpa amɛfãtɔɔi ahe wiemɔ, ni wɔŋɔ hegbɛ lɛ kɛtsu naagba ni eba lɛ he nii.
Naagba titri ko ni ebabi ni wɔkpee naa ji shɛiifeelɔ ko ni tsɛɔ ehe Mwana Lesa, ni shishi ji “Nyɔŋmɔ Bi” lɛ, kɛ ekuu ni ale amɛ akɛ Kitawala, ni dɔlɛ sane ji akɛ eshishitsɔɔmɔ ji “Buu-Mɔɔ” lɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ mɛi akpekpei abɔ kɛ amɛhe woɔ sɔlemɔ mli waa moŋ, shi ohia, tsofai fɔji kɛ nitsumɔ ni eka mɔ he, wekui ni mli egbala, awuiyeli, kɛ tai ahe naagbai ni haoɔ adesai aweku lɛ miiwo wu.
Dabi, ejaakɛ ákɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ Nɔyelɔ lɛ, Yesu baasaa nɛkɛ naagbai ni Satan kɛba nɛɛ fɛɛ.
5 Be ni Israelbii lɛ shi Ejipt sɛɛ lɛ, eyeee nyɔji enyɔ ni amɛkɛ naagba wulu ko kpe.
Kɛji nakai ni lɛ, mɛni hewɔ wɔkpɛlɛɛɛ nɔ ni wɔfee ni wɔkɛha naagba lɛ ba lɛ nɔ, ni wɔtsɔɔ bɔ ni edɔ wɔ akɛ wɔkɛ nɔ ko efata naagba lɛ he lɛ.
Ni kɛ amɛnuɔ he akɛ esa akɛ amɛtao naanyobɔɔ ni baana mli aha amɛ yɛ gbalashihilɛ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ebaanyɛ ekɛ naagbai ni hiɛdɔɔ yɔɔ mli aba.
Onukpai nɛɛ ma nɔ mi amɛha mi akɛ ehe miihia ni mikɛ Biblia lɛ atsu nii kɛ hesaa kɛ́ miitsu naagbai ahe nii loo mikɛ hewalɛwoo miiha.”
(Yohane 2:25) Ena akɛ maŋ onukpa nɛɛ yɛ naagba ko ni yɔɔ hiɛdɔɔ, ni no esa ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ wekukpãa lɛ he.
Eyɛ mli akɛ ekolɛ, amɛleŋ kɔmpiutai ahe nibii pii aloo nii ni atsɔɔ yɛ skul lɛ ateŋ ekomɛi ahe nii babaoo moŋ, shi amɛle nibii pii ni kɔɔ shihilɛ kɛ bɔ ni afeɔ akpeeɔ shihilɛ mli naagbai anaa.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni eeeba nibii ni kɛ naagbai nɛɛ ba lɛ ashi lɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni enɛ eha emli ewo wu moŋ.”
Wɔfɔɔ shika he naagbai ahe wiemɔ titri.’
Ekolɛ shika ni obɛ, weku mli naagbai, gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ ni onáaa, loo suɔlɔ ko gbele fata onaagbai lɛ ahe.
Wɔtaoɔ nii amli koni wɔnyɛ wɔtsu sanebimɔi kɛ naagbai srɔtoi ahe nii, ni enɛ eye ebua mi ni minu Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli tsɔɔmɔi lɛ ashishi jogbaŋŋ, ni eha mile bɔ ni akɛ wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ shishitoo mlai ni nɔ kwɔlɔ lɛ hu tsuɔ nii kɛyeɔ abuaa mɛi krokomɛi.
Ani aana onaagbai lɛ anaa tsabaa, aloo aaha eewo wu moŋ?
(Lala 143:10) Kɛlɛ, amɛyeŋ amɛhe kɛjɛŋ naagbai ahe, shii abɔ ni anako sane ni kɔɔ adesai aheyeli kwraa he lɛ naa lɛ.
Beni etsɔɔ bɔ ni enikanemɔ lɛ esa ehe eha lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Ehaa wɔnaa suɔmɔ wɔhaa Yehowa kɛ Yesu ni wɔhiɔ shi kɛ miishɛɛ, kɛ wɔnaagbai kɛ jaramɔ shihilɛi lɛ po, ejaakɛ wɔle akɛ Yehowa shiwoi lɛ baaba mli kɛ̃.”
Ekolɛ nijiaŋwujee ji mɔ kroko naagba, ni bo ji mɔ ni baanyɛ ni ekɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ni tswaa mɔ emaa shi ni he hiaa koni akɛtee ekãa ni mɔ lɛ yɔɔ kɛha Maŋtsɛyeli sɔɔmɔ lɛ shi ekoŋŋ lɛ aha.
Hemɔkɛyeli tsake eshihilɛ aahu akɛ, gboklɛfoi krokomɛi baa eŋɔɔ bianɛ kɛha ŋaawoo yɛ bɔ ni amɛaafee amɛtsu amɛ naagbai ahe nii amɛha.
Beni eye afii 60 kɛyaa pɛ kɛkɛ ni ena nibii komɛi ni tsɔɔ akɛ eyɛ tsui hela.
Wɔbaasumɔ ni osusu nɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛɔ yɛ nɔnaa he, kɛ bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ yeɔ ebua wɔ koni wɔnu nɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni kɛ nɔnaa baa, ni ji naagba ni he hiaa waa nɛɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ lɛ he okwɛ. —2 Timoteo 3:16.
Shihilɛ Mli Naagbai ni Aaadamɔ Naa
Nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ, nakai gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ, naagbai krokomɛi tamɔ awuiyeli ni akɛtutuaa mɔ lɛ haaa ni maji babaoo ni ená nɔyaa lɛ kɛ niyenii kɛ kwɛmɔ ni sa ni abaanyɛ amɛkɛye amɛbua kɛtsu shihilɛ nɛɛ he nii lɛ aha.
Adafitswaa wolo lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ: “Nɔ ni ejɛ mli eba ji jwɛŋmɔŋ naagbai ni gbaa gbekɛbii lɛ anaa ni asheɔ gbeyei akɛ ebaaye sɔɔmɔ ni akɛhaa koni akɛye abua amɛ lɛ nɔ butuu lɛ.”
Kɛ́ oyɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ mli naagbai lɛ, obaanyɛ otsu yɛ nyɔji ni kɔɔyɔŋ tsakemɔ baahi kɛha bo lɛ amli.
Ekɛ nii babaoo ni ená yɛ eshihilɛ be fɛɛ mli lɛ tsu nii ni ekɛbua nibii ni yɔɔ fɛo kɛ nibii ni abuɔ akɛ ehi fe fɛɛ lɛ anaa.
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 5:32) Mumɔ nɛɛ haa wɔwoɔ yibii kpakpai—sui kpakpai ni baanyɛ aha wɔya nɔ wɔfee toiboo lɛ.—Galatabii 5:22, 23.
Abaaje shishi atsake shikpɔŋ lɛ afee lɛ shia fɛfɛo, ni toiŋjɔlɛ, kɛ miishɛɛ yɔɔ mli kɛha adesai.
Jeee kɛɛmɔ ni aaakɛɛ kɛkɛ akɛ ajáa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ ji nɔ ni nɔ atsɔ ayɔse anɔkwa Kristofoi lɛ, shi moŋ kɛtsɔ hemɔkɛyeli ni jieɔ sui kpakpai ni Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ woɔ lɛ akpo lɛ nɔ.
Kɛji wɔkwɛ nitɛŋmɔ ko ni yɔɔ fɛo loo wɔná nɔ ko ni agbɔ lɛ fɛfɛo ko he miishɛɛ lɛ, wɔyiŋ efeee wɔ kɔshikɔshi akɛ nitɛŋlɔ aloo nitɛŋlɔ ko ni gbɔɔ nii yɛ shihilɛ mli.
(Yuda 6) Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, amɛshi gbɛhe ni akɛwo amɛdɛŋ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ŋwɛi gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ mli lɛ ejaakɛ amɛmiisumɔ ni amɛkɛ yei fɛfɛji abahi shi yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
Yɛ saji ni ŋɔɔ ni awie yɛ Salomo Lalai lɛ amli lɛ fɛɛ mli lɛ, Shulamit oblayoo lɛ hi shi yɛ jeŋba hetsemɔ mli, ni no hewɔ lɛ ená bulɛ kɛjɛ mɛi ni bɔle ehe lɛ aŋɔɔ.
Nyɛminuu Breaux mã nɔ mi eha skulbii lɛ akɛ mɛi ni feɔ Yehowa suɔmɔnaa nii lɛ ahe yɛ fɛo yɛ Yehowa hiɛ ekɔɔɔ he eko bɔ ni amɛji yɛ kponɔgbɛ.
Miida nyɛ shi yɛ shikpɔŋ he mfoniri wolo fɛfɛo nɛɛ hewɔ.”
Abonsam duɔ mɛi komɛi, ejaakɛ amɛŋmɛɔ béi gbɛ ni efiteɔ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ ekomefeemɔ ni yɔɔ wɔteŋ lɛ kɛ shweremɔ ni Yehowa eha anɔkwa jamɔ miishwere yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ.—Lala 133:1-3.
(Romabii 5:9) Efeɔ enɛ ejaakɛ amɛhe yɛ fɛo yɛ ehiɛ.
Bɔ ni ŋoŋoi nɛɛ yɔɔ fɛo ni amɛyɔɔ srɔtoisrɔtoi lɛ sa ehiɛ waa, ni oona kɛ onaaa lɛ ebashi ekɔ eko eekwɛ.
Eŋɔɔ wɔnaa waa akɛ wɔɔle akɛ wɔ onukpai ni yɔɔ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii feɔ nii yɛ nɛkɛ mfoniri fɛfɛo ni haa mɔ naa hejɔɔmɔ nɛɛ kɛ gbeekpamɔ naa.
Yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ, kɛ́ wɔjie wɔwiemɔi akpo kɛ henumɔ ni sa lɛ, no lɛ wɔwiemɔ lɛ baanyɛ aŋɔɔ ni emli baatsii bɔ ni ebaanyɛ esa mɛi ni boɔ wɔ toi lɛ atsuii ahe.
“Bei komɛi kɛ́ mina yoo ko ni he yɔɔ fɛo lɛ, mikɛ lɛ toɔ fɔfɔi fɛfɛo ko ni mɔ fɛɛ mɔ baasumɔ akɛ ená yɛ eshĩa lɛ he.
No ji nɔ ni ha efee yoo ni he yɔɔ fɛo diɛŋtsɛ lɛ.—Abɛi 31:30; Hebribii 11:11.
Nɛkɛ skul naagbee he gbɛjianɔtoo ni ji klɛŋklɛŋ nɔ ni akɛje shishi yɛ Buu Mɔɔ Asafo lɛ Nikasemɔhe ni yɔɔ Patterson, New York lɛ bafee nifeemɔ be ko ni ŋɔɔ waa kɛ emli nibii fɛfɛji.
Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ jetsɛremɔ tsuɔ nii tamɔ pɛnte, ni ekɛhãa je lɛŋ feɔ fɛo.
Nakai afi lɛ ji be ni miye afii 91, ni awo wɔ hewalɛ koni wɔfã kɛyahi maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa shiɛlɔi lɛ ashĩa ni yɔɔ Rome lɛ mli, ni eji shĩa fɛfɛo ko ni yɔɔ he ko ni kɛ́ wɔɔkɛɛ lɛ toiŋjɔlɛ yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ.
+ 13 No hewɔ lɛ, wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ, wɔmiida bo shi ni wɔmiijie ogbɛ́i fɛfɛo lɛ yi.
Ekolɛ obaabi akɛ, ‘Ani onukpai anine baanyɛ ashɛ sui kpakpai ni yɔɔ gbekɛbii ahe ni eŋmɛɛ amɛ lɛ anɔ ekoŋŋ?’
Nɔ ni akɛha fɛfɛo ni tsɔɔ saji amli fɛfɛo, ni yɔɔ wiemɔi 35 mli lɛ tsɔɔ bɔ ni Yehowa jeŋ muu fɛɛ webii agbɛjianɔtoo lɛ hãa Yesu famɔ akɛ ajaje sanekpakpa lɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ lɛ baa mli ehaa.
Abɛi 20:29 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Oblahii anunyam ji amɛhewalɛ, ni hiimeji ahefɛo ji amɛwaji lɛ.”
Amɛnikasemɔ lɛ ha amɛna Ŋmalɛ mli anɔkwalei komɛi ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ.
“Kɛ́ onyiɛ koo ko mli, ni oyati tso tsũ fɛfɛo ko ni mashi nɔ lɛ, ani obaakɛɛ akɛ: ‘Tsũ nɛɛ yɛ fɛo waa!
Atoɔ niyenii, nu, wɔɔhei, datrɛfoi kɛ nɛɛsifoi ahe gbɛjianɔ, ni amrɔ nɔŋŋ lɛ atoɔ asafoŋ kpeei ahe gbɛjianɔ kɛshɛjeɔ mɛi ni oshãra lɛ eba amɛnɔ lɛ amii
Wɔbua lai saŋŋ naa ni wɔkɛshɛre la, ni wɔhoo wɔniyenii ni eshwɛ lɛ, kɛkɛ ni wɔyi gbɛ.
Tsuji kɛ amɛhiɛ fɔ̃ɔ amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi anɔ kɛhã niyenii kɛ hebuu. Shi kɛfata he lɛ, amɛhãa amɛhiɛ hiɔ amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi lɛ anɔ daa, koni amɛna nɔ ni amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi lɛ miisumɔ ni amɛfee, ni amɛtsu he nii.
(2 Timoteo 3:1-5) Yɛ shikpɔji komɛi anɔ lɛ hɔmɔ kɛ tai woɔ mɛi babaoo awala he gbeyei.
Mɛni hewɔ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ he hiaa koni wɔnu mumɔŋ niyenii ahe hɔmɔ ni yeɔ mɔ he lɛ?
No sɛɛ lɛ, Yesu tsɔɔ wɔ akɛ wɔsɔle yɛ niyenii ni he hiaa wɔ kɛha gbi lɛ he.
Yɛ sɛɛ mli lɛ, tsɔnei krokomɛi enyɔ hu ni kɛlɛ bɔ ni sa kɛ niyenii tee Russia.
Shi niyenii kɛha nitsulɔi lɛ fɛɛ hu?
Agbɛnɛ Yesaia wie asraafoi anibii ní akɛwuɔ ta lɛ ahe akɛ akɛ la ekpata fɛɛ hiɛ kwraa, akɛ: “Aspaatre fɛɛ aspaatre ní tawulɔi woɔ kɛshimɔɔ shi yɛ ta gidigidifeemɔ mli lɛ kɛ atade ni wuɔ shi yɛ lá mli lɛ, shã abaashã, ni eeetsɔ la niyenii.”
No mli lɛ dumɔnii lɛ miikwɛ̃ lolo, ni kpaako gbɛjianɔtoo ni abaatsɔ nɔ akɛ mumɔŋ niyenii aha lɛ baajie ehe kpo.
Kɛ wɔfee nakai lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baakwɛ koni wɔná niyenii wɔye kɛ atadei ni wɔbaawo.
Amɛkpɛlɛ nitsumɔ ni yɔɔ oshara akɛ amɛkɛ mumɔŋ niyenii baaya Biafra lɛ nɔ, ni enɛ ha nyɛmimɛi babaoo na he sɛɛ kɛyashi ta lɛ ba naagbee yɛ afi 1970.—3/1 baafa 27.
Habakuk fee bɔ ni enu he eha lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ efɔ̃ shi, ejaakɛ ekɛɛ akɛ: “Ejaakɛ agbamitso lɛ gbaŋ afofro, ni yibii hu ehiŋ weintsei lɛ anɔ; mutso yibiiwoo aaafee yaka, ni abɔɔi lɛ baŋ niyenii; aaaha tooi atã yɛ tooi atsũ lɛ mli, ni anaŋ tsinai yɛ amɛtsũi lɛ amli. Shi mi lɛ, manya yɛ Yehowa mli, mimli aaafili mi yɛ miyiwalaheremɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ mli!”
Kɛ́ wɔye mumɔŋ niyenii ni akɛha yɛ “be ni sa nɔ”—kɛtsɔ Kristofoi awoji, asafoŋ kpeei, kpeei bibii kɛ kpeei wuji—anɔ be fɛɛ be lɛ, no lɛ wɔbaanyɛ wɔná hekɛnɔfɔɔ akɛ wɔkɛ wɔnanemɛi Kristofoi baahiɛ hemɔkɛyeli kɛ nilee lɛ mli yɛ “ekomefeemɔ” mli.—Mateo 24:45.
(2 Kronika 7:13) Yɛ nu hɔmɔ ní ba lɛ mli lɛ, kwaakwaalabitei lɛ̀ Elia yɛ Kerit faa lɛ naa, ni sɛɛ mli lɛ, okulafo ko mamu fioo kɛ mu fioo ni etãaa yɛ naakpɛɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ ha ená niyenii eye.
Shinaa Niyenii
Ani eeenyɛ eba akɛ wɔmii baanyɛ ashɛ daa gbi shihilɛ mli hiamɔ nii—niyenii, hehaanɔ, kɛ wɔɔhe kɛkɛ ní wɔyɔɔ lɛ he lɛɛlɛŋ?
9 Okpɔlɔ kɛ hiɛmaa aboloo lɛ kaiɔ asafo babaoo lɛ akɛ, kɛ amɛaaya nɔ amɛhe awa daa yɛ mumɔŋ lɛ, no lɛ esa akɛ amɛye mumɔŋ niyenii ni jɛ Biblia lɛ kɛ “tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ” lɛ woji amli lɛ be fɛɛ be.
12:4-8) Gbɛnaa nii kã tsulɔ anɔkwafo kɛ nilelɔ kuu lɛ nɔ akɛ ekɛ mumɔŋ niyenii aha “yɛ be ni sa nɔ.”
Ehaa wɔ niyenii kɛ miishɛɛ.
Kɛha Yesu kɛ agbɛnɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji fɛɛ lɛ, sɔlemɔ ni asɔleɔ kɛbiɔ jɔɔmɔ ashwieɔ niyenii anɔ lɛ ji nɔ ko ni he hiaa waa.
Kaimɔ akɛ, kɛ́ amɛba klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa lɛ, ekolɛ amɛleŋ bɔ ni ayeɔ niyenii ni yɔɔ omaŋ lɛ mli lɛ ekomɛi.
Eha etsuji lɛ kɛ niyenii wo amɛ kotokui lɛ fɛɛ amli obɔbɔ.
Taakɛ ehe miihia ni wɔtsui lɛ aná niyenii ni hewalɛ yɔɔ mli lɛ, esa akɛ wɔná mumɔŋ niyenii kpakpai ni fá bɔ ni sa.
Amɛkaye nii, ni amɛkanu nu hu.
Hémɔ Be Kɛtsɔse Obii Lɛ
Gbekɛbii gboiii yɛ nakai shiai lɛ amli.
Eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ Yesu nu he akɛ esa akɛ ena be eha gbekɛbii.
Satan folɔ Yehowa, Nyɔŋmɔ anɔkwafo, Nyɔŋmɔ ni yɔɔ suɔmɔ, kɛ Bɔlɔ lɛ naa akɛ nɔ ni ekɛɛ E-bii adesai lɛ, amale ni!—Lala 31:6; 1 Yohane 4:16; Kpojiemɔ 4:11.
Afii 20 ni eho nɛ lɛ, julɔi komɛi tswa Selmira wu tu ni amɛgbe lɛ, ni no ha ehe bahia ni ekome ekwɛ amɛbii etɛ lɛ.
Mɛni esa akɛ fɔlɔi atsɔɔ amɛbii yɛ Yehowa he, ni te esa akɛ amɛfee nakai amɛha tɛŋŋ?
Henumɔŋ faladokui baahi gbekɛbii ni tamɔ nɛkɛ he be kakadaŋŋ.
Ejaakɛ aŋɔ bɔɔnii lɛ awo yakayakanii ashishi, jeee yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛsuɔmɔ naa, shi kɛtsɔ mɔ ni ba amɛ shi lɛ nɔ, yɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ hewɔ akɛ, bɔɔnii lɛ diɛŋtsɛ hu baaye ehe kɛjɛ fitemɔ nyɔŋyeli lɛ mli koni amɛná Nyɔŋmɔ bii lɛ anunyam heyeli lɛ eko.”—Romabii 8:14-21, NW; 2 Timoteo 2:10-12.
Esa akɛ fɔlɔi lɛ abo wiemɔ ni yitso ji “Fɔlɔi ni Naa Amɛbii Ahe Miishɛɛ” lɛ toi jogbaŋŋ.
Bɔni afee ni gbekɛbii ajo Abonsam tsɔnei lɛ anaa foi lɛ, esa akɛ amɛná amɛle Yehowa ni amɛbo lɛ toi.
Kɛ́ ojɛɔ osuɔmɔ mli oboɔ obii lɛ atoi yɛ sane fɛɛ sane he lɛ, obaana akɛ ewaŋ kɛhaŋ amɛ akɛ amɛkɛ bo aaagba nɔ fɛɛ nɔ he sane, ni amɛbaabi bo ŋaawoo.
No hewɔ lɛ, ehe miihia ni fɔlɔi akwɛ amɛbii lɛ anɔ jogbaŋŋ, ni amɛkɛ Ŋmalɛ naa gbɛtsɔɔmɔ ni sa ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni esa akɛ amɛkɛ Internet lɛ atsu nii aha lɛ aha amɛ, tamɔ bɔ ni amɛkwɛɔ amɛnɔ yɛ amɛlala aloo sinii ahalamɔ mli lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.—1 Kor.
Shi nɔ titri ni kadi Anabaptistbii lɛ ahemɔkɛyeli fe fɛɛ, ni ha ebasoro amɛ yɛ jamɔi krokomɛi lɛ ahe ji hemɔkɛyeli ni mli wa ni amɛyɔɔ akɛ baptisimɔ yɛ kɛha onukpai shi jeee gbekɛbii.
Odasefoi lɛ bawoɔ wɔ kɛyaa kpeei lɛ, ni amɛwaa wɔ kɛkwɛɔ wɔbii lɛ yɛ kpeei lɛ ashishi.
Kɛ fɔlɔi lɛ kɛ shwɛmɔ nii loo woji ni atɛŋ mfonirii yɛ mli, ni gbekɛbii kɛ pɛnsil sui sɔrɔtoi dikiɔ mli lɛ ha amɛ ni amɛkɛshwɛ koni no aha amɛfee dioo lɛ, no lɛ nɔ ko bibioo pɛ gbekɛbii lɛ baakase.
Mɛɛ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ ni kɔɔ gbekɛbii awolokasemɔ he yɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli?
Be ko beni mi kɛ Beryl tee wɔyashiɛ yɛ shĩa agbo ko mli lɛ, gbekɛbii komɛi bɔi wɔ jɛmɔ, ni amɛbɔi wɔ tɛi hu tswiamɔ.
Beni amɛji gbekɛbii lɛ, amɛnyɛɔ amɛshwɛɔ yɛ he fɛɛ he ni amɛsumɔɔ, ni amɛsheee gbeyei.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, wumɛi yeɔ amɛŋwɛi Maŋtsɛ lɛ anɔkwa kɛtsɔ Kristo sui lɛ akpo ni amɛjieɔ yɛ bɔ ni amɛkɛ amɛŋamɛi kɛ amɛbii lɛ yeɔ haa lɛ mli lɛ nɔ.
26:1, 4, 5) Beni nyɛyɔɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asa lɛ nɔ lɛ, nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛtsɔɔ amɛ nɔ hewɔ ni ayɔɔ wojiatoohe, adafitswaa tao, kɛ nibii krokomɛi ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ.
Naagbee kwraa lɛ, ye obua obii lɛ ni amɛna bɔ ni amɛaafee amɛkɛ nɔ ni amɛkaseɔ lɛ atsu nii.

13 Nɛkɛ jaramɔ be nɛɛ mli maŋnyɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ —eyɛ faŋŋ akɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ nyɛ lɛ —bote okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ asa lɛ nɔ.
Awo Nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ Kpakpa Lɛ
Misumɔɔ Tsɛkwɛ̃ Ben sane waa, shi Awo weku lɛ mli bii krokomɛi ni amɛji Methodistbii lɛ susuɔ akɛ enifeemɔ yɛ srɔto kwraa tsɔ̃.
Mi kɛ awo yɛ afi 1956
Ejaakɛ kɛ hoo lɛ, abifao nyɛɛɛ ehe nɔ ko kwraa efee; nyɔɔŋ kɛ shwane fɛɛ lɛ, nyɛ lɛ suɔmɔ kwɛmɔ kɛ hedɔɔ he hiaa abifao lɛ.
Sonia hiɛ ka nɔ akɛ Awo baafata ehe kɛya, shi Awo tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Mi hu miyɛ mɔ kroko ŋɔɔ ni maya.
Nɛkɛ wekukpãa ni yɔɔ wu kɛ eŋa teŋ ni haa amɛfoɔ amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ nɔ̃ mli lɛ ji nɔ ni awie he yɛ 1 Mose 2:24 lɛ akɛ: ‘Nuu aaashĩ etsɛ kɛ enyɛ, ni eeekpɛtɛ eŋa he, ni amɛaatsɔ̃ heloo kome.’
Ani mi kɛ omami kɛ onyɛmimɛi hii lɛ baaba abakula shi ni wɔkɛ wɔhiɛ abumɔ shi yɛ ohiɛ?”
(1 Korintobii 6:9, 10; Hebribii 13:4) Susumɔ nɛɛ ji nɔ titri ni ha mifɔ bii ekpaa beni atsuko mihe nii lɛ.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mɔ ko bɛ ni eshi shia loo nyɛmimɛi hii loo nyɛmimɛi yei loo tsɛ loo nyɛ loo ŋa loo bii loo abɔɔi yɛ mi kɛ sanekpakpa lɛ hewɔ, ní enaŋ . . . toi oha yɛ benɛ be nɛɛ mli beebe, . . . ni jeŋ ni baaba lɛŋ hu eeená naanɔ wala.”

36 Nɔ ni Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: ‘Akɛni afɔse okɔnɔ lɛ ashwie shi ni ajie ohe folo be ni okɛ osuɔlɔi lɛ kɛ onyaŋemɔ nii, omagai ni yɔɔ nyaŋemɔ* lɛ,+ nibii ni okɛ obihii alá po shã afɔle ohã lɛ bɔɔ ajwamaŋ lɛ hewɔ lɛ,+ 37 miibua osuɔlɔi lɛ fɛɛ ni ohã amɛmii shɛ amɛhe lɛ, mɛi fɛɛ ni osumɔ kɛ mɛi fɛɛ ni onyɛ amɛ lɛ anaa.
8 “Kɛ́ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, lɛɛ ohusu lɛ mli tamɔ bɔ ni ekã otsɛmɛi lɛ kitã lɛ,+ ni ekɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ fɛɛ ni ewo shi akɛ ekɛbaahã otsɛmɛi lɛ hã bo lɛ+ 9 —kɛji oooye kitãi nɛɛ fɛɛ ni miwoɔ bo ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ anɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ní onyiɛ egbɛi lɛ anɔ daa lɛ+—no lɛ, okɛ maji etɛ krokomɛi afata maji etɛ nɛɛ ahe.
+ 23 No hewɔ lɛ, agbɛnɛ kã mi kitã yɛ biɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ, akɛ obaaye mi kɛ mibii kɛ miseshibii lɛ anɔkwa, ni akɛ, bɔ ni mijie suɔmɔ ni tsakeee kpo mitsɔɔ bo lɛ, okɛ mi kɛ shikpɔŋ ni oyɔɔ nɔ nɛɛ nɔ bii lɛ baaye nakai nɔŋŋ.”
Dani Israel maŋ lɛ aaabote Shiwoo Shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, Mose kai amɛ sɔ̃ ni kã amɛnɔ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ lɛ he, ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi aná wala, ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni obo egbee toi, ni okɛ ohe akpɛtɛ ehe.”
Ni naa, mikɛo yɛ, ni he fɛɛ he ní oyaa lɛ mabu ohe, ni mikɛo aaaba shikpɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ ekoŋŋ; ejaakɛ mishiŋo kɛyashi beyinɔ ni mafee nɔ ni mitsĩ tã mikɛɛo lɛ.”—1 Mose 28:10-15.

Nyɛmiisumɔ mi kulɛ, nyɛaana miishɛɛ akɛ miiya Tsɛ lɛ ŋɔɔ, ejaakɛ mi-Tsɛ da fe mi.”

Kaaja amɛ, ni kaasɔmɔ amɛ hu; ejaakɛ mi, Yehowa, O-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, miji Nyɔŋmɔ awuŋayelɔ ni woɔ tsɛmɛi atɔmɔi anyɔmɔ kɛtsɔɔ bii anɔ kɛyashiɔ yinɔbii ni ji etɛ kɛ yinɔbii ni ji ejwɛ ni nyɛɔ mi lɛ anɔ; ni minaa mɛi akpei abɔ ni sumɔɔ mi ni amɛyeɔ mikitai lɛ anɔ lɛ amɔbɔ.” —2 Mose 20: 4-6.

Kɛ́ hetuu-kɛhamɔ bɛ lɛ, ehaa wekukpãa joɔ, ekɔɔɔ he eko bɔ ni nuu kɛ yoo teŋ suɔmɔ ni yɔɔ gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi ateŋ lɛ ŋɔɔ ha kɛjɛ beni amɛná suɔmɔ amɛha amɛhe lɛ.

Mɛɛ ŋɔɔmɔ po nɛ!

Ekolɛ ewiemɔi baaŋɔɔ dɔkɔbii ni ekɛ ‘awuiyeli’ ní ekɛwo etsui mli lɛ ‘baatee,’ shi yɛ naagbee lɛ ejieɔ lɛ kpo yɛ gbɔmɔtsoŋ loo wiemɔ mli tutuamɔi amli.
Ahã nu ni joɔ tsɔ nu ni ŋɔɔ (22-27)
2:9–3:3—Mɛni hewɔ wolokpo ni aŋmala yaafoi kɛ ŋtsɔidɔɔmɔ yɛ mli lɛ ŋɔɔ yɛ Ezekiel daaŋ lɛ?
Ni mahã amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛlá atɔrɔ amɛ dãa tamɔ nɔ ni amɛnu wain ni ŋɔɔ.
4 Kɛji akɛ wɔsɔlemɔi aaakwɔ kɛaaya Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔɔ akɛ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma ni eŋma ŋɔɔ lɛ, belɛ esa akɛ wɔsɔle yɛ hemɔkɛyeli mli.
1:27, 28) Nyɛhaa wɔkwɛa naanyobɔɔ ni ŋɔɔ ni wɔkɛaabua wɔhe naa yɛ Kaimɔ lɛ shishi yɛ March 28 lɛ gbɛ, ni wɔjie shidaa kpo daa wɔha Yehowa kɛ e-Bi lɛ!—Luka 22:19.
7 La ŋɔɔ, ni kɛ́ hiŋmɛii na hulu lɛ, ehi.
Kɛ eji blɔfo atĩa, akutu, aloo nɔ kroko ni jio, obaasumɔ ni oduawa lɛ afee nɔ ni etsu, ni he yɔɔ akɔnɔ, ni ŋɔɔ hu.
19 Kɛ́ mɔ ko nine shɛ nɔ ni eshweɔ nɔ lɛ, enáa miishɛɛ,*+
16 Enaa ŋɔɔ diɛŋtsɛ,
6 Nilelɔ Maŋtsɛ Salomo yɔse jeeŋmɔ beebe akɛ: “Nitsulɔ lɛ, eye nii fioo jio, pii jio, ewɔ ŋɔɔ enaa; shi tɔ ni niiatsɛ tɔɔ lɛ haaa ewɔ.”
No sɛɛ lɛ, yɛ he ni etee ni adesa ko kwraa enaaa lɛ nɛɛ, efɔseɔ tsofa-kɛ-ŋma eshwieɔ ŋãi la lɛ nɔ, ni He Krɔŋkrɔŋ Fe Fɛɛ lɛ yiɔ obɔ kɛ lasu ni jeɔ ŋma.—3 Mose 16:12, 13.
Obaanyɛ okai lɛ miishɛɛ ni yɔɔ daa ni awooo he nyɔmɔ ni anáa kɛjɛɔ hulushinyɔɔ ni yɔɔ fɛo, fɔfɔi ko ŋmajee, aduawa ko ni ŋɔɔ waa lɛ yeli mli, loo okai lɛ miishɛɛ ni anáa beni akwɛɔ loofɔlɔ nyɛ ko ni miiha ebii niyenii lɛ.
11 Shi agbami tso kɛɛ amɛ akɛ, ‘Ani mihã miŋɔɔmɔ kɛ yibii kpakpai ni miwoɔ lɛ aŋmɛɛ mi koni miya ni kɔɔyɔɔ ayatswa mi kɛya kɛba yɛ tsei krokomɛi lɛ anɔ?’
Shi maŋ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, gbeei lɛ kɛ sulɔi lɛ kɛ ajwamaŋbɔlɔi lɛ kɛ awuiyelɔi lɛ kɛ amaga jalɔi lɛ kɛ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni sumɔɔ amale ni emaleɔ lɛ yɔɔ jɛi.”—Kpojiemɔ 22:12-15.
“Nyɛkaŋɔa nɔ ni ji krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ nyɛhaa shifɔ̃ji lɛ.”
Hiroko ni kase Blɔfo wiemɔ lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ, be ko ni eho lɛ, nɔ ni kɛ́ fee lɛ ekɛɔ yɛ eyitsoŋ ji akɛ: ‘Gbeei kɛ alɔntei ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli lɛ po nuɔ Blɔfo fe mi.’
Kɛji wɔmiitsɔmɔ mɛi ni susuɔ akɛ amɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ yeɔ emuu lɛ, wɔɔfee jogbaŋŋ akɛ wɔɔkai akɛ “gbee ni hiɛ kã lɛ ehi fe jata ni egbo.”
Amɛ fɛɛ lɛ, gbei mumuii sɔŋŋ ni, amɛnyɛɛɛ amɛbolɔ.
+ 28 Shi yoo lɛ here nɔ ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Nakai ni, onukpa, shi kɛ̃lɛ gbeebii ni yɔɔ okpɔlɔ lɛ shishi lɛ po yeɔ bii bibii lɛ aniyenii fufuji lɛ.”
23 Ni Yezebel hu lɛ, Yehowa ekɛɛ yɛ ehe akɛ: ‘Gbei baaye Yezebel yɛ shikpɔŋ ni yɔɔ Yezreel lɛ nɔ.
Akɛ afɔlei krokomɛi ní amɛshãa lɛ toɔ gbee loo kpolotoo afɔlei, ni ji kooloi ní he tseee yɛ Mose Mla lɛ shishi, ní no hewɔ lɛ amɛjeee kooloi ní sa kɛha afɔleshaa lɛ ahe.
Kɛkɛ ni beni etsɔɔ lɛ gbɛnaa nii titri ni ka enɔ yɛ Israel bii lɛ ahe, ní nakai beaŋ nɔŋŋ hu lɛ, ekaa yoo lɛ hemɔkɛyeli kɛ efaishitswaa ekwɛɔ lɛ, Yesu kɛ musuŋtsɔlɛ gbala nibii amli eha lɛ akɛ: “Ejaaa akɛ aŋɔɔ [Israel] bii lɛ aboloo lɛ ashɛrɛɔ ashwieɔ [Jeŋmajiaŋbii] shifɔji abii.”
Kɛkɛ ni amɛkɛ bulɛ shɛ gbee lɛ ni amɛyi gbɛ akɛ amɛmiiya.
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, miyashɛ okwaafoi ashihilɛhe lɛ, kɛkɛ ni gbeei bɔi bolɔmɔ kɛ miwoo.
Nyɔŋmɔ kojomɔ kɛɔ yɛ hemɔkɛyeli kwalɔi lɛ ahe akɛ: “Shi anɔkwa abɛ lɛ eba mli yɛ amɛhe akɛ: ‘Gbee kuɔ esɛɛ kɛyaa lɛ diɛŋtsɛ eshwee he, ni kpolokoo ni aju ehe lɛ yakokoloɔ ŋmɔtɔ mli.’ ”—2 Petro 2:22.
Shi be ni eshwɛ fioo ni gbei lɛ baashɛ wɔmasɛi lɛ, amɛwa amɛdamɔ shi, ni amɛtswa amɛlei, kɛkɛ ni amɛtsɔmɔ amɛhe ni amɛtee.
Nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ, fɛi lɛ gbe wuɔi ejwɛ, kɛ gbeei enyɔ ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ niiaŋ lɛ!
Atsɔɔ Hebri gbɛi kɛha nɛkɛ filikilɔ nɛɛ shishi . akɛ “ofɔi,” “gbee he adɔdɔŋ.” kɛ “koklogbantɛŋ.”
Amɛba shia lɛ, ni amɛŋa gbee lɛ, ni amɛkɛɛ amɛyɛ miishɛɛ waa ejaakɛ amɛná hegbɛ akɛ amɛaawie amɛtsɔɔ lɛ.
Wolo fɛɛ wolo ni naabu ekua, egbɔ, nibii eka mli, loo etserɛ lɛ baagbe asafo lɛ he guɔ, ni ehaŋ shiatsɛ lɛ aná bulɛ kɛha shɛɛ sane ni hereɔ mɔ yiwala ni yɔɔ mli lɛ.
Abu Tɔmɔ Taolɔ lɛ akɛ “amɛtamɔ gbeei” shi awo Diogenes sabala akɛ Gbee Lɛ.
Hela wiemɔ ni atsɔɔ shishi yɛ biɛ akɛ “tumu nɔ nii” lɛ hu tsɔɔ “nɔ ko ni ashɛrɛ ashwie aha gbeei,” “sɛbo,” loo “wamɔ.”
Miwaŋ gbee loo alɔnte po yi.”
Wɔŋ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ bɔni afee ni gbekɛ lɛ ‘susuma’ awuu ashi mɔ lɛ, esa akɛ ana lai kuku ni miitso, dãa tɔ kome, kɛ gbee bi, koni akɛsha afɔle.
Wɔsheɔ gbeei gbeyei waa ejaakɛ wɔnyɛɔ wɔnaa amɛ agboi tamɔ okpɔŋɔi.
27 Yoo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Nuŋtsɔ, nakai ni, shi yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, gbeebii lɛ yeɔ fufuji ni jɛɔ amɛnuŋtsɔmɛi lɛ akpɔlɔ lɛ nɔ shwieɔ shi lɛ.”
9 Kɛkɛ ni Zeruia binuu, Abishai+ kɛɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ akɛ: “Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ gbee ni egbo+ nɛɛ alomɔ minuŋtsɔ maŋtsɛ?
Akɛ gbee ni tsɔɔ shwilafo gbɛ haaa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ kɛkɛ.
20 Bɔfo Paulo kɛɛ: “Nyɛkaia nyɛ tsɔɔlɔi, mɛi ni wie Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ tsɔɔ nyɛ lɛ; nyɛkwɛa amɛjeŋba lɛ naagbee, ni nyɛkasea amɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ.”
Kwɛ bɔ ni onuɔ he akɛ ohe ejɔ bo beni mɔ ni jie bo lɛ kɛ bo shĩɔ oshara lɛ mli ní ekɛɔ akɛ: “Agbɛnɛ oyɛ shweshweeshwe” lɛ!
Ani onu he pɛŋ akɛ mɔ ko kwraa bɛ ni susuɔ ohe loo enuɔ nɔ ni yaa nɔ yɛ oshihilɛ mli lɛ shishi?
Te obaanu he tɛŋŋ kɛ́ eha ole akɛ ojara wa waa kɛha lɛ lɛ?
Shi ani oyɔse bɔ ni ewa akɛ oooya nɔ ohi shi akɛ mɔ ni tsui enyɔ emli yɛ be mli ni etamɔ nɔ ni nɔ ko ni omɛɔ lɛ miihé bei babaoo fe bɔ ni okpaa gbɛ loo beni etamɔ nɔ ni shihilɛ ko ni ehiii lɛ miitsɛ waa fe bɔ ni okpaa gbɛ lɛ?
17 No hewɔ lɛ, Paulo wiemɔi ní ekɛ asafo ní yɔɔ Tesalonika lɛ wie lɛ sa jogbaŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ, akɛ: “Enɛ ji Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nɔ̃, nyɛ hetsemɔ lɛ, ní nyɛtsĩ nyɛhe naa kɛjɛ ajwamaŋbɔɔ mli, ní nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ale lɛ diɛŋtsɛ enɔ̃ lɛ hiɛmɔ yɛ hetsemɔ kɛ woo mli, jeee yɛ akɔnɔ hiɛdɔɔ mli, taakɛ bɔ ni jeŋmajiaŋbii ní leee Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ feɔ lɛ.”
14 Shi be ni mina akɛ amɛnyiɛɛɛ yɛ sane kpakpa lɛ anɔkwale lɛ naa lɛ,+ mikɛɛ Kefa* yɛ amɛ fɛɛ amɛhiɛ akɛ: “Kɛ́ bo ni oji Yudanyo lɛ ohiɔ shi tamɔ bɔ ni jeŋmaji lɛ feɔ lɛ, ni jeee tamɔ bɔ ni Yudafoi feɔ lɛ, te tɛŋŋ ni onyɛɔ jeŋmajiaŋbii lɛ anɔ ni amɛhi shi yɛ Yudafoi akusum naa lɛ?”
Kɛji akɛ mɛi krokomɛi kai ogbɛi lɛ te onuɔ he ohaa tɛŋŋ?— Onáa miishɛɛ, aloo jeee nakai?— Yehowa hu miisumɔ ni gbɔmɛi ale egbɛi.
4 Kɛ okɛ “True Peace and Security—From What Source?” wolo ni etsu lɛ miitsu nii lɛ, obaasumɔ ni oka enɛ okwɛ:
“Nyɛkaia mɛi ni nyiɛɔ hiɛ yɛ nyɛteŋ, ní wie Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔ lɛ amɛtsɔɔ nyɛ lɛ, ni be ni nyɛkwɛɔ yibii kpakpai ni jɛɔ bɔ ni amɛbaa amɛjeŋ amɛhãa lɛ mli kɛbaa lɛ jogbaŋŋ lɛ, nyɛkasea amɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ.” —Heb.
Kɛ́ oŋa mɛi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ yɛ amɛmaŋ wiemɔ mli lɛ, amɛnuɔ he akɛ osusuɔ amɛhe.
(1 Petro 2:21) Beni Petro ewie amanehulu ni Yesu kɛkpe kɛ bɔ ni ekɛ heshibaa to etsui shi yɛ nakai amanehulu lɛ mli lɛ he lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ewo ŋamɛi ni wumɛi heee yeee lɛ hewalɛ akɛ: “Nakai nɔŋŋ nyɛ yeigbayei lɛ hu, nyɛbaa nyɛhe shi nyɛhaa nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ nyɛwumɛi lɛ, koni, kɛ́ mɛi komɛi booo wiemɔ lɛ toi tete lɛ, ashi wiemɔ lɛ sɛɛ ni atsɔ yei lɛ ajeŋba nɔ ni nine ashɛ amɛnɔ, ejaakɛ amɛnaa nyɛjeŋba ni hetsemɔ kɛ gbeyeishemɔ yɔɔ mli lɛ.”—1 Petro 3:1, 2.
6 “Agbɛnɛ, kitãi kɛ taomɔ nii kɛ yiŋkpɛi* ni Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛhã akɛ atsɔɔ nyɛ lɛ nɛ, koni nyɛye nɔ kɛ́ nyɛfo mli kɛtee shikpɔŋ ni nyɛyaaŋɔ lɛ nɔ, 2 bɔ ni afee ni oshe Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbeyei, ní oye emlai kɛ ekitãi ni miwoɔ bo lɛ fɛɛ nɔ—bo kɛ obi kɛ onabi+—owala gbii abɔ fɛɛ, koni owala sɛɛ atsɛ.
+ 29 No hewɔ lɛ, Yakob kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Ole bɔ ni misɔmɔ bo mihã, kɛ bɔ ni okooloi lɛ eshwere yɛ midɛŋ ehã;+ 30 fioo pɛ oyɔɔ dani miba, shi okooloi lɛ efa ni amɛshwere babaoo, ni Yehowa ejɔɔ bo kɛjɛ be ni miba nɛɛ.
Kɛ ookane Biblia lɛ, ŋɔɔ be ni okɛsusu nɔ ni okaneɔ lɛ shishinumɔ he—nɔ ni ekɛɔ bo yɛ Yehowa he, bɔ ni ehe baanyɛ aba sɛɛnamɔ yɛ oshihilɛ mli, kɛ bɔ ni obaanyɛ okɛtsu nii ni okɛye obua mɛi krokomɛi.
(1 Tesalonikabii 2:7) Yɛ bei komɛi amli lɛ, ekolɛ obaleŋ nɔ ni otaoɔ, aloo po ni ooonu bɔ ni onuɔ he ohaa lɛ he, ni kɛlɛ, kwɛ bɔ ni ehe hiaa akɛ ooole akɛ otsɛ kɛ onyɛ sumɔɔ bo!
Kɛ́ wɔna nɔ ko loo wɔkane nɔ ko lɛ, esa akɛ wɔbi wɔhe akɛ: ‘Mɛni enɛ tsɔɔ mi yɛ Yehowa kɛ Yesu he?,’ ni wɔkwɛ bɔ ni wɔbaafee wɔkase amɛ ni wɔkɛ nɔ ni wɔkase lɛ aye abua mɛi krokomɛi.
Obaanyɛ okadi bɔ ni jamɔ fɛɛ jamɔ boteɔ adesa yinɔsane be kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ jamɔ yinɔsane be ko mli pɛpɛɛpɛ lɛ, kɛ bɔ ni ewoji loo niŋmaai krɔŋkrɔŋi lɛ kɔɔ ekrokomɛi ahe ehaa, bɔ ni jamɔ mli susumɔi krokomɛi na eshishitolɔ loo ehiɛnyiɛlɔ lɛ nɔ hewalɛ eha, kɛ bɔ ni ena hewalɛ yɛ adesai ajeŋba kɛ yinɔsane nɔ eha lɛ.
Oniiashikpamɔ yɛ gbɛgbamɔ sɔɔmɔ lɛ mli lɛ baaha ole nikasemɔi ni sɛɛnamɔ yɔɔ he, tamɔ bɔ ni ooohi shi yɛ gbɛjianɔtoo naa, bɔ ni oooha bo diɛŋtsɛ ogbɛjianɔtoo aya hiɛ, gbɛ nɔ ni oootsɔ okɛ mɛi krokomɛi ahi shi, kɛ bɔ ni ooona nyɛmɔ kɛha gbɛnaanii ahe nitsumɔ.
Susumɔ amɛteŋ mɛi akpei ohai abɔ ni amrɔ nɛɛ amɛsɔmɔɔ akɛ nyɛmɛi, tsɛmɛi, nyɛmimɛi yei, nyɛmimɛi hii, kɛ bii kɛha mɛi ni amɛbɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛwekui lɛ ahe okwɛ; susumɔ mɛi abɔ ni tamɔ nanemɛi ni “kpɛtɛɔ mɔ gbagbalii fe nyɛmi” kɛhaa mɛi ni ebote haomɔ mli lɛ ahe okwɛ. —Abɛi 18:24: Marko 10:30,
(Mateo 6:33) Thomas kula shi ni ebi ni Nyɔŋmɔ atsɔɔ lɛ bɔ ni eeefee enɛ, ni ewo shi akɛ: “Kɛ otsɔɔ mi gbɛ ni matsɔ nɔ matao o-Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ, matuu miwala be mli nyɔji ekpaa ni mikɛkase bɔ ni mafee masɔmɔ bo.”
Bo diɛŋtsɛ halamɔ baafai loo yitsei abɔ ni obaakane daa gbi, aloo halamɔ be falɛ ni okɛbaakane kɛ be mli ni obaakane.
Kɛ́ ohe be kɛsusu gbɛi ni Yehowa tsɔɔ nɔ ejɔɔ bo amrɔ nɛɛ, kɛ bɔ ni ebaajuro bo wɔsɛɛ lɛ he lɛ, obaaná he sɛɛ waa.
10 Kristo hewɔ lɛ, kwashiai ji wɔ,+ shi nyɛ lɛ hiɛshikalɔi ji nyɛ yɛ Kristo hewɔ; wɔhe waaa, shi nyɛ lɛ, nyɛhe wa; awoɔ nyɛhiɛ nyam, shi wɔ lɛ, wɔhiɛ bɛ nyam.
Bɔ ni wɔɔfee wɔkɛha Buddhanyo ko ni hiɛ efã: “Ekolɛ bɔ ni susumɔi fɔji ehe shi waa ŋmɛnɛ kɛ bɔ ni enɛɛmɛi náa wɔbii anɔ hewalɛ lɛ miihao bo tamɔ bɔ ni ehaoɔ mi lɛ.
27 Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, etsɛŋ ni wɔbaana Satan jeŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ naagbee.
No sɛɛ etsɛɛɛ nɔŋŋ lɛ Gestapobii, loo polisifoi ni tsuɔ nii yɛ teemɔŋ lɛ ba wɔshĩa trukaa be ni wɔmiihala Biblia kasemɔ he woji ni akɛmaje wɔ lɛ amli.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, wɔshihilɛ baanyɛ aya nɔ afite kwraa.
Be mli ni wɔfeɔ enɛ lɛ, wɔtaooo hiɛnyam wɔhaaa wɔhe, shi moŋ wɔsumɔɔ akɛ “atsɔ Yesu Kristo nɔ awo Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛ nyam yɛ nii fɛɛ mli.”
+ 6 Ni enɛ ji suɔmɔ lɛ, akɛ wɔya nɔ wɔnyiɛ yɛ ekitãi lɛ anaa.
Eŋma kɛyaha asafo ni yɔɔ Tesalonika lɛ akɛ: “Akɛni wɔsumɔɔ nyɛ jogbaŋŋ nɛkɛ hewɔ lɛ, wɔyɛ he tsui akɛ jeee Nyɔŋmɔ sanekpakpa lɛ kɛkɛ wɔkɛaaha nyɛ, shi moŋ wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔwala tete, ejaakɛ wɔmiisumɔ nyɛ naakpa.”
(1 Timoteo 6: 9, 10) Shi kɛji akɛ wɔkɛ hela, shika, loo naagbai krokomɛi ni naa wa waa kpe hu?
13 Akɛni ‘wɔmiina akɛ gbi lɛ miibɛŋkɛ’ hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ ‘wɔwowoo wɔhe hewalɛ.’
+ 7 Kɛjɛ wɔtsɛmɛi lɛ agbii lɛ amli aahu kɛbashi ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, wɔtɔmɔi lɛ efa babaoo;+ ni wɔtɔmɔi lɛ ahewɔ lɛ, akɛ wɔ, kɛ wɔmaŋtsɛmɛi lɛ, kɛ wɔsɔfoi lɛ ewo shikpɔji lɛ anɔ maŋtsɛmɛi lɛ adɛŋ, ni akɛ klante ekpãtã wɔhiɛ,+ ni aŋɔ wɔ nom,+ ni aloo wɔnibii yɛ ta mli,+ ni wɔhiɛ eshwie shi tamɔ bɔ ni eji ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ.
Yehowa le wɔnifeemɔi, wɔsusumɔi, kɛ wiemɔi ni yɔɔ wɔlilɛi anɔ lɛ fɛɛ po dani wɔwieɔ.
Kɛ́ wɔkpɛ yiŋ ni ja lɛ, Yehowa baabu wɔ akɛ mɛi ni “jara wa.” —Hagai 2:7.
Beni wɔyi enyɔ lɛ wɔshiɔ shwapo lɛ mli lɛ, wɔkɛ oblanyo ko ni he yɔɔ miishɛɛ waa ni eta baisikel ni ejɛ nitsumɔ eeya shia lɛ kpe.
Wɔkai Yesu kɔkɔbɔɔ ni ekɛha ekaselɔi lɛ akɛ ‘amɛya nɔ amɛwo yibii pii’ lɛ.
3:3, 4) Fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, wɔyɛ yiŋtoo ní wɔɔdamɔ nɔ wɔhé wɔye akɛ mɛi babaoo yɛ wɔshikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli ni baakpɛlɛ sanekpakpa lɛ nɔ kɛ́ amɛná amɛnu he.
Ehe miihia ni wɔsusu “Nyɔŋmɔ he nilee” lɛ he akɛ etamɔ “jwiɛtɛi” kɛ “jwetrii ni aŋɔtee.”
Shi amrɔ nɛɛ miyɛ ŋa ni misumɔɔ lɛ waa kɛ bihii enyɔ, ni wɔfeɔ ekome akɛ weku kɛyeɔ wɔbuaa mɛi krokomɛi ni amɛkaseɔ anɔkwalei ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he, ni enɛ haa wɔnáa miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
Kɛ́ eji anɔkwale akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsɔɔ hiɛ ehalaa kai ni ebaaŋmɛ gbɛ ni wɔkɛkpe lɛ, belɛ no tsɔɔ akɛ, ele nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baaba wɔnɔ.
Wɔheɔ wɔyeɔ akɛ, hewalɛwoo wiemɔi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ baanyɛ aye abua bo koni otsu shihilɛ lɛ he nii.
(2 Korintobii 1:8-10) Ani wɔ hu wɔhaa amanehului ahe baa sɛɛnamɔ kɛhaa wɔ?
Bɔni afee ni oha nakai sanebimɔ lɛ hetoo koni aye abua bo ni ona shishinumɔ ni Nuŋtsɔ lɛ Gbɛkɛnaashi Niyenii lɛ yɔɔ kɛha bo lɛ, wɔmiifɔ̃ bo nine ni okane sane ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ.
Yehowa etsĩii wɔnaa koni wɔkaná miishɛɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ, shi wɔle jogbaŋŋ akɛ jeee nifeemɔi nɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ ji nibii ni yeɔ ebuaa wɔ ni wɔto mumɔŋ jwetrii yɛ ŋwɛi.
18 Nyɔŋmɔ kojomɔ gbi lɛ miibɛŋkɛ oyayaayai.
(1 Mose 45:4-8) Akɛ Kristofoi lɛ, esa akɛ wɔkase nɔ ko kɛjɛ enɛ mli.
Kɛha nɔkwɛmɔnɔ ni tsɔɔ bɔ ni ewa akɛ wɔbaayoo kɛji wɔhiɛ mɔ ko he jwɛŋmɔ ni ejaaa yɛ wɔtsuiŋ lɛ, feemɔ shihilɛ nɛɛ he mfoniri okwɛ: Okome too onyiɛ gbɛjegbɛ ko nɔ gbɛkɛ ni duŋ ewo.
(1 Yohane 4:20) Yɛ yitsei ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ amli lɛ, wɔbaapɛi bɔ ni Yesu jie suɔmɔ kpo etsɔɔ mɛi lɛ mli.
Kɛ́ wɔɔwie he yɛ mfonirifeemɔ naa lɛ, enɛ haa tsutsu nanemɛi enyɔ kɛ amɛhe wuɔ ta.
16 Kɛ́ wɔkɛ mɛi ni halaa akɛ amɛkɛ je lɛ aaabɔ lɛ fee wɔnanemɛi lɛ, no lɛ Nyɔŋmɔ nyɛŋ aya nɔ ekɛ wɔ afee eshieŋtsɛmɛi.
(Abɛi 11:13) Ekolɛ onaanyo ko ni bɛŋkɛ bo kpaakpa lɛ wiemɔi ni esusuuu he lɛ ‘dumɔ bo tamɔ klante.’
Gilead ha miná hegbɛi ni mikɛaaná nanemɛi heei.
Eji naanyo anɔkwafo.
Ekɛ fɛɛ dro wɔ; nomɛi fɛɛ hãa wɔnaa
Taakɛ tsɔɔmɔ nɛɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, gbohii lɛ amumɔi lɛ baanyɛ amɛbatsɔmɔ nanemɛi ni he wawai loo henyɛlɔi ni yitseiaŋ wa.
Taakɛ mfoniri ni yɔɔ baafa 63 lɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, mɛni Ebed-Melek fee kɛtsɔɔ akɛ eji naanyo kpakpa kɛha Yeremia?
No hewɔ lɛ mikɛɛ lɛ akɛ mikɛ minaanyo ko ni le Biblia lɛ mli fe mi baaba, ni mifee nakai enɔ otsi lɛ.
14 Bhagavad Gita (Ŋwɛi Lala), ni mɛi komɛi kɛɔ akɛ eji “India mumɔŋ nilee mli agugu” lɛ ji sanegbaa ni tee nɔ yɛ tawuu hé “yɛ Nuŋtsɔ Śrī Kṛṣṇa [Krishna], Ofe Nyɔŋmɔ ni ji Yitso ni Ejie Ehe Kpo yɛ Gbɔmɔtso Mli lɛ, kɛ Arjuna, E-shieŋtsɛ ni bɛŋkɛ lɛ kpaakpa kɛ mɔ ni etuu ehe eha lɛ, ni etsɔseɔ lɛ yɛ heyɔsemɔ he nilee mli lɛ teŋ.”
Mɛni mɛi komɛi efee koni amɛtsɔmɔ nyɛmimɛi Kristofoi ananemɛi ni bɛŋkɛ kpaakpa?
(2 Korintobii 4:16) Mi, kɛ miweku kɛ minanemɛi lɛ miikwɛ gbɛ kɛmiiha wɔsɛɛ be ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ beni abaaha maná gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ ekoŋŋ ni hi kwraa fe bɔ ni miji beni miye afii 17 lɛ.
Nakai nɔŋŋ hu ja wɔyeɔ anɔkwa dani wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛ wɔnaanyo loo wɔwekunyo ko ni ashwie lɛ lɛ afɔ̃ɔ bɔɔ.—1 Kor.
Ekolɛ, ebaawa kɛha nanemɛi kɛ wekumɛi akɛ amɛbaatsake amɛhe amɛwo mɛi hee ni ebadɔmɔ weku lɛ ashihilɛ mli.
(Efesobii 3:7, 8) Nyɛminuu Liverance wo mɛi ni gbeɔ naa lɛ hewalɛ koni amɛkɛ amɛnikeenii, loo sɔɔmɔ hegbɛ lɛ atsu nii koni amɛkɛye amɛbua mɛi krokomɛi ní amɛbatsɔmɔ Nyɔŋmɔ nanemɛi ni amɛnine ashɛ ‘Nyɔŋmɔ duromɔ nɔkeenɔ lɛ naanɔ wala yɛ Kristo Yesu, wɔ-Nuntsɔ lɛ, mli’ lɛ nɔ.—Romabii 6:23.
No hewɔ lɛ, kaaha mɔ ko miitsĩ bo gbɛ yɛ bɔ ni ooofee okase Nyɔŋmɔ naanyo ni oootsɔ lɛ he. —Yohane 17:3.
Hitoshi weku lɛ kɛ enanemɛi wo lɛ hewalɛ ni ehiɛ shidaamɔ ni ekɔ akɛ ebaaye anɔkwa lɛ mli, shi eshɛ he ko ni eyiŋ bɔi lɛ kɔshikɔshifeemɔ.
Minaanyo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Isabel lɛ kɛɛ mi akɛ mikwɛ kɛji manyɛ mikɛfee oti akɛ mafata ehe kɛya shiɛmɔ ni wɔkɛ ŋmɛlɛtswai 60 atsu nii yɛ nyɔɔŋ kome ko mli lo.
(1 Korintobii 15:33) Ni wɔbɛ yiŋsusumɔ ko kwraa akɛ wɔkɛ je lɛ baabɔ naanyo.
Esa akɛ sanesɛɛkɔmɔ abɛŋkɛ wɔ waa tamɔ naanyo ni bɛŋkɛɔ mɔ kpaakpa.
Mɛi ni kwa amɛfee amɛhe Hiob nanemɛi lɛ basara lɛ, ni amɛwo eshihilɛ lɛ mli wu kwraa moŋ kɛtsɔ kɛɛmɔ ni amɛkɛɛ akɛ, ekolɛ nibii fɔji ni efee lɛ hewɔ ni ekɛ haomɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ kpeɔ lɛ nɔ.
Sanegbaa kpakpa ni aaakã wɔkɛ wɔnanemɛi ateŋ lɛ ji nɔ ko ni he hiaa.
Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔhala Yehowa nanemɛi akɛ wɔnanemɛi lɛ?
“Amɛkɛ lɛ bɔ naanyo ni amɛgbaa saji ni kɔɔ bɔɔltswaa he, ni amɛhereɔ mɔ hiɛmɛɛ waa.
Kɛ́ wɔtee kpee lɛ, wɔnanemɛi lɛ woɔ wɔ hewalɛ, ni wɔnine shɛɔ gbɛtsɔɔmɔ nɔ kɛjɛɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli.
Mɛni hewɔ ehe hiaa waa akɛ wɔɔkwa kutumpɔo kɛ shishiumɔ nifeemɔi ni wɔkɛ wɔhe aaawo mli lɛ?
No hewɔ lɛ, gbi ko lɛ, Yesu gba amɛ sane ko, koni ekɛtsɔɔ amɛ bɔ ni ehiii kwraa akɛ amɛaapupuu amɛhe.

Lɛɛlɛŋ, miikɛɛ nyɛ akɛ: Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni heee Nyɔŋmɔ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ tamɔ gbekɛ bibioo lɛ, eboteŋ mli kwraa.”
Mibolɔɔ ní aye abua mi, shi ayeee jalɛ sane.
10 Yiwalaheremɔ ko bɛ kɛha mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni ekpɛlɛɛɛ “hemɔkɛyeli wiemɔ” nɛɛ nɔ kɛ ekɛ nitsumɔ nɔ, taakɛ bɔfo lɛ tee nɔ ejaje lɛ: “Ejaakɛ tsui akɛheɔ ayeɔ kɛshɛɔ jalɛ he, ni naabu akɛjajeɔ kɛshɛɔ yiwalaheremɔ he.
Ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ no hewɔ ni Yohane jaje kɛ nɔmimaa akɛ anunyam lɛ kɛ hewalɛ lɛ ji Yesu nɔ lɛ!
Lɛɛlɛŋ, Yehowa baajɔɔ Kristofoi fɛɛ ni sumɔɔ akɛ amɛhiɛ amɛ emuuyeli mli daa ni amɛkpooɔ efɔŋfeemɔ lɛ, ni ebaawaje amɛ. —Lala 1: 1-3.
+ 26 Kɛ́ ashwie amɛhiɛ shi yɛ misɛɛ ni amɛje lɛ hewɔ lɛ agbe naa lɛ,+ amɛbaaba amɛbahi shi yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ ni sane fɔŋ ko ninaŋ amɛ, ni mɔ ko mɔ ko woŋ amɛhe gbeyei.
Ekolɛ bei krokomɛi baaba ni anaŋ nuu ko nuu ko ni abaptisi lɛ yɛ asafoŋ kpee ko shishi.
Ehi jogbaŋŋ akɛ wɔɔtsu naagbai bibii ahe nii yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ, ni enɛ haa ekomefeemɔ hiɔ wɔkɛ wɔnyɛmimɛi lɛ ateŋ, ni ehaa wɔnáa miishɛɛ.
Obaanyɛ okɛ mɛi krokomɛi hu abɔ yɛ kpeei ashishi, mɛi ni sumɔɔ Yehowa ni jieɔ mumɔ lɛ yibii lɛ—suɔmɔ, miishɛɛ, hejɔlɛ, tsuishitoo, mlihilɛ, ejurɔfeemɔ, hemɔkɛyeli, mlijɔlɛ, kɛ henɔyeli—lɛ kpo yɛ amɛshihilɛ mli lɛ.
Nyɛ je lɛŋ mumɔŋ kɛ jamɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi fɛɛ ni nyɛnaa ebakpe shi yɛ biɛ lɛ tsɔɔ mi akɛ, [enɛ] ji toiŋjɔlɛ lumɔ lɛ ni miishi Jeŋmaji Ekomefeemɔ agbo lɛ.”
Ehaa wɔnáa henilee kpakpa, ni no haa wɔtoiŋ jɔɔ wɔ ni wɔtsui nyɔɔ wɔmli.
Ebaafee nakai kɛtsɔ Mesia Maŋtsɛyeli ní toiŋjɔlɛ baahi mli lɛ ni eeeye adesai anɔ lɛ nɔ.—Daniel 2:44.
Kwɛ toiŋjɔlɛ kɛ shweshweeshwe shihilɛ ni wɔná yɛ Yehowa mumɔŋ sɔlemɔtsu lɛ kpoi ni yɔɔ fɛo lɛ anɔ!
Kɛ́ wɔfee nii yɛ gbɛ ni eŋmɛɛɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ nɔ yɛ jalɛ sane ni etamɔ nɔ ni ayeee hewɔ lɛ, no lɛ ebaanyɛ eye toiŋjɔlɛ ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ awui babaoo fe jalɛ sane ni ayeee lɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
Nyɛkɛ nɔ ni nyɛkaseɔ lɛ atsua nii, nyɛyaa nɔ nyɛkɛtsua nii, ni “hejɔlɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ nyɛ ahi shi.”—Filipibii 4:9.
(Romabii 12:18) ‘Nyɛhaa wɔtiua hejɔlɛ nibii asɛɛ.’—Romabii 14:19.
Ekɔɔɔ he eko bɔ ni mɛi kɛwɔ baaye aha lɛ, esa akɛ wɔkɛ miishɛɛ ashi shinaa lɛ naa.
Emaŋkwramɔŋ kɛ osɔfoi anitsumɔi amli nifeemɔ lɛ baanyɛ adamɔ bɔ ni eshweɔ ni eha toiŋjɔlɛ ahi shi, eha maji ni teɔ shi woɔ amɛhe lɛ ateŋ ajɔ, ewaje naanyobɔɔ tsakpaai ni kã ehefatalɔi ni baafã paapa lɛ he, ni eha Kristendom maŋtsɛmɛi lɛ afee ekome ni amɛkɛdamɔ Turkeybii ahegbeyeiwoo lɛ naa lɛ nɔ.
Yoo ko wie saramɔ ni Odasefonyo ko basara lɛ lɛ he akɛ: “Nɔ ni mikaiɔ yɛ ehiɛ ŋmɔlɔŋmɔlɔ su lɛ he ji toiŋjɔlɛ ni eyɔɔ.
Kɛ́ yɛ Boka Teŋgbɛ, Latin Amerika, Europa Bokagbɛ, loo he kroko hu lɛ—mɔdɛŋ ni adesa bɔɔ yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ he lɛ lakaa mɔ waa.
Yehowa, mɔ ni fee la ní ebɔ duŋ lɛ, baanyɛ eha toiŋjɔlɛ aba ni ebaanyɛ ekɛ amanehulu hu aba
(Yohane 3:36) Shi Kristofoi ni sumɔɔ toiŋjɔlɛ, ni amɛná Nyɔŋmɔ mli hemɔkɛyeli lɛ hu?
Ani Mɔ ni Biblia lɛ tsɛɔ lɛ akɛ “suɔmɔ kɛ hejɔlɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ” kɛ asraafoi ahewalɛ baaha atsu jalɛsaneyeli he nii?
Enɛ baaye ebua amɛ ni amɛhi shi yɛ heshibaa mli, ni weku shihilɛ lɛ baafee nɔ ni toiŋjɔlɛ babaoo yɔɔ mli.
Bei pii lɛ faikpamɔ haa anáa naanyobɔɔ ni toiŋjɔlɛ yɔɔ mli ekoŋŋ
Shi yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, enɛ ha mitoiŋ jɔ mi babaoo.
Ani Europa baanyɛ akpa naanɔ toiŋjɔlɛ gbɛ agbɛnɛ?
Migbekɛbiiashi afii lɛ amli lɛ, no mli lɛ toiŋjɔlɛ yɛ maŋ lɛ mli.
Taomɔ toiŋjɔlɛ ni obaayi
12:14) Hɛɛ, abaanyɛ afee nibii ni kɛ toiŋjɔlɛ baa shĩa, ni sɛɛ mli lɛ enɛ baanyɛ aná weku mli bii ni heee yeee lɛ anɔ hewalɛ.
“‘Ni mahã toiŋjɔlɛ ahi biɛ nɛɛ,’+ Yehowa, taiatsɛ lɛ kɛɛ.”
Ni toiŋjɔlɛ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ mli baakpã kɛyabote Paradeiso diɛŋtsɛ lɛ mli, beni ‘Nyɔŋmɔ suɔmɔnaa nii yaa nɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ fɛɛ nɔ taakɛ eyaa nɔ yɛ ŋwɛi lɛ.’
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔ nɔ lɛ, gbekɛ nuu fioo ko ŋma wolo gbonyo nɛɛ eyaha etsɛ: “Kɛ okɛ mi eyaaa Alexandria lɛ, miŋmaŋ bo wolo, ni mikɛ bo ewieŋ, loo ni makɛɛ bo akɛ yaaba, ni kɛji akɛ oshi mi otee Alexandria lɛ, mimɔŋ onine mli ni miŋaŋ bo kwraa dɔŋŋ.
19 Ŋmɛnɛ gbi nɛɛ, miitsɛ ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ akɛ odasefoi miiwo nyɛ akɛ, mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ, eshwie ohiɛ;+ no hewɔ lɛ, kɔ wala koni ohi wala mli,+ bo kɛ oseshibii,+ 20 ní osumɔ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ,+ ní obo egbee toi, ní okpɛtɛ ehe,+ ejaakɛ lɛ ji owala, ni lɛ ebaahã owala sɛɛ atsɛ waa yɛ shikpɔŋ ni Yehowa kã kitã akɛ ekɛbaahã otsɛmɛi Abraham kɛ Isak kɛ Yakob lɛ nɔ.”
7 “No hewɔ lɛ, nɔ ni Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: ‘Akɛni nyɛhe yɛ ahuntoo fe jeŋmaji ni ebɔle nyɛhe lɛ, ni nyɛnyiɛɛɛ yɛ mimlai lɛ amli, ni nyɛyeee miyiŋkpɛi* lɛ anɔ, shi moŋ nyɛye jeŋmaji ni bɔle nyɛhe lɛ ayiŋkpɛi* lɛ anɔ hewɔ lɛ,+ 8 nɔ ni Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa kɛɛ nɛ: “Bo maŋ, naa, mikɛ bo ená,+ ni mi diɛŋtsɛ magbala otoi yɛ jeŋmaji lɛ ahiɛ.
6 “Agbɛnɛ, kitãi kɛ taomɔ nii kɛ yiŋkpɛi* ni Yehowa, nyɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛhã akɛ atsɔɔ nyɛ lɛ nɛ, koni nyɛye nɔ kɛ́ nyɛfo mli kɛtee shikpɔŋ ni nyɛyaaŋɔ lɛ nɔ, 2 bɔ ni afee ni oshe Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbeyei, ní oye emlai kɛ ekitãi ni miwoɔ bo lɛ fɛɛ nɔ—bo kɛ obi kɛ onabi+—owala gbii abɔ fɛɛ, koni owala sɛɛ atsɛ.
YEHOWA kɛɛ Abram akɛ: “Jee oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ . . . kɛya shikpɔŋ ni matsɔɔo lɛ nɔ. Ni maha otsɔ jeŋmaŋ kpeteŋkpele, ni majɔɔo, ni maha ogbɛi ada.”
13 Shi nyɛmimɛi, miisumɔ akɛ nyɛle akɛ, mito miyiŋ shii abɔ akɛ maba nyɛŋɔɔ, bɔ ni afee ni maná yibii komɛi yɛ nyɛ hu nyɛteŋ tamɔ bɔ ni miná yɛ jeŋmaji krokomɛi lɛ ateŋ lɛ—shi atsĩ minaa kɛbashi amrɔ nɛɛ.
Yehowa ekɛɛ Abraham akɛ: “Jee oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ ojaku lɛ kɛ otsɛ we lɛ kɛya shikpɔŋ ni matsɔɔo lɛ nɔ. Ni maha otsɔ jeŋmaŋ kpeteŋkpele, ni majɔɔo, ni maha ogbɛi ada, ni oootsɔ jɔɔmɔ!
Miikpa nyɛ fai ni nyɛkɛ nyɛnɔ ni mitɔ̃ lɛ kɛ nyɛ shishi ni miyanuuu lɛ loo bɔ ni misumɔɔ nyɛ mihaa lɛ ni mihaaa nyɛle lɛ afa mi. . . .
9 No sɛɛ lɛ, Yakob sɔle ekɛɛ: “Ao, mitsɛ Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mitsɛ Isak Nyɔŋmɔ, Yehowa, bo mɔ ni okɛɛ mi akɛ, ‘Kuu osɛɛ kɛya oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ owekumɛi lɛ aŋɔɔ, ni mikɛ bo baaye jogbaŋŋ lɛ,’+ 10 suɔmɔ ni tsakeee kɛ anɔkwayeli fɛɛ ni ojie kpo otsɔɔ otsulɔ lɛ,+ emli ekome folo nɛkɛ esaaa mi, ejaakɛ midɛhiɛmɔtso lɛ pɛ mikɛfo Yordan nɛɛ, ni amrɔ nɛɛ mitsɔ kui enyɔ.
Nyɔŋmɔ jie ehe kpo etsɔɔ lɛ ni ekɛ famɔ ha lɛ akɛ: “Jee oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ ojaku lɛ kɛ otsɛ we lɛ kɛya shikpɔŋ ni matsɔɔo lɛ nɔ. Ni maha otsɔ jeŋmaŋ kpeteŋkpele, ni majɔɔo, ni maha ogbɛi ada, ni oootsɔ̃ jɔɔmɔ!
Kɛlɛ, Yakob sɔle akɛ: “Mitsɛ Abraham Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ mitsɛ Isak Nyɔŋmɔ, Yehowa, mɔ ni kɛɛ mi akɛ: Kuu osɛɛ oya oshikpɔŋ nɔ kɛ owekumɛi aŋɔɔ, ni mafeeo jogbaŋŋ lɛ; omɔbɔnalɛi kɛ onɔkwayeli fɛɛ ni ojie otsɔɔ otsulɔ lɛ, ekome folo nɛkɛ esaaa mi; shi tso mihiɛ kɛfo Yordan nɛɛ, ni agbɛnɛ mitsɔ asafokui enyɔ.
11 Ni Yehowa kɛɛ Solomon akɛ: 12 “Shĩa ni omaa nɛɛ, kɛ́ onyiɛ yɛ mimlai lɛ anaa ni oye miyiŋkpɛi* lɛ kɛ mikitãi lɛ anɔ, ni onyiɛ yɛ amɛnaa lɛ,+ mi hu maye shi ni miwo otsɛ David yɛ ohe lɛ nɔ,+ 13 ni mahi Israelbii lɛ ateŋ,+ ni mikwaŋ mimaŋ Israel.”
+ 4 Ni bo lɛ, kɛ́ okɛ tsui krɔŋŋ+ kɛ jalɛ+ nyiɛ yɛ mihiɛ tamɔ otsɛ David nyiɛ yɛ mihiɛ lɛ,+ kɛtsɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni miwoɔ bo he kitã ni ooofee,+ kɛ mitaomɔ nii, kɛ miyiŋkpɛi* lɛ anɔ ni oooye lɛ nɔ lɛ,+ 5 no lɛ, mahã omaŋtsɛyeli sɛi lɛ ama shi shiŋŋ yɛ Israel nɔ kɛya naanɔ tamɔ bɔ ni miwo otsɛ David shi akɛ, ‘Ebaŋ kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ be ko baashɛ ni anáŋ oseshinyo ko ni baata Israel maŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ nɔ’ lɛ.
12 Bɔfo Paulo baanyɛ awie yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ yɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ esɔɔmɔ lɛ he akɛ: ‘Nyɛle bɔ ni mitsɔ mikɛ nyɛ hi shi be muu lɛ fɛɛ, kɛjɛ klɛŋklɛŋ gbi nɔ ni miba Asia nɛɛ misɔmɔ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ; bɔ ni mishiuuu nii ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ ha nyɛ lɛ eko nɔ, ni mijaje mitsɔɔ nyɛ yɛ faŋŋ kɛ shia-fɛɛ-shia hu.’—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:18-20.
14 Eyɛ mli akɛ mihiɛ kã nɔ akɛ etsɛŋ ni maba oŋɔɔ moŋ, shi miiŋma bo nibii nɛɛ, 15 koni kɛ́ mitsɛ lɛ, ole bɔ ni sa akɛ ofee onii ohã yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ shĩa,+ ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛkãalɔ lɛ asafo lɛ, anɔkwale lɛ akulashiŋ kɛ enɔdaamɔnɔ lɛ mli.
Ni mahã ahi onɔ tamɔ bɔ ni ahi onɔ yɛ blema lɛ,+ ni mahã oshwere fe be ni eho lɛ;+ ni obaaná ole akɛ miji Yehowa.
11 Ni Yehowa kɛɛ Solomon akɛ: “Akɛni ofee enɛ ni oyeee mikpaŋmɔ kɛ mimlai lɛ anɔ tamɔ bɔ ni miwo bo kitã lɛ hewɔ lɛ, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, mashɔ̃ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ yɛ odɛŋ ni mikɛbaahã otsuji lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome.
*+ 15 Mikɛ bo yɛ, ni mabu ohe yɛ he fɛɛ he ni obaaya, ni mikɛ bo baaku sɛɛ kɛba shikpɔŋ nɛɛ+ nɔ.
18 Be ni amɛba eŋɔɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Nyɛle bɔ ni mifee minii mihã yɛ nyɛteŋ kɛjɛ klɛŋklɛŋ gbi ni miba Asia kpokpaa lɛ nɔ lɛ nɔ,+ 19 akɛ mijɛ heshibaa fɛɛ* mli misɔmɔ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ akɛ nyɔŋ+ kɛ yaafonui, ni mina nɔ babaoo yɛ Yudafoi lɛ aŋaatsɔi lɛ hewɔ, 20 ni nakai be lɛ mli nɔŋŋ lɛ, mishashaooo shi akɛ makɛɛ nyɛ nibii ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ* lɛ ni agbɛnɛ hu matsɔɔ nyɛ nii yɛ maŋ+ kɛ shĩa fɛɛ shĩa.
Gbi ko lɛ oblayoo fioo ko ba miŋɔɔ yɛ nyanyɔŋ he datrɛfonyo lɛ nitsumɔhe lɛ ni ekɛɛ akɛ, “Oleee mi, shi mile bo, ni miisumɔ ni maha ole kɛkɛ akɛ misumɔɔ osane.”
(Tito 1:9) Hiɛnɔkamɔ yɛ akɛ efɔŋfeelɔ lɛ efeŋ tamɔ Israelbii lɛ ni Yehowa gbalɔ lɛ ŋma yɛ amɛhe akɛ: “Mitsɛ́ nyɛ ni nyɛhereee mi nɔ, miwie, ni nyɛbooo toi, shi moŋ nyɛfee nɔ ni ji efɔŋ yɛ mihiɛ, ni nyɛhala nii ni esaaa mihiɛ lɛ!” —Yesaia 65:12.
17 “Ni bo lɛ, kɛ́ onyiɛ yɛ mihiɛ tamɔ bɔ ni otsɛ David nyiɛ yɛ mihiɛ lɛ, kɛtsɔ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni miwoɔ bo he kitã ni ooofee, kɛ mitaomɔ nii, kɛ miyiŋkpɛi* lɛ anɔ ni oooye lɛ nɔ lɛ,+ 18 no lɛ, mahã omaŋtsɛyeli maŋtsɛ sɛi lɛ ama shi shiŋŋ+ tamɔ bɔ ni mikɛ otsɛ David kpaŋ+ akɛ, ‘Ebaŋ kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ be ko baashɛ ni anáŋ oseshinyo ko ni baaye Israel nɔ maŋtsɛ’ lɛ.
(Bɔf. 20:13-17) Beni amɛbashɛ shi lɛ, Paulo kɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Nyɛle bɔ ni mitsɔ mikɛnyɛ hi shi be muu lɛ fɛɛ, kɛjɛ klɛŋklɛŋ gbi nɔ ni miba Asia nɛɛ, ni mikɛ heshibaa jwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ kɛ yaafonui pii kɛ kai ni ba minɔ yɛ Yudafoi akáwoi lɛ amli lɛ sɔmɔ Nuŋtsɔ lɛ; bɔ ni mishiuuu nii ni he yɔɔ sɛɛnamɔ ha nyɛ lɛ eko nɔ, ni mijaje mitsɔɔ nyɛ yɛ faŋŋ kɛ shĩa fɛɛ shĩa hu; ní miye tsuitsakemɔ kɛ Nyɔŋmɔ hamɔ kɛ wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ Yesu Kristo nɔ hemɔkɛyeli lɛ he odase mitsɔɔ Yudafoi kɛ Helabii fɛɛ lɛ.”—Bɔf.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ́ obi lɛ kɛɛ akɛ “Be fɛɛ be lɛ, okɛ mi yeɔ tamɔ gbekɛ” lɛ, ekolɛ nɔ ni etaoɔ etsɔɔ ji akɛ “Minuɔ he akɛ obɛ hekɛnɔfɔɔ yɛ mimli,” ni kɛ́ ekɛɛ akɛ “Kɛ́ miiwie lɛ obooo mi toi” lɛ, ekolɛ nɔ ni etaoɔ etsɔɔ ji akɛ “Miisumɔ ni makɛɛ bo bɔ ni minuɔ he mihaa diɛŋtsɛ.”
20 Ejaakɛ miishe gbeyei akɛ yɛ gbɛ ko nɔ lɛ kɛ́ miba lɛ, ekolɛ mibanaŋ nyɛ bɔ ni mitaoɔ, ni mibafeŋ bɔ ni nyɛ hu nyɛtaoɔ, moŋ lɛ ekolɛ mabana béi, kɛ awuŋayeli, kɛ mlifu, kɛ naataamɔ, kɛ mɔfitemɔ, kɛ ablɛbiwiemɔ,* kɛ henɔwomɔ, kɛ basabasafeemɔ.
Mɛi babaoo baanyɛ akpɛlɛ nɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ akɛ miishɛɛnamɔ damɔ nibii tamɔ gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛnamɔ kpakpa, yiŋtoo ni yɔɔ shihilɛ mli, kɛ naanyobɔɔ kpakpa ni yaa nɔ yɛ mɔ kɛ mɛi krokomɛi ateŋ lɛ nɔ.
41 Gbekɛbii Ni Haa Nyɔŋmɔ Náa Miishɛɛ
Agbɛnɛ hu, Biblia mli nɔkwɛmɔnii babaoo ha mile anɔkwale nɛɛ: Kɛ́ misɔmɔ nyɛmimɛi lɛ kɛ Yehowa lɛ, maná anɔkwa miishɛɛ.”
Ŋmalɛ nɛɛ shɛje emii waa, ejaakɛ ekai lɛ akɛ, nɔ ni he hiaa fe fɛɛ ji, ni ebaahã Yehowa tsui anyɔ emli.
Mináa miishɛɛ waa yɛ nakai beiaŋ.
(Yeremia 10:23) Eji anɔkwale akɛ, tsɔɔlɔ, mɔ ni he esa, loo ŋaawolɔ ko bɛ ni esaa ehe jogbaŋŋ ni ekɛaatsɔɔ wɔ anɔkwale lɛ, ni eha wɔle nii ni wɔná miishɛɛ.
Beni mina bɔ ni amɛyɔɔ miishɛɛ lɛ, miná ni kulɛ mi hu miyɛ miishɛɛ nakai nɔŋŋ.”
Mesia lɛ he gbalɛi krokomɛi hu tsɔɔ miishɛɛ be ni baaba aha adesa weku lɛ.
Ni wɔ gbɛkpamɔ ni yɔɔ miishɛɛ akɛ wɔɔhi shi kɛya naanɔ yɛ emuuyeli mli, ni enɔyeli lɛ baahã wɔná lɛ haa wɔ yiŋtoo babaoo ni wɔɔdamɔ nɔ wɔya nɔ wɔna miishɛɛ.
Ewieɔ kɛfãa ehe kɛtsɔɔ jarayeli mli adafitswaa gbɛ nɔ, yɛ wiemɔ ni mli ka shi faŋŋ mli akɛ: Miishɛɛ jɛɔ heloonaa nibii ni shika nyɛɔ eheɔ kɛ sɔɔmɔ ni ehaa mɔ naa lɛ mli baa.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, mɛi ni kɛ amɛhe haa nɔ ko tsumɔ lɛ naa miishɛɛ babaoo mli ŋɔɔmɔ.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:35.
Sɔlemɔtsui ni kamɔ efoji kɛ sɔlemɔyalɔi ni amɛnɔ miigbɔ lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ gbɔmɛi akpekpei abɔ ebuuu jamɔ dɔŋŋ akɛ ehe miihia kɛha miishɛɛ namɔ. —Okɛto 1 Mose 2: 7, 17; Ezekiel 18: 4, 20 he.
‘Miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ’ lɛ le nibii ni he hiaa wɔ ni baaha wɔ fɛɛ wɔná miishɛɛ.
Taakɛ lalatsɛ David tsɔɔ mli lɛ, “nyɛsaa nyɛnaa nyɛkwɛa, ni nyɛaana akɛ Yehowa hi; ajɔɔ gbɔmɔ ni baa lɛ abo lɛ.”—Lala 34:9.
Yiŋtoo kroko hewɔ ni Yehowa kɛ e-Wiemɔ, ni ji Biblia lɛ hã wɔ lɛ ji, koni wɔle bɔ ni wɔbaafee wɔná miishɛɛ yɛ shihilɛ mli.
David kɛɛ: “Ajɔɔ mɔ ni aŋɔ enɔtɔmɔ afa lɛ, ni atsimɔ ehe esha nɔ lɛ!
Kwɛ miishɛɛ be diɛŋtsɛ ní amɛná mli ŋɔɔmɔ!
2 Rebeka Miisumɔ ni Eha Yehowa Aná Miishɛɛ
Yɛ nɔ ni miihe ashɛ afii 60 ni mikɛtsu nii yɛ be-fɛɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, eŋɔɔ minaa akɛ mináa miishɛɛ ni yɔɔ shiɛmɔ ni miyaa daa, ni mitsɔɔ nii yɛ mi maŋsɛɛ sanekpakpa jajemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ.
Shi Adam kɛ Hawa miishɛɛ lɛ sɛɛ etsɛɛɛ.
Miishɛɛ Ji Mɛi ni Naa Mɔbɔ Lɛ
Kɛfata he lɛ, kɛ́ wɔkase Yesu nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ni wɔye wɔbua mɛi krokomɛi ni amɛ hu amɛfee nakai lɛ, ehaa wɔkɛ miishɛɛ kɛ ekomefeemɔ jaa Nyɔŋmɔ, ni etsui nyɔɔ emli.
Ena miishɛɛ yɛ Biblia mli shishitoo mlai akasemɔ kɛ amɛkɛ nitsumɔ hewɔ.
16 Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ bɔ ni Yehowa ji lɛ mli akɛ “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ.”
Bɔfo Paulo tsɛɔ Yehowa akɛ “miishɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ.”
(2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 16:3) Yɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ gbonyo nɛɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, Hezekia tsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ kasemɔ nɔ ‘eha egbɛ lɛ he tse’ kɛjɛ wɔŋjalɔi ahewalɛi ahe. —2 Kronika 29:2.
+ Be ni abɔi shãa afɔle lɛ shãa lɛ, abɔi Yehowa lala lɛ lamɔ, ni abɔi tɛtɛrɛmantɛrɛi lɛ hu akpamɔ yɛ nibii ni akɛtswaa lala ni Israel maŋtsɛ David fee lɛ famɔ naa.
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, afii akpei enyɔ ni eho nɛ lɛ, gbɔmɛi tao ni amɛwó Yesu Kristo amɛnɔ maŋtsɛ ejaakɛ amɛna akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsu lɛ, ni ebaanyɛ efee nɔyelɔ ni nɔ bɛ kwraa.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, susumɔ Maŋtsɛ David he okwɛ.
MAŊTSƐ KUNIMYELƆ LƐ MIIYE NƆ
Beni Cleopatra gbe ehe lɛ sɛɛ afi lɛ, Mizraim hu batsɔ Roma nɔyelihe ni etsuuu nii akɛ wuoyigbɛ maŋtsɛ dɔŋŋ.
Mɛni Yesu kɛɛ akɛ ebaakadi ba ni eba akɛ Maŋtsɛ ni anaaa lɛ lɛ?
(Abɛi 4:3) Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ, maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛ miishɛɛ kai bɔ ni atsɔse lɛ lɛ.
Antiochus IV bi ni aha lɛ be koni ekɛ eŋaawolɔi ayasusu sane lɛ he, shi Laenas fo liamɔ kutruku kɛbɔle maŋtsɛ lɛ he ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ eha lɛ hetoo dani eteke liamɔ ni efo lɛ.
(Lala 74:12) No mli lɛ, Yehowa maŋtsɛyeli lɛ yɛ kɛjɛ blema po ni fe nakai, no hewɔ lɛ te aaafee tɛŋŋ ni ŋwɛi lalatsɛmɛi lɛ aaala akɛ “Yehowa . . . eje shishi eeye maŋtsɛ” lɛ?
Mihala ebihii lɛ ekome koni ebaye maŋtsɛ.’
Mɛni hewɔ ni Yehowa kɛ Maŋtsɛ Manase yiwalɔ lɛ he ke lɛ lɛ?
Kanaanbii lɛ amaŋtsɛmɛi lɛ ekomɛi kɛ Maŋtsɛ Yabin, ni no mli lɛ etamɔ nɔ ni eyɛ hewalɛ fe amɛ fɛɛ lɛ yafee ekome.
Biblia he nilelɔ ko wie akɛ: “Maŋtsɛ-jamɔ biii nɔ ko srɔto kɛjɛɛɛ jeŋmaji ni jáa amagai lɛ adɛŋ; no hewɔ lɛ, Babilonianyo ni abiɔ ni ekɛ woo ni ekɛhaa nyɔŋmɔ ko lɛ ahã kunimyelɔ lɛ —Dario Medianyo lɛ —kpɛlɛɔ nibimɔ lɛ nɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ.
Kɛkɛ ni amɛfɔ David mu ni amɛwó lɛ Israel nɔ maŋtsɛ,+ tamɔ bɔ ni Yehowa etsɔ Samuel nɔ ewie lɛ.
Maŋtsɛmɛi a-Wolo ni Ji Enyɔ lɛ wieɔ saji ni tee nɔ yɛ afii 340 mli lɛ ahe—kɛjɛ afi 920 D.Ŋ.B. kɛyashi afi 580 D.Ŋ.B., ni ji be ni gbalɔ Yeremia gbe wolo nɛɛ ŋmaa naa lɛ.
‘Babilon maŋtsɛ lɛ klante lɛ baaba onɔ.
No mli lɛ, Ahab ni ji Israel maŋtsɛ lɛ jaaa Yehowa, anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ.
(2 Maŋtsɛmɛi 5:1-4) Obalanyo Daniel kɛ enanemɛi lɛ hiɛ amɛhemɔkɛyeli lɛ mli beni akaa amɛ yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ mlai ni kɔɔ niyenii ahe lɛ gbɛfaŋ lɛ.
Shi, etsɛŋ, nibii baafee srɔto yɛ be mli ni Yesu yeɔ nɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ nɔ Maŋtsɛ lɛ.
Etsuji lɛ ha hetoo akɛ: ‘Hɛɛ, Oo maŋtsɛ!’
(1 Mose 18:4, 5) Nakai “aboloo atroma kome” lɛ batsɔ̃ tsina bi ni ewo fɔ ni akɛŋmɛ okpɔlɔ, kɛ tatalei ni akɛ mã kpakpa eshĩ, kɛ butru, kɛ fufɔ—okpɔlɔŋmɛɛ ni sa maŋtsɛ.
2 Maŋtsɛ he yɛ gbeyei tamɔ jata* ni miihũu;+
Mɛni amɛkɛ Yesu baafee yɛ jɛmɛ?— Biblia lɛ kɛɔ akɛ, ekaselɔi lɛ ni ná “klɛŋklɛŋ shitee” lɛ baahi ŋwɛi ni amɛkɛ lɛ baaye shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ ‘akɛ maŋtsɛmɛi afii akpe.’—Kpojiemɔ 5:10; 20:6; 2 Timoteo 2:12.
3 Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni Yesu kɛ ehe aaawo maŋkwramɔŋ saji amli beni eyɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ ni ji ŋwɛi nɔyeli ni ebaaye nɔ Maŋtsɛ wɔsɛɛ lɛ shiɛmɔ fee enitsumɔ.
Tamɔ bɔ ni nu nyɛɔ etsuɔ heloonaa nibii ahe lɛ, Biblia mli anɔkwalei lɛ baanyɛ atsuu wɔhe ni wɔhe atse yɛ jeŋba kɛ Nyɔŋmɔjamɔ mli
Yɛ adebɔɔ nibii ahe nilee naa lɛ, nibii enyɔ pɛ ni futuɔ ni anáa nu.
Jeee akɛ amɛbaanyɛ amɛnu nakai nui ni shɛjeɔ mɔ mii lɛ kɛkɛ, shi moŋ amɛbaanyɛ amɛtserɛ yibii sɔrɔtoi ni wajeɔ mɔ kɛjɛ nakai tsei lɛ anɔ yɛ be fɛɛ mli.
19 Wɔkaneɔ akɛ: “Ebaba mli akɛ, beni Izebel kpãtãa Yehowa gbalɔi lɛ ahiɛ lɛ, Obadia ŋɔ gbalɔi oha, ni eŋɔ amɛ etee tɛkploi amli mɛi nyɔŋmai-enumɔ-enumɔ, ni ekɛ aboloo kɛ nu lɛ̀ amɛ.”
Ama nɔ mi aha mi akɛ okpɔŋɔ ni mita nɔ lɛ efeee basabasa, shi abɔ mi kɔkɔ hu akɛ kɛji nu lɛ naa wa waa tsɔ lɛ, bei pii lɛ okpɔŋɔi lɛ shɛrɛɔ amɛjatsui lɛ amɛshwieɔ.
Wɔdɛŋ ní wɔfɔɔ kɛ samala kɛ nu lɛ haaa hela amɔ wɔ, ni ebaa wala yi.
Bɔ ni elaaje nibii pii yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ sɔlemɔwe lɛ hewɔ lɛ, enu he tamɔ ofrote ni kumai miiye lɛ, ni miishwe nu yɛ shikpɔŋ gbiŋ nɔ.
Ŋwɛi bɔfo lɛ jaje akɛ: “Nyɛshea Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei ni nyɛkɛ anunyam ahaa lɛ, ejaakɛ ekojomɔ ŋmɛlɛtswaa lɛ eshɛ; ni nyɛjaa mɔ ni fee ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ kɛ ŋshɔ kɛ nubui ni baa lɛ.”
Kɛkɛ ni Yehowa kɛɛ Gideon akɛ: “Tse mɛi fɛɛ ni kɛ amɛnine tsɔɔ nu lɛ kɛtoɔ amɛnaa ni amɛshɔɔ tamɔ gbee lɛmɔɔ nu lɛ kɛje mɛi ni baakula shi yɛ amɛnakutsei anaa amɛnu nu lɛ ahe.”
Yehowa “gbalaa nu kulibii lɛ kɛjɛɔ ŋshɔŋ ni ehaa etsɛ̃rɛ̃ɔ kɛjɛɔ efua ni efee lɛ mli.”
Ŋshɔ lɛ mli nui lɛ amli gba enyɔ, ni nui lɛ wa edamɔ shi yɛ biɛ kɛ biɛ!
Nu ni yata Maŋtsɛyeli Asa ko nɔ lɛ mlikwɔlɛ shɛɔ mita kome.
Eba ni ebajie nu kɛje tɛ kroko nɛɛ hu mli ehã wɔ koni wɔna akɛ efee naakpɛɛ nii lɛɛlɛŋ.’”
Mɛni hewɔ David tsi nu ni ewebii lɛ ateŋ mɛi etɛ yayɛ kɛbaha lɛ lɛ eshwie lɛ?
Nɔ ni fata amɛjamɔ mli nibii lɛ ahe ji ŋkunyaayeli sɛbɛi ni akɛɛ ehaa mɔ feɔ mɔ ni anaaa lɛ ni tawuu nii nyɛɛɛ agbe lɛ aloo ehaa mɔ ko nyiɛɔ nu hiɛ loo efilikiɔ kɛtsɔɔ ŋwɛiniiaŋ.
Nu jɛ tɛsaai amli ni amɛkɛgbe amɛkumai.
Ni mɛni abaanyɛ akɛɛ yɛ kɔɔyɔɔŋ mujiwoo, ŋshɔ, faai, kpaakpoi kɛ ekrokomɛi ni fata he lɛ amli mujiwoo, kɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ muji ni awoɔ ní bei babaoo ejɛ mlatɔmɔ hewɔ lɛ ahe?
Ejaakɛ mahã nu aba ŋa lɛ nɔ,
No hewɔ lɛ akɛ hehiamɔ miikpa wɔ fai yɛ wɔgbii nɛɛ amli yɛ jeŋ fɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛshea Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyei ni nyɛkɛ anunyam ahaa lɛ, ejaakɛ ekojomɔ ŋmɛlɛtswaa lɛ eshɛ; ni nyɛjaa Mɔ ni fee ŋwɛi kɛ shikpɔŋ kɛ ŋshɔ kɛ nu bui ni baa lɛ.”
Ebi koni abaha lɛ nu, kɛkɛ ni efɔ edɛŋ ákɛ eyeee fɔ yɛ gbele fɔbuu ni ekpɛlɛ ni atsu he nii lɛ mli.
(Yohane 4:14) Wielɔ lɛ kɛfata he akɛ: “Nyɛhiɛ akakpaa nɔ kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ nyɛkɛ woo kɛ anunyam ni sa Yehowa ni ji ‘wala nubu lɛ’ aaaha lɛ.
• “Amɛfeŋ efɔŋ ni amɛfiteŋ nii yɛ migɔŋ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ nɔ fɛɛ; ejaakɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ aaayi obɔ kɛ Yehowa he nilee lɛ, tamɔ bɔ ni nu ha ŋshɔ shishi lɛ.”—YESAIA 11:9.
David tsu kɛtee Nabal, ni ji nuu niiatsɛ ko ni yɔɔ gwantɛŋi kɛ abotiai akuu babaoo lɛ ŋɔɔ koni eha amɛ niyenii kɛ nu.
“Kaafee amaga ko loo nɔ ko ní tamɔ nii ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi, loo nii ní yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, loo nii ní yɔɔ nu mli yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ shishi lɛ oha ohe.
6 Koresh asraafoi lɛ ateŋ ŋaalɔi lɛ tee faa lɛ yitsogbɛ kɛjɛ Babilon, ni amɛtsa nujɔɔ yɛ Eufrate Faa lɛ naabu, ni amɛha emli nui lɛ ho kɛtsɔ mli, no hewɔ lɛ nu lɛ eyaaa wuoyigbɛ kɛbɛŋkɛɛɛ maŋtiase lɛ dɔŋŋ.
(Daniel 2:44) Kɛkɛ lɛ, ákɛ Maŋtsɛ ni akɛ lɛ eta sɛi nɔ lɛ, Yesu “[baana] ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efi lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ehere mɛi ni efi amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.
Yɛ no hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa kɛɛ gbalɔ lɛ agbɛnɛ akɛ: ‘Bo lɛ adedeŋkruma lɛ sane miidɔ bo.
Ni mihiŋmɛi enaŋo mɔbɔ, ni mibaaŋ oyi, shi moŋ maha ogbɛ̀i lɛ aba onɔ.”
“Edɔ mi waa yɛ ogbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ ni baa shi lɛ hewɔ.
Edɔ David waa yɛ nɔ ni efee lɛ hewɔ, no hewɔ lɛ Yehowa egbeee lɛ.
Kɛji akɛ okɛ shihilɛ ni tamɔ nakai diɛŋtsɛ kpe lɛ, ebaafee mlɛo kɛha nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ akɛ eeekɛɛ kɛjɛ etsui mli akɛ, “Edɔ mi waa akɛ yɛ emuu ni wɔyeee hewɔ lɛ béi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ ba wɔteŋ.
Minii feɔ mihe mɔbɔ bei komɛi, ejaakɛ gbekɛbii krokomɛi lɛ tsuuu nii dɛŋdɛŋ tamɔ bɔ ni wɔfeɔ lɛ.
Mishwa mihe waa yɛ nɔ ni mifee lɛ he.”
Ekaneɔ akɛ, “Eedɔ mi waa akɛ tɛligram nɛɛ baaha onu dɔlɛ he.
Ekɛ yikɔmɔ wie akɛ: “Edɔ mi waa diɛŋtsɛ.
Aso esaaa akɛ wɔnuɔ he wɔhaa mɛi ni yɔɔ wɔshikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli lɛ ní wɔkɛ ekãa awo Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ shiɛmɔ kɛ kaselɔfeemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli?—2 Petro 3:9.
20 Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ Yona susu nii ahe, ni ewie akɛ edɔ gbalɔ lɛ yɛ tso flo ni kwɛ̃ jenamɔ kome lɛ hewɔ, tso ni jeee Yona du loo eha ekwɛ̃ lɛ.
Eeena ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efĩ lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ehere mɛi ni efĩ amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.”—Lala 72:12, 13.
Shi kɛlɛ, nakai wiemɔi ni yɔɔ mlɛo, ni ji, “edɔ mi, ofainɛ kɛke mi,” lɛ baanyɛ atsu nii babaoo kɛtsa pilamɔi.
Yɛ Yesu gbɛtsɔɔmɔ ni suɔmɔ yɔɔ mli lɛ naa lɛ, abaahole adesai anɔ kɛjɛ shihilɛ gbonyo ni amɛyɔɔ mli amrɔ nɛɛ lɛ mli kɛya anunyam emuuyeli mli.
(Yakobo 5:16) Anɔkwayeli ni akɛaakɛɛ akɛ, “Edɔ mi waa akɛ mifee bo efɔŋ” lɛ biɔ heshibaa kɛ ekãa.
Miikpa bo fai, miwieee ni ahi.’
Beni Yona mli fu yɛ enɛ he lɛ, Yehowa kɛɛ akɛ: “Kolɛ omli ní ewo la yɛ adedeŋkruma nɛɛ hewɔ nɛɛ eja, bɛ? . . .
Eeena ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efĩ lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ehere mɛi ni efĩ amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.
Kɛ́ mɛi ni sumɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ na akɛ amɛfee nɔ ko ni teɔ shi ewoɔ emlai kɛ eshishitoo mlai lɛ, edɔɔ amɛ waa.
No hewɔ lɛ, mikɛ minine laa lɛ be fɛɛ be ni mikɛɔ akɛ, ‘Miikpao fai, Suɔlɔ.
Lu-Ann gba akɛ: “Mibinuu Eric, ni eye afii ekpaa lɛ, klasbii lɛ ekome mami banina mi ni ekɛɛ mi akɛ, Eric nii feɔ lɛ mɔbɔ waa ejaakɛ ekome etaa shi yɛ he ko banee ni ekɛ ehe wooo klas fɔmɔ gbijurɔyelii lɛ amli.
Eeena ohiafo kɛ mɔ ni efĩ lɛ lɛ mɔbɔ, ni ehere mɛi ni efĩ amɛ lɛ asusumai ayiwala.’
+ 21 Kaana* mɔbɔ:+ Akɛ wala* ato wala* najiaŋ, hiŋmɛi yɛ hiŋmɛi najiaŋ, nyanyɔŋ yɛ nyanyɔŋ najiaŋ, nine yɛ nine najiaŋ, nane yɛ nane najiaŋ.
Wɔnyɛmi yoo lɛ jɛ mlihilɛ mli ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Ofainɛ miikpa bo fai.
Mɛɛ beyinɔ po ooote shi kɛaajɛ owɔ lɛ mli?”
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛ́ wɔhao yɛ saji komɛi ni wɔnyɛɛɛ he nii wɔtsu lɛ ahe lɛ, ani efeŋ nɔ ni hi jogbaŋŋ akɛ wɔɔtsake wɔdaa gbi nifeemɔi amli loo wɔtsake wɔshihilɛ mli moŋ fe nɔ ni wɔɔha sane lɛ agba wɔnaa?
Kɛji akɛ wɔkpa lɛ fai akɛ ekaha wɔgbee shi beni akaa wɔ lɛ, ebaaye ebua wɔ koni Satan, ‘mɔ fɔŋ lɛ,’ nine akashɛ wɔnɔ.
Yakobo 1:2, 3 lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ: “Minyɛmimɛi, kɛji nyɛgbee kaai srɔtoi pii amli lɛ, nyɛbua lɛ miishɛɛ sɔŋŋ; ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nyɛhemɔkɛyeli kaa lɛ tsɛ́ɔ tsuishiŋmɛɛ kɛbaa.”
Kɛ́ asafoŋ onukpai ha amɛnyɛmimɛi héyelilɔi lɛ na akɛ amɛfee klalo akɛ amɛbaaye amɛbua amɛ, ni akɛ, amɛyɛ dekã kɛha amɛ lɛ, ewaŋ kɛhaŋ nyɛmimɛi lɛ akɛ amɛaabi amɛ ni amɛye amɛbua amɛ.
Bei pii lɛ, enɛ jeɔ kpo yɛ gbɛ pɔtɛɛ nɔ yɛ be mli ni wɔkaseɔ Samarianyo kpakpa ni Yesu wie ehe yɛ ebɛbua ni saa mɔ henumɔi ahe lɛ mli lɛ.
17 Susumɔ be mli ni Yesu tsa nuu ko ni daimonio yɔɔ emli ni eshwila ni enyɛɛɛ ewie lɛ he okwɛ.
Ani ja miyaha wiemɔ loo miyɛ nifeemɔ ko dani mikaseɔ nii?’
5 Shi, kɛji akɛ wɔjwɛŋmɔ yɛ mumɔŋ nibii anɔ lɛ, wɔhiɛ baahi wɔhe nɔ be fɛɛ be akɛ, eyɛ mli akɛ Yehowa jeee Nyɔŋmɔ ni taoɔ tɔmɔ moŋ, shi ele beni wɔtsuɔ susumɔi kɛ akɔnɔi ni ehiii lɛ ahe nii.

(1 Mose 1:26-28) Beni Yesu yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ, ena nibii gbohii ni ejɛ esha mli kɛba lɛ yɛ gbɛ ni yɔɔ srɔto nɔ—ebatsɔ gbɔmɔ, ni enu nii ahe tamɔ bɔ ni adesai nuɔ nii ahe lɛ.

20 Ani ona nuu ni yeɔ ehe oyai kɛwieɔ?
No mli lɛ mikã he misheɔ gbɔmɔ gbeyei, ni taakɛ mishe he gbeyei lɛ, etamɔ nɔ ni mɛi ni mikɛyaa skul lɛ fɛɛ batsɔ he ni midamɔ lɛ!
Ani eeenyɛ efee akɛ wɔbaatsu nii waa kɛ yiŋtoo akɛ wɔɔbua “nii babaoo” naa ni wɔkpoo akɛ wɔɔfee nɔ ni he hiaa ni baaha wɔna “afii pii” ni no aha wɔfee wɔnii tamɔ nuu ni yɔɔ abɛbua lɛ mli lɛ?
Biblia lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ henyɛlɔ nɛɛ ji Satan Abonsam, ni ji mumɔŋ bɔɔ nɔ̃ fɔŋ ní te shi ewo hegbɛ ni Nyɔŋmɔ yɔɔ akɛ eyeɔ nɔ lɛ kɛjɛ adesai ashishijee tɔ̃ɔ lɛ.
Amrɔ nɛɛ miisɔmɔ akɛ daa gbɛgbalɔ, ni mikɛ nuu ko ni lɛ hu eyɔɔ dãanumɔ he naagba lɛ kaseɔ Biblia lɛ, koni manyɛ mikɛ miniiashikpamɔ lɛ aye abua lɛ.”
KWƐMƆ okpo ni baa ebasɔ̃ nuu lɛ yiteŋ lɛ.
Dabi, ejaakɛ ele akɛ nuu lɛ nibimɔ lɛ ji naajiemɔ ko kɛkɛ ni ekɛmiijo ekaselɔ ni ebaatsɔ lɛ naa foi.
