‘Ebɛ Gbɔmɔ Dɛŋ’
Shi, Adam, ni ji klɛŋklɛŋ gbɔmɔ lɛ, gbo Bɔlɔ lɛ nɔ toi, ni enɛ ha naanɔ wala he hiɛnɔkamɔ lɛ ŋmɛɛ lɛ.
Aha amɛdamɔ fɛ̃i mli nyɔɔŋnyɔɔŋ kɛ shwaneshwane gbii 3, kɛkɛ ni aŋa amɛyi yɛ tsuŋwoohei ni mli ewo duŋ mli ni aha amɛ niyenii fioo pɛ gbii 40, ni akɛgbala amɛtoi.
Amɛyahɔlɔɔ tɛ tsũi amli yɛ fɛ̃i gbi nɔ,
Kɛ́ wɔhiɛɛɛ shika ní wɔkɛbaawó tsɔne lɛ, wɔnyiɛɔ aaafee kilomitai 20 daa gbi kɛtsɔɔ mulu kɛ ŋmɔtɔ mli, ni latsaa tsaa wɔ ni fɛ̃i hu yeɔ wɔ bei komɛi.
Kɛlɛ, mikwɛɔ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ yei ni ehala shihilɛ gbɛ ni haa amɛnaa heloonaa nii babaoo lɛ, ni etamɔ nɔ ni amɛshihilɛ gbɛ ni amɛhala lɛ baa mi tsine yɛ be mli ni mijɛɔ shinaa kome naa kɛyaa ekroko naa yɛ nugbɔnɛmɔ kɛ fɛ̃i ni yeɔ mi lɛ mli lɛ.
Wɔmiiya shiɛmɔ yɛ fɛ̃i beaŋ
4. (a) Mɛni hãa wɔnaa akɛ ŋmɛnɛ lɛ mɛi pii asuɔmɔ he ejɔ?
Beni Béi ni Tawuu Bɛ Mli lɛ yaa nɔ lɛ, kooyigbɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛ ehenyɛlɔ lɛ wuu kɛtsɔ maji krokomɛi ni kɛ amɛhe wuɔ tai lɛ asɛɛfimɔ, kɛ atuatsemɔi ni ba yɛ Afrika, Asia, kɛ Latin Amerika lɛ anɔ.
Ebako gbi ko pɛŋ akɛ amɛyakamɔ shi amɛwɔ kɛ amɛmusuŋ hɔmɔ ni fɛ̃i hu miiye amɛ yɛ hehaanɔ ni amɛbɛ hewɔ.
17 Nyɛkahãa Nyɛsuɔmɔ Lɛ He Jɔa
Ákɛ mɛi ni jieɔ hedɔɔ kɛ mlihilɛ kpo loo mɛi ni sumɔɔɔ mɔ ni amɛsusuuu mɛi krokomɛi ahe?
Ekolɛ, Yona fee ehe mfoniri ni aashɛ lɛ aafɔ̃ ŋshɔ ni mli ejɔ ŋanii ni efee hamahama lɛ mli, ni eshe gbeyei ni ekpokpo.
Beni wɔyɔɔ datrɛfonyo lɛ ŋɔɔ lɛ, minu ni ekɛ wiemɔi wuji komɛi (autoimmune chronic illness kɛ juvenile polyarthritis*) miitsu nii.
Akɛtsu nii yɛ Babilonia kɛ blema Mizraim, he ni asusu yɛ akɛ Nilo faa lɛ mli nui ni mli ejɔ lɛ baamɔ hewalɛ babaoo, ni ehaa mɔ shihilɛ ni gbele bɛ mli lɛ.
Kɛ fɛ̃i lɛ miiye bo lolo lɛ, owoɔ ekroko oshwieɔ nɔ.
Yɛ jeŋ dɔlɛ babaoo ni wɔkɛkpe yɛ Afrika lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, agbɛnɛ lɛ ehe bahia ni wɔdamɔ fɛi ni naa wa naa.
Gbalamɔ jwɛŋmɔ kɛya odaseyeli ni akɛha yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli Sanekpakpa lɛ baafa 2 lɛ ni yitso ji “Naanyo Suɔmɔ He Ejɔ” lɛ nɔ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ gbalashihilɛ jeee gbeekpamɔ kɛha nitsumɔ ko ni henumɔ bɛ mli moŋ, shi sɔ̃ fata hetuu-kɛhamɔ ni ebiɔ ni aná lɛ he.
Enyɛ eha amɛhiɛ tserɛ amɛ yɛ samfɛji lɛ ni egbele koni kɔɔyɔɔ ŋanii kpakpa ko abote mli lɛ hewɔ.
Bɔni afee ni atsɔ Biblia mli nikaselɔi tamɔ nɛkɛ ayiŋ lɛ ebiɔ babaoo fe sane naatsɔɔmɔ he ŋaa ko kɛkɛ loo ŋmalɛi ni tsara nɔ ni akɛaatsɔɔ akɛ mɔ lɛ susumɔi lɛ ejaaa ni akɛaaha.
Nakai gbɛkɛ lɛ, fɛi lɛ gbe wuɔi ejwɛ, kɛ gbeei enyɔ ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ niiaŋ lɛ!
Loo “nibii tsiŋ amɛhe,” amɛbaawa keketee tamɔ nɔ ni jɛmɛ ni ejɔ ŋanii ji nɔ ni hã amɛwa lɛ.
Kɛ ona ohe yɛ mɛi ni miihɔ̃ɔ ais-wɔta, akwadu hɔɔlɔi, kɛ gbekɛbii hii ni feɔ kayakaya lɛ ateŋ lɛ, ewaaa akɛ enɛɛmɛi aaaha oyiŋ afutu bo.
Taakɛ saji ahe wielɔ ko kɛɛ lɛ: “Nɔ ni yɔɔ mɔbɔ ji akɛ, kɛ awie Nyɔŋmɔ he akɛ ‘Nuŋtsɔ lɛ,’ eyɛ mli akɛ wiemɔ kuku lɛ ja moŋ, shi eyɛ wuruduu ni ebɛ fɛo . . .
Kɛ́ wɔná suɔmɔ wɔha heloonaa nibii kɛ shihilɛ mli ŋɔɔmɔyelii lɛ, no lɛ suɔmɔ ni wɔyɔɔ kɛha Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ he baajɔ.—Mateo 24:12.
Shi wɔbɛ suɔmɔ, wɔjeee nɔ ko.
Ejaakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ baakojo nitsumɔ fɛɛ nitsumɔ kɛ teemɔ sane fɛɛ teemɔ sane hu, ekpakpa jio, efɔŋ jio.”—Jajelɔ 12:13, 14; Mika 6:8.
(1 Mose 6:5) Mɛi lɛ fee efɔŋ aahu akɛ, Yehowa kpɛ eyiŋ akɛ ebaakpãtã nakai jeŋ fɔŋ lɛ hiɛ.
Ejajeɔ nɔ ni ji ekpakpa kɛ nɔ ni ji efɔŋ faŋŋ diɛŋtsɛ, ni ekɛ sane mlitii tsuɔ nii shii abɔ.
Kɛ́ wɔnyɛ nibii ni Nyɔŋmɔ nyɛɔ lɛ ni wɔye wɔhe nɔ lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ no baabu wɔhe?
Kɛ́ onya susumɔ akɛ, abaahi shi yɛ jeŋ ko mli, ni nibii fɔji baŋ mɛi kpakpai anɔ dɔŋŋ lɛ he lɛ, mɛni hewɔ okɛfeee oti ni ma ohiɛ akɛ obaatsɔ Biblia lɛ nɔ okase anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ eyiŋtoi lɛ ahe nii babaoo?
13 Taakɛ wɔna yɛ Yitso 3 lɛ, wɔnanemɛi baanyɛ aná wɔ nɔ hewalɛ yɛ gbɛ kpakpa loo gbɛ fɔŋ nɔ.

Nakai beaŋ lɛ, gbɔmɛi lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo kpoo akɛ amɛaatsake amɛtsui yɛ amɛgbɛi fɔji lɛ ahe.
Shi kɛji ofee nɔ ni ji efɔŋ lɛ, she gbeyei! ejaakɛ jeee yaka ehiɛ tsi lɛ; shi eji Nyɔŋmɔ sɔɔlɔ ni kɛ mlifu tɔɔ owele yɛ mɔ ni tsuɔ nifɔjianii lɛ nɔ.”
Maŋtsɛmɛi fɛɛ ni baye Israel nɔ yɛ Yehu gbele sɛɛ lɛ fee efɔŋ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Yehowa tsɔ e-Bi lɛ kpɔmɔ afɔleshaa lɛ nɔ ehé adesai aweku lɛ, ni eha amɛ gbɛ ni amɛaatsɔ nɔ amɛná kpɔmɔ kɛjɛ esha kɛ gbele mli moŋ, shi esa akɛ mɔ aŋkro fɛɛ mɔ aŋkro akpɛlɛ kpɔmɔnɔ lɛ nɔ ni ekafolɔ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ etɛi eshwie shi dɔŋŋ yɛ ekpakpa kɛ efɔŋ he.
Kɛkɛ lɛ, ebaatsu akɔnɔ fɔŋ nɛɛ he nii kɛji hegbɛ lɛ ba. —Yakobo 1:13-15.
“Wii ohe kɛje efɔŋ he, ni ofee ekpakpa. Taomɔ toiŋjɔlɛ ni onyiɛ no sɛɛ.” —Lala 34:14, Ga Biblia hee.
Yehowa etsɔ egbalɔi lɛ anɔ ewo gbɔmɛi nɛɛ kita aahu ní amɛtsake amɛtsui, shi amɛbooo lɛ toi, ni amɛkɛ kuɛŋtimɔ ehala akɛ amɛbaafee nɔ ni amɛle akɛ eji efɔŋ yɛ ehiɛ lɛ moŋ.
Ni eji anɔkwale akɛ jeee mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni heee Nyɔŋmɔ nɔ eyeee lɛ doo ji gbɔmɔ fɔŋ.
Yɛ be mli ni etsɔɔ sui kpakpai ni eyɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ, ewie akɛ: “Ekolɛ misumɔɔɔ ni makai nibii fɔji lɛ, shi minyɛɛɛ masusu nɔ ko ni ehiii ni yɔɔ ehe lɛ he.
Yɛ naagbee lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ tsu ŋwɛibɔfoi enyɔ ni amɛyabɔ Lot kɔkɔ akɛ ebaafite Sodom kɛ maŋ ni bɛŋkɛ jɛmɛ ni ji Gomora lɛ yɛ amɛ nɔ fɔŋ feemɔ lɛ hewɔ.
Ebɔ Mose kɔkɔ akɛ, Israelbii lɛ anifeemɔi baanyɛ aná yinɔbii ni baaba yɛ amɛsɛɛ lɛ anɔ hewalɛ yɛ gbɛ kpakpa loo gbɛ fɔŋ nɔ.
(Abɛi 4:23; Yeremia 17:9) Kɛ́ wɔŋmɛ gbɛ ni akɔnɔi gbohii bote wɔtsui mli lɛ, no lɛ wɔbaabɔi nɔ̃ fɔŋ he miishɛɛ námɔ ni wɔnyɛ̃ nɔ̃ kpakpa.

6 Hela emɔ gbɔmɔtso muu lɛ fɛɛ, kɛjɛ naneshi aahu kɛyashi yiteŋ.
Nilelɔi komɛi heɔ amɛyeɔ akɛ jarayelɔi ni jɛ Arabia Wuoyigbɛ ni tsuɔ tsofa kɛ ŋma he nii lɛ kɛ amɛjatsui lɛ tereɔ yomai kɛfãa gbɛ kɛtsɔɔ shia ŋa nɔ kɛyaa kooyigbɛ hei tamɔ Mizraim kɛ Siria, ni no ha akɛ yomai bɔi nitsumɔ yɛ hei nɛɛ.
Nɔ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔna nɔŋŋ ji nuu onukpa hiɛshikalɔ, ni baa ehe shi, ni ekɛ heshwamɔ kɛ awerɛhoyeli miihoso eyitso beni egbalaa lɛ diɛŋtsɛ etɔ̃mɔi, atua ni etse, kɛ bɔ ni ekɛ kuɛŋtimɔ kpoo akɛ ebaana mɔbɔ lɛ amli lɛ.

Ebla asraafonyo ni hiɛ ehenyɛlɔi ayitsei ni efolɔ
Ni amɛkɛ amɛklantei lɛ baawo amɛyitsei ashishi* ni amɛkɛ amɛhe eshai lɛ baashwie amɛwui lɛ anɔ, ejaakɛ tawulɔi kãkãlɔi nɛɛ hã gbeyei mɔmɔ mɛi yɛ hiɛkãalɔi ashikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
Kɛ maŋsɛɛ Maŋ Nukpa ko yasara maŋ ko nɔ lɛ, atsiɔ be ni ekɛyɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ ta.
Eba kɛmiibɛŋkɛ esɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ naagbee gbɛ, yɛ be mli ni enyiɛ gbɛ kɛyaa Yerusalem ákɛ naagbee be ni ekɛaaya jɛmɛ, koni ekɛ piŋmɔ gbele ayakpe lɛ.—Marko 10:32-34.
Mɛi fɛɛ ni fata ehe lɛ hu eha amɛyiteŋ ni amɛ hu amɛmiifó be ni amɛkwɔɔ lɛ.
Beni polisifoi lɛ heɔ amɛmɔ lɛ lɛ, etswa tu lɛ ewo lɛ diɛŋtsɛ eyitsoŋ.
Yesu kaselɔi lɛ na mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ tamɔ lalilɛii, ni ebatara amɛ fɛɛ amɛyiteaŋ ekomekome—aaafee hii kɛ yei 120—ni amɛbua amɛhe naa yɛ Yerusalem.—Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 1:12-15; 2:1-4.
Agbɛnɛ hu ekɛɔ akɛ, “yoo fɛɛ yoo hu yitso ji nuu.”
“Manyɛ makɛɛ bo faŋŋ akɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔná nɔmimaa ni ma shi shiŋŋ akɛ Yesu hi shi moŋ . . . , shi wɔnyɛŋ wɔkɛ nɔmimaa ni tamɔ nɛkɛ nɔŋŋ awie akɛ wɔle akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tée Lɛ shi kɛjɛ gbohii ateŋ.”
Nyɛdamɔa shi shiŋŋ yɛ hemɔkɛyeli lɛ mli nyɛtsĩa lɛ gbɛ, ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ nakai nɔnai lɛ nɔŋŋ nyɛnyɛmimɛi asafo muu lɛ fɛɛ ni yɔɔ je lɛ mli lɛ hu kɛkpeɔ. —1 Pet.
Nɔ ni Otoibolɔi lɛ Le Momo.
(Mateo 11:30; Luka 5:39; Romabii 2:4; 1 Petro 2:3) Ákɛ kapintɛ lɛ, eeenyɛ eba akɛ Yesu efee tsinakɔii kɛ apãi [kɔŋtsei] pɛŋ, ni ebaale bɔ ni agbɔɔ kɔŋtsei ahaa koni esa mɔ lɛ, ni anyɛ akɛtsu nii babaoo yɛ hejɔlɛ mli bɔ ni aaanyɛ.
Amɛtee sɔlemɔwe lɛ, ni Yehoshafat sɔle yɛ jɛmɛ akɛ: ‘Oo Yehowa wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ, wɔleee nɔ ni wɔbaafee.
Gbɛ ni nilee yɔɔ mli ji, ni ale Yesu “wiemɔ” lɛ kɛtsɔ Biblia lɛ kasemɔ nɔ.
Ele mɛi ni ji enii.
Akɛni gbohii lɛ nyɛŋ ale nɔ ko, ni amɛnyɛŋ amɛnu nii ahe hu hewɔ lɛ, amɛnyɛŋ amɛye hiɛkãalɔi awui, ni asaŋ amɛnyɛŋ amɛye amɛbua hiɛkãalɔi hu. —Lala 146:3, 4.

Shi beni edaa lɛ, ebaleɔ etsɛ gbɛi kɛ esubaŋ, ni eeenyɛ efee akɛ no haa enaa ehe miishɛɛ waa.

9 Kɛ́ ojɔɔ owala nɔ oha Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ momo ni abaptisi bo akɛ Kristofonyo lɛ, no lɛ ole akɛ wekukpaa ko bɛ ni tamɔ okɛ Nyɔŋmɔ teŋ nɔ̃ lɛ.
2 “Ŋmaa oyahã Efeso+ asafo lɛ bɔfo+ lɛ akɛ: Nii ni mɔ ni hiɛ ŋulamii kpawo lɛ yɛ eninejurɔ, ni enyiɛɔ shika tsuru kanetsei kpawo lɛ ateŋ lɛ kɛɛ nɛ:+ 2 ‘Mile onifeemɔi lɛ, kɛ nitsumɔ ni otsuɔ waa lɛ kɛ oshifimɔ lɛ, ni akɛ, oŋmɛɛɛ mɛi fɔji agbɛ, ni oka mɛi ni kɛɔ akɛ bɔfoi ji amɛ,+ shi amɛjeee lɛ okwɛ, ni ona akɛ amalelɔi ji amɛ.
Kɛha mɛi babaoo lɛ, susumɔ akɛ amɛkɛ amɛhe aaawo sanegbaa mli, titri lɛ kɛ mɔ ko ni amɛleee lɛ lɛ, teeɔ yeyeeyefeemɔ shi.
▪ “Wɔle akɛ Yesu Kristo fee naakpɛɛ nibii babaoo yɛ egbii lɛ amli.
Nitsumɔhei ni ajɛɔ jɛmɛ ayeɔ abuaa maŋbii lɛ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛfee nɔ fɛɛ nɔ oya—niyenii hoomɔ oya, hei ni ajieɔ shika yɛ ni afiteee be kwraa, kɛ ekrokomɛi ni tamɔ nakai—ejaakɛ amɛle akɛ kɛ́ afiteee mɛi ni amɛkɛyeɔ jara lɛ abei lɛ, ehaa amɛnáa miishɛɛ.
Esa akɛ wiemɔi lɛ diɛŋtsɛ aba kɛji ole nɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni otaoɔ ni okɛɛ lɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ ŋmɛnɛ gbɔmɛi ni jɛ jeŋmaji sɔrɔtoi fɛɛ mli yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ he fɛɛ he moŋ, shi jeŋ nilelɔi le akɛ yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, adesai fɛɛ jɛ mɔ kome mli.

10. (a) Te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ akɛ jeee Hiob emuuyeli mlihiɛmɔ lɛ pɛ he sane Satan bi lɛ?

7 Ja wɔle Yehowa ní wɔná suɔmɔ wɔha lɛ dani wɔbaanyɛ wɔye wɔbua mɛi krokomɛi koni amɛsumɔ lɛ.
Yɛ Hɔgbaa nɛkɛ lɛ, mɛi ni shɛɛɛ akpekpei ejwɛ yaa sɔlemɔ.
Nikasemɔ ko ni afee yɛ gbekɛbii ni eye afii ejwɛ lɛ ahe lɛ jie lɛ kpo akɛ mɛi ni amɛkase henɔyeli falɛ ko kɛ nitsumɔ lɛ “daa ni bei pii lɛ amɛfeɔ gbekɛbii ni baa amɛjeŋ jogbaŋŋ, mɛi ni ale waa, mɛi ni kpɛlɛɔ nitsumɔi heei anɔ, mɛi ni yɔɔ hekɛnɔfɔɔ, kɛ gbekɛbii ni eye afii 13 kɛyaa ni anyɛɔ akɛ he fɔɔ amɛnɔ.”
* 17 Kɛ́ amɛmiiya lɛ, amɛbaanyɛ amɛgba kɛya amɛkoji ejwɛ lɛ eko fɛɛ eko nɔ bɔ ni amɛteŋ mɔ ko mɔ ko tsɔɔɔ ehe.
Nɛkɛ loofɔji nɛɛ ajara waaa aahu akɛ, kɛ́ ohiɛ pesewai enyɔ lɛ, abaaha bo aflimatai enumɔ shi jeee ejwɛ, ni tsɔɔ ákɛ akɛ ekome gbeɔ yi ni aheee shika.
Beni mihi tsuŋwoo mli aaafee afii ejwɛ sɛɛ lɛ, yɛ naagbee lɛ ajie mi akɛ mɔ ni aaka lɛ aakwɛ, yɛ 1952 mli.
Amrɔ nɛɛ nyɛhaa wɔsusua hetooi ní Biblia lɛ kɛhaa yɛ sanebimɔi ejwɛ nɛɛ ahe lɛ he: Mɛɛ yiŋtoi ahewɔ aboteɔ gbalashihilɛ mli?
Miishɛɛ sane ji akɛ, ekɛ Nyɔŋmɔ diɛŋtsɛ gbɛi fata he shii ejwɛ, yɛ su ni ji “Ieová mli.”—1 Mose 22:14; 2 Mose 6:3; 17:15; Kojolɔi 6:24.
Akɛni gbii ejwɛ nɛ ni Lazaro gbo, ni ekolɛ ebɔi fitemɔ hewɔ lɛ, Marta te shi wo nibimɔ nɛɛ.
6 Nyɔŋmɔ ŋwɛibɔfo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Nɛkɛ kooloi wuji ejwɛ nɛɛ, amɛji maŋtsɛmɛi ejwɛ ni baate shi yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ.”
Vincent, ni ji tsɛ ni yɔɔ bii ejwɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Bei pii lɛ, wɔkɛ wɔbii lɛ susuɔ sɛɛnamɔi kɛ osharai ni yɔɔ nifeemɔ ko he lɛ he, koni amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛna gbɛ ni ja ni esa akɛ amɛkɔ.
Kɛjɛ no beaŋ kɛbaa nɛɛ, amɛteŋ mɛi ejwɛ ejɔɔ amɛhe nɔ amɛha Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ ni nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ amɛteŋ mɔ kome tee Sɔɔmɔ Tsɔsemɔ Skul lɛ eko.
Amɛtsɛ amɛhe nilelɔi, shi amɛtsɔmɔ kwashiai, ni Nyɔŋmɔ ni fiteee lɛ anunyam lɛ, amɛtsake amɛha gbɔmɔ ni fiteɔ lɛ subaŋ henɔ ko kɛ loofɔji kɛ kooloi naji-ejwɛjwɛtsɛmɛi, kɛ waamɔ nibii anɔ.”
Kɛ́ eha woji ni aha lɛ wuɔi aaafee etɛ loo ejwɛ lɛ, ekɛyaa jara nɔ eyahɔɔ ni ekɛheɔ pɛtro ewoɔ etsɔne lɛ mli.
Efee Josué naakpɛɛ akɛ nyɔji ejwɛ sɛɛ lɛ enu Javier he.
Eka shi faŋŋ akɛ enɛ feɔ Yehowa su kɛ baŋ lɛ mli sui ejwɛ ní sa kadimɔ waa lɛ ahe mfoniri.—Kpojiemɔ 4:6-8, 10.
Whiston tsɔɔ Sanekpakpai ejwɛ lɛ kɛ Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji lɛ ashishi kɛjɛ Codex Bezae, ni ji Paulo woji ni jɛ Clermont Codex mli lɛ mli, kɛ efai komɛi ni eshwɛ, ni Kpojiemɔ wolo, ni jɛ Alexandrine niŋmaa lɛ mli lɛ fata he.
22 Taakɛ Marta kɛ hiɛshikamɔ feɔ enii lɛ, ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ amɛkafee nakai ejaakɛ gbonyo lɛ eye gbii ejwɛ, ni benɛ esha.
Yɛ afii ejwɛ ni miishɛɛ yɔɔ mli lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, mile akɛ mihala nɔ ni hi lɛ.”
Shi afii nyɔŋmai enyɔ kɛ ejwɛ sɛɛ lɛ, sutsakemɔ he nilelɔ Michael Ruse ŋma akɛ: “Nilelɔi ni kaseɔ nibii ni wala yɔɔ amɛmli lɛ ahe nii lɛ ateŋ mɛi pii . . . wieɔ akɛ sutsakemɔ tsɔɔmɔ ko ni akaa yiŋ awieɔ, ni damɔ Darwin shishitoo mlai anɔ—titri lɛ tsɔɔmɔ fɛɛ tsɔɔmɔ ni akaa yiŋ awieɔ, ni buɔ jeŋ muu fɛɛ nihalamɔ lɛ akɛ gbɛ titri ni sutsakemɔ mli tsakemɔi lɛ tsɔ nɔ kɛba lɛ—yeee emuu, ni elakaa mɔ.”
22 Eyɛ mli akɛ Lazaro egbo gbii ejwɛ moŋ, shi wɔkadiɔ akɛ Yesu ewieee nɔ ko yɛ Lazaro susuma he akɛ eyɛ ŋwɛi, hɛl, aloo hetsuumɔ he!

Bɔ Ni Wɔɔfee Wɔkɛ Bo Nyɔŋmɔ Toi Wolo Lɛ Atsu Nii

Eŋma kɛyaha asafo ni yɔɔ Tesalonika lɛ akɛ: “Akɛni wɔsumɔɔ nyɛ jogbaŋŋ nɛkɛ hewɔ lɛ, wɔyɛ he tsui akɛ jeee Nyɔŋmɔ sanekpakpa lɛ kɛkɛ wɔkɛaaha nyɛ, shi moŋ wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔwala tete, ejaakɛ wɔmiisumɔ nyɛ naakpa.”
Nyɔŋmɔ ebɔɔɔ bɔɔ nɔ̃ fɔŋ koni ebate shi ewo lɛ.

Nyɔŋmɔ baanyɛ aye adesai agbɛjianɔtoo ni anaa lɛ nɔ yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ?

+ 20 Ejaakɛ be ni ewala gbii lɛ hoɔ yaa lɛ, ejwɛŋmɔ eyaaa nɔ,* ejaakɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hãa emii ni eshɛ ehe yɛ etsui mli lɛ heɔ ejwɛŋmɔ fɛɛ.
Ehe miihia ni wɔsusu “Nyɔŋmɔ he nilee” lɛ he akɛ etamɔ “jwiɛtɛi” kɛ “jwetrii ni aŋɔtee.”
Ehe bahia waa ni aye abua amɛ ni amɛhiɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ mli jeŋba he tɛi ni nɔ kwɔlɔ lɛ amli kpɛŋŋ.
Shi amrɔ nɛɛ miyɛ ŋa ni misumɔɔ lɛ waa kɛ bihii enyɔ, ni wɔfeɔ ekome akɛ weku kɛyeɔ wɔbuaa mɛi krokomɛi ni amɛkaseɔ anɔkwalei ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he, ni enɛ haa wɔnáa miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
4 Ákɛ Nyɔŋmɔ yɛ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ eji mɔ ni saa lɛ diɛŋtsɛ ehiɛ, ewóɔ ehe nɔ, loo ebuuu mɛi krokomɛi.
Kɛ́ eji anɔkwale akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsɔɔ hiɛ ehalaa kai ni ebaaŋmɛ gbɛ ni wɔkɛkpe lɛ, belɛ no tsɔɔ akɛ, ele nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baaba wɔnɔ.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ anyɛ Cyril nɔ koni ekaye Nyɔŋmɔ anɔkwa?
Esa akɛ mayajaje Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sane kpakpa lɛ matsɔɔ maji krokomɛi hu, ejaakɛ enɛ hewɔ atsu mi. —Luka 4:43.
Mɛni hewɔ kɛ́ osusu bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ lɛ ye ebua mɛi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ he lɛ, ewoɔ bo hewalɛ lɛ?
Shishijee lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ haaa ale gbɛ nɔ ni ebaatsɔ esaa nɔ ni Satan fite lɛ.
18 Nyɔŋmɔ kojomɔ gbi lɛ miibɛŋkɛ oyayaayai.
No hewɔ lɛ, yɛ gbalɛ lɛ mlibaa mli lɛ, kooyigbɛ maŋtsɛ lɛ ni mli efu lɛ fãa ta eshiɔ Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ.
Te wɔfeɔ tɛŋŋ wɔleɔ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ shiŋ wɔ yɛ kaa be mli?
Shi kɛlɛ, Yesu tsĩ nɔ ko ni esa akɛ wɔfee koni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔhe eshai ake wɔ lɛ tã: Kɛ́ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔhe eshai aaake wɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔkɛ mɛi krokomɛi anɔ̃ ake amɛ.
Mɛni hewɔ Mose bi Nyɔŋmɔ egbɛ́i lɛ he sane lɛ, ni mɛni hewɔ shishinumɔ yɛ mli akɛ ebi nakai lɛ?
25 Esusu akɛ enyɛmimɛi lɛ baakɔ sɛɛ akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ miitsɔ enine nɔ eehere amɛyiwala, shi amɛkɔɔɔ sɛɛ.
Yɛ yiwaa ni Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji kɛkpeɔ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, mɛni amɛfeee?
Ani obaanyɛ okai nɔyelɔi hewalɔi loo jamɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi ni yɛ owala shihilɛ mli lɛ amɛwa Nyɔŋmɔ webii lɛ ayi lɛ agbɛi?
1:28) Ani obaanyɛ otsɔɔ obi bibioo lɛ bɔ ni eeeŋa mɛi kɛ wiemɔi tamɔ “ojekoo,” “minaokoo,” “oshwiee,” loo ŋamɔi krokomɛi ni aŋaa mɛi yɛ he ni nyɛyɔɔ lɛ?
Awie Yesu Kristo he yɛ gbalɛ naa akɛ enáa Yehowa tsɔɔmɔi lɛ ahe sɛɛ daa leebi: ‘[Yehowa] tsĩɛɔ mi daa leebi, etsĩɛɔ mitoi, ni mikɛnu nii tamɔ nikaselɔi.’
Hɔɔ leebi gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ baama bɔ ni kaselɔ-feemɔ nitsumɔ lɛ he hiaa ha lɛ nɔ mi yɛ wiemɔ ni hiɛ fãi etɛ ni tsara nɔ, ni yitso ji “Bɔfoi ni kɛ Toiŋjɔlɛ he Sanekpakpa Baa” lɛ mli.
(Hiob 33:25) Wɔbaaná wɔ̀ kpakpa wɔwɔ̀, ni be fɛɛ be lɛ, wɔbaate shi kɛ hewalɛ ní wɔmiikwɛ gbɛ akɛ wɔbaatsa nitsumɔ ni haa mɔ mii shɛɔ ehe nɔ.
Jajelɔ 11:6 lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Leebi lɛ dũ odũmɔnii lɛ, ni gbɛkɛ hu kaajie onine yɛ he; ejaakɛ oleee emli nɔ ni baahi, enɛ jio, enɛ jio, aloo ekolɛ enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ baahi pɛpɛɛpɛ jio.”
Eyɛ mli akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ enyɛɛɛ enyiɛ pii moŋ, shi nɛkɛ nyɛmi yoo anɔkwafo nɛɛ taa egbo naa daa leebi ni efɔ̃ɔ mɛi ni yaa kɛ baa lɛ nine ni amɛbatara emasɛi ni amɛbo saji kpakpai komɛi atoi.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛji akɛ wɔte shi leebi ko lɛ, ekolɛ nɔ ko baanyɛ atsirɛ wɔ ni wɔwie wiemɔi ni tamɔ nɛkɛ: “Ehi akɛ ada Yehowa shi, ni alá ajie, bo Ŋwɛinyo lɛ, ogbɛi lɛ yi, ni agba omlihilɛ lɛ he sane leebi kɛ onɔkwayeli lɛ he sane nyɔɔŋ, . . . ejaakɛ bo, Yehowa, oha mimii eshɛ mihe yɛ onifeemɔ nii lɛ ahewɔ, ni mimli efili mi yɛ oninenaa nitsumɔi lɛ ahewɔ.”
Akɛni wɔnaa shweremɔ nɛɛ yɛ faŋŋ mli hewɔ, esa akɛ wɔbo ŋaawoo ni aŋma afɔ shi afii ohai abɔ ni eho nɛɛ lɛ toi akɛ: “Leebi lɛ dũ odũmɔnii lɛ, . . . ejaakɛ oleee emli nɔ ni baahi, enɛ jio, enɛ jio, aloo ekolɛ enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ baahi pɛpɛɛpɛ jio.”—Jaj.
Ewie hu akɛ: “Leebi lɛ dũ odũmɔ nii lɛ, ni gbɛkɛ hu kaajie onine yɛ he; ejaakɛ oleee emli nɔ ni baahi, enɛ jio, enɛ jio, aloo ekolɛ enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ baahi pɛpɛɛpɛ jio.”
Amɛkaiɔ Biblia mli ŋaawoo ni nilee yɔɔ mli nɛɛ akɛ: “Leebi lɛ dũ odũmɔnii lɛ, ni gbɛkɛ hu kaajie onine yɛ he; ejaakɛ oleee emli nɔ ni baahi, enɛ jio, enɛ jio, aloo ekolɛ enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ baahi pɛpɛɛpɛ jio.”—Jajelɔ 11:6.
Biblia lɛ woɔ wɔ ŋaa yɛ jɛmɛ akɛ: “Leebi lɛ dũ odumɔnii lɛ, ni gbɛkɛ hu kaajie onine yɛ he; ejaakɛ oleee emli nɔ ni baahi, enɛ jio, enɛ jio, aloo ekolɛ enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ baahi pɛpɛɛpɛ jio.”
(Kpojiemɔ 15:3) No hewɔ lɛ, esa akɛ wɔkwa wiemɔi tamɔ “Ojekoo, Yehowa,” “Wɔkɛ wɔsuɔmɔ miimajeo,” aloo, “Hii shi jogbaŋŋ” kɛ́ wɔmiisɔle.
Kwɛ miishɛɛ ni nyɛmimɛi yei nɛɛ baaná nɛkɛ akɛ amɛfɔ̃ɔɔ sanekpakpa lɛ jajemɔ yɛ be mli ni amɛmɛɔ ni amɛto srɛnɛɛ kɛha lɛlɛ lɛ yɛ nakai leebi lɛ mli lɛ!
+ 3 Ajieɔ maŋtsɛ lɛ diɛŋtsɛ nibii ni eyɔɔ lɛ eko koni akɛshã shãa afɔlei,+ leebi kɛ gbɛkɛnaashi,+ agbɛnɛ hu koni akɛshã shãa afɔlei yɛ Hejɔɔmɔ Gbii+ lɛ anɔ, kɛ nyɔɔŋtsere hei+ lɛ anɔ, kɛ gbii juji+ lɛ anɔ, tamɔ bɔ ni aŋma yɛ Yehowa Mla* lɛ mli akɛ afee lɛ.
Eho edamɔ shi fioo taakɛ efɔɔ feemɔ lɛ, kɛkɛ ni ekɛ miishɛɛ ŋa Betel weku lɛ ekɛɛ “Nyɛjekoo, nyɛmimɛi!”
Maŋtsɛ Salomo kɛɛ: “Leebi lɛ dũ odũmɔ nii lɛ, ni gbɛkɛ hu kaajie onine yɛ he; ejaakɛ oleee emli nɔ ni baahi, enɛ jio, enɛ jio, aloo ekolɛ enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ baahi pɛpɛɛpɛ jio.”—Jajelɔ 11:6.
“Ojekoo!
“Leebi lɛ dũ odumɔnii lɛ, ni gbɛkɛ hu kaajie onine yɛ he; ejaakɛ oleee emli nɔ ni baahi, enɛ jio, enɛ jio, eloo ekolɛ enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ baahi pɛpɛɛpɛ jio.”
“Beni akɛ nibii nɛɛ tsɔɔ lɛ, kɛ mɔ ko ba wɔ okpɔlɔ lɛ he lɛ, wɔkɛɔ lɛ akɛ: ‘Ojekoo!
Amɛkpɛlɛ koni amɛkpe daa Hɔgbaa leebi, ni kɛtsɔ enɛ nɔ lɛ, minyɛ bɔi “sanekpakpa lɛ anɔkwale lɛ” kasemɔ.—Galatabii 2:14.
Mihiɛ miwolo lɛ, koni makwɛ mli kɛji mihiɛ aaakpa wiemɔ ko nɔ lɛ, ni miwie yɛ Spanish mli akɛ: “Ojekoo.
Maŋtsɛ Salomo wie akɛ: “Leebi lɛ dũ odũmɔnii lɛ, ni gbɛkɛ hu kaajie onine yɛ he; ejaakɛ oleee emli nɔ ni baahi, enɛ jio, enɛ jio, aloo ekolɛ enyɔ lɛ fɛɛ baahi pɛpɛɛpɛ jio.”
4 Akɛni kaselɔi ni yɔɔ Yerusalem lɛ ná mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, amɛbɔi mɛi krokomɛi yiwalaheremɔ lɛ he sanekpakpa lɛ gbaa ní amɛfiteee be kwraa, ni amɛkɛ asafo ni ebua amɛhe naa nakai leebi lɛ je shishi.
Nɔ ni tee nɔ nakai leebi lɛ fata mɔdɛŋ ni Yehowa Odasefoi ni yɔɔ Mexico lɛ bɔɔ waa nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ koni amɛkɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa lɛ aha shikwɛ̃ɛbii ni yɔɔ jɛmɛ lɛ he.—Mateo 24:14; 28:19, 20.
Baal jálɔi lɛ tsɛ́ amɛpasa nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbɛi “kɛjɛ lebilebi aahu kɛyashi shwane amɛkɛɛ: Baal, heremɔ wɔ nɔ,” shi nakai feemɔ he baaa sɛɛnamɔ ko kwraa kɛhaaa amɛ.
Eji anɔkwale akɛ, yɛ naagbee lɛ Yehowa baatsu saji ahe nii, ni ebaakpata mɛi ni yaa nɔ amɛfeɔ nibii ni ejaaa lɛ ahiɛ.—Jajelɔ 8:11-13.
Nyɔŋmɔ ‘aaatsumɔ mɛi fɛɛ ahiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ,’ ni ekɛ nɔnaa baaba naagbee.
Beni tutuamɔ ni akɛkpataa jamɔ hiɛ nɛɛ yaa nɔ lɛ, ebaafee tamɔ nɔ ni ebaakpata jamɔ gbɛjianɔtoi fɛɛ hiɛ, ni Yehowa webii fata he.
Kɛfata he lɛ, eshwɛ fioo ni abaakpata jeŋ muu fɛɛ maŋkwramɔ gbɛjianɔtoo, ni afee ehe mfoniri yɛ Kpojiemɔ wolo lɛ mli akɛ kooloo awuiyelɔ ni yɔɔ yitsei kpawo kɛ akoloŋtoi nyɔŋma lɛ hu hiɛ kwraa, tamɔ bɔ ni afee wɔŋjalɔi amaji ni ebɔle Yerusalem he lɛ amli babaoo lɛ.
+ 4 Ni ebaatsumɔ amɛhiŋmɛiiaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ,+ ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ,+ ni mɔ ko yeŋ awerɛho dɔŋŋ, ni mɔ ko woŋ yara ko hu dɔŋŋ, ni mɔ ko hu piŋŋ dɔŋŋ.
Eji mɔ ko ni minyɛɔ mibɛŋkɛɔ lɛ be fɛɛ be ni minaa naagba ko; eshɛjeɔ mimii ni etsumɔɔ mihiɛ yaafo nui.
Akɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ: “‘[Nyɔŋmɔ baatsumɔ] amɛhiŋmɛiiaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, asaŋ awerɛhoyeli ko loo yarawoo ko loo hejaramɔ ko hu bɛ dɔŋŋ.
39 Ni mabule amɛshishi ni majwara amɛ, koni amɛkate shi dɔŋŋ;+
Maria fɔse mu lɛ eshwie Yesu yiteŋ kɛ naji ahe, ni ekɛ eyitsɔi tsumɔ Yesu naji ahe.
(2 Korintobii 1:11) Ni eba hu akɛ wɔkɛ anɔkwayeli aaaŋmɛ wɔtsui shi aahu kɛyashi be mli ni Nyɔŋmɔ baatsɔ Yesu Kristo nɔ ‘atsumɔ wɔhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ’ kwraa kɛmɔ shi.
Ni Nyɔŋmɔ aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ.’ ”—Kpojiemɔ 7:1, 9, 14-17.
Yehowa ‘aaatsumɔ hiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ.’—Kpoj.
“Eeemi gbele kɛaatee naanɔ; ni Nuntsɔ Yehowa aaatsumɔ hiɛaŋ fɛɛ yaafonui.”
Miikpa gbi ni manyɛ mana bo yɛ nibii agbɛjianɔtoo hee lɛ mli, beni Yehowa baatsumɔ wɔhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ lɛ gbɛ waa diɛŋtsɛ.—Kpojiemɔ 21:4.
*+ 7 No hewɔ lɛ, Yehowa kɛɛ: “Mibakpãtã gbɔmɛi ni mibɔ lɛ ahiɛ kɛje shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ, gbɔmɔ kɛ shĩa kooloi, kooloi ni wamɔɔ, kɛ bɔɔ nii ni filikiɔ yɛ ŋwɛi, ejaakɛ edɔ mi waa akɛ mifee amɛ.”
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ, ni ji Biblia lɛ woɔ shi akɛ Yehowa “aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋkɔmɔyeli ko kɛ bolɔmɔ ko kɛ nɔnaa ko hu bɛ dɔŋŋ.”
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ gba akɛ: “Nyɔŋmɔ aaatsumɔ amɛhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ, ni gbele bɛ dɔŋŋ, ni ŋkɔmɔyeli ko kɛ bolɔmɔ ko kɛ nɔnaa ko hu bɛ dɔŋŋ.”—Kpojiemɔ 21:4.
Kɛlɛ, shikpɔŋ hosomɔ, ahum ni naa wa, oshara, loo yiwalɛ nifeemɔ ko baanyɛ akpata nakai nibii ni aná lɛ fɛɛ ahiɛ shikome.
Akɛni okpãtã majimaji babaoo ahiɛ hewɔ lɛ, ofee esha oshi bo diɛŋtsɛ ohe.
* Beni mikane shiwoo ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛha akɛ ebaatsumɔ hiɛaŋ fɛɛ yaafonui ni ebaajie gbele tete po kɛya lɛ, miyiŋ efeee mi kɔshikɔshi kɔkɔɔkɔ akɛ mina nɔ ni ji anɔkwale ni baanyɛ aha adesai aye amɛhe lɛ.
21 Akɛni enaa Kristofoi amumɔŋ shihilɛ lɛ akɛ “shikpɔŋ ni naa kã” ni ewaaa haaa lɛ akɛ eeeye amɛnɔ kunim kwraa hewɔ lɛ, Gog bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ waa akɛ eeejie nɛkɛ gbɛtsii nii ni haaa enyɛ ekɛ adesai fɛɛ abawo ekudɔmɔ shishi nɛɛ kɛjɛ jɛmɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ŋɔɔ lɛ akɛ wɔmiisusu sane ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ eshaifaa lɛ he, ni wɔmiitao wɔfee sane oti ni yɔɔ Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 3:19 lɛ ni kɛɔ akɛ Yehowa ‘gbeɔ’ loo etsumɔɔ wɔhe eshai lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ.
Yesu Kristo ni ji Nyɔŋmɔ Toobi lɛ baatsɔɔ wɔ gbɛ kɛya “wala nubui” ahe, ni Nyɔŋmɔ baatsumɔ wɔhiɛaŋ yaafonui fɛɛ.
Amɛ mlakwamɔ jeŋba lɛ sa jeŋ ni tsɔ Nu Afua lɛ hiɛ lɛ he aahu kɛyashɛ he ni Yehowa kɛɛ: “‘Makpata gbɔmɔ ni mibɔ lɛ hiɛ kɛjɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ . . . shi mishwa mihe akɛ mibɔ amɛ.’
Biblia lɛ ewo shi akɛ Yehowa baafo hewalɛ ni Satan Abonsam ni ji malemɔtsɛ ni shishiuɔ jeŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ náa yɛ mɛi anɔ lɛ sɛɛ.
“Wɔteŋ mɛi pii kpɛlɛɔ nɔ kɛkɛ akɛ, wɔbaaná niyenii babaoo wɔye be fɛɛ be.
Ekɛɛ akɛ: “Kɛji Nyɔŋmɔ gbɔmɔ ji mi lɛ, no lɛ la ajɛ ŋwɛi ayi shi ni ebashão kɛ omɛi nyɔŋmai-enumɔ lɛ!”
26 Ni obaanyɛ okɛ shika lɛ ahe nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baa otsine*—tsinai kɛ gwantɛŋi kɛ abotiai kɛ wain kɛ dãji krokomɛi ni wa, kɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni osumɔɔ;* ní oye yɛ jɛmɛ yɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ, ní omii ashɛ ohe, bo kɛ oshĩabii fɛɛ.
10 Shi hɔmɔ ye lɛ waa ni eetao nii eye.
Kɛjɛ migbekɛbiiashi aahu kɛbashi bianɛ lɛ, miyeko kooloo ko ni egbo, loo kooloo ko ni atserɛ emli+ loo kɛbuleko mihe* pɛŋ, ni loo ni he tseee* eyako midaaŋ pɛŋ.”
18. (a) Mɛni wala tso lɛ yeli baatsɔɔ aha Adam kɛ Hawa?
25 Kɛkɛ ni ekɛɛ: “Mibinuu, hã mi jwɛiaŋ loo lɛ eko maye, koni no sɛɛ lɛ majɔɔ* bo.”
(2 Mose 29:38-42) Ashãa shidaa afɔle hu, ni mɛi ni shãa lɛ náa mli gbɛfaŋnɔ kɛtsɔ nibii ni akɛshãa afɔle ahaa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ eko ni amɛyeɔ lɛ nɔ.—3 Mose 19:5-8.
11 Be ni ekɛ niyenii lɛ bahã lɛ koni eye lɛ, Amnon mɔ Tamar mli ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Minyɛmi yoo, ba ni okɛ mi abawɔ.”
Esa akɛ wɔkɛ anɔkwayeli aye abua amɛ koni ahere amɛyiwala kɛjɛ hiɛkpatamɔ ni bɛŋkɛɔ lɛ mli.
Amɛ fɛɛ amɛbaana shiai kpakpai, ni amɛbaaye niyenii ni amɛdu yɛ amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛ shikpɔŋ nɔ lɛ, yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ shishi.
5 Beni klɛŋklɛŋ adesai enyɔ, ni ji Adam kɛ Hawa, booo Nyɔŋmɔ famɔ ni mli kã shi faŋŋ akɛ amɛkaye ekpakpa kɛ efɔŋ lee tso lɛ yibii lɛ eko lɛ toi lɛ, amɛhiɛ kã he ni amɛye.
24 Shi Israel hii lɛ ahe fĩ amɛ waa yɛ nakai gbi lɛ nɔ, ejaakɛ Saul ekã mɛi lɛ kitã akɛ: “Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni baaye nii* dani je baana loo dani matɔ mihenyɛlɔi lɛ anɔ owele magbe naa lɛ, alomɔ lɛ!”
Ekɛfata he akɛ: “Ehi akɛ oyeee loo ni onuuu wein loo nɔ ko ní aaato onyɛmi pampi loo aaaha enane atɔ̃tɔ aloo enijiaŋ aaaje wui yɛ mli.”
29 “‘Nuu fɛɛ nuu ni ji osɔfo lɛ aye eko.
7 Okɛ naanyobɔɔ afɔlei+ ayahã yɛ jɛmɛ, ni oye yɛ jɛmɛ,+ ni omii ashɛ ohe yɛ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ hiɛ.
14 Ni be ni shɛ niyeli be lɛ, Boaz kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Tsi kɛba biɛ, baaye blodo lɛ eko, ni okɛ eko atsɔ wain ni joɔ* lɛ mli.”
22 Yehowa tee nɔ ekɛ Mose wie ekɛɛ: 23 “Kɛɛmɔ Israelbii lɛ akɛ, ‘Nyɛkayea tsina loo gwantɛŋ loo abotia ko fɔ+ ko fɔ ko kwraa.
Miishɛɛnamɔ mli hoofeemɔ tee nɔ egbɛ eshwã babaoo fe jamɔŋ hetuu-kɛhamɔ, yɛ be mli ni miishɛɛnamɔ mli hoofeelɔi kɛ amɛhe woɔ niyeli kɛ ninumɔ shɛii mli lɛ.
5 Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ baaná lɛ diɛŋtsɛ eshĩa yɛ Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ shishi, ejaakɛ Yesaia gba akɛ: “Shi amɛaamamɔ tsũi, ni amɛaahi mli, ni amɛaafee weintromi, ni amɛaaye mli yibii!”
Obaanyɛ oye amɛnɔ yibii lɛ eko, shi kaafolɔ oshwie shi.
6 Bulɛ ni wɔyɔɔ kɛha Yehowa okpɔlɔ lɛ baatsirɛ wɔ koni wɔbo wiemɔi lɛ atoi jogbaŋŋ, ni wɔkwa wiemɔi ni he bɛ sɛɛnamɔ ni wɔkɛ mɛi aaawie, niyeli, loo ni wɔɔkpa shi be ni kpee lɛ miiya nɔ.
+ 26 Ejaakɛ be fɛɛ be ni nyɛbaaye blodo nɛɛ ni nyɛbaanu kɔɔpoo nɛɛ naa lɛ, belɛ nyɛmiijaje Nuŋtsɔ lɛ gbele lɛ nyɛmiitsɔɔ kɛyashi ebaaba.
3 Te Oyeɔ Nii Jogbaŋŋ Ohaa Tɛŋŋ?
Agu wɔ ni wɔkɛ wonu ni akɛhaa wɔ yɛ nsra lɛ mli lɛ akafata wɔniyenii lɛ ahe, shi moŋ wɔye bodobodo ni ashã he pɛ.
Yehowa gba kɛtsɔ gbalɔ Zakaria nɔ akɛ: “Nakai gbii lɛ amli lɛ aaaba mli akɛ hii nyɔŋma ni jɛ jeŋmaji anɔ wiemɔi srɔtoi fɛɛ mli aaamɔ Yudanyo kome atade naamuu mli, amɛaakɛɛ: Wɔkɛ nyɛ aaatee; ejaakɛ wɔnu akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ nyɛ yɛ!”
Sanebimɔi enyɔ nɛɛ fɛɛ ahetoo ji hɛɛ.
Hɛɛ, gbele ji naagbee henyɛlɔ, ni ebiɔ ni akpɔ̃ adesai aweku lɛ kɛjɛ edɛŋ.
Hɛɛ, gbɔmɛi fɔji ha ashɛ́ Daniel awo jatai abu mli.
Hɛɛ, wɔkɛ naagbai kpeɔ, no hewɔ lɛ mi paradeiso lɛ yeko emuu.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni wɔbaatsĩ nɔ ni haoɔ wɔ lɛ tã kɛkɛ wɔtsɔɔ lɛ lɛ, nyɛhãa wɔkɛ hiɛdɔɔ akpaa lɛ fai ni eye ebua wɔ. —Fil.
Hɛɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ baanyɛ abu emɛi anɔkwafoi ahe kɛjɛ ayɛkpɛmɔ kɛ hewalɛi krokomɛi fɛɛ ni fe adesai anɔ̃ lɛ he.
(Lala 16:8; 63:8) Hɛɛ, Yehowa baanyɛ aye abua bo koni ohi shi yɛ gbɛ ni saa ehiɛ lɛ nɔ.
ohe awa, hɛɛ, ohe awa!”
Hɛɛ, kɛji mɛi fɛɛ ni laa yɛ wɔ Maŋtsɛyeli Asai lɛ anɔ lɛ kɛ hiɛdɔɔ susuɔ ŋaawoi ni yɔɔ mli lɛ ahe lɛ, enɛ baafee ŋaawoo kpele kɛha wɔ koni wɔna ekaa yɛ sɔɔmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli ni wɔtsi wɔhe kɛjɛ efɔŋ feemɔ tsɔnei ahe.
Bɔfo Paulo wie mɛi komɛi ahe akɛ: “Amɛkaseɔ hejɔ̃feemɔ, amɛkpaa shi yɛ shiai, ni jeee hejɔ̃lɔi kɛkɛ amɛtsɔmɔɔ, shi amɛwiewieɔ mɛi ahe hu, ni amɛjeɔ shi, amɛwieɔ nii ni ejaaa.”
(Abɛi 18:9) Hɛɛ, gbɔmɛi ni bɛ gbɛjianɔtoo, ni amɛnitsumɔ mɔɔɔ shi jogbaŋŋ lɛ baanyɛ amɛkɛ oshara aba, ni amɛkɛye amɛ diɛŋtsɛ kɛ mɛi krokomɛi awui.
Beni Yudafoi amla he nilelɔ ko ni hi shi yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ afii 100 lɛ mli lɛ wieɔ Mesia lɛ he lɛ, eŋma akɛ: “Shi Nyɔŋmɔ shiwoi abɔ ni yɔɔ nɛɛ, emli hɛɛ lɛ nɔŋŋ yɔɔ.”

Hɛɛ, awuŋayeli ni kanyaa mɔ yɛ gbɛ ni ja nɔ—awuŋayeli ni Nyɔŋmɔ gbeyeishemɔ yɔɔ mli—lɛ náa mɛi krokomɛi anɔ hewalɛ kpakpa.

Gbɛ nɔ ni Ŋa Kristofonyo Tsɔɔ Esheɔ Ewu
19 Mɛni hewɔ okɛɛ, ‘Minyɛmi yoo+ ni’ lɛ, ni no hewɔ lɛ, kulɛ miiba maŋɔ lɛ mafee miŋa lɛ?
Shi mɛɛ be mli aloo be naa abaanyɛ akɛɛ akɛ ‘Toobi lɛ ŋa lɛ esaa ehe eto’?
Anɔkwa hiɛsɔɔ wiemɔ tsɔɔ babaoo kɛhaa oŋa lɛ ni eyeɔ ebuaa lɛ koni enu he akɛ akɛ woo haa lɛ.—Abɛi 31:28.
Ni okɛ oblahiiaŋ ŋa lɛ aná miishɛɛ,+
Hɛɛ, ‘ná oblahiiaŋ ŋa lɛ he miishɛɛ.’—Abɛi 5:18.
Yɛ Kristofoi a-Hela Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli lɛ, Paulo tĩ bɔ ni Yesaia tsɔɔ Yehowa kɛ Israel teŋ wekukpaa lɛ mli eha lɛ mli beni ekɛ wu kɛ ŋa teŋ wekukpaa lɛ to Kristo kɛ Kristofoi ní afɔ amɛ mu lɛ asafo lɛ teŋ wekukpaa lɛ he lɛ.—Efesobii 5:21-27.
Misɔleɔ daa akɛ Yehowa akai miŋa ni he yɔɔ fɛo lɛ yɛ mlihilɛ mli.
Wu ni sumɔɔ eŋa lɛ kpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ esoro bɔ ni amɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ feɔ enii ehaa, ni emli fuuu yɛ srɔtofeemɔ nɛɛ he.
Ŋa Kristofonyo ko kɛ heshibaa kpɛlɛ nɔ akɛ: “Yɛ sɔlemɔ ni mli wa waa sɛɛ lɛ, minu he tamɔ nɔ ni Yehowa mumɔ lɛ miiwo minine nɔ ni mafua mihefatalɔ lɛ atuu.”
Wɔkaneɔ yɛ Yesaia 49:15 lɛ akɛ: “Aso yoo hiɛ aaakpa ebi fufɔoo nɔ, aloo emusuŋ etsɔŋ lɛ yɛ emusuŋ bi hewɔ?
+ 5 Kɛkɛ ni Boaz kɛɛ akɛ: “Gbi nɔ ni obaahe shikpɔŋ lɛ yɛ Naomi dɛŋ lɛ, esa akɛ ohe yɛ Rut, Moab yoo lɛ, ni ji nuu lɛ ni egbo lɛ ŋa lɛ hu dɛŋ, bɔ ni afee ni nuu lɛ ni egbo lɛ gbɛ́i abakã egboshinii lɛ nɔ.”

Bɔ ni too ni laaje lɛ sane tee nɔ ekã tookwɛlɔ lɛ tsui nɔ lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ esa akɛ mɛi ni ekpa asafoŋ kpeei baa lɛ asane aya nɔ akã onukpai lɛ atsui nɔ.

4 Kɛ́ nakai mɔ lɛ kɛ eshwiei lɛ eko hã Molek, ni shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ bii lɛ je gbɛ amɛku amɛhiɛ amɛfɔ̃ enifeemɔ lɛ nɔ, ni amɛgbeee lɛ lɛ,+ 5 no lɛ, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, mi diɛŋtsɛ majie mihiɛ maka nakai mɔ lɛ kɛ eweku lɛ.
Shi moŋ, amɛkɛ amɛhiɛ maa ‘ŋwɛi hee kɛ shikpɔŋ hee ní jalɛ hiɔ mli lɛ’ nɔ.—2 Petro 3:13; 2 Korintobii 4:18.
18 Yɛ nifeemɔi enumɔ ni wɔsusu he nɛɛ asɛɛ lɛ, “nii ni anaaa” krokomɛi hu yɛ ni wɔbaasumɔ ni ‘wɔkwɛ.’
Bɔfo ni mumɔ lɛ tsirɛ lɛ lɛ ŋma akɛ: “Nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni yɔɔ je lɛŋ lɛ, heloo lɛ sɛɛdii nii lɛ kɛ hiŋmɛii lɛ asɛɛdii nii lɛ kɛ shihilɛ lɛ mli hewoo lɛ, ejɛɛɛ tsɛ lɛ mli, shi moŋ je lɛ mli ejɛ.”
Yesaia gba fɔ shi pɛpɛɛpɛ akɛ: “No mli lɛ aaagbele shwilafoi ahiŋmɛii, ni aaagbele toimulɔi atoii.
Abɛi ni ajɛ mumɔ mli aŋma lɛ wo hewalɛ akɛ: “Too ohiɛ tɛ̃ɛ,” bɔni afee ni “oha ogbɛ̀i fiaa aja.”—Abɛi 4:25, 26.
10 Ni Babilon maŋtsɛ lɛ gbe Zedekia bihii lɛ yɛ Zedekia hiɛ, ni egbe Yuda lumɛi lɛ fɛɛ hu yɛ jɛmɛ yɛ Ribla.
20 Etee nɔ efee efɔŋ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ tamɔ bɔ ni etsɛ Manase fee lɛ nɔŋŋ.
Hɛɛ, nyɛhaa wɔyaa nɔ wɔsɔlea taakɛ lalatsɛ lɛ fee lɛ, akɛ: “Jiemɔ mihiɛ kɛjɛ yaka nii akwɛmɔ nɔ.”
Mɛni hewɔ mihiɛ bako nyam yɛ ohiɛ, ni okɛ maŋbii nɛɛ fɛɛ ajatsu lɛ etere mi lɛ?
Rut ho ekula shikpɔŋ, ni ekɛɛ: ‘Mɛɛ hewɔ ni mi mɔkpɔŋ nɛɛ mihiɛ eba nyam yɛ ohiɛ lɛ?’
2 Etee nɔ efee efɔŋ yɛ Yehowa hiɛ, tamɔ bɔ ni Yehoiakim fee lɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.

Etɔ mihiŋmɛii kɛ ŋwɛi kwɛmɔ:+
Jeŋmaji lɛ yaa nɔ amɛfeɔ nɔ ni ehiii yɛ Yehowa hiɛ.
Ohiŋmɛii baana Yerusalem akɛ shihilɛhe ni toiŋjɔlɛ yɔɔ jɛmɛ,
Eeekpɔ̃ amɛsusuma kɛaajɛ fifiamɔ kɛ yiwalɛ mli, ni amɛlá jara aaawa yɛ ehiɛ.”
11 Bɔni afee ni wɔkpoo bɔlɛnamɔ jeŋba shara lɛ, esa akɛ wɔbi wɔhe akɛ, ‘Ani miŋmɛɔ mihiŋmɛi gbɛ ni ehaa mináa shwelɛ akɛ makane jeŋba shara he nibii yɛ woji amli, loo makwɛ yɛ tɛlivishiŋ loo Intanɛt lɛ nɔ?’
Ejaakɛ wɔmrɔmrɔ amanehulu, ní jaraaa nɛɛ, miitsu naanɔ anunyam babaoo ní teke nɔ ní jara wa aahu eha wɔ.
Shi amrɔ nɛɛ miyɛ ŋa ni misumɔɔ lɛ waa kɛ bihii enyɔ, ni wɔfeɔ ekome akɛ weku kɛyeɔ wɔbuaa mɛi krokomɛi ni amɛkaseɔ anɔkwalei ni kɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ he, ni enɛ haa wɔnáa miishɛɛ diɛŋtsɛ.
Esa akɛ eyɔse akɛ, ja ekpɛlɛ yibii gbohii ni gbɛ fɔŋ ni ekɔ lɛ ewo lɛ fɛɛ anɔ dani fai ni ekpaa Yehowa kɛha eshaifaa lɛ baafee nɔ̃ ni sa.
1:5) Eeenyɛ efee akɛ Paulo ná ele weku nɛɛ beni etee nakai kpokpaa lɛ nɔ klɛŋklɛŋ kwraa yɛ afii komɛi ni tsɔ hiɛ lɛ mli lɛ.
Kɛfata mɔ he susumɔ kɛ suɔmɔ ni amɛjieɔ lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛnaanyo gbɔmɔ lɛ he lɛ, nɛkɛ tsutsu mɛi ni jeɔ gbɛ amɛfiteɔ nibii nɛɛ ekase bɔ ni ‘anyɛɔ efɔŋ.’

Zimbabwebii babaoo buɔ Biblia lɛ waa, ni no hewɔ lɛ, bei pii kɛ́ akɛ amɛ miisusu Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli sane ko he lɛ, amɛtsɛ́ɔ amɛbii lɛ hu kɛbataraa shi koni amɛbo toi.

3 “Bɔ ni Yehowa ní bɔ bo, Yakob, ní eshɔ̃ bo, Israel, lɛ kɛɛ nɛ: Kaashe gbeyei, ejaakɛ mikpɔ̃o; mitsɛ́o kɛ ogbɛi; minɔ̃ jio!
Yɛ yiwaa ni Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji kɛkpeɔ lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ lɛ, mɛni amɛfeee?
Amɛyeɔ amɛtsui akɛ, ‘Ani wɔbii lɛ, loo amɛ hu amɛbii lɛ baahi je ko ni ta, awuiyeli, muji, kɔɔyɔŋ tsakemɔ, kɛ tsɛŋemɔ helai bɛ mli lɛ mli?’
The Encyclopedia of Religion lɛ tsɔɔ mli akɛ, mɛi ni to jamɔi ni ji Buddha jamɔ, Kristojamɔ kɛ Islam jamɔi lɛ ashishi lɛ hiɛ susumɔi srɔtoi yɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi ahe, shi wolo lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Jamɔi nɛɛ ahe yinɔsaji krokomɛi tsɔɔ akɛ naakpɛɛ nifeemɔi kɛ saji ni kɔɔ nifeemɔi nɛɛ ahe lɛ ji adesai ajamɔ mli hemɔkɛyelii lɛ amli fã titri ko.”
Yɛ nyɛsɛɛ afii nɛɛ amli lɛ, mikɛ kuu ni wieɔ Gujarati, ni amɛ hu amɛkpeɔ yɛ jɛmɛ lɛ bɔɔ.
Kɛji akɛ wɔjaje yɛ faŋŋ mli akɛ wɔyɛ Yehowa masɛi lɛ, belɛ Satan kɛ wɔ baafee mɛi ni etutuaa.
Kɛ́ abi bo akɛ, ‘Ani mɛi enyɔ ni esoro amɛsubaŋ kwraa lɛ baanyɛ ahi shi yɛ toiŋjɔlɛ mli’ lɛ, te obaahã hetoo ohã tɛŋŋ?
Bo lɛ susumɔ shii abɔ ni mikane Biblia lɛ kɛ Biblia kasemɔ he woji yɛ afii ni eho lɛ amli lɛ he okwɛ.”
Bɔ ni wɔɔfee wɔkɛha Buddhanyo ko ni hiɛ efã: “Ekolɛ bɔ ni susumɔi fɔji ehe shi waa ŋmɛnɛ kɛ bɔ ni enɛɛmɛi náa wɔbii anɔ hewalɛ lɛ miihao bo tamɔ bɔ ni ehaoɔ mi lɛ.
Nakai nɔŋŋ mumɔŋ kpɔiaŋgbɔlemɔ ni akɛ he wooo mli lɛ baanyɛ ekɛ naagbai ni mli wawai aba.
Mibɔɔ mɔdɛŋ waa akɛ mihaŋ saji bibii atsɔ naagbai wuji, aloo ni mabu mihe akɛ mihe hiaa tsɔ̃ fe nine.
Sanegbaa kɛ miishɛɛ tsa nɔ, ni ekpa mi fai, yɛ naanyobɔɔ su ni eyajieee lɛ kpo kɛjɛ shishijee, ejaakɛ ebɛ deka kwraa lɛ hewɔ.
Okɛ be kukuoo ko awie nibii komɛi ni yɔɔ wolo ni akɛbaaha yɛ July mli lɛ ahe, ni no sɛɛ lɛ, oha afee bɔ ni akɛ wolo lɛ baaha lɛ he nɔkwɛmɔnɔ kome loo enyɔ.
Akɛni wɔhiɔ shi tamɔ bɔ ni Nyɔŋmɔ sumɔɔ ni wɔhi shi —yɛ nyɔŋmɔjamɔ hetuu-kɛhamɔ naa hewɔ lɛ —ehaa je lɛ nyɛ̃ɛɔ wɔ, ni enɛ kɛ kaai baa wɔhemɔkɛyeli nɔ be fɛɛ be.
Daa Hɔgbaa lɛ, yɛ be mli ni wɔkɛ sɔlemɔ ekpa kpee lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, wɔkɛ be fioo kaseɔ lala.
Kɛtsɔ Nyɔŋmɔ mumɔ lɛ hewalɛ nɔ lɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi enyɛ amɛtsu nitsumɔ ko ni atsuko eko nakai dã yɛ adesai ayinɔsane mli, ni no ji Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ he sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛmɔ, yɛ shinaai anaa kɛ hei krokomɛi, kɛha gbɔmɛi akpekpei abɔ.
Kɛ onukpai lɛ na akɛ etamɔ nɔ ni mɛi komɛi sumɔɔ ni amɛsaa amɛhe yɛ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ yɛ amɛ hejɔɔmɔ be mli lɛ, no lɛ ebaafee nɔ ni sa akɛ amɛkɛ ŋaawoo ni mlihilɛ yɔɔ mli ni yɔɔ shiŋŋ hu ni tsɔɔ akɛ atade ni tamɔ nɛkɛ esaaa hiɛ lɛ aaaha dani aya kpee lɛ, titri lɛ ákɛ mɛi ni yaa Kristofoi akpee.
Mɛni hewɔ esaaa akɛ gbalashihilɛ mli bii náa bɔlɛnamɔ henumɔi amɛhãa mɛi ni jeee amɛhefatalɔi lɛ?

Mika, ní hi shi yɛ Yesaia beaŋ lɛ jaje akɛ: “Ájaje nɔ ni hi kɛ nɔ ni Yehowa biɔ yɛ odɛŋ atsɔɔo: no ji akɛ ofee nɔ ni ja gbɛ, ni osumɔ ejurɔfeemɔ, ni okɛ o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ anyiɛ yɛ heshibaa mli.”
Nɔ ni haa amɛkɛɔ enɛ titri lɛ ji Odasefoi lɛ ashidaamɔ ni damɔ Biblia lɛ nɔ, yɛ nibii tamɔ lá ni agbalaa awoɔ mɔ mli, he ní akɛwooo maŋ saji amli, tawa shɛremɔ, kɛ jeŋbai gbohii lɛ hewɔ.
5. (a) Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔle nɔ ni ebiɔ dani mɔ ko atsɔ “asafo babaoo” ni baana yibaamɔ lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome lɛ?
Ekolɛ obaabi akɛ, ‘Ani anɔkwa sane ni ji akɛ etamɔ nɔ ni Yehowa efeko nɔ ko yɛ mikaa lɛ he lɛ tsɔɔ akɛ eleee shihilɛ mli ni miyɔɔ lɛ, loo ákɛ esusuuu mihe?’
16 Suɔmɔ kpo ni wɔɔjie wɔtsɔɔ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ kɔɔɔ mɛi ni yɔɔ wɔkpokpai anɔ lɛ pɛ ahe.
Shi yɛ nɛkɛ be nɛɛ mli lɛ, bɔfo lɛ ni jɛ ŋwɛi ni je agbo, ni enunyam ha shikpɔŋ muu lɛ fɛɛ nɔ kpɛ lɛ maa nɔ ni etsɔɔ lɛ nɔ mi!
Kɛfata he lɛ, Yehowa ‘baaŋɔ wɔ kɛya anunyam mli’ ni tsɔɔ akɛ, wekukpãa kpakpa baahi ekɛ wɔ teŋ.
19 Nɔ ni ji ejwɛ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔtao mumɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ yelikɛbuamɔ ejaakɛ suɔmɔ ji mumɔ lɛ yibii lɛ eko.
15 Kpɔmɔ nɔ lɛ ji hiɛnɔkamɔ diɛŋtsɛ ni adesai yɔɔ, shi jeee susumɔ folo ko ni ana akɛ susuma lɛ hiɔ shi yɛ gbele sɛɛ.
Gbɔmɛi ayifalɛ ni tai gbe yɛ afi 1900 afii lɛ amli lɛ ji nɔ ko ni mɛi ajwɛŋmɔ shɛɛɛ he.
Shi bo lɛ susumɔ nɔ ni kanyaa wɔ lɛ he okwɛ.
Suɔmɔ kɛha Yehowa ji kanyamɔ kpakpa fe fɛɛ ní wɔbaanyɛ wɔná ni wɔkɛkane e-Wiemɔ lɛ.
Kɛ́ eshi wiemɔ kpoku lɛ nɔ pɛ lɛ, no tsɔɔ akɛ egbe wiemɔ lɛ naa.
Kɛ́ ena bɔ ni nibii etee lɛ ehã lɛ, ele akɛ Yehowa miiye eebua wɔ.
Yesu kɛɛ e-Tsɛ lɛ yɛ sɔlemɔ mli akɛ: “Owiemɔ lɛ anɔkwaleŋ.”

42 Etsɔ shãa afɔle ni abaashã daa yɛ nyɛyinɔi fɛɛ amli yɛ kpee buu lɛ shinaa lɛ naa yɛ Yehowa hiɛ, jɛmɛ majie mihe kpo matsɔɔ nyɛ ní mikɛ bo awie yɛ.
Ehi akɛ okɛ hiŋmɛi kome baabote wala mli fe nɔ ni oyɛ hiŋmɛii enyɔ ni abaashɛ bo afɔ̃ Gehena la* lɛ mli.
Beni wɔyaa nɔ wɔkɛ Biblia lɛ tsuɔ nii yɛ shia-kɛ-shia nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ, wɔnaa akɛ ‘ehiɛ kã ni eyɛ hewalɛ.’—Heb.
Bɔ ni Yehowa, mɔ ni feeo, mɔ hu ní shɔ̃o ní eye ebuao kɛjɛ onyɛ musuŋ beebe lɛ, kɛɛ nɛ: Kaashe gbeyei, mitsulɔ Yakob, kɛ bo Yeshurun ní mihalao!”
Kwɛ bɔ ni eyɔɔ oshara akɛ mɔ ko aaasusu akɛ ebaaye ehe tswaa kɛjɛ toigbalamɔ he kɛ́ etɔ̃ mla!
‘Kwɛmɔ Shikpɔŋ Kpakpa Lɛ’ ji dɛŋdade ko ni obaanyɛ okɛtsu nii koni okɛha Ŋmalɛi lɛ ahe shishinumɔ ni oyɔɔ lɛ aya hiɛ.
4 Enɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ esa akɛ wɔsumɔsumɔɔ wɔhe yɛ gbɛnaa nii ni kã wɔnɔ lɛ kɛkɛ hewɔ.
21 Wɔbaanyɛ wɔkɛɛ yɛ 1996 mli, ni shishashaomɔ ko bɛ mli akɛ ashiɛ sanekpakpa lɛ yɛ je lɛŋ he fɛɛ he, kɛjɛ “boka shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ” kɛyashi “anai shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ hu.”
No sɛɛ lɛ, beni Teofilo gbalaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛyaa nitsumɔi pɔtɛɛi ni Nyɔŋmɔ etsu lɛ anɔ lɛ, etee nɔ taakɛ efɔɔ feemɔ yɛ bɔ ni etiɔ sane mli fitsofitso ehaa lɛ mli akɛ: “Ejaakɛ ŋwɛii lɛ ji E-nitsumɔ, shikpɔŋ lɛ ji E-nibɔɔ, ŋshɔ lɛ ji E-nine naa nitsumɔ; gbɔmɔ ji E-nibɔɔ kɛ E-subaŋ; hulu, nyɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii ji E-nibɔɔi, ni efee kɛha okadii, kɛ bei, kɛ gbii, kɛ afii, koni amɛsɔmɔ gbɔmɔ ni amɛfee gbɔmɔ nyɔji; ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ nibii ni bɛ shihilɛ mli lɛ fee nibii fɛɛ ni ba shihilɛ mli, bɔni afee ni atsɔ E-nitsumɔi anɔ ale E-gbojee ni anu shishi.”
Nyɛminuu Russell le akɛ enyɛŋ enyɛ la lɛ nɔ koni ekpɛ eshwie Kpojiemɔ wolo lɛ nɔ, tamɔ bɔ ni gbɛfalɔ ko ni nyiɛ ni feɔ yeyeeye lɛ nyɛŋ atsɔ hulu lɛ yiŋ koni ete shi fe be ni áto aha lɛ lɛ.
+ Ejaakɛ namɔ baanyɛ akɛɛ gbɔmɔ nɔ ni baaba yɛ hulu shishi nɛɛ yɛ egbele sɛɛ?
8 Hindu woloŋlelɔ Swami Sankarananda kɛ Marshall kpaaa gbee yɛ eshishitsɔɔmɔ lɛ mli, ni ekɛɛ akɛ kɛjɛ shishijee lɛ, tɛi ni akɛ woo haa amɛ, ni ale ekomɛi akɛ Sivalinga lɛ, ji “atatuiaŋ la loo hulu kɛ hulu la, ekpɛmɔ” lɛ he okadii.
31 Ni be ni efo mli yɛ Penuel* nɔŋŋ lɛ, hulu lɛ je yɛ enɔ, shi no mli lɛ, egboŋ lɛ hewɔ lɛ eetsutsɔ.
22 Mɛɛ sɛɛ gbɔmɔ náa, kɛ́ etsu nii waa ni ebɔ mɔdɛŋ waa hu koni eshɛ oti ni ekɛma ehiɛ yɛ hulu shishi nɛɛ he?
Yesaia etsɔɔɔ akɛ gbi ko lɛ, hulu, nyɔɔŋtsere, kɛ ŋulamii lɛ kpɛŋ dɔŋŋ.
María kɛfata he akɛ: “Biblia mli ŋmalɛ pɔtɛɛ ko—‘hulu akanyɔ shi yɛ nyɛmlila lɛ nɔ’—ye ebua mi koni mijaje mijwɛŋmɔ ekoŋŋ.
Yesu kɛɛ akɛ: “Ehaa ehulu teɔ shi yɛ mɛi fɔji kɛ mɛi kpakpai anɔ, ni ehaa nugbɔ nɛɔ yɛ jalɔi kɛ mɛi ni bɛ jalɛ lɛ anɔ.”—Mateo 5:45.
Nɔ ni sa kadimɔ ji akɛ, Biblia lɛ haa wɔleɔ akɛ beni Nyɔŋmɔ je nibɔɔ shishi lɛ, eha hulu la kpɛ́ kɛtsɔ atatui ni edi tũu ni hà nui lɛ ahiɛ tamɔ ‘mama ni akɛbala’ gbekɛ lɛ mli.—Hiob 38:4, 9; 1 Mose 1:3-5.
20 Hulu lɛ baatsɔ duŋ ni nyɔɔŋtsere lɛ baatsɔ lá dani Yehowa* gbi wulu ni yɔɔ nyam lɛ baaba.
Eji wɔbɛ hulu lɛ kulɛ, nɔ fɛɛ nɔ baafee ŋanii ni wala ehiŋ shikpɔŋ nɔ.
* Shi beni hulu lɛ tsoɔ yɛ gbi ni sa kadimɔ waa nɛɛ nɔ lɛ, ebafee faŋŋ akɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ shikãmɔ ehiii kwraa.
Kɛlɛ, Mɔ ni bɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ kɛ hulu lɛ tsakeee.
Feemɔ ehe mfoniri ni eedɔ ekuɛ kɛmiiya anaigbɛ ni egbele ehiŋmɛi fioo kɛmiikwɛ nyɔŋtsere lɛ be ni hulu lɛ nyɔɔ shi yɛ Ŋshɔ Kpeteŋkpele lɛ mli, ni eebɔ mɔdɛŋ ni ehã ejwɛŋmɔ akpele bɔ ni eshihilɛ etsake ehã lɛ he lɛ he okwɛ.
Kuku 6 lɛ haa hetoo akɛ: “Amɛsuɔmɔ jio, amɛnyɛɛ jio, amɛwuŋayeli jio, fɛɛ eho etee jeeŋmɔ beebe, ni amɛbɛ gbɛfaŋnɔ ko dɔŋŋ kɛmiiya naanɔ yɛ nii fɛɛ ni afeɔ yɛ hulu shishi nɛɛ mli.”
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛji akɛ ehe miihia ni tsɔne ko atsu nii pɛpɛɛpɛ nɛkɛ lɛ, belɛ wɔ hulu lɛ ni “tsoɔ” jogbaŋŋ lɛ hu?
Kɛji obaanyɛ otĩ hulu lɛ teŋ tuuntu ní shɛɔ aklotia yitso dalɛ ní okɛfɔ̃ biɛ yɛ shikpɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ lɛ, onyɛŋ odamɔ he ni kɛ nakai dɔlɛ jɛɛhe nyɛkɛsiɔɔ lɛ teŋ jɛkɛmɔ aaashɛ kilomitai 140 ní ofee shweshweeshwe!
7 Sane lɛ yaa nɔ akɛ: “Ni egbele bu kwɔŋkwɔŋ lɛ naa, ni lasu te shi kɛjɛ bu lɛ mli tamɔ flɔnɔɔ kpeteŋkpele mli lasu, ni hulu kɛ atatuiaŋ wo duŋ yɛ bu lɛŋ lasu lɛ hewɔ.
Maŋ ni ma gɔŋ nɔ lɛ gbalaa mɔ ni kwɛɔ lɛ jwɛŋmɔ ejaakɛ ejeɔ shi faŋŋ yɛ atatui lɛ amli ni akɛni shia fɛɛ shia ni yɛɔ lɛ jieɔ hulu la kpɛmɔ lɛ kpo lɛ hewɔ.
Ŋulamii Atatui Hulu
Hulu lɛ sɔlemɔtsu ni yɔɔ Palmyra
Shi ni aaakwɛ hulu lɛ ni miinyɔ shi yɛ nɛkɛ gɔŋ ni yɔɔ Apuan Alps yɛ Tuscany, Italy lɛ sɛɛ lɛ ji nɔ ni nɔ bɛ lɛɛlɛŋ.
Ni akɛni la loo kane jɛɔ hulu lɛ nɔ kɛbaa hewɔ lɛ, wɔbaanyɛ wɔna nii, wɔye nii, wɔmu ni wɔhi wala mli.
Ná nɔmimaa akɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ baajɔɔ bo yɛ osusuma fɛɛ ni okɛsɔmɔɔ lɛ, kɛ agbɛnɛ hu yɛ suɔmɔ ni oyɔɔ kɛha lɛ kɛ onanemɛi adesai lɛ hewɔ.—Mateo 22:36-40.
Akɛ sɔɔlɔi ni ahala nyɛ lɛ, nyɛkɛ nyɛ hiɛnɔkamɔ fɛɛ baafɔ Ŋwɛi Flooflonyo lɛ nɔ, ejaakɛ nyɛle akɛ ebaakudɔ nyɛ ni ebaatsɔɔ nyɛ gbɛ yɛ hiamɔ bei fɛɛ mli, ni nyɛbaana nyɛle hu akɛ eji Nyɔŋmɔ ni jɔɔ mɔ lɛlɛŋ.”
Eba akɛ wɔteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ kɛ shidaa aaaha Nyɔŋmɔ wiemɔi ni etsɔ Mose nɔ ekɛha lɛ hetoo: “Mikɛ wala kɛ gbele, jɔɔmɔ kɛ loomɔ eshwie nyɛhiɛ; no hewɔ lɛ kɔ wala, koni bo kɛ oseshi fɛɛ ayi ana wala.”—5 Mose 30:19.
Yaa nɔ okase Biblia lɛ, ni Nyɔŋmɔ baajɔɔ bo!
Abraham eye aaafee afii 75 beni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Jee oshikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kɛ ojaku lɛ kɛ otsɛ we lɛ kɛya shikpɔŋ ni matsɔɔo lɛ nɔ. Ni maha otsɔ jeŋmaŋ kpeteŋkpele, ni majɔɔo!”—1 Mose 12:1, 2.
+ 29 Kɛkɛ lɛ, Levinyo ni bɛ gbɛfaŋnɔ loo gboshinii ko yɛ nyɛteŋ, kɛ gbɔ kɛ gbekɛ ni bɛ tsɛ* kɛ yoo okulafo ni yɔɔ omaji lɛ amli lɛ baaba ni amɛbaye ni amɛtɔrɔ,+ koni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ajɔɔ bo yɛ nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni ofeɔ lɛ mli.
“Esa akɛ nɛkɛ jɔɔmɔi nɛɛ fɛɛ aba onɔ ní onine ashɛ nɔ, ejaakɛ oboɔ Yehowa o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ gbee toi be fɛɛ be.”—5 MOSE 28:2, NW.
+ 26 Be ni Nyɔŋmɔ tsu e-Tsulɔ lɛ, etsu lɛ kɛba nyɛŋɔɔ klɛŋklɛŋ,+ koni ebajɔɔ nyɛ ni ehã nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ aku esɛɛ kɛjɛ enifɔjianii lɛ amli.”
Ni kaimɔ be fɛɛ be akɛ Nyɔŋmɔ “ni ŋɔɔ nibii fɛɛ ehaa wɔ babaoo, akɛ wɔye mli ŋɔɔmɔ lɛ” ewo bo shi akɛ obaanyɛ oná jɔɔmɔi babaoo amrɔ nɛɛ kɛ wɔsɛɛ hu kɛ́ ohala otii ni woɔ ehiɛnyam lɛ.—1 Timoteo 6:17.
29 “Kɛ́ Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛ bo yashɛ shikpɔŋ ni oyaa oyaŋɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ, jajemɔ jɔɔmɔ lɛ otsɔɔ* yɛ Gerizim Gɔŋ lɛ nɔ, ni ojaje loomɔ lɛ otsɔɔ* yɛ Ebal Gɔŋ lɛ nɔ.
Eji Yehowa webii ni hi shi yɛ blema lɛ bo lɛ toi kulɛ, amɛna jɔɔmɔi babaoo amli ŋɔɔmɔ, ejaakɛ ekɛɛ amɛ akɛ: “Miji Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, Mɔ ni tsɔɔ bo nii ni hi hao, Mɔ ni tsɔɔ bo gbɛ ni onyiɛ nɔ lɛ.
27 No hewɔ lɛ, jɛɛ osuɔmɔ mli ojɔɔ otsulɔ shĩa lɛ, ni ohã ehi shi kɛya naanɔ yɛ ohiɛ, ejaakɛ bo, Yehowa, ojɔɔ otsulɔ shĩa lɛ, ni ajɔɔ shĩa lɛ kɛmiiya naanɔ.”
29 No hewɔ lɛ, jɛɛ osuɔmɔ mli ojɔɔ otsulɔ shĩa lɛ, ni ohã ehi shi kɛya naanɔ yɛ ohiɛ;+ ejaakɛ bo, Nuŋtsɔ Ofe Yehowa, owo shi, ni hã akɛ ojɔɔmɔ lɛ ajɔɔ otsulɔ shĩa lɛ kɛya naanɔ.”
Ni majɔɔ mɛi ni jɔɔo, ni mɔ ni lomɔɔo lɛ, malomɔ lɛ; ni omli aaajɛ ajɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ wekui fɛɛ.”
13 Agbɛnɛ susumɔ he akɛ oonu ni mɛi ni yɔɔ Gerizim Gɔŋ lɛ hiɛ lɛ kɛ amɛgbee miiha jɔɔmɔ fɛɛ jɔɔmɔ hetoo, yɛ be mli ni Levibii lɛ jajeɔ lɛ: “Aaajɔɔo yɛ maŋ, ni aaajɔɔo yɛ ŋmɔshi.
Ni majɔɔ mɛi ni jɔɔo, ni mɔ ni lomɔɔo lɛ, malomɔ lɛ; ni omli aaajɛ ajɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ wekui fɛɛ.”—1 Mose 12:1-3; Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 7:2, 3.
+ 3 Majɔɔ mɛi ni jɔɔ bo lɛ, ni malomɔ mɔ ni lomɔɔ bo lɛ,+ ni bo onɔ abaatsɔ ajɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ wekui fɛɛ.”
Biblia lɛ wieɔ ehe akɛ: “Ajɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔ-Nuŋtsɔ Yesu Kristo tsɛ lɛ, mɔ ni ji musuŋtsɔlɛi atsɛ kɛ miishɛjemɔ fɛɛ Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, mɔ ni shɛjeɔ wɔmii yɛ wɔmanehului lɛ fɛɛ mli, koni wɔ hu wɔnyɛ wɔkɛ miishɛjemɔ, ni Nyɔŋmɔ ŋɔshɛjeɔ wɔ diɛŋtsɛ wɔmii lɛ, ashɛje mɛi ni naa amanehulu fɛɛ amanehulu lɛ amii.”
Kɛkɛ ni maŋtsɛ lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: ‘Ajɔɔ Shadrak kɛ Meshak kɛ Abednego Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, ni tsu ebɔfoi koni amɛbahere etsuji ayiwala akɛni amɛjáaa nyɔŋmɔ ko kwraa akɛ ja amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ pɛ lɛ.’—Daniel, yitso 3.
Taakɛ Nyɔŋmɔ ewo shi yɛ e-Wiemɔ ni jɛ mumɔŋ ni ji Biblia lɛ mli lɛ, “shikpɔŋ lɛ [aaa]ba enii; Naanyɔŋmɔ ni ji wɔ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ aaajɔɔ wɔ.”
Kɛkɛ ni maŋtsɛ lɛ bo akɛ: “Ajie Shadrak, Meshak, kɛ Abednego Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ yi akɛ etsu ebɔfo, mɔ ni fata amɛhe fee ejwɛ yɛ flɔnɔɔ lɛ mli lɛ ni ebajie etsuji ni ŋɔ amɛhiɛ amɛfɔ enɔ, ni amɛtsake maŋtsɛ lɛ wiemɔ lɛ hiɛ, ni amɛŋɔ amɛgbɔmɔtsei amɛha, koni amɛkasɔmɔ nyɔŋmɔ ko nyɔŋmɔ ko ni amɛja lɛ, akɛ ja amɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛkɛ lɛ! . . .
David le akɛ toiboo ni eeefee eha Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ ehe ni ekɛaafɔ̃ enɔ lɛ baaha ená miishɛɛ kɛ jɔɔmɔi babaoo, ni ákɛ kɛ́ ekwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, enáŋ ehiɛ duromɔ.
Ejaje akɛ: “Ajie Shadrak, Meshak kɛ Abednego Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ yi akɛ etsu ebɔfo, ni ebajie etsuji ni ŋɔ amɛhiɛ amɛfɔ̃ enɔ, ni amɛtsake maŋtsɛ lɛ wiemɔ lɛ hiɛ, ni amɛŋɔ amɛgbɔmɔtsei amɛha, koni amɛkasɔmɔ nyɔŋmɔ ko nyɔŋmɔ ko ni amɛjá lɛ, akɛ ja amɛ-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛkɛ!”
12 “Kɛji eba lɛ akɛ onu yɛ omaji ni Yehowa, o-Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ, kɛhãa bo akɛ ohi mli lɛ ateŋ eko mli akɛ, 13 ‘Hii yaka gbɔmɛi komɛi ejɛ nyɛteŋ amɛtee koni amɛyahã amɛmaŋ lɛ mli bii lɛ aje Nyɔŋmɔ sɛɛ, ni amɛkɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛhãa wɔyaa ni wɔyasɔmɔa nyɔŋmɔi krokomɛi,” nyɔŋmɔi ni nyɛleee lɛ,’ 14 no lɛ, taomɔ sane lɛ mli, bi mli ni opɛi mli fitsofitso;+ ni kɛ́ oná nɔmimaa akɛ afee nɛkɛ nihiinii nɛɛ yɛ nyɛteŋ lɛɛlɛŋ lɛ, 15 no lɛ, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, okɛ klante agbe nakai maŋ lɛ mli bii lɛ.
+ 10 Kɛkɛ ni miwo bo atade ni alo nii awo mli, ni miwo bo tokota ni akɛ kooloo hewolo kpakpa* fee, ni mikɛ klala kpakpa bala bo, ni miwo bo atadei ni jara wa.
11 Beni Israelbii lɛ yɔɔ Mizraim lolo lɛ, Yehowa tsu Mose kɛtee Farao ŋɔɔ ni ekɛɛ lɛ akɛ: “Yaa Farao ŋɔɔ, shi miwaje etsui kɛ etsuji lɛ atsui, bɔni afee ni mafee mikadii nɛɛ fɛɛ matsɔɔ amɛ, koni ogba nibii ni mifee yɛ Mizraim, kɛ mikadii hu ni mifee yɛ amɛteŋ lɛ, owo obii kɛ obii abii atoiaŋ, koni nyɛna nyɛle akɛ mi ji Yehowa lɛ.”
(Bɔfoi 20:35) Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, manyɛ makɛɛ akɛ miyɛ miishɛɛ waa, ni eyɛ mli akɛ be ko ni eho lɛ kulɛ misusu akɛ minyɛŋ manyɛ maye mɛi, shi amrɔ nɛɛ mina akɛ manyɛ maye mabua mɛi krokomɛi.
20 Ejaakɛ miishe gbeyei akɛ yɛ gbɛ ko nɔ lɛ kɛ́ miba lɛ, ekolɛ mibanaŋ nyɛ bɔ ni mitaoɔ, ni mibafeŋ bɔ ni nyɛ hu nyɛtaoɔ, moŋ lɛ ekolɛ mabana béi, kɛ awuŋayeli, kɛ mlifu, kɛ naataamɔ, kɛ mɔfitemɔ, kɛ ablɛbiwiemɔ,* kɛ henɔwomɔ, kɛ basabasafeemɔ.
10 Ni Yehowa kɛɛ Mose akɛ: “Yaa Farao ŋɔɔ, ejaakɛ miŋmɛ gbɛ koni ekpiliŋ etsui, ní etsuji lɛ hu akpiliŋ amɛtsui,+ koni mafee mikadii nɛɛ yɛ ehiɛ,+ 2 agbɛnɛ hu, koni ogba obii kɛ onabii bɔ ni migbala Ejipt toi waa, kɛ okadii hu ni mifee yɛ amɛteŋ lɛ;+ ni nyɛbaaná nyɛle akɛ miji Yehowa lɛ.”
Michael kɛɛ akɛ: “Minu he akɛ esa akɛ makpɛ miyiŋ yɛ jɛmɛ amrɔ nɔŋŋ, no hewɔ lɛ, mimu waa ni mikɛɛ lɛ akɛ, ‘Amrɔ nɛɛ, Yehowa Odasefoi ateŋ mɔ kome ji mi,’ eyɛ mli akɛ nakai be lɛ mli lɛ abaptisiko mi moŋ.
Edɔɔ mi waa akɛ mihi shi afii babaoo ni mileee Nyɔŋmɔ jogbaŋŋ, shi eŋɔɔ minaa waa akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ mile Nyɔŋmɔ ni mijaa lɛ lɛ.—w12-E 9/1.
+ 2 Eyɛ mli akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ mibɛ nyɛŋɔɔ moŋ, shi etamɔ nɔ ni miyɛ nyɛŋɔɔ nɔ ni ji shii enyɔ nɔ, ni miitsɔ hiɛ miibɔ mɛi ni be ko ni eho lɛ amɛfee esha, kɛ mɛi krokomɛi lɛ fɛɛ kɔkɔ akɛ, kɛ́ miná miba ekoŋŋ lɛ, mikɛ amɛhe ekeŋ amɛ, 3 ejaakɛ nyɛmiitao odaseyeli ni tsɔɔ akɛ, Kristo, mɔ ni gbɔjɔɔɔ yɛ nyɛgbɛfaŋ, shi moŋ ehe wa yɛ nyɛteŋ lɛ, miitsɔ minɔ eewie lɛɛlɛŋ.
19 Nyɛsɔlea nyɛhãa mi hu, koni kɛ́ migbele minaa lɛ, akɛ wiemɔi lɛ awo minaa, koni kɛ́ miijaje sane kpakpa lɛ he teemɔŋ sane krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ, manyɛ mawie kɛ ekãa,+ 20 sane kpakpa ni mitsuɔ he nii akɛ maŋ bɔfo+ yɛ tsein mli* nɛɛ, ni mawie he kɛ ekãa, bɔ ni sa akɛ miwie lɛ.
Eyɛ mli akɛ amrɔ nɛɛ miye nɔ ni fe afii 70 moŋ, shi minyɛɔ mitsuɔ nii gbi muu fɛɛ yɛ nihoomɔhe lɛ kɛ niyeli tsũ lɛ mli.
Dani obaasɛndi nakai sane lɛ, bi ohe akɛ: ‘Ani miyɛ nɔmimaa akɛ sane nɛɛ ni miyasɛndi lɛ yɛ mli?
Ni kɛlɛ enyɛ eŋma Kolosebii lɛ akɛ: “Ejaakɛ kɛ mikɛ nyɛ bɛ yɛ heloo gbɛfaŋ jiŋŋ, mumɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ, mikɛ nyɛ yɛ, ni mimii shɛɔ, ni minaa nyɛ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ kɛ nyɛhé ni nyɛheɔ Kristo nɔ nyɛyeɔ lɛ shifimɔ lɛ.”
3 Miida Nyɔŋmɔ, mɔ ni mikɛ sɔɔmɔ krɔŋŋ hãa tamɔ bɔ ni mitsɛmɛi lɛ fee lɛ shi, ni mifeɔ nakai kɛ henilee ni he tse, ni mikpaaa bo kaimɔ yɛ fai ni mikɛ hiɛdɔɔ kpaa jenamɔ kɛ jetsɛremɔ lɛ mli.
Esa akɛ Paulo amia ehiɛ ni edamɔ naa, shi ekɛɛ kɛfata he akɛ: “Kɛ mifee gbedee lɛ, no moŋ mináa hewalɛ.”

YITSO KPAWO
Jeŋ hewalɛi kpawo ni sa kadimɔ krɛdɛɛ yɛ Biblia mli lɛ ji Mizraim, Ashur, Babilonia, Media kɛ Persia, Hela, Roma, kɛ Anglo Amerika jeŋ hewalɛ ni bɔ he enyɔ lɛ.
Shi ekɛɛ Yakob akɛ etsu nii afii kpawo yɛ eŋmɔ mli dani ekɛ Rahel aha lɛ.
Wɔ fɛɛ wɔhe wɔye akɛ gbekɛ yoo ni gbo lɛ susuma baakpata mɔ ni gbe lɛ trukaa lɛ hiɛ yɛ gbii kpawo mli.
Shi Yehowa baa Noa kɛ “mɛi kpawo krokomɛi ayi beni ekɛ nu afua ba mɛi ni kwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ aje lɛ nɔ” lɛ.
Yɛ June 21, 1918 lɛ, awo Nyɛminuu Rutherford kɛ Biblia Kaselɔi onukpai krokomɛi kpawo tsuŋ, kɛ afii 10 loo 20 tsuŋwoi babaoo ni tsara nɔ shii abɔ.
Aye blodo ni ashikishaŋ-sha* bɛ mli lɛ gbii kpawo.
Shi kɛlɛ, ekolɛ yɛ be kɛ bei amli lɛ mɔ ni kwɛɔ nikasemɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ baagbala toibolɔi lɛ awo nikasemɔ lɛ mli ni ekanya amɛjwɛŋmɔ yɛ sane ni agbaa lɛ he kɛtsɔ sanebimɔi krokomɛi ni ebaabi kɛfata he lɛ nɔ.
Mɛni hewɔ esaaa akɛ gbalashihilɛ mli bii náa bɔlɛnamɔ henumɔi amɛhãa mɛi ni jeee amɛhefatalɔi lɛ?
▪ Nyɛtoa shiɛmɔ wiemɔ kuku ko ni damɔ Biblia mli ŋmalɛ kome kɛ woji ni akɛ mɛi kaseɔ lɛ eko mli kuku kome nɔ lɛ he gbɛjianɔ.
No hewɔ lɛ etao wolo lɛ, ni beni ena lɛ, lɛ hu ekɛha ebinuu lɛ.

“Kɛlɛ, gbi ko Hɔgbaa lɛ, minu nɔ ko ni ha mitsake misusumɔ.
Kɛ oshɛ helatsamɔhe lɛ, ekolɛ datrɛfoi lɛ ateŋ mɔ kome baakɛɛ bo akɛ helatsamɔhei bibii fioo komɛi yɛ nsara lɛ mli, he ni atsuɔ naagbai bibii ahe nii yɛ; ni ahaa akɛ osharai ni eba mɔ nɔ kɛ naagbai ni mli wa he saji yaa helatsamɔhe lɛ.
Aloo ebaashi tooi 99 lɛ yɛ he ko ni yɔɔ shweshweeshwe koni eya eyatao ekome ni elaaje lɛ?
Gbɔmɛi ayifalɛ ni tai gbe yɛ afi 1900 afii lɛ amli lɛ ji nɔ ko ni mɛi ajwɛŋmɔ shɛɛɛ he.
No mli lɛ, atsɛ́ɔ akutso ni wɔyɔɔ mli lɛ akɛ Forrest River Mission, ni klas 1 kɛyashi klas 5 skul he gbɛjianɔtoo pɛ yɔɔ jɛmɛ.
Wɔbua lai saŋŋ naa ni wɔkɛshɛre la, ni wɔhoo wɔniyenii ni eshwɛ lɛ, kɛkɛ ni wɔyi gbɛ.
Wɔkɛ saji ni abua naa lɛ fɔɔ gbɛfaa Hɔɔ shwane loo Hɔgbaa, be ni Ataa eyaaa nitsumɔ lɛ.
Anɔkwafoi ni yɔɔ hiɛnɔkamɔ akɛ amɛbaahi shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ baaná wala ni hi kɛwula shi kɛ́ amɛnyɛ amɛye naagbee kaa ni amɛkɛbaakpe yɛ Kristo Afii Akpe Nɔyeli lɛ sɛɛ nɔŋŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ.—1 Kor.
Gbi ko baaba ni mɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ baatsɔmɔ nyɛmimɛi hii kɛ nyɛmimɛi yei, ni amɛfee ekome yɛ anɔkwa Nyɔŋmɔ lɛ kɛ mɛi fɛɛ a-Tsɛ lɛ jamɔ mli.
Kpaako miná mile akɛ oheɔ mi oyeɔ, ejaakɛ okamaaa mi obinuu, ni ji obi kome too lɛ.’
Ehi akɛ okɛ hiŋmɛi kome baabote wala mli fe nɔ ni oyɛ hiŋmɛii enyɔ ni abaashɛ bo afɔ̃ Gehena la* lɛ mli.
Etsɛ́ɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ní ta eŋwɛi maŋtsɛsɛi lɛ nɔ lɛ wiemɔi asɛɛ akɛ eejaje akɛ: “Naa, miifee nii fɛɛ ehee.”
Kwɛ bɔ ni eyɔɔ oshara akɛ mɔ ko aaasusu akɛ ebaaye ehe tswaa kɛjɛ toigbalamɔ he kɛ́ etɔ̃ mla!
4 Enɛ etsɔɔɔ akɛ esa akɛ wɔsumɔsumɔɔ wɔhe yɛ gbɛnaa nii ni kã wɔnɔ lɛ kɛkɛ hewɔ.
Nɔ ni aŋma afɔ̃ shi yɛ Biblia lɛ mli lɛ kaneɔ akɛ: “Ni Miriam kɛ Aaron wie Mose he yɛ Kushyoo ni eyaŋɔ lɛ hewɔ; . . .
5 Satan kɛ gbɛ̀i srɔtoi fɛɛ ni eeenyɛ etsu nii koni ekɛbɔ mɔdɛŋ ni ekɛtsĩ Kristo nyɛmimɛi lɛ kɛ amɛ hefatalɔi anɔkwafoi lɛ odaseyeli nitsumɔ lɛ naa.
Be ni Yesu kɛ Petro kwɔ lɛlɛ lɛ, ahum lɛ kpa tswaa amrɔ nɔŋŋ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, beni Yudanyo ko ni atsɛɔ lɛ Saulo nyiɛ gbɛ kɛyaa Damasko lɛ, ena naakpɛɛ ninaa ko bɔni afee ni no aha ekpa Kristo kaselɔi lɛ ayiwaa.
(Mateo 22:37-39) Ekãa ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ hewɔ lɛ, wɔkpaŋ shiɛmɔ.
Afrika wiemɔ ko ní afɔɔ wiemɔ lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “(Kristojamɔ loo Islam) hemɔkɛyeli lɛ nɔkpɛlɛmɔ etsĩii wɔnaa akɛ wɔkajá nyɔŋmɔi ní wɔyɔɔ yɛ wɔmaŋ lɛ mli lɛ.”
11 Ni wɔhenyɛlɔi lɛ tee nɔ amɛkɛɛ akɛ: “Be ni amɛaahɛle shi loo be ni amɛaana lɛ, wɔbote amɛteŋ ni wɔgbe amɛ ni wɔhã akpa nitsumɔ lɛ.”
* Kpa nibii ni tamɔ nakai lɛ taomɔ.”’
7 Shi nakai mɔ lɛ here nɔ kɛjɛ tsũ lɛ mli ekɛɛ: ‘Kpa minaagbamɔ.
Ani Nyɔŋmɔ henyɛlɔi lɛ baanyɛ atsĩ anɔkwa jamɔ hiɛyaa lɛ naa?
Efɔɔ kaa akɛ kɛ́ gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi kɛ naagbai kpe lɛ, amɛkɛ amɛhe kpaa sanegbaa, ni enɛ haa amɛmli fuɔ amɛhe.
Kɛ́ okane Biblia lɛ fã ko ogbe naa lɛ, mɛɛ fioo ni obi ohe saji ni nyiɛ sɛɛ nɛɛ: ‘Mɛni enɛ hãa mileɔ yɛ Yehowa he?
Kɛkɛ ni be ko bashɛ ni minyɛɛɛ naa madamɔ dɔŋŋ, kɛkɛ ni mifɔ̃ɔ miwu lɛ kɛ wiemɔ kɛyashi beni mitsui nyɔ mimli.”
Awa mɛi krokomɛi akpei abɔ yi, afee amɛ niseniianii, ni agbe amɛteŋ mɛi komɛi po akɛni amɛfɔ̃ɔɔ sanekpakpa lɛ shiɛmɔ hewɔ, loo akɛni amɛkɛ nanemɛi heyelilɔi kpaaa bɔɔ yɛ asafoŋ kpeei ashishi lɛ hewɔ.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni ooowa ni okwɛ wiemɔ fɛɛ wiemɔ lɛ, bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni ona wiemɔi pii yɛ be kome mli.
Ní amɛyashɛ Galilea lɛ, amɛwa yɛ maŋ ni Natanael jɛ mli, ni ji Kana lɛ mli.
Kɛji akɛ naanyo heyelilɔ ko fee mɔ ko nɔ ko ni edɔ lɛ waa lɛ, ekolɛ ebaahao waa yɛ jwɛŋmɔŋ aahu akɛ ebaanu he akɛ esa akɛ ekpa Kristofoi akpeeiyaa loo ekpa shiɛmɔyaa.—Luka 17:1.
Gbi ko yɛ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli lɛ, miyadamɔ agba ko ni yɔɔ gbɛ he lɛ shishi.
Naagbee lɛ ebabi ni makɛɛ nyɛmimɛi lɛ koni amɛkpa yelikɛbuamɔ ni amɛkɛ haa mi yɛ niyenii kɛ shia kwramɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ!
Enáaa lɛ mlɛo akɛ eeekpa dãanumɔ, shi naagbee lɛ, enyɛ efee nakai.
Kɛ́ okɛ shihilɛ nɛɛ loo ekroko ni tamɔ nakai kpe lɛ, obaanyɛ obi ohe akɛ: ‘Ani mihefatalɔ lɛ miitsɔɔ akɛ mikpa Yehowa jamɔ kwraa?
Akɛni miisumɔ ni makpa dãatɔɔ hewɔ lɛ, mikpa paati kɛ disko yaa, ejaakɛ kɛ́ mitee hei nɛɛ, ewaaa kwraa akɛ mayanu dãa.
(Yesaia 30:11b) Ha Yesaia akpa wiemɔ yɛ Yehowa, ni ji “Israel Mɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ lɛ” gbɛi anɔ!
Megan: Akɛ́ fɔlɔ lɛ, bo lɛ susumɔ bɔ ni Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ, ni ji Yesu ŋwɛi Tsɛ lɛ, baanu he ehã be ni agbe Yesu lɛ he okwɛ.

Makai Dada wiemɔ ni ewie yɛ nakai be lɛ mli lɛ daa akɛ: “Wɔkpaŋ lɛ mra nakai.
18, 19. (a) Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ oootsɔ otiu otii ni woɔ Nyɔŋmɔ hiɛnyam lɛ asɛɛ?
(Bɔfoi lɛ Asaji 20:28; Yakobo 5:14, 15; Yuda 22) Amɛbaaye amɛbua bo ni ona oyiŋkɔshikɔshi feemɔ lɛ jɛɛhe, ni ekolɛ eeenyɛ efee henɔwomɔ loo susumɔ ko ni ejaaa.
21 Kɛkɛ ni miwó nakai nɔ gbonyo* ni nyɛfee, ni ji tsinabi lɛ,+ ni mishã yɛ la mli; mijwara lɛ ni miwiɛ lɛ aahu kɛyashi be ni efee munyɔmunyɔ tamɔ mulu, ni mitsi mulu lɛ mishwie faa ni jɛɔ gɔŋ lɛ mli hoɔ lɛ mli.
Kɛ́ oku osɛɛ otee lɛ, okɛ baafa 4-5 lɛ atsu nii.
(Abɛi 20:5) Kɛ́ ootao ní oshɛ etsui he lɛ, no lɛ mlihilɛ, sane shishinumɔ, kɛ suɔmɔ ní ooojie lɛ kpo lɛ he miihia.
Paulo jaje akɛ: “Wɔdaa Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ wɔ-Nuntsɔ Yesu Kristo tsɛ lɛ shi [NW shishigbɛ niŋmaa, “wɔsɔleɔ daa”] yɛ nyɛhewɔ daa nɛɛ yɛ wɔsɔlemɔi amli.”
Kɛ oba kpee lɛ shishi ni etɔ bo waa lɛ, sane toiboo baafee nɔ ni wa. (b) Tsɔ hiɛ ona be babaoo ni okɛ okar lɛ ayama shi ni oyata shi dani wiemɔ he gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ aje shishi.
Kwɛmɔ akɛ owiemɔ naamuu lɛ kɔɔ susumɔi ni okɛha momo lɛ ahe tɛ̃ɛ.
19 Shi jeee bo ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ, shi moŋ, bo diɛŋtsɛ obinuu ni abaafɔ ahã bo lɛ,* lɛ ji mɔ ni baama shĩa lɛ ehã migbɛ́i lɛ.’
Kɛ́ onyiɛ gbɛjegbɛi bibii ni lɔgɔɔ shi yɛ gɔji lɛ ekomɛi anɔ lɛ nɔ lɛ, onaa shikpɔŋ lɛ kɛ ŋshɔ lɛ shikamɔ kɛyaa shɔŋŋ, ni kɛ́ ookwɛ lɛ, eyɛ fɛo pam.
Sɔlemɔ baanyɛ asaa bo ni ekudɔ bo hu.
Te ooofee tɛŋŋ okɛ sane nɛɛ ato mɔ ni egbɔ he lɛ?
ŊWANEJEE ko bɛ he akɛ Yesu Kristo sɛɛnyiɛlɔi ni darako lɛ yɛ ejwɛŋmɔ mli beni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛbaa miŋɔɔ, . . . ni maha nyɛ hejɔɔmɔ” lɛ.
Taakɛ lalatsɛ lɛ kɛɛ lɛ, obaanyɛ ‘ona Yehowa mlihilɛ lɛ.’
Ejaakɛ sũ jio, ni sũ mli oooku osɛɛ kɛaatee!”
Mɔ ni kɛ bo kaseɔ Biblia lɛ baanyɛ aye abua bo ni osaa ohe yɛ sane ni obaasumɔ ni oha hetoo yɛ asafoŋ kpeei ni baanyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ shishi.
Okɛ klante gbe Uria, Hitnyo lɛ!
Kɛ́ obɛ nɔmimaa akɛ obaanyɛ ofee enɛ lɛ, no lɛ kaa gbɛgbalɔi awamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nyɔŋ kome loo nyɔji enyɔ okwɛ, ni okɛma ohiɛ akɛ obaaná ŋmɛlɛtswai 70 yɛ eko fɛɛ eko mli.
10 Yɛ be mli ni ewieɔ “nakai yoo Isabel” lɛ he lɛ, Yesu tee nɔ akɛ: “Ni ebii lɛ, gbe magbe amɛ; ni asafoi lɛ fɛɛ aaana ale akɛ mi ji mɔ ni taoɔ sabai kɛ tsuii amli, ni maha nyɛteŋ mɔ fɛɛ mɔ bɔ ni nyɛnitsumɔi lɛ yɔɔ lɛ.”
Ni kɛ́ nyɛna akɛ bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni fee lɛ, nyɛnyɛŋ nyɛkɛ nyɛhe awo mli hu?
“Nyɛ yeigbayei lɛ hu, nyɛbaa nyɛhe shi nyɛhaa nyɛ diɛŋtsɛ nyɛwumɛi lɛ, koni, kɛ mɛi komɛi booo wiemɔ lɛ toi tete lɛ, ashi wiemɔ lɛ sɛɛ ni atsɔ yei lɛ ajeŋba nɔ ni nine ashɛ amɛnɔ, ejaakɛ amɛnaa nyɛjeŋba ni hetsemɔ kɛ gbeyeishemɔ yɔɔ mli lɛ.” —1 Petro 3: 1-4.
17 Kɛ́ okwɛɔ ponografi lɛ, esa akɛ obi yelikɛbuamɔ amrɔ nɔŋŋ.
Ejaakɛ bo okome too ji mɔ krɔŋkrɔŋ; ejaakɛ jeŋmaji fɛɛ aaaba ni amɛbaja yɛ ohiɛ, ejaakɛ ajie ojalɛ nii lɛ ashi faŋŋ”!
Ni ahosoŋ toiŋjɔlɛ kpaŋmɔ ni mikpaŋ lɛ hu,”+ Yehowa, mɔ ni naa bo mɔbɔ lɛ kɛɛ.
‘Bo mɔ ni ohiɔ ŋshɔ lɛ agbói lɛ anaa,
Maji babaoo fiɔ coypright (mla naa gbɛŋmɛɛ) he gbeekpamɔi ni aba koni akɛbu “woloŋlee gboshinii” ni tamɔ kɔmpiuta mli gbɛjianɔtoi lɛ ahe lɛ sɛɛ, ni amɛbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛha atsu mla naa gbɛŋmɛɛ mlai lɛ ahe nii.
Oblanuu ko ná suɔmɔ eha ilɛtrɔniki tsɔnei nɛɛ eko aahu akɛ eyahɔɔ esabai lɛ ekome ni ekɛyahe tsɔne nɛɛ.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni ooowie ŋmalɛi otii lɛ ahe loo oookane kɛjɛ nɔ ni oprinti loo kɛjɛ ilɛtrɔnik tsɔne ko nɔ lɛ, gbelemɔ Biblia lɛ ni okane kɛjɛ mli, ni owo toibolɔi lɛ hewalɛ ni amɛ hu amɛfee nakai.
Esaaa akɛ ashĩɔ ahaa kɔmpiuta lɛ koni no atsɔɔ.
Daa otsi kɛ́ wɔweku lɛ miikase Biblia lɛ, ekwɛɔ mi, kɛkɛ lɛ ekwɛ ekɔmpiuta lɛ.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kumpiuta kɛ adafitswai ahe tsɔji ni akɛtsuɔ nii yɛ nilee mli lɛ eha anyɛɔ akalaa Buu-Mɔɔ yɛ wiemɔi 121 mli kɛ Awake!
Okɔmpiuta?
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, ebiɔ ni afee ekãa dani anyɛ ate shi ni ashi sinikwɛmɔhe ko loo ni agbe kumpiuta loo TV kɛ́ aajie nibii ni bɛ hiŋmɛi nɔ lɛ.
Kristofoi ni gbɛnaa nii ka amɛnɔ lɛ tsɔɔɔ hiɛ amɛtooo Biblia mli maŋshiɛmɔi loo kpee lɛ mli nifeemɔ fãi lɛ ahe gbɛjianɔ amɛwooo kɔmpiutai amli koni mɛi krokomɛi kɛtsu nii.
Oblayoo ko ni yɔɔ Asia Wuoyi-bokagbɛ lɛ kɛ ekɔmpiuta lɛ tsuɔ nii kɛtsɔɔ wiemɔ shishi kɛyashiɔ nyɔɔŋ, ni etɔɔ lɛ waa, latsaa tsaa lɛ, ni akɛni akɔɔ kane yɛ be kɛ beaŋ hewɔ lɛ, ehaaa nitsumɔ lɛ aya lɛ bɔ ni etaoɔ.
Mikɔmpiuta lɛ yeɔ ebuaa mi hu ni minyɛɔ miboɔ nibii ni yaa nɔ yɛ asafoŋ kpeei ashishi lɛ toi, ni mikɛ mihe woɔ mli.
Taakɛ aŋkroaŋkroi ni bɛ jeŋba lɛ baanyɛ ni amɛkɛ muawai—nifeemɔ ni ato he gbɛjianɔ koni akɛfite ni akɛkpata kɔmpiuta mli saji ahiɛ lɛ awo adafitswaa tao ko nɔ lɛ—nakai nɔŋŋ hemɔkɛyeli kwalɔi, osɔfoi, kɛ mɛi ni sumɔɔ ni amɛfite mɛi krokomɛi ajeŋba loo amɛfee enɛ yɛ gbɛ kroko nɔ lɛ baanyɛ amɛkɛ amɛjwɛŋmɔŋ ebɔɔ lɛ awo adafitswaa taoi anɔ yɛ gbɛ ni waaa kwraa nɔ.
Shi kɛlɛ, esaaa ni akɛ asafo mli saji ni aŋmala ni afee woji kɛha nomɛi lɛ toɔ kɔmpiutai amli, akɛni gbekɛbii loo mɛi krokomɛi ni ahako amɛ hegbɛ akɛ amɛna saji nɛɛ lɛ nine baanyɛ ashɛ nɔ lɛ hewɔ.
Kɔmpiutai baanyɛ amɛkɛ nilee babaoo diɛŋtsɛ ato, shi ewa waa akɛ aaasusu he akɛ mɔ ko baawie nɛkɛ tsɔnei nɛɛ ahe akɛ amɛle ŋaa.
Mikɛ mɛi gbaa sane kɛtsɔɔ tso ni mikɛtsuɔ nii kɛtswaa kɔmpiuta lɛ nɔ.
15 Ŋmɛnɛ lɛ, sinii, vidioi, TV nɔ nifeemɔi, kɔmpiuta gemisii, kɛ Intanɛt nɔ nifeemɔi pii yɛ ni kɔɔ daimonioi, majik, kɛ hewalɛi ni fe adesai anɔ he.
Nɔ ni tá wui ni mli wa, fãji ni yɔɔ tswãa, kɛ nibii ni haa wɔgbɔmɔtso lɛ nuɔ nibii ahe lɛ fɛɛ nɔ ji aŋsɔ ko ni nɔ kwɔ kwraa fe kooloo fɛɛ kooloo aŋsɔ, ni yɔɔ nyɛmɔi hu ni kompiuta ni dalɛ aaashɛ ŋwɛitsu ŋsɔɔdoi babaoo nyɛŋ ekɛ lɛ aye egbɔ kɔkɔɔkɔ.
Jeŋ nilelɔ ko ni yɔɔ Massachusetts Institute of Technology lɛ kɛɛ akɛ: “Ŋmɛnɛŋmɛnɛ kɔmpiutai ni yɔɔ lɛ shɛɛɛ adesa ko ni eye afii 4 lɛ he, yɛ amɛnyɛmɔi ni amɛkɛnaa nii, amɛkɛwieɔ, amɛkɛtsiɔ amɛhe, aloo amɛjwɛŋmɔ ni amɛkɛtsuɔ nii lɛ he kwraa. . . .
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, abaanyɛ aha elɛtrik stof adɔ, kɔmpiuta atsu saji ahe nii, ebu akɔntaa, aha tɛlivishiŋ afee mfonirii ni egbɛɛ.
No hewɔ lɛ, Biblia lɛ ji klɛŋklɛŋ wolo ni niiamlipɛilɔ lɛ tswa emli wiemɔi lɛ ewo kɔmpiuta mli bɔni afee ni ekɛ emli wiemɔi lɛ ato ni enyɛ ejɛ no mli ekɛtsɔɔ wolo hee ko shishi.
Kɛkɛ ni Web site ko ni miiwie jeŋba shara he pue yɛ ekɔmpiuta lɛ nɔ.
Nyɛmimɛi ni he esa ni jɛ maji krokomɛi anɔ tsɔɔ amɛ bɔ ni akɛ laptop kompiuta bibii tsuɔ nii ni amɛkɛtsɔɔ woji ashishi yɛ Albania wiemɔ mli.
11 Nitsumɔ hei wuji komɛi hɔɔ kɔmpiutai ni afee emli gbɛjianɔtoi ni yɔɔ mli lɛ momo ni akɛwo mla shishi.
Ákɛ nɔkwɛmɔnɔ lɛ, kɛji kɔmpiuta lɛ kadi akɛ Blɔfo wiemɔ pɔtɛɛ ko jeɔ kpo shii abɔ yɛ wolo lɛ mli, ni ákɛ be fɛɛ be ni epueɔ lɛ, Ga wiemɔ ni ji “shia” ji nɔ ni akɛtsɔɔ shishi lɛ, no lɛ kɔmpiuta lɛ muɔ sane naa akɛ nakai Blɔfo wiemɔ lɛ shishi yɛ Ga mli ji “shia.”
Shi ahɔɔ kɔmpiuta mli nibii ni ato he gbɛjianɔ kɛha nitsumɔ pɔtɛɛ ko nɛɛ ateŋ babaoo.
Atswa saŋkui, amɛla lalai, amɛjojooi, amɛye nii, ni amɛnu daai.
14 David kɛ ehewalɛ fɛɛ miijo yɛ Yehowa hiɛ; no mli fɛɛ lɛ, David wo* klala efɔd.
Kɛji akɛ anu dãa ni wa fe nine yɛ yookpeemɔ ko shishi, ni atswa lala waa kɛ gbɛɛmɔ ni wa, ni ajo waa fe nine lɛ, no lɛ oshara yɛ waa akɛ nakai be lɛ baanyɛ atsɔ nɔ ko ni tamɔ shwɛmɔ fɔŋ kɛ hoofeemɔ.
Mɛi ni yɔɔ Yerusalem lɛ na amɛmaŋtsɛ lɛ “miijo ni eehuru” “kɛ ehewalɛ fɛɛ.”—1 Kronika 15:15, 16, 29; 2 Samuel 6:11-16.
Japan obalayoo ko kɛɛ: “Kɛ mibo rap lalai atoi lɛ mimii shɛɔ mihe, ni kɛ miijo lɛ, minuɔ heyeli he waa.”
Sɛɛ mli lɛ amɛwo amɛ maŋ atadei kɛjo amɛmaŋ joo ko ni yɔɔ fɛo waa.
Nakai nɔŋŋ ŋmɛnɛ, bei pii lɛ lala kɛ joo baanyɛ afee nɔ ni akpɛlɛɔ nɔ yɛ he ni wɔyɔɔ lɛ, ni ekolɛ egbaŋ mɛi krokomɛi ahenilee naa.
Amɛteŋ mɔ kome baanyɛ efee enii akɛ Tsɛ ni mɔ kroko lɛ hu baanyɛ efee enii akɛ Nyɛ, shi esa akɛ amɛfee ekome kɛtao sane ni wieɔ skul joi ahe ni amɛbatsɔɔ wɔ gbɛ yɛ he.”
Eji Katoliknyo ni etu ehe eha, shi ehiɛnɔkamɔ fee yaka beni ena akɛ osɔfo lɛ shɛreɔ zigaret ni eyaa dance, taakɛ je lɛŋ bii krokomɛi lɛ feɔ pɛpɛɛpɛ lɛ.
Kɛlɛ, yɛ Afrika wuoyigbɛ lɛ, yɛ yookpeemɔi babaoo ni atee nyɛsɛɛ nɛɛ lɛ shishi lɛ, Kristofoi oblahii kɛ oblayei ni ahala amɛ koni amɛfee yookpeemɔ kuu lɛ mli bii ateŋ mɛi komɛi lɛ tsɔ hiɛ amɛfite bei babaoo kɛkase joo ko ni wa joo.
Eeenyɛ efee akɛ, yɛ Nyɔŋmɔ tsuji anɔkwafoi ni hi shi yɛ Biblia beaŋ lɛ ateŋ lɛ, joo ji nɔ ko ni baa trukaa, ni ejeee nɔ titri ni afeɔ yɛ amɛ yookpeemɔi ashishi.
Nakai nyɔŋmɔ ni wala bɛ emli lɛ eyanyɛɛɛ etsɛ̃ la kuli po yɛ bolɔmɔ ni egbalɔi lɛ bolɔ amɛtsɛ lɛ, jooi ni amɛjojoi kɛ kaklai ni amɛkɛfolɔfolɔɔ amɛhe kɛkpa lɛ fai lɛ fɛɛ sɛɛ.
Akɛni maŋkwramɔŋ bei, pɛsɛmkunya, tutuamɔ, kɛ weku kɛ adesai aweku mli bei ni ehe shi waa lɛ yɔɔ hewɔ lɛ, taakɛ Gwynne Dyer kɛɛ lɛ, “adesai aweku muu lɛ fɛɛ miijo yɛ gbonyobu lɛ naa tuuntu.”
Kɛ́ abaatswa lalai ni abaajo hu lɛ, ani ekɛ tɛi ni afolɔ ashwie shi kɛha Kristofoi lɛ baakpã gbee?
Yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ, kooloi agboi lɛ fɛɛ tsɔɔ . . . amɛnifeemɔi, ŋmajee, tsɛ́mɔi, bolɔmɔi, kɛ lalai anɔ amɛwieɔ, ni wobii joɔ po kɛwieɔ.
Kɛkɛ lɛ wekumɛi kɛ nanemɛi baa ni amɛlaa, amɛjoɔ, amɛyeɔ nii, ni amɛnuɔ dãai kɛyashiɔ jetsɛremɔ leebi mra.
Niyeli kɛ ninumɔ babaoo, joo, kɛ lala gbeleɔ gbɛ kɛhaa bɔlɛnamɔ mli yakayaka nifeemɔ.
Ani tɔ̃mɔ yɛ joo nɛɛ he aloo ekolɛ eji jeŋbii anifeemɔ?
Yɛ he ni eyɔɔ tsutsu lɛ, joo jeee nifeemɔ ko ni ehe shi waa, shi yɛ Spain lɛ, eji kusum lɛ fã.
7:1—Mɛni ji “Mahanaim joo lɛ”?
Amɛtamɔ gbekɛbii ni tara jaji anɔ ni amɛtsɛtsɛɔ amɛnanemɛi akɛ: ‘Wɔkpã bɛlɛ wɔha nyɛ, ni nyɛjoko; wɔwo yara wɔha nyɛ, ni nyɛfoko.’
Akɛ Hela wiemɔ ni akɛtsu nii akɛ “shwɛmɔ fɔŋ kɛ hoofeemɔ” lɛ tsu nii ni akɛtsɔɔ gbɛjegbɛ ni efee hoo, ni oblahii kɛ oblayei ni etɔ dãa fa kɛ fa ni miila, ni miijo ni miitswa lala yɔɔ nɔ.
Shi kɛlɛ, esa akɛ anɔkwa Kristofoi ahenaabuamɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ lɛ afee sɔrɔto yɛ je lɛŋ okpɔlɔŋmɛɛi ni nɔ ni kadiɔ nomɛi ji nii ni afeɔ kɛtekeɔ nɔ, dãanumɔ babaoo, fufeemɔ, lalai ni naa wa, yakayaka jooi kɛ nɔmɔi po lɛ.
Shi kɛlɛ, yɛ nɔ ni ji shii enyɔ nɔ lɛ, eye omanye, ni no ha David ná miishɛɛ ni ejo waa.
Be ni amɛmiilá lɛ, yei lɛ miijo ni amɛmiisha akashaa.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yudafoi ni hi shi yɛ Yeremia beaŋ lɛ ateŋ mɛi babaoo ji “tsuiŋ foolɔi”?
+ 41 Manya amɛhe koni mafee amɛ ekpakpa,+ ni mikɛ mitsui fɛɛ kɛ misusuma* fɛɛ baadu amɛ koni amɛmɔ shi yɛ shikpɔŋ nɛɛ nɔ.’”
Hebri sht. ŋm., “ebɛ tsui.”
Efee nii “yɛ tsui ni eye emuu kɛ jalɛ mli.”
10 Yiwalaheremɔ ko bɛ kɛha mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni ekpɛlɛɛɛ “hemɔkɛyeli wiemɔ” nɛɛ nɔ kɛ ekɛ nitsumɔ nɔ, taakɛ bɔfo lɛ tee nɔ ejaje lɛ: “Ejaakɛ tsui akɛheɔ ayeɔ kɛshɛɔ jalɛ he, ni naabu akɛjajeɔ kɛshɛɔ yiwalaheremɔ he.
Abɛi 2:10-19 jeɔ shishi nɛkɛ akɛ: “Ejaakɛ ŋaalee aaabote otsui mli ni nilee aaaŋɔɔ osusuma naa; jwɛŋmɔ aaabaa oyi jogbaŋŋ, sane shishinumɔ [sɛɛyoomɔ, NW] aaabu ohe.”
(Yohane 18:37, TEV; Luka 4:43) Yesu kpaaa mɛi ni yɔɔ tsuii kɛ jwɛŋmɔi ni baahe wiemɔ lɛ ewo mli lɛ anitsɔɔmɔ.
Amrɔ nɛɛ, datrɛfoi yɛ gbɛi kɛ tsɔji krɛdɛi komɛi ni amɛkɛtsuɔ nii kɛkwɛɔ helatsɛ ko tsui beni eetswa lɛ, ni no haa amɛnaa bɔ ni tsui lɛ yɔɔ diɛŋtsɛ.
Taakɛ ehe miihia ni wɔtsui lɛ aná niyenii ni hewalɛ yɔɔ mli lɛ, esa akɛ wɔná mumɔŋ niyenii kpakpai ni fá bɔ ni sa.
Belɛ, wɔsumɔŋ akɛ wɔɔkpaŋ kɛfite gbãla bɔni afee ni wɔnyɛ wɔkɛ mɔ kroko abote gbalashihilɛ mli.—Yer.
Beni Yesu kɛ mɛi ni jáaa Yehowa yɛ anɔkwale mli lɛ wieɔ lɛ, etsɛ́ Yehowa wiemɔ yisɛɛ ni ekɛɛ akɛ: “Maŋ nɛɛ kɛ amɛnaabu woɔ mi; shi amɛtsui etsi ehe kɛjɛ mihe kɛtee shɔŋŋ.”
Yesaia gba akɛ mɛi ahiŋmɛii baashwila ni amɛtsui hu baakpilim koni amɛkakpale ni atsa amɛ.
Agbɛnɛ ehe miihia ni wɔya nɔ wɔye mumɔŋ niyenii kpakpa lɛ koni wɔya nɔ wɔhiɛ tsui ni fiɔ shi shiŋŋ mli akɛ Yehowa tsuji ni amɛjɔɔ amɛhe nɔ.
Yesu ma tsakpãa ni yɔɔ nibii ni wɔnaa kɛ nibii ni wɔshweɔ lɛ teŋ lɛ nɔ mi, ebɔ kɔkɔ akɛ: “Mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni kwɛɔ yoo ni ehe feɔ lɛ akɔnɔ lɛ, ekɛ lɛ efite gbala momo yɛ etsui mli.”
Kɛ amɛnu ni eetsɛ wiemɔ ko kɛmiitsara nɔ, kɛfata eŋmɔlɔ lɛ he, ekolɛ “Mama” loo “Dada” lɛ, ehaa amɛtsuii yimɔɔ obɔ kɛ miishɛɛ.
• Te wɔɔfee tɛŋŋ wɔha Yehowa tsui anya?
Obaanyɛ oná enɛ kɛ́ oyɛ suɔmɔ diɛŋtsɛ kɛha Yehowa, ni okɛ nɔ ni gbohiiashitee hiɛnɔkamɔ lɛ tsɔɔ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ to otsui mli.
Akɛni gbekɛbii ajwɛŋmɔ esako ni amɛkɛ amɛhe fɔɔ mɛi anɔ hewɔ lɛ, amɛji mɛi titri ni heguɔgbee baanyɛ aye amɛ awui waa.—Kolosebii 3:21.
12 Kɛfata he lɛ, Paulo wie akɛ: “Nyɛhaa wɔkɛ anɔkwa tsuii abɛŋkɛa yɛ hemɔkɛyeli ni wɔyɔɔ hewalɛ yɛ nɔ lɛ mli, kɛ tsui hu ni atsuu he ni ebɛ henilee fɔŋ ko dɔŋŋ, kɛ gbɔmɔtso ni akɛ nu ni mli tse eju he.”
4 Wiemɔ ni ji “tsui” ni akɛtsu nii yɛ Abɛi 4:23 lɛ ji “mligbɛ gbɔmɔ” lɛ loo ‘teemɔŋ gbɔmɔ’ lɛ.

Ajie wɔlalai lɛ amli wiemɔi lɛ babaoo kɛjɛ Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli, no hewɔ lɛ, gbɛ ko ni hi jogbaŋŋ ni wɔbaanyɛ wɔtsɔ nɔ wɔha anɔkwale lɛ abote wɔtsuiŋ ji lalai lɛ ekomɛi amli wiemɔi ni wɔɔkase.

(b) Mɛni hewɔ kɛ́ wɔkɛ nanemɛi Kristofoi bɔ lɛ no baabu wɔhe lɛ?

(2 Timoteo 2:17, 18) Ekã shi faŋŋ akɛ, amɛhé amɛye akɛ gbohiiashitee kome pɛ ní yɔɔ lɛ ji mumɔŋ nɔ̃, ni akɛ Kristofoi anine eshɛ nɔ momo.
□ Kristofoi asafo lɛ ji teokrase yɛ mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ, ni mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ atsɔ ato he gbɛjianɔ?
Beni etsɛ jwɛŋmɔ yisɛɛ kɛtee mɔdɛŋ srɔtoi ni abɔ koni awo nɔyeli lɛ ashɛ afɔ lɛ sɛɛ lɛ, ekai eshitee-kɛ-wolɔi lɛ akɛ mɛi ni tee nɔyeli lɛ yinɔ apam lɛ ji wɔŋjalɔi diɛŋtsɛ, shi jeee Kristofoi.
Kɛ́ wɔye mumɔŋ niyenii ni akɛha yɛ “be ni sa nɔ”—kɛtsɔ Kristofoi awoji, asafoŋ kpeei, kpeei bibii kɛ kpeei wuji—anɔ be fɛɛ be lɛ, no lɛ wɔbaanyɛ wɔná hekɛnɔfɔɔ akɛ wɔkɛ wɔnanemɛi Kristofoi baahiɛ hemɔkɛyeli kɛ nilee lɛ mli yɛ “ekomefeemɔ” mli.—Mateo 24:45.
Mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Kristofonyo ko damɔ henumɔŋ naagbai anaa?
Tertullian wolo ni ale fe fɛɛ ji Apology, ni akpɛlɛɔ nɔ akɛ eji Kristojamɔ folo hefamɔi awolo ni yɔɔ hewalɛ waa lɛ ateŋ ekome.
16:19) Aagbala jwɛŋmɔ kɛmiiba mɛi ni feɔ nɔyeli ni baaye adesa nɔ afii 1,000 lɛ nɔ titri, ni etamɔ nɔ ni Kristofoi a-Hela Ŋmalɛi lɛ amli woji ni ajɛ mumɔ mli aŋmala lɛ fɛɛ gbalaa jwɛŋmɔ kɛbaa nɛkɛ Maŋtsɛyeli niyelɔi akuu nɛɛ anɔ titri—“krɔŋkrɔŋbii lɛ,” “ni ena ŋwɛi tsɛmɔ lɛ eko” lɛ.
3:24) Kristofonyo ní ‘eda yɛ jwɛŋmɔ gbɛfaŋ lɛ’ náa hiɛsɔɔ ni tamɔ nɛkɛ ni ekɛ Yehowa teŋ wekukpaa lɛ mli waa diɛŋtsɛ.—1 Kor.
No hewɔ lɛ ebɛ naakpɛɛ akɛ Kristofoi oshijafoi aaana henumɔi ni mli wa ni tamɔ nɛkɛ.
Kɛ egbaaa helatsɛ ko naa tete po lɛ, te ebaafee tɛŋŋ ni Kristofonyo datrɛfonyo ko ni yɔɔ hegbɛ lɛ kɛ famɔ baaha koni aha mɔ ko lá loo afite musu, yɛ be mli ni ele nɔ ni Biblia lɛ kɛɔ yɛ saji nɛɛ ahe?
Kɛ́ akai Kristofonyo ni kɛ afii babaoo esɔmɔ lɛ wiemɔ ko shishitsɔɔmɔ lɛ, ebaanyɛ eye ebua lɛ ni enu nɔ ni ŋmalɛ lɛ kɛɔ diɛŋtsɛ lɛ shishi jogbaŋŋ.
6:14-16) Esaaa akɛ nifeemɔi ni baaya nɔ yɛ Kristofonyo ko yara nɔ lɛ gbaa enanemɛi héyelilɔi ahenilee naa loo etoɔ mɛi ni le nɔ ni wɔheɔ wɔyeɔ ní wɔtsɔɔ yɛ gbohii ahe lɛ pampi.
6:17-20) Ani wɔ hu wɔsɔleɔ wɔhaa wɔnyɛmimɛi Kristofoi krokomɛi yɛ gbɛ ni tamɔ nakai nɔŋŋ nɔ?
Kristofoi bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛkɛ Biblia mli ŋaawoo nɛɛ atsu nii yɛ wiemɔ kɛ nifeemɔ mli, nɔ ni kɛɔ akɛ: ‘Taomɔ hejɔlɛ ni onyiɛ no sɛɛ.’—1 Petro 3:11.
No hewɔ lɛ, amɛ hu ehe miihia ni amɛkɛ nilee atsu nii yɛ wekukpaa ni aaaka amɛkɛ mɛi ni yɔɔ anɔkwa Kristofoi asafo lɛ sɛɛ lɛ ateŋ lɛ gbɛfaŋ.
8 Kɛ́ oji Kristofonyo ni oyɛ ŋa lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ oootsɔ okpoo ŋkomeŋfa sui ní ojɛ anɔkwayeli mli ojie suɔmɔ kpo otsɔɔ oŋa lɛ?
Te ohiɛɔ nikeenii ni Nyɔŋmɔ kɛha bo nɛɛ ohaa tɛŋŋ?
9 Shi amrɔ nɛɛ ni nyɛbale Nyɔŋmɔ, aloo kɛ́ wɔɔkɛɛ lɛ, Nyɔŋmɔ ebale nyɛ nɛɛ, te tɛŋŋ ni nyɛkuɔ nyɛsɛɛ kɛyaa susumɔi ni nyɛɛɛ nɔ ko atsu+ ni sɛɛnamɔ bɛ he lɛ ahe, ni nyɛmiitao ni amɛye nyɛ nyɔŋ lɛ?

● Kɛ́ ajɛ bo loo awo omli la lɛ, mɛɛ gbɛ nɔ Yesu wiemɔi lɛ baaye abua bo ni okɛ nilee afee onii?—Mateo 5:38-42.

Woloŋmalɔ ko bu naa akɛ “[tɛŋ] tsei fɛɛ ni woɔ yibii lɛ ateŋ eko fɛɛ eko nyɛɔ ewoɔ amitsrɔbii ni tsiimɔ shɛɔ tɔn enyɔ loo etɛ ehaa enɔtsɛ lɛ dani tso lɛ gboɔ.”
Susumɔ otii kpakpai enyɔ ko ni obaanyɛ okɛtsu nii ni okɛye kunim lɛ he.
Kwɛmɔ nikasemɔi enyɔ ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ, kɛha nɔ hewɔ kɛ bɔ ni abaashiɛ sanekpakpa lɛ atsɔɔ aha lɛ ahe saji amlipɛimɔ ni yaa hiɛ.—Marko 13:10.
No hewɔ lɛ akɛ lɛ kɛ eŋa, kɛ ebihii enyɔ je Biblia kasemɔ shishi.
Okɛ miniti kome loo enyɔ atsĩ woji tɛtrɛbii lɛ amli saji ni mɛi ni yɔɔ nyɛshikpɔŋkuku lɛ mli lɛ baanya he lɛ ateŋ fioo komɛi atã.
Eshinaa naa ŋmɛlɛ lɛ gbɛɛ, ni naa Yehowa Odasefoi enyɔ ni amɛdamɔ agbo lɛ naa.
Beni Yesu na ni ekɛ “leptoi enyɔ (tsaakpoo)” miiwo onia adeka lɛ mli lɛ, ani Yesu bu eniatsumɔ lɛ akɛ sɛɛnamɔ bɛ he?
Akɛ tɛ bluu kɛ eyɛŋ tswa wiemɔ kpoku nɛɛ, ni aye samai fɛfɛji awo he, ni ayɛ tsũi enyɔ yɛ kpoku lɛ he kɛ amɛmli sɛii ni akɛ tɛ fee, ni asaa shikpɔŋ lɛ fɛfɛo, ni amɛɔ yɛ tsũi nɛɛ amli.
10 Hɛɛ, suɔmɔ ni amɛaana amɛha Nyɔŋmɔ kɛ amɛhe, kɛ bulɛ ni amɛaajie lɛ kpo amɛtsɔɔ amɛhe hu ji nibii titrii enyɔ ni he hiaa waa yɛ gbalashihilɛ ni yeɔ omanye mli.
17 Anɔkwa jalɛ kɛ anɔkwayeli ji sui enyɔ komɛi ni Paulo je gbɛ etsi tã akɛ anaa faŋŋ yɛ gbɔmɔtso hee lɛ he.
Ewie yɛ be ko mli akɛ: “Osɔi yɛ bui, ni ŋwɛi lofɔji yɛ tsũi; shi gbɔmɔ bi lɛ bɛ he ni ekɛ eyitso tsɔleɔ.”
8, 9. (a) Mɛni fɔlɔi baanyɛ akase kɛjɛ loofɔji ahe yɛ amɛbii ni amɛaakwɛ amɛ yɛ gbɛ ni pɛsɛmkunya bɛ mli nɔ lɛ he?
‘Ŋwɛi loofɔji bahiɔ nɔ, ni amɛfeɔ tsũi yɛ ehɔŋ lɛ shishi.’
+ 33 Ni gbɔmɛi nɛɛ agbohii baatsɔ niyenii ahã ŋwɛi loofɔji kɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kooloi, ni mɔ ko mɔ ko eshwieŋ amɛ.
33 Ewieɔ tsei ahe, kɛjɛ tseneduru tso ni yɔɔ Lebanon lɛ nɔ kɛyashi hisopo+ ni kwɛ̃ɔ kɛjɛɔ gbogbo mli lɛ nɔ; ewieɔ kooloi,+ kɛ loofɔji,*+ kɛ kooloi ni wamɔɔ,*+ kɛ nu mli loi ahe.
Nɔ hewɔ ji akɛ, kooloi kɛ loofɔji ahe miihia Israelbii lɛ ni amɛkɛshã afɔle amɛha Nyɔŋmɔ.
Beni Yesu kɛ asafo babaoo ko ni ohiafoi fata he lɛ wieɔ lɛ, ekɛɛ akɛ: “Nyɛkwɛa ŋwɛi loofɔji lɛ: amɛduuu nii, asaŋ amɛkuuu, asaŋ amɛbuaaa naa amɛwooo aboŋoi amli; shi nyɛtsɛ ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi lɛ lɛɔ amɛ kɛ̃.
Beni David kwɛɔ tooi lɛ, ena Yehowa adebɔɔ nibii ni yɔɔ naakpɛɛ lɛ: ŋulamii babaoo ni yɔɔ ŋwɛi niiaŋ lɛ, “ŋaŋ kooloi,” kɛ “ŋwɛi loofɔji.”
Mɛni hewɔ wɔyɔɔ nɔmimaa akɛ wɔjara wa fe loofɔji lɛ?
Duguma nuu kɛ yoo lɛ fɛɛ joɔ foi amɛshiɔ amɛbii lɛ.
Kwɛ miishɛɛ ni eeefee akɛ wɔkɛ nakai nyɛmɔ lɛ aaatsu nii ni wɔkɛnu Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ kanemɔ kɛ emlitsɔɔmɔ, ni wɔkɛnu kɔɔyɔɔ gbɛɛmɔ yɛ tsei amli, abifao ŋmɔlɔ, kɛ loofɔlɔ lala hu!
Obaanyɛ okai lɛ miishɛɛ ni yɔɔ daa ni awooo he nyɔmɔ ni anáa kɛjɛɔ hulushinyɔɔ ni yɔɔ fɛo, fɔfɔi ko ŋmajee, aduawa ko ni ŋɔɔ waa lɛ yeli mli, loo okai lɛ miishɛɛ ni anáa beni akwɛɔ loofɔlɔ nyɛ ko ni miiha ebii niyenii lɛ.
Levinyo ko ni ená kulɛ etamɔ loofɔlɔ (3)
Woji ni aŋmala lɛ bɔɔ shiɛmɔ nitsumɔ lɛ nɔyaa he amaniɛ ni bei komɛi lɛ ekɛ anɔkwa saji ni kɔɔ loofɔji, kooloi, kɛ tsei ni yɔɔ maŋ pɔtɛɛ ni eyɔɔ mli lɛ he lɛ he amaniɛbɔɔ fataa he.
Loofɔji ni awie amɛ he yɛ abɛbua ni kɔɔ nidulɔ ni yashwã dumɔwui ni yashwie shikpɔŋ sũi srɔtoi anɔ lɛ he lɛ mli lɛ damɔ shi kɛha Maŋtsɛyeli lɛ henyɛlɔi ni bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ akɛ amɛye dumɔwui lɛ.
Ni akɛtee ŋwɛi loofɔji hu.
Shi nɛgbɛ Israelnyo ko baaná loofɔji kɛ kooloi yɛ ni ekɛshã afɔle lɛ eha Nyɔŋmɔ?
Kɛji akɛ Yehowa Nyɔŋmɔ kwɛɔ loofɔji kɛ fɔfɔii lɛ, bɔ fɛɛ bɔ ni ji lɛ, ebaakwɛ mɛi ni sumɔɔ lɛ ni ‘amɛyaa nɔ amɛtaoɔ maŋtsɛyeli lɛ kɛ ejalɛ lɛ’ kɛ̃.
Nyɛkwɛa loofɔji lɛ.
17 Kɛ́ okɛ yaa miitsɔ loofɔlɔ tsɔne be ni eena lɛ, oduŋ lɛ kɔkɔɔkɔ.
6 Ŋwɛi loofɔji lɛ fɛɛ feɔ amɛtsũi yɛ eniji wuji lɛ amli,
Nɔ ni Loofɔji Baanyɛ Atsɔɔ Wɔ
Henyɛlɔ ni he wa nɛɛ tsɔɔ gbɛ̀i nigii anɔ ebɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni elaka Yehowa webii lɛ ní edu amɛ tamɔ bɔ ni loofɔlɔdulɔ bɔɔ mɔdɛŋ ni edu loofɔlɔ lɛ.
Ewie nibii ni ale jogbaŋŋ tamɔ kane, ŋwɛi loofɔji, kɛ ŋa nɔ fɔfɔi ahe.
15 “No hewɔ lɛ, nyɛkwɛa nyɛhe nɔ jogbaŋŋ*—ejaakɛ gbi nɔ ni Yehowa kɛ nyɛ wie yɛ Horeb kɛjɛ la lɛ teŋ lɛ, nyɛnaaa nɔ ko nɔ ko*— 16 koni nyɛkaye sane fɔŋ ní nyɛyafee nɔ ko he amaga* nyɛhã nyɛhe, nuu loo yoo henɔ ko,+ 17 shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ kooloo ko henɔ ko loo loofɔlɔ ni filikiɔ yɛ ŋwɛi lɛ henɔ ko,+ 18 nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni wamɔɔ yɛ shikpɔŋ lɛ nɔ lɛ henɔ ko loo loi ni yɔɔ nui amli* lɛ henɔ ko.
□ Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔkwɛ Yehowa gbɛ kɛha sɛɛyoomɔ be fɛɛ be lɛ?
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni ooosusu akɛ ole gbɛ ni hi jogbaŋŋ ni oootsɔ nɔ ojie mɔhesusumɔ kpo otsɔɔ ohefatalɔ lɛ, mɛni hewɔ obiii lɛ ni etsɔɔ bo nɔ ni kɛ́ ofee lɛ ebaanya he waa?
Mɛni hewɔ mɔdɛŋbɔɔ he hiaa koni wɔnu mumɔŋ niyenii ahe hɔmɔ ni yeɔ mɔ he lɛ?
No hewɔ ni eji “mɛi ni taoɔ esɛɛgbɛ lɛ anyɔmɔwolɔ hu” lɛ.
Shi yɛ shihilɛ komɛi amli hu lɛ, ani efeŋ nɔ ni baahi moŋ akɛ wɔkɛ wiemɔ ni tswaa mɔ emaa shi waa ni yɔɔ ebe naa aaato najiaŋ?
Mɛɛ su kitã ni ji nyɔŋma lɛ wieɔ shiɔ, ni mɛni hewɔ?
Mɛni Hewɔ Mɛi Sɔleɔ?
Mɛni hewɔ miishɛjemɔ ni Yehowa kɛhaa lɛ yɔɔ srɔto lɛ?
□ Mɛni hewɔ adesai agbɛjianɔtoi yeee omanye yɛ mɔdɛŋ ni amɛbɔɔ ni amɛkɛ toiŋjɔlɛ ni sɛɛ tsɛɔ aba lɛ gbɛfaŋ lɛ?
Ebaakai bo nɔ̃ hewɔ ni esa akɛ ofee ekãa lɛ, ni ebaaha ona bɔ ni ooofee ni ohe asa kɛ nitsɔɔmɔ, ni ebaaha ona akɛ mɛi miibo shiɛmɔ ni wɔshiɛɔ lɛ toi lolo koni no awo bo hewalɛ.
4: Toma—Saneyitso: #Nɔ Hewɔ ni Esa akɛ Wɔsusu Nii Ahe Dani Wɔwie
Mɛni Hewɔ Yehowa Odasefoi Eyaaa Ta Lɛ?
24:14) Kɛ wɔhiɛ sɔ nɔ hewɔ ni esa akɛ wɔkã he wɔshiɛ lɛ, nijiaŋwujee fɛɛ loo nɔ fɛɛ nɔ ni baanyɛ agbala wɔjwɛŋmɔ ni bajeɔ wɔgbɛ nɔ lɛ etsiŋ wɔnaa.
▪ Baafa 22-23: Mɛni hewɔ mɛi babaoo ku amɛhiɛ amɛfɔ̃ oshara he kɔkɔbɔɔ nɔ yɛ Australia, yɛ afi 1974 kɛ yɛ Colombia, afi 1985 lɛ, ni mɛni jɛ mli kɛba?
Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ amɛfee nakai?
Belɛ, mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔŋmɛ gbɛ ni Satan aha wɔnu he akɛ anyɛŋ akɛ wɔhe eshai afa wɔ?
38 Nɔ Hewɔ Ni Esa Akɛ Wɔsumɔ Yesu Sane
(1 Korintobii 10:12) Mɛni hewɔ Paulo kɛɛ nakai?
Sanebimɔi: Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa kɛɛ ekɛ Nu Afua lɛ baaba lɛ?
18, 19. (a) Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ wɔkwɛ wɔhe nɔ jogbaŋŋ yɛ gbɛi nigii ni atsɔɔ nɔ ajieɔ je lɛ susumɔi lɛ ayi lɛ ahe?
Mɛni baaanyɛ aha mɔ ko aje ehefatalɔ sɛɛ, ni mɛni hewɔ mɔ ko nyɛŋ ekɛ afii abɔ ni eye lɛ ajie enaa lɛ?
Mɛni hewɔ Yehowa ‘shwɛ shwɛɛnɔ̃ fioo ko’ yɛ klɛŋklɛŋ afii oha lɛ mli lɛ?
No hewɔ lɛ eedɔ mi ni miishwa mihe yɛ su kɛ lamulu mli!.” —Hiob 42: 3, 6.
Mɛni hewɔ esa akɛ otsɔ mɔ ko tsɔne?
ejaakɛ kɛjɛ beyinɔ ní tsɛmɛi lɛ tee yawɔwɔi nɛɛ, bɔ ni nibii yɔɔ kɛjɛ jeŋbɔɔ shishijee mli lɛ, nakai nɔŋŋ amɛyɔɔ nɛɛ.”—2 Petro 3:4.
Weku shihilɛ lɛ fite kɛshɛ he ni miwekunyo ko kɛ mi ná bɔlɛ.
Awaa mɛi ni efeee blematsɛmɛi jamɔ nifeemɔ lɛ ayi yɛ be kɛ bei amli kɛtsɔ weku mli bii kɛ akutsoŋbii anɔ.
Nɛgbɛ osusuɔ akɛ wekui baanyɛ aná ŋaawoo kpakpai yɛ?
18 min: Nyɛfea Nyɛ Weku Nikasemɔ lɛ Daa.
Kɛ́ owekunyo ko ni ashwie lɛ lɛ sane miidɔ bo lɛ, sɔlemɔ ohã Yehowa ni ohã ele bɔ ni onuɔ he diɛŋtsɛ.
Shi mɔdɛŋbɔɔ ní akɛaawo mli lɛ sa, kɛji akɛ nyɛbaanyɛ nyɛkɛ ŋaawoo kome pɛ atsu nii yɛ be kome mli po, koni nyɛha nyɛweku nikasemɔ gbɛjianɔtoo lɛ aya hiɛ fiofio.
(2 Timoteo 3:1-5) Beni nibii agbɛjianɔtoo nɛɛ maa eyi shi kɛyaa enaagbee ni anyɛŋ atsĩ naa lɛ mli lɛ, ŋwanejee ko bɛ he akɛ nɔnyɛɛ ni baa wekui anɔ yɛ shikpɔji ni kpaako amɛyaa hiɛ lɛ anɔ lɛ baaya nɔ afa.
Ehala sane yitsei etɛ koni agba he sane—adesai kɛ shihilɛ, jeŋba kpakpa kpojiemɔ yɛ nitsumɔhe, kɛ jeŋba kpakpa kpojiemɔ yɛ weku lɛ mli.
10 No sɛɛ lɛ, oshiki ni ji etɛ+ ni afɔ̃ lɛ gbee Zebulon+ seshibii lɛ anɔ yɛ amɛtsɛmɛi ashĩai lɛ anaa, ni amɛgboshinii lɛ husu lɛ tee aahu kɛyashɛ Sarid.
(1 Petro 5:2, 3) Kɛfata amɛ diɛŋtsɛ amɛwekui ni amɛkwɛɔ lɛ ahe lɛ, ekolɛ ebaabi ni amɛhe be yɛ gbɛkɛ mli loo yɛ otsii lɛ anaagbee kɛtsu asafoŋ nibii ahe nii, ni nɔ ni fata he ji, amɛhe ni amɛaasaa kɛha asafoŋ kpeei srɔtoi lɛ amli nifeemɔi, nyɛmimɛi lɛ asaramɔ, kɛ mɛi ni etɔ̃ lɛ asaneyeli.
Kɛtsɔ nɛkɛ gbɛ nɔ lɛ, bo kɛ oweku lɛ baaná woji tɛtrɛbii ni akɛhaa nyɛ lɛ yibɔ ni sa daa.”
Ann kɛɛ akɛ: “Oblahii kɛ oblayei babaoo ni tamɔ mi lɛ bɛ wekumɛi ni kpɛlɛɔ amɛ Kristofoi ahemɔkɛyeli lɛ nɔ.
(Hebribii 10:23-25) Ekolɛ, amɛfee mɛi ni tiuɔ heloonaa nii asɛɛ, ni amɛkwaa mumɔŋ nibii yɛ be mli ni amɛbɔɔ mɔdɛŋ koni amɛfee shweshweeshwe yɛ shika gbɛfaŋ kɛha amɛhe kɛ amɛwekui lɛ.
Yɛ nɔ najiaŋ ni aaakase efalɛ ko kɛkɛ yɛ weku nikasemɔ be lɛ mli lɛ, fɔlɔi ni le nii lɛ kɛ nitsɔɔmɔ mli hesaa tsuɔ nii.
Ebɛ naakpɛɛ akɛ Betel weku lɛ yeee Blonya nakai December lɛ, ni no sɛɛ hu lɛ amɛyeee dɔŋŋ!
Gbalashihilɛ mli hefatalɔi nɛɛ na hu akɛ gbii komɛi ni amɛhala yɛ otsi lɛ mli akɛ amɛkɛkwɛŋ tɛlivishiŋ gbɛkɛ lɛ haa mɔ fɛɛ mɔ ni yɔɔ weku lɛ mli lɛ náa hegbɛ kɛkaneɔ nii.
Noa kɛ eweku lɛ, kɛ kooloi lɛ, kɛ niyenii ni amɛ fɛɛ amɛbaaye lɛ baahi tsũi lɛ amli.
Kɛ́ weku lɛ feɔ ekome kɛsɔleɔ, ni amɛwieɔ wiemɔi ni tsɔɔ akɛ amɛhiɛ sɔɔ Nyɔŋmɔ ekpakpafeemɔ lɛ, ebaaha gbekɛbii lɛ ana akɛ ehe miihia waa ni amɛkɛ Nyɔŋmɔ afee amɛ-Naanyo.”
Yɛ Weku lɛ Mli
Kɛ mɛi fɛɛ ni yɔɔ weku lɛ mli lɛ fee ekome kɛhi shi yɛ weku lɛ shika he gbɛjianɔtoo muu lɛ naa lɛ, ebaajie weku lɛ kɛjɛ naagbai babaoo mli.
Kɛji afee tsakemɔi yɛ shihilɛ lɛ mli lɛ, ani mɔ kome nyɔmɔwoo baanyɛ akwɛ weku lɛ?
Mɛɛ gbɛ Yesu kɛ eweku lɛ fãa daa afi yɛ March loo April mli, ni mɛni hewɔ?
11 Mɛni hewɔ osusuuu otii komɛi ni bo kɛ oweku lɛ baanyɛ atiu sɛɛ lɛ he?
22. (a) Mɛɛ he kaa-kɛ-kwɛmɔ weku mli bii baajɛ nilee mli amɛfee?
4 Mɛni hewɔ wɔpapa gbɛ́i lɛ baalaaje yɛ eweku lɛ mli akɛni ebɛ binuu ko lɛ hewɔ?
Nyɔŋmɔ Wiemɔ lɛ kɛɔ akɛ: “Shika suɔmɔ akaba nyɛjeŋba mli.”
Beni eba shia sɛɛ etsɛɛɛ lɛ, Ataa hɔ̃ɔ ekamɛra ni shaa mfoniri ewoɔ glase plɛte nɔ lɛ kɛ Awo shika nineshi nii lɛ koni ena shika ni wɔkɛya kpee wulu ko.
Eyɛ mli akɛ Sara náaa shika pii tamɔ bɔ ni enáa be ko ni eho lɛ moŋ, shi ehiɛ egbɛgbamɔ nitsumɔ lɛ mli.
(Mateo 3:7-12) Eji Yesu kɛ ekaselɔi lɛ baakpa Nyɔŋmɔ sane lɛ shiɛmɔ kulɛ, jamɔŋ hiɛnyiɛlɔi ni sumɔɔ shika nɛɛ amii baashɛ amɛhe waa.
Kɛfata he lɛ, shika he gbɛjianɔtoo baaha eje kpo faŋŋ akɛ shika ni afiteɔ kɛ pɛsɛmkunya, yɛ asɔshwɛmɔ, kɛ tawa shɛremɔ, kɛ daatɔɔ shɛii mli lɛ yeɔ weku lɛ shika gbɛfaŋ shihilɛ awui, ni eteɔ shi ewoɔ Biblia shishitoo mlai hu.—Abɛi 23:20, 21, 29-35; Romabii 6:19; Efesobii 5:3-5.
Enyɛɛɛ ewo shika lɛ amrɔ nɔŋŋ.
Kɛlɛ, esaaa akɛ afeɔ nɔ ko ni tamɔ nakai ni aja aha mɛi babaoo aloo ahɔ̃ɔ, ejaakɛ nakai feemɔ kuɔ copyright loo woji afeemɔ he mlai amli.—Rom.
Eyɔse akɛ shika lɛ amɛtaoɔ lɛ, no hewɔ lɛ, etsi ebɛŋkɛ amɛ ni ekɛɛ: “Ani nyɛ nɔ ko elaaje?”
Jamɔ mli hiɛnyiɛlɔi komɛi shiɛɔ koni awo amɛ ehe nyɔmɔ, kɛ eji nyɔmɔwoo kɛha jamɔŋ nifeemɔi loo kɛha amɛshiɛmɔ ni amɛtsuɔ he nii yɛ TV nɔ ni amɛkɛtaoɔ shika lɛ hewɔ.
13 Akɛni ehe bahia ni Eduardo awo nyɔmɔ ni emɔ lɛ fiofio hewɔ lɛ, hekpa ni kã shika lɛ nɔ lɛ bada.
Shi kɛlɛ, kɛji akɛ wɔkɛ shika ni wɔɔná fee nɔ titri yɛ wɔshihilɛ mli lɛ, wɔbaaná “jwɛŋmɔŋ piŋmɔi babaoo” mli amanehulu.
Nɔtsɛ lɛ kɛ eweku lɛ hiɛ sɔ nɔ ni Haykanush fee lɛ waa, no hewɔ lɛ amɛhã lɛ shika, shi eheee.
Ekpɛlɛ nɔ amrɔ akɛ shika he hiaa; shika ni sa ni mɔ ko yɔɔ lɛ hi fe ni ooohi shi kpɛŋŋ akɛ mɔ ni bɛ nɔ ko, loo yɛ ohia mli.
Ani eji mɔ ko ni sumɔɔ ni eya asafo lɛ mli koni eyafa shika yɛ mɛi srɔtoi adɛŋ?
Mɛɛ ŋaawoo Paulo kɛha yɛ hiɛjoomɔ kɛ shika suɔmɔ he?
Ejaakɛ “nilee tamɔ hɔɔŋ, tamɔ bɔ ni shika hu tamɔ hɔɔŋ lɛ; shi nɔ ni nilee kɛfe ji akɛ nilee hereɔ etsɛ yiwala.”
Wɔfɔɔ shika he naagbai ahe wiemɔ titri.’
Ekolɛ shika ni obɛ, weku mli naagbai, gbɔmɔtsoŋ hewalɛ ni onáaa, loo suɔlɔ ko gbele fata onaagbai lɛ ahe.
No hewɔ lɛ ekɔɔɔ he eko he ni mɔ oyɔɔ, kɛji akɛ oha kojolɔ, polisinyo, loo mɛi ni kwɛɔ koni akɛ mla lɛ atsu nii lɛ shika loo oke amɛ nii koni amɛkaye jalɛ sane, loo ní amɛku amɛhiɛ amɛshwie tɔmɔ loo mla mlikuu ko nɔ lɛ, eji nyɔɔŋnihamɔ.
Yɛ afi 2011 lɛ, etee France koni eyatsu nii kɛtao shika ni ekɛbaakwɛ ehe yɛ afi ni nyiɛ sɛɛ lɛ mli (afi ni ji ekpaa nɔ) yɛ Afrika.
Ani shika ji nɔ̃ diɛŋtsɛ ni kɛ shihilɛ mli miishɛɛ baa?
